MAT 1:1 Un'kaan a un'lwaaŋ a Yɛsu Klistɔ, itoo a David, itoo a Abàlam.
MAT 1:2 Abàlam kàbör Isak, Isak kàbör Yakɔb, Yakɔb kàbör Yudà anà atɔŋ ande,
MAT 1:3 Yudà kàbör Falesi anà Zalà, ikɔb a ngwän aba Tamar, Falesi kàbör Isilɔn, Isilɔn kàbör Alam,
MAT 1:4 Alam kàbör Aminadab, Aminadab kàbör Naasɔn, Naasɔn kàbör Salmɔn,
MAT 1:5 Salmɔn kàbör Bɔɔzi, Rayab kàkäl ngwän ande, Bɔɔzi kàbör Yɔbɛd, Luti kàkäl ngwän ande, Yɔbɛd kàbör Yɛsɛ,
MAT 1:6 Yɛsɛ kàbör mfum David. David kàbör Salàmun, ngwän ande kàkäl un'kyay a Uli.
MAT 1:7 Salɔmun kàbör Rɔbɔwam, Rɔbɔwam kàbör Abya, Abya kàbör Asa,
MAT 1:8 Asa kàbör Yɔsafat, Yɔsafat kàbör Yɔlam, Yɔlam kàbör Ɔsya,
MAT 1:9 Ɔsya kàbör Yɔwatam, Yɔwatam kàbör Akazi, Akazi kàbör Isikyä,
MAT 1:10 Isikyä kàbör Mànasi, Mànasi kàbör Amɔn, Amɔn kàbör Yɔsyä,
MAT 1:11 Yɔsyä kàbör Yɛkɔnya anà atɔŋ ande, u paŋà bàsɔ̈ɔ̈l baan a Isàlɛl nsi u Babilɔn.
MAT 1:12 Ungö a nsɔ̈ɔ̈l a nsi, Yɛkɔnya kàbör Salàtyɛl, Salàtyɛl kàbör Zɔrɔbabɛl,
MAT 1:13 Zɔrɔbabɛl kàbör Abyudi, Abyudi kàbör Ɛlyakim, Ɛlyakim kàbör Azɔr,
MAT 1:14 Azɔr kàbör Sadɔki, Sadɔki kàbör Akim, Akim kàbör Ɛlyudi,
MAT 1:15 Ɛlyudi kàbör Ɛlyazar, Ɛlyazar kàbör Matan, Matan kàbör Yakɔb,
MAT 1:16 Yakɔb kàbör Yɔsɛfi, un'dim a Màlye awà kàbör Yɛsu awà bàfàbel naa Klistɔ.
MAT 1:17 Abun, yanswà yàkäl ngyääl kwem aŋinà fà Abàlam mukàman David, yàfàlyaŋ sye ngyääl kwem aŋinà fà David tii u paŋà alà bàsɔ̈ɔ̈l baan a Isàlɛl nsi u Babilɔn, ngyääl kwem aŋinà sye yàfàlyaŋ fà nsɔ̈ɔ̈l a nsi u Babilɔn tii u paŋà alà bàbör Klistɔ.
MAT 1:18 Le, mböör a Yɛsu Klistɔ yàkäl abà: Ngwän ande Màlye kàkäl un'kaar kàtɛ Yɔsefi ntüüm, wɛɛ kusà ba mutàtüüb ndür, nde kàmɛnà anà yöm unsà ngwal a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl.
MAT 1:19 Wɛɛ un'dim ande Yɔsɛfi, ntɔn kàkäl nde mbuur a balàbal, nde kàkwen anki mukun'mɛɛy nswɛn u mii a baar, lalan kàwɛl nde an'kyän u mpem ande mukun'wɛy kà unku.
MAT 1:20 U taaŋ kàyweerà nde abà, un'kyeey a Mwol mwɛy kàyàmɛnà akà nde u ndwɛy, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Yɔsefi, mwan a David, twon an'man bɔɔmà muwal un'kyay angye Màlye, ntɔn yöm alà kan'bäl ande lan'fà akà Dweelà In'kyɛɛl.
MAT 1:21 Undiir awun, nde ayàbɔr mwan baal, ngye ayun'pà ikɔb a Yɛsu, ntɔn nde asàtswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a un'sɛŋ ande unsà man'be a wa. »
MAT 1:22 Ndaa ayi yanswà yà ntɔn undiir kàtɛn Mwol u mun a ŋangɔɔm ande ukwe:
MAT 1:23 « Le, mwan un'kaar unkɔr asàkal yöm, nde asàbɔr mwan baal, bàsun'beelà Mànwel », iswaŋà naa « Nzam wà uboo a bi ».
MAT 1:24 Mpal kàwiyà nde u twaal, Yɔsefi kàkyer ndaa kun'swɛŋ un'kyeey a Mwol, waa nde kàsi un'kyay ande u ndwà.
MAT 1:25 Wɛɛ nde kàtüüb anki ndür anà nde tii mpal kàbör nde mwan baal awà kàpɛ nde ikɔb a Yɛsu.
MAT 2:1 Yɛsu bun'bör u Bɛtelɛm a Yuday, umpal kàkäl Ɛlɔdi mfum. Ungö a mböör ande, baar bàfàleŋ muyöb nku a mbwaar bàfü mper làfàsɛnà taaŋ, ba bàyi u Yɛlusàlɛm,
MAT 2:2 waa bàfuul naa: « Wà ken Mfum a Ayudà ban'bɔr benàben awà? Bi kàmɛn mbwaar ande mper làfàsɛnà taaŋ, lalan kan'yà bi mukun'kömà. »
MAT 2:3 Mpal kàwem mfum Ɛlɔdi làsaŋ alà, nde kàkyer atɛɛr, anà Yɛlusàlɛm lanswà mbwo mwɛy anà nde.
MAT 2:4 Nde kàtüüb andwer angaŋ anà alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn, ntɔn mukafuul naa Klistɔ bàlun'bɔr ken.
MAT 2:5 Ba bun'fuur naa: « U Bɛtelɛm a Yuday. Ntɔn ŋangɔɔm kàsön abà:
MAT 2:6 « Le, ngye Bɛtelɛm, u nsi a Yuday, ngye kà awà bul làkɔ̈ɔ̈n ndöŋ anki u Yuday, ntɔn mfum asàdii un'sɛŋ amɛ Isàlɛl, asàtoo uboo a ngye. »
MAT 2:7 Apan, Ɛlɔdi kàbel aŋan'yeerà kà unku, ntɔn ba bun'kyään ubwaŋàbwaŋ taaŋ nà mbwaar kàmɛnà.
MAT 2:8 Apan, nde katöm Bɛtelɛm, waa kàtɛn naa: « Làkyen, kàlafuul ubwaŋàbwaŋ ntɔn mwan awà, bɛ làsun'man, yàlan'kyään, ntɔn mɛ sye in'kyen mukun'kömà. »
MAT 2:9 Ungö bàwem ba ndaa kàtɛn mfum Ɛlɔdi, ba waa bàkyen, waa bàfàman mbwaar awà bàtàman ba umper làfàsɛnà taaŋ: mbwaar wa kàyikyeenà kusà a ba tii kàkàmbar wa udu a ikal kàkäl mwan.
MAT 2:10 Umpal bun'tääl ba, ba bàmɛn un'sak mbɔɔn.
MAT 2:11 Mpal bàbilà ba u ndwà, ba bàmɛn mwan anà ngwän ande Màlye, waa bun'kömà. Apan, ba bàduub an'bɔ̈ɔ̈n aba, waa bun'pɛ an'kab mà: wɔl, tswà anà may a usɔŋ.
MAT 2:12 Ungö apan, Nzam kakyään u ndwɛy naa ba bàkɔɔn afurà akà Ɛlɔdi, ba waa bàfurà nsi aba u mbwo asin.
MAT 2:13 Ungö a nkyeen aba, un'kyeey a Mwol mwɛy kàyàmɛnà akà Yɔsefi u ndwɛy, waa kun'kyään naa: « Mbarà, un'sɛn mwan anà ngwän, katiin u Ngipiti. Kal kwo tii umpal in'saswaŋ mɛ mufurà. Ntɔn Ɛlɔdi ayàleŋ mudwa mwan. »
MAT 2:14 Undiir awun, Yɔsefi kàmbarà nde u mpib, kàsɛn nde mwan anà ngwän ande, waa kàkàyee u Ngipiti.
MAT 2:15 Nde kàbwaay kwo tii u nkweel a Ɛlɔdi, ntɔn undiir kàtɛn Mwol wà u mbwo a ŋangɔɔm ukwe: « Mɛ kàbel mwan amɛ mutoo u Ngipiti. »
MAT 2:16 Mpal kàyöb Ɛlɔdi naa baar bàfàleŋ muyöb nku a mbwaar bàkyer un'kur, nde kàwem nkyɛl mbɔɔn, waa kàswɛŋ naa bàdwä baan abaal a mbul yweel tii u ngyɛl u Bɛtelɛm anà u nsi ande yanswà, mulab paŋà bun'kyään aŋan'yeerà.
MAT 2:17 Abun, undiir kàtɛn ŋangɔɔm Yɛlɛmya wà kàkyer akwo:
MAT 2:18 « Bàwem ndaa mwɛy u Lamà, ilel anà in'tär mbɔɔn. Wawɛy Lakɛl wàmulel baan ande, nde ukwen anki naa mbuur kun'syääm, ntɔn ba bàfàkal anki. »
MAT 2:19 Ungö a nkweel a Ɛlɔdi, un'kyeey a Mwol mwɛy kàkàmɛnà u ndwɛy akà Yɔsefi u Ngipiti,
MAT 2:20 waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mbarà, un'sɛn mwan anà ngwän, furà u mɛɛn a Isàlɛl, ntɔn baar akwà bàkwen mudwa mwan ban'kwà. »
MAT 2:21 Undiir awun, Yɔsefi kàmbarà nde, kàwɛl nde mwan anà ngwän, waa kàfurà u mɛɛn a Isàlɛl.
MAT 2:22 Wɛɛ utaaŋ kàwem nde naa Alakɛlawüs kàsàkiir taarànde Ɛlɔdi u kir a imfum u Yuday, nde kàwem bɔɔmà mufurà kwo. Nzam kun'weey u ndwɛy, laa kàkàyee nde u mɛɛn a Ngalilɛ.
MAT 2:23 Nde kàkàtɔŋ u bul làmwɛy bàfàbel naa Nasàlɛr, ntɔn ndaa bàtɛn aŋangɔɔm ibü balàbal: « Nde bàsun'beelà un'nazɔrya. »
MAT 3:1 Utaaŋ alan, Ywan Un'düümà kàyàmɛnà u nsye a ipɔl a Yuday mulɔŋ naa:
MAT 3:2 « Làbuul mpem abɛ, ntɔn Imwol a du kye tsütsü! »
MAT 3:3 Ywan awà wà mbuur kàsam ŋangɔɔm Yɛsay utaaŋ kàtɛɛnà nde naa: « Ndaa mwɛy yàmusaa in'kwɛŋ u nsye a ipɔl: Làlɔ̈ɔ̈n mbwo a Mwol, làsuub myay ande! »
MAT 3:4 Ywan kàbwäärà ipfɛy a in'kà a Kamɛl anà un'kab a ibaan a ntsür u lɔŋ ande. Nde kàdyee mpay anà bwey a ndwaŋ.
MAT 3:5 Abun Yɛlusàlɛm, Yuday lanswà, anà un'tà a Yɔrdan bàkyeenà akà nde.
MAT 3:6 Ba bàkyeyà man'be aba u mii a baar anà Ywan kadümà u Yɔrdan.
MAT 3:7 Mpal kàmɛn nde naa Amfarisi anà Asadusi mbɔɔn bàyee akà nde ntɔn muwal ndüümà, nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mbil a iyäy! Nà kàlalɔŋ mutiin nkyɛl a Nzam ayà iyà?
MAT 3:8 Làswɛŋ unsà nsyääl abɛ naa bɛ lan'buul mpem,
MAT 3:9 anà twon lan'tɛn u mpem abɛ naa: "Abàlam wà nkaa abi!" Ntɔn mɛ alakyään naa Nzam kan'kwo mutwey ikyee a Abàlam u nkɔŋ yi!
MAT 3:10 Fà itaan nkwar yà tsütsü mutsul in'te kun'swɛy: un'te wanswà mpa afàbɔr imbɛŋ aŋàbwaŋ, bàkyer asun'tsul, waa bàsun'tɔɔm u mbaa.
MAT 3:11 « Mɛ, mɛ in'kàladümà kan'dà ntɔn mbuul a mpem. Wɛɛ mbuur awà ayà ungö a mɛ kàman'lyaŋ u ngwal: mɛ in'kwe anki musɔɔl idyäär ande. Nde, nde asàladümà u Dweelà In'kyɛɛl anà u mbaa.
MAT 3:12 Nde we anà impye u kɔɔ ande ntɔn mukɔɔm blɛ. Nde asàsà imbɛŋ uboo a ikɔr, wɛɛ un'lɛŋ nde asàtɔɔm u mbaa mpa isàdim akà ikikye. »
MAT 3:13 Abun, Yɛsu kàfü Ngalilɛ, waa kàyàkɔlà u Yɔrdan akà Ywan Un'düümà u ngyäl a Yɔrdan, ntɔn nde kun'dümà.
MAT 3:14 Wɛɛ Ywan kàmɛn ube, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mɛ, mɛ in'làkwo muyà akà ngye, ntɔn ngye an'pɛ ndüümà, wɛɛ ngye, ngye afàyà akà mɛ! »
MAT 3:15 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Wɛy ya ikäl abà apanà, ntɔn yà ubwaŋ naa bi ikwey balàbal lanswà. » Abun, Ywan waa kàkyey.
MAT 3:16 Pa kàwɛl nde ndüümà, Yɛsu laa kàtoo nde kan'dà. Taaŋ nsil la du waa làyaanà, nde kàmɛn Dweelà a Nzam wàmuyàtyà akà nde asànaa nkokà.
MAT 3:17 Le, ndaa mwɛy yàfü du, waa yàtɛn naa: « Wawà wà Mwan amɛ wà nkween. Mpem amɛ yanswà ye amu nde. »
MAT 4:1 Ungö apan, Dweelà a Nzam kàsyen Yɛsu u nsye a ipɔl ntɔn ileŋ kyun'lwɛb.
MAT 4:2 Ungö mukin udyà myäänà an'kwem an'nà anà mpib an'kwem an'nà, ngyal waa yun'käär.
MAT 4:3 Un'lwɛɛb kàyàsin tsütsü, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Kya ngye asàkal Mwan a Nzam, swaŋ nkɔŋ yi ibulà mampà. »
MAT 4:4 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kàfuur naa: « Bàsön naa: "Kà nà mampà mpɛl anki màfàpà mbuur mɔ̈ɔ̈, wɛɛ ndaa yanswà ifàtoo u mun a Nzam". »
MAT 4:5 Apan, ileŋ kyun'syen u bul in'kyɛɛl, laa kun'si nde udu a ndwà a Nzam,
MAT 4:6 waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Kya isàkal naa ngye awà Mwan a Nzam, tɔɔmà unsi, ntɔn bàsön naa: "Nde asàswaŋ akyeey ande ntɔn ngye, waa ba bàsawal kan'kɔɔ aba ntɔn làkɔl angye làkɔɔn aböl u nkɔŋ mwɛy". »
MAT 4:7 Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Bàsön sye naa: "Ngye asun'lwab anki Mwol, Nzam angye". »
MAT 4:8 Ileŋ kàfun'syen udu a mɔŋ a bwɛlàbwɛl, waa kun'mɛɛy imfum a mɛɛn byanswà anà làkoo abya,
MAT 4:9 waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mɛ in'sapà indiir bi byanswà, isàkal naa ngye aman'kömà anà aman'sà làkoo. »
MAT 4:10 Abun Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Satanà, kyà kunà! Ntɔn bàsön naa: "Ngye asàkömà Mwol Nzam angye anà ngye asàsyääl nde mpɛl". »
MAT 4:11 Abun, ileŋ waa kàsun'wɛy. Apan sye, akyeey bàyàsin tsütsü apà Yɛsu, waa bun'syäälà.
MAT 4:12 Mpal kàwem nde naa Ywan Un'düümà kan'bilà bɔlokà, Yɛsu kàkyen Ngalilɛ.
MAT 4:13 Ungö kàlwomà nde u Nasàlɛr, nde kàkyen Kapɛrnawum kun'kɔɔl a ɛwà, kà itiir a nsi a Zabulɔn anà Nɛftali,
MAT 4:14 ntɔn ndaa kàkyään ŋangɔɔm Yɛsay yi ikwe:
MAT 4:15 « Mɛɛn a Zabulɔn, mɛɛn a Nɛftali, mbwo a ngyäl a kölàköl, nsi ayà u sim a Yɔrdan lumwɛy, u Ngalilɛ a baar mpa abà Ayudà!
MAT 4:16 Un'sɛŋ kàkäl uboo a làpib kàkyàman pɛɛlà a kölàköl! Baar abà bàkäl u nsi a làpib a ukwà, pɛɛlà làmwɛy làkölàköl làkyàmɛnà! »
MAT 4:17 Fà umpal ayin, Yɛsu laa kàsɛmà nde mukyään naa: « Làbuul mpem abɛ: Imwol a du kyan'yàsin tsütsü! »
MAT 4:18 Mpal kàkäl nde muyikyà kun'kɔɔl a ɛwà a Ngalilɛ, nde kàmɛn atɔŋ abɔ̈ɔ̈l, Simɔn bàfàbel Petɔlà anà un'tɔŋ ande Andrɛ, bàmuyitɔɔm an'tɛy u ngyäl, ntɔn ba bàkäl alɔ̈ɔ̈b a nsö.
MAT 4:19 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Yà lan'läb, waa mɛ in'yàlabuul alɔ̈ɔ̈b a baar. »
MAT 4:20 Apan sye, ba bàsàwɛy an'tɛy, waa bun'läb.
MAT 4:21 Mpal kàfàsin nde kusà, nde kàmɛn atɔŋ abɔ̈ɔ̈l asin, Zyak anà Ywan, baan a Zɛbeday. Ba bàkäl uboo a bwaar aba anà taaràba Zɛbeday bàmulɔɔnà an'tɛy aba. Yɛsu waa kabel.
MAT 4:22 Apan sye, ba bàsàwɛy bwaar anà taaràba, waa bun'läb.
MAT 4:23 Ungö apan, nde kàyilyaŋà u Ngalilɛ wanswà, waa kàyilɔɔŋà uboo a ndwà a nköŋ aba, muyikyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là Imwol anà muyikɔɔr ukyäl banswà anà too lanswà uboo a un'sɛŋ.
MAT 4:24 Làsaŋ ande làpää u Siri lanswà, waa bun'twäälà abɛy bàkäl anà an'kyal mà ifà ifà: an'dweelà an'be, akweel a nkaaŋ anà ikar, waa kakɔɔr ba banswà.
MAT 4:25 Iköŋ a baar mbɔɔn bàfü Ngalilɛ, anà itiir a An'bul Kwem, anà Yɛlusàlɛm, Yuday anà sim a Yɔrdan waa bàyun'labà.
MAT 5:1 Mpal kàmɛn Yɛsu iköŋ a baar, nde kàbeenà udu a mɔŋ, waa kàbwaay. Alɔŋki ande bàsin apà nde,
MAT 5:2 nde waa kàsɛmà mukalɔŋ abà:
MAT 5:3 « Un'sak akà baar abye anà mpem a làbɔ̈ɔ̈n, ntɔn Imwol a du kye anà ba!
MAT 5:4 Un'sak akà baar bàlelà, ntɔn bàkyer asalɛɛl!
MAT 5:5 Un'sak akà baar a làbɔ̈ɔ̈n, ntɔn mɛɛn mà isàkal kwal aba!
MAT 5:6 Un'sak akà baar abye anà ngyal anà mfwää a balàbal, ntɔn ba bàkyer asàyuur!
MAT 5:7 Un'sak akà aŋangyɛb, ntɔn bàkyer asasyääm!
MAT 5:8 Un'sak akà baar abye anà mpem a pɛɛl, ntɔn ba bàsàman Nzam!
MAT 5:9 Un'sak akà baar bàfàsà duu, ntɔn bàsabel baan a Nzam!
MAT 5:10 Un'sak akà baar bàŋàmɛɛy nkwaaŋ ntɔn balàbal, ntɔn imwol a du isàkal kyà ba!
MAT 5:11 Un'sak we anà bɛ isàkal naa bàmàlato, bàmàlamɛɛy nkwaaŋ anà bàmàlaküür ndaa ntɔn mɛ.
MAT 5:12 Làsäŋ, làkäl kun'sak, ntɔn bweel a kölàköl làmukàladilà u du. Abun sye bàmɛɛy ba nkwaaŋ akà aŋangɔɔm bàkäl kusà abɛ. »
MAT 5:13 Nde kàfàtɛn naa: « Bɛ, bɛ làbà muŋ a mɛɛn. Isàkal naa ntsà a muŋ yan'wà, ya bàsàfuur a nkye? Ndöŋ a wa yan'wà, wa bàpiy u nsà, baar waa bàndyäär wa. »
MAT 5:14 « Bɛ, bɛ làbà pɛɛlà uboo a baar. Bul bàtöŋ u du a mɔŋ làfàkal anki làŋàyee.
MAT 5:15 Bàfàkyä anki mwinà ntɔn musà u ngyɛl a kantin. Wɛɛ wa bàfàsà udu a ikɔlà bàfàtɔl mwinà ntɔn wa upɛ kyɛɛy akà baar banswà abà uboo a ndwà.
MAT 5:16 Abun sye, wɛy pɛɛlà abɛ làŋyɛŋ u mii a baar, mpal bàman ba nsyääl abɛ yàŋàbwaŋ, ba bàsà Taaràbɛ awà u du làkoo. »
MAT 5:17 « Twon lan'si naa mɛ kàyi ntɔn mulwom Un'kɔɔn itàkal Aŋangɔɔm. Mɛ kàyii anki muyàlwom mya, wɛɛ ntɔn mukwey wa.
MAT 5:18 Mɛ, mɛ amàlakyään ndandaa naa, kusà du anà mɛɛn mulyaŋ, akà i mwɛy, akà un'tswe a i mwɛy usàlwomà anki unsà Un'kɔɔn tii mpal isàkwo indiir abi byanswà.
MAT 5:19 Undiir awun, mbuur asàbɛy, itàkal kinswɛɛŋ mwɛy uboo a in'kɔɔn ami myanswà anà asàlɔŋ baar mukyer abà, nde asàkal kimbuur uboo a Imwol a du. Wɛɛ mbuur asàsyääl mya anà asàlɔŋ mya akà baar bumwɛy, nde asàkal mbuur a kölàköl uboo a Imwol a du.
MAT 5:20 Mɛ, mɛ alakyään naa: isàkal naa balàbal abɛ làlyaŋ anki balàbal a alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn anà Amfarisi, bɛ, bɛ taaŋ asàbilà uboo a Imwol a du latɛy. »
MAT 5:21 « Bɛ làkyàwem, bàtɛn a bànkaa naa: "Ngye mbuur asàdwa anki. Mbuur asàdwa mbuur, bàsun'sà u làbay a nsaŋ."
MAT 5:22 Waa mɛ, mɛ alakyään naa: mbuur wanswà awà kan'wem un'tɔŋ ande nkyɛl, bun'sà u làbay a nsaŋ. Mbuur usàtɛn a un'tɔŋ ande naa: "Ntsür a mbuur!", nde bun'sà u Làbay a nsaŋ a kölàköl. Mbuur usàtɛn a nde naa: "Insil", nde bun'tɔɔm u yaaŋ a mbaa.
MAT 5:23 Abun, isàkal naa ngye an'kàpà ibɔɔn u mɛsà a ibɔɔn, wɛɛ apan ngye asàyɔbà naa un'tɔŋ angye we anà nkyɛl anà ngye,
MAT 5:24 sàwɛy ibɔɔn angye paa kusà a mɛsà a ibɔɔn, kyen katàkàlɔ̈ɔ̈n anà un'tɔŋ angye, ungö apan, yafurà mupà ibɔɔn angye.
MAT 5:25 Lɔɔn agyä anà ŋankir angye, u taaŋ awà ngye u mbwo anà nde, naa tɛy, ŋankir angye awà kapà kan'kɔɔ a ntɛɛn, ntɛɛn kan'kɔɔ a pulusi anà nde katɔɔm u bɔlokà.
MAT 5:26 Mɛ, mɛ akyään ndandaa naa: ngye asàtoo anki kwo isàkal naa ngye ŋàtàfur anki tii u làdiim làntsüü. »
MAT 5:27 « Bɛ, bɛ làkyàwem bàtɛn naa: "Ngye asàtà anki inswem."
MAT 5:28 Mɛ, mɛ alàkyään naa: mbuur wanswà kan'ler un'kaar anà an'kyän an'be, nde kan'furàtà inswem anà nde u mpem ande.
MAT 5:29 Isàkal naa dii angye libaal làkwen mukabwiy, kwol la, piy la ukwɛl: ntɔn yà ubwaŋ akà ngye naa itiir a ndür angye mwɛy ikɔ̈ɔ̈n, akwà naa bàtɔɔm ndür angye yanswà u mbaa a mbul a in'tye.
MAT 5:30 Wɛɛ isàkal naa kɔɔ angye libaal làkwen mukabwiy, tsul la, piy la ukwɛl: ntɔn yà ubwaŋ naa ngye akɔ̈ɔ̈n itiir a ndür angye, akwà naa ndür angye yanswà ikyen u mbaa a mbul a in'tye. »
MAT 5:31 « Bàtɛn sye naa: "Isàkal naa mbuur kan'böŋ un'kyay ande, wɛy nde kun'pɛ un'kaan a ndwääl a bɔr".
MAT 5:32 Waa mɛ, mɛ alakyään naa: Yan'kwo bàböŋ un'kaar kan'tà inswem mpɛl. Mbuur wanswà kan'böŋ un'kyay ande mpa kàtɛ nde inswem, nde kàmusiinà mutà inswem. Mbuur usàbääl un'kaar ban'böŋ u bɔr, nde kan'tà inswem. »
MAT 5:33 « Bɛ làkyàwem sye naa bàtɛn a bànkaa abi naa: "Twon an'sàbɛy kyän angye, wɛɛ ngye asàkwey kyän angye kusà a Mwol."
MAT 5:34 Waa mɛ, mɛ alàkyään naa twon lan'dyà kyän akà ikikye: itàkal naa u du, ntɔn du là kir a imwol a Nzam,
MAT 5:35 itàkal naa u mɛɛn, ntɔn mɛɛn mà ikal ufàtɔl nde in'kɔl ande, itàkal naa u Yɛlusàlɛm, ntɔn la là bul a Mfum a kölàköl.
MAT 5:36 Twon an'dyà sye kyän kun'tswe angye, ntɔn ngye akwe anki mubuul làtswe a un'tswe angye làpɛɛl, itàkal làpiil.
MAT 5:37 Wɛy naa ɛ angye làkäl "ɛ", itàkal naa ŋaa angye ukäl "ŋaa": ayà bàfàkwɛy udu pa ifàfà akà Un'be. »
MAT 5:38 « Bɛ làkyàwem ayà bàtɛn naa: "Dii ntɔn dii, anà din ntɔn din."
MAT 5:39 Waa mɛ, mɛ alàkyään naa twon lan'sà impeenà akà mbuur un'be. Isàkal naa mbuur kàmakam mbar u twam a ibaal, fun'lɛɛ sye lumwɛy.
MAT 5:40 Akà mbuur akwen mukasyen u làbay a nsaŋ ntɔn mugyɔɔr inkur angye, un'wɛy alà sye kàzak angye.
MAT 5:41 Isàkal naa mbuur amasiinà a ngwal mukyer kilɔmɛtre imwɛy, kyer an'kilɔmɛtre mɔ̈ɔ̈l mbwo mwɛy anà nde.
MAT 5:42 Pà akà mbuur kàmalɔ̈ɔ̈m. Twon an'pà ngö akà mbuur akwen musɔɔm akà ngye. »
MAT 5:43 « Bɛ làkyàwem ayà bàtɛn naa: "Ngye asàkwen un'tɔŋ angye anà ngye asàtɔn ŋankir angye."
MAT 5:44 Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ in'tɛn a bɛ naa: Lakwen aŋankir abɛ, làsaak baar bàfàlaküül, làkyer ubwaŋ akà baar bàfàlayiiŋ, anà làyamà ntɔn baar bàfàlatà an'kaal anà bàfàlamɛɛy nkwaaŋ.
MAT 5:45 Abun bɛ làsàbulà baan a Taaràbɛ awà u du. Ntɔn nde afàbaal mwäänà ande udu a baar abe anà udu a baar aŋàbwaŋ, anà afàtɔ̈ɔ̈l mbul udu baar a balàbal anà udu a baar mpa abà balàbal.
MAT 5:46 Kya isàkal naa bɛ, bɛ làfàkwen nà baar bàfàlakwen, bweel nà bɛ làsàwal? Nkye afüür a itɛr ba ŋakwo kà bàfàkyer anki abà?
MAT 5:47 Kya isàkal naa bɛ, bɛ mbɔr làfàpà nà atɔŋ abɛ mpɛl, undiir nà wà nsöön làfàkyer bɛ? Nkye baar mpa abà Ayudà sye bàfàkyer anki abun?
MAT 5:48 Undiir awun, làkäl bàlää asànaa Taaràbɛ awà u du awà nde wàlää. »
MAT 6:1 « Twon lan'kyer balàbal abɛ u mii a baar, ntɔn ba bàlamɛn. Naa tɛy, bɛ bweel làsàwal anki akà Taaràbɛ awà u du.
MAT 6:2 Twon an'bɛɛr mfuŋ u mii a baar isàkal naa ngye akwen mupà undiir akà ŋàlàmbwà, asànaa bàfàkyer baar a mpem yweel uboo a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà anà uboo a an'balàbal ntɔn baar basyäŋà. Ndandaa mɛ alakyään, ba bàkyàwal bweel aba itaan.
MAT 6:3 Wɛɛ akà ngye, mpal apà ngye undiir akà ŋàlàmbwà, wɛy kɔɔ angye likaar làkɔɔn ayöb ndaa làkyerà kɔɔ angye libaal.
MAT 6:4 Abun, wɛy kab angye làkäl aŋàyee, waa Taaràŋà awà afàman u nku, usafuur la. »
MAT 6:5 « Mpal làyamà bɛ, twon lan'kal asànaa baar a mpem yweel: ba bàfàkwen muyamà umbäär uboo a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà anà kan'kuun a mbwo ntɔn baar banswà bamɛn. Mɛ alàkyään ndandaa: ba bàkyàwal bweel aba itaan.
MAT 6:6 Wɛɛ akà ngye, isàkal naa ngye akwen muyamà, bilà u suk angye alà ukwɛl, dübà ibeenà anà sà un'kaŋ a boo, yamà Taaràŋà awà kwo kà ikal a ngyee. Waa Taaràŋà awà afàman u nku, usafuur ya. »
MAT 6:7 « Mpal làyamà bɛ, twon lan'tɛn itetɛɛn, asànaa baar mpa abà Ayudà: ba bàfàsi naa ba bàsàtɛn mbɔɔn ba bàsàwal nsaak.
MAT 6:8 Abun, twon làmalab, ntɔn Taaràbɛ akyàyöb naa undiir nà bɛ làbye awà ngyal kusà bɛ mukun'lɔ̈ɔ̈m.
MAT 6:9 Le bɛ, bɛ làyamà abà: "Taaràbi awà u du, wɛy ikɔb angye ikäl kyà in'kyɛɛl,
MAT 6:10 wɛy Imwol angye iyi, wɛy ukwen angye bàmɛnà u mɛɛn asànaa abà ba u du.
MAT 6:11 Ipɛ ŋàbawà isaa byan'kwo akà bi.
MAT 6:12 Idwääl un'pi a nkul a man'be abi, asànaa bi ŋakwo sye ifàdwääl bi un'pi a nkul a baar bà ikyer ube.
MAT 6:13 Twon an'pà mbwo naa bà ilwɛb, anà ilwom kan'kɔɔ a Ŋandɛb. [ Ntɔn imwol, ngwal anà làkoo bye anà ngye. Yà abwɛy" ] »
MAT 6:14 « Undiir awun, bɛ làsàdwääl baar bumwɛy nkul a ibii aba, Taaràbɛ awà u du asàladwääl nkul abɛ sye.
MAT 6:15 Wɛɛ isàkal naa bɛ làdwääl anki baar bumwɛy nkul a ibii, Taaràbɛ sye usàladwääl anki nkul a ibii abɛ. »
MAT 6:16 « Mpal làkin bɛ isaa, twon lan'kal ngyɛb ngyɛb asànaa bàfàkyer baar a mpem yweel: ba bàfàsɔɔm ntabwey aba ntɔn baar bamɛn naa ba ban'kin isaa. Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ alàkyään ndandaa naa ba bàkyàwal bweel aba itaan.
MAT 6:17 Wɛɛ akà ngye, mpal akin ngye, sir may a usɔŋ kun'tswe angye, ywɛy ntabwey angye
MAT 6:18 ntɔn baar bàkɔɔn ayöb naa ngye an'kin udyà, wɛɛ Taaràŋà mpɛl awà u nku. Waa Taaràŋà awà afàyöb ndaa afàkyer ngye u nku, usafuur ya. »
MAT 6:19 « Twon lan'köŋà in'naaŋ abɛ u mɛɛn pà, ikal a in'swab anà an'tär myàfàdwa mya myanswà, ikal bàfàbilà mbüüb ntɔn muyib.
MAT 6:20 Wɛɛ akà bɛ, làköŋà in'naaŋ u du, ntɔn kwo itàkal nsɛɛl itàkal in'swab myàfàkwo anki mutay mya, ikal mpa bàfàbilà mbüüb anà mpa bàfàyib ba.
MAT 6:21 Ntɔn ikal awà un'naaŋ angye, mpem angye sye isàkal kwo. »
MAT 6:22 « Dii là mwinà a ndür: isàkal naa dii angye là ubwaŋ, ndür angye yanswà isàkal aŋàpɛɛlà.
MAT 6:23 Wɛɛ isàkal naa dii angye lye anà ukyal, ndür angye yanswà isàkal uboo a mpib. Abun, isàkal naa pɛɛlà alà uboo a ngye là mpib, ya yà mpib a nkye ifà! »
MAT 6:24 « Mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki musyääl amfum abɔ̈ɔ̈l: taaŋ lumwɛy nde asàyiiŋ umwɛy anà asàkwen wumwɛy, taaŋ lumwɛy nde asàkàbääb a umwɛy anà asàbɛy wumwɛy. Bɛ, bɛ làkwe anki musyääl Nzam anà ngim taaŋ nsil la. »
MAT 6:25 « Undiir awun waa mɛ alakyään naa twon lan'man mpay ntɔn udii ndür abɛ, itàkal naa bɛ ya làsàbwää aben. Nkye mɔ̈ɔ̈ kà kan'söön isaa anki anà ndür kà yan'söön ipfɛy anki u ndöŋ?
MAT 6:26 Làler nɛn a du: ya ifàkɔn anki, ifàbwo anki anà ifàsà anki isaa uboo a ikɔr. Wɛɛ Taaràbɛ awà u du afàkyer adii! Nkye bɛ kà lan'söön ya anki u ndöŋ?
MAT 6:27 Nà uboo a bɛ kan'kwo mukwɛy ilä udu a mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande ntɔn nkyän ufàsà nde? »
MAT 6:28 « Waa ntɔn nkye làfàsà bɛ nkyän ntɔn ipfɛy? Làler iful a nsye ifàyɛl bya: bya ifàsal anki, bya ipfɛy byàfàtsum anki.
MAT 6:29 Wɛɛ mɛ alàkyään naa itàkal Salɔmun unsà làkoo ande lanswà, nde kàsàbwaar anki asànaa bya.
MAT 6:30 Isàkal naa Nzam afàbwää abà iteerà a ywaŋ akye anà möö ŋàbawà anà bàyàtɔɔm u mbaa nkàswo, nkye nde usàkyer anki yàŋàsöön akà bɛ, bɛ aŋàlàkwikilà ikikye?
MAT 6:31 Twon lan'sà nkyän anà mutɛn naa: "Ininà bi iyàdyà? ininà bi iyànwà? ininà bi iyàbwaar?"
MAT 6:32 Indiir abi byanswà baar mpa abà Ayudà bàfàleŋ bya taaŋ lanswà. Wɛɛ Taaràbɛ awà u du akyàyöb naa bɛ làbye anà ngyal a bya.
MAT 6:33 Wɛɛ akà bɛ, bɛ tàlaleŋà imwol anà balàbal a Nzam, waa nde usàlakwɛy indiir abi byanswà.
MAT 6:34 Undiir awun, twon lan'sà nkyän ntɔn nkàswo, ntɔn nkàswo akyer asàlɔ̈ɔ̈n nde ŋakwo. Ilä a ilä kye anà ndaa a kya. »
MAT 7:1 « Twon an'tsul nsaŋ, waa ngye sye mpa batsüül nsaŋ.
MAT 7:2 Ntɔn ngye sye bàsatsüül asànaa afàtsüül ngye baar bumwɛy, ngye sye bàsasi unsà isii afàsi ngye baar bumwɛy.
MAT 7:3 Ntɔn nkye amanà ngye nà un'lɛŋ awà u dii a un'tɔŋ angye, wɛɛ umpaaŋ a làbää wà u dii angye, ngye wa amanà anki?
MAT 7:4 Aben, ngye akwen mutɛn a un'tɔŋ angye naa: "Wɛy mɛ alwom un'lɛŋ u dii a ngye", wɛɛ le, ngye awe anà umpaaŋ a làbää u dii angye?
MAT 7:5 Ngye mbuur a mpem yweel, tàlwom umpaaŋ a làbää wà u dii angye, waa ngye ayàtääl ubwaŋàbwaŋ ntɔn mulwom un'lɛŋ u dii a un'tɔŋ angye. »
MAT 7:6 « Twon an'pà undiir a in'kyɛɛl akà mbwà. Twon lan'piy an'yak abɛ màntal kusà a ngul, manà ya iyàndyàndyäär ma anà ya iyàbulà mper akà bɛ ntɔn mukàlakyer ube. »
MAT 7:7 « Làlɔ̈m waa bàsàlapà, làleŋ waa bɛ làsàman, làbɛɛrà waa bàsàladuub.
MAT 7:8 Ntɔn mbuur awalɔm akyer awal, mbuur aleŋà akyer aman, akà mbuur awà abɛɛrà bàkyer asun'duub.
MAT 7:9 Nà uboo abɛ kan'kwo mupà nkɔŋ akà mwan ande, isàkal naa nde kan'lɔm mampà?
MAT 7:10 Naa sye nde kun'pɛ idyà an'kwar isàkal naa nde kan'lɔm nsö?
MAT 7:11 Bɛ, abe a baar làbà bɛ, isàkal naa bɛ làyöb mupà indiir aŋàbwaŋ akà baan abɛ, nkye ikɔɔn akà Taaràbɛ awà u du mupà indiir aŋàbwaŋ akà baar bun'lɔ̈ɔ̈m bya! »
MAT 7:12 « Abun, ndaa yanswà làkwen bɛ naa baar bàlakyeer, bɛ ŋakwo làkyer ya ntɔn ba: wawà un'kɔɔn anà aŋangɔɔm. »
MAT 7:13 « Làbilà u munàmbwo ikikye! Munàmbwo a kölàköl anà mbwo aŋàyaam ifàbiil baar kukwà, baar mbɔɔn bàfàbilà kwo.
MAT 7:14 Wɛɛ munàmbwo a ikikye anà mbwo a inküünà ifàsyen baar u mɔ̈ɔ̈, baar mbɔɔn ya bàfàman anki. »
MAT 7:15 « Wɛy bɛ làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ ntɔn aŋangɔɔm a loor. Ba bàfàbulà asànaa in'kɔk mpal bàfàyà ba akà bɛ, wɛɛ uboo a mpem aba, ba bà an'kyɛŋbɔl a mpɔr.
MAT 7:16 Bɛ, bɛ ba làsayöb unsà nkääl aba. Nkye ban'kwo bàbwe rɛzɛ unsà bite a nsyeenà, itàkal an'figɛ unsà ikwarngyal?
MAT 7:17 Kyakin, un'te aŋàbwaŋ afàbɔr mbɛŋ aŋàbwaŋ, wɛɛ un'te un'be afàbɔr mbɛŋ ambe.
MAT 7:18 Un'te aŋàbwaŋ ukwe anki mubɔr mbɛŋ ambe, itàkal isɔ̈ɔ̈là a un'te mubɔr mbɛŋ aŋàbwaŋ.
MAT 7:19 Un'te wanswà mpa afàbɔr mbɛŋ aŋàbwaŋ bàkyer afàtsul wa, waa bàfàtɔɔm u mbaa.
MAT 7:20 Abun, bɛ aŋangɔɔm a loor làsayöb u mbɛŋ aba. »
MAT 7:21 « Kyakin, kà baar banswà anki bàfàtɛn a mɛ naa "Mwol, Mwol", bàsàbilà uboo a Imwol a du, wɛɛ ba mpɛl bàfàkyer ukwen a Taaràmɛ awà u du.
MAT 7:22 Kà ilä kya, baar mbɔɔn bàsàtɛn a mɛ naa: "Mwol, Mwol, nkye ngye ayöb anki naa bi kàtɛɛ ngɔɔm kà ikɔb angye, bi kàböŋ insɔŋà kà ikɔb angye, bi sye kàkyer impà mbɔɔn kà ikɔb angye?"
MAT 7:23 Abun mɛ in'safuur naa: "Mɛ alàyöb anki akà ikikye, làkyà kunà, bɛ baar làfàkyer ube!" »
MAT 7:24 « Undiir awun, mbuur wanswà kan'wem ndaa an'tɛn mɛ yi anà ukasyäälà ya, asàkal asànaa ŋun'yɛnà mwɛy kàtöŋ ndwà ande udu a nkɔŋ.
MAT 7:25 Mpal kànɔ̈ mbul, ngyäl yàsi an'swɛb, ikül a mbul kyàsiinà ndwà ayi, wɛɛ ya yàbü anki ntɔn in'bään aya myàkäl udu a nkɔŋ.
MAT 7:26 Wɛɛ mbuur wanswà kan'wem ndaa an'tɛn mɛ yi anà ukɔɔn asyäälà ya, asàkal asànaa insil mwɛy kàtöŋ ndwà ande udu a ansɛŋ.
MAT 7:27 Mpal kànɔ̈ mbul, ngyäl yàsi an'swɛb, ikül a mbul kyàsiinà kya ndwà ayi, laa yàbü ya: mbwabà aya yàkäl yàngwal. »
MAT 7:28 Apan, mpal kàmay Yɛsu nswɛɛŋ ayi, baar banswà bàkäl mubem ntɔn an'lɔɔŋ ande,
MAT 7:29 ntɔn nde ba kalɔɔŋà a ikɔ̈b kyanswà, wɛɛ kà asànaa alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn aba anki.
MAT 8:1 Mpal kàyàtyà Yɛsu u mɔŋ, iköŋ a baar waa kyun'läb.
MAT 8:2 Le, ŋukyal a bay mwɛy kàyàsin tsütsü kusà a nde, kàbü an'köm, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, kya ngye asàkwen, mpööŋ. »
MAT 8:3 Yɛsu kàsilà kɔɔ, kun'bä, waa kàtɛn naa: « Mɛɛ an'kwen, pɔŋà! » Taaŋ nsil alan, laa kàpɔŋà nde u bay ande.
MAT 8:4 Ungö apan, Yɛsu kun'swɛŋ naa: « Twon an'sam ndaa ayi itàkal akà mbuur mwɛy. Wɛɛ, kyen akà ngaŋ anà kapɛ ibɔɔn kàswɛŋ Mɔsɛ, ntɔn kya ikäl imbäl ntɔn ba. »
MAT 8:5 Umpal kàbilà Yɛsu u Kapɛrnawum, kaptɛn a aŋità mwɛy kàsin tsütsü apà nde, waa kun'bɔ̈ɔ̈n,
MAT 8:6 waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwol, un'syääl amɛ wàŋàbɔ̈ɔ̈n u ndwà, ndür ande ikanii anki, nde wàmuweemà usaay mbɔɔn. »
MAT 8:7 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Mɛ, mɛ in'kyer akun'kɔɔr. »
MAT 8:8 Wɛɛ kaptɛn awun kàfuur naa: « Mwol, mɛ in'kwe anki naa ngye abilà u ndwà amɛ. Wɛɛ ngye, tɛn ndaa mwɛy mpɛl, un'syääl amɛ ukɔɔrà.
MAT 8:9 Ntɔn mɛ in'we anà amfum bàfan'ler anà mɛ sye in'we anà aŋità in'fàler mɛ. Kya mɛ insàtɛn a aŋità mwɛy naa: "Kyen!", nde laa ukyà nde, kya mɛ insàtɛn a wumwɛy naa: "Yà!", nde sye laa uyà nde, kya mɛ sye insàtɛn a un'syääl amɛ naa: "Kyer abà!", nde sye laa ukyer nde. »
MAT 8:10 Mpal kàwem Yɛsu ndaa ayin, laa kàbem nde, waa kàtɛn a baar bàyun'labà naa: « Mɛ alakyään ndandaa naa mɛ ŋàtàman anki làkwikilà atub alà akà mbuur mwɛy uboo a Isàlɛl.
MAT 8:11 Mɛ in'fàlakyään naa baar mbɔɔn bàsàfà mper làfàsɛnà anà làfàkàminà taaŋ, ba bàsàdyà mɛsà mwɛy anà Abàlam, Isak anà Yakɔb uboo a Imwol a du,
MAT 8:12 wɛɛ, aŋan'kwal a imwol bàsatɔɔm u nsà uboo a làpib: kwo isàkal ilel anà nkwoor a an'din. »
MAT 8:13 Apan Yɛsu kàtɛn a kaptɛn naa: « Furà ndwà angye, wɛy ya ikäl asànaa lan'lɔɔm làkwikilà angye! » Taaŋ nsil alan un'syääl a kaptɛn waa kàkɔɔrà.
MAT 8:14 Ungö apan, Yɛsu kàkyen ndwà a Petɔlà. Kwo nde kàmɛn ukwà a Petɔlà wun'kaar wàŋàbɔ̈ɔ̈n ntɔn nde kàkäl anà làbwey a mpye.
MAT 8:15 Nde kun'bä u kɔɔ, làbwey a mpye waa làtoo. Apan nde waa kàmbarà, waa kàsɛmà mukun'syääl.
MAT 8:16 U sisye, baar bun'twäälà baar bàkäl anà an'dweelà an'be mbɔɔn. Umbwo a ndaa ande, nde kàböŋà an'dweelà amà, waa kàkɔɔrà sye abɛy banswà.
MAT 8:17 Kàkyer nde abà ntɔn ndaa kàtɛn ŋangɔɔm Yɛsay ikwe: « Nde kàwɛl an'too anà an'kyal abi. »
MAT 8:18 Mpal kàmɛn Yɛsu iköŋ a baar kyàmun'diŋà, nde kàswɛŋ alɔŋki ande musabà sim a ɛwà lumwɛy.
MAT 8:19 Un'lɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn mwɛy kàsin, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, mɛ in'kyer ayalab mper yanswà ayàkyà ngye. »
MAT 8:20 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « In'kyɛŋ mye anà an'fu, nɛn sye ye anà an'yaab, wɛɛ Mwan a mbuur ikal atälà un'tswe kyatɛy. »
MAT 8:21 Umwɛy uboo a alɔŋki ande kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwol, mpɛ mbwo mɛ in'tàkàdyee taaràmɛ. »
MAT 8:22 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Yan'läb, wɛy akü bàdyee akü aba. »
MAT 8:23 Ungö apan, Yɛsu kàbilà u bwaar anà alɔŋki ande.
MAT 8:24 Kimbürà, un'pöb a ngwal kàyi udu a ɛwà, ibɔ a an'dà byàbilà u bwaar. Apan nde kàkäl aŋàbɔ̈ɔ̈n.
MAT 8:25 Alɔŋki bàsin apà nde, waa bun'wiy anà mutɛn naa: « Mwol, itsü mɔ̈ɔ̈! Bi abà ikwà! »
MAT 8:26 Nde kafuur naa: « Ntɔn nkye làbà bɛ u bɔɔmà? Bɛ baar a làkwikilà ikikye! » Apan, nde waa kàmbarà, kàŋän un'pöb anà ɛwà. Duu a mbɔɔn waa làbilà.
MAT 8:27 Ba banswà bàkäl mubem, waa bàtɛɛnà naa: « Mbuur awà wà nà, waa itàkal in'pöb anà ɛwà byàmukun'weemà? »
MAT 8:28 Mpal kàkɔlà Yɛsu u sim lumwɛy, u nsi a baar a Gadarà, baar a an'dweelà an'be bɔ̈ɔ̈l bayàtoo kan'dii, waa bàyàbwey anà nde. Ba bàkäl anà umpɔr mbɔɔn, lalan akà mbuur mwɛy kàkwe anki mulyaŋ u mbwo ayin.
MAT 8:29 Waa le, ba bàsɛmà musà in'kwɛŋ: « Mwan a Nzam, ndaa nà ngye awe ayà anà bi? Ngye an'yà pà ntɔn mukà itwääl lingyoomà kusà a taaŋ mukwo? »
MAT 8:30 U kikwɛl, làkäl anà làböl a kölàköl là ngul làkäl muyidyà.
MAT 8:31 An'dweelà an'be màlɔ̈ɔ̈m akà Yɛsu naa: « Kya ngye asàkwen mukiböŋ, itöm u làböl a ngul lanà. »
MAT 8:32 Nde kàtɛn a ma naa: « Làkyen. » Ma waa màtoo, waa màkàbilà u ngul. Apan sye, làböl a ngul làkaamà fà iköl a mɔŋ, waa làkàbwà kà ɛwà, waa làminà kan'dà.
MAT 8:33 Aseey a ngul waa bàtiin, bàkàbila u bul, waa bàkyään yinà yanswà yàlyaŋ anà indiir byàbweel baar bàkäl anà an'dweelà an'be.
MAT 8:34 Apan bul lanswà waa làtoo mukàman Yɛsu. Utaaŋ bun'mɛn ba, ba bun'bɔ̈ɔ̈n naa nde ulwomà u nsi aba.
MAT 9:1 Yɛsu kàbilà u bwaar, waa kàfàsabà ɛwà ntɔn mukyà bul ande.
MAT 9:2 Apan bun'twääl mbuur mwɛy wàŋàkwɛkà wàŋàbɔ̈ɔ̈n udu a ipɔy. Umpal kàmɛn Yɛsu làkwikilà aba, nde kàtɛn a mbuur aŋàkwɛkà naa: « Mwan amɛ, sà un'kanà! Bàmadwääl nkul a man'be angye! »
MAT 9:3 Wɛɛ alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn bàtɛɛnà ba a ba naa: « Mbuur wà an'bɛy Nzam! »
MAT 9:4 Yɛsu kàkyer ayöb an'kyän aba, waa kàtɛn naa: « Ntɔn nkye làwe bɛ anà an'kyän an'be u mpem abɛ?
MAT 9:5 Nkye byan'söön ubwaŋ, mutɛn naa: "Ube angye ban'wà", lɛɛ mutɛn naa: "Mbarà, kyen"?
MAT 9:6 Yà ubwaŋ naa bɛ, bɛ làyöb naa Mwan a mbuur we anà ikɔ̈b adwääl baar nkul u mɛɛn pà. » Apan, nde kàtɛn a mbuur aŋàkwɛkà naa: « Mɛ amaswaŋ: Mbarà, sɛn ipɔy angye, furà ndwà angye! »
MAT 9:7 Mbuur awun waa kàmbarà, waa kàkyen ndwà ande.
MAT 9:8 Mpal kyàmɛn iköŋ a baar ndaa ayi, kya kyàkäl u bɔɔmà, waa kyàkömà Nzam ntɔn kàpɛ nde ikɔ̈b atub aki akà baar.
MAT 9:9 Ungö apan, Yɛsu waa kàkyen. Mpal kàkäl nde mulyaŋ, nde kàmɛn mbuur mwɛy kàkyàbwaay kà ikal bàfàfur itɛr, ikɔb ande Màtay. Nde kàtɛn a nde naa: « Yan'läb! » Mbuur awà waa kàmbarà, waa kun'läb.
MAT 9:10 Yɛsu kàkäl mudyà u ndwà. Afüür a itɛr mbɔɔn anà baar abe bàyàdyà mɛsà mwɛy anà Yɛsu anà alɔŋki ande.
MAT 9:11 Mpal bàmɛn Amfarisi abun, ba bàfuul alɔŋki ande naa: « Ntɔn nkye Un'lɔɔŋ abɛ udyaa nde ikal imwɛy anà afüür a itɛr anà baar abe? »
MAT 9:12 Wɛɛ Yɛsu, mpal kàwem nde abwɛy, nde kàtɛn naa: « Mfun a ungaŋ yatɛy akà baar mpa abye anà ukyal, wɛɛ akà abɛy.
MAT 9:13 Abun, làkyen kàlalɔŋkà mbuul a ndaa yi: "Mɛ, mɛ in'kwen nsyääm, wɛɛ kà ibɔɔn anki." Ntɔn mɛ, mɛ kàyi anki mubel baar a balàbal, wɛɛ baar abe. »
MAT 9:14 Apan, alɔŋki a Ywan bàyi apà Yɛsu, waa bun'fuul naa: « Ntɔn nkye bi anà Amfarisi, bi ifàkin udyà, wɛɛ alɔŋki angye bàfàkin anki udyà? »
MAT 9:15 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Nkye asam a mbuur kan'tà bɔr ban'kwo bàkäl u ngyɛb umpal awà nde apà ba? Wɛɛ ilä ikyer asàyà bàsun'lwom ba uboboo a ba, apan ba bàsàkin udyà. »
MAT 9:16 « Akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki mubaay ipfɛy aŋànün anà ikaam a ipfɛy akün, ntɔn kya iyàkaam ipfɛy aŋànün, abun tuun a ipfɛy làyàbulà làkölàköl.
MAT 9:17 Vin akün bàfàsà anki u mbeen aŋànün manà mbeen iyàbölà, manà man iyàpää anà mbeen iyàkyà bwà. Wɛɛ vin akün bàfàsà u mbeen akün, waa vin anà mbeen byàsàkal aŋàtii ubwaŋ. »
MAT 9:18 Umpal kàtɛɛnà Yɛsu a ba abà, un'byääl mwɛy kàyàbwà an'köm kusà a nde, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwan amɛ wà un'kaar kan'kwà itaan a mbɔɔn tɛy. Wɛɛ yun'si an'kɔɔ, waa nde ufàyàkal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈. »
MAT 9:19 Apan, Yɛsu waa kàmbarà, waa kun'läb anà alɔŋki ande.
MAT 9:20 Taaŋ nsil alan, un'kaar mwɛy awàkàyitoo an'kil mbul kwem aŋiyweel, kàyàsin tsütsü ungö a Yɛsu, waa kàtɛ làpaan a ipfɛy ande mpi.
MAT 9:21 Ntɔn nde kàtɛɛnà naa: « Isàkal naa mɛ an'tà làpaan a ipfɛy ande mpi, mɛ in'kyer akɔɔrà. »
MAT 9:22 Mpal kàbulà Yɛsu anà kun'mɛn nde, nde kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwan amɛ, sà un'kanà! Làkwikilà angye làmakɔɔr. » Taaŋ nsil alan, un'kaar awà waa kàkɔɔrà.
MAT 9:23 Umpal kàkɔlà Yɛsu u ndwà a un'byääl awà anà kàmɛn nde abɛɛrà a mfuŋ anà mini a iköŋ a baar,
MAT 9:24 nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làlwomà, ntɔn mwan un'kaar ŋàkwà tɛy, nde wàmubɔ̈ɔ̈n. » Wɛɛ ba waa bun'sɛɛ.
MAT 9:25 Ungö bàtwey ba iköŋ a baar, nde waa kàbilà, kàtɛ kɔɔ a mwan un'kaar awun mpi, mwan un'kaar waa kàwiyà.
MAT 9:26 Làsaŋ a ndaa ayi làkyer apää kun'tà awun.
MAT 9:27 Umpal kàkyen Yɛsu, ikwàmii abɔ̈ɔ̈l waa bàyun'labà bàmuyisà in'kwɛŋ: « Mwan a David, iweem ngyɛb! »
MAT 9:28 Umpal kàbilà nde u ndwà, ikwàmii bàyàsin tsütsü apà nde, waa Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Nkye bɛ lan'sà làkwikilà naa mɛ an'kwo in'kyer ya? » Ba bun'fuur naa: « Inye, Mwol. »
MAT 9:29 Apan, Yɛsu waa kàbä mii aba, waa kàtɛn naa: « Wɛy ya ikäl asànaa alà làkwikilà abɛ! »
MAT 9:30 Waa mii aba myàyaanà. Yɛsu kaswɛŋ a ngwal naa: « Làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ, wɛy akà mbuur mwɛy ukɔɔn ayöb! »
MAT 9:31 Wɛɛ ba, pa làtoo, laa bàpay ba làsaŋ ande u nsi yanswà.
MAT 9:32 Umpal bàkäl ba mukyà, baar bun'twääl nkiin mwɛy kàkäl anà unsɔŋà.
MAT 9:33 Pa kàböŋ Yɛsu unsɔŋà awun, nkiin waa kàsɛmà musà ndaa. In'kàbɔ a baar bàmɛn ndaa yubem, waa bàtɛɛnà naa: « Ndaa atub ayi ŋàtàbwà anki kà Isàlɛl. »
MAT 9:34 Wɛɛ Amfarisi bàtɛn naa: « Nde an'dweelà an'be ayiböŋ unsà ikɔ̈b a mfum a an'dweelà an'be. »
MAT 9:35 Yɛsu kàyilyaŋà kà an'bul a kölàköl anà mà ikikye. Nde kàyilɔɔŋà u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà aba, mukyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là Imwol a du anà mukɔɔr ukyal banswà anà too lanswà.
MAT 9:36 Umpal kàmɛn nde iköŋ a baar, laa kàkyɛɛr nde, ntɔn baar abà bàkäl aŋàyɔn anà ndür aŋàkwamà, asànaa in'kɔk ikɔ̈ɔ̈n un'seey.
MAT 9:37 Apan nde kàtɛn a alɔŋki ande naa: « Mbɛŋ aŋàsöŋ yà mbɔɔn, wɛɛ baar a isal abwo ya bà ikikye.
MAT 9:38 Làlɔ̈ɔ̈m akà ŋaywaŋ mutɔm baar a isal mbɔɔn u ywaŋ ande. »
MAT 10:1 Yɛsu kàbel alɔŋki ande bàkwem aŋiyweel, waa kapɛ ikɔ̈b muböŋ an'dweelà an'be anà mukɔɔr an'kyal manswà anà an'too manswà.
MAT 10:2 Le ikɔb a antööm bàkwem aŋiyweel abi: wàtàtwɛb Simɔn, awà bàfàbel naa Petɔlà, anà un'tɔŋ ande Andre, Zyak anà Ywan, baan a Zebàday,
MAT 10:3 Filipo anà Bàtɛlàmay, Tuma anà Màtay un'füür a itɛr, Zyak mwan a Alfɛ anà Tàday,
MAT 10:4 Simɔn ŋambämà anà Yudasi Isikalyɔt, mbuur kun'yälà.
MAT 10:5 Yɛsu kàtöm alɔŋki abà bàkwem aŋiyweel mukàsal isal anà musyääl nswɛŋ yi: « Twon lan'kyà akà baar mpa abà Ayudà anà twon lan'bilà kan'bul a Samàlya.
MAT 10:6 Wɛɛ bɛ, làkyen akà in'kɔk a un'sɛŋ a Isàlɛl amyà myàdiimà.
MAT 10:7 U mbwo làkyà bɛ, làlɔŋ naa Imwol a du kyà tsütsü.
MAT 10:8 Làkɔɔr abɛy, làwiy akü, làpöŋ aŋukyal a bay, làböŋ an'dweelà an'be. Bɛ, bɛ làwɛl byàngway, làpɛ sye byàngway.
MAT 10:9 Twon lan'syen itàkal wɔl, itàkal ngim, itàkal itɛr a ishabà ntɔn bɛ làsi kà in'di abɛ,
MAT 10:10 itàkal bɔ̈n ntɔn nkyeen, itàkal an'kàzak an'mɔ̈ɔ̈l, itàkal idyäär, itàkal unsɔk, ntɔn un'syääl afàdyà unsà isal ande. »
MAT 10:11 « U bul a kölàköl itàkal là ikikye làbilà bɛ, làleŋ naa nà kan'kwo mukàlawal, làbwaay apà nde tii mpal làsàkyà bɛ.
MAT 10:12 Umpal làbilà bɛ u ndwà, làpɛ ya mbɔr,
MAT 10:13 isàkal naa ndwà ayin yàmàlawal, wɛy duu abɛ làkäl udu a ya, wɛɛ isàkal naa ya yàlawɛl anki, wɛy duu abɛ làfurà akà bɛ.
MAT 10:14 Isàkal naa bàlawɛl anki anà bàlawem anki, làtoo u ndwà ayin itàkal u bul alan anà làkɔɔb un'twà a in'kɔl abɛ.
MAT 10:15 Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään: ilä a nsaŋ, nsi a Sɔdɔm anà Gɔmɔr bàsawem kingyɛb akɔ̈ɔ̈n naa bul alan. »
MAT 10:16 « Mɛ, mɛ amàlatɔm asànaa in'kɔk uboboo a an'kyɛŋbɔl. Làkäl unsà igyɛɛŋ asànaa ntäy anà aŋàlàbɔ̈ɔ̈n asànaa nkokà.
MAT 10:17 Làkäl unsà igyɛɛŋ akà baar, ntɔn baar bàsàlasyen u làbay a nsaŋ a kölàköl anà bàsàlakam an'füm uboo a ndwà a nköŋ aba,
MAT 10:18 ba bàsàlafüün akà an'kuvɛrnɔ̈ɔ̈r anà akà amfum a nsi ntɔn mɛ, ntɔn bɛ làtɛ imbäl akà ba anà akà baar mpa abà Ayudà.
MAT 10:19 Wɛɛ mpal bàsàlafüün ba, twon lan'man mpay muyöb naa bɛ làtɛn aben itàkal naa ininà bɛ làtɛn. Ndaa yanswà làsàtɛn bɛ, ya bàsàlapà taaŋ nsil la.
MAT 10:20 Ntɔn ya isàfà anki akà bɛ, wɛɛ Dweelà In'kyɛɛl a Taaràbɛ asàtɛn uboo a bɛ.
MAT 10:21 Un'tɔŋ asàyälà un'tɔŋ ande ntɔn bun'dwä, taa asàyälà mwan ande, baan bàsàsà un'tswe ngwal akà aböör aba anà bàsàkwen naa badwä.
MAT 10:22 Baar banswà bàsàkyer alayiiŋ ntɔn ikɔb amɛ. Wɛɛ mbuur asàtsim tii u ntsüü asàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
MAT 10:23 Mpal bàsàlamɛɛy nkwaaŋ u bul làmwɛy, kàlayee u bul asin. Mɛ ndandaa alàkyään, bɛ làsàkal aŋàtàmay anki muyilyaŋ kà an'bul a Isàlɛl manswà mpal usàyà Mwan a mbuur. »
MAT 10:24 « Un'lɔŋki ufàlyaŋ anki un'lɔɔŋ ande, itàkal un'syääl ufàlyaŋ anki nkum ande.
MAT 10:25 Yan'kwo naa un'lɔŋki ukäl asànaa un'lɔɔŋ ande anà un'syääl asànaa nkum ande. Ntɔn ba ŋandwà bun'beelà Bɛlzàbul, nkye byan'kɔɔn ba mubel baar a ndwà ande abwɛy! »
MAT 10:26 « Twon làmatiin bɔɔmà. Ntɔn undiir aŋàyee wanswà akyer asàmɛnà u leŋ, anà ndaa yanswà yà unku bàkyer asàyöb.
MAT 10:27 Ndaa amàlakyään mɛ u làpib, wɛy bɛ làtɛn ya u mwäänanswà, ndaa bàmàlalwɛɛŋ u tsü, làlɔŋ ya udu a isaŋ.
MAT 10:28 Twon lan'tiin bɔɔmà baar akwà bàfàdwa nà ndür mpɛl, wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ bɔɔmà làtiin mbuur akwà afàdwa ndür anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ uboo a yaaŋ a mbaa.
MAT 10:29 Nkye bàfàyälà anki insɔɔr ibyeel u falà làmwɛy? Mpalàbà, akà imwɛy uboo a bya ifàbwà tɛy u mɛɛn naa Taaràbɛ ukɔɔn ayöb.
MAT 10:30 Wɛɛ akà bɛ, itàkal ntswe abɛ yanswà yaŋàtaŋ.
MAT 10:31 Twon lan'man bɔɔmà: bɛ, bɛ lan'söön insɔɔr mbɔɔn. »
MAT 10:32 « Mbuur wanswà asàkyey u mii a baar naa nde wà un'lɔŋki amɛ, mɛ sye in'sun'kyey u mii a Taaràmɛ awà u du.
MAT 10:33 Wɛɛ isàkal naa mbuur aman'tɔn u mii a baar banswà, mɛ sye in'sun'tɔn u mii a Taaràmɛ awà u du. »
MAT 10:34 « Twon lan'si naa mɛ kàyàtwaal duu u mɛɛn: mɛ, mɛ kà duu kàyàtwaal anki, wɛɛ kɔm.
MAT 10:35 Mɛ kayi ntɔn muyàkaab mbuur anà taarànde, mwan un'kaar anà ngwän, mwan un'kaar àna ukwà ande wà un'kaar.
MAT 10:36 Aŋankir a mbuur bàfàfà uboo a ywar ande ŋakwo.
MAT 10:37 Mbuur akwen taarànde itàkal ngwän aŋàsöön mɛ, nde ukwe anki mukal wàmɛ, mbuur akwen mwan ande wàbaal itàkal wà un'kaar aŋàsöön mɛ, nde ukwe anki mukal wàmɛ.
MAT 10:38 Mbuur mpa usɛn kulunsi ande anà ukɔɔn ayan'lab, nde ukwe anki mukal wàmɛ.
MAT 10:39 Mbuur asàyee mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande, wa asàkyà bwà. Wɛɛ mbuur asàpiy mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande ntɔn mɛ, nde akyer afàsàman wa. »
MAT 10:40 « Mbuur usàlawal, nde mɛ kan'wal, mbuur usan'wal, nde kan'wal mbuur kan'töm.
MAT 10:41 Mbuur kan'wal ŋangɔɔm ntɔn nde wà ŋangɔɔm, nde asàwal bweel a ŋangɔɔm. Mbuur kan'wal mbuur a balàbal ntɔn nde wà wàbalàbal, nde asàwal bweel a mbuur a balàbal.
MAT 10:42 Mbuur wanswà asàpà indiir anwà, itàkal naa kɔɔb a an'dà a mpye làmwɛy akà umwɛy uboo a baan ambɛy bà ntɔn nde wà un'lɔŋki amɛ, bweel ande bwà làsàkyà anki. »
MAT 11:1 Mpal kàmay Yɛsu mupà nswɛɛŋ akà alɔŋki ande bàkwem aŋiyweel, nde kàlwomà apan, waa kàkyen ntɔn mukàlɔŋ anà mukàkyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ kà an'bul aba.
MAT 11:2 Kyekà Ywan, u bɔlokà ande, kàwem baar bàmukanà isal a Klistɔ. Nde kun'tööm alɔŋki ande ntɔn mukun'fuul naa:
MAT 11:3 « Nkye ngye awà Mbuur akwà akyer ayà, lɛɛ bi idil wàsin? »
MAT 11:4 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Làkyen kàlun'sam Ywan ayà lan'wem bɛ anà lan'man bɛ yi:
MAT 11:5 ikwàmii ban'man, ikar ban'mbarà, aŋabay ban'pɔŋà, ikwan'tsü ban'wem, akü ban'wiyà, Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ ban'kyään akà aŋàlàmbwà.
MAT 11:6 Un'sak akà mbuur mpa asàpiy làkwikilà ande ntɔn mɛ! »
MAT 11:7 Ungö a nkyeen a alɔŋki a Ywan, Yɛsu kàsɛmà muyäm ntɔn Ywan: « Ininà bɛ làkàler u nsye a ipɔl? Wɛŋwɛŋ kànini un'pöb?
MAT 11:8 Wɛɛ bɛ, ininà bɛ làkàler? Mbuur mwɛy wàŋàbwaar ipfɛy a ntal? Wɛɛ naa baar bàfàbwaar ipfɛy a ntal bàfàkal u ndwà a amfum.
MAT 11:9 Wɛɛ bɛ, ininà bɛ làkàler? ŋangɔɔm mwɛy? Inye, waa mɛ alàkyään naa mbuur mwɛy wàŋàsöön ŋangɔɔm.
MAT 11:10 Ntɔn nde wà mbuur akwà bàsön ntɔn nde naa: "Le, mɛ an'tɔm mbuur mwɛy kusà angye, ntɔn mulɔn mbwo angye."
MAT 11:11 Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään: uboo a baar banswà kàbör un'kaar, akà mbuur mwɛy kan'söön Ywan Un'düümà watɛy. Wɛɛ mbuur ikikye uboo a Imwol a du kàmusöön.
MAT 11:12 Sɛmà paŋà a Ywan Un'düümà tii ŋàbawà, Imwol a du kyà uboo a unkaak a ngwal. Aŋunkaak a ngwal bàfàgyɔɔr kya.
MAT 11:13 Ntɔn aŋangɔɔm banswà anà Un'kɔɔn a Mɔsɛ bàtɛ ngɔɔm tii u paŋà a Ywan.
MAT 11:14 Isàkal naa bɛ làkwen muyöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ, nde wà Ɛli akwà kàkyer alàyà.
MAT 11:15 Wɛy mbuur awe anà an'tsü, uwem! »
MAT 11:16 « Nkööl ayi mɛ ya in'sii anà nà? Ya yà asànaa baan akwà bàfàmbàmbar u balàbal anà bàfàyɔɔb bumwɛy naa:
MAT 11:17 "Bi kàlabɛɛrà mfuŋ, wɛɛ bɛ làkyen anki! Bi kàlasyeel ingɔŋ a ilel, wɛɛ bɛ làlel anki!"
MAT 11:18 Abun, Ywan kàyi nde, afàdyà anki, afànwà anki, ba bàfàtɛn naa: "Nde we anà un'sɔŋà!"
MAT 11:19 Mwan a mbuur kan'yà, wàmudyà, wàmunwà, wɛɛ bàfàtɛn naa: "Le, nde wà ndyeel anà un'nweel a man, un'sam a afüür a itɛr anà baar abe!" Wɛɛ an'yeerà màfàmɛnà u nkyeer a ma. »
MAT 11:20 Mpalàbà Yɛsu kàsɛmà muŋän an'bul akwà amàkàkyer nde impà mbɔɔn, ntɔn an'bul amà màbuul anki mpem aba. Nde kàtɛn naa:
MAT 11:21 « Ngyɛb akà ngye Kɔrazin! Ngyɛb akà ngye Bɛtesayidà! Ntɔn, ilàkal naa impà bàkyer akà bɛ bàkyer u Tir anà u Sidɔn, abà itaan baar aba bàkyàbuul mpem, bàkyàbwaar ngɔɔr anà bàkyàkübà un'twà.
MAT 11:22 Undiir awun, waa mɛ in'tɛn a bɛ naa: ilä a nsaŋ, Tir anà Sidɔn mpay a mbɔɔn bàsamɛɛy anki asànaa bàsàmɛɛy ba bɛ.
MAT 11:23 Anà ngye Kapɛrnawum, nkye ngye asàlar tii u du? Ngye asàtyà an'lɔŋ! Ntɔn, yàlàkal naa impà bàkyer akà ngye bàkyer u Sɔdɔm, bul alà làlàkal tii ŋàbawà.
MAT 11:24 Undiir awun, waa mɛ in'tɛn a bɛ naa ilä a nsaŋ, Sɔdɔm bàsun'weel ngyɛb akwànaa ngye. »
MAT 11:25 Utaaŋ alan, Yɛsu kàsɛmà mutɛn naa: « Taa, Mwol a du anà mɛɛn, mɛ amasyäŋà ntɔn kàyee ngye ndaa ayi akà aŋan'yeerà anà akà aŋuyɛnà anà kàswɛŋ ngye ya akà baan ambɛy.
MAT 11:26 Ɛɛ, Taa, mɛ amasyäŋà ntɔn kàkwen ngye naa ya ikäl abà. »
MAT 11:27 « Taaràmɛ kàkyan'pà indiir byanswà, wɛɛ akà mbuur mwɛy tɛy uyöb Mwan, isàkal naa kà Taa anki anà mbuur tɛy uyöb Taa isàkal naa kà Mwan anki anà mbuur kan'kwen Mwan mukyään ndaa ayi. »
MAT 11:28 « Làyi akà mɛ, bɛ banswà lan'yɔn muyisyen buur a kölàköl, waa mɛ in'sàlapà ngyöör.
MAT 11:29 Làwɛl ntaaŋàmbar amɛ anà làkyey naa mɛ alàlɔŋ, ntɔn mɛ in'wà mbuur a mpem a duu anà wàlàbɔ̈ɔ̈n, waa mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ usàyöör.
MAT 11:30 Ɛɛ, ntaaŋàmbar amɛ mpay yatɛy musyen, buur amɛ là ikaay. »
MAT 12:1 Ungö apan, Yɛsu kàkäl mulyaŋ uboo a an'ywaŋ a blɛ ilä a saba. Alɔŋki ande bàkäl anà ngyal, waa bàbwe imfà a blɛ ntɔn mudyà.
MAT 12:2 Mpal bàmɛn Amfarisi abun, ba bàtɛn a nde naa: « Ler, alɔŋki angye bàmukyer ndaa mpa bàfàkyer kilä a saba! »
MAT 12:3 Yɛsu waa kafuur naa: « Nkye bɛ làtäŋ anki ndaa kàkyer David mpal kàwem nde ngyal anà baar bàkäl anà nde?
MAT 12:4 Nde kàbilà u ndwà a Nzam, kàwɛl mampà bàfàpà ibɔɔn akà Nzam waa kàdi ma, mumwɛy nde kàpɛ baar bàkäl anà nde, itàkal naa ma angaŋ mpɛl bàfàdyà.
MAT 12:5 Itàkal naa nkye bɛ, bɛ làtäŋ anki uboo a Un'kɔɔn naa ilä a saba, u ndwà a Nzam, angaŋ bàfàbɛy saba, mukɔɔn akal unsà ube?
MAT 12:6 Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ alàkyään naa apà ye anà ndaa yàŋàsöön ndwà a Nzam!
MAT 12:7 Kya bɛ làlàyöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ mbuul a ndaa ayi: "Mɛ in'kwen ngyɛb wɛɛ kà ibɔɔn anki", bɛ baar bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n ube làlatsüül anki mbar.
MAT 12:8 Ntɔn Mwan a mbuur wà nkum a saba. »
MAT 12:9 Yɛsu kàlwomà nde paa, nde kàkyen ndwà a nköŋ aba, waa kàbilà kwo.
MAT 12:10 Akun kàkäl anà mbuur mwɛy kàkäl anà kɔɔ aŋàkwɛkà. Amfarisi bàkwen mufüün Yɛsu: ba bun'fuul naa: « Nkye un'kɔɔn abi akyàpà mbwo mukɔɔr mbuur kilä a saba? »
MAT 12:11 Wɛɛ nde kafuur naa: « Nà uboo abɛ, isàkal naa nde we awà un'kɔk mwɛy anà wa ubü uboo a fu kilä a saba, waa nde mpa ukàsaab wa?
MAT 12:12 Wɛɛ mbuur kan'söön un'kɔk! Kyakin, mbwo yà mwo mukyer ubwaŋ kilä a saba. »
MAT 12:13 Apan nde kàtɛn a mbuur awun naa: « Sen kɔɔ angye. » Nde waa kàsen la, la sye waa làbwɛŋ asànaa lumwɛy.
MAT 12:14 Amfarisi bàtoo ba, ba bàkàsà nköŋ ntɔn mutsul mbar naa ba bàyun'dwa aben.
MAT 12:15 Mpal kàyöb Yɛsu ndaa ayin, nde kàlwomà kà ikal akin, baar mbɔɔn bàkyer un'lab, waa kàkɔɔr ba banswà,
MAT 12:16 wɛɛ nde katsüŋ a ngwal naa ba bàkɔɔn akyään naa nde wà nà.
MAT 12:17 Kàkyer nde abà ntɔn ndaa akwà kàtɛn ŋangɔɔm Yɛsay ikwe:
MAT 12:18 « Le un'syääl amɛ kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l mɛ, Nkwen Aŋàbwaŋ amɛ kàkwen mɛ musɔɔl, mɛ in'sàsà Dweelà amɛ udu a nde, waa nde usàkyään balàbal akà in'sɛŋ. Mɛ in'sàsà Dweelà amɛ udu a nde, nde asàkyään un'kɔɔn awà an'pà mɛ akà in'sɛŋ.
MAT 12:19 Nde usàtwal anki an'sye, nde usàsà anki in'kwɛŋ, akà mbuur mwɛy usàwem anki ndaa ande kà an'balàbal.
MAT 12:20 Nde usàbɔɔl anki kite a iful aŋàbɔɔl, nde usàdim anki mwinà akalɛɛmà unsinsi. Nde asàkyer abà tii mpal làsàwal balàbal iböŋ.
MAT 12:21 Waa in'sɛŋ myàsàsà làkyän a mya kà ikɔb ande. »
MAT 12:22 Apan ba bun'twääl ŋukɔŋ mwɛy wà ikwàmii anà wànkiin. Yɛsu laa kun'kɔɔr nde, waa kàsɛmà musà ndaa anà muman.
MAT 12:23 In'sɛŋ a baar myanswà myàkäl mubem anà mutɛn naa: « Nkye wà kà mwan a David anki? »
MAT 12:24 Mpal bàwem Amfarisi abwɛy, ba bàtɛn naa: « Mbuur wunà insɔŋà ayiböŋ u mbwo a Bɛlzàbul, mfum a insɔŋà. »
MAT 12:25 Yɛsu kàyöb an'kyän aba, waa kàtɛn naa: « Imwol kyanswà akyà ifàkaabà kya ŋakwo, ikyer afàpää. Bul làmwɛy, itàkal ywar làmwɛy làŋàkaabà la ŋakwo, la làfàtsim anki.
MAT 12:26 Isàkal naa Satanà kan'twey Satanà, nde wàŋakaabà anà nde ŋakwo: apan imwol ande isàtsim aben?
MAT 12:27 Isàkal naa mɛ, mɛ insɔŋà in'kaböŋà kà ikɔ̈b a Bɛlzàbul, baan abɛ insɔŋà bàfàböŋ kà ikɔ̈b a nà? Lalan ba ŋakwo bàsàkal atsüül a nsaŋ abɛ!
MAT 12:28 Wɛɛ isàkal naa mɛ insɔŋà in'fàböŋ a Dweelà a Nzam, ikaswaŋà naa Imwol a Nzam kyàkyàyà akà bɛ. »
MAT 12:29 « Itàkal sye naa nkye mbuur mwɛy kan'kwo ubilà u ndwà a ŋangwal anà ugyɔɔr indiir ande, isàkal naa nde mbuur a ngwal awà ŋàtun'bäm anki in'siŋ? Ungö akun'bäm in'siŋ, nde kan'kwo ugyɔɔr indiir byanswà u ndwà ande.
MAT 12:30 Mbuur mpa awà anà mɛ, nde kan'kwen anki, mbuur mpa akaböbà anà mɛ, nde wàmupay.
MAT 12:31 Undiir awun, mɛ alàkyään naa bàsàdwääl baar nkul a man'be manswà anà mbɛɛy yanswà, wɛɛ bàsàdwääl anki nkul a mbɛɛy a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl.
MAT 12:32 Mbuur asàtɛn ndaa a insoonà a Mwan a mbuur, nde bàsun'dwääl nkul. Wɛɛ mbuur asàtɛn ndaa a insoonà a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl, bàsun'dwääl anki nkul u mɛɛn mà itàkal u mɛɛn amà isàyà. »
MAT 12:33 « Isàkal naa un'te wà ubwaŋ, mbɛŋ awa ikal ubwaŋ, isàkal naa un'te wà un'be, mbɛŋ awa ikal yàmbe. Ntɔn un'te bàfàyöb u mbɛŋ awa.
MAT 12:34 Mbil a iyäy! Nkye baar abe asànaa bɛ, bɛ lan'kwo mutɛn ndaa aŋàbwaŋ? Ntɔn ayà ifàtoo u mun a mbuur, ifàfà u mpem ande.
MAT 12:35 Mbuur aŋàbwaŋ afàwal indiir aŋàbwaŋ unsà un'naaŋ ande wàŋàbwaŋ, wɛɛ mbuur un'be afàwal indiir ibe unsà un'naaŋ ande wube.
MAT 12:36 Waa mɛ, mɛ alàkyään naa: kà ilä a nsaŋ, baar bàsàsà in'lɔɔn a ndaa a bunàbun yanswà bàsatɛɛnà ba.
MAT 12:37 Ntɔn ntɛɛn angye ŋakwo isatsüül mbar. »
MAT 12:38 Apan alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn amwɛy anà Amfarisi amwɛy bàtɛn a Yɛsu naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, bi ikwen naa ngye iswɛŋ impà mwɛy. »
MAT 12:39 Nde kafuur naa: « Nkööl a baar abe anà yà inswem yàmulɔm impà, wɛɛ ba impà asin bàman anki, impà nsil kyà ŋangɔɔm Yɔnas.
MAT 12:40 Undiir awun, asànaa Yɔnas kàkyer nde myäänà in'tär anà mpib tär uboo a dum a nsö a kölàköl, abun sye Mwan a mbuur asàkyer myäänà in'tär anà mpib tär ungyɛl a mɛɛn.
MAT 12:41 Ilä a nsaŋ, baar a Ninivɛ bàsàmbarà kusà a baar a nkööl ayi waa bàsafüün, ntɔn baar a Ninivɛ bàbuul mpem aba mpal bàwem ba an'lɔɔŋ a Yɔnas. Wɛɛ apà, we anà mbuur kan'söön Yɔnas!
MAT 12:42 Ilä a nsaŋ, mfum un'kaar a Ngyɛl asàmbarà kusà a baar a ŋàbà, ntɔn nde kàfü kwɛl muyàwem an'yeerà a Salɔmun. Waa apà, we anà mbuur kan'söön Salɔmun! »
MAT 12:43 « Uman naa dweelà a làbe lan'too uboo a mbuur, la làfàkyà nsye a ipɔl muleŋ ikal akàyöör, la làsàkɔɔn aman,
MAT 12:44 laa làtɛn la naa: "Mɛ in'kyer afurà ndwà amɛ kàtoo mɛ." Mpal làtol la, làman la ya yà ipɔl, yàŋàkɔɔm anà yàŋàlɔ̈ɔ̈n,
MAT 12:45 apan laa làkyà la mukàwal an'dweelà asin nsambwaar man'söön la unsà ube, laa màbilà ma, màbwaay ma. Mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbuur awà laa utay wa wàŋàsöönà mɔ̈ɔ̈ kàkäl nde awà kusà. Ya sye isàkal abà akà nkööl a mbe yi. »
MAT 12:46 Mpal kàkäl Yɛsu muyäm a iköŋ a baar, le ngwän anà atɔŋ ande bàkäl u nsà, ba bàleŋà muyäm anà nde.
MAT 12:47 Mbuur mwɛy waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Le, ngwa anà atɔŋ angye bà u nsà anà bàmuleŋà muyäm anà ngye. »
MAT 12:48 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Maa nà, anà atɔŋ amɛ bànà? »
MAT 12:49 Apan, nde kàsilà kɔɔ udu a alɔŋki ande, waa kàtɛn naa: « Le maa anà atɔŋ amɛ.
MAT 12:50 Ntɔn mbuur wanswà afàlab ukwen a Taaràmɛ awà u du, nde wà un'tɔŋ amɛ wàbaal anà wun'kaar, nde wà maa. »
MAT 13:1 Ilä akin, Yɛsu kàtoo u ndwà, waa kàkàbwaay ukɔl a ɛwà.
MAT 13:2 Iköŋ a baar kyàyàkwo tsütsü apà nde, nde kàbilà u bwaar, waa kàbwaay. Un'sɛŋ a baar wanswà kàkäl u nkankyel.
MAT 13:3 Nde kàyääm anà ba indiir mbɔɔn u nsim, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ilä mwɛy, un'köön mwɛy kàkyer atoo mukàkɔn mbɛŋ u ywaŋ ande.
MAT 13:4 Umpal kàmwɛŋ nde ya, yar làmwɛy làbü ukɔl a mbwo: nɛn a du laa yàyi ya, waa yàdi ya.
MAT 13:5 Yar lumwɛy làbü udu a in'kul mpa myàkäl anà mɛɛn mbɔɔn. Mbɛŋ yàmɛn agyägyä, ntɔn mɛɛn màkäl itääŋ.
MAT 13:6 Wɛɛ umpal kàbalà mwäänà, bite waa byàkuŋà, byàyöm, ntɔn bya byàkäl anki anà in'swɛy.
MAT 13:7 Yar lumwɛy làbü uboo a nsyeenà: nsyeenà yàyɛl ya, laa yàküünà ya bite aŋàbwaŋ.
MAT 13:8 Wɛɛ mbɛŋ yumwɛy yàbü udu a mɛɛn aŋàbwaŋ, waa byàbör imfà: imwɛy nkam, kyumwɛy an'kwem an'syaam, kyumwɛy an'kwem an'tär.
MAT 13:9 Wɛy mbuur awe anà an'tsü awem uwem! »
MAT 13:10 Apan, alɔŋki bàyàsin apà nde, waa bun'fuul naa: « Ntɔn nkye ayiyääm ngye anà ba u nsim? »
MAT 13:11 Nde kafuur naa: « Bɛ, bɛ làkyàwal an'yeerà a inkuu a imfum a du, wɛɛ ba, ba ma bàwɛl anki.
MAT 13:12 Mbuur awe anà undiir, nde bàkyer asun'pà, waa nde usàkal abyà mbɔɔn, wɛɛ akà mbuur mpa awe anà wa, bàsàlwom itàkal undiir awe nde awà.
MAT 13:13 Undiir awun in'fàyääm mɛ anà ba unsà nsim: Ntɔn, ba bàmulerà ukɔɔn aman, anà bàmulɛɛ tsü ukɔɔn awem anà ukɔɔn ayöb.
MAT 13:14 Abun, ngɔɔm kàtɛ Yɛsay wà kan'kwo ntɔn ba: "Bɛ làsàwem ubwaŋàbwaŋ, wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làsàyöb anki, bɛ làsàler ubwaŋàbwaŋ, wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làsàman anki.
MAT 13:15 Ntɔn mpem a un'sɛŋ awà yàkyàbwà ikwabà, ba bàkyàdübà an'tsü aba, ba bàkyàdübà mii aba ntɔn mii aba myàkɔ̈ɔ̈n aman, an'tsü aba màkɔ̈ɔ̈n awem, mpem aba ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ayöb, abun ba bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n abuul mpem, anà mɛ in'kɔ̈ɔ̈n akɔɔr." »
MAT 13:16 « Wɛɛ akà bɛ, bɛ làbà unsà un'sak, ntɔn mii abɛ myà mutäälà anà an'tsü abɛ mà muweemà!
MAT 13:17 Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, aŋangɔɔm anà baar a balàbal mbɔɔn bàlàkwen muman ndaa ayà làmanà bɛ yi, wɛɛ ba ya bàsàman anki, muwem ndaa làweemà bɛ yi, wɛɛ ba ya bàsàwem anki. »
MAT 13:18 « Mpalabà, làwem mbuul a itim a un'köön.
MAT 13:19 Isàkal naa mbuur kan'wem ndaa a Imwol, wɛɛ nde ya uyöbà anki, imɛnà naa mbuur un'be kan'yà anà kan'lwom ndaa bàkön u mpem ande. Nde wà asànaa mbɛŋ yàbü ukɔl a mbwo.
MAT 13:20 Baar bumwɛy bà asànaa yar a mbɛŋ alà làbü u mɛɛn a in'kul, wà mbuur kan'wal Ndaa agyägyä unsà un'sak.
MAT 13:21 Wɛɛ uboo ande in'swɛy myatɛy, nde wà mbuur a ansɔŋà: isàkal naa lingyoomà lan'yà itàkal nkwaaŋ ntɔn Ndaa, laa ubwà nde.
MAT 13:22 Mbɛŋ ayà bàkön uboo a nsyeenà, yà asànaa mbuur kan'wem Ndaa, wɛɛ nkyän a indiir a mɛɛn mà anà ndɛb a in'naaŋ laa iküünà bya Ndaa, waa ya mpa ibɔr imbɛŋ.
MAT 13:23 Yar bàkön u mɛɛn aŋàbwaŋ, là baar bàfàwem Ndaa anà bàfàyöb ya. Apan ba bàfàbɔr mbɛŋ: amwɛy nkam, bumwɛy an'kwem an'syaam, bumwɛy an'kwem an'tär. »
MAT 13:24 Yɛsu kàfatɛɛl nsim asin: « Imwol a du kyà asànaa mbuur mwɛy kàkön imbɛŋ aŋàbwaŋ u ywaŋ ande.
MAT 13:25 Wɛɛ utaaŋ bàkäl baar mubɔ̈ɔ̈n, un'yiiŋ ande waa kàyi, waa kàkön iteerà uboo a blɛ, laa kàkyen nde.
MAT 13:26 Mpal làyɛl blɛ anà imfà byàsɛmà bya mutoo, iteerà sye waa byàyàsɛnà mbwo mwɛy anà bya.
MAT 13:27 Asyääl a ŋaywaŋ bayi mukun'fuul naa: "Nkum, nkye kà imbɛŋ aŋàbwaŋ anki ngye kàkön u ywaŋ angye? Wɛɛ iteerà binà byan'fà ken?"
MAT 13:28 Nde kafuur naa: "Un'yiiŋ mwɛy kàkyer abun." Asyääl waa bun'fuul naa: "Nkye ngye akyàkwen naa bi ikàlwom bya?"
MAT 13:29 Nde kàtɛn a ba naa: "Aay, manà bɛ làyàkàtsuum blɛ mbwo mwɛy anà iteerà.
MAT 13:30 Làwɛy bya byàbyeel byàyɛl mbwo mwɛy tii u paŋà abwo bya. Mpal ayin mɛ in'sàtɛn a abweel naa: Tàlalwoomà iteerà, làbäm bya ibiŋ ntɔn musà bya mbaa. Ungö, làbwe imfà, làsi blɛ unsà ikɔr amɛ." »
MAT 13:31 Yɛsu kàfatɛɛl nsim asin naa: « Imwol a du kyà asànaa mbuur mwɛy kan'wal imbɛŋ ikikye anà kan'kɔn kya u ywaŋ ande.
MAT 13:32 Imbɛŋ aki kyà imbɛŋ mwɛy kyan'söön ukye uboo a mbɛŋ yanswà. Wɛɛ kya isàyɛl, kya ifàbulà un'te mwɛy wà kölàköl. Apan, nɛn a du iyàtɔŋ an'yaab aya kan'kɔkà a wa. »
MAT 13:33 Yɛsu kàfatɛɛl nsim asin naa: « Imwol a du kyà asànaa ful kàwɛl un'kaar mwɛy anà kàbünà nde anà an'kɔɔb an'tär mà mfufu a mampà. Ungö apan mfar yanswà waa yàfül. »
MAT 13:34 Ndaa ayin yanswà Yɛsu ba ya kakyäänà u nsim, akà ndaa mwɛy yatɛy kàtɛɛnà nde anà ba ukɔɔn nsim,
MAT 13:35 ntɔn ndaa ayà kàtɛn ŋangɔɔm ikwe: « Mɛ in'sàduub mun amɛ mutà nsim, mɛ in'sakyään indiir aŋàyee sɛmà bàkyer mɛɛn. »
MAT 13:36 Apan Yɛsu kàsàwɛy iköŋ a baar, waa kàkyen ndwà. Alɔŋki ande bàsin apà nde, waa bàtɛn a nde naa: « Ibuul nsim a iteerà uboo a ywaŋ. »
MAT 13:37 Nde kafuur abà: « Mbuur afàkɔn imbɛŋ aŋàbwaŋ, Mwan a mbuur,
MAT 13:38 ywaŋ là mɛɛn mà, imbɛŋ aŋàbwaŋ bà baan abà uboo a Imwol, iteerà ikaswaŋà baan a Mbuur un'be.
MAT 13:39 Ŋankir kàkön iteerà wà ileŋ, mbweel a imbɛŋ yà ntsüü a mɛɛn mà, wɛɛ abweel bà akyeey.
MAT 13:40 Abun, asànaa bàfàtsuum iteerà ntɔn musà bya mbaa, ya sye isàkal abwɛy u ntsüü a mɛɛn:
MAT 13:41 Mwan a mbuur asàtɔm akyeey ande mulwom uboo a Imwol ande, ndaa yanswà ifàsiinà baar mukyer ube anà baar bàfàyweer ndaa a mbe,
MAT 13:42 waa bàsatɔɔm u yaaŋ a mbaa. Akun ntsü isàkal ilel anà nkwoor a an'din.
MAT 13:43 Apan, baar a balàbal bàsàtà in'nyäŋ uboo a Imwol a Taaràba asànaa taaŋ. Wɛy mbuur awe anà an'tsü awem uwem! »
MAT 13:44 « Imwol a du kyà asànaa undiir a ntal wàŋàyee u mɛɛn uboo a ywaŋ làmwɛy, waa mbuur mwɛy kàmɛn wa: nde kan'fàyee wa. Unsà un'sak, nde waa ukyà, uyälà indiir ande byanswà ntɔn musom ywaŋ alà. »
MAT 13:45 « Le, Imwol a du kyan'kwo ifàkal asànaa un'tɛɛl a an'yà ayileŋ mpɛr aŋàbwaŋ.
MAT 13:46 Utaaŋ kàmɛn nde làpɛr làmwɛy làntal a kölàköl, nde kàkàyälà indiir ande byanswà ntɔn musom làpɛr alà. »
MAT 13:47 « Imwol adu kyan'kwo bàfàsi anà an'tɛy mwɛy ban'tɔɔm kà ɛwà anà man'siim nsö a ifà ifà.
MAT 13:48 Ma isàyɔl, alɔ̈ɔ̈b waa bànaan ma u nkankyel, waa bàbwaay, bàsà nsö aŋàbwaŋ uboo a un'lwaŋ, waa bàpiy indiir ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ndöŋ.
MAT 13:49 Ya sye isàkal abun u ntsüü a mɛɛn: akyeey bàsàyà ntɔn mukaab baar abe anà baar a balàbal,
MAT 13:50 waa bàsàtɔɔm baar abe u yaaŋ a mbaa. Akun ntsü isàkal ilel anà nkwoor a an'din. »
MAT 13:51 Abun, Yɛsu kafuul naa: « Nkye bɛ, bɛ làkiyöbà indiir abi byanswà? » Ba bàfuur naa: « Ɛɛ »
MAT 13:52 Nde kakyään naa: « Lalan, un'lɔɔŋ a un'kɔɔn wanswà kan'wal an'yeerà unsà Imwol a du, asàkal asànaa ŋandwà mwɛy afàwal indiir akün anà byà itaan uboo a un'naaŋ ande. »
MAT 13:53 Mpal kàmay Yɛsu mutɛn unsà nsim, nde kàlwomà kà ikal akin.
MAT 13:54 Apan nde kàkyen nsi ande, waa kàlɔɔŋà u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà aba. Baar bàkäl pa bàkyer abem, waa bàtɛɛnà naa: « An'yeerà ande amà anà impà abi byan'fà ken?
MAT 13:55 Nkye nde kà mwan a sharpantye anki? Nkye ngwän ande kà Màlye anki? Nkye Zyak, Yɔsɛfi, Simɔn anà Yude kà atɔŋ ande anki?
MAT 13:56 Nkye ampääŋ ande banswà kà bà uboo a bi anki? Ikɔ̈b aki kyanswà, nde kya kyan'fà ken? »
MAT 13:57 Lalan mpa bàsi ba làkwikilà amu nde. Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ŋangɔɔm wanswà bàfun'bɛy u nsi ande anà u ywar ande. »
MAT 13:58 Apan, Yɛsu kàsàkyer anki impà mbɔɔn u bul alan, ntɔn nkɔ̈ɔ̈n a làkwikilà aba.
MAT 14:1 Utaaŋ alan, Ɛlɔdi, kuvɛrnɔ̈ɔ̈r a Ngalilɛ, kàwem nde làkoo a Yɛsu,
MAT 14:2 nde kàtɛn a asyääl ande naa: « Wawɛy Ywan Un'düümà kan'wiyà uboo a akü! Undiir awun awà nde anà ikɔ̈b mukyer impà! »
MAT 14:3 Yàmɛnà naa Ɛlɔdi kàswɛŋ baar mukɔr Ywan, mukun'bäm dwaaŋ anà mukun'biil u bɔlokà. Ntɔn kàwɛl nde Ilɔdyas, un'kyay a un'tɔŋ ande Filipo.
MAT 14:4 Ntɔn Ywan kàtɛɛnà a nde naa: « Ikwe anki naa ngye un'wɛl un'kyay! »
MAT 14:5 Itàkal naa Ɛlɔdi kàkwen mudwa Ywan, nde kàtiinà un'sɛŋ a baar bɔɔmà ntɔn ba Ywan bàfun'walà asànaa ŋangɔɔm.
MAT 14:6 Apan, kilä a un'kyɔm a mböör a Ɛlɔdi, mwan a Ɛlɔdyadi wà un'kaar kàyàkyen kusà a baar kàbel nde, un'sak laa kàwɛl wa Ɛlɔdi.
MAT 14:7 Undiir awun, kàdi nde kyän mukun'pà undiir wanswà kàlun'lɔ̈ɔ̈m nde.
MAT 14:8 Apan, u nswɛɛŋ a ngwän, nde kàtɛn a Ɛlɔdi naa: « Mpɛ un'tswe a Ywan Udüümà, apà, udu a làlɔŋà! »
MAT 14:9 Mfum kàwɛm ngyɛb ntɔn ya. Wɛɛ ntɔn kyän ande anà baar kàbel nde, nde kàswɛŋ naa bun'pɛ wa.
MAT 14:10 Nde kàtöm baar mukàtsul Ywan un'tswe u bɔlokà.
MAT 14:11 Ba bàtwääl un'tswe a Ywan udu a làlɔŋà, waa bàpɛ wa akà mwan un'kaar, nde waa kàsyen wa akà ngwän.
MAT 14:12 Alɔŋki a Ywan laa bàyi ba muwal ndom ande, waa bàkàdyee ya. Ungö ba bàkàkyään Yɛsu ndaa ayi.
MAT 14:13 Mpal kàwem Yɛsu làsaŋ alà, nde kàlwomà kà ikal akin, kàbilà u bwaar, waa kàkyen ikal a mpey. In'sɛŋ a an'bul myàyöb mya, fà an'bul aba, ba bun'läb kà in'kɔl.
MAT 14:14 Mpal kàtoo Yɛsu u bwaar, nde kàmɛn iköŋ a baar, laa kamɛɛn nde ngyɛb a kölàköl, waa kàkɔɔr an'too aba.
MAT 14:15 Mpal làbü sisye, alɔŋki bàsin tsütsü apà nde, waa bàtɛn a nde naa: « Ikal ki kyà ipɔl, taaŋ sye lan'kyà itaan. Apay baar bàkyen ba ŋakwo bàkàsom isa adyà kan'bul. »
MAT 14:16 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Ba mfun akyà yatɛy, lapɛ isa adyà bɛ ŋakwo! »
MAT 14:17 Wɛɛ ba bàtɛn a nde naa: « Apà bi ibye anà mampà an'tyeen anà nsö yweel mpɛl. »
MAT 14:18 Nde kàtɛn naa: « Lan'twääl abyà kà. »
MAT 14:19 Apan, ungö muswaŋ iköŋ a baar mubwaay udu a in'lɛŋ, nde kàwɛl mampà aman man'tyeen anà nsö yàyweel, kàler u du, waa kàsaak bya. Ungö, nde kàtsütsül mampà, waa kàpɛ ma akà alɔŋki, ba waa bàkàkäb ma akà iköŋ a baar.
MAT 14:20 Baar banswà waa bàdi, waa bàyüür. Ba bàsyen in'lwaŋ kwem aŋiyweel myàŋàyɔl a itiir byàsäl.
MAT 14:21 Baar bàdi bàkäl isii a abaal nsaab tyeen, ukɔɔn ataŋ akaar anà baan.
MAT 14:22 Apan sye, Yɛsu kàswɛŋ alɔŋki mubilà u bwaar ntɔn ba bàfwel u sim, mpal usàpay nde in'sɛŋ.
MAT 14:23 Ungö kàpay nde iköŋ a baar, nde kàbeenà udu a mɔŋ ntɔn mukàyamà u mpey. Nde kàkäl kwo aŋàyen tii u sisye.
MAT 14:24 Bwaar làkäl lan'tol kwɛl a mɛɛn, ibɔ a an'dà byàkäl muyisiinà la ntɔn un'pöb kàyee lisà.
MAT 14:25 Tsütsü a taaŋtyà, Yɛsu kàkyen udu a an'dà mper akà ba.
MAT 14:26 Umpal bun'mɛn ba wàmuyikyà udu a an'dà, alɔŋki bàkyer atɛɛr, waa bàtɛɛnà naa: « Wà un'sɔŋà! » Unsà bɔɔmà lanswà, ba bàsi in'kwɛŋ.
MAT 14:27 Wɛɛ apan, Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làsi un'kanà. Wà mɛ, twon lan'man bɔɔmà! »
MAT 14:28 Petɔlà kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwol, kya isàkal ndandaa naa wà ngye, nswɛŋ mɛ in'yi akà ngye udu a an'dà. »
MAT 14:29 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Yà! » Petɔlà waa kàtoo u bwaar, waa kàkyen udu a an'dà mper kàkäl Yɛsu.
MAT 14:30 Wɛɛ umpal kàmɛn nde un'pöb a ngwal, bɔɔmà làkyer un'kaar. Nde kàsɛmà muminà uboo a an'dà, waa kàsi in'kwɛŋ naa: « Mwol, an'tsü mɔ̈ɔ̈! »
MAT 14:31 Apan, Yɛsu kàsilà kɔɔ, kun'tɛ mpi, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mbuur a làkwikilà a ikikye! Ntɔn nkye asi ngye nkyɛɛr? »
MAT 14:32 Umpal bàbilà ba u bwaar, un'pöb waa kànye.
MAT 14:33 Abun, baar bàkäl uboo a bwaar bàbü an'köm kusà a Yɛsu, waa bàtɛn a nde naa: « Ndandaa, ngye awà Mwan a Nzam! »
MAT 14:34 Ungö bàsabà ba ɛwà, ba bàtöl u Ngɛnɛsàlɛr.
MAT 14:35 Baar a mper ayin bun'yöb ba, ba bàpay làsaŋ mper yanswà, waa bun'twäälà abɛy banswà.
MAT 14:36 Ba bun'bɔ̈ɔ̈nà naa nde kapɛ mbwo ba bàbä itàkal làpan a ipfɛy ande mpɛl. Abun, baar bàtɛɛ kya mpi bàkyer akɔɔrà.
MAT 15:1 Apan, Amfarisi anà alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn bàfü Yɛlusàlɛm, bàyi akà Yɛsu, waa bun'fuul naa:
MAT 15:2 « Ntɔn nkye alɔŋki angye bàfàbɛy ba nkääl abi? Ntɔn ba bàfàywɛy anki an'kɔɔ mpal bàfàdyà ba. »
MAT 15:3 Nde kafuur naa: « Atöl bɛ, ntɔn nkye làfàbɛy bɛ nswɛɛŋ a Nzam ntɔn nkääl abɛ?
MAT 15:4 Ntɔn Nzam kàtɛn naa: "Sà làkoo akà taaràŋà anà akà ngwa", anà: "Mbuur asàküül taarànde anà ngwän, bàkyer asun'dwa."
MAT 15:5 Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làfàtɛn naa: "Mbuur wanswà afàtɛn a taarànde itàkal a ngwän naa: Undiir in'lapà mɛ, mɛ wa in'kyàpà akà Nzam",
MAT 15:6 mbuur awun, nde kun'kömà anki taarànde." Abun, bɛ làkyàpiy Ndaa a Nzam, ntɔn nkääl abɛ.
MAT 15:7 Baar a mpem yweel! Yɛsay we anà iböŋ kàtɛ nde ngɔɔm ntɔn bɛ, mpal kàtɛn nde naa:
MAT 15:8 "Un'sɛŋ wà afan'pà làkoo a mun, wɛɛ mpem awa yà ukwɛl anà mɛ.
MAT 15:9 Ngyamàkà bàfan'sà ba yà bunàbun, ntɔn ndaa bàfàlɔŋ ba, yà ndaa a imbuur mpɛl." »
MAT 15:10 Apan,Yɛsu kàbel iköŋ a baar, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làwem anà làyöb!
MAT 15:11 Kà indiir byàfàbilà u mun a mbuur byàfun'buul ŋingyäy anki, wɛɛ indiir byàfàtoo u mun byàfun'buul ŋingyäy. »
MAT 15:12 Apan, alɔŋki bàyi akà Yɛsu, waa bàtɛn a nde naa: « Nkye ngye akyàyöb naa Amfarisi bàwem ba ndaa ayi, ya yapɛ mpay? »
MAT 15:13 Nde waa kàfuur naa: « Kite kyanswà mpa kàkön Taaràmɛ awà u du, bàkyer asàtsuum kya.
MAT 15:14 Lawɛy: ba bà ikwàmii bàyisyen ikwàmii bumwɛy! Isàkal naa ikwàmii wàmuyisyen ikwàmii wumwɛy, ba bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l bàkàbwà u fu. »
MAT 15:15 Petɔlà kàwɛl ndaa, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ibuul nsim ayi. »
MAT 15:16 Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Nkye anà bɛ, bɛ sye un'yɛnà watɛy?
MAT 15:17 Nkye bɛ làyöb anki naa undiir wanswà afàbilà u mun, afàlyaŋ uboo a an'bäl, ungö waa bàkàpiy u kàbenà?
MAT 15:18 Wɛɛ ndaa ifàtoo u mun ifàfà u mpem, ya ifàbuul mbuur ŋingyäy.
MAT 15:19 Ntɔn an'kyän an'be, ndwää a baar, inswem, ipasàsɛ, küb, imbäl ibe, ntwee byàfàfà u mpem.
MAT 15:20 Le, byabi byà indiir byàfàbuul mbuur ŋingyäy! Wɛɛ mudyà ukɔɔn aywab mpin ifàbuul anki mbuur ŋingyäy. »
MAT 15:21 Ungö apan, Yɛsu kàlwomà paa, waa kàkyen itiir a nsi a Tir anà kyà Sidɔn.
MAT 15:22 Waa le, un'kaar mwɛy un'nsi Kanana kàfü ntsü ayin, waa kàsi in'kwɛŋ: « Mwol, Mwan a David, nsyääm! Mwan amɛ wà un'kaar we anà unsɔŋà mwɛy afun'sà lingyoomà mbɔɔn. »
MAT 15:23 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kun'fuur anki akà ndaa mwɛy. Alɔŋki ande laa bàsin ba, waa bun'lɔ̈ɔ̈m naa: « Un'böŋ, ntɔn nde wàmuyilab bi anà in'kwɛŋ ande. »
MAT 15:24 Yɛsu kàfuur naa: « Mɛ, mɛ ban'töm akà in'kɔk a Isàlɛl myàŋàdiimà mbwo mpɛl. »
MAT 15:25 Wɛɛ un'kaar awà kàyàbwà an'köm kusà a nde, waa kàtɛn naa: « Mwol, yambay! »
MAT 15:26 Yɛsu kàfuur naa: « Ubwaŋ batɛy muwal mampà a baan anà mutɔɔm ma akà bibaan a mbwà. »
MAT 15:27 Un'kaar awà kàfuur naa: « Inye, ndandaa Mwol, wɛɛ mbwà sye ifàdyà mfür ifàbwà u ngyɛl a mɛsà a nkum aba. »
MAT 15:28 Apan, Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Ɔɔ un'kaar! Làkwikilà angye là làkölàköl! Wɛy ya ikäl asànaa ikwen mpem angye. » Taaŋ nsil alan, mwan ande waa kàkɔɔrà.
MAT 15:29 Fà apan, Yɛsu kàyikyenà kà un'kɔɔl a ɛwà a Ngalilɛ. Nde kàlär udu a mɔŋ, waa kàbwaay.
MAT 15:30 Baar mbɔɔn bàyàköŋ apà nde, waa bàtwäälà ikar, ikwàmii, aŋatoo, nkiin, anà abɛy asin bàmbɔɔn. Ba batɔ̈ɔ̈là kà in'kɔl a Yɛsu, nde waa kakɔɔrà.
MAT 15:31 Baar bàkyer abem mpal bàmɛn ba naa nkiin ban'sà ndaa, aŋatoo ban'kɔɔrà, akyeen a ibweel ban'dyäär, ikwàmii ban'man. Waa bàsɛmà mukömà Nzam a Isàlɛl.
MAT 15:32 Yɛsu kàbel alɔŋki ande, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mpem amɛ yan'kyɛɛr ntɔn baar bà, ntɔn ŋàbà byan'kwo ilä itär abà ba anà mɛ apà. Wɛɛ ba, ba undiir adyà watɛy. Mɛ in'kwen anki mukapay anà ngyal, manà ngwal aba ikàwà u mbwo. »
MAT 15:33 Alɔŋki bun'fuul naa: « U nsye a ipɔl yi bi mampà ifà ken mudii un'kàbɔ a baar a tub awà? »
MAT 15:34 Yɛsu kafuul naa: « Bɛ làbye amà mampà an'kwe? » Ba bàfuur naa: « Nsambwaar anà binsö imwɛy. »
MAT 15:35 Apan, nde kàswɛŋ iköŋ a baar mubwaay u mɛɛn.
MAT 15:36 Nde kàwɛl mampà aman mà nsambwaar anà nsö, kàkömà Nzam, kàtsül ma, waa kàpɛ alɔŋki mukab akà baar banswà.
MAT 15:37 Ba banswà waa bàdi, waa bàyüür. Ba bàsyen in'lwaŋ nsambwaar myàŋàyɔl a itsü byàsäl.
MAT 15:38 Baar banswà bàdi bàkäl isii a nsaab nà, ukɔɔn ataŋ akaar anà baan.
MAT 15:39 Ungö kàpay nde iköŋ a baar, Yɛsu kàbilà u bwaar, waa kàkyen itiir a nsi a Makadan.
MAT 16:1 Amfarisi anà Asadusi bàyi akà Yɛsu ntɔn mukun'lɛɛ untaam. Ba bun'lɔ̈ɔ̈m idiim mwɛy kyan'fà du.
MAT 16:2 Nde kafuur naa: « Umpal làfàkàminà taaŋ, bɛ làfàtɛn naa: "Du làyàkal ubwaŋ ntɔn la là làtsöö."
MAT 16:3 Ututu naa: "Mbul akyer anɔ ŋàbà, ntɔn du lan'yeen." Bɛ, bɛ làyöb nà musyeebà mpɛl naa du lye aben, wɛɛ idiim a an'taaŋ bɛ làkwo anki muyöb bya!
MAT 16:4 Nkööl a baar abe anà yà inswem yàmulɔm idiim. Wɛɛ akà idiim asin bàsun'pà anki, idiim nsil kyà Yɔnas. » Nde laa kàsawɛy nde, waa kàkyen.
MAT 16:5 Mpal bàsabà alɔŋki u sim lumwɛy, ba bàkyärà mpiim muwal mampà.
MAT 16:6 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ ntɔn ful a Amfarisi anà Asadusi! »
MAT 16:7 Alɔŋki bàyweerà abà: « Ntɔn bi mampà iwɛl anki. »
MAT 16:8 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kàmɛn nde an'kyän aba, nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Baar a làkwikilà a ikikye, ntɔn nkye làkayweerà bɛ ntɔn làkɔ̈ɔ̈n bɛ mampà?
MAT 16:9 Bɛ ŋàtàyöb anki? Bɛ làfàkayɔbà anki mampà an'tyeen ntɔn nsaab tyeen, anà in'lwaŋ in'kwe bɛ làsyen?
MAT 16:10 Itàkal mampà nsambwaar ntɔn nsaab nà, anà in'lwaŋ in'kwe bɛ làsyen?
MAT 16:11 Bɛ làkɔɔn akayöbà aben naa kà ntɔn mampà anki in'tɛɛnà mɛ a bɛ naa: Làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ ntɔn ful a Amfarisi anà Asadusi! »
MAT 16:12 Apan, ba bàyöb naa nde kàtɛɛnà anki a ba mukal kà igyɛɛŋ ntɔn ful a mampà, wɛɛ ntɔn an'lɔɔŋ a Amfarisi anà Asadusi.
MAT 16:13 Umpal kàkɔlà nde kà itiir a nsi a Sɛzarɛ u Filipe, Yɛsu kàfuul alɔŋki ande naa: « Baar bàfàtɛn naa Mwan a mbuur wa nà? »
MAT 16:14 Ba bàtɛn naa: « Ntɔn bumwɛy, Ywan Un'düümà, bumwɛy naa Ԑli, bumwɛy naa Yɛlɛmya, taaŋ lumwɛy naa umwɛy uboo a aŋangɔɔm. »
MAT 16:15 Nde waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Atöl bɛ, bɛ làfàtɛn naa mɛ in'wà nà? »
MAT 16:16 Simɔn Petɔlà kàfuur naa: « Ngye, Ngye awà Klistɔ, Mwan a Nzam a mɔ̈ɔ̈. »
MAT 16:17 Apan, Yɛsu waa kun'kyään naa: « Un'sak akà ngye Simɔn, mwan a Yɔnas, ntɔn kà ngye ŋakwo anki an'yöb ya, wɛɛ Taaràmɛ awà u du kàmayɔɔb.
MAT 16:18 Waa mɛ, mɛ akyään naa ngye awà nkɔŋ, udu a nkɔŋ ayi mɛ in'sàtɔŋ Ikööŋ amɛ, ngwal a ukwà isàkal anki anà ikɔ̈b udu a kya.
MAT 16:19 Mɛ in'sapà nsab a Imwol a du: Undiir wanswà asàbäm ngye u mɛɛn, wa sye asàkal wàŋàbäm u du, undiir wanswà asàtsuuŋ ngye u mɛɛn, wa asàkal wàŋàtsuuŋ u du. »
MAT 16:20 Apan, Yɛsu kàswɛŋ alɔŋki ande a ngwal naa ba bàkɔɔn akyään baar naa nde wà Klistɔ.
MAT 16:21 Fà taaŋ alan, Yɛsu kàsɛmà muswaŋ alɔŋki ande naa yan'kwo naa nde ubeenà Yɛlusàlɛm, ukàman mpay mbɔɔn kà an'kɔɔ a andweer, a amfum a angaŋ anà mà alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn. Ba bàkyer akun'dwa, wɛɛ kà ilä kyàtär nde akyer asàwiyà.
MAT 16:22 Petɔlà kun'bel ukɔl, waa kàsɛmà mukun'ŋän anà mutɛn naa: « Mwol, Nzam akyer ayabay, ndaa ayi iyabweel anki! »
MAT 16:23 Wɛɛ nde, kàbulà nde, waa kàtɛn a Petɔlà: « Kyà kunà, Satanà! Lwomà apà mɛ pà! Ngye awà kyà u mbwo amɛ, ntɔn an'kyän angye kà mà an'kyän a Nzam anki, wɛɛ mà baar. »
MAT 16:24 Apan, Yɛsu kàtɛn a alɔŋki ande naa: « Isàkal naa mbuur akwen mukan'lab, wɛy nde ukɔɔb mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande ŋakwo, uwɛl kulunsi ande, wɛy nde kan'läb.
MAT 16:25 Ntɔn mbuur usàkwen mutswà möö ande, wa asàkyà bwà. Wɛɛ mbuur usàpiy möö ande ntɔn mɛ, nde asàtswà wa.
MAT 16:26 Bweel nà mbuur usàkal abà, itàkal naa nde kan'wal mɛɛn aŋukiinà, wɛɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande ukyà bwà? Itàkal naa undiir nà wà ndöŋ mbuur kan'kwo mupà ntɔn musom mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande?
MAT 16:27 Ntɔn Mwan a mbuur asàyà unsà làkoo a Taarànde anà akyeey ande, apan nde asàfuur akà mbuur mbuur asànaa yàkäl nsyääl ande.
MAT 16:28 Mɛ, mɛ alàkyään ndandaa naa amwɛy uboo a baar bà pà bàsàkal aŋàkwà anki kusà muman Mwan a mbuur wàmuyà unsà imwol ande. »
MAT 17:1 Ungö a ilä isyaam, Yɛsu kàwɛl Petɔlà, Zyak anà un'tɔŋ ande Ywan, nde kasyen u mpey udu a mɔŋ mwɛy wàbwɛlàbwɛl.
MAT 17:2 Nde kàsɔɔmà ifà u mii aba: ntabwey ande yàkäl muŋyäŋ asànaa taaŋ, ipfɛy ande byàbulà byà tsɛk tsɛk asànaa pɛɛlà.
MAT 17:3 Kà imbürà, alɔŋki batär bàmɛn Mɔsɛ anà Ɛli bàmuyäämà anà nde.
MAT 17:4 Petɔlà kàtɛn a Yɛsu naa: « Mwol, yan'söön ubwaŋ bi mukal apà. Kya ngye asàkwen, mɛ in'töŋ ntɛn, ntɛn tär: mwɛy ntɔn ngye, mwɛy ntɔn Mɔsɛ, mwɛy ntɔn Ɛli. »
MAT 17:5 Mpal kàkäl nde mutɛɛnà, tööb a uŋyäŋ laa lafwee la. Ndaa yàtoo uboo a tööb alan, waa yàtɛn naa: « Wawà, Mwan amɛ, nkwen amɛ, mpem amɛ yanswà ye amu nde. Lun'wem! »
MAT 17:6 Mpal bàwem alɔŋki ndaa ayi, ba bàmɛn bɔɔmà mbɔɔn, waa bàbü bàŋàtsüüm.
MAT 17:7 Yɛsu kàsin tsütsü apà ba, kabä, waa kàtɛn naa: « Làmbarà, twon lan'man bɔɔmà. »
MAT 17:8 Apan, ba bàsuub un'tswe, ba bàfàman anki mbuur asin, nà Yɛsu ŋakwo mpɛl.
MAT 17:9 Mpal bàkäl ba muyàtyà u mɔŋ, Yɛsu kaswɛŋ naa: « Iman mii ki, twon lan'kyään kya mbuur asin tii umpal usàwiyà Mwan a mbuur kà ukwà. »
MAT 17:10 Ungö apan, alɔŋki bàfuul Yɛsu naa: « Ntɔn nkye alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn bàtɛn ba naa Ɛli atwab atàyà? »
MAT 17:11 Nde kafuur naa: « Yà abun naa Ɛli atwab atàyà ntɔn mulɔn ndaa yanswà.
MAT 17:12 Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ alàkyään naa Ɛli wa kàkyàyà itaan, wɛɛ baar bun'kyey anki, ba bun'kyer ndaa yanswà ayà bàkwen ba. Ba Mwan a mbuur sye bàsun'tà an'kaal. »
MAT 17:13 Abun, alɔŋki bàsii naa nde akatɛɛnà ntɔn Ywan Un'düümà.
MAT 17:14 Utaaŋ bàyàkɔlà ba kà ikal kàkäl un'sɛŋ a baar, mbuur mwɛy kàyàbwà an'köm kà in'kɔl a Yɛsu,
MAT 17:15 waa kun'bɔ̈ɔ̈n naa: « Mwol, un'wem ngyɛb mwan amɛ, nde afikwà nkaaŋ anà afiman mpay mbɔɔn. Mbalà mbɔɔn nde afàbwà u mbaa itàkal kan'dà.
MAT 17:16 Mɛ amun'pà akà alɔŋki angye, wɛɛ ba bàsàkwo anki mukun'kɔɔr. »
MAT 17:17 Mufuur, Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Làfuun a làbe anà làkɔ̈ɔ̈n làkwikilà! Tii mpal nà in'sàkalà mɛ anà bɛ? An'taaŋ an'kwe in'sakaŋà mɛ mpem ntɔn bɛ? Lan'twääl awà pà mwan awun. »
MAT 17:18 Apan Yɛsu kàswɛŋ unsɔŋà mutoo, wa waa kàtoo u mwan awun. Taaŋ nsil sye alan mwan awun laa kàkɔɔrà nde.
MAT 17:19 Apan, alɔŋki bàyàsin tsütsü apà Yɛsu, waa bun'fuul naa: « Ntɔn nkye mpa ikwe bi muböŋ unsɔŋà awunà? »
MAT 17:20 Nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ntɔn làkwikilà abɛ là ikikye. Kyakin mɛ, mɛ alàkyään ndandaa: isàkal naa bɛ làbye anà làkwikilà asànaa imbɛŋ a ndɔŋ, bɛ lan'kwo làtɛn a mɔŋ wà naa: "Lwomà pà, kyen kàbü kunà", wa sye akyer akyà. Akà undiir mwɛy watɛy asàkal mpay akà bɛ.
MAT 17:21 [ Unsɔŋà a tub awà kan'kwo mutoo unsà ngyamàkà anà nkin a isa. » ]
MAT 17:22 Mpal bàkäl ba mufurà Ngalilɛ, Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mwan a mbuur bàkyer ayun'yälà kà an'kɔɔ a baar,
MAT 17:23 laa bàsun'dwa ba, wɛ kà ilä kyàtär, nde akyer asàwiyà. » Alɔŋki bàwem ngyɛb mbɔɔn.
MAT 17:24 Mpal bàyàkɔlà ba Kapɛrnawum, afüür a itɛr a ndwà a Nzam bàyi akà Petɔlà, waa bun'fuul naa: « Ntɔn nkye Un'lɔɔŋ abɛ mpa ufàfur nde itɛr a ndwà a Nzam? »
MAT 17:25 Petɔlà kàfuur naa: « Ɛɛ, nde akyer afàfur. » Mpal kàbilà Petɔlà u ndwà, Yɛsu kàdi nsweel, waa kun'fuul naa: « Simɔn, an'kyän angye mye aben? Amfum a mɛɛn un'laam itàkal itɛr bàfàwal akà nà? Akà baan aba lɛɛ akà angyey? »
MAT 17:26 Petɔlà kàfuur naa: « Akà angyey. » Yɛsu naa: « Abun, baan a ndwà mwo batɛy.
MAT 17:27 Itàkal abwɛy, mukɔɔn adwa làkwikilà aba, kyen kà ɛwà, tɔɔm ndɔb angye. Nsö atàtwɛb asiim ngye, duub mun awa, ngye ayàman itɛr a ngim, wal kya, apɛ ntɔn bi bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l. »
MAT 18:1 Utaaŋ alan, alɔŋki bàsin tsütsü apà Ysɛu, waa bàtɛn a nde naa: « Abun, nà awà kölàköl uboo a Imwol a du? »
MAT 18:2 Yɛsu kàbel mwan mwɛy, kun'si uboboo a ba,
MAT 18:3 waa kàtɛn naa: « Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, isàkal naa bɛ làsɔɔmà anki anà làkɔɔn abulà asànaa baan, bɛ làsàbilà anki kà Imwol a du.
MAT 18:4 Lalan, mbuur wanswà asàkal anà làbɔ̈ɔ̈n, nde asàkal wàkölàköl kà Imwol a du.
MAT 18:5 Mbuur awal mwan mwɛy asànaa wunà kà ikɔb amɛ, nde kan'wal mɛ ŋakwo. »
MAT 18:6 « Wɛɛ mbuur wanswà asiinà umwɛy uboo a bibaan ban'sà làkwikilà bà amu mɛ mubwà kà ube, yan'söön ubwaŋ akà nde naa bun'bäm nkɔŋ a kölàköl u bway, waa bun'tɔɔm kà indübà a an'dà.
MAT 18:7 Ngyɛb akà mɛɛn ntɔn ndaa yanswà ifàsyen baar mukyer ube! Ya ifàkɔɔn anki, wɛɛ ngyɛb akà mbuur awà mbwo ayà ifàyà ndɛb!
MAT 18:8 Isàkal naa kɔɔ angye itàkal làkɔl angye làfasyen nkuur unsà ube, tsul la anà piy la ukwɛl. Ntɔn yan'söön ubwaŋ naa ngye abilà du a Nzam làkɔl làmwɛy itàkal kɔɔ làmwɛy, akwànaa ngye mukal amà an'kɔɔ an'mɔ̈ɔ̈l itàkal in'kɔl myeel, waa batɔɔm u mbaa a mbul a in'tye.
MAT 18:9 Isàkal sye naa dii angye làfasyen nkuur unsà ube, kwool la, tɔɔm la ukwɛl. Ntɔn yan'söön ubwaŋ naa ngye abilà du a Nzam dii làmwɛy akwànaa ngye mukal amyà mii myeel, wɛɛ batɔɔm u mbaa a mbul a in'tye.
MAT 18:10 « Twon lan'bɛy akà umwɛy uboo a bibaan bi, ntɔn mɛ, mɛ in'tɛn a bɛ naa u du akyeey aba bàŋàmbar taaŋ lanswà kusà a Taaràmɛ awà u du.
MAT 18:11 [ Ntɔn Mwan a mbuur kàyi muyàtswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a baar bàdiimà mbwo. » ]
MAT 18:12 « An'kyän abɛ mye aben? Isàkal naa mbuur mwɛy we amyà in'kɔk nkam, wɛɛ umwɛy udiimà, nkye nde usàwɛy anki in'kɔk an'kwem wà aŋiwà myumwɛy u mɔŋ ntɔn mukàleŋ un'kɔk mwɛy kàdiimà wà?
MAT 18:13 Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, isàkal naa nde kan'man wa, nde ayàkal unsà un'sak aŋàsöönà ntɔn wa, akwànaa ntɔn an'kwem wà aŋiwà mpa myàdiimà.
MAT 18:14 Abun sye, Taaràbɛ awà u du akwen naa umwɛy uboo a bibaan bi ukɔɔn adiimà.
MAT 18:15 « Isàkal naa un'tɔŋ angye kàmakyer ube, kyen kun'mɛn, kun'mɛɛy ube kan'kyer nde. Isàkal naa nde kan'kyey, ngye an'fuur itɔŋ abɛ.
MAT 18:16 Wɛɛ isàkal naa nde kawem anki, syen mbuur mwɛy itàkal baar bɔ̈ɔ̈l, ntɔn ndaa yanswà ikäl aŋàlɔ̈ɔ̈n u mun a ambäl abɔ̈ɔ̈l itàkal atär.
MAT 18:17 Isàkal naa nde ba kawem anki, kasaam ya kà Ikööŋ. Isàkal naa nde kan'tɔn muwem Ikööŋ, wɛy nde ukäl akà ngye asànaa mbuur mpa awà un'yudà itàkal un'füür a itɛr.
MAT 18:18 « Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään: undiir wanswà làsàbäm bɛ u mɛɛn, wa asàkal wàŋàbäm u du. Undiir wanswà làsàtsuuŋ bɛ u mɛɛn, wa asàkal wàŋàtsuuŋ u du.
MAT 18:19 « Mɛ, mɛ in'fàlakyään naa isàkal naa baar abɔ̈ɔ̈l uboo abɛ ban'lwɛŋ u mɛɛn pà ntɔn mulɔm undiir, Taaràmɛ awà u du akyer asapà wa.
MAT 18:20 Ntɔn baar abɔ̈ɔ̈l itàkal atär bàsàtüüb kà ikɔb amɛ, mɛ in'wà uboo a ba.»
MAT 18:21 Apan, Petɔlà kàsin tsütsü apà Yɛsu, waa kun'fuul naa: « Mwol, mbalà kwe mɛ an'kwo mudwääl un'tɔŋ amɛ nkul isàkal naa nde kàman'kyer ube? Nkye mbalà nsambwaar? »
MAT 18:22 Yɛsu naa: « Mɛ in'tɛn anki a ngye naa tii mbalà nsambwaar, wɛ, tii u mbalà an'kwem nsambwaar mbalà nsambwaar.
MAT 18:23 Abun, Imwol a du kyà asànaa mfum mwɛy kàkwen mulɔn ndaa a ngim ande anà asyääl ande.
MAT 18:24 U nsɛmà, ba bun'twääl umwɛy kàlun'fuur itɛr nsaab kwem.
MAT 18:25 Wɛɛ nde ngim afuur kàkäl ayà anki. Apan, nkum ande kàswɛŋ naa bayälà asànaa asɔ, nde anà un'kyay ande anà baan ande, anà indiir ande byanswà ntɔn mufur nkul ayin.
MAT 18:26 Apan, un'syääl awà kàbü an'köm kusà a nkum ande, waa kàtɛn naa: "Nkum, kaŋ mpem ntɔn mɛ, mɛ in'kyer ayàfur nkul angye yanswà."
MAT 18:27 Nkum ande kun'wem ngyɛb, waa kun'wɛy ungö akun'dwääl nkul ande.
MAT 18:28 Un'syääl awà kàtoo nde, nde kàbwey a umwɛy uboo a baar bàfàsal anà nde, awà kàlun'pà itɛr a ngim nkam mwɛy. Nde kun'si mpi a mpà anà mutɛn naa: "Fur nkul amɛ!"
MAT 18:29 Abun, mbuur awun kàbü an'köm, waa kun'bɔ̈ɔ̈n naa: "Kaŋ mpem ntɔn mɛ, mɛ in'kyer ayafur!"
MAT 18:30 Wɛɛ un'syääl awun waa kàtön, kàkun'sà u bɔlokà tii mpal kàlàfur nde nkul ayin.
MAT 18:31 Mpal bàmɛn asyääl bumwɛy ndaa ayi, laa bàkyɛɛr ba, waa bàkàkyään nkum aba ndaa yanswà yàlyaŋ.
MAT 18:32 Apan, nkum kàbel un'syääl awun, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: "Un'syääl un'be! Nkul angye yanswà mɛ kàkyer apiy bwà, ntɔn ngye kàkyer an'bɔɔn.
MAT 18:33 Nkye ngye sye un'tɔŋ angye alun'wem anki ngyɛb asànaa kawem mɛ ngyɛb?"
MAT 18:34 Nkum ande kàwem nkyɛl, waa kun'pɛ akà aŋangwal tii mpal kàlàfur nde nkul ande yanswà.
MAT 18:35 « Taaràmɛ awà u du asàlakyer sye abun isàkal naa umwɛy umwɛy uboo a bɛ udwääl anki un'tɔŋ ande nkul a ibii ande unsà mpem ande wanswà. »
MAT 19:1 Mpal kàmay Yɛsu nswɛɛŋ ayin, nde kàlwomà u Ngalilɛ, waa kàkyen itiir a nsi a Yuday, u sim a Yɔrdan lumwɛy.
MAT 19:2 Un'sɛŋ a baar mbɔɔn laa kàyun'labà wa, nde waa kakɔɔr kwo.
MAT 19:3 Amfarisi bàsin apà nde ntɔn mukun'lɛɛ untaam : « Nkye baal kan'kwo uböŋ un'kyay ande ntɔn ndaa kànà? »
MAT 19:4 Nde kafuur naa: « Nkye bɛ làtäŋ anki naa u nsɛmà Nkyer kàyilà baal anà un'kaar,
MAT 19:5 waa kàtɛn naa: "Lalan, baal asàwɛy taarànde anà ngwän, nde usàkàbääb anà un'kyay ande. Waa ba bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l bàsàbulà ndür mwɛy.
MAT 19:6 Abun, ba bàfàkal anki abɔ̈ɔ̈l, wɛɛ ndür mwɛy mpɛl. Apan, wɛy mbuur ukɔɔn akaab ayà kàtüüb Nzam." »
MAT 19:7 Ba bàtɛn naa: « Ntɔn nkye Mɔsɛ kàpɛ nde mbwo akà baal mupà un'kaan a nkaabà akà un'kyay ande mpal kun'böŋ nde? »
MAT 19:8 Nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ntɔn mpem a ngwal abɛ waa Mɔsɛ kàpɛ mbwo muböŋ akyay abɛ. Wɛɛ u nsɛmà, ya yàkäl anki abwɛy.
MAT 19:9 Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ alàkyään naa: Yan'kwo bàwɛy un'kaar kan'tà inswem mpɛl. Wɛɛ mbuur usàwɛy un'kyay ande mpa kàtɛ nde inswem, anà kan'bääl un'kaar asin, nde kan'tà inswem. »
