MAT 19:10 Alɔŋki ande bàtɛn a nde naa: « Isàkal naa ndaa a baal anà un'kyay ande yà abwɛy, apɛy ndöŋ abääl yatɛy. »
MAT 19:11 Nde kafuur naa: « Baar banswà bàfàyöb anki ndaa ayi, wɛɛ baar akwà bàwɛl kab alan mpɛl.
MAT 19:12 Abun, bye anà ampfwe fà an'bäl a angwän aba, bye anà ampfwe ntɔn baar asin bawɛl mfɛɛl, bye anà ampfwe ntɔn ba ŋakwo bàkwen mukal ampfwe ntɔn Imwol a du. Wɛy mbuur kan'kwo muyöb uyöb! »
MAT 19:13 Apan, baar bun'twääl baan ambɛy ntɔn nde kasi an'kɔɔ anà ngyamàkà. Wɛɛ alɔŋki laa baŋyäŋà ba.
MAT 19:14 Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Lawɛy baan ambɛy bàyi akà mɛ, twɔn làmatsuŋ ntɔn Imwol a du kye akà baar abà asànaa ba. »
MAT 19:15 Ungö kasi nde an'kɔɔ, nde kàlwomà apan.
MAT 19:16 Ungö apan, mbuur mwɛy kàsin apà nde, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, ininà aŋàbwaŋ an'kwo mɛ mukyer ntɔn muwal mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye? »
MAT 19:17 Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ntɔn nkye aman'fuul ngye ntɔn yàŋàbwaŋ? Umwɛy mpɛl awà ŋàbwaŋ. Isàkal naa ngye akwen mubilà u mɔ̈ɔ̈, lab nswɛɛŋ. »
MAT 19:18 Mbuur awà kun'fuul naa: « Nswɛɛŋ yɛn? » Nde kàtɛn a nde naa: « Twɔn an'dwa, twon an'tà inswem, twɔn an'yib, twɔn an'tà imbäl a loor,
MAT 19:19 kömà taaràŋà anà ngwa, kwen un'tɔŋ angye asànaa ngye ŋakwo. »
MAT 19:20 Un'tö awà kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mɛ akyàkwey indiir abi byanswà, undiir nà amàfan'kɔ̈ɔ̈n? »
MAT 19:21 Yɛsu kàtɛn ande naa: « Isàkal naa ngye akwen mukal wàŋàkwo, kyen, kayälà indiir angye, wal ngim an'yälà ngye bya pà ya akà aŋàlàmbwà , waa ngye asàwal un'naaŋ u du. Ungö apan, yan'läb. »
MAT 19:22 Ungö muwem ndaa ayi, un'tö awà kàkyen unsà ngyɛb yanswà, ntɔn nde kàkäl anà indiir mbɔɔn.
MAT 19:23 Waa Yɛsu kàtɛn a alɔŋki ande naa: « Mɛ, mɛ alàkyään ndandaa naa yà mpay akà ŋun'naaŋ mubilà kà Imwol a du.
MAT 19:24 Mɛ, mɛ in'fàlakyään naa: mpay yatɛy akà mpoonà mubilà u mun a nsway, akwànaa akà ŋun'naaŋ mubilà uboo a Imwol a Nzam. »
MAT 19:25 Mpal bàwem alɔŋki abwɛy, ba bàbem mbɔɔn, waa bàtɛn naa: « Abun, nà kan'kwo muwà mɔ̈ɔ̈? »
MAT 19:26 Yɛsu laa kaler nde, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ya ikwe anki akà baar, wɛɛ akà Nzam yanswà ikyer afàkwo. »
MAT 19:27 Apan, Petɔlà kàwɛl ndaa, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Le, bi, bi kàkyàsàwɛy ya yanswà ntɔn mulab ngye. Ininà bi isàwal? »
MAT 19:28 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mɛ, mɛ alàkyään ndandaa: utaaŋ byàsàfurà indiir byanswà byàkün, mpal usàbwaay Mwan a mbuur u kir a làkoo ande, bɛ, bɛ sye làsàbwaay kà an'kir kwem aŋiyweel mà imwol, ntɔn mutsul nsaŋ a in'sɛŋ a Isàlɛl myà kwem aŋiyweel.
MAT 19:29 Waa mbuur wanswà kàsàwɛy ndwà, atɔŋ abaal anà bakaar, taarànde, ngwän, baan, itàkal an'ywaŋ ntɔn mɛ, asàwal yàŋàsöön mbalà nkam, bweel ande bàsàkal mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye.
MAT 19:30 Bàmbɔɔn bàtàtwɛb bàsàkal bàngöngö, bàmbɔɔn bàngöngö bàsàkal bàtàtwɛb. »
MAT 20:1 « Abun, Imwol a du kyà asànaa nkum a ndwà mwɛy kàtoo ututu tutu muwal baar ntɔn mukàsal u ywaŋ a vin ande.
MAT 20:2 Nde kàlwɛɛŋ anà ba naa nde ayafur itɛr a ngim mwɛy kà ilä imwɛy kyà isal. Ungö nde katöm mukàsal u ywaŋ ande.
MAT 20:3 Ntsü a taaŋ làwà làtutu, nde kàtoo, waa kàmɛn baar bumwɛy u balàbal bàkyàkal mpɛɛl,
MAT 20:4 nde kàtɛn a ba naa: "Bɛ sye, làkyen ywaŋ amɛ, mɛ in'yàlapà làfur aŋàkwo."
MAT 20:5 Ba waa bàkyen. Ntsü a midi anà utaaŋ làtär ungö a midi, nde kàfàtoo, waa kàkyer asànaa kusà.
MAT 20:6 Mumay, nde kàfàtoo u taaŋ làtyen là sisye, waa kàmɛn baar asin bàkyàmbar paa. Nde kafuul naa: "Ntɔn nkye làbwaayà bɛ apà ilä aŋun'kiinà ukɔɔn isal?"
MAT 20:7 Ba bàfuur naa: "Ntɔn akà mbuur mwɛy kà iwɛl anki musal." Nde waa kàtɛn a ba naa: "Bɛ sye, làkyen ywaŋ amɛ!" »
MAT 20:8 « Mpal làkwe sisye, ŋaywaŋ kàswɛŋ mbuur afàler isal ande naa: "Abel baar a isal, pà akà mbuur wanswà làfur ande. Ngye ayàsɛmà akà baar a ngöngö, waa ayàmay akà baar atàtwɛb."
MAT 20:9 Baar akwà bàsɛmà isal u taaŋ làtyɛn là sisye waa bàyi, bàwɛl mbuur mbuur itɛr a ngim mwɛy.
MAT 20:10 Wɛɛ mpal bàyi baar atàtwɛb, an'kyän aba màkäl naa ba bàyàwal làfur aŋàsöön, wɛɛ ba sye bàwɛl mbuur mbuur itɛr a ngim mwɛy.
MAT 20:11 Utaaŋ ban'wal ba kya, ba bàŋüŋün a nkum a ndwà,
MAT 20:12 waa bàtɛn a nde naa: "Baar bàbilà isal ungöngö bàkyer taaŋ làmwɛy mpɛl, wɛɛ ngye amafur làsii làmwɛy anà bi baar kan'sɛn yɔ̈ɔ̈n a ilä anà igyɛy a mwäänà!"
MAT 20:13 Wɛɛ ŋaywaŋ kàfuur akà umwɛy uboo a ba naa: "Un'sam amɛ, akà ube mwɛy amakyer mɛ batɛy. Nkye ngye alwɛɛŋ anki anà mɛ ntɔn itɛr a ngim mwɛy?
MAT 20:14 Wal kab angye, kyen kà ngye. Mɛ an'kwen mupà akà mbuur angöngö asànaa akà ngye.
MAT 20:15 Nkye mɛ in'kwe anki mukyer anà indiir amɛ asànaa in'kwen mɛ? Ngye an'man ube ntɔn in'wà mɛ mbuur aŋàbwaŋ?"
MAT 20:16 Abun, bàngöngö bàsàkal bàtàtwɛb, bàtàtwɛb bàsàkal bàngöngö. »
MAT 20:17 Umpal kàkäl Yɛsu mubeenà Yɛlusàlɛm, nde kàbel Bàkwem Aŋiyweel ukɔl, waa kàtɛn a ba u mbwo naa:
MAT 20:18 « Le, bi ibàmubeenà Yɛlusàlɛm, mper bàyàkàyälà Mwan a mbuur akà amfum a angaŋ anà akà alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn. Ba bàkyer akun'tsüül mbar a ukwà,
MAT 20:19 anà bàkun'pà kà an'kɔɔ a baar mpa abà Ayudà ntɔn mukun'sɛ, mukun'kam an'füm anà mukun'bɛɛrà u kulunsi. Wɛɛ kà ilä kyàtär, nde akyer asàwiyà. »
MAT 20:20 Apan, un'kyay a Zebeday kàyàsin tsütsü apà Yɛsu anà baan ande babaal , waa kabü an'köm ntɔn mukun'lɔ̈ɔ̈m.
MAT 20:21 Yɛsu kàtɛn ande naa: « Ininà ngye akwen? » Nde kun'fuur naa: « Pà mbwo uboo a Imwol angye naa baan abaal amɛ bà bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l bàsàbwaay umwɛy u kɔɔ angye libaal, wumwɛy u kɔɔ angye là ikaar. »
MAT 20:22 Yɛsu kàfuur naa: « Le baar bà: bɛ làyöb anki naa bɛ ininà làkalɔɔmà. Nkye bɛ lan'kwo munwà kɔɔb alà in'yànwà mɛ? » Ba bun'fuur naa: « Inye, bi kan'kwo. »
MAT 20:23 Nde waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Bɛ làkyer asànwà kɔɔb amɛ. Wɛɛ mubwaay u kɔɔ ibaal anà là ikaar, kà mɛ anki an'kwo mupà mbwo: Kya kyà ntɔn baar kàlɔ̈ɔ̈n Taa. »
MAT 20:24 Mpal bàwem alɔŋki kwem bumwɛy ndaa ayin, ba bàwem atɔŋ aba abà bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l nkyɛl.
MAT 20:25 Wɛɛ Yɛsu waa kabel, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Bɛ, bɛ làkyàyöb naa amfum a in'sɛŋ bàfàsà ba ungyɛl a in'kɔl aba, anà baar an'köl an'köl bàfàswaŋ ba ikɔ̈b aba.
MAT 20:26 Ya ikwe anki mukal abwɛy uboo a bɛ. Wɛɛ isàkal naa mbuur akwen mukal wàkölàköl uboo a bɛ, wɛy nde ukäl un'syääl abɛ,
MAT 20:27 waa mbuur wanswà akwen mukal wàtàtwɛb uboo a bɛ, wɛy nde ukäl un'syääl abɛ.
MAT 20:28 Lalan Mwan a mbuur kàyi anki ntɔn bun'syääl, wɛɛ ntɔn musyääl anà mupà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande nkwiy ntɔn un'kàbɔ a baar. »
MAT 20:29 Umpal bàtoo ba u Yɛlikɔ, un'sɛŋ a baar mbɔɔn kàläb Yɛsu.
MAT 20:30 Kyekà ikwàmii abɔ̈ɔ̈l bàkäl bàŋàbwaay ukɔl a mbwo. Mpal bàwem ba naa Yɛsu wàmulyaŋ tsütsü, ba bàsɛmà mukuub in'kwɛŋ: « Mwol, Mwan a David, isyääm! »
MAT 20:31 Un'sɛŋ a baar katsüŋà musà in'kwɛŋ, wɛɛ ba bàsöönà mulaal: « Mwol, Mwan a David, isyääm! »
MAT 20:32 Yɛsu waa kàmbär, waa kabel, waa kafuul naa: « Ininà bɛ làkwen naa mɛ in'kyer ntɔn bɛ? »
MAT 20:33 Ba bun'fuur naa: « Mwol, kyer naa mii abi idubà. »
MAT 20:34 Yɛsu waa kasyääm, kabä u mii. Apan sye, mii aba waa myàdubà, waa bun'läb.
MAT 21:1 Umpal bàsin ba tsütsü a Yɛlusàlɛm, anà bàtöl ba tsütsü a Bɛtefazɛ, udu a mɔŋ a In'te a olive, apan Yɛsu kàtöm abɔ̈ɔ̈l uboo a alɔŋki ande,
MAT 21:2 waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làkyen u bul lanà kusà a bɛ, pa làkàkɔlà bɛ, bɛ làkàman ntsür bàfàbel anɛs wàŋàbäm un'siŋ anà mwan awa ukɔl. Làtsuuŋ wa, lan'twääl ayà pà.
MAT 21:3 Isàkal naa mbuur kan'tɛn undiir anà bɛ, lun'fuur naa: "Mwol we anà mfun aya". Làgyägyä, ba bàyàwɛy ya ntɔn mukyà. »
MAT 21:4 Yàkäl ya abà, ntɔn ndaa kàtɛn ŋangɔɔm yi ikwe:
MAT 21:5 « Tɛn a un'sɛŋ a Siyɔnà naa: Le, mfum angye wàmuyà akà ngye, wàŋàyɔl a làbɔ̈ɔ̈n anà wàŋàlaar udu a ntsür bàfàbel an, anà udu anɔ, mwan a ntsür afàsyen buur. »
MAT 21:6 Alɔŋki bàkyen ba, ba bàkyer asànaa kaswɛŋ Yɛsu.
MAT 21:7 Ba bàtwääl ntsür bàfàbel an anà mwan awa, waa bàyɛɛl ipfɛy aba udu a ya. Yɛsu kàbwaay udu a ya.
MAT 21:8 Un'sɛŋ a baar kàyɛɛl ipfɛy awa u mbwo, bumwɛy bàtsüülà an'kɔkà a in'te waa bàyɛɛlà ma u mbwo.
MAT 21:9 In'sɛŋ a baar myàyikyeenà kusà a Yɛsu anà myàyun'labà myàkäl muyisà in'kwɛŋ naa: « Ɔsana akà Mwan a David! Wɛy mbuur awà ayà kà ikɔb a Mwol ukäl wàŋàsaak! Ɔsana kà ikal a dudu! »
MAT 21:10 Mpal kàbilà nde u Yɛlusàlɛm, bul lanswà làkyer ani anà làkäl mufuulà naa: « Nà wawà? »
MAT 21:11 In'sɛŋ waa myàfuurà naa: « Ŋangɔɔm Yɛsu, un'nsi Nasàlɛr u Ngalilɛ. »
MAT 21:12 Yɛsu kàbilà u làpaŋ a ndwà a Nzam, nde kàböŋ atɛɛl a an'yà banswà bàkäl kwo, kàbuum mɛsà a agyɛɛŋ a ngim anà an'kir a ayääl a an'yem.
MAT 21:13 Nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Bàsön naa: "Ndwà amɛ bàsabeelà naa ndwà a ngyamàkà", wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ ya làkyàbuul mboo a mbüüb! »
MAT 21:14 Ikwàmii anà ikar bàyàsin tsütsü apà nde uboo a ndwà a Nzam, nde waa kakɔɔr.
MAT 21:15 Wɛɛ mpal bàmɛn andweer a angaŋ anà alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn ndaa impà kàkyer Yɛsu anà in'kwɛŋ bàsyee baan uboo a ndwà a Nzam: « Ɔsana akà Mwan a David! », ba bàwem nkyɛl,
MAT 21:16 waa bàtɛn a nde naa: « Nkye ngye akiweemà ndaa bàtɛɛnà ba? » Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Inye. Nkye bɛ, bɛ làtäŋ anki akà ikikye ndaa bàsön yi: "Nkye ngye kàyöŋà nsyäŋà u mun a ambɛy anà yà baan abà kà an'bɛɛl?" »
MAT 21:17 Apan laa kàsawɛy nde, waa kàkyen Bɛtani, ntsü kàkàbɔ̈ɔ̈n nde.
MAT 21:18 Taaŋtyà ututu, mpal kàkäl nde u mbwo mufurà bul a kölàköl, Yɛsu kàwem ngyal.
MAT 21:19 Nde kàmɛn un'te a an'fige ukɔl a mbwo, nde kàsin tsütsü apà wa, wɛɛ nde undiir kàmɛn anki, nà nkay mpɛl. Apan nde kàtɛn a un'te naa: « Ngye afàsàbɔr anki imbɛŋ! » Taaŋ nsil alan, un'te laa kàyöm wa.
MAT 21:20 Mpal bàmɛn alɔŋki abun, ba bàkyer abem, waa bàtɛn naa: « Un'te a an'fige kan'yɔm aben u mbalà mwɛy? »
MAT 21:21 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Mɛ, mɛ ndandaa alàkyään: isàkal naa bɛ làbye anà làkwikilà, ukɔɔn nkyɛɛr, bɛ lan'kwo mukyer kànà ndaa an'kyer mɛ yi akà un'te wà anki, wɛ bɛ lan'kwo mutɛn itàkal a mɔŋ wà naa: "Lwomà pà, kyen kabü u ngyäl", ya sye ikal abun.
MAT 21:22 Undiir wanswà làlɔm bɛ unsà làkwikilà u ngyamàkà, bɛ làkyer asàwal wa. »
MAT 21:23 Mpal kàbilà Yɛsu u ndwà a Nzam, amfum a angaŋ anà andweer a un'sɛŋ bàyàsin anà bun'fuul umpal kàkäl nde mulɔŋ: « Unsà ikɔ̈b nà ayikyer ngye indiir abi? Nà kapɛ ikɔ̈b aki? »
MAT 21:24 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Mɛ sye in'we anà mfuul mwɛy ntɔn bɛ. Isàkal naa bɛ làman'pà mfuur, mɛ sye waa alakyään naa unsà ikɔ̈b nà mɛ in'kyerà bya.
MAT 21:25 Ndüümà a Ywan yàfü ken? U du lɛɛ akà baar? » Wɛɛ ba bàsyeelà mbaaŋ ba a ba naa: « Kya bi isàtɛn naa: "U du", nde ayifuul naa: "Ntɔn nkye mpa lun'si bɛ làkwikilà?"
MAT 21:26 Wɛɛ bi isàfuur naa: "Baar", bi itiin un'sɛŋ a baar bɔɔmà, ntɔn ba banswà bàkyàyöb naa Ywan wà ŋangɔɔm. »
MAT 21:27 Apan, ba bàfuur akà Yɛsu naa: « Bi iyöb anki. » Waa nde sye kafuur naa: « Mɛ sye alàkyään anki unsà ikɔ̈b nà in'fàkyer mɛ indiir abi. »
MAT 21:28 « An'kyän abɛ mye aben? Mbuur mwɛy kàkäl anà baan abaal bɔ̈ɔ̈l. Nde kàsin apà wàtàtwɛb, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: "Mwan amɛ, kyen kasäl ŋàbà u ywaŋ a vin."
MAT 21:29 Mwan awà kàfuur naa: "Aay, mɛ in'kwen anki." Ungö a taaŋ, nde kàsɔɔm ankyän, waa kàkyen.
MAT 21:30 Kàsin nde apà mwan wàyweel, nde kàtɛn ndaa nsil ya. Mwan awà kàfuur naa: "Inye, taa". Wɛɛ nde kàkyen anki.
MAT 21:31 Nà uboo a ba bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l kàkyer ukwen a taarànde? » Ba naa: « Wàtàtwɛb. » Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään: afüür a itɛr anà akaar a pasàsɛ bàsàfwel kusà a bɛ uboo a Imwol a Nzam.
MAT 21:32 Ntɔn Ywan kàyi akà bɛ u mbwo a balàbal, wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làkwikilà lun'si anki. Wɛɛ afüür a itɛr anà akaar a pasàsɛ bun'si làkwikilà. Itàkal naa bɛ làkyàman ya abwɛy, wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làbuul anki mpem ntɔn mukun'sà làkwikilà.
MAT 21:33 « Làwem nsim yumwɛy: Nkum mwɛy kàkön vin u ywaŋ. Nde kàdiŋà la a làpaŋ, nde kàtöŋ ikal mukaam mbɛŋ anà ndwà a ikyɛɛŋ. Ungö apan nde kàpɛ la akà atɛɛr a man, waa kàkyen mukàyilyaŋ.
MAT 21:34 Mpal làkwe taaŋ abwo mbɛŋ, nde kàtöm asyääl ande akà atɛɛr a man ntɔn muwal mbɛŋ a vin.
MAT 21:35 Atɛɛr a man bàkör asyääl aban, umwɛy bun'düb, umwɛy bun'dwä, umwɛy bun'käm in'kul.
MAT 21:36 Nde kàfàtɔm asyääl asin mbɔɔn bàŋàlyaŋ bàtàtwɛb, wɛɛ atɛɛr a man bakyer ifà imwɛy kya.
MAT 21:37 Mumay, nde kàtöm mwan ande, waa kàtɛn naa: "Ba bàyàkàkömà mwan amɛ."
MAT 21:38 Wɛɛ mpal bàmɛn atɛɛr a man mwan awà, ba bàtɛn ba a ba naa: "Le ikyee ande. Làyi bi kun'dwä, waa bi iwal ywaŋ ande!"
MAT 21:39 Apan, ba bun'tɛ mpi, bun'tɔɔm u nsà a ywaŋ a vin, waa bun'dwä. »
MAT 21:40 Abun, Yɛsu kafuul naa: « Ŋàbawà, ŋaywaŋ asàkyer aben ntɔn atɛɛr a man abà? »
MAT 21:41 Ba bun'fuur naa: « Nde baar abe abà akyer asadwa ukɔɔn aman ngyɛb, nde asàwal ywaŋ a vin, waa usàpà la akà atɛɛr a man asin ban'kwo mukun'pà mbɛŋ u taaŋ a taaŋ. »
MAT 21:42 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Nkye bɛ làtäŋ anki akà ikikye uboo a Ndaa Aŋàsɔn: "Nkɔŋ bàpiy atööŋ, ya yàbulà nkɔŋ a twɛrà a ndwà. Kyaki kyà isal a Mwol, ndaa mwɛy yubem u mii abi!" »
MAT 21:43 « Mɛ, mɛ in'fàlakyään naa: Imwol a Nzam bàkyer asàladuum, waa bàsàpà akà un'sɛŋ awà asàbɔr mbɛŋ.
MAT 21:44 [ Mbuur asàbwà udu a nkɔŋ ayi akyer asàpàpää, anà ya isàbweel mbuur, mbuur awun akyer asàbwàbwamà. » ]
MAT 21:45 Mpal bàwem andweer a angaŋ anà Amfarisi nsim ande ayi, ba bàkyer ayöb naa nde kàtɛɛnà a ba.
MAT 21:46 Undiir awun, bàleŋà ba ipöl mukun'kɔr, wɛɛ ba bàmɛn bɔɔmà a iköŋ a baar byàwɛlà Yɛsu asànaa ŋangɔɔm.
MAT 22:1 Yɛsu kàfàtɛn a ba unsà nsim naa:
MAT 22:2 « Imwol a du kyà asànaa mfum mwɛy kàyöŋà un'kyɔm atà bɔr ntɔn mwan baal ande.
MAT 22:3 Nde kàtöm asyääl ande mukàbel baar ntɔn un'kyɔm awà, wɛɛ ba bàkwen anki muyà.
MAT 22:4 Nde kàfàtɔm asyääl asin ntɔn mukàtɛn a baar bàbel naa: "Le, mɛ an'lɔn isa byanswà: mɛ an'dwa in'dim a ngɔɔmà anà ntsür a may amɛ, indiir byanswà byan'kwo. Làyi kà un'kyɔm atà bɔr!"
MAT 22:5 Wɛɛ ba bàwɛl ya asànaa an'yääm a ngway, ba bàkyen isal aba: umwɛy u ywaŋ ande, wumwɛy u yà ande.
MAT 22:6 Bumwɛy bàkör asyääl, waa bamɛɛy an'kyeey, waa badwä.
MAT 22:7 Mfum kàwem nkyɛl, waa kàtöm aŋità ande mudwa adwää baar aban, waa bàwuul bul aba mbaa.
MAT 22:8 Apan, nde kàtɛn a asyääl ande naa: "Un'kyɔm atà bɔr kan'kwo, wɛɛ baar bàbel ndöŋ batɛy.
MAT 22:9 Abun, làkyen kà an'kuun a mbwo, làtwääl kà un'kyɔm atà bɔr baar banswà làkàman bɛ."
MAT 22:10 Asyääl abà laa bàkyen ba u mbwo, bàköŋà ba baar banswà bàmɛn ba, baar abe anà abwɛŋ. Ndwà a un'kyɔm atà bɔr waa yàyöl a baar bàbel.
MAT 22:11 Mfum kàbilà ntɔn muler baar bàbel, waa kàmɛn mbuur mwɛy mpa kàbwäär ipfɛy a un'kyɔm.
MAT 22:12 Nde waa kun'fuul: "Un'sam amɛ, ngye apà ayàbilà aben ukɔɔn ipfɛy a un'kyɔm?" Mbuur awà ndaa kàsi anki.
MAT 22:13 Apan, mfum waa kàtɛn a asyääl naa: "Lun'bäm in'siŋ kà in'kɔl anà kà an'kɔɔ, lun'piy u làpib a nsà. Kwo iyàkal ilel anà nkwoor a an'din."
MAT 22:14 Abun, bàfàbel baar mbɔɔn, wɛɛ bàfàwal ikikye mpɛl. »
MAT 22:15 Apan, Amfarisi bàkàköŋ ntɔn muleŋ naa ba ndaa bun'lwab aben u ntɛɛn ande ŋakwo.
MAT 22:16 Ungö apan, ba bun'tööm alɔŋki aba anà baar a Ɛlɔdi ntɔn mutɛn a nde naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, bi ikyàyöb naa ngye loor afàtà anki: ngye afàlɔŋ mbwo a Nzam unsà ndandaa yanswà ukɔɔn alab an'kyän a mbuur asin, ntɔn ngye afàler anki imbuur a baar.
MAT 22:17 Abun, ikyään, ngye akasii aben: mbwo yàmwo lɛɛ yatɛy mufur itɛr akà Sɛzar? »
MAT 22:18 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kàkyer ayöb an'kyän an'be aba, waa kafuur naa: « Baar a mpem yweel, ntɔn nkye lan'lwab bɛ ndaa?
MAT 22:19 Lan'swɛŋ ngim bàfàfur ayà itɛr. » Ba waa bun'mɛɛy itɛr a ngim mwɛy.
MAT 22:20 Waa Yɛsu kafuul naa: « Idiim anà ikɔb bi byà nà? »
MAT 22:21 Ba bun'fuur naa: « Byà Sɛzar. » Apan nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Abun, làpɛ indiir a Sɛzar akà Sɛzar, indiir a Nzam, akà Nzam. »
MAT 22:22 Mpal bàwem ba mfuur ayi, ba bàkyer abem, laa bàsun'wɛy ba, waa bàkyen.
MAT 22:23 Ilä nsil akin, Asadusi bàsin tsütsü apà Yɛsu. Ba bà baar bàfàtɛn naa ngwiiyà kà ukwà yatɛy. Ba bun'fuul naa:
MAT 22:24 « Un'lɔɔŋ, Mɔsɛ kàtɛn naa: "Isàkal naa mbuur kan'kwà ukɔɔn baan, un'tɔŋ ande asàbääl un'kweel a un'dim, ntɔn nde uböör un'tɔŋ ande baan."
MAT 22:25 Akà bi bàkäl anà atɔŋ nsambwaar. Wàtàtwɛb kàkäl wàŋàbääl. Nde kàkü ukɔɔn abɔr, waa kàsàwɛy un'kyay ande akà un'tɔŋ ande.
MAT 22:26 Ya yàkäl abà akà wàyweel, wàtär, tii akà wànsambwaar.
MAT 22:27 Ungö a ba banswà, un'kaar awun waa kàkü.
MAT 22:28 Mpal bàsàwiyà baar kukwà, uboo a ba bànsambwaar, un'kaar awà asàkal un'kyay anà? Ntɔn ba banswà bàkäl adim ande! »
MAT 22:29 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Bɛ, bɛ làbaŋàdiimà mbwo, ntɔn bɛ làyöb anki itàkal Ndaa Aŋàsɔn, itàkal ngwal a Nzam.
MAT 22:30 Ntɔn, mpal bàsàwiyà baar, abaal anà akaar bàfàsàtà anki bɔr, wɛɛ ba bàsàkal asànaa akyeey u du.
MAT 22:31 Unsà ndaa iler ngwiiyà a baar kà ukwà, nkye bɛ làtäŋ anki ndaa kàtɛn Nzam a bɛ naa:
MAT 22:32 "Mɛ, mɛ in'wà Nzam a Abàlam, Nzam a Isak anà Nzam a Yakɔb?" Nde kà wà Nzam a akü anki, wɛɛ wà baar a mɔ̈ɔ̈. »
MAT 22:33 In'sɛŋ a baar bàwem an'lɔɔŋ ande, ma màkyer atwà.
MAT 22:34 Mpal bàwem Amfarisi naa Yɛsu an'dübà Asadusi mun, laa bàköŋ ba,
MAT 22:35 umwɛy uboo a ba, un'lɔɔŋ a un'kɔɔn, waa kun'fuul ntɔn mukun'lwab ndaa:
MAT 22:36 « Un'lɔɔŋ, nswɛɛŋ nà ayà kölàköl uboo a Un'kɔɔn? »
MAT 22:37 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « "Ngye asàkwen Mwol, Nzam angye, u mpem angye wanswà, u mɔ̈ɔ̈ angye wanswà, anà kan'kyän angye manswà."
MAT 22:38 Ayi nswɛɛŋ a kölàköl anà yàtàtwɛb.
MAT 22:39 Yàyweel yà mfun sye àyi: "Ngye asàkwen un'tɔŋ angye asànaa ngye ŋakwo."
MAT 22:40 Un'kɔɔn wanswà anà aŋangɔɔm bàtoo u nswɛɛŋ ayi yàyweel. »
MAT 22:41 Amfarisi bàkäl aŋàköŋ, waa Yɛsu kafuul naa:
MAT 22:42 « An'kyän abɛ myà aben ntɔn Klistɔ? Nde wà mwan anà? » Ba bun'fuur naa: « Wà David. »
MAT 22:43 Nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Abun, aben David, u mbwo a Dweelà, kun'beelà nde Mwol mpal kàtɛn nde naa:
MAT 22:44 "Mwol kàtɛn a mwol amɛ naa: Bwaay u kɔɔ amɛ libaal, tii mpal in'sàsà mɛ aŋankir angye ungyɛl a in'kɔl angye." »
MAT 22:45 « Isàkal abun naa David afun'bel "Mwol", aben nde kan'kwo mufàkal mwan a David? »
MAT 22:46 Akà mbuur mwɛy kàsàkwo anki mukun'fuur akà ndaa mwɛy. Sɛmà ilä akin, akà mbuur mwɛy kàfàsi anki mukun'fuul ndaa.
MAT 23:1 Apan, Yɛsu kàtɛn a un'sɛŋ a baar anà alɔŋki ande naa:
MAT 23:2 « Alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn anà Amfarisi bàkyàbwaay u kir a Mɔsɛ.
MAT 23:3 Undiir awun, làler yinà yanswà ban'kwo mutɛn ba a bɛ. Wɛɛ twon lan'lab nkyeer aba, ntɔn ba bàfàkyer anki ayà bàfàtɛn ba.
MAT 23:4 Ba bàfàbäm indiir a buur anà bàfàtälà bya udu a ipaay a baar. Wɛɛ ba ŋakwo bàfàkwen anki mukaal bya a làpin.
MAT 23:5 Nsyääl aba yanswà yà ntɔn baar bamɛn. Ba bàfàbwaar inkwà abye anà ndaa a Nzam, in'lɛl a ipfɛy aba myà bwɛlàbwɛl.
MAT 23:6 Ba bàfàkwen mubwaay kà ikal atàtwɛb kà in'kyɔm, anà kà an'kir atàtwɛb u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà,
MAT 23:7 ba bàfàkwen naa baar bapɛ mbɔr a làkoo kà ikal a un'sɛŋ anà baar babel naa "Un'lɔɔŋ".
MAT 23:8 Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ twon bàmàlabel "Un'lɔɔŋ", ntɔn bɛ làbye awà Un'lɔɔŋ mwɛy mpɛl, bɛ banswà làbà atɔŋ.
MAT 23:9 Twon lan'bel mbuur u mɛɛn "Taa", ntɔn bɛ làbye awà umwɛy mpɛl, Taa awà u du.
MAT 23:10 Twon bàmàlabel sye "un'lɔɔŋ", ntɔn bɛ un'lɔɔŋ asin watɛy, Klistɔ mpɛl.
MAT 23:11 Mbuur a kölàköl uboo a bɛ asàkal un'syääl abɛ.
MAT 23:12 Mbuur wanswà asàsɛn an'pɛy bàkyer asun'tyeey, wɛɛ mbuur a làbɔ̈ɔ̈n bàkyer asun'sɛɛn. »
MAT 23:13 « Ngyɛb akà bɛ, bɛ alɔɔŋ a un'kɔɔn anà Amfarisi a mpem yweel! Bɛ làfàbäm mbwo a Imwol a du akà baar. Bɛ ŋàkwo làfàbilà anki kwo, wɛɛ bɛ làfàtsuŋ baar akwà bàfàkwen mubilà. »
MAT 23:14 [ « Ngyɛb akà bɛ alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn anà Amfarisi, baar a mpem yweel! Bɛ làfàgyɔɔr kà an'kɔɔ a akweel adim indiir aba byanswà, wɛɛ taaŋ nsil la, bɛ làbàmusà ngyamàkà a bwɛlàbwɛl ntɔn baar bàlamɛn. Undiir awun, ntaaŋàmbar abɛ isàkal yàŋàdiir an'din! » ]
MAT 23:15 « Ngyɛb akà bɛ alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn anà Amfarisi a mpem yweel! Bɛ, bɛ làwàmuyikyà ntsü yanswà u mɛɛn anà udu a ngyäl ntɔn mubuul mpem a mbuur mwɛy, wɛɛ nde usàlakyey, apan bɛ làmun'biil u yaaŋ a mbaa mbalà yweel yàŋàsöön bɛ. »
MAT 23:16 « Ngyɛb akà bɛ, asyeen a ikwàmii! Bɛ làfàtɛn naa: "Undiir watɛy isàkal naa mbuur kan'dyà kyän kà idwà. Wɛɛ isàkal naa nde kan'dyà la u wɔl a ndwà a Nzam, apan nde kan'kyey ipepey."
MAT 23:17 Insil, ikwàmii! Undiir nà kan'söön uteer: wɔl, lɛɛ idwà akwà kyan'buul wɔl undiir a in'kyɛɛl?
MAT 23:18 Bɛ làfàtɛn sye naa: "Undiir watɛy isàkal naa mbuur mwɛy kan'dyà kyän udu a mɛsà afub ibɔɔn. Wɛɛ isàkal naa nde kan'dyà kyän unsà kab alà udu a mɛsà afub ibɔɔn, apan nde kan'kyey ipepey."
MAT 23:19 Ikwàmii! Undiir nà kan'söön mfun, ibɔɔn akyà udu a mɛsà a ibɔɔn, lɛɛ mɛsà a ibɔɔn akwà myan'buul ibɔɔn aki undiir a in'kyɛɛl?
MAT 23:20 Lalan, mbuur wanswà afàdyà kyän udu a mɛsà a ibɔɔn, nde sye afàdyà udu a mɛsà a ibɔɔn anà indiir byanswà abyà udu pa,
MAT 23:21 mbuur afàdyà kyän kà idwà, afàdyà kyän kà idwà anà akà mbuur afàkal uboo kwo,
MAT 23:22 mbuur afàdyà kyän u mbwo a du afàdyà kyän u mbwo a kir a Imwol a Nzam anà akà mbuur afàbwaay kwo. »
MAT 23:23 « Ngyɛb akà bɛ, bɛ alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn anà Amfarisi, baar a mpem yweel! Bɛ làfàpà akà Nzam un'te mwɛy uboo a in'te kwem, in'te asànaa mɛntɛ, fɛnwil anà kümin. Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làfàpiy indiir byan'söön mfun uboo a Un'kɔɔn asànaa balàbal, nsyääm anà lää: abi indiir lan'kwo bɛ mukyer ukɔɔn apiy byumwɛy.
MAT 23:24 Asyeen aŋàkwàmii! Bɛ làfàkɔr imwe kun'lɛɛ, wɛɛ bɛ làfàmin mpoonà! »
MAT 23:25 « Ngyɛb akà bɛ, alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn anà Amfarisi a mpem yweel! Bɛ làfàsɔŋ nsà a kɔɔb anà yà làlɔŋà, wɛɛ boo a ma làŋàyɔl a indiir a küb anà làmpfɛɛl abɛ.
MAT 23:26 Umfarisi aŋàkwàmii! Tàsɔŋ boo a kɔɔb, ntɔn nsà sye ipɔŋà.
MAT 23:27 « Ngyɛb akà bɛ, alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn anà Amfarisi, baar a mpem yweel! Bɛ làbà asànaa an'dii aŋàkiir un'swɛn a pɛɛl: u nsà ma mye anà ntwɛn, wɛɛ ubɔɔ ma màŋàyɔl a in'kwo a baar aŋàkwà anà ipɔɔn byà ifà ifà.
MAT 23:28 Abun bɛ sye, u nsà bɛ làkamɛnà asànaa baar a balàbal umii a un'sɛŋ, wɛɛ ubɔɔ, bɛ làbà aŋàyɔl a mpem yweel anà an'kyän an'be. »
MAT 23:29 « Ngyɛb akà bɛ, alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn anà Amfarisi a mpem yweel! Bɛ làfàtööŋ aŋangɔɔm abɛ an'dii, anà bɛ làfàsà ntwɛn kà an'dii a baar a balàbal,
MAT 23:30 waa bɛ làfàtɛn naa: "Yàlàkal naa bi ikäl utaaŋ a bànkaa abi, bi kàlàbwà anki mbwo mwɛy anà ba ntɔn mutyaŋ an'kil a aŋangɔɔm."
MAT 23:31 Abun, bɛ lan'tà imbäl bɛ ŋakwo naa bɛ làbà baan a baar bàdwä aŋangɔɔm.
MAT 23:32 Apanà, làkölà isal bàsɛmà bàtaaràbɛ!
MAT 23:33 Ntäy, a iyäy! Nkye bɛ làkyàkwo mutiin ntaaŋàmbar a yaaŋ a mbaa?
MAT 23:34 Undiir awun, làwem: mɛ, mɛ amàlatööm aŋangɔɔm, aŋan'yeerà anà alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn. Bɛ làsàdwa amwɛy anà làsabɛɛrà u kulunsi, làsàkam bumwɛy an'füm u ndwà a nköŋ abɛ anà làsamɛɛy nkwaaŋ u bul a bul,
MAT 23:35 ntɔn an'kil a baar a balàbal màpää u mɛɛn isàbwà udu a bɛ, sɛmà an'kil a Abɛl mbuur a balàbal tii akà an'kil a Zakàlye, mwan a Balaki, awà làdwä bɛ uboboo a idwà anà mɛsà a ibɔɔn.
MAT 23:36 Undiir awun, waa mɛ amàlakyään ndandaa naa: mpay a ube abà banswà isàbwà u du a un'tswe a nkööl a ŋàbà! »
MAT 23:37 « Yɛlusàlɛm, Yɛlusàlɛm, ngye, ngye mbuur afàdwa aŋangɔɔm anà afàtà bumwɛy katööm Nzam in'kul. Mbalà kwe kàkwen mɛ muböbà baan angye ikal imwɛy apà mɛ asànaa ngwän a nkɔɔ ufàböbà wa baan awa u ngyɛl a an'paab ande, wɛɛ ngye, ngye kàsàkwen anki!
MAT 23:38 Undiir awun, ndwà angye bàsawɛy yà ipɔl.
MAT 23:39 Kyakin, waa mɛ amakyään ndandaa naa: Sɛmà ŋàbawà, bɛ mɛ làfàsaman anki tii làsàtɛn bɛ naa: "Wɛy nsaak ikäl akà mbuur awà ayà kà ikɔb a Mwol!" »
MAT 24:1 Yàmɛnà naa Yɛsu kàtoo nde u ndwà a Nzam anà kàkäl nde mukyà, alɔŋki ande bàyàsin apà nde ntɔn mukun'swaŋ ntööŋ a ndwà a Nzam.
MAT 24:2 Nde waa kàfuur naa: « Nkye bɛ làkimanà indiir abi byanswà? Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, akà nkɔŋ mwɛy ifàsàsal anki udu a nkɔŋ yumwɛy. Ya yanswà ikyer asàpää. »
MAT 24:3 Yɛsu kàkäl wàŋàbwaay udu a mɔŋ a in'te a ɔlive, alɔŋki bàsin apà nde, waa bàtɛn a nde naa: « Ikyään taaŋ isàyà ndaa ayi, idiim nà isàswaŋ ngyeel angye anà ntsüü a mɛɛn. »
MAT 24:4 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ, wɛy mbuur ukɔɔn alakur.
MAT 24:5 Ntɔn baar mbɔɔn bàsàyà kà ikɔb amɛ, waa bàsàtɛn naa: "Mɛ in'wà Klistɔ!" Ba bàsàkur baar mbɔɔn.
MAT 24:6 Bɛ làsàwem naa bye anà ità anà in'bää a ità. Twon lan'tɛɛr: indiir abi ikyer ayà, wɛɛ bya kà ntsüü anki.
MAT 24:7 Un'sɛŋ mwɛy asànwaan anà un'sɛŋ wumwɛy, imwol mwɛy anà imwol kyumwɛy, kà itiir a nsi imwɛy imwɛy, ngyal ikyer asàkal anà mɛɛn ikyer asàtɛɛr.
MAT 24:8 Wɛɛ indiir abi byanswà byàsàkal nsɛmà a usaay.
MAT 24:9 Apan, bàsàlasà u ngyɛb aŋàdiir, waa bàsàladwa. In'sɛŋ myanswà ikyer asàlayiiŋ ntɔn ikɔb amɛ.
MAT 24:10 Apan, bàmbɔɔn bàsàpiy làkwikilà aba, ba bàsàmɛɛn nku ba a ba, anà bàsàyiiŋ ba a ba.
MAT 24:11 Aŋangɔɔm a loor mbɔɔn bàkyer asàmbarà, waa bàsàbwiy baar mbɔɔn.
MAT 24:12 Ukwen a baar mbɔɔn bàsàbwà mpye, ntɔn ube bàkyer asàsöönà.
MAT 24:13 Wɛɛ mbuur asàsà muküünà tii u ntsüü, asàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
MAT 24:14 Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là Imwol alà bàkyer asàkyään la u mɛɛn manswà. Kya isàkal imbäl ntɔn in'sɛŋ myanswà. Apan waa ntsüü isàyà. »
MAT 24:15 « Lalan, mpal làsàman bɛ lingyoomà mbɔɔn alà kàtɛn ŋangɔɔm Danyel lan'bilà kà ikal a in'kyɛɛl, - wɛy mbuur akataŋà uyöb! -
MAT 24:16 Apan, wɛy baar bàsàkal u Yuday, bàtiin uboo a myɔŋ,
MAT 24:17 wɛy mbuur asàkal udu a nsyä a ndwà, ukɔɔn ayàtɔlà ntɔn muwal indiir abyà uboo a ndwà ande,
MAT 24:18 wɛy mbuur awà u ywaŋ ande, ukɔɔn afurà ndwà ntɔn mukàwal ipfɛy ande.
MAT 24:19 Ngyɛb akà akaar aŋayöm anà akaar bàsàkal munüü baan kà ilä abin!
MAT 24:20 Làyamà ntɔn bɛ làkɔɔn asàtiin u paŋà a làbe, itàkal kà ilä a saba!
MAT 24:21 Ntɔn, umpal ayin, isàkal anà ngyɛb aŋàdiir mpa aŋàtàkal fà nsɛmà a mɛɛn tii ŋàbà, anà ya sye ifàsàkal anki akà ikikye.
MAT 24:22 Yàlàkal naa Nzam ukɔ̈ɔ̈n atyey ilä abin, akà mbuur mwɛy kàlàwà anki mɔ̈ɔ̈. Wɛɛ, ntɔn baar kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l nde, ilä abin isàkal byàŋàtyeey.
MAT 24:23 Apan, isàkal naa mbuur mwɛy kan'tɛn a bɛ naa: "Làler, Klistɔ awà kà!" Itàkal naa: "Nde awunà kunà!", twon lun'kyey.
MAT 24:24 Ntɔn aklistɔ a loor anà aŋangɔɔm a loor bàkyer asàmbarà, bàsàkyer idiim a kölàköl anà impà ntɔn mukur baar, kya ipöl isàkal, itàkal baar bàŋàsɔɔl.
MAT 24:25 Làler, mɛ ya amàlaweey kusà. »
MAT 24:26 « Abun, isàkal naa bàmàlakyään naa: "Làler, nde wà u nsye a ipɔl!", twon lan'kyà. "Nde wà kà ikal a mpey", twon lan'kyey.
MAT 24:27 Ntɔn, ngyeel a Mwan a mbuur isàkal asànaa muŋyä ufàpàrà wa fà mper làfàsɛnà taaŋ tii mper làfàkàminà la.
MAT 24:28 Ntsü yanswà iwà ndom, nɛn ayifàdyà in'twaŋ ifàkàköŋ kwo. »
MAT 24:29 « Taaŋ a mbɔɔn tɛy ungö a mpay a kölàköl yà ilä abin, taaŋ làsàbwà làpib, nsöŋ ifàsàpà anki kyɛɛy a wa, mbwaar ikyer asàbwà fà du, ngwal a du ikyer asàni.
MAT 24:30 Apan, idiim a Mwan a mbuur isàmɛnà u du, apan in'sɛŋ myanswà amyà u mɛɛn ikyer asàlaal, mya isàman Mwan a mbuur wàmuyà uboo a itööm a du anà unkaak a ngwal anà làkoo.
MAT 24:31 Nde asàtɔm akyeey ande anà mfuŋ a kölàköl, waa ba bàsàtüüb baar kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l nde u mper yànà, fà nswɛŋ a du tii nswɛŋ yumwɛy. »
MAT 24:32 « Làyöb an'lɔɔŋ man'fà unsà un'te a fige: isàkal naa an'kɔkà ande man'bulà an'dà an'dà anà nkay sye yan'too, làyöb apan naa paŋà aŋàbwaŋ là tsütsü.
MAT 24:33 Abun, akà bɛ sye, mpal làsàman bɛ indiir abi byanswà, làyöb naa Mwan a Mbuur wà tsütsü a minambwo a ndwà abɛ.
MAT 24:34 Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, nkööl ayi isàkal aŋàlyaŋ anki kusà a ndaa ayi muyà.
MAT 24:35 Du anà mɛɛn màkyer asàlyaŋ, wɛɛ ndaa amɛ isàlyaŋ anki akà ikikye. »
MAT 24:36 « Wɛɛ akà mbuur mwɛy uyöb anki ilä kya anà taaŋ la, itàkal akyeey, itàkal Mwan, nà Taa mpɛl.
MAT 24:37 Asànaa ndaa yàlyaŋ utaaŋ a Nɔwà, ngyeel a Mwan a mbuur isàkal abun sye.
MAT 24:38 Ntɔn, u paŋà alan, kusà ikül a mbul muyööl mɛɛn, baar bàkäl mudyà, munwà, mutà an'bɔr anà mupà baan aba an'bɔr tii ilä kàbilà Nɔwà kà an'swà.
MAT 24:39 Ba bàmɛnà anki akà ube mwɛy tii ilä màyöl an'dà anà masyen ma ba banswà. Ya isàkal sye abun umpal usàyà Mwan a mbuur.
MAT 24:40 Apan, abaal bɔ̈ɔ̈l bàsàkal kan'ywaŋ: umwɛy bàkyer asun'syen, wumwɛy bàkyer asun'wɛy.
MAT 24:41 Akaar bɔ̈ɔ̈l bàsàkal muyir: umwɛy bàkyer asun'syɛn, wumwɛy bàkyer asun'wɛy.
MAT 24:42 Abun, làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ, ntɔn bɛ làyöb anki ilä usàyà Mwol abɛ.
MAT 24:43 Bɛ làkyàyöb: yàlàkal naa ŋandwà akiyöbà naa taaŋ nà mbüüb usàyà u mpib, nde kàlikalà kà igyɛɛŋ anà nde kàlun'wɛyà anki mubilà u ndwà ande.
MAT 24:44 Undiir awun, bɛ sye làkäl aŋàlɔ̈ɔ̈n, ntɔn Mwan a mbuur asàyà u taaŋ mpa làsàyöb bɛ. »
MAT 24:45 « Abun, nà awà un'syääl a lää anà wàŋàlɔ̈ɔ̈n awà kàpɛ nkum buur a asyääl a ndwà ande ntɔn mukapà isa u taaŋ a taaŋ?
MAT 24:46 Un'sak akà un'syääl awà usyetaan nkum ande, taaŋ usàyà nde, wàmukyer abà!
MAT 24:47 Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, nde asun'pà buur a indiir ande byanswà.
MAT 24:48 Wɛɛ, isàkal naa nde wà un'syääl un'be, nde asàyweer naa: "Nkum amɛ usyefurà anki agyägyä",
MAT 24:49 anà nde ubulà mudüb atɔŋ ande bà isal, mudyà anà munwà ikal imwɛy a in'yöör a man,
MAT 24:50 nkum a un'syääl awà asàyà kà ilä anà u taaŋ mpa uyöb nde.
MAT 24:51 Nde akyer asun'böŋ anà asun'pà ntaaŋàmbar ikwe a baar a mpem yweel: kwo isàkal ilel anà nkwoor a an'din. »
MAT 25:1 « Apan, Imwol a du isàkal asànaa baan asye ankɔr bàwɛl minà aba ntɔn mukàbwey a un'dim aba.
MAT 25:2 Atyeen uboo a ba bàkäl insil, atyeen bàkäl aŋan'yeerà.
MAT 25:3 Insil bàwɛl ba minà, ba bàsyen anki may.
MAT 25:4 Asye aŋan'yeerà, bàwɛl ba minà, ba bàwɛl anà may unsà in'laŋ.
MAT 25:5 Kyekà baal atà bɔr kàkyer itaan muyà, undiir awun ba banswà bàbɔ̈ɔ̈n ba.
MAT 25:6 Uboboo a mpib, ba bàwem làso làmwɛy: "Le baal atà bɔr! Làkyen kàlabwey anà nde!"
MAT 25:7 Apan, asye ankɔr banswà bàwiyà ba, ba bàsɛmà mulɔn minà aba.
MAT 25:8 Asye insil bàtɛn a asye aŋan'yeerà naa: "Lipɛ bi ndam a may, ntɔn minà abi myàmudim."
MAT 25:9 Aŋan'yeerà bàfuur naa: "Aay, may ikwo anki ntɔn bɛ anà bi. Làkyen kàlasöm akà baar bàfàyälà ma."
MAT 25:10 Mpal bàkyen ba mukàsom ma, baal atà bɔr laa kàyàkɔlà nde. Asye akwà bàkäl aŋàlɔ̈ɔ̈n bàbilà mbwo mwɛy anà nde u ndwà atà bɔr, waa bàdübà ibeenà.
MAT 25:11 Ungöngö, asye ankɔr bumwɛy bàyi ba, ba bàtɛn naa: "nkum, nkum, iduub!"
MAT 25:12 Wɛɛ nde kafuur naa: "Mɛ alàkyään ndandaa naa mɛ alàyöb anki."
MAT 25:13 Undiir awun, làkäl aŋàlɔ̈ɔ̈n taaŋ lanswà. Ntɔn bɛ làyöb anki itàkal ilä, itàkal taaŋ. »
MAT 25:14 « Ya isàkal asànaa mbuur mwɛy kàkyà nkyeen, nde kàbel asyääl ande, waa kapɛ indiir ande.
MAT 25:15 Nde mbuur mwɛy kun'pɛ itɛr ityeen, akà wumwɛy ibyeel, akà wumwɛy sye imwɛy mpɛl, mbuur mbuur asànaa awà un'kanà ande. Apan nde waa kàkyen.
MAT 25:16 Mbuur awà kàwɛl itɛr ityeen, kàkyen musal anà byà, waa kàwɛl bweel a itɛr ityeen asin.
MAT 25:17 Ifà imwɛy sye anà mbuur awà kàwɛl itɛr ibyeel, nde kàwɛl bweel a ibyeel asin.
MAT 25:18 Wɛɛ mbuur awà kàwɛl imwɛy mpɛl, nde kàtim fu, waa kàyee ngim a nkum ande. »
MAT 25:19 « Ungö a ilä mbɔɔn, nkum a asyääl abà waa kàyàfurà, waa kàlɔ̈m naa ba bun'swɛŋ nsyääl a ngim ande.
MAT 25:20 Mbuur awà kàwɛl itɛr ityeen, kàsin nde, waa kàswɛŋ ityeen asin, waa kàtɛn naa: "Nkum amɛ, ngye kampɛ itɛr ityeen, le ityeen asin kàtwey mɛ."
MAT 25:21 Nkum ande kàtɛn a nde naa: "Yubwaŋ, ngye awà un'syääl aŋàbwaŋ anà wàlää. Ngye kàkäl wàlää unsà indiir ikikye, mɛ in'sasà udu a byàmbɔɔn. Yà, saŋ anà nkum angye.
MAT 25:22 Mbuur kàwɛl itɛr ibyeel kàsin nde sye, waa kàtɛn naa: "Nkum amɛ, ngye kampɛ itɛr ibyeel, le ibyeel asin kàtwey mɛ abi."
MAT 25:23 Nkum ande kàtɛn a nde naa: "Yubwaŋ, ngye awà un'syääl aŋàbwaŋ anà wàlää. Ngye kàkäl wàlää unsà indiir ikikye, mɛ in'sasà udu a byàmbɔɔn. Yà, saŋ anà nkum angye."
MAT 25:24 Mbuur kàwɛl itɛr imwɛy mpɛl, kàsin nde sye, waa kàtɛn naa: "Nkum amɛ, mɛ in'kyàyöb naa­ ngye awà mbuur a ndaa a ngwal: Ngye afàbwo kà ikal mpa kàkön ngye, ngye afàköŋà kà ikal mpa kàmwɛŋ ngye.
MAT 25:25 Mɛ kàmɛn bɔɔmà, lalan kàkàdye mɛ itɛr angye u mɛɛn, le undiir angye awà."
MAT 25:26 Wɛɛ nkum ande kun'fuur naa: "Un'syääl un'be, un'bwal! Ngye kàkiyöbà naa mɛ in'fàbwo kà ikal mpa kàkön mɛ anà mɛ in'fàköŋà kà ikal mpa kàmwɛŋ mɛ.
MAT 25:27 Abun yàlàbwaŋ naa ngye atɔ̈l ngim amɛ u bank: u mfurà amɛ, mɛ in'làkàtwey undiir amɛ anà bweel udu.
MAT 25:28 Abun, lun'lwom itɛr akin, làpɛ kya akà mbuur awe abyà itɛr kwem.
MAT 25:29 Ntɔn, bàsàpà akà mbuur awe anà indiir mbɔɔn, waa nde usàkal abyà byàŋàsöön mbɔɔn, wɛɛ bàsàlwom akà mbuur akwà mpa awe anà undiir, bàsàlwom itàkal undiir kàkäl nde awà.
MAT 25:30 Akà un'syääl akɔ̈ɔ̈n ndöŋ wà, lun'tɔɔm u làpib u nsà: kwo isàkal ilel anà nkwoor a an'din." »
MAT 25:31 « Mpal usàyà Mwan a mbuur unsà làkoo ande anà akyeey banswà, apan nde asàbwaay udu a kir a làkoo ande.
MAT 25:32 In'sɛŋ myanswà myàsàköŋ kusà ande. Nde asàkaab baar amwɛy anà bumwɛy, asànaa un'seey ufàkaab nde in'kɔk anà ntab.
MAT 25:33 Nde in'kɔk asasà u kɔɔ ande libaal, ntab u kɔɔ ande likaar.
MAT 25:34 Apan, mfum asàtɛn a baar bàsàkal u kɔɔ ande libaal naa: "Làyi, bɛ baar kàsaak Taaràmɛ. Làbilà ubɔɔ a imwol akyà bàlɔ̈ɔ̈n ntɔn bɛ sɛmà bàkyer mɛɛn.
MAT 25:35 Ntɔn mɛ, mɛ kàkäl anà ngyal, bɛ lan'pɛ isaa adyà. Mɛ kàkäl anà mfwää, bɛ lan'pɛ undiir anwà. Mɛ kàkäl ungyey, bɛ waa lan'wɛl,
MAT 25:36 mɛ kàkäl wànsàpɔl, bɛ waa lan'bwää. Mɛ kàkäl anà ukyal, bɛ waa làyan'ler. Mɛ kàkäl u bɔlokà, bɛ waa làyan'ler."
MAT 25:37 Apan, baar a balàbal bàsun'fuur naa: "Mwol, mpal nà kamɛn bi anà ngyal, waa bi kapɛ isaa adyà, itàkal anà mfwää, waa bi kapɛ undiir anwà?
MAT 25:38 Mpal nà kamɛn bi ungyey, waa bi kawɛl, itàkal wànsàpɔl waa bi kabwää?
MAT 25:39 Mpal nà kamɛn bi anà ukyal itàkal u bɔlokà, waa bi kàyaler?"
MAT 25:40 Mfum usafuur naa: "Mɛ, mɛ alakyään ndandaa: mbalà yanswà ayà làkyer bɛ indiir abi akà umwɛy ubɔɔ a bibaan akye bà, abà atɔŋ amɛ, bɛ bya làkyer akà mɛ." »
MAT 25:41 « Abun, nde asàtɛn a baar bàsàkal u kɔɔ ande likaar naa: "Baar aŋàküül! Làkyà kunà! Làkyen u mbaa a mbul a in'tye ayà bàyöŋà ntɔn ileŋ anà akyeey ande!
MAT 25:42 Ntɔn mɛ kàkäl anà ngyal, wɛɛ bɛ udyà lan'pɛ anki. Mɛ kàkäl anà mfwää, wɛɛ bɛ undiir anwà lan'pɛ anki.
MAT 25:43 Mɛ kàkäl ungyey, wɛɛ bɛ lan'wɛl anki, wànsàpɔl, wɛɛ bɛ lan'bwää anki. Mɛ kàkäl anà ukyal anà u bɔlokà, wɛɛ bɛ làyan'ler anki."
MAT 25:44 Apan ba bàsun'fuur naa: "Mwol, mpal nà kamɛn bi anà ngyal itàkal anà mpfwää, itàkal un'ngyey, itàkal wànsàpɔl, itàkal anà ukyal, itàkal u bɔlokà, waa bi mpa kabay?"
MAT 25:45 Mfum waa usafuur naa: "Mɛ, mɛ alàkyään ndandaa: mbalà yanswà mpa làkyer bɛ indiir abi byanswà akà umwɛy ubɔɔ a bibaan abi, bɛ bya sye làkyer anki akà mɛ."
MAT 25:46 Baar abà bàsàkyà u ntaaŋàmbar a mbul a in'tye, wɛɛ baar a balàbal u mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye. »
MAT 26:1 Mpal kàmay Yɛsu nswɛɛŋ ayi yanswà, nde kàtɛn a alɔŋki ande naa:
MAT 26:2 « Bɛ làkyàyöb naa un'kyɔm a Pak ayàkal ungö a ilä byeel: Mwan a mbuur bàkyer ayun'yälà, ntɔn bun'bɛɛrà u kulunsi. »
MAT 26:3 Apan, andweer a angaŋ anà andweer a un'sɛŋ a Ayudà bakyer aköŋ u ndwà a Undweer a angaŋ Kayifa.
MAT 26:4 Ba bàtsül mukɔr Yɛsu u mbwo a loor anà mukun'dwa.
MAT 26:5 Wɛɛ, ba bàtɛɛnà naa: « Wɛy ya ikɔɔn akal umpal bàkyɔɔmà ba, manà lingyoomà làyàbwà uboo a un'sɛŋ. »
MAT 26:6 Yɛsu kàkäl u Bɛtani u ndwà a Simɔn ŋabay.
MAT 26:7 Un'kaar mwɛy kàyàsin apà nde anà un'laŋ wàŋàyɔl a may a usɔŋ bàfàbel naa albatre. Ma mà ntal mbɔɔn. Nde kàtyaŋ ma udu a un'tswe a Yɛsu mpal kàkäl nde mudyà.
MAT 26:8 Mpal bàmɛn alɔŋki abun, ba bàmɛn ube mbɔɔn, waa bàtɛn naa: « Ntɔn nkye ubii a tub abà?
MAT 26:9 Yàlàbwaŋ muyälà may a usɔŋ amà u ntal a mbɔɔn, waa ngim ayin bàlàpà aŋàlàmbwà! »
MAT 26:10 Mpal kàyöb Yɛsu an'kyän aba, nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ntɔn nkye làpà bɛ un'kaar wà mpay? Nde kan'kyer ndaa aŋàbwaŋ ntɔn mɛ.
MAT 26:11 Ntɔn aŋàlàmbwà bà anà bɛ ilä byanswà, wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ in'wà anki anà bɛ ilä byanswà.
MAT 26:12 Kan'tyaŋ nde may a usɔŋ mà udu a ndür amɛ, nde kan'lɔɔn ndyee amɛ.
MAT 26:13 Ndandaa mɛ alakyään: mper yanswà bàsàkàkyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ, u mɛɛn manswà, bàsakyäänà sye ndaa kan'kyer un'kaar wà, ntɔn mukun'yɔbà. »
MAT 26:14 Apan, Yudasi Isikalyɔt, umwɛy uboo a alɔŋki kwem aŋiyweel bà Yɛsu, kàkàman andweer a angaŋ,
MAT 26:15 waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ininà bɛ lan'pà, waa mɛ alàpà awà? » Ba bun'pɛ itɛr a ngim an'kwem an'tär.
MAT 26:16 Sɛmà apan, Yudasi kàyileŋà ipöl aŋàbwaŋ ntɔn mukapɛɛl awà.
MAT 26:17 Ilä a tàtwɛb kyà un'kyɔm a mampà màkɔ̈ɔ̈n ful, alɔŋki bàyi akà Yɛsu mukun'fuul naa: « Ngye akwen naa bi ikàlɔn ken ikal adyà ngye Pak? »
MAT 26:18 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làkyen u bul a kölàköl, akà mbuur mwɛy, lun'kyään naa: "Un'lɔɔŋ an'tɛn naa: Taaŋ amɛ là tsütsü, mɛ anà alɔŋki amɛ in'yàdyà Pak u ndwà angye." »
MAT 26:19 Alɔŋki bàlɔ̈ɔ̈n Pak asànaa kaswɛŋ Yɛsu.
MAT 26:20 Mpal a sisye, Yɛsu kàkäl u mɛsà anà Bàkwem Aŋiyweel.
MAT 26:21 Mpal bàkäl ba mudyà, Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään: umwɛy uboo a bɛ ayan'mɛɛn nku. »
MAT 26:22 Ba bàmɛn ngyɛb mbɔɔn, waa bàsɛmà mukun'fuul umwɛy umwɛy naa: « Mwol, nkye mɛ? »
MAT 26:23 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Mbuur awà kan'biil kɔɔ mbwo mwɛy anà mɛ uboo a làlɔŋà a isaa, mbuur nsil awà ayan'mɛɛn nku.
MAT 26:24 Mwan a mbuur wàmukyà asànaa Ndaa Aŋàsɔn ikyäänà ya ntɔn nde. Wɛɛ ngyɛb akà mbuur amɛɛn Mwan a mbuur nku! Yàlàkal ubwaŋ naa mbuur awà bàkɔɔn a un'bɔr! »
MAT 26:25 Yudasi, mbuur ayun'yälà, kun'fuul naa: « Mwol, nkye mɛ? » Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Ngye ŋakwo an'tɛn. »
MAT 26:26 Umpal bàkäl ba mudyà, Yɛsu kàwɛl mampà, ungö kàsaak nde ma, nde kàtsül ma, kàpɛ alɔŋki ande, waa kàtɛn naa: « Mää, làdi, ayi yà ndür amɛ. »
MAT 26:27 Ungö, nde kàwɛl kɔɔb a vin, ungö mufuur an'tɔɔn, nde kàpɛ ba, waa kàtɛn naa: « Lànü la bɛ banswà,
MAT 26:28 ntɔn mamà an'kil amɛ, an'kil a un'tüüb, màpää ntɔn un'kàbɔ a baar, ntɔn ndwääl a nkul a man'be aba.
MAT 26:29 Mɛ, mɛ alàkyään naa: sɛmà apanà, mɛ in'fàsànwà anki vin tii ilä in'sànwà mɛ vin akün mbwo mwɛy anà bɛ uboo a Imwol a Taaràmɛ. »
MAT 26:30 Ungö mutɔl an'diim a un'kyɔm, ba bàtoo ntɔn mukyà mɔŋ a In'te a ɔlive.
MAT 26:31 Apan, Yɛsu kàtɛn a alɔŋki ande naa: « U mpib a ŋàbà, bɛ banswà làkyer abwà ntɔn mɛ. Ntɔn bàsön naa: "Mɛ, mɛ in'sàdwa un'kyɛɛŋ a in'kɔk, waa in'kɔk a làböl myàsàtà upay."
MAT 26:32 Wɛɛ, mpal in'sàwiyà mɛ, mɛ in'sàlafweel u Ngalilɛ. »
MAT 26:33 Petɔlà kàwɛl ndaa, waa kàtɛn naa: « Itàkal naa ba banswà ban'bwà ntɔn ngye, wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ in'sàbwà anki akà ikikye. »
MAT 26:34 Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mɛ, ndandaa mɛ akyään: u mpib nsil ayi, kusà a nkɔɔ mutàbeel, ngye ayan'tɔn mbalà tär. »
MAT 26:35 Petɔlà kàtɛn a nde naa: « Itàkal naa mɛ in'kyer akwà anà ngye, aay, mɛ in'satɔn anki. » Waa alɔŋki banswà bàtɛn sye mun mwɛy wa.
MAT 26:36 Yɛsu kàyàkɔlà anà alɔŋki ande kà ikal mwɛy bàfàbel Ngɛtɛsɛmani, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Sàlàbwaayà pà, mpal in'kàyamà mɛ kunà. »
MAT 26:37 Ungö apan nde kàsyen Petɔlà anà baan a Zebeday babaal bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l, waa kàsɛmà muman ngyɛb anà bɔɔmà aŋàdiir.
MAT 26:38 Apan nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mpem amɛ yàŋàyɔl a ngyɛb mbɔɔn tsütsü a ukwà. Sàlakälà pà anà làgyɛɛŋ anà mɛ. »
MAT 26:39 Nde kàkyen u kikwɛl, waa kàbü, ntabwey u mɛɛn, waa kàyamà abà: « Taa, kya mbwo isàkal, wɛy kɔɔb là làlyaŋ ukwɛl apà mɛ! Itàkal naa abwɛy, kyer ukwen angye, wɛɛ kà bàmɛ anki. »
MAT 26:40 Nde kan'yà ntsü bàkäl alɔŋki ande batär, waa kàmaman bàŋàbɔ̈ɔ̈n. Nde kan'tɛn a Petɔlà naa: « Abà, nkye bɛ làkal anki anà ngwal mukyɛɛŋ itàkal taaŋ làmwɛy anà mɛ!
MAT 26:41 Làkyɛɛŋ anà làyamà, ntɔn bɛ làkɔ̈ɔ̈n abwà u ndɛb. Dweelà làŋàyɔl a ngwal, wɛɛ ndür ye anà ukwarà. »
MAT 26:42 U mbalà yàyweel, nde kàkyà ukwel, waa kàyamà abà: « Taaràmɛ, isàkal naa ikwe anki naa kɔɔb làlyaŋ, naa mɛ in'kɔ̈ɔ̈n anwà la, wɛy ukwen angye bàkäl! »
MAT 26:43 U mbalà asin kàfàyà nde apà alɔŋki ande, nde kàfaman bàŋàbɔ̈ɔ̈n, ntɔn mii aba myàkäl myàŋàbwà buur.
MAT 26:44 Yɛsu waa kàsawɛy, waa kàkyen ukwɛl, waa kàyamà mbalà yàtär, wàmufuur ndaa nsil ya.
MAT 26:45 Apan, kàyi nde apà alɔŋki, nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Fàlabɔ̈ɔ̈nà, fàlàyöörà! Kyekà taaŋ bàyälà ba Mwan a mbuur kà an'kɔɔ a baar abe lye tsütsü.
MAT 26:46 Làmbarà! Tsweenà! Le mbuur kàman'yälà wà tsütsü! »
MAT 26:47 Umpal kàkäl nde muyäämà, Yudasi, umwɛy uboo a Bàkwem Aŋiyweel kàyàkɔlà anà iköŋ a baar mbɔɔn bàtöm andweer a angaŋ anà andweer a un'sɛŋ. Ba bàkäl anà an'kɔm anà nköl.
MAT 26:48 Mbuur kun'yälà, kapɛ idiim ki: « Mbuur wanswà in'kàböbà mɛ, mbuur wa nde awun. Lun'kör. »
MAT 26:49 Taaŋ nsil alan, Yudasi kàsin apà Yɛsu, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, mbɔr angye! » Waa kun'böbà.
MAT 26:50 Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Un'sam, kyer undiir ayeel ngye. » Apan, laa bàsin ba, bun'tɛ ba mpi, waa bun'kör.
MAT 26:51 Umwɛy uboo a baar bàkäl a Yɛsu, kàsilà kɔɔ, waa kàtwey kɔm ande, laa kàkäm nde un'syääl a undweer a angaŋ, waa kun'tsül tsü.
MAT 26:52 Apan, Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Fuur kɔm angye kà ikal a la, ntɔn baar banswà bàfàsyääl kɔm, bàsàkwà a kɔm.
MAT 26:53 Nkye ngye ayöb anki naa mɛ an'kwo in'lɔ̈ɔ̈m akà Taaràmɛ, nde sye kan'tööm in'lwaaŋ kwem aŋiyweel myà akyeey làgyägyä?
MAT 26:54 Ndaa Aŋàsön ayà itɛɛnà naa ya ikal abà, yàlàkwo aben? »
MAT 26:55 Utaaŋ alan, Yɛsu kàtɛn a iköŋ a baar naa: « Bɛ, bɛ lan'yà anà an'kɔm anà nköl ntɔn muyan'kɔr asànaa mɛ iwà un'dwää baar! Ilä byanswà mɛ kàkäl aŋàbwaay u ndwà a Nzam mulɔŋ, wɛɛ bɛ lan'nkör anki.
MAT 26:56 Wɛɛ ayi yanswà yan'yà ntɔn Ndaa Aŋàsɔn a aŋangɔɔm ikwe. » Apan, alɔŋki banswà bàkyer asun'kɔɔb, waa bàtiin.
MAT 26:57 Baar abà bàkör Yɛsu bun'syen akà undweer a angaŋ Kayifa, ikal bàköŋ alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn anà andweer.
MAT 26:58 Petɔlà kàyun'labà ukwɛl tii u làpaŋ a undweer a angaŋ. Nde kàbilà u làpaŋ, waa kàbwaay ikal imwɛy anà aseey ntɔn muler naa ya ikàtsü aben.
MAT 26:59 Amfum a angaŋ anà Làbay a nsaŋ a kölàköl lanswà bàleŋà imbäl a loor ntɔn Yɛsu ntɔn bun'tsüül mbar a ukwà.
MAT 26:60 Itàkal naa ambäl a loor mbɔɔn bàkyer ayàmɛnà, wɛɛ ba bàmɛn anki akà imbäl mwɛy. Ungöngö, abɔ̈ɔ̈l waa bàyàmɛnà,
MAT 26:61 waa bàtɛn naa: « Mbuur wà kàtɛn naa: "Mɛ an'kwo in'bwaab ndwà a Nzam, waa in'fàtɔŋ ya ungö a ilä itär." »
MAT 26:62 Undweer a angaŋ laa kàmbarà nde, waa kàtɛn a Yɛsu naa: « Nkye ngye undiir afuur anki unsà ya yanswà bafüünà baar bà? »
MAT 26:63 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kàkälà a duu. Waa undweer a angaŋ kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mɛ amaswaŋ kà ikɔb a Nzam a mɔ̈ɔ̈, tɛn a bi, isàkal naa ngye, ngye awà Klistɔ, Mwan a Nzam. »
MAT 26:64 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Ngye an'tɛn ya. Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ alàkyään naa semà apanà, bɛ làsàman Mwan a mbuur akyàbwaay u kɔɔ a ibaal a Ngwal anà wàmuyà udu a an'töb a du. »
MAT 26:65 Apan, undweer a angaŋ kàkaam ipfɛy ande, waa kàtɛn naa: « Nde wàmubɛy! Bi ambäl nkye ifàkyer abà! Apanà bɛ lan'wem mbɛɛy ande!
MAT 26:66 An'kyän abɛ mà aben? » Ba bàfuur naa: « Nde akyà ukwà. »
MAT 26:67 Apan ba bun'tsül an'te u ntabwey, bun'düb iki, bumwɛy bun'käm an'füm.
MAT 26:68 Ba bàtɛn a nde naa: « Ɛɛ, Klistɔ, bulà ŋangɔɔm ntɔn bi! Ikyään, nà kàmakam mbar? »
MAT 26:69 Kyekà Petɔlà kàkäl aŋàbwaay u nsà, uboo a làpaŋ. Un'syääl mwɛy wun'kaar kàsin apà nde, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ngye sye, ngye kàkäl anà Yɛsu, un'nsi Ngalilɛ. »
MAT 26:70 Wɛɛ nde kàtön u mii a baar banswà, waa kàtɛn naa: « Mɛ, mɛ in'yöb anki naa ngye ininà atɛɛnà. »
MAT 26:71 Nde kàkäl mukyà mper akà munàmbwo a làpaŋ, mpal kun'mɛn un'syääl asin wun'kaar anà kàtɛn nde a baar bàkäl paa: « Mbuur wà kàkäl a Yɛsu un'nazɔrya. »
MAT 26:72 Nde kàfàtɔn mbalà asin, waa kàdi kyän naa: « Mɛ, mɛ mbuur awà un'yöb anki. »
MAT 26:73 Ungö ikye, baar bàkäl paa bàsin apà Petɔlà, waa bàtɛn a nde naa: « Ndandaa, ngye sye awà umwɛy uboo a baar banà, ntɔn ntɛɛn angye ikaswaŋà ubwaŋàbwaŋ. »
MAT 26:74 Apan, nde kàsɛmà mudyà kyän anà muŋan naa: « Mɛ, mɛ un'yöb anki mbuur awà! » Apan sye nkɔɔ mwɛy waa kàbel.
MAT 26:75 Petɔlà kàyɔbà ndaa kàtɛn Yɛsu naa: « Kusà nkɔɔ mutàbel, ngye ayan'tɔn mbalà tär. » Laa kàtoo nde, waa kàlel a un'kwoon wanswà.
MAT 27:1 Ututu tutu, andweer a angaŋ anà andweer a un'sɛŋ bàköŋ ntɔn mutsüül Yɛsu mbar a ukwà.
MAT 27:2 Ba bun'bäm in'siŋ, bun'twääl, waa bun'pɛ akà kuvɛrnɔ̈ɔ̈r Pilatu.
MAT 27:3 Apan, Yudasi mbuur kun'yälà, umpal kàwem nde naa Yɛsu bàmutsüül mbar a ukwà, nde kàfuur an'kyän, waa kàyàfuur itɛr a ngim an'kwem an'tär akà andweer a angaŋ anà andweer a un'sɛŋ.
MAT 27:4 Waa kàtɛn naa: « Mɛ, mɛ kàkyer ube muyälà an'kil ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ube! » Wɛɛ ba bun'fuur naa: « Kwo akà bi nkye? Nsaŋ angye ŋakwo! »
MAT 27:5 Yudasi kàwɔm itɛr a ngim bya uboo a ndwà a Nzam, laa kàtoo nde, waa kàkàbäm un'siŋ.
MAT 27:6 Andweer a angaŋ bàwɛl ngim ayi, waa bàtɛn naa: « Ikwe tɛy musà ngim ayi uboo a un'naaŋ a ndwà a Nzam, ntɔn ya yà ngim a an'kil. »
MAT 27:7 Ungö bàköŋ ba, ba bàsöm ywaŋ akà un'boom a mpfwee ntɔn mudye angyey.
MAT 27:8 Undiir awun, bàfàbel ba ywaŋ alà naa "ywaŋ a an'kil" tii ŋàbawà.
MAT 27:9 Apan, ndaa kàtɛn ŋangɔɔm Yɛlɛmya waa yàkwe: « Ba bàwɛl itɛr an'kwem an'tär byà ngim, ntal bàtsül baan a Isàlɛl mukun'som,
MAT 27:10 waa ba bàpɛ ya ntɔn ywaŋ a un'boom a mpfwee asànaa kàswɛŋ Mwol abun. »
MAT 27:11 Yɛsu kàkäl kusà a kuvɛrnɔ̈ɔ̈r. Kuvɛrnɔ̈ɔ̈r kun'fuul naa: « Nkye ngye awà mfum a Ayuda? » Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Ngye ŋakwo an'tɛn. »
MAT 27:12 Wɛɛ utaaŋ bun'füünà andweer a angaŋ anà andweer a un'sɛŋ, nde akà ndaa mwɛy kàfuur anki.
MAT 27:13 Apan Pilatu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Nkye ngye aweemà anki ndaa yanswà bafüünà ba yi? »
MAT 27:14 Nde kun'fuur anki akà undiir mwɛy. Abà, kuvɛrnɔ̈ɔ̈r kàbem mbɔɔn.
MAT 27:15 Yàmɛnà naa kà un'kyɔm wanswà, kuvɛrnɔ̈ɔ̈r kàkäl anà nkääl mutsuuŋ mbuur a bɔlokà mwɛy ntɔn un'sɛŋ, mbuur kàkwenà un'sɛŋ ŋakwo.
MAT 27:16 Apan kàkäl anà mbuur a bɔlokà mwɛy wàŋàtoo làpaan ikɔb ande Yɛsu Barabas.
MAT 27:17 Abun, Pilatu kàfuul iköŋ a baar bàkwe pa naa: « Nà bɛ làkwen naa mɛ alàwɛɛy awà, Yɛsu Barabas, lɛɛ Yɛsu bàfàbel Klistɔ? »
MAT 27:18 Ntɔn nde kàkyer ayöbà naa ba Yɛsu bun'pɛɛl awà ntɔn un'köl aba.
MAT 27:19 Umpal kàkäl Pilatu mutɛɛnà ndaa u làbay a nsaŋ, un'kyay ande kun'tööm ndaa naa: « Twon an'bilà u ndaa a mbuur a balàbal wun, ntɔn ŋàbawà mɛ an'man mpay mbɔɔn u ndwɛy ntɔn nde. »
MAT 27:20 Andweer a angaŋ anà andweer a un'sɛŋ bàsiinà iköŋ a baar a ngwal naa ba bàlɔ̈m Barabas anà bàdwä Yɛsu.
MAT 27:21 Kuvɛrnɔ̈ɔ̈r kàfafuul naa: « Nà mɛ in'wɛy uboo a ba bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l? » – Ba naa: « Barabas! »
MAT 27:22 Pilatu kafuul naa: « Abun, ininà mɛ in'yàkyer anà Yɛsu bàfàbel Klistɔ? » Ba banswà bàfuur naa: « Wɛy bun'bɛɛrà u kulunsi! »
MAT 27:23 Pilatu kafuul naa: « Abun, ube nà nde kàkyer? » Wɛɛ ba bàsöönà musà in'kwɛŋ: « Wɛy bun'bɛɛrà u kulunsi! »
MAT 27:24 Umpal kàmɛn Pilatu naa nde undiir asin afàkyer watɛy, wɛɛ lingyoomà làmusöönà, nde kàwɛl an'dà, kàywɛb mpin u mii a un'sɛŋ, waa kàtɛn naa: « Mɛ, mɛ un'baranki watɛy unsà an'kil a mbuur wà. Ayin nsaŋ abɛ ŋakwo! »
MAT 27:25 Wɛɛ un'sɛŋ wanswà kàfuur naa: « Wɛy an'kil ande màbü udu abi anà udu a baan abi! »
MAT 27:26 Apan, Pilatu katsuuŋ awà Barabas. Wɛɛ akà Yɛsu, ungö akun'kam an'füm, nde kapɛ awà ntɔn bun'bɛɛrà u kulunsi.
MAT 27:27 Aŋità a kuvɛrnɔ̈ɔ̈r bàsyen Yɛsu u làpaŋ a Pilatu, un'lwaaŋ a aŋità wanswà waa kun'diŋà.
MAT 27:28 Ba bun'sɔɔl ipfɛy, waa bun'bwää kàzak a tsöö.
MAT 27:29 Ungö apan ba bun'tööŋ mpà a ibyääl yà nsyeenà, waa bun'bwää kà un'tswe, anà bun'si ibwiy u kɔɔ ande libaal. Ungö, ba bàbü an'köm, waa bun'sɛɛ naa: « Mfum a Ayudà, mbɔr angye! »
MAT 27:30 Ba bun'tsüülà an'tɛ, bàwɛlà ibwiy, waa bun'kämà kya kun'tswe.
MAT 27:31 Ungö amukun'sɛɛ, ba bun'sɔɔl kàzak, waa bàfun'bwää ipfɛy ande, waa bun'syen ntɔn bàkun'bɛɛrà u kulunsi.
MAT 27:32 Umpal bàkäl ba mutoo u bul, ba bàbweey anà un'nsi Sirɛn mwɛy ikɔb ande Simɔn. Aŋità bun'siinà a ngwal musyen kulunsi a Yɛsu.
MAT 27:33 Mpal bàtöl ba kà ikal mwɛy bàfàbel naa Ngɔlɔngɔta, iswaŋà naa « Ikal a Bɔl a Un'tswe. »
MAT 27:34 Akun, ba bun'nüü vin aŋàtüüb a undiir a nyän. Mpal kàkyee nde la, laa kàtön nde munwà la.
MAT 27:35 Mpal bàmay ba mukun'bɛɛrà u kulunsi, ba bàtɔɔm löb ntɔn mukab ipfɛy ande.
MAT 27:36 Ungö, ba bàkäl aŋàbwaay paa mukun'lerà.
MAT 27:37 Udu a un'tswe ande, ba bàsön isin a ndaa a nkweel ande: « Mbuur wà wà Yɛsu, mfum a Ayudà. »
MAT 27:38 Apan, baar abe bɔ̈ɔ̈l babɛɛrà sye u kulunsi mbwo mwɛy anà nde, umwɛy u kɔɔ a ibaal, wumwɛy u kɔɔ a ikaar.
MAT 27:39 Alyaaŋ a mbwo bàkyer un'bɛyà, bàmunii un'tswe,
MAT 27:40 waa bàtɛɛnà naa: « Ngye mbuur afàbwiy ndwà a Nzam anà afàtɔŋ ya unsà ilä itär, tswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ angye, ngye ŋakwo, isàkal naa ngye awà Mwan a Nzam, tɔlà u kulunsi! »
MAT 27:41 Mbwo mwɛy sye, amfum a angaŋ anà alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn anà andweer bàkyer un'sɛɛ, waa bàtɛɛnà naa:
MAT 27:42 « Nde kàtsü baar bumwɛy mɔ̈ɔ̈, wɛɛ nde ukwe anki mutswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande ŋakwo! Nde wà Mfum a Isàlɛl, wɛy nde utɔlà apanà u kulunsi, waa bi iyàsà làkwikilà amu nde.
MAT 27:43 Nde kàsi làkwikilà akà Nzam, wɛy Nzam kun'tsuuŋ apanà, isàkal naa nde akyun'kwen. Ntɔn nde kàtɛn naa: "Mɛ in'wà Mwan a Nzam." »
MAT 27:44 Itàkal baar abe akwà bàbɛɛrà u kulunsi mbwo mwɛy anà nde, bàkyer un'too sye.
MAT 27:45 Sɛmà midi, làpib làkyer abwà u mɛɛn manswà tii u taaŋ làtär ungö a midi.
MAT 27:46 Ntsü a taaŋ làtär ungö a midi, Yɛsu kàsi in'kwɛŋ a ngwal: « Ɛli, Ɛli, lema sabaktani » iswaŋà naa « Nzam amɛ, Nzam amɛ, ntɔn nkye aman'piy ngye? »
MAT 27:47 Amwɛy uboo a baar bàkäl pa, mpal bun'wem ba, ba bàtɛɛnà naa: « Le, nde kan'bel Ɛli! »
MAT 27:48 Umwɛy uboo a ba kàkaamà ntiin, kàkàwal für làmwɛy, kànwɛmà la uboo a man a nyän, laa kàsi nde la u kite, waa kun'pɛ ntɔn munwà.
MAT 27:49 Bumwɛy bàtɛn naa: « Tàmbar bi itàler nkye Ɛli akyàyà mukun'tswà mɔ̈ɔ̈! »
MAT 27:50 Apan Yɛsu kàfàkuub un'kwɛŋ a ngwal, waa kàkü.
MAT 27:51 Taaŋ nsil alan, u ndwà a Nzam, rido a idwà làkyer akaamà uboboo fà du tii ngyɛl. Mɛɛn màkyer atɛɛr, nkɔŋ yàkyer abàbaarà,
MAT 27:52 an'dii màkyer adubà, ndür a baar inkyɛɛl mbɔɔn bàkü yàkyer awiyà:
MAT 27:53 bàtoo ba kan'dii, ungö a uwiyà, waa bàbilà uboo a bul in'kyɛɛl, waa bàmɛnà akà baar mbɔɔn.
MAT 27:54 Mpal bàmɛn ba ntɛɛr a mɛɛn anà ndaa yàbü, kaptɛn anà aŋità bàkäl anà nde museyà Yɛsu, bàmɛn bɔɔmà a kölàköl, waa bàtɛn naa: « Ndandaa, mbuur awà kàkäl Mwan a Nzam! »
MAT 27:55 Paa bàkäl anà akaar mbɔɔn bàleerà ukwɛl. Ba bàyilabà Yɛsu sɛmà Ngalilɛ ntɔn muyun'syääl.
MAT 27:56 Uboo a ba, bàkäl Màlye un'si Magàdala, Màlye ngwän a Zyak anà Yɔsɛfi, anà un'kyay a Zebeday.
MAT 27:57 Mpal làbü sisye, aŋun'naaŋ mwɛy un'nsi Arimatɛ, ikɔb ande Yɔsefi, awà kàbulà sye un'lɔŋki a Yɛsu, waa kàyàkɔlà.
MAT 27:58 Mbuur awà kàkàman Pilatu, waa kàlɔ̈ɔ̈m ndom a Yɛsu. Apan Pilatu kàswɛŋ naa bun'pɛ ayà.
MAT 27:59 Yɔsɛfi kàwɛl ya, kàläl ya ipfɛy a pɛɛl kyàkün,
MAT 27:60 waa kàkàtɔl ya uboo a an'dii akün amà bun'fuun u nkɔŋ. Ungö, nde kàbuum nkɔŋ ntɔn mudübà munàmbwo a an'dii. Waa kàkyen.
MAT 27:61 Màlye un'nsi Magàdalà anà Màlye wumwɛy bàkäl paa, bàŋàbwaay u sim a an'dii.
MAT 27:62 Taaŋtyà, ilä kyàlääb ngyööŋ a un'kyɔm a saba, amfum a angaŋ anà Amfarisi bàkyen mbwo mwɛy akà Pilatu,
MAT 27:63 waa bàtɛn a nde naa: « Nkum, bi kan'yɔbà naa ŋaloor wà, mpal kàkäl nde anà mɔ̈ɔ̈, kàtɛɛnà naa: "Ungö a ilä itär, mɛ in'sàkyer awiyà."
MAT 27:64 Abun, swaŋ baar musey an'dii ande tii kà ilä kyàtär, uman naa alɔŋki ande bàyàyib ndür ande anà bàyàtɛn a un'sɛŋ naa: "Nde kàkyàwiyà uboo a akü." Apan loor ande làsàsöön làtàtwɛb. »
MAT 27:65 Pilatu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làwɛl aŋità abà. Làkyen kàlasey an'dii asànaa làkwen bɛ. »
MAT 27:66 Abun, bàkyen ba, ba bàbäm nkɔŋ yàkäl u munàmbwo a deŋdeŋ, waa bàsàsà aseey.
MAT 28:1 Ungö a saba, u nsɛmà a ilä atàtwɛb kyà mpɔsà, Màlye un'nsi Magàdalà anà Màlye wumwɛy, bàkyen mukàler an'dii.
MAT 28:2 Kà imbürà, mɛɛn laa màtɛɛr ma ngwal: un'kyeey a Mwol kàfü du, waa kàbuum nkɔŋ anà kàbwaay udu aya.
MAT 28:3 Nde kàkäl asànaa munyä, ipfɛy ande byàkäl byàpɛɛl asànaa für.
MAT 28:4 Aseey bàwem bɔɔmà mbɔɔn, waa bàbulà asànaa baar aŋàkwà.
MAT 28:5 Wɛɛ un'kyeey kàtɛn a akaar aban naa: « Bɛ, bɛ twon lan'man bɔɔmà. Mɛ, mɛ in'kyàyöb naa bɛ làwàmuleŋ Yɛsu awà bàbɛɛrà u kulunsi.
MAT 28:6 Nde apà watɛy, nde kan'wiyà kukwà asànaa kàtɛn nde. Yää, làmɛn ikal kàkäl nde aŋàbɔ̈ɔ̈n.
MAT 28:7 Làkyen agyä, kàlakyään alɔŋki ande naa: "Nde kàkyàwiyà uboo a akü, nde kan'fwel u Ngalilɛ, bɛ làyàkuman kwo." Le, mɛ amàlakyään. »
MAT 28:8 Làgyägyä, ba bàlwomà kan'dii u ntiin bàŋàyɔl a bɔɔmà anà un'sak mbɔɔn, waa bàkàkyään alɔŋki ande.
MAT 28:9 Umbalà mwɛy, Yɛsu kàyàbwey anà ba, waa kàtɛn naa: « Mbɔr abɛ! » Ba bàsin tsütsü apà nde, bun'tɛ mpi kà in'kɔl, waa bun'kömà.
MAT 28:10 Apan, Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Twon lan'man bɔɔmà. Kàlakyään atɔŋ amɛ bàkyen Ngalilɛ: ba bàyan'man kwo. »
MAT 28:11 Mpal bàkäl akaar u mbwo, amwɛy uboo aseey a an'dii bayi u bul, waa bàkyään amfum a angaŋ ndaa yanswà yàlyaŋ.
MAT 28:12 Amfum a angaŋ bàköŋ anà andweer, waa bàpɛ ngim mbɔɔn akà aŋità,
MAT 28:13 waa baswɛŋ naa: « Bɛ làyàtɛn naa: "Bi kàkäl bàŋàbɔ̈ɔ̈n u mpib, alɔŋki ande waa bàyun'yib."
MAT 28:14 Kya isàkal naa kuvɛrnɔ̈ɔ̈r kan'yöb ya, bi ikyer ayun'kwaam mpem ntɔn bɛ làkɔ̈ɔ̈n abwà u ndaa. »
MAT 28:15 Ba bàwɛl ngim ayin, waa bàläb ndaa yanswà baswɛŋ amfum a angaŋ anà andweer. Làsaŋ a ndaa ayi làkyàpää akà Ayudà tii ŋàbawà.
MAT 28:16 Alɔŋki bàkwem aŋimwɛy bàkyen Ngalilɛ, udu a mɔŋ kaswɛŋ Yɛsu.
MAT 28:17 Mpal bun'mɛn ba, laa bun'kömà ba. Wɛɛ bumwɛy uboo aba bàkyey anki naa awà nde.
MAT 28:18 Yɛsu kàsin tsütsü apà ba, waa kàtɛn naa: « Ikɔ̈b kyanswà bàkyan'pà u du anà u mɛɛn.
MAT 28:19 Làkyen akà in'sɛŋ myanswà, labuul alɔŋki, ladümà kà ikɔb a Taa, anà kyà Mwan, anà kyà Dweelà In'kyɛɛl,
MAT 28:20 anà lalɔŋ mukyer ndaa yanswà kàlaswɛŋ mɛ. Wɛɛ akà mɛ, mɛ in'wà anà bɛ ilä byanswà tii u ntsüü a mɛɛn. »
MAR 1:1 Nsɛmà a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là Yɛsu Klistɔ, Mwan a Nzam:
MAR 1:2 Uboo a un'kaan a ŋangɔɔm Yɛsay bàsön naa: « Le, mɛ an'tɔm un'kyeey amɛ kusà a ngye ntɔn mulɔn mbwo angye.
MAR 1:3 Ndaa mwɛy yàmusà in'kwɛŋ u nsye a ipɔl: Làlɔ̈n mbwo a Mwol, làsuub myäy ande. »
MAR 1:4 Apan Ywan Un'düümà kàkàmɛnà u nsye a ipɔl, muyilɔŋ baar mubuul mpem anà muwal ndüümà, ntɔn badwääl nkul a man'be.
MAR 1:5 -Itiir a Yuday kyanswà anà baar a Yɛlusàlɛm banswà bàkyeenà akà nde, bàkyeyà man'be aba, waa nde kàfadümà u Yɔrdan.
MAR 1:6 Ywan kàkäl aŋàbwaar ipfɛy a in'kà a ntsür bàfàbel naa shamo anà un'kab a iban a ntsür kyàŋàkwam u lɔŋ ande. Nde kàdyee mpay anà bwey a nsye.
MAR 1:7 Nde kàkyäänà naa: « Mbuur kàman'söön u ngwal wàmuyà ungö a mɛ. Mɛ in'kwo anki munye ntɔn mutsuuŋ in'siŋ a idyaar ande.
MAR 1:8 Mɛ, mɛ kàladümà kan'dà, wɛɛ nde, nde ayàladümà u Dweelà Inkyɛɛl. »
MAR 1:9 Yàmɛnà naa kà ilä abin Yɛsu kàfü Nasàlɛr u Ngalilɛ. Ywan kun'dümà u Yɔrdan.
MAR 1:10 Pa kàtoo nde kan'dà, nde kàmɛn du làmudubà. Dweelà kàyàtyà udu a nde asànaa nkokà.
MAR 1:11 Ndaa yàfü du, yàtɛn naa: « Ngye awà Mwan amɛ wà nkween. Mpem amɛ yanswà ye amu ngye. »
MAR 1:12 Kà imbürà, Dweelà kun'siinà u nsye a ipɔl.
MAR 1:13 Kwo, Satanà kun'lwɛb ilä an'kwem an'nà. Nde kàkälà anà ntsür a ndwaŋ, akyeey bun'syäälà.
MAR 1:14 Ungö bàyälà ba Ywan, Yɛsu kàkyen Ngalilɛ. Kwo nde kàkyäänà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là Nzam anà mutɛn naa:
MAR 1:15 « Taaŋ lan'kwo, Imwol a Nzam kyan'tol tsütsü. Làbuul mpem abɛ! Làsi làkwikilà amu Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ! »
MAR 1:16 Umpal kàkäl nde mulyäŋ kà un'kɔɔl a ɛwà a Ngalilɛ, nde kàmɛn Simɔn anà Andrɛ, un'tɔŋ a Simɔn, bàmutɔɔm an'kwen aba kà ɛwà: ba bàkäl alɔ̈ɔ̈b a nsö.
MAR 1:17 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Yàlan'läb, waa mɛ in'yàlabuul alɔ̈ɔ̈b a baar. »
MAR 1:18 Apan sye, ba bàsàwɛy an'kwen aba, waa bun'läb.
MAR 1:19 Kàsin nde ikye, nde kàmɛn Zyak mwan a Zebeday anà un'tɔŋ ande Ywan. Ba bàkäl uboo a bwaar aba mulɔn an'kwen.
MAR 1:20 Apan sye, nde waa kabel. Ba bàsàwɛy taaràba Zebeday uboo a bwaar anà baar a isal, waa bun'läb.
MAR 1:21 Yɛsu anà alɔŋki ande ban'bilà u Kapɛrnawum. Apan sye, ilä a saba, nde kàbilà u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà, waa kàlɔɔŋà.
MAR 1:22 Baar bàkäl mubem an'lɔɔŋ ande, ntɔn nde kàlɔɔŋà asànaa mbuur awe anà ikɔ̈b, wɛɛ kà asànaa alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn anki.
MAR 1:23 Kyekà uboo a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà akun, mbuur mwey kàkäl anà dweelà a làbe, nde kàsi in'kwɛŋ:
MAR 1:24 « Yɛsu, un'nsi Nasàlɛr, ininà ngye akwen akà bi? Nkye ngye ayi ntɔn muböŋ bi? Mɛ in'kyàyöb naa ngye awà nà: ngye awà Ŋun'kyeel a Nzam! »
MAR 1:25 Yɛsu kun'swɛŋ a ngwal naa: « Kal a duu! Too uboo a mbuur wà! »
MAR 1:26 Dweelà a làbe waa làtoo, lun'nini, làmuyisà un'kwɛŋ a kölàköl.
MAR 1:27 Baar banswà bàkäl mubem, waa bàsyeelà mbaaŋ ba a ba naa: « Ndaa nà ayi? An'lɔɔŋ akün màŋàyɔl a ikɔ̈b! Nde wàmuswaŋ an'dweelà an'be a ngwal, ma sye màmukun'wem! »
MAR 1:28 Làsaŋ a nde làpää agyägyä kà itiir a nsi a Ngalilɛ kyanswà.
MAR 1:29 Pa bàtoo ba u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà, ba bàkyen anà Zyak anà Ywan u ndwà a Simɔn anà Andrɛ.
MAR 1:30 Kyekà ukwà a Simɔn wun'kaar kàkäl aŋàbɔ̈ɔ̈n ntɔn nde kàkäl anà làbwey a mpye. Apan sye, ba bàsam Yɛsu ntɔn nde.
MAR 1:31 Nde kàsin tsütsü, kun'käär u kɔɔ, waa kun'mbaar. Làbwey a mpye waa làtoo, nde waa kàsɛmà mukasyääl.
MAR 1:32 Làsisye, ungö a miinà a taaŋ, ba bun'twäälà baar an'kyal banswà anà baar bàkäl anà an'dweelà an'be.
MAR 1:33 Bul lanswà làyàköŋ u munàmbwo.
MAR 1:34 Yɛsu kàkɔɔr baar mbɔɔn bàkäl anà an'kyal a ifà ifà. Nde kàtwey sye insɔŋà mbɔɔn. Nde kàwɛy anki mbwo akà insɔŋà musà ndaa. Ntɔn mya, mya myàkyun'yöbà.
MAR 1:35 Ututu tutu, Yɛsu kàsubà nde, kàtoo u ndwà, waa kàkyen u mpey. Akun nde kàkäl muyamà.
MAR 1:36 Simɔn anà baar bamwey bàkäl anà nde bàkyer akun'leŋ.
MAR 1:37 Utaaŋ bun'mɛn ba, ba bàtɛn a nde naa: « Baar banswà bàmuyaleŋ. »
MAR 1:38 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Tsweenà ikal asin, kan'bul a tsütsü, ntɔn mɛ in'kàkyään sye Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ kwo. Mɛ, mɛ kàtoo ntɔn la. »
MAR 1:39 Nde waa kàyilyaaŋà u Ngalilɛ wanswà mulɔŋ uboo a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà anà muböŋ insɔŋà.
MAR 1:40 Yàmɛnà naa ŋukyal a bay mwɛy kàsin apà nde, kàbü an'köm, waa kàtɛn naa: « Kya ngye akyàkwen, ngye an'kwo an'pöŋ. »
MAR 1:41 Yɛsu kun'wɛm ngyɛb mbɔɔn, kàsɛn kɔɔ, kun'bä, waa kàtɛn naa: « Mɛ an'kwen, pɔŋà! »
MAR 1:42 Umbalà mwɛy bay waa làlwomà, nde waa kàpɔŋà.
MAR 1:43 Apan, Yɛsu kun'fuur ndwà ande,
MAR 1:44 ungö mukun'pà nswɛɛŋ yi: « Twon an'sam ndaa ayi akà mbuur mwɛy. Wɛɛ ngye, kyɛn kamɛnà akà ngaŋ, waa akàpà an'kab a mpööŋ asànaa kàlɔ̈m Mɔsɛ, ntɔn mukaswaŋ naa ngye an'kɔrà. »
MAR 1:45 Pa kàkyen nde, nde kàsɛmà mukyään u ndaa a ngwal anà mupay làsaŋ a ndaa ayi. Kyakin Yɛsu kàmɛn anki mbwo mukàmɛnà u mii a baar banswà kan'bul an'köl an'köl, wɛɛ nde kàkälà u nsà, u mpey. Waa baar bàfwee mper anà mper, bàyee akà nde.
MAR 2:1 Ungö a ilä, Yɛsu kàfurà Kapernawum. Làsaŋ làpää naa nde kàkäl u ndwà.
MAR 2:2 Baar mbɔɔn bàyàköŋ paa. Akà ikal kyàkäl anki, itàkal tsütsü a munàmbwo a ndwà. Ikal kyàfàkal anki, itàkal u nsà. Nde kakyäänà Ndaa.
MAR 2:3 Apan, baar bun'twääl mbuur aŋàkwɛkà.
MAR 2:4 Wɛɛ ba bàkwe anki mukun'twaal kà ikal kàkäl nde ntɔn baar bàkäl mbɔɔn, ba bàmɛn nsyä udu a ikal kàkäl nde, waa bàpfuul mun ntɔn mutyeey ipɔy kàkäl mbuur aŋàkwɛkà.
MAR 2:5 Mpal kàmɛn Yɛsu làkwikilà aba, nde kàtɛn a mbuur aŋàkwɛkà naa: « Mwan amɛ, mɛ amadwääl nkul a man'be angye. »
MAR 2:6 Alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn amwɛy bàkäl aŋàbwaay paa, bàmuyweerà u mpem aba naa:
MAR 2:7 « Ntɔn nkye mbuur wà kan'tɛn nde abwɛy? Nde wàmubɛy Nzam. Nà kan'kwo mudwa nkul a man'be isàkal naa kà Nzam mpɛl anki? »
MAR 2:8 Abà kàyöb nde unsà dweelà ande ndaa bayweerà ba uboo a ba ŋakwo, Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ntɔn nkye làbà bɛ anà an'kyän atub amà u mpem abɛ?
MAR 2:9 Undiir nà akɔ̈ɔ̈n mpay mutɛn akà mbuur aŋàkwɛkà: "Bàmadwääl nkul a man'be angye", lɛɛ mutɛn naa: "Mbarà, sɛn ipɔy angye, kyen"?
MAR 2:10 Abun, ntɔn bɛ làyöb naa Mwan a mbuur wɛ anà ikɔ̈b mudwääl baar nkul a man'be u mɛɛn pà. » Apan, nde kàtɛn a mbuur aŋàkwɛkà naa:
MAR 2:11 « Mɛ amaswaŋ, mbarà, sɛn ipɔy angye, kyen ndwà angye! »
MAR 2:12 Baal awà waa kàmbarà, apan sye nde kàsɛn ipɔy ande, waa kàtoo u mii a baar banswà. Apan ba banswà bàmɛn ndaa yubem, waa bàsyäŋà Nzam, bàtɛɛnà naa: « Bi ŋàtàman anki abà akà ikikye! »
MAR 2:13 Yɛsu kàfàkyà kà un'kɔɔl a ɛwà. Un'sɛŋ a baar wanswà kàkyeenà akà nde, waa nde kalɔɔŋà.
MAR 2:14 Umpal kàkäl nde mulyaŋ, nde kàmɛn Lɛvi, mwan a Alfɛ, kan'bwaay kà ikàl bàfàfur itɛr, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Yan'läb! » Nde waa kàmbarà, waa kun'läb.
MAR 2:15 Ungö apan Yɛsu kàkàdyà u ndwà a Lɛvi. Afüür a itɛr mbɔɔn anà baar abe bàdyee mɛsà mwɛy anà nde, anà alɔŋki ande sye. Ntɔn baar abe bàkäl mbɔɔn muyun'lab.
MAR 2:16 Uboo a alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn bàkäl anà Amfarisi. Mpal bàmɛn ba naa Yɛsu akadyaa ikal imwɛy anà baar abà banswà, ba bàtɛn a alɔŋki ande naa: « Abà aben? Ntɔn nkye udyaa nde anà afüür a itɛr anà baar abe? »
MAR 2:17 Yɛsu kàwem nde abwey, nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Kà baar abye anà ngwal u ndür anki abye anà mfun a un'ngaŋ, wɛɛ aŋakyal. Mɛ kàyi anki mubel baar a balàbal, wɛɛ baar abe. »
MAR 2:18 Ilä mwɛy alɔŋki a Ywan anà Amfarisi bàkäl mukin mbɔr. Ba bàyàtɛn a Yɛsu naa: « Ntɔn nkye bi alɔŋki a Ywan anà alɔŋki a Amfarisi ifàkin mbɔr, wɛɛ alɔŋki angye mbɔr bàfàkin anki? »
MAR 2:19 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Nkye baar ban'bel kà un'kyɔm atà bɔr ban'kwo mukin mbɔr umpal awà un'tɛɛl a bɔr paa? Umpal awà un'tɛɛl a bɔr anà ba, ba bàkwo anki mukin mbɔr.
MAR 2:20 Wɛɛ ilä ikyer asàyà, umpal bàsàlwom ba un'tɛɛl a bɔr uboo a ba, ba bàsàkin mbɔr ilä akin.
MAR 2:21 « Akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki mubaay ikaam a ipfɛy akün udu a ipfɛy aŋànün, naa tɛy, ikaam akün ban'kwɛy iyànaan yar a ipfɛy aŋanün, tuun waa làyàyàmà.
MAR 2:22 Akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki musà man akün u mbeen aŋanün, naa tɛy, man akün laa ipfuul ma mbeen aŋanün, laa ipää ma: man anà mbeen sye waa ikyà bwà. Aay, akà man akün, mbeen sye yàkün! »
MAR 2:23 Yàmɛnà naa ilä a saba mwɛy, Yɛsu kàkäl mulyaaŋ uboo a an'ywaŋ a blɛ. Alɔŋki ande bàsɛmà mubwo imfà u mbwo bayikyeenà ba.
MAR 2:24 Amfarisi bàtɛɛnà a nde naa: « Ler ndaa bàkyerà ba ilä a saba! Yà ikin. »
MAR 2:25 Waa nde kafuur naa: « Nkye bɛ làtäŋ anki akà ikikye ndaa kàkyer David umpal kàkäl nde u làkɔɔŋ anà kàwem nde ngyal, nde anà baar bàkäl anà nde?
MAR 2:26 Aben, umpal kàkäl Abyatar undweer a angaŋ, kàbilà nde u ndwà a Nzam, kàwɛl nde mampà bàfàpà ibɔɔn, kàdi nde ma anà kàpɛ nde baar bàkäl anà nde, itàkal naa ma angaŋ mpɛl bàfàdyà? »
MAR 2:27 Apan, Yɛsu kàtɛɛnà a ba naa: « Saba bàkyer ntɔn mbuur, wɛɛ kà mbuur anki ntɔn saba.
MAR 2:28 Kyakin, Mwan a mbuur wà nkum itàkal sye wà saba. »
MAR 3:1 Ungö, Yɛsu kàfàbilà u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà. Uboo kwo kàkäl anà baal mwɛy wàŋàkwɛkà kɔɔ.
MAR 3:2 Baar bàkäl musey Yɛsu ntɔn muyöb naa nkye nde akyer un'kɔɔr ilä a saba, ntɔn ba bun'füün.
MAR 3:3 Nde waa kàtɛn a baal aŋàkwɛkà kɔɔ naa: « Mbarà! yà uboboo pà. »
MAR 3:4 Apan nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Nkye bàkyàpà mbwo ilä a saba mukyer yàŋàbwaŋ lɛɛ yà ube, mutswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ lɛɛ mudwa? » Wɛɛ ba bàkäl a kul.
MAR 3:5 Kyakin Yɛsu kaler nde intwɛn, kawem nde ngyɛb sye ntɔn mpem ambe aba, waa kàtɛn a baal awun naa: « Sɛn kɔɔ a ngye. » Nde waa kàsɛn la, la waa làkɔɔrà.
MAR 3:6 Pa bàtoo Amfarisi, laa bàkàköŋ ba anà baar a Ɛlɔdi ntɔn ba bàleŋ mbwo mudwa Yɛsu.
MAR 3:7 Yɛsu kàkyen u mpey anà alɔŋki ande kà un'kɔɔl a ɛwà. Un'kàbɔ a baar bàfü Yɛlusàlɛm anà itiir a nsi a Ngalilɛ, Yuday,
MAR 3:8 Idumɛ, u sim a ngyäl a Yɔrdan, Tir anà Sidɔn, bàyi akà Yɛsu ntɔn bàwem ba làsaŋ a indiir byanswà kàkyerà nde.
MAR 3:9 Nde kàswɛŋ alɔŋki ande naa ba bun'lɔ̈ɔ̈n bwaar làmwɛy ntɔn baar bàkɔɔn akun'sà un'süküün.
MAR 3:10 Ntɔn kàkɔɔrà nde baar mbɔɔn, baar banswà bàkäl anà mpay u ndür bun'bweelà ntɔn mukun'ba.
MAR 3:11 Apan sye an'dweelà an'be, mpal mun'mɛnà ma, ma mun'bweelà kà in'kɔl, waa bun'syee in'kwɛŋ naa: « Ngye awà Mwan a Nzam! »
MAR 3:12 Wɛɛ nde katsüŋ a ngwal naa ba bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n un'mɛɛy.
MAR 3:13 Ungö, Yɛsu kàbeenà udu a mɔŋ, kàbel baar kàkwen nde. Ba bàyi apà nde.
MAR 3:14 Nde kàkyer itsuŋ a baar kwem aŋiyweel ntɔn muyikal anà nde anà mukatɔm mukàlɔŋ
MAR 3:15 anà ikɔ̈b muböŋ insɔŋà.
MAR 3:16 Le, Bàkwem Aŋiyweel ba abà: Simɔn, Yɛsu kun'pɛ ikɔb a Petɔlà,
MAR 3:17 Zyak, mwan a Zebeday anà un'tɔŋ ande Ywan. Nde ba kapɛ ikɔb a Bwanɛrgɛsi, iswaŋà naa « baar abà asànaa idum »,
MAR 3:18 Andrɛ, Filipo, Bàtɛlàmay, Màtay, Tuma, Zyak mwan a Alfɛ, Tadɛ, Simɔn mbuur a mankay,
MAR 3:19 anà Yudas Iskalyɔt, nde awun sye mbuur kun'yälà.
MAR 3:20 Ungö apan Yɛsu kàyi u ndwà mwɛy. Un'sɛŋ a baar kàfàkàköŋ kwo, lalan ba bàsàkwo anki itàkal mudyà.
MAR 3:21 Mpal bàwem baar a ywar ande abwɛy, ba bàyi mukun'lwom, ntɔn ba bàtɛɛnà naa: « Nde kan'yiŋ! »
MAR 3:22 Alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn bàyàtyà fà Yɛlusàlɛm bàtɛɛnà naa: « Bɛlzebul wà uboo ande! » Anà sye naa: « Nde insɔŋà ayibɔ̈ŋ u mbwo a mfum a insɔŋà! »
MAR 3:23 Apan Yɛsu waa kabel, waa kàtɛn a ba unsà nsim naa: « Nkye Satanà kan'kwo uböŋ Satanà?
MAR 3:24 Isàkal naa imwol mwɛy kyàŋàkaabà anà kya ŋakwo, imwol akin ifàtsim anki.
MAR 3:25 Isàkal naa ywar mwɛy làŋàkaabà anà la ŋakwo, ywar alan làfàtsim anki.
MAR 3:26 Kya Satanà usànwan anà nde ŋakwo, nde wàŋàkaabà, nde utsim anki, yànde yan'wà.
MAR 3:27 « Akà mbuur mwey ukwe anki mubilà u ndwà a ŋangwal anà ugyɔɔr indiir ande, isàkal naa nde ŋàtun'bäm anki ŋangwal awun in'siŋ. Manà nde kàmubäm in'siŋ, apan laa ugyɔɔr nde indiir byanswà abyà uboo a ndwà ande.
MAR 3:28 Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, baan a baar bàkyer asadwääl nkul a ndaa aba yanswà: man'be anà mbɛɛy mbɔɔn isàtoo u mun aba.
MAR 3:29 Wɛɛ mbuur asàbɛy Dweelà In'kyɛɛl, nde bàsun'dwääl anki nkul akà ikikye. Ntɔn ube ande bà bàmbul a in'tye. »
MAR 3:30 Yɛsu kàtɛɛnà nde abwɛy ntɔn ba bàtɛɛnà naa: « Nde we anà dweelà a làbe. »
MAR 3:31 Ngwän anà atɔŋ a Yɛsu bàyi anà bàmbär u nsà, waa bàtöm mbuur mukun'bel.
MAR 3:32 Un'sɛŋ a baar kàkäl aŋàbwaay apà ande. Waa bàtɛn a nde naa: « Le, ngwa anà atɔŋ angye babaal anà bakaar bàmukaleŋà u nsà. »
MAR 3:33 Nde kafuur naa: « Maa anà atɔŋ amɛ bànà? »
MAR 3:34 Apan, nde kàler baar bàkäl aŋàbwaay apà nde, waa kàtɛn naa: « Làler maa anà atɔŋ amɛ!
MAR 3:35 Mbuur wanswà afàsyääl ukwen a Nzam, nde wà un'tɔŋ amɛ wàbaal, un'tɔŋ amɛ wà un'kaar anà maa. »
MAR 4:1 Yɛsu kàfàsɛmà mulɔŋ kà un'kɔɔl a ɛwà. Un'sɛŋ a baar mbɔɔn kàköŋ tsütsü apà nde, lalan kàbilà nde u bwaar, la làkäl udu a an'dà, waa kàbwaay. Baar banswà bàkäl u mɛɛn, usà ntsü akà an'dà.
MAR 4:2 Nde ba kalɔɔŋà indiir mbɔɔn unsà nsim. Nde kàtɛɛnà a ba unsà an'lɔɔŋ ande naa:
MAR 4:3 « Làwem. Le, un'köön kàtoo mukɔn.
MAR 4:4 Umpal kàyimwaŋà nde, yar a mbɛŋ làmwɛy làbü u mbwo: nɛn waa yàyi, waa yàdi ya.
MAR 4:5 Yar lumwɛy làbü kà ikal kyàkäl anà in'kul, mɛɛn a mbɔɔn màkäl anki. La làtoo agyàgyà ntɔn mɛɛn màkäl anki mbɔɔn u ngyɛl.
MAR 4:6 Mpal kàbalà mwäänà, laa làkuŋà la, waa làyöm ntɔn ukɔɔn in'swɛy.
MAR 4:7 Lumwɛy làbü uboo a nsyeenà. Nsyeenà yàyɛl ya, ya waa yun'fwee, la waa mpa làtwey mbɛŋ.
MAR 4:8 Mbɛŋ yumwɛy yàbü uboo a mɛɛn aŋàbwaŋ, waa yàmɛn, yàyɛl, yàbör mbɛŋ mbɔɔn: imwɛy an'kwem an'tär, imwɛy an'kwem an'syaam, imwɛy nkam. »
MAR 4:9 Nde kàtɛɛnà naa: « Wɛy mbuur awe anà an'tsü awem, uwem! »
MAR 4:10 Mpal kàkäl Yɛsu u mpey, baar bàyun'labà anà Bàkwem Aŋiyweel, bun'fuulà ntɔn nsim.
MAR 4:11 Nde kàtɛɛnà a ba naa: « Akà bɛ, ngyee a Imwol a Nzam bàkyàlapà. Wɛɛ akà baar abà u nsà, indiir byanswà byàfàlyaŋ unsà nsim,
MAR 4:12 ntɔn abun, "itàkal naa ba bàkyer aleerà, ba bàkɔɔn aman, itàkal naa ba bàkyer aweemà, ba bàkɔɔn ayöb, manà ba bàyàbuul mpem anà bàyadwääl un'pi a nkul!" »
MAR 4:13 Nde kàfàtɛn a ba naa: « Bɛ, bɛ làyöb anki nsim ayi! Abun bɛ làyàyöb aben nsim yanswà?
MAR 4:14 "Un'köön" kan'kɔn Ndaa.
MAR 4:15 Le, baar abà u mbwo, kà ikal bàkön Ndaa: mpal bàwem ba, Satanà abwà ayà, waa ulwom Ndaa bàkön uboo aba.
MAR 4:16 Bumwɛy bakön udu a nkɔŋ: bà baar, mpal bàfàwem ba Ndaa, ba bàbwà awal ya unsà un'sak.
MAR 4:17 Wɛɛ uboo a ba in'swɛy myatɛy, ba bà baar a ansɔŋà: isàkal naa lingyoomà lan'yà itàkal nkwaaŋ ntɔn Ndaa, laa bàbwà ba.
MAR 4:18 Bumwɛy bakön uboo a nsyeenà: bà baar bàwem Ndaa,
MAR 4:19 wɛɛ nkyän a mɛɛn, untaam a in'naaŋ anà ngyal a indiir asin asin byàbilà bya, laa iküünà bya Ndaa, ya waa mpa ibɔr mbɛŋ.
MAR 4:20 Bumwɛy bakön u mɛɛn aŋàbwaŋ. Ba bà baar bàfàwem Ndaa, bàfàwal ya, waa bàfàbɔr mbɛŋ: imwɛy an'kwem an'tär, imwɛy an'kwem an'syaam, imwɛy nkam. »
MAR 4:21 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Nkye mwinà afàyà ntɔn musà ungyɛl a kantin itàkal ungyɛl a itäb? Nkye kà ntɔn mutɔl udu a ikɔlà a un'te a wa anki?
MAR 4:22 Ntɔn undiir mwɛy wàŋàyee watɛy mpa usàmɛnà u mii, ndaa mwɛy yànkuu yatɛy mpa isàmɛnà u mwäänà.
MAR 4:23 Wɛy mbuur awe anà an'tsü awem, uwem! »
MAR 4:24 Nde waa kàfàtɛn a ba naa: « Làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ ntɔn ndaa làkaweemà bɛ. Làsii làsyäälà bɛ musi, làsii nsil alan bàsàsyääl akà bɛ, la làsàkal aŋàkwɛy ntɔn bɛ.
MAR 4:25 Ntɔn bàsàpà akà mbuur awɛ anà undiir, wɛɛ akà mbuur mpa awe anà undiir, bàsàlwom itàkal undiir ufàsi nde mukal anà wa. »
MAR 4:26 Nde kàfàtɛn a ba naa: « Imwol a Nzam kyà asànaa mbuur mwɛy kan'mwaŋ nkɔɔn u mɛɛn.
MAR 4:27 Nde utàkal aŋàbɔ̈ɔ̈n, utàkal wàŋàwiyà, mpib anà mwäänà, nkɔɔn yan'mɛn anà yan'yɛl, nde uyöb anki naa yà aben.
MAR 4:28 Mɛɛn ma ŋakwo màfàtàtwey bite, ungö imfà, ungö apan mbɛŋ aŋàkɔlà yan'yööl imfà.
MAR 4:29 Pa isöŋ mbɛŋ, ba bàsà impye, ntɔn la paŋà abwo. »
MAR 4:30 Yɛsu kàfàtɛn naa: « Ininà bi kan'kwo musi a Imwol a Nzam, itàkal naa nsim nà bi kan'kwo mutà ntɔn muswaŋ kya?
MAR 4:31 Kya kyà asànaa imbɛŋ ikikye bàkön u mɛɛn. Kya kyan'söön ukye uboo a mbɛŋ yanswà ayà u mɛɛn.
MAR 4:32 Wɛɛ isàkal naa ban'kɔn kya, kya kyan'laar, kyan'bulà aŋàsöön ndon yanswà uboo a làpaŋ, waa isà an'kɔkà. Apan, nɛn a du waa iyàtɔŋ an'yaab. »
MAR 4:33 Yà u mbwo a nsim mbɔɔn a tub ayi nde kàkyäänà Ndaa, ntɔn baar bàkäl kà isii ban'kwo ba mukun'wem.
MAR 4:34 Nde kàyäämà anki anà ba ukɔɔn asyääl nsim, wɛɛ nde kàbuulà ya yanswà akà alɔŋki ande u mpey.
MAR 4:35 Ilä nsil kya, làsisye, Yɛsu kàtɛn a alɔŋki ande naa: « Tsweenà bi isabà. »
MAR 4:36 Ba bàsàwɛy un'sɛŋ a baar, waa bun'syen uboo a bwaar kàkäl nde, an'bwaar asin màkäl tsütsü apà nde.
MAR 4:37 Ikül laa kyàyi kya. Ibɔ a an'dà byàbilà uboo a bwaar, waa byàyöölà la.
MAR 4:38 Wɛɛ akà nde, nde kàkäl aŋàbɔ̈ɔ̈n kà ita a bwaar, un'tswe udu a ibɔm. Alɔŋki ande bun'wiy, waa bàsi in'kwɛŋ: « Un'lɔɔŋ, nkye ngye ube amanà anki naa bi ikü? »
MAR 4:39 Yɛsu waa kàsubà, kàŋän ikül, waa kàtɛn a ɛwà naa: « Kal akul! Bäm mun! » Ikül laa kyàkwamà kya, duu a kölàköl waa làbilà.
MAR 4:40 Apan nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ntɔn nkye làbà bɛ mutɛɛr? Nkye bɛ ŋàtàsà anki làkwikilà? »
MAR 4:41 Matɛɛr mawɛl ma, ba waa bàtɛɛnà ba a ba naa: « Abà nde wà nà, waa itàkal ikül anà ɛwà byàmukun'weemà? »
MAR 5:1 Ungö apan ba bàkɔlà u sim lumwɛy là ɛwà, u nsi a Bàngɛlàsà.
MAR 5:2 Pa kàtoo Yɛsu u bwaar, baal mwɛy wàŋàyɔl a an'dweelà an'be kàyàtoo kà an'dii, waa kàyàbwey anà nde.
MAR 5:3 Nde kàfabwaayà kà an'dii. Akà mbuur mwɛy kàfàkwo anki mukun'bäm itàkal dwaaŋ.
MAR 5:4 Ntɔn mbalà mbɔɔn ba bàfun'bäämà iswɛɛy anà dwaaŋ, wɛɛ nde kàtsüülà mya. Akà mbuur mwɛy kàkwe anki mukun'kyäämà.
MAR 5:5 Taaŋ lanswà, mpib anà mwäänà, nde kàkäl muyità nsay uboo a an'dii anà u myɔŋ, wàmuyikuub in'kwɛŋ anà muyikàkaam ndür a in'kul.
MAR 5:6 Umpal kàmɛn nde Yɛsu ukwɛl, nde kàkyen ntiin, waa kàbü an'köm kusà a nde,
MAR 5:7 waa kàkuub in'kwɛŋ anà mutɛn naa: « Ininà akà mɛ anà ngye, Yɛsu, Mwan a Nzam a Dudu? Mɛ amabɔɔn kà ikɔb a Nzam, twon aman'pà mpay! »
MAR 5:8 Ntɔn Yɛsu kàtɛɛnà a nde naa: « Dweelà a làbe, too unsà mbuur wà! »
MAR 5:9 Nde kun'fuul naa: « Ikɔb angye nà? » Nde kun'fuur naa: « Ikɔb a mɛ "Un'kàbɔ", ntɔn bi ibà mbɔɔn. »
MAR 5:10 Nde waa kun'bɔ̈ɔ̈nà mbɔɔn, ntɔn nde ukɔɔn akaböŋ u nsi ayin.
MAR 5:11 Kyekà, mper akà mɔŋ, làkäl anà làböl a kölàköl là ngul làkäl muyidyà.
MAR 5:12 An'dweelà an'be màbɔ̈ɔ̈n Yɛsu naa: « Itöm uboo a ngul ntɔn bi ibilà amu ya! »
MAR 5:13 Yɛsu kapɛ mbwo. Apan laa màtoo ma, màbilà ma uboo a ngul, làböl, fà iköl a mɔŋ, làkàbwà kà ɛwà. Ya yàkäl isii a nsaab yweel, waa làminà.
MAR 5:14 Aseey a ngul batiin ba, ba bàkàpay làsaŋ uboo a bul anà kà itsuŋ a ndwà. Apan baar waa bàyi muman ndaa yàlyaaŋ.
MAR 5:15 Mpal bàyàtol ba tsütsü apà Yɛsu anà bàmɛn ba aŋadweelà an'be akyàbwaay, akyàbwaar anà akyàkal a duu, nde mbuur kàkäl anà Un'kàbɔ, ba bàmɛn bɔɔmà.
MAR 5:16 Baar bàmɛn ya yanswà yàlyaŋ, ba bakyäänà ndaa yàbweel mbuur aŋadweelà an'be anà ngul.
MAR 5:17 Apan ba bàsɛmà mukun'bɔɔn naa nde ulwomà kà itiir a nsi aba.
MAR 5:18 Umpal kàkäl Yɛsu mubilà u bwaar, mbuur awà kàkäl anà an'dweelà an'be kun'lɔ̈ɔ̈m naa
MAR 5:19 Yɛsu kun'pɛ anki mbwo, wɛɛ nde kàtɛn a nde naa: « Furà ndwà a ngye, ntsü akà atoŋ angye, waa akakyään ndaa yanswà kàmakyer Mwol unsà ngyɛb ande. »
MAR 5:20 Apan, baal awà kàkyen nde, nde kàsɛmà mukyään indiir a kölàköl byanswà kàkyer Yɛsu akà nde u Dɛkapɔl. Baar banswà bakyer abemà.
MAR 5:21 Mpal kàfurà Yɛsu sim lumwɛy u bwaar, un'sɛŋ a baar mbɔɔn kàyàkɔ̈ŋ apà nde. Nde kàkäl kà un'kɔɔl a ɛwà.
MAR 5:22 Apan umwɛy uboo a amfum a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà, ikɔb ande Zayirɔs, umpal kàmɛn nde Yɛsu, nde kàbü kà in'kɔl ande,
MAR 5:23 waa kun'bɔ̈ɔ̈n mbɔɔn, mutɛn naa: « Mwan un'kye amɛ wà un'kaar wà tsütsü mukwà, yun'si an'kɔɔ ntɔn nde ukɔɔrà, uwü mɔ̈ɔ̈! »
MAR 5:24 Yɛsu kàkyen mbwo mwɛy anà nde. Un'sɛŋ a baar mbɔɔn kàyun'labà, waa kàyun'bàbääbà.
MAR 5:25 Kyekà kàkäl anà un'kaar mwɛy kàyitoo an'kil mbul kwem aŋiyweel.
MAR 5:26 Nde kàmɛn mpay mbɔɔn muyikyà akà ingaŋ mbɔɔn, kàmay indiir ande byanswà, ukɔɔn aman ubwaŋ. Wɛɛ ukyal ande bàkyer afàsöönà mbɔɔn.
MAR 5:27 Umpal kàwem un'kaar awà ndaa bàtɛɛnà baar ntɔn Yɛsu, nde kàkül ungö, uboo a un'sɛŋ a baar, waa kàbä ipfɛy ande.
MAR 5:28 Ntɔn nde kàtɛɛnà nde ŋàkwo naa: « Isàkal naa mɛ in'tàba akà ipfɛy ande mpɛl, mɛ in'kyɛr awà mɔ̈ɔ̈. »
MAR 5:29 Taaŋ nsil alan sye an'kil ande waa màtsü mutoo, nde kàyöb u ndür ande naa nde kan'kɔɔrà unsà ukyal ande.
MAR 5:30 Apan sye, Yɛsu waa kàyöb naa ngwal mwɛy yan'too u ndür ande, nde kàbulà uboboo a un'sɛŋ a baar, waa kàfuulà naa: « Nà kan'ba ipfɛy amɛ? »
MAR 5:31 Alɔŋki ande bàtɛɛnà a nde naa: « Ngye akimanà naa un'sɛŋ a baar wàmukabàbääbà, wɛɛ ngye afuulà naa: "Nà kàman'ba?" »
MAR 5:32 Wɛɛ nde kàleerà umbil ande ntɔn muyöb naa un'kaar nà kan'kyer abà.
MAR 5:33 Apan, abà kàyöb un'kaar awun ndaa yun'yeel, unsà bɔɔmà anà matɛɛr, nde kàyàbwà kà in'kɔl a Yɛsu, waa kàtɛn a nde ndandaa yanswà.
MAR 5:34 Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mangwa, làkwikilà angye làmatswà mɔ̈ɔ̈. Kyen a duu, wɛy naa ngye akɔɔrà unsà ukyal angye. »
MAR 5:35 Nde kàkäl aŋàtàmay anki muyääm, umpal bàyi baar bàfü ndwà a mfum a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà, waa bàtɛn naa: « Mwan angye wà un'kaar kan'kwà. Ntɔn nkye mufàtwääl Un'lɔɔŋ nkwom? »
MAR 5:36 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kàsàlab anki ndaa ayi, waa kàtɛn a mfum a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà naa: « Twon an'man bɔɔmà, sà làkwikilà mpɛl. »
MAR 5:37 Abun, nde kàpɛ anki mbwo akà mbuur mukun'swà, nà Petɔlà, Zyak, anà un'tɔŋ ande Ywan mpɛl.
MAR 5:38 Ba ban'kɔlà u ndwà a mfum a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà. Yɛsu kan'man baar ban'kal udu udu, bàmulel, bàmusà in'kwɛŋ mbɔɔn.
MAR 5:39 Nde kan'bilà, waa kan'tɛn a ba naa: « Ntɔn nkye minii ami anà ilel abi? Mwan kà wàŋàkwà anki, nde wàŋàbɔ̈ɔ̈n. »
MAR 5:40 Ba bàkyer un'sɛɛ. Wɛɛ nde kàtwey baar banswà, waa kàwɛl nà taarande anà ngwän a mwan anà baar bàyun'swà. Apan nde kan'bilà u suk kàkäl mwan.
MAR 5:41 Nde kan'tà kɔɔ a mwan mpi, waa kan'tɛn a nde naa: « Mwan un'kaar, mɛ amaswaŋ, wiyà! »
MAR 5:42 Apan sye, mwan un'kaar waa kàmbarà, waa kàsemà mukyà, - nde kàkäl ayà mbul kwem aŋiyweel. Apan, ba bàkäl unsà ubem mbɔɔn.
MAR 5:43 Yɛsu kaswɛŋ a ngwal naa akà mbuur mwɛy ukɔɔn ayöb, waa kàtɛn naa ba bun'pɛ isaa adyà.
MAR 6:1 Yɛsu kàlwomà kà ikal akin, waa kan'yà bul ande, alɔŋki ande bàkäl mukun'lab.
MAR 6:2 Ilä a saba, nde kàsɛmà mulɔŋ u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà. Baar mbɔɔn bàweemà nde bàkäl mubem, waa bàtɛɛnà naa: « Nde indiir abi byan'fà ken? Amà an'yeerà a nkye ifà bun'pɛ, waa an'kɔɔ ande ikakyerà isal a ngwal a ngwal a tub abi?
MAR 6:3 Nkye nde kà sharpantye anki, mwan a Màlye, un'tɔŋ a Zyak, anà Yɔsɛ, anà Yude, anà Simɔn? Nkye atɔŋ ande bakaar kà bà anki uboo a bi apà? » Kyakin bàbööl ba kyà ntɔn làkwikilà aba.
MAR 6:4 Apan Yɛsu kàtɛɛnà a ba naa: « Ŋangɔɔm bàfun'bɛy nà u bul ande, u mbil ande anà u ndwà ande mpɛl. »
MAR 6:5 Nde kàsàkwo anki mukyer akà impà mwɛy kwo, wɛɛ nde kàsi nà an'kɔɔ udu a ndam a aŋatoo, waa kakɔɔr.
MAR 6:6 Nde kàbemà ntɔn mpa bàkäl ba anà làkwikilà. Ungö apan nde kàyilyaaŋà kan'bul a tsütsü muyilɔŋ.
MAR 6:7 Nde kàbel Bàkwem Aŋiyweel, kàsɛmà mukatɔm abɔ̈ɔ̈l abɔ̈ɔ̈l, kapɛ ikɔ̈b udu a an'dweelà an'be,
MAR 6:8 waa kaswɛŋ naa: « Twon lan'wal akà undiir mwɛy ntɔn mbwo, nà unsɔk mpɛl. Twon lan'wal isaa adyà, itàkal ngɔɔr, itàkal ngim uboo a un'di,
MAR 6:9 wɛɛ làbwäär idyaar, twon lan'bwaar an'kàzak an'mɔ̈ɔ̈l. »
MAR 6:10 Nde kàfàtɛn a ba naa: « Isàkal naa kà ikal imwɛy, bɛ lan'bilà u ndwà mwɛy, làbwaay paa tii umpal làsàlwomà bɛ kà ikal akin.
MAR 6:11 Isàkal naa kà ikal imwɛy bàlawɛl anki, bàlawem anki, làlwomà apan, làkɔɔb un'twà a in'kɔl abɛ. Kya isàkal imbäl ntɔn ba. »
