MAR 6:12 Alɔŋki bàkyen ba, ba bàkyäänà naa baar bàkyer abuul mpem.
MAR 6:13 Ba bàyiböŋà insɔŋà mbɔɔn, bàkiirà aŋatoo mbɔɔn may, waa bakɔɔrà.
MAR 6:14 Mfum Ɛlɔdi kàwem naa bàtaa Yɛsu din, ntɔn ikɔb ande kyàtoo làpaan. Baar bàtɛɛnà naa: « Ywan Un'düümà kan'wiyà kukwà! Undiir awun awà nde anà ikɔ̈b mukyer indiir a ngwal a ngwal. »
MAR 6:15 Bumwɛy bàtɛɛnà naa: « Nde wà Ɛli. » Bamwey sye naa: « Nde wà ŋangɔɔm asànaa umwɛy uboo a aŋangɔɔm. »
MAR 6:16 Mpal kàwem Ɛlɔdi ndaa ayi, nde kàtɛɛnà naa: « Ywan akwà kàtsül mɛ un'tswe, kan'wiyà! »
MAR 6:17 Abun, Ɛlɔdi kàswɛŋ mukɔr Ywan anà bun'si u bɔlokà, ntɔn kàbääl nde Ɛlɔdyas awà kàkäl un'kyay a un'tɔŋ ande Filipo.
MAR 6:18 Ntɔn Ywan kàtɛɛnà a Ɛlɔdi naa: « Mbwo yatɛy ngye muwal un'kyay a un'tɔŋ angye! »
MAR 6:19 Undiir awun Ɛlɔdyas kàyiiŋ nde Ywan, waa kàkweenà mukun'dwa. Wɛɛ nde kàsàkwo anki,
MAR 6:20 ntɔn Ɛlɔdi kàtiinà Ywan bɔɔmà, abà kàyöb nde naa nde wà mbuur a balàbal anà wà in'kyɛɛl, laa kun'tii nde. Mpal kun'wɛɛmà nde, ya yun'pää mpay mbɔɔn. Wɛɛ nde kàkweenà mukun'wɛm.
MAR 6:21 Kyekà, Ɛlɔdyas ipöl aŋàbwaŋ kàmɛn ilä a un'kyɔm a mböör a Ɛlɔdi. Nde awà kàpɛ udyà akà ayɔl ande anà amfum a aŋità ande, anà akà abyääl a Ngalilɛ.
MAR 6:22 Mwan a Ɛlɔdyas wà un'kaar waa kàyàkyen. Ɛlɔdi anà baar kàbel nde bàmɛn un'sak mbɔɔn. Mfum kàtɛn a mwan un'kaar naa: « Lɔm undiir wanswà akwen ngye, mɛ in'kyer ayapà wa. »
MAR 6:23 Nde kun'dyeel kyän naa: « Undiir wanswà ayàlɔm ngye, mɛ in'kyɛr ayapà, itàkal naa yar a mɛɛn a imfum amɛ.
MAR 6:24 Mwan un'kaar kàtoo u ndwà, waa kàtɛn a ngwän naa: « Ininà mɛ in'lɔm? » Nde waa kàfuur naa: « Un'tswe a Ywan Un'düümà. »
MAR 6:25 Nde kàfurà agyägyä akà mfum, waa kun'lɔ̈ɔ̈m: « Mɛ in'kwen naa ngye an'pɛ agyägyä udu a làlɔŋà, un'tswe a Ywan Un'düümà! »
MAR 6:26 Mfum kàwem ngyɛb. Wɛɛ, ntɔn kyän ande anà baar kàbel nde, nde kàkwen anki utön mukun'pà.
MAR 6:27 Apan sye, mfum kàtöm un'seey mwɛy anà nswɛɛŋ mutwal un'tswe a Ywan Un'düümà. Un'seey kàkyen u bɔlokà, waa kàtsül un'tswe a Ywan,
MAR 6:28 kàtwääl wa udu a làlɔŋà, waa kàpɛ wa akà mwan un'kaar. Waa mwan un'kaar kàpɛ wa akà ngwän.
MAR 6:29 Mpal bàwem alɔŋki a Ywan làsaŋ alan, ba bàyàwal ndom ande, waa bàsi ya kan'dii mwɛy.
MAR 6:30 Yàmɛnà naa mpal bàyàfurà antööm, ba bàkɔ̈ŋ apà Yɛsu, ba bun'sam ndaa yanswà bàkyer ba anà bàlɔɔŋà ba.
MAR 6:31 Nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Bɛ bumwɛy, làyi u mpey, làyöör ikye u nsye a ipɔl. » Ntɔn baar mbɔɔn bàkälà muyaa anà mukyeenà, waa ba bàkäl anki itàkal anà taaŋ mudyà.
MAR 6:32 Lalan bàkyen ba, ba mpɛl, uboo a bwaar u mpey, u nsye a ipɔl.
MAR 6:33 Baar batääl mukyà, bàmbɔɔn laa bayöb ba. Apan, fà an'bul manswà, ba bàkyen ntiin ntiin kà in'kɔl, waa bàfweel kà ikal bàkwen ba mukyà.
MAR 6:34 Umpal katoo Yɛsu u bwaar, nde kàmɛn un'sɛŋ a baar mbɔɔn, ngyɛb waa yun'wɛl ntɔn ba, ntɔn ba bàkäl asànaa in'kɔk myakɔɔn aleer, waa kàsɛmà mukalɔŋ indiir mbɔɔn.
MAR 6:35 Taaŋ làkyen mbɔɔn, alɔŋki bàsin apà Yɛsu, waa bàtɛn a nde naa: « Ikal ki kyà ipɔl, taaŋ sye lan'kyà mbɔɔn.
MAR 6:36 Afuur baar bà, ba bàkyà u bitsuŋ a ndwà anà an'bul a tsütsü mukàsom isaa adyà. »
MAR 6:37 Wɛɛ nde kafuur naa: « Lapɛ udyà bɛ ŋakwo! » Ba bàtɛn a nde naa: « Nkye bi ikàsom mampà a itɛr a ngim nkam yweel ntɔn bi ipɛ ba udyà? »
MAR 6:38 Nde waa utɛn a ba naa: « Mampà an'kwe bɛ làwe amà? Kàlaler! » Ungö muler, ba ban'tɛn naa: « An'tyeen, anà nsö yweel. »
MAR 6:39 Apan, nde kaswɛŋ naa ba bàsi baar banswà unsà an'kab bàŋàbwaay udu a un'lɛŋ un'bu.
MAR 6:40 Baar bàbwaay unsà in'lwaaŋ a nkam anà myà an'kwem an'tyeen.
MAR 6:41 Yɛsu kàwɛl mampà man'tyeen anà nsö yàyweel, nde kàler u du, kàsaak ma, kàtsül ma, waa kàpɛ akalɔŋki ntɔn mukääb baar banswà.
MAR 6:42 Ba banswà bàdi, waa bàyüür.
MAR 6:43 Ba bàsyen in'lwaŋ kwem aŋiyweel myàŋàyɔl a itiir a mampà anà byà nsö byàsäl.
MAR 6:44 Baar bàdi mampà bàkäl abaal nsaab tyeen.
MAR 6:45 Apan sye, Yɛsu kàswɛŋ alɔŋki ande mubilà u bwaar anà mufweel kusà a nde, u sim a ɛwà lumwɛy, u ntsü a Bɛtesayidà, umpal nde ŋakwo usàpay nde un'sɛŋ a baar.
MAR 6:46 Ungö mupay ba, nde kàbeenà u mɔŋ mukàyamà.
MAR 6:47 Làsisye, bwaar làkäl lan'tol uboboo a ɛwà, nde kàsàkal nde mpɛl u mɛɛn.
MAR 6:48 Muman naa alɔŋki ande bàmunwan a ngwal muluk nkay ntɔn un'pöb kàyee lisà, tsütsü a taaŋtyà, nde kan'yà mper akà ba wàmuyikyà udu a ɛwà, waa kàlasoonà.
MAR 6:49 Mpal bun'mɛn ba wàmuyikyà udu a ɛwà, ba bàsi naa bwo kàkäl, waa bàsi in'kwɛŋ.
MAR 6:50 Ntɔn ba banswà bàkyer un'man, lingyoomà waa lawɛl. Wɛɛ apan, nde kàyäm anà ba, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làwɛl ibaal! Wà mɛ, twon lan'man bɔɔmà! »
MAR 6:51 Apan, nde kàbilà u bwaar apà ba, un'pöb waa kànye. Uboo a ba ŋakwo, ba bàbemà mbɔɔn.
MAR 6:52 Kutɛn aŋàbwaŋ, ba bàsàyöb anki mbuul a impà a mampà, ntɔn mpem aba yàkäl bwoor.
MAR 6:53 Ungö a nsaabà, ba bàtɔlà u mɛɛn a Ngɛnɛsàlɛr, waa bàbäm bwaar aba.
MAR 6:54 Pa bàtoo ba u bwaar, baar waa bàyöb Yɛsu,
MAR 6:55 waa bàkyen ntiin kà itiir a nsi akin kyanswà, waa bàsɛmà mukun'twääl aŋukyal udu a ipɔy kà ikal kyanswà bàweemà ba naa Yɛsu wà kwo.
MAR 6:56 Ntsü yanswà kàbilà nde: uboo an'bul itàkal an'bul a kölàköl, itàkal kà itsuŋ a ndwà, baar bàtɔ̈ɔ̈là aŋukyal u làbay, waa bun'bɔ̈ɔ̈nà naa nde kawɛy ba bàbä itàkal làpan a ipfɛy ande mpɛl. Abun baar abà bàtɛɛ kya mpi bàkyer akɔɔrà.
MAR 7:1 Amfarisi anà alɔɔŋ a un'kɔɔn amwɛy bàfü Yɛlusàlɛm ban'köŋ apà Yɛsu.
MAR 7:2 Ba ban'man naa alɔŋki ande amwɛy bàmudyà anà an'kɔɔ a ŋingyäy, iswaŋà naa ukɔɔn aywɛy ma.
MAR 7:3 Ntɔn Amfarisi, itàkal Ayudà banswà, bàfàdyà anki ukɔɔn aywɛy an'kɔɔ ubwaŋàbwaŋ, mulab nkääl a andweer.
MAR 7:4 Ba bàsàfà mukàlyaaŋ, ba bàfàdyà anki kusà mutàpöŋ. Ye anà nsyääl asin mbɔɔn yindweer bàfàlab ba: mpööŋ a an'kɔɔb, yà an'buuŋ anà yan'lɔŋà.
MAR 7:5 Amfarisi anà alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn ban'fuul Yɛsu naa: « Ntɔn nkye alɔŋki angye mpa bàfàlab ba in'kɔɔn a andweer, wɛɛ ba bàfàdyà anà an'kɔɔ a ŋingyäy? »
MAR 7:6 Nde waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Yɛsay kàtɛ ngɔɔm aŋàbwaŋ ntɔn bɛ baar a mpem yweel, ntɔn bàsön naa: "Un'sɛŋ wà mɛ làkoo afan'sà udu a ndem mpɛl, wɛɛ mpem aba yukwɛl anà mɛ."
MAR 7:7 Ngyamàkà bàfan'sà ba yà bunàbun, ntɔn nsyääl bàfàlɔŋ ba yan'kyän a baar."
MAR 7:8 Bɛ nswɛɛŋ a Nzam làfàsà ukɔl, wɛɛ bɛ làfàndäär anà nsyääl a baar. »
MAR 7:9 Nde kàfàtɛn a ba naa: « Bɛ làfàtɔn ubwaŋàbwaŋ nswɛɛŋ a Nzam ntɔn mukaar nkääl abɛ!
MAR 7:10 Ntɔn Mɔsɛ kàtɛn naa: "Sà làkoo akà taaràŋà anà ngwa", sye naa: "Wɛy mbuur ato taarànde anà ngwän, ukyen ukwà."
MAR 7:11 Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làfàtɛn naa: mbuur usàtɛn a taarànde itàkal a ngwän naa: "Undiir alàwal ngye akà mɛ wà Kɔrban", ikaswaŋà naa "kab in'kyɛɛl",
MAR 7:12 bɛ làmun'pà mbwo naa nde ukɔɔn akyer akundiir mwɛy ntɔn taarànde itàkal ntɔn ngwän."
MAR 7:13 Lalan, bɛ làfàdwa Ndaa a Nzam ntɔn nkääl a andweer abɛ làfàlɔŋ bɛ. Bɛ làfàkyer sye indiir asin mbɔɔn byà ifà aki. »
MAR 7:14 Ungö apan, Yɛsu kàfàbel un'sɛŋ a baar, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Lan'wem bɛ banswà, làyöb naa:
MAR 7:15 Akundiir mwɛy tɛy afàfà nsà awafàbilà uboo a mbuur afun'buul wàŋingyäy. Wɛɛ indiir ifàtoo u mbuur ifun'buul wàŋingyäy. »
MAR 7:16 [ Kya mbuur mwɛy usàkal anà an'tsü awem, wɛy nde uwem! ]
MAR 7:17 Umpal kàbilà Yɛsu u ndwà, ukwɛl a un'sɛŋ a baar, alɔŋki ande bun'fuulà ntɔn itim aki.
MAR 7:18 Nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Nkye anà bɛ sye, abun bɛ un'yɛnà watɛy? Nkye bɛ làyöb anki naa undiir mwɛy tɛy afafà nsà anà afàbilà uboo a mbuur ukwe anki mukun'buul wàŋingyäy,
MAR 7:19 ntɔn wa ufàbilà anki u mpem ande, wɛɛ kan'bäl ande, ungö wa akyà u nkuràndwà? » Abun nde kàkyäänà naa isaa byanswà byàŋàpɔŋà.
MAR 7:20 Nde waa kàtɛn naa: « Ndaa ifafà uboo a mbuur, ya ifun'buul wàŋingyäy.
MAR 7:21 Ntɔn an'kyän an'be ifàtoo fà boo, fà mpem a baar: ipasàsɛ, küb, ndwääl a baar,
MAR 7:22 intswem, ngyal a in'naaŋ, an'kyän an'be, loor, mɔ̈ɔ̈ a isak isak, intwɛn, mbɛɛy, nsɛɛn a an'pɛy, unsil.
MAR 7:23 Indiir ibe abi byanswà byàfàtoo uboo, waa byàfàbuul mbuur wàŋingyäy. »
MAR 7:24 Yɛsu kàlwomà nde apan, nde kàkyen itiir a Tir. Nde kàbilà u ndwà mwɛy, nde kàkwen anki naa akà mbuur mwɛy uyɔ̈b. Wɛɛ yàkwe anki naa nde ukäl aŋàyee.
MAR 7:25 Yàmɛnà naa un'kaar mwɛy, mwan ande wun'kaar kàkäl anà dweelà a làbe. Pa kàwem nde làsaŋ a Yɛsu, laa kàyi nde, waa kàbü kà in'kɔl ande.
MAR 7:26 Un'kaar awà kàkäl ungɛlɛki, un'nsi Fɛnisi u Siri. Nde kàlɔ̈ɔ̈mà akà Yɛsu naa nde uböŋ unsɔŋà unsà mwan ande wun'kaar.
MAR 7:27 Yɛsu kàtɛɛnà a nde naa: « Wɛy baan bàtàyuur, kàyubwaŋ anki muwal isaa a baan ntɔn mutɔɔm bya akà bimbwà. »
MAR 7:28 Nde wà kun'fuur naa: « Ndandaa, Mwol, itàkal bimbwà, ungyɛl a mɛsà, byàfàdyà mfür a isaa a baan. »
MAR 7:29 Apan Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ntɔn ndaa ayi, kyen: unsɔŋà kan'too u mwan angye wun'kaar. »
MAR 7:30 Nde kàfura ndwà ande, waa kàmɛn mwan ande wàŋàsilà udu a itäb: unsɔŋà akyàtoo amu nde.
MAR 7:31 Yɛsu kàlwomà nde itiir a Tir, nde kàfurà ntsü a ɛwà a Ngalilɛ u mbwo a Sidɔn, waa kàlyaŋ itiir a Dɛkapɔl.
MAR 7:32 Baar bun'twääl nkiin mwɛy kàyäämà a mpay, ba bun'bɔ̈ɔ̈n naa nde kun'si kɔɔ.
MAR 7:33 Apan, Yɛsu kun'syen ukɔl, ukwel a un'sɛŋ a baar, kun'biil mpin kan'tsü, kàtsül an'te, waa kun'bä u làlem.
MAR 7:34 Ungö nde kàsɛn mii u du, kànyääm ikye, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Efàfàta! » Ikaswaŋà naa: « Dubà! »
MAR 7:35 Kà imbürà, an'tsü ande waa màdubà, làlem ande waa làtsuŋà, waa kàyäämà ubwaŋàbwaŋ.
MAR 7:36 Yɛsu kaswɛŋ naa ba bàkɔɔn asam akà mbuur mwɛy. Wɛɛ kàsin aswaŋà nde, ba bàsin apayà làsaŋ.
MAR 7:37 Ba bàkäl mubem mbɔɔn, waa bàtɛɛnà naa: « Indiir byanswà nde kan'kyer ubwaŋ! Nde wàmukyer naa ikwan'tsü bàwem, nkiin bàsi ndaa! »
MAR 8:1 Kà ilä abin un'sɛŋ a baar mbɔɔn kàkyer afàköŋ. Wa kàkäl anki anà indiir adyà, Yɛsu kàbel alɔŋki ande, waa kàtɛn a ba naa:
MAR 8:2 « Mɛ aman ngyɛb mbɔɔn ntɔn un'sɛŋ a baar wà, ntɔn, le, ŋàbà ilä itär abà ba anà mɛ, wɛɛ ba undiir adyà watɛy.
MAR 8:3 Wɛɛ, kya mɛ in'safuur an'bul aba anà ngyal, ba bakyer akàyɔn u mbwo. Bàmbɔɔn uboo aba bàfü kwɛl. »
MAR 8:4 Alɔŋki ande bun'fuur naa: « U nsi ipɔl ayi, ntsü nà ban'kwo bi muman undiir adii ba, waa ba bàyuur? »
MAR 8:5 Nde kafuul naa: « Bɛ làwe amà mampà an'kwe? » Ba bàtɛn naa: « Nsambwaar ».
MAR 8:6 Apan nde kàswɛŋ un'sɛŋ a baar mubwaay u mɛɛn. Ungɔ̈ apan nde kàwɛl mampà nsambwaar, kàfuur an'tɔɔn, kàtsül ma, waa kàpɛ ma akalɔŋki ntɔn ba bàkäb. Ba bàkäb ma akun'sɛŋ a baar wanswà.
MAR 8:7 Ba bàkäl sye anà binsö imwɛy. Ungɔ̈ musaak bya, nde kàtɛn naa ba bàkäb bya sye.
MAR 8:8 Baar waa bàdi, waa bàyüür. Ba bàsyen in'lwaŋ, in'lwaŋ nsambwaar myà itsü byàsäl.
MAR 8:9 Kyekà baar bàkäl isii a nsaab nà. Ungö apan nde wakapay,
MAR 8:10 apan sye nde kàbilà u bwaar anà alɔŋki ande, waa bàkyen itiir a Dalmanutà.
MAR 8:11 Amfarisi bàyi ba, waa bàsɛmà musà mbaaŋ anà Yɛsu ntɔn mukun'lwab ndaa. Ba bun'lɔ̈ɔ̈m impà kyan'fà du.
MAR 8:12 Nde kàŋyäm mbɔɔn unsà an'kyän ande, waa kàtɛn naa: « Ntɔn nkye baar a nkööl ayi bàlɔɔmà ba impà? Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, baar a nkööl ayi akidiim a impà mwɛy bàsapà anki. »
MAR 8:13 Ungö apan kàsawɛy nde, nde kàfàbilà u bwaar, waa kàkyen sim a ɛwà lumwɛy.
MAR 8:14 Alɔŋki bàkyärà mpiim muwal mampà, waa bàkäl alà làmwɛy mpel u bwaar.
MAR 8:15 Yɛsu kaswɛŋ naa: « Le, làkäl kigyɛɛŋ ntɔn ful a Amfarisi anà là Ɛlɔdi. »
MAR 8:16 Ba bàsyeelà mbaaŋ ba a ba ntɔn ba bàkäl anki anà mampà.
MAR 8:17 Yɛsu kàmɛn nde abun, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ntɔn nkye làsyeelà bɛ mbaaŋ ntɔn lan'kɔɔn bɛ mampà? Nkye bɛ ŋàtàwal anki un'yɛnà, waa bɛ mpa làyöbà? Nkye mpem abɛ yàŋàbwà bwoor?
MAR 8:18 Bɛ làwe anà mii, nkye bɛ làkamanà anki? Bɛ làwe anà an'tsü, nkye bɛ làkawɛɛmà anki? Nkye bɛ làfàkayöbà anki:
MAR 8:19 mpal kàtsül mɛ mampà an'tyeen ntɔn abaal nsaab tyeen, in'lwaŋ aŋàyɔl a itsü in'kwe bɛ làsyen? » Ba bàtɛn a nde naa: « Kwɛm aŋiyweel. »
MAR 8:20 « Wɛɛ mpal kàtsül mɛ mampà nsambwaar ntɔn abaal nsaab nà, in'lwaŋ in'kwe myàŋàyɔl a itsü bɛ làsyen? » Ba waa bàtɛn naa: « Nsambwaar. »
MAR 8:21 Nde waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Nkye bɛ ŋàtàyöb anki? »
MAR 8:22 Ba ban'tol Bɛtesayidà. Waa bun'twääl ikwàmii mwɛy, bun'bɔ̈ɔ̈n naa nde kun'bä.
MAR 8:23 Nde kàtɛ ikwàmii mpi u kɔɔ, waa kun'twey u nsà a bul. Nde kun'fül an'te u mii, kun'si an'kɔɔ, waa kun'fuulà naa: « Nkye ngye akimanà undiir? »
MAR 8:24 Nde kun'duub mii, waa kàtɛɛnà naa: « Mɛ in'täälà baar, mɛ ba amanà asànaa in'te, wɛɛ ba bàmuyikyà. »
MAR 8:25 Apan Yɛsu kàfun'sà an'kɔɔ udu a mii. Baal awà waa kàmɛn ubwaŋàbwaŋ. Nde kàkyer akɔrà, waa kamɛnà indiir byanswà umwɛy umwɛy.
MAR 8:26 Lalan Yɛsu kun'fuur nde ndwà ande, waa kun'kyään naa: « Twon an'bilà akikikye uboo a bul. »
MAR 8:27 Yɛsu kàkyen anà alɔŋki ande u ntsü an'bul a tsütsü anà Sɛzarɛ a Filipo. U mbwo, nde kàfuul alɔŋki ande naa: « Baar bàfàtɛn naa mɛ in'wà nà? »
MAR 8:28 Ba waa bun'fuur naa: « Ywan Un'düümà, bumwɛy, Ɛli, bumwɛy naa umwɛy uboo a aŋangɔɔm. »
MAR 8:29 Nde waa ufàfuul: « Wɛɛ bɛ ŋakwo làtɛn naa mɛ in'wà nà? » Petɔlà waa ufuur: « Ngye awà Klistɔ. »
MAR 8:30 Yɛsu kaswɛŋ a ngwal naa ba bàkɔɔn ayäm akà mbuur mwɛy ntɔn nde.
MAR 8:31 Apan, nde kàsɛmà mukalɔŋ naa: « Mwan a mbuur akyer aman mpay mbɔɔn. Andwer, amfum a angaŋ anà alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn bàkyer un'tɔn, bàkyer un'dwa, waa ungö ilä itär nde akyer awiyà. »
MAR 8:32 Ndaa ayi nde kàtɛɛnà kimii imii. Apan Petɔlà kun'naan ukɔl, waa kàsɛmà mukun'ŋän.
MAR 8:33 Wɛɛ nde waa kàbulà, kàler alɔŋki ande, kàŋän Petɔlà, waa kàtɛn naa: « Satanà, kyen ungö a mɛ! Ntɔn ngye akayweerà anki indiir a Nzam, wɛɛ indiir a baar. »
MAR 8:34 Ungö nde kàbel un'sɛŋ a baar anà alɔŋki ande, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Isàkal naa mbuur akwen mukan'lab, wɛy nde ukɔɔb ndür ande, usɛɛn kulunsi ande, waa kan'lab.
MAR 8:35 Ntɔn mbuur usàkwen mutii mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande, wa asàkyà bwà, wɛɛ mbuur usàpiy mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande ntɔn mɛ anà làsaŋ aŋàbwaŋ, nde asàtswà wa.
MAR 8:36 Bweel nà mbuur kan'kwo muwal uman naa nde kan'wal mɛɛn manswà, wɛɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande ukyà bwà?
MAR 8:37 Abun, ininà mbuur kan'kwo mupà ntɔn musɔɔm mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande?
MAR 8:38 Ntɔn mbuur usàwem mɛ nswɛn anà ndaa amɛ uboo a nkööl ayi yinswem anà yube, Mwan a mbuur sye asun'wem nswɛn mpal usàyà nde unsà làkoo a Taarànde, anà akyeey in'kyɛɛl. »
MAR 9:1 Yɛsu kàfàtɛn a ba naa: « Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, amwɛy uboo a baar bà pà, bàsàkwà anki kusà muman Imwol a Nzam kyàmuyiyà anà ngwal. »
MAR 9:2 Ungö ilä isyaam, Yɛsu kàwɛl Petɔlà, Zyak anà Ywan, waa kasyen u mpey udu a mɔŋ a bwɛlàbwɛl. Nde kàyoolà ifà u mii a ba,
MAR 9:3 ipfɛy ande byàbulà byà tsɛk tsɛk, anà pɛɛl làmwɛy mpa kan'kwo akà un'yiir mwɛy mutwey.
MAR 9:4 Ɛli kàyàmɛnà anà Mɔsɛ akà ba. Ba bàkayäämà a Yɛsu.
MAR 9:5 Petɔlà kàtɛn a Yɛsu naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, yubwaŋ naa bi ikäl apà. Wɛy bi imbaar ntɛn, ntɛn tär: mwɛy ntɔn ngye, mwɛy ntɔn Mɔsɛ, mwɛy ntɔn Ɛli. »
MAR 9:6 Nde kàyöb anki naa nde nkye utɛɛnà, ntɔn matɛɛr màkyer awal.
MAR 9:7 Un'böŋ mwey kàyafwee wa, ndaa mwɛy yàtoo uboo un'böŋ awà naa: « Awà wà Mwan amɛ wà nkween. Lun'wem! »
MAR 9:8 Ungö apan, bàler ba umbil aba, ba bàsàman anki akà mbuur mwɛy, Yɛsu mpɛl anà ba.
MAR 9:9 Umpal bàyàtyà ba u mɔŋ, nde katsüŋ mukyään itàkal akà mbuur mwɛy ndaa bàmɛn ba, tii mpal usàwiyà Mwan a mbuur uboo a akü.
MAR 9:10 Ba bàkyer akaar nswɛɛŋ ayi, wɛɛ ba bàfuulà ba a ba naa: « Ikaswaŋà aben "ngwiiyà uboo a akü"? »
MAR 9:11 Apan ba bun'fuul naa: « Ntɔn nkye alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn bàfàtɛn ba naa: "Ɛli akyer atwab atàyà"? »
MAR 9:12 Nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Yabwɛy naa Ɛli atàyà muyàfuur indiir byanswà u mbwo. Wɛɛ ntɔn nkye bàsön ba ntɔn Mwan a mbuur naa nde akyɛr aman mpay mbɔɔn, bun'wal asànaa undiir a bunàbun?
MAR 9:13 Wɛɛ mɛ alàkyään naa Ɛli kàkyàyà, baar bun'kyer ndaa yanswà bàkwen ba, asànaa bàsön ya ntɔn nde. »
MAR 9:14 Mpal bàyafurà ba akà alɔŋki, ba bàmɛn un'sɛŋ a baar mbɔɔn apà ba anà alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn bàmusyeelà mbaaŋ anà ba.
MAR 9:15 Pa kàmɛn wa Yɛsu, un'sɛŋ a baar wanswà laa kàbamà wa, waa kàkyeenà ntiin mukun'pà mbɔr.
MAR 9:16 Nde waa kafuul naa: « Ininà bɛ làsyeelà mbaaŋ anà ba? »
MAR 9:17 Baal mwɛy uboo a un'sɛŋ a baar kun'fuur naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, mɛ amatwääl mwan amɛ wàbaal: nde we anà dweelà a nkiin.
MAR 9:18 Ikal kyanswà lun'kaar la, la lun'bwiy u mɛɛn, mwan ugyɔrà an'te, laa ukwoor nde an'din ande, waa ubwà un'sey. Mɛ an'tɛn a alɔŋki angye naa ba bàböŋ la, wɛɛ ba bàsàkal anki anà ngwal. »
MAR 9:19 Nde waa utɛn a ba naa: « Nkööl ikɔ̈ɔ̈n làkwikilà, tii nkye taaŋ mɛ insàkal anà bɛ? Tii mpal nà mɛ in'sàkaŋ mpem ntɔn bɛ? Lan'twääl awà. »
MAR 9:20 Ba waa bun'twääl. Umpal làmɛn dweelà a làbe Yɛsu, la làni mwan a ngwal, mwan kàbü u mɛɛn, waa kàyisilà wàmuyigyɔrà an'te.
MAR 9:21 Yɛsu kàfuul taarànde naa: « Sɛmà taaŋ nà ya ifun'yeel? » Nde waa kàten naa: « Sɛmà imbɛy ande.
MAR 9:22 Mbalà mbɔɔn la làfun'tɔɔm u mbaa anà kan'dà ntɔn mukun'dwa. Wɛɛ, isàkal naa ngye an'kwo mukyer undiir, yà ibay, ntɔn ngyɛb angye akà bi! »
MAR 9:23 Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Isàkal naa ngye an'kwo! ... Indiir byanswà byàŋàkwo akà mbuur awe anà làkwikilà. »
MAR 9:24 Apan sye, taar a mwan kàsi un'kwɛŋ naa: « Mɛ an'sà làkwikilà! Mbay ntɔn an'kɔɔn mɛ làkwikilà! »
MAR 9:25 Yɛsu, abà kàmɛn nde un'sɛŋ a baar wàmuyàkɔ̈ŋ, nde kàswɛŋ dweelà a làbe, waa kàtɛn naa: « Dweelà a nkiin anà ikwan'tsü, mɛ amaswaŋ, too ubɔɔ a mwan wà, twon an'fyefurà! »
MAR 9:26 Dweelà làsi in'kwɛŋ, waa lun'ni a ngwal. Mwan kàbulà asànaa wàŋàkwà, lalan bàmbɔɔn bàteenà ba naa: « Nde kan'kwà. »
MAR 9:27 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kun'tɛ mpi u kɔɔ, kun'mbaar, nde waa kàmbarà.
MAR 9:28 Mpal kàfurà Yɛsu ndwà, alɔŋki ande bun'fuul ukɔl naa: « Wɛɛ bi, ntɔn nkye mpa ikwe bi muböŋ dweelà a làbe alanà? »
MAR 9:29 Nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Dweelà a tub alà làfàtoo u ngyamàkà mpɛl. »
MAR 9:30 Ba bàlwomà apan, waa bàsoonà Ngalilɛ. Yɛsu kàkwen anki naa baar bàyɔ̈b.
MAR 9:31 Ntɔn nde kàlɔɔŋà alɔŋki ande, waa kàtɛɛnà a ba naa: « Mwan a mbuur bàkyer ayun'yälà kàn'kɔɔ a baar, ba bàkyer ayun'dwà, waa ilä itär ungö a ndwääl ande, nde akyer ayàwiyà. »
MAR 9:32 Ba bàyöbà anki ndaa ayin, wɛɛ ba bàweemà bɔɔmà mukun'fuul.
MAR 9:33 Ba bàkyen Kapɛrnawum. Umpal kàkäl nde u ndwà, Yɛsu kàfuul alɔŋki ande naa: « Ininà bɛ làyisyeelà mbaaŋ u mbwo? »
MAR 9:34 Wɛɛ ba bàkäl akul, ntɔn u mbwo, ba bàyisyeelà mbaaŋ ba a ba ntɔn muyöb naa nà awà mbuur a kölàköl.
MAR 9:35 Yɛsu kàkyer abwaay, waa kàbel Bàkwen Aŋiyweel, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Isàkal naa mbuur akwen mukäl wàtàtwɛb, wɛy nde ukäl wàngöngö anà un'syääl a baar banswà. »
MAR 9:36 Apan nde kàwɛl mwan mwɛy, waa kun'si uboboo a ba. Ungö akun'böbà mpi, nde kàtɛn a ba naa:
MAR 9:37 « Mbuur awal mwan asànaa wà kikɔb amɛ, nde kan'wal mɛ ŋakwo: mbuur kàman'wal, kà mɛ anki nde kan'wal, wɛ Mbuur kan'töm. »
MAR 9:38 Ywan waa kàtɛn a Yɛsu naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, bi kàmɛn mbuur mwɛy wàmuböŋ an'dweelà an'be kikɔb angye, wɛɛ bi kàleŋ mukun'tsuŋ mukyer abun ntɔn nde bi kàfilabà anki. »
MAR 9:39 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Twon làmutsuŋ, ntɔn kà we anà mbuur anki kan'kwo mukyer impà kà ikɔb amɛ, waa ungö apan nde ufàtɛn ube ntɔn mɛ.
MAR 9:40 Abun, mbuur mpa afàtɔn bi wà anà bi.
MAR 9:41 Mbuur wanswà asàlapà kɔɔb a an'dà anwà, ntɔn bɛ làbà baar a Klistɔ, mɛ alàkyään ndandaa, bweel ande làsàkyà anki bwà.
MAR 9:42 « Wɛɛ mbuur wanswà asiinà umwɛy uboo a bibaan ban'sà làkwikilà bà akà mɛ mubwà unsà ube, yan'söön ubwaŋ akà nde naa bun'bäm nkà a kölàköl u bway, waa bun'tɔɔm kà ɛwà.
MAR 9:43 Isàkal naa kɔɔ angye làfasyen nkuur unsà ube, tsul la. Ntɔn yan'söön ubwaŋ naa ngye abilà u mɔ̈ɔ̈ kɔɔ làmwɛy, akwànaa ngye mukal amà an'kɔɔ an'mɔ̈ɔ̈l, waa akyà yaaŋ a mbaa mpa làfàdim. [
MAR 9:44 Kwo, "in'swab myàfàkwà anki, mbaa ifàdim anki akà ikikye." ]
MAR 9:45 Isàkal naa làkɔl angye làfasyen nkuur unsà ube, tsul la. Ntɔn yan'söön ubwaŋ naa ngye abilà u mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà too, akwànaa ngye mukal amyà in'kɔl myeel, waa akyà yaaŋ a mbaa. [
MAR 9:46 Kwo, "in'swab myàfàkwà anki, mbaa ifàdim anki akà ikikye." ]
MAR 9:47 Isàkal naa dii angye làfasyen nkuur unsà ube, kwol la. Ntɔn yan'söön ubwaŋ naa ngye abilà imwol a Nzam anà dii làmwɛy, akwànaa ngye mukal amyà mii myeel, waa batɔɔm u yaaŋ a mbaa.
MAR 9:48 Kwo, in'swab myàfàkwà anki, mbaa ifàdim anki akà ikikye.
MAR 9:49 « Abun, mbuur wanswà asàlyaŋ u mbaa, asàwal muŋ ntɔn mupɔŋà.
MAR 9:50 « Muŋ wà undiir aŋàbwaŋ, wɛɛ ntsà awa isàwà, bɛ ya làfuur aben? Làkäl anà muŋ uboo abɛ ŋakwo, làkäl unsà duu uboo amwɛy anà bumwɛy. »
MAR 10:1 Yɛsu kàlwomà nde apan, nde kàkyen itiir a nsi a Yuday, u sim a Yɔrdan lumwɛy. In'sɛŋ a baar myàfàköŋ apà nde, nde kàfalɔɔŋà asànaa nkääl ande.
MAR 10:2 Amfarisi bàsin tsütsü apà nde ntɔn mukun'fuul naa : « Nkye mbwo yàmwo baal muböŋ un'kyay ande. »
MAR 10:3 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Ininà Mɔsɛ kàlaswɛŋ? »
MAR 10:4 Ba bàtɛn naa: « Mɔsɛ kàpɛ mbwo musɔn ukaan a nkaabà anà muböŋ un'kaar. »
MAR 10:5 Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Yà ntɔn bwoor a mpem abɛ waa nde kàlapɛ nswɛɛŋ ayi.
MAR 10:6 Wɛɛ u nsɛmà a nkyeer, Nzam "kakyer baal anà un'kaar".
MAR 10:7 "Lalan baal asàwɛy taarànde anà ngwän, waa usàbääb a un'kyay ande,
MAR 10:8 waa ba bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l bàsabulà ndür mwɛy. Apan, ba bàfàkal anki abɔ̈ɔ̈l, wɛɛ ndür mwɛy.
MAR 10:9 Abun, wɛy mbuur ukɔɔn akaab ayi kàtüüb Nzam." »
MAR 10:10 Mpal bàkäl ba u ndwà, alɔŋki bàfun'fuul ntɔn ndaa ayi.
MAR 10:11 Nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Baal usàwɛy un'kyay ande, usàbääl un'kyay asin, nde kan'tà inswem akà wàtàtwɛb.
MAR 10:12 Isàkal naa un'kaar kan'wɛy un'dim ande, usàwal wàsin, nde wà un'kaar inswem. »
MAR 10:13 Baar bàtwäälà baan ntɔn nde kabä, wɛɛ alɔŋki bàŋän ba.
MAR 10:14 Mpal kàmɛn nde abun, Yɛsu kàmɛn ube, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làwɛy baan bàyi akà mɛ! Twon làmatsuŋ, ntɔn Imwol a Nzam kye a baar abà asànaa ba.
MAR 10:15 Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, mbuur mpà awal Imwol a Nzam asànaa mwan, nde kya usàbilà anki. »
MAR 10:16 Ungö, nde kàbööbà baan, waa kasi an'kɔɔ ntɔn mukasaak.
MAR 10:17 Mpal kàkäl Yɛsu mukyà, mbuur mwɛy kàyi u ntiin, waa kàbü an'köm kusà ande, waa kun'fuul naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ aŋàbwaŋ, mɛ in'kyer aben muwal bweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye? »
MAR 10:18 Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ntɔn nkye aman'bel ngye aŋàbwaŋ? Akà mbuur mwɛy wàŋàbwaŋ watɛy isàkal naa kà Nzam mpɛl anki.
MAR 10:19 Ngye akiyöb in'kɔɔn: "Twon an'dwà, twon an'tà inswem, twon an'yib, twon an'tà imbäl a loor, twon an'kyer mbuur ube, sà làkoo akà taaràŋà anà ngwa." »
MAR 10:20 Mbuur waa kun'fuur naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, ayin yanswà mɛ in'kyer afàlab sɛmà imbɛy amɛ. »
MAR 10:21 Yɛsu kun'ler nde, waa kun'kwen, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Undiir mwɛy mpɛl kàmakɔ̈ɔ̈n: kyen, yälà indiir angye byanswà, pà ngim ya akà aŋàlàmbwà, waa ngye asàwal un'naaŋ u du. Ungö apan, yan'läb. »
MAR 10:22 Wɛɛ u ndaa ayi, nde kàbü mpye, waa kàkyen u ngyɛb mbɔɔn. Ntɔn nde kàkäl anà indiir mbɔɔn.
MAR 10:23 Yɛsu kàler umbil ande, waa kàtɛn a alɔŋki ande naa: « Yà mpay mbɔɔn akà aŋin'naaŋ mubilà kà Imwol a Nzam! »
MAR 10:24 Alɔŋki bàmɛn mpay ntɔn ndaa ande. Wɛɛ Yɛsu kàfàtɛn a ba naa: « Baan amɛ, yà mpay mbɔɔn mubilà kà Imwol a Nzam!
MAR 10:25 Mpay yatɛy mbɔɔn akà mpoonà mubilà u mun a nsway akwànaa ŋun'naaŋ mubilà kà Imwol a Nzam. »
MAR 10:26 Ba bakyer abem mbɔɔn, waa bàtɛɛnà ba a ba naa: « Abun, nà kan'kwo muwà mɔ̈ɔ̈? »
MAR 10:27 Yɛsu kaler, waa kàtɛn naa: « Ya ikwe anki akà baar, wɛɛ akà Nzam yanswà ikyer afàkwo. »
MAR 10:28 Petɔlà kàsɛmà mutɛn a nde naa: « Le bi, bi kàkyàwɛy indiir byanswà ntɔn mulab ngye. »
MAR 10:29 Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, isàkal naa mbuur an'sàwɛy ndwà, atɔŋ abaal, atɔŋ akaar, ngwän, taarànde, baan, an'ywaŋ ntɔn mɛ anà ntɔn Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ,
MAR 10:30 nde asàwal mbalà nkam aŋàsöönà u paŋà alà, ndwà, atɔŋ abaal, atɔŋ akaar, ngwän, baan, an'ywaŋ, - anà nkwaaŋ - anà u paŋà làyà, mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye.
MAR 10:31 Lalan, bàtàtwɛb mbɔɔn bàsàkal bàngöngö, bàngöngö bàsàkal bàtàtwɛb. »
MAR 10:32 Ba bàkäl u mbwo mubeenà Yɛlusàlɛm. Yɛsu kàyikyeenà kusà a ba. Ba bàkäl mutɛɛr, baar bàyun'labà bàkal u bɔɔmà. Apan nde kàfàwal Bàkwem Aŋiyweel anà nde, waa kàsɛmà mukakyään ndaa ayà ikun'bweel:
MAR 10:33 « Le, bi iwàmubeenà Yɛlusàlɛm, akun Mwan a mbuur bàkyer akun'yälà akà amfum angaŋ anà akà alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn. Ba bàkun'tsüül mbar a ukwà, waa bàkun'yälà kan'kɔɔ a baar mpa abà Ayudà,
MAR 10:34 bàkyer akun'sɛ, bàkyer akun'tsul an'te, bàkyer akun'kam an'füm anà bàkyer akun'dwa, wɛɛ ungö a ilä itär, nde akyer asàwiyà. »
MAR 10:35 Apan, Zyak anà Ywan, baan a Zebeday, bàkyen tsütsü apà Yɛsu, waa bàtɛn a nde naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, bi ikwen naa ngye akyer ntɔn bi undiir kalɔ̈ɔ̈m bi. »
MAR 10:36 Nde waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ininà bɛ làkwen naa mɛ in'kyer ntɔn bɛ? »
MAR 10:37 Ba bun'fuur naa: « Ipɛ mbwo bi mubwaay u làkoo angye, umwɛy u kɔɔ angye là ibaal, wumwɛy u kɔɔ angye là ikaar. »
MAR 10:38 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Bɛ làyöbà anki undiir làlɔɔmà bɛ. Nkye bɛ làn'kwo munwà kɔɔb a mpay in'yànwà mɛ, itàkal naa muwal ndüümà ayin'yàwal mɛ? »
MAR 10:39 Ba bàtɛn a nde naa: « Bi kan'kwo. » Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Kɔɔb in'yànwà mɛ, bɛ làkyer ayànwà la, ndüümà in'wal mɛ, bɛ làkyer ayàwal ya.
MAR 10:40 Wɛɛ mubwaay u kɔɔ amɛ là ibaal itàkal là ikaar, kà mɛ anki an'kwo mupà: ikal abi byà ntɔn baar kàlɔ̈ɔ̈n Nzam bya. »
MAR 10:41 Bàkwen bumwɛy bàwem ba ndaa ayin, ba bàmɛn Zyak anà Ywan ube.
MAR 10:42 Apan Yɛsu kabel, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Bɛ, bɛ làkyàyöb naa baar bàfàmɛnà asànaa amfum a in'sɛŋ bàfasà ungyɛl a in'kɔl aba, baar an'köl an'köl bàfàswaŋ ba ikɔ̈b aba.
MAR 10:43 Ya ikwe anki mukal abwɛy uboo abɛ. Wɛɛ isàkal naa mbuur akwen mukal wàkölàköl uboo abɛ, wɛy nde ukäl un'syääl abɛ,
MAR 10:44 mbuur wanswà akwen mukal wàtàtwɛb uboo abɛ, nde akal un'sɔ a baar banswà.
MAR 10:45 Lalan Mwan a mbuur kàyi anki ntɔn bun'syääl, wɛɛ nde kàyi ntɔn musyääl anà mupà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande asànaa nkwiy ntɔn baar mbɔɔn. »
MAR 10:46 Ba bàtöl Yɛlikɔ. Umpal kàkäl Yɛsu mutoo u bul alan anà alɔŋki ande anà un'sɛŋ a baar mbɔɔn, ikwàmii Bartimɛ, mwan baal a Timɛ, kàkäl aŋàbwaay ukɔl a mbwo mulɔɔmà.
MAR 10:47 Mpal kàwem nde naa awɛy Yɛsu un'nsi Nasàlɛr kàkäl, nde kàsɛmà mukuub in'kwɛŋ: « Mwan a David, Yɛsu, nsyääm! »
MAR 10:48 Bàmbɔɔn bun'swɛŋà naa nde ukäl akul, wɛɛ nde kàsöönà mulaal: « Mwan a David, nsyääm! »
MAR 10:49 Yɛsu waa kàmbär, waa kàtɛn naa: « Lun'bel! » Ba bàbel ikwàmii, waa bàtɛn a nde naa: « Wal ibaal, mbarà, nde kàmabel. »
MAR 10:50 Apàn, nde kàpiy kàzak ande, waa kàmbarà, kàparà ntiin mukyà akà Yɛsu.
MAR 10:51 Yɛsu kun'fuul naa: « Ininà ngye akwen mɛ mukyer ntɔn ngye? » Ikwàmii kun'fuur naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, wɛy mɛ in'fàman! »
MAR 10:52 Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Kyen, làkwikilà angye làmatswà mɔ̈ɔ̈. » Apan sye nde waa kàfàman, waa kàyilabà Yɛsu u mbwo.
MAR 11:1 Mpal bàtɔ̈l ba tsütsü a Yɛlusàlɛm, tsütsü a Bɛtfagɛ anà Bɛtani, mper a mɔŋ a In'te a Ɔlive, Yɛsu kàtöm abööl uboo alɔŋki ande,
MAR 11:2 waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làkyen u bul lanà kusà a bɛ: Pa làkàbilà bɛ uboo a la, bɛ làkàman mwan a ntsür bàfàbel naa anɛs, udu awa mbuur ŋàtàlaar anki. Làtsuuŋ wa, lan'twääl awà.
MAR 11:3 Isàkal naa mbuur kan'tɛn a bɛ naa: "Ntɔn nkye làkyerà bɛ abun?" Lun'fuur naa: "Mwol we anà mfun a wa, waa làgyägyä nde ayàfuur wa apà." »
MAR 11:4 Apan, ba waa bàkyen, waa bàmɛn mwan anɛ wàŋàbäm u nsà tsütsü a munàmbwo, u balàbal. Ba bàtsuuŋ wa.
MAR 11:5 Baar amwɛy bàkäl paa bafuul naa: « Ntɔn nkye làtsuuŋà bɛ mwan anɛ? »
MAR 11:6 Ba bafuur asànaa kàtɛn Yɛsu, ba waa bawɛy musyen wa.
MAR 11:7 Ba bàsyen mwan anɛ akà Yɛsu, waa bàyeel ipfɛy aba udu a wa, Yɛsu waa kàbwaay udu a wa.
MAR 11:8 Baar mbɔɔn bàyeel ipfɛy aba u mbwo, bumwɛy ibwiy a nkay bàtsüülà ba kan'ywaŋ.
MAR 11:9 Baar bàyikyeenà kusà anà baar bàyilabà bàkäl muyisà in'kwɛŋ naa: « Ɔsana! Nsaak ikäl akà mbuur ayà kikɔb a Mwol!
MAR 11:10 Nsaak ikal kà imwol kyan'yà, imwol a taaràbi David! Ɔsana kà ikal a dudu! »
MAR 11:11 Yɛsu kàkyen Yɛlusàlɛm, waa kàbilà u ndwà a Nzam. Ungö muler indiir byanswà byàkäl apà nde, taaŋ sye làkäl làŋàkyà, waa kàtoo, kàkyen Bɛtani anà Bàkwem Aŋiyweel.
MAR 11:12 Taaŋtyà, umpal bàtoo ba u Bɛtani, Yɛsu kàwen ngyal.
MAR 11:13 Apan waa kàtääl un'te a an'fige kàkäl anà nkay, nde kàkàler wa naa nkye nde akyàman undiir mwɛy. Wɛɛ mpal kàsin nde tsütsü, nde kàmɛn nkay mpɛl, ntɔn la làkäl anki paŋà a an'fige.
MAR 11:14 Lalan kàtɛn nde a wa naa: « Wɛy mbuur mwɛy ukɔɔn asàdyà imbɛŋ angye akà ikikye! » Alɔŋki ande waa bàwem.
MAR 11:15 Ba bàtöl Yɛlusàlɛm. Yɛsu kàbilà u ndwà a Nzam, waa kàsɛmà muböŋ baar bàyäälà anà bàsöömà u ndwà a Nzam: nde kàbuum mɛsà a agyɛɛŋ a ngim anà an'kir a ayääl a nkokà,
MAR 11:16 nde kàwɛy anki akà mbuur mwɛy mulyaaŋ anà undiir u ndwà a Nzam.
MAR 11:17 Nde kàlɔɔŋà, waa kàtɛɛnà a ba naa: « Nkye bàsön anki naa: "Ndwà amɛ bàsabeelà ndwà a ngyamàkà ntɔn in'sɛŋ myanswà"? Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ ya làkyàbuul mboo a mbüüb! »
MAR 11:18 Amfum a angaŋ anà alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn bàwem ba ndaa ayin, ba bàleŋà mbwo mukun'dwa. Ntɔn ba bun'weemà bɔɔmà, ntɔn an'lɔɔŋ ande màtü un'sɛŋ a baar.
MAR 11:19 Mpal làbü sisye, Yɛsu anà alɔŋki ande waa bàtoo u bul a kölàköl.
MAR 11:20 Mpal bàkal ba mulyaaŋ u tutu, ba bàmɛn un'te a an'fige wàŋàyɔm tii kà in'swɛy awa.
MAR 11:21 Petɔlà kàyɔbà nde, laa kàtɛn nde naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, ler, un'te a an'fige akwà kàküül ngye kan'yɔm wanswà. »
MAR 11:22 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Làkäl anà làkwikilà akà Nzam.
MAR 11:23 Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, isàkal naa mbuur kan'tɛn a mɔŋ wà naa: "Lwomà apan, kyen kàbü u ngyäl", ukɔɔn asà nkyɛɛr u mpem ande, wɛɛ nde usi làkwikilà naa ndaa kan'tɛn nde ikyer akwo, ya sye laa isàkwo ya ntɔn nde.
MAR 11:24 Lalan mɛ alàkyään naa: indiir byanswà làlɔm bɛ unsà ngyamàkà, làkäl anà làkwikilà naa bɛ bya lan'wal, bya byàbɛ.
MAR 11:25 Umpal làwà bɛ umbäär u ngyamàkà, isàkal naa bɛ làwe anà nkir a mbuur, lun'dwääl nkul, waa Taaràbɛ awà u du uyàladwääl sye nkul a ibii abɛ. [
MAR 11:26 Wɛɛ bɛ làsàkɔɔn adwääl nkul a ibii, Taaràbɛ awà u du uyàladwääl anki sye nkul a ibii abɛ. ] »
MAR 11:27 Ba ban'yàfurà Yɛlusàlɛm. Umpal kàkäl Yɛsu muyiyoolà uboo a ndwà a Nzam, amfum a angaŋ, alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn anà andweer bàyàsin apà nde,
MAR 11:28 waa bàtɛn a nde naa: « Unsà ikɔ̈b nà akyerà ngye indiir abi? Itàkal naa nà kapɛ ikɔ̈b mukyer bya? »
MAR 11:29 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mɛ alàsà mfuul mwɛy mpɛl, lan'fuur, waa mɛ in'yàtɛn a bɛ naa unsà ikɔ̈b nà mɛ in'kyerà indiir abi.
MAR 11:30 Nkye ndüümà a Ywan yàfü du lɛɛ akà baar? Lan'fuur! »
MAR 11:31 Ba bàyweerà ba a ba naa: « Kya bi isàtɛn naa: "U du", nde ayifuul naa: "Ntɔn nkye mpa lun'si bɛ làkwikilà?"
MAR 11:32 Wɛɛ, nkye bi itɛn naa: "Akà baar"...? - Ba bàtiinà un'sɛŋ a baar bɔɔmà, ntɔn ba banswà bàsii naa Ywan kàkäl ŋangɔɔm ndandaa. »
MAR 11:33 Lalan bàfuur ba akà Yɛsu naa: « Bi iyöb anki. » Apan Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mɛ sye alàkyään anki unsà ikɔ̈b nà mɛ in'kyerà indiir abi. »
MAR 12:1 Apan Yɛsu kàsɛmà muyääm a ba unsà nsim naa: « Mbuur mwɛy kàkön ywaŋ a vin. Nde kàdiŋà la a làpaŋ. Nde kàtöŋ ikal mukaam mbɛŋ anà ndwà a ikyɛɛŋ. Ungö apan nde kàpɛ la akà baar musyääl a la, waa kàkyen.
MAR 12:2 Utaaŋ mubwo, nde kàtöm un'syääl ande mwɛy akà baar bàfàkyer vin ntɔn muwal akà ba kab a isaa lànde.
MAR 12:3 Baar abà bàtɛ un'syääl awà mpi, bun'düb, waa bun'fuur an'kɔɔ ipɔl.
MAR 12:4 Nde kàfatööm un'syääl asin. Awà sye, ba bun'düb kun'tswe, waa bun'tö.
MAR 12:5 Nde kàtöm wàsin, wawun sye ba bàkyer un'dwà, anà bàsin sye mbɔɔn: bumwɛy bàkyer adüb, bumwɛy bàkyer adwa.
MAR 12:6 Nde kàsàsal awà nà mwan ande mwɛy mpɛl wà nkween. Nde kun'töm ungöngö, waa kàtɛn naa: "Ba bàyàkàkömà mwan amɛ."
MAR 12:7 Wɛɛ baar bàfàkyer vin bàtɛn ba a ba naa: "Le ikyee ande. Làyi bi kun'dwä, waa ywaŋ làyàkal làbi!"
MAR 12:8 Apan, ba bun'tɛ mpi, bun'dwä, waa bun'tɔɔm unsà a ywaŋ a vin. »
MAR 12:9 « Apan ŋàywaŋ asàkyer aben? Nde akyer asàyà, akyɛr asàswaŋ baar mukadwa, waa usàpà ywaŋ akà baar asin.
MAR 12:10 Nkye bɛ làtäŋ anki itiir a ndaa ki uboo a Ndaa Aŋàsɔn: "Nkɔŋ bàpiy atööŋ, yàkyàbulà nkɔŋ a twɛrà.
MAR 12:11 Ayi ndaa yàfü akà Mwol: ya yà ndaa ubem u mii a bi!" »
MAR 12:12 Ba bàleŋà ipöl mukun'kɔr, wɛɛ ba bàtiinà un'seŋ bɔɔmà. Ba bàkyer ayɔ̈b naa nde nsim ayi kàtɛ ntɔn ba. Apan ba bàsun'wɛy, waa bàkyen.
MAR 12:13 Ungö apan, ba bun'tööm Amfarisi amwɛy anà baar a Ɛlɔdi ntɔn ba bun'lwɛb ndaa u mbwo a ntɛɛn ande ŋakwo.
MAR 12:14 Ba bàyàtɛn a nde naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, bi ikyàyöb naa ngye awà swalaa anà ngye afàlab anki ukwen a mbuur mwɛy: ngye afàler anki ntabwey a baar, wɛɛ ngye afàlɔŋ mbwo a Nzam unsà ndandaa. Nkye bàkyàpà mbwo, lɛɛ tɛy, mufur itɛr akà Sɛzar? Nkye bi ikyer afur lɛɛ ifur anki? »
MAR 12:15 Wɛɛ nde, abà kàyöb nde mpem yweel aba, nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ntɔn nkye làman'lwab bɛ? Lan'twääl itɛr a ngim, mɛ in'kwen muman kya. »
MAR 12:16 Ba bun'twääl imwɛy. Yɛsu waa kafuul naa: « Ntabwey anà ikɔb ki udu akya byà nà? » Ba bàfuur naa: « Byà Sɛzar. »
MAR 12:17 Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làpɛ indiir a Sɛzar akà Sɛzar, indiir a Nzam akà Nzam. » Ba bàkyer abemà ntɔn nde.
MAR 12:18 Asadusu amwɛy ban'yà akà Yɛsu. Baar abà bàfàtɛn naa akü bàfàwiyà anki. Ba bun'fuulà abà:
MAR 12:19 « Un'lɔɔŋ, Mɔsɛ kàsɔn abà ntɔn bi: "Isàkal naa baal mwɛy un'tɔŋ ande kan'kwà, kan'sàwɛy un'kaar, ukɔɔn awɛy baan, wɛy nde ubääl un'kweel un'dim awà ntɔn mupà un'tɔŋ ande mbɛŋ."
MAR 12:20 Bàkäl anà atɔŋ nsambwaar. Wàtàtwɛb kàkyer abääl, waa kàkü ukɔɔn asàwɛy mwan.
MAR 12:21 Wàyweel kàbääl un'kaar awun, waa kàkü ukɔɔn asàwɛy mwan. Wàtär sye abun,
MAR 12:22 ba bànsambwaar bàsàwɛy anki akà mwan mwɛy. Ungö a ba bànswà, un'kaar sye waa kàkü.
MAR 12:23 U ngwiiyà, mpal bàsàwiyà akü, nde asàkal un'kyay a nà uboo a ba? Ntɔn ba bànsambwaar bàkyer un'bääl! »
MAR 12:24 Yɛsu kakyään naa: « Ntɔn bɛ làyöb anki Ndaa Aŋàsɔn, itàkal ngwal a Nzam, waa bɛ lan'diimà mbwo, kabwɛy anki?
MAR 12:25 Abun, mpal bàsàwiyà baar uboo a akü, ba bàsàbääl anki akyay, itàkal adim, wɛɛ ba bàsàkal asànaa akyeey u du.
MAR 12:26 Ntɔn ngwiiyà a akü, nkye bɛ làtäŋ anki, uboo a un'kaan a Mɔsɛ, unsà nsim a ibwiy a mbaa, ndaa kàtɛn Nzam a nde naa: "Mɛ in'wà Nzam a Abàlam, Nzam a Izak anà Nzam a Yakɔb."
MAR 12:27 Nde kà wà Nzam a akü anki, wɛɛ wà baar a mɔ̈ɔ̈. Bɛ làkadiimà mbwo mbɔɔn. »
MAR 12:28 Un'lɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn mwɛy awà kàwem nsyeel a mbaaŋ aba, kàkyer ayöb naa Yɛsu kafuur ubwaŋ, laa kàsin nde, waa kun'fuul naa: « Un'kɔɔn nà wàtàtwɛb unsà in'kɔɔn myanswà? »
MAR 12:29 Yɛsu kàfuur naa: « Wàtàtwɛb awà: "Isàlɛl, wem, Mwol Nzam abi, Mwol wà mwɛy,
MAR 12:30 ngye ayàkwen Mwol Nzam angye unsà mpem angye yanswà, unsà mɔ̈ɔ̈ angye wanswà, unsà an'kyän angye manswà anà unsà ngwal angye yanswà."
MAR 12:31 Wàyweel awà: "Ngye ayàkwen un'tɔŋ angye asànaa ngye ŋakwo." In'kɔɔn asin myatɛy myasöön ami. »
MAR 12:32 Un'lɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn kàfàtɛn naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, ngye an'tɛn ndandaa: Nde wà nde mpɛl, wàsin watɛy,
MAR 12:33 waa, mukun'kwen u mpem ande yanswà, kun'yɛnà ande wanswà, u ngwal ande yanswà, anà mukwen un'tɔŋ ande asànaa nde ŋakwo, yan'söön ibɔɔn byanswà anà an'kab. »
MAR 12:34 Yɛsu kàmɛn nde naa nde kan'fuur a un'yɛnà, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ngye kwel watɛy anà Imwol a Nzam. » Ungö apan, akà mbuur mwɛy kàfun'sà anki mfuul.
MAR 12:35 Apan, Yɛsu kàlɔɔŋà u ndwà a Nzam, waa kàtɛɛnà naa: « Ya ye aben naa alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn ban'kwo mutɛn naa Klistɔ wà mwan a David?
MAR 12:36 David ŋakwo kàtɛn u ngwal a Dwɛɛl In'kyɛɛl naa: "Mwol kàtɛn a mwol amɛ naa: Bwaay u kɔɔ amɛ là ibaal, tii mpal in'sàsà mɛ ayiiŋ angye u ngyɛl in'kɔl angye."
MAR 12:37 David ŋakwo kun'bel Mwol, apan nde mwan ande wà aben? » Un'sɛŋ a baar mbɔɔn kun'weemà unsà un'sak.
MAR 12:38 Unsà an'lɔɔŋ ande, nde kàtɛɛnà naa: « Làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ ntɔn alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn: ba bàfàkwen muyilyaaŋ anà mvwɛl, naa bapɛ mbɔr kà ikal a nköŋ,
MAR 12:39 bàfàsɔɔl an'kir amà kusà uboo a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà anà ikal atàtwɛb kà in'kyɔm.
MAR 12:40 Ba bàfàduum indiir a akweel adim, taaŋ nsil alan ba bàfasà ngyamàkà a bwɛlàbwɛl. Nsaŋ aba isàkal yà kölàköl! »
MAR 12:41 Apan Yɛsu kàbwaay kusà a insak a an'kab, waa kàlerà naa baar bàkàsaa aben ngim uboo a kya. Aŋin'naaŋ bàmbɔɔn bàsye mbɔɔn.
MAR 12:42 Un'kweel a un'dim wàŋàlàmbwà waa kàyi, waa kàsi bitɛr a ngim ibyeel, byàsànten.
MAR 12:43 Yɛsu kàbel alɔŋki ande, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, un'kweel a un'dim wàŋàlàmbwà wà kàn'sà yàŋàsöön baar banswà bàsaa uboo a insak.
MAR 12:44 Ntɔn baar banswà ban'pà ngim ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ndöŋ akà ba. Wɛɛ nde, nde kan'wal unsà làmbwà ande ntɔn mupà yinà yanswà kàkäl nde ayà ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande. »
MAR 13:1 Umpal kàkäl Yɛsu mutoo u ndwà a Nzam, umwɛy uboo a alɔŋki ande kàtɛn a nde naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, le! In'kul nà myàkölàköl, ndwà nà yàkölàköl! »
MAR 13:2 Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ngye akimanà ndwà a kölàköl yi! Akà nkɔŋ mwɛy ifàsàsal anki udu a nkɔŋ yumwɛy. Ya yanswà ikyer asàbwabà. »
MAR 13:3 Yɛsu kàkäl aŋàbwaay u mɔŋ a in'te a ɔlive, kusà a ndwà a Nzam. Petɔlà, Zyak, Ywan anà Andrɛ bun'fuulà ukɔl naa:
MAR 13:4 « Isam, mpal nà ndaa ayi isàyà, idiim nà isàswaŋ naa indiir abi byanswà ikyer asàkwo. »
MAR 13:5 Apan, Yɛsu kàsɛmà mutɛn a ba naa: « Làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ, mbuur twon amàlakur.
MAR 13:6 Ntɔn baar mbɔɔn bàsàyà kà ikɔb amɛ, waa bàsàtɛn naa: "Wà mɛ", waa ba bàsàkur baar mbɔɔn.
MAR 13:7 Mpal làsàwem bɛ làsaŋ a ità anà in'bää a ità, twon lan'man bɔɔmà: yubwaŋ naa bya itàyà, wɛɛ bya kà isàkal ntsüü anki.
MAR 13:8 Ntɔn un'sɛŋ mwɛy asànwaan a un'sɛŋ wumwɛy, imwol mwɛy a imwol kyumwɛy, kà ikal imwɛy imwɛy, mɛɛn ikyer asàtɛɛr, ngyal ikyer asàkal. Indiir abi byanswà byà nsɛmà a in'swaŋ.
MAR 13:9 Làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ. Bàkyer asàlayälà u mbay a nsaŋ anà u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà, basàlakam iki, bɛ làsàkàsà in'lɔn kusà a amfum a itiir a mɛɛn anà kusà a amfum a nsi ntɔn mɛ: kya isàkal imbäl ntɔn ba.
MAR 13:10 Ntɔn Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ bàkyer atàkyään la akà in'sɛŋ myanswà.
MAR 13:11 Mpal bàsàlasyen ntɔn mukàlayälà, twon lan'kyɛɛr kusà naa bɛ nkye làyàkàtɛn, wɛɛ ya bàsàlapà utaaŋ alan, làtɛn ya. Ntɔn kà bɛ anki làsàtwey mun, wɛɛ Dweelà Inkyɛɛl.
MAR 13:12 Un'tɔŋ asàyälà un'tɔŋ ande ntɔn bun'dwä, taa asàyälà mwan ande, baan bàsàbɛy aböör aba, waa bàsatsüül ukwà.
MAR 13:13 Baar banswà bàkyer asàlayiiŋ ntɔn ikɔb amɛ. Wɛɛ mbuur asàkaŋ mpem tii u ntsüü, asàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
MAR 13:14 « Mpal làsàman bɛ lingyoomà aŋàdiir lan'bwaay kà ikal mpa lan'kwo la mukal, - wɛy mbuur akataŋà uyöb! Apan, wɛy baar bàsàkal u Yuday, bàtiin uboo a myɔŋ,
MAR 13:15 wɛy mbuur asàkal udu a mpaan a ndwà, ukɔɔn asàtɔlà ntɔn muwal undiir u ndwà ande,
MAR 13:16 wɛy mbuur asàkal u ywaŋ, ukɔɔn afurà ndwà ntɔn mukàwal ipfɛy ande.
MAR 13:17 Ngyɛb akà akaar bàsàkal anà an'yöm anà akakaar bàsànüü ilä abin!
MAR 13:18 Làyamà naa ndaa ayi ikɔ̈ɔ̈n asàyà u paŋà a làbe!
MAR 13:19 Ntɔn, ilä abin isàkal ilä a mpay aŋàdiir mpa aŋàtàman fà nsɛmà a mɛɛn kàkyer Nzam tii papanà, anà ya ifàsàkal anki akà ikikye.
MAR 13:20 Yàlàkal naa Mwol ukɔɔn atyey ilä abi, akà mbuur mwɛy mɔ̈ɔ̈ kàlàwà anki. Wɛɛ, ntɔn baar kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l nde, nde kàtyey ilà abi.
MAR 13:21 Abun, isàkal naa mbuur kan'tɛn a bɛ naa: "Le, Klistɔ awà kà!" Itàkal naa: "Le, awunà kunà!", twon làmukyey.
MAR 13:22 Ntɔn Aklistɔ a loor anà aŋangɔɔm a loor bàkyer asàtoo, waa bàsàkyer idiim anà impà ntɔn mukur, itàkal sye baar aŋàsɔɔl, kya mbwo isàkal.
MAR 13:23 Abun bɛ, bɛ làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ! Indiir abi byanswà mɛ kàkyàlaweey kusà.
MAR 13:24 « Wɛɛ kà ilä abin, ungö a mpay aŋàdiir ayin, taaŋ làsàbwà làpib, nsöŋ ufàsàpà anki kyɛɛy awa,
MAR 13:25 mbwaar isàfà du waa isàbwà, ngwal a du ikyer asàni.
MAR 13:26 Apan ba bàsàman Mwan a mbuur wàmuyà uboo a un'böŋ unsà ngwal mbɔɔn anà làkoo.
MAR 13:27 Apan nde asàtɔm akyeey anà asàböbà baar kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l nde kà an'twɛrà man'nà, fà nswɛŋ a mɛɛn tii u nswɛŋ a du.
MAR 13:28 « Làyöb lwɛŋ lan'fà uboo a nsim a un'te a fige: an'kɔkà màsàbulà bɔɔlàbɔɔl, nkay isàfulà, bɛ lan'yöb naa un'tye wà tsütsü.
MAR 13:29 Asànaa bɛ sye, mpal làsàman bɛ indiir abi byan'yà, làyöb naa Mwan a mbuur wà tsütsü u munàmbwo.
MAR 13:30 Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään: nkööl ayi isàlyaŋ anki kusà ndaa ayi yanswà mukwo.
MAR 13:31 Du anà mɛɛn màkyer asàlyaaŋ, wɛɛ ndaa amɛ isàlyaaŋ anki akà ikikye.
MAR 13:32 « Wɛɛ ilä kya itàkal taaŋ la, akà mbuur mwɛy uyöb anki bya, itàkal akyeey a du, itàkal Mwan, akà mbuur mwɛy, nà Taa mpɛl.
MAR 13:33 Làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ, làduub mii abɛ, ntɔn bɛ làyöb anki mpal nà ya isàkwo.
MAR 13:34 Ya isàkal asànaa mbuur mwɛy kan'kàlyaaŋ: nde an'sàwɛy ndwà ande, an'sàpà ikɔ̈b akà asyääl ande, mbuur mbuur anà isal ande, waa uswaŋ un'kyɛɛŋ a munàmbwo muduub mii.
MAR 13:35 Lalan, làduub mii, ntɔn bɛ làyöb anki mpal usàyà nkum a ndwà, làsisye lɛɛ u mpöŋàmpöŋ, u mbeel a nkɔ lɛɛ u tutu,
MAR 13:36 manà nde uyà kà imbürà, waa kàlaman bàŋàbɔ̈ɔ̈n.
MAR 13:37 Ndaa in'tɛɛnà mɛ yi a bɛ, mɛ in'tɛɛnà a baar banswà: Làduub mii! »
MAR 14:1 Byàsäl ilä ibyeel Pak anà un'kyɔm a mampà ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ful mukwo, amfum a angaŋ anà alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn bàleŋà impeenà mukɔr Yɛsu, waa bun'dwa.
MAR 14:2 Ntɔn ba bàtɛɛnà naa: « Kà uboo a un'kyɔm anki, manà lingyoomà layàbilà uboo a un'sɛŋ. »
MAR 14:3 Yɛsu kàkäl u Bɛtani u ndwà a Simɔn ŋabay, mpal kàkäl nde u mɛsà mudyà, un'kaar mwɛy kàyi anà làbuuŋ aŋàyɔl a may a usɔŋ a ndandaa màntal mbɔɔn. Nde kàduub la, waa kun'tsüül udu a un'tswe.
MAR 14:4 Baar bumwɛy bàkäl paa bàmɛn ube, waa bàtɛɛnà ba a ba naa: « Ntɔn nkye mubi may a usɔŋ amà abà?
MAR 14:5 Yàlàbwaŋ naa bàyälà ma màŋàsɔ̈ɔ̈nà nkam tär yà itɛr a ngim, waa bàlàpà aŋàlàmbwà! » Ba bàpɛlà un'kaar awà.
MAR 14:6 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Lun'si a duu. Ntɔn nkye lun'paa bɛ mpay? Nde kan'kyer undiir aŋàbwaŋ akà mɛ.
MAR 14:7 Ntɔn aŋàlàmbwà bɛ làbà anà ba taaŋ lanswà, bɛ lan'kwo mukakyer ubwaŋ mpal làkwen bɛ, wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ anà bɛ watɛy taaŋ lanswà.
MAR 14:8 Undiir kàkwen nde mukyer, nde kan'kyer wa: kusà nde kan'tsuul ndür amɛ may a usɔŋ ntɔn ndyee aya.
MAR 14:9 Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, ntsü yanswà bàsàpay Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ, u mɛɛn manswà, bàsataa ndaa kan'kyer un'kaar wà ntɔn muyɔbà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande. »
MAR 14:10 Yudas Iskaryɔt, umwɛy uboo a alɔŋki Kwem Aŋiyweel, kàkyen akà amfum a angaŋ ntɔn mukàyàlà Yɛsu.
MAR 14:11 Ba bàkäl kà un'sak ntɔn làsaŋ alan. Ba bàdirà mukun'pà ngim. Apan nde kàleŋà ipöl aŋàbwaŋ mukun'yälà.
MAR 14:12 Ilä atàtwɛb kyà mampà ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ful, ilä bàfàdwa in'tö a in'kɔk ntɔn isaa a Pak, alɔŋki a Yɛsu ban'tɛn a nde naa: « Ikal nà ngye akwen bi ikàyilà ntɔn ngye akàdyà Pak? »
MAR 14:13 Apan Yɛsu kàtöm alɔŋki ande bɔ̈ɔ̈l, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làkyen u bul a kölàköl, bɛ làkàman baal mwɛy we anà làbuuŋ a an'dà ayàmɛɛn anà bɛ, lun'läb.
MAR 14:14 Ikal kyanswà ukàbilà nde, làtɛn akà ŋàndwà naa: "Un'lɔɔŋ kan'tɛn naa: Làken suk in'dyà mɛ Pak anà alɔŋki amɛ?"
MAR 14:15 Nde akàlaswaŋ suk a du làkölàköl làŋakwo anà indiir byanswà. Ngiil ntɔn bi, bɛ làkàkyer kwo. »
MAR 14:16 Alɔŋki bàkyen ba, bàtɔ̈l ba u bul a kölàköl, ba bàmɛn asànaa kàtɛn nde a ba, waa bàyöŋà Pak.
MAR 14:17 Mpal làbü sisye, Yɛsu kàyi anà Bàkwem Aŋiyweel.
MAR 14:18 Umpal bàkäl ba u mɛsà bàmudyà, nde kàtɛn naa: « Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, umwɛy uboo a bɛ awàmudyà anà mɛ, akyer ayan'yälà. »
MAR 14:19 Alɔŋki bàmɛn ngyɛb mbɔɔn, waa bàsɛmà mukun'fuul umwɛy umwɛy: « Nkye an'kwo ikäl mɛ? »
MAR 14:20 Nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Umwɛy uboo a Bàkwem Aŋiyweel, kan'dümà kɔɔ ande mbwo mwɛy anà mɛ uboo làlɔŋà.
MAR 14:21 Ntɔn Mwan a mbuur akyer akyà asànaa bàsön ya ntɔn nde, wɛɛ ngyɛb akà mbuur ban'yälà Mwan a mbuur u mbwo a nde! Yàlàkal ubwaŋ mbɔɔn akà nde naa bàkɔɔn un'bɔr! »
MAR 14:22 Utaaŋ adyà, Yɛsu kàwɛl mampà, ungö musaak ma, nde kàtsül ma, waa kapɛ, waa kàtɛn naa: « Làwɛl, ayi yà ndür amɛ. »
MAR 14:23 Waa kàwɛl kɔɔb, ungö mufuur an'tɔɔn, nde kapɛ la, waa ba banswà bànü unsà la.
MAR 14:24 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Amà an'kil amɛ, an'kil a nkwà màtyaŋà ntɔn bàmbɔɔn.
MAR 14:25 Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään: mɛ in'fàsànwà anki akà ikikye vin tii ilä in'sànwà mɛ vin akün kà imwol a Nzam. »
MAR 14:26 Ungö mutɔɔl an'diim, ba bàtoo ntɔn mukyà mɔŋ a in'te a Ɔlive.
MAR 14:27 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Bɛ, bɛ banswà làkyer asan'kɔɔb, ntɔn bàsön naa: "Mɛ in'sàdwa un'kyɛɛŋ, waa in'kɔk isàtà upay."
MAR 14:28 Wɛɛ mɛ, ungö a ngwiiyà, mɛ in'sàfweel kusà a bɛ u Ngalilɛ. »
MAR 14:29 Petɔlà kàtɛn a nde naa: « Itàkal naa baar banswà bàmakɔɔb, wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ in'sakɔɔb anki. »
MAR 14:30 Yɛsu waa utɛn a nde naa: « Ndandaa mɛ akyään: ŋàbawà, mpib nsil ayi, kusà nkɔɔ mubel mbalà yweel, ngye, ngye ayan'tɔn mbalà tär. »
MAR 14:31 Wɛɛ nde, nde kàfàfuur a ngwal: « Mɛ, itàkal naa mɛ in'kyer akwà anà ngye, aay, mɛ ngye in'satɔn tɛy. » Ba banswà bàkäl mun mwɛy wa.
MAR 14:32 Apan ba bàyàkɔlà kà ikal mwɛy bàfàbel naa Ngɛtɛsɛmani, Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a alɔŋki ande naa: « Sàlàbwaay pà, umpal in'kàyamà mɛ. »
MAR 14:33 Ungö nde kàsyen Petɔlà, Yakɔb anà Ywan. Apan nde kàsɛmà muwem matɛɛr anà ngyɛb mbɔɔn.
MAR 14:34 Nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mɔ̈ɔ̈ amɛ wàŋàyɔl a ngyɛb yan'kwo mudwa. Sàlasäl pà, làkyɛŋ. »
MAR 14:35 Nde kàkyen u kikwɛl, waa kàbü an'köm, kàyamà naa kya mbwo isàkal, taaŋ alà làlyaaŋ ukwɛl apà nde.
MAR 14:36 Nde kàtɛɛnà naa: « Taa, indiir byanswà akà ngye ikyer afàkwo, lwom kɔɔb a mpay aŋàkir là apà mɛ. Itàkal abwɛy, kà ndaa in'kwen mɛ anki, wɛɛ ayan'kwen ngye. »
MAR 14:37 Ungö apan nde kan'yà, kan'man ba bàŋàbɔ̈ɔ̈n, waa kan'tɛn a Petɔlà: « Simɔn, ngye an'bɔ̈ɔ̈n? Nkye ngye asàkal anki anà ngwal mukyɛŋ itàkal akà taaŋ làmwɛy?
MAR 14:38 Làkyɛŋ, làyamà, ntɔn bɛ làkɔ̈ɔ̈n abwà u ndɛb. Dweelà làŋàyɔl a ngwal, wɛɛ ndür ye anà gyɔ̈ɔ̈là. »
MAR 14:39 Nde kàfàkyà u kikwɛl, waa kàyamà wàmufuur ndaa nsil ya.
MAR 14:40 Apan, nde kàyi mbalà asin, waa kàfaman bàmubɔ̈ɔ̈n, ntɔn mii aba myàkäl myàŋàbwà buur. Ba waa mpa bàyöb naa bun'fuur aben.
MAR 14:41 U mbalà yàtär kan'yà nde, nde kan'tɛn a ba naa: « Làläb mubɔ̈ɔ̈n, làyöör. Yan'wà! Taaŋ lan'kwo: le, Mwan a mbuur bàmuyälà kà an'kɔɔ a baar abe.
MAR 14:42 Làmbarà, tsweenà! Làler, mbuur kàman'yälà wà tsütsü. »
MAR 14:43 Umpal kàkäl nde muyäämà, Yudasi, umwɛy uboo a Bàkwem Aŋiyweel, kàyàkɔlà anà iköŋ a baar mbɔɔn bàtöm andweer a angaŋ anà andweer a un'sɛŋ. Ba bàkäl anà an'kɔm anà nköl.
MAR 14:44 Mbuur kun'yälà, kapɛ idiim ki: « Mbuur wanswà in'kàböbà mɛ, mbuur wa nde awun. Lun'kör, lun'syen unsà ikyɛɛŋ. »
MAR 14:45 Pa kàyàkɔlà nde, nde kàsin apà Yɛsu, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ! » Waa kun'böbà.
MAR 14:46 Apan bumwɛy bun'tɛ mpi, waa bun'kör.
MAR 14:47 Umwɛy uboo a baar bàkäl paa, kàtwey kɔm, waa kàkäm un'syääl a Mfum a angaŋ, waa kun'tsül tsü.
MAR 14:48 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Nkye mɛ in'wà un'dwää baar waa bɛ làyi anà an'kɔm anà nköl ntɔn mukan'kɔr?
MAR 14:49 Mɛ kàkäl anà bɛ u ndwà a Nzam ilä byanswà mulɔŋ, bɛ làsan'kɔr anki. Wɛɛ ayi yan'yà ntɔn Ndaa Aŋàsɔn ikwe. »
MAR 14:50 Apan ba banswà bàsun'wɛy, waa bàtiin.
MAR 14:51 Mwan baal mwɛy wàŋàbwaar làpye làmwɛy mpɛl waa kàyun'labà. Waa bun'kör,
MAR 14:52 wɛɛ nde kàsàpiy làpye alan, waa kàtiin wànsàpɔl.
MAR 14:53 Ba bàsyen Yɛsu akà mfum a angaŋ, ikal bàköŋ amfum a angaŋ bànswà, andweer anà alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn.
MAR 14:54 Petɔlà kàyilabà Yɛsu ukwel tii uboo a làpaŋ, u làbay a ndwà a mfum a angaŋ. Nde kàbwaay anà aŋità muywar mbaa.
MAR 14:55 Kyekà andweer a angaŋ anà Làbay a nsaŋ a kölàköl bàkäl muleŋ imbäl a loor ntɔn Yɛsu ntɔn bun'dwä, wɛɛ ba kya bàmɛnà anki.
MAR 14:56 Ntɔn bàmbɔɔn bàtɛɛ imbäl a loor ntɔn nde, wɛɛ bya byàkyeena anki balàbal.
MAR 14:57 Baar amwɛy waa bàyàmbarà, waa bàyataa loor ntɔn nde naa:
MAR 14:58 « Bi kàwem nde wàmutɛn naa: "Mɛ in'yàbwaab ndwà a Nzam bàtöŋ yi kàn'kɔɔ a baar, wɛɛ ungö a ilä itär mɛ in'yàtɔŋ yàsin mpa bàkyer kan'kɔɔ a baar." »
MAR 14:59 Wɛɛ, itàkal abà, imbäl aba kyàkwe anki balàbal.
MAR 14:60 Apan Mfum a angaŋ kàmbarà nde uboo a nköŋ, nde kàfuul Yɛsu naa: « Nkye ngye afuur anki akà undiir mwɛy unsà imbäl bàtaa baar bà ntɔn ngye? »
MAR 14:61 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kàkäl akul, waa mpa kàfuur akà ikikye. Mfum a angaŋ kun'fuul mbalà asin: « Nkye ngye awà Klistɔ, Mwan a Nzam aŋàsaak? »
MAR 14:62 Yɛsu waa kàfuur naa: « Mɛ in'wà nde, bɛ làsàman Mwan a mbuur waŋàbwaay u kɔɔ ibaal a Ŋangwal, wàmuyà uboo in'böŋ a du. »
MAR 14:63 Apan, Mfum a angaŋ kàkaam ipfɛy ande, waa kàtɛn naa: « Bi ambäl nkye ifàkyer abà!
MAR 14:64 Bɛ lan'wem mbɛɛy. Bɛ lan'tɛn aben? » Ba banswà bun'tsüül mbar a ukwà.
MAR 14:65 Bamwɛy uboo a ba bun'tsüülà an'te, bun'fwee ntabwey, bun'kämà iki, waa bàtɛɛnà a nde naa: « Tà ngɔɔm! » Aseey waa bun'yab a mbar.
MAR 14:66 Petɔlà kàkäl u ngyɛl uboo a làpaŋ umpal kàyi un'syääl mwɛy wun'kaar wà mfum a angaŋ,
MAR 14:67 nde kàmɛn Petɔlà wàmuywar mbaa, nde kun'syebà, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ngye sye, ngye kàkäl anà Yɛsu un'nsi Nasàlɛr. »
MAR 14:68 Wɛɛ nde kàkyer atɔn, waa kàtɛn naa: « Mɛ in'yöb anki. Mɛ in'yöb anki naa ngye nkye akwen mutɛn. » Ungö, waa kàtoo u nsà mukyà ikal bàfabilà. [ Apan nkɔɔ waa kàbel. ]
MAR 14:69 Un'syääl wun'kaar kun'mɛn nde, waa kàfàtɛn a baar bàkäl paa naa: « Mbuur wà, wà umwɛy uboo a ba! »
MAR 14:70 Wɛɛ nde waa kàfàtɔn. Ungö apan, baar bàkäl paa bàfàtɛn a Petɔlà naa: « Ndandaa, ngye awà umwɛy uboo a ba, ntɔn ngye, ngye awà un'nsi Ngalilɛ. »
MAR 14:71 Wɛɛ nde kàsɛmà mudyà kyän anà musà in'küül: « Mɛ un'yöb anki mbuur lan'saamà bɛ. »
MAR 14:72 Utaaŋ nsil alan, nkɔɔ mwɛy waa kàbel u mbalà yàyweel, apan Petɔlà kàyɔbà ndaa kun'kyään Yɛsu: « Kusà nkɔɔ mutàbel mbalà yweel, ngye ayan'tɔn mbalà tär. » Apan, nde kàtoo u ntiin, waa kàlel.
MAR 15:1 U tutu tutu, amfum a angaŋ bàköŋ anà andweer, anà alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn anà Làbay a nsaŋ làkölàköl lanswà. Ba bàbäm Yɛsu in'siŋ, bun'syen anà bun'pɛ akà Pilatu.
MAR 15:2 Pilatu waa kun'fuul naa: « Nkye ngye awà mfum a Ayudà? » Yɛsu waa kun'fuur naa: « Ngye ŋàkwo an'tɛn. »
MAR 15:3 Amfum a angaŋ bun'füünà indiir mbɔɔn.
MAR 15:4 Pilatu kàfun'fuulà naa: « Nkye ngye ndaa afuur anki akà ikikye? Ngye akiweemà indiir mbɔɔn bàfüünà ba ngye! »
MAR 15:5 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kàsàfuur anki akà ndaa mwɛy, abun Pilatu waa kàbem.
MAR 15:6 Kà un'kyɔm wanswà, Pilatu kàkäl anà nkääl mutsuuŋ mbuur a bɔlokà mwɛy, mbuur kàlɔ̈ɔ̈mà un'sɛŋ.
MAR 15:7 Kyekà mbuur mwɛy ikɔb ande Barabas kàkäl u bɔlokà anà aŋàlingyoomà abà bàdwä mbuur umpal làbü lingyoomà.
MAR 15:8 Un'sɛŋ a baar kàbeenà, waa kàsɛmà mukun'lɔ̈ɔ̈m naa nde kapɛ asànaa nkääl ande.
MAR 15:9 Pilatu kàfuul naa: « Nkye bɛ làkyàkwen mɛ alàwɛɛy mfum a Ayudà? »
MAR 15:10 Ntɔn nde kàkyer ayöb naa ba Yɛsu bun'yälà ntɔn un'köl aba.
MAR 15:11 Wɛɛ amfum a angaŋ bàsiinà un'sɛŋ ntɔn Pilatu katsuuŋ awà Barabas.
MAR 15:12 Pilatu kàfàtɛn a ba naa: « Abun bɛ làkwen naa mɛ nkye in'kyer anà mbuur làfàbel bɛ mfum a Ayudà? »
MAR 15:13 Ba bàfàsà in'kwɛŋ: « Un'bɛɛrà u kulunsi! »
MAR 15:14 Pilatu kàtɛɛnà a ba naa: « Ube nà nde kàkyer bà? » Wɛɛ ba bàsöönà musà in'kwɛŋ: « Un'bɛɛrà u kulunsi! »
MAR 15:15 Pilatu kàkwen mupà un'sɛŋ un'sak, waa katsuuŋ Barabas. Apan nde kàswɛŋ naa bàkäm Yɛsu an'füm, waa kun'yälà ntɔn bun'bɛɛrà u kulunsi.
MAR 15:16 Aŋità bàsyen Yɛsu uboo a làpaŋ a kuvɛrnɔ̈ɔ̈r u pɛlàtwal, waa bàbel làböl lanswà.
MAR 15:17 Ba bun'bwää kàzak a tsöö, waa bun'tɔ̈ɔ̈l mpà a nsyeenà bàtöŋ ba kun'tswe.
MAR 15:18 Ba bàsɛmà mukun'pà mbɔr naa: « Mbɔr, mfum a Ayudà! »
MAR 15:19 Ba bun'kämà un'bii kun'tswe, bun'tsüülà an'te, anà bàbwee an'köm kusà ande ntɔn mukömà.
MAR 15:20 Ungö amukun'sɛɛ, ba bun'lwom kàzak a tsöö, waa bun'fuur ipfɛy ande. Apan ba bun'twey u nsà a bul ntɔn bàkun'bɛɛrà u kulunsi.
MAR 15:21 Mbuur mwɛy, ikɔb ande Simɔn, un'nsi Sirɛn, taar a Alɛksandre anà Rufus, kàfü ndwaŋ, anà kàkäl mulyaaŋ. Aŋità bun'siinà a ngwal musyen kulunsi.
MAR 15:22 Ba bàsyen Yɛsu kà ikäl mwɛy ikɔb a kya Ngɔlàngɔta, ikaswaŋà naa: « Ikal a köl a un'tswe. »
MAR 15:23 Ba bun'pɛɛ vin aŋàtüüb a dyam, wɛɛ Yɛsu kàtön munwà la.
MAR 15:24 Ungö bun'bɛɛrà ba u kulunsi, ba bàkäbà ipfɛy ande, waa bàtɛɛ löb ntɔn muyöb naa mbuur mbuur ininà uwal.
MAR 15:25 Ba bun'bɛɛrà u kulunsi u taaŋ làwà làtutu.
MAR 15:26 Isin a ndaa bàsön muswaŋ ntsüül a ukwà ande yàkäl abà: « Mfum a Ayudà. »
MAR 15:27 Ba bàbɛɛrà sye baar abe abɔ̈ɔ̈l u bikulunsi ukɔl a Yɛsu, mwɛy u kɔɔ ande là ibaal, umwɛy u kɔɔ ande là ikaar. [
MAR 15:28 Apan itiir a Ndaa Aŋàsɔn yi laa kyàkwe kya: « Nde bun'täŋ unsà ulwaŋ a baar abe. » ]
MAR 15:29 Baar bàlyaaŋà u mbwo bun'töö, bànii in'tswe, waa bàtɛɛnà naa: « Imbye itàkal ngye atàman! Ngye awee naa abwiy ndwà a Nzam, waa afàtɔŋ ya kà ilä itär,
MAR 15:30 tswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ angye, ngye ŋankwo, tɔlà u kulunsi! »
MAR 15:31 Amfum a angaŋ anà alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn bàsɛɛ, ba a ba, waa bàtɛɛnà naa: « Nde kàtsü baar asin mɔ̈ɔ̈, wɛɛ nde ukwe anki mutswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ nde ŋakwo!
MAR 15:32 Wɛy Klistɔ, mfum a Isàlɛl utɔlà apanà u kulunsi, waa bi iman, waa bi isà làkwikilà! » Baar bàbɛɛrà u kulunsi mbwo mwɛy anà nde, bun'töö sye.
MAR 15:33 U midi làpib làkyer abwà u mɛɛn manswà tii u taaŋ làtär ungö a midi.
MAR 15:34 Apan, u taaŋ làtär, Yɛsu kàsi un'kwɛŋ a ngwal: « Ɛlɔyi, Ɛlɔyi, lɛma sabaktani? » Ikaswaŋà naa: « Nzam a mɛ, Nzam a mɛ, ntɔn nkye aman'wɛy ngye? » -
MAR 15:35 Bamwɛy uboo a baar bàkäl paa bun'weemà ba, waa bàtɛɛnà naa: « Làwem, nde kan'bel Ɛli! »
MAR 15:36 Mbuur mwɛy kàkaamà ntiin, kànwɛmà ikaam a ipfɛy unsà vin a nkyään, nde kàbäm kya u nswɛŋ a un'bii, waa kàsilà kya akà Yɛsu ntɔn nde unü, wàmutɛn naa: « Làdil, bi iler naa nkye Ɛli akyun'tɔɔl u kulunsi! »
MAR 15:37 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kàsi un'kwɛŋ a ngwal, waa un'swey kàtoo.
MAR 15:38 Rido a idwà làkaamà itiir byeel fà du tii u ngyɛl.
MAR 15:39 Kaptɛn kàkäl paa kusà a nde, mpal kàmɛn nde naa nde kàkü aben, waa kàtɛn naa: « Ndandaa mbuur wà kàkäl Mwan a Nzam! »
MAR 15:40 Bàkäl anà akaar amwɛy sye bàleerà ukwɛl. Uboo a ba, bàkäl Màlye un'nsi Magàdala, Màlye ngwän a Zyak Un'kye, anà Yɔsɛ, anà Salɔmɛ.
MAR 15:41 Ba bàkäl akaar bàyun'labà anà bàyun'syäälà mpal kàkäl nde u Ngalilɛ, anà akaar asin mbɔɔn bàbeenà Yɛlusàlɛm anà nde.
MAR 15:42 Sisye làkäl aŋàbwà, kya kyàkal ilä ayöŋà, iswaŋà naa ilä kyàfweel saba,
MAR 15:43 un'byääl mwɛy wà làbay a nsaŋ, Yɔsɛfi un'nsi Alimatɛ, kàyàkɔlà paa. Nde sye kàfadilà Imwol a Nzam. Nde kàwɛl ibaal mukyà akà Pilatu ntɔn mulɔm ndom a Yɛsu.
MAR 15:44 Pilatu kàbem muwem naa nde abwà akwà. Nde kàbel kaptɛn, waa kun'fuul naa nkye nde kàkü itaan.
MAR 15:45 Ungö kàyöb nde u mbwo a kaptɛn, nde kàpɛ mbwo akà Yɔsefi muwal ndom.
MAR 15:46 Ungö musom làpye a pɛɛl, nde kàtɔɔl ndom u kulunsi, kàläl ya uboo a làpye, kàsi ya kà an'dii bàfuun uboo a nkɔŋ, waa kàbuum nkɔŋ a kölàköl ntɔn mudübà an'dii.
MAR 15:47 Màlye un'nsi Magàdalà anà Màlye ngwän a Yɔsɛ bàleerà ikal basi ndom.
MAR 16:1 Ungö ilä a saba, Màlye un'nsi Magàdalà, anà Sàlomɛ anà Màlye ngwän a Zyak, bàsöm may a usɔŋ ntɔn mumwaŋ u ndür a Yɛsu.
MAR 16:2 Ilä atàtwɛb kyà mpɔsà, ba bàkyen an'dii u tutu, mpal làsɛnà taaŋ.
MAR 16:3 Ba bàtɛɛnà ba a ba naa: « Nà akà ibuum nkɔŋ yinà u mun a an'dii? »
MAR 16:4 Wɛɛ umpal bàler ba, ba bàmɛn naa nkɔŋ yàkäl aŋàbuum ukɔl.
MAR 16:5 Ba bàbilà uboo a an'dii, bàmɛn un'tö mwɛy wàŋàbwaay u kɔɔ ibaal, akyàbwaar mvwɛl a pɛɛl. Matɛɛr waa mawɛl.
MAR 16:6 Wɛɛ nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Twon lan'man bɔɔmà, bɛ làwàmuleŋ Yɛsu un'nsi Nasàlɛr awà bàbɛɛrà u kulunsi. Nde akyàwiyà, nde ufàkal anki apà. Làler ikal bun'tɔ̈ɔ̈l.
MAR 16:7 Wɛɛ làkyen kàlakyään alɔŋki ande, anà Petɔlà sye, naa: "Nde amàkaladil u Ngalilɛ. Bɛ làyàkun'man kwo, asànaa kàlakyään nde." »
MAR 16:8 Apan, ba bàtoo, waa bàtiin ukwɛl a an'dii, ntɔn matɛɛr anà lingyoomà màkyer awal. Ba bàkyään anki itàkal undiir mwɛy akà mbuur umwɛy, ntɔn ba bàkäl u bɔɔmà.
MAR 16:9 Ungö a ngwiiyà ande kà ilä atàtwɛb kyà mpɔsà u tutu, Yɛsu kàtwab akàmɛnà akà Màlye un'nsi Magàdalà awà kàböŋ nde an'dwelà an'be, an'dweelà nsambwaar.
MAR 16:10 Nde kàkàkyään ndaa ayi akà baar bàkälà anà nde. Ba bàkälà u ngyɛb anà mulelà.
MAR 16:11 Wɛɛ mpal bàwem ba nde wàmutɛɛnà naa: « Yɛsu wà anà mɔ̈ɔ̈, mɛ in'kyun'man! », ba bun'si anki làkwikilà.
MAR 16:12 Ungö apan, Yɛsu kàkàmɛnà ifà asin akalɔŋki abɔ̈ɔ̈l bàkäl u mbwo mukyà ndwaŋ.
MAR 16:13 Ba bàyàfurà, waa bàkyään ya akà bumwɛy. Wɛɛ ba, ba sye basi anki làkwikilà.
MAR 16:14 Ungö apan, Yɛsu kàkàmɛnà akà Bàkwem Aŋimwɛy umpal bàkäl ba mudyà, waa kapɛl ntɔn bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n ba làkwikilà anà ntɔn bwoor a mpem aba bàtön ba mukyey baar bun'mɛn wàŋàwiyà.
MAR 16:15 Nde waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làkyen u mɛɛn manswà mukyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ akà nkyeer yanswà.
MAR 16:16 Mbuur asàsà làkwikilà anà asàwal ndüümà, nde asàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈, wɛɛ mbuur mpa asàsà làkwikilà, nde bàsun'tsüül mbar.
MAR 16:17 Làler idiim isaswaŋà naa baar bà bàkyàsà làkwikilà: Kà ikɔb amɛ ba bàsàböŋ insɔŋà, ba bàsàtɛn ndaa a kün,
MAR 16:18 ba bàsàtà ntäy mpi kà an'kɔɔ, bàsànwà ipöm, wɛɛ kyà ube isakyer anki, ba bàsàsà abɛy an'kɔɔ, waa ba bàsàkɔɔrà. »
MAR 16:19 Abun, ungö muyäm anà ba, Mwol Yɛsu bun'syen du, waa kàbwaay u kɔɔ a Nzam là ibaal.
MAR 16:20 Wɛɛ akà ba, ba bàkyen mukàkyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ u mɛɛn manswà. Mwol kàsälà anà ba, waa kàtää imbäl u mbwo a idiim a impà kàkyerà nde muswaŋ naa an'lɔɔŋ aba mà ndandaa.
LUK 1:1 Un'sam Tyɔfil. Baar mbɔɔn bàbön musɔn ndaa yàlyaaŋ uboo a bi.
LUK 1:2 Ba ya bàsön asànaa bàkyään baar bàmɛn ya u mii fà nsɛmà anà bàbulà asyääl a ndaa a Nzam.
LUK 1:3 Lalan mɛ sye kàläb mɛ ndaa ayi pànsi pànsi fà nsɛmà aya. Un'byääl Tyɔfil, yubwaŋ naa mɛ asöön ndaa ayi.
LUK 1:4 In'kyer mɛ abà ntɔn ngye ayöb naa an'lɔɔŋ kàwɛl ngye mà ndandaa.
LUK 1:5 Mpal kàkäl Ɛlɔdi mfum a Yuday, kàkäl anà ngaŋ mwɛy wà itsuŋ a angaŋ a Abya ikɔb ande Zakàlye. Un'kyay ande, mbuur a mbil a Alɔn, ikɔb ande Làsàbɛr.
LUK 1:6 Ba bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l bàkäl baar a balàbal u mii a Nzam. Ba bàfalabà ubwaŋàbwaŋ in'kɔɔn myanswà anà nswɛɛŋ yanswà yà Mwol.
LUK 1:7 Wɛɛ ba bàkäl anki anà baan ntɔn Làsàbɛr kàbör anki, ba bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l bàkäl aŋànün.
LUK 1:8 Ilä mwɛy, Zakàlye kàkäl musal ingaŋ ande kusa a Nzam, ntɔn la làkäl taaŋ a itsuŋ aba musal.
LUK 1:9 Mulab nsyääl a angaŋ, löb làbü akà nde ntɔn mubilà uboo a idwà a Mwol ntɔn musà tswà mbaa kwo.
LUK 1:10 Umpal musà tswà mbaa, un'sɛŋ a baar wanswà kàkäl u nsà muyamà.
LUK 1:11 Kà imbürà, un'kyeey a Mwol mwɛy kàyàmɛnà akà Zakàlye: nde kàmbär u kɔɔ a ibaal a mɛsà a tswà.
LUK 1:12 Mpal kàmɛn Zakàlye un'kyeey awà, lileŋ làkyer un'wal, bɔɔmà làkyer un'kaar.
LUK 1:13 Wɛɛ un'kyeey kàtɛn a nde naa: « Zakàlye, twon an'man bɔɔmà, ntɔn Nzam akyàwem ngyamàkà angye: un'kyay angye Làsàbɛr ayaböör mwan baal. Ngye ayun'pà ikɔb a Ywan.
LUK 1:14 Nde asàkal ntwà a un'sak mbɔɔn ntɔn ngye. Baar mbɔɔn sye bàsàman un'sak ntɔn mböör ande.
LUK 1:15 Ntɔn nde asàkal mbuur a kölàköl u mii a Mwol. Nde usanwaa anki vin, itàkal man manswà bàfàyɔr. Nde asàkal aŋàyɔl a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl sɛmà dum a ngwän.
LUK 1:16 Nde asàfuur baan a Isàlɛl mbɔɔn akà Mwol awà Nzam aba.
LUK 1:17 Nde isal ande asàkyer u dweelà anà u ngwal asànaa ŋangɔɔm Ɛlya, ntɔn mutüüb bàtaa anà baan aba, mufuur baar a un'tswe ngwal muyweer asànaa baar a balàbal. Nde asàboom un'sɛŋ aŋàlɔ̈ɔ̈n ntɔn Mwol. »
LUK 1:18 Zakàlye kàtɛn a un'kyeey naa: « Mɛ ya in'yàyöb aben? Ntɔn mɛ in'wà un'nün anà umpal ayi un'kyay amɛ sye wàŋànün. »
LUK 1:19 Un'kyeey kun'fuur naa: « Mɛ, mɛ in'wà Ngàbàlye. Mɛ in'fàkal tsütsü apà Nzam, nde kan'töm muyäm anà ngye anà mukakyään ndaa aŋàbwaŋ ayi.
LUK 1:20 Le, ngye ayàbulà nkiin, ngye ayàkwo anki musà ndaa tii mpal isàkwo ndaa ayi, ntɔn ngye ndaa amɛ akyey anki. Ndaa ayi isàmɛnà umpal ya paa. »
LUK 1:21 Umpal ayin, baar banswà bàkäl mudilà Zakàlye u nsà, bàmukabemà naa nde kan'kàkyer itaan uboo a idwà.
LUK 1:22 Wɛɛ mpal kàyàtoo nde, nde kàkwe anki muyäm anà ba, apan ba waa bàyöb naa nde kan'man impà kà idwà. Muyäm a ba, nde kàyaswaŋà mpin, mun kàkälà wàŋàdübà.
LUK 1:23 Umpal kàmay nde ilä a isal ande u ndwà a Nzam, nde kàfurà ndwà ande.
LUK 1:24 Ungö a ilä, un'kyay ande Làsàbɛr kàkäl yöm. Apan nde kàkàyee ngɔn tyeen. Nde kàtɛɛnà naa:
LUK 1:25 « Abà ubwaŋ a Mwol kan'kyer nde akà mɛ: ŋàbawà nde kan'tɔɔm ileer ande udu a mɛ ntɔn mulwom nswɛn amɛ u mii a baar banswà. »
LUK 1:26 U ngɔn wàsyaam, Nzam kàtöm un'kyeey Ngàbàlye u bul mwɛy là Ngalilɛ ikɔb a la Nasàlɛr,
LUK 1:27 akà mwan un'kaar unkɔr awà kàtɛ Yɔsefi mbuur a mbil a David ntüüm, ikɔb ande Màlye.
LUK 1:28 Un'kyeey kàbilà u ndwà ande waa kàtɛn naa: « Mbɔr angye, Mwol kan'swaŋ ubwaŋ ande mbɔɔn akà ngye, nde wà anà ngye. »
LUK 1:29 Màlye kàmɛn ndaa yubem, waa kàyayweerà naa mbɔr ayi ikaswaŋà aben.
LUK 1:30 Apan, Un'kyeey kàtɛn a nde naa: « Màlye, twon an'man bɔɔmà, ntɔn Nzam kàmaswaŋ ukwen ande banswà.
LUK 1:31 Le, ngye ayàkal yöm, ngye ayàbɔr mwan baal, ngye ayun'pà ikɔb a Yɛsu.
LUK 1:32 Nde asàkal mbuur a kölàköl, bàsun'beelà Mwan a Nzam a Dudu. Mwol Nzam asun'sà u kir a imfum a nkaa ande David.
LUK 1:33 Nde asàyaal ipepey u ndwà a Yakɔb, imwol ande sye isàtsü anki. »
LUK 1:34 Màlye waa kàtɛn a un'kyeey naa: « Ya abwɛy iyàkal aben ntɔn mɛ ŋàtàkal anki anà baal? »
LUK 1:35 Un'kyeey kun'fuur naa: « Dweelà In'kyɛɛl ayàkal udu angye, ngwal a Nzam a Dudu ikyer ayafwee asànaa kilàpib. Lalan mwan in'kyɛɛl ayàbɔr ngye bàsun'beelà Mwan a Nzam.
LUK 1:36 Le, un'tɔŋ angye Làsàbɛr sye we anà yöm a mwan baal unsà inün ande. Bàfatɛɛnà naa nde wà ikɔb, wɛɛ ŋàbawà yöm ande là u ngɔn wàsyaam.
LUK 1:37 Ntɔn undiir kan'kwo mukɔ̈ɔ̈n Nzam watɛy. »
LUK 1:38 Apan Màlye kàfuur naa: « Mɛ in'wà un'tsüüŋ a Mwol. Wɛy ndaa yanswà an'tɛn ngye ikäl abwɛy. » Un'kyeey waa kàsun'wɛy.
LUK 1:39 Ungö apan, Màlye kàkyen agyägyä u bul mwɛy udu a mɔŋ u mɛɛn a Yuday.
LUK 1:40 Nde kàbilà u ndwà a Zakàlye, waa kàpɛ Làsàbɛr mbɔr.
LUK 1:41 Kyekà, umpal kàwem Làsàbɛr mbɔr a Màlye, mwan kànini uboo a an'bäl ande. Làsàbɛr kàyöl a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl,
LUK 1:42 waa kàsi in'kwɛŋ: « Nzam kàkyapà làpɛɛm aŋàsöönà akaar banswà, mwan ayàbɔr ngye we anà làpɛɛm a Nzam.
LUK 1:43 Làkoo alà lan'fà ken naa ngwän a Mwol amɛ uyi akà mɛ?
LUK 1:44 Ler, umpal kan'wem mɛ mbɔr angye, mwan awà kan'bäl amɛ kan'nini ntɔn un'sak mbɔɔn.
LUK 1:45 Ngye awà un'kaar aŋun'sak, ngye kàsi làkyän naa Mwol ayàkyer ndaa kakyään nde. »
LUK 1:46 Waa Màlye kàtɛn naa: « U mɔ̈ɔ̈ amɛ wanswà mɛ in'kwen usyäŋà Mwol,
LUK 1:47 mpem amɛ yan'yɔl a un'sak ntɔn Nzam, Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ amɛ,
LUK 1:48 ntɔn nde kàtɔɔm ileer ande udu a làbɔ̈ɔ̈n a un'tsüüŋ ande. Lalan, sɛmà apanà ngyääl yanswà isatɛɛnà a mɛ naa un'kaar aŋun'sak,
LUK 1:49 ntɔn Ŋangwal kàkyer indiir a kölàköl ntɔn mɛ. Ikɔb ande kyà in'kyɛɛl,
LUK 1:50 U mbul a intye nde wàŋàyɔl a ngyɛb ntɔn baar bàfun'kyɛɛl.
LUK 1:51 Nde kàswɛŋ ikɔ̈b ande musyääl ngwal a kɔɔ ande: nde kàpay baar aŋàyɔl a uyɔl u mpem aba,
LUK 1:52 nde kàtyeey amfum kà an'kir aba mà imfum anà kàsɛɛn baar a làbɔ̈ɔ̈n.
LUK 1:53 Nde kàyööl aŋangyal a indiir mbɔɔn, wɛɛ nde aŋin'naaŋ kafuur an'kɔɔ a ipɔl.
LUK 1:54 Nde kàbay un'tsüüŋ ande Isàlɛl: nde kàyɔbà ngyɛb ande asànaa kàswɛŋ nde bànkaa abi,
LUK 1:55 akà Abàlam anà ikyee ande kyà mbul a in'tye. »
LUK 1:56 Màlye kàkäl isii a ngɔɔn tär akà Làsàbɛr, apan waa kàfurà ndwà ande.
LUK 1:57 Taaŋ a Làsàbɛr mubɔr làkwe la, nde kàbör mwan baal.
LUK 1:58 Baar a tsütsü anà baar a mbil ande bàwem ba naa Mwol kan'swaŋ ngyɛb ande mbɔɔn akà nde, ba bàsäŋà anà nde.
LUK 1:59 Ilä kyànaan ungö a mböör ande, ba bàyi mutsul mwan. Ba bàkweenà mukun'pà ikɔb a taarànde Zakàlye.
LUK 1:60 Wɛɛ ngwän kàtɛn naa: « Aay, bàyun'beelà Ywan! »
LUK 1:61 Ba bàtɛn a nde naa: « Aa, u ndwà abɛ mbuur awe anà ikɔb akyɛy watɛy! »
LUK 1:62 Abun, ba waa bàfuul taarànde muswaŋà mpin ntɔn muyöb naa ikɔb nà nde ukwen mupà mwan ande.
LUK 1:63 Zakàlye kàlɔ̈m kilàbää, waa kàsɔ̈n abà: « Ndandaa ikɔb ande Ywan. » Baar banswà bàkyer abem.
LUK 1:64 Apan sye, ndaa a Zakàlye waa yàsabà, waa kàsɛmà musà Nzam làkoo.
LUK 1:65 Abun, baar a tsütsü bàmɛn bɔɔmà. Ndaa ayi baar bàsaamà ya u myɔŋ a Yuday myanswà.
LUK 1:66 Baar banswà bàweemà ya bàkäl muyweerà anà mutɛn naa: « Kimwan aki ayàkal aben? » Ndandaa kɔɔ a Mwol làkäl anà nde.
LUK 1:67 Taarànde Zakàlye kàkäl aŋàyɔl a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl, waa kàbulà mutà ngɔɔm anà mutɛn naa:
LUK 1:68 « Wɛy Mwol uwɛl nsaak, Nzam a un'sɛŋ a Isàlɛl, ntɔn nde kàyàler anà kàtsuuŋ wa kà isɔ.
LUK 1:69 Nde kàtwey Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ a ngwal ntɔn bi uboo a ndwà a un'tsüüŋ ande mfum David.
LUK 1:70 Ayi ndaa kàkyään nde itaan u mun a aŋangɔɔm ande bà in'kyɛɛl:
LUK 1:71 ntsuuŋ abi kà an'kɔɔ a aŋankir abi anà kà an'kɔɔ a baar bàfàkyer bi ube.
LUK 1:72 Nde kàswɛŋ ubwaŋ ande akà bànkaa abi. Nde sye kàdiimà anki kyän ande là in'kyɛɛl.
LUK 1:73 Ndandaa, Nzam kàdi kyän akà nkaa abi Abàlam,
LUK 1:74 mukà itsuuŋ kà ikɔ̈b a aŋankir abi anà mukà ipà mbwo mukun'syääl ukɔɔn bɔɔmà,
LUK 1:75 ntɔn bi ikälà baar a in'kyɛɛl anà bàbalàbal kusà ande kà ilä a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi byanswà.
LUK 1:76 Wɛɛ ngye mwan amɛ, bàsabeelà ŋangɔɔm a Nzam a dudu, ntɔn ngye asàfwel kusà a Mwol ntɔn muyilà mbwo ande
LUK 1:77 anà mulɔŋ un'sɛŋ ande naa nde akyer ayà mutswà nde mɔ̈ɔ̈ ntɔn nde ayun'dwääl nkul a man'be ande.
LUK 1:78 Nzam abi wàŋàyɔl a ngyɛb, lalan kà itööm nde pɛɛlà làfü du asànaa taaŋ làfàsɛnà la,
LUK 1:79 ntɔn mupɛɛlà baar abà uboo a làpib anà u mbwo a ukwà, ntɔn musyen bi u mbwo a duu. »
LUK 1:80 Mwan wa kàkäl muyɛl u ndür anà u dweelà. Nde kàkälà u nsye a ipɔl tii mpal kàyàmɛnà nde u mii a un'sɛŋ a Isàlɛl.
LUK 2:1 Mpal ayin, Sɛzar Angus kàtöm un'kaan ntɔn mutaŋ baar banswà u mɛɛn a Lɔmà.
LUK 2:2 Ntääŋ a baar atàtwɛb ayi yàkäl mpal kàkäl Kirinüs mfum a Siri.
LUK 2:3 Baar banswà bàkyeenà mukàsɔn ikɔb aba mbuur mbuur u bul kàfü nde.
LUK 2:4 Yɔsefi sye kàmbarà u Nasàlɛr bul a Ngalilɛ ntɔn mukyà Bɛtɛlɛm bul a Yuday ntɔn nde kàkäl mbuur a ywar anà mbil a David,
LUK 2:5 ntɔn mukàsɔn ikɔb ande anà kyà un'kyay ande Màlye awà kàkäl anà yöm.
LUK 2:6 Mpal bàkäl ba u Yɛlusàlɛm, taaŋ a Màlye mubɔr làkyer akwo,
LUK 2:7 nde kàbör mwan baal ande wàtàtwɛb. Nde kun'läl ipfɛy, waa kun'byee uboo a unkwak ntɔn ba bàmɛn anki ikal u ndwà a angyey.
LUK 2:8 U ntsü ayin sye aseey bàfabɔ̈ɔ̈nà u nsà uboo a an'ywaŋ muyiler in'kɔk aba u mpib.
LUK 2:9 Wɛɛ, le, un'kyeey a Mwol mwɛy kàyàmɛnà akà ba, làkoo a Mwol sye làswɛŋ pɛɛlà a la. Ba bàwɛn bɔɔmà mbɔɔn.
LUK 2:10 Wɛɛ un'kyeey kàtɛn a ba naa: « Twon lan'wem bɔɔmà, ntɔn mɛ amàlatwääl làsaŋ aŋàbwaŋ làyàpà un'sak akà baar banswà:
LUK 2:11 U mpib aŋàbà, u bul a David, bàmàlaböör Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ mwɛy, nde wà Klistɔ, wà Mwol.
LUK 2:12 « Bɛ làyun'man unsà idiim ki: mwan aŋàlal ipfɛy, wàŋàbyee uboo a unkwak. »
LUK 2:13 Kà imbürà, akyeey a du mbɔɔn waa bàyun'taan, bàmusà Nzam làkoo, bàmutɛn naa:
LUK 2:14 « Làkoo akà Nzam kà ikal a dudu, duu u mɛɛn uboo a baar bàfun'kwen! »
LUK 2:15 Mpal bàsawɛy akyeey ntɔn mufurà du, aseey bàtɛn ba a ba naa: « Tsweenà Bɛtelɛm bà, bi ikàman ndaa yan'bwà kwo, ndaa kàmisam Mwol. »
LUK 2:16 Ba bàkyen agyägyä, waa bàmɛn Màlye anà Yɔsefi, anà mwan akɔɔ wàŋàbyee uboo a unkwak.
LUK 2:17 Mpal bun'mɛn ba, ba bàsam ndaa kakyään un'kyeey ntɔn mwan akɔɔ awun.
LUK 2:18 Baar banswà bàweemà indiir bàtɛɛnà aseey, bàmɛn ndaa yubem.
LUK 2:19 Ndaa ayi yanswà Màlye ya kàkäärà u mpem, waa kàfayɔbà ya taaŋ lanswà.
LUK 2:20 Aseey waa bàfurà, bàmuyisà làkoo anà muyisyäŋà Nzam, ntɔn indiir byanswà bàwem ba anà bàmɛn ba, byàbü balàbal asànaa kakyään un'kyeey.
LUK 2:21 Ilä kyànaan ungö a mböör, taaŋ mutsul mwan làkwe la, ba bun'pɛ ikɔb a Yɛsu, ikɔb kakyään un'kyeey kusà ngwän mukal yöm.
LUK 2:22 Apan, taaŋ mupöŋ ndür làkwe la ntɔn Yɔsefi anà Màlye asànaa kàswɛŋà un'kɔɔn a Mɔsɛ, ba bàsyen mwan u ndwà a Nzam a Yɛlusàlɛm ntɔn mukun'swaŋ akà Mwol,
LUK 2:23 ntɔn bàsön uboo a un'kɔɔn a Mwol abà: « Mwan baal a nswɛm wanswà bun'sà ukɔl ntɔn Mwol. »
LUK 2:24 Yàlɔ̈m sye naa ba bàpɛ ibɔɔn asànaa ukalɔɔmà un'kɔɔn nsil awà, « nkokà un'kyay anà un'dim, itàkal in'tö a an'yem myeel. »
LUK 2:25 U Yɛlusàlɛm kàkäl anà mbuur mwɛy ikɔb ande Simɛyɔ. Mbuur awà kàkäl wàbalàbal anà inzaam, nde kàfadilà mbuur ayàlwom ngyɛb a Isàlɛl. Dweelà In'kyɛɛl kàkäl anà nde,
LUK 2:26 waa kun'kyään naa nde usàkwà anki kusà muman Klistɔ a Mwol.
LUK 2:27 Dweelà kun'syen u ndwà a Nzam. Umpal bàyàtwaal aböör a Yɛsu mwan aba ntɔn mukyer ndaa kàlɔ̈ɔ̈mà un'kɔɔn,
LUK 2:28 Simɛyɔ kun'wɛl kà an'kɔɔ ande, waa kàsyäŋà Nzam, waa kàtɛn naa:
LUK 2:29 « Mwol, mpalàbà ngye an'kwey ilää angye: ngye an'kwo awɛy un'tsüüŋ angye ukü a duu.
LUK 2:30 Ntɔn mɛ an'man Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ amɛ u mii,
LUK 2:31 Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ kàlɔ̈ɔ̈n ngye ntɔn in'sɛŋ myanswà,
LUK 2:32 Nde wà pɛɛlà ntɔn mupà kyɛɛy akà in'sɛŋ a mɛɛn anà nde asàkal làkoo ntɔn un'sɛŋ angye Isàlɛl. »
LUK 2:33 Taarànde anà ngwän bàkäl mubem indiir kàtɛɛnà Simɛyɔ ntɔn Yɛsu.
LUK 2:34 Simɛyɔ kun'si kɔɔ, waa kàtɛn a Màlye ngwän a Yɛsu naa: « Le! Mwan wà ayàkal mbuur ayàtyeey, taaŋ lumwɛy ayàmbaar baar mbɔɔn kà Isàlɛl. Nde ayàkal isi a Nzam iyàtwaal nkaabà,
LUK 2:35 abun an'kyän aŋàyee u mpem a baar mbɔɔn màsàmɛnà u leŋ. Wɛɛ akà ngye ŋakwo Màlye, usaay bàsapfuul mpem asànaa kɔm. »
LUK 2:36 Kàkäl sye anà ŋangɔɔm un'kaar ikɔb ande Anà, mwan a Fanwel, mbuur a un'sɛŋ a Asɛr. Nde kàkäl un'nün. Nde kàkäl mbul nsambwaar anà un'dim kàbääl nde kà isyee ande,
LUK 2:37 ungö, nde kàbulà un'kweel un'dim. Nde kàkäl ayà mbul an'kwem naan aŋinà. U mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande wanswà nde kàbwaayà u ndwà a Nzam musyäälà Nzam mpib anà mwäänà: nde kàkälà mukin mbɔr anà muyamà.
LUK 2:38 Nde kàyàkɔlà sye taaŋ nsil alan, wàmuyisyäŋà Nzam. Nde kàkäl mukyään ndaa a Yɛsu akà baar banswà bàkälà mudilà naa Nzam ukɔɔr Yɛlusàlɛm.
LUK 2:39 Mpal bàmay ba mukyer ndaa yanswà kàlɔ̈ɔ̈mà un'kɔɔn a Mwol, Yɔsefi anà Màlye bàfurà bul aba Nasàlɛr u Ngalilɛ.
LUK 2:40 Mwan kàkäl muyɛl anà mubulà ngwal. Nde kàkäl aŋàyɔl a an'yeerà, kɔɔ a Nzam làkäl anà nde.
LUK 2:41 Aböör a Yɛsu bàfakyeenà Yɛlusàlɛm mbul wanswà mukàdyà Pak.
LUK 2:42 Mpal kàkäl Yɛsu mbul kwen aŋiyweel, ba bun'syen Yɛlusàlɛm asànaa ikääl aba.
LUK 2:43 Mpal yàwü nköŋ, ba waa bàfurà, wɛɛ mwan Yɛsu kàsàsal u Yɛlusàlɛm, aböör ande bàyöb anki.
LUK 2:44 Ba bàsii naa nde wa anà atɔŋ aba bàtüüb ba mbwo, ba bàkyer mwäänà mwɛy muyikyà, waa bàsɛmà muyun'leŋ uboo a atɔŋ aba anà uboo a asam aba.
LUK 2:45 Wɛɛ ba bun'mɛn anki. Apan ba bàfurà Yɛlusàlɛm mukun'leŋ.
LUK 2:46 Ungö ilä itär ba bun'mɛn u ndwà a Nzam kàkyàbwaay uboboo a alɔɔŋ a un'kɔɔn. Nde kàkäl muweemà ba anà musà ba mfuul.
LUK 2:47 Baar banswà bàweemà ndaa ande bàkäl mubem ntɔn un'yɛnà ande anà mfuur a ndaa ande.
LUK 2:48 Mpal bun'mɛn aböör ande, ba bàkyer abem, lalan ngwän kàtɛn nde a nde naa: « Mwan amɛ, ntɔn nkye amà ikyer ngye abà? Ler, taaràŋà anà mɛ, bi kan'kyɛɛr mbɔɔn muyaleŋ. »
LUK 2:49 Nde waa kafuur naa: « Ntɔn nkye làyan'leŋ bɛ? Bɛ làyöb anki naa mɛ in'kyer akyer isal a taaràmɛ? »
LUK 2:50 Wɛɛ ba bàsàyöb anki ndaa kàtɛɛnà nde.
LUK 2:51 Apan Yɛsu kàfurà Nasàlɛr anà ba. Nde kàkyer afalabà ndaa aba. Ndaa ayi yanswà ngwän ya kàkäärà u mpem ande.
LUK 2:52 Yɛsu kàkäl muyɛl unsà ndür anà unsà an'yeerà. Nde sye kàpɛɛ un'sak akà Nzam anà akà baar.
LUK 3:1 Mbul wàkwem aŋityeen wà imfum a Mfum Tibɛr Sɛzar, umpal kàkäl Pɔnsɔ Pilatu kuvɛrnɔ̈ɔ̈r u Yuday, Ɛlɔdi u Ngalilɛ, un'tɔŋ ande Filipo u Itürɛ anà u Trakɔnit, Lizanyas u Abilɛn,
LUK 3:2 anà umpal a andwer a angaŋ Anà anà Kayifa, ndaa a Nzam yàyi akà Ywan mwan a Zakàlye, u nsye a ipɔl.
LUK 3:3 Nde kàyilyaaŋà u nsi yanswà yà tsütsü a ngyäl a Yɔrdan muyilɔŋ baar mubuul mpem anà mukadümà ntɔn badwääl nkul a man'be aba
LUK 3:4 asànaa bàsön ya uboo a un'kaan a ndaa a ŋangɔɔm Yɛsay naa: « Yi ndaa a mbuur akasaa in'kwɛŋ u nsye a ipɔl: "Làlɔ̈ɔ̈n mbwo a Mwol, làsuub myäy ande.
LUK 3:5 Un'baan wanswà akyer ayàyɔl, mɔŋ wanswà anà iköl kyanswà ikyer ayàtye, mbwo aŋàkwàkwarà ikyer ayàsubà, mbwo aŋàkwà bàkyer ayàlɔn."
LUK 3:6 Mbuur wanswà ayàman mɔ̈ɔ̈ kàpɛ Nzam. »
LUK 3:7 In'sɛŋ a baar myàyee akà Ywan ntɔn nde kadümà. Nde kàtɛɛnà a ba naa: « Mbil a iyäy, nà kàlaswɛŋ mutiin nkyɛl iyà ungö?
LUK 3:8 Làswɛŋ u nsyääl abɛ naa bɛ lan'buul mpem, wɛɛ twon lan'tɛn u mpem abɛ naa: "Abàlam wà nkaa abi." Ntɔn mɛ alàkyään naa Nzam kan'kwo utwey ikyee a Abàlam unsà nkɔŋ yi.
LUK 3:9 Làler, fà itaan nkwar ya tsütsü mutsul in'te kà in'swɛy a mya: un'te wanswà mpa afàbɔr mbɛŋ aŋàbwaŋ bàkyer ayun'tsul, waa bàyun'tɔɔm u mbaa. »
LUK 3:10 Baar bun'fuulà naa: « Apɛy bi waa ikyer aben? »
LUK 3:11 Nde waa kàfuur naa: « Wɛy mbuur awe abyà inkur byeel upɛ imwɛy akà mbuur akɔ̈ɔ̈n a kya, wɛɛ mbuur awe anà isaa adyà ukyer sye abà. »
LUK 3:12 Afüür a itɛr sye bàyi ntɔn badümà, waa bàtɛn a nde naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, bi ikyer aben? »
LUK 3:13 Nde waa kafuur naa: « Twon lan'kwɛy undiir udu a indiir bàlaswɛŋ mukyer. »
LUK 3:14 Aŋità sye bàfuul naa: « Atöl bi ikyer aben? » Nde waa kafuur naa: « Twon lan'gyɔɔr undiir a mbuur, twon lan'yib, làkyey làfur abɛ mpɛl. »
LUK 3:15 Baar bàkäl anà ngyal muyöb naa nkye Ywan wà Klistɔ bàdilà ba.
LUK 3:16 Nde kàtɛn a baar banswà naa: « Mɛ, mɛ in'kàladümà kà an'dà, wɛɛ mbuur ayàyà ungö amɛ kàman'söön u ngwal, mɛ in'kwe anki musɔɔl in'siŋ a sàbar ande. Nde bɛ ayàladümà u Dweelà In'kyɛɛl anà u mbaa.
LUK 3:17 Nde we anà impye ande u kɔɔ ntɔn mukaab mbɛŋ anà un'lɛŋ. Nde mbɛŋ ayàsà uboo a ikɔr ande, wɛɛ nde un'lɛŋ ayàtɔɔm u mbaa mpa ifàdim. »
LUK 3:18 Abun Ywan kàswɛŋà ndaa asin mbɔɔn akà un'sɛŋ mukyer anà kun'kyäänà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ.
LUK 3:19 Apan sye Ywan kàtɛɛnà a Ɛlodi, mbuur kàfayaalà u Ngalilɛ, ntɔn kàbääl nde Ɛlɔdyas, un'kyay a un'tɔŋ ande, anà ntɔn nde kàkyer ube asin bà ifà ifà,
LUK 3:20 nde kàfàkwɛy ube asin musà Ywan u bɔlokà.
LUK 3:21 Yàmɛnà naa baar banswà bàkyeenà mukàwal ndüümà. Yɛsu sye kàkàwal ndüümà. Mpal kàkäl nde muyamà, du waa làdubà,
LUK 3:22 Dweelà In'kyɛɛl kàyi udu ande kà imbuur imbuur asànaa yem. Ndaa yan'fà du yan'tɛn naa: « Ngye, ngye awà Mwan in'kwen mɛ, mɔ̈ɔ̈ amɛ wanswà we amu ngye. »
LUK 3:23 Yɛsu kàkäl ayà tsütsü mbul an'kwem an'tär taaŋ kàsɛmà nde isal ande asànaa bàsii baar naa nde wà mwan a Yɔsɛfi, mwan a Ɛli,
LUK 3:24 mwan a Matat, mwan a Lɛvi, mwan a Mɛlshi, mwan a Zanayi, mwan a Yɔsɛfi,
LUK 3:25 mwan a Matatyas, mwan a Amɔs, mwan a Nawum, mwan a Ɛsli, mwan a Nangay,
LUK 3:26 mwan a Maat, mwan a Matatyas, mwan a Sɛmɛy, mwan a Yɔsɛk, mwan a Yɔda,
LUK 3:27 mwan a Ywanan, mwan a Yɛsa, mwan a Zɔrɔbabɛl, mwan a Salatyɛl, mwan a Nɛri
LUK 3:28 mwan a Mɛlki, mwan a Adi, mwan a Kɔsam, mwan a Ɛlmadam, mwan a Ɛr,
LUK 3:29 mwan a Yɛsu, mwan a Ɛlyɛzɛr, mwan a Yɔrim, mwan a Matat, mwan a Lɛvi,
LUK 3:30 mwan a Simɛyɔ, mwan a Yudà, mwan a Yɔsɛfi, mwan a Yɔnam, mwan a Ɛlyakim,
LUK 3:31 mwan a Mɛlɛya, mwan a Mɛna, mwan a Matatar, mwan a Natan, mwan a David,
LUK 3:32 mwan a Isayi, mwan a Yɔbɛd, mwan a Booz, mwan a Salà, mwan a Nasɔn,
LUK 3:33 mwan a Aminadab, mwan a Admin mwan a Arni, mwan a Ɛsrɔm, mwan a Farɛs, mwan a Yudà,
LUK 3:34 mwan a Yakɔb, mwan a Isak, mwan a Abàlam, mwan a Tara, mwan a Nashɔr,
LUK 3:35 mwan a Sɛrush, mwan a Ragɔ, mwan a Falɛk, mwan a Ɛbɛr, mwan a Salà,
LUK 3:36 mwan a Kaynam, mwan a Alàpakàsad, mwan a Sɛm, mwan a Nɔwà, mwan a Lamɛk,
LUK 3:37 mwan a Matusala, mwan a Ɛnɔk, mwan a Yɛred, mwan a Màlalɛyɛl, mwan a Kɛnan,
LUK 3:38 mwan a Ɛnɔs, mwan a Sɛt, mwan a Adam, mwan a Nzam.
LUK 4:1 Yɛsu kàkäl aŋàyɔl a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl mpal kàfü nde Yɔrdan, Dweelà kun'syen u nsye a ipɔl,
LUK 4:2 ikal kun'lɛb Satanà ilä an'kwem an'nà. Ilä abin byanswà nde akundiir kàdi anki. Mpal byàwü ilä abi, nde kàwem ngyal.
LUK 4:3 Satanà kàtɛn a nde naa: « Isàkal naa ngye awà Mwan a Nzam, swaŋ nkɔŋ yi ibulà nsɔ. »
LUK 4:4 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Bàsön naa: "Mbuur usàkal anki anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ntɔn nsɔ mpɛl." »
LUK 4:5 Satanà kun'syen ududu, kun'swɛŋ imfum a mɛɛn byanswà,
LUK 4:6 waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mɛ in'yapà ikɔ̈b ki kyanswà, un'naaŋ anà làkoo a imfum bi byanswà, ntɔn bya mɛ bàpɛ, mɛ sye in'fàpà akà mbuur wanswà in'kwen mɛ.
LUK 4:7 Isàkal naa ngye an'bwà an'köm kusà a mɛ, ayi yanswà iyàkal yà ngye. »
LUK 4:8 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Bàsön naa: "Ngye asàbwà an'köm kusà a Mwol, Nzam angye, ngye sye ayàsyääl nde mpɛl." »
LUK 4:9 Satanà kàfun'syen u Yɛlusàlɛm, kun'si udu a ndwà a Nzam, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Isàkal naa ngye awà Mwan a Nzam, tɔɔmà sɛmà pà tii u nsi, ntɔn bàsön naa:
LUK 4:10 "Nde ayàswaŋ in'kyeey ande ntɔn ngye, ntɔn ba batii,
LUK 4:11 anà ba sye bàsawal kan'kɔɔ aba ntɔn làkɔl angye làkɔ̈ɔ̈n abööl u nkɔŋ." »
LUK 4:12 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Bàsön naa: "Ngye asun'kur anki Mwol, Nzam angye". »
LUK 4:13 Pa kàmay nde ndɛb yanswà, Satanà waa kàlwomà tsütsü apà Yɛsu tii utaaŋ asin.
LUK 4:14 Yɛsu kàkäl aŋàyɔl a ngwal a Dweelà mpal kàfurà nde Ngalilɛ. Làsaŋ ande làpää kà itiir a nsi aki kyanswà.
LUK 4:15 Nde kàyilɔŋà uboo a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà. Baar banswà bàkyer un'sà làkoo.
LUK 4:16 Apan, Yɛsu kàkyen Nasàlɛr ikal kàyɛl nde. Asànaa ifà ande, nde kàbilà u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà ilä a saba. Nde kàmbarà ntɔn mutaŋ,
LUK 4:17 ba bun'pɛ un'kaan a ŋangɔɔm Yɛsay. Nde kàduub wa, waa kàmɛn ikal bàsön naa:
