LUK 4:18 « Dweelà a Mwol là udu amɛ, ntɔn nde kan'si an'kɔɔ ntɔn mukyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ akà aŋàlàmbwà, nde kan'töm mukyään ntsuuŋà akà baar aŋàkwɛlà, anà akà ikwàmii muman, mutsuuŋ baar bàŋàmɛɛy nkwaaŋ,
LUK 4:19 mukyään mbul usàswaŋ Mwol kab angway ande. »
LUK 4:20 Ungö apan nde kàdübà un'kaan awun, kàpɛ wa akà un'syääl, waa kàbwaay. Uboo a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà, mii myanswà myàkäl muler nde.
LUK 4:21 Apan nde kàsɛmà mutɛn a ba naa: « Itiir a Ndaa a Nzam an'taŋ mɛ yi, akà bɛ baar làweemà ya, ya yan'kwo ŋàbawà. »
LUK 4:22 Baar banswà bun'tɛɛlà imbäl: ba bàkäl mubem ntɔn ndaa aŋàbwaŋ iyatoo u mun ande, wɛɛ ba bàtɛɛnà naa: « Wà mà mwan a Yɔsɛfi! »
LUK 4:23 Apan Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mɛ inkyàyöb naa bɛ làyan'tɛɛl itim ki: "Ungaŋ, kɔɔr ngye ŋakwo, bɛ làyàtɛn naa kyer u bul angye asànaa kàkyer ngye u Kapɛrnawum."
LUK 4:24 Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ alàkyään ndandaa naa akà ŋangɔɔm mwɛy ufun'wal u nsi ande watɛy.
LUK 4:25 Mɛ alàkyään ndandaa, akweel adim bàkäl mbɔɔn u taaŋ a Ɛli kà Isàlɛl mpal mbul mpa kànɔ̈ wa mbul tär a ngɔn syaam. Ngyal yàkyer abilà u mɛɛn manswà,
LUK 4:26 wɛɛ Ɛli bun'töm anki akà umwɛy uboo a ba, bun'töm akà un'kweel un'dim mwɛy u Sarɛpta, u mɛɛn a Sidɔn.
LUK 4:27 Baar a ukyal a bay sye bàkäl mbɔɔn kà Isàlɛl utaaŋ a ŋangɔɔm Ɛlisya, ba banswà bàkɔɔrà anki, Naaman un'nsi Siri mpɛl. »
LUK 4:28 Baar banswà uboo a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà bàwem nkyɛl mbɔɔn mpal bàwem ba indiir abi byanswà.
LUK 4:29 Waa bàmbarà, bun'böŋ u bul aba, bun'syen udu a mɔŋ bàtöŋ bul aba ntɔn mukun'siinà waa nde ukàbwà u ngyɛl.
LUK 4:30 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kàlyaaŋ uboo aba, waa kàkyen.
LUK 4:31 Apan Yɛsu kàtyà Kapɛrnawum, bul a Ngalilɛ. Nde kàlɔɔŋà ilä a saba.
LUK 4:32 Baar bàmɛn ndaa yubem ntɔn nde kàlɔɔŋà a ikɔ̈b.
LUK 4:33 U ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà kàkäl anà mbuur mwɛy kàkäl anà dweelà a làbe. Mpal kàmɛn nde Yɛsu, nde kàsi in'kwɛŋ:
LUK 4:34 « Aa! Yɛsu un'nsi Nasàlɛr, ngye ininà akwen ntɔn bi? Ngye ayi ntɔn muböŋ bi? Mɛ in'kyàyöb naa ngye awà nà, ngye awà Ŋun'kyɛɛl a Nzam. »
LUK 4:35 Yɛsu waa kun'ŋän, waa kàtɛn naa: « Kal a duu, too uboo a mbuur wà. » Dweelà a làbe lun'bwiy u nsi, waa làtoo ukɔɔn akun'kyer ube.
LUK 4:36 Baar banswà bàkäl u bɔɔmà, waa bàtɛɛnà ba a ba naa: « Ndaa nà ayi? Nde wà mutɛɛnà a ngwal anà ikɔ̈b a an'dweelà an'be, ma sye màmutoo! »
LUK 4:37 Làsaŋ ande làpää kà itiir a nsi akin.
LUK 4:38 Yɛsu kàtoo u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà, waa kàkyen ndwà a Simɔn. Ukwà a Simɔn kàkäl anà làbwey a mpye mbɔɔn. Ba bun'bɔ̈ɔ̈n mukun'kɔɔr.
LUK 4:39 Yɛsu waa kànyee udu ande, waa kàböŋ ukyal aban. Umpal bàtoo ba u ndür ande, nde waa kàsubà, waa kàsɛmà mukasyääl.
LUK 4:40 U làbwàmpib, baar bàkäl anà baar a an'kyal mà ifà ifà batwäl akà Yɛsu. Nde kasi an'kɔɔ, ba waa bàkɔɔrà.
LUK 4:41 An'dweelà an'be sye màtoo anà in'kwɛŋ anà màtɛn naa: « Ngye awà Mwan a Nzam. » Wɛɛ Yɛsu katsüŋ a ngwal ntɔn ba bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n afàtɛn, ntɔn ba bàkyer ayöbà naa nde kàkäl Klistɔ.
LUK 4:42 Taaŋtyà ututu, Yɛsu kàkyer atoo, waa kàkyen kikal a mpey. Baar mbɔɔn bàkyer ayun'leŋà. Mpal bun'mɛn ba, ba bàkwen mukun'tà mpi ntɔn nde ukɔɔn asawɛy.
LUK 4:43 Wɛɛ nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mɛ in'kyer akàpay Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là imwol a Nzam kà an'bul mumwɛy, ntɔn ndaa kan'töm Nzam yayi. »
LUK 4:44 Nde kàlɔɔŋà u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà u Yuday.
LUK 5:1 Yàmɛnà naa ilä mwɛy Yɛsu kàkäl tsütsü a ɛwà a Ngɛnàsàlɛr, baar mbɔɔn bàkyer un'diŋà ntɔn muwem ndaa a Nzam.
LUK 5:2 Nde kàmɛn an'bwaar an'mɔ̈ɔ̈l mà ipɔl kà un'kɔɔl a an'dà ntɔn aŋama bàkäl musɔŋ an'kwen aba.
LUK 5:3 Nde kàlär uboo a bwaar làmwɛy, la làkäl là Simɔn, waa kun'lɔ̈ɔ̈m naa nde usiinà la ikyee uboo a an'dà. Nde waa kàbwaay, kàlɔɔŋà baar uboo a bwaar.
LUK 5:4 Mpal kàmay nde mulɔŋ, nde kàtɛn a Simɔn naa: « Làkyen uboboo a an'dà, làtɔɔm an'kwen abɛ kan'dà ntɔn mulwab nsö. »
LUK 5:5 Simɔn kun'fuur naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, bi kan'kyer mpib aŋun'kiinà, wɛɛ bi akà undiir imɛn anki. Ntɔn ngye aman'swaŋ, mɛ in'kyer atɔɔm an'kwen. »
LUK 5:6 Ungö mutɔɔm ma, ba bàsiim nsö mbɔɔn, an'kwen màkäl tsütsü mukaamà.
LUK 5:7 Ba bàbel atɔŋ aba bàkäl uboo a bwaar lumwɛy ntɔn ba babay. Ba waa bàyi, bàyööl an'bwaar màmɔ̈ɔ̈l: ma màkäl tsütsü muminà ntɔn buur a nsö.
LUK 5:8 Mpal kàmɛn Simɔn abun, nde kàbü kà in'kɔl a Yɛsu, waa kàtɛn naa: « Mwol, lwomà tsütsü apà mɛ, ntɔn mɛ in'wà mbuur a man'be. »
LUK 5:9 Ntɔn nde anà atɔŋ ande matɛɛr màkyer awal ntɔn bàsiim ba nsö mbɔɔn.
LUK 5:10 Atɔŋ ande Zyak anà Ywan, baan a Zebàday, bàkäl sye asànaa nde. Apan, Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a Simɔn naa: « Twon an'man bɔɔmà, sɛmà apanà ngye an'bulà un'lɔ̈ɔ̈b a baar. »
LUK 5:11 Ungö bàmay ba mutwey an'bwaar u nkankyel, ba bàsàwɛy ma, waa bàläb Yɛsu.
LUK 5:12 Yàmɛnà naa Yɛsu kàkäl u bul mwɛy, ŋun'kyal a bay kun'mɛn nde, nde kàbü kusà ande, waa kun'bɔ̈ɔ̈n naa: « Mwol, kya ngye asàkwen, mpööŋ. »
LUK 5:13 Yɛsu kàsilà kɔɔ ande, waa kun'bä, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mɛ an'kwen, pɔŋà! » Taaŋ nsil alan bay waa làlwomà.
LUK 5:14 Ungö apan nde kun'tsüŋ naa: « Twon an'kyään mbuur asin ndaa ayi. Wɛɛ, kyen akà ngaŋ ntɔn nde kaler, ungö waa ngye apà an'kab kàswɛŋ Mɔsɛ ntɔn mpööŋà angye, waa kya ikal imbäl ntɔn ba. »
LUK 5:15 Apan, làkoo ande làkyer apää ntsü yanswà, baar mbɔɔn bàyee ntɔn muwem ndaa ande anà muleŋ nkɔɔr unsà an'kyal aba.
LUK 5:16 Wɛɛ nde kàkyeenà kà ikal a mpey ntɔn mukàyamà Nzam.
LUK 5:17 Yàmɛnà naa ilä mwɛy Yɛsu kàkäl mulɔŋ. Amfarisi anà alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn bàkäl paa sye ban'bwaay. Ba bàfü an'bul manswà mà Ngalilɛ, mà Yuday anà Yɛlusàlɛm. Ngwal a Mwol yàkäl a Yɛsu ntɔn mukɔɔr abɛy.
LUK 5:18 Apan sye, baar amwɛy bàtwäl mbuur mwɛy aŋàkwɛkà udu a ipɔy. Ba bàleŋà mukun'biil uboo a ndwà anà bun'tɔɔl kusà a Yɛsu.
LUK 5:19 Abà bàmɛn ba naa mbwo abilà yatɛy ntɔn baar bàkäl mbɔɔn, ba bàpfuul mun u mpaan a ndwà, waa bun'tɔɔl kusà a Yɛsu u mii a baar banswà.
LUK 5:20 Mpal kàmɛn nde làkwikilà aba, Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Mbuur wà, mɛ amadwääl nkul a man'be angye. »
LUK 5:21 Amfarisi anà alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn waa bàyweerà u mpem aba naa: « Nà mbuur awà? Nde wàmubɛy Nzam. Nà kan'kwo mudwa nkul a man'be isàkal naa kà Nzam anki? »
LUK 5:22 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kàyöb nde ankyän aba, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « An'kyän nà bɛ làwe amà u mpem abɛ?
LUK 5:23 Undiir nà akɔ̈ɔ̈n mpay mutɛn: Bàmadwääl nkul angye, lɛɛ mutɛn naa: Mbarà, kyen?
LUK 5:24 Apanà, yubwaŋ bɛ làyöb naa Mwan a mbuur we anà ikɔ̈b mudwääl baar nkul a man'be aba u mɛɛn pà. » Nde kàswɛŋ mbuur aŋàkwɛkà naa: « Mɛ amaswaŋ, mbarà, sɛn ipɔy angye, furà ndwà angye. »
LUK 5:25 Taaŋ nsil alan, u mii a baar banswà, laa kàmbarà nde, kàsɛn nde ipɔy ande, waa kàfurà ndwà ande wàmuyisà Nzam làkoo.
LUK 5:26 Baar banswà bàkäl mubem, waa bàsyäŋà Nzam. Unsà bɔɔmà ba bàtɛɛnà naa: « Bi kan'man indiir ibaŋ ŋàbawà. »
LUK 5:27 Ungö apan Yɛsu kàtoo nde, nde kàmɛn un'füür a itɛr mwɛy ikɔb ande Lɛvi kan'bwaay kà ikal a isal ande. Nde kàtɛn a nde naa: « Yan'läb. »
LUK 5:28 Nde sye laa kàsàwɛy nde indiir byanswà, waa kun'läb.
LUK 5:29 Lɛvi kàwɛl Yɛsu unsà ubwaŋ banswà u ndwà ande. Afüür a itɛr mbɔɔn anà baar asin bàkäl mudyà anà nde u mɛsà.
LUK 5:30 Amfarisi anà alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn bàkyer aŋüŋün, waa bàtɛn a alɔŋki a Yɛsu naa: « Ntɔn nkye làkadyaa bɛ ikal imwɛy anà afüür a itɛr anà baar a man'be? »
LUK 5:31 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Kà baar abye anà ngwal u ndür anki bye anà mfun a un'ngaŋ, wɛɛ aŋukyal.
LUK 5:32 Mɛ kàyi anki muleŋ mbuul a mpem a baar a balàbal, wɛɛ mbuul a mpem a baar a man'be. »
LUK 5:33 Amfarisi bàtɛn ande naa: « Alɔŋki a Ywan anà alɔŋki abi bàfàkin mbɔr mbalà mbɔɔn anà muyamà Nzam, wɛ alɔŋki angye isal aba udyà anà unwà. »
LUK 5:34 Nde kafuur naa: « Nkye asam a mbuur kan'tà bɔr ban'kwo bàkin mbɔr isàkal naa nde wà paa anà ba?
LUK 5:35 Ilä kyà paa bàsàlwom ba un'tɛɛl a bɔr, apan ba waa bàsàkin mbɔr. »
LUK 5:36 Nde kàfatɛɛl nsim yi: « Akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki muwal itɛɛnà a ipfɛy akün ntɔn mubaay ipfɛy aŋànün. Ntɔn itɛɛnà akin iyàpà anki ubwaŋ unsà ipfɛy aŋànün.
LUK 5:37 Akà mbuur mwɛy sye ukwe anki musà man akün uboo a mbeen itaan: naa tɛy, man akün iyàpfuul mbeen itaan, waa ipää, mbeen sye waa ikyà bwà.
LUK 5:38 Yubwaŋ musà man akün u mbeen akün.
LUK 5:39 Akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki mukwen man akün isàkal naa nde akyàfuràtànwà man itaan, ntɔn nde ayàtɛn naa: "Man a itaan mà ntsà." »
LUK 6:1 Yàmɛnà naa ilä a saba mwey, Yɛsu kàkäl mulyaaŋ uboo a an'ywaŋ a blɛ. Alɔŋki ande bàbwee imfà, ungö mupfipfiy bya kà an'kɔɔ aba, waa bàdyee mbɛŋ a bya.
LUK 6:2 Amfarisi amwɛy bàkäl paa bàtɛn a ba naa: « Ntɔn nkye làkyerà bɛ ndaa mpa bàfàkyer kà ilä a saba? »
LUK 6:3 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Nkye bɛ làtäŋ anki ndaa kàkyer David mpal kàwem nde ngyal anà baar bàkäl anà nde?
LUK 6:4 Nde kàbilà u ndwà a Nzam, kàwɛl mampà ufàpà ibɔɔn akà Nzam laa kàdi nde, mumwɛy nde kàpɛ akà baar bàkäl anà nde, itàkal naa ma angaŋ mpɛl bàfàdyà. »
LUK 6:5 Nde waa kàfàkwɛy abà: « Mwan a mbuur wà mfum a saba. »
LUK 6:6 Yàmɛnà sye naa ilä a saba kyumwɛy Yɛsu kàbilà u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà, waa kàlɔɔŋà. Uboo kwo kàkäl anà mbuur kàkäl anà kɔɔ ibaal làŋàkwɛkà.
LUK 6:7 Alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn anà Amfarisi bàkäl musyebà Yɛsu a duu ntɔn muyöb naa nkye nde akyer akɔɔr mbuur ilä a saba, ntɔn ba bun'bämà ndaa.
LUK 6:8 Wɛɛ nde kàkyer ayöb an'kyän aba, waa kàbel mbuur kàkäl anà kɔɔ aŋàkwɛkà: « Mbarà, mbar uboboo pà. » Mbuur awà waa kàmbarà, waa kàmbär uboboo a baar.
LUK 6:9 Yɛsu waa kafuul naa: « Mɛ in'kwen muyöb: Nkye yubwaŋ mukyer ubwaŋ lɛɛ mukyer ube ilä a saba? Mutswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbuur lɛɛ mukɔɔn atswà wa ilä a saba? »
LUK 6:10 Ungö apan, Yɛsu kàler ba banswà, waa kàtɛn a mbuur awun naa: « Sen kɔɔ angye. » Nde sye waa kàsen la, laa làkɔɔrà la.
LUK 6:11 Alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn anà Amfarisi bàwem nkyɛl, waa bàsɛmà mutɛn ba a ba naa ba ininà bàkyer akà Yɛsu.
LUK 6:12 Mpal ayin Yɛsu kàlär udu a mɔŋ ntɔn mukàyamà. Nde kwo kàkyer mpib aŋun'kiinà muyamà Nzam.
LUK 6:13 Taaŋtyà, nde kàbel alɔŋki ande, waa kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l kwem aŋiyweel uboo a ba, nde kapɛ ikɔb naa antööm:
LUK 6:14 Simɔn, nde kun'pɛ ikɔb a Petɔlà, un'tɔŋ ande Andrɛ, Zyak, Ywan, Filipo, Bàtelàmay,
LUK 6:15 Màtay, Tuma, Zyak mwan a Alfɛ, Simɔn mbuur a mankay,
LUK 6:16 Yudà mwan a Zyak, anà Yudas Iskaryɔt, mbuur ayun'yälà.
LUK 6:17 Ungö apan nde kàyàtyà anà ba, waa bàmbär kà ikal mwɛy kyà ibär, ikal bàkäl alɔŋki ande mbɔɔn anà un'kàbɔ a baar: baar a Yuday lanswà, bà Yɛlusàlɛm, anà baar bàfü un'kɔɔl a an'dà, a Tir anà Sidɔn.
LUK 6:18 Ba bàyi ntɔn mukun'wem anà ba bàkɔɔrà unsà an'kyal aba. Baar bàkäl anà an'dweelà an'be, bàkyer akɔɔrà.
LUK 6:19 Baar banswà bàleŋà muba nde u ndür, ntɔn ngwal mbɔɔn yàkatoo u ndür ande, ya yàkɔɔrà ba banswà.
LUK 6:20 Apan Yɛsu kàler alɔŋki ande, waa kàtɛn naa: « Un'sak akà bɛ aŋàlàmbwà, ntɔn imwol a Nzam kye anà bɛ!
LUK 6:21 Un'sak akà bɛ baar làwe anà ngyal mpalàbà, ntɔn bɛ làkyer asàyuur! Un'sak akà bɛ baar làlelà ŋàbawà, ntɔn bɛ làkyer asàsɛ!
LUK 6:22 « Un'sak asàkal akà bɛ isàkal naa ba bàmàlàyiiŋ, bàmàlàböŋ, bàmàlato, bàmàlapiy asànaa undiir a ŋingyäy ntɔn Mwan a mbuur!
LUK 6:23 Làkäl unsà un'sak mpal isàkwo ndaa ayin ntɔn bweel abɛ làsàkal mbɔɔn u du, ntɔn bànkaa aba bàkyerà abà akà aŋangɔɔm. »
LUK 6:24 « Wɛɛ ngyɛb akà bɛ, aŋun'naaŋ, ntɔn bɛ ndɛɛl abɛ lan'wal nsil apà.
LUK 6:25 Ngyɛb akà bɛ baar lan'yuur mpalàbà, ntɔn bɛ làsàwem ngyal. Ngyɛb akà bɛ baar làsɛɛ mpalàyi, ntɔn bɛ làsàkal kun'saabà anà uboo a ilel.
LUK 6:26 Ngyɛb, isàkal naa baar bàfàtɛn ndaa aŋàbwaŋ mpɛl akà bɛ, ntɔn bànkaa aba bàkyerà abà akà aŋangɔɔm a loor.
LUK 6:27 « Wɛɛ bɛ baar banswà làweemà mɛ, mɛɛ alàkyään abà: Lakwen ayiiŋ abɛ, làkyer ubwaŋ akà baar bàfàlakyer ube,
LUK 6:28 làfuum làpɛɛm akà baar bàfàlaküül anà làyamà ntɔn baar bàfàlatwee.
LUK 6:29 Isàkal naa mbuur kàmapà mbar u twam, fàlɛɛ twam lumwɛy. Isàkal naa mbuur kan'gyɔɔr inkur angye, twon amun'tsuŋ muwal kàzak angye.
LUK 6:30 Pà akà mbuur wanswà kan'lɔm, wɛɛ twon an'lɔm undiir angye akà mbuur kan'gyɔɔr wa.
LUK 6:31 Undiir wanswà akwen ngye naa baar bàkyer akà ngye, kyer abun sye akà baar bumwɛy.
LUK 6:32 Isàkal naa ngye afàkwen baar bàfakwen, ngye bweel nà an'wal uboo kwo? Baar abɛ sye bàfàkwen baar bàfakwen.
LUK 6:33 Isàkal naa ngye ubwaŋ afàkyer akà baar bàfakyer ubwaŋ, ngye bweel nà an'wal uboo kwo? Baar abɛ sye bàfàkyer abun.
LUK 6:34 Isàkal naa ngye afàsɔɔm baar an'sà ngye làkyän naa ba bàkyer asafuur, bweel nà ngye an'wal? Ntɔn baar abɛ sye bàfàpà akà baar abɛ ntɔn ba sye bàfàwal asànaa ban'pà ba.
LUK 6:35 Làkwen ayiiŋ abɛ, làkyer ubwaŋ, làpɛ ukɔɔn adil bweel. Waa bweel abɛ làsàkal làkölàköl, bɛ sye làsàkal baan a Mwol a du, ntɔn nde afàswaŋ ubwaŋ ande akà baar bàfàfuur ube kà ikal a ubwaŋ anà akà baar abɛ.
LUK 6:36 Làkäl baar aŋàyɔl a ukwen ntɔn Taaràbɛ wàŋàyɔl a ukwen. »
LUK 6:37 « Twon lan'tsüül baar nsaŋ, waa bɛ sye mpa bàsàlatsüül nsaŋ. Twon lan'pà baar ikwàndwà, waa bɛ sye mpa bàsàlapà ikwàndwà. Làdwääl nkul, waa bɛ sye bàsàladwääl nkul.
LUK 6:38 Làpɛ, waa bɛ bàsàlapà: bàsàyööl mpàkɔr a kölàköl a ipfɛy abɛ a mbäl aŋàbwaŋ, yàŋàkinà, yàŋàndyeer, yàŋàpää. Ntɔn Nzam an'kab ande akà bɛ nde asàsi unsà isii làfàsyääl bɛ ntɔn baar bumwɛy. »
LUK 6:39 Yɛsu kàfàtɛn a ba u itim naa: « Nkye ikwàmii kan'kwo musyen ikwàmii wumwɛy? Nkye ba bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l bàkàbwà anki u fu?
LUK 6:40 Un'lɔŋki ukwe anki mulyaaŋ un'lɔɔŋ ande. Wɛɛ un'lɔŋki afàsyääl ndaa a un'lɔɔŋ ande afàbulà asànaa un'lɔɔŋ ande.
LUK 6:41 Ntɔn nkye amanà ngye isɛrà a un'lɛŋ akyà u dii a un'tɔŋ angye, wɛ ngye amanà anki kyɔɔl là u dii angye?
LUK 6:42 Ngye an'kwo aben mutɛn a un'tɔŋ angye naa: "Un'tɔŋ, yà mɛ alwom isɛrà a un'lɛŋ ki u dii angye", ngye mbuur mpa akamanà kyɔɔl alà u dii angye? Mbuur a mpem yweel, twab atàlwom kyɔɔl là u dii angye, ungö apan ngye waa ayàman ubwaŋàbwaŋ ntɔn ngye alwom isɛrà a un'lɛŋ ki u dii a un'tɔŋ angye. »
LUK 6:43 Yɛsu kàfàtɛn naa: « Un'te aŋàbwaŋ ufàbɔr anki mbɛŋ ambe, un'te un'be sye ufàbɔr anki mbɛŋ aŋàbwaŋ.
LUK 6:44 Ntɔn un'te wanswà bàfàyöb unsà mbɛŋ a wa. Fige bàfàkwol anki unsà ibwiy a nsyeenà, rɛzɛ sye bàfàbwo anki u mikyɛl.
LUK 6:45 Mbuur aŋàbwaŋ afàwal ndaa aŋàbwaŋ unsà an'kyän aŋàbwaŋ màfàtoo u mpem ande, wɛɛ mbuur un'be afàwal ndaa a mbe unsà an'kyän ande mube. Ntɔn ndaa yanswà ufàtɛn mbuur ifàfà u mpem ande. »
LUK 6:46 « Wɛɛ Ntɔn nkye lan'beelà bɛ naa Mwol, Mwol, wɛɛ bɛ ndaa amɛ làfàlab anki?
LUK 6:47 Mɛ in'kyer ayàlàswaŋ naa mbuur afàwem ndaa amɛ anà afàsyääl ya, nde wà nà:
LUK 6:48 Nde wà asànaa mbuur kàkwen mutoŋ ndwà ande, kàkyer atim, ufàtim, waa kàmɛn nkɔŋ ntɔn musà un'bään a ntööŋ udu a nkɔŋ ayi. Mbul a ngwal kànɔ̈ wa, un'pöb a ngwal kàni wa ndwà ayin, wɛɛ ndwà ayin yàbü anki ntɔn ya bàtɔ̈ŋ udu a nkɔŋ.
LUK 6:49 Wɛɛ mbuur afàwem ndaa amɛ wɛɛ nde ya ufàsyääl anki, wà asànaa mbuur kàtɔ̈ŋ ndwà ande udu a ansɛŋ ukɔɔn un'bään, ibɔɔ a an'dà laa byà ni bya ndwà ayin, laa yàbwabà ya. »
LUK 7:1 Ungö mutɛn a baar ndaa yanswà kàkwen nde mutɛn, Yɛsu kàkyen Kapɛrnawum.
LUK 7:2 Un'tsüüŋ a kaptɛn mwɛy aŋità a Lɔmà kàfakweenà nde mbɔɔn kàkäl anà ukyal, tsütsü mukwà.
LUK 7:3 Mpal kàwem nde làsaŋ a Yɛsu, nde kàtöm abyääl a Ayudà ntɔn ba bàkun'bɔɔn naa nde uyàkɔɔr un'tsüüŋ ande.
LUK 7:4 Ba waa bàyi akà Yɛsu, bun'bɔ̈ɔ̈n, waa bàtɛn naa: « Mbuur wà kan'kwo muwal bweel aŋàkwo,
LUK 7:5 ntɔn nde afàkwen nsi abi, nde sye kàtöŋ ndwà a nköŋ abi a ngim ande ŋakwo. »
LUK 7:6 Yɛsu kàkyen anà ba. Mpal kàkäl nde tsütsü a ndwà a mbuur awun, mbuur wa kàtɔ̈m asam ande ntɔn mutɛn naa: « Mwol, twon an'pà ndür ngye mpay. Mɛ in'wà mbuur a man'be, mɛ in'kwe anki muwal ngye u ndwà amɛ.
LUK 7:7 Lalan mpa in'yi mɛ, mɛ ŋakwo. Tɛn ngɔk mwɛy ntɔn un'tsüüŋ amɛ ukɔɔrà.
LUK 7:8 Ntɔn mɛ ŋakwo in'wà mfum u ngyɛl, wɛɛ mɛ in'we anà aŋità in'fàler mɛ, mɛ in'sàtɛn a umwɛy naa: "Kyen", laa ukyà nde. Mɛ in'sàtɛn a wàsin naa: "Yà", laa uyà nde. Mɛ in'sàtɛn a un'tsüüŋ amɛ naa: "Kyer abà", laa ukyer nde. »
LUK 7:9 Mpal kàwem Yɛsu ndaa ayi, nde kàkyey kaptɛn awà, waa ubulà, uler baar banswà bàyun'labà, waa kàtɛn naa: « Mɛ, mɛ alàkyään, itàkal kà Isàlɛl mɛ ŋàtàman anki làkwikilà a mbɔɔn abà. »
LUK 7:10 Baar kàtöm kaptɛn, bàfurà ba ndwà ande, ba bàmɛn un'tsüüŋ ande wàŋàkɔɔrà.
LUK 7:11 Yàkäl naa ilä kyàlääb pa, Yɛsu kàkyen bul mwey ikɔb a la Nayin. Alɔŋki ande anà un'sɛŋ a baar bàkäl mukyà anà nde.
LUK 7:12 Mpal kàkäl nde tsütsü a bul alan, iköŋ a baar kyàkäl mukàdyee ndom, mwan baal mwɛy mpɛl wà un'kweel a un'dim mwɛy. Baar a bul alan mbɔɔn bàkäl anà nde.
LUK 7:13 Mpal kun'mɛn Mwol, ngyɛb yàkyer un'käär, waa kun'kyään naa: « Twon an'lel! »
LUK 7:14 Nde kàsin tsütsü a un'böl, waa kàbä wa. Baar bàyisyeenà wa laa bàmbär ba. Nde waa kàtɛn naa: « Mwan baal, mɛ amaswaŋ, wiyà! »
LUK 7:15 Ndom waa ubwaay, waa usɛmà muyäm. Yɛsu waa kun'fuur akà ngwän.
LUK 7:16 Baar banswà bàkäl u bɔɔmà anà musyäŋà Nzam, waa bàtɛɛnà naa: « Ŋangɔɔm a kölàköl kan'too uboo a bi, Nzam kan'yàbay baar ande. »
LUK 7:17 Làsaŋ a Yɛsu alà làkyer apää u Yuday lanswà anà kà an'bul a tsütsü manswà.
LUK 7:18 Alɔŋki a Ywan bàkyer un'kyäänà ndaa ayi.
LUK 7:19 Nde kàbel abɔ̈ɔ̈l uboo a ba, waa katöm akà Mwol ntɔn ba bun'fuul naa: « Nkye ngye awà Klistɔ awà ayàyà, lɛɛ bi ikyer adil wàsin? »
LUK 7:20 Mpal bàkɔlà ba apà Yɛsu, ba bàtɛn a nde naa: « Ywan Un'düümà kàmitɔm akà ngye ntɔn muyöb naa nkye ngye awà mbuur awayàyà, lɛɛ bi ikyer adil wàsin? »
LUK 7:21 Taaŋ nsil alan, Yɛsu waa ukɔɔr baar a an'kyal mbɔɔn, baar bàkäl anà an'too anà baar bàkäl anà an'dweelà an'be, waa uduub mii a ikwàmii mbɔɔn.
LUK 7:22 Nde kafuur abà: « Kàlun'kyään Ywan ndaa yanswà lan'man anà lan'wem bɛ: Ikwàmii bàmuman, ikar bàmumbarà, baar a ukyal a bay bàmupɔŋà, ikwan'tsü bàmuwem, ndom yàmuwiyà, ndaa a Nzam bàmulɔŋ akà aŋàlàmbwà.
LUK 7:23 Un'sak akà mbuur mpa asàpiy làkwikilà ande amu mɛ. »
LUK 7:24 Ungö a nkyeen a alɔŋki a Ywan, Yɛsu kàsɛmà mutà imbäl a Ywan: « Bɛ ininà làkàler u nsye a ipɔl? Kite a iful kànini un'pöb?
LUK 7:25 Wɛɛ bɛ ininà làkàler? Mbuur kàbwäärà a ntwɛn? Làler, baar bàfàbwaar ipfɛy a ntal anà bàfàkal unsà un'naaŋ, bàfàkal uboo a ndwà a amfum.
LUK 7:26 Bɛ ininà làkàler? Ŋangɔɔm mwɛy? Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, nde kan'söön ŋangɔɔm.
LUK 7:27 Nde wà mbuur awà bàsön naa: "Le, mɛ an'tɔm un'kyeey amɛ kusà angye, ntɔn muyilà mbwo angye kusà a ngye."
LUK 7:28 « Mɛ alàkyään naa uboo a baar banswà kàbör un'kaar, akà umwɛy kàmusöön watɛy. Wɛɛ kimbuur ikikye uboo a Imwol a Nzam kàmun'söön. »
LUK 7:29 Baar banswà bàweemà ndaa ande, itàkal afüür a itɛr, bàkyer akyey naa Nzam wà balàbal, lalan bàkyeenà ba mukàwal ndüümà a Ywan.
LUK 7:30 Wɛɛ amfarisi anà alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn bàtön ndaa kàkwen Nzam ntɔn ba anà ndüümà a Ywan.
LUK 7:31 Yɛsu kàfàtɛn naa: « Mɛ baar a taaŋ alà an'kwo mukasi anà nà? Ba bà asànaa bànà?
LUK 7:32 Ba bà asànaa baan bàfàmbàmbar u balàbal anà bàfàtɛn ba a ba naa: Bi kàlabɛɛrà mfuŋ, wɛɛ bɛ làkyen anki, bi kàlàtɔ̈ɔ̈l an'diim a ilel, wɛɛ bɛ làlel anki.
LUK 7:33 Ntɔn Ywan Un'düümà kàkyer ayà, kàdyee anki nsɔ, kànwee anki man, wɛɛ bɛ làtɛɛnà naa: Nde we anà dweelà a làbe.
LUK 7:34 Mwan a mbuur kan'yà, akyer adyà, akyer anwà, wɛɛ bɛ làtɛn naa: "Awà wà ndyeel anà un'nweel a man, un'sam a afüür a itɛr anà baar a man'be."
LUK 7:35 Wɛɛ an'yeerà a Nzam, baar bàfàman naa ma màbalàbal bà baar bàfàkyey ma. »
LUK 7:36 Yàmɛnà naa umfarisi mwɛy kàbel Yɛsu mukàdyà u ndwà ande. Yɛsu kàbilà nde u ndwà a mbuur awun, waa kàsɛmà mudyà u mɛsà.
LUK 7:37 U bul alan kàkäl anà un'kaar a pasàsɛ mwɛy. Mpal kàwem nde naa Yɛsu wàmudyà u ndwà a mbuur awun, nde kàyàbilà anà làbuuŋ a pɛɛl làŋàyɔl a may a usɔŋ,
LUK 7:38 nde kàbü ungö a Yɛsu kà in'kɔl ande. Nde kàkäl mulel, nsaaŋ ande yàbwee kà in'kɔl a Yɛsu, waa kàkɔɔmà ya a ntswe ande, kàndüürà mya, waa kàkiirà mya may a usɔŋ.
LUK 7:39 Un'mfarisi awà kàbel Yɛsu u ndwà ande kàmɛn nde abun, laa kàyweerà nde u mpem naa: « Mbuur wà ulàkal ŋangɔɔm a ndandaa, nde akyer alàyöb naa un'kaar awà wà nà, nde akyer alàyöb naa nde wà un'kaar a pasàsɛ. »
LUK 7:40 Yɛsu kun'fuur u ndaa a dudu naa: « Simɔn, mɛ in'we anà kindaa muyäm anà ngye. » Nde kàfuur naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, yäm. »
LUK 7:41 Yɛsu naa: « Ilä mwɛy un'pɛɛl a nkul mwɛy kàkäl anà asɔ̈ɔ̈m abɔ̈ɔ̈l. Wàtàtwɛb kàlun'fuur an'falà nkam tyeen, wàyweel an'falà an'kwem an'tyeen.
LUK 7:42 Baar abà bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l bàkäl anki anà ngim mukun'fuur. Nde waa kadwääl nkul. Uboo a baar abà bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l, nà ayun'kwen aŋàsöön? »
LUK 7:43 Simɔn kun'fuur naa: « Mɛ in'kasii naa mbuur awà kàdwääl nde nkul a mbɔɔn. » Yɛsu naa: « An'man, ngye an'yweer ubwaŋ. »
LUK 7:44 Ungö apan, Yɛsu waa uler un'kaar awun, waa utɛn a Simɔn naa: « Ngye akyun'manà un'kaar wà? In'bilà mɛ u ndwà angye, ngye an'dà an'pɛ anki muywɛy in'kɔl, wɛɛ nde, nde mya kan'ywɛy a nsaaŋ ande anà kan'kɔɔm mya a ntswe ande.
LUK 7:45 Ngye mɛ andüür anki, wɛɛ nde, sɛmà in'bilà mɛ nde uyɔ̈n anki mundüür in'kɔl amɛ.
LUK 7:46 Ngye mɛ may a usɔŋ an'tsüül anki kun'tswe, wɛɛ nde, nde kan'tsuul may a usɔŋ kà in'kɔl amɛ.
LUK 7:47 Lalan mɛ akyään naa bàkyun'dwääl nkul a man'be ande manswà, ntɔn nde kan'kwen mbɔɔn. Wɛɛ mbuur akwà bàmun'dwääl nkul a man'be ikikye, nde akwen sye ikikye. »
LUK 7:48 Waa nde kàtɛn a un'kaar awun naa: « Mɛ amadwääl nkul a man'be angye. »
LUK 7:49 Baar bumwɛy bàkäl anà nde bàtɛɛnà u mpem naa: « Mbuur awà wà nà, nde mudwääl baar nkul a man'be aba? »
LUK 7:50 Waa Yɛsu kàtɛn a un'kaar awun naa: « Làkwikilà angye làmatswà mɔ̈ɔ̈, kyen unsà duu. »
LUK 8:1 Yàkäl naa ungö a an'taaŋ, Yɛsu kàkyen uboo a an'bul a kölàköl anà an'bul ikikye ntɔn mulɔŋ anà mupay làsaŋ a Ndaa Aŋàbwaŋ yà Imwol a Nzam, alɔŋki bàkwem aŋiyweel bàkäl anà nde
LUK 8:2 anà akaar amwɛy kàkɔɔr nde unsà an'dweelà an'be anà an'kyal mà ifà ifà: Màlye bàfabeelà un'nsi Magàdala, uboo ande insɔŋà nsambwaar myàtoo,
LUK 8:3 Zyan, un'kyay a Shuzà mbuur a isal a Ɛlɔdi, Suzan, anà akaar asin bàyibayà Yɛsu anà alɔŋki ande unsà indiir aba.
LUK 8:4 Baar mbɔɔn bàfü an'bul a kölàköl bàyàköŋ apà Yɛsu. Nde katɛɛl nsim yi:
LUK 8:5 « Un'köön mwɛy kàtoo mukàkɔn mbɛŋ ande. Umpal kàmwɛŋ nde ya, yar làmwɛy làbü u mbwo: baar bàndyaar ya, nɛn a du waa yàdi ya.
LUK 8:6 Yar lumwɛy làbü udu a nkɔŋ: mpal yàmɛn ya, bite laa byàyöm bya, ntɔn mɛɛn màkäl màŋàyɔm.
LUK 8:7 Yar lumwɛy làbü uboo a nsyeenà: nsyeenà yàyɛl mbwo mwɛy anà in'te, waa yàfwee mya.
LUK 8:8 Yar lumwɛy làbü u mɛn aŋàbwaŋ: mpal làyɛl la, la làbör mbɛŋ mbɔɔn: imbɛŋ mwɛy kyàbör mbɛŋ nkam anà nkam. » Yɛsu waa kàkwɛy abà: « Wɛy mbuur awe anà an'tsü awem uwem. »
LUK 8:9 Alɔŋki ande bun'fuul naa nsim ayi iswaŋà aben.
LUK 8:10 Nde kafuur naa: « Bweel a bɛ là naa bɛ làkyàyöb ngyee a imwol a Nzam, wɛ akà baar bumwɛy, ndaa ayi bàfakyään unsà nsim. Ntɔn, "itàkal naa ba bàkyer aleerà, ba bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n aman, "itàkal naa ba bàkyer aweemà, ba bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n ayöb." »
LUK 8:11 « Mpalàbà làwem mbuul a nsim ayi: Mbɛŋ yà ndaa a Nzam.
LUK 8:12 Kɔl a mbwo, là baar bàfàwem ndaa a Nzam, wɛɛ Satanà waa uyàlwom ya u mpem aba ntɔn ba bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n asà làkwikilà anà bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n awà möö.
LUK 8:13 Udu a nkɔŋ yà baar bàfàwem ndaa a Nzam anà bàfàwal ya unsà un'sak, wɛɛ ba ya bàfàkaar anki u mpem aba, làkwikilà aba bwɛl latɛy. La in'swɛy myatɛy, isàkal naa mpay yan'yà, ba ban'piy làkwikilà aba.
LUK 8:14 Mbɛŋ yàbü u nsyeenà yà baar bàfàwem ndaa a Nzam, wɛɛ ba ya bàfàküünà a mpay anà ngyal a indiir a mɛɛn. Abun ya ifàbɔr anki mbɛŋ.
LUK 8:15 Mbɛŋ yàbü u mɛn aŋàbwaŋ yà baar bàfàwem ndaa a Nzam anà bàfàwal ya unsà un'sak, bàfàkaar ya u mpem aba anà bàfàsyääl ya. Ya ifàbɔr mbɛŋ. »
LUK 8:16 Yɛsu kàläb abà: « Akà mbuur mwey ukwe anki mukyä mwinà waa ukümà wa kantin, itàkal usi wa ungyɛl a itäb. Wɛɛ nde wa asà udu a ikɔlà a un'te ntɔn baar bàbilà u ndwà bàmɛn pɛɛlà.
LUK 8:17 Undiir wanswà wàŋàyee ŋàbawà, akyer asàmɛnà u pɛɛlà. Undiir wanswà wà unku, baar bàkyer asàyöb wa, wa sye asàmɛnà u leŋ.
LUK 8:18 Làlɛɛ an'tsü abɛ ntɔn muwem ubwaŋàbwaŋ, ntɔn bàsàkwɛy akà mbuur awe anà undiir, wɛ akà mbuur mpa awe anà undiir bàsàlwom undiir ufàsi nde naa nde we anà wa. »
LUK 8:19 Yàmɛnà naa ngwän anà atɔŋ a Yɛsu bàyi muyàbwey anà nde, wɛɛ yàkäl mpay ba mukun'man ntɔn baar bàkäl mbɔɔn.
LUK 8:20 Baar bun'kyään naa: « Ngwa anà atɔŋ angye bà unsà, ba bàkwen mukaman. »
LUK 8:21 Nde kafuur naa: « Maa anà atɔŋ amɛ bà baar bàfàwem ndaa a Nzam anà bàfàsyääl ya. »
LUK 8:22 Yàlɔ̈m naa ilä mwɛy, Yɛsu kàbilà u bwaar a kölàköl anà alɔŋki ande, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Tsweenà bi isabà sim a ɛwà. » Ba waa bàkyen.
LUK 8:23 Mpal bàkäl ba mubweel, Yɛsu waa kàbɔ̈ɔ̈n. Kà imbürà, un'pöb a ngwal kàyi udu a ɛwà. An'dà waa màsɛmà mubilà u bwaar, ba bàkäl u mpay a ukwà.
LUK 8:24 Alɔŋki bàsin tsütsü apà Yɛsu, waa bun'wiy anà in'kwɛŋ u mun: « Un'lɔɔŋ, Un'lɔɔŋ, bi abà ikwà! » Nde waa usubà, waa uŋän un'pöb anà ibɔ a kölàköl byà an'dà: bya waa byàkwamà, duu waa làbilà.
LUK 8:25 Apan, Yɛsu kàtɛn a alɔŋki ande naa: « Làkwikilà abɛ làken? » Wɛɛ ba bàkäl u bɔɔmà anà unsà ubem, ba bàtɛɛnà ba a ba naa: « Baal awà wà nà? Nde wàmuŋän un'pöb anà ibɔ a an'dà, bya sye byàmukun'weemà. »
LUK 8:26 Ba bàkɔlà u mɛɛn a Ngɛlàsà u sim a Ngalilɛ.
LUK 8:27 Pa kàtɔ̈l Yɛsu làkɔl u mɛɛn, mbuur mwɛy wà bul alan kàkäl anà insɔŋà mbɔɔn, nde kàyi akà Yɛsu. Sɛmà itaan nde kàkälà nsàpɔl. Nde kàkweenà anki mukal u ndwà, nde kàfabwaayà uboboo a an'dii.
LUK 8:28 Mpal kàmɛn nde Yɛsu, nde kabü kà in'kɔl ande, waa kàlal in'kwɛŋ mutɛn u ndaa a ngwal naa: « Yɛsu, Mwan a Nzam a Dudu, mɛ anà ngye un'tüüb nà? Mɛ amabɔɔn, twon aman'pà mpay. »
LUK 8:29 Yɛsu waa kàböŋ insɔŋà myàkäl uboo a mbuur awà. Ntɔn mya myun'bilà itaan. Ba bàfun'bäämà an'dwaaŋ anà impaaŋ a in'te kà an'kɔɔ anà kà in'kɔl ntɔn nde ukɔ̈ɔ̈n atiin. Wɛɛ nde kàkyer afatsuulà mya myanswà, insɔŋà myun'syeenà u nsye a ipɔl.
LUK 8:30 Yɛsu waa kun'fuul naa: « Ikɔb angye nà? » Nde kàfuur naa: « Un'kàbɔ. » Ntɔn insɔŋà mbɔɔn myàbilà amu ande.
LUK 8:31 Insɔŋà amin myàbɔ̈ɔ̈n Yɛsu naa nde ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akatɔm uboo a un'baan.
LUK 8:32 Wɛɛ tsütsü apan làkäl anà làböl a ngul làmuyidyà udu a mɔŋ, lalan myàlɔ̈m mya akà Yɛsu naa mya myàbilà uboo a ngul. Nde waa kapɛ mbwo.
LUK 8:33 Apan, insɔŋà myàtoo mya unsà mbuur awun, mya myàbilà u ngul ayin, làböl a ngul waa làparà ntiin fà iköl a mɔŋ, laa làkàbwà la kà an'dà, waa làminà.
LUK 8:34 Aseey bàmɛn ba abun, laa bàtiin ba, bàkyen ba mukàpay làsaŋ kà an'bul anà kà itsuŋ a ndwà.
LUK 8:35 Baar bàyi ntɔn muyöb naa ya yàlyaaŋ aben. Mpal bàyàtol ba tsütsü apà Yɛsu, bàmɛn ba ŋukɔŋ akyàbwaay kà in'kɔl a Yɛsu, akyàbwaar, akyàkal a duu, ba bàmɛn bɔɔmà.
LUK 8:36 Baar bàkäl paa mpal kàkɔɔr nde ŋukɔŋ, bàkyäänà baar naa nde kun'kɔɔr aben.
LUK 8:37 Kyakin baar a Ngɛlàsa banswà bàkäl ba u bɔɔmà, waa bàlɔ̈m akà Yɛsu mulwomà apà ba. Nde kàbilà u bwaar ntɔn mufurà.
LUK 8:38 Mbuur awà kàkɔɔrà unsà an'dweelà an'be kàlɔ̈m akà Yɛsu naa nde uyilyaaŋ anà nde, wɛɛ Yɛsu kun'fuur naa:
LUK 8:39 « Furà ndwà angye, kyen kakyään ndaa yanswà kan'kyer Nzam akà ngye. » Lalan mbuur awà kàkàpay nde làsaŋ a ndaa yanswà kàkyer Yɛsu akà nde u bul lanswà.
LUK 8:40 Mpal kàfurà Yɛsu Ngalilɛ, baar banswà bun'wɛl unsà ubwaŋ banswà, ntɔn ba bàkäl mukun'dilà.
LUK 8:41 Apan mbuur mwɛy ikɔb ande Zayirɔs laa kàyi nde. Nde kàkäl mfum a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà. Nde kàbü kà in'kɔl a Yɛsu, waa kun'bɔ̈ɔ̈n naa nde ukyen ndwà ande:
LUK 8:42 mwan ande mwɛy mpɛl wà un'kaar wà tsütsü mbul kwem aŋiyweel kàkäl musyäämà mɔ̈ɔ̈. Yɛsu waa kàkyen ndwà a mbuur awun. Apan, baar mbɔɔn bàyibääbà u mbil a ndür ande.
LUK 8:43 Uboo a baar aban kàkäl anà un'kaar mwɛy kàyimanà an'kil mbul kwem aŋiyweel. Nde kàdwä ngim mbɔɔn akà angaŋ, wɛɛ nde kàkɔɔra anki.
LUK 8:44 Nde kàsin tsütsü ungö a Yɛsu, waa kun'bä u làpan a ipfɛy ande. Taaŋ nsil alan an'kil laa màtsü ma mutoo.
LUK 8:45 Yɛsu waa kàfuul naa: « Nà kàman'ba? » Wɛɛ akà mbuur mwɛy kàkyey anki. Petɔlà waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ambà Un'lɔɔŋ, baar bàmasà uboboo, bà mbɔɔn bà imbäm'dir anà ngye. »
LUK 8:46 Nde waa kàtɛn naa: « Mbuur akyer an'ba: mɛ in'kyer awem naa dweelà a ngwal mwɛy lan'too u ndür amɛ. »
LUK 8:47 Un'kaar awun kàmɛn nde naa undiir kàkyer nde kan'mɛnà u mii a baar, laa kàsin nde tsütsü apà Yɛsu, kàbü nde kà inkɔl ande, waa kàtɛn u mii a baar ntɔn nkye kun'bä nde anà muswaŋ naa taaŋ nsil alan nde waa kàkɔɔrà.
LUK 8:48 Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mangwa, làkwikilà angye làmatswà mɔ̈ɔ̈, kyen unsà duu. »
LUK 8:49 Nde kàkäl anki aŋàtàmay mutɛn mpal kàyi mbuur kàfü ndwà a mfum a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà. Waa kun'kyään naa: « Mwan angye wà unkaar kan'kwà, twon afun'twääl Un'lɔɔŋ nkwom. »
LUK 8:50 Mpal kàwem Yɛsu abwɛy, nde kàtɛn a Zayirɔs naa: « Twon an'man bɔɔmà, sà làkwikilà mpɛl, mwan angye akyer akɔɔrà. »
LUK 8:51 Mpal kàkɔlà nde, Yɛsu kàkwen anki naa baar asin bàbilà u ndwà, wɛ Petɔlà, Ywan, Zyak, taar anà ngwän a mwan mpɛl.
LUK 8:52 Ntsü yanswà baar bàkäl mulel. Yɛsu waa kàtɛn naa: « Twon lan'lel, nde ukü anki, nde kan'bɔ̈ɔ̈n twaal. »
LUK 8:53 Wɛɛ ba bàkyer un'sɛɛ, ntɔn ba bàkyer ayöbà naa nde kàkäl aŋàkwà.
LUK 8:54 Apan, Yɛsu kàtɛ kɔɔ a kimwan un'kaar awun mpi, waa kàtɛn a nde u ndaa a ngwal naa: « Mwan amɛ, wiyà! »
LUK 8:55 Laa kàwiyà nde, waa kàmbarà. Yɛsu kàswɛŋ naa ba bun'pɛ udyà.
LUK 8:56 Aböör a mwan un'kaar awun matɛɛr màkyer awal. Wɛɛ Yɛsu katsüŋ mukyään mbuur asin ndaa ayin.
LUK 9:1 Yɛsu kàtüüb antööm bàkwem aŋiyweel, waa kapɛ ngwal anà ikɔ̈b muböŋ insɔŋà myanswà anà mukɔɔr an'kyal.
LUK 9:2 Ungö apan, waa katöm mukàpay làsaŋ a Imwol a Nzam anà mukɔɔr an'kyal.
LUK 9:3 Nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Twon lan'wal undiir ntɔn mbwo: itàkal unsɔk, itàkal ngɔɔr, itàkal isaa, itàkal ngim. Twon lan'syen inkur byeel.
LUK 9:4 Isàkal naa bàmàlawal u ndwà mwɛy, làbwaay apan tii taaŋ làsàlwomà bɛ kà ikal akin.
LUK 9:5 Isàkal naa mbuur kàlawɛl anki, làlwomà u bul alan, sàlàkɔɔb un'twà a in'kɔl abɛ: kya isàkal imbäl ibe ntɔn ba. »
LUK 9:6 Apan, alɔŋki bàkyen ba, ba bàyilyaaŋà bul a bul muyikyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ anà muyikɔɔr abɛy.
LUK 9:7 Mfum Ɛlɔdi kàwem nde ndaa ayi yanswà, nde kàyweerà naa nde akyer aben. Ntɔn baar mbɔɔn bàtɛɛnà naa Ywan kan'wiyà,
LUK 9:8 bumwɛy naa Ԑlya kan'fàmɛnà, wɛɛ bumwɛy naa umwɛy uboo a aŋangɔɔm bà itaan kan'wiyà.
LUK 9:9 Wɛɛ Ɛlɔdi kàtɛɛnà naa: « Mɛ Ywan kàkyun'tsul un'tswe: nà mbuur wa in'fiweemà mɛ làsaŋ a tub lalɛy? » Nde kàleŋà mukun'man.
LUK 9:10 Mpal bàyàfurà antööm, ba bàkyäänà Yɛsu indiir byanswà bàkyer ba. Nde kawɛl, waa kasyen ukɔl, u bul mwɛy ikɔb a la Bɛtesayidà.
LUK 9:11 Baar mbɔɔn bàyöb ba naa Yɛsu anà alɔŋki ande bà u bul alan, laa baläb ba. Yɛsu kawɛl nde, laa kakyäänà nde ndaa a imwol a Nzam. Nde kàkɔɔr sye baar bàkäl anà ngyal akɔɔrà.
LUK 9:12 Mpal bàmɛn antööm bàkwem aŋiyweel naa taaŋ lan'sɛmà muminà, ba bàsin tsütsü apà Yɛsu, waa bun'kyään naa: « Apay baar, ba bàkyen kà an'bul anà u bitsuŋ a ndwà byà tsütsü ntɔn ba bàkàleŋ ikal abɔ̈ɔ̈n anà isaa adyà ntɔn bi apà ibà u nsye a ipɔl. »
LUK 9:13 Yɛsu waa kafuur naa: « La pɛ udyà bɛ ŋakwo. » Ba waa bun'fuur naa: « Bi iwe amà mampà tyeen anà nsö yweel, tɛn naa bi ŋakwo ikàsom isaa ntɔn mbul a baar wà. »
LUK 9:14 Abaal bàkäl isii a nsaab tyeen. Yɛsu naa: « Làswɛŋ baar bàbwaay an'kwem an'tyeen, an'kwem an'tyeen. »
LUK 9:15 Ba bàkyer abun, bàpɛ baar banswà ikal abwaay.
LUK 9:16 Yɛsu kàwɛl mampà mà an'tyeen anà nsö yàyweel, waa kàler u du, kàfuur an'tɔɔn akà Nzam. Ungö apan waa kàtsül mampà anà nsö, waa kàpɛ alɔŋki ande ntɔn mupà akà baar banswà.
LUK 9:17 Baar banswà waa bàdi, bàyüür. Itiir a mampà byàsäl mbɔↄn, bya byàyööl in'lwaŋ kwem aŋiyweel.
LUK 9:18 Ilä mwɛy Yɛsu kàkäl muyamà u mpey anà alɔŋki ande, waa kafuul naa: « Baar bàfàtɛn naa mɛ in'wà nà? »
LUK 9:19 Ba bàfuur naa: « Ywan Un'düümà, bumwɛy, Ԑlya, bumwɛy, umwɛy uboo a aŋangɔɔm kan'wiyà. »
LUK 9:20 Nde waa kafuul naa: « Wɛɛ bɛ ŋakwo làtɛn naa mɛ in'wà nà? » Petɔlà waa kàfuur naa: « Ngye awà Klistɔ a Nzam. »
LUK 9:21 Yɛsu katsüŋ mukyään mbuur akà ikikye.
LUK 9:22 Nde waa kàfàkwɛy naa: « Mwan a mbuur akyer aman mpay mbɔɔn. Andweer, amfum a angaŋ anà alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn bàkyer un'tɔn, bàkyer un'dwa, waa ilä kyàtär nde akyer awiyà. »
LUK 9:23 Ungö, nde waa kàtɛn akà baar banswà: « Isàkal naa mbuur akwen mukan'lab, wɛy nde ukɔɔb ndür ande, usɛn buur ande ilä byanswà, wɛy nde kan'läb.
LUK 9:24 Ntɔn mbuur usàkwen muyee möö ande, wa asàkyà bwà. Wɛɛ mbuur usàpiy möö ande ntɔn mɛ, nde asàtswà wa.
LUK 9:25 Bweel nà mbuur kan'kwo muwal isàkal naa nde kan'wal mɛɛn manswà, wɛɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande ukyà bwà?
LUK 9:26 Mbuur usàwem mɛ nswɛn anà ndaa amɛ, Mwan a mbuur sye asun'wem nswɛn mpal usàyà nde unsà làkoo ande anà là Taa anà là akyeey in'kyɛɛl.
LUK 9:27 Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, bàmbɔɔn uboo abɛ bàyàkal aŋàtàkwà anki kusà muman Imwol a Nzam. »
LUK 9:28 Kà isii a ilä naan ungö a ndaa ayi, Yɛsu kàwɛl Petɔlà, Ywan anà Zyak, nde kàlär udu a mɔŋ ntɔn mukàyamà.
LUK 9:29 Mpal kàkäl nde muyamà, ntabwey ande waa yàsɔɔmà, ipfɛy ande kyàbulà kyà in'ŋyäŋ a pɛɛl.
LUK 9:30 Apan, baar bɔ̈ɔ̈l bàkäl muyääm anà nde, ba bàkäl Mɔsɛ anà Ԑlya,
LUK 9:31 ban'yàmɛnà uboo a làkoo, bàmuyäämà ndaa ukàmay Yɛsu isal ande u Yɛlusàlɛm u mbwo a nkweel ande.
LUK 9:32 Petɔlà anà bumwɛy bàkäl anà nde bàbɔ̈ɔ̈n twaal aŋàkir. Umpal bàsubà ba, ba bàmɛn làkoo a Yɛsu anà baar bööl bàkäl anà nde.
LUK 9:33 Umpal bàkaabà baar aban anà Yɛsu, Petɔlà kàtɛn a nde naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, yà ubwaŋ naa bi ikäl apà, bi imbaar ntɛn, ntɛn tär: mwɛy ntɔn ngye, mwɛy ntɔn Mɔsɛ anà mwɛy ntɔn Ԑlya. » Kutɛn aŋàbwaŋ nde kàyöb anki undiir kàtɛɛnà nde.
LUK 9:34 Umpal kàkäl nde mutɛn, un'böŋ mwɛy waa kafwee. Alɔŋki bàkäl u bɔɔmà mpal bàmɛn ba naa ba ban'bilà uboo a un'böŋ.
LUK 9:35 Uboo a un'böŋ ndaa waa itoo, waa itɛn naa: « Awà mwan amɛ, mwan kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l mɛ. Lun'wem! »
LUK 9:36 Ungö a ndaa ayi, ba bàsàman Yɛsu aŋàyen mpɛl. Wɛɛ mpal ayin, ndaa ayi yanswà ba bàkäärà u mpem, ba akà mbuur mwɛy bàkyään anki.
LUK 9:37 Taaŋtyà, ba bàkäl muyàtyà u mɔŋ, baar mbɔɔn bàyi mubwey a Yɛsu.
LUK 9:38 Waa le, uboo a baar abà, mbuur mwɛy kàlal in'kwɛŋ: « Un'lɔɔŋ, mɛ amabɔɔn, un'ler mwan baal amɛ! Mwan baal mwɛy awà mpɛl.
LUK 9:39 Dweelà a làbe làsun'bilà, kà imbürà nde asà in'kwɛŋ, laa lun'bwiy la, waa ugyɔrà an'te. La làfun'wɛy anki agyä, nde afàkwà lɛy.
LUK 9:40 Mɛ an'bɔɔn alɔŋki angye naa ba bun'böŋ, wɛɛ ba bàsàkwo anki. »
LUK 9:41 Yɛsu waa kaŋän: « Bɛ làbà baar làkɔ̈ɔ̈n làkwikilà, baar abe! mɛ anà bɛ ilä ikwɛ in'yàfàkal anà mukàlakaar? » Waa ubulà akà mbuur awun: « Un'twääl mwan angye! »
LUK 9:42 Umpal kàkäl mwan musin tsütsü apà Yɛsu, dweelà a làbe lun'bwiy u mɛɛn, lun'ni a ngwal. Wɛɛ Yɛsu kàŋän dweelà a làbe, waa kàkɔɔr mwan awun, kun'fuur akà taarànde.
LUK 9:43 Baar banswà bàkäl unsà ubem muman ibaŋ a Nzam. Mbuur wanswà kàkäl mubem ndaa kàkyerà Yɛsu, nde kàtɛn a alɔŋki ande naa:
LUK 9:44 « Làkäär ndaa alàkyään mɛ yi apanà: Mwan a mbuur bàkyer ayun'yälà kà an'kɔɔ a baar. »
LUK 9:45 Wɛ alɔŋki ande bàyöb anki ndaa ayi. Mbuul a ya bàkyer ayee ntɔn ba bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n ayöb. Ba bàmɛn bɔɔmà mufuul Yɛsu mbuul a ya.
LUK 9:46 Isür kyàkyer abilà uboo a antööm: ba bàkwen muyöb naa nà kan'söön uboo a ba.
LUK 9:47 Yɛsu kàyöb nde an'kyän aba, nde kàtɛ mwan umbɛy mpi u kɔɔ, kun'si tsütsü apà nde,
LUK 9:48 waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mbuur awal mwan wà kà ikɔb amɛ, nde kan'wal mɛ ŋakwo, waa mbuur kàman'wal, nde kan'wal mbuur kan'töm. Ntɔn mbuur awà ikikye uboo abɛ, nde awun awà mbuur a kölàköl. »
LUK 9:49 Ywan waa kàsɛmà mutɛn naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, bi kàmɛn mbuur mwɛy wàmuböŋ an'dweelà an'be kà ikɔb angye, wɛɛ bi kun'tsüŋ mukyer abun ntɔn nde ngye ufalab anki anà bi. »
LUK 9:50 Yɛsu waa kàfuur naa: « Twon làmutsuŋ, ntɔn mbuur mpa afàtɔn bɛ, nde wà anà bɛ. »
LUK 9:51 Taaŋ a Yɛsu mulwomà u mɛɛn làkäl tsütsü mukwo, nde kàsi ukwen mbɔɔn mukyà Yɛlusàlɛm.
LUK 9:52 Nde kàtöm akyeey kusà ande. Mpal bàkäl ba u mbwo, ba bàbilà u bul mwɛy là Samalya ntɔn mukun'yiil ikal.
LUK 9:53 Wɛɛ baar a Samalya bàtön mukun'wal ntɔn nde kàkäl mukyà Yɛlusàlɛm.
LUK 9:54 Mpal bàmɛn ba abun, alɔŋki ande Zyak anà Ywan bun'lɔ̈ɔ̈m naa: « Mwol, ipɛ mbwo bi iswɛŋ ipar a mbaa ifi du, kyabweel, waa ba bàkuŋà. »
LUK 9:55 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kàbulà nde ntsü bàkäl ba, waa kaŋän.
LUK 9:56 Waa ba bàkyen bul asin.
LUK 9:57 Mpal bàkäl ba u mbwo, mbuur mwɛy kàyi nde, kàtɛn a Yɛsu naa: « Mɛ in'kyer ayalab ntsü yanswà ayàkyà ngye. »
LUK 9:58 Yɛsu waa kun'fuur naa: « In'kyɛŋ mye anà an'fu, nɛn a du ye anà an'yaab, wɛ Mwan a mbuur ikal musà un'tswe kyatɛy. »
LUK 9:59 Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a mbuur mwɛy naa: « Yan'läb! » Mbuur awà waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwol, an'pɛ mbwo mɛ in'tàkàdyee taa. »
LUK 9:60 Yɛsu waa kun'fuur naa: « Wɛy akü bàdyee akü aba. Wɛɛ ngye, kyen kapay làsaŋ a Imwol a Nzam! »
LUK 9:61 Mbuur asin waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mɛ in'kyer ayalab, wɛɛ ngye tan'pà mbwo mɛ in'kàpà atɔŋ amɛ mbɔr a ntsüü. »
LUK 9:62 Yɛsu waa kun'fuur naa: « Mbuur kan'sà kɔɔ ande mulem ywaŋ ande anà kan'wɛy la ntɔn mukyer undiir asin, nde ukwe anki uboo a Imwol a Nzam. »
LUK 10:1 Ungö apan, Yɛsu kàfàsɔɔl alɔŋki bumwɛy an'kwem nsambwaar aŋiyweel, waa katöm abɔ̈ɔ̈l abɔ̈ɔ̈l, ntɔn ba bàkyen kusà ande uboo a an'bul anà ntsü yanswà kàkwe nde mubilà.
LUK 10:2 Nde waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Isaa uboo a ywaŋ byà mbɔɔn, wɛɛ baar abwo bya bà ikikye. Làlɔ̈m akà Mwol ŋaywaŋ mutɔm baar a isal mbɔɔn ntɔn ba bàbwe bya.
LUK 10:3 Làkyen: mɛ amàlatɔm asànaa baan a in'kɔk uboo a nkwee.
LUK 10:4 Twon lan'syen ngim, itàkal ngɔɔr, itàkal an'sàbar, wɛɛ twon lan'mbar u mbwo ntɔn muyipà baar mbɔr.
LUK 10:5 U ndwà yanswà làbilà bɛ, tàlatɛɛnà naa: "Wɛy duu làkäl udu a ndwà yi."
LUK 10:6 Isàkal naa we anà mbuur a duu u ndwà ayin, duu abɛ làyàbwaay udu ande, naa tɛy, duu làyàfurà akà bɛ.
LUK 10:7 Làkäl u ndwà ayin, làdi, lànü undiir wanswà bàlapà ba, ntɔn mbuur a isal afàwal làfur ande. Twon lan'kyà ndwà a ndwà.
LUK 10:8 U bul lanswà làbilà bɛ isàkal naa bàmàlawal, làdi undiir wanswà bàlapà ba,
LUK 10:9 làkɔɔr abɛy, lakyään naa: "Imwol a Nzam kyan'sin tsütsü apà bɛ."
LUK 10:10 Wɛɛ u bul lanswà làbilà bɛ, isàkal naa bàlawɛl anki, làkyen unsà an'balàbal ala, làtɛn naa:
LUK 10:11 "Bi kan'kɔɔb un'twà a bul abɛ kan'dyaar bi kà in'kɔl, wɛɛ làyöb naa Imwol a Nzam kyà tsütsü."
LUK 10:12 Mɛ alàkyään naa ilä a nsaŋ, Sɔdɔm bàsun'pa anki mpay aŋàsöönà mpay a baar a bul alan. »
LUK 10:13 « Ngyɛb akà ngye Kɔrazin! Ngyɛb akà ngye Bɛtesayidà! Ntɔn, ilàkal naa impà bàkyer akà bɛ, bàkyer u Tir anà u Sidɔn, abà itaan baar aba bàkyàbuul mpem, bàkyàbwaar ngɔɔr anà bàkyàkübà un'twà.
LUK 10:14 Lalan ilä a nsaŋ, Tir anà Sidɔn mpay a mbɔɔn bàsapà anki asànaa bàsàpà ba bɛ.
LUK 10:15 Waa ngye, ngye Kapɛrnawum, ngye akasii naa ngye asàlaar du? Ngye asàtyà an'lɔŋ!
LUK 10:16 Mbuur usàwem bɛ, nde mɛ kan'wem, mbuur usàlapiy, nde mɛ kan'piy. Wɛɛ mbuur apiy mɛ, nde kan'piy mbuur kan'töm. »
LUK 10:17 Alɔŋki an'kwem nsambwaar aŋiyweel bàyàfurà unsà un'sak, waa bàtɛn naa: « Mwol, kà ikɔb angye itàkal insɔŋà bàkyer akà iweemà. »
LUK 10:18 Yɛsu waa kafuur naa: « Mɛ kàkimanà Satanà kàbwee nde fà du asànaa munyä.
LUK 10:19 Le, Mɛ akyàlapà ikɔ̈b mundyaar udu a ntäy anà nye, anà udu a imfum a Satanà, wɛɛ akà undiir mwɛy ukwe anki mukyer bɛ ube.
LUK 10:20 Wɛɛ bɛ twon lan'man un'sak naa insɔŋà myàkyer alàwem, wɛɛ bɛ làmɛn un'sak naa ikɔb abɛ ban'sɔn u du. »
LUK 10:21 Taaŋ nsil alan, u mbwo a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl, Yɛsu kàyöl a un'sak, waa kàtɛn naa: « Taa, Mwol a du anà mɛɛn, mɛ amasyäŋà, ntɔn kàyee ngye indiir abi akà aŋayeerà anà akà aŋuyɛnà, wɛɛ ngye bya kàswɛŋ akà baan ambɛy. Ɛɛ, Taa, ngye kàkwen naa ya ikäl abà. »
LUK 10:22 « Taaràmɛ kàkyan'pà indiir byanswà, wɛɛ akà mbuur mwɛy tɛy uyöb Mwan, isàkal naa kà Taa anki, anà mbuur mwɛy tɛy uyöb Taa, isàkal naa kà Mwan anki anà mbuur kan'kwen Mwan mukyään ndaa ayi. »
LUK 10:23 Ungö apan, waa kàbulà ntsü bàkäl alɔŋki ande, waa kàtɛn a ba mpɛl naa: « Un'sak mbɔɔn akà mii ikamanà ndaa làmanà bɛ yi!
LUK 10:24 Ntɔn mɛ alàkyään naa aŋangɔɔm anà amfum mbɔɔn bàkwen muman ndaa làmanà bɛ yi, wɛɛ ba ya bàsàman anki, muwem ndaa làweemà bɛ yi, wɛɛ ba ya bàsàwem anki. »
LUK 10:25 Un'lɔɔŋ a un'kɔɔn mwɛy kàmbarà ntɔn mulwab Yɛsu ndaa, waa kàtɛn naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, ininà mɛ in'kyer ntɔn muwal möö a mbul a in'tye? »
LUK 10:26 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Uboo a un'kɔɔn ininà bàsön? Ngye akataŋà aben? »
LUK 10:27 Nde kàfuur naa: « Ngye ayàkwen Mwol, Nzam angye, unsà mpem angye yanswà, unsà mɔ̈ɔ̈ angye wanswà, unsà ngwal angye yanswà, unsà an'kyän angye manswà, anà un'tɔŋ angye asànaa ngye ŋakwo. »
LUK 10:28 Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ngye an'fuur ubwaŋ. Kyer abun, waa ngye ayàkal anà möö. »
LUK 10:29 Wɛɛ nde kàkwen muwal iböŋ anà mufuul Yɛsu naa: « Un'tɔŋ amɛ nà? »
LUK 10:30 Yɛsu waa kàfuur naa: « Mbuur mwɛy kàfü Yɛlusàlɛm mutyà Yɛlikɔ. Baar abɛ laa bun'käär ba, bàgyɔɔr ba indiir ande byanswà, bun'düb ba, bàkyen ba anà bàsun'wɛy ba tsütsü a ukwà.
LUK 10:31 Ngaŋ mwɛy kàkäl mutyà u mbwo ayin. Mpal kàmɛn nde mbuur awun, nde kàlyaaŋ ukɔl.
LUK 10:32 Un'lɛvi mwɛy sye kàkɔlà kà ikal akin, kun'mɛn nde, waa kàköl.
LUK 10:33 Wɛɛ un'samàlya mwɛy kàkäl u mbwo ande mulyaaŋ. Mpal kàmɛn nde mbuur awà, ngyɛb laa yun'käär yà.
LUK 10:34 Nde kàsin tsütsü, kun'bäm ipfɛy kà iwà ande, kun'tyaŋ may anà man, waa kun'si udu a mpoonà ande, kun'syen u ndwà a angyey, waa kun'bay.
LUK 10:35 Taaŋtyà nde kàwɛl ndiim yweel, laa kàpɛ nde ya akà ŋandwà a angyey, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: "Sun'bay mbuur wà, isàkal naa ngye an'sàtwey ngim mbɔɔn yan'söön yi, mɛ in'yafuur umpal in'yàfurà mɛ."
LUK 10:36 « Uboo a baar abà batär, nà awà un'tɔŋ a mbuur kàbü wà kà an'kɔɔ a baar abe? »
LUK 10:37 Un'lɔɔŋ a un'kɔɔn waa kun'fuur naa: « Mbuur akwà kun'wem ngyɛb. » Yɛsu naa: « Kyen, ngye sye kakyer abun. »
LUK 10:38 Umpal kàkäl Yɛsu u mbwo anà alɔŋki ande, nde kàbilà u bul mwɛy, un'kaar mwɛy ikɔb ande Màtà kawɛl u ndwà ande.
LUK 10:39 Nde kàkäl anà un'tɔŋ ande wà un'kaar ikɔb ande Màlye. Mwan un'kaar awà kàbwaay kà in'kɔl a Mwol ntɔn muweemà ndaa ande.
LUK 10:40 An'kyän a Màtà manswà màkäl mukyer isal a ifà ifà, laa kàyàmɛnà nde kà ikal kàkäl Yɛsu, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwol, ngye ube akamanà anki naa un'tɔŋ amɛ kàman'sööl isal byanswà aŋayen? Un'swɛŋ nde uyan'bay. »
LUK 10:41 Mwol waa kun'fuur naa: « Màtà, Màtà, ngye akamanà mpay anà akayoolàyoolà ntɔn indiir mbɔɔn.
LUK 10:42 Wɛɛ, undiir mwɛy awà ndöŋ. Kyakin Màlye kan'sɔɔl kab aŋàbwaŋ mpa bàsun'lwom. »
LUK 11:1 Yàmɛnà naa ilä mwɛy Yɛsu kàkäl muyamà kà ikal mwɛy. Umpal kàmay nde, un'lɔŋki ande mwɛy kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwol, ilɔŋ muyamà asànaa Ywan kàlɔŋ nde alɔŋki ande. »
LUK 11:2 Nde waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mpal làyamà bɛ, làtɛn abà: "Taa! Wɛy ikɔb angye ikäl kyà in'kyɛɛl, wɛy imwol angye iyi.
LUK 11:3 Ipɛ ŋàbà isaa abi byà ilä a ilä.
LUK 11:4 Idwääl nkul asànaa ifàdwääl bi nkul akà baar bàfikyer ube. Twon an'pà mbwo naa bi ibilà u ndɛb." »
LUK 11:5 Nde waa kàfàtɛn a ba naa: « Isàkal naa umwɛy uboo a bɛ we anà un'sam, waa nde ukyen akà nde uboboo a mpib ntɔn mulɔm akà nde naa. "Un'sam, nsɔɔm nsɔ tär,
LUK 11:6 ntɔn un'sam amɛ mwɛy kan'fà kwɛl, kan'yàkɔlà apanà u ndwà amɛ, wɛɛ mɛ undiir un'pà watɛy."
LUK 11:7 Wɛɛ, isàkal naa uboo a ndwà ande un'sam ande awun kan'fuur naa: "Twon aman'sà lingyoomà, ibeenà kyàŋàbäm, baan amɛ anà mɛ ŋakwo ibaŋàbɔ̈ɔ̈n, mɛ in'fàsubà anki ntɔn mupà ngye nsɔ."
LUK 11:8 Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, isàkal naa nde usubà anki mukun'pà ya ntɔn nde wà un'sam ande, nde akyer ayàsubà mukun'pà undiir wanswà awe nde awà mfun ntɔn un'sam ande wàmusà muküünà.
LUK 11:9 Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ alàkyään naa: Làlɔ̈m, waa bàlapà. Làleŋ, waa bɛ làyàman. Làbɛɛrà, waa bàyàladuub.
LUK 11:10 Ntɔn mbuur wanswà afàlɔm akyer afàwal, mbuur afàleŋ akyer afàman, anà bàfàduub akà mbuur afàbɛɛrà.
LUK 11:11 Isàkal naa umwɛy uboo a bɛ wà taa, nkye nde kan'kwo mupà mwan ande ntäy isàkal naa nde kàmulɔ̈ɔ̈m nsö?
LUK 11:12 Itàkal naa nde kan'lɔm kyà, waa nde kun'pà lànye?
LUK 11:13 Isàkal naa bɛ baar abe làkyàyöb mupà baan abɛ indiir aŋàbwaŋ, wɛɛ Taa u du waa mpa upà Dweelà In'kyɛɛl akà baar bàmulɔ̈ɔ̈m? »
LUK 11:14 Yàlɔ̈m naa ilä mwɛy Yɛsu kàböŋ unsɔŋà mwɛy kàbuulà mbuur mwɛy nkiin. Ungö a ntoo a unsɔŋà awun, nkiin waa kàsɛmà musà ndaa, baar banswà bàkäl unsà ubem.
LUK 11:15 Wɛɛ baar bumwɛy uboo a ba bàtɛɛnà naa: « Nde ayisyääl ikɔ̈b a Bɛlzebul, mfum a insɔŋà, ntɔn muböŋ insɔŋà. »
LUK 11:16 Baar bumwɛy waa bàlɔ̈m naa nde ukyer impà kyan'fà du ntɔn mukun'si.
LUK 11:17 Yɛsu abà kàyöb nde an'kyän aba, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Imwol kyanswà kye anà nkaabà uboo a kya, kya ikyer afàpää: Ndwà ibwà udu a ndwà yumwɛy.
LUK 11:18 Isàkal naa Satanà wà un'yiiŋ ande ŋakwo, imwol ande iyàtsim aben? Ntɔn bɛ làtɛɛnà naa mɛ in'kaböŋà insɔŋà kà ikɔ̈b a Bɛlzebul.
LUK 11:19 Isàkal naa mɛ insɔŋà in'kaböŋà kikɔ̈b a Bɛlzebul, baan abɛ insɔŋà bàfàböŋ kà ikɔ̈b a nà? Lalan ba ŋakwo bàsàkal atsüül a nsaŋ abɛ.
LUK 11:20 Wɛɛ, isàkal naa mɛ insɔŋà in'yiböŋ a làpin a Nzam, iswaŋà naa imwol a Nzam kyàkyàtol akà bɛ.
LUK 11:21 Uman naa mbuur a ngwal awe anà an'tà màŋàkwo wàmuler ndwà ande, indiir ande mbuur uyàba anki.
LUK 11:22 Wɛɛ, isàkal naa mbuur asin kàmun'söön u ngwal kan'yà, kan'wal iböŋ udu ande, nde kun'gyɔɔr an'tà ande manswà kàsyee nde làkyän, waa ukab indiir byanswà kàmun'gyɔɔr nde.
LUK 11:23 « Mbuur mpa awà anà mɛ nde wà un'yiiŋ amɛ, wɛɛ mbuur mpa ayàtüüb anà mɛ ntɔn muböbà, nde wàmupay.
LUK 11:24 « Isàkal naa dweelà a làbe lan'too uboo a mbuur, la làfàkyà nsye a ipɔl muleŋ ikal akàyöör. La usàkɔɔn aman ikal ayöör laa làtɛn la naa: "Mɛ in'furà ndwà amɛ kàfü mɛ."
LUK 11:25 Mpal làyàfurà la, la làsàman ya yàŋàkɔɔm, indiir byanswà byàŋayöŋà ubwaŋàbwaŋ,
LUK 11:26 laa ukyà nde, ukàwal nde an'dweelà nsambwaar mà mun'söön u nkyɛl, ma màbilà u ndwà, waa màbwaay. Apan mpay a mbuur awà laa isöönà ya mpay yàtàtwɛb. »
LUK 11:27 Yàmɛnà naa mpal kàkäl Yɛsu mutɛɛnà abwɛy, un'kaar mwɛy kàmbarà uboo a baar, waa kàtɛn u ndaa a ngwal naa: « Un'sak akà un'kaar kakäär kà an'bäl ande anà kanüü an'bɛɛl ande! »
LUK 11:28 Nde waa kàfuur naa: « Aay, un'sak aŋasöönà akà baar bàweemà ndaa a Nzam anà bàsyäälà ya. »
LUK 11:29 Umpal ban'yàköŋ baar apà Yɛsu, nde kàsɛmà mutɛn naa: « Baar a mpalàbà bà baar abe: ba bàlɔɔmà idiim, wɛɛ ba idiim asin bàman anki, idiim nsil kyà Yɔnas.
LUK 11:30 Lalan, asànaa Yɔnas kàkäl nde idiim ntɔn baar a Ninive, abun sye Mwan a mbuur uyàkal nde idiim ntɔn baar a mpalàbà.
LUK 11:31 Kà ilä a nsaŋ, mfum a ngyɛl wà un'kaar akyer asàmbarà kusà a baar a mpalàbà ntɔn mukapà ikwàndwà, ntɔn nde kàfü ntsü a kwɛl muyàwem an'yeerà a Salɔmun. Wɛɛ apà we anà mbuur kan'söön Salɔmun.
LUK 11:32 Kà ilä a nsaŋ, baar a Ninive bàkyer asàmbarà kusà a baar a mpalàbà ntɔn mukapà ikwàndwà, ntɔn baar a Ninive bàbuul mpem umpal bàwem ba an'lɔɔŋ a Yɔnas. Wɛɛ apà we anà mbuur kan'söön Yɔnas!
LUK 11:33 « Akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki mukyä mwinà waa nde uyee wa, itàkal naa nde usi wa u ngyɛl a kantin. Wɛɛ nde wa asà udu a un'te bàfàsà mwinà ntɔn baar bàbilà u ndwà bàmɛn pɛɛlà.
LUK 11:34 Mii angye myà mwinà a ndür angye: isàkal naa mii angye myà ubwaŋ, ndür angye yanswà ikal uboo a pɛɛlà, wɛɛ mii angye isàkal anà ukyal, ndür angye yanswà ikal uboo a làpib.
LUK 11:35 Duub mii angye ubwaŋàbwaŋ, wɛy pɛɛlà a ndür angye làkɔ̈ɔ̈n abwà làpib.
LUK 11:36 Abun, isàkal naa ndür angye yanswà yà uboo a pɛɛlà, akà ikal mwɛy kyatɛy uboo a làpib, ya yanswà iyàkal uboo a pɛɛlà, asànaa mwinà ufàpà wa ngye ŋakwo pɛɛlà a in'ŋyäŋ ande. »
LUK 11:37 Yàmɛnà naa mpal kàmay Yɛsu mutɛn, umfarisi mwɛy kun'bel ntɔn mukàdyà u ndwà ande. Yɛsu kàbilà nde, waa kàbwaay u mɛsà.
LUK 11:38 Umfarisi awun kàkyer abem muman naa Yɛsu kàtàywab anki kusà mudyà.
LUK 11:39 Wɛɛ Mwol waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Le ndaa abɛ Amfarisi: Bɛ làfàsɔŋ nsà a an'kɔɔb anà an'lɔŋà, wɛɛ uboo bɛ làbà aŋàyɔl a làmfɛɛl anà nkyɛl mbɔɔn.
LUK 11:40 Angwöy Mbuur akwà kàkyer nsà, nde boo kàkyer anki?
LUK 11:41 Làpɛ akà aŋàlàmbwà indiir abyà uboo a an'kɔɔb anà uboo a an'lɔŋà abɛ, waa indiir byanswà byàyàkal byà in'kyɛɛl ntɔn bɛ.
LUK 11:42 « Wɛɛ ngyɛb akà bɛ Amfarisi! Bɛ làfàpà mwɛy uboo a kwem wà nkay ifàsà indiir ntsà asànaa un'dül anà köb anà nkay adyà asin yà ifà ifà, wɛɛ bɛ làfàkyer anki ndaa a balàbal anà ukwen a Nzam: undiir làlàkyer bɛ ukɔɔn adiimà indiir byumwɛy.
LUK 11:43 Ngyɛb akà bɛ Amfarisi, ntɔn bɛ làfàkwen an'kir a làkoo u ndwà a nköŋ. Bɛ làfàkwen naa baar bàlapɛ mbɔr kà ikal a nköŋ.
LUK 11:44 Ngyɛb akà bɛ! Bɛ làbà asànaa an'dii mpa bàfàman baar anà bàfàndyaar ba ukɔɔn ayöb. »
LUK 11:45 Umwɛy uboo a alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn, kàtɛn a nde naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, akatɛɛnà ngye abwɛy, ngye bi akatoo sye! »
LUK 11:46 Yɛsu waa kàfuur naa: « Ngyɛb akà bɛ sye, alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn! Ntɔn bɛ làfàtɔɔl buur a mpay musɛn akà baar, wɛɛ bɛ la làfàba anki akà u làpin làmwɛy.
LUK 11:47 Ngyɛb akà bɛ, ntɔn bɛ làfàtɔŋ an'dii a aŋangɔɔm bàdwä bàtaaràbɛ!
LUK 11:48 Abun iswaŋà ubwaŋàbwaŋ naa bɛ lan'kyey ndaa bàkyer bàtaaràbɛ: ba bàdwä aŋangɔɔm, wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làtɔŋà an'dii aba!
LUK 11:49 Lalan Nzam kàtɛn nde unsà an'yweerà ande naa: "mɛ ba in'satööm aŋangɔɔm anà antööm, ba bàsàdwa bumwɛy anà bàsàmɛɛy bumwɛy nkwaaŋ."
LUK 11:50 Lalan an'kil a aŋangɔɔm màpää fà nsɛmà a mɛɛn bàsàtälà udu a un'tswe a baar a mpalàyi,
LUK 11:51 sɛmà an'kil a Abɛl tii an'kil a Zakàlye awà bàdwä uboboo a mɛsà a ibɔɔn anà idwà. Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, buur a an'kil a baar abà banswà bàsàtälà udu a un'tswe a baar a mpalàyi!
LUK 11:52 « Ngyɛb akà bɛ alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn, bɛ làkyàduum nsab ufàduub ndaa a un'yɛnà. Bɛ ŋakwo làfàbilà anki, bɛ sye làfàtsuŋ baar bumwɛy bàfàkwen mubilà kwo. »
LUK 11:53 Yàmɛnà naa umpal kàtoo Yɛsu u ndwà, alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn anà Amfarisi bàkun'nüün ntɔn mukun'fuul ndaa yà ifà ifà:
LUK 11:54 ba bàkäl mukun'lwab ndaa, ntɔn ba bàwɛl ndaa ayifà u mun ande ntɔn ba bun'füün.
LUK 12:1 Yàmɛnà naa utaaŋ nsil alan, baar nsaab bàkyer ayàköŋ, ba bàndyàndyaar ba a ba kà in'kɔl. Yɛsu kàtàsɛmà mutɛn a alɔŋki ande naa: « Làduub mii abɛ ntɔn ful a Amfarisi, iswaŋà naa ukwen a loor.
LUK 12:2 Ndaa yanswà yàŋàyee ikyer asàmɛnà u mii, ndaa a unku ikyer asàtoo.
LUK 12:3 Lalan ndaa yanswà làsàtɛn bɛ u làpib, bàkyer asàwem u mwäänà answà, wɛɛ ndaa yanswà làsàŋüŋün bɛ u mun a tsü uboo a suk aŋàdübà, isàbulà ndaa a kuub in'kwɛŋ udu a nsyä a ndwà.
LUK 12:4 « Asam amɛ, mɛ alàkyään naa: twon lan'man bɔɔmà a baar bàfàlɔ ndür mpɛl, wɛɛ mpa bàkwe mufàkyer undiir asin.
LUK 12:5 Mɛ in'kyer alàswaŋ nà bɛ lan'kwo mutiin bɔɔmà: làtiin mbuur awe anà ikɔ̈b mukàlàtɔɔm u yaaŋ a mbaa ungö a nkweel. Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, bɛ bɔɔmà làtiin nde! »
LUK 12:6 « nkye Insɔɔr ityeen bàfàyälà anki ndiim yweel? Wɛɛ Nzam ufàdiimà anki akà umwɛy uboo a bya.
LUK 12:7 Yumwɛy ayi: Itàkal ntswee abɛ yanswà yàŋàtaŋ. Twon lan'man bɔɔmà, ntɔn bɛ lan'söön insɔɔr mbɔɔn u ntal.
LUK 12:8 « Wɛɛ mɛ alàkyään naa mbuur wanswà asàtà imbäl amɛ u mii a baar, Mwan a mbuur sye asun'tɛɛl imbäl u mii a akyeey a Nzam.
LUK 12:9 Wɛɛ mbuur wanswà asàswaŋ ngaal u mii a baar naa nde mɛ kan'yöb anki, nde sye bàsun'yöb anki u mii a akyeey a Nzam.
LUK 12:10 Isàkal naa mbuur kan'twe Mwan a mbuur, nde bàsun'dwääl nkul, wɛ mbuur asàto Dweelà In'kyɛɛl, usàwal anki ndwääl a nkul.
LUK 12:11 « Mpal bàsàlasyen ba u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà ntɔn mukàlatsüül nsaŋ, itàkal kusà a amfum, itàkal kusà a an'yɔl, twon lan'man mpay naa bɛ un'lɔn làkàsà aben, bɛ ndaa nà làkàtɛn.
LUK 12:12 Ntɔn Dweelà In'kyɛɛl akyer asàlalɔŋ taaŋ nsil alan ndaa lan'kwo bɛ mutɛn. »
LUK 12:13 Yàmɛnà naa uboo a un'sɛŋ a baar mbuur mwɛy kàtɛn a Yɛsu naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, un'swɛŋ un'tɔŋ amɛ mukab anà m un'naaŋ abi. »
LUK 12:14 Yɛsu waa kun'fuur naa: « Un'sam amɛ, nà kan'si ntɛɛn abɛ, itàkal nkalsà mukab un'naaŋ abɛ? »
LUK 12:15 Nde waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làwem ubwaŋàbwaŋ: twon lan'kal anà ngyal mukal anà indiir mbɔɔn, ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbuur kà wà uboo a indiir ande anki, itàkal naa nde wà ŋun'naaŋ. »
LUK 12:16 Apan nde katɛɛl nsim yi: « An'ywaŋ a ŋun'naaŋ mwɛy màtwey isaa mbɔɔn.
LUK 12:17 Nde kàsɛmà muyweer: "Mɛ in'kyer aben? Ntɔn mɛ ikal musà isaa amɛ abi byanswà kyatɛy."
LUK 12:18 Apan nde kàtɛn naa: "Mɛ in'yàkyer abà: Mɛ in'kyer ayàpay ikɔr amɛ byanswà ntɔn mutɔŋ byàkölàköl, waa in'yàsà mbɛŋ amɛ yanswà anà isaa amɛ byumwɛy.
LUK 12:19 Ungö apan mɛ in'yàtɛn a mɛ ŋakwo naa: Mɔ̈ɔ̈ amɛ, ngye awe anà isaa mbɔɔn ntɔn mbul mbɔɔn. Yweer, dyà, nwà, man un'sak."
LUK 12:20 Wɛɛ Nzam waa kàtɛn a nde naa: "Insil! U mpib a ŋàbà nsil awà ngye akyer akwà. Ayi yanswà an'lɔn ngye ntɔn ngye, nà asàman ubwaŋ a ya?" »
LUK 12:21 Yɛsu kàkwɛy naa: « Abun, ya yabwɛy sye ntɔn mbuur afàköŋà un'naaŋ mbɔɔn ntɔn nde ŋakwo, wɛɛ nde ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akal ŋun'naaŋ ntɔn Nzam. »
LUK 12:22 Apan Yɛsu kàfàtɛn a alɔŋki ande naa: « Lalan m alàkyään naa: Twon lan'man mpay ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ anà mutɛɛn naa bɛ ininà làyàdyà, itàkal naa ntɔn ndür abɛ naa bɛ ininà làyàbwaar.
LUK 12:23 Ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ kan'söön isaa anà ndür yan'söön ipfɛy.
LUK 12:24 Làler inkaak, bya ifàkɔn anki, ifàbwo anki, bya ikɔr byatɛy, wɛɛ Nzam akyer afadii. Bɛ lan'söön nɛn!
LUK 12:25 Nà uboo a bɛ, ntɔn ngyɛb ande, kan'kwo mukwɛy akà ilä mwɛy u mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande?
LUK 12:26 Isàkal naa bɛ làkwe anki mukyer undiir ikikye, ntɔn nkye làmanà bɛ mpay ntɔn indiir byumwɛy?
LUK 12:27 Làler iful a an'ywaŋ ifàyɛl bya: bya byàfàsal anki, byàfàtɔŋ anki, wɛɛ mɛ alàkyään naa itàkal Salɔmun unsà un'naaŋ ande wanswà kàsàbwaar anki asànaa bya.
LUK 12:28 Isàkal naa Nzam afàbwää iteerà abyà u ywaŋ ŋàbà wɛɛ nkàswo bya bàyàtɔɔm u mbaa, waa Nzam mpa uyàlabwää, bɛ aŋàlàkwikilà ikikye.
LUK 12:29 Wɛɛ bɛ, twon lan'man mpay ntɔn udyà anà unwà abɛ, twon lan'kal u ngyɛb.
LUK 12:30 Ntɔn indiir abi byanswà baar mpa bàyöb Nzam u mɛɛn mà bàfàleŋ bya taaŋ lanswà. Wɛɛ bɛ, Taaràbɛ akyàyöb naa bɛ làbye anà mfun a bya.
LUK 12:31 Wɛɛ bɛ, tàlaleŋà imwol a Nzam, waa bàsàlakwɛy indiir abi byanswà. »
LUK 12:32 « Twon an'man bɔɔmà, ngye làböl ikikye! Ntɔn Taaràbɛ kàkwen mukàlapà imwol.
LUK 12:33 Làyälà indiir abɛ, làpɛ ngim akà aŋàlàmbwà. Làkyer in'di a ngim mpa ifàbwà an'tär. Làyee in'naaŋ abɛ u du, waa mya mpa myàtäy. Mbüüb bàyàkwo anki muwal mya, anà nsɛɛl sye idyà anki mya.
LUK 12:34 Ntɔn ikal awà in'naaŋ abɛ, ikal sye iwà mpem abɛ.
LUK 12:35 Làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ musal anà indiir a isal abɛ u kɔɔ. Làwɛy minà abɛ myàkäl myàŋàlɛɛmà.
LUK 12:36 Làkäl asànaa asyääl bàkadilà nkum aba kàkyen mukàbäl un'kyay, ntɔn ba bun'duub ndwà isàkal naa nde kan'yàfura anà kan'bɛɛrà. Mpal uyàfurà nde, ubɛɛrà nde, waa ba bun'duub ndwà.
LUK 12:37 Un'sak akà asyääl usyetaan nde bàmuleerà mpal uyàfurà nde! Mɛ ndandaa alàkyään, nde ŋakwo asàbwaar ipfɛy a isal, asàpà ba ikal abwaay anà isaa.
LUK 12:38 Isàkal naa nde kan'yà uboboo a mpib, itàkal naa u nkɔɔ atàtwɛb, un'sak akà asyääl akwà usàtaan nde bàŋàleer! »
LUK 12:39 « Làyöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ naa isàkal naa ŋandwà akyàyöb taaŋ uyà mbüüb, nde uyun'wɛy anki mubilà u ndwà ande.
LUK 12:40 Bɛ sye, làduub mii abɛ, ntɔn bɛ làyöb anki taaŋ usàyà Mwan a mbuur. »
LUK 12:41 Apan Petɔlà waa kun'fuul naa: « Mwol, nsim ayi yà ntɔn bi mpɛl lɛɛ ntɔn baar banswà? »
LUK 12:42 Mwol waa ufuur naa: « Nà un'syääl a balàbal anà ŋun'yɛnà awà kan'kwo nkum ande mupà buur muler asyääl anà mupà umwɛy umwɛy isaa ande u taaŋ a taaŋ?
LUK 12:43 Un'sak akà un'syääl awà, isàkal naa nkum ande amàyun'taan mukyer isal akin!
LUK 12:44 Mɛ alàkyään ndandaa, nde asun'sà mfum udu a un'naaŋ ande wanswà.
LUK 12:45 Wɛɛ, isàkal naa un'syääl kan'yweer u mpem ande naa: "Nkum amɛ kan'kyer itaan muyàfurà." Nde usɛmà mudüb baar a isal abaal anà bakaar, isal ande udyà, unwà anà uyɔr man,
LUK 12:46 apan nkum ande asyefurà ilä mpa kun'dilà nde anà u taaŋ mpa uyöb nde. Apan nkum ande asun'pà ntaaŋàmbar aŋàsöönà, nde asun'sà uboo a un'lwaaŋ a atsüüŋ mpa bàfàlab nswɛɛŋ.
LUK 12:47 Un'syääl akwà awà ayöb naa nkum ande ininà ufàkwen, wɛɛ nde ufàkwen anki mukyer ya anà mulɔ̈ɔ̈n ya kusà, nde asàwal an'füm mbɔɔn.
LUK 12:48 Wɛɛ un'syääl akwà mpa uyöb naa nkum ande inina ukwen ntɔn nde, isàkal naa nde an'kyer ube, ntaaŋàmbar ande isàkal ikikye. Isàkal naa mbuur kàwɛl mbɔɔn, bàsun'lɔ̈ɔ̈m sye mbɔɔn. Isàkal naa bàmapà mbɔɔn, bàsalɔ̈ɔ̈m sye mbɔɔn. »
LUK 12:49 « Mɛ kàyi muyàtɔɔm mbaa u mɛɛn. Wɛɛ mɛ in'kwen naa ya ikäl yàŋàlɛɛmà.
LUK 12:50 Ye anà ndüümà mwɛy mɛ in'wal, mɛ waa in'wà u ngyɛb mbɔɔn tii umpal isàkwo ya!
LUK 12:51 Nkye bɛ làsii naa mɛ kàyi ntɔn mutwaal duu u mɛɛn? Ŋaa, mɛ alàkyään naa nkaabà.
LUK 12:52 Yan'mɛnà naa sɛmà ŋàbawà, u ywar a baar atyeen nkaabà yan'bilà, atär bàkwen anki abɔ̈ɔ̈l, aböɔ̈l bàkwen anki atär,
LUK 12:53 taa ukwen anki mwan ande wà baal, mwan baal ukwen anki taarànde, maa ukwen anki mwan ande wà un'kaar, mwan un'kaar ukwen anki ngwän, maa ukwen anki un'kyay a mwan ande, un'kyay a mwan ukwen anki ukwà ande wà un'kaar. »
LUK 12:54 Ungö apan, Yɛsu waa kàtɛn sye a baar banswà naa: « Umpal làfàman bɛ itööm ntsü làfàmina taaŋ, bɛ làfàtɛn naa: "Mbul akyer anɔ", wa sye afàkyer anɔ.
LUK 12:55 Isàkal naa un'pöb an'fà ngyɛl, bɛ làfàtɛn naa: "Ŋàbà mwäänà akal mbɔɔn", wa sye afàkal mbɔɔn.
LUK 12:56 Baar a mpem yweel! Bɛ làkyàyöb ndaa yan'kwo mulyaaŋ u mɛɛn anà u du, wɛɛ ntɔn nkye mpa làyöb bɛ ndaa a mpalàyi? »
LUK 12:57 « Ntɔn nkye bɛ ŋakwo mpa làyöb bɛ musɔɔl ndaa a ndandaa?
LUK 12:58 Isàkal naa we anà mbur kàmafüün, wɛɛ bɛ làwàmukyà làbay a nsaŋ, leŋ ipöl muyöŋà anà nde mpal làbà bɛ u mbwo. Abun nde ngye uyàfasyen anki akà ntɛɛn, ntɛɛn ayàfapà anki akà un'kyɛɛŋ, un'kyɛɛŋ uyàfabiil anki u bɔlokà.
LUK 12:59 Kya naa tɛy, mɛ akyään ndandaa, ngye kwo asàtoo anki isàkal naa ngye ngim ande yanswà ŋàtàfur anki. »
LUK 13:1 Umpal ayin, baar amwɛy bàyi mukyään Yɛsu naa Pilatu kàdwä aben Angalilɛ taaŋ bàkäl ba mupà ibɔɔn akà Nzam.
LUK 13:2 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Bɛ làsii naa Angalilɛ abà bàsöön Angalilɛ bumwɛy unsà man'be, lalan bàmɛn ba mpay a tub ayi?
LUK 13:3 Mɛ in'tɛn a bɛ naa ŋaa. Wɛɛ bɛ làsàkɔɔn asɔɔmà, bɛ banswà sye làsàkwà asànaa ba.
LUK 13:4 Itàkal baar kwem aŋinaan bàkü mpal yabweel ndwà a bwɛlàbwɛl a Silɔwɛ, bɛ làsii naa ba bàkäl anà man'be màŋasöönà baar a Yɛlusàlɛm banswà?
LUK 13:5 Mɛ in'tɛn a bɛ naa ŋaa. Isàkal naa bɛ mpem làbuul anki, bɛ banswà làkyer asàkwà. »
LUK 13:6 Apan nde katɛɛl nsim yi: « Mbuur mwɛy kàkäl anà un'te adyà wàŋàkɔn uboo a làpaŋ ande. Ilä mwɛy nde kàkwen mubwo mbɛŋ, wɛɛ nde kàmɛn anki akà mwɛy.
LUK 13:7 Abun nde kàtɛn a mbuur kàfalerà làpaŋ a in'te adyà ande naa: "Le, abà mbul tär in'yaa mɛ muyàbwo mbɛŋ kà un'te awà, wɛɛ mɛ akà imwɛy in'manà anki. Tsul wa: mɛ in'manà anki isin usaa nde làpib a bunàbun uboo a làpaŋ amɛ."
LUK 13:8 Mbuur awun naa: "Un'lɔɔŋ, tàfun'wɛy mbul awà! Mɛ in'yàbuun mɛɛn u mbil a wa, mɛ in'yàsà nkay:
LUK 13:9 taaŋ lumwɛy ilä iyà ungö wa akyer ayàbɔr. Kya naa tɛy, ngye waa asun'tsul." »
LUK 13:10 Yàmenà naa ilä a saba mwɛy Yɛsu kàkäl mulɔŋ u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà.
LUK 13:11 Wɛɛ le, uboo kwo kàkäl anà un'kaar mwɛy dweelà a làbe lun'buulà aŋàkwɛkà abà mbul kwem aŋinaan: nde kàkäl aŋàtöör, kàkwee anki mumbar aŋàsubà alää.
LUK 13:12 Mpal kun'mɛn Yɛsu, nde waa kun'bel, kàtɛn a nde naa: « Un'kaar, ngye an'kɔɔrà unsà nkwɛkà angye! »
LUK 13:13 Nde kàsi an'kɔɔ ande udu a un'kaar awà, taaŋ nsil alan un'kaar waa kàsubà, laa kàsɛmà nde musyäŋà Nzam.
LUK 13:14 Wɛɛ mfum a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà kàwem nkyɛl ntɔn Yɛsu kàkɔɔr nde mbuur ilä a saba. Apan nde kàtɛn a baar banswà naa: « Ilä mukyer isal byà isyaam, làyi kà ilä abin ntɔn bàlakɔɔr, wɛɛ kà ilä a saba anki! »
LUK 13:15 Mwol waa kun'fuur naa: « Bɛ làbà baar a loor! Mbuur wanswà uboo abɛ afàbäm ngɔɔmà ande itàkal ntab ande kà ikal ufàdyà wa anà mukun'nüü ilä a saba. Kabwɛy anki?
LUK 13:16 Wɛɛ un'kaar wà, mwan a Abàlam kàkör Satanà wà mbul kwem aŋinaan, bàlun'kɔɔr anki in'siŋ ande ntɔn ŋàbà ilä a saba? »
LUK 13:17 Mfuur a Yɛsu ayi yàpɛ nswɛn akà ayiiŋ ande, wɛɛ baar banswà bàmɛn un'sak ntɔn ndaa aŋàbwaŋ kàkyerà nde.
LUK 13:18 Yɛsu kàfàtɛn naa: « Imwol a Nzam kyà asànaa ininà?
LUK 13:19 Kya kyà asànaa imbɛŋ ikikye kan'wal mbuur mwɛy anà kan'tɔɔm nde uboo a làpaŋ ande: kya waa imɛn, iyɛl, ibulà un'te, nɛn a du waa itöŋ an'yaab kà an'kɔkà a wa. »
LUK 13:20 Nde kàkwɛy naa: « Mɛ imwol a Nzam in'sii anà ininà?
LUK 13:21 Kya kyà asànaa ful kàwɛl un'kaar mwɛy waa kàtüüb la anà an'kɔɔb an'tär mà mfufu a mampà. Ungö apan mfar yanswà laa yàfül ya. »
LUK 13:22 Yɛsu kàyilyaaŋà uboo a an'bul a kölàköl anà mà ikikye muyilɔŋ anà muyisin tsütsü a Yɛlusàlɛm.
LUK 13:23 Mbuur mwɛy kun'fuul naa: « Mwol, nkye baar ikikye mpɛl bàsàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈? » Nde waa kàfuur naa:
LUK 13:24 « Làkyer ngwal mubilà u kimunàmbwo, ntɔn mɛ alàkyään naa baar mbɔɔn bàsàleŋ mubilà wɛɛ ba bàsàkwo anki. »
LUK 13:25 « Mpal usàsubà ŋandwà anà usàbäm nde ndwà, isàkal naa bɛ lan'sàsal u nsà, bɛ làtàbɛɛrà ibeenà unsà làbɔ̈ɔ̈n lanswà: "Mwol, iduub!" Nde bɛ asàlafuur naa: "Bɛ làbà baar a ken?"
LUK 13:26 Apan, bɛ làsàtɛn a nde naa: "Wɛɛ bi laa kàdi anà kànü u mii angye, ngye kàlɔɔŋà kà an'balàbal anà bi."
LUK 13:27 Nde afàsàlafuur naa: "Bɛ làbà baar a ken. Làlwomà apà mɛ, bɛ baar làfàkyer man'be."
LUK 13:28 Akun isàkal ilel anà nkwoor a an'din mpal làsàman bɛ Abàlam, Isak anà Yakɔb anà aŋangɔɔm banswà uboo a Imwol a Nzam, wɛɛ bɛ ŋakwo bàkyàlapiy unsà.
LUK 13:29 Apan, baar bàsàfà ntsü làfàsɛnà taaŋ, ntsü làfàminà la, ntaal anà ngyɛl, ba bàsàwal ikal u mɛsà kà Imwol a Nzam.
LUK 13:30 Lalan baar a ngöngö bàsàbulà baar atàtwɛb, wɛɛ baar atàtwɛb bàsàbulà baar a ngöngö. »
LUK 13:31 Umpal ayin, Amfarisi amwɛy bàyi ba, ba bàtɛn a Yɛsu naa: « Lwomà pabà, kyen ntsü asin, ntɔn Ɛlɔdi akwen mukadwa. »
LUK 13:32 Yɛsu waa kafuur naa: « Làkyen kàlun'kyään un'kyɛŋ awun: ŋàbà anà nkàswo mɛ in'wà muböŋ insɔŋà anà mukɔɔr aŋakyal, nkàswo wunà isal amɛ iyàkal aŋàwà.
LUK 13:33 Wɛɛ mɛ in'kyer alab mbwo amɛ ŋàbà, nkàswo anà nkàswo wunà, ntɔn ŋangɔɔm ukwe anki mukwà kà ikal asin mpa akyà Yɛlusàlɛm.
LUK 13:34 Aa, Yɛlusàlɛm! Yɛlusàlɛm! Ngye an'may aŋangɔɔm, ngye an'dwa baar ufàtɔm Nzam a in'kul. Mbalà kwe mɛ kàkwen muböbà baan angye tsütsü apà mɛ asànaa nkɔɔ ufàfwee wa an'tsül u ngyɛl a an'paab ande. Wɛɛ bɛ ya làsàkwen anki!
LUK 13:35 Isàkal abun ndwà abɛ bàkyer apiy bwà. Ɛɛ, sɛmà ŋàbawà bɛ mɛ làfàsan'man anki tii mpal làsàtɛn bɛ naa: "Wɛy un'sak ukäl akà mbuur kan'yà kà ikɔb a Mwol." »
LUK 14:1 Yàmɛnà naa ilä a saba mwɛy mfum a Amfarisi mwɛy kàbel Yɛsu mukàdyà u ndwà ande. Baar bàkäl paa bàkäl musey nde ubwaŋàbwaŋ.
LUK 14:2 Wɛɛ le, mbuur aŋàyàyam u ndür kàkäl aŋàmbar kusà a nde.
LUK 14:3 Yɛsu kàsi ndaa, waa kàtɛn a alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn anà Amfarisi naa: « Nkye bàkyàpà mbwo lɛɛ tɛy mukɔɔr mbuur ilä a saba? »
LUK 14:4 Wɛɛ ba ndaa bàsi anki. Apan Yɛsu laa kàbä nde mbuur awun, waa kun'kɔɔr, kun'sweŋ mufurà ndwà ande.
LUK 14:5 Ungö apan, nde waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Nà uboo abɛ, isàkal naa mwan ande itàkal ngɔɔmà ande kan'bwà uboo a fu, mpa kun'twey nde a agyägyä, ilä a saba? »
LUK 14:6 Wɛɛ ba sye bàsàkwo anki mufuur.
LUK 14:7 Mpal kàmɛn nde naa baar bàbel bàkäl musɔɔl ikal atàtwɛb, nde kàtɛ nsim yi:
LUK 14:8 « Isàkal naa mbuur kàmabel mukàdyà ilä atà bör ande, twon an'kàbwaay kà ikal a imfum. Taaŋ lumwɛy uboo abɛ we anà mbuur kan'söön ngye unsà imfum
LUK 14:9 anà mbuur kàlabel, ngye anà nde, uyàtɛn a ngye naa: "Sun'wɛy ikal ki." Uboo a nswɛn, ngye akàbwaay kà ikal a ngöngö.
LUK 14:10 Wɛɛ, manà bàmabel, kyen kabwaay kà ikal a ngöngö. Abun, mpal uyàbilà mbuur kabel, nde waa kakyään naa: "Un'sam amɛ, kye anà ikal aŋasöön ubwaŋ ntɔn ngye, yabwaay udu kà". Abun ngye ayàkal aŋasyäŋà u mii a baar bàkäl anà ngye u mɛsà.
LUK 14:11 Lalan, mbuur afàsɛɛn an'pɛy bàkyer afun'tyeey, mbuur afàtyà bàkyer afun'sɛn. »
LUK 14:12 Ungö Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a mbuur kun'bel naa: « Isàkal naa ngye apà baar udyà, twon an'bel asam angye, atɔŋ angye, baar a mbil angye, itàkal aŋun'naaŋ bàfàkal tsütsü apà ngye, ntɔn ba sye bàfàsabel mufuur ayi yanswà an'kyer ngye.
LUK 14:13 Wɛɛ, isàkal naa ngye apà isaa akà baar, bel aŋàlàmbwà, baar aŋàyɔm in'kɔl, ikar, ikwàmii.
LUK 14:14 Waa ngye ayàkal kà un'sak ntɔn baar aban ndöŋ yatɛy musafuur asànaa an'kyer ngye. Waa Nzam usakwɛy mpal bàsàwiyà baar a balàbal kà ukwà. »
LUK 14:15 Yàmɛnà naa ungö apan, umwɛy uboo a baar bàbel waa kàtɛn a Yɛsu naa: « Un'sak akà mbuur asàwal ikal mpal bàsàdii baar uboo a Imwol a Nzam! »
LUK 14:16 Waa Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Ilä mwɛy, mbuur mwɛy kàwɛl baar u ndwà ande ntɔn udyà a kölàköl. Waa nde kàbel baar mbɔɔn.
LUK 14:17 Taaŋ a udyà làkwe la, nde kàtöm un'syääl ande mukàswaŋ baar kàbel nde naa: "Làyi apanà, ntɔn ndaa yanswà yan'kwo."
LUK 14:18 Wɛ ba banswà bàkal mun umwɛy wa, waa bàlɔ̈m ndwääl a nkul. Wàtàtwɛb kun'kyään naa: "Mɛ an'som ywanŋ làmwɛy, mɛ in'kyer akyà mukàler la. Mɛ amabɔɔn, ndwääl nkul."
LUK 14:19 Wumwɛy naa: "Mɛ an'som adim atyeen anà akyay atyeen bà ngɔɔmà. Mɛ in'kyer akàsi ya. Mɛ amabɔɔn, ndwääl nkul."
LUK 14:20 Wumwɛy sye naa: "Mɛ an'bääl làbenàben alà, mɛ in'kwe anki muyà."
LUK 14:21 Taaŋ kàyàfurà un'syääl awun, nde kàkyään nkum ande ndaa ayi yanswà bàtɛn ba. Lalan ŋandwà kàwem nde nkyɛl, kàswɛŋ nde un'syääl ande naa: "Kyen agyägyä! Kyen u mbay anà kan'balàbal a bul, twaal pabà aŋàlàmbwà, baar aŋàkwɛkà, ikwàmii, ikar."
LUK 14:22 Ungö a taaŋ, un'syääl waa kàyàkyään nkum ande naa: "Mwol, mɛ an'kyer asànaa an'swɛŋ ngye, wɛɛ ikal a ipɔl byà paa."
LUK 14:23 Nkum ande naa: "Kyen u mbwo yanswà, u mbil a mpaŋ, siinà baar bàbilà, ntɔn ndwà amɛ iyöl abar.
LUK 14:24 Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ alàkyään ndandaa naa akà mbuur mwɛy uboo a baar kàbel mɛ ulɛr anki isaa amɛ!" »
LUK 14:25 Yàmɛnà naa mbul a baar kàyikyeenà a Yɛsu, nde waa kàbulà, waa kàtɛn a ba naa:
LUK 14:26 « Isàkal naa mbuur an'yà akà mɛ, wɛɛ nde udiimà anki taarànde, ngwän, un'kyay ande, baan ande, atɔŋ ande babaal anà bakaar, itàkal ndür ande ŋakwo, nde ukwe anki mukal un'lɔŋki amɛ.
LUK 14:27 Mbuur mpa usɛn buur ande anà mpa ulab mɛ, nde ukwe anki mukal un'lɔŋki amɛ.
LUK 14:28 Abà, nà uboo abɛ akwen mutɔŋ ndwà a bwɛlàbwɛl, nde uwal anki taaŋ muyweer ntɔn muyöb naa nde kwe uyàtwey, nkye nde ayàkwo mumay ndwà ande?
LUK 14:29 Naa tɛy, nde uyàmay anki mutɔŋ ungö musà un'bään, baar banswà bàsamanà ya bàkyer asun'sɛ.
LUK 14:30 Ba bàsàtɛn naa: "Làler mbuur kàsɛmà mutɔŋ, wɛ nde kàkwe anki mumay."
LUK 14:31 Itàkal naa mfum mwɛy wà tsütsü muleŋ ngwiy a mfum asin. Nde uwal anki taaŋ mubwaay anà muyweer naa nkye nde akyàkwo muwal iböŋ kusà a mbuur awe abà baar nsaab an'kwem mööl isàkal naa nde ŋakwo we abà baar nsaab kwem?
LUK 14:32 Nde usàman naa nde ukwo anki, nde atɔm in'kyeey mpal awà un'yiiŋ ande u kwɛlàkwɛl ntɔn muyöŋà duu.
LUK 14:33 Ya ye abun sye ntɔn bɛ: uboo abɛ, mbuur mpa ukwen mukɔɔb ubwaŋ ande banswà ukwe anki mukal un'lɔŋki amɛ. »
LUK 14:34 « Muŋ wà undiir aŋàbwaŋ, wɛɛ ntsà awa isàwà, ya bàyun'fuur a nkye?
LUK 14:35 Wa bàfàsàsyääl anki itàkal ntɔn mɛɛn, itàkal ntɔn mudii ndon. Undiir kan'saal: upiy wa bwà u nsà. Wɛy mbuur awe anà an'tsü awem uwem. »
LUK 15:1 Yàmɛnà naa afüür a itɛr anà baar asin babe, ba banswà bàsin tsütsü apà Yɛsu ntɔn mukun'wem.
LUK 15:2 Amfarisi anà alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn bàŋüŋün anà bàtɛn naa: « Mbuur wà ayiwal baar abɛ anà ayidyà ikal imwɛy anà ba. »
LUK 15:3 Wɛɛ Yɛsu katɛɛl nsim yi:
LUK 15:4 « Nà uboo abɛ we amyà in'kɔk nkam, wɛ umwɛy udiimà, nkye nde usàwɛy anki in'kɔk an'kwem wà aŋiwà u nsye ntɔn mukàleŋ umwɛy kan'diimà wà tii mpal usàman nde wa?
LUK 15:5 Mpal usàman nde wa, unsà un'sak nde, nde wa asàsà kà an'pɛy.
LUK 15:6 Mpal uyàfurà nde ndwà ande, nde abel asam ande anà baar a tsütsü, waa utɛn naa: "Làsäŋ anà mɛ, ntɔn un'kɔk amɛ kàdiimà kan'mɛnà."
LUK 15:7 Abun sye, mɛ ndandaa alàkyään, un'sak mbɔɔn asàkal u du isàkal naa mbuur un'be mwɛy kan'buul mpem, wɛɛ kà ntɔn an'kwen wà aŋiwà mpa bàwe anà mfun a mbuul a mpem. »
LUK 15:8 « Itàkal naa, nà un'kaar mwɛy we abyà itɛr a ngim kwem, wɛɛ imwɛy kyan'diimà. Nkye nde ukyää anki mwinà, ukɔ̈ɔ̈m ndwà anà uyaal ntsü yanswà tii mpal uyàfàman nde kya?
LUK 15:9 Wɛɛ umpal uman nde kya, nde abel asam ande anà baar a tsütsü anà mutɛn naa: "Làsäŋ anà mɛ, ntɔn itɛr a ngim amɛ kyàdiimà kyan'mɛnà."
LUK 15:10 Abun sye, mɛ alàkyään naa un'sak mbɔɔn afàkal akà akyeey a Nzam isàkal naa mbuur un'be mwɛy kan'buul mpem. »
LUK 15:11 Yɛsu waa kàfàtɛn naa: « Mbuur mwɛy kàkäl abà baan abaal bɔ̈ɔ̈l.
LUK 15:12 Mwan wà umbɛy kàtɛn a taarànde naa: "Taa, mpɛ kab a indiir làmɛ." Taaràba kakääb indiir ande.
LUK 15:13 Ungö a ilä, mwan umbɛy awun kàwɛl indiir ande byanswà, laa kàyälà nde bya, waa kàkyen nsi a kwɛl. Wɛɛ akun nde kàtay un'naaŋ ande uboo a lingyoomà.
LUK 15:14 Mpal kàmay nde indiir ande byanswà, ngyal a ngwal yàbilà u nsi ayin, laa kàsɛmà nde muleŋ udyà.
LUK 15:15 Apan, nde kàkàleŋ isal akà mbuur mwɛy wà nsi ayin. Mbuur awà kun'töm u nsye mukàdii ngul ande.
LUK 15:16 Wɛɛ an'kyän ande màkäl naa nde udi itàkal isaa a ngul, wɛɛ mbuur un'pà bya kàkäl anki.
LUK 15:17 Apan, nde kàfuur an'kyän, waa kàtɛn naa: "Asyääl a taa akwe bàfàdyà asànaa bàkwen ba, wɛɛ mɛ kà in'wà mukwà a ngyal.
LUK 15:18 Mɛ in'kyer ambarà, in'kyer akyà akà taa, waa in'kàtɛn a nde naa: Taa, mɛ an'kyer man'be akà Nzam anà akà ngye.
LUK 15:19 Mɛ in'kwe anki mufàkal mwan angye. Ngwɛl asànaa umwɛy uboo a asyääl angye."
LUK 15:20 Apan laa kambarà nde, kàfurà nde akà taarànde. Nde kàkäl anki ŋàtàtol, mpal kun'mɛn taarànde ukwɛl, laa kun'wem nde ngyɛb mbɔɔn, kàkyen nde ntiin, kun'bwirà nde, waa kundüür.
LUK 15:21 Mwan laa kàtɛn nde a taarànde naa: "Taa, mɛ kàkyer man'be akà Nzam anà akà ngye, mɛ in'kwe anki mufàkal mwan angye …"
LUK 15:22 Wɛɛ taarànde kàswɛŋ asyääl ande: "Làkyen agyägyä, kàlaleŋ ipfɛy kyan'söön ntwɛn, lun'bwää, lun'si làpɛr u làpin, lun'bwää an'sàbar aŋàbwaŋ.
LUK 15:23 Wɛɛ làtwääl un'tö a ngɔɔmà a may, làdwä wa. Bi ikyer adyà, bi ikyer ataam
LUK 15:24 ntɔn mwan amɛ kàkäl awàŋàkwà, nde kan'wiyà, nde kàkyer adiimà, wɛɛ mɛ amun'man." Laa bàsɛmà ba mutaam.
LUK 15:25 Taaŋ nsil alan, mwan wà nswɛm kàkäl kà an'ywaŋ. Mpal kàkäl nde u mbwo muyàfurà, kàkɔlà nde tsütsü a ndwà, laa kàwem nde an'diim anà an'kyen.
LUK 15:26 Nde kàbel umwɛy uboo a asyääl, waa kun'fuul naa ndaa nà ikalyaaŋà.
LUK 15:27 Un'syääl kun'fuur abà: "Un'kɔm angye an'yàfurà. Taaràŋà kan'dwa un'tö a ngɔɔmà a may ntɔn nde an'yàfurà anà mɔ̈ɔ̈."
LUK 15:28 Lalan, mwan wà nswɛm kàwen nde nkyɛl, waa kàtön mubilà u ndwà. Taarànde laa kàyàtoo nde, waa kun'lɔ̈ɔ̈m mubilà.
LUK 15:29 Wɛɛ nde kàtɛn a taarànde naa: "Le, mɛ an'kyer mbul anà mbul musyääl ngye: mɛ ndaa angye mwɛy akà ikikye in'fàbɛy anki. Wɛɛ, akà mbalà mwɛy ngye un'tö a ntab kan'pɛ anki ntɔn mutaam anà asam amɛ.
LUK 15:30 Wɛɛ mwan angye, mbuur kan'kàtay indiir angye byanswà anà akaar a pasàsɛ kan'yàfurà, ntɔn nde, ngye an'dwa un'tö a ngɔɔmà a may!"
LUK 15:31 Taarànde naa: "Mwan amɛ, ngye awà anà mɛ taaŋ lanswà, indiir amɛ byanswà byà byàngye.
LUK 15:32 Wɛɛ, yubwaŋ naa bi ikäl kà un'sak, ntɔn un'tɔŋ angye wà asànaa mbuur kàkü waa kan'wiyà, ntɔn nde kàkyer adiimà, waa kan'mɛnà." »
LUK 16:1 Yàmɛnà naa Yɛsu kàtɛn a alɔŋki ande naa: « Ŋun'naaŋ mwɛy kàkäl anà mfum a isal ande. Baar laa bàyun'füün ba naa nde afàtaam anà indiir ande.
LUK 16:2 Ŋun'naaŋ waa kun'bel, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: "Ndaa nà mɛ in'weemà ntɔn ngye? Nswɛŋ nsyääl angye, ntɔn ngye ayàfàlab anki musyääl indiir amɛ."
LUK 16:3 Mfum a isal kàsɛmà muyweer: "Mɛ in'kyer aben, ntɔn nkum amɛ kàman'lwom muler isal ande? In'bulà mulem an'ywaŋ? Mɛ ngwal yatɛy. In'sɛmà muyilɔm akà baar? Yà ndaa a nswɛn.
LUK 16:4 Aa, mɛ an'man naa mɛ ininà in'kyer ntɔn baar ban'wɛl u ndwà aba mpal bàyan'lwom kà isal amɛ."
LUK 16:5 Ungö apan, nde kàbeelà umwɛy umwɛy aŋankul a nkum ande. Nde kàtɛn a mbuur wàtàtwɛb naa: "Ngye kwɛ apà akà nkum amɛ?"
LUK 16:6 Nde kun'fuur naa: "Ngungulà nkam yà may." Nde waa kàtɛn naa: "Le un'kaan a nkul angye, bwaay pabà, kyer agyägyä, sɔn an'kwem an'tyeen."
LUK 16:7 Ungö nde waa kàtɛn a wumwɛy naa: "Atöl ngye kwe?" Nde naa: "Ngɔɔr nkam mwɛy yà mbɛŋ a imbab." Mfum a isal naa: "Mà un'kaan a nkul angye, sɔn an'kwem naan."
LUK 16:8 Abun, nkum kàkyer un'syäŋà un'be un'syääl awà ntɔn mankay ande. Iswaŋà naa baan a nsi yi ban'söön mankay kusà a atɔŋ aba akwà abà baan a pɛɛlà.
LUK 16:9 Wɛɛ mɛ alàkyään naa: Làtɛ isaam a in'naaŋ a loor myà mɛɛn mà. Abun, umpal myàsàkɔɔn mya, waa mya isàlawal kà ikal a mbul a in'tye.
LUK 16:10 Isàkal naa mbuur wà balàbal unsà indiir ikikye, nde asàkal sye wàbalàbal unsà indiir mbɔɔn. Wɛɛ isàkal naa mbuur wà ŋaloor unsà indiir ikikye, nde asàkal sye ŋaloor unsà indiir mbɔɔn.
LUK 16:11 Lalan, isàkal naa bɛ balàbal batɛy musyääl un'naaŋ a loor a mɛɛn mà, nà kan'kwo mukàlapà un'naaŋ a ndandaa?
LUK 16:12 Isàkal naa bɛ balàbal batɛy unsà indiir a baar asin, nà ayàlapà indiir abɛ ŋakwo?
LUK 16:13 Akà un'syääl mwɛy tɛy kan'kwo musyääl ankum bɔ̈ɔ̈l. Ya iyàmɛnà naa nde ayàkyey umwɛy, nde ayàtɔn wumwɛy, itàkal naa nde ayàpà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande akà umwɛy, nde ayàyiiŋ wumwɛy. Bɛ làkwe anki musyääl Nzam anà ngim u taaŋ làmwɛy la. »
LUK 16:14 Yàmɛnà naa Amfarisi bàwem ba ndaa ayi yanswà, ba bàsɛɛ Yɛsu, ntɔn ba bàkweenà ngim.
LUK 16:15 Wɛɛ nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Bɛ làbà baar làfàswaŋ u mii a baar naa bɛ làbà balàbal, wɛɛ Nzam akiyöb boo a mpem abɛ. Undiir bàfàman baar naa wa wà làkoo, Nzam wa afàman wà ŋingyäy.
LUK 16:16 « Taaŋ a Un'kɔɔn anà là in'kaan a aŋangɔɔm làtsü apà Ywan. Sɛmà taaŋ alan, Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là Imwol a Nzam ban'kyään, anà mbuur mbuur wà mukyer ngwal ntɔn mubilà kwo.
LUK 16:17 Du anà mɛɛn man'kwo isàdiimà, wɛɛ akà isɛrà mwɛy kyà Un'kɔɔn isàdiimà anki.
LUK 16:18 « Baal wanswà kàkaabà anà un'kyay ande, usàkàwal un'kyay asin, nde kan'tà inswem, wɛɛ baal wanswà asàwal un'kaar kàkaabà anà un'dim ande, nde kan'tà inswem.
LUK 16:19 « Taaŋ mwɛy kàkäl anà ŋun'naaŋ mwɛy kàfàbwaarà ubwaŋàbwaŋ ipfɛy a ntal. Ilä byanswà isal ande udyà anà utaam.
LUK 16:20 Ŋàlàmbwà mwɛy ikɔb ande Lazar kàfabɔ̈ɔ̈nà u mun a làpaŋ a ŋun'naaŋ awà, nde kàkäl anà inkyar u ndür ande.
LUK 16:21 Nde kàlàkwen mudyà mfür a mampà yàbwee u mɛsà a ŋun'naaŋ. Apan sye mbwà yàyee mulɛɛr inkyar ande.
LUK 16:22 Yàmɛnà naa ŋàlàmbwà waa ukü, akyeey a Nzam laa bun'syen ba akà Abàlam. Ŋun'naaŋ sye waa ukü, waa bun'dyee.
LUK 16:23 Kà an'lɔŋ, ŋun'naaŋ kàkäl uboo a mpay yà mbɔɔn. Mpal kàler nde u du laa kàmɛn nde ukwɛl Lazar tsütsü apà Abàlam.
LUK 16:24 Apan nde kàlaal in'kwɛŋ: "Taaràmɛ Abàlam, ngwem ngyɛb! Tɔm Lazar, nde udüma nswɛŋ a làpin ande kà an'dà, nde kan'nɔ̈ lànyaŋ a an'dà u làlem amɛ, ntɔn mɛ in'wà u mpay mbɔɔn uboo a mbaa yi."
LUK 16:25 Wɛɛ Abàlam kun'fuur naa: "Mwan amɛ, yɔbà ubwaŋ banswà kàmɛn ngye u mɔ̈ɔ̈ angye taaŋ kàkäl ngye u mɛɛn, wɛɛ Lazar kàkäl u mpay taaŋ lanswà. Mpalabà, apà, Lazar wà kà un'sak, wɛɛ ngye awà u mpay aŋasöönà.
LUK 16:26 Yumwɛy ayi: Uboo a bi anà bɛ we anà un'baan a kölàköl. Ilàtàkal naa ukwen bàkäl, bi ikwe anki musoonà wa, itàkal naa mufà akà bi muyà akà bɛ, itàkal naa mufà akà bɛ muyà akà bi."
LUK 16:27 Ŋun'naaŋ waa kàtɛn naa: "Isàkal abwɛy, mɛ amabɔɔn, taa, tɔm Lazar u ndwà a taaràmɛ,
LUK 16:28 ntɔn mɛ in'we abà atɔŋ abaal atyeen, nde ukakyään, manà ba sye bàyàlab mbwo a mpay ayi."
LUK 16:29 Abàlam naa: "Atɔŋ angye bye anà Mɔsɛ anà aŋangɔɔm, wɛy ba bawem."
LUK 16:30 Nde naa: "Ŋaa, taa Abàlam, manà mbuur kan'fà an'lɔŋ, kan'kyà akà ba, ba bàkyer ayàbuul mpem."
LUK 16:31 Abàlam waa kun'fuur naa: "Isàkal naa ba bàkwe anki muwem Mɔsɛ anà aŋangɔɔm, ba sye bàyàkwo anki muwem akà ikikye mbuur kan'fà an'lɔŋ." »
LUK 17:1 Ungö apan, Yɛsu kàtɛn a alɔŋki ande naa: « Yà ndandaa naa taaŋ lanswà baar ban'kwo bàbü u man'be, wɛɛ ngyɛb akà mbuur awà mbwo ntɔn mbweel a un'tɔŋ ande.
LUK 17:2 Yubwaŋ akà nde naa bun'bäm nkɔŋ a kölàköl u bway anà bun'tɔɔm u ngyäl, akwà naa nde mubwiy umwɛy uboo a baan ambɛy bà.
LUK 17:3 Làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ ntɔn bɛ ŋakwo! Isàkal naa un'tɔŋ angye kan'kyer man'be, un'pɛ an'lwɛŋ. Nde usàsɔɔmà, un'dwääl nkul.
LUK 17:4 Itàkal naa nde kàmakyer ube mbalà nsambwaar kà ilä mwɛy wɛɛ nde akayaa akà ngye taaŋ lanswà naa nde akyer asɔɔmà, un'dwääl nkul. »
LUK 17:5 Yàmɛnà naa ilä mwɛy antööm bàtɛn a Mwol naa: « Kwɛy làkwikilà abi. »
LUK 17:6 Mwol waa kàfuur naa: « Isàkal naa ndandaa bɛ làbye anà làkwikilà làtàkal ikikye asànaa imbɛŋ a làpɔ̈ɔ̈là, bɛ lan'kwo muswaŋ un'te a kölàköl naa: "Tsumà pà, kyen kambär uboo a ngyäl!" Wa akyer alàwem. »
LUK 17:7 Yɛsu kàkwɛy naa: « Bi itàwal naa umwɛy uboo abɛ ukäl anà un'tsüüŋ ande isal ande mulem, taaŋ lumwɛy mudii ntsür. Uman nde kan'fà an'ywaŋ kan'yàfurà, nkye nde ayàtɛn a nde naa: "Yà agyägyä, bwaay u mɛsà"?
LUK 17:8 Aay, nde ayàtɛn a nde naa: "Ndääm isaa, bwaar ubwaŋ, yà yan'pɛ udyà, manà mɛ an'may mudyà anà munwà, ungö ngye sye waa ayàdyà anà ayànwà."
LUK 17:9 Nkye nkum kan'kwo mupà ndä akà un'tsüüŋ ande ntɔn nde kan'kyer isal kyanswà kun'swɛŋ nde?
