LUK 17:10 Ya sye ye abwɛy ntɔn bɛ. Isàkal naa bɛ lan'kyer isal kyanswà bàlaswɛŋ, làtɛn naa: "Bi ibà atsüüŋ ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ndöŋ: bi kan'kyer isal kan'kwo bi mukyer." »
LUK 17:11 Yàmɛnà naa Yɛsu kàkäl mukyà Yɛlusàlɛm, nde kàsoonà ndel a Samalya anà Ngalilɛ.
LUK 17:12 Mpal kàkäl nde tsütsü mubilà u bul mwɛy, aŋakyal a bay kwem bàyi akà nde, ba bàmbär u kwɛl
LUK 17:13 waa bàsɛn ndaa: « Yɛsu, Un'lɔɔŋ, iwem ngyɛb! »
LUK 17:14 Mpal kamɛn Yɛsu, nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làkyen kàlamɛnà akà angaŋ. » Mpal bàkäl ba u mbwo, laa bàkɔɔrà ba.
LUK 17:15 Umwɛy uboo aba kàmɛn nde naa nde kan'kɔɔrà, waa kàyàfurà, wàmuyisyäŋà Nzam u ndaa a dudu.
LUK 17:16 Apan, waa kàbü, ntabwey u mɛɛn, kà in'kɔl a Yɛsu, waa kun'kömà. Mbuur awà kàkäl un'nsi Samalya.
LUK 17:17 Waa Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Ba bàkwem bàkyer akɔɔrà, wɛɛ bàken baar wà bumwɛy?
LUK 17:18 Akà mbuur mwɛy ukäl anki anà an'kyän muyàfurà ntɔn mukömà Nzam, ilàkɔɔn akal ungyey abarankye wà? »
LUK 17:19 Apan Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mbarà, kyen, làkwikilà angye làmatswà mɔ̈ɔ̈. »
LUK 17:20 Ilä mwɛy Amfarisi bàfuul Yɛsu naa imwol a Nzam isàyà mpal yɛn. Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Imwol a Nzam iyà anki asànaa undiir a ubem.
LUK 17:21 Bàsàtɛn anki naa: "Làler, kya aki kà." Taaŋ lumwɛy naa: "Kya kyà kunà." Ntɔn, làyöb naa Imwol a Nzam kyà uboo a bɛ. »
LUK 17:22 Apan nde waa kàtɛn a alɔŋki ande naa: « Taaŋ là paa làsàkwen bɛ muman Mwan a mbuur itàkal ilä mwɛy mpɛl, wɛɛ bɛ làsun'man anki.
LUK 17:23 Ba bàsàlakyäänà naa: "Làler kunà!", taaŋ lumwɛy naa: "Làler kà!" Wɛɛ twon lan'kyà, twon lan'kaamà ntiin.
LUK 17:24 Ilä a Mwan a mbuur isàkal asànaa muŋyä ufàparà wa udu, anà ufàpà wa kyɛɛy awa ntsü anà ntsü.
LUK 17:25 Wɛɛ kusà nde akyer atàman mpay mbɔɔn anà baar a mpalàbà bàkyer un'tɔn.
LUK 17:26 Lalan ndaa yàlyaaŋ utaaŋ a Nɔwa, isàkal sye kà ilä a Mwan a mbuur.
LUK 17:27 Baar bàkyer afadyaa, bàkyer afanwaa, bàkyer afataa an'bɔr, bàkyer afapaa baan aba an'bɔr, tii ilä kàbilà Nɔwà kà an'swà. An'dà màyööl ma mɛɛn, laa bàkü ba banswà.
LUK 17:28 Isàkal sye asànaa utaaŋ a Lɔti: baar bàkyer afadyaa, bàkyer afanwaa, bàkyer afasoomà, bàkyer afayälà, bàkyer afakɔnà, bàkyer afatɔŋà.
LUK 17:29 Wɛɛ ilä kàtoo Lɔti u Sɔdɔm, mbul a in'kul a mbaa laa kàfü wa du, kàdwä wa ba banswà.
LUK 17:30 Ya isàkal abà sye kà ilä a Mwan a mbuur usàmɛnà nde.
LUK 17:31 Ilä akin, mbuur asàkal udu a nsyä a ndwà ande, ufàsàbilà anki u ndwà ntɔn mukàwal indiir ande, ifà imwɛy sye akà mbuur asàkal kan'ywaŋ usàkwo anki mufurà ndwà ande.
LUK 17:32 Làyɔbà un'kyay a Lɔti!
LUK 17:33 Mbuur asàkwen muyee mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande, wa asàkyà bwà, wɛɛ mbuur asàkɔɔb mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande, akyer asàwal wa.
LUK 17:34 Mɛ alàkyään naa: u mpib ayin, baar bɔ̈ɔ̈l bàsàkal ibɔ̈ɔ̈n imwɛy: umwɛy bàkyer asun'syen, umwɛy bàkyer asun'wɛy.
LUK 17:35 Akaar bɔ̈ɔ̈l bàsàkal mutswà ikal imwɛy: un'mwɛy bàkyer asun'syen, un'mwɛy bàkyer asun'wɛy.
LUK 17:36 Abaal bɔ̈ɔ̈l bàsàkal kà ibɔr: umwɛy bàkyer asun'syen, un'mwɛy bàkyer asun'wɛy. »
LUK 17:37 Alɔŋki ande bun'fuul naa: « Mwol, ndaa ayi isàkal ken? » Waa nde kafuur naa: « Ntsü isàkal ndom, akun sye inkaak isàköŋ bya. »
LUK 18:1 Ilä mwɛy Yɛsu katɛɛl nsim yi ntɔn muswaŋ ba naa ba bàkyer ayamà taaŋ lanswà, bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n ayɔɔn:
LUK 18:2 « U bul mwɛy, kàkäl anà ntɛɛn mwɛy. Nde Nzam kàfun'weemà anki, nde mbuur wanswà kàfun'manà naa wa undiir a bunàbun.
LUK 18:3 U bul nsil alan kàkäl sye anà un'kweel a un'dim mwɛy kàfayaa taaŋ lanswà akà nde ntɔn nde ulɔ̈ɔ̈n ndaa ande, nde kàtɛɛnà naa: "Mpɛ iböŋ udu a un'yiiŋ amɛ!"
LUK 18:4 Taaŋ mbɔɔn ntɛɛn awà kàkyer atɔnà, wɛɛ mpal mwɛy nde kàtɛn u mpem ande naa: "Yà ndandaa naa mɛ Nzam bɔɔmà in'fun'man anki, mɛ sye akà mbuur mwɛy làkoo in'fun'sà anki,
LUK 18:5 wɛɛ asànaa un'kweel a un'dim wà kàman'sà pfwopfwo, mɛ in'kyer un'lɔ̈ɔ̈n ndaa ande, naa tɛy, usinayaa nde abà, nde ayan'twääl lingyoomà." »
LUK 18:6 Apan Mwol waa ufàkwɛy naa: « Làwem ndaa kan'tɛn ntɛɛn un'be wà!
LUK 18:7 Wɛ bɛ làsii naa Nzam uyàpà anki iböŋ agyägyä akà baar ande kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l nde, bàfun'bel mpib anà mwäänà? Nde ayàbwiy mpib mukyer abà?
LUK 18:8 Mɛ, mɛ alàkyään naa nde ba iböŋ ayapà agyägyä. Wɛɛ, nkye mpal usàyà Mwan a mbuur, nde akyer asàtaan làkwikilà u mɛɛn? »
LUK 18:9 Ungö apan Yɛsu kàfàtà nsim ntɔn baar bàfàkyey uyɔl naa ba bà baar a balàbal anà bàfàbɛy baar bumwɛy.
LUK 18:10 Nde kàtɛn abà: « Baar bööl bàkaanà u ndwà a Nzam mukàyamà: umwɛy kàkäl Umfarisi, wumwɛy un'füür a itɛr.
LUK 18:11 Umfarisi kàkäl umbär anà muyamà u mpem ande naa: "Ɔɔ Nzam, mɛ amafuur an'tɔɔn ntɔn mukɔɔn akal asànaa baar bumwɛy, aŋunkaam, baar mpa abà balàbal, baar a inswem, itàkal asànaa un'füür a itɛr wà.
LUK 18:12 Mɛ in'fàkin mbɔr ilä byeel u mpɔsà mwɛy, in'fàpà kwen unsà indiir nkam amɛ byanswà."
LUK 18:13 Un'füür a itɛr kàkäl ukɔl, nde kàkwen anki musuub ntabwey ande. Wɛɛ nde kàyabɛɛrà itɔl ande, waa kàtɛɛnà naa: "Ɔɔ Nzam, ngwem ngyɛb ntɔn mɛ in'wà mbuur a man'be!"
LUK 18:14 Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, un'füür a itɛr Nzam kun'twey mbuur a balàbal mpal kàfurà nde ndwà ande, wɛɛ kà Umfarisi anki. Ntɔn mbuur wanswà afàsɛnà bàkyer afun'tyeey, wɛɛ mbuur afàtyà bàkyer afun'sɛɛn. »
LUK 18:15 Umpal ayin yàmɛnà naa baar bàyàtwaal baan ambɛy akà Yɛsu ntɔn nde kasi an'kɔɔ. Alɔŋki bàmɛn ba abun, waa baŋän.
LUK 18:16 Yɛsu waa kabel, waa kàtɛn naa: « Lawɛy baan bàyi apà mɛ! Twon làmatsuŋ, ntɔn imwol a Nzam kye a baar abà asànaa ba.
LUK 18:17 Mɛ ndandaa alàkyään, mbuur mpa awal imwol a Nzam asànaa mwan, nde kya usàbilà anki. »
LUK 18:18 Mfum mwɛy kàfuul Yɛsu naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ aŋàbwaŋ, mɛ in'kyer aben muwal möö a mbul a in'tye? »
LUK 18:19 Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ntɔn nkye aman'bel ngye aŋàbwaŋ? Akà mbuur mwɛy wàŋàbwaŋ watɛy, usàkɔɔn akal Nzam mpɛl.
LUK 18:20 Ngye akiyöb in'kɔɔn: "Twon an'tà inswem, twon an'lɔ, twon an'yib, twon an'tà imbäl a loor, sà làkoo akà taaràŋà anà ngwa." »
LUK 18:21 Wɛɛ nde kun'fuur naa: « Ayin yanswà mɛ in'kyer afàlab sɛmà imbɛy. »
LUK 18:22 Ungö kàwem nde abwɛy, Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Undiir mwɛy mpɛl kàmasääl: Yälà indiir angye byanswà, waa akääb ngim ayin aŋàlàmbwà, waa ngye asàwal un'naaŋ u du. Ungö, yan'läb! »
LUK 18:23 Umpal kàwem mbuur awà abwɛy, nde kàmɛn mpay mbɔɔn u mpem ande, ntɔn nde kàkäl ŋunaaŋ a kölàköl.
LUK 18:24 Yɛsu kàmɛn nde naa ŋun'naaŋ kan'kwamà ndür, nde kàtɛn naa: « Yà mpay akà aŋin'naaŋ mubilà uboo a Imwol a Nzam!
LUK 18:25 Lalan mpay yatɛy akà mpoonà mubilà u mun a nsway akwà naa ŋun'naaŋ mubilà uboo a Imwol a Nzam. »
LUK 18:26 Baar bun'weemà bàtɛn naa: « Woo, abwɛy nà kan'kwo muwà mɔ̈ɔ̈? »
LUK 18:27 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Indiir mpa bàfàkwo baar, akà Nzam bya mpay byatɛy. »
LUK 18:28 Apan Petɔlà waa kàtɛn naa: « Atöl bi, bi kàsàwɛy indiir abi ŋakwo ntɔn mulab ngye. »
LUK 18:29 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, isàkal naa ntɔn imwol a Nzam, mbuur an'sàwɛy ndwà ande, un'kyay ande, atɔŋ ande, aböör ande itàkal baan ande,
LUK 18:30 nde asàwal mbɔɔn u mpalàyi, wɛɛ umpal isàyà nde asàwal mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye. »
LUK 18:31 Yàmɛnà naa Yɛsu kàwɛl Bàkwen Aŋiyweel tsütsü apà nde, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làler, bi ibeenà Yɛlusàlɛm, ndaa yanswà bàsön aŋangɔɔm ntɔn Mwan a mbuur ikyer akàkwo.
LUK 18:32 Lalan ba bàyun'pà kà an'kɔɔ a baar mpa bàyöb Nzam, ba bàkyer ayun'sɛ, bàkyer ayun'to, bàkyer ayun'tsul an'te.
LUK 18:33 Ungö apan ba bàkyer ayun'kam an'füm, waa bàyun'dwa. Wɛɛ kà ilä kyàtär nde akyer ayàwiyà. »
LUK 18:34 Wɛɛ alɔŋki ande bàyöbà anki akà undiir unsà ndaa ayin, mbuul aya bàkyer ayee, ba bàyöb anki naa Yɛsu nkye kàkwen mutɛn.
LUK 18:35 Mpal kàkäl Yɛsu tsütsü a Yɛlikɔ, ikwàmii mwɛy kàkäl aŋàbwaay ukɔl a mbwo wàmulɔɔmà akà baar.
LUK 18:36 Mpal kàwem nde làso a baar bàkäl mulyaaŋ, nde kàfuul naa nkye ikalyaaŋà.
LUK 18:37 Ba bun'kyään naa Yɛsu un'nsi Nazàlɛr wàmulyaaŋ.
LUK 18:38 Nde kàkuub in'lalà: « Yɛsu, Mwan a David, ngwem ngyɛb! »
LUK 18:39 Baar bàyikyeenà kusà bun'tsüŋà musà làso, wɛɛ nde kàsöönà mukuub in'lalà: « Mwan a David, ngwem ngyɛb! »
LUK 18:40 Yɛsu laa kàmbär nde, waa kàswɛŋ naa bun'twääl awà. Mpal kàtöl ikwàmii tsütsü apà nde, Yɛsu kun'fuul naa:
LUK 18:41 « Ngye ininà akwen mɛ mukyer ntɔn ngye? » Ikwàmii kun'fuur naa: « Mwol, wɛy mɛ in'fàman. »
LUK 18:42 Wɛɛ Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Fàman! Làkwikilà angye làmakɔɔr. »
LUK 18:43 Apan sye laa kàfàman nde, kàläb nde Yɛsu, wàmuyisyäŋà Nzam. Baar banswà bàmɛn ba abun laa bàsyäŋà ba Nzam.
LUK 19:1 Ilä mwɛy Yɛsu kàbilà u Yɛlikɔ, nde kàlyaaŋ uboo a la.
LUK 19:2 Wɛɛ le, kwo kàkäl anà mbuur ikɔb ande Zakay. Nde kàkäl mfum a afüür a itɛr, nde kàkäl ŋun'naaŋ.
LUK 19:3 Nde kàkweenà muman naa Yɛsu kàkäl nà, wɛɛ nde kàkwe anki ntɔn baar bàkäl mbɔɔn, ntɔn nde kàkäl ikökö.
LUK 19:4 Nde kàkaamà ntiin kusà, waa kàlär udu a un'te ntɔn nde umɛn Yɛsu ntɔn nde ayàlyaaŋ paa.
LUK 19:5 Mpal kàkɔlà Yɛsu kà ikal akin, nde kàler u du, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Zakay, yatɔlà agyägyä, mɛ ŋàbà in'kàbɔ̈ɔ̈n u ndwà angye. »
LUK 19:6 Zakay kàtɔlà agyägyä, waa kàwɛl Yɛsu unsà un'sak.
LUK 19:7 Mpal bàmɛn baar abun, ba banswà bàkyer aŋüŋün, waa bàtɛn naa: « Làler, nde akyer akàbɔ̈ɔ̈n u ndwà a mbuur a man'be wà! »
LUK 19:8 Wɛɛ Zakay laa kàmbär nde, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwol, wem, mɛ in'pà boboo a indiir amɛ akà aŋàlàmbwà, isàkal naa mɛ kàgyɔɔr undiir a mbuur, mɛ un'fuur mbalà nà udu a wa. »
LUK 19:9 Apan Yɛsu kàtɛn ntɔn nde naa: « Ŋabawà mɔ̈ɔ̈ kan'bilà u ndwà ayi, ntɔn nde sye wà mwan a Abàlam.
LUK 19:10 Ntɔn Mwan a mbuur kàyi muleŋ anà mutswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a baar bàdiimà mbwo. »
LUK 19:11 Umpal bàkäl ba muweemà ndaa ayi, Yɛsu kàläb mutà nsim mwɛy. Ntɔn nde kàkäl tsütsü a Yɛlusàlɛm, wɛɛ ba bàsii naa Imwol a Nzam ikyer amɛnà apanà.
LUK 19:12 Làwem ndaa kàtɛn nde: « Mbuur mwɛy wà ywar a imwol kàkäl tsütsü mukyà nsi a kwɛl ntɔn bun'si mfum. Ungö nde waa kàyàfurà nsi ande.
LUK 19:13 Nde kàbel baar kwem uboo a asyääl ande, waa kàpɛ akà umwɛy umwɛy itɛr a wɔl. Ungö apan nde kaswɛŋ mutà yà a ngim ayin ntɔn ya ibör yàsin tii mpal usyefurà nde.
LUK 19:14 Wɛɛ mbuur awà, baar a nsi ande bàfun'kwenà anki. Lalan bàtöm ba akyeey ungö ande ntɔn mutɛn naa: "Bi ikwen anki naa mbuur awun uyaal u nsi abi!"
LUK 19:15 Ungö bun'si ba mfum, nde kàfurà nsi ande. Nde kàbel asyääl akwà kàpɛ nde ngim ntɔn muyöb naa ya ininà yàbör.
LUK 19:16 Wàtàtwɛb kàyi nde, kàtɛn naa: "Un'lɔɔŋ, itɛr a wɔl angye kyan'bɔr itɛr kwem."
LUK 19:17 Apan, Nkum ande naa: "Yubwaŋ mbɔɔn, ngye awà un'syääl aŋàbwaŋ! Ngye an'syääl balàbal unsà undiir ikikye, mɛ amasà mfum a an'bul a kölàköl kwem."
LUK 19:18 Wàyweel waa kàyàsin, waa kàtɛn naa: "Un'lɔɔŋ, itɛr a wɔl a ngye kyan'bɔr ityeen asin."
LUK 19:19 Nkum waa kàtɛn ande sye naa: "Yubwaŋ, mɛ amasà mfum a an'bul a kölàköl an'tyeen."
LUK 19:20 Ungöngö, umwɛy waa kàyi, waa kàtɛn naa: "Mwol, itɛr a wɔl angye kyaki: mɛ kya kàyee uboo a itɛɛnà a ipfɛy.
LUK 19:21 Lalan mɛ kàmɛn bɔɔmà angye, ntɔn ngye awà mbuur a ndaa a ngwal, ngye afàwal ngim kà ikal mpa kàsi ngye, ngye afàbwo ywaŋ mpa kàkön ngye."
LUK 19:22 Nde waa kàtɛn a nde naa: "Un'syääl un'be! Mbar angye mɛ in'tsul unsà ndaa angye ŋakwo! Ngye kàkyer ayöb naa mɛ in'wà mbuur a ndaa a ngwal, in'fàwal ngim kà ikal mpa kàsi mɛ, in'fàbwo ywaŋ mpa kàkön mɛ.
LUK 19:23 Wɛɛ ntɔn nkye mpa kàsi ngye ngim amɛ u bank? U mfurà amɛ, mɛ in'làwal bweel!"
LUK 19:24 Apan nde kàswɛŋ akà baar bàkäl paa: "Làduum itɛr a wɔl kin akà nde, làpɛ kya akà mbuur awe abyà kwem!"
LUK 19:25 Ba waa bàtɛn a nde naa: "Un'lɔɔŋ, nde we abyà kwem!"
LUK 19:26 Mɛ alàkyään naa: "mbuur awe anà bya bàkyer asun'kwɛy, wɛɛ mbuur mpa awe undiir bàkyer asun'lwom itàkal kindam awe nde akyà!
LUK 19:27 Wɛɛ ayiiŋ amɛ akwà mpa bàkwen naa mɛ in'käl mfum, latwääl pà, ladwä u mii amɛ!" »
LUK 19:28 Ungö mutɛn abà, Yɛsu kàkyen kusà a un'sɛŋ a baar kàkäl mubeenà Yɛlusàlɛm.
LUK 19:29 Mpal kàsin nde tsütsü apà Bɛtfagɛ anà Bɛtani, tsütsü apà mɔŋ bàfàbel naa mɔŋ a in'te a ɔlivɛ, nde kàtöm alɔŋki bööl kusà,
LUK 19:30 waa kàtɛn naa: « Làkyen u bul lanà u sim. Bɛ làsàkɔlà, bɛ làkàman mwan a anɛ wàŋabäm, udu awa mbuur ŋàtàlaar anki. Lun'tsuuŋ, lun'twääl pà.
LUK 19:31 Wɛɛ isàkal naa mbuur amàlafuul naa: "Ntɔn nkye làtsuuŋà bɛ wa?" Lun'fuur naa: "Mwol we anà mfun a wa." »
LUK 19:32 Umpal bàkyen antööm, ba bàmɛn asànaa kàtɛn Yɛsu.
LUK 19:33 Utaaŋ bàkäl ba mutsuuŋ mwan a anɛ wa, aŋawa bafuul naa: « Ntɔn nkye làtsuuŋà bɛ wa? »
LUK 19:34 Ba bàfuur naa: « Mwol we anà mfun a wa. »
LUK 19:35 Apan ba bàsyen mwan a anɛ akà Yɛsu. Ba bàyeel ipfɛy aba udu a ntsür, waa bàbay Yɛsu mulaar udu awa.
LUK 19:36 Mpal kàkäl nde muyikyà, baar bàyiyeelà ipfɛy aba u mbwo.
LUK 19:37 Utaaŋ kàkäl nde tsütsü a Yɛlusàlɛm, u mbumà a mɔŋ a in'te a ɔlive, un'kàbɔ a alɔŋki wanswà kàkäl mukömà Nzam unsà un'sak, u ndaa a ngwal, ntɔn impà byanswà bàmɛnà ba.
LUK 19:38 Ba bàtɛɛnà naa: « Wɛy Nzam usaak mfum kan'yà kà ikɔb a Mwol! Duu u dudu anà làkoo akà Nzam. »
LUK 19:39 Uboo a un'kàbɔ awà bàkäl anà Amfarisi amwɛy, ba bàtɛn a Yɛsu naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, aswɛŋ alɔŋki angye bàwɛy musà làso. »
LUK 19:40 Yɛsu waa kafuur naa: « Mɛ alàkyään naa ba bàsàkal a duu, in'kul ikyer a kuub in'kwɛŋ. »
LUK 19:41 Mpal kàkäl Yɛsu tsütsü a bul a kölàköl anà kàmɛn nde la, nde kàkyer alel ntɔn la,
LUK 19:42 anà kàtɛn nde naa: « Ngye sye alàyöb ŋàbà naa ngye akyer aben muman duu! Wɛɛ apanà ndaa ayi yàŋayee u mii angye!
LUK 19:43 Ntɔn ngye, ilä abyà iyà ungö ayiiŋ angye bàkyer asasà uboboo a ibä, bàkyer asadiŋà anà bàsaküünà ntsü yanswà.
LUK 19:44 Ba bàkyer asapay ipepey, ngye anà baar angye. Ba bàsàwɛy anki un'kul udu a un'kul wumwɛy, ntɔn ngye kàyöb anki taaŋ kàyi Nzam muyaler! »
LUK 19:45 Ungö apan Yɛsu kàbilà u ndwà a Nzam, waa kàsɛmà muböŋ ayääl,
LUK 19:46 waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Bàsön naa: "Ndwà amɛ isàkal ndwà a ngyamàkà." Wɛɛ bɛ ya lan'buul mboo a mbüüb! »
LUK 19:47 Yɛsu kàlɔɔŋà ilä byanswà u ndwà a Nzam. Amfum a angaŋ, alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn anà abyääl a baar banswà bàleŋà mukun'dwa.
LUK 19:48 Wɛɛ ba bàyöbà anki naa ba bàkyer aben mukɔr nde, ntɔn baar banswà bàkäl muweemà nde ubwaŋàbwaŋ.
LUK 20:1 Yàmɛnà naa ilä mwɛy, Yɛsu kàkäl mulɔŋ baar u ndwà a Nzam anà mupay Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ. Amfum a angaŋ, alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn anà andweer bàyi
LUK 20:2 mukun'fuul naa: « Ikyään, unsà ikɔ̈b nà akakyerà ngye indiir abi, nà kapɛ ikɔ̈b udu a bya? »
LUK 20:3 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Mɛ sye in'kwen mukàlafuul undiir mwɛy. Lan'kyään:
LUK 20:4 Ywan nà kun'töm mudümà baar? Du lɛɛ baar? »
LUK 20:5 Wɛɛ ba bàbulà muyweer ba a ba naa: « Bi isàfuur naa: "Du kun'töm", nde ayifuul naa: "Ntɔn nkye mpa lun'kyey bɛ?"
LUK 20:6 Wɛɛ bi isàtɛn naa: "Baar bun'töm", baar banswà bàyilom in'kul, ntɔn ba bàkyàyöb naa Ywan kàkäl ŋangɔɔm. »
LUK 20:7 Apan ba bun'fuur naa: « Bi iyöb anki naa nde kàfü ken. »
LUK 20:8 Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Aay, mɛ sye alàkyään anki naa nà kan'pɛ mbwo mukyer indiir abi. »
LUK 20:9 Apan nde kàfàtɛɛl un'sɛŋ nsim yi: « Mbuur mwɛy kàkön ywaŋ a vin. Nde kàsɔ̈ɔ̈m la akà baar bàfàkyer vin ntɔn ba bàkyer isal aba uboo kwo. Ungö nde kàkyen nsi a kwɛl. Nde kwo kàkyer taaŋ mbɔɔn.
LUK 20:10 Taaŋ abwo mbɛŋ làkwe la, nde kàtöm un'syääl ande mwɛy akà baar aban ntɔn ba bun'pɛ kab lànde. Wɛɛ akyeer a man laa bàdüb ba un'syääl awun, waa kàfurà an'kɔɔ ipɔl.
LUK 20:11 Ŋaywaŋ kàtöm un'syääl asin. Nde awà sye bàkyer un'düb, bàkyer un'to, waa bun'fuur an'kɔɔ ipɔl.
LUK 20:12 Nde kàfàtɔm un'syääl wàtär. Awun sye bun'yɔ̈ɔ̈l, waa bun'böŋ.
LUK 20:13 Ŋaywaŋ kàyweer naa: "Mɛ in'kyer aben? Mɛ in'tɔm mwan baal amɛ in'fàkwen mɛ, mɛ in'sii naa ba bàkyer akun'sà làkoo."
LUK 20:14 Wɛɛ mpal bun'mɛn akyeer a vin, ba bàyweerà ba a ba naa: "Làler ikyee! Yää bi kun'dwä waa ywaŋ a vin làyàbulà làbi."
LUK 20:15 Laa bun'böŋ ba, waa bun'dwä. « Apan ŋaywaŋ asàkyer aben ntɔn ba?
LUK 20:16 Nde ŋakwo akyer asàyà, nde asàdwa akyeer a man abà banswà, waa usàsɔɔm ywaŋ akà baar asin. » Mpal bàwem baar ndaa ayi yanswà, ba bàtɛn naa: « Ndaa a tub ayi isàbwà anki! »
LUK 20:17 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kaler nde, waa kàtɛn naa: « Ndaa bàsön yi iswaŋà aben: "Nkɔŋ bàpiy atööŋ a ndwà, "yàbulà nkɔŋ a twɛrà."
LUK 20:18 « Mbuur wanswà asàbwà udu a nkɔŋ ayin akyer asàbɔɔ. Wɛɛ isàkal naa nkɔŋ ayi yan'bweel mbuur, nde akyer asàpää nwamnwam. »
LUK 20:19 Taaŋ nsil alan, alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn anà amfum a angaŋ bàkwen mukɔr Yɛsu, ntɔn ba bàkyer ayöb naa nde nsim yi ba kàtɛɛl, wɛɛ ba bàtiinà un'seŋ bɔɔmà.
LUK 20:20 Apan ba bàsɛmà musey Yɛsu. Lalan bun'tööm ba baar bàfakurà naa ba bà baar aŋàbwaŋ. Baar abà bàlàlwab Yɛsu ndaa unsà mfuul mwɛy ntɔn ba bàwɛl iböŋ mukun'yälà akà abyääl anà akà mfum a nsi.
LUK 20:21 Baar aban bàtɛn a nde naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, bi ikyàyöb naa ndaa afàtɛn ngye anà afàlɔŋ ngye yà ndandaa. Ngye afàler anki ntabwey a mbuur mupà nde ikwàndwà, wɛɛ ngye afàlɔŋ ndandaa mbwo a Nzam.
LUK 20:22 Wɛɛ bi ikwen muyöb naa nkye un'kɔɔn abi kà ipaa mbwo bi mufur itɛr akà Sɛzar lɛɛ tɛy? »
LUK 20:23 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kàyöb nkwɛɛr a ba, waa kàtɛn a ba naa:
LUK 20:24 « Lan'swɛŋ itɛr a ngim. Ntabwey anà ikɔb ki udu a kya byà nà? » Ba bàfuur naa: « Byà Sɛzar. »
LUK 20:25 Apan Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Abun, làpɛ yà Sɛzar akà Sɛzar, yà Nzam akà Nzam. »
LUK 20:26 Lalan ba bàsàman anki ube unsà yinà yanswà kàtɛɛnà nde u mii a baar. Ba bàkäl mubem mfuur ande, ba ndaa bàfàsà anki.
LUK 20:27 Yàmɛnà naa Asadusu amwɛy bàyi akà Yɛsu. Ba baar bàfàtɛn naa akü bàfàwiyà anki. Ba bun'fuul,
LUK 20:28 waa bàtɛn a nde naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, Mɔsɛ kà ipɛ un'kɔɔn aŋàsɔn: "Isàkal naa mbuur aŋàkwɛl kan'kwà ukɔɔn asàwɛy baan, un'tɔŋ ande asàwal un'kyay kàkäl wànde ntɔn mupà ikyee akà un'kü."
LUK 20:29 Kyekà, bàkäl anà atɔŋ nsambwaar. Wàtàtwɛb kàkyer abääl, ungö waa kàkü ukɔɔn abɔr.
LUK 20:30 Wàyweel waa kàbääl un'kaar kàsàwɛy bweel ande,
LUK 20:31 wàtär sye abun. Ya yàkäl abun ntɔn ba bànsambwaar: ba bàkü ukɔɔn abɔr.
LUK 20:32 Ungö apan un'kaar sye waa kàkü.
LUK 20:33 Abun, ilä bàsàwiyà akü, un'kaar awà asàkal un'kyay a nà? Ntɔn ba bànsambwaar bàkyer un'bääl. »
LUK 20:34 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Abaal anà akaar a nsi yi bàkyer afàbääl,
LUK 20:35 wɛɛ abaal anà akaar bàsɔ̈ɔ̈l muwiyà kà ukwà anà mukal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ taaŋ làsàyà, bàsàbääl anki.
LUK 20:36 Ba bàfàsàkwà anki, ba bà asànaa akyeey a du. Ba bà baan a Nzam, ntɔn ba baan a ngwiiyà.
LUK 20:37 Mɔsɛ ŋakwo kàtɛn ubwaŋàbwaŋ naa akü bàkyer asàwiyà. Uboo a nsim a ibwiy a mbaa, nde Mwol Nzam kun'bel Nzam a Abàlam, Nzam a Isak, Nzam a Yakɔb. »
LUK 20:38 Yɛsu kàfàkwɛy naa: « Mwol wà Nzam a baar a möö, nde kà wà Nzam a akü anki, ntɔn akà nde baar banswà bye anà mɔ̈ɔ̈. »
LUK 20:39 Alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn amwɛy bàtɛn a nde naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, ngye an'tɛn ubwaŋ. »
LUK 20:40 Abun ba nde ndaa bàfun'fuul anki.
LUK 20:41 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ban'kwo mutɛn aben naa Klistɔ wà mwan a David?
LUK 20:42 Ntɔn David atɛɛnà nde ŋakwo uboo a un'kaan a an'diim naa: "Mwol kàtɛn akà Mwol amɛ: "Bwaay u kɔɔ amɛ là ibaal,
LUK 20:43 mɛ in'kwen mubwiy ayiiŋ angye ntɔn ba bàbulà ikal angye mutɔɔl in'kɔl."
LUK 20:44 David kun'bel Mwol: Klistɔ kan'kwo mufàkal mwan a David? »
LUK 20:45 Ilä mwɛy, mpal kàkäl un'sɛŋ wanswà mulab an'lɔɔŋ ande, Yɛsu kàtɛn a alɔŋki ande naa:
LUK 20:46 « Làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ ntɔn alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn: isal aba uyilyaaŋ anà mvwɛl anà bàfàkwɛn naa bàyapà mbɔr u balàbal. Ba bàfàsɔɔl an'kir amà kusà uboo a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà anà ikal a làkoo u mɛsà adyà a kölàköl.
LUK 20:47 Ba bàfàduum indiir a akweel a adim byanswà, taaŋ nsil alan ba bàfàsà ngyamàkà a bwɛlàbwɛl ntɔn baar bamɛn: nsaŋ aba isàkal yà kölàköl. »
LUK 21:1 Yàmɛnà naa ilä mwɛy, mpal kàkäl Yɛsu muler, nde kàmɛn aŋin'naaŋ bàmusà an'kab aba uboo a insak a an'kab.
LUK 21:2 Nde kàmɛn sye un'kweel un'dim mwyɛ wàŋàlàmbwà wàmusà an'falà mɔ̈ɔ̈l.
LUK 21:3 Nde kàtɛn naa: « Ndandaa mɛ alàkyään: un'kweel un'dim wàŋàlàmbwà wà kan'pà yàŋàsöön baar banswà.
LUK 21:4 Ntɔn baar bumwɛy banswà ban'pà ngim ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ndöŋ akà ba, wɛɛ nde, unsà làmbwà ande, nde kan'pà yinà yanswà ikäl ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande. »
LUK 21:5 Ilä mwɛy, baar amwɛy bàkäl mukan in'kul anà indiir byàpɛɛ ntwɛn a ndwà a Nzam, wɛɛ Yɛsu kàtɛn naa:
LUK 21:6 « Ilä byà paa mpa usàsaal akà un'kul mwɛy udu a un'kul wumwɛy uboo a bya làmanà bɛ bi: bya byanswà byàsàkyer apää. »
LUK 21:7 Apan ba waa bun'fuul naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, ndaa ayi isàlyaaŋ mpal nà? Undiir nà asàswaŋ ngyeel a ndaa ayi? »
LUK 21:8 Yɛsu kàfuur naa: « Làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ, mbuur twon amàlakur. Ntɔn baar mbɔɔn bàsàyà kà ikɔb amɛ, waa bàsàtɛn naa: "Mɛ in'wà Klistɔ!" Anà: "Taaŋ lan'kwo!" Wɛɛ twon làmalab.
LUK 21:9 Mpal làsàwem bɛ naa ità anà lingyoomà byan'yà, twon lan'man bɔɔmà: yubwaŋ naa bya itàyà abun kusà, wɛɛ bya kà ntsüü anki. »
LUK 21:10 Apan nde waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Isàmɛnà naa nsi mwɛy yàmunwan anà nsi yumwɛy, imwol mwɛy anà imwol kyumwɛy.
LUK 21:11 Mɛɛn ikyer asàtɛɛr ngwal. Kà ikal mbɔɔn ngyal mbɔɔn anà an'fway màkyer asàbilà, ndaa a bɔɔmà yà ifà ifà ikyer asàtoo, idiim a kölàköl byàkyer asàmɛnà u du.
LUK 21:12 Wɛɛ kusà a ndaa ayi yanswà, bàkyer asàlakɔr, bàkyer asàlamɛɛy nkwaaŋ, bàkyer asàlasyen u làbay a nsaŋ a amfum a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà, waa bàsàlatɔɔm u bɔlokà. Ntɔn ikɔb amɛ, bàkyer asàlasyen akà amfum a nsi anà akà amfum a itiir a nsi.
LUK 21:13 Indiir abi byanswà isàlayeel ntɔn bɛ làkäl anà mbwo mutà imbäl.
LUK 21:14 Twon lan'yweer kusà naa bɛ làkyer aben musàsà un'lɔɔn abɛ.
LUK 21:15 Mɛ ŋakwo in'kyer asàlapà ndaa anà an'yeerà mpa bàsàtɔn ayiiŋ abɛ itàkal musà mbaaŋ.
LUK 21:16 Baar bàsàlayälà bà aböör anà atɔŋ abɛ, baar a tsütsü a bɛ anà asam abɛ, ba bàsàdwa baar mbɔɔn uboo a bɛ.
LUK 21:17 Baar banswà bàkyer asàlayiiŋ ntɔn mɛ.
LUK 21:18 Wɛɛ akà làtswe abɛ làmwɛy làsàdiimà anki.
LUK 21:19 Abun, ntɔn nkääŋ a mpem abɛ, bɛ làsàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
LUK 21:20 « Wɛɛ mpal làsàman bɛ naa aŋità ban'diŋà Yɛlusàlɛm, apan làyöb naa mpää a la yà tsütsü.
LUK 21:21 Apan, wɛy baar a Yuday bàtiin udu a myɔŋ. Wɛy baar abà u Yɛlusàlɛm bàtoo agyägyä. Wɛy baar abà u bitsuŋ a ndwà bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n abilà u bul a kölàköl!
LUK 21:22 Ntɔn ilä abin isàkal ilä a bweel, ntɔn Ndaa Aŋàsɔn yanswà ikwe.
LUK 21:23 Ngyɛb akà akaar bàsàkal anà an'yöm anà akaar bàsàkal munüü baan ilä abin! Ntɔn ntaan isàkal uboo a nsi yi, anà nkyɛl ntɔn un'sɛŋ wà.
LUK 21:24 Baar a nsi yi bàsadwa a kɔm, bumwɛy bàsasyen asɔ u nsi a ingyey, wɛ Yɛlusàlɛm làsàbulà là baar mpa bàyöb Nzam tii mpal isàwà isɔ.
LUK 21:25 « Idiim ikyer asàkal uboo a taaŋ, uboo a nsöŋ anà unsà mbwaar. U mɛɛn baar banswà bàsàkal mutɛɛr a bɔɔmà ntɔn làso anà ibɔ a an'dà a ngyäl.
LUK 21:26 Lalan baar mbɔɔn bàsàkwà a bɔɔmà muyweer ndaa isàbwà u mɛɛn manswà, ntɔn ngwal a du yanswà ikyer asàni.
LUK 21:27 Apan, baar bàsàman Mwan a mbuur wàmuyà uboo a itööm unsà ngwal anà làkoo mbɔɔn.
LUK 21:28 Taaŋ isàlyaŋ ndaa ayi yanswà, làsuub un'tswe anà làsi un'kanà, ntɔn ntsuuŋ abɛ isàkal tsütsü. »
LUK 21:29 Apan Yɛsu katɛɛl nsim yi: « Làler un'te a maŋ anà in'te myanswà:
LUK 21:30 Bɛ làsàman naa mya myan'fulà, bɛ lan'yöb bɛ ŋakwo naa paŋà a mbul là tsütsü.
LUK 21:31 Ya sye yabun mpal làsàman bɛ naa ndaa ayi yan'yà, làyöb naa Imwol a Nzam kyà tsütsü.
LUK 21:32 Mɛ ndandaa alàkyään, nkööl ayi isàlyaŋ anki kusà a ndaa ayi yanswà mukwo.
LUK 21:33 Du anà mɛɛn màkyer asàlyaaŋ, wɛɛ ndaa amɛ isàlyaaŋ anki akà ikikye.
LUK 21:34 « Làkäl kà ikyɛɛŋ bɛ ŋakwo ntɔn an'kyän abɛ màkɔ̈ɔ̈n abwà mpye ntɔn udyà mbɔɔn, unwà mbɔɔn anà ngyɛb ntɔn indiir a mɛɛn mà, naa tɛy, ilä aki isàyàlataan kà imbwirà imbwirà.
LUK 21:35 Ntɔn kya isàbwà asànaa an'tɛy udu a baar a mɛɛn banswà.
LUK 21:36 Làkäl kà ikyɛɛŋ, làyamà taaŋ lanswà, ntɔn bɛ làkäl anà ngwal mutiin ndaa iyà yi yanswà anà musàkal umbär kusà a Mwan a mbuur. »
LUK 21:37 U mwäänà Yɛsu kàlɔɔŋà u ndwà a Nzam, wɛ sisye nde kàkyeenà mukàtyeey taaŋ u mɔŋ bàfàbel naa mɔŋ a in'te a ɔlive.
LUK 21:38 Ututu tutu, un'sɛŋ wanswà kàkyeenà akà nde u ndwà a Nzam ntɔn mukun'wem.
LUK 22:1 Un'kyɔm a mampà màkɔ̈ɔ̈n ful bàfàbel Pak làsin tsütsü.
LUK 22:2 Amfum a angaŋ anà alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn bàleŋà mudwa Yɛsu, wɛɛ ba bàweemà bɔɔmà a un'sɛŋ.
LUK 22:3 Apan, Satanà kàbilà u mpem a Yudas Iskaryɔt, umwɛy uboo a Bàkwem Aŋiyweel.
LUK 22:4 Yudas kàkyen akà amfum a angaŋ anà amfum a aleer a ndwà a Nzam ntɔn nde ukàyäm anà ba muyöb naa nde Yɛsu ayun'yälà aben.
LUK 22:5 Ba bàkäl kà un'sak, waa bàyilà naa ba bàyun'pà ngim.
LUK 22:6 Nde waa kàkyey. Sɛmà apan, nde kàleŋà ipöl aŋàbwaŋ muyälà Yɛsu kà unku, ntɔn baar banswà bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n ayöb.
LUK 22:7 Yàmɛnà naa ilä a mampà màkɔ̈ɔ̈n ful, ilä bàfàdwa in'tö a in'kɔk ntɔn Pak kyàkwe kya,
LUK 22:8 Yɛsu kàtöm Petɔlà anà Ywan, waa kaswɛŋ naa: « Làkyen kàlayilà ndyeel a Pak. »
LUK 22:9 Ba bun'fuul naa: « Ngye akwen naa bi la ikàyilà ken? »
LUK 22:10 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Le, mpal làkàbilà bɛ u bul a kölàköl, bɛ làkàman mbuur mwɛy anà làbuuŋ a an'dà. Lun'läb tii u ndwà ukàbilà nde.
LUK 22:11 Bɛ làkàtɛn a ŋandwà abà: "Un'lɔɔŋ kan'tɛn a ngye naa: Làken suk in'dyà mɛ Pak anà alɔŋki amɛ?"
LUK 22:12 Waa nde ukàlaswaŋ, u ndwà adu, suk a kölàköl làŋalɔɔn ubwaŋàbwaŋ, ikal làkàyilà bɛ Pak kyakin. »
LUK 22:13 Ba waa bàkyen, bàmɛn ndaa yanswà asànaa kàtɛn Yɛsu, waa bàyilà isaa a Pak.
LUK 22:14 Taaŋ làkwe la, Yɛsu kàkäl u mɛsà anà antööm.
LUK 22:15 Nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mɛ, mɛ kàkwen mbɔɔn mudyà Pak alà anà bɛ kusà muman mpay.
LUK 22:16 Lalan, mɛ ndandaa alàkyään naa mɛ in'fàsàdyà anki la tii ilä isàmɛnà mbuul a la uboo a Imwol a Nzam. »
LUK 22:17 Apan, nde kàwɛl kɔɔb, kàfuur an'tɔɔn, waa kàtɛn naa: « Làwɛl kɔɔb là, làkäb la bɛ a bɛ,
LUK 22:18 ntɔn mɛ alàkyään naa sɛmà apanà mɛ in'fàsànwà anki vin tii mpal isàyà Imwol a Nzam. »
LUK 22:19 Ungö apan, nde kàwɛl mampà, waa kàfuur an'tɔɔn akà Nzam, kàtsül ma, kapɛ, waa kàtɛn naa: « Ayi ndür amɛ bàpɛ ntɔn bɛ. Làkyer abà ntɔn mukan'yɔbà. »
LUK 22:20 Ungö a udyà, nde kàwɛl kɔɔb, waa kàtɛn naa: « Lalà kɔɔb a un'tüüb akün kan'kyer bi unsà an'kil amɛ amiyàpää ntɔn bɛ.
LUK 22:21 Wɛɛ le, mbuur ayàyälà mɛ wà papà u mɛsà anà mɛɛ.
LUK 22:22 Ntɔn Mwan a mbuur wàmukyà asànaa bàtsül ya, wɛɛ ngyɛb akà mbuur kàmun'yälà! »
LUK 22:23 Apan, ba bàbulà mufufuul ba a ba naa uboo a ba nà ayàkyer undiir a tub awà.
LUK 22:24 Yàmɛnà naa ilä mwɛy alɔŋki bàsyeelà mbaaŋ ba a ba: ba bàkwen muyöb naa uboo a ba nà awà mbuur a kölàköl.
LUK 22:25 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Amfum a in'sɛŋ bàkyer afandyaar, baar abye anà ikɔ̈b udu a ba bàfàleŋ naa babel baar aŋàbwaŋ.
LUK 22:26 Kà yubwaŋ anki bɛ mukyer abà, yubwaŋ naa mbuur a kölàköl uboo a bɛ ukäl umbɛy, wɛɛ mbuur akayaalà ukäl asànaa un'syääl.
LUK 22:27 Uboo a an'kyän abɛ, nà awà kölàköl? Mbuur kan'bwaay u mɛsà lɛɛ mbuur akapaa isaa? Kà mbuur kan'bwaay u mɛsà anki? Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ uboo a bɛ in'wà asànaa un'syääl.
LUK 22:28 Bɛ lan'ndäär u ndür amɛ taaŋ lanswà an'man mɛ mpay.
LUK 22:29 Lalan, asànaa kan'pɛ Taaràmɛ Imwol, mɛ sye amàlapà kya:
LUK 22:30 Bɛ làsàdyà anà làsànwà u mɛsà anà mɛ, uboo a imwol amɛ, bɛ làsàbwaay udu a kir a imfum ntɔn mutsul nsaŋ a in'sɛŋ a Isàlɛl myàkwem aŋiyweel. »
LUK 22:31 Yàmɛnà naa Yɛsu kàtɛn a Simɔn Petɔlà naa: « Simɔn, Simɔn! Le, Satanà kàkyer alɔm naa nde kàlasɛk asànaa bàfàsɛk mbɛŋ mukaab ya anà isɛrà.
LUK 22:32 Wɛɛ mɛ kàyamà ntɔn ngye, ntɔn làkwikilà angye làkɔ̈ɔ̈n abwà. Wɛɛ ngye, ilä asyefurà ngye akà mɛ, pà atɔŋ angye ngwal. »
LUK 22:33 Simɔn kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwol, mɛ an'kyey mukyà anà ngye, itàkal u bɔlokà, itàkal kà ukwà. »
LUK 22:34 Yɛsu waa kun'fuur naa: « Simɔn, mɛ ndandaa akyään, ŋabawà, kusà nkɔɔ mubel, ngye akyer an'tɔn mukan'yöb mbalà tär. »
LUK 22:35 Ungö apan, nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Taaŋ kàlatöm mɛ ukɔɔn ngim, ngɔɔr anà an'sàbar, nkye we anà undiir kàlakɔ̈ɔ̈n? » Ba waa bàfuur naa: « Akà undiir. »
LUK 22:36 Apan, nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Wɛɛ papanà, isàkal naa mbuur we anà ngim, uwɛl ya, isàkal sye naa mbuur we anà ngɔɔr, uwɛl wa, isàkal naa mbuur kɔm latɛy, uyälà inkur ande, usöm làmwɛy.
LUK 22:37 Ntɔn mɛ alàkyään naa yubwaŋ naa undiir aŋàsɔn wà ukwe amu mɛ: "Nde bun'täŋ uboo a adwää baar." »
LUK 22:38 Waa ba bàtɛn naa: « Mwol, le an'kɔm mɔ̈ɔ̈l amà. » Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Man'kwo! »
LUK 22:39 Yàmɛnà naa Yɛsu kàkyer atoo, waa kàkyen u mbwo a mɔŋ a in'te a ɔlive asànaa ifà ande. Alɔŋki waa bun'läb.
LUK 22:40 Mpal kàtöl nde kà ikal akin, nde kaswɛŋ naa: « Làyamà, ntɔn bɛ làkɔ̈ɔ̈n abwà u ndɛb. »
LUK 22:41 Wɛɛ nde, nde kàkyen ukɔl a ba kà isii a bwɛl ufàkàbwà un'kul awà ban'lom, kàbü an'köm, waa kàyamà
LUK 22:42 abà: « Ɔɔ Taa, kya ngye asàkwen, lwom kɔɔb là tsütsü apà mɛ! Wɛɛ taaŋ lanswà, wɛy bàkäl ukwen angye, kà bàmɛ anki. » [
LUK 22:43 Apan, un'kyeey mwɛy waa kàyamɛnà akà nde ntɔn mukun'pà ngwal.
LUK 22:44 Yàmɛnà naa nkyän yàkyer un'kaar, nde kàfàyamà nswɛy nswɛy, kyaŋ a ndür ande waa làbulà asànaa bin'kul a an'kil byàbwee u mɛɛn. ]
LUK 22:45 Ungö a ngyamàkà ayi, nde waa kàmbarà, kàsin tsütsü apà alɔŋki ande, nde kamɛn bàkyàbɔ̈ɔ̈n a ngyɛb.
LUK 22:46 Apan, nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ntɔn nkye lan'bɔ̈ɔ̈n bɛ? Làmbarà! Làyamà ntɔn bɛ làkɔ̈ɔ̈n abwà u ndɛb. »
LUK 22:47 Nde kàkäl mutɛn, mpal kàkɔlà un'kàbɔ a baar. Mbuur bàfabeelà Yudas, umwɛy uboo a Bàkwem Aŋiyweel, kàkäl kusà a ba. Nde kàsin tsütsü apà Yɛsu ntɔn mukundüür.
LUK 22:48 Waa Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Yudas, ngye Mwan a mbuur un'yälà a ndüür? »
LUK 22:49 Mpal bàmɛn baar bàkäl a Yɛsu naa ndaa yan'täy, ba bun'fuul naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, nkye bi isyääl an'kɔm abi ntɔn munwan? »
LUK 22:50 Utaaŋ nsil alan, umwɛy uboo a ba kàkäm un'syääl a undweer a angaŋ mwɛy kɔm, waa kun'ywaŋ tsü a ibaal.
LUK 22:51 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Làwɛy, yan'kwo! » Apan, nde kàbä tsü a mbuur awun, waa kun'kɔɔr.
LUK 22:52 Apan, Yɛsu kàtɛn a amfum a angaŋ, a an'kaptɛn a ndwà a Nzam anà andwer a baar bàyi ntɔn mukun'kɔr: « Nkye mɛ in'wà un'dwää a baar waa bɛ làyi anà an'kɔm anà nköl?
LUK 22:53 Mɛ kàkälà anà bɛ ilä byanswà u ndwà a Nzam, wɛ akà mbuur kan'bä anki. Apanà là taaŋ abɛ anà ngwal a mpib. »
LUK 22:54 Apan ba bun'te mpi, waa bun'syen u ndwà a amfum a angaŋ. Petɔlà kàyilabà ukwɛl.
LUK 22:55 Baar bàyöbà mbaa uboo a làpaŋ. Petɔlà kàbwaayà uboo a baar bàkäl ukɔl a ya.
LUK 22:56 Un'syääl mwɛy wà un'kaar kun'mɛn tsütsü a ba, laa kun'syebà u kyɛɛy a mbaa, waa kàtɛn naa: « Le, mbuur wà sye kàkäl anà nde. »
LUK 22:57 Wɛɛ nde kàkyer un'tɔn, waa kàtɛn naa: « Un'kaar wà, mɛ nde un'yöb anki. »
LUK 22:58 Ungö a taaŋ ikikye, mbuur asin kàmɛn nde Petɔlà, kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ngye sye awà umwɛy uboo a baar bà! » Petɔlà naa: « Mbuur wà, mɛ mwo watɛy! »
LUK 22:59 Tsütsü ungö a taaŋ làmwɛy, mbuur asin waa ufàtɛn a ngwal yanswà: « Ndandaa, mbuur wunà kàkäl anà nde ntɔn nde wà un'nsi Ngalilɛ. »
LUK 22:60 Petɔlà kàfuur naa: « Mbuur wà, mɛ in'yöb anki naa ngye nkye akwen mutɛn. » Taaŋ nsil alan, nde kàkäl anki aŋàtàmay mutɛn, nkɔɔ waa kàbel.
LUK 22:61 Mwol kàbulà nde, waa kàler Petɔlà. Apan Petɔlà kàyɔbà ndaa kun'kyään Mwol: « Kusà nkɔɔ mutàbel ŋàbawà, ngye ayan'tɔn mbalà tär! »
LUK 22:62 Apan laa kàtoo nde, waa kàlel ubwaŋàbwaŋ.
LUK 22:63 Baar bàkäl muler Yɛsu bàkyer akun'sɛɛ anà kun'dübà.
LUK 22:64 Ba bun'bäämà ipfɛy u mii, waa bun'fuulà naa: « Le! Tà ngɔɔm! Ikyään nà kàmadwa! »
LUK 22:65 Laa bun'töö ba in'tswe asin myà ifà ifà.
LUK 22:66 Mpal làsɛnà taaŋ, nkööŋ a andweer a un'sɛŋ, amfum a angaŋ anà alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn bàkyer aköŋ, waa bun'syɛn u làbay a nsaŋ a kölàköl,
LUK 22:67 waa bàtɛn naa: « Isàkal naa ngye, ngye awà Klistɔ, ikyään. » Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mɛ in'sàlakyään, bɛ làyàkyey anki,
LUK 22:68 mɛ in'sàlafuul, bɛ làyan'fuur anki.
LUK 22:69 Wɛɛ, sɛmà apanà, Mwan a mbuur ayàkal wàŋàbwaay u kɔɔ a ibaal a ngwal a Nzam. »
LUK 22:70 Apan ba banswà bàtɛn naa: « Iswaŋà naa ngye awà Mwan a Nzam! » Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Bɛ ŋakwo lan'tɛn naa mɛ in'wà nde. »
LUK 22:71 Apan, ba bàtɛn naa: « Bi mfun a imbäl ifàkal anki. Bi ŋakwo kan'wem u mun ande. »
LUK 23:1 Yàmɛnà naa un'kàbɔ a baar wanswà kàkyer ambarà, waa kàsyen Yɛsu kusà a Pilatu.
LUK 23:2 Akun, ba bàsɛmà mukun'füün abà: « Bi kan'man mbuur wà wàmutwaal lingyoomà uboo a un'sɛŋ abi: Nde akatsuŋà baar mufur itɛr akà Sɛzar, nde kan'tɛn sye naa nde wà Klistɔ, mfum! »
LUK 23:3 Apan Pilatu kun'fuul naa: « Nkye ngye awà mfum a Ayudà? » Yɛsu waa kun'fuur naa: « Ngye ŋakwo an'tɛn. »
LUK 23:4 Pilatu kàtɛn a amfum a angaŋ anà un'kàbɔ a baar naa: « Mɛ in'manà anki undiir kan'kwo mɛ mupà mbuur wà ikwàndwà. »
LUK 23:5 Wɛɛ ba bàsi unkiiŋ mutɛn naa: « Nde ayimbaar baar mukyer ube unsà an'lɔɔŋ ande u Yuday lanswà sɛmà u Ngalilɛ tii apà. »
LUK 23:6 Mpal kàwem Pilatu ndaa ayi, nde kafuul naa nkye mbuur awà wà un'nsi Ngalilɛ.
LUK 23:7 Umpal kàyöb nde naa nde wà mbuur a ikal ufàyaal Ɛlɔdi, nde kun'töm akà Ɛlɔdi. Taaŋ nsil alan Ɛlɔdi kàkäl u Yɛlusàlɛm.
LUK 23:8 Ɛlɔdi kàkäl unsà un'sak mbɔɔn muman Yɛsu, ntɔn sɛmà itaan nde kàkwen mukun'man, ntɔn yinà kàweemà nde, nde kàleŋà naa nde utàman akà impà mwɛy.
LUK 23:9 Nde kun'si mfuul mbɔɔn, wɛɛ Yɛsu kàsàfuur anki akà ikikye.
LUK 23:10 Taaŋ nsil alan, amfum a angaŋ anà alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn bàmbärà paa, bàmukun'füünà a nkyɛl.
LUK 23:11 Apan, Ɛlɔdi anà aŋità ande bun'mɛn asànaa undiir a bunàbun, waa bun'sɛɛ, bun'bwää inkur aŋàbwaŋ. Ɛlɔdi kun'fuur akà Pilatu.
LUK 23:12 Ɛlɔdi anà Pilatu bàkäl ayiiŋ, wɛɛ sɛmà ilä akin ba bàbulà asam.
LUK 23:13 Abun, Pilatu kàbel amfum a angaŋ, abyääl anà un'sɛŋ,
LUK 23:14 waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Bɛ lan'twääl mbuur wà naa nde wàmubuul an'kyän a un'sɛŋ. Wɛ mɛ, mɛ amun'fuul u mii abɛ, mɛ in'sàman anki undiir kan'kyer nde uboo a indiir byanswà lun'füünà bɛ.
LUK 23:15 Ɛlɔdi sye usàman anki ube ande, lalan kàman'fuur nde awà. Abun, mbuur wà undiir ukyer nde watɛy awà ban'kwo mukun'dwa.
LUK 23:16 Mɛ in'swaŋ baar amɛ bun'käm an'füm, waa mɛ un'wɛy. »
LUK 23:17 Kà un'kyɔm a Pak wanswà Pilatu kàkäl anà nkääl mukatsuuŋ mbuur a bɔlokà mwɛy.
LUK 23:18 Wɛɛ un'sɛŋ wanswà kàsɛmà musà in'kwɛŋ: « Idwääl mbuur wà! Un'tsuuŋ Barabas! »
LUK 23:19 Barabas awà bun'si ba u bɔlokà ntɔn lingyoomà làbü uboo a bul anà nde sye kàdwä mbuur.
LUK 23:20 Wɛ Pilatu kàkwen muwɛy Yɛsu, waa kàfàtɛn mbalà asin a ba,
LUK 23:21 wɛɛ ba bàkuub in'kwɛŋ, waa bàtɛn naa: « Un'bɛɛrà u kulunsi! Un'bɛɛrà u kulunsi! »
LUK 23:22 Wɛɛ nde kàfafuul mbalà yàtär: « Ube nà nde kan'kyer? Mɛ in'sàman anki akà ube mwɛy ntɔn nde ukwe mukwà. Abun, mɛ in'pà mbwo naa bun'pɛ an'füm waa mɛ un'wɛy. »
LUK 23:23 Wɛɛ ba bàsi unkiiŋ u ndaa a ngwal naa bun'bɛɛrà u kulunsi. In'kwɛŋ aba myàwɛl iböŋ.
LUK 23:24 Lalan Pilatu kàyer akyey nde ndɔ̈ɔ̈m aba.
LUK 23:25 Nde kàtsuuŋ mbuur kàbilà bɔlokà ntɔn lingyoomà anà nkweel a mbuur mwɛy, waa kapɛ Yɛsu ntɔn ba bun'kyer undiir bàkweenà ba.
LUK 23:26 Wɛɛ mpal bàkäl ba mukun'syen, ba bàbweey anà mbuur mwɛy kàkäl u mbwo kàfü nde itsuŋ a ndwà, ikɔb ande Simɔn un'nsi Sirɛn, ba bun'siinà a ngwal mubay Yɛsu musyen kulunsi ungö.
LUK 23:27 Un'kàbɔ a baar kàkäl muyilab. Akaar sye bàkäl mbɔɔn muyilel anà muman ntaan ntɔn nde.
LUK 23:28 Yɛsu kàbulà ntsü akà ba, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Akaar a Yɛlusàlɛm, twon lan'lel ntɔn mɛ! Làlel ntɔn bɛ ŋakwo anà baan abɛ,
LUK 23:29 ntɔn le, làyöb naa ilä iyàyà bàyàtɛn naa: "Un'sak akà akaar ikɔb anà akaar mpa bàbör anà mpa bànüü baan."
LUK 23:30 Apan baar bàsàbulà mutɛn a myɔŋ a bwɛlàbwɛl naa: "Làbü udu a bi!" A myɔŋ a ikökö: "Lifwee!"
LUK 23:31 Ntɔn isàkal naa un'te a un'bu bàmukyer abà, ya isàkal aben ntɔn un'te aŋàyɔm? »
LUK 23:32 Yàmɛnà sye naa ba bàsyen, mbwo mwɛy anà Yɛsu, baar bɔ̈ɔ̈l bàfakyerà baar ube, ntɔn bàkadwa sye.
LUK 23:33 Mpal bàtöl ba kà ikal mwɛy ikɔb akya « Bɔl a un'tswe », ba bàbɛɛrà Yɛsu u kulunsi anà baar bööl abà, umwɛy u kɔɔ ande là ibaal, wumwɛy u kɔɔ ande là ikaar.
LUK 23:34 Waa Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Taa, adwääl nkul, ntɔn ba bàyöb anki ndaa bàkyerà ba. » Ba bàkäb ipfɛy ande mutà löb.
LUK 23:35 Un'sɛŋ kàkäl paa muleerà. Wɛɛ abyääl bàkäl musɛɛ nde, waa bàtɛɛnà naa: « Nde kàtsü baar asin mɔ̈ɔ̈, wɛy nde utsü mɔ̈ɔ̈ nde ŋakwo isàkal naa nde wà Klistɔ, mbuur kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l Nzam. »
LUK 23:36 Aŋità sye bàkäl mukun'sɛɛ. Ba bàsin tsütsü apà nde, waa bun'pɛɛ man a nkyään,
LUK 23:37 waa bàtɛɛnà naa: « Isàkal naa ngye awà mfum a Ayudà, tswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ngye ŋakwo. »
LUK 23:38 Udu a nde yàkäl anà ndaa aŋàsɔn abà: « Mbuur wà, wà mfum a Ayudà. »
LUK 23:39 Umwɛy uboo a baar abe bàkäl u kulunsi waa kun'töö, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Nkye ngye kà Klistɔ anki? Tswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ngye ŋakwo anà bi mwo sye. »
LUK 23:40 Wɛɛ wumwɛy waa kun'pɛl, kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ngye Nzam bɔɔmà un'tiin anki, ngye mbuur an'wal ntaaŋàmbar nsil ya?
LUK 23:41 Akà bi, bi ube abi kan'fur, wɛ nde undiir ube ukyer nde watɛy. »
LUK 23:42 Waa kàkwɛy naa: « Yɛsu, ngyɔbà mpal asàyà ngye kà imwol angye. »
LUK 23:43 Yɛsu waa kun'fuur naa: « Mɛ ndandaa akyään, ŋabawà ngye akal u du anà mɛ. »
LUK 23:44 Sɛmà tsütsü a taaŋ a midi tii taaŋ làtär ungö a midi làpib làkyer abwà u nsi yanswà.
LUK 23:45 Taaŋ làkäl lan'minà, rido a kölàköl làkäl uboo a ndwà a Nzam làkyer akaamà u boboo.
LUK 23:46 Apan Yɛsu kàsi in'kwɛŋ waa kàtɛn naa: « Taa, mɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ amɛ an'fuur akà ngye. » Ungö mutɛn ndaa ayi, laa kàkü nde.
LUK 23:47 Muman ndaa yàlyaaŋ yi, kaptɛn a Lɔmà kàsi Nzam làkoo anà kàtɛn naa: « Ndandaa mbuur wà kàkäl mbuur a balàbal. »
LUK 23:48 Ungö apan, in'kàbɔ a baar myanswà myàyi muyàler ibaŋ a ndaa aki, bàfurà bàmuyibɛɛrà kà itɔl.
LUK 23:49 Asam a Yɛsu banswà anà akaar bàyilabà nde sɛmà Ngalilɛ, bàmbärà ukwɛl mulerà ndaa yàlyaaŋà.
LUK 23:50 Yàmɛnà naa kàkäl anà mbuur mwɛy ikɔb ande Yɔsɛfi, nde kàkäl mbuur a làbay a nsaŋ a kölàköl, mbuur aŋàbwaŋ anà wàbalàbal.
LUK 23:51 Nde kàkäl anki un'sak anà atɔŋ ande baar a Làbay a Nsaŋ a kölàköl ntɔn ayà bàtsül ba anà bàkyer ba. Nde kàkäl mbuur a bul a Yuday ikɔb la Arimatay, waa kàdilà ngyeel a Imwol a Nzam.
LUK 23:52 Nde kàkàlɔm ndür a Yɛsu akà Pilatu.
LUK 23:53 Ungö mutɔl ya u kulunsi, nde kàläl ya uboo a làpye a ntal, waa kàsi ya kà an'dii akün bàfuun uboo a nkɔŋ anà mpa aŋàtàsà mbuur.
LUK 23:54 Kya kyàkäl ilä muyöŋà ntɔn saba làkäl tsütsü musɛmà.
LUK 23:55 Akaar bàläbà Yɛsu sɛmà Ngalilɛ bàläb Yɔsɛfi. Ba bàleerà an'dii anà muyöb naa ba ndür a Yɛsu bàtɔl aben.
LUK 23:56 Ungö, bàfurà ba ndwà aba, ba bàyilà may a usɔŋ anà an'nanàsi. Apan waa bàkyɛɛl saba asànaa Un'kɔɔn utɛɛnà wa.
LUK 24:1 Ilä a làmiŋ ututu tutu, akaar bàkyen kà an'dii, bàsyen may a usɔŋ bàläm ba.
LUK 24:2 Ba bàmɛn naa nkɔŋ yàkäl u mun a an'dii bàkyàbuum ukɔl.
LUK 24:3 Waa bàbilà, wɛɛ ba bàmɛn anki ndür a Mwol Yɛsu.
LUK 24:4 Kyekà mpal bàkäl ba mubem ndaa ayi, wɛɛ le, baar bɔ̈ɔ̈l bàŋàbwaar ipfɛy a in'ŋyäŋ bàyàmɛnà tsütsü apà ba.
LUK 24:5 Bɔɔmà lawɛl la, laa bàtsüüm ba u mɛɛn, waa bàtɛn a ba naa: « Ntɔn nkye làleŋà bɛ mbuur a mɔ̈ɔ̈ uboo a akü?
LUK 24:6 Nde papà watɛy, nde akyàwiyà. Làyɔbà ndaa kàlakyään nde mpal kàkäl nde u Ngalilɛ
LUK 24:7 anà kàtɛn nde naa: "Yubwaŋ naa Mwan a mbuur bun'yälà akà baar abe, bun'bɛɛrà u kulunsi, waa nde uwiyà kà ilä kyàtär." »
LUK 24:8 Apan ba bàyɔbà ndaa a Yɛsu.
LUK 24:9 Ba bàlwomà kà an'dii, waa bàkàkyään ndaa ayi yanswà akà Bàkwem Aŋimwɛy anà akà alɔŋki bumwɛy banswà.
LUK 24:10 Akaar aban bàkäl Màlye a Magàdalà, Zwan anà Màlye ngwän a Zyak. Akaar bumwɛy bàkäl anà ba bàkàkyään ndaa nsil ayi akà antööm.
LUK 24:11 Wɛɛ ba làkwikilà bàsi anki ntɔn ya yàkäl asànaa ndwɛy a mwäänà.
LUK 24:12 Itàkal abwɛy, Petɔlà waa kàmbarà, kàpaarà ntiin mukyà an'dii, laa kànyee nde, kàmɛn nde in'siŋ a ipfɛy mpɛl, waa kàfurà ndwà ande wàmuyibem ndaa yàlyaaŋ.
LUK 24:13 Yàmɛnà naa ilä nsil akin, alɔŋki bööl bàkäl mukyà bul mwɛy ikɔb a la Ԑmayüs, la làkäl isii an'taaŋ mɔ̈ɔ̈l mà dwaan a Yɛlusàlɛm.
LUK 24:14 Ba bàkäl muyiyääm ndaa yanswà yàlyaaŋ.
LUK 24:15 Mpal bàkäl ba muyiyääm, Yɛsu ŋakwo kàsin tsütsü apà ba, waa uyikyà mbwo mwɛy anà ba.
LUK 24:16 Ba bàkyer un'manà, wɛɛ mii a ba myapɛɛ anki mbwo muyöb naa awà nde.
LUK 24:17 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Bɛ ininà làyiyääm u mbwo làyikyà bɛ? » Ba waa bàmbär, anà ngyɛb yanswà.
LUK 24:18 Umwɛy uboo a ba ikɔb ande Klɔpas waa kun'fuul: « Ngye, ngye awà un'nsi Yɛlusàlɛm umwɛy mpɛl mpa uyöb indiir ikalyaaŋà ilä abi? »
LUK 24:19 Nde waa kafuul naa: « Ininà bà? » Ba waa bun'fuur naa: « Ndaa yàbweel Yɛsu un'nsi Nasàlɛr! Nde kàkäl ŋangɔɔm a ngwal. Nde ya kàswɛŋ unsà nsyääl ande anà ndaa ande kusà a Nzam anà kusà a un'sɛŋ wanswà.
LUK 24:20 Wɛɛ amfum a angaŋ abi anà abyääl abi bàkyer aben mukun'yälà ntɔn bun'tsüül mbar a ukwà, waa bun'bɛɛrà u kulunsi.
LUK 24:21 Wɛɛ bi, bi kàsi làkyän naa nde mbuur ayàkɔɔr Isàlɛl. Udu a ayi yanswà, wɛɛ le, ŋàbawà ilä kyàtär sɛmà yan'lyaaŋ ndaa ayi yanswà.
LUK 24:22 Yà ndandaa naa akaar amwɛy uboo a un'tüüb abi bàyikyään ndaa a ubem: ba bàkyen ututu tutu kà an'dii,
LUK 24:23 wɛɛ ba bàmɛn anki ndür ande. Waa ba bàyikyään sye naa akyeey a du bàyàmɛnà akà ba ntɔn mukakyään naa nde we anà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
LUK 24:24 Bumwɛy uboo abi waa bàkyen kà an'dii, ba bàmɛn asànaa bàtɛn akaar, wɛɛ ba nde bun'mɛn anki. »
LUK 24:25 Apan Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ɔɔ bɛ baar làkɔ̈ɔ̈n un'yɛnà, u mpem mpa ifàyöb agyägyä ndaa yanswà bàtɛn aŋangɔɔm!
LUK 24:26 Yàlɔ̈m anki naa Klistɔ umɛn mpay ayi yanswà, waa ubilà u làkoo ande? »
LUK 24:27 Ungö, nde kakyään indiir byanswà bàsön ntɔn nde sɛmà Mɔsɛ tii aŋangɔɔm banswà.
LUK 24:28 Mpal nsil ayin, ba bàtöl tsütsü a bul bàkäl ba mukyà. Yàmɛnà asànaa Yɛsu alab mbwo ande.
LUK 24:29 Wɛɛ ba bun'si muküünà, waa bàtɛn naa: « Kal anà bi, ngye akimanà naa taaŋ làmuminà, mpib yàmubwà. » Nde kàbilà u ndwà ntɔn mukal anà ba.
LUK 24:30 Nde kàbwaay u mɛsà anà ba, waa kàwɛl mampà, ungö mufuur antɔɔn, nde kàtsül ma, waa kapɛ.
LUK 24:31 Apan, mii aba waa myàdubà, bun'yöb ba, wɛɛ taaŋ nsil alan, laa kàyaalà nde kusà aba.
LUK 24:32 Ba waa bàsàbulà mutɛn un'tɔŋ a un'tɔŋ naa: « Mpem abi yàböl anki mpal uyitɛɛn nde u mbwo anà uyibuul nde Ndaa Aŋàsɔn? »
LUK 24:33 Taaŋ nsil alan waa bàmbarà, waa bàfurà Yɛlusàlɛm. Akun ba bàmɛn Bàkwem Aŋimwɛy ban'köŋ anà baar bàkäl anà ba.
LUK 24:34 Ba banswà bawɛl ubwaŋ. Apan ba bàtɛn a ba naa: « Ndandaa Mwol akyàwiyà, nde amɛnà akà Simɔn. »
LUK 24:35 Apan alɔŋki bɔ̈ɔ̈l abà bakyään indiir byanswà byàlyaaŋ u mbwo anà ba Yɛsu bun'yöb aben mpal kàtsül nde mampà.
LUK 24:36 Mpal bàkäl ba muyäämà abà, Yɛsu ŋakwo kàyàmɛnà uboo a ba, waa kàtɛn naa: « Duu làkäl anà bɛ. »
LUK 24:37 Wɛɛ ba bàkäl unsà ubem anà u bɔɔmà ntɔn ba bàsii naa ba ban'man buulà.
LUK 24:38 Nde waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ntɔn nkye lan'bulà bɛ udu udu? Ntɔn nkye nkyɛɛr yan'bilà ya u mpem abɛ?
LUK 24:39 Làler an'kɔɔ amɛ anà in'kɔl amɛ: awà mɛ. Lan'tɛ mpi anà làler! Ntɔn buulà ufàkal anki anà in'twaŋ anà in'kwo. Wɛɛ bɛ làkimanà naa mɛ in'we anà mya. »
LUK 24:40 Mpal kàtɛɛnà nde abwɛy, nde kàkälà muswaŋ an'kɔɔ ande anà in'kɔl ande.
LUK 24:41 Abun, unsà un'sak, ba bàkwe anki musà làkwikilà, ba bàkäl mubem. Apan nde waa kafuul naa: « Nkye bɛ làwe anà undiir adyà apà? »
LUK 24:42 Ba bun'pɛ itsu a nsö aŋàyaŋ.
LUK 24:43 Nde kàwɛl kya, waa kàdi kya u mii aba.
LUK 24:44 Ungö, nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Bɛ lan'man ndaa kàtɛn mɛ a bɛ mpal kàkäl mɛ anà bɛ: "Yubwaŋ naa ndaa yanswà bàsön ntɔn mɛ uboo a Un'kɔɔn a Mɔsɛ, Aŋangɔɔm anà An'diim yan'mɛnà u mii." »
LUK 24:45 Apan nde kaduub un'yɛnà ntɔn ba bàyöb Ndaa Aŋàsɔn.
LUK 24:46 Wɛɛ nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Bàsön naa: "Klistɔ ayàman ntaan, nde akyer ayàwiyà kà ilä kyàtär,
LUK 24:47 waa bàyàlɔŋ kà ikɔb ande akà baar a in'sɛŋ myanswà, sɛmà Yɛlusàlɛm, naa ba bàkyer asɔɔmà, waa bàwal ndwääl a nkul a man'be aba.
LUK 24:48 Bɛ làbà ambäl a indiir abi byanswà.
LUK 24:49 Waa mɛ, mɛ in'yàlatööm undiir kàlapɛ Taa ilää. Wɛɛ akà bɛ, làkäl apà uboo a bul a kölàköl tii mpal làsàyɔl bɛ anà ngwal isàfà du. »
LUK 24:50 Ungö, nde kasyen u nsà a bul a tsütsü a Bɛtani, nde kàsɛn an'kɔɔ ande, waa kasaak.
LUK 24:51 Mpal kàkäl nde mukasaak, nde kàkaabà anà ba, waa bun'syen u du.
LUK 24:52 Wɛɛ akà ba, ungö mukun'sà làkoo, ba bàfurà Yɛlusàlɛm unsà un'sak mbɔɔn.
LUK 24:53 Wɛɛ ba bàkälà taaŋ lanswà u ndwà a Nzam musyaŋà Nzam.
JOH 1:1 U nsɛmà kàkäl Ndaa, Ndaa kàkäl anà Nzam, Ndaa kàkäl Nzam.
JOH 1:2 Nde kàkäl u nsɛmà anà Nzam.
JOH 1:3 Indiir byanswà bàkyer u mbwo a nde, kà we anà undiir anki bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n akyer u mbwo a nde.
JOH 1:4 Mɔ̈ɔ̈ kàkäl amu nde, mɔ̈ɔ̈ wa kàkäl pɛɛlà a baar.
JOH 1:5 Pɛɛlà wàmunyɛŋ uboo a mpib, wɛɛ mpib bun'yöb anki.
JOH 1:6 Kàkäl anà mbuur mwɛy, ntööm a Nzam, ikɔb ande Ywan.
JOH 1:7 Nde kàyi asànaa mbäl, ntɔn mutɛɛl pɛɛlà imbäl, ntɔn baar banswà bàsi làkwikilà u mbwo a nde.
JOH 1:8 Nde kàkäl anki pɛɛlà, wɛɛ nde kàkäl ntɔn mutɛɛl pɛɛlà imbäl.
JOH 1:9 Ndaa kàkäl pɛɛlà a ndandaa. Kàyi nde u mɛɛn, nde àfàpà kyɛɛy akà mbuur wanswà.
JOH 1:10 Nde kàkäl u mɛɛn, mɛɛn màyàmɛnà u mbwo ande, wɛɛ mɛɛn mun'yöb anki.
JOH 1:11 Nde kàyi ntsü akà bànde ŋakwo, wɛɛ ba bun'wɛl anki.
JOH 1:12 Wɛɛ akà baar bun'wɛl, akà baar bàfàsà làkwikilà kà ikɔb ande, nde kapɛ ikɔ̈b mubulà baan a Nzam.
JOH 1:13 Baar abanà babör anki unsà an'kil, itàkal unsà ukwen a ndür, itàkal unsà ukwen a mbuur, wɛɛ unsà ukwen a Nzam.
JOH 1:14 Ndaa kàbwäär ndür, nde kàkäl uboo a bi, wàŋàyɔl a kab a ngway anà ndandaa. Bi kàkyàman làkoo ande, làkoo a Mwan baal mwɛy mpɛl kàfü akà Taa.
JOH 1:15 Ywan amun'tɛɛl imbäl, waa kan'kyään naa: « Le mbuur akwà kàtɛn mɛ naa: "Mbuur awayà ungö a mɛ kàfweel kusà a mɛ, ntɔn nde kàkäl kusà a mɛ." »
JOH 1:16 Abun, unsà ukwà ande, bi banswà kàwɛl kab a ngway udu a kab a ngway.
JOH 1:17 Isàkal naa un'kɔɔn bàpɛ u mbwo a Mɔsɛ, kab a ngway anà ndandaa byàyi u mbwo a Yɛsu Klistɔ.
JOH 1:18 Akà mbuur mwɛy kàmɛn anki Nzam akà ikikye, Mwan baal mwɛy mpɛl awà Nzam, awà uboo a Taa kà imɛɛy awà.
JOH 1:19 Le imbäl kàtɛ Ywan mpal amfum a Ayudà a Yɛlusàlɛm bun'tööm ba angaŋ anà alɛwi ntɔn mukun'fuul naa: « Ngye, ngye awà nà? »
JOH 1:20 Nde kàkyer kyey mufuur, waa kàtɛn naa: « Mɛ, mɛ kà in'wà Klistɔ anki. »
JOH 1:21 Waa ba bun'fuul naa: « Waa ngye awà nà bà? Nkye ngye awà Ɛli? » Nde kàfuur naa: « Aay, mɛ kà in'wà nde anki. » - « Nkye ngye awà Ŋangɔɔm? » Nde kàfuur naa: « Aay. »
JOH 1:22 Abun, ba bàtɛn a nde naa: « Ngye awà nà bà? Ntɔn bi ikàpà mfuur akà baar bitöm. Ngye atɛn aben ntɔn ngye ŋakwo? »
JOH 1:23 Nde kàtɛn naa: « Mɛ, mɛ in'wà "ndaa a mbuur ifàsà in'kwɛŋ u nsye a ipɔl: Làlɔ̈ɔ̈n alää mbwo a Mwol!" » asànaa kàtɛn ŋangɔɔm Yɛsay.
JOH 1:24 Kyekà baar abà bàtöm bàkäl Amfarisi.
JOH 1:25 Ba bàläb mufun'fuul, waa bàtɛn naa: « Isàkal naa ngye kà Klistɔ anki, itàkal Ɛli, itàkal Ŋangɔɔm, ntɔn nkye akadümà ngye? »
JOH 1:26 Ywan kàfuur naa: « Mɛ, mɛ in'kadümà kà an'dà. Uboo a bɛ we anà mbuur mwɛy mpa làyöb bɛ,
JOH 1:27 nde wàmuyà ungö a mɛ. Mɛ in'kwe anki musɔɔl in'siŋ a idyäär ande. »
JOH 1:28 Indiir abi byanswà byàlyaaŋà u Bɛtani, u sim a Yɔrdan, mper kàfadümà Ywan.
JOH 1:29 Taaŋtyà, nde kan'man Yɛsu wàmuyà ntsü akà nde, waa kàtɛn naa: « Le Mwan a un'kɔk a Nzam awalwom man'be a mɛɛn.
JOH 1:30 Awà mbuur akwà kàtɛn mɛ naa: "Ungö a mɛ, we anà mbuur ayà, nde kàfweel itaan, ntɔn nde kàkyàtàkal."
JOH 1:31 Mɛ ŋakwo sye kun'yöbà anki. Wɛɛ ntɔn nde muyàmɛnà akà un'sɛŋ a Isàlɛl, waa mɛ kàyi mudümà kà an'dà. »
JOH 1:32 Ywan kàtɛ imbäl ande naa: « Mɛ, mɛ kàmɛn Dweelà kan'fà du, kan'yàtyà asànaa yem, waa kàn'yàbwaay udu a nde.
JOH 1:33 Mɛ, mɛ kun'yöbà anki, wɛɛ mbuur akwà kan'töm mudümà kà an'dà, kan'kyään naa: "Mbuur ayàman ngye naa Dweelà kan'yàtyà anà kan'yàbwaay udu a nde, nde awun ayàdümà u Dweelà In'kyɛɛl."
JOH 1:34 Mɛ, mɛ kàkyàman anà kàkyàtà imbäl naa nde, nde wà Mwan a Nzam. »
JOH 1:35 Taaŋtyà, Ywan kàfàkal ikal nsil kya anà alɔŋki abɔ̈ɔ̈l uboo alɔŋki ande.
JOH 1:36 Mpal kàsyebà nde Yɛsu wàmulyaaŋ, nde kàtɛn naa: « Le Mwan a un'kɔk a Nzam! »
JOH 1:37 Alɔŋki abà bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l bàwem ndaa kàtɛn Ywan, ba bàläb Yɛsu.
JOH 1:38 Yɛsu kàbulà ungö, waa kàmɛn ba bàmuyun'lab, nde kafuul naa: « Ininà bɛ làleŋà? » Ba bàfuur naa: « Rabi - iswaŋà naa Un'lɔɔŋ - ngye afàkal ken? »
JOH 1:39 Nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làyi, waa bɛ làkàman. » Apan sye laa bun'läb ba, bàmɛn ba ikal kàfakalà nde, waa bàkäl apà nde ilä akin, la làkäl taaŋ lànà ungö a midi.
JOH 1:40 Andrɛ, un'tɔŋ a Simɔn Petɔlà, kàkäl umwɛy uboo a abɔ̈ɔ̈l bàwem Ywan anà bàläb Yɛsu.
JOH 1:41 Kusà a nde mukàman mbuur asin, nde kàtàkàman un'tɔŋ ande ŋakwo Simɔn, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Bi kan'swaal Mɛsya! » Ikaswaŋà naa « Klistɔ ». –
JOH 1:42 Nde kun'syen akà Yɛsu. Yɛsu kun'ler a lää, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ngye, ngye awà Simɔn, mwan a Ywan, ngye, ngye bàyabeelà Sɛfas. » Ikɔb aki ikaswaŋà naa Petɔlà.
JOH 1:43 U taaŋtyà, Yɛsu kàwɛl an'kyän mukyà Ngalilɛ. Nde kàbwey a Filipo, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Yan'läb! »
JOH 1:44 Kyekà Filipo kàkäl un'nsi Bɛtesayidà, bul làmwɛy anà Andrɛ anà Petɔlà.
JOH 1:45 Nde kàkàman Natanayɛl, waa kun'kyään naa: « Bi, bi ban'swaal mbuur akwà bàsön unsà Un'kɔɔn a Mɔsɛ anà unsà aŋangɔɔm. Mbuur wa Yɛsu, mwan a Yɔsɛfi, un'nsi Nasàlɛr. »
JOH 1:46 Natanayɛl waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Nkye undiir aŋàbwaŋ sye kan'kwo utoo u Nasàlɛr? » Filipo naa: « Yà, man. »
JOH 1:47 Umpal kàmɛn Yɛsu Natanayɛl wàmuyàsin tsütsü apà nde, nde kàtɛn ntɔn nde naa: « Le un'nsi Isàlɛl umwɛy wà ndandaa, awà akɔ̈ɔ̈n loor uboo a nde. »
JOH 1:48 Natanayɛl kun'fuul naa: « Ngye mɛ an'yöb aben? » Yɛsu naa: « Kusà Filipo mutabel, mɛ amɛn itaan umpal akäl ngye u ngyɛl a un'te a fige. »
JOH 1:49 Apan Natanayɛl kàfàfuur naa: « Rabi, ngye, ngye awà Mwan a Nzam, ngye, ngye awà mfum a Isàlɛl! »
JOH 1:50 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Nkye ntɔn amakyään mɛ naa: mɛ amɛn u ngyɛl a un'te a fige, waa ngye an'sà làkwikilà? Ngye, ngye ayàman indiir mbɔɔn byan'söön bi. »
JOH 1:51 Nde kàfàkwɛy naa: « Ndandaa, ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, bɛ làsàman du lan'dubà, akyeey a Nzam bàmubeenà anà bàmutyà udu a Mwan a mbuur! »
JOH 2:1 Kyekà, ilä kyàtär, kàkäl anà un'kyɔm a bɔr mwɛy u Kana, u Ngalilɛ. Ngwän a Yɛsu kàkäl kwo.
JOH 2:2 Yɛsu sye bàkyer un'bel anà alɔŋki ande kà un'kyɔm awà.
JOH 2:3 Yàmɛnà naa man màkyer awà. Ngwän a Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ba vin latɛy. »
JOH 2:4 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Un'kaar wà, ngye anà mɛ inina? Taaŋ amɛ ŋàtàkwo anki. »
JOH 2:5 Ngwän waa kàtɛn a asyääl naa: « Làkyer yinà yanswà utɛn nde a bɛ. »
JOH 2:6 Paa màkäl anà an'buuŋ, an'buuŋ an'syaam mà nkɔŋ, amà bàfasyäälà Ayudà ntɔn mupöŋ ndür. U làbuuŋ làmwɛy man'kwo ibilà isii a an'litre an'kwem an'tär aŋitär.
JOH 2:7 Yɛsu kàswɛŋ asyääl naa: « Làyööl an'dà uboo a an'buuŋ mà. » Ba sye waa bàyööl ma tii u mɔɔl.
JOH 2:8 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Apanà, làtɛɛ an'dà anà làsyen ma akà mfum a un'kyɔm. » Ba waa bun'syeen ma.
JOH 2:9 Kàkyee nde, an'dà màkäl man'bulà vin. Nde kàyöb anki naa vin alà lan'fà ken. Wɛɛ asyääl bàtɛɛ an'dà bàkyer ayöb. Apan sye nde kàbel ŋabɔr,
JOH 2:10 waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Baar banswà bàfàtapà vin aŋàbwaŋ. Ungö, isàkal naa baar ban'yɔr, waa bapà vin làkɔ̈ɔ̈n ntsà. Wɛɛ ngye, ngye vin a ntsà akyer asàlɔɔn tii apanà! »
JOH 2:11 Ayi nsɛmà a idiim a Yɛsu yàlyaaŋ u Kana a Ngalilɛ. Nde kàmɛɛy làkoo ande, alɔŋki ande waa bun'si làkwikilà.
JOH 2:12 Ungö apan, Yɛsu kàtyà Kapɛrnawum anà ngwän, anà atɔŋ ande anà alɔŋki ande. Ba kwo bàkyer anki ilä mbɔɔn.
JOH 2:13 Pak a Ayudà làkäl tsütsü mukwo, Yɛsu waa kàbeenà Yɛlusàlɛm.
JOH 2:14 Nde kàmɛn ayääl a ngɔɔmà, in'kɔk, an'yem anà agyɛɛŋ a ngim sye bàkyàbwaay uboo a ndwà a Nzam.
JOH 2:15 Abun, nde kàkyer füm a in'siŋ, waa kàböŋ ba banswà u ndwà a Nzam, anà ngɔɔmà, anà in'kɔk aba. Nde kàpay ngim a agyɛɛŋ anà kàbuum mɛsà aba.
JOH 2:16 Nde kàtɛn a ayääl a an'yem naa: « Làlwom indiir abi byanswà pà! Twon lan'buul ndwà a Taaràmɛ ndwà atà yà! »
JOH 2:17 Alɔŋki ande bàyɔbà naa bàsön abà: « Ukwen a ndwà angye bàkyer asan'kwiiy. »
JOH 2:18 Apan, amfum a Ayudà bun'fuul naa: « Idiim nà an'kwo ngye mukyer, ntɔn muswaŋ naa ngye awe anà ikɔ̈b mukyer abà? »
JOH 2:19 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Làbwaab ndwà a Nzam yi, ungö a ilä itär mɛ in'yàmbaar ya. » –
JOH 2:20 Apan, Ayudà abà bàtɛn a nde naa: « Yàlɔ̈m mbul an'kwem an'nà aŋisyaam mutɔŋ ndwà ayi, wɛɛ ngye, ngye ya ayàmbaar ungö a ilä itär? »
JOH 2:21 Wɛɛ, kyekà, ndwà a Nzam kàtɛɛnà nde yàkäl ndür ande ŋakwo.
JOH 2:22 Ungöngö, umpal kàwiyà Yɛsu uboo a akü, alɔŋki ande waa bàyɔbà naa nde kàkyàtɛn abà. Kyakin bàsi ba làkwikilà amu Ndaa Aŋàsɔn anà amu ndaa kàtɛn nde.
JOH 2:23 Utaaŋ kàkäl Yɛsu u Yɛlusàlɛm, umpal a un'kyɔm a Pak, bàmbɔɔn bàsi làkwikilà kà ikɔb ande ntɔn idiim kàfakyerà nde.
JOH 2:24 Wɛɛ Yɛsu, nde ba làkwikilà kasyeelà anki, ntɔn nde kàkyayöb ba banswà ubwaŋàbwaŋ.
JOH 2:25 Nde kàkäl anki anà mfun naa bun'tɛɛl imbäl ntɔn mbuur, ntɔn nde ŋakwo kàkyer ayöbà naa ininà abyu mpem a mbuur.
JOH 3:1 Kàkäl anà mbuur mwɛy kiböl a Amfarisi ikɔb ande Nàkàdim. Nde kàkäl umwɛy uboo a amfum a Ayudà.
JOH 3:2 Nde kàyi u mpib akà Yɛsu, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Rabi, bi ikyàyöb naa ngye awà un'lɔɔŋ an'fà akà Nzam, ntɔn akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki mukyer idiim asànaa afàkyer ngye, isàkal naa uboo ande Nzam watɛy. »
JOH 3:3 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Ndandaa, ndandaa, mɛ akyään: Isàkal naa mbuur bun'bör anki wàkün, nde ukwe anki muman Imwol a Nzam. »
JOH 3:4 Nàkàdim kun'fuul naa: « Nkye mbuur aŋànün kan'kwo bàfun'bɔr mbalà asin? Nkye nde kan'kwo ufàbilà mbalà yàyweel kà an'bäl a ngwän waa bàfun'bɔr? »
JOH 3:5 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Ndandaa, ndandaa, mɛ akyään: akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki mubilà kà Imwol a Nzam, isàkal naa nde bun'bör anki kà an'dà anà u Dweelà.
JOH 3:6 Ayà ban'bɔr unsà un'sön yà un'sön, ayà ban'bɔr unsà Dweelà, yà dweelà.
JOH 3:7 Twon an'bem isàkal naa mɛ an'tɛn a ngye naa: "Yan'kwo naa bàfabɔr mböör a du."
JOH 3:8 Un'pöb afàful mper ayà ukwen wa. Ngye awem làso awa, wɛɛ ngye ayöb anki naa wa kan'fà ken, itàkal naa wa sye akyà ken. Ayi yà ndaa ifàlyaaŋ uboo a mbuur wanswà awà ban'bɔr u Dweelà. »
JOH 3:9 Apan Nàkàdim kun'fuul naa: « Ndaa ayi yan'kwo mukal aben? »
JOH 3:10 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Ngye, ngye awà un'lɔɔŋ atoo làpan kà Isàlɛl, waa ngye indiir abi ayöb anki!
JOH 3:11 Ndandaa, ndandaa, mɛ akyään: bi ifàtɛn ya iyöb bi, bi ifàtà imbäl a yakwà kàmɛn bi. Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làkwen anki làkyey imbäl abi.
JOH 3:12 Isàkal naa bɛ làkakyeyà anki mpal alàkyäänà mɛ indiir a mɛɛn, bɛ làyàkyey aben isàkal naa mɛ amàlakyään indiir a du?
JOH 3:13 Ntɔn, akà mbuur ŋàtàbeenà anki du, nà Mwan a mbuur mpɛl awà kàfü du.
JOH 3:14 Asànaa Mɔsɛ kàmbaar nde ntäy u nsye a ipɔl, abun sye bàsàmbaar Mwan a mbuur,
JOH 3:15 ntɔn mbuur wanswà asà làkwikilà amu nde, ukäl anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye.
JOH 3:16 Abun Nzam kàkwen mɛɛn mbɔɔn, lalan kàpɛ nde Mwan baal ande mwɛy mpɛl, ntɔn mbuur wanswà asà làkwikilà amu nde ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akyà bwà, wɛɛ nde ukäl anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye.
JOH 3:17 Ntɔn Nzam kàtöm anki Mwan baal ande u mɛɛn ntɔn mudwa mbuur ndwà, wɛɛ ntɔn mɛɛn iwü mɔ̈ɔ̈ u mbwo a nde.
JOH 3:18 Mbuur afàsà nde làkwikilà bun'tsüül anki nsaŋ. Mbuur mpa afàsà làkwikilà, bàkyun'tsüül mbar itaan, ntɔn nde kàsi anki làkwikilà amu ikɔb a Mwan baal mwɛy mpɛl a Nzam.
JOH 3:19 Nsaŋ ya yi: pɛɛlà làyi u mɛɛn, wɛɛ baar bàkwen làpib kà ikal a pɛɛlà, ntɔn nsyääl aba yàkäl yàmbe.
JOH 3:20 Abun, mbuur wanswà afàkyer ube, nde kan'tɔn pɛɛlà anà nde sye kan'kaabà anà la, manà nsyääl ambe ande iyàmɛnà u leŋ.
JOH 3:21 Mbuur wanswà afàkyer ndandaa, nde afàyà ntsü awà pɛɛlà, ntɔn nsyääl ande amu Nzam imɛnà u leŋ. »
JOH 3:22 Ungö apan, Yɛsu kàkyen Yuday anà alɔŋki ande. Nde kàbwaay kwo anà ba anà kàpɛɛ ndüümà.
JOH 3:23 Ywan sye kàpɛɛ ndümà u Ɛnɔ tsütsü a Salim, ntɔn an'dà màkäl mbɔɔn kwo. Baar bàyee akà nde, waa bàwɛlà ndüümà.
JOH 3:24 Ntɔn Ywan kàkäl anki aŋàtàbilà bɔlokà.
JOH 3:25 Kyekà, nsyeel a mbaaŋ yàkyer abwà uboo a alɔŋki a Ywan anà Un'yudà mwɛy unsà ndaa iler mpɔɔŋà a ndür.
JOH 3:26 Ba bàyàman Ywan, waa bun'fuul naa: « Rabi, mbuur akwà kàkälà anà ngye u sim a Yɔrdan lumwɛy, nde akwà kàtɛɛlà ngye imbäl, le nde sye wàmupaa ndüümà anà baar banswà bàkyeenà akà nde! »
JOH 3:27 Ywan kafuur naa: « Akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki muwal undiir asin udu a undiir bun'pɛ fà du.
JOH 3:28 Bɛ, bɛ ŋakwo làbà ambäl amɛ mpal kàtɛn mɛ naa: "Mɛ, mɛ kà in'wà Klistɔ anki, wɛɛ mɛ in'wà mbuur bàtöm kusà a nde."
JOH 3:29 Mbuur awe anà un'kyay, nde wà un'dim. Wɛɛ akà un'sam ande afàkal ukɔl, wàmukun'wemà, ndaa a un'dim yàmukun'paa un'sak. Awà un'sak amɛ, wa wàŋàkwo.
JOH 3:30 Yubwaŋ naa nde uyɛl, wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ in'tyà.
JOH 3:31 « Mbuur kan'fà du, wà udu a baar banswà. Mbuur awà u mɛɛn, wà mbuur a mɛɛn, ndaa ande yà ndaa a mɛɛn. Mbuur kan'fà du wà udu a baar banswà,
JOH 3:32 nde afàtà imbäl a indiir kàmɛn nde anà kàwem nde, wɛɛ akà mbuur mwɛy afàkyey imbäl ande watɛy.
JOH 3:33 Mbuur afàwal imbäl ande, kan'bɛɛrà inyɛm naa Nzam wà ndandaa.
JOH 3:34 Ntɔn mbuur kàtöm Nzam afàtɛn ndaa a Nzam, ntɔn nde afun'pà Dweelà aŋàkwo.
JOH 3:35 Taa akwen Mwan, waa kàpɛ indiir byanswà kà an'kɔɔ ande.
JOH 3:36 Mbuur afàsà làkwikilà ande amu Mwan, we anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye. Mbuur mpa afàsà làkwikilà amu Mwan usàman anki mɔ̈ɔ̈, wɛɛ nkyɛl a Nzam isàkal udu a nde. »
JOH 4:1 Mpal kàyöb Yɛsu naa Amfarisi bàwem naa nde kàfakyerà anà kàfadümà alɔŋki aŋàsöön Ywan,
JOH 4:2 - Kutɛn aŋàbwaŋ, Yɛsu kàfadümà anki nde ŋakwo, wɛɛ alɔŋki ande. - Mpal kàwem Yɛsu indiir bàtɛɛnà baar,
JOH 4:3 nde kàlwomà u Yuday, waa kàfurà Ngalilɛ.
JOH 4:4 Mukyà kwo, yàlɔ̈m naa nde atsul uboo a Samalya.
JOH 4:5 Apan, nde kàtöl bul a Samalya mwɛy ikɔb a la Sikar, tsütsü a ywaŋ kàpɛ Yakɔb mwan ande Yɔsɛfi
JOH 4:6 ntsü làkäl fu a an'dà a Yakɔb. Ntɔn yɔ̈ɔ̈n a mbwo, Yɛsu kàkäl wàŋàbwaay kà un'beel a fu. La làkäl isii a taaŋ a midi.
JOH 4:7 Un'kaar un'nsi Samalya mwɛy kàyi mutɛɛ an'dà. Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mpɛ an'dà anwà. »
JOH 4:8 Ntɔn alɔŋki ande bàkäl aŋàkyà bul mukàsom isaa adyà.
JOH 4:9 Wɛɛ un'kaar awà, un'nsi Samalya awà, kàtɛn a nde naa: « Aben? Ngye Un'yudà, ngye awe anà yɔr mulɔm an'dà anwà, akà mɛ, un'kaar mwɛy, un'nsi Samalya mwɛy? » - Kutɛn aŋàbwaŋ, Ayudà un'tüüb watɛy anà Asamalya. -
JOH 4:10 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Ilàkal naa ngye ayöb kab a Nzam anà mbuur wa kan'tɛn wà a ngye naa: "Mpɛ an'dà", ngye mbuur alun'lɔ̈ɔ̈m an'dà, waa nde ulapà an'dà a mɔ̈ɔ̈. »
JOH 4:11 Un'kaar waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwol, ngye akà kantin latɛy, fu a an'dà la sye làŋàtyà mbɔɔn. Ngye an'dà a mɔ̈ɔ̈ ma màfàken?
JOH 4:12 Nkye ngye an'söön taaràbi Yakɔb, mbuur kà ipɛ fu alà anà kànü an'dà mwo nde ŋakwo, anà baan ande anà itɔŋà ande? »
JOH 4:13 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Mbuur wanswà anwà an'dà mà, afàsàwem mfwää a an'dà,
JOH 4:14 wɛɛ mbuur asànwà an'dà insun'pà mɛ, nde ufàsàwem anki mfwää a an'dà akà ikikye, wɛɛ an'dà insun'pà mɛ isàbulà amu nde ntwà isàfuunà ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye. »
JOH 4:15 Apan, un'kaar kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwol, mpɛ an'dà ma, ntɔn mɛ in'kɔ̈ɔ̈n afàsàwem mfwää a an'dà, waa mɛ mpa in'fàsàyà mutɛɛ an'dà apà. »
JOH 4:16 Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Kyen, un'bel un'dim angye, waa ayàfurà pà. »
JOH 4:17 Un'kaar kun'fuur naa: « Mɛ un'dim watɛy. » Yɛsu naa: « Ngye awe anà iböŋ mutɛn naa: "Mɛ un'dim watɛy."
JOH 4:18 Ngye kàkäl abà adim atyeen, baal awà ngye awà apanà, kà wà un'dim angye anki. Abun, ngye an'tɛn ndandaa. »
JOH 4:19 Apan, un'kaar kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwol, mɛ in'manà naa ngye awà ŋangɔɔm.
JOH 4:20 Bàtaaràbi, bàfakömà udu a mɔŋ wà, wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làtɛn naa ikal kyan'kwo mukömà kyà u Yɛlusàlɛm. »
JOH 4:21 Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Un'kaar, nkyey, taaŋ làmuyà alà mpa làsàkömà bɛ Taa itàkal udu a mɔŋ awà, itàkal u Yɛlusàlɛm.
JOH 4:22 Bɛ, Asamàlya, bɛ làfàkömà Nzam mpa làyöb bɛ. Bi, Ayudà, bi ifàkömà Nzam iyöb bi, ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ afàyà u mbwo a Ayudà.
JOH 4:23 Wɛɛ taaŋ làmuyà, la sye lan'yà, mpal aŋankömà a ndandaa bàsakömà ba Taa u Dweelà anà u ndandaa, ba bà aŋankömà ufàleŋ Taa.
JOH 4:24 Nzam wà Dweelà, kyakin baar bàfun'kömà bun'kömà unsà dweelà anà unsà ndandaa. »
JOH 4:25 Un'kaar waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mɛ, mɛ in'kyàyöb naa Mɛsya, iswaŋà naa Klistɔ, asàkyer ayà. Mpal usàyà nde, nde asikyään indiir byanswà. »
JOH 4:26 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Mɛ, mɛ in'wà nde, mɛ mbuur in'yäämà wà anà ngye. »
JOH 4:27 Umpal bàyàfurà alɔŋki, ba bàmɛn ndaa mwɛy yubem ntɔn nde kàkäl muyäämà anà un'kaar. Wɛɛ akà mbuur mwɛy uboo aba kàkwe anki mukun'fuul naa: « Ngye nkye akwen akà nde? » Sye naa: « Ininà ngye akayäämà anà nde? »
JOH 4:28 Apan, un'kaar kàsàwɔm làbuuŋ ande paa, waa kàkyen bul, waa kàtɛn a baar naa:
JOH 4:29 « Yàlamɛn mbuur mwɛy kan'tɛn a mɛ indiir byanswà kàkyer mɛ. Nkye nde kà wà Klistɔ anki? »
JOH 4:30 Kyakin bàtoo ba u bul, bàyi ba mper akà nde.
JOH 4:31 Apan sye, alɔŋki bun'siinà naa: « Rabi, dyà! »
JOH 4:32 Wɛɛ nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mɛ, mɛ in'we anà isaa adyà, isaa mpa làyöb bɛ. »
JOH 4:33 Kyakin alɔŋki bàtɛɛnà ba, ba a ba naa: « Nkye ikyàkal naa mbuur mwɛy kun'twääl isaa adyà? »
JOH 4:34 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Isaa adyà amɛ, byà ntɔn mukyer ukwen a mbuur kan'töm anà mukwey isal ande.
JOH 4:35 Bɛ, nkye bɛ làfàtɛn anki bɛ ŋakwo naa: "Yan'sal nsöŋ nà mubwo isaa." Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ alàkyään naa làduub mii abɛ, anà làler an'ywaŋ: mbɛŋ yan'söŋ anà yan'kwo mubwo!
JOH 4:36 Un'bweel kan'wal làfur ande itaan anà kan'böbà mbɛŋ ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye, ntɔn mbuur kan'kɔn anà mbuur kan'bwo, bàmɛn un'sak ba bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l.
JOH 4:37 Abà, un'sim afàtɛn ndandaa naa: "Umwɛy afàkɔn, umwɛy afàbwo."
JOH 4:38 Mɛ, mɛ kàlatöm mukàbwo mbɛŋ làkɔ̈ɔ̈n aman bɛ mpay, baar asin bàsöön mwäänà. Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ lan'bilà unsà bweel a isal aba. »
JOH 4:39 Asamalya mbɔɔn bàsi làkwikilà amu Yɛsu ntɔn imbäl kàtɛ un'kaar naa: « Nde kan'tɛn amɛ indiir byanswà kàkyer mɛ. »
JOH 4:40 Undiir awun, mpal bàyàkɔlà ba tsütsü apà nde, ba bun'bɔ̈ɔ̈n mukal anà ba. Yɛsu kàbwaay paa ilä byeel.
JOH 4:41 Abun sye, un'kàbɔ a baar kàsi làkwikilà ntɔn ndaa kàtɛɛnà nde ŋakwo.
JOH 4:42 Waa ba bàtɛɛnà a un'kaar naa: « Bi kan'sà anki làkwikilà ntɔn ndaa kà ikyään ngye, wɛɛ ntɔn bi ŋakwo kàmuwem, waa bi kan'yöb naa ndandaa nde wà Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mɛɛn. »
JOH 4:43 Ungö a ilä byeel, Yɛsu kàlwomà apan, waa kàkyen Ngalilɛ.
JOH 4:44 Nde kàkyään nde ŋakwo naa: « Ŋangɔɔm bàfun'pà anki làkoo u nsi ande ŋakwo. »
JOH 4:45 Umpal kàtöl nde u Ngalilɛ, baar a itiir a nsi akin bun'wɛl ubwaŋ, ntɔn ba bàkyer aman indiir byanswà kàkyer nde kà un'kyɔm, ntɔn ba sye bàkyen un'kyɔm.
JOH 4:46 Apan Yɛsu kàfurà Kana u Ngalilɛ, ntsü kàbuul nde an'dà vin. Kàkäl anà undweer a mfum a aŋità mwɛy , mwan ande wàbaal kàkäl anà ukyal u Kapɛrnawum.
JOH 4:47 Mpal kàwem nde naa Yɛsu kan'yà u Yuday a Ngalilɛ, waa kàkun'man anà kun'bɔ̈ɔ̈n naa nde utyà anà ukɔɔr mwan baal ande awà kàkäl tsütsü mukwà.
JOH 4:48 Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Isàkal naa bɛ làmɛn anki idiim anà impà, bɛ làsà anki làkwikilà akà ikikye! »
JOH 4:49 Mfum aŋità awà kun'fuur naa: « Mwol, tyà kusà a mwan amɛ mukwà. »
JOH 4:50 Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Kyen, mwan angye we anà mɔ̈ɔ̈. » Mbuur awà kàsi làkwikilà u ndaa kàtɛn Yɛsu a nde, waa kàkyen.
JOH 4:51 Umpal kàkäl nde mutyà, baar a isal ande bàkàbwey ande, waa bun'kyään naa: « Mwan angye kan'wà mɔ̈ɔ̈! »
JOH 4:52 Apan, nde kàfuul ba naa taaŋ nà mwan ande ukayà, ba bun'fuur naa: « Làbwɛy a mpye làlwomà ywenà, utaaŋ atàtwɛb, ungö a midi. »
JOH 4:53 Taarànde kàyɔbà naa làkäl taaŋ nsil lalɛy alà kun'kyään Yɛsu naa: « Mwan angye we anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ». Apan, nde anà ndwà ande yanswà bàsi làkwikilà amu Yɛsu.
JOH 4:54 Kyaki kyà idiim a impà kyàyweel kàkyer Yɛsu u mfuurà ande u Ngalilɛ fà Yuday.
JOH 5:1 Ungö a indiir abi byanswà, kàkäl anà un'kyɔm a Ayudà, waa Yɛsu kàbeenà Yɛlusàlɛm.
JOH 5:2 Kyekà, u Yɛlusàlɛm, tsütsü a munàmbwo a In'kɔk, kyàkäl anà itɛy a an'dà bàfàbel un'sà Ɛbɛlyɔ naa Bɛtesdà. Kya kyàkäl anà myäy, myäy in'tyeen.
JOH 5:3 Ungyɛl a myäy ami un'kàbɔ abɛy bàkäl musil: ikwàmii, aŋibweel anà ikar bàkäl mudil naa an'dà inini,
JOH 5:4 ntɔn utaaŋ làmwɛy un'kyeey a Mwol mwɛy kàfatɔlà uboo a itɛy, waa kàfanii an'dà. Un'bɛy atàtwɛb kàfatɔlà kan'dà aŋàni, kàkyer afakɔɔrà itàkal naa ukyal ande abɛy bàkaben.
JOH 5:5 Kwo kàkäl anà ikar mwɛy kàkäl anà ukyal mbul an'kwem an'tär aŋinaan.
JOH 5:6 Utaaŋ kun'mɛn Yɛsu wàŋàbɔ̈ɔ̈n anà kàyöb nde naa nde kàbɛl itaan, nde kun'fuul naa: « Nkye ngye akyàkwen akɔɔrà? »
JOH 5:7 Ikar kun'fuur naa: « Mwol, mɛ in'we anki anà mbuur akan'tɔɔm uboo a itɛy umpal ifàsɛmà an'dà munini. Umpal in'kyà mɛ, mbuur asin kan'tɔɔmà kusà a mɛ. »
JOH 5:8 Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mbarà, sɛn ipɔy angye, kyen. »
JOH 5:9 Apan sye, baal awà waa kàkɔɔrà, kàsɛn ipɔy ande, waa kàsɛmà mukyà. Kyekà, ilä akin kyàkäl ilä a saba.
JOH 5:10 Apan, amfum a Ayudà bàfuul baal awà kàkɔɔrà naa: « Ŋàbà ilä a saba, ngye mbwo musyen ipɔy angye yatɛy. »
JOH 5:11 Wɛɛ nde kafuur naa: « Mbuur awà kan'kɔɔr, atɛn a mɛ naa: "Wal ipɔy angye, kyen." »
JOH 5:12 Ba bun'fuul naa: « Nà mbuur awà atɛn a ngye naa: "Wal ipɔy angye, kyen"? »
JOH 5:13 Wɛɛ mbuur awà kàkɔɔrà, kàyöbà anki naa nà kun'kɔɔr, ntɔn Yɛsu kàbilà uboo a iköŋ a baar bàkäl kà ikal akin.
JOH 5:14 Ungöngö, Yɛsu kàfun'man uboo a ndwà a Nzam, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Le, apanà ngye awà ŋàkɔɔrà. Twon an'fàkyer man'be, ntɔn undiir aŋàsöön ube ukɔɔn afayeel. »
JOH 5:15 Baal awà kàkàkyään amfum a Ayudà naa Yɛsu kun'kɔɔr.
JOH 5:16 Lalan Ayudà bàmɛɛyà ba Yɛsu nkwaaŋ, ntɔn nde indiir abi kàkyerà ilä a saba.
JOH 5:17 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Tii lalà Taa wàmusal, mɛ sye in'wàmusal. »
JOH 5:18 Ntɔn ndaa ayi, amfum a Ayudà bàyileŋà ipöl mbɔɔn mukun'dwa, kànà ntɔn kàbɛyà nde saba anki, wɛɛ ntɔn kàtɛɛnà nde naa Nzam wà Taarànde ŋakwo, abà nde mumɛnà làsii làmwɛy anà Nzam.
JOH 5:19 Apan Yɛsu kàfàwal ndaa, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ndandaa, ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, Mwan ukwe anki mukyer akà undiir mwɛy nde ŋakwo, wɛɛ nà wa akwà ufàman nde mukyer akà Taa. Ntɔn indiir byanswà ufàkyer Taa, Mwan sye afàkyer bya.
JOH 5:20 Ntɔn Taa akwen Mwan, anà nde sye afun'swaŋ indiir byanswà ufàkyer nde ŋakwo. Nde afàsun'swaŋ indiir mwɛy byàkölàköl byan'söön abi ntɔn bɛ làsàkal unsà ubem.
JOH 5:21 Ntɔn, asànaa Taa ufàwiy nde akü anà ufapà nde mɔ̈ɔ̈, abun sye Mwan afàpà mɔ̈ɔ̈ akà mbuur awukwen nde.
JOH 5:22 Taa ufàtsüül anki mbuur nsaŋ, wɛɛ nde ikɔ̈b atsul nsaŋ kyanswà kàpɛ akà Mwan,
JOH 5:23 ntɔn baar banswà bàsi Mwan làkoo asànaa bàfàsà ba Taa làkoo. Mbuur mpa afàsà Mwan làkoo, nde sye Taa awà kun'töm ufun'sà anki làkoo. »
JOH 5:24 Nde kàkwɛy naa: « Ndandaa, ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, mbuur wanswà afàwem ndaa amɛ anà afàsà làkwikilà amu mbuur kan'töm, nde we anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye, nde uyà anki u nsaŋ, wɛɛ nde kàkyàtoo itaan unsà ukwà, nde kàkyàwal mɔ̈ɔ̈.
JOH 5:25 Ndandaa, ndandaa mɛ alakyään, taaŋ làmuyà - la sye lan'kwo - alà bàsàwem akü ndaa a Mwan a Nzam. Baar bàsàwem ya, bàsàkal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
JOH 5:26 Ntɔn, asànaa Taa awà nde anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ amu nde ŋakwo, nde kàpɛ mbwo akà Mwan mukal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
JOH 5:27 Nde kun'pɛ ikɔ̈b mutsul nsaŋ, ntɔn nde wà Mwan a mbuur.
JOH 5:28 Twon lan'man ndaa yubem unsà ya, ntɔn taaŋ làmuyà alà bàsàwem baar banswà abà uboo a an'dii ndaa ande.
JOH 5:29 Baar bàkyer indiir aŋàbwaŋ bàsàwiyà ntɔn muwal mɔ̈ɔ̈, wɛɛ baar bàkyer indiir ibe, ba bàsàwiyà ntɔn nsaŋ.
JOH 5:30 Mɛ, mɛ in'kwe anki mukyer akà undiir mwɛy mɛ ŋakwo: mɛ in'fàtsul nsaŋ a ndaa in'fàwem mɛ, lalan mbar in'fàtsul mɛ yà balàbal, ntɔn mɛ in'fàleŋ anki ukwen amɛ ŋakwo, wɛɛ mɛ in'fàleŋ ukwen a mbuur kan'töm.
JOH 5:31 « Ilàkal naa mɛ kàtɛɛ imbäl ntɔn mɛ ŋakwo, kya kyàlàkal anki kyà ndandaa.
JOH 5:32 Wɛɛ mbuur asin afan'tɛɛl imbäl anà mɛ sye in'kyàyöb naa imbäl ufan'tɛɛl nde kyà ndandaa.
JOH 5:33 Bɛ, bɛ làtöm akyeey akà Ywan, nde waa kàtɛɛl ndandaa imbäl.
JOH 5:34 Akà mɛ, mɛ mfun a imbäl a mbuur kyatɛy, wɛɛ an'tɛn mɛ abà, ntɔn bɛ làwü mɔ̈ɔ̈.
JOH 5:35 Ywan kàkäl asànaa mwinà aŋàkyää wàmupà pɛɛlà: u taaŋ làmwɛy bɛ làkwen muman un'sak a pɛɛlà ande.
JOH 5:36 Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ in'we anà imbäl aŋàsöön kyà Ywan, ntɔn isal abyà kan'pɛ Taa mukyer, isal nsil bya in'fàkyer mɛ bi anà bya ifan'tɛɛl imbäl ntɔn muswaŋ naa Taa kan'töm.
JOH 5:37 Taa awà kan'töm nde ŋakwo kàtɛ imbäl ntɔn mɛ. Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làwem anki akà ikikye ndaa ande, bɛ làmɛn anki akà ikikye ntabwey ande.
JOH 5:38 Ndaa ande yatɛy amu bɛ, ntɔn bɛ mbuur kun'töm làfun'sà anki làkwikilà.
JOH 5:39 Bɛ, bɛ làfàlab pànsi pànsi Ndaa Aŋàsɔn, ntɔn bɛ làfàsi naa bɛ làwal mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a intye uboo aya: kyekà ya ŋakwo ifàtà imbäl ntɔn mɛ!
JOH 5:40 Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làkwen anki muyà akà mɛ ntɔn muwal mɔ̈ɔ̈.
JOH 5:41 « Mɛ in'fàwal anki làkoo làfàfà akà baar.
JOH 5:42 Wɛɛ mɛ in'kyàyöb naa amu bɛ ukwen batɛy akà Nzam.
JOH 5:43 Mɛ, mɛ kàyi kà ikɔb a Taa, wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làtön mukan'wal. Isàkal naa mbuur asin kan'yà kà ikɔb ande ŋakwo, bɛ làkyer asun'wal!
JOH 5:44 Aben, nkye bɛ lan'kwo mukal anà làkwikilà, bɛ baar làkoo abɛ làfàfà akà bɛ a bɛ, anà mpa làfàleŋ làkoo làfàfà akà Nzam mpɛl?
JOH 5:45 Bɛ twon lan'si naa mɛ in'sàkyer alafüün kusà a Taa. Mbuur afüünà bɛ Mɔsɛ awà làsi bɛ làkyän abɛ.
JOH 5:46 Kyakin, yàlàkal naa bɛ làsi làkwikilà amu Mɔsɛ, bɛ làlàsà làkwikilà akà mɛ sye, ntɔn nde kàsön ntɔn mɛ.
JOH 5:47 Wɛɛ isàkal naa bɛ làsi anki làkwikilà u ndaa kàsön nde, bɛ lan'kwo aben musà làkwikilà u ndaa amɛ? »
JOH 6:1 Ungö a indiir abi, Yɛsu kàsabà sim a ɛwà a Ngalilɛ lumwɛy, akyà bàfàbel sye naa Tibɛryade.
JOH 6:2 Iköŋ a baar mbɔɔn kyàkäl muyun'lab, ntɔn bàmɛn ba idiim kàkyerà nde udu a abɛy.
JOH 6:3 Kyakin Yɛsu kàbeenà nde udu a mɔŋ, kàbwaay nde paa anà alɔŋki ande.
JOH 6:4 Pak, un'kyɔm a Ayudà, làkäl tsütsü mukwo.
JOH 6:5 Kyekà, kàsɛn nde mii, nde kàmɛn iköŋ a baar mbɔɔn kyan'yà akà nde, nde kàfuul Filipo naa: « Bi kan'kwo musom ken mampà ntɔn baar bà bàdi? »
JOH 6:6 - Kàtɛn nde abà ntɔn mubilà Filipo u mpem, ntɔn akà nde, nde kàkyer ayöbà naa nde ininà uyàkyer. -
JOH 6:7 Filipo kun'fuur naa: « Itàkal làfur a mbul mwɛy lun'syääl a an'ywaŋ làkwo anki musom mampà isàkal naa mbuur mbuur awal itàkal kitsu. »
JOH 6:8 Umwɛy uboo a alɔŋki ande, ikɔb ande Andrɛ, un'tɔŋ a Simɔn Petɔlà, kàtɛn a nde naa:
JOH 6:9 « Mwan baal mwɛy awà apà, nde we anà mampà an'tyeen mà ɔrze anà bibaan a nsö byeel. Wɛɛ indiir abi nkye byan'kwo mukyer akà un'kàbɔ a baar? »
JOH 6:10 Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Laswɛŋ baar bàbwaay. » Ikal akin kyàkäl anà in'lɛŋ mbɔɔn. Baar waa bàbwaay, ba bàkäl abaal isii a nsaab tyeen.
JOH 6:11 Apan, Yɛsu kàwɛl mampà, kàfuur an'tɔɔn, waa kàkäb akà baar bàkäl paa. Nde kàkyer abun sye ntɔn nsö: nde kapɛɛ yinà yanswà bàkweenà ba muwal.
JOH 6:12 Umpal bàyüür ba, Yɛsu kàtɛn a alɔŋki ande naa: « Làköŋà itiir byan'sal, ntɔn akà undiir ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akyà bwà. »
JOH 6:13 Ba bàköŋà bya, waa bàyööl in'lwaŋ, in'lwaŋ kwem aŋiyweel a itiir a mampà an'tyeen mà ɔrzɛ byàsääl akà baar bàdi.
JOH 6:14 Mpal bàmɛn baar impà kàkyer nde, ba bàtɛn naa: « Ndandaa mbuur awà, wà Ŋangɔɔm awayà u mɛɛn! »
JOH 6:15 Wɛɛ Yɛsu, abà kàyöb nde naa ba bàkyer ayun'wal a ngwal ntɔn mukun'sà mfum, nde kàfàkyà u mpey aŋàyen udu a mɔŋ.
JOH 6:16 Mpal làbü sisye, alɔŋki ande bàyàtyà kà un'kɔɔl a ɛwà,
JOH 6:17 ba bàbilà u bwaar làmwɛy, waa bàsɛmà mubweel ɛwà ntɔn mukyà Kapɛrnawum. Làpib làkäl lan'bwà itaan, Yɛsu kàkäl anki aŋàtataan.
JOH 6:18 Un'pöb angwal kàkäl muful, ɛwà kyàkäl munini.
JOH 6:19 Ba bàkäl ban'kyer an'kilɔmɛtre an'tyeen, itàkal an'syaam, ba bàmɛn Yɛsu wàmuyikyà udu a an'dà, wàmuyàsin tsütsü a bwaar. Apan bɔɔmà làkyer akaar.
JOH 6:20 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Wà mɛ, twon lan'man bɔɔmà! »
JOH 6:21 Ba bàkwen mukun'wal u bwaar, wɛɛ la làkäl lan'tol u mɛɛn kà ikal akyà bàkyen ba.
JOH 6:22 U taaŋtye, iköŋ a baar bàsàsal u sim lumwɛy, bàmɛn ba naa bwaar làkäl làmwɛy mpɛl paa, naa Yɛsu sye kàkyen anki mbwo mwɛy anà alɔŋki ande uboo a bwaar aba, wɛɛ ba, bàkyen ba mpɛl aŋàyen.
JOH 6:23 Apan sye, an'bwaar asin màfü Tibɛryade, màyàkɔlà tsütsü kà ikal bàdi ba mampà, ungö kàfuur Mwol an'tɔɔn.
JOH 6:24 Wɛɛ utaaŋ kàmɛn iköŋ a baar naa itàkal Yɛsu, itàkal alɔŋki ande bàkäl anki paa, baar bàbilà kà an'bwaar, waa bàkyen Kapɛrnawum mukàleŋ Yɛsu.
JOH 6:25 Utaaŋ bun'mɛn ba u sim a ɛwà lumwɛy, ba bàtɛn a nde naa: « Rabi, ngye apà an'yàkɔlà taaŋ nà? »
JOH 6:26 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Ndandaa, ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, kà ntɔn impà làmɛn bɛ anki waa bɛ, bɛ làyan'leŋ, wɛɛ ntɔn làdi bɛ mampà anà làyüür bɛ.
JOH 6:27 Twon lan'sal ntɔn isaa abyà ifàtay, wɛɛ ntɔn isaa ifàlam ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye, bya akwà usàlapà Mwan a mbuur, ntɔn nde wà mbuur kàsi Taa Nzam inyɛm ande. »
JOH 6:28 Apan, ba bun'fuul naa: « Ininà bi kan'kwo mukyer ntɔn musal isal a Nzam? »
JOH 6:29 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Isal udilà Nzam akà bɛ kyà musà làkwikilà amu mbuur kàtöm nde. »
JOH 6:30 Apan ba bun'fuur naa: « Wɛɛ ngye, idiim nà ngye akyer ntɔn bi imɛn anà bi kasi làkwikilà? Ininà ngye afàsal?
JOH 6:31 Bànkaa abi bàdi mane u nsye a ipɔl, asànaa bàsön ya naa: "Isaa kapɛ nde mudyà byà làmpà làfü du." »
JOH 6:32 Apan Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Ndandaa, ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, kà Mɔsɛ tɛy kàlapɛ làmpà a du, wɛɛ Taa amɛ afàlapà làmpà a du là ndandaa.
JOH 6:33 Ntɔn làmpà a Nzam là mbuur kan'fà du anà kan'pà mɔ̈ɔ̈ u mɛɛn. »
JOH 6:34 Apan, ba bàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwol, ipɛ taaŋ lanswà làmpà alà. »
JOH 6:35 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mɛ, mɛ in'wà làmpà a mɔ̈ɔ̈. Mbuur awayà akà mɛ usàwem anki ngyal akà ikikye, mbuur awà asà làkwikilà amu mɛ, usàwem anki mfwää akà ikikye.
JOH 6:36 Wɛɛ, mɛ ya kàkyàtɛn a bɛ naa: bɛ làkyàman, wɛɛ bɛ làsaa anki làkwikilà.
JOH 6:37 Baar banswà kan'pà Taa bàsàyà akà mɛ, anà mbuur ayà akà mɛ, mɛ in'sun'piy anki,
JOH 6:38 ntɔn kàyàtɔlà mɛ fà du, kà mukyer ukwen amɛ ŋakwo anki, wɛɛ mukyer ukwen a mbuur awà kan'töm.
JOH 6:39 Le, ukwen a mbuur awà kan'töm abà: naa mbuur wanswà kan'pɛ nde ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akyà bwà, wɛɛ mɛ un'wiiy kà ilä a ntsüü.
JOH 6:40 Abun, ukwen a Taaràmɛ abà: mbuur wanswà aman Mwan anà asà làkwikilà amu nde, ukäl anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye, waa mɛ, mɛ in'sun'wiiy kà ilä a ntsüü. »
JOH 6:41 Sɛmà apan, Ayudà bàbulà muŋüŋün ntɔn kàtɛn nde naa: « Mɛ, mɛ in'wà làmpà làfü du. » –
JOH 6:42 Ba waa bàfatɛɛnà naa: « Nkye nde kà Yɛsu, mwan a Yɔsɛfi anki? Nkye bi taarànde anà ngwän kayöb anki? Aben nde kan'kwo mukyey uyɔl apanà naa: "Mɛ an'yàtɔlà fà du"? »
JOH 6:43 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Twon lan'ŋüŋün bɛ a bɛ.
JOH 6:44 Akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki muyà akà mɛ isàkal naa Taa awà kan'töm kun'naan anki, waa mɛ, mɛ insun'wiiy kà ilä a ntsüü.
JOH 6:45 Aŋangɔɔm bàsön abà: "Nzam asàlɔŋ ba banswà." Mbuur wanswà kàwem Taa anà kàkyey an'lɔɔŋ ande, ayà akà mɛ.
JOH 6:46 Ikaswaŋà naa akà umwɛy kàmɛn anki Taa akà ikikye, nà mbuur mwɛy awà kàfü akà Nzam, nde awà kàmɛn Taa.
JOH 6:47 Ndandaa, ndandaa, mɛ alàkyään: mbuur asà làkwikilà we anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye.
JOH 6:48 Mɛ, mɛ in'wà làmpà a mɔ̈ɔ̈.
JOH 6:49 Bànkaa abɛ bàdi manɛ u nsye a ipɔl, wɛɛ ba bàkyàkwà.
JOH 6:50 Wɛɛ làmpà làyàtɔlà fà du, là naa mbuur adyà la ukɔɔn akwà.
JOH 6:51 Mɛ, mɛ in'wà làmpà alye anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ làfü du. Isàkal naa mbuur kan'dyà unsà làmpà alà, nde asàkal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye. Làmpà alà in'sàpà mɛ, lun'sön a ndür amɛ an'pà mɛ ntɔn mɛɛn ikäl anà mɔ̈ɔ̈. »
JOH 6:52 Apan, Ayudà bàsyeelà mbaaŋ a ngwalàngwal ba a ba: « Aben mbuur wà kan'kwo mupà bi un'sön a ndür ande naa bàdi wa? »
JOH 6:53 Abun, Yɛsu kakyään naa: « Ndandaa, ndandaa mɛ alàkyään: isàkal naa bɛ làdi anki un'sön a ndür a Mwan a mbuur anà bɛ lànü anki an'kil ande, bɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ làsàkal awà anki.
JOH 6:54 Mbuur awadyà un'sön a ndür amɛ anà anwà an'kil amɛ, nde we anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye, waa mɛ, mɛ insun'wiiy kà ilä a ntsüü.
JOH 6:55 Ntɔn un'sön a ndür amɛ wà isaa a ndandaa byàdyà anà an'kil amɛ mà man a ndandaa.
JOH 6:56 Mbuur awadyà un'sön a ndür amɛ anà anwà an'kil amɛ, nde wà amu mɛ anà mɛ in'wà amu nde.
JOH 6:57 Asànaa Taa awà kan'töm awà nde anà mɔ̈ɔ̈, mɛ sye in'wà anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ u mbwo ande. Abun, mbuur asan'dyà, nde asàkal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ u mbwo amɛ:
JOH 6:58 Alà là làmpà làyàtɔlà fà du. La kà latɛy asànaa la akwà bàdi bànkaa abɛ. Ba, ba bàkyàkwà. Wɛɛ mbuur asàdyà làmpà là, nde asàkal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye. »
JOH 6:59 Indiir abi nde kàlɔɔŋà u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà u Kapɛrnawum.
JOH 6:60 Ungö bàwem ba Yɛsu, bàmbɔɔn uboo a alɔŋki ande bàtɛn naa: « Ndaa ayi yà bwoor! Nà kan'kwo muwem ya? »
JOH 6:61 Wɛɛ nde kayöb nde ŋakwo naa alɔŋki ande bàkäl mukun'twe ntɔn ndaa ayi, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Nkye ndaa ayi yàmàladii ukyal?
JOH 6:62 Akya isàkal naa bɛ lan'man Mwan a mbuur wàmubɛɛnà mper kàkäl nde kusà?
JOH 6:63 Dweelà làfàpà mɔ̈ɔ̈, wɛɛ un'sön a ndür wà undiir mwɛy ndöŋ watɛy. Ndaa an'tɛn mɛ a bɛ yà dweelà anà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
JOH 6:64 Wɛɛ bamwɛy uboo abɛ bàfàsà anki làkwikilà. » Abun, Yɛsu kàkyer ayöbà fà nsɛmà naa bànà mpa bàsye làkwikilà anà nà kàlun'yälà.
JOH 6:65 Nde kàkwɛy naa: « Kyakin kàlakyään mɛ naa: "akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe tɛy muyà akà mɛ, isàkal naa ya Taa kun'pɛ anki." »
JOH 6:66 Fà apan, alɔŋki ande mbɔɔn bàkyer alwomà, waa bàwɛy muyikyà anà nde.
JOH 6:67 Apan, Yɛsu kàtɛn a Bàkwem Aŋiyweel naa: « Atöl bɛ, nkye bɛ làkwen anki mukyà? »
