JOH 6:68 Simɔn Petɔlà kun'fuur naa: « Mwol, bi ikyà akà nà? Ngye awe anà ndaa a mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye.
JOH 6:69 Bi, bi kàkyàsà làkwikilà anà kàkyàyöb naa ngye, ngye awà Ŋun'kyɛɛl a Nzam. »
JOH 6:70 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Nkye kà mɛ anki kàlasɔ̈ɔ̈l, bɛ Bàkwem Aŋiyweel? Kyekà umwɛy uboo abɛ wà ileŋ! »
JOH 6:71 Abun, nde kàtɛɛnà ntɔn Yudasi, Mwan a Simɔn Isikalyɔt. Ntɔn nde wumwɛy uboo a Bàkwem Aŋiyweel awà kàlun'yälà.
JOH 7:1 Ungö apan, Yɛsu kàyilyaaŋà u Ngalilɛ. Nde kàkwen anki muyilyaaŋ u Yuday, ntɔn amfum a Ayudà bàleŋà mukun'dwa.
JOH 7:2 Kyekà, un'kyɔm a ndwà a ntɛn a Ayudà kàkäl tsütsü.
JOH 7:3 Apan, atɔŋ a Yɛsu bàtɛn a nde naa: « Lwomà apà, kyen Yuday, ntɔn alɔŋki angye sye bàmɛn isal akyerà ngye bi.
JOH 7:4 Akà mbuur mwɛy ufàkyer anki undiir u nku isàkal naa nde akwen umɛnà. Ntɔn akakyerà ngye indiir abi, wɛy ngye ŋakwo sye amɛnà u mii a baar. »
JOH 7:5 Abun, atɔŋ ande ŋakwo bun'si anki làkwikilà.
JOH 7:6 Apan Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Taaŋ amɛ ŋàtàkwo anki. Wɛɛ akà bɛ, taaŋ lanswà là ubwaŋ.
JOH 7:7 Mɛɛn ikwe tɛy mukàlayiiŋ, wɛɛ mɛ, nde akyer afan'yiiŋ, ntɔn mɛ in'fàtà imbäl naa isal ande byà ibe.
JOH 7:8 Kyakin, bɛ, bɛ làbeenà un'kyɔm. Akà mɛ, mɛ in'beenà tɛy un'kyɔm, ntɔn taaŋ amɛ ŋàtàkwo anki. »
JOH 7:9 Ungö mutɛn abà, nde kàsàbwaay u Ngalilɛ.
JOH 7:10 Wɛɛ mpal bàkyen atɔŋ ande un'kyɔm, apan, nde sye kàbeenà aŋàyen, kà u mii a baar anki, wɛɛ asànaa u nku.
JOH 7:11 Umpal a un'kyɔm, amfum a Ayudà bàyun'leŋà ba, waa bàtɛɛnà naa: « Wàken nde bà? »
JOH 7:12 Baar bàsyeelà mbaaŋ mbɔɔn ntɔn nde uboo a nköŋ. Amwɛy naa: « Nde wà mbuur aŋàbwaŋ ». Wɛɛ bumwɛy naa: « Ŋaa, nde wà muyibwiy baar ndwaŋ. »
JOH 7:13 Itàkal abun, akà mbuur mwɛy kàtɛɛnà anki u mii a baar, ntɔn ba bàtiinà amfum a Ayudà bɔɔmà.
JOH 7:14 Un'kyɔm kàkäl kan'tol uboboo, Yɛsu kàbeenà ndwà a Nzam, waa kàlɔɔŋà.
JOH 7:15 Amfum a Ayudà bàmɛn ndaa yubem, waa bàtɛɛnà naa: « Aben nde uyöbà, nde mbuur mpa kàtäŋ? »
JOH 7:16 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « An'lɔɔŋ amɛ kà man'fà akà mɛ anki, wɛɛ màmbuur kan'töm.
JOH 7:17 Isàkal naa mbuur akwen mukyer ukwen a Nzam, nde asàyöb naa nkye an'lɔɔŋ amà man'fà akà Nzam, lɛɛ mɛ in'wà mutɛn kà ikɔb amɛ ŋakwo.
JOH 7:18 Mbuur afàtɛn ntɔn nde ŋakwo, afàleŋ làkoo ande ŋakwo. Wɛɛ mbuur afàleŋ làkoo a mbuur kun'töm, nde wà mbuur a ndandaa, usɔɔr akà nde batɛy.
JOH 7:19 Nkye kà Mɔsɛ anki kàlapɛ Un'kɔɔn? Wɛɛ akà umwɛy uboo abɛ ufàsyääl anki wa. Ntɔn nkye làkwen bɛ mukan'dwa? »
JOH 7:20 Iköŋ a baar kyun'fuur naa: « Ngye awe anà un'sɔŋà! Nà akwen akadwa? »
JOH 7:21 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Mɛ, mɛ an'kyer isal imwɛy, wɛɛ bɛ banswà, bɛ lan'bem!
JOH 7:22 Ntɔn Mɔsɛ kàlaswɛŋ mukyɛy baan abaal - ya sye yàfü anki akà Mɔsɛ, wɛɛ yàfü akà bànkaa - waa bɛ làfàkyɛy baal mwɛy ilä a saba.
JOH 7:23 Isàkal naa bɛ lan'kwo mukyɛy baal mwɛy ilä a saba ukɔɔn abɛy Un'kɔɔn a Mɔsɛ, ntɔn nkye làman'wem bɛ nkyɛl ntɔn an'kɔɔr mɛ baal aŋun'kiinà ilä a saba?
JOH 7:24 Twon lan'tsul mbar ntɔn ubwaŋ a nsà, wɛɛ làtsül mbar a balàbal. »
JOH 7:25 Ndam a baar uboo a baar a Yɛlusàlɛm bàtɛɛnà naa: « Nkye wà kà mbuur bàyileŋ ba mudwa anki?
JOH 7:26 Le, nde wàmutɛn u mii a baar, wɛɛ akà mbuur a un'sà nso watɛy! Nkye amfum abi ban'kyey naa ndandaa nde wà Klistɔ?
JOH 7:27 Mpal usàyà Klistɔ, akà mbuur mwɛy usàyöb anki ntsü kan'fà nde. Wɛɛ baal wà, bi ikyàyöb ntsü kan'fà nde. »
JOH 7:28 Apan, umpal kàlɔɔŋà Yɛsu u ndwà a Nzam, nde kàsi un'kwɛŋ: « Bɛ, bɛ làkyan'yöb! Bɛ làkyàyöb ntsü an'fà mɛ! Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ kàyi anki mɛ ŋakwo, mbuur awà kan'töm wà ndandaa. Bɛ, bɛ lun'yöb anki.
JOH 7:29 Mɛ, mɛ in'kyun'yöb, ntɔn mɛ kàfü akà nde, nde sye kan'töm. »
JOH 7:30 Apan, ba bàleŋ mukun'kɔr, wɛɛ akà mbuur kun'bä anki, ntɔn taaŋ ande làkäl aŋàkwo anki.
JOH 7:31 Uboo a iköŋ, baar mbɔɔn bàsi làkwikilà amu nde. Ba bàtɛɛnà naa: « Nkye mpal usàyà Klistɔ, nde asàkyer impà aŋàsöön abyà ukyerà mbuur wà? »
JOH 7:32 In'ŋün myàkäl uboo a iköŋ a baar ntɔn Yɛsu, myàyàböl kà an'tsü a Amfarisi. Apan, andwer a angaŋ anà Amfarisi waa bàtöm aseey ntɔn mukun'kɔr.
JOH 7:33 Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Mɛ, mɛ in'wà anà bɛ taaŋ ikikye, ungö mɛ in'kyà ntsü akà mbuur kan'töm.
JOH 7:34 Bɛ làkyer asan'leŋ, wɛɛ bɛ làsan'man tɛy, ntɔn bɛ làkwe anki muyà kà ikal in'sàkal mɛ. »
JOH 7:35 Fà apan, amfum a Ayudà bàsɛmà mufuul ba a ba naa: « Nde apɛy ayàkyà ken ntɔn bi ifàkɔɔn un'man? Nkye nde apɛy ayàkàtaan Ayudà akwà bàpää uboo a Angɛlɛki? Nkye nde apɛy Angɛlɛki usàkàlɔŋ?
JOH 7:36 Ikaswaŋà aben ndaa utɛn nde ayɛy naa: "Bɛ, bɛ làkyer asan'leŋ, wɛɛ bɛ làsan'man tɛy, naa sye bɛ làkwe tɛy muyà kà ikal in'sàkal mɛ"? »
JOH 7:37 Ilä a ntsüü a un'kyɔm kyàkäl ilä mwɛy kyà kölàköl. Yɛsu kàkäl umbär wàmukyäänà naa: « Isàkal naa mbuur we anà mfwää, wɛy nde uyi akà mɛ, waa unwà.
JOH 7:38 Mbuur awe anà làkwikilà amu mɛ, "ngyäl a an'dà a mɔ̈ɔ̈ isàtoo u mpem ande", asànaa itɛɛnà Ndaa Aŋàsɔn. »
JOH 7:39 Kàtɛɛnà nde abunà, yà ntɔn Dweelà bàlàwal baar bàlàsà làkwikilà aba amu nde. Umpal ayin, Dweelà kàkäl aŋàtàpà anki, ntɔn Yɛsu kàkäl anki aŋàtàwal làkoo.
JOH 7:40 Amwɛy uboo iköŋ bàwem ndaa ayi, ba bàtɛɛnà naa: « Ndandaa mbuur awà, wà Ŋangɔɔm! »
JOH 7:41 Bumwɛy bàtɛɛnà naa: « Nde wà Klistɔ! » – Wɛɛ bumwɛy bàfuur naa: « Nkye Klistɔ sye an'kwo utoo u Ngalilɛ?
JOH 7:42 Nkye Ndaa Aŋàsɔn itɛɛnà anki naa nde asàkal mbuur a ywar a David, nde asàfà Bɛtelɛm, bul kàkälà David? »
JOH 7:43 Apan, iköŋ kyàkaabà ntɔn nde.
JOH 7:44 Amwɛy uboo a ba bàkweenà naa bun'kör, wɛɛ akà mbuur mwɛy kàkwe anki mukun'ba.
JOH 7:45 Aseey bàyàfurà ba akà andweer a angaŋ anà Amfarisi, ba bafuul naa: « Ntɔn nkye mpa làtwääl bɛ Yɛsu? »
JOH 7:46 Aseey bàfuur naa: « Akà mbuur mwɛy ŋàtàtɛn anki akà ikikye asànaa nde! » –
JOH 7:47 Apan, Amfarisi bafuul naa: « Nkye anà bɛ sye, nde akyàlabwiy ndwaŋ?
JOH 7:48 Nkye we anà umwɛy uboo a amfum itàkal uboo a Amfarisi, kàsi làwikilà amu nde?
JOH 7:49 Wɛɛ baar abà, baar mpa bàyöb Un'kɔɔn akà ikikye, ba bàŋàküül! »
JOH 7:50 Wɛɛ umwɛy uboo a Amfarisi, Nàkàdim akwà kàkàman Yɛsu itaan, kàtɛn a ba naa:
JOH 7:51 « Nkye Un'kɔɔn abi afàtsüül mbuur mbar ukɔɔn atun'wem anà muyöb naa nde nkye kan'kyer? »
JOH 7:52 Ba bun'fuur naa: « Nkye ngye sye awà un'nsi Ngalilɛ? Leŋ, ngye ayàman naa akà ŋangɔɔm mwɛy ufàtoo anki u Ngalilɛ akà ikikye. »
JOH 7:53 Ungö apan, mbuur mbuur kàfurà ndwà ande.
JOH 8:1 Yɛsu kàkyen mɔŋ a In'te a olive.
JOH 8:2 Ututu tutu, nde kàyàfurà u ndwà a Nzam. Un'sɛŋ a baar wanswà kàyi akà nde, nde waa kàbwaay, waa kàsɛmà mulɔŋ.
JOH 8:3 Apan, alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn anà Amfarisi bun'twääl un'kaar mwɛy bàkör ba wàmutà inswem, waa bun'tɔɔl uboboo a baar banswà,
JOH 8:4 waa bàtɛn a Yɛsu naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, un'kaar wà bàmun'kɔr wàmutà inswem.
JOH 8:5 Unsà un'kɔɔn, Mɔsɛ kà iswɛŋ mutà akaar a tub abà in'kul. Waa ngye, ngye an'tɛn aben bà? »
JOH 8:6 Bàtɛɛnà ba abà ntɔn ba bun'lwɛb ndaa, anà ba bàkäl anà undiir ban'kwo ba mukun'füün. Wɛɛ Yɛsu waa kàtsüüm, kàsɛmà mubaar in'dyärà a làpin u mɛɛn.
JOH 8:7 Ntɔn bàsi ba muküünà mukun'fuul, Yɛsu kàsuub un'tswe, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Isàkal naa apà we anà mbuur mwɛy uboo a bɛ mpa aŋàtàkyer man'be akà ikikye, wɛy nde kun'käm un'kul atàtwɛb. »
JOH 8:8 Ungö, kàfàtsüüm nde, nde kàsön u mɛɛn.
JOH 8:9 Ungö bàwem ba ndaa ayi, ba bàsɛmà mutà upay umwɛy umwɛy, semà akà andweer. Wɛɛ Yɛsu kàsàsal aŋàyen, un'kaar kàkyàmbar kusà a nde.
JOH 8:10 Apan, Yɛsu kàsuub nde un'tswe, waa kun'fuul naa: « Un'kaar, bàken ba? Nkye akà mbuur akyapà ikwàndwà? » –
JOH 8:11 Nde kàfuur naa: « Ŋaa, Mwol, akà mbuur. » Waa Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mɛ sye, mɛ apà anki ikwàndwà. Kyen, twon an'fàkyer man'be. »
JOH 8:12 Yɛsu kàfàtɛn a ba naa: « Mɛ, mɛ in'wà pɛɛlà a mɛɛn. Mbuur ayan'lab, nde usàkyà anki u mpib akà ikikye, nde asàwal pɛɛlà làfàpà mɔ̈ɔ̈. »
JOH 8:13 Apan, Amfarisi bàtɛn a nde naa: « Ngye, ngye awàmutà imbäl angye ŋakwo. Imbäl angye kà kyà ndandaa anki. »
JOH 8:14 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Yà ndandaa naa mɛ, mɛ in'wàmutà imbäl amɛ ŋakwo. Imbäl amɛ kyà ndandaa, ntɔn mɛ in'kyàyöb naa mɛ an'fà ken anà mɛ sye in'kyà ken. Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làyöb anki naa mɛ an'fà ken anà mɛ sye in'kyà ken.
JOH 8:15 Bɛ, bɛ nsaŋ làfàtsul unsà imbuur. Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ in'fàtsüül anki mbuur nsaŋ.
JOH 8:16 Mpalabà, isàkal naa mɛ in'kyer atsul nsaŋ, ntsüül a nsaŋ amɛ yà balàbal, ntɔn mɛ kà in'wà aŋàyen anki, wɛɛ mɛ in'wà anà Taa, mbuur awà kan'töm.
JOH 8:17 Bàsön unsà Un'kɔɔn abɛ ŋakwo naa bàfàtɔn anki imbäl a baar bɔ̈ɔ̈l.
JOH 8:18 Mɛ, mɛ in'fàtà imbäl amɛ ŋakwo, Taa awà kan'töm afan'tɛɛl sye imbäl. »
JOH 8:19 Apan ba bàtɛɛnà a nde naa: « Wàken Taaràŋà wa? » Yɛsu naa: « Bɛ, bɛ mɛ lan'yöb anki, itàkal Taaràmɛ, bɛ lun'yöb anki. Ilàkal naa bɛ lan'yöb, bɛ sye Taaràmɛ làkyer alun'yöb. »
JOH 8:20 Ndaa ayi, Yɛsu ya kàtɛɛnà umpal kàlɔɔŋà nde u ndwà a Nzam, kà ikal a insak a an'kab. Akà mbuur mwɛy kàkwe anki mukun'kɔr, ntɔn taaŋ ande làkäl aŋàkwo anki.
JOH 8:21 Yɛsu kàfàtɛn a ba naa: « Mɛ, mɛ in'kyer ayàkyà, bɛ làkyer ayan'leŋ, wɛ bɛ, bɛ làsàkwà unsà ube abɛ. Bɛ làkwe anki mukyà mper in'kyà mɛ. »
JOH 8:22 Apan amfum a Ayudà bàtɛɛnà naa: « Nkye nde we anà an'kyän mudwa nde ŋakwo, ntɔn nde wàmutɛn naa: "Bɛ làkwe anki mukyà mper in'kyà mɛ"? »
JOH 8:23 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Bɛ, bɛ làbà baar a indiir a mɛɛn mà. Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ in'wà mbuur a indiir a dudu. Bɛ, bɛ làbà baar a mɛɛn mà, wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ kà in'wà mbuur a mɛɛn mà anki.
JOH 8:24 Undiir awun in'tɛn mɛ a bɛ naa bɛ làsàkwà unsà man'be abɛ. Abun, isàkal naa bɛ làkyey anki naa "Mɛ In'wà", bɛ làsàkwà unsà man'be abɛ. » –
JOH 8:25 Ba bun'fuul naa: « Ngye, ngye awà nà? » Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Mbuur akwà kàlakyään mɛ fà nsɛmà.
JOH 8:26 Mɛ, mɛ in'we anà indiir mbɔɔn mutɛn anà mutsul nsaŋ ntɔn bɛ. Wɛɛ mɛ in'fàkyään u mɛɛn nà ya akwà kàwem mɛ akà mbuur kan'töm, nde afàtɛn ndandaa. »
JOH 8:27 Wɛɛ ba bàyöbà anki naa nde ba kasaamà ntɔn Taa.
JOH 8:28 Apan, Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Utaaŋ làsàsɛɛn bɛ Mwan a mbuur, bɛ laa làsàyöb bɛ naa "Mɛ In'wà", anà mɛ in'fàkyer anki undiir kà ukwen amɛ ŋakwo: mɛ in'fàtɛn ya akwà kan'lɔŋ Taa.
JOH 8:29 Mbuur kan'töm wà anà mɛ: nde kan'wɛy anki aŋàyen, ntɔn mɛ, taaŋ lanswà mɛ in'fàkyer indiir ufàkwen nde. »
JOH 8:30 Umpal kàkäl nde mutɛɛnà abà, baar mbɔɔn bàsi làkwikilà amu nde.
JOH 8:31 Abun Yɛsu kàtɛn a Ayudà abà bàsi làkwikilà amu nde naa: « Isàkal naa bɛ, bɛ lan'lam u ndaa amɛ, ndandaa bɛ làbà alɔŋki amɛ.
JOH 8:32 Abun, bɛ làsàyöb ndandaa, waa ndandaa isàlabuul baar a nsaay. »
JOH 8:33 Ba bun'fuur naa: « Bi, bi ibà itoo a Abàlam, bi kàsàkal anki asɔ a mbuur mwɛy akà ikikye. Aben ngye, ngye atɛɛnà naa: "Bɛ làsàbulà baar a nsaay"? »
JOH 8:34 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Ndandaa, ndandaa mɛ alàkyään: mbuur wanswà afàkyer man'be, nde wà un'sɔ a man'be.
JOH 8:35 Un'sɔ ufàbwaay anki ipepey u ndwà, wɛɛ mwan afàbwaay ipepey kwo.
JOH 8:36 Abun, isàkal naa Mwan kàmàlakɔɔr, bɛ làsàkal baar a nsaay bàndandaa.
JOH 8:37 Mɛ in'kyàyöb naa bɛ làbà itoo a Abàlam, wɛɛ bɛ làfàleŋ mukan'dwa, ntɔn ndaa amɛ ifàlatwà anki u mpem.
JOH 8:38 Mɛ, mɛ in'fàtɛn indiir kàmɛn mɛ akà Taa. Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làfàkyer indiir làwem bɛ akà taaràbɛ. »
JOH 8:39 Ba bun'fuur naa: « Abàlam wà taaràbi. » Yɛsu naa: « Kya bɛ làlàkal baan a Abàlam, bɛ làlikyerà isal a Abàlam.
JOH 8:40 Wɛɛ apanà, bɛ, bɛ làleŋà mukan'dwa, mɛ mbuur kàlakyään ndandaa ayà kàwem mɛ akà Nzam. Abàlam kàkyer anki abà!
JOH 8:41 Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làfàkyer isal a taaràbɛ. » Ba bun'fuur naa: « Bi kà ibà baan a inswem anki. Bi ibye awà Taa mwɛy mpɛl, Nzam. »
JOH 8:42 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Yàlàkal naa Nzam wà Taaràbɛ, bɛ làlàkyer an'kwen. Ntɔn mɛ, mɛ an'too amu Nzam anà mɛ sye an'fà kwo. Mɛ, mɛ kàyi anki a ukwen amɛ ŋakwo, wɛɛ Nde kan'töm.
JOH 8:43 Ntɔn nkye mpa làkayöbà bɛ ntɛɛn amɛ? Ntɔn bɛ, bɛ làkwe anki muwem ndaa amɛ.
JOH 8:44 Bɛ, taaràbɛ ileŋ, bɛ làfàkwen mukyer ngyal a taaràbɛ. Nde wun'dwää fà nsɛmà, nde kàsàtsim anki uboo a ndandaa, ntɔn ndandaa amu nde yatɛy. Umpal ufàtà nde loor, nde la afàwal uboo a indiir ande ŋakwo, ntɔn nde wà ŋaloor anà taar a loor.
JOH 8:45 Wɛɛ, mɛ in'fàtɛn ndandaa, undiir awun mpa làfan'sà bɛ làkwikilà.
JOH 8:46 Nà uboo abɛ kan'kwo mukan'swaŋ naa mɛ an'kyer man'be? Ntɔn nkye lan'kɔɔn bɛ mukan'sà làkwikilà isàkal naa mɛ an'tɛn ndandaa?
JOH 8:47 Mbuur awà mbuur a Nzam, afàwem ndaa a Nzam. Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làfàwem anki, ntɔn bɛ kàlàbà baar a Nzam anki. »
JOH 8:48 Ayudà bun'fuur naa: « Nkye bi iböŋ kyatɛy mutɛn naa ngye awà un'nsi Samalya, anà ngye sye awe anà unsɔŋà? » –
JOH 8:49 Yɛsu kàfuur naa: « Mɛ, mɛ unsɔŋà watɛy. Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ in'wàmusyäŋà Taaràmɛ. Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làkun'syäŋà anki.
JOH 8:50 Mɛ, mɛ in'fàleŋ anki làkoo amɛ ŋakwo. We anà mbuur afàpà la anà afàtsul mbar.
JOH 8:51 Ndandaa, ndandaa, mɛ alàkyään: isàkal naa mbuur kan'kaar ndaa amɛ, nde usàkwà anki akà ikikye. »
JOH 8:52 Apan, Ayudà nsil abà bàtɛn a nde naa: « Apanà, bi kan'yöb naa ngye awe anà unsɔŋà! Abàlam kàkyàkwà anà aŋangɔɔm sye, wɛ ngye atɛn naa: "Isàkal naa mbuur an'kaar ndaa amɛ, nde usàkwà anki akà ikikye."
JOH 8:53 Nkye ngye, ngye an'söön taaràbi Abàlam awà kàkü itaan? Aŋangɔɔm sye bàkyàkwà! Ngye, ngye akasii naa ngye awà nà? »
JOH 8:54 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Isàkal naa mɛ, mɛ in'fàsà làkoo akà mɛ ŋakwo, la ndöŋ latɛy. Mɛ, mɛ in'fàsà làkoo a Taaràmɛ, nde akwà làfàtɛn bɛ naa: "Nde wà Nzam abi".
JOH 8:55 Bɛ nde lun'yöb anki, wɛɛ akà mɛ, mɛ in'kyun'yöb. Kya mɛ in'sàtɛn naa mɛ un'yöb anki, mɛ in'sàkal mbuur a loor asànaa bɛ. Mɛ in'kyun'yöb anà mɛ sye in'fàkaar ndaa ande.
JOH 8:56 Taaràbɛ Abàlam kàkäl kà un'sak unsà an'kyän muman ilä amɛ: nde kàkyàman kya, waa kàkü unsà un'sak. »
JOH 8:57 Ayudà waa bàtɛn a nde naa: « Nkye ngye akà mbul an'kwem an'tyeen awe ayà, waa ngye kàmɛn Abàlam! »
JOH 8:58 Yɛsu naa: « Ndandaa, ndandaa, mɛ alàkyään: kusà a mböör a Abàlam, "Mɛ In'wà". »
JOH 8:59 Apan, ba b 1 bür in'kul ntɔn mukun'kam. Wɛɛ Yɛsu laa kàkàyee nde, waa kàtoo u ndwà a Nzam.
JOH 9:1 U mbwo, Yɛsu kàmɛn baal mwɛy wàŋàkwàmii fà mböör ande.
JOH 9:2 Alɔŋki ande bun'fuul naa: « Rabi, nà kàkyer man'be ntɔn nde bun'bör wàŋàkwàmii, nkye nde lɛɛ aböör ande? »
JOH 9:3 Yɛsu kàfuur naa: « Kà nde anki, itàkal aböör ande, wɛɛ ntɔn isal a Nzam imɛnà amu nde.
JOH 9:4 Ibà bi pà u mwäänà, bi ikyer isal a mbuur kan'töm. Làpib làmubwà, taaŋ mpa usal mbuur.
JOH 9:5 Umpal in'wà mɛ pà u mɛɛn, mɛ in'wà pɛɛlà a mɛɛn. »
JOH 9:6 Ungö mutɛn indiir abi, nde kàtsül an'te u mɛɛn, kàkyer twar, waa kàkiir la u mii a ikwamii,
JOH 9:7 waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Kyen, kaywɛb kà itɛy a Silɔwɛ. » Ikɔb aki ikaswaŋà naa « Ntööm ». Ikwàmii kàkyen kwo, kàywɛy ntabwey, waa kàyimanà mpal kàyàfurà nde.
JOH 9:8 Baar a tsütsü anà nde anà baar bàfun'manà kusà wàmulɔlɔm, bàfuulà naa: « Nkye wà kà mbuur akwà kàkälà wà aŋàbwaay anà kàfalɔ̈lɔ̈mà anki? »
JOH 9:9 Amwɛy bàtɛɛnà naa: « Awà nde. » Bumwɛy naa: « Awà kà nde anki, mbuur asin kàmufwän. » Wɛɛ ikwàmii kàkyey naa: « Ndandaa, wà mɛ. »
JOH 9:10 Abun, ba bun'fuulà naa: « Mii angye myan'dubà aben? »
JOH 9:11 Nde kàfuur naa: « Mbuur awà bàfàbel Yɛsu kàkyer twar, kan'kiir la u mii, waa kàtɛn a mɛ naa: "Kyen Silɔwɛ, kaywɛb". Apan sye in'kyen mɛ, in'ywɛb mɛ, waa in'bulà muman! »
JOH 9:12 Ba bun'fuul naa: « Nde wàken, mbuur wa? » Nde kàfuur naa: « Mɛ in'yöb anki. »
JOH 9:13 Apan, ba bàtwääl mbuur kàkäl ikwàmii akà Amfarisi.
JOH 9:14 Kyekà, ilä akin kyàkäl ilä a saba akyà kàkyer Yɛsu twar, anà kun'duub nde mii.
JOH 9:15 Apan sye, Amfarisi bun'fuul sye naa mii angye myàdubà aben. Nde kafuur naa: « Nde kan'kiir twar u mii, in'ywɛb mɛ, waa mɛ an'man. »
JOH 9:16 Apan, uboo a Amfarisi amwɛy bàtɛɛnà naa: « Mbuur awà kà kan'fà akà Nzam anki, ntɔn nde saba ufàkyɛɛl anki. » Wɛɛ bumwɛy bàtɛɛnà naa: « Nkye mbuur a man'be kan'kwo ukäl anà ikɔ̈b akyer idiim a tub abi? » Nkaabà yàkyer abilà uboo a ba.
JOH 9:17 Apan, ba bàfàfuul ikwamii naa: « Waa ngye, ngye an'tɛn aben ntɔn mbuur kaduub mii? » Nde kàfuur naa: « Nde wà ŋangɔɔm. »
JOH 9:18 Wɛɛ amfum a Ayudà bàkyer atɔn musà làkwikilà naa nde kàkäl ikwàmii, waa nde kàbulà muman. Undiir awun, bàbel ba aböör ande
JOH 9:19 ntɔn mukafuul naa: « Nkye wà mwan abɛ akwà làwe bɛ naa nde bun'bör wàŋàkwàmii? Abun, nde kan'man aben apanà? »
JOH 9:20 Aböör ande bàfuur naa: « Bi, bi ikyàyöb ndandaa naa wà mwan baal abi, nde sye bun'bör wàŋàkwàmii.
JOH 9:21 Apanà nde kan'man aben, bi iyöb anki. Nà kun'duub mii? Bi iyöb anki. Lun'fuul, nde wàŋàyɛl, nde kan'kwo musam ntɔn nde ŋakwo! »
JOH 9:22 Aböör ande bàtɛɛnà ba abà, ntɔn ba bàtiinà Ayudà bɔɔmà. Ntɔn amfum a Ayudà bàdirà kusà muböŋ u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà mbuur wanswà asàkyey naa Yɛsu wà Klistɔ.
JOH 9:23 Undiir awun aböör ande bàtɛn ba naa: « Nde wàŋàyɛl, lun'fuul! »
JOH 9:24 Amfarisi bàbel mbuur akwà kàkäl aŋàkwàmii mbalà yàyweel, waa bàtɛn a nde naa: « Pà làkoo akà Nzam! Bi, bi ikyàyöb naa baal wà wà mbuur a man'be. »
JOH 9:25 Nde kafuur naa: « Isàkal naa nde wà mbuur a man'be, mɛ in'yöb anki. Mɛ in'yöb undiir mwɛy mpɛl awà: mɛ kàkäl ikwàmii, apanà mɛ an'man. »
JOH 9:26 Ba waa bun'fuul naa: « Ininà nde kakyer? Nde ngye mii kaduub aben? »
JOH 9:27 Nde kafuur naa: « Mɛ ya akyàlakyään itaan, wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làwem anki. Ntɔn nkye làkwen bɛ mufàwem mbalà asin? Nkye bɛ sye, bɛ làkwen mubulà alɔŋki ande? »
JOH 9:28 Apan, ba waa bàsɛmà mukun'to, mutɛn naa: « Ngye mbuur awà un'lɔŋki ande! Bi, bi ibà alɔŋki a Mɔsɛ.
JOH 9:29 Bi, bi ikyàyöb naa Nzam kàyääm a Mɔsɛ, wɛɛ mbuur wà, bi iyöb anki naa nde an'fà ken! »
JOH 9:30 Baal kafuur naa: « Le, ayi ndaa yubem: bɛ làyöb anki naa nde kan'fà ken, apan sye nde kàman'duub mii!
JOH 9:31 Bi ikyàyöb naa Nzam ufàwem anki baar a man'be. Wɛɛ isàkal naa mbuur afàkömà Nzam anà afàkyer ukwen ande, Nzam afàkyer un'wem.
JOH 9:32 Baar ŋàtàwem anki akà ikikye mutɛn naa mbuur mwɛy waa kàkɔɔr ikwàmii fà mböör ande.
JOH 9:33 Ilàkal naa mbuur awà kàfü anki akà Nzam, nde kàlàkwo anki mukyer akà undiir. »
JOH 9:34 Ba bun'fuur naa: « Ngye wanswà awà uboo a man'be fà mböör angye, waa ngye ilɔŋ! » Apan ba waa bun'tɔɔm u nsà.
JOH 9:35 Yɛsu kàwem naa ba nde bàkyer un'böŋ. Mpal kàbwey nde anà nde, nde kun'fuul naa: « Nkye ngye, ngye an'sà làkwikilà amu mwan a mbuur? » –
JOH 9:36 Nde kun'fuur naa: « Mwol, nde wà nà, waa mɛ in'sà làkwikilà amu nde? »
JOH 9:37 Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ngye amun'man, wa atɛɛnà awà apanà anà ngye, nde awà. »
JOH 9:38 Baal waa kàtɛn naa: « Mwol, mɛ, mɛ an'sà làkwikilà. » Apan, nde kàbü an'köm kusà a Yɛsu.
JOH 9:39 Waa Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Mɛ, mɛ kàyi u mɛɛn pà ntɔn ntsüül a nsaŋ mwɛy ikäl: ntɔn ikwàmii bàmɛn, baar bàfàman bàbulà ikwàmii. »
JOH 9:40 Amfarisi bàkäl tsütsü apà nde, bàwem ba indiir abi, waa bun'fuul naa: « Nkye bi sye, bi ibà ikwàmii? »
JOH 9:41 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Yàlàkal naa bɛ làbà ikwàmii, bɛ làlàkal anki baar a man'be. Wɛɛ ntɔn bɛ làtɛn naa: "Bi ifàman", abun, man'be abɛ mà kapaa. »
JOH 10:1 Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Ndandaa, ndandaa, mɛ alàkyään: isàkal naa mbuur ubilà anki u munàmbwo a làböl a in'kɔk, wɛɛ naa nde kan'lar udu a ibä a làböl, u ntsü yumwɛy, nde wà mbüüb anà un'dwää.
JOH 10:2 Wɛɛ mbuur afàbilà u munàmbwo, nde wun'kyɛɛŋ a in'kɔk.
JOH 10:3 Un'leer kun'duub munàmbwo, in'kɔk myàwem ndaa ande. Nde afàbel in'kɔk ande umwɛy umwɛy kà ikɔb awa, waa utwey mya u nsà.
JOH 10:4 Utaaŋ utwey nde mya myanswà, uyikyà nde kusà a mya, mya myun'lab ungö, ntɔn mya myàkyàyöb ndaa ande.
JOH 10:5 Ikwe anki akà ikikye naa mya myàsàlab ungyey, mya ikyer asun'tiin, ntɔn mya myàyöb anki ndaa a angyey. »
JOH 10:6 Yɛsu katɛɛl nsim ayi, wɛɛ ba bàyöb anki naa indiir nà nde kàtɛɛnà.
JOH 10:7 Yɛsu kàfàtɛn naa: « Ndandaa, ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, mɛ in'wà munàmbwo a làböl a in'kɔk.
JOH 10:8 Baar banswà bàfwel kusà a mɛ bà mbüüb anà adwää, wɛɛ in'kɔk myawem anki.
JOH 10:9 Mɛ, mɛ in'wà munàmbwo. Isàkal naa mbuur kan'bilà u mbwo amɛ, nde asàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈, nde akyer asàbilà, akyer asàtoo, nde asàman byàdyà.
JOH 10:10 Mbüüb afàyà nà muyib, mudwa anà mupay. Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ kàyi ntɔn baar bàwɛl mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà bàwɛl wa mbɔɔn.
JOH 10:11 Mɛ, mɛ in'wà un'kyɛɛŋ aŋàbwaŋ. Un'kyɛɛŋ aŋàbwaŋ afàpà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande ntɔn in'kɔk ande.
JOH 10:12 Mbuur afàsal ntɔn ngim mpɛl, nde kà wà un'kyɛɛŋ a ndandaa anki, in'kɔk kà myànde anki. Kya nde usàman kyɛŋbɔl làmuyà, nde la usàkɔɔb nde in'kɔk, waa uwurà ntiin. Apan, kyɛŋbɔl la làsàbürà la mya, waa làsàtà làböl upay.
JOH 10:13 Le, nde wà un'syääl a ngim, nde undiir ukyɛr anki ntɔn in'kɔk.
JOH 10:14 Mɛ, mɛ in'wà un'kyɛɛŋ aŋàbwaŋ. Mɛ in'kyàyöb in'kɔk amɛ, mya sye myàkyan'yöb,
JOH 10:15 Taaràmɛ akyan'yöb, mɛ sye in'kyun'yöb. Mɛ in'fàpà mɔ̈ɔ̈ amɛ ntɔn in'kɔk amɛ.
JOH 10:16 Mɛ, mɛ in'we anà in'kɔk myumwɛy mpa amyà uboo a làböl alà. Mya sye mɛ in'kyer atwaal. Mya isàwem ndaa amɛ, làböl làsàkal làmwɛy, un'kyɛɛŋ mwɛy sye.
JOH 10:17 Taa akyan'kwen, ntɔn mɛ in'fàpà mɔ̈ɔ̈ amɛ, ungö waa in'fàwal wa.
JOH 10:18 Akà mbuur mwɛy tɛy afan'duum mɔ̈ɔ̈, wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ wa in'fàpà a ukwen amɛ. Mɛ in'we anà ikɔ̈b apà wa, anà ikɔ̈b afàwal wa. Ayi nswɛɛŋ kan'pɛ Taaràmɛ. »
JOH 10:19 U ndaa ayi, nkaabà yàkyer abilà uboo a amfum a Ayudà.
JOH 10:20 Bàmbɔɔn uboo a ba bàtɛɛnà naa: « Nde we anà unsɔŋà! Nde wà ŋukɔŋ! Ntɔn nkye lun'weemà bɛ? »
JOH 10:21 Wɛɛ bumwɛy bàtɛɛnà naa: « Mbuur awe anà unsɔŋà ufàtɛn anki abà. Nkye unsɔŋà kan'kwo muduub mii a ikwàmii? »
JOH 10:22 La làkäl paŋà làfakalà mpye mbɔɔn, baar bàkäl mukyɔm mpööŋ a ndwà a Nzam u Yɛlusàlɛm.
JOH 10:23 Yɛsu kàkäl mulàlyaaŋ u ndwà a Nzam, u myäy bàfàbel naa myäy a Salɔmun.
JOH 10:24 Apan, Amfum a Ayudà bàkyer un'diŋà, waa bun'fuul naa: « Tii mpal nà asikaar ngye unsà pfürà? Ikyään ubwaŋàbwaŋ isàkal naa ngye awà Klistɔ. »
JOH 10:25 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Mɛ ya akyàlakyään itaan, wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ lan'si anki làkwikilà. Isal in'fàkyer mɛ kà ikɔb a Taaràmɛ, byàmutà imbäl ntɔn mɛ.
JOH 10:26 Wɛɛ bɛ lan'si anki làkwikilà, ntɔn bɛ kàlàbà in'kɔk amɛ anki.
JOH 10:27 In'kɔk amɛ myàfàwem ndaa amɛ. Mɛ in'kyayöb, mya sye myàkyer afan'lab.
JOH 10:28 Mɛ in'fapà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye, mya myàsàkyà anki bwà akà ikikye, akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki mugyɔɔr mya u kɔɔ amɛ.
JOH 10:29 Taaràmɛ, mbuur kan'pɛ mya, kan'söön baar banswà. Akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki mugyɔɔr mya u kɔɔ a Taa.
JOH 10:30 Taa anà mɛ, bi ibà mwɛy. »
JOH 10:31 Ayudà bàfàbürà in'kul ntɔn mukun'tà.
JOH 10:32 Apan, Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mɛ kàlamɛɛy isal a ntwɛn mbɔɔn byàfü akà Taa. Isal nà uboo a bya làkwen bɛ mukan'tà in'kul? »
JOH 10:33 Ayudà bun'fuur naa: « Kà ntɔn isal a ntwɛn anki waa bi katà in'kul, wɛɛ ntɔn mbɛɛy: ngye awà mbuur, wɛɛ ngye, ngye awàmukyey naa ngye awà Nzam! »
JOH 10:34 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Nkye bàsön anki uboo a un'kɔɔn abɛ naa: "Mɛ, mɛ kàtɛn naa bɛ làbà bànzam."?
JOH 10:35 Bi ikyàyöb naa ikwe anki bàlwom indiir abyà uboo a Ndaa Aŋàsɔn. Kyekà, Nzam kàbel nde baar naa bànzam, ntɔn ndaa ande bàtöm akà ba.
JOH 10:36 Bɛ, bɛ làtɛn a baal kàsi Nzam an'kɔɔ anà kàtöm nde u mɛɛn naa: "Ngye awàmubɛy!", ntɔn an'tɛn mɛ naa mɛ in'wà Mwan a Nzam!
JOH 10:37 Isàkal naa mɛ in'fàkyer anki isal a Taaràmɛ, twon làman'sà làkwikilà.
JOH 10:38 Wɛɛ isàkal naa mɛ in'fàkyer bya, itàkal naa bɛ lan'sà anki làkwikilà, làsi làkwikilà unsà isal abi. Ntɔn bɛ làyöb anà làkyey naa Taa wà amu mɛ, mɛ in'wà amu Taa. »
JOH 10:39 Apan, ba bàfàleŋ mukun'kɔr, wɛɛ nde kàkwiyà kà an'kɔɔ aba.
JOH 10:40 Yɛsu kàfàfurà sim a Yɔrdan lumwɛy, kà ikal kàfadümà Ywan utàtwɛb, waa kàbwaay kwo.
JOH 10:41 Baar mbɔɔn bàyee akà nde, waa bàtɛɛnà naa: « Ywan kàkyer anki akà idiim mwɛy, wɛɛ ndaa yanswà kàtɛn nde ntɔn mbuur awà yàkäl ndandaa. »
JOH 10:42 Abun, baar mbɔɔn bàsi làkwikilà amu nde.
JOH 11:1 Kàkäl anà ŋukyal mwɛy ikɔb ande Lazar, un'si Bɛtanya, bul a Màlatà anà mpääŋ ande Màlye.
JOH 11:2 - Wawà Màlye akwà kàtsüül Mwol may a usɔŋ anà kun'kɔɔm in'kɔl a ntswe ande. Baal ande Lazar kàkäl anà ukyal. -
JOH 11:3 Abun, ampääŋ abà bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l bàtöm mbuur mwɛy mukàkyään Yɛsu naa: « Mwol, mbuur akwà afàkwen ngye we anà ukyal. »
JOH 11:4 Umpal kàwem Yɛsu làsaŋ alà, nde kàtɛn naa: « Abà kà ukyal akun'syen kà ukwà anki, wɛɛ ba bà ntɔn mupà làkoo akà Nzam: u mbwo a ba, Mwan a Nzam ayàwal làkoo. »
JOH 11:5 Kyekà, Yɛsu kàfakwenà Màlatà, anà mpääŋ ande, anà Lazar.
JOH 11:6 Umpal kàwem nde naa Lazar we anà ukyal, nde kàfàkyer ilä byeel kà ikal kàkäl nde.
JOH 11:7 Ungö apan nde kàtɛn a alɔŋki naa: « Tsweenà ifurà Yuday. »
JOH 11:8 Alɔŋki bun'fuur naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, itaan a mbɔɔn tɛy, amfum a Ayudà bàleŋà mukatà in'kul, waa ngye akwen mufàfurà kwo? »
JOH 11:9 Yɛsu kàfuur naa: « Nkye an'taaŋ kwem aŋiyweel matɛy u mwäänà? Isàkal naa mbuur wàmuyikyà u mwäänà, nde uböl anki kyà, ntɔn lye anà pɛɛlà.
JOH 11:10 Wɛɛ isàkal naa mbuur wàmuyikyà u làpib, nde atɛbà kyà, ntɔn pɛɛlà latɛy. »
JOH 11:11 Ungö kàtɛn nde ndaa ayi, nde kàkwɛy naa: « Un'sam abi Lazar kàn'bɔ̈ɔ̈n, wɛɛ mɛ in'kyer akyà mukun'wiiy. »
JOH 11:12 Apan, alɔŋki bàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwol, isàkal naa nde wàŋàbɔ̈ɔ̈n, nde akyer ayàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈. »
JOH 11:13 Kutɛn aŋàbwaŋ, Yɛsu kàsam ukwà a Lazar, wɛɛ ba bàsii naa twaal a twaal.
JOH 11:14 Apan, Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba ubwaŋàbwaŋ naa: « Lazar kan'kwà.
JOH 11:15 Mɛ in'wà unsà un'sak ntɔn bɛ in'kɔ̈ɔ̈n akal mɛ kwo, ntɔn bɛ lan'si làkwikilà. Wɛɛ tsweenà akà nde. »
JOH 11:16 Apan, Tuma awà bàfàbel naa Didimɔ, kàtɛn a alɔŋki bumwɛy naa: « Tsweenà, kya ikäl naa ukwà, bi sye ikàkwà mbwo mwɛy anà nde! »
JOH 11:17 Mpal kàyàkɔlà Yɛsu, nde kàwem naa Lazar kàkyàkyer ilä inà kà an'dii.
JOH 11:18 Kyekà, Bɛtanya làkäl tsütsü a Yɛlusàlɛm, kà isii a an'kilɔmɛtre an'tär.
JOH 11:19 Ayudà bàyi mbɔɔn muyàlɛɛl Màlye anà Màlatà ntɔn nkweel a baal aba Lazar.
JOH 11:20 Umpal kàwem Màlatà naa Yɛsu wàmuyà, nde kàkàbwey anà nde, wɛɛ Màlye kàsàsal u ndwà wàŋàbwaay.
JOH 11:21 Màlatà kàtɛn a Yɛsu naa: « Mwol, ilàkal naa ngye akäl apà, baal amɛ kàlàkwà anki!
JOH 11:22 Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ in'kyàyöb, itàkal apanà, naa undiir wanswà ayàlɔm ngye akà Nzam, Nzam akyer ayapà. »
JOH 11:23 Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Baal angye akyer ayàwiyà. »
JOH 11:24 Màlatà kàfuur naa: « Mɛ in'kyàyöb naa nde asàkyer awiyà mbwo mwɛy a akü, kà ilä a ntsüü. »
JOH 11:25 Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mɛ, mɛ in'wà ngwiiyà anà mɔ̈ɔ̈. Mbuur wanswà an'sà làkwikilà amu mɛ asàkal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈, itàkal naa nde kan'kwà.
JOH 11:26 Mbuur wanswà awe anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà an'sà làkwikilà amu mɛ, nde usàkwà anki akà ikikye. Nkye ngye an'sà làkwikilà? » -
JOH 11:27 Nde kàfuur naa: « Inye, Mwol, mɛ an'sà làkwikilà naa ngye awà Klistɔ, Mwan a Nzam awasàyà pà u mɛɛn. »
JOH 11:28 Apan, Màlatà kàkàbel mpääŋ ande Màlye, waa kun'kyään unsinsi naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ kan'yà, nde sye wàmukabeelà. »
JOH 11:29 Pa kàwem Màlye abà, laa kàmbarà nde, kàkyen u ntiin akà Yɛsu.
JOH 11:30 Kyekà, Yɛsu kàkäl anki aŋàtàbilà uboo a bul, wɛɛ nde kàtàfàkal kà ikal kàkun'taan Màlatà.
JOH 11:31 Ayudà bàkäl anà Màlye u ndwà ntɔn mukun'lɛɛl, mpal bun'mɛn ba kan'barà anà kan'too u ntiin, laa bun'läb ba. Ntɔn ba bàsii naa nde wàmukyà an'dii mukàlel.
JOH 11:32 Umpal kàkɔlà Màlye kà ikal kàkäl Yɛsu, pa kun'mɛn nde, nde kàbü kà in'kɔl ande, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwol, ilàkal naa ngye akäl apà, baal amɛ kàlàkwà anki. »
JOH 11:33 Utaaŋ kàmɛn Yɛsu Màlatà anà Ayudà bàkäl anà nde bàmulel, mpem ande yàkyer atɛɛr, lingyoomà làkyer un'wal.
JOH 11:34 Nde waa kafuul naa: « Wa bɛ lun'tɔ̈ɔ̈l ken? » Ba bun'fuur naa: « Mwol, yamɛn. »
JOH 11:35 Yɛsu waa kàlel.
JOH 11:36 Abun, Ayudà bàtɛɛnà naa: « Làler naa nde kàfun'kwenà aben! »
JOH 11:37 Wɛɛ amwɛy uboo a ba bàtɛn naa: « Nde mbuur kàkɔɔr ikwàmii, nkye nde kàlàkyer anki sye naa Lazar ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akwà? »
JOH 11:38 Apan, Yɛsu kàfàtɛɛr u mpem ande, waa kàkyen an'dii, ma màkäl mɔɔ aŋàdübà a nkɔŋ.
JOH 11:39 Apan, Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Làlwom nkɔŋ yi. » Màlatà, mpääŋ a un'kü, kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwol, apanà nde ayàkal aŋàfuurà nsɔŋ, ntɔn ŋàbà ilä inà awà nde apà. »
JOH 11:40 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Nkye mɛ in'tɛn anki a ngye naa isàkal naa ngye awe anà làkwikilà, ngye ayàman làkoo a Nzam? »
JOH 11:41 Abun, ba waa bàlwom nkɔŋ. Apan, Yɛsu kàler u du, waa kàtɛn naa: « Taa, mɛ amafuur an'tɔɔn ntɔn aman'wem ngye.
JOH 11:42 Ndandaa, mɛ in'kyàyöb naa ngye afàkyer an'wem taaŋ lanswà. Wɛɛ an'tɛn mɛ abà, ntɔn baar bàman'diŋà bà bàyöb naa ngye kan'töm. »
JOH 11:43 Ungö mutɛn abà, nde kàbel u ndaa a ngwal naa: « Lazar, yatoo! »
JOH 11:44 Un'kü sye waa kàyàtoo, in'kɔl anà an'kɔɔ myàŋàlàlal a ikaam a ipfɛy anà ntabwey yàŋàfwe a ipfɛy. Yɛsu kàtɛn a baar naa: « Lun'tsuuŋ, lun'wɛy ukyen. »
JOH 11:45 Apan, bàmbɔɔn uboo a Ayudà bàyi akà Màlye anà bàmɛn indiir kàkyer Yɛsu, ba bun'si làkwikilà.
JOH 11:46 Wɛɛ bumwɛy bàkàman Amfarisi, waa bakyään indiir kàkyer Yɛsu.
JOH 11:47 Apan, amfum a angaŋ anà Amfarisi bàköŋà làbay a nsaŋ a kölàköl, waa bàtɛn naa: « Ininà bi kan'kwo mukyer? Ntɔn baal wà wàmukyer idiim mbɔɔn!
JOH 11:48 Isàkal naa bi kàmuwɛy musin akyer abà, baar banswà bàyun'sà làkwikilà. Apan, Bàlɔmà bàyàyà mupay ndwà a Nzam abi anà nsi abi! »
JOH 11:49 Umwɛy uboo aba, ikɔb ande Kayifa, kàkäl undweer a angaŋ u mbul awun, nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Bɛ, bɛ akà undiir mwɛy làkayöbà anki!
JOH 11:50 Nkye bɛ làmanà anki naa yubwaŋ naa mbuur mwɛy ukü ntɔn un'sɛŋ, waa nsi yanswà mpa ikyà bwà? »
JOH 11:51 Kyekà, nde kàtɛɛnà anki abà unsà ukwen ande ŋakwo, wɛɛ ntɔn kàkäl nde undweer a ngaŋ u mbul awun, nde kàtɛɛ ngɔɔm naa Yɛsu akyer asàkwà ntɔn un'sɛŋ ande,
JOH 11:52 kànà ntɔn un'sɛŋ mpɛl anki, wɛɛ sye ntɔn mutüüb baan a Nzam abà bàtɛ upay.
JOH 11:53 Fà ilä akin, amfum a Ayudà bàtsül mbar naa bàdwa Yɛsu.
JOH 11:54 Undiir awun, Yɛsu mpa kàfàfilyaaŋà nde kà imɛɛy u mii a amfum a Ayudà: nde kàkyen u mpey, kà itiir a nsi mwɛy tsütsü a nsye a ipɔl, u bul mwɛy ikɔb a la Ɛfalayimi, waa kàbwaay kwo anà alɔŋki ande.
JOH 11:55 Un'kyɔm a Pak a Ayudà kàkäl tsütsü. Baar mbɔɔn bàfwee kà itiir a nsi aki bàbeenà Yɛlusàlɛm kusà a un'kyɔm mukwo, ntɔn mukàpöŋ ndür.
JOH 11:56 Ba bàkäl muleŋà Yɛsu, wɛɛ umpal bàkäl ba u Ndwà a Nzam, ba bàtɛɛnà ba a ba naa: « Bɛ làsii aben? Nkye nde uyà anki un'kyɔm? »
JOH 11:57 Kyekà, andweer a angaŋ anà Amfarisi bàpɛ nswɛɛŋ naa: isàkal naa mbuur kan'yöb ikal awà nde, nde kakyään ntɔn ba bun'kör.
JOH 12:1 Ilä isyaam kusà a Pak mukwo, Yɛsu kàkyen Bɛtanya, kà ikal kàfakalà Lazar akwà kàwiiy nde uboo a akü.
JOH 12:2 Akun, Màlatà kun'pɛ isaa bun'lääm ba. Lazar kàkäl umwɛy uboo a baar bàkäl mbwo mwɛy anà Yɛsu mudyà u mɛsà.
JOH 12:3 Màlye kàwɛl boboo a litre mwɛy là may a usɔŋ màndandaa, màntal a mbɔɔn, nde kàsir ma kà in'kɔl a Yɛsu. Ungö waa kàkɔɔmà ma a ntswe ande. Apan, ndwà yanswà yàtiimà a usɔŋ a may.
JOH 12:4 Ungö apan, Yudasi Isikalyɔt - umwɛy uboo a alɔŋki ande, nde mbuur awayun'yälà, - kàtɛn naa:
JOH 12:5 « Ntɔn nkye mpa bàyälà ba may a usɔŋ amà unsà nkam tär yà itɛr a ngim, waa bàlàpà ya akà aŋàlàmbwà? »
JOH 12:6 Kàtɛɛnà nde abà, kà ntɔn nde kàkäl anà ngyɛb a aŋàlàmbwà anki, wɛɛ ntɔn nde kàkäl mbüüb: nde kàfakaarà bɔ̈ɔ̈n a ngim, waa kàfalwabà ngim bàsyee uboo mwo.
JOH 12:7 Apan, Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Un'si a duu! Kan'kyer nde abà, nde kan'tsweel kusà ntɔn ilä bàsan'dye.
JOH 12:8 Bɛ làwe anà aŋàlàmbwà ilä byanswà, wɛɛ mɛ, bɛ làbye anki anà mɛ ilä byanswà. »
JOH 12:9 Apan, un'sɛŋ a Ayudà mbɔɔn kàwem wa naa Yɛsu kàkäl u Bɛtanya, wa kàkyeenà kwo, kà nà ntɔn Yɛsu mpɛl anki, wɛɛ sye ntɔn mukàman Lazar akwà kàwiiy nde uboo a akü.
JOH 12:10 Apan, andweer a angaŋ bàdirà mudwa Lazar sye,
JOH 12:11 ntɔn Ayudà mbɔɔn bàtiinà Ikööŋ aba, waa bàsyee làkwikilà akà Yɛsu isin nà Lazar.
JOH 12:12 U taaŋtye, iköŋ a baar mbɔɔn akwà bàyi un'kyɔm a Pak, kyàwem naa Yɛsu wàmuyàbeenà Yɛlusàlɛm.
JOH 12:13 Ba bàwɛl an'laaŋ a an'bà, bàkyen mukàbwey anà nde, bàmuyisà in'kwɛŋ naa: « Ɔsana! Wɛy ukäl aŋàsaak mbuur awà ayà kà ikɔb a Mwol, Mfum a Isàlɛl. »
JOH 12:14 Yɛsu kàmɛn mwan a anɛ, waa kàbwaay udu a wa, asànaa ikyäänà Ndaa Aŋàsɔn naa:
JOH 12:15 « Bul a Siyɔn, twon an'man bɔɔmà! Le, Mfum angye wàmuyà, akyàbwaay udu a mwan a anɛ. »
JOH 12:16 U nsɛmà, alɔŋki ande bàkayöbà anki indiir abi. Wɛɛ umpal kàwɛl Yɛsu làkoo, apan ba bàyɔbà naa indiir abi bàsön ntɔn nde anà ba bya sye bàkyer ntɔn nde.
JOH 12:17 Baar banswà bàkäl anà Yɛsu mpal kàbel nde Lazar muyàtoo kà an'dii anà kun'wiiy nde uboo a akü, bun'tɛɛlà imbäl.
JOH 12:18 Kyakin, iköŋ a baar kyàkàbwey kya anà nde, ntɔn kya kyàwem naa nde kàkyer impà akin.
JOH 12:19 Apan, Amfarisi bàtɛn ba a ba naa: « Bɛ lan'man naa bɛ akà undiir làyàwal anki: le, baar banswà bàmun'lab! »
JOH 12:20 Yàmɛnà naa uboo a baar bàbeenà Yɛlusàlɛm mukömà umpal a un'kyɔm, bàkäl anà Angɛlɛki amwɛy.
JOH 12:21 Ba bàsin apà Filipo, un'nsi Bɛtesayidà a Ngalilɛ, waa bun'lɔ̈ɔ̈m naa: « Un'lɔɔŋ, bi ikwen muman Yɛsu. »
JOH 12:22 Filipo kàkàsam Andrɛ, ungö, ba bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l waa bàkàsam Yɛsu.
JOH 12:23 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Mpalabà taaŋ lan'kwo alà uwal Mwan a mbuur làkoo.
JOH 12:24 Ndandaa, ndandaa, mɛ alàkyään, isàkal naa imbɛŋ a blɛ kyan'bwà u mɛɛn ikü anki, kya ikal kya mpɛl aŋàyen. Wɛɛ, isàkal naa kya kyan'kwà, kya ibɔr mbɛŋ mbɔɔn.
JOH 12:25 Mbuur akwen mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande aŋàsɔ̈ɔ̈n Nzam, wa akyà bwà, wɛɛ mbuur asàkɔɔb mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande u mɛɛn pà, nde asàkaar wa mbul a in'tye.
JOH 12:26 Isàkal naa mbuur kan'kwen mukan'syääl, wɛy nde kan'läb. Ikal in'wà mɛ, un'syääl amɛ asàkal kwo sye. Isàkal naa mbuur kàman'syääl, Taa asun'pà làkoo.
JOH 12:27 « Papanà mpem amɛ yan'too! Waa ininà mɛ in'tɛn? Taa, ntsü mɔ̈ɔ̈ utaaŋ alà? Wɛɛ kiin amɛ, mɛ kàyi ntɔn taaŋ a mpay a tub alà!
JOH 12:28 Taa, pà ikɔb angye làkoo! » Apan, ndaa yàfü du, yàtɛn naa: « Mɛ kàkyàpà kya làkoo, mɛ in'kyer ayàfàpà kya làkoo. »
JOH 12:29 Iköŋ a baar kyàkäl pa anà kyàwem ndaa, kyàtɛɛnà naa: « Ipar kyan'bwà! » Bumwɛy naa: « Un'kyeey mwɛy kàmusam! »
JOH 12:30 Yɛsu kakyään naa: « Ndaa ayi kà ban'tɛn a mɛ anki, wɛɛ ban'tɛn a bɛ.
JOH 12:31 Papanà là taaŋ mutsul nsaŋ a mɛɛn mà, papanà mfum a mɛɛn mà bàyun'tɔɔm u nsà.
JOH 12:32 Wɛɛ akà mɛ, mpal bàsan'sɛɛn u mɛɛn pà, mɛ in'sànaan baar banswà akà mɛ. »
JOH 12:33 Kàtɛɛnà nde abà, nde kàswɛŋà naa nkweel ande isàkal aben.
JOH 12:34 Iköŋ a baar kyun'fuur naa: « Bi, bi kàlɔŋàkà unsà Un'kɔɔn naa Klistɔ asàkal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ipepey. Aben ngye an'kwo mutɛn naa Mwan a mbuur bàkyer asun'sɛɛn? Nà Mwan a mbuur awà? »
JOH 12:35 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Pɛɛlà làfàkal anki anà taaŋ mbɔɔn uboo a bɛ. Làlyaaŋ umpal làbà bɛ anà pɛɛlà, ntɔn mpib ikɔ̈ɔ̈n alabweel. Ntɔn mbuur afilyaaŋ u mpib, nde uyöb anki naa nde akyà ken.
JOH 12:36 Kyakin, mpal làbà bɛ anà pɛɛlà, làsi làkwikilà amu pɛɛlà, ntɔn bɛ làbulà baan a pɛɛlà. » Ungö kàsam nde ba abà, Yɛsu kàlwomà paa, waa kàkàyee ukwɛl apà ba.
JOH 12:37 Itàkal naa nde kàkyerà idiim mbɔɔn u mii a ba, ba bàsun'sà anki làkwikilà.
JOH 12:38 Abun yàkwe ndaa kàtɛn ŋangɔɔm Yɛsay: « Mwol, nà kàsi làkwikilà akà an'lɔɔŋ abi? Mwol ngwal ande kàswɛŋ akà nà? »
JOH 12:39 Yɛsay awà kàswɛŋ sye isin a ndaa mpa bàkwe ba musà làkwikilà:
JOH 12:40 « Nzam kàdwä mii aba, nde kàbuul mpem aba bwoor, ntɔn mii aba ikɔ̈ɔ̈n atääl, naa mpem aba ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ayöb, ntɔn ba bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n asàfyefurà akà mɛ ntɔn mɛ akɔɔr. »
JOH 12:41 Yɛsay kàtɛn nde indiir abi, ntɔn kàmɛn nde làkoo a Yɛsu, waa kàsam ntɔn nde.
JOH 12:42 Apanà sye, bàmbɔɔn uboo a amfum a Ayudà ŋakwo bàsi làkwikilà amu nde. Wɛɛ, ntɔn Amfarisi, ba bàkyey anki u mii a baar manà bàyatwey u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà.
JOH 12:43 Ntɔn ba bàkwen làkoo lan'fà akà baar, akwànaa lan'fà akà Nzam.
JOH 12:44 Yɛsu kàsi un'kwɛŋ: « Mbuur asà làkwikilà amu mɛ, kà amu mɛ mpɛl anki nde kan'sà làkwikilà, wɛɛ amu mbuur kan'töm sye.
JOH 12:45 Mbuur aman'man, nde kan'man sye mbuur kan'töm.
JOH 12:46 Mɛ pɛɛlà, mɛ kàyi u mɛɛn, ntɔn mbuur wanswà asà làkwikilà amu mɛ, ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akal uboo a mpib.
JOH 12:47 Isàkal naa mbuur kan'wem ndaa amɛ, wɛ nde ya ufàsyääl anki, kà mɛ anki in'sàtsul nsaŋ ande, ntɔn mɛ kàyi anki mutsul nsaŋ a mɛɛn, wɛɛ ntɔn mukun'tswà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
JOH 12:48 Mbuur atɔn mɛ anà akɔ̈ɔ̈n akyey ndaa amɛ, nde we anà un'tsüül a nsaŋ ande: an'lɔɔŋ kàpɛɛ mɛ isun'tsüül mbar kà ilä a ntsüü.
JOH 12:49 Ntɔn mɛ kàtɛn anki unsà ukwen amɛ ŋakwo, wɛɛ Taa, mbuur kan'töm, kan'swɛŋ nde ŋakwo naa ininà mɛ in'tɛn, ininà mɛ in'kyään.
JOH 12:50 Waa mɛ in'kyàyöb naa nswɛɛŋ ande ifàpà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye. Kyakin indiir an'tɛn mɛ, mɛ bya an'tɛn asànaa kan'swɛŋ Taa. »
JOH 13:1 Yàmɛnà naa kusà a un'kyɔm a Pak, Yɛsu kàkyer ayöb naa taaŋ ande lan'kwo, taaŋ ntɔn mulwomà u mɛɛn pà anà mukyà akà Taa. Nde kàkwen bànde abà u mɛɛn pà, nde kakwen aŋàsöönà.
JOH 13:2 Kyekà, umpal bàkäl ba mudyà làsisye, ileŋ kàkyàbiil itaan an'kyän u mpem a Yudasi, mwan a Simɔn Isikalyɔt, ntɔn mukun'yälà.
JOH 13:3 Yɛsu kàyöbà naa indiir byanswà Taa kàpɛ kà an'kɔɔ ande, naa nde kàtoo amu Nzam, nde wàmufurà akà Nzam.
JOH 13:4 Yɛsu kàmbarà u mɛsà, kàlwom ipfey adu ande, waa kàwɛl làpye, kàbäm la u lɔŋ.
JOH 13:5 Ungö, nde kàsi an'dà u làlɔŋà, waa kàsɛmà muywɛy in'kɔl a alɔŋki ande, waa kàkɔɔmà mya a làpye kàbäm nde u lɔŋ.
JOH 13:6 Apan, kan'yàtol nde akà Simɔn Petɔlà, nde waa utɛn a nde naa: « Mwol, ngye, an'ywɛy in'kɔl! »
JOH 13:7 Yɛsu waa kun'fuur naa: « Undiir in'kyer mɛ wà, ngye wa ayöb anki apanà, wɛɛ ngye wa asàyöb ungö. »
JOH 13:8 Petɔlà kàtɛn a nde naa: « Aay, ngye mɛ in'kɔl an'ywɛy anki akà ikikye! » Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Isàkal naa mɛ mya aywɛy anki, ngye un'tüüb anà mɛ watɛy. »
JOH 13:9 Simɔn Petɔlà kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwol, isàkal abwɛy, twon aman'ywɛy nà in'kɔl mpɛl, wɛɛ anà an'kɔɔ anà un'tswe sye! »
JOH 13:10 Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mbuur aŋàywab, nde mfun afàywab yatɛy, ntɔn ndür ande yanswà yàŋàpɔŋà. Bɛ, bɛ làbà aŋàpɔŋà, wɛɛ kà bɛ banswà anki. »
JOH 13:11 Nde kàkyer ayöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ naa nà kàlun'yälà, undiir awun kàtɛn nde naa: « Kà bɛ banswà anki làbà aŋàpɔŋà. »
JOH 13:12 Ungö kaywɛy nde in'kɔl, Yɛsu kàfàbwaar ipfɛy adu ande, nde kàfurà u mɛsà, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Nkye bɛ lan'yöb undiir amàlakyer mɛ?
JOH 13:13 Bɛ, bɛ làfan'bel "Un'lɔɔŋ" anà "Mwol", bɛ làbye anà iböŋ, ntɔn mɛ in'wà nde.
JOH 13:14 Abun, isàkal naa mɛ Mwol anà Un'lɔɔŋ, mɛ amàlaywɛy in'kɔl, wɛy bɛ, bɛ sye làywɛy in'kɔl bɛ a bɛ.
JOH 13:15 Mɛ amàlapà mbaan, ntɔn bɛ sye làkyer asànaa amàlakyer mɛ là.
JOH 13:16 Ndandaa, ndandaa, mɛ alàkyään: un'syääl ukwe anki ulyaaŋ nkum ande, itàkal naa ntööm ulyaaŋ mbuur kun'töm.
JOH 13:17 Isàkal naa bɛ lan'yöb indiir abi, bɛ làbà aŋun'sak isàkal naa bɛ lan'syääl bya.
JOH 13:18 Mɛ, mɛ in'tɛn anki ntɔn bɛ banswà, ntɔn mɛ in'kyàyöb baar kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l mɛ. Wɛɛ, wɛy Ndaa Aŋàsɔn ikwe: "Mbuur kàdyee làmpà anà mɛ, kàman'diŋà làkɔl mbaar."
JOH 13:19 Apanà, mɛ amàlakyään kusà a ndaa ayi muyà, ntɔn, umpal iyàyà ya, waa bɛ làyàsà làkwikilà naa "Mɛ In'wà".
JOH 13:20 Ndandaa, ndandaa mɛ alàsam: mbuur wanswà awal mbuur an'tɔm mɛ, nde kàman'wal sye. Mbuur kàman'wal, nde kan'wal sye mbuur kan'töm. »
JOH 13:21 Ungö mutɛn indiir abi, mpem a Yɛsu kàkyer ayɔɔ, waa kàtɛ imbäl ki: « Ndandaa, ndandaa mɛ alàkyään, umwɛy uboo abɛ akyer ayan'yälà. »
JOH 13:22 Apan, alɔŋki bàleerà ba a ba u mii, ukɔɔn ayöb naa nde atɛɛnà ntɔn nà.
JOH 13:23 Umwɛy uboo a alɔŋki, awà kàfakweenà Yɛsu, kàkäl ukɔl a nde.
JOH 13:24 Apan, Simɔn Petɔlà kun'bɛl imbweer: « Un'fuul, nde atɛɛnà ntɔn nà. »
JOH 13:25 Ungö, un'lɔŋki awà kàkàyiir kà itɔl a Yɛsu, waa kun'fuul naa: « Mwol, nà wa? »
JOH 13:26 Yɛsu kàfuur naa: « Mbuur awà in'yàpà mɛ itiir a làmpà in'yàdümà mɛ. » Apan sye, Yɛsu kàwɛl itiir a làmpà, kàdümà kya, waa kàpɛ kya akà Yudasi, mwan a Simɔn Isikalyɔt.
JOH 13:27 Pa kàyä Yudasi itiir a mampà kya, Satanà laa kun'bilà nde. Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Yudasi, undiir awà ngye awà mukyer, kyer wa agyägyä! »
JOH 13:28 Baar bàkäl u mɛsà bàyöb anki, akà mbuur mwɛy, naa ntɔn nkye Yɛsu kun'kyään nde abwɛy.
JOH 13:29 Bàmbɔɔn bàsii naa ntɔn bɔ̈ɔ̈n a ngim làkälà a Yudasi, undiir awun Yɛsu kun'swɛŋ nde naa nde ukyen mukàsom indiir byàkäl mfun ntɔn un'kyɔm, itàkal naa mupà an'kab akà aŋàlàmbwà.
JOH 13:30 Pa kàwɛl Yudasi itiir a làmpà, nde kàtoo agyägyä. Làpib làkäl aŋàbwà.
JOH 13:31 Apan, ungö a ntoo a Yudasi, Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Apanà, làkoo a Mwan a mbuur lan'mɛnà, làkoo a Nzam sye lan'mɛnà amu nde.
JOH 13:32 [ Isàkal naa làkoo a Nzam lan'mɛnà amu nde, ] itaan a mbɔɔn tɛy, Nzam sye asàmɛɛy làkoo a Mwan amu nde ŋakwo.
JOH 13:33 Baan amɛ, mɛ in'fàsaal anki anà taaŋ mbɔɔn mukal anà bɛ. Bɛ, bɛ làkyer asan'leŋ, asànaa kàtɛn mɛ a amfum a Ayudà: "bɛ, bɛ làkwo anki muyà u mper ayà in'kyà mɛ", mɛ in'tɛn a bɛ sye apanà.
JOH 13:34 Mɛ amàlapà nswɛɛŋ akün: làkäl anà ukwen bɛ a bɛ. Asànaa kàlakwen mɛ, wɛy bɛ sye làkäl anà ukwen bɛ a bɛ.
JOH 13:35 Isàkal naa bɛ lan'kwen bɛ a bɛ, apan, baar banswà bàsàyöb naa bɛ làbà alɔŋki amɛ. »
JOH 13:36 Simɔn Petɔlà kàfuul Yɛsu naa: « Mwol, ngye ken akyà? » Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Apanà, ngye akwo anki muyà mper in'kyà mɛ, wɛɛ ngye asan'lab ungöngö. »
JOH 13:37 Petɔlà naa: « Mwol, ntɔn nkye mpa in'kwo mɛ muyalab apanà? Mɛ, mɛ an'kyey mupà mɔ̈ɔ̈ amɛ ntɔn ngye! »
JOH 13:38 Yɛsu naa: « Akɔɔb mɔ̈ɔ̈ angye ntɔn mɛ! Ndandaa, ndandaa, mɛ akyään, nkɔɔ mwɛy uyàtàkal aŋàbel anki, ayan'tɔn ngye mbalà tär. »
JOH 14:1 Yɛsu kan'tɛn naa: « Wɛy mpem abɛ ikɔ̈ɔ̈n akyɛɛr. Làsi làkwikilà amu Nzam, làsi làkwinkilà sye amu mɛ.
JOH 14:2 U ndwà a Taaràmɛ ikal byà mbɔɔn. Kya ilàkɔɔn akal abwɛy, mɛ in'làlakyään anki: Mɛ amàkàlalɔ̈ɔ̈n ikal.
JOH 14:3 Umpal in'sàkyà mɛ mukàlalɔ̈ɔ̈n ikal, mɛ insàfyefurà muyàlawal, ntɔn ikal in'wà mɛ, bɛ sye làkäl paa.
JOH 14:4 Mɛ, ntsü in'kyà mɛ, bɛ làkyàyöb mbwo. »
JOH 14:5 Tuma kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwol, bi iyöb anki mper akyà ngye. Bi ban'kwo muyöb aben mbwo a ya? »
JOH 14:6 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Mɛ, mɛ in'wà mbwo, ndandaa anà mɔ̈ɔ̈. Mbuur ukwo anki mukyà akà Taa ukɔɔn alyaaŋ u mbwo amɛ.
JOH 14:7 Ilàkal naa bɛ lan'yöb, bɛ làlàyöb sye Taaràmɛ. Fà apanà, bɛ làmun'yöb, bɛ làmun'man. »
JOH 14:8 Filipo kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwol, iswɛŋ Taa, waa ya ikwo akà bi. »
JOH 14:9 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Filipo, mɛ an'kal anà bɛ taaŋ mbɔɔn, wɛɛ ngye ŋàtan'yöb anki? Mbuur kàman'man, kan'man Taa. Ntɔn nkye an'tɛn ngye naa: "Iswɛŋ Taa"?
JOH 14:10 Làsi làkwikilà naa mɛ in'wà amu Taa, naa nde wà amu mɛ. Ndaa in'fàtɛn mɛ a bɛ banswà, kà mɛ ŋakwo in'fàbɔn anki, Taa awà amu mɛ afàkyer isal ande ŋakwo.
JOH 14:11 Làsi làkwikilà naa mɛ in'wà amu Taa, naa Taa wà amu mɛ. Naa tɛy, làsi làkwikilà ntɔn isal abi.
JOH 14:12 Ndandaa, ndandaa, mɛ alàkyään: mbuur awe anà làkwikilà amu mɛ, nde sye, nde asàkyer isal in'fàkyer mɛ. Nde asàkyer byàŋàsöön, ntɔn mɛ in'wàmukyà akà Taa.
JOH 14:13 Undiir wanswà làsàlɔm bɛ kà ikɔb amɛ, mɛ in'kyer asàkyer wa, ntɔn Taa uwɛl làkoo amu Mwan.
JOH 14:14 Isàkal naa bɛ lan'lɔm undiir mwɛy kà ikɔb amɛ, mɛ, mɛ in'kyer asàkyer wa.
JOH 14:15 « Isàkal naa bɛ làman'kwen, bɛ làsàsyääl nswɛɛŋ amɛ.
JOH 14:16 Waa mɛ, mɛ in'sàbɔɔn Taa, waa nde usàlatööm un'lɛɛl asin ntɔn nde ukäl anà bɛ ilä byanswà:
JOH 14:17 Dweelà a ndandaa mpa ban'kwo baar a mɛɛn muwal, ntɔn ba bun'manà anki, ba bun'yöb anki. Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làkyun'yöb, ntɔn nde wà apà bɛ, anà nde asakalà amu bɛ mbul a in'tye.
JOH 14:18 Mɛ in'sàlawɛy anki asànaa itii, mɛ in'kyer asàfyefurà akà bɛ.
JOH 14:19 Yan'saal ikikye, baar a mɛɛn bàsan'man anki, wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làkyer asan'man ntɔn mɛ in'wà wàmɔ̈ɔ̈ anà bɛ, bɛ làsàkal bàmɔ̈ɔ̈ sye.
JOH 14:20 Kà ilä akin, bɛ làsàyöb naa mɛ in'wà amu Taaràmɛ, naa bɛ làbà amu mɛ anà mɛ in'wà amu bɛ.
JOH 14:21 « Mbuur awe anà nswɛɛŋ amɛ anà afàsyääl ya, wawun mbuur afan'kwen. Kyeka mbuur afan'kwen, Taa asàkyer un'kwen, mɛ sye in'kyer asun'kwen, waa mɛ ŋakwo in'sàmɛnà akà nde. »
JOH 14:22 Yudasi - kà Yudas mwan a Isikalyɔt anki - kun'fuul naa: « Mwol, ya yà aben naa ngye akyer asyemɛɛy akà bi, wɛɛ kà akà baar a mɛɛn mà anki? »
JOH 14:23 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Isàkal naa mbuur mwɛy kàman'kwen, nde asàkaar ndaa amɛ, Taaràmɛ akyer asun'kwen. Bi isàyà akà nde, waa isàbwaay amu nde.
JOH 14:24 Mbuur mpa kan'kwen, ufàkyey anki ndaa amɛ. Ndaa lan'wem bɛ yi, kàyan'fà akà mɛ anki, wɛɛ yà Taa mbuur kan'töm.
JOH 14:25 Indiir abi, mɛ bya amàlakyään utaaŋ in'wà mɛ anà bɛ.
JOH 14:26 Dweelà In'kyɛɛl, un'lɛɛl, usàtɔm Taa kà ikɔb amɛ, nde asàlalɔŋ indiir byanswà, waa usàlayɔɔb ndaa yanswà kàtɛn mɛ a bɛ.
JOH 14:27 « Mɛ amàsàlawɛy duu, mɛ amàlapà duu amɛ. Mɛ la alapà anki asànaa bàfàpà baar a mɛɛn. Wɛy mpem a bɛ ikɔ̈ɔ̈n akyɛɛr, ikɔ̈ɔ̈n atɛɛr.
JOH 14:28 Bɛ làkyàwem, mɛ kàtɛn a bɛ naa: "Mɛ an'kyà anà mɛ in'kyer asàfyefurà akà bɛ". Yàlàkal naa bɛ làfàkyer an'kwen, bɛ làlàkal unsà un'sak ntɔn in'kyà mɛ akà Taa, ntɔn Taa kàman'söön.
JOH 14:29 Mɛ amàlawey indiir abi apanà, kusà a bya muyà, ntɔn umpal isàyà bya, waa bɛ làsàsà làkwikilà.
JOH 14:30 Mɛ in'sàfàyääm anki mbɔɔn anà bɛ, ntɔn mfum a mɛɛn mà wàmuyà. Itàkal abun, nde ikɔ̈b mwɛy kyatɛy udu a mɛ,
JOH 14:31 wɛɛ, ntɔn naa mɛɛn màyöb naa mɛ in'kwen Taa, anà mɛ in'fàkyer nswɛɛŋ kan'pɛ Taa. Làmbarà, tsweenà!
JOH 15:1 « Mɛ, mɛ in'wà un'te a vin a ndandaa, Taaràmɛ wà ŋawa.
JOH 15:2 Nde afàtsul kɔkà lanswà alà amu mɛ anà mpa làfàtwà, wɛɛ nde afàsaal la akwà làfàtwà, ntɔn la làbör mbɛŋ asin mbɔɔn.
JOH 15:3 Bɛ, bɛ làbà aŋàpɔŋà itaan ntɔn ndaa kàlakyään mɛ.
JOH 15:4 Làkäl amu mɛ, asànaa in'wà mɛ amu bɛ. Akà kɔkà làmwɛy làkwe anki mubɔr mbɛŋ la ŋakwo isàkal naa la kà là aŋànääm anki a mbiim a un'te, itàkal bɛ sye, bɛ làkwo anki mubɔr mbɛŋ, isàkal naa bɛ, bɛ làbà anki amu mɛ.
JOH 15:5 Mɛ, mɛ in'wà mbiim a un'te a vin, bɛ, bɛ làbà an'kɔkà. Mbuur awà amu mɛ, anà mɛ amu nde, nde afàbɔr mbɛŋ mbɔɔn. Ntɔn bɛ, bɛ làkwe anki mukyer akà undiir mwɛy ukɔɔn mɛ.
JOH 15:6 Mbuur mpa awà amu mɛ, nde wàŋàpiy u nsà, asànaa kɔkà, laa uyɔm nde. An'kɔkà aŋàyɔm bàkyer afàköŋà, bàtɔɔm u mbaa, waa ma ikuŋà.
JOH 15:7 Isàkal naa bɛ, bɛ làbà amu mɛ, ndaa amɛ sye yà amu bɛ, bɛ làsàlɔm undiir wanswà làsàkwen bɛ, bɛ làsàwal wa.
JOH 15:8 Ndaa ifàpà Taaràmɛ làkoo yà naa bɛ làbɔ̈r mbɛŋ mbɔɔn, waa bɛ làsàkal alɔŋki amɛ.
JOH 15:9 Abun, asànaa kan'kwen Taa, mɛ sye amàlakwen. Làkäl uboo a ukwen amɛ.
JOH 15:10 Isàkal naa bɛ làfàsyääl nswɛɛŋ amɛ, bɛ làbà uboo a ukwen amɛ, asànaa kàkwey mɛ nswɛɛŋ a Taaràmɛ, mɛ in'wà uboo a ukwen ande. »
JOH 15:11 « An'tɛn mɛ a bɛ abà, ntɔn un'sak amɛ ukäl uboo abɛ, anà wa sye ukäl wàŋàkwo.
JOH 15:12 Le nswɛɛŋ amɛ ayi: làkwen bɛ a bɛ asànaa in'fàlakwen mɛ.
JOH 15:13 Kà we anà mbuur mwɛy anki awe anà ukwen a kölàköl isàkɔɔn akal asànaa mukɔɔb mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande ntɔn asam ande.
JOH 15:14 Bɛ làbasam amɛ isàkal naa bɛ làfàkyer indiir in'fàlàswaŋ mɛ.
JOH 15:15 Mɛ alàbel anki asyääl, ntɔn un'syääl uyöb anki ayufàkyer nkum ande. Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ alabel asam, ntɔn ndaa yanswà kàwem mɛ akà Taaràmɛ, mɛ ya akyàlaswaŋ.
JOH 15:16 Kà bɛ anki lan'sɔ̈ɔ̈l, mɛ kàlasɔ̈ɔ̈l, mɛ kàlasi ntɔn bɛ làkyen, làbör mbɛŋ, waa mbɛŋ abɛ ilam. Abun, undiir wanswà làsàlɔm bɛ akà Taa kikɔb amɛ, nde akyer asàlapà wa.
JOH 15:17 Undiir alàswaŋ mɛ awà: làkwen bɛ a bɛ. »
JOH 15:18 « Isàkal naa mɛɛn mà màmàlayiiŋ, làyöb naa mɛ in'wà mbuur atàtwɛb kàyiiŋ ma.
JOH 15:19 Ilàkal naa bɛ làkäl baar a mɛɛn, mɛɛn ikyer alàlakwen ntɔn bɛ làbà baar ama. Wɛɛ bɛ kà làbà baar ande anki: ntɔn kàlasi mɛ ukɔl, undiir awun mɛɛn màlayiiŋ ma.
JOH 15:20 Làyɔbà ndaa kàlakyään mɛ: "Un'lɔŋki ukwe anki ulyaŋ un'lɔɔŋ ande." Isàkal naa ba mɛ ban'mɛɛy nkwaaŋ, ba bɛ sye bàsàlamɛɛy nkwaaŋ. Isàkal naa ba bàkäär ndaa amɛ, ba bàsàkaar sye yàbɛ.
JOH 15:21 Wɛɛ indiir abi byanswà ba bàsàlakyer ntɔn ikɔb amɛ, ntɔn ba bàyöb anki mbuur kan'töm.
JOH 15:22 Ilàkal naa mɛ in'kɔ̈ɔ̈n ayà anà in'kɔ̈ɔ̈n akakyään, ba bàlàkal anki anà man'be. Wɛɛ apanà, ba undiir afàkur watɛy ntɔn man'be aba.
JOH 15:23 Mbuur kàman'yiiŋ, nde kan'yiiŋ sye Taaràmɛ.
JOH 15:24 Ilàkal naa mɛ in'kɔ̈ɔ̈n akàkyer isal abi uboboo a ba, isal mpa kàkwe mbuur asin mukyer, ba bàlàkal anki anà man'be. Apanà ba bàkyàman bya, wɛɛ ba bàmufiyiiŋ, mɛ anà Taaràmɛ.
JOH 15:25 Wɛɛ ya yà ntɔn ndaa bàsön uboo un'kɔɔn aba ikwe: "Ba ban'yiiŋ abunàbun." »
JOH 15:26 « Mpal usàyà un'lɛɛl in'sàlatööm mɛ kà ikɔb a Taa, Dweelà a ndandaa lan'fà akà Taa, nde asan'tɛɛl imbäl.
JOH 15:27 Anà bɛ sye, bɛ làsan'tɛɛl imbäl, ntɔn bɛ làbà anà mɛ fà nsɛmà. »
JOH 16:1 « Kàlakyään mɛ indiir abi, ntɔn bɛ làkɔ̈ɔ̈n abwiy làkwikilà abɛ.
JOH 16:2 Bàkyer asàlaböŋ u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà. Yumwɛy ayi: taaŋ làmuyà, mbuur asàladwa asàsi naa nde wàmupà ibɔɔn akà Nzam.
JOH 16:3 Bàsàkyer ba abà, ntɔn ba bàyöb anki itàkal Taa, itàkal mɛ.
JOH 16:4 Wɛɛ kàlayäm mɛ indiir abi, ntɔn umpal làsàkwo taaŋ, bɛ, bɛ làsàyɔbà naa mɛ, mɛ kàkyàlayäm ya. « Mɛɛ ya kàlasam anki fà nsɛmà, ntɔn mɛ kàkälà anà bɛ.
JOH 16:5 Apanà, mɛ in'wàmukyà akà mbuur kan'töm, wɛɛ akà mwɛy uboo a bɛ kan'fuul anki naa: "Ngye ken akyà?"
JOH 16:6 Wɛɛ, ntɔn amàlasam mɛ abà, undiir awun mpem abɛ yan'yɔl ya a ngyɛb.
JOH 16:7 Mpalabà, mɛ amàlasam ubwaŋàbwaŋ: yan'söön mfun akà bɛ naa mɛ, mɛ in'kyen. Wɛɛ kya mɛ impàkyà anki, un'lɛɛl akwà alàyà mukàlabay, uyàfàyà anki akà bɛ. Wɛɛ isàkal naa mɛ an'kyà, mɛ in'kyer asàlatööm awà.
JOH 16:8 Waa mpal usàyà nde, nde asàswaŋ ubwaŋàbwaŋ muyöb man'be aba, balàbal anà nsaŋ a Nzam.
JOH 16:9 U ndaa iler man'be, ntɔn ba bàfàsà anki làkwikilà amu mɛ,
JOH 16:10 u ndaa iler balàbal, ntɔn mɛ in'kyà akà Taa anà bɛ làfàsan'man anki,
JOH 16:11 u ndaa iler nsaŋ, mfum afàyaal mɛɛn bàyun'tsüül nsaŋ. »
JOH 16:12 « Mɛ, mɛ in'we anà indiir mbɔɔn mukàlasam, wɛɛ papanà bɛ làkwo anki mukaar bya u mpem abɛ.
JOH 16:13 Utaaŋ usàyà Dweelà a ndandaa, nde asàlatwaal unsà ndandaa yanswà. Ntɔn nde usàtɛn anki kà ukwen ande ŋakwo, nde asàtɛn ndaa yanswà usàwem nde anà asàkyään ndaa yanswà isàyà.
JOH 16:14 Nde asan'sà làkoo, ntɔn nde asàwal ndaa amɛ, waa usàlakyään ya.
JOH 16:15 Indiir byanswà abyà byàtaa, bya sye byà byàmɛ. Undiir awun in'tɛn mɛ naa Dweelà asàwal unsà byàmɛ, waa usàlakyään bya.
JOH 16:16 « Itaan a mbɔɔn tɛy, bɛ làsàfan'man anki, apan sye, ungö a taaŋ ikikye, bɛ làkyer asàfan'man. »
JOH 16:17 Apan, amwɛy uboo a alɔŋki ande bàtɛɛnà ba a ba naa: « Ininà nde ukwen mutɛn a bi naa: "Itaan a mbɔɔn tɛy, bɛ làfàsan'man anki, apan sye, ungö a taaŋ ikikye, làkyer afàsan'man", anà sye: "Ntɔn mɛ in'kyà akà Taa"?
JOH 16:18 "Taaŋ ikikye" utɛɛnà nde ikaswaŋà aben? Bi ikayöbà anki naa ininà nde utɛɛnà! »
JOH 16:19 Yɛsu kàyöb nde naa ba bàkwen mukun'fuul, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Bɛ làbàmuleŋ uboo a bɛ muyöb naa mɛ ininà in'kwen mutɛn: "Itaan a mbɔɔn tɛy, bɛ làfàsan'man anki, apan sye, ungö a taaŋ ikikye, bɛ làkyer afàsan'man."
JOH 16:20 Ndandaa, ndandaa, mɛ alàkyään, bɛ, bɛ làkyer asàlel anà làsàsà un'saabà, mpal isàkal mɛɛn musaŋ. Bɛ làsàkal u ngyɛb, wɛɛ ngyɛb abɛ isàbulà un'sak.
JOH 16:21 Umpal ufàkal un'kaar anà in'swaŋ, mpem ande ifàkal udu udu ntɔn taaŋ ande lan'kwo. Wɛɛ isàkal naa nde kan'bɔr, nde afàdiimà usaay abà banswà, waa usaŋ ntɔn kan'bɔr nde mwan.
JOH 16:22 Lalan ŋàbawà bɛ làbà u ngyɛb mbɔɔn. Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ in'kyer afàsàlaman, mpem abɛ isàkal unsà un'sak, mbuur asàladuum wa watɛy.
JOH 16:23 « Abun, ilä akin, akà undiir mwɛy bɛ làfàsan'fuul anki. Ndandaa, ndandaa, mɛ alàkyään, undiir wanswà làsàlɔm bɛ akà Taa, nde akyer asàlapà wa kà ikɔb amɛ.
JOH 16:24 Tii apanà, akà undiir mwɛy bɛ ŋàtàlɔm anki kà ikɔb amɛ. Làlɔ̈m, waa bɛ làsàwal, ntɔn un'sak abɛ ukàl wàŋàkwo. »
JOH 16:25 « Indiir abi mɛ kàtɛn a bɛ unsà nsim. Taaŋ làmuyà, alà mpa in'fàsàlasam mɛ abà, wɛɛ alà in'sàlakyään mɛ kà imɛɛy ndaa iler Taa.
JOH 16:26 Ilä akin, bɛ làsàlɔm akà Taa kà ikɔb amɛ, mɛ in'tɛn anki naa mɛ in'sàlalɔ̈ɔ̈m akà Taa,
JOH 16:27 ntɔn Taa akyàlakwen nde ŋakwo, ntɔn lan'kwen bɛ anà làsi bɛ làkwikilà naa mɛ kàfü akà Nzam.
JOH 16:28 Mɛ, mɛ kàtoo amu Taa, waa mɛ kàyi u mɛɛn. Apanà, mɛ in'wàmulwomà u mɛɛn anà mufurà akà Taa. »
JOH 16:29 Alɔŋki bàtɛn a nde naa: « Le, apanà ngye an'tɛn kà imɛɛy, ukɔɔn asyääl nsim.
JOH 16:30 Apanà bi kan'yöb naa ngye ayöb indiir byanswà, anà ngye mfun yatɛy naa mbuur kafuul ndaa. Undiir awun waa bi kan'sà làkwikilà naa ngye an'fà akà Nzam. »
JOH 16:31 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Nkye apanà bɛ lan'sà làkwikilà?
JOH 16:32 Le, taaŋ làmuyà, apanà la lan'kwo, alà làsàtà bɛ upay, mbuur mbuur a mbwo ande, làsan'wɛy bɛ aŋàyen. Wɛɛ mɛ kà in'wà aŋàyen anki, ntɔn Taa wà anà mɛ.
JOH 16:33 Amàlakyään mɛ indiir abi ntɔn bɛ làkäl anà duu amu mɛ. Bɛ làbà uboo a lingyoomà u mɛɛn mà. Wɛɛ làkäl anà un'kanà, mɛ, mɛ mɛɛn akyun'wal iböŋ! »
JOH 17:1 Ungö kàtɛn nde abà, Yɛsu kàler u du, waa kàtɛn naa: « Taa, taaŋ lan'kwo, mɛɛy làkoo a Mwan angye, ntɔn nde sye umɛɛy làkoo angye.
JOH 17:2 Ngye kun'pɛ ikɔ̈b udu a baar banswà, ntɔn nde upɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye akà baar kun'pɛ ngye.
JOH 17:3 Wɛɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye wà naa ba bàyöb ngye mpɛl, Nzam a ndandaa, anà bàyöb Yɛsu Klistɔ, awà kàtöm ngye.
JOH 17:4 Mɛ, mɛ kàkyapà làkoo u mɛɛn. Mɛ akyàmay isal akyan'pɛ ngye mukyer.
JOH 17:5 Apanà, ngye, Taa, mpɛ làkoo akwà kàkäl mɛ alà akà ngye, kusà mɛɛn mukal.
JOH 17:6 Mɛ, mɛ ngye akyamɛɛy akà baar akwà kàtwey ngye u mɛɛn ntɔn mukan'pà. Ba bàkäl bàngye, waa ngye kan'mpɛ abà, waa ba bàkäär ndaa angye.
JOH 17:7 Apanà, ba ban'yöb naa indiir byanswà kan'mpɛ ngye, byan'fà akà ngye.
JOH 17:8 Ntɔn mɛ ba kapɛ ndaa kan'mpɛ ngye. Ba ya bàkyàwal. Ba bàkyàyöb ndandaa naa mɛ kàtoo amu ngye, waa ba bàsi làkwikilà naa ngye kan'töm. »
JOH 17:9 « Ngyamàkà amɛ yà ntɔn ba. Mɛ in'yamà anki ntɔn mɛɛn, wɛɛ ntɔn baar kan'pɛ ngye, ntɔn ba bà bàngye.
JOH 17:10 Indiir byanswà in'wà mɛ abyà, byà byàngye. Indiir awà ngye abyà, byà byàmɛ. Mɛ kàwɛl làkoo amu ba.
JOH 17:11 Mɛ in'fàkal anki u mɛɛn, wɛɛ ba, ba bà u mɛɛn. Mɛ in'wàmukyà akà ngye. Taa In'kyɛɛl, aler unsà ikɔ̈b a ikɔb angye, ikɔ̈b akwà kan'pɛ ngye, ntɔn ba bàkäl mwɛy asànaa ibà bi mwɛy.
JOH 17:12 Umpal kàkäl mɛ anà ba, mɛ, mɛ ba kàfalerà kà ikɔ̈b a ikɔb angye kan'pɛ ngye. Mɛ ba afàkyer atii, lalan, akà umwɛy kàdiimà anki, nà mwan aŋàdiimà mbwo, ntɔn Ndaa Aŋàsɔn ikwe.
JOH 17:13 Apanà, mɛ in'kyà akà ngye. Indiir abi mɛ an'tɛn umpal in'wà mɛ u mɛɛn, ntɔn ba bàkäl anà un'sak amɛ u mpem aba, un'sak wàŋàkwo.
JOH 17:14 Mɛ, mɛ kapɛ ndaa angye, baar a mɛɛn bàkyer ayiiŋ, ntɔn ba kà bà baar a mɛɛn anki, asànaa mɛ mpa in'wà mɛ wàmɛɛn.
JOH 17:15 Mɛ, mɛ in'löm anki naa ngye alwom u mɛɛn, wɛɛ mukatii ntɔn Ŋube.
JOH 17:16 Ba kà baar a mɛɛn anki, asànaa mpa in'wà mɛ mbuur a mɛɛn.
JOH 17:17 Asi ukɔl ntɔn ngye u mbwo a ndandaa: ndaa angye yà ndandaa.
JOH 17:18 Asànaa kan'töm ngye u mɛɛn, mɛ sye ba amatɔm u mɛɛn.
JOH 17:19 Mɛ an'sà ndür amɛ ŋakwo akà ngye ntɔn ba, ntɔn ba sye bàkäl bàngye ndandaa. »
JOH 17:20 « Mɛ in'yamà anki ntɔn ba mpɛl, wɛɛ sye ntɔn baar abà bàsàsà làkwikilà aba amu mɛ u mbwo a an'lɔɔŋ aba.
JOH 17:21 Wɛy ba banswà bàkäl mwɛy, asànaa ngye, Taa, ngye awà amu mɛ anà mɛ in'wà amu ngye, wɛy ba sye bàkäl mwɛy amu bi, ntɔn mɛɛn màyöb naa ngye kan'töm.
JOH 17:22 Mɛ, mɛ ba akyapà làkoo kan'pɛ ngye, ntɔn ba bàkäl mwɛy, asànaa naa bi ibà bi mwɛy:
JOH 17:23 mɛ amu ba, ngye amu mɛ, ntɔn ba bàkäl bàŋakwo mwɛy, waa mɛɛn màyöb naa ngye kan'töm, naa ngye ba akyakwen asànaa kan'kwen ngye.
JOH 17:24 Taa, mɛ in'kwen naa ikal in'wà mɛ, ba sye bàkäl paa, anà ba bàmɛn làkoo kan'pɛ ngye kusà a nkyeer a mɛɛn.
JOH 17:25 Taa a balàbal, mpal mpa mayöb mɛɛn, wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ kàkyayöb, ba abà bàkyàyöb naa ngye kan'töm.
JOH 17:26 Mɛ kàkyer naa ba bàyöb ikɔb angye, mɛ in'yàfàkyer naa ba bàyöb kya, ntɔn ukwen kan'kwen ngye bàkäl amu ba, anà mɛ in'käl amu ba. »
JOH 18:1 Ungö mutɛn abà, Yɛsu kàkyen anà alɔŋki ande u sim a un'lwɛy bàfàbel Sɛdrɔn. Akun làkäl anà làpaŋ làmwɛy, waa kàkàbilà kwo anà alɔŋki ande.
JOH 18:2 Kyekà Yudasi, mbuur kun'yälà, kàkyàyöb ikal aki, ntɔn Yɛsu kàfakyeenà kwo mbalà mbɔɔn anà alɔŋki ande.
JOH 18:3 Nde kàkäl kusà a un'lwaŋ a aŋità bun'pɛ andweer a angaŋ anà Amfarisi, waa kàbilà u làpaŋ anà isüü a mbaa, anà mwinà anà an'tà.
JOH 18:4 Apan, Yɛsu kàyöb indiir byanswà byun'yeel, nde kàkyen mper akà ba, anà kafuul naa: « Nà bɛ làyileŋ? »
JOH 18:5 Ba bun'fuur naa: « Yɛsu, un'nsi Nasàlɛr. » Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mɛ awà. » Kyekà, uboo a ba, Yudasi, mbuur kun'yälà, kàkäl mwo.
JOH 18:6 Umpal kàtɛn Yɛsu a ba naa: « Mɛ awà », ba bàfurà lingö, waa bàbü u mɛɛn.
JOH 18:7 Yɛsu kàfafuul naa: « Nà bɛ làyileŋ? » Ba naa: « Yɛsu, un'nsi Nasàlɛr. »
JOH 18:8 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Mɛ in'kyàtɛn a bɛ, mɛ awà. Isàkal naa bɛ mɛ làyileŋ, abun lawɛy baar bumwɛy bà bàkyen kàba. »
JOH 18:9 Abun yàlàkwo ndaa kàtɛn Yɛsu naa: « Uboo a baar kan'pɛ ngye, mɛ akà umwɛy kàpiy anki. »
JOH 18:10 Apan, Simɔn Petɔlà kàkäl anà kɔm, nde kàswam la kà inkwà, kàkäm la un'tsüüŋ a undweer a angaŋ, waa la lun'ywaaŋ tsü là ibaal. Un'tsüüŋ awà ikɔb ande kyàkäl Malkusu.
JOH 18:11 Wɛɛ Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a Petɔlà naa: « Fuur kɔm angye uboo a inkwà a la. Nkye mɛ in'sànwà anki kɔɔb kan'pɛ Taa munwà? »
JOH 18:12 Apan, iköŋ a aŋità anà mfum aba, anà aleer a amfum a Ayudà, bàkör Yɛsu, waa bun'läl in'siŋ.
JOH 18:13 Ba bàtun'syen akà An. Nde kàkäl ukwà a Kayifa, undweer a angaŋ u mbul awun.
JOH 18:14 Kyekà Kayifa awà, wà mbuur kàpɛ amfum a Ayudà lwɛŋ naa: « Yà mfun naa mbuur mwɛy ukü ntɔn un'sɛŋ a baar. »
JOH 18:15 Simɔn Petɔlà anà un'lɔŋki wumwɛy bàyilabà Yɛsu. Undweer a Angaŋ kàkyun'yöb un'lɔŋki awà. Nde kàbilà mbwo mwɛy anà Yɛsu u làpaŋ a undweer a angaŋ.
JOH 18:16 Simɔn Petɔlà kàkäl u nsà, tsütsü a munàmbwo. Abun, un'lɔŋki awà kàyöb Undweer a Angaŋ, kàyàtoo nde, kàyäm a un'kaar kàkäl un'leer a munàmbwo, waa nde kàbiil Petɔlà.
JOH 18:17 Apan, un'syääl a un'kaar, un'leer a munàmbwo, kàtɛn a Petɔlà naa: « Nkye ngye, ngye sye kawumwɛy anki uboo a alɔŋki a mbuur awunà? » Petɔlà kun'fuur naa: « Aay, kà mɛ anki. »
JOH 18:18 Asyääl anà aleer bàyöbà böl a mbaa a an'kal, waa bàyörà ya, ntɔn mpye yàkyer akal. Petɔlà sye kàkäl paa muywar mbaa anà ba.
JOH 18:19 Apan, un'dweer a angaŋ kàfuul Yɛsu unsà ndaa iler alɔŋki anà an'lɔɔŋ ande.
JOH 18:20 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Mɛ, mɛ kàtɛɛnà kimɛɛy akà baar. Taaŋ lanswà, mɛ kàyilɔɔŋà u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà anà u ndwà a Nzam, ikal bàfàköŋ Ayudà banswà. Akundiir mwɛy wàŋàyee kàtɛn mɛ watɛy.
JOH 18:21 Ntɔn nkye an'fuulà ngye? Fuul baar bàwem ndaa kàtɛn mɛ, ba bàkyàyöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ ndaa kàtɛn mɛ! »
JOH 18:22 Umwɛy uboo a aleer bàkäl paa, umpal kàwem nde mfuur a Yɛsu ayi, waa kun'käm mbar, anà mutɛn naa: « Nkye ngye undweer a angaŋ un'fuur abwɛy? »
JOH 18:23 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Isàkal naa mɛ an'tɛn ube, swaŋ ba. Isàkal naa mɛ an'tɛn ubwaŋ, ntɔn nkye aman'kam ngye mbar? »
JOH 18:24 Apan, An kun'töm wàŋàbäm in'siŋ akun'dweer a angaŋ Kayifa.
JOH 18:25 Utaaŋ nsil alan, Simɔn Petɔlà kàkälà paa, wàmuywar mbaa. Ba bun'fuul naa: « Nkye ngye sye awumwɛy uboo a alɔŋki ande? » Petɔlà waa kàtön: « Ŋaa, kà mɛ anki. »
JOH 18:26 Umwɛy uboo a asyääl a undweer a angaŋ, un'tɔŋ a mbuur awà kàywaaŋ Petɔlà tsü ande, kàtɛn naa: « Nkye mɛ kamɛn anki anà nde uboo a làpaŋ? »
JOH 18:27 Wɛɛ Petɔlà waa kàfun'tɔn. Utaaŋ nsil alan, nkɔɔ mwɛy waa kàbel.
JOH 18:28 Apan, ba bàsyen Yɛsu u ndwà a kuvɛrnɔ̈ɔ̈r fà ndwà a Kayifa. Yàkäl ututu. Baar bun'twäl bàkyer atɔn mubilà u ndwà a kuvɛrnɔ̈ɔ̈r, ntɔn mukɔɔn asà ndür aba làbiin anà ba bàdi Pak.
JOH 18:29 Abun, kuvɛrnɔ̈ɔ̈r Pilatu kàyaman u nsà, waa kafuul naa: « Undiir nà lan'füün bɛ mbuur wà? »
JOH 18:30 Ba bun'fuur naa: « Ilàkal naa mbuur awà ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akyer ube, bi ilatwääl awà anki. »
JOH 18:31 Abun, Pilatu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Lun'wɛl, lun'tsüül nsaŋ bɛ ŋakwo unsà un'kɔɔn abɛ. » Ba bun'fuur naa: « Bi ikɔ̈b mutsüül mbuur mbar a ukwà kyatɛy. »
JOH 18:32 Kyakin, yàkwe ndaa kàtɛn Yɛsu muswaŋ naa nde kàlàkwà aben.
JOH 18:33 Apan, Pilatu kàfurà u ndwà, waa kàswɛŋ naa bun'twääl Yɛsu. Nde kun'fuul naa: « Nkye ngye, ngye awà mfum a Ayudà? »
JOH 18:34 Yɛsu kàfuur naa: « Nkye ngye an'tɛn unsà an'kyän angye ŋakwo lɛɛ baar asin bàmakyään ntɔn mɛ? »
JOH 18:35 Pilatu kàfuur naa: « Nkye mɛ, mɛ in'wà Un'yudà? Baar a nsi angye anà amfum a angaŋ bàmayälà akà mɛ! Ininà ngye an'kyer? »
JOH 18:36 Yɛsu kàfuur naa: « Imwol amɛ kà kyà mɛɛn mà tɛy. Ilàkal naa kya ikäl kyà mɛɛn mà, asyääl amɛ bàlàkyer an'nwään naa bàkɔɔn an'yälà akamfum a Ayudà. Ŋaa, imwol amɛ kà kyà mɛɛn mà anki. »
JOH 18:37 Apan, Pilatu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Iswaŋà naa ngye awà mfum? » Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Ngye an'tɛn ngye ŋakwo naa mɛ in'wà mfum. Mɛ, bàkyer an'bɔr, waa mɛ kàyi u mɛɛn ntɔn mutà imbäl akà ndandaa. Mbuur wanswà awunsà ndandaa afàwem ndaa amɛ. » –
JOH 18:38 Pilatu kun'fuul naa: « Ndandaa ininà? » Ungö a ngɔk ayi, Pilatu kàfàkàman amfum a Ayudà u nsà, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mɛ akà undiir in'mɛn anki kan'kwo mutsüül mbuur wà mbar a ukwà.
JOH 18:39 Wɛɛ asànaa akyà kya ifà abɛ naa mɛ alàwɛɛy mbuur mwɛy kun'kyɔm a Pak, nkye bɛ làkyàkwen naa mɛ in'wɛy mfum a Ayudà? »
JOH 18:40 Apan ba banswà bàfàsà in'kwɛŋ: « Ŋaa, kà nde tɛy, wɛɛ Banabasi! » Kyekà, Banabasi awà kàkäl un'dwää baar.
JOH 19:1 Apan, Pilatu kàswɛŋ mutwal Yɛsu anà mukun'kam an'füm.
JOH 19:2 Aŋità bàtöŋ nkar a nsyeenà, waa bun'bwä ya kun'tswe. Ba bun'bwä sye kàzak a tsöö.
JOH 19:3 Ba bàsinà tsütsü apà nde, waa bàtɛɛnà naa: « Mfum a Ayudà, mbɔr angye! » Ba bun'kämà mbar.
JOH 19:4 Pilatu kàkyer afàtoo, waa kàtɛn a amfum a Ayudà naa: « Làler, mɛ in'kyer alatwääl awà u nsà: bɛ làkyer ayöb naa mɛ in'mɛn anki ube kan'kyer nde. »
JOH 19:5 Abun, Yɛsu kàyàtoo wàŋàbwaar nkar a nsyeenà anà kàzak a tsöö. Pilatu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Le baal! »
JOH 19:6 Pa bun'mɛn andweer a angaŋ anà aleer, ba bàsi in'kwɛŋ: « Un'bɛɛrà u kulunsi! Un'bɛɛrà u kulunsi! » Pilatu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Lun'wɛl anà lun'bɛɛrà bɛ ŋakwo u kulunsi, wɛɛ akà mɛ, mɛ in'mɛn anki undiir kan'kwo mukun'tsüül mbar a ukwà. »
JOH 19:7 Amfum a Ayudà bun'fuur naa: « Bi iwe anà un'kɔɔn, mulab un'kɔɔn awà, nde akyer akwà, ntɔn nde kàkyeyà uyɔl naa nde wà Mwan a Nzam. »
JOH 19:8 Mpal kàwem Pilatu ndaa ayi, nde kàfàman bɔɔmà mbɔɔn.
JOH 19:9 Nde kàfurà u ndwà, waa kàfuul Yɛsu naa: « Ngye, ngye awà un'nsi nà? » Wɛɛ Yɛsu kun'fuur anki akundiir.
JOH 19:10 Apan, Pilatu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ngye an'tɔn mukan'pà mfuur? Nkye ngye ayöb anki naa mɛ, mɛ in'we anà ikɔ̈b mukawɛy itàkal mukabɛɛrà u kulunsi? »
JOH 19:11 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Ngye ikɔ̈b alàkal akyà anki, ilàkal naa Nzam ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akapà kya. Undiir awun, mbuur awà kàman'yälà akà ngye, we anà man'be màŋàsöönà. »
JOH 19:12 Fà apan, Pilatu kàleŋà mukun'wɛy. Wɛɛ amfum a Ayudà bàsi in'kwɛŋ: « Isàkal naa ngye amun'wɛy, ngye kawà un'sam a Sɛzar anki! Mbuur wanswà afàkyey uyɔl naa nde wà mfum, nde kan'kyey naa nde wà ŋankir a Sɛzar! »
JOH 19:13 Mpal kàwem Pilatu ndaa ayi, nde kàsyen Yɛsu u nsà, kàbwaay u làbay a nsaŋ, kikal bàfàbel naa « Plase pavɛ » - unsà ɛbɛlyɔ naa « Ngabàtà ».
JOH 19:14 Kya kyàkäl ilä mulɔ̈ɔ̈n un'kyɔm a Pak u midi. Pilatu kàtɛn a Ayudà naa: « Le mfum abɛ! »
JOH 19:15 Wɛɛ ba bàsɛmà musà in'kwɛŋ: « Ukü! Ukü! Un'bɛɛrà u kulunsi! » Pilatu kàfàtɛn a ba naa: « Nkye mɛ in'bɛɛrà mfum abɛ u kulunsi? » Andweer a angaŋ bàfuur naa: « Bi mfum asin watɛy, Sɛzar mpɛl. »
JOH 19:16 Apan Pilatu wa kapɛ awà ntɔn bun'bɛɛrà u kulunsi. Apan ba bàsyen Yɛsu.
JOH 19:17 Yɛsu kàyisyeenà kulunsi ande, nde ŋakwo, nde kàtoo u nsà a bul ntɔn mukyà ikal akyà bàfàbel naa « Bɔl a un'tswe », unsà ɛbɛlyɔ bàfàbel « Ngɔlɔngɔta ».
JOH 19:18 Akun ba bun'bɛɛrà u kulunsi anà baar, baar bɔ̈ɔ̈l: mwɛy u kɔɔ a ibaal, mwey u kɔɔ a ikaar, Yɛsu uboboo.
JOH 19:19 Pilatu kàsön isɔn udu a kilàbää, waa kàbɛɛrà kya udu a kulunsi. Kya kyàkäl aŋàsön naa: « Yɛsu un'nsi Nasàlɛr, mfum a Ayudà. »
JOH 19:20 Ayudà mbɔɔn bàtäŋà isɔn abi, ntɔn ikal bàbɛɛrà Yɛsu u kulunsi kyàkäl tsütsü a bul, anà isɔn bya sye bàsön unsà ibɛlyɔ, unsà ilatɛ anà unsà ingɛlɛki.
JOH 19:21 Abun, andweer a angaŋ a Ayudà bàtɛn a Pilatu naa: « Twon an'sɔn naa "mfum a Ayudà", wɛɛ sɔn naa: "mbuur wà kàkyey uyɔl naa nde kàkäl mfum a Ayudà." »
JOH 19:22 Pilatu kàfuur naa: « Ayan'sɔn mɛ, mɛ an'sɔn ya. »
JOH 19:23 Mpal ban'may aŋità mun'bɛɛrà Yɛsu u kulunsi, ba bàwɛl ipfɛy ande, bàsi bya an'kab an'nà, mbuur mbuur kàwɛl kab làmwɛy. Làsàsal nà kàzak ande. La làkäl anki làŋàtsum: ipfɛy mwɛy fà du tii u ngyɛl.
JOH 19:24 Aŋità bàtɛɛnà ba a ba naa: « Wɛy bi ikɔ̈ɔ̈n akaam kya, wɛɛ bi itɔɔm löb, ntɔn muyöb naa nà awal kya. » Ntɔn naa Ndaa Aŋàsɔn ikwe: « Ba bàsi ipfɛy amɛ an'kab anà ba bàtɔɔm löb ntɔn kàzak amɛ. » Byabi indiir bàkyer aŋità.
JOH 19:25 Baar bàkäl tsütsü a kulunsi anà Yɛsu babà: ngwän, mpääŋ a ngwän, Màlye un'kyay a Kɔlɔpasi, anà Màlye un'nsi Makdalà.
JOH 19:26 Yɛsu kàmɛn nde ngwän anà un'lɔŋki kàfakweenà nde ukɔl a nde, nde kàtɛn a ngwän naa: « Un'kaar, le mwan angye wàbaal. »
JOH 19:27 Ungö waa kàtɛn a un'lɔŋki naa: « Le ngwa. » Fà apan, un'lɔŋki kun'wɛl u ndwà ande.
JOH 19:28 Ungö a ndaa ayi, nde kàyöb naa indiir byanswà byakyàkwo itaan, ntɔn Ndaa Aŋàsɔn ikwe, Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Mfwää yàman'kaar. »
JOH 19:29 Paa làkäl anà làbuuŋ aŋàyɔl a vin a nyän, ba bàbäm ikaam a ipfɛy aŋànwɛmà unsà vin a nyän alan u nswɛŋ a kɔkà a kite bàfàbel naa isɔp, waa bun'bämà kya u mun.
JOH 19:30 Pa kànü nde vin a nyän alà, nde kàtɛn naa: « Yanswà yan'kwo! » Abun, nde kàtsülà un'tswe, waa kàfuur mɔ̈ɔ̈.
JOH 19:31 Kya kyàkäl ilä ayöŋà un'kyɔm a saba. Ntɔn mukɔɔn awɛy ndom isinakalà u kulunsi ilä a saba, ntɔn kya kyàkäl ilä a kölàköl, amfum a Ayudà bàkàlɔm mbwo akà Pilatu ntɔn bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l ya in'kɔl anà bàlwom ya.
JOH 19:32 Apan, aŋità bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l in'kɔl a mbuur atàtwɛb anà myà mbuur wàyweel bàbɛɛrà u kulunsi mbwo mwɛy a Yɛsu.
JOH 19:33 Mpal bàkɔlà ba apà Yɛsu, ba bun'mɛn wàŋàkwà, waa mpa bun'bɔ̈ɔ̈l in'kɔl.
JOH 19:34 Wɛɛ umwɛy uboo a aŋità, kun'kül kwaŋ u bɛl a nsyäärà, apan sye an'kil anà an'dà waa màyàtoo.
JOH 19:35 Mbuur kàmɛn ya, kàtɛ imbäl. Imbäl ande kyà ndandaa. Nde, nde akyàyöb naa nde kan'tɛn ndandaa ntɔn bɛ sye làsi làkwikilà.
JOH 19:36 Abun, indiir abi byàyi ntɔn Ndaa Aŋàsɔn ikwe: « Bàsun'bɔɔl anki akun'kwo ande mwɛy. »
JOH 19:37 Ntsü yumwɛy, Ndaa Aŋàsɔn itɛn naa: « Ileer aba isàkal akà mbuur bàkül ba kwaŋ. »
JOH 19:38 Ungö a indiir abi, un'lɔŋki a Yɛsu mwɛy ikɔb ande Yɔsɛfi, un'nsi Alimatɛ, kàkyen akà Pilatu u nku, ntɔn bɔɔmà a Ayudà, mulɔm mbwo mulwom ndom a Yɛsu. Pilatu waa kàkyey. Abun, Yɔsɛfi kàkàlwom ya.
JOH 19:39 Nàkàdim sye, mbuur akwà kàkyen mukàman Yɛsu u mpib, kàtwäl isii an'kilɔ an'kwem an'tär mà may a usɔŋ mà mir àŋàtüüb anà alɔwɛ.
JOH 19:40 Ba bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l bàwɛl ndom a Yɛsu, bàläl ya ikaam a ipfɛy a linɔ, bàtyaŋ ya may a usɔŋ, asànaa awà ifà a Ayudà bàfàdyee ba akü aba.
JOH 19:41 Kikal bàbɛɛrà Yɛsu u kulunsi làkäl anà làpaŋ. Uboo a la màkäl anà an'dii akün, mpa amàŋàtàsà mbuur akikikye.
JOH 19:42 Abun, ba Yɛsu bun'tɔ̈l kwo, ntɔn ngyööŋ a Ayudà anà an'dii sye màkäl tsütsü.
JOH 20:1 Ututu a ilä atàtwɛb kyà mpɔsà, u kilàpib, Màlye un'nsi Makdalà kàkyen an'dii, waa kàmɛn nkɔŋ yàŋàlwomà.
JOH 20:2 Apan, nde kàwurà ntiin, kàkàman Simɔn Petɔlà anà un'lɔŋki kàfakweenà Yɛsu, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mwol bàkyun'lwom kan'dii, bi iyöb anki naa bàmusà ken. »
JOH 20:3 Petɔlà anà un'lɔŋki wumwɛy waa bàkyen an'dii.
JOH 20:4 Ba bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l bàwurà ntiin, wɛɛ un'lɔŋki wumwɛy kàyiwurà aŋàlyaŋ Petɔlà, waa kàkàkɔlà mbuur atàtwɛb kan'dii.
JOH 20:5 Nde kànyee ntɔn muler, waa kàmɛn ikaam a ipfɛy a linɔ byàŋàtɔɔl u mɛɛn. Wɛɛ nde kàbilà anki uboo a an'dii.
JOH 20:6 Simɔn Petɔlà kàyun'labà nde, waa kàyàkɔlà sye. Nde kàbilà uboo a an'dii, waa kàmɛn ikaam a ipfɛy byàŋàtɔɔl u mɛɛn,
JOH 20:7 anà ipfɛy bàfwe un'tswe a Yɛsu. Kya kyàkäl anki ikal imwɛy anà ikaam a ipfɛy a linɔ, wɛɛ kya kyàkäl kyàŋàbwɛlà, kyàŋàtɔɔl ikal asin.
JOH 20:8 Apan, un'lɔŋki akwà kàkàkɔlà kusà kan'dii waa kabilà sye. Nde waa kàmɛn, waa kàsi làkwikilà.
JOH 20:9 Ntɔn ba bàkäl aŋàtàyöb anki Ndaa Aŋàsɔn ayà itɛɛnà naa Yɛsu kàkyer alàwiyà uboo a akü.
JOH 20:10 Ungö apan, alɔŋki bàfurà ndwà aba.
JOH 20:11 Màlye kàkäl u nsà, tsütsü a an'dii, wàmulelà. Umpal kàlelà nde, nde kànye ntɔn muler uboo a an'dii,
JOH 20:12 nde kàmɛn akyeey abɔ̈ɔ̈l bàkyàbwaar ipfɛy a pɛɛl, bàŋàbwaay kikal bàtɔ̈l ndom a Yɛsu, mwɛy ntsü a un'tswe, mwɛy ntsü a in'kɔl.
JOH 20:13 Akyeey bun'fuul naa: « Un'kaar, ntɔn nkye alelà ngye? » Nde kafuur naa: « Mwol amɛ bàmun'lwom, mɛ in'yöb anki naa bun'si ken. »
JOH 20:14 Ungö mutɛn abà, nde kàler ungö, waa kàmɛn Yɛsu kàkyàmbar paa, wɛɛ nde kàyöb anki naa awunà nde.
JOH 20:15 Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Un'kaar, ntɔn nkye alelà ngye? Nà ngye aleŋà? » Wɛɛ nde kàsii naa un'syääl a làpaŋ kàkäl, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mwol, isàkal naa ngye kun'lwom, nkyään, ngye kun'si ken, waa mɛɛ in'kun'wal. »
JOH 20:16 Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Màlye! » Nde waa kàbulà, kun'fuur unsà Ibɛlyɔ naa: « Rabuni! », iswaŋà naa « Un'lɔɔŋ ».
JOH 20:17 Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Twon aman'ba, ntɔn mɛ ŋàtàbeenà anki akà Taaràmɛ. Wɛɛ kyen kakyään atɔŋ amɛ naa mɛ an'beenà akà Taaràmɛ awà Taaràbɛ sye, akà Nzam amɛ awà Nzam abɛ sye. »
JOH 20:18 Abun, Màlye un'si Makdalà kàkyen akalɔŋki, waa kasam naa: « Mɛ, mɛ an'man Mwol, le ndaa kan'kyään nde. »
JOH 20:19 Làsisye a ilä nsil aki, ilä atàtwɛb kyà mpɔsà, alɔŋki bàkàköŋ u ndwà, ibeenà byàkäl byàŋàdübà a in'kaŋàboo, ntɔn ba bàtiinà bɔɔmà a amfum a Ayudà. Yɛsu waa kàyi, kàmbär uboboo a ba, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Duu làkäl anà bɛ! »
JOH 20:20 Ungö mutɛn abà, nde kamɛɛy an'kɔɔ anà bɛl a nsyäärà ande. Alɔŋki banswà bàkäl unsà un'sak muman Mwol.
JOH 20:21 Yɛsu kàfàtɛn a ba naa: « Duu làkäl anà bɛ! Asànaa kan'töm Taa, mɛ, mɛ sye amàlatɔm. »
JOH 20:22 Ungö a ndaa ayi, nde kafül un'swey, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làwɛl Dweelà In'kyɛɛl!
JOH 20:23 Akà baar abà làsàdwääl bɛ nkul a man'be aba, ba bàsàwal ndwääl a nkul. Wɛɛ akà baar mpa làsàdwääl bɛ nkul, ba ya sye bàsàwal anki. »
JOH 20:24 Kyekà Tuma awà bàfàbel Didimɔ, umwɛy uboo a Bàkwem Aŋiyweel kàkäl anki anà ba umpal kàyi Yɛsu.
JOH 20:25 Abun, alɔŋki bumwɛy bun'kyään naa: « Bi kan'man Mwol. » Wɛɛ nde kafuur naa: « Isàkal naa mɛ in'mɛn anki idiim a in'sàmar kan'kɔɔ ande, isàkal naa mɛ in'külà anki làpin amɛ kikal a in'sàmar anà kɔɔ amɛ u bɛl a nsyäärà ande, mɛ in'sà anki làkwikilà. »
JOH 20:26 Wɛɛ ungö a ilä naan, alɔŋki bàfàköŋ u ndwà, Tuma kàkäl anà ba. Ibeenà byanswà byàkäl byàŋàsà in'kaŋàboo. Yɛsu kàyi nde, kàmbär uboboo a ba, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Duu làkäl anà bɛ! »
JOH 20:27 Ungö waa kàtɛn a Tuma naa: « Sin làpin angye pà, ler an'kɔɔ amɛ. Sin sye kɔɔ angye, fwaar la u bɛl a nsyäärà amɛ. Wɛy mukal un'syeel a mbaaŋ, wɛɛ bulà aŋàlàkwikila! »
JOH 20:28 Tuma kun'fuur naa: « Mwol amɛ, Nzam amɛ! »
JOH 20:29 Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Nkye ntɔn aman'man ngye, waa ngye an'sà làkwikilà? Un'sak mbɔɔn akà baar mpa bàmɛn, waa bàsi làkwikilà! »
JOH 20:30 Yɛsu kàkyer idiim asin mbɔɔn u mii a alɔŋki ande abyà mpa bàsön uboo a un'kaan awà.
JOH 20:31 Indiir abi bàsön ntɔn bɛ làsi làkwikilà naa Yɛsu wà Klistɔ, Mwan a Nzam, naa sye u mbwo a làkwikilà alà, bɛ làkäl anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ kikɔb ande.
JOH 21:1 Ungö a indiir abi, Yɛsu kàfàmɛnà akalɔŋki ande kun'kɔɔl a ɛwà a Tibɛryade. Le, nde kàyàmɛnà aben akà ba:
JOH 21:2 Simɔn Petɔlà, Tuma - bàfàbel naa Didimɔ, Natanayɛl un'nsi Kana u Ngalilɛ, baan a Zebeday anà alɔŋki bɔ̈ɔ̈l bumwɛy bàkäl ikal imwɛy.
JOH 21:3 Simɔn Petɔlà kàtɛn a ba naa: « Mɛ, mɛ awin'kyà in'kàlwab nsö. » Ba bàtɛn a nde naa: « Bi ikyà anà ngye! » Laa bàtoo ba, bàbilà ba u bwaar, wɛɛ u mpib ayin, ba akundiir bàsiim anki.
JOH 21:4 Taaŋ làkäl lan'tyà, Yɛsu kàkäl aŋàmbar paa kun'kɔɔl a an'dà. Wɛɛ alɔŋki bàyöbà anki naa awun Yɛsu kàkäl.
JOH 21:5 Apan, Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Baan amɛ, nkye bɛ làwe anà undiir adyà? » Ba bun'fuur naa: « Ŋaa. »
JOH 21:6 Nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làtɔɔm an'tɛy u kɔɔ a ibaal a bwaar, waa bɛ làyàman. » Abun, waa ba bàtɔɔm ma, wɛɛ ba bàkwe anki munaan ma, ntɔn nsö yàkäl mbɔɔn.
JOH 21:7 Apan, un'lɔŋki kàfakweenà Yɛsu kàtɛn a Petɔlà naa: « Awà Mwol! » Pa kàwem Petɔlà naa Mwol kàkäl, nde kàbwäär ipfɛy, ntɔn nde kàkäl nsàpɔl, waa kàbü kan'dà.
JOH 21:8 Alɔŋki bumwɛy bàyi anà bwaar, ntɔn munaan an'tɛy màkäl aŋàyɔl a nsö: ba bàkäl anki kwɛl a nkankyel, isii a mɛtre nkam mwɛy.
JOH 21:9 Utaaŋ bàtɔlà ba u nkankyel, ba bàmɛn böl a an'kal a mbaa anà nsö udu, anà mampà.
JOH 21:10 Yɛsu kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làtwääl nsö yumwɛy uboo a nsö lan'siim bɛ. »
JOH 21:11 Simɔn Petɔlà kàbilà u bwaar, kànaan an'tɛy u mɛɛn, ma màkäl aŋàyɔl a nsö an'köl an'köl: nkam mwɛy a an'kwem an'tyeen aŋitär. Itàkal naa ya yàkäl un'kàbɔ, an'tɛy màkaamà anki.
JOH 21:12 Yɛsu waa kabel: « Yää, làdi. » Akà un'lɔŋki mwɛy kàkwe anki mukun'fuul naa: « Ngye, ngye nà? » Ntɔn ba bàkiyöbà naa awà Mwol kàkäl.
JOH 21:13 Abun Yɛsu kàsin nde, nde kàwɛl mampà anà nsö, waa kakääb.
JOH 21:14 Ayi yàkäl mbalà yàtär ayà kàmɛnà Yɛsu akalɔŋki ande, fà kàwiyà nde uboo a akü.
JOH 21:15 Ungö a udyà, Yɛsu kàfuul Simɔn Petɔlà naa: « Simɔn, mwan a Ywan, nkye ngye akyan'kwen aŋàsöön baar bà? » – Nde kàfuur naa: « Inye, Mwol, ngye akyàyöb ngye ŋakwo naa mɛ in'kyakwen. » Apan Yɛsu kàtɛn a nde naa: « Sey baan a in'kɔk amɛ. »
JOH 21:16 U mbalà yàyweel, Yɛsu kun'fuul naa: « Simɔn, mwan a Ywan, nkye ngye akyan'kwen? » Nde kàfuur naa: « Inye, Mwol, ngye akyàyöb naa mɛ in'kyakwen. » Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Kal nkyɛɛŋ a in'kɔk amɛ. »
JOH 21:17 U mbalà yàtär, nde kàtɛn a nde naa: « Simɔn, mwan a Ywan, nkye ngye akyan'kwen? » Petɔlà kàmɛn ngyɛb ntɔn kun'fuul Yɛsu mbalà yàtär naa: « Nkye ngye akyan'kwen? » Nde kun'fuur naa: « Mwol, ngye mbuur ayöb ndaa yanswà, ngye akyàyöb naa mɛ, mɛ in'kyakwen! » Yɛsu waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Sey in'kɔk amɛ.
JOH 21:18 Ndandaa, ndandaa, mɛ akyään: mpal kàkäl ngye un'tö, ngye ŋakwo kàfabäämà un'kab, ngye kàkyeenà ntsü yanswà kàkweenà ngye. Wɛɛ mpal asàbulà ngye un'nün, ngye asayaamà an'kɔɔ angye, waa mbuur asin usabäämà un'kab, nde sye usasyeenà ntsü mpa akwen ngye. »
JOH 21:19 Kàtɛn nde abà, Yɛsu kàkwen muswaŋ naa nkweel a Petɔlà isàkal aben ntɔn mupà Nzam làkoo. Ungö mutɛn abà, nde kàtɛn a nde naa: « Yan'läb! »
JOH 21:20 Petɔlà kàler ungö, kàmɛn nde un'lɔŋki kàfakweenà Yɛsu - nde akwà kàkàyiir kitɔl ande umpal bàkäl ba mudyà anà kun'fuul naa: « Mwol, nà asayälà? »
JOH 21:21 Mpal kun'mɛn Petɔlà, nde kàfuul Yɛsu naa: « Mwol, atöl nde, ininà isàkal? »
JOH 21:22 Yɛsu kun'fuur naa: « Isàkal naa mɛ in'kwen naa nde ukäl anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ tii mpal in'sàyà mɛ, a akà ngye mwo nkye? Ngye, yan'läb! »
JOH 21:23 Fà apan, làsaŋ làpää akatɔŋ naa un'lɔŋki awà usàkwà anki. Kyekà, Yɛsu kàtɛn anki naa un'lɔŋki awà usàkwà anki, wɛɛ nde kàtɛn naa: « Isàkal naa mɛ in'sàkwen naa nde ukäl tii mpal in'sàyà mɛ, a akà ngye mwo nkye? »
JOH 21:24 Un'lɔŋki nsil awà, wàmutà imbäl a indiir abi anà kàsön bya, bi ban'yöb naa imbäl ande kyà ndandaa.
JOH 21:25 Yɛsu kàkyer indiir asin mbɔɔn. Yàlàkal naa bàsön bya imwɛy imwɛy, mɛ in'sii ikal kyàlàkal anki musà in'kaan myanswà bàlàsɔn.
ACT 1:1 Un'sam Tyɔfil, Uboo a un'kaan amɛ wàtàtwɛb, mɛ kasam indiir byanswà kàsɛmà Yɛsu mukyer anà mulɔŋ
ACT 1:2 tii ilä bun'sɛɛn ba ungö mupà nswɛɛŋ u mbwo a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl akà Antööm kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l nde.
ACT 1:3 Yàlɔ̈m naa ungö a nkweel ande, nde kàyamɛnà nde ŋakwo akà ba ntɔn mukaswaŋ unsà mbwo yà ifà ifà naa ndandaa nde wà anà mɔ̈ɔ̈. Nde kàyàmɛnà akà ba ilä an'kwem an'nà mukakyään indiir a Imwol a Nzam.
ACT 1:4 Ilä mwɛy nde kàkäl mudyà anà ba, nde kaswɛŋ ndaa yi: « Twon lan'lwomà u Yɛlusàlɛm, wɛɛ làdil ilää kàpɛ Taa, kab a ngway kàlakyään mɛ.
ACT 1:5 Ntɔn Ywan kàyadümà kà an'dà, wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ bàyàladümà unsà Dweelà In'kyɛɛl ungö a ilä ikikye. »
ACT 1:6 Apan, baar bàyàköŋ apà nde bun'fuul naa: « Mwol, nkye taaŋ nsil alà ayàfuur ngye imwol akà Isàlɛl? »
ACT 1:7 Yɛsu kafuur naa: « Kà bɛ anki lan'kwo muyöb taaŋ anà ilä kàsi Nzam unsà ikɔ̈b ande.
ACT 1:8 Wɛɛ bɛ làsàwal ngwal taaŋ usyetyà Dweelà In'kyɛɛl udu a bɛ. Bɛ làsàkal ambäl amɛ u Yɛlusàlɛm, uboo a Yuday lanswà, u Samalya tii u ntsüü a mɛɛn. »
ACT 1:9 Utaaŋ kàmay nde mutɛn abwɛy, laa bun'sɛɛn ba, Antööm bàkäl mukun'lerà. Itööm mwɛy kyun'fwee u mii aba.
ACT 1:10 Umpal bàkäl ba mulerà u du ntsü kàkyen Yɛsu, kà imbürà, ba bàmɛn abaal bɔ̈ɔ̈l bàŋambwaar ipfɛy a pɛɛl bàŋàmbar apà ba,
ACT 1:11 waa bàtɛn a ba naa: « Baar a Ngalilɛ, ntɔn nkye lan'mbar bɛ apà mulerà u du? Yɛsu wa bàmàlalwom wà mubeenà du, afàsyefurà asànaa lun'mɛn bɛ mubeenà. »
ACT 1:12 Antööm bàlwomà u mɔŋ bàfàbel naa mɔŋ a in'te a olive, ba bàfurà Yɛlusàlɛm. Mɔŋ awà wà tsütsü a Yɛlusàlɛm kà isii a kilɔmɛtre mwɛy.
ACT 1:13 Mpal bàkɔlà ba, ba bàläär u suk adu, ikal bàfakööŋà ba. Ba bàkäl Petɔlà, Ywan, Zyak anà Andrɛ, Filipo anà Tuma, Bàtɛlàmay anà Màtay, Zyak mwan a Alefɛ, Simɔn Ŋinaŋ, anà Yudà mwan a Zyak.
ACT 1:14 Ba banswà bàkyer afabweyà mbɔɔn ntɔn muyamà, anà akaar, anà Màlye ngwän a Yɛsu anà atɔŋ ande.
ACT 1:15 Kà ilä abin, alɔŋki bàköŋ bàkal kà isii a nkam a an'kwem mɔ̈ɔ̈l. Petɔlà kàmbarà uboo a ba, waa kàtɛn a ba naa:
ACT 1:16 « Atɔŋ, yubwaŋ naa ndaa kàtɛn Dweelà In'kyɛɛl uboo Un'kaan ikwe: u mun a David, nde kàtɛn kusà ntɔn Yudasi mbuur kàtwääl baar ntɔn mukɔr Yɛsu.
ACT 1:17 Ntɔn nde kàkäl umwɛy uboo a bi, nde sye kàkyer awal kab uboo a isal bipɛ.
