ACT 1:18 Nde kàsöm mɛɛn a ngim kàyälà nde Yɛsu. Nde kàbü kwo un'tswe lingyɛl, ndür ande yàbarà uboboo, in'swà ande myanswà waa myàpää.
ACT 1:19 Baar a Yɛlusàlɛm banswà bàkyer ayöb ndaa ayin: lalan bàbeelà ba mɛɛn aman u ndaa aba naa "akɛldamà", iswaŋà naa "mɛɛn a an'kil".
ACT 1:20 Wɛɛ, làwem ndaa bàsön uboo a un'kaan a an'diim: "Wɛy ndwà ande ikäl ipɔl, mbuur ukɔɔn abilà kwo." Waa bàfàkwɛy naa: "Wɛy mbuur asin uwɛl buur ande."
ACT 1:21 Abun, bye anà baar bàyikyeenà anà bi taaŋ lanswà kàyilyaaŋà Mwol abi Yɛsu kusà a bi
ACT 1:22 sɛmà ilä kun'dümà Ywan tii ilä kàlwomà nde uboo a bi. Lalan mbuur awun ayàkal mbäl ntɔn ngwiiyà a Yɛsu. »
ACT 1:23 Ba bàswɛŋ baar bɔ̈ɔ̈l: Yɔsefi bàfabeelà naa Barsàbas, bun'pɛ sye ikɔb naa Mbuur a balàbal, anà Màtyas.
ACT 1:24 Apan ba bàsi ngyamàkà yi: « Ngye, Mwol, ngye akyàyöb mpem a baar banswà. Iswɛŋ uboo a atɔŋ bà bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l ngye nà an'sɔɔl
ACT 1:25 ntɔn muwal uboo a isal a Antööm ikal kàsàwɛy Yudasi ki ntɔn mukyà ikal kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l nde. »
ACT 1:26 Ungö apan ba bàtɔ̈ɔ̈m löb, löb waa làbü udu a Màtyas. Nde mbuur kàtüüb anà Antööm bàkwem aŋimwɛy.
ACT 2:1 Ungö apan, mpal kyàkwe ilä a Pantɛkɔt, alɔŋki banswà bàkàköŋ ikal imwɛy.
ACT 2:2 Yàmɛnà naa kà imbürà, làso làfü du: la làkäl asànaa un'pöb a ngwal akayaa anà akayöölà ndwà yanswà bàkälà ba.
ACT 2:3 Taaŋ nsil alan, yàmɛnà anà ndem mwɛy asànaa ndem a mbaa. Ya yakyer akaabà, waa yàbwee udu a umwɛy umwɛy uboo a ba.
ACT 2:4 Apan sye Dweelà In'kyɛɛl kàwɛl ba banswà, ba waa bàsɛmà mutɛn unsà ndaa asin yà ifà ifà, mbuur mbuur asànaa Dweelà kàswɛŋà nde ba mutɛn.
ACT 2:5 Kyekà taaŋ nsil alan, Ayudà a mpem aŋàbwaŋ bàfü in'sɛŋ myanswà amyu mɛɛn, bàkäl u Yɛlusàlɛm.
ACT 2:6 Mpal bàwem ba làso alan, un'sɛŋ wanswà kàyi u ntiin. Ba bàkäl mubem, ntɔn mbuur mbuur kàweemà u ndaa ande ŋakwo bàtɛɛnà ba.
ACT 2:7 Ba bàkäl unsà lingyoomà anà ubem, waa bàtɛɛnà naa: « Làler, baar bàyäämà bà banswà, nkye ba kà baar a Ngalilɛ anki?
ACT 2:8 Iswaŋà aben naa bi ikaweemà umwɛy umwɛy u ndaa a bul ande ŋakwo?
ACT 2:9 Uboo abi, bi ibà anà bà Partɛs, bà Mɛdɛs, bà Ɛlamit, bi ifàkal u Mɛzɔpɔtami, u Yuday, u Kapadɔs, u Pɔn anà kà itiir a nsi a Azi,
ACT 2:10 u Frizi bàfàbel sye Pamfili, u Ngipiti, u Libi tsütsü a Sirɛn, u Lɔmà,
ACT 2:11 u Krɛt anà Arabi. Bi ibà Ayudà unsà mböör abi anà Ayudà unsà inzaam, wɛɛ mbuur mbuur uboo a bi wàmuweemà u ndaa ande ŋakwo indiir a kölàköl kan'kyer Nzam. »
ACT 2:12 Ba banswà bàkäl unsà lingyoomà anà isak isak. Ba bàtɛɛnà ba a ba naa: « Abà iswaŋà aben? »
ACT 2:13 Wɛɛ bumwɛy bàsɛɛ aŋàlàkwikilà, waa bàtɛn naa: « Ba bàŋàyɔr ubwaŋàbwaŋ! »
ACT 2:14 Apan, Petɔlà waa kàmbarà anà Bàkwen Aŋimwɛy, nde kàtɛn u ndaa a ngwal a baar mbɔɔn naa: « Abaal a Yuday anà bɛ banswà làfàkal u Yɛlusàlɛm, làwem ubwaŋàbwaŋ ndaa amɛ!
ACT 2:15 Aay, baar bà kàbàŋàyɔr anki asànaa làkasii bɛ, ntɔn bi ibà u taaŋ làwà làtutu.
ACT 2:16 Wɛɛ papà, ndaa kàkyään ŋangɔɔm Ywel yan'kwo:
ACT 2:17 "Làler ndaa isàlyaaŋ kà ilä a ntsüü, mɛ in'sàtsuul Dweelà amɛ udu a mbuur wanswà, baan abɛ babaal anà bakaar bàsàtà ngɔɔm, mɛ in'sàtɛn kà imanmii akà baan ambɛy abɛ anà u ndwɛy akà anün abɛ.
ACT 2:18 Ɛɛ, mɛ in'sàtsuul Dweelà amɛ itàkal udu a asyääl amɛ babaal anà bakaar kà ilä abin, mɛ in'sàtsuul Dweelà amɛ, ba bàsàtà ngɔɔm.
ACT 2:19 Mɛ in'sàmɛɛy indiir a ubem untaal u du anà idiim ungyɛl udu a mɛɛn: an'kil, mbaa anà un'swey a un'diŋ a mbaa,
ACT 2:20 taaŋ làsàbulà mpib, nsöŋ asàbulà wàtsöö asànaa an'kil kusà a ilä a Mwol muyà, ilä a kölàköl anà kyàlàkoo.
ACT 2:21 Abun, mbuur wanswà asàbel ikɔb a Mwol asàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈."
ACT 2:22 Baar a Isàlɛl, làwem ndaa yi: Yɛsu un'nsi Nasàlɛr wà mbuur kàtöm Nzam ntɔn bɛ. Nde kàkyer isal a ngwal, indiir a ubem anà idiim uboo a bɛ asànaa làyöb bɛ ŋakwo,
ACT 2:23 mbuur awà bàkyer un'yälà kà an'kɔɔ a baar abɛ asànaa kàbön Nzam itaan unsà an'kyän ande. Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làkyer un'dwa, lun'bɛɛrà u kulunsi u kɔɔ a baar abɛ.
ACT 2:24 Wɛɛ Nzam kun'fuur u mɔ̈ɔ̈, kun'tsuuŋ unsà usaay a nkweel, ntɔn yàlàkwo anki naa an'lɔŋ mun'käär uboo a ikɔ̈b a ma.
ACT 2:25 Lalan David kàtɛn nde ntɔn nde naa: "Mɛ kàmɛnà Mwol taaŋ lanswà kusà a mɛ, ntɔn nde wà u kɔɔ amɛ là ibaal ntɔn mɛ in'kɔ̈ɔ̈n abwà.
ACT 2:26 Ntɔn ndaa ayi, mpem amɛ yà unsà un'sak anà mun amɛ wàmutwey ndaa a ntsà. Abun, ndür amɛ sye isàbɔ̈ɔ̈n unsà làkyän.
ACT 2:27 Ntɔn ngye, ngye mɛ asan'wɛy anki kà an'lɔŋ. Ngye asun'wɛy anki mbuur angye wàŋin'kyɛɛl upɔ̈ɔ̈n.
ACT 2:28 Ntɔn ngye mɛ kan'swɛŋ mbwo a mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà ngye asan'yööl a un'sak u mii a ngye."
ACT 2:29 Atɔŋ, wɛy mɛ alàkyään alää naa undweer David kàkyàkwà ndandaa, bàkyun'dyee. An'dii ande mà tsütsü apà bi tii ŋàbawà.
ACT 2:30 Wɛɛ nde kàkäl ŋangɔɔm anà kàkyer ayöbà naa Nzam kàdi kyän naa: "Mɛ in'sàsà ikyee angye u kir a imwol angye".
ACT 2:31 David kàyöb kusà ndaa iyàyà ntɔn ngwiiyà a Klistɔ, nde kàtɛɛnà naa Nzam asun'wɛy anki kà an'lɔŋ, nde sye usàwɛy anki ndür ande ipɔ̈ɔ̈n.
ACT 2:32 Yɛsu awà, Nzam kàkyun'wiiy, bi banswà ibà ambäl.
ACT 2:33 Abun, Nzam kun'sɛɛn, waa kun'si u kɔɔ ande là ibaal, nde kan'wal akà Taa Dweelà Inkyɛɛl kàbön nde, waa kàmun'tyaaŋ. Ayin ya làmanà anà làweemà bɛ yi.
ACT 2:34 Kutɛn aŋàbwaŋ, David kàbeenà anki du nde ŋakwo, wɛɛ nde kàtɛn naa: "Mwol kàtɛn a Mwol amɛ naa: Yabwaay u kɔɔ amɛ là ibaal,
ACT 2:35 tii mpal in'sàsà mɛ aŋankir angye u ngyɛl a in'kɔl angye."
ACT 2:36 Wɛy un'sɛŋ a Isàlɛl wanswà uyöb ndandaa naa Yɛsu akwà bɛ, lun'bɛɛrà bɛ u kulunsi, Nzam kàkyun'sà Mwol anà Klistɔ. »
ACT 2:37 Ndaa ayi yàpɛ mpay mbɔɔm akà baar bàwem ya. Ba bàfuul Petɔlà anà antööm bumwɛy naa: « Atɔŋ abaal, ininà bi kan'kwo mukyer? »
ACT 2:38 Petɔlà waa kafuur abà: « Làbuul mpem abɛ, wɛy mbuur mbuur uwɛl ndüümà kà ikɔb a Yɛsu Klistɔ, ntɔn bàladwääl nkul a man'be abɛ. Apan bɛ làsàwal kab a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl.
ACT 2:39 Ntɔn ilää kyà bɛ, ntɔn ikyee abɛ anà ntɔn in'sɛŋ a nsi a kwɛlàkwɛl usàbel Mwol Nzam abi tsütsü apà nde. »
ACT 2:40 Wɛɛ unsà ndaa yà ifà ifà, nde kàkweenà naa ba bàkyey ndaa kàtɛɛnà nde anà kalɔɔŋà nde naa: « Làkaabà a nkööl a lingyoomà yi. »
ACT 2:41 Abun baar bàkyey ndaa a Petɔlà bàwɛl ndüümà. Ilä akin baar bàbilà uboo a un'tüüb a aŋàlàkwikilà bàkäl kà isii a nsaab tär.
ACT 2:42 Wɛɛ ba bàsi muküünà mulab an'lɔɔŋ a Antööm, mukal un'tüüb ba banswà: ba bàkäbà, bàdyee anà bàyayamà ikal imwɛy.
ACT 2:43 Mbuur wanswà kàkäl u bɔɔmà, ntɔn Antööm bàkyerà impà anà idiim mbɔɔn.
ACT 2:44 Aŋàlàkwikilà banswà bàkälà ikal imwɛy, indiir aba byàkäl byà ba banswà.
ACT 2:45 Ba bàyälà mɛɛn anà indiir aba anà mukab bweel ba banswà mbuur mbuur u ngyal ande.
ACT 2:46 Unsà ukwen aba, ilä byanswà ba bàfabweyà u ndwà a Nzam. Unsà un'sak wanswà anà ukɔɔn nkyɛɛr u mpem, ba bàfadyaa ibööl u ndwà aba.
ACT 2:47 Ba bàfasyaŋà Nzam, baar banswà bakyer akweenà. Ilä byanswà Mwol kàkwɛyà kà Ikööŋ aba baar kàtswää nde mɔ̈ɔ̈.
ACT 3:1 Yàmɛnà naa ilä mwɛy Petɔlà anà Ywan bàkäl mubeenà ntɔn mukàyamà u ndwà a Nzam u taaŋ làtär ungö a midi.
ACT 3:2 Kyekà ilä byanswà ba bàfatwaalà ŋatoo mwɛy sɛmà mböör ande, waa bàfun'tɔɔlà u munàmbwo a ndwà a Nzam tsütsü a ibeenà bàfàbel naa « La Bɛɛl Pɔrte » ntɔn nde ulɔ̈ɔ̈mà ngim akà baar bàfabilà u ndwà a Nzam.
ACT 3:3 Umpal kàmɛn nde Petɔlà anà Ywan bàmubilà u ndwà a Nzam, nde kalɔ̈ɔ̈m ngim.
ACT 3:4 Petɔlà anà Ywan waa bun'syebà. Petɔlà kàtɛn a nde naa: « Iler. »
ACT 3:5 Mbuur awà kaler ubwaŋàbwaŋ. Nde kàsii naa nde awal undiir mwɛy akà ba.
ACT 3:6 Petɔlà waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mɛ ngim yatɛy, itàkal wɔl, wɛɛ undiir in'wà mɛ awà mɛ in'kyer apà wa: Kà ikɔb a Yɛsu Klistɔ un'nsi Nasàlɛr, mbarà, kyen. »
ACT 3:7 Apan nde kun'te mpi u kɔɔ ande là ibaal, waa kumbaar. Papan sye in'kɔl anà nkɔn a in'kɔl ande waa myàtsim,
ACT 3:8 nde waa kàfumà, kàmbarà, kàsɛmà mukyà dwaan. Nde kàbilà anà ba u ndwà a Nzam, wàmukyà, mufumà anà musyäŋà Nzam.
ACT 3:9 Baar banswà bun'mɛn mukyà dwaan anà musyäŋà Nzam.
ACT 3:10 Ba bàkyer ayöbà naa wà mbuur afàkal aŋàbwaay tsütsü a « La Bɛɛl Pɔrte » mulɔɔmà ngim. Muman ndaa yun'yeel, baar bàkäl mutɛɛr anà muman bɔɔmà aŋàkir.
ACT 3:11 Wɛɛ nde, nde kàsàwɛy anki Petɔlà anà Ywan. Un'sɛŋ wanswà kàyi wa, kàköŋ tsütsü apà ba u làpaŋ a ndwà a Nzam, ungyɛl a ta a ndwà a Salɔmun wàmutɛɛr a bɔɔmà.
ACT 3:12 Mpal kàmɛn Petɔlà abun, nde kàtɛn a un'sɛŋ naa: « Abaal a Isàlɛl, ntɔn nkye làkabemà bɛ ntɔn ndaa yan'lyaaŋ yi? Ntɔn nkye lileerà bɛ apɔŋaa asànaa u ngwal abi itàkal unsà inzaam abi waa bi kambaar mbuur wà?
ACT 3:13 Aay, wà Nzam a Abàlam, wà Izak anà Zakɔb, Nzam a bànkaa abi, kan'sà un'syääl ande Yɛsu làkoo, Yɛsu akwà bɛ, làyälà bɛ anà làtön bɛ u mii a Pilatu umpal kàkwen nde mukun'tsuuŋ.
ACT 3:14 Ɛɛ, bɛ, bɛ làkyer atɔn Ŋun'kyɛɛl anà wàbalàbal, wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làsɔ̈ɔ̈l un'dwää baar mukun'tswà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
ACT 3:15 Abun bɛ làdwä aŋamɔ̈ɔ̈. Wɛɛ Nzam kun'twey kà ukwà, bi ibà ambäl a ndaa ayi.
ACT 3:16 Ntɔn làkwikilà amu ikɔb a Yɛsu, ngwal a ikɔb aki yan'fuur ngwal ambarà akà mbuur làmanà bɛ anà làyöb bɛ wà. Làkwikilà amu Yɛsu lan'kɔɔr ubwaŋàbwaŋ mbuur wà kusà a bɛ banswà.
ACT 3:17 Wɛɛ apanà, atɔŋ, mɛ inkyàyöb naa ntɔn ukɔɔn ayöb waa bɛ anà amfum abɛ sye làkyer abà akà Yɛsu.
ACT 3:18 Wɛɛ Nzam kan'kwey ndaa kàtɛn nde itaan u mun a aŋangɔɔm ande naa Klistɔ ande akyer asàman mpay.
ACT 3:19 Abun, làbuul mpem abɛ, làsɔɔm nkääl abɛ, ntɔn mubiiŋ man'be abɛ.
ACT 3:20 Apan, Mwol asàtwaal paŋà a duu, waa usàtɔm mbuur kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l nde kusà ntɔn bɛ: Klistɔ Yɛsu.
ACT 3:21 Wɛɛ apanà, Yɛsu atàkal u du tii mpal isàsɔɔmà ndaa yanswà asànaa kàkyään Nzam u mun a aŋangɔɔm inkyɛɛl ande itaan.
ACT 3:22 Lalan, unsà ndaa ayi Mɔsɛ kàtɛn naa: "Mwol, Nzam abɛ asàlatweey ŋangɔɔm asànaa mɛ, nde asàkal umwɛy uboo a un'sɛŋ abɛ. Bɛ làkyer asàkyey ndaa yanswà usàlakyään nde.
ACT 3:23 Mbuur wanswà asàkɔɔn awem ndaa a ŋangɔɔm awà bàkyer asun'böŋ kà un'sɛŋ a Nzam."
ACT 3:24 Wɛɛ aŋangɔɔm bàtɛn sɛmà Sàmwel, ba banswà umwɛy umwɛy, bàkyer akyäänà ilä abi.
ACT 3:25 Ilää kàsi Nzam u mbwo a aŋangɔɔm kyà ntɔn bɛ, bɛ sye làbye anà kab uboo a nkwà kàdi Nzam anà andweer abɛ mpal kàtɛn nde a Abàlam naa: "Mɛ in'sàsaak an'bɔr manswà u mɛɛn u mbwo a ikyee angye."
ACT 3:26 Abun, Nzam kàtwey un'syääl ande utàtwɛb ntɔn bɛ, nde kun'töm ntɔn nde kàlasaak anà kàlalwom unsà an'kyän abɛ man'be. »
ACT 4:1 Umpal bàkäl Petɔlà anà Ywan mukyäänà un'sɛŋ a baar, angaŋ, mfum a aleer a ndwà a Nzam anà Asadusi waa bàyi.
ACT 4:2 Ba bàkäl anki un'sak unsà an'lɔɔŋ aba akà un'sɛŋ anà mukun'kyään naa Yɛsu akyàwiyà kà an'lɔŋ ntɔn muswaŋ naa akü bàkyer asàwiyà.
ACT 4:3 Ba waa bakör, basi u bɔlokà tii taaŋtyà, ntɔn sisye làkäl aŋàkwo itaan.
ACT 4:4 Apan, bàmbɔɔn uboo a baar bàwem ndaa a Antööm bàkyer akyey ya. Abun abaal aŋàlàkwikilà bàkɔlà kà isii a nsaab tyeen.
ACT 4:5 Yàmɛnà naa taaŋtyà, amfum a un'sɛŋ, andweer anà alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn bàköŋ u Yɛlusàlɛm,
ACT 4:6 anà An, undweer a angaŋ, anà Kayifà anà Ywan anà Aleksandre anà baar banswà bàkäl u ywar a undweer a angaŋ.
ACT 4:7 Ba bàsi Antööm uboboo, waa bafuul naa: « Unsà ikɔ̈b nà itàkal kikɔb anà bɛ, bɛ làkyerà ndaa ayi? »
ACT 4:8 Apan Petɔlà kàkäl aŋàyɔl a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Amfum a un'sɛŋ anà andweer,
ACT 4:9 isàkal naa ŋàbawà bàkifuulà ntɔn ubwaŋ kan'kyer bi ntɔn un'bɛy anà muyöb naa nde kan'kɔrà aben,
ACT 4:10 yubwaŋ naa bɛ anà un'sɛŋ a Isàlɛl wanswà làyöb naa unsà ikɔb a Yɛsu Klistɔ, un'nsi Nasàlɛr, mbuur akwà bɛ, bɛ lun'bɛɛrà u kulunsi anà kàtwey Nzam kà ukwà, waa mbuur wà kambar anà ngwal kusà a bɛ.
ACT 4:11 Mbuur awà wà nkɔŋ akwà làtön bɛ atööŋ anà kàbulà un'tswe a twɛrà a ndwà.
ACT 4:12 Lalan, ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈ yatɛy unsà mbuur asin, ntɔn uboo a baar u mɛɛn pà ikɔb a mbuur asin kyatɛy u mbwo a kya ban'kwo bi muwà mɔ̈ɔ̈. »
ACT 4:13 Baar a làbay a nsaŋ bàkäl mubem ntɔn bàmɛn ba uyɔl a Petɔlà anà Ywan anà muyöb naa ba bàkäl baar asànaa baar banswà, baar mpa bàtäŋ. Ba bàyöb naa ba bàyikalà ana Yɛsu.
ACT 4:14 Wɛɛ ba bàmɛnà sye mbuur kàkɔɔrà wà akyàmbar kusà a ba, ba undiir atɛn kàkäl anki.
ACT 4:15 Apan ba baswɛŋ mutoo u làbay a nsaŋ, waa bàbulà muyääm ba a ba, waa
ACT 4:16 bàtɛn naa: « Ininà bi kan'kwo mukyer anà baar bà? Ntɔn baar a Yɛlusàlɛm banswà bàkyàyöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ naa idiim aŋàmɛnà ba bàkyer. Bi ikwo anki mutɔn kya.
ACT 4:17 Wɛɛ ndaa ayi mukɔɔn apää uboo a un'sɛŋ wanswà, bi ikyer atsuŋ a ngwal ba mutɛn akà mbuur mwɛy kà ikɔb a akyɛy. »
ACT 4:18 Ba waa bàfabel, batsüŋ a ngwal mutɛn anà mulɔŋ kà ikɔb a Yɛsu.
ACT 4:19 Wɛɛ Petɔlà anà Ywan bafuur naa: « Làtsül bɛ ŋakwo, nkye yà balàbal u mii a Nzam, bi mulab ndaa abɛ anà mubɛy ndaa a Nzam?
ACT 4:20 Wɛɛ bi, bi iwɛy anki mukyään indiir kàmɛn bi anà kàwem bi. »
ACT 4:21 Baar a Làbay a nsaŋ bàläb mukasiinà a ngwal, waa bawɛy. Ba bàsàman anki mbwo mupà ba ntaaŋàmbar, ntɔn un'sɛŋ wanswà kàkäl musyäŋà Nzam ntɔn ndaa yàlyaaŋ.
ACT 4:22 Abun, mbuur awà kàkɔɔrà nkɔɔr impà kàkäl ayà mbul aŋàlyaŋ an'kwen an'nà.
ACT 4:23 Ungö batsuuŋ ba, ba bàkyen akà atɔŋ aba bumwɛy, waa bakyään indiir byanswà bàtɛn amfum a angaŋ anà andweer aba.
ACT 4:24 Ungö muwem ndaa ayi, ba bàlaal unsà un'tüüb akà Nzam, waa bàtɛn naa: « Mwol, ngye, ngye kàkyer du, mɛɛn, ngyäl anà indiir byanswà abyà uboo mwo,
ACT 4:25 u mbwo a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl, ngye kàten u mun a nkaa abi David, un'syääl angye naa: "Ntɔn nkye nsi yàbilà ya uboo a lingyoomà anà in'sɛŋ myàkyer mya indiir ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ndöŋ?
ACT 4:26 Amfum a mɛɛn bàkyer ayööŋ munwan, baar abye anà ikɔ̈b bàkyer aköŋ ntɔn munwan a Mwol anà Klistɔ ande.
ACT 4:27 Ntɔn, yà ndandaa naa Ɛlɔdi anà Pɔns Pilatu bàköŋ u bul alà anà angyey anà in'sɛŋ a Isàlɛl ntɔn mutɔn un'syääl angye wà in'kyɛɛl, Yɛsu kàsi ngye an'kɔɔ,
ACT 4:28 ntɔn mukyer indiir byanswà kàbön ngye anà kàkwen ngye kusà.
ACT 4:29 Wɛɛ apanà, Mwol, kyɛɛŋ ubwaŋàbwaŋ ndaa aba yàmbe, apɛ atsüüŋ angye mbwo mukyään ndaa angye unsà uyɔl.
ACT 4:30 Abun, swaŋ ngwal angye ntɔn nkɔɔr, impà anà idiim byàmɛnà kà ikɔb a un'syääl inkyɛɛl angye Yɛsu. »
ACT 4:31 Umpal bàmay ba muyamà, ikal bàkäl ba muköŋ kyàkyer atɛɛr, ba banswà bàyöl a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl, waa bàkyään ndaa a Nzam anà uyɔl.
ACT 4:32 Apan, un'sɛŋ a baar bàsi làkwikilà bàkäl mpem anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ mwɛy, akà umwɛy kàkyey anki naa indiir ande ikäl byànde mpɛl, wɛɛ indiir byanswà byàkäl byà un'sɛŋ.
ACT 4:33 Abun, unsà ngwal mbɔɔn, Antööm bàtɛɛ imbäl a ngwiiyà a Mwol Yɛsu, kab a ngway a kölàköl làkäl udu a ba.
ACT 4:34 Kyakin, akà mbuur umwɛy uboo a ba kàkɔ̈ɔ̈n anki undiir. Ntɔn baar bàkäl anà an'ywaŋ itàkal ndwà, bàkyer ayälà, bweel bàyälà ba indiir abin bàkyer atwaalà,
ACT 4:35 anà bàpɛɛ akà Antööm, ungö waa bàkäbà mbuur mbuur u ngyal ande.
ACT 4:36 Apan, Yɔsefi, Antööm bun'pɛ ikɔb a Barnabas, iswaŋà naa « Mbuur afàpà un'kanà. » Nde kàkäl un'lɛvi, un'nsi Sipriyɔt,
ACT 4:37 nde kayälà ywaŋ ande, waa kàpɛ ngim ayin akà Antööm.
ACT 5:1 Wɛɛ yàmɛnà naa mbuur mwɛy ikɔb ande Ananyas, ikɔb a un'kyay ande Safirà, ba bàyälà ywaŋ làmwɛy.
ACT 5:2 Ungö pa, un'tüüb mwɛy a un'kyay ande, nde kàyee yar a ngim làmwɛy, lumwɛy waa kàsyen, kàkàtɔl kà in'kɔl a Antööm.
ACT 5:3 Apan Petɔlà kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ananyas, ntɔn nkye Satanà uyööl nde mpem angye ntɔn ngye akür Dweelà Inkyɛɛl, waa ayee yar a ngim yan'fà u ngyäälà a ywaŋ?
ACT 5:4 Kusà ngye muyälà la, la kà làkäl làngye anki? Ungö ngye muyälà la, ngim ayin kà yàkäl kan'kɔɔ angye anki? Ntɔn nkye awel ngye an'kyän mukyer ndaa ayin? Ngye kà baar an'kur anki, wɛɛ ngye an'kur Nzam. »
ACT 5:5 Pa kàwɛm Ananyas ndaa ayi laa kàbü nde, waa kàkü. Baar banswà bàwem ndaa ayi, bɔɔmà làkyer akaar.
ACT 5:6 Apan atö laa bàmbarà ba, bun'läl ba ipfey, bun'syen ba u nsà, waa bun'dyee.
ACT 5:7 Yàmɛnà naa ungö a isii a an'taaŋ an'tär, un'kyay ande waa kàyàbilà, nde kàyöb anki ndaa yàlyaaŋ.
ACT 5:8 Petɔlà kun'fuul naa: « Nkyään, ngim làyälà bɛ ywaŋ abɛ, ayi? » Nde kàfuur naa: « Ɛɛ, ayi. »
ACT 5:9 Apan Petɔlà waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Bɛ làtüüb aben an'kyän musi Dweelà a Mwol? Leer ntääm a baar bàkàdyee un'dim angye u munàmbwo, ba sye bàkyer asyen u nsà. »
ACT 5:10 Nde kàbü sye kusà a in'kɔl ande, waa kàkü. Atö bàyàbilà ba, bun'mɛn ba wàŋàkwà, waa bun'syen, bàkun'dyee tsütsü apà un'dim ande.
ACT 5:11 Apan, baar a ndwà a Nzam banswà bàmɛn bɔɔmà mbɔɔn anà baar bàwɛm ndaa ayi.
ACT 5:12 Apan, u mbwo a an'kɔɔ a Antööm, idiim anà impà mbɔɔn byàkyer amɛnà uboo a un'sɛŋ a baar. Ba banswà sye bàkälà un'tüüb mwɛy uboo a un'lwaaŋ a an'ta a Salɔmun.
ACT 5:13 Wɛɛ akà mbuur asin wà nsà kàkwe anki mutüüb anà ba, wɛɛ un'sɛŋ kàkyer akanà mbɔɔn.
ACT 5:14 Lalan un'sɛŋ abaal anà akaar mbɔɔn bàsye làkwikilà amu Mwol, bàtüübà anà ba.
ACT 5:15 Ba sye bàtweyà baar an'kyal u mbwo, basyee udu a bitäb, taaŋ lumwɛy udu a bipɔy, ntɔn utaaŋ uyàlyaaŋ Petɔlà, munii ande ufwee itàkal umwɛy uboo a ba.
ACT 5:16 Un'sɛŋ a baar mbɔɔn bàfwee an'bul a tsütsü a Yɛlusàlɛm, bàtwäälà baar an'kyal anà baar bàkäl anà dweelà a làbe, ba banswà bàkyer akɔɔrà.
ACT 5:17 Apan, undweer a angaŋ anà baar banswà bàkäl anà nde, baar a un'tüüb a Asadusi, bàyöm mpem ntɔn Antööm,
ACT 5:18 waa bakör, basi u bɔlokà a baar banswà.
ACT 5:19 Wɛɛ uboboo a mpib, un'kyeey a Mwol kàduub ibeenà a bɔlokà, waa katwey anà mukàtɛn a ba naa:
ACT 5:20 « Làkyen, làmbär uboo a ndwà a Nzam, waa làkyään akà un'sɛŋ ndaa a mɔ̈ɔ̈ ayi yanswà. »
ACT 5:21 Ba bàkyer un'wem: ba bàkyen ututu tutu u ndwà a Nzam, waa bàsɛmà mulɔŋ. Undweer a angaŋ anà baar bàkäl anà nde bàbel baar a làbay a nsaŋ a kölàköl anà un'syääl a andweer a baan a Isàlɛl, waa bàtöm baar muwal Antööm u bɔlokà.
ACT 5:22 Wɛɛ utaaŋ ban'yà ba u bɔlokà, ba bamɛn anki. Ban'furà ba, ba bakyään
ACT 5:23 anà bàtɛn naa: « Bi bɔlokà ikàman làŋàdübà a kwab kwab, aseey bàkäl kà ikal aba kusà a munàmbwo. Wɛɛ umpal kan'duub bi, bi mbuur imɛn anki uboo. »
ACT 5:24 Mpal bàwɛm ba ndaa ayin, mfum a aleer a ndwà a Nzam anà amfum a angaŋ bàkäl kà ubem anà muyweer naa ndaa nà yàyeel antööm.
ACT 5:25 Wɛɛ mbuur mwɛy kayi mukasam naa: « Làler baar làbiil bɛ u bɔlokà, ba abanà uboo a ndwà a Nzam mukalɔɔŋà un'sɛŋ ndaa aba. »
ACT 5:26 Apan, mfum a aseey anà asyääl bàkàwal antööm a duu ntɔn ba bàmɛnà bɔɔmà naa manà baar balom in'kul.
ACT 5:27 Ungö batwääl ba, ba batɔ̈l u làbay a nsaŋ a kölàköl. Mfum a angaŋ kafuul naa:
ACT 5:28 « Nkye bi kàlatsüŋ anki mulɔŋ kà ikɔb aki? Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ lan'yööl Yɛlusàlɛm anà an'lɔɔŋ abɛ, bɛ làkwen muwɔm an'kil a mbuur awà udu a bi! »
ACT 5:29 Petɔlà anà Antööm bumwɛy bafuur naa: « Yubwaŋ mulab Nzam wɛɛ kà baar anki.
ACT 5:30 Nzam a andweer abi kàwiiy Yɛsu akwà làdwä bɛ mpal lun'bɛɛrà bɛ u kulunsi.
ACT 5:31 Mbuur akwà kàsɛɛn Nzam u kɔɔ ande là ibaal asànaa nkum anà Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ ntɔn mupà mbwo akà baar a Isàlɛl musɔɔmà anà muwal ndwääl a nkul a man'be aba.
ACT 5:32 Wɛɛ bi, bi ibà ambäl a ndaa ayi, bi anà Dweelà In'kyɛɛl kàpɛ Nzam akà baar bàfun'lab. »
ACT 5:33 Mpal bàwem ba ndaa ayin, un'fur a nkyɛl kàkyer awal, waa bàkwen mukadwa.
ACT 5:34 Wɛɛ kàkäl anà Umfarisi umwɛy uboo a ba, ikɔb ande Ngàmàlyɛl, un'lɔɔŋ a un'kɔɔn kàfakwenà un'sɛŋ wanswà, kàkyer ambarà, waa kàswɛŋ naa batwey ikikye antööm,
ACT 5:35 waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Abaal a Isàlɛl, làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ ntɔn bɛ ŋakwo unsà undiir làkwen bɛ mukyer akà baar bà.
ACT 5:36 Lalan, itaan a mbɔɔn tɛy, mbuur mwɛy ikɔb ande Tɛwudas kàkyer ayàmɛnà, waa kàkyey uyɔl naa nde wà un'byääl. Isii a abaal nkam nà bàkyer un'lab. Wɛɛ nde bàkyer un'dwa, baar banswà bàkyer apay. Akà undiir kàfàkal anki.
ACT 5:37 Ungö a nde, utaaŋ musɔn ikɔb, mbuur mwɛy un'nsi Ngalilɛ kàkyer ayàmɛnà, ikɔb ande Yudas. Nde kàsyen un'sɛŋ a baar u mpey. Nde sye bàkyer un'dwa, baar bàkäl anà nde banswà bàkyer apay.
ACT 5:38 Wɛɛ apanà, mɛ in'tɛn a bɛ naa twon laläb, lawɛy ba bàkyen. Isàkal naa an'kyän anà isal aba byan'fà akà baar, bya ikyer ayàdiimà.
ACT 5:39 Wɛɛ, isàkal naa bya byan'fà akà Nzam, bɛ làkwe anki mudwa bya, naa tɛy, bɛ làyànwan sye a Nzam! » Ba bàsyääl an'kyän ande.
ACT 5:40 Abun, ba bàbel Antööm, bakäm an'füm, batsüŋ mutà ikɔb a Yɛsu din, waa bawɛy.
ACT 5:41 Apan sye, ba bàlwomà u làbay a nsaŋ a kölàköl unsà un'sak wanswà muman naa bàmatwey an'yɔl muman ntaan ntɔn ikɔb a Yɛsu.
ACT 5:42 Abun, ilä byanswà uboo a ndwà a Nzam anà uboo a ndwà a baar, ba bàwɛy anki mulɔŋ anà mupay Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là Klistɔ Yɛsu.
ACT 6:1 Kà ilä abin, ntal a alɔŋki yàkyer alaar, yàmɛnà naa bà Elɛnit bàkäl anki un'sak anà bà Ɛbɛlyɔ ntɔn akweel adim aba bayɔbà anki taaŋ lanswà unsà nkääb a indiir a ilä a ilä.
ACT 6:2 Lalan Bàkwem Aŋiyweel bàtüüb ba un'kàbɔ a alɔŋki, waa bàtɛn a ba naa: « Kà yubwaŋ anki naa bi iwɛy ndaa a Nzam ntɔn mukab isaa adyà.
ACT 6:3 Abun, làsɔ̈ɔ̈l uboo a bɛ baar nsambwaar abye anà imbäl aŋàbwaŋ bàŋàyɔl a Dweelà anà an'yeerà, waa bi iyapà isal aki.
ACT 6:4 Ntɔn bi, bi iyàlab mupà taaŋ abi u ngyamàkà anà mulɔŋ Ndaa. »
ACT 6:5 Nköŋ yanswà yàkyey an'kyän amà: Ba bàsɔ̈ɔ̈l Ityen, mbuur aŋàyɔl a làkwikilà anà Dweelà In'kyɛɛl, anà Filipo, Pɔlɔkɔr, Nikanɔr, Timɔnà, Palàmɛnas anà Nikɔlà un'nsi Antyɔsha kàbulà un'yudà unsà inzaam.
ACT 6:6 Ba baswɛŋ akà Antööm, Antööm bàyamà ntɔn ba, waa basi an'kɔɔ.
ACT 6:7 Apan, ndaa a Nzam yàpää aŋàsöönà. Ntal a alɔŋki yàbulà ya mbɔɔn a mbɔɔn u Yɛlusàlɛm, un'sɛŋ a angaŋ mbɔɔn kàläb làkwikilà.
ACT 6:8 Abun, Ityen kàkäl aŋàyɔl a kab a ngway anà ngwal, nde kàkyerà impà anà idiim a kölàköl uboo a un'sɛŋ.
ACT 6:9 Wɛɛ baar amwɛy uboo a baar a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà bàfabeelà naa asɔ aŋàtsuŋà, anà baar a Sirɛn anà Alɛksandri anà Silisi anà Azi, ba bàsɛmà musyeel mbaaŋ anà Ityen.
ACT 6:10 Wɛɛ ba bàkwe anki mutɔn an'yeerà anà Dweelà kàsyäälà nde mutɛn.
ACT 6:11 Ba bàpɛɛ baar nsɛm ntɔn ba bàtɛn naa: « Bi kan'wem, nde wàmubɛy Mɔsɛ anà Nzam. »
ACT 6:12 Apan, ba bàsiinà un'sɛŋ anà andweer anà alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn, waa bàyi, bàkör Ityen kà imbürà, waa bun'syen u làbay a nsaŋ a kölàköl.
ACT 6:13 Akun, ba bun'twääl ambäl a loor bàtɛn naa: « Mbuur wà usàwɛy anki mutɛn ndaa a mbe akà ikal abi kyà in'kyɛɛl anà akà Un'kɔɔn.
ACT 6:14 Bi kàwem u mun ande naa Yɛsu, un'nazɔrya wà, ayàbwaab Ikal ki anà ayàsɔɔm nkääl abi kàsiwɛɛy Mɔsɛ. »
ACT 6:15 Apan baar banswà bàkäl mutsul nsaŋ u làbay a nsaŋ a kölàköl, ileer aba byàkäl akà Ityɛn, ba bàmɛn ntabwey ande asànaa ntabwey a un'kyeey.
ACT 7:1 Mfum a angaŋ kun'fuul naa: « Nkye ndaa ya bàkatɛɛnà yi a ngye yà ndandaa? »
ACT 7:2 Wɛɛ Ityen kàfuur naa: « Atɔŋ anà bàtaa, lan'wem. Nzam a làkoo kàyàmɛnà akà taaràbi Abàlam umpal kàkäl nde u Mɛsɔpɔtami, kusà nde mukàkal u Aran.
ACT 7:3 Waa nde kun'sam naa: "Lwomà u bul angye anà ywar angye, kyen bul alà in'yaswaŋ mɛ."
ACT 7:4 Abun, Abàlam kàlwomà u bul aba Syaldɛyɛn mukàkal u Aran. Akun, ungö a nkweel a taarànde, Nzam kàyun'tɔl u nsi làbà bɛ yi ŋàbà.
ACT 7:5 Abun, nde kun'pɛ anki akà ywaŋ mwɛy, itàkal itiir a mɛɛn, wɛɛ nde kun'pɛ ilää mukun'pà mɛɛn ande anà baan ande ungö a nkweel ande. Wɛɛ Abàlam kàkäl anki anà mwan.
ACT 7:6 Kyakin Nzam kun'kyään naa: "Ikyee ande bàsàkal u nsi a baar asin, ba bàsàbulà asɔ anà bàsatà an'kaal mbul nkam nà.
ACT 7:7 Wɛɛ mɛ in'sàtsul nsaŋ a nsi ayisàbuul ba asɔ. Ungö a indiir abi, ba bàkyer asàtoo anà bàsan'syaŋà kà ikal aki."
ACT 7:8 Ungö apan Nzam kàdi nkwà anà nde, idiim a wa kyàkäl nkyɛɛy. Kyakin Abàlam kàkyɛy nde mwan ande Izak kà ilä kyà naan ungö a mböör ande. Izak sye kàkyer abun akà Yakɔb, Yakɔb waa kàkyer akà ankum bà kwem aŋiyweel.
ACT 7:9 Ankum bàyöm mpem ntɔn Yɔsɛfi, ba bàkyer un'yälà ntɔn bun'syen Ngipiti. Wɛɛ Nzam kàkäl anà nde.
ACT 7:10 Abun, nde kun'lwom uboo a ngyɛb, waa kun'pɛ kab anà an'yeerà kusà a Falawɔ, mfum a Ngipiti, nde kun'si mfum ikikye u Ngipiti anà udu a ndwà ande yanswà.
ACT 7:11 Wɛɛ umpal ayin, ngyal mbɔɔn yàbilà u Ngipiti wanswà anà u Kanana. Ngyɛb yàkäl mbɔɔn, bàtaaràbi bàmɛnà anki isaa adyà.
ACT 7:12 Mpal kàyöb Yakɔb naa isaa byàkäl u Ngipiti, nde kàtöm bàtaaràbi u mbalà atàtwɛb.
ACT 7:13 U mbalà yàyweel, nde kàkyer naa atɔŋ ande bun'yöb, apan Falawɔ waa kàyöb ntsü kàfü Yɔsɛfi.
ACT 7:14 Ungö apan Yɔsɛfi katöm mukàbel taarànde Yakɔb anà ywar ande lanswà, ba bàkäl baar an'kwem nsambwaar aŋityeen.
ACT 7:15 Apan, Yakɔb kàtyà Ngipiti, waa kàkàkwà kwo anà bàtaaràbi,
ACT 7:16 waa basyen u Sishɛm, batɔ̈ɔ̈l uboo a an'lom kàsöm Abàlam a ngim akà baan a Amɔr, taar a Sishɛm.
ACT 7:17 Ungö apan, taaŋ kàsi Nzam ntɔn ilää kàpɛ nde akà Abàlam kyàkäl tsütsü mukwo, un'sɛŋ kàkyer ayɛl, baar bàbulà mbɔɔn u Ngipiti
ACT 7:18 tii umpal kàwɛl mfum asin imfum u Ngipiti. Nde Yɔsɛfi kàsun'yöb anki.
ACT 7:19 Mfum awà kàkür un'sɛŋ abi anà kàpɛ bànkaa abi mpay muswaŋ ba a ngwal mupiy baan a kɔɔ aba ntɔn ba bàkü.
ACT 7:20 Umpal ayin bàbör ba Mɔsɛ awà kàkäl ntwɛn mbɔɔn u mii a Nzam. Nde bun'bɔɔŋ ngɔn tär u ndwà a taarànde.
ACT 7:21 Mpal bàkun'tɔɔl ba, mwan a Falawɔ wun'kaar laa kun'wɛl nde, waa kun'ywaaŋ nkà.
ACT 7:22 Mɔsɛ bun'lɔŋ unsà an'yeerà a baar a Ngipiti manswà. Nde kàkäl un'te baal unsà ntɛɛn anà unsà nsyääl ande.
ACT 7:23 Mpal kàkölà nde mbul an'kwem an'nà, ankyän màyi u mpem ande mukàler atɔŋ ande baan a Isàlɛl.
ACT 7:24 Akun nde kàmɛn mbuur mwɛy wàmukyerà mwan a Isàlɛl mwɛy ube, nde kàwɛɛl mbuur bàkyeer ube wà, waa kàdwä Un'ngipiti wa.
ACT 7:25 Abun nde kàsii muswaŋ atɔŋ ande naa u mbwo ande Nzam kàlatswà mɔ̈ɔ̈, wɛɛ ba bàsàyöb anki.
ACT 7:26 Wɛɛ ilä kyàlääb paa, nde an'kàmɛnà akà ba mpal bàkäl ba munwan ba a ba, nde waa katsuuŋ, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: "Abaal, bɛ làbà atɔŋ, ntɔn nkye làkyerà bɛ ube bɛ a bɛ?"
ACT 7:27 Wɛɛ mbuur akwà kàkyerà un'tɔŋ ande ube kàtön Mɔsɛ, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: "Nà kasi mfum anà ntɛɛn udu a bi?
ACT 7:28 Nkye ngye akwen mukan'dwa asànaa kàdwä ngye un'ngipiti ywenà?"
ACT 7:29 Ntɔn ndaa ayi, Mɔsɛ laa kàtiin nde, waa kàkàbwaay u nsi a Madyani, mper kàbör nde baan abaal bɔ̈ɔ̈l.
ACT 7:30 Ungö a mbul an'kwem an'nà, un'kyeey mwey kàkàmɛnà akà nde u nsye a ipɔl yà mɔŋ a Sinayi uboo a làlɛm a mbaa a ibwiy.
ACT 7:31 Mpal kàmɛn Mɔsɛ abun, nde kàbem mbɔɔn ntɔn iman mii akin. Wɛɛ mpal kàsin nde tsütsü muler naa nkye ikalyaaŋà, nde kàwɛm ndaa a Mwol yàmutɛn naa:
ACT 7:32 "Mɛ in'wà Nzam a bàtaaràŋà, Nzam a Abàlam, a Izak anà wà Yakɔb." Mɔsɛ kàkyer atɛɛr a bɔɔmà, kàfàkwo anki muler.
ACT 7:33 Apan, Mwol waa kun'sam naa: "Lwoom idyaar abyà kà in'kɔl angye, ntɔn ikal awà ngye kin mà mɛɛn in'kyɛɛl.
ACT 7:34 Mɛ kàkyàman mpay a un'sɛŋ amɛ u Ngipiti anà in'tär aba. Lalan mɛ an'yàtyà ntɔn mukatsuuŋ. Kyen apanà, mɛ inkwen mukatɔm u Ngipiti."
ACT 7:35 Mɔsɛ awà, ba bàkyer un'tɔn, waa bàtɛn a nde naa: "Nà kasi mfum anà ntɛɛn?" Nzam kàkyer un'tɔm asànaa mfum anà ntɛɛn, u mbwo a un'kyeey akwà kàyamɛnà akà nde uboo a ibwiy.
ACT 7:36 Nde mbuur awà kàtwey baan a Isàlɛl, mukyer impà anà idiim u Ngipiti, u ngyäl a tsöö anà u nsye a ipɔl mbul an'kwem an'nà.
ACT 7:37 Mɔsɛ nsil awà kàtɛn a baan a Isàlɛl naa: "Nzam ayàtwey ŋangɔɔm mwɛy asànaa mɛ uboo a atɔŋ abɛ."
ACT 7:38 Mbuur nsil awà, utaaŋ a nköŋ u nsye a ipɔl, nde kàkäl nkalsà a bànkaa abi anà un'kyeey akwà kàtɛɛnà a nde udu a mɔŋ a Sinayi, nde mbuur kàwɛlà ndaa a mɔ̈ɔ̈ ntɔn mupà akà bi.
ACT 7:39 Wɛɛ bànkaa abi bàkwen anki mukun'wem, ba bàkyer un'tɔn, an'kyän aba màfurà Ngipiti.
ACT 7:40 Abun, ba bàtɛn a Alɔn naa: "Ikyeer bànzam bàyàkal kusà abi, ntɔn bi iyöb anki naa Mɔsɛ akwà kà itwey u Ngipiti nkye kan'bulà."
ACT 7:41 Apan, ba bàkyer un'tö a ngɔɔmà, waa bàpɛɛ ibɔɔn akà wa, bàyakyerà un'kyɔm a indiir bàkyerà ba a an'kɔɔ aba.
ACT 7:42 Wɛɛ Nzam kapɛ ngö, waa kawɛy musyäŋà indiir a du, asànaa bàsön uboo a un'kaan a aŋangɔɔm naa: "In'sɛŋ a Isàlɛl, nkye kà akà mɛ anki bɛ làpɛɛ ntsür anà ibɔɔn asin mbul an'kwem an'nà u nsye a ipɔl?
ACT 7:43 Wɛɛ bɛ làbwäär ntɛn a Mɔlɔk anà mbwaar a nzam abɛ Rɛfan, abi itɛk làkyer bɛ ntɔn bɛ làsyeel bya làkoo. Kyakin, mɛ in'sàkàlasà asɔ lyaaŋ Babilɔn."
ACT 7:44 U nsye a ipɔl bànkaa abi bàkäl anà ntɛn a imbäl. Mbuur kàyäämà a Mɔsɛ kun'swɛŋ naa nde ukyer wa asànaa idiim kàmɛn nde.
ACT 7:45 Umpal bàwɛl bàtaa abi ya, ba anà Yɔswa bàbiil ya u mɛɛn a in'sɛŋ kàböŋ Nzam kusà aba. Ya yàkäl kwo tii upaŋà a David.
ACT 7:46 David kàwɛl kab angway akà Nzam, waa kàlɔ̈m akà nde ikal mutɔŋ ndwà in'kyɛɛl ntɔn ywar a Yakɔb.
ACT 7:47 Wɛɛ mbuur kun'tööŋ ndwà Salɔmun.
ACT 7:48 Wɛɛ Nzam a dudu afàbɔ̈ɔ̈n anki u ndwà bàtöŋ baar kà an'kɔɔ aba, asànaa kàtɛn nde u mun a ŋangɔɔm naa:
ACT 7:49 "Du là kir a imfum amɛ, mɛɛn mà ikal in'fàsà mɛ in'kɔl amɛ. Ndwà nà bɛ lan'kwo mutööŋ mɛ? Itàkal naa ikal nà mɛ an'kwo muyöör?
ACT 7:50 Nkye kà an'kɔɔ amɛ anki màkyer indiir abi byanswà?"
ACT 7:51 Bɛ, baar a ibway aŋàbwà un'sey, mpa bàkyɛy mpem anà an'tsü, bɛ làfàmbäär Dweelà In'kyɛɛl taaŋ lanswà! Bɛ, bɛ làbà asànaa bànkaa abɛ.
ACT 7:52 Uboo a aŋangɔɔm banswà, nà bànkaa abɛ mpa bàmɛɛy nkwaaŋ? Ba bàdwä baar abà bàkyäänà kusà a ngyeel a mbuur a balàbal mwɛy mpɛl. Wɛɛ ŋàbawà bɛ, bɛ làmun'yälà anà làmun'dwa.
ACT 7:53 Bɛ baar làwɛl un'kɔɔn u mbwo a akyeey, wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ wa làfàlab anki! »
ACT 7:54 Mpal bàwem ba indiir abi, un'fur a nkyɛl kàwɛl mpem aba, waa bàkwoorà an'din.
ACT 7:55 Wɛɛ nde, nde kàkäl aŋàyɔl a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl, waa kàsyebà du, kàmɛn làkoo a Nzam anà Yɛsu kàkyàbwaay u kɔɔ a Nzam là ibaal.
ACT 7:56 Waa kàtɛn naa: « Làler, mɛ in'wàmumanà an'du màŋàduub, Mwan a mbuur wàŋàbwaay u kɔɔ a Nzam là ibaal. »
ACT 7:57 Apan, ba bàsi in'kwɛŋ, waa bàdübà an'tsü. Ba banswà waa bun'bürà,
ACT 7:58 bun'syen u nsà a bul, waa bun'kämà in'kul. Ambäl ipfɛy aba bàtɔ̈ɔ̈là kà in'kɔl a mwan baal mwɛy ikɔb ande Sɔl.
ACT 7:59 Mpal bàkäl ba mukun'lomà in'kul, Ityen kàyamà naa: « Mwol Yɛsu, wal dweelà amɛ! »
ACT 7:60 Apan, nde kàbü an'köm, waa kàlaal: « Mwol, twon an'tälà buur a ube bà udu a ba! » Ungö mutɛn abà, nde waa kàkü.
ACT 8:1 Wɛɛ Sɔl kàkyer akyey nkweel a Ityen. Ilä nsil akin nkwaaŋ a ngwal yàsɛmà ntɔn Ikööŋ a Yɛlusàlɛm. Baar bàkyey ndaa a Nzam banswà bàtɛ upay u Yuday anà u Samàlya. Antööm mpɛl bàsàsal.
ACT 8:2 Apan, baar a mpem aŋàbwaŋ bàdyee Ityen, waa bun'lel mbɔɔn.
ACT 8:3 Wɛɛ Sɔl kàkyer ngwal mudwa Ikööŋ, nde kàyibilà u ndwà mukɔr abaal anà akaar anà mukabiil u bɔlokà.
ACT 8:4 Baar abà bàpää bàyilyaaŋà ntsü anà ntsü mupay Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là Ndaa.
ACT 8:5 Lalan Filipo kàkyen nde bul mwɛy là Samalya mukyään ba làsaŋ a Klistɔ.
ACT 8:6 Apan, unsà un'tüüb, in'sɛŋ a baar myàkäl maàŋàbääb u ndaa kàtɛɛnà Filipo ntɔn ba bàweemà anà bàmɛnà impà kàkyerà nde.
ACT 8:7 Abun, an'dweelà an'be màkyer atɔɔ akà baar bàkäl anà ma u ndaa a ngwal. Baar aŋàkwɛkà anà ikar bàkyer akɔɔrà.
ACT 8:8 Lalan, un'sak kàkäl wàmbɔɔn u bul alan.
ACT 8:9 Wɛɛ u bul alan kàfwel anà mbuur mwɛy ikɔb ande Simɔn. Nde kàfakyerà inwɛŋ anà kàbemà ngwal un'sɛŋ a Samàlya. Nde kakyeyà uyɔl naa nde mpɛl awà mbuur a kölàköl.
ACT 8:10 Apan, baar banswà, sɛmà baan akye tii akà andweer, bun'wemà unsà igyɛɛŋ kyanswà mutɛɛnà naa: « Mbuur awà wà ngwal a Nzam ayà bàfàbel naa: "Ngwal a kölàköl." »
ACT 8:11 Ba bun'weemà kà igyɛɛŋ, ntɔn ba bàbemà inwɛŋ ande taaŋ mbɔɔn.
ACT 8:12 Wɛɛ umpal bàkyey ba Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là imfum a Nzam anà ikɔb a Yɛsu Klistɔ kàlɔɔŋà Filipo, abaal anà akaar bàwɛl ndüümà.
ACT 8:13 Simɔn ŋakwo sye kàsi làkwikilà, waa kàwɛl ndüümà, wɛɛ nde Filipo kun'wɛy anki, ntɔn nde kàkyer abemà muman idiim anà ndaa a ngwal yàlyaaŋà.
ACT 8:14 Mpal ban'wem Antööm bàkäl u Yɛlusàlɛm naa baar a Samàlya ban'kyey Ndaa a Nzam, ba batööm Petɔlà anà Ywan.
ACT 8:15 Mpal bàyàkɔlà ba u Samàlya, ba bàyamà ntɔn ba naa ba bàwɛl Dweelà In'kyɛɛl.
ACT 8:16 Ntɔn Dweelà In'kyɛɛl kàkäl aŋàtàyàtyà anki akà udu a umwɛy uboo a ba: ba badümà mpɛl kà ikɔb a Mwol Yɛsu.
ACT 8:17 Abun, Petɔlà anà Ywan bàsi an'kɔɔ, ba waa bàwɛl Dweelà In'kyɛɛl.
ACT 8:18 Abà kàmɛn Simɔn naa baar bàwɛlà Dweelà mpal basi Antööm an'kɔɔ, nde kàpɛ Petɔlà anà Ywan in'naaŋ,
ACT 8:19 waa kàtɛn naa: « Lan'pɛ mɛ sye ikɔ̈b, ntɔn taaŋ in'yasaa mɛ baar an'kɔɔ ba sye bàwɛl Dweelà In'kyɛɛl. »
ACT 8:20 Wɛɛ Petɔlà kun'fuur naa: « Wɛy ngim angye ikü anà ngye ŋakwo ntɔn ngye akasii naa kab a Nzam bàfàsom a in'naaŋ!
ACT 8:21 Uboo a ndaa ayi, ngye akà kitiir, akà yar latɛy, ntɔn mpem angye kà yàbalàbal anki kusà a Nzam.
ACT 8:22 Buul mpem angye, yamà Mwol ntɔn u taaŋ lumwɛy, nde akyer awem ngyɛb unsà an'kyän awà ngye amà.
ACT 8:23 Mɛ an'man naa ndandaa ngye awɛ anà ube bàŋàsöön anà ngye awà un'sɔ a ube. »
ACT 8:24 Waa Simɔn kàtɛn naa: « Bɛ ŋakwo làyamà Mwol ntɔn mɛ, ntɔn undiir mwɛy ukɔ̈ɔ̈n ayà unsà ya yanswà lan'tɛn bɛ yi. »
ACT 8:25 Ungö mutà imbäl anà mulɔŋ ndaa a Mwol, ba bàfurà Yɛlusàlɛm. U mbwo ba bàyipayà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ uboo an'bul mbɔɔn mà Samàlya.
ACT 8:26 Yàmɛnà naa un'kyeey a Mwol mwɛy kàyääm anà Filipo, waa kàtɛn naa: « Mbarà, kyen ntsü a ngyɛl, u mbwo ifàtyà sɛmà Yɛlusàlɛm tii u Gaza. Mbwo ayi yà ipɔl. »
ACT 8:27 Apan Filipo waa kàmbarà, kàkyen agyägyä. Kyekà yɔl mwɛy wà Ɛtyɔpi, mbuur a isal a kölàköl, isal ande musyäl un'naaŋ a Kandase, mfum un'kaar a Ɛtyɔpi, nde kàfü Yɛlusàlɛm ntɔn mukàkömà Nzam.
ACT 8:28 Mpal kàfurà nde, nde kàkäl aŋàbwaay udu a shar wàmutaŋ un'kaan a ŋangɔɔm Yɛsay.
ACT 8:29 Dweelà waa kàtɛn a Filipo naa: « Sin, kabweey a shar lanà. »
ACT 8:30 Apan, Filipo kàkyà ntiin, waa kàwem mbuur a Ɛtyɔpi wàmutaŋ u ndaa a ngwal un'kaan a ŋangɔɔm Yɛsay. Filipo waa kun'fuul naa: « Nkye ngye akiyöbà ndaa akataŋà ngye yi? »
ACT 8:31 Nde kàfuur naa: « Mɛ an'kwo muyöb aben, isàkal naa mbuur kan'buul anki? » Nde kàlɔ̈ɔ̈m Filipo mulaar anà mubwaay ukɔl a nde.
ACT 8:32 Itiir a ndaa kàtäŋà nde kyaki: « Nde kàkäl asànaa un'kɔk bàfàsyen kà idwääl, asànaa mwan a un'kɔk mpa afàsà ndaa kusà a mbuur awà kun'kɔɔlà in'kà. Lalan nde mun ufàduub anki.
ACT 8:33 Uboo a làbɔ̈ɔ̈n ande, nde kàwɛl anki iböŋ. Nà kan'kwo mutɛn ntɔn ikyee ande? Ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande bàkyer alwom u mɛɛn. »
ACT 8:34 Wɛɛ yɔl a Ɛtyɔpi kàfuul Filipo naa: « Mɛ amabɔɔn, nkyään, ntɔn nà ŋangɔɔm ukatɛɛnà nde abà? Ntɔn nde ŋakwo lɛɛ ntɔn mbuur asin? »
ACT 8:35 Filipo kàduub mun, waa kàsɛmà kà itiir a ndaa aŋàsɔn aki, mukun'kyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là Yɛsu.
ACT 8:36 Ba bàkäl mulab mbwo aba, waa bàkɔlà kà ikal mwɛy kyàkäl anà an'dà. Yɔl awà kàtɛn naa: « Le an'dà, undiir nà kan'kɔɔn mukan'dümà? »
ACT 8:37 Apan, Filipo waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Isàkal naa ngye an'kyey u mpem angye yanswà, ngye an'kwo awɛl ndüümà. » Mbuur awà waa kàfuur naa: « Mɛ an'kyey naa Yɛsu Klistɔ wà Mwan a Nzam. »
ACT 8:38 Apan nde kàswɛŋ mubäm shar ande. Ba bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l, Filipo anà yɔl, bàtɔlà kan'dà, waa Filipo kun'dümà.
ACT 8:39 Umpal bàtoo ba kà an'dà, Dweelà a Mwol kàsyen Filipo, yɔl kàfun'man anki. Wɛɛ nde kàläb mbwo ande unsà un'sak.
ACT 8:40 Apan, Filipo kàkàmɛnà u Azɔt, nde kàyipayà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ kà an'bul manswà kàlyaaŋà nde tii u Sɛzarɛ.
ACT 9:1 Yàmɛnà naa utaaŋ alan, Sɔl kàkwen anki uwɛy mupà alɔŋki a Mwol mpay a ukwà. Nde kàkàman undweer a angaŋ,
ACT 9:2 ntɔn mulɔm in'kaan mubilà u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà u Damas, isàkal naa nde kan'man baar, itàkal abaal itàkal akaar abà bàläbà Mbwo, nde waa kakɔr anà katwääl u Yɛlusàlɛm.
ACT 9:3 Wɛɛ mpal kàkäl nde u mbwo tsütsü a Damas, kà imbürà, un'ŋyäŋ a pɛɛlà kàfü du, waa kun'diŋà.
ACT 9:4 Nde kàbü u mɛɛn, waa kàwem ndaa yàmutɛɛnà a nde naa: « Sɔl, Sɔl, ntɔn nkye an'mɛɛyà ngye nkwaaŋ? »
ACT 9:5 Nde kàfuul naa: « Ngye awà nà, Mwol? » Ndaa waa itɛn naa: « Ɛɛ, mɛ in'wà Yɛsu akwà ngye, afàmɛɛy ngye nkwaaŋ.
ACT 9:6 Wɛɛ mbarà, bilà uboo a bul, bàkyer akakyään undiir ayàkyer ngye kwo. »
ACT 9:7 Abaal kàyilyaaŋà nde abà, bàkyer atsum mun, ba bàweemà ndaa, wɛɛ ba mbuur bàmɛn anki.
ACT 9:8 Sɔl kàsubà u mɛɛn, itàkal naa mii ande myàkäl myàŋàduub, nde undiir kàmɛnà anki. Ba bun'te mpi u kɔɔ ntɔn mukun'syen Damas.
ACT 9:9 Nde kàkäl ilä itär ukɔɔn aman, ukɔɔn adyà anà ukɔɔn anwà.
ACT 9:10 Kyekà kàkäl anà un'lɔŋki mwɛy u Damas ikɔb ande Ananyas. Mwol kàkàmɛnà akà nde unsà imanmii, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ananyas! » Nde kàfuur naa: « Mɛ awà, Mwol. »
ACT 9:11 Mwol kàtɛn a nde naa: « Kyen uboo a balàbal bàfàbel balàbal a lää, u ndwà a Yudasi, fuul mbuur mwɛy wà Tarsɛ ikɔb ande Sɔl. Nde wàmukayamà taaŋ nsil alà,
ACT 9:12 wɛɛ uboo a imanmii, nde kan'man mbuur mwɛy ikɔb ande Ananyas wàmubilà anà kàmusà an'kɔɔ ntɔn nde ufàman. »
ACT 9:13 Ananyas waa ufuur naa: « Mwol, mɛ an'wem akà baar mbɔɔn ube banswà kàkyer mbuur awà akà aŋin'kyɛɛl angye u Yɛlusàlɛm.
ACT 9:14 Kyakin, apà nde kan'yà anà ikɔ̈b bun'pɛ amfum a angaŋ mukɔr baar banswà bàkayamà ikɔb angye. »
ACT 9:15 Wɛɛ Mwol kàtɛn a nde naa: « Kyen, ntɔn mbuur awà mɛ amun'sɔɔl asànaa un'syääl amɛ musyen ikɔb amɛ kusà a baar mpa abà Ayudà, kusà a amfum anà kusà a baan a Isàlɛl.
ACT 9:16 Mɛ ŋakwo in'yun'swaŋ indiir byanswà usàman nde mpay ntɔn mɛ. »
ACT 9:17 Ananyas waa kàkyen. Nde kàbilà u ndwà, kun'si an'kɔɔ, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Sɔl, un'tɔŋ amɛ, Mwol kàman'tɔm, Yɛsu akwà kàyàmɛnà akà ngye u mbwo kàfü ngye, ntɔn ngye afàman anà akäl aŋàyɔl a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl. »
ACT 9:18 Utaaŋ nsil alan, indiir imwɛy asànaa ibal byàbwee fà mii a Sɔl, laa kàfàman nde. Nde waa kambarà, waa bun'dümà.
ACT 9:19 Ungö apan nde kàkyer adyà, waa kàwɛl ngwal. Sɔl kàkäl ndam a ilä anà alɔŋki bàkäl u Damas.
ACT 9:20 Itaan a mbɔɔn anki, nde kàsɛmà mukyään uboo a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà naa Yɛsu wà Mwan a Nzam.
ACT 9:21 Apan, baar banswà bàweemà nde bàkäl unsà ubem, waa bàtɛɛnà naa: « Nkye wunà kà mbuur akwà anki kàmɛɛyà baar bàfàbel ikɔb aki kwaaŋ u Yɛlusàlɛm? Nkye apà nde kàyi anki ntɔn mukɔr anà musyen ba akamfum a angaŋ? »
ACT 9:22 Wɛɛ Sɔl kàkäl ngwal mbɔɔn muswaŋ akà Ayudà bàkäl u Damas naa Yɛsu wà Klistɔ.
ACT 9:23 Ungö a ilä mbɔɔn, Ayudà banswà bàdirà mukun'dwa.
ACT 9:24 Wɛɛ Sɔl kàyöb ndaa ayin. Mpib anà mwäänà, ba bàkaseyà ibeenà a bul alà, ntɔn mukun'dwa.
ACT 9:25 Abun, alɔŋki a Sɔl bun'syen u mpib ntɔn mukun'sweey u ntsü yumwɛy yà ibää a bul. Ba bun'twey uboo a un'tɛr.
ACT 9:26 Mpal kan'kɔlà nde u Yɛlusàlɛm, Sɔl kàsi mutüüb anà alɔŋki. Wɛɛ ba banswà bàkäl u bɔɔmà, ntɔn ba bàkyey anki naa nde akyàbulà un'lɔŋki ndandaa.
ACT 9:27 Abun, Banàbasi waa kun'wɛl, kun'syen akà Antööm, waa kasam ndaa kàmɛn Sɔl Mwol u mbwo anà kàyääm nde anà nde. Nde kasam sye naa Sɔl kàlɔŋ anà uyɔl kà ikɔb a Yɛsu u Damas.
ACT 9:28 Sɛmà apan, Sɔl kàkälà anà ba u Yɛlusàlɛm anà mulɔŋà anà nuyɔl kà ikɔb a Mwol.
ACT 9:29 Nde sye kayakyäänà Ayudà bàfatɛɛnà Ingɛlɛki anà kàfasaa mbaaŋ anà ba. Wɛɛ ba bàlɛŋà mukun'dwa.
ACT 9:30 Mpal ban'wem atɔŋ ndaa ayi, ba bun'syen Sɛzarɛ, akun ba bun'töm Tarse.
ACT 9:31 U Yuday lanswà, sɛmà Ngalilɛ anà Samàlya, Ikööŋ kyanswà kyàkäl unsà duu, kyàwɛlà ngwal, kyàwemà Mwol bɔɔmà, anà kyàyɛlà u ngwal a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl.
ACT 9:32 Yàmɛnà naa Petɔlà kàfilyaŋà ntsü yanswà, waa kàtyà sye akà baar in'kyɛɛl bàkäl u Lidà.
ACT 9:33 Nde kàmɛn mbuur mwɛy kwo ikɔb ande Ɛnɛ, wàŋàbɔ̈ɔ̈n udu a ntäŋ, fà mbul naan nde kàkäl aŋàkwɛkà.
ACT 9:34 Petɔlà kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ɛnɛ, Yɛsu Klistɔ kàmakɔɔr! Mbarà, bwɛlà ntäŋ angye, ngye ŋakwo. » Apan sye, Ɛnɛ waa kambarà.
ACT 9:35 Mpal bun'mɛn baar a Lidà anà baar a Sarɔn banswà, ba bàbuul mpem aba amu Mwol.
ACT 9:36 U Yɔpɛ kàkäl anà un'lɔŋki mwɛy wà un'kaar ikɔb ande Tabità, ikaswaŋà naa Dɔkasi u ndaa aba, waa ifiswaŋà naa Nsey. Taaŋ lanswà nde kàfakyerà ndaa aŋàbwaŋ anà kàfabayà aŋàlàmbwà.
ACT 9:37 Umpal ayin, nde kàkyer abɛɛl, waa kàkü. Ungö mukun'ywɛy, ba bun'si u suk adu.
ACT 9:38 Mpal bàwem alɔŋki a Yɔpɛ naa Petɔlà wà u Lidà, bul a tsütsü anà ba, ba bàtöm abaal abɔ̈ɔ̈l ntɔn mukun'bel anà mutɛn naa: « Bi kàmabɔɔn, yà akà bi làgyägyä. »
ACT 9:39 Apan, Petɔlà waa kàmbarà, waa kàkyen anà ba. Umpal kàkɔlà nde, ba bun'syen u suk adu. Akweel adim bàyi kusà a nde, bàmulel anà muswaŋ ba inkur anà ipfɛy a mpye kàfakyerà Dɔkasi mpal bàkäl ba banswà.
ACT 9:40 Apan, Petɔlà kàtwey baar banswà, nde kàbü an'köm, kàyamà, waa kàbulà ntsü yàkäl ndom anà mutɛn naa: « Tabità, mbarà! » Nde kàduub mii, mpal kàmɛn nde Petɔlà, waa kàbwaay.
ACT 9:41 Abun, Petɔlà kàsilà kɔɔ ande, waa kun'mbaar. Nde kàbel baar in'kyɛɛl anà akweel adim, waa kun'mɛɛy, wà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
ACT 9:42 Baar a Yɔpɛ banswà bàwem ba ndaa ayi, bàmbɔɔn bàsi làkwikilà akà Mwol.
ACT 9:43 Petɔlà kàkäl ilä mbɔɔn u Yɔpɛ akà un'kwaam a ibaan, ikɔb ande Simɔn.
ACT 10:1 U Sԑzarԑ kàkäl anà mbuur mwԑy ikↄb ande Kↄlↄnԑlyↄ. Nde kàkäl kaptԑn a iköŋ a aŋità a Lↄmà bàfàbel naa « iköŋ a Itali. »
ACT 10:2 Nde kàkäl anà inzaam, nde anà ywar ande lanswà bàweemà Nzam bɔɔmà. Nde kàfabayà baar mbɔɔn anà kàfayamà Nzam taaŋ lanswà.
ACT 10:3 Ilä mwԑy, u ntsü a taaŋ làtär ungö a midi, nde kàmԑn ubwaŋàbwaŋ unsà imanmii un'kyeey a Nzam mwԑy kan'yàbilà u ndwà ande, waa kan'tɛn a nde naa: « Kↄlↄnԑlyↄ! »
ACT 10:4 Kɔlɔnɛlyɔ kun'ler a lää, kun'wem bↄↄmà, waa kun'fuul naa: « Mwol, ininà abi? » Un'kyeey waa kun'fuur naa: « Ngyamàkà angye anà nkääb angye yàkyàbeenà u mii a Nzam, nde waa kan'yɔbà ya.
ACT 10:5 Wɛɛ apanà, tↄm baar u Yↄpԑ mukàbel mbuur mwɛy ikɔb ande Simↄn, bàfun'bel Petↄlà.
ACT 10:6 Nde afàbɔ̈ɔ̈n u ndwà a mbuur mwԑy ikɔb ande Simↄn, nde wà un'kwaam a ibaan a ntsür. Ndwà ande yà kà un'kɔɔl a ngyäl a kölàköl. »
ACT 10:7 Ungö a nkyeen a un'kyeey kàyun'kyään ndaa ayi, Kↄlↄnԑlyↄ kàbel asyääl ande abɔ̈ɔ̈l anà ŋità mwԑy kàkäl anà inzaam anà kàkäl wàŋàbääb anà nde taaŋ mbɔɔn.
ACT 10:8 Ungö mukakyään indiir byanswà byalyaaŋ, nde katöm Yↄpԑ.
ACT 10:9 U taaŋtyà, ba bàkäl u mbwo, tsütsü a Yↄpԑ, Petɔlà kàlär kà ikal bàfàyöör mper a midi ntↄn muyamà.
ACT 10:10 Nde kàwem ngyal, waa kàkwen mudyà. Mpal bàkäl ba mukun'läämà isaa, nde kàmԑn imanmii.
ACT 10:11 Nde kàmԑn du lan'dubà, undiir mwԑy asànaa yar a ipfԑy a kölàköl làŋàbääm in'siŋ kà an'twɛrà man'nà, lan'yàtyà anà lan'yàtↄlà u mԑԑn.
ACT 10:12 Uboo a la yàkäl anà ntsür a ifà ifà: ntsür a in'kɔl in'nà, ntsür ifilaan u mԑԑn anà nԑn a du.
ACT 10:13 Ndaa mwԑy yàtɛn a nde naa: « Petↄlà, mbarà, dwa anà dyà! »
ACT 10:14 Wԑԑ Petɔlà kàfuur naa: « Mwol, ikwo anki akà ikikye, ntɔn mԑ ŋàtàdyà anki undiir wanswà wàlàbiin anà wàŋingyäy. »
ACT 10:15 Wɛɛ nde an'fàwem ndaa mbalà yàyweel: « Ngye, twon an'bel ŋingyäy indiir kan'pööŋ Nzam. »
ACT 10:16 Ya yàkɔlà mbalà tär, ungö apan, undiir awun bàfuur u du.
ACT 10:17 Petↄlà kàkäl unsà lingyoomà anà muyweerà nde ŋakwo naa imanmii kàmԑn nde ki ikaswaŋà aben. Kyekà taaŋ nsil alan, baar kàtöm Kↄlↄnԑlyↄ bàkäl u munàmbwo bàmufuulà ndwà a Simↄn.
ACT 10:18 Ba bàbel u ndaa a ngwal, waa bàfuul naa: « Nkye Simↄn awà bàfàbel naa Petↄlà afàbɔ̈ɔ̈n apà? »
ACT 10:19 Apan Petↄlà kàkäl mukayweerà u mpem ande ntↄn imanmii akyà kàmԑn nde ki, Dweelà kàtɛn a nde naa: « Le, baar atär bàmukaleŋà.
ACT 10:20 Mbarà, tyà, kyen mbwo mwԑy anà ba ukɔɔn nkyɛɛr, ntↄn ba mԑ, mɛ amatↄm. »
ACT 10:21 Undiir awun, Petↄlà kàtɔlà nde, waa kàtɛn a baar aban naa: « Le, mԑ in'wà mbuur làleŋà bԑ. Ntɔn nkye làyi bɛ? »
ACT 10:22 Ba bàtɛn naa: « Kaptɛn Kↄlↄnԑlyↄ kàmitↄm. Nde wà mbuur mwԑy wà balàbal anà afàtiin Nzam bɔɔmà. Nde sye we anà imbäl aŋàbwaŋ akà un'sԑŋ a Ayudà wanswà. Un'kyeey in'kyɛɛl mwԑy kun'swԑŋ naa nde akyer ayabel u ndwà ande, ntↄn ngye awem ndaa awà nde ayà mukakyään. »
ACT 10:23 Apan, Petɔlà waa kabiil anà kapɛ ikal abɔ̈ɔ̈n. Taaŋtyà nde kàkyen anà ba mbwo mwɛy anà atɔŋ amwɛy bà Yɔpɛ.
ACT 10:24 Kà ilä kyàlääb, nde kàkɔlà Sɛzarɛ. Kɔlɔnɛlyɔ awà kàkäl mudilà ba, kàbel ywar ande anà asam ande bànkwen.
ACT 10:25 Umpal kàkɔlà Petɔlà, Kɔlɔnɛlyɔ kàyàbwey anà nde, waa kàbü kà in'kↄl ande ntɔn mukun'sà làkoo.
ACT 10:26 Petɔlà waa kumbaar, kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mbarà, ntↄn mԑ, mɛ sye in'wà kàmɛ mbuur. »
ACT 10:27 Apan, Petↄlà kàkäl muyiyääm a Kↄlↄnԑlyↄ umpal kàbilà nde u ndwà, waa kàmԑn baar mbɔɔn bàkyàköŋ.
ACT 10:28 Nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Bԑ, bԑ làkyàyöb naa wà ikin naa un'yudà mwԑy utüüb itàkal usin tsütsü apà ungyey. Wԑԑ mԑ, Nzam kan'mɛɛy naa twon an'tɛn a mbuur naa nde wà làbiin itàkal naa ŋingyäy.
ACT 10:29 Undiir awun, mԑ an'yà mԑ ukɔↄn asà impeen u làbeel angye. Wɛɛ apanà, mԑ in'kwen muyöb ntɔn atöm ngye baar muyan'bel. »
ACT 10:30 Apan Kↄlↄnԑlyↄ kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ŋàbà ilä kyànà, mԑ kàkäl u ngyamàkà u ndwà amԑ, u taaŋ làtär ungö a midi, wɛɛ le, mbuur mwԑy kàkyàbwaar ipfԑy a iŋyäŋ akyàmbar kusà a mԑ,
ACT 10:31 nde kan'kyään naa: "Kↄlↄnԑlyↄ, Nzam akyàwem ngyamàkà angye, anà akyàyɔbà nkääb angye.
ACT 10:32 Tↄm baar u Yↄpԑ mukàbel Simↄn awà bàfàbeel Petↄlà. Nde wà u ndwà a Simↄn un'kwaam a ibaan a ntsür. Ndwà ande yà kà un'kↄↄl a ngyäl."
ACT 10:33 Làgyägyä, mԑ waa atööm baar muyabel. Ngye, ngye waa akyey muyà. Apanà bi, bi banswà ibà kusà a Nzam ntↄn muwem indiir byanswà kaswɛŋ Mwol. »
ACT 10:34 Abun, Petↄlà kàduub mun mutԑn naa: « Mԑ in'kyàyöb ndandaa naa Nzam un'kↄl aŋàyↄŋ afàkyer anki,
ACT 10:35 wԑԑ unsà un'sɛŋ wanswà, mbuur afun'man bɔɔmà anà afàkyer ndaa a balàbal, nde akyer afun'kyey.
ACT 10:36 Nde kàtöm ndaa ande akà un'sԑŋ a Isàlԑl, mukyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là duu u mbwo a Yԑsu Klistↄ awà Mwol a baar banswà.
ACT 10:37 Bԑ, bԑ làkyàyöb ndaa yàsԑmà u Ngalilԑ anà yàpää u Yuday lanswà ungö a ndüümà kàlↄɔŋà Ywan.
ACT 10:38 Bԑ, bɛ làkyàyöb naa Nzam kàtsüül Dweelà In'kyɛɛl anà kàpɛ ngwal udu a Yɛsu un'nsi Nasàlɛr awà kàyilyaaŋà mukyer ubwaŋ anà mukɔɔr baar bàkäl uboo a ikɔ̈b a Satanà, ntɔn Nzam kàkäl anà nde.
ACT 10:39 Anà bi sye, bi ibà ambäl a indiir byanswà kàkyer nde u mɛɛn a Ayudà anà u Yɛlusàlɛm. Nde sye wà mbuur bàdwä ba anà bàbɛɛrà ba u kulunsi,
ACT 10:40 wɛɛ Nzam kun'wiiy kilä kyàtär, waa kun'pɛ mbwo muyàmɛnà,
ACT 10:41 kakun'sԑŋ wanswà anki, wԑԑ akà bi, bi baar abà kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l Nzam kusà asànaa ambäl, bi baar kàdi anà kànü anà nde ungö a ngwiiyà ande uboo a akü.
ACT 10:42 Apan Yɛsu kà iswԑŋ mukyään un'sԑŋ anà mutà imbäl naa Nzam nde kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l mukal nkalsà a baar a mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà akü.
ACT 10:43 Aŋangↄↄm banswà bun'tɛɛl imbäl, mutɛn naa mbuur wanswà asun'wal anà asàsà làkwikilà amu nde, bàsun'dwääl nkul a man'be ande u mbwo a ikɔ̈b a Ikↄb ande. »
ACT 10:44 Umpal kàkäl Petↄlà mutɛɛnà ndaa ayi, Dweelà In'kyɛԑl kàbü udu a baar banswà bàweemà ndaa kàlↄɔŋà nde.
ACT 10:45 Wԑԑ aŋàlàkwikilà bàŋàkyɛy abà bàyi mbwo mwԑy anà Petↄlà bàkäl unsà ubem muman naa Dweelà In'kyɛԑl kàpää sye udu a baar mpa abà Ayudà.
ACT 10:46 Abun, ba bàweemà naa ba bàmutԑɛnà u ndaa a ingyey anà bàmusyäŋà Nzam. Apan, Petↄlà kàtԑn naa:
ACT 10:47 « Taaŋ alà, nkye we anà mbuur kan'kwo mutsuŋ an'dà a ndüümà akà baar ban'wal Dweelà In'kyɛԑl bà asànaa bi? »
ACT 10:48 Apan, nde kàswԑŋ naa badümà kà ikↄb a Yԑsu Klistↄ. Ba bun'lɔ̈ɔ̈m naa nde ubwaay ndam a ilä apà ba.
ACT 11:1 Antööm anà atↄŋ bàkäl u Yuday bàwem naa baar mpa abà Ayudà sye ban'wal Ndaa a Nzam.
ACT 11:2 Wԑԑ mpal kàbeenà Petↄlà Yԑlusàlԑm, baar bàŋàkyԑy bàkäl musà mbaaŋ anà nde.
ACT 11:3 Ba bàtԑn a nde naa: « Ngye an'kàbilà u ndwà a baar bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n aŋàkyԑy anà an'kàdyà ikal imwԑy anà ba. »
ACT 11:4 Apan, Petɔlà kàsԑmà mukakyään ndaa yanswà pànsi pànsi asànaa yàlyaaŋ ya. Waa kàtɛn a ba naa:
ACT 11:5 « Mԑ, mɛ kàkäl uboo a Yↄpԑ muyamà, laa kàkabà mɛ, waa kàmԑn imanmii: undiir mwԑy kan'fà du wàŋàbäm in'siŋ a bwԑlàbwԑl kà an'twԑrà man'nà asànaa yar a ipfԑy.
ACT 11:6 Mpal kàsyeebà mɛ boo awa ubwaŋàbwaŋ, mɛ kàmԑn ntsür a in'kↄl in'nà, ntsür a ndwaŋ, ntsür ifilaan u mɛɛn anà nԑn a du.
ACT 11:7 Apan, mɛ kàwem ndaa mwԑy yàmukan'kyäänà naa: "Petↄlà, kyen, dwa, dyà."
ACT 11:8 Wԑԑ mԑ kàtԑn naa: "Aay, Mwol, akà undiir mwԑy wà ikin itàkal wàŋingyäy ŋatàbilà anki u mun amԑ."
ACT 11:9 Ndaa yan'fàfà du mbalà yàyweel, yan'fuur naa: "Indiir kàpɔŋà Nzam, twon an'bel bya mbiin."
ACT 11:10 Ndaa ayi yàkyer abà mbalà tär. Ungö, indiir byanswà byàfurà du.
ACT 11:11 Kyekà taaŋ nsil alan, abaal atär bàyàkↄlà u ndwà kàkäl bi. Ba ban'tööm abà u Sɛzarɛ.
ACT 11:12 Apan, Dweelà kan'kyään naa mԑ in'kyen mbwo mwԑy anà ba ukɔɔn nkyɛɛr. Atɔŋ bà basyaam bàyan'swà. Bi banswà kàkàbilà u ndwà a mbuur awun.
ACT 11:13 Nde kà ikyään naa un'kyeey kàyàmԑnà aben u ndwà ande anà kun'kyään naa: "Tↄm mbuur mwey u Yↄpԑ mukàbel Simↄn awà bàfàbel naa Petↄlà.
ACT 11:14 Nde ayakyään ndaa yanswà iyàtswà ngye mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà ndwà angye yanswà."
ACT 11:15 Pa kàsɛmà mɛ mutԑn, Dweelà kàyàtyà udu a ba asànaa kàyàtyà nde udu a bi u nsɛmà.
ACT 11:16 Apan, mɛ kàyↄbà ndaa kàtԑn Mwol naa: "Ywan kàfadümà kà an'dà. Wԑԑ bԑ, bԑ bàsàladümà u Dweelà In'kyԑɛl."
ACT 11:17 Abun, Nzam kapԑ kab nsil la asànaa kàpԑ nde bi umpal kàsi bi làkwikillà amu Yԑsu Klistↄ, mԑ, mɛ kàkäl nà mutsuŋ Nzam? »
ACT 11:18 Ungö bàwem ba ndaa ayi, ba bàkäl a duu, bàsi Nzam làkoo, waa bàtԑn naa: « Abà Nzam kan'pà mbwo sye akà baar mpa abà Ayudà musↄↄmà nkääl aba anà muwal mɔ̈ɔ̈. »
ACT 11:19 Yàmԑnà naa aŋàlàkwikilà bàkyer atà upay mper yanswà ntɔn nkwaaŋ bamɛɛy mpal bàdwä Ityen. Ba bàkàkɔlà anà u Fԑnisi, u Shipԑlɛ anà Antyↄsha. Wԑԑ ba Ndaa a Nzam bàyilↄɔŋà Ayudà mpԑl.
ACT 11:20 Wԑԑ bumwԑy bàkäl baar a Shipԑlɛ anà Sirԑn. Umpal bàtöl ba Antyↄsha, ba bàkyäänà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là Mwol Yɛsu akà Angԑlԑki sye.
ACT 11:21 Kↄↄ a Mwol làkäl anà ba, undiir awun baar mbↄↄn bàsi ba làkwikilà anà bàbuul ba mpem akà Mwol.

ACT 11:23 Umpal kàtöl nde anà kàmԑn nde kab a ngway a Nzam, nde kàmԑn un'sak, nde kàlɔ̈ɔ̈m ba banswà mukal uboo a un'tüüb a Mwol u mpem aba yanswà.
ACT 11:24 Ntɔn nde kàkäl mbuur mwԑy wàŋàbwaŋ, wàŋàyↄl a Dweelà In'kyɛԑl anà làkwikilà. Apan, un'kàbɔ a baar kàyàtüüb anà Mwol.

ACT 11:26 Umpal kun'mԑn nde, nde kun'twääl u Antyↄsha. Ba bàkyer mbul mwԑy aŋun'kiinà musal mbwo mwԑy anà mulↄŋ iköŋ a baar uboo a Ikööŋ. Ya yàkäl mbalà atàtwԑb u Antyↄsha bàbel ba alↄŋki naa aklistↄ.

ACT 12:1 Yàmԑnà naa utaaŋ alan, mfum Ɛlↄdi kàsԑmà mumԑɛy baar a Ikööŋ bàmwɛy nkwaaŋ.
ACT 12:2 Nde kàdwä Zyak, un'tↄŋ a Ywan wàbaal, a kↄm.
ACT 12:3 Mpal kàmԑn nde naa ya yan'pà Ayudà un'sak, nde kàfàkɔr Petↄlà ilä a mampà ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ful.
ACT 12:4 Ungö mukun'kɔr, nde kun'tↄↄm u bɔlokà, kun'pԑ kan'kↄↄ a itsuŋ inà bye abyà aŋità anà uboo a imwɛy ntɔn mukun'kaar. Nde kàkwen mukun'sà u làbay a nsaŋ u mii a un'sɛŋ ungö mukyɛɛl Pak.
ACT 12:5 Petↄlà bun'käär u bↄlokà. Wԑԑ Ikööŋ kyàyɔ̈n anki musà ngyamàkà akà Nzam ntↄn nde.

ACT 12:7 Wԑԑ kà imbürà, un'kyeey a Mwol mwԑy waa kàyàmԑnà, bↄlokà waa làpԑԑlà. Un'kyeey kàni Petɔlà u làbɛm, kun'wiiy, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Mbarà agyägyä! » Apan, an'dwaaŋ màkäl kà an'kↄↄ ande waa màbü.
ACT 12:8 Un'kyeey kàtɛn a nde naa: « Bäm un'kab angye, bwaar idyäär angye. » Nde waa kàkyer abun. Nde kàfàtɛn a nde naa: « Bwaar ipfɛy angye, yan'läb. »
ACT 12:9 Nde kàkyer atoo, waa kun'läb. Wԑԑ nde kàyöb anki naa ndaa kàkyerà un'kyeey yàkäl ndandaa. Nde kàsii naa kya kyà imanmii.
ACT 12:10 Apan ba bàlyaaŋ ikal a nseey kyàtàtwԑb, bàfàlyaaŋ kyàyweel, waa bàtöl u munàmbwo awe anà ibeenà a in'naan ifàler mper a bul. Ibeenà aki kyàdubà kya ŋakwo kusà a ba. Ba waa bàtoo, bàyikyeenà u balàbal làmwey. Apan, un'kyeey kàsun'wɛy kà imbürà.
ACT 12:11 Mpal màfurà an'kyän a Petↄlà, nde kàtԑn naa: « Apanà mԑ an'yöb naa ndandaa Mwol kàtöm un'kyeey ande, nde kàman'tsuuŋ kà an'kↄↄ a Ɛlↄdi anà akà yinà yanswà kàdiilà un'sԑŋ a Ayudà. »
ACT 12:12 Ungö kàyöb nde abun, nde kàkyen ndwà a Màlye, ngwän a Ywan awà bàfàbel Malakↄ. Akun, baar mbɔɔn bàkyer aköŋ anà bàkäl muyamà.
ACT 12:13 Mpal kàbԑԑrà nde kà ibeenà a munàmbwo, un'syääl mwɛy wà un'kaar ikↄb ande Lↄdԑ waa kàsin muwem.
ACT 12:14 Nde kàyöb ndaa a Petↄlà. Wԑԑ unsà un'sak ande, nde kàduub anki ndwà, nde kàkyen u ntiin ntↄn mukàkyään naa Petↄlà wàŋàmbar u nsà.
ACT 12:15 Wԑԑ ba bàtԑn a nde naa: « Ngye awe anà nukↄŋ. » Wԑԑ nde kàsi muküünà mutɛn naa yà ndandaa. Apan, ba bàtɛn naa: « Un'kyeey ande ayàkal. »

ACT 12:17 Wɛɛ akà nde, nde kadübà mun a kↄↄ ntɔn mukaswaŋ naa ba bàkäl a duu, nde kakyään naa Mwol kàkyer aben mukun'twey u nsà a bↄlokà. Nde kàtԑn sye naa: « Kyen kàlakyään Zyak anà atↄŋ bumwԑy indiir abi. » Apan, nde waa kàtoo, kàkyen mper asin.

ACT 12:22 Apan, un'sԑŋ kàtԑn u ndaa a ngwal naa: « Ayi ntɛɛn a nzam mwɛy, wԑԑ kà yà mbuur anki. »

ACT 12:24 Apan, Ndaa a Nzam waa yàyԑl, waa yàpää.

ACT 13:13 Pↄl anà baar bàyikyeenà anà nde, bàwԑl an'swà u Pafɔs ntɔn mukyà Pɛrzɛ u Pamfili. Ywan kàkaabà anà ba, waa kàfurà Yԑlusàlԑm.

ACT 13:21 Wɛɛ semà apan, ba bàlöm mfum, kyakin Nzam kapԑ nde Sawul, mwan a Kisi, umwԑy uboo a mbil a Bԑnsàmԑn. Nde kàyaal mbul an'kwem an'nà.

ACT 13:26 « Atↄŋ abaal, baan a ywar a Abàlam, anà bԑ bumwԑy làfàtiin Nzam bↄↄmà, Ndaa a mɔ̈ɔ̈ ayi bàtöm akà bi.
ACT 13:27 Wɛɛ abun, baar a Yԑlusàlԑm anà amfum aba, bun'kyey anki Yԑsu. Wɛɛ mpal bun'tsüül ba mbar, ba bàkwey ndaa a aŋangↄↄm bàfàtaŋ saba lanswà.
ACT 13:28 Wɛɛ, itàkal ba bàmɛn anki undiir ban'kwo mukun'dwa, ba bàlɔ̈m akà Pilatu mulwom mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande.

ACT 13:30 Wԑԑ Nzam kun'twey uboo a akü,
ACT 13:31 nde kàyàmԑnà ilä mbɔɔn akà baar abà bàbeenà anà nde, sԑmà Ngalilԑ tii Yԑlusàlԑm. Ŋàbawà ba bà ambäl ande kusà a un'sԑŋ a Isàlɛl!

ACT 13:37 Wԑԑ mbuur kàwiiy Nzam, nde kàpɔ̈ɔ̈n anki.
ACT 13:38 Undiir awun, atↄŋ, làyöb naa u mbwo ande bàkyàlakyään ndwääl a nkul.

ACT 13:40 Kyakin, làkäl kà igyɛԑŋ manà ndaa bàtԑn aŋangɔɔm iyàlabweel:

ACT 13:47 Abun, Mwol kà iswԑŋ abà: "Mԑ ngye kasi pԑԑlà ntɔn baar mpa abà Ayudà, ntↄn ngye asyen mɔ̈ɔ̈, tii mper màkàtsü mɛɛn." »
ACT 13:48 Wԑԑ mpal bàwem baar mpa abà Ayudà ndaa ayi, ba bàmɛn un'sak, ba bàsɛmà musà ndaa a Mwol làkoo. Baar banswà basɔ̈ɔ̈l muwal mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye, ba bàsi làkwikilà.

ACT 13:50 Wԑԑ Ayudà bàkàkul usey akà akaar aŋun'naaŋ bàfasyäŋà Nzam anà akà abyääl a bul, ba bàsiinà baar mupà Pↄl anà Banabasi nkwaaŋ, ba baböŋ kà itiir a nsi aba.

ACT 13:52 Wԑԑ akà alↄŋki, ba bàkäl aŋàyↄl a un'sak anà Dweelà In'kyɛԑl.
ACT 14:1 U Ikↄnyum Pↄl anà Banabasi bàbilà sye u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà, waa bàlↄɔŋà. Abun, un'kàbɔ a Ayudà anà Angԑlԑki basi làkwikilà.
ACT 14:2 Wԑԑ Ayudà bàtön an'lↄↄŋ, waa bàsiinà baar mpa abà Ayudà mutɔŋ mpem ambe akà atɔŋ.
ACT 14:3 Itàkal abun, ba kwo bàkäl ilä mbↄↄn bàmulɔŋ a uyɔl ntɔn làkwikilà aba akà Mwol. Nde kapԑ ikɔ̈b mukyer impà anà idiim anà mutà imbäl u ndaa a kab angway ande.
ACT 14:4 Wԑԑ un'sԑŋ a bul waa kàkaabà: amwԑy bàbü a Ayudà, bumwԑy bàbü a Antööm.
ACT 14:5 Baar mpa abà Ayudà anà Ayudà anà amfum aba, ba bàbön mumԑɛy ba nkwaaŋ anà mukam ba in'kul.
ACT 14:6 Pa bàyöb ba ndaa ayi, ba bàkyer akàyee, waa bàkyen ntsü a Likayɔni, Listre, Dԑrbԑ anà Likↄnya anà an'bul a tsütsü.
ACT 14:7 Akun sye, ba bàkäl mukyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ.
ACT 14:8 U Listre kàkäl anà ŋàkwɛkà mwԑy, nde kàkäl ikar, sԑmà mböör ande, nde kàsàkyà anki dwaan.
ACT 14:9 Ilä mwɛy nde kàkäl mulab ndaa kàlɔɔŋà Pↄl. Pↄl kun'paam mii, waa kàmԑn naa mbuur awà kàkäl anà làkwikilà ntɔn nde ukɔↄrà.
ACT 14:10 Apan, nde kàtɛn a nde u ndaa a ngwal naa: « Mbarà, kal aŋàtsim unsà in'kↄl angye! » Mbuur awà waa kàfumà, waa kàkyen.
ACT 14:11 Mpal bàmԑn in'sԑŋ ndaa kàkyer Pↄl, ba bàsi in'kwԑŋ kà Ilikↄnya, waa bàtɛn naa: « Bànzam ban'bulà baar, waa ban'yàtyà mper akà bi. »
ACT 14:12 Ba bàpԑ Banabasi ikↄb a « Zösi » Pↄl bun'pԑ ikↄb a « Ɛrmԑsi » ntↄn ndaa yanswà yàkäl anà nde.
ACT 14:13 Ndwà a nzam a ngaŋ a Zösi yàkäl u nswɛŋ a bul. Nde kàtwääl in'dim a ngɔɔmà anà in'siŋ a iful u minàmbwo a ndwà ayi ntɔn nde kàkwen naa nde anà un'sɛŋ, ba bàpɛ ibɔɔn.
ACT 14:14 Wԑԑ mpal bàwem Antööm ndaa ayi, ba bàkaam ipfԑy aba, waa bàkyen u ntiin ntsü kàkäl un'sԑŋ a baar, bàmusà in'kwɛŋ
ACT 14:15 anà mutɛn naa: « Abaal, ntↄn nkye lan'kyer bԑ indiir a tub abi? Làyöb naa bi sye, bi ibà baar asànaa bԑ. Ndaa Aŋàbwaŋ ikàlakyään bi yà naa bԑ làwԑy itԑk, wԑԑ bԑ làyi akà Nzam a mɔ̈ɔ̈ awà kàkyer du, mԑԑn, ngyäl a kölàköl anà indiir byanswà abyà uboo.
ACT 14:16 U nkööl yàlyaaŋ, nde kàwԑy in'sԑŋ myanswà mulab ndaa aba ŋakwo.
ACT 14:17 Itàkal abà, nde kàkɔ̈ɔ̈n anki mutà imbäl a ubwaŋ ande, mukàlapà fà du, mbul anà mbɛŋ kà an'paŋà a bya, mukàlapà isaa anà muyööl mpem abԑ a un'sak. »
ACT 14:18 Wԑԑ itàkal bàtԑn ba ndaa ayi, yàkäl mpay antööm mutsuŋ un'sԑŋ a baar mukɔɔn akapà ibↄↄn.
ACT 14:19 Apan, Ayudà bàfü Antyↄsha anà Ikↄn, ba bàsi muküünà akà un'sɛŋ a baar. Un'sɛŋ a baar awà kàkyey an'kyän aba, waa bàtԑ Pↄl in'kul ntↄn mukun'dwa. Ungö ba bàkun'wɔm u nsà a bul. Ba bàsii naa nde kan'kwà.
ACT 14:20 Wԑԑ mpal bàkàköŋ alɔŋki umbil a Pↄl, laa kàmbarà nde, kàbilà nde uboo a bul. Taaŋtyà, ba bàkyen Dԑrbԑ anà Banabasi.
ACT 14:21 Ungö bàlↄŋ ba baar Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ u bul alà anà baar mbↄↄn bàbulà ba alↄŋki, ba bàfurà Listre, Ikↄn anà Antyↄsha.
ACT 14:22 Ba bàpԑɛ alɔŋki ngwal anà bàlɔ̈ɔ̈mà naa ba bàsi muküünà u làkwikilà anà mutɛn naa: « Ilↄↄmà naa bi itwab atàman mpay mbↄↄn mubilà kà imwol a Nzam. »
ACT 14:23 Ba bàsɔ̈ɔ̈l andweer kà Ikööŋ imwԑy imwɛy. Ungö muyamà anà mukin, ba bapԑ kà an'kↄↄ a Mwol awà bàsi ba làkwikilà.
ACT 14:24 Ungö apan, ba bàsoonà Pisidi mukyà Pamfili.
ACT 14:25 Ungö mulɔŋ Ndaa u Pԑrzԑ, ba bàtyà Atalya.
ACT 14:26 Akun, ba bàwԑl an'swà, waa bàkyen Antyↄsha, ikal akyà basi u kab a ngway a Nzam ntɔn isal bàkyer ba.
ACT 14:27 Mpal bàtöl ba, ba bàbel Ikööŋ, bàkyään ndaa yanswà kàkyer Nzam akà ba, anà kaduub nde sye mbwo a làkwikilà akà baar mpa abà Ayudà.
ACT 14:28 Abun, ba bàkäl ilä mbↄↄn anà alɔŋki.
ACT 15:1 Ndam abaal bàfü Yuday, bàlɔɔŋà atɔŋ naa: « Isàkal naa bɛ bàlakyɛy anki asànaa ukaswaŋà un'kɔɔn a Mɔsɛ, bɛ làkwe anki muwà mɔ̈ɔ̈. »
ACT 15:2 Yàmɛnà naa an'sye anà mbaaŋ a kölàköl yàkyer abwà uboo a Pɔl anà Banabasi asye anà ba. Ba bàtsül mbar naa Pɔl anà Banabasi anà ndam a baar bumwɛy, bàbeenà Yɛlusàlɛm akà Antööm anà andweer, ntɔn mutsul ndaa ayin.
ACT 15:3 Wɛɛ akà ba, Ikööŋ kyapɛ indiir byàkäl mfun ntɔn nkyeen aba, ba bàsoonà Fɛnɛsi anà Samàlya, bàmuyisam mbuul a mpem a baar mpa abà Ayudà. Ndaa ayi yàpɛɛ un'sak mbɔɔn akà atɔŋ banswà.
ACT 15:4 Mpal bàtöl ba Yɛlusàlɛm, Ikööŋ anà Antööm anà andweer bawɛl ba, ba bàsam ndaa yanswà kàkyer Nzam u mbwo anà ba.
ACT 15:5 Wɛɛ, ndam a Amfarisi amwɛy abà bàbula aklistɔ bàmbarà ntɔn mutɛn naa baar mpa abà Ayudà bàkyer akyɛy anà bàkyer aswaŋ mulab un'kɔɔn a Mɔsɛ.
ACT 15:6 Antööm anà andweer bàköŋ ntɔn muler ndaa ayi.
ACT 15:7 Ungö a mbaaŋ a bwɛlàbwɛl, Petɔlà laa kàmbarà nde, waa kàtɛn naa: « Atɔŋ abaal, bɛ, bɛ làkyàyöb naa sɛmà itaan Nzam kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l uboo abɛ naa u mun amɛ, baar mpa abà Ayudà bàwem Ndaa a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ anà bàsi làkwikilà.
ACT 15:8 Waa Nzam awà ayöb mpem a baar, katɛɛl imbäl mukapà Dweelà In'kyɛɛl asànaa akà bi.
ACT 15:9 Nde sye nsöön kàsi anki uboo a bi anà ba: nde kàpöŋ mpem aba ntɔn làkwikilà aba.
ACT 15:10 Apanà, ntɔn nkye lan'lwab bɛ Nzam, lan'sà bɛ buur u bway a alɔŋki, buur mpa bàkwe bànkaa abi itàkal bi ŋakwo musɛn?
ACT 15:11 Wɛɛ, ntɔn ngyɛb a Mwol Yɛsu awà ifàsà bi làkwikilà, bi kàwü mɔ̈ɔ̈ sye asànaa ba. »
ACT 15:12 Abun, un'sɛŋ wanswà kàkäl a kul, ba bàkäl muwem Banabasi anà Pɔl bàkäl mukyäänà ba idiim anà impà byanswà kàkyɛr Nzam akà baar mpa abà Ayudà u mbwo a Antööm.
ACT 15:13 Mpal bàmay ba mutɛn, Zyak kàwɛl ndaa, waa kàtɛn naa: « Atɔŋ abaal, lan'wem!
ACT 15:14 Simɔn kàmiyɔɔb naa u nsɛmà Nzam kàkyer aben musɔɔl un'sɛŋ umwɛy uboo a in'sɛŋ myanswà mpa amyà Ayudà ntɔn muwal ikɔb ande.
ACT 15:15 Ya yan'bwà balàbal asànaa ndaa bàsön aŋangɔɔm naa:
ACT 15:16 "Mwol kan'tɛn naa: Ungö apan, mɛ in'sàkyer asàyàfurà ntɔn musuub ndwà a David ayà yàbü. Mɛ in'sàlɔɔn indiir aya byàtäy, mɛ in'sàmbaar ya.
ACT 15:17 Abun, ndam abaal ayisàsal waa isàleŋ Mwol, anà baar a in'sɛŋ myanswà myàfàtà ikɔb amɛ din. Ayi ntɛɛn a Mwol afàkyer indiir abi
ACT 15:18 abyà bàyöb sɛmà itaan."
ACT 15:19 Kyakin mɛ, mɛ in'kasii naa kà ubwaŋ anki mupà mpay akà baar mpa abà Ayudà ban'buul mpem aba akà Nzam,
ACT 15:20 wɛɛ basöön un'kaan naa ba bàkɔɔn asin tsütsü apà ŋingyäy a itɛk, anà inswem, anà ntsür mpa aŋàtsul kil anà an'kil.
ACT 15:21 Ntɔn, sɛmà nkööl yàlyaŋ itaan, bye anà baar bàfalɔŋ un'kɔɔn a Mɔsɛ u bul lanswà, ntɔn bàfàtaŋ wa ilä a saba kyanswà u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà. »
ACT 15:22 Abun yan'söön ubwaŋ naa Antööm anà andweer anà Ikööŋ kyanswà bàsɔ̈ɔ̈l baar uboo aba anà batöm Antyɔsha mbwo mwɛy anà Pɔl anà Banabasi. Ba bàsɔ̈ɔ̈l Yudɛ awà bàfàbel naa Balàsàbasi anà Silasi, baar bàkäl anà ikɔ̈b uboo a atɔŋ.
ACT 15:23 Ba bapɛ un'kaan mwɛy awà bàsön ba abà: « Akà bɛ atɔŋ mpa abà Ayudà làfàkal kà Antyↄsha u Siri anà Silisi, Antööm, andweer anà atɔŋ bàmàlapà mbɔr!
ACT 15:24 Bi kan'wem naa baar amwɛy bàfü uboo a bi, waa bàyàtwaal lingyooma akà bɛ unsà ntɛɛn aba anà bàpɛ mpem abɛ mpay, wɛɛ bi ba katöm anki.
ACT 15:25 Lalan kàmɛn bi anà kàkyey bi banswà naa yubwaŋ bi isɔ̈ɔ̈l abaal anà bi katöm akà bɛ. Ba bàyà mbwo mwɛy anà nkween abi Banabasi anà Pɔl.
ACT 15:26 Baar abà bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l, bàkyàyälà mɔ̈ɔ̈ aba ntɔn ikɔb a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ.
ACT 15:27 Abun, bi kàmàlatööm Yude anà Silasi, ba bàyàlakyään u mun aba ndaa nsil ayi.
ACT 15:28 Yàmɛnà naa yubwaŋ naa Dwelà In'kyɛɛl anà bi ŋakwo, bi kàtsül mukɔɔn akàlatälà buur asin udu a indiir a mfun bi:
ACT 15:29 utɔn in'twaŋ a ntsür bàfàpà ibɔɔn akà itɛk, anà an'kil, anà ntsür mpa yàŋàtsul kil, anà ipasàsɛ. Bɛ làsàlab ndaa ayi, bɛ lan'kyer ubwaŋ. Làkäl ubwaŋ! »
ACT 15:30 Apan ba bàkaabà anà Ikööŋ, waa bàtyà Antyɔsha. Akun ba bàtüüb un'sɛŋ a aŋàlàkwikilà, waa bapɛ un'kaan.
ACT 15:31 Ungö ban'taŋ ba wa, atɔŋ bàmɛn un'sak, ntɔn wa kapɛ ngwal.
ACT 15:32 Yude anà Silasi, ba ŋakwo sye bàkäl aŋangɔɔm, ba bapɛɛ an'lwɛŋ mbɔɔn ntɔn ba bàwɛl un'kanà anà ngwal.
ACT 15:33 Ba bàkäl ndam a taaŋ paa, atɔŋ waa bafuur unsà duu akà baar batöm.
ACT 15:34 Wɛɛ Silasi kàsàsal paa.
ACT 15:35 Wɛɛ akà Pɔl anà Banabasi, ba bàsàsal u Antyɔsha anà baar asin mbɔɔn mulɔɔŋà anà mukyäänà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là Ndaa a Mwol.
ACT 15:36 Ungö a an'taaŋ, Pɔl kàtɛn a Banabasi naa: « Tsweenà bi ifurà mukàler atɔŋ kà an'bul manswà kàyilɔɔŋà bi Ndaa a Mwol, ntɔn muyöb naa ba kwo bà aben. »
ACT 15:37 Banabasi kàkwen musyen sye anà ba Ywan, awà bàfabeelà sye Malakɔ.
ACT 15:38 Wɛɛ Pɔl kàmɛn naa kà ubwaŋ anki ba mukyà anà mbuur awà kàsawɛy sɛmà Pamfili anà mpa kàsabay unsà isal aba.
ACT 15:39 Apan, an'sye màkäl màngwal uboo a ba bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l, undiir awun bàkaabà ba. Banabasi kàwɛl Malakɔ, waa bàbilà anà nde kà an'swà ntɔn mukyà isaŋ a Shipɛlɛ.
ACT 15:40 Wɛɛ akà Pɔl, nde kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l Silasi, waa kàkyen anà nde, ungö bun'si atɔŋ u kab angway a Mwol.
ACT 15:41 Nde kàyilyaaŋà u Siri anà Silisi ntɔn muyipà Ikööŋ ngwal.
ACT 16:1 Pɔl kàkɔlà Dɛrbɛ anà Listre. Akun, kàkäl anà un'lɔŋki mwɛy ikɔb ande Tumàtɛ, mwan a un'kaar un'yudà kàbulà un'klistɔ, taarànde kàkäl un'ngɛlɛki.
ACT 16:2 Atɔŋ abà u Listre anà u Ikɔn bun'tɛɛl imbäl aŋàbwaŋ.
ACT 16:3 Pɔl kàkwen mukun'syen. Ungö akun'wal, nde kàkyer un'kyɛy, ntɔn Ayudà bàkäl kwo bàkyer ayöbà naa taarànde kàkäl un'ngɛlɛki.
ACT 16:4 Kà an'bul bàyilyaaŋà ba, ba bàyiswaŋà atɔŋ mulab ndaa bàtsül Antööm anà andweer u Yɛlusàlɛm.
ACT 16:5 Abun, Ikööŋ byàbulà ngwal unsà làkwikilà anà byàkwɛyà ntal a aklistɔ ilä a ilä.
ACT 16:6 Dwelà In'kyɛɛl kàkyer atsuŋ mukyään Ndaa u mɛɛn a Azi, abun ba bàsoonà nsi a Filizi anà Ngalàtyà.
ACT 16:7 Mpal bàtöl ba tsütsü a Misi, ba bàsii mubilà u Bitini, wɛɛ Dweelà a Yɛsu mbwo kapɛ anki.
ACT 16:8 Lalan bàsoonà ba Misi, waa bàtyà Tɔlɔwasi.
ACT 16:9 U mpib mwɛy, Pɔl kàmɛn imanmii: un'nsi Masɛdwan mwɛy kàkäl aŋàmbar, waa kun'bɔ̈ɔ̈n, waa kàtɛn naa: « Lyaaŋ u Masɛdwan, yibay! »
ACT 16:10 Ungö a imanmii aki, kà imbürà, nde kàleŋ bi mukyà Masɛdwan, ntɔn bi kàyöb naa Mwol kàmibel mukàkyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ akà baar a mper ayin.
ACT 16:11 U Tɔlɔwasi, bi kàbilà kà an'swà mukyà ipey isaŋ a Samɔtalasi. Taaŋtyà bi kàtoo kà an'swà u Nɛyapɔlisi.
ACT 16:12 Fà apan, bi kàkyà Filipe, bul a kölàköl là itiir a nsi Masɛdwan, la làkäl nsal a Lɔmà. Bi kàkäl ndam a taaŋ u bul alà.
ACT 16:13 Ilä a saba, bi kàtoo u nsà a bul ntɔn mukyà kà un'kɔɔl a an'dà, ntɔn bi kàsii naa bi ikàman ikal a ngyamàkà. Bi kàbwaay paa, anà kàyamà anà akaar bàköŋ paa.
ACT 16:14 Umwɛy uboo a akaar abà, ikɔb ande Lidi, bul ande Tyatir, nde kàkäl un'yääl a ipfɛy a tsöö, nde kàfasyäŋà Nzam. Nde kàkyer iweemà, waa Mwol kun'duub mpem ntɔn nde uwem ubwaŋàbwaŋ indiir kàtɛɛnà Pɔl.
ACT 16:15 Umpal kàwɛl nde ndüümà, nde anà ndwà ande, nde kà ibɔ̈ɔ̈n, waa kàtɛn naa: « Kya bɛ làsàman naa mɛ in'wà ŋàlakwikilà a Mwol, wɛy bɛ làbilà anà làkäl u ndwà amɛ. » Nde kàsi muküünà naa bi ikyey.
ACT 16:16 Ilä mwɛy bi kàkäl mukyà ikal a ngyamàkà, un'syääl mwɛy wà un'kaar kàkäl anà bwoo a nkwee, nde kàyi akà bi. Nde kàfakɔlà myee anà kàfakyäänà baar ndaa iyàyà kusà. Isal ande aki kyàpɛɛ bweel mbɔɔn akà ankum ande.
ACT 16:17 Nde kàsɛmà muyilab Pɔl anà bi. Nde kàyikuubà in'kwɛŋ, waa kàtɛɛnà naa: « Baar làman bɛ bà, ba bà asyääl a Nzam a Dudu! Ba bàmuyàlakyään mbwo a mɔ̈ɔ̈! »
ACT 16:18 Nde kàfakyerà abà ilä mbɔɔn. Ya yàpɛ Pɔl làkyämun, lalan kàbulà nde, waa kàswɛŋ dweelà alan naa: « Kà ikɔb a Yɛsu Klistɔ, mɛ amaswaŋ, too uboo a un'kaar wà. » La waa làtoo taaŋ nsil alan.
ACT 16:19 Mpal bàmɛn ankum ande naa undiir kàfapaa ba ubwaŋ kan'too, ba bàkör Pɔl anà Silasi, waa basyen kà un'syäl kusà a antɛɛn.
ACT 16:20 Ba baswɛŋ akà amfum a antɛɛn, waa bàtɛn naa: « Baar bà, bàmuyitwaal lingyoomà uboo a bul abi. Ba Bayudà,
ACT 16:21 ba bàyikyään nkääl a ingyey mpa ban'kwo bi mulab ntɔn bi ibà baar a Lɔmà. »
ACT 16:22 Un'sɛŋ a baar kàmbarà u nkyɛl ntɔn mutɔn ba, antɛɛn batöm mukasɔl ipfɛy, waa baswɛŋ naa bapɛ an'füm.
ACT 16:23 Ungö mukadüb iki mbɔɔn, ba batɔɔm u bɔlokà, waa bàswɛŋ un'leer a bɔlokà mukasey ubwaŋàbwaŋ.
ACT 16:24 Pa kàwɛl nde nswɛɛŋ ayi, nde kasi u bɔlokà làboboo, waa kabäm ibiŋ a in'te kà in'kɔl aba.
ACT 16:25 Tsütsü a boboo a mpib, Pɔl anà Silasi bàkäl muyamà anà mutɔl an'diim musyäŋà Nzam. Baar a bɔlokà bumwɛy bàkäl muweemà ba.
ACT 16:26 Kà imbürà, mɛɛn màni a ngwal, an'sin an'ta a bɔlokà màkyer atɛɛr, apan ibeenà byanswà waa byàdubà, in'siŋ a baar a bɔlokà banswà waa myàtsuŋà.
ACT 16:27 Umpal kàwiyà un'leer a bɔlokà u twaal anà kàmɛn nde naa ibeenà a bɔlokà byàŋàdubà, nde kàtwey kɔm ande ntɔn mudwa mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande, ntɔn nde kàsii naa baar a bɔlokà ban'tiin.
ACT 16:28 Wɛɛ Pɔl kàtɛn u ndaa a ngwal naa: « Twɔn an'dwa mɔ̈ɔ̈ angye, bi banswà ibà paa! »
ACT 16:29 Un'leer a bɔlokà kàlɔ̈m mwinà, kàbilà uboo a ndwà u ntiin, waa kàbü a matɛɛr kà in'kɔl a Pɔl anà Silasi.
ACT 16:30 Apan, nde katwey u nsà, waa kàtɛn naa: « Amwol, ininà mɛ in'kyer muwal mɔ̈ɔ̈? »
ACT 16:31 Ba bun'fuur naa: « Sà làkwikilà akà Mwol Yɛsu, waa ngye ayàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈, ngye anà ndwà angye yanswà. »
ACT 16:32 Abun, ba bun'kyään ndaa a Mwol, anà baar banswà bàkäl u ndwà ande.
ACT 16:33 Taaŋ nsil alan u mpib, nde kasyen mukàsɔŋ iwà aba. Ungö apan nde kàwɛl ndüümà, nde anà baar ande banswà.
ACT 16:34 Nde kasyen u ndwà ande, kàyöŋà mɛsà, waa kàsäŋà anà ndwà ande yanswà ntɔn kàsi nde làkwikilà amu Nzam.
ACT 16:35 Mpal làyaanà taaŋ, antɛɛn bàtöm asyääl ntɔn mutɛn a un'leer a bɔlokà naa: « Awɛy baar ban. »
ACT 16:36 Un'leer a bɔlokà kàkyään Pɔl ndaa ayi, waa kàtɛn naa: « Amfum antɛɛn ban'tɔm ndaa naa bàlatwey u bɔlokà. Apanà, làtoo anà làkyen unsà duu. »
ACT 16:37 Wɛɛ Pɔl kàtɛn naa: « Ungö mukikam an'füm u mii a baar ukɔɔn akifuul un'lɔɔn, bi Alɔmà, ba bitɔɔm u bɔlokà. Apanà waa ba bitɔɔm u nsà u nku! Ya ikal anki abwɛy! Wɛy ba ŋakwo bàyitwey! »
ACT 16:38 Asyääl bàkàkyään ndaa ayi akà amfum a antɛɛn. Mpal bàwem ba naa ba bàkäl Alɔmà, bɔɔmà waa lawɛl.
ACT 16:39 Ba waa bàyi, babɔ̈ɔ̈n, batwey anà balɔ̈ɔ̈m mutoo u bul.
ACT 16:40 Mpal bàtoo ba u bɔlokà, ba bàkàbilà u ndwà a Lidi. Ungö mubwey anà atɔŋ, ba bapɛ ngwal, waa bàkyen.
ACT 17:1 Pɔl anà Silasi bàlyaaŋ kà Amfipolisi anà Apɔlɔni, ba bàkɔlà Tɛsalɔnikà. Akun Ayudà bàkäl anà ndwà a nköŋ aba.
ACT 17:2 Pɔl kàbilà kwo asànaa nkääl ande. An'saba an'tär màlääb, nde kàkäl muyäämà anà ba ntɔn Ndaa Aŋàsɔn,
ACT 17:3 wàmubuul anà muswaŋ naa Klistɔ kàkyer alàman mpay anà kàkyer alàwiyà uboo a akü. Klistɔ wà Yɛsu wa alàkyäänà mɛ wà.
ACT 17:4 Ndam a baar uboo a ba bàkyey ba, ba bàtüüb anà Pɔl anà Silasi, anà un'kàbɔ a Angɛlɛki bàfasyäŋà Nzam, anà akaar a nkaay mbɔɔn.
ACT 17:5 Wɛɛ Ayudà bàwem un'köl, ba bàwɛl baar a bunàbun bàmbàmbärà kà an'balàbal ntɔn musà binköŋ mbɔɔn uboo a un'sɛŋ anà lingyoomà uboo a bul. Ba bàkàyɔl u ndwà a Yasɔn, ntɔn muleŋ Pɔl anà Silasi anà mukasyen akà un'sɛŋ a baar.
ACT 17:6 Ba bamɛn anki, apan ba bàwɛl Yasɔn anà ndam a atɔŋ bàkäl anà nde, ba batwääl akà abyääl a bul, bàmusà in'kwɛŋ anà mutɛn naa: « Baar bà ban'twaal lingyoomà u mɛɛn manswà, wɛɛ ŋàbawà ba ban'yàkɔlà apà!
ACT 17:7 Yasɔn kawɛl u ndwà ande. Ba banswà bàkwen anki mulab in'kɔɔn a Sɛzar, ba bàmutɛɛnà naa we anà mfum asin ikɔb ande Yɛsu. »
ACT 17:8 Ndaa ayi yàtwääl lingyoomà akà un'sɛŋ a baar anà akà abyääl a bul.
ACT 17:9 Ungö muwal nkwiy kà an'kɔɔ a Yasɔn anà mà baar bumwɛy, ba waa bawɛy.
ACT 17:10 U mpib, atɔŋ bàtöm Pɔl anà Silasi u Bɛrɛ. Umpal bàtöl ba, ba bàbilà u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà.
ACT 17:11 Ayudà a Bɛrɛ bàkäl anà mpem aŋàbwaŋ akwànaa Ayudà a Tɛsalɔnikà. Ba bàwɛl Ndaa unsà mansyäär, ba sye bàfasyeebà Ndaa Aŋàsɔn ilä byanswà ntɔn muyöb naa nkye indiir bakyäänà byàkäl ndandaa.
ACT 17:12 Baar mbɔɔn uboo a ba bàsi làkwikilà, anà akaar angɛlɛki a nkaay, anà abaal mbɔɔn.
ACT 17:13 Wɛɛ mpal bàyöb Ayudà a Tɛsalɔnikà naa Pɔl wàmukyäänà ndaa a Nzam sye u Bɛrɛ, ba bàyi ntɔn musà lingyoomà uboo a baar banswà.
ACT 17:14 Apan, làgyägyä, atɔŋ bàkàswà Pɔl u ntsü a ngyäl a kölàköl, wɛɛ akà Silasi anà Tumàtɛ, ba bàsàsal paa.
ACT 17:15 Baar bàsyen Pɔl, bàkàtsü kà Atɛn. Ungö bàyàfurà ba, ba bàkyään Silasi anà Tumàtɛ nswɛɛŋ katööm Pɔl: nde kalɔ̈m naa ba bun'läb agyägyä.
ACT 17:16 Umpal kàkäl Pɔl mudilà ba kà Atɛn, mpem ande yàlalà mbaa muman naa bul la làkäl aŋàyɔl a itɛk.
ACT 17:17 Nde kàyäämà anà Ayudà anà baar mpa abà Ayudà abà bàfasyäŋà Nzam uboo a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà, anà baar banswà kàbweeyà nde abà kà un'syäl ilä byanswà.
ACT 17:18 Ndam a baar a an'yeerà, baar a Epikür anà baar a Stɔyi bàyäämà anà nde. Amwɛy bàtɛɛnà naa: « Ŋamun awà ininà ukwen mutɛn? » Bumwɛy naa: « Nde ayàkal un'lɔɔŋ a bànzam a ingyey » ntɔn nde kàkyäänà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là Yɛsu anà ngwiiyà a akü.
ACT 17:19 Apan waa bun'kör, bun'syen kà un'syäl a Arɔpazɛ, waa bàtɛn a nde naa: « Nkye bi ikyàkwo muyöb, an'lɔɔŋ nà màkün ayikyään ngye mà?
ACT 17:20 Ntɔn ngye awà mukyäänà bi indiir a ingyey. Bi ikwen muyöb naa bya iswaŋà aben. »
ACT 17:21 Abun, baar a Atɛn banswà anà angyey bàfàkal kà Atɛn, taaŋ aba mbɔɔn làlyaaŋà mutɛn itàkal muwem indiir akün.
ACT 17:22 Pɔl kàkäl umbär uboboo a Arɔpazɛ, waa kàtɛn naa: « Abaal a Atɛn, mɛ an'man naa mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ wanswà wà unsà inzaam.
ACT 17:23 Ntɔn an'yilyaaŋ mɛ uboo a bul abɛ anà an'syebà mɛ indiir a in'kyɛɛl abɛ, mɛ an'man idwà imwɛy bàkyàsɔn naa: "Akà nzam mpa bàyöb baar!" Wɛɛ nde wa làfàsyänà bɛ wà anà làkɔ̈ɔ̈n ayöb bɛ, mɛ amàyàlakyään wa.
ACT 17:24 Nzam awà kàkyer du anà mɛɛn anà indiir byanswà abyà uboo, nde wà Mwol a du anà mɛɛn, nde ufàkal anki uboo a ndwà a nzam ayà bàkyer kà an'kɔɔ a baar,
ACT 17:25 nde baar bàfun'bay anki, asànaa nde kà we anà mfun a undiir aben undiir. Ntɔn nde wà mbuur afàpà mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà un'swey akà baar banswà anà indiir byumwɛy.
ACT 17:26 Fà mbuur mwɛy nde kàkyer in'sɛŋ a baar ntɔn ba bàkäl udu a mɛɛn manswà, nde kàtsül an'mpaŋà anà ndel a nsi bàtöŋ ba.
ACT 17:27 Nde kàkwen naa baar bàleŋ Nzam, taaŋ lumwɛy naa ba bun'mɛn unsà ileleŋ aba. Kutɛn aŋàbwaŋ nde kwɛl watɛy anà umwɛy umwɛy uboo a bi,
ACT 17:28 ntɔn: "U mbwo ande, bi ibye anà mɔ̈ɔ̈, ibàmubar anà mukal." Ya yà asànaa bàtɛn asöön abɛ amwɛy naa: "Bi sye ibà itoo ande."
ACT 17:29 Undiir awun, ntɔn ibà bi itoo a Nzam, bi ikwe anki muyweer naa nde ukäl asànaa itɛk a wɔl, kyà arza anà kyà un'kul kàkyer mbuur unsà an'kyän ande.
ACT 17:30 Wɛɛ Nzam, ukɔɔn alab taaŋ a ingyöy, apanà nde wàmubel baar banswà u ntsü yanswà mubuul mpem,
ACT 17:31 ntɔn nde kàkyàtsul ilä mwɛy akyà usàtsüül nde mɛɛn manswà nsaŋ unsà balàbal u mbwo a mbuur kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l nde, awà kaswɛŋ nde idiim mukun'wiiy kà ukwà. »
ACT 17:32 Mpal bàwem ba « ngwiiyà a akü », baar amwey waa bun'sɛɛ, wɛɛ bumwɛy bàtɛɛnà naa: « Bi iyàfawem mutɛn ndaa ayi u mbalà asin. »
ACT 17:33 Apan, Pɔl waa kàsawɛy.
ACT 17:34 Wɛɛ ndam a baar bumwɛy bàbääb anà nde, ba bàsi làkwikilà: uboo a ba, Dɛnis mbuur a Arɔbazɛ, anà un'kaar mwɛy ikɔb ande Damalis, anà baar asin sye.
ACT 18:1 Ungö apan, Pɔl kàlwomà kà Atɛn, waa kàkyen Kɔlintɔ.
ACT 18:2 Nde kwo kàbwey anà Un'yudà mwɛy ikɔb ande Akilasi, un'nsi Pɔnt, kàfü Itali itaan a mbɔɔn tɛy anà un'kyay ande Pilàsilà, ntɔn Kɔlɔdɛ kàswɛŋ naa Ayudà banswà bàkyer atoo u Lɔmà, nde kàbääb anà ba,
ACT 18:3 ntɔn nde kàkäl akyà isal mwɛy anà ba, nde kàkäl apà ba ntɔn mukyer isal: ba bàkäl akyeer a ntɛn.
ACT 18:4 Pɔl kàyäämà kà ilä a saba kyanswà u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà. Nde kàkyer ngwal naa Ayudà anà Angɛlɛki bàkyey.
ACT 18:5 Wɛɛ utaaŋ bàfü Silasi anà Tumàtɛ Masɛdwan anà bàyàkɔlà ba, Pɔl kàpɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande wanswà mulɔŋ Ndaa anà mutà imbäl akà Ayudà naa Yɛsu wà Klistɔ.
ACT 18:6 Ayudà bàsyee mbaaŋ, waa bun'töö. Pɔl kàkɔɔb ipfɛy ande, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Wɛy an'kil abɛ màbü udu a un'tswe abɛ ŋakwo! Mɛ un'bar ankye akwɛy watɛy. Sɛmà apanà mɛ in'kyà akà baar mpa abà Ayudà. »
ACT 18:7 Apan, nde kàtoo akun, waa kàbilà u ndwà a mbuur mwɛy ikɔb ande Tityüs Züstüs, nde kàfasyäŋà Nzam, ndwà ande yàkäl yàŋàbääb a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà.
ACT 18:8 Apan, Krispüs, un'leer a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà, kàsi làkwikilà amu Mwol anà ndwà ande yanswà. Bàkɔlintɔ mbɔɔn bàweemà Pɔl, bàsi làkwikilà anà bàwɛlà ndüümà.
ACT 18:9 U mpib mwɛy, Mwol kàkyään Pɔl unsà imanmii naa: « Twɔn an'man bɔɔmà, lab mukyään, twɔn an'kal a duu.
ACT 18:10 Ntɔn mɛ, mɛ in'wà anà ngye, akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki mukakyer ube, ntɔn un'sɛŋ amɛ wà mbɔɔn u bul alà. »
ACT 18:11 Nde kàkyer mbul mwɛy a ngɔɔn syaam mulɔŋ ndaa a Nzam uboo a ba.
ACT 18:12 Wɛɛ umpal kàkäl Galyɔn mfum u Akayi, unsà un'tüüb mwɛy, Ayudà bàtwääl lingyoomà ntɔn mutɔn Pɔl. Apan, ba bun'syen u làbay a nsaŋ,
ACT 18:13 waa bàtɛn naa: « Mbuur wà wàmuyisyen baar musyäŋà Nzam ukɔɔn alab un'kɔɔn. »
ACT 18:14 Umpal kàlàduub Pɔl mun, Galyɔn kàtɛn a Ayudà naa: « Kya ilàkal ndwääl itàkal ube a kölàköl, mɛ in'kyer alawem, oo Ayudà.
ACT 18:15 Wɛɛ isàkal naa mbaaŋ yà ntɔn ndaa anà ikɔb anà un'kɔɔn abɛ ŋakwo, ayin iler bɛ ŋakwo. Mɛ, mɛ in'kwen anki mukal ntɛɛn a indiir abi! »
ACT 18:16 Apan, nde waa kafuur.
ACT 18:17 Lalan bàkör ba Sɔstɛn, mfum a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà, waa bun'düb kusà a làbay a nsaŋ. Wɛɛ Galyɔn indiir abi kàsi anki u mpem.
ACT 18:18 Pɔl kàfàkal ilä mbɔɔn u Kɔlintɔ. Ungö, nde kàsàwɛy atɔŋ, waa kàwɛl an'swà ntɔn mukyà Siri anà Pilàsilà anà Akilasi, ungö mukɔɔl ntswe ande u Sanshres ntɔn nde kàdi kyän.
ACT 18:19 Ba bàtöl Ԑfɛsɔ, Pɔl kàsàwɛy atɔŋ bàkäl anà nde paa. Nde kàbilà nde ŋakwo u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà, waa kàyäm anà Ayudà.
ACT 18:20 Ba bun'lɔ̈ɔ̈m naa nde ukäl ilä mbɔɔn apà ba, wɛɛ Pɔl kàkyey anki,
ACT 18:21 wɛɛ nde kàsawɛy nde, waa kàtɛn naa: « Nzam usàkwen, mɛ in'kyer afàsyefurà apà bɛ. » Nde kàbilà kà an'swà mukyà Ԑfɛsɔ.
ACT 18:22 Nde kàtoo kà an'swà u Sɛzarɛ. Nde kàtàbeenà mupà Ikööŋ mbɔr, waa kàtyà Antyɔsha.
ACT 18:23 Ungö kàkyer nde ndam a an'taaŋ paa, nde kàkyen anà kàsoonà Ngalàtyà anà Frizi muyipà alɔŋki banswà ngwal.
ACT 18:24 Un'yudà mwɛy ikɔb ande Apɔlɔsi, un'nsi Alɛksandri, kàyàkɔlà kà Ɛfɛsɔ. Nde kàkäl aŋun'yɛnà, kàyöb utwɛɛy ubwaŋàbwaŋ anà kàkäl ngwal u Ndaa Aŋàsɔn.
ACT 18:25 Nde kàwɛl un'yɛnà u mbwo a Mwol, anà mbämà unsà dwelà, nde kàyikyäänà anà kàyilɔɔŋà anà nwɛŋ indiir iler Yɛsu, itàkal naa nde kàyöb nà ndüümà a Ywan mpɛl.
ACT 18:26 Nde kàyääma unsà uyɔl uboo a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà. Wɛɛ Pilàsilà anà Akilasi bun'wem ba, ba bun'wɛl ukɔl, ntɔn ba bun'swɛŋ ubwaŋàbwaŋ Mbwo a Nzam.
ACT 18:27 Nde kàkwen mulyaaŋ kà Akayi, atɔŋ bun'pɛ ngwal mukyer abun, ba bàsön un'kaan akà alɔŋki ntɔn ba bun'wɛl. Mpal kàtöl nde, unsà kab a ngway, nde kàmɛnà mbuur a ndöŋ akà baar bàbulà aŋàlàkwikilà
ACT 18:28 ntɔn nde kàtön Ayudà ipepey a ngwal yanswà u mii a baar: nde kàswɛŋà u mbwo a Ndaa Aŋàsɔn naa Yɛsu wà Klistɔ.
ACT 19:1 Yàmɛnà naa mpal kàkäl Apɔlɔsi u Kɔlintɔ, Pɔl, ungö kàsoonà nde itiir a nsi a myɔŋ, nde kàtyà Ԑfɛsɔ. Nde kwo kàbwey a ndam a alɔŋki, nde kafuul naa:
ACT 19:2 « Nkye bɛ làkyàwal Dwelà In'kyɛɛl umpal làbulà bɛ aŋàlàkwikilà? » Ba bun'fuur naa: « Bi kàwem anki akà làsaŋ làmwɛy naa we anà Dweelà In'kyɛɛl. »
ACT 19:3 Apan nde kafuul naa: « Ndüümà nà bɛ làwɛl? » Ba naa: « Ndüümà a Ywan. »
