ACT 19:4 Waa Pɔl kàtɛn naa: « Ndüümà a Ywan yà ndüümà a mbuul a mpem, nde kàkyäänà un'sɛŋ naa ba bàsi làkwikilà akà mbuur awà ayàyà ungö a nde, iswaŋà naa Yɛsu. »
ACT 19:5 Ungö bàwem ba ndaa ayi, ba bàwɛl ndüümà kà ikɔb a Mwol Yɛsu.
ACT 19:6 Ungö kasi Pɔl an'kɔɔ, Dweelà In'kyɛɛl kàyi udu a ba, waa ba bàsɛmà mutɛn unsà ndaa yà ifà ifà anà mutà ngɔɔm.
ACT 19:7 Ba banswà bàkäl isii a baar kwem aŋiyweel.
ACT 19:8 Ungö apan, Pɔl kàbilà u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà, nde kàtɛɛnà anà uyɔl ngɔɔn tär, wàmuyämà anà musiinà baar bàweemà nde naa ba bàkyey ndaa a Imwol a Nzam kàlɔɔŋà nde.
ACT 19:9 Wɛɛ bumwɛy uboo a ba bàkäl baar a un'tswe bwoor, ba bàtön musà làkwikilà anà bàsɛɛ Mbwo u mii a nköŋ a baar. Apan Pɔl kàkaabà anà ba, waa kàwɛl alɔŋki ukɔl ntɔn muyäämà anà ba ilä a ilä u ndwà a nkaan a Tiranüs.
ACT 19:10 Ya abà yàkölà mbul yweel, abun baar banswà bàkäl kà Azi, Ayudà anà a Angɛlɛki, bàkyer awem Ndaa a Mwol.
ACT 19:11 Nzam kàkyerà impà a ifà asin u mbwo a an'kɔɔ a Pɔl.
ACT 19:12 Undiir awun, bàsyee ba ipfey itàkal itɛɛnà a ipfɛy byàböölà ndür ande udu a abɛy: an'kyal aba waa màwüü, an'dweelà an'be waa màtoo.
ACT 19:13 Ndam a Ayudà bàyilyaaŋà ntsü yanswà ntɔn muböŋ an'dweelà an'be uboo a baar, bàbulà sye mutà ikɔb a Mwol Yɛsu din anà mutɛn naa: « Mɛ amaswaŋ, too kà ikɔb a Yɛsu awà ufàkyään Pɔl wà! »
ACT 19:14 Baar bàkyerà abun bà baan a Tsɛva babaal bànsambwaar. Tsɛva kàkäl Un'yudà, kàkäl sye undweer a angaŋ.
ACT 19:15 Wɛɛ dweelà a làbe kafuur naa: « Mɛ Yɛsu in'kyun'yöb, mɛ in'kyàyöb naa Pɔl wà nà. Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làbà bànà? »
ACT 19:16 Apan, mbuur kàkäl anà dweelà a làbe kabweel u ndür, kàsöön ba banswà u ngwal. Unkiiŋ kàkü bɛy, lalan bàtiin ba ndwà ande bànsàpɔl anà iwà u ndür.
ACT 19:17 Baar banswà bàkäl kà Ɛfɛsɔ, Ayudà anà Angɛlɛki, bàkyer ayöb ndaa ayi, bɔɔmà waa lawɛl, ikɔb a Mwol Yɛsu kyàkäl kyàŋàsyäŋà.
ACT 19:18 Baar mbɔɔn uboo a baar bàbulà aŋàlàkwikilà, bàyee mukyey anà mukyään nsyääl aba.
ACT 19:19 Baar mbɔɔn uboo a baar bàfasyäälà inwɛŋ, bàtwääl in'kaan aba, waa bàsyee mya mbaa kusà a baar banswà. Mpal bàyilà ba ntal a mya, ya yàbü nsaab an'kwem an'tyeen myà itɛr a ngim.
ACT 19:20 Undiir awun, unsà ngwal a Mwol, Ndaa yàkyer ayɛl anà yàkäl ngwal.
ACT 19:21 Ungö byàlyaaŋ indiir abi, Pɔl kàwɛl an'kyän unsà dweelà musoonà Masɛdwan anà Akayi ntɔn mukyà Yɛlusàlɛm, waa kàtɛn naa: « Mɛ insàfur atol paa, mɛ in'kyer aman Lɔmà sye. »
ACT 19:22 Ungö mutɔm Masɛdwan abɔ̈ɔ̈l uboo a baar basälà anà nde, Tumàtɛ anà Ԑlastɛ, nde ŋakwo kàsàkyer ndam a ilä kà Azi.
ACT 19:23 Umpal ayin, lingyoomà a ngwal làkyer atoo ntɔn Mbwo.
ACT 19:24 Kàkäl anà un'kyeer a in'tak mwɛy ikɔb ande Dɛmɛtrüs, kàfakyerà bikwom a idwà a Artɛmisi anà arza. Abun asyääl ande bàwɛlà bweel mbɔɔn.
ACT 19:25 Nde kàtüüb ba anà baar asin bàfakyerà isal imwey anà ba, waa kàtɛn naa: « Abaal, bɛ làkyàyöb naa ubwaŋ abi bàfàfà unsà isal ki.
ACT 19:26 Wɛɛ bɛ ŋakwo làkimanà anà làkiweemà: kànà kà Ԑfɛsɔ mpɛl anki, wɛɛ kà isii a Azi kyanswà, Pɔl awà wàmuni an'kyän a un'sɛŋ mbɔɔn anà musiinà ba, asànaa ukatɛɛnà nde, naa bànzam akwà bàfàfà kà an'kɔɔ abi kàbà bànzam anki.
ACT 19:27 Kà nà isal abi mpɛl anki iyàtäy, wɛɛ sye ndwà a nzam abi wàkölàköl wà un'kaar Artɛmisi ikɔ̈ɔ̈n afàyàkal anà làkoo a nzam wa bàfàsyäŋà wà kà Azi anà u mɛɛn manswà! »
ACT 19:28 Ndaa ayi yàpɛ nkyɛl mbɔɔn akà baar bàwem ya, ba bàsi in'kwɛŋ, waa bàtɛn naa: « Artɛmisi wà nzam un'kaar wàkölàköl wà baar a Ԑfɛsɔ! »
ACT 19:29 Bul lanswà làbilà uboo a lingyoomà. Baar mbɔɔn bàkyen u ndwà a itaŋà, bàkör Gayüsi anà Aristarkà, baar a Masɛdwan abɔ̈ɔ̈l bàyilyaaŋà anà Pɔl.
ACT 19:30 Pɔl kàkwen mukàmɛnà kusà a un'sɛŋ, wɛɛ alɔŋki waa bun'tsüŋ.
ACT 19:31 Andweer a isal amwɛy bàkäl asam ande, ba bàtöm baar mukun'lɔm naa nde ukɔɔn akàpà ndür ande u ndwà a itaŋà.
ACT 19:32 Baar baar bàkäl mutɛn a ngwal unsà làkyamun, lingyoomà làkyer abilà uboo a nköŋ, bàmbɔɔn bàyöb anki isin a ndaa bàköŋ ba.
ACT 19:33 Apan, baar uboo a un'sɛŋ bàkyään ndaa ayin akà mbuur mwɛy ikɔb ande Alɛksandre awà bàsi Ayudà nkalsà. Alɛksandre kàsɛn kɔɔ udu ntɔn muwɛɛl ba kusà a nköŋ.
ACT 19:34 Wɛɛ mpal bàwem ba naa nde kàkäl un'yudà, ba banswà, u mun mwɛy, bàsi in'kwɛŋ tsütsü a an'taaŋ mɔ̈ɔ̈l: « Artɛmisi a Ɛfɛsɔ wàkölàköl! »
ACT 19:35 Apan, ungö mukyäämà un'sɛŋ, nde kàtɛn naa: « Abaal a Ԑfɛsɔ, nà mpa ayöb naa Ԑfɛsɔ là bul làfàler ndwà a nzam a Artɛmisi a kölàköl anà itɛk ande kyàfü du anà kyàyàbwà u mɛɛn?
ACT 19:36 Ntɔn ndaa ayi, akà mbuur asà ya mbaaŋ watɛy, làkäl a duu, twɔn lan'kyer agyägyä.
ACT 19:37 Wɛɛ baar bà, bɛ làmatwaal apà, baar mpa bàkyer ube akà nzam abi wà un'kaar, anà mpa bun'bɛy.
ACT 19:38 Isàkal naa Dɛmɛtrüs anà baar kàsälà nde abà bàkwen mufüün mbuur mwɛy, ye anà mbay a nsaŋ anà ntɛɛn: wɛy baar baar bakàfüün kwo.
ACT 19:39 Kya isàkal naa bɛ làwe anà undiir asin mulɔm, wɛy un'syäl a balàbal ulɔ̈n wa.
ACT 19:40 Naa tɛy, baar bàyiwal asànaa baar a lingyoomà ntɔn nköŋ abi yàŋàbà, ntɔn akà undiir mwɛy kan'kwo mupà bi iböŋ ntɔn nköŋ ayi watɛy. »
ACT 19:41 Ungö apan, nde kàpay baar bàköŋ.
ACT 20:1 Mpal làwü làso lanswà, Pɔl kàtüüb alɔŋki. Ungö mukapà ngwal, laa kàsawɛy nde, waa kàkyen Masɛdwan.
ACT 20:2 Nde kàlyaaŋ kà in'tà amin mupà alɔŋki ngwal unsà an'yääm mbɔɔn. Ungö nde kàkyen Ngɛlɛsi
ACT 20:3 mper kàkyer nde ngɔɔn tär. Nde kàbön muwal an'swà ntɔn mukyà Siri, wɛɛ Ayudà bàdirà mukun'kyer ube. Undiiràwun kàsɔɔm nde an'kyän mufàsoonà u Masɛdwan.
ACT 20:4 Baar bàkyen muyisal anà nde tii kà Azi babà: Sɔpatrɔs, mwan baal a Pirüs un'nsi Bɛrɛ, Aristark anà Sɛgɔn ansi Tɛsalɔnikà, Gayüs un'nsi Dɛrbɛ, Tumàtɛ anà Tishik anà Trɔfim baar a un'tà a Azi.
ACT 20:5 Ba banswà bàkyen kusà a bi, ba bàkidil u Tɔlɔwasi.
ACT 20:6 Wɛɛ bi, bi Filipe kàlwomà ungö a ilä a mampà iköön ful, bi kàbilà kà an'swà mukàtaan ba ungö a ilä ityeen u Tɔlowasi, ikal kàkyer bi ilä nsambwaar.
ACT 20:7 Ilä atàtwɛb ungö a saba, bi kàkäl ikal imwɛy ntɔn mutsul mampà, Pɔl kàkäl muyäämà anà ba. Ntɔn ya yàlɔ̈m naa nde akyà taaŋtyà, nde kàläb an'yääm ndaay tii uboboo a mpib.
ACT 20:8 Minà myàkäl mbɔɔn u suk adu kàköŋ bi.
ACT 20:9 Kyekà, un'tö mwɛy ikɔb ande Ötik, kàkäl wàŋàbwaay u mun a nɛl. Umpal kàkäl Pɔl mulab an'yääm ndaay, nde kàkuur a twaal. Twaal alà lun'syen nkuur, waa kàbü fà ndwà yàtär udu. Mpal bun'suub ba, nde kàkäl wàŋàkwà.
ACT 20:10 Pɔl laa kàtɔlà nde, waa kàkyà ntiin mper kàkäl un'tö awà. Nde kun'wɛl kà an'kɔɔ, waa kàtɛn naa: « Twɔn lan'tɛɛr, mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande wà mwo! »
ACT 20:11 Ungö mubeenà, Pɔl, kàtsül làmpà, waa kàdi. Apan, waa kàfàlab an'yääm tii làtyà taaŋ. Apan, laa kàkyen nde.
ACT 20:12 Wɛɛ akà un'tö awà, ba bun'syen anà mɔ̈ɔ̈. Ya yàpɛ ngwal mbɔɔn akà baar banswà.
ACT 20:13 Wɛɛ bi, bi kàwɛl an'swà kusà mukyà Asɔsi, bul kàkàwal bi Pɔl, ntɔn nde kàkwen mukyà u mbwo a mɛɛn.
ACT 20:14 Mpal kàyitaan nde u Asɔsi, bi kun'wɛl kà an'swà ntɔn mukyà Mitilɛn.
ACT 20:15 Fà apan, bi kàläb mbwo a an'dà taaŋtyà, bi kàkàtol tsütsü a Kyɔ. Ilä kyàlääb pa, bi kàsoonà u Samɔsi. Ungö a ilä mwɛy, bi kàtöl Milɛ ungö mukɔm u Trɔzilyɔn.
ACT 20:16 Ntɔn, Pɔl kàkwen mulyaaŋ ifaŋ kà Ԑfɛsɔ, ntɔn mukɔɔn adwa taaŋ kà Azi: nde kàdüül mukal u Yɛlusàlɛm ilä a Pantɛkɔt, kya mbwo yàlàkal.
ACT 20:17 Mpalàbà, u Milɛ, Pɔl kàtöm baar mukàbel andweer a Ikööŋ a Ԑfɛsɔ.
ACT 20:18 Utaaŋ bàyàkɔlà ba apà nde, nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Bɛ, bɛ làkyàyöb naa mɛ anà bɛ in'fàkal aben sɛmà ilä atàtwɛb kàtɔ̈l mɛ Azi.
ACT 20:19 Mɛ kàsyääl Mwol unsà làbɔ̈ɔ̈n lanswà uboo a nsaaŋ anà uboo a in'taam myàfü u ndiirà a Ayudà.
ACT 20:20 Mɛ kàyee anki akà undiir mwɛy kan'kwo mukal wàndöŋ ntɔn bɛ. Wɛɛ mɛ kàkyer alakyään anà kàkyer alalɔŋ u mii a baar anà uboo a ndwà,
ACT 20:21 mukyään Ayudà anà Angɛlɛki mbuul a mpem akà Nzam anà musà làkwikilà amu Mwol abi Yɛsu.
ACT 20:22 Wɛɛ apanà, mɛ, mɛ in'wà aŋàbämà anà Dweelà, lalan in'kyà mɛ Yɛlusàlɛm, ukɔɔn ayöb naa ndaa nà ikan'bweel kwo.
ACT 20:23 Wɛɛ undiir mwɛy mpɛl Dweelà In'kyɛɛl ukan'swaŋà: u bul lanswà in'siŋ anà mpay aŋàkir yàmukan'diilà.
ACT 20:24 Wɛɛ akà mɛ, mɛ ndöŋ mbɔɔn in'paa anki akà mɔ̈ɔ̈ amɛ, undiir mwɛy awà kan'söön ubwaŋ wà mulab mbwo amɛ anà mumay isal kan'pɛ Mwol Yɛsu: utà imbäl a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là kab a ngway a Nzam.
ACT 20:25 Sɛmà apanà, mɛ, mɛ in'kyàyöb naa bɛ ntabwey amɛ làyàfàman anki, bɛ banswà baar abà kàlyaaŋà mɛ uboo a bɛ muyikyään Imwol a Nzam.
ACT 20:26 Lalan, mɛ, mɛ an'kwo in'tɛ imbäl ŋàbawà kusà a bɛ naa umwɛy uboo abɛ usadiimà mbwo, nsaŋ ande ŋakwo.
ACT 20:27 Ntɔn mɛ akà undiir mwɛy kàyee anki, wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ kàlakyään an'kyän a Nzam manswà.
ACT 20:28 Làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ ntɔn bɛ ŋakwo anà ntɔn làböl kàlapɛ Dweelà In'kyɛɛl muler, làkäl aseey a Ikööŋ a Nzam kàwɛl nde u mbwo a an'kil ande ŋakwo.
ACT 20:29 Mɛ, mɛ inkyàyöb naa ungö a nkyeen amɛ, in'kyɛŋ a nkyɛl mpa myàsàwem ngyɛb a làböl myàkyer asàbilà uboo a bɛ,
ACT 20:30 itàkal uboo a itsuŋ abɛ ŋakwo baar bàkyer asàmbarà mutɛn ndaa a loor ntɔn alɔŋki baläb.
ACT 20:31 Lalan, làtsim, làyöb naa u mbul tär, mpib anà mwäänà, isal amɛ kyàkäl mutɛn a bɛ anà nsaaŋ u mii.
ACT 20:32 « Waa apanà, mɛ amàlapà kà an'kɔɔ a Nzam anà akà ndaa a kab a ngway ande alye anà ngwal atɔŋ anà mupà kwal akà baar aŋàkyɛɛl banswà.
ACT 20:33 Mɛ kàsàwem anki un'köl ntɔn ngim itàkal wɔl itàkal ipfey a mbuur.
ACT 20:34 Bɛ, bɛ ŋakwo làkyàyöb naa an'kɔɔ mà, ma màsäl ntɔn indiir kàkäl bi abyà ndöŋ, mɛ anà baar bàkäl anà mɛ.
ACT 20:35 Mɛ kàlaswɛŋ taaŋ lanswà naa yubwaŋ musal abun ntɔn mubay baar abà u ngyal, muyɔbà ndaa kàtɛn Mwol Yɛsu ŋakwo naa: "Un'sak afàkal mbɔɔn mupà akwànaa muwal!" »
ACT 20:36 Ungö mutɛn abwɛy, nde kàbü an'köm mbwo mwɛy anà ba banswà, waa kàyamà.
ACT 20:37 Apan ba banswà waa bàlel, bun'bweel u bway ntɔn mukundüür.
ACT 20:38 Ngyɛb aba yàmbɔɔn yàfü unsà ndaa kàtɛn nde naa ba ntabwey ande bàfàsàman anki. Apan ba bàkun'swà tii kà an'swà.
ACT 21:1 Yàmɛnà naa ungö mukaabà anà ba a mpay anà muwal an'swà, bi kàkyen ipey tii u Kɔs, taaŋtyà bi kàkɔlà Rɔdɛ, apan bi kàkyà Patara.
ACT 21:2 Paa, bi kàmɛn an'swà màmukyà Fɛnɛsi, laa kàbilà bi, kàkyen bi.
ACT 21:3 Mpal kàtääl bi isaŋ a Shipɛlɛ, bi kàsàwɛy kya u kɔɔ a ikaar, waa kàwɛl mbwo mukyà mper a Siri, bi kàtɔlà u Tir, ikal màtwey an'swà buur ama.
ACT 21:4 Akun bi kàmɛn alɔŋki, bi kàbwaay paa mpɔsà mwɛy. U mbwo a Dweelà ba bàtɛn a Pɔl naa nde ukɔɔn abeenà Yɛlusàlɛm.
ACT 21:5 Wɛɛ mpal byàkwe ilä abi, bi kàfàwal mbwo mukyà. Ba banswà anà akyay aba anà baan aba bàkiswà tii u nsà a bul. Mpal kàtöl bi kà un'kɔɔl a an'dà, bi kàbü an'köm, waa kàyamà.
ACT 21:6 Ungö mupɛɛl mbɔr a ntsüü anà atɔŋ, bi kàbilà kà an'swà, wɛɛ ba bàfurà ndwà aba.
ACT 21:7 Wɛɛ akà bi, bi kàmay mbwo abi yanswà sɛmà Tir tii Petɔlɛmayis, bi kàpɛ atɔŋ mbɔr, waa kàbwaay apà ba ilä mwɛy.
ACT 21:8 Taaŋtyà, kàtoo bi, bi kàkyen Sɛzarɛ. Akun, bi kàbilà u ndwà a Filipo un'paylàsaŋ a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ, umwɛy uboo a Nsambwaar, waa bi kàbwaay paa.
ACT 21:9 Nde kàkäl abà baan akaar ankɔr anà. Ba bàfataa ngɔɔm.
ACT 21:10 Bi kàkäl paa ilä mbɔɔn, umpal kàyi ŋangɔɔm mwɛy kàfü Yuday ikɔb ande Agabüs.
ACT 21:11 Nde kayi akà bi anà kàwɛl un'di a lɔŋ a Pɔl, nde kàbäm wa kà in'kɔl anà kà an'kɔɔ ande ŋakwo, waa kàtɛn naa: « Làwem, Dweelà In'kyɛɛl an'tɛn naa mbuur aŋun'di wà, Ayudà bàsàkyer un'bäm u Yɛlusàlɛm asànaa an'bäm mɛ là, waa bàsun'yälà kà an'kɔɔ a angyey. »
ACT 21:12 Mpal bàwem bi indiir abi, bi ŋakwo anà atɔŋ a bul alan, bi bàbɔ̈ɔ̈n Pɔl mukɔɔn abeenà Yɛlusàlɛm.
ACT 21:13 Apan, Pɔl kàfuur naa: « Undiir nà làlelà bɛ anà làkaamà bɛ mpem amɛ? Wɛɛ akà mɛ, mɛ an'kyey, kà nà mukan'bäm in'siŋ mpɛl anki, wɛɛ anà mukwà u Yɛlusàlɛm ntɔn ikɔb a Mwol Yɛsu. »
ACT 21:14 Bi bàsàkwo anki musɔɔm an'kyän ande, bi bàkäl akul, waa bàtɛn naa: « Wɛy ukwen a Mwol bàkäl. »
ACT 21:15 Ungö a ndam a ilä, bi bàlɔ̈ɔ̈n indiir abi, waa kàbeenà Yɛlusàlɛm.
ACT 21:16 Ndam a alɔŋki uboo alɔŋki a Sɛzarɛ bàkiswà anà bisyeen mukàbɔ̈ɔ̈n u ndwà a un'nsi Shipɛle mwɛy ikɔb ande Mnasɔn. Nde kàkäl un'lɔŋki fà itaan.
ACT 21:17 U ntööl abi u Yɛlusàlɛm, atɔŋ biwɛl unsà un'sak wanswà.
ACT 21:18 Taaŋtyà, Pɔl kàkyen anà bi u ndwà a Zyak, ikal bàköŋ andweer banswà.
ACT 21:19 Ungö kapɛ nde mbɔr, nde kakyään pànsi pànsi indiir byanswà kàkyer Nzam akà baar mpa abà Ayudà u mbwo a isal ande.
ACT 21:20 Ungö mukun'wem, ba bàsi Nzam làkoo, waa bàfuur akà Pɔl naa: « Un'tɔŋ, ngye akimanà, Ayudà nsaab kwe ban'sà làkwikilà, ba banswà ban'pà mɔ̈ɔ̈ aba unsà un'kɔɔn.
ACT 21:21 Wɛɛ ntɔn ngye, ba bàwem in'ŋün naa ngye ayilɔŋ ndaa a nkɔɔl, naa Ayudà bàfàkal uboo a baar mpa abà Ayudà bàtön Mɔsɛ, anà mukakyään naa ba bàkɔɔn akyɛy baan aba anà bàkɔɔn alab nkääl a Ayudà.
ACT 21:22 Bi waa ikyer aben? Itàkal kaben, ba bàkyer ayàyöb naa ngye an'yà.
ACT 21:23 Undiiràwun, ngye akyer asànaa kaswaŋ bi: bi ibye abà abaal anà bàkyàdyà kyän.
ACT 21:24 Asyen, kadi nkwà anà ba. Fur sye ngim aba ntɔn ba bàkɔɔl ntswe aba. Abun baar banswà bàyàyöb ba naa ndaa yanswà bàwem ba ntɔn ngye kàyà ndandaa anki, wɛɛ ngye, ngye ŋakwo sye afàlab Un'kɔɔn.
ACT 21:25 Akà baar mpa abà Ayudà bàbulà aŋàlàkwikilà, bi, bi kàkyasöön mbar kàtsül bi: ukɔɔn adyà in'twaŋ ifàfà unsà ibɔɔn bàfàpà akà itɛk, anà an'kil, anà in'twaŋ mpa bàtsül kil, anà ukɔɔn akyer ipasasɛ. »
ACT 21:26 Apan, Pɔl kàsyen baar abà, waa kàdi nkwà anà ba taaŋtyà. Nde kàbilà u ndwà a Nzam ntɔn mukyään ilä isàwà nkwà anà bàsàpà ibɔɔn ntɔn umwɛy umwɛy uboo a ba.
ACT 21:27 Wɛɛ ilä nsambwaar byàkäl tsütsü mukwo mpal bun'mɛn Ayudà a Azi u ndwà a Nzam. Apan ba bàsi lingyoomà uboo a un'sɛŋ a baar wanswà, waa bun'kör,
ACT 21:28 bàkuub in'kwɛŋ, waa bàtɛn naa: « Baar a Isàlɛl, kàlayää libay! Le mbuur akwà ayinwan anà un'sɛŋ anà un'kɔɔn abi, anà ikal ki unsà ndaa uyilɔŋ nde mper yanswà anà akà baar banswà! Nde sye kàkyàbiil Angɛlɛki uboo a ndwà a Nzam ntɔn mubɛy ikal in'kyɛɛl ki! »
ACT 21:29 Ntɔn ba bàtwab atàman Trɔfimɛ un'nsi Ԑfɛsɔ anà nde uboo a bul, lalan bàsii ba naa Pɔl kun'biil u ndwà a Nzam.
ACT 21:30 Bul lanswà waa làni, un'sɛŋ waa kàyàköŋ. Baar bàkör Pɔl, waa bun'twey u ndwà a Nzam, apan ba bàdübà ibeenà agyägyä.
ACT 21:31 Ba bàleŋà mbwo mukun'dwa, mpal làkàtöl làsaŋ akà mfum a aŋità nsaab a Lɔmà naa Yɛlusàlɛm lanswà lan'bilà u lingyoomà.
ACT 21:32 Taaŋ nsil alan, nde kàwɛl aŋità anà an'kaptɛn, waa kàkyà ntiin mupay un'sɛŋ u mper bàkäl ba. Mpal bàmɛn ba mfum a aŋità nsaab anà aŋità, ba bàwɛy mudüb Pɔl.
ACT 21:33 Apan mfum a aŋità kàsin tsütsü apà nde, waa kun'kör, kàswɛŋ mukun'bäm an'dwaaŋ. Ungö apan, nde kàkwen muyöb naa nde wà nà anà nde sye ininà kan'kyer.
ACT 21:34 Wɛɛ, uboo a un'sɛŋ a baar, baar baar bàkäl mukuub in'kwɛŋ. Unsà isak isak aki, mfum a aŋità kàsàyöb anki akà undiir mwɛy. Undiir awun, kàswɛŋ nde naa Pɔl bun'syen u Fɔrtɛrɛs a aŋità a Lɔmà.
ACT 21:35 Mpal kàkɔlà nde udu a ikaar, aŋità bàkyer un'syɛn ntɔn nkyɛl a un'sɛŋ a baar yàkäl mbɔɔn,
ACT 21:36 ntɔn un'kàbɔ a baar kàkäl muyun'lab anà musà in'kwɛŋ naa: « Ukü! »
ACT 21:37 U taaŋ bàlun'biil ba u Fɔrtɛrɛs, Pɔl kàtɛn a mfum a nsaab naa: « Nkye mbwo ikyàkal mɛ mutɛn undiir mwɛy a ngye? » Mfum a aŋità kun'fuul naa: « Nkye ngye akyàyöb Ingɛlɛki?
ACT 21:38 Nkye ngye, kà ngye anki awà un'ngipiti awà kàtwääl ipaay mfwen anà kàsyen adwää baar nsaab nà u nsye a ipɔl? »
ACT 21:39 Pɔl kàtɛn naa: « Mɛ? Mɛ in'wà un'yudà, bul a mɛ Tarsisi u Silisi, bul làmwɛy là làkoo. Mɛ amabɔɔn, mpɛ mbwo muyääm a un'sɛŋ. »
ACT 21:40 Mfum a nsaab waa kun'pɛ mbwo. Pɔl kàkäl umbäär udu a ikaar, kàkyer isii a kɔɔ, un'sɛŋ a baar wanswà waa kàkäl a duu. Apan nde kàkyään ba unsà Ɛbɛlyɔ, waa kàtɛn naa:
ACT 22:1 « Atɔŋ abaal anà bàtaa, làwem un'lɔn in'kwen mɛ musà kusà a bɛ apanà. »
ACT 22:2 Mpal bàwem ba Pɔl wàmutɛn u ndaa a Bɛbɛlyɔ, Ba bàkäl akul. Apan Pɔl waa kàtɛn naa:
ACT 22:3 « Mɛ, mɛ in'wà un'yudà, mɛ ban'bör u Tarsis a Silisi, wɛɛ mɛ ban'bɔŋ u bul alà, ban'lɔŋ kà in'kɔl a Ngamalyɛl asànaa awà un'kɔɔn a andweer, mɛ kàkäl anà un'kanà mbɔɔn ntɔn Nzam asànaa naa làbà bɛ banswà ŋàbawà.
ACT 22:4 Mɛ awà, mɛ kàyiiŋ Mbwo ayi ngwal tii u nkweel, mɛ kàbäm abaal anà akaar in'siŋ anà katɔɔm u bɔlokà.
ACT 22:5 Undweer a angaŋ anà itsuŋ a andweer bà ambäl amɛ: mɛ kàwɛl anà in'kaan akà ba ntɔn mukyà Damas mukɔr atɔŋ bàkäl kwo anà mukasyen Yɛlusàlɛm ntɔn bapɛ ntaaŋàmbar.
ACT 22:6 « Yàmɛnà naa kàkäl mɛ u mbwo anà kàtöl mɛ tsütsü a Damas, kà imbürà, mper a midi, un'ŋyäŋ a pɛɛlà mwɛy kàfü du, waa kan'diŋà.
ACT 22:7 Mɛ kàbü u mɛɛn, umpal kàwem mɛ ndaa mwɛy itɛɛnà a mɛ naa: "Sɔl, Sɔl, ntɔn nkye ayan'mɛɛy ngye nkwaaŋ?"
ACT 22:8 Mɛ kàfuur naa: "Mwol, ngye nà?" Nde kàtɛn naa: "Mɛ, mɛ in'wà Yɛsu Nazorye akwà afàmɛɛy ngye nkwaaŋ."
ACT 22:9 Baar bàkäl anà mɛ bàkyàman un'ŋyäŋ a pɛɛlà, wɛɛ ba bàwem anki ndaa a mbuur kàyäämà anà mɛ.
ACT 22:10 Mɛ kàtɛn naa: "Mwol, ininà mɛ an'kwo mukyer?" Mwol kàtɛn a mɛ naa: "Mbarà, kyen Damas, bàkyer akasam yinà yanswà kàmaswaŋ Nzam mukyer."
ACT 22:11 Wɛɛ un'ŋyäŋ a pɛɛlà awun kan'dwä mii, baar bàkäl anà mɛ ban'ntɛ mpi u kɔɔ tii kàtöl mɛ Damas.
ACT 22:12 « U Damas, kàkäl anà mbuur mwɛy ikɔb ande Ananyas, nde kàkäl anà inzaam anà kàläbà un'kɔɔn ubwaŋàbwaŋ. Ayudà banswà bàkälà paa bun'tɛɛlà imbäl.
ACT 22:13 Nde kàkyer ayan'man, waa kàtɛn a mɛ naa: "Un'tɔŋ amɛ Sɔl, fàman. Taaŋ nsil alan mɛ waa kàfàman, waa kun'mɛn.
ACT 22:14 Nde kàtɛn naa: "Nzam a bàtaaràbi kasɔ̈ɔ̈l kaa usà ntɔn muyöb ukwen ande, muman Ŋabalàbal anà muwem ndaa itoo u mun ande,
ACT 22:15 ntɔn ngye asàkal mbäl ande u mii a baar banswà unsà indiir kàmɛn ngye anà kàwem ngye.
ACT 22:16 Wɛɛ apanà, ininà ngye afidilà? Mbarà, wal ndüümà anà mpɔɔŋà a man'be angye mutà ikɔb ande din.
ACT 22:17 « Yàmɛnà naa kàfurà mɛ Yɛlusàlɛm, ilä mwɛy, mɛ kàkäl muyamà u ndwà a Nzam, waa kàmɛn imanmii.
ACT 22:18 Mɛ kàmɛn Mwol, nde kàtɛn a mɛ naa: "Kyer agyägyä, too apanà u Yɛlusàlɛm, ntɔn ba imbäl angye ntɔn mɛ bàyàkyey anki."
ACT 22:19 Wɛɛ mɛ kàtɛn naa: "Mwol, ba ŋakwo bàkyàyöb naa mɛ, mɛ kàyisaa baar u bɔlokà anà kàyikamà baar bàkäl anà làkwikilà akà ngye an'füm uboo a ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà yanswà.
ACT 22:20 Mpal bàdwä mbäl angye Ityen, mɛ ŋakwo kàkäl paa, mukyey baar bun'dwä anà mukaar ipfɛy aba.
ACT 22:21 Wɛɛ nde kàtɛn a mɛ naa: "Kyen, mɛ, mɛ ŋakwo in'yatɔm ukwɛl mper akà baar mpa abà Ayudà." »
ACT 22:22 Ba bàkäl mukun'weemà tii mpal kàtɛn nde ndaa ayi, ba bàkuub in'kwɛŋ, waa bàtɛn naa: « Lun'lwom u mɛɛn mbuur atub awà, nde ukwe anki mukal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈! »
ACT 22:23 Ba bàkuubà in'kwɛŋ, bàkaamà ipfɛy aba anà bàfuumà un'twà u du.
ACT 22:24 Mfum a nsaab kàswɛŋ naa bun'biil u fɔrtɛrɛs anà bun'fuul in'lɔɔn a an'füm ntɔn nde uyöb ndaa kàkyer nde ntɔn ba bàsi in'kwɛŋ ntɔn nde.
ACT 22:25 Wɛɛ mpal bun'bäm ba in'siŋ ntɔn bun'käm an'füm, Pɔl kàtɛn a kaptɛn kàkäl paa naa: « Nkye bɛ làbye anà mbwo mukam un'lɔmà an'füm ukɔɔn un'fuul un'lɔɔn? »
ACT 22:26 Kaptɛn kàwem nde abwɛy, waa kàkàkyään mfum a nsaab: « Ngye pà akyer aben? Mbuur awà wà un'lɔmà. »
ACT 22:27 Apan, mfum a nsaab kàyàsin apà Pɔl, waa kun'fuul: « Nkyän, nkye ndandaa ngye awà un'lɔmà? » Nde naa: « Ɛɛ. »
ACT 22:28 Mfun a nsaab waa kàtɛn naa: « Mɛ, mɛ kàfür ngim mbɔɔn ntɔn mubulà un'lɔmà. » Pɔl waa kàtɛn naa: « Mɛ, mɛ un'bar anki, ilɔmà amɛ bàkyer an'bɔr anà kya. »
ACT 22:29 Kà imbürà, baar bàlun'kam an'füm ntɔn nde usi ndaa, waa bàtɛ upay. Wɛɛ mfum a nsaab kàwem bɔɔmà naa kyekà mbuur kàbäm nde in'siŋ wà, wà un'lɔmà.
ACT 22:30 Lalan taaŋtyà kàkwen nde muyöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ undiir bun'füün Ayudà, nde kun'sɔɔl isiŋ ntɔn nde usi un'lɔɔn kusà a ba.
ACT 23:1 Pɔl kàler làbay a nsaŋ a kölàköl a tɔŋtɔŋ, waa kàtɛn naa: « Atɔŋ abaal, yà unsà an'kyän a duu mɛ kàsyääl Nzam tii ŋàbawà. »
ACT 23:2 Wɛɛ Undweer a ngaŋ Ananyas kàswɛŋ baar bàkäl tsütsü apà nde mukun'kam mbar u mun ande.
ACT 23:3 Pɔl kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ubwaŋ a nsà, Nzam ayapà mbar! Ngye an'bwaay mukan'tsüül nsaŋ unsà un'kɔɔn, wɛɛ ngye, ngye awàmubɛy un'kɔɔn, ngye aswaŋ baar ban'käm mbar! »
ACT 23:4 Baar bàkäl tsütsü apà nde bàtɛn a nde naa: « Ngye awàmuto undweer a angaŋ a Nzam! »
ACT 23:5 Pɔl kàtɛn naa: « Atɔŋ, mɛ in'yayöb anki naa nde wà undweer a angaŋ, ntɔn bàsön naa: "Ngye asun'to anki mfum a un'sɛŋ angye!" »
ACT 23:6 Pɔl kàkyer ayöb naa Làbay a Nsaŋ a kölàköl làkäl an'kab mɔ̈ɔ̈l: ndam yà Asadusi, ndam yà Amfarisi. Lalan kàkuub nde in'kwɛŋ kusà a ba: « Atɔŋ abaal, mɛ, mɛ in'wà un'mfarisi, mwan a amfarisi. Ntɔn làkyän unsà ngwiiyà a akü, ba bàman'sà u làbay a nsaŋ. »
ACT 23:7 Pa kàmay nde mutɛn, mbaaŋ yàbü uboo a Amfarisi anà Asadusi, lalan nköŋ yàkaabà ya.
ACT 23:8 Ntɔn Asadusi bàfàtɛn naa itàkal ngwiiyà kà ukwà, itàkal un'kyeey, itàkal dweelà batɛy, wɛɛ Amfarisi bàfàkyey naa ba bà mwo.
ACT 23:9 In'kwɛŋ myàkyer asöönà mbɔɔn, alɔɔŋ a in'kɔɔn amwɛy uboo a Amfarisi waa bàmbarà, bàtɛn a ngwal naa: « Bi akà ndaa mwɛy yà ube imanà anki unsà mbuur wà. Taaŋ lumwɛy dweelà làmwɛy akɔ̈ɔ̈n sye un'kyeey mwɛy kun'kyään ndaa! »
ACT 23:10 Mbaaŋ yàbulà yà ngwal. Ntɔn bɔɔmà muman naa ba ban'kwo musay Pɔl, mfum a nsaab kàswɛŋ aŋità ande mutyà anà mukun'lwom uboo a ba anà mukun'syen u fɔrtɛrɛs.
ACT 23:11 U mpib yàlääb paa, Mwol kàyàmɛnà akà Pɔl, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Tsim! Ngye an'tà imbäl amɛ apà u Yɛlusàlɛm, ngye akyer afàkàtà sye u Lɔmà. »
ACT 23:12 Taaŋtyà, Ayudà bàkyer adirà, waa bàdi kyän naa ba bàdyà anki anà bànwà anki tii mpal bàsàdwa ba Pɔl.
ACT 23:13 Baar bàdirà ndaa ayi bàkäl aŋàsöön ankweem an'nà.
ACT 23:14 Apan, ba bàkàman amfum a angaŋ anà andweer, waa bàtɛn naa: « Bi kan'bɔl un'kaan anà kan'dyà kyän naa bi undiir idyà anki kusà mudwa Pɔl.
ACT 23:15 Wɛɛ akà bɛ apanà, mbwo mwɛy anà Làbay a Nsaŋ a Kölàköl, làkyen kàlalɔ̈m mfum a aŋità naa nde kàlatwääl awà asànaa bɛ làkwen mulab ndaa ande pànsi pànsi. Wɛɛ bi, bi indiir byanswà ikyàlɔn ntɔn mukun'dwa kusà nde muyàkɔlà apà. »
ACT 23:16 Wɛɛ mwanàmpääŋ a Pɔl wàbaal kàwem ndiirà ayi, nde kàkyen fɔrtɛrɛs, waa kàbilà ntɔn mukyään Pɔl naa nde ukäl kà igyɛɛŋ.
ACT 23:17 Pɔl kàbel umwɛy uboo a aŋità, waa kàtɛn a nde naa: « Lun'syen mwan baal wà akà mfum a aŋità ntɔn nde we anà ndaa mukun'kyään. »
ACT 23:18 Kaptɛn awà kàsyen mwan baal awun akà mfum a nsaab, waa kàtɛn naa: « Mbuur a bɔlokà Pɔl akyer an'bel, waa kan'lɔ̈ɔ̈m mukatwääl mwan baal wà awe anà undiir akakyään. »
ACT 23:19 Mfum a nsaab kàtɛ mwan baal awun mpi u kɔɔ, kun'syen u mpey, waa kun'fuul naa: « Ininà ngye awe awà mukan'kyään? »
ACT 23:20 Nde kun'fuur naa: « Ayudà ban'lwɛɛŋ naa ba bàyàlɔm akà ngye naa ngye asyen Pɔl nkàswo u Làbay a Nsaŋ a Kölàköl asànaa ba bàkwen ulab ndaa ande pànsi pànsi.
ACT 23:21 Wɛɛ ngye, ngye twɔn amakyey, ntɔn aŋàsöön baar an'kwem an'nà uboo a ba bàkun'diil ndɔɔŋ u mbwo. Ba bàdi kyän naa ba bàdyà anki anà bànwà anki tii mpal bàyun'dwa ba. Ba ndaa yanswà ban'yöŋà, yan'sal nkyeey angye mpɛl. »
ACT 23:22 Apan mfum a nsaab kàfuur mwan baal awun ungö akun'swaŋ naa: « Twɔn an'kyään akà mbuur mwɛy naa mɛ an'yöb ndaa ayi. »
ACT 23:23 Ungö apan, mfum a nsaab kàbel baar bɔ̈ɔ̈l uboo a an'kaptɛn, waa kàtɛn a ba naa: « Làsɔ̈ɔ̈l aŋità nkam yweel, asyeen a mpoonà an'kwem nsambwaar anà aŋanwɛŋ nkam yweel, ntɔn u taaŋ làwà là mpib ba bàkyà Sɛzarɛ.
ACT 23:24 Làlɔ̈ɔ̈n sye mpoonà ntɔn musyen Pɔl ntɔn nde ukàtol unsà ubwaŋ banswà akà kuvɛrnɔ̈ɔ̈r Filikisi. »
ACT 23:25 Apan, nde kàsön un'kaan abà:
ACT 23:26 « Kɔlɔdɛ Lizyasi akà mwol Filikisi, làköm angye!
ACT 23:27 Mbuur wà, Ayudà bakyer un'kɔr anà bàkyer alun'dwa. Mpal kàwem mɛ naa nde wà un'lɔmà, mɛ kàkyen anà aŋità ntɔn mukun'lwom kan'kɔɔ aba.
ACT 23:28 Mɛ kàkwen muyöb isin a ndaa bun'füün ba, lalan kun'syen mɛ kusà a Làbay a Nsaŋ a Kölàköl.
ACT 23:29 Mɛ, mɛ kàmɛn naa ba bun'füün ntɔn ndaa a un'kɔɔn aba, wɛɛ akà ube mwɛy kàkyer nde batɛy ntɔn bun'dwä itàkal bun'bäm in'siŋ.
ACT 23:30 Kan'wem mɛ sye naa Ayudà bàmulɛɛ untaam, lalà amatööm mɛ awà anà an'swaŋ mɛ baar bun'füün naa ba ŋakwo bun'füün akà ngye. »
ACT 23:31 Aŋità bàläb ndaa baswɛŋ, waa bàwɛl Pɔl, bun'syen u mpib u Antipatris.
ACT 23:32 Taaŋtyà, ba bàwɛy asyeen a mpoonà mulab mbwo anà Pɔl, waa bàfurà fɔrtɛrɛs.
ACT 23:33 Mpal bàtöl ba Sɛzarɛ, asyeen a mpoonà bàpɛ mfum un'kaan, waa bun'swɛŋ Pɔl sye.
ACT 23:34 Ungö kàtäŋ nde un'kaan, nde kàfuul naa Pɔl wà mbuur a itiir a nsi nà. Mpal kàwem nde naa nde wà mbuur a Silisi,
ACT 23:35 nde kàtɛn naa: « Mɛ in'yawem mpal bàyàyà sye baar bafüün. » Apan, nde kàswɛŋ naa bun'si u làpaŋ a Ɛlɔdi.
ACT 24:1 Ungö a ilä ityeen, mfum a angaŋ Ananyas anà andweer anà nkalsà mwɛy ikɔb ande Tɛrtülüs, bàtyà ntɔn mufüün Pɔl akà kuvernɔ̈ɔ̈r.
ACT 24:2 Apan, ba bàbel Pɔl. Tɛrtülüs kàsɛmà mukun'füün abà: « Mwol Filikisi, mbɔr angye. Ntɔn ngye anà ndaa akün an'kyer ngye ntɔn musyen nsi unsà ubwaŋ banswà, lalan ibà bi uboo a duu aŋàkwo.
ACT 24:3 Taaŋ lanswà anà ntsü yanswà, bi ibàmukömà ubwaŋ angye.
ACT 24:4 Wɛɛ mukɔɔn akà adwääl taaŋ mbɔɔn, mɛ in'tɛn ikikye, lalan mɛ amalɔm mukan'wem unsà igyɛɛŋ kyanswà asànaa kayöb bi.
ACT 24:5 Bi kan'man naa mbuur wà, wà fway, nde wàmuyisà lingyoomà uboo a Ayudà banswà u mɛɛn manswà ntɔn nde wà mfum a Bànazɔrye.
ACT 24:6 Nde sye alàkwen mubɛy un'kyɛɛl a ndwà a Nzam, undiir awun bun'kör bi. Bi bàkwen mutsul nsaŋ ande asànaa ukalɔɔmà un'kɔɔn abi,
ACT 24:7 wɛɛ mfum a nsaab waa kàyun'duum a ngwal yanswà kà an'kɔɔ abi.
ACT 24:8 Abun, ngye, ngye ŋakwo asun'fuul un'lɔɔn, ngye akyer akyey naa ndaa kàmun'füün bi yà ndandaa. »
ACT 24:9 Ayudà banswà bàkyey naa ndaa yanswà kàtɛn Tɛrtülüs yà abwɛy.
ACT 24:10 Apan kuvɛrnɔ̈ɔ̈r kun'swɛŋ musà ndaa, Pɔl waa kàfuur abà: « Mɛ in'kyàyöb naa sɛmà mbul mbɔɔn ngye afàswaŋ balàbal akà un'sɛŋ abi: undiirawà, waa mɛ an'sà làkyän akà ngye, mɛ in'sà un'lɔɔn amɛ kusà angye.
ACT 24:11 Ngye an'kwo ayim ubwaŋàbwaŋ: ilyaaŋ anki ilä kwem aŋiyweel kàbeenà mɛ Yɛlusàlɛm ntɔn mukàsyäŋà.
ACT 24:12 Itàkal u ndwà a Nzam, itàkal u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà, itàkal uboo a bul, akà mbuur mwɛy kan'mɛn anki musà mbaaŋ anà mbuur itàkal musiinà un'sɛŋ a baar mukyer lingyoomà.
ACT 24:13 Ba bàkwo anki mukaswaŋ apanà indiir bàkan'füünà ba.
ACT 24:14 Wɛɛ mɛ, ndaa in'yöb mɛ kusà angye ayi: mɛ in'fàsyääl Mbwo ayà bàmanà ba naa yà loor. Mɛ in'fàsyääl Nzam a andweer abi. Làkwikilà amɛ là unsà ndaa yanswà bàsön uboo a Un'kɔɔn anà uboo a Aŋangɔɔm.
ACT 24:15 Làkyän amɛ là akà Nzam, ba ŋakwo sye bàkyer afàkyey la, naa baar mpa abà balàbal anà baar a balàbal bàkyer asàwiyà.
ACT 24:16 Lalan mɛ sye in'fàsà mɛ ngwal taaŋ lanswà mukal anà an'kyän mpa ban'kwo mubɛy kusà a Nzam anà kusà a baar.
ACT 24:17 Ungö a mbul mbɔɔn, mɛ kàyàfurà u Yɛlusàlɛm ntɔn mubay un'sɛŋ amɛ anà mupà an'kab.
ACT 24:18 Apan ba bàyan'man u ndwà a Nzam ungö a mpɔ̈ɔ̈ŋ amɛ: akà nköŋ mwɛy itàkal làso làmwɛy làkäl anki.
ACT 24:19 Wɛɛ Ayudà amwɛy bà Azi bàkäl paa, ba baar bàlàkwo muyàmɛnà kusà a ngye mukan'füün ilàkal naa ba bàkäl anà undiir atɛn a mɛ.
ACT 24:20 Itàkal ba abà, ba ŋakwo bàtɛn ndaa a ube bàmɛn ba mpal kasi mɛ un'lɔɔn u Làbay a Nsaŋ a Kölàköl.
ACT 24:21 Taaŋ lumwɛy ndaa mwɛy mpɛl kàsi mɛ umbäär kusà a ba naa: "Yà ntɔn ngwiiyà a akü lalan bàman'füün ba ŋàbawà kusà a bɛ!" »
ACT 24:22 Filikisi kàkyer ayöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ ndaa a Mbwo, waa kàsin mutsul ungö anà mutɛn naa: « Mɛ ndaa abɛ in'yàtsul mpal uyàtyà mfum a nsaab. »
ACT 24:23 Apan nde kàswɛŋ kaptɛn mwɛy mukaar Pɔl u bɔlokà anà mukun'pà mbwo naa atɔŋ ban'kwo mukun'bay.
ACT 24:24 Ungö a ndam a ilä, Filikisi kàkäl anà un'kyay ande Dulàsiye, un'kaar un'yudà, nde kàtöm baar mukàbel Pɔl. Nde kàkwen mukun'wem ntɔn ndaa a làkwikilà unsà Klistɔ Yɛsu.
ACT 24:25 Wɛɛ mpal kàsɛmà Pɔl mutɛn ndaa mukal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a balàbal anà nkääŋ a mpem anà nsaŋ isàyà kusà, Filikisi kàwem bɔɔmà, waa kàtɛn naa: « Apanà ngye an'kwo afurà. Taaŋ làsàkal mɛ in'kyer afasàbel. »
ACT 24:26 Nde kàsii naa Pɔl ayun'pà ngim, undiir awun kàfatɔmà nde baar mbalà mbɔɔn mukun'bel u bɔlokà ntɔn muyäm anà nde.
ACT 24:27 Ungö a mbul yweel, Filikisi bun'kiir akà Pɔrsyus Fɛstüs. Wɛɛ, ntɔn muswaŋ ubwaŋ ande akà Ayudà, nde kàsàwɛy Pɔl u bɔlokà.
ACT 25:1 Ungö a ilä itär a ngyeel ande kà itiir a nsi akin, Fɛstüs kàbeenà Yɛlusàlɛm fà Sɛzarɛ.
ACT 25:2 Amfum a angaŋ anà andweer a Ayudà bayi mufüün Pɔl akà nde.
ACT 25:3 Ba bàsi muküünà mulɔm naa nde kakyeer ndam a ubwaŋ mubel Pɔl u Yɛlusàlɛm. Kutɛn aŋàbwaŋ ba bàdirà mukun'dwa u mbwo.
ACT 25:4 Wɛɛ Fɛstüs kàfuur naa bɔlokà a Pɔl là u Sɛzarɛ, anà nde ŋakwo kàkäl u mbwo mufurà.
ACT 25:5 Nde kàkwɛy naa: « Wɛy baar a an'yeerà uboo a bɛ bàtüüb anà mɛ, ntɔn bi ityà Sɛzarɛ. Kya isàkal naa we anà undiir un'be mbuur awà kàkyer, waa ba bun'füün. »
ACT 25:6 Fɛstüs kàkäl aŋàsöön ilä naan akɔ̈ɔ̈n kwem apà ba, ungö waa kàtyà Sɛzarɛ. Taaŋtyà, nde kàbwaay u làbay a nsaŋ, waa kàswɛŋ naa bun'twääl Pɔl.
ACT 25:7 Mpal kàyàkɔlà nde, Ayudà bàfü Yɛlusàlɛm bàkyer un'diŋà, waa bun'füün ndaa a ngwalàngwal mbɔɔn, wɛɛ ba bàsàswaŋ anki naa ya yà ndandaa.
ACT 25:8 Wɛɛ Pɔl kàsi un'lɔɔn ande, waa kàtɛn naa: « Mɛ akà undiir mwɛy wà ube in'kyer anki, itàkal unsà Un'kɔɔn a Ayudà, itàkal u ndwà a Nzam, itàkal akà Sɛzar. »
ACT 25:9 Ntɔn mumɛnà mbuur aŋàbwaŋ kusà a Ayudà, Fɛstüs kàfuul Pɔl naa: « Nkye ngye akyàkwen mubeenà Yɛlusàlɛm ntɔn bàtsül ndaa angye u mii amɛ? »
ACT 25:10 Wɛɛ Pɔl kàfuur naa: « Mɛ in'wà u làbay a nsaŋ a Sɛzar, nsaŋ amɛ bàkàtɛn kwo. Akundiir mwɛy wà ube an'kyer mɛ Ayudà watɛy asànaa ngye ŋakwo ayöb ngye ubwaŋàbwaŋ.
ACT 25:11 Isàkal naa ndandaa mɛ kàkyer ube mwɛy ban'kwo mutwaal ukwà, mɛ ukwa in'tɔn anki. Wɛɛ, isàkal naa ndaa ban'füünà baar ndɔ̈ŋ aya yatɛy, akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki mukan'pà kà an'kɔɔ aba. Mɛ an'lɔm naa Sɛzar utsül ndaa amɛ. »
ACT 25:12 Apan, ungö mulwɛɛŋ anà ntɛɛn ande, Fɛstüs kàfuur naa: « Ngye an'lɔm muman Sɛzar, ngye akyer akyà kusà a Sɛzar. »
ACT 25:13 Ungö a ilä, mfum Angilàpà anà Bɛrnis bàyi u Sɛzarɛ ntɔn mupà Fɛstüs mbɔr.
ACT 25:14 Ba paa bàkyer ilä mbɔɔn, lalan Fɛstüs kàkyään nde mfum ndaa a Pɔl mutɛn naa: « We anà baal mwɛy Filikisi kàsàwɛy u bɔlokà.
ACT 25:15 Umpal kàbeenà mɛ Yɛlusàlɛm, amfum a angaŋ anà andweer a Ayudà bàkyer ayà mukun'füün, ba bàkwen naa bun'dwä ndwà.
ACT 25:16 Mɛ ba kafuur naa: "Kya kà ifà a baar a Lɔmà anki mupà mbuur kà an'kɔɔ a baar, isàkal naa kusà ande baar bun'füün batɛy, isàkal sye naa nde un'lɔɔn ŋàtàsà anki."
ACT 25:17 Ba bàyi apà anà mɛ. Mukɔɔn afàsà ilä, taaŋtyà mɛ kàbwaay u làbay a nsaŋ, mɛ kàlɔ̈m naa bun'twääl mbuur awun.
ACT 25:18 Ayiiŋ ande bàyi ba, ba bàsàmɛɛy anki akà undiir mwɛy wà ngwal uboo indiir ibe kàyweerà mɛ.
ACT 25:19 Undiir mwɛy bàkäl ba awà anà nde yà mbaaŋ ntɔn inzaam aba ŋakwo, sin sin ntɔn mbuur mwɛy ikɔb ande Yɛsu, nde kàkyer akwà, wɛɛ Pɔl akakyeyà uyɔl naa nde we anà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
ACT 25:20 Ya yàkäl mpay akà mɛ mutsul ndaa a tub ayi, lalan kàpɛ mɛ Pɔl lwɛŋ mubeenà Yɛlusàlɛm ntɔn bàkàtsul nsaŋ ande kwo.
ACT 25:21 Wɛɛ Pɔl kàlɔ̈m naa ndaa ande bàkàtsul kusà a Sɛzar. Lalan kàswɛŋ mɛ naa bun'käär u bɔlokà tii mpal in'sun'tɔm mɛ akà Sɛzar. »
ACT 25:22 Waa Angilipà kàtɛn a Fɛstüs naa: « Mɛ ŋakwo sye in'kwen muwem mbuur awà. » Fɛstüs kun'fuur naa: « Ngye ayun'wem nkàswo. »
ACT 25:23 Taaŋtyà, Angilipà anà Bɛrnis bàyi unsà làso lanswà, waa bàbilà u làbay a nsaŋ mbwo mwɛy anà amfum a nsaab anà abyääl a bul. Fɛstüs kàswɛŋ naa bun'twääl Pɔl.
ACT 25:24 Fɛstüs kàtɛn naa: « Mfum Angilipà, anà bɛ banswà làbà pà anà bi, bɛ làkyun'manà mbuur wà. Un'kàbɔ a Ayudà kàyun'füün akà mɛ, itàkal u Yɛlusàlɛm, itàkal apà, bàmusà in'kwɛŋ naa nde ufàkwo anki mukal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
ACT 25:25 Wɛɛ akà mɛ, mɛ in'sàman anki undiir un'be kàkyer nde ntɔn nde ukyà an'lɔŋ. Wɛɛ nde ŋakwo kàlɔ̈m naa nde ukyà akà Sɛzar, mɛ kàtsül naa mɛ in'kyer un'tööm awà.
ACT 25:26 Itàkal abwɛy, mɛ in'manà anki undiir in'söön mɛ Sɛzar, lalan, an'kwen mɛ naa nde usi un'lɔɔn u mii a bɛ, sin sin u mii a ngye Mfum Angilipà, ntɔn mɛ in'wɛl undiir asɔn ungö a nköŋ ayi.
ACT 25:27 Ntɔn akà mɛ, ya ikamɛnà naa kà yubwaŋ anki naa mɛ in'töm mbuur a bɔlokà ukɔɔn aswaŋ ubwaŋàbwaŋ ube kàkyer nde. »
ACT 26:1 Angilipà kàtɛn a Pɔl naa: « Bàmapà mbwo musà un'lɔɔn angye. » Apan nde kàsen kɔɔ ntɔn musà un'lɔɔn ande:
ACT 26:2 « Mfum Angilipà, mɛ an'man un'sak mbɔɔn musà un'lɔɔn kusà a ngye ŋàbawà ntɔn indiir byanswà bàman'füün Ayudà,
ACT 26:3 sin sin ngye akyàyöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ nkääl a Ayudà anà nsyeel a mbaaŋ aba. Kyakin mɛ amalɔm mukan'wem anà igyɛɛŋ unsà nkääŋ a mpem yanswà.
ACT 26:4 « Ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ amɛ, sɛmà imbɛy, Ayudà banswà bàkyàyöb wa, ntɔn mɛ kàkäl u Yɛlusàlɛm uboo a un'sɛŋ amɛ.
ACT 26:5 Ba ŋakwo bàkyàyöb fà itaan, ba ban'kwo bàtɛ imbäl, kya ba bàsàkwen, naa mɛ in'wà umwɛy uboo a Ikööŋ a Amfarisi ifàlab inzaam abi pànsi pànsi.
ACT 26:6 Apanà, mɛ bàman'füün ntɔn làkyän amɛ unsà ilää kàpɛ Nzam akà andweer abi.
ACT 26:7 In'sɛŋ abi myanswà myàkwem aŋiyweel myàfàsyääl Nzam uboo a muküünà mpib anà mwäänà ntɔn muman nkölà a ilää aki. Ɔɔ Mfum, ntɔn làkyän alà, Ayudà waa bàman'füün!
ACT 26:8 Ntɔn nkye mpa làkyeyà bɛ naa Nzam afàwiy akü?
ACT 26:9 Mɛ ŋakwo, mɛ kàyweerà naa yubwaŋ munwan a ngwal yanswà anà ikɔb a Yɛsu Nazɔrye.
ACT 26:10 Undiir nsil awà mɛ kàkyer u Yɛlusàlɛm. Mɛ kàbiil baar in'kyɛɛl mbɔɔn u bɔlokà mpal kàwɛl mɛ ikɔ̈b akà andweer a angaŋ, mɛ sye kàkyer akyeyà naa badwä.
ACT 26:11 Mɛ kàyibilà mbalà mbɔɔn u ndwà a nköŋ a Ayudà yanswà ntɔn mukapà ntaaŋàmbar anà mukasiinà a ngwal yanswà ba mubɛy làkwikilà aba. Uboo a nkyɛl amɛ yanswà, akà ba, mɛ ba kàyalabà tii kà an'bul a ingyey. »
ACT 26:12 « Lalan ilä mwɛy mɛ kàkyà Damas anà ikɔ̈b aŋàkwo anà isal ban'pɛ amfum a angaŋ.
ACT 26:13 Ɔɔ Mfum, ilä mwɛy ntsü a midi, mɛ kàkäl u mbwo, mɛ anà atɔŋ bàkäl anà mɛ, mpal kàmɛn mɛ un'ŋyäŋ a pɛɛlà wàŋàsöönà taaŋ kan'fà du, waa kan'diŋà.
ACT 26:14 Bi banswà kàbü u mɛɛn, waa mɛ kàwem ndaa mwɛy ikan'kyäänà unsà Ibɛlyɔ naa: "Sɔl, Sɔl, ntɔn nkye ayan'mɛɛy ngye nkwaaŋ? Yà mpay akà ngye mutɔn un'swaaŋ!"
ACT 26:15 Mɛ kàfuur naa: "Mwol, ngye awà nà?" Mwol waa kan'fuur naa: "Mɛ, mɛ in'wà Yɛsu akwà ayimɛɛy ngye nkwaaŋ.
ACT 26:16 Wɛɛ mbarà, tsim kà in'kɔl angye. An'yàmɛnà mɛ akà ngye ntɔn mɛ kàkyasɔɔl kusà mukal un'syääl anà mbäl unsà indiir kàmɛn ngye anà unsà indiir in'yàfamɛɛy mɛ.
ACT 26:17 Mɛ ngye akyasɔɔl uboo a un'sɛŋ wà anà uboo a baar mpa abà Ayudà mper amatɔm mɛ.
ACT 26:18 Mɛ ngye amatɔm ntɔn ngye aduub ba mii, alwom ba u mpib anà atwääl u pɛɛlà anà akà Nzam fà ikɔ̈b a Satanà, ntɔn ba bàwɛl ndwääl a man'be aba anà kwal uboo a aŋin'kyɛɛl u mbwo a làkwikilà amu mɛ." »
ACT 26:19 « Unsà ayi yanswà, mfum Angilipà, mɛ kàtön anki imanmii kyàfü du ki.
ACT 26:20 Wɛɛ mɛ kàtàlɔŋ baar a Damas, u Yɛlusàlɛm, kà itiir a Yuday kyanswà, anà akà in'sɛŋ mpa abà Ayudà, ntɔn ba bàbuul mpem anà bàpɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ aba akà Nzam anà muswaŋ nsɔɔmà ayi u nsyääl aba.
ACT 26:21 Undiir awun Ayudà ban'kör ba mpal kàkäl mɛ u ndwà a Nzam, laa bàleŋ ba mukan'dwa.
ACT 26:22 Wɛɛ Nzam laa kan'tii nde, lalan mɛ in'wa mɛ anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ tii ŋàbawà, mɛ in'wàmuyità imbäl kusà a ambɛy anà andweer ndaa bàtɛn aŋangɔɔm anà Mɔsɛ naa ya isàkyer ayà,
ACT 26:23 muyöb naa Klistɔ kàkyer alàman mpay, naa nde, nde alàkal mbuur atàtwɛb mutoo uboo a akü, naa nde akyään pɛɛlà akà un'sɛŋ anà akà baar mpa abà Ayudà. »
ACT 26:24 Pɔl kàkäl musà un'lɔɔn ande mpal kàsi Fɛstüs in'kwɛŋ naa: « Pɔl, ngye awà ŋun'kɔŋ! Un'yɛnà angye wà mbɔɔn kàmatwääl ukɔŋ! »
ACT 26:25 Wɛɛ Pɔl kun'fuur naa: « Un'byääl Fɛstüs, mɛ kà in'wà ŋukɔŋ anki. Ndaa in'kyäänà mɛ yi yà ndandaa anà yan'kyän aŋàbwaŋ.
ACT 26:26 Ntɔn Mfum awà in'kakyäänà mɛ unsà uyɔl banswà, akyàyöb indiir abi ubwaŋàbwaŋ. Mɛ in'we anà iböŋ muyweer naa undiir mwɛy udiimà nde watɛy, ntɔn ndaa ayi yàlyaaŋ anki kunku, kà ikal aŋàyee.
ACT 26:27 Mfum Angilipà, nkye ngye afàsà làkwikilà akà aŋangɔɔm? Mɛ in'kyàyöb naa ngye awe anà làkwikilà. »
ACT 26:28 Angilipà waa kàtɛn a Pɔl naa: « Le, ngye akwen mukan'buul un'klistɔ! »
ACT 26:29 Nde kàfuur naa: « Mɛ in'kwenà naa itàkal naa taaŋ ikikye, naa taaŋ mbɔɔn, wɛy Nzam ukyer naa kà nà ngye mpɛl anki, wɛɛ sye anà baar banswà bàweemà mɛ ŋàbawà, bɛ làbulà asànaa mɛ ukɔɔn in'siŋ mii. »
ACT 26:30 Mfum waa kàmbarà, anà kuvɛrnɔ̈ɔ̈r, Bɛrnis anà baar banswà bàtɛɛnà nsaŋ.
ACT 26:31 Ba bàkyen nku, waa bàtɛn ba a ba naa: « Mbuur wà undiir mwɛy kan'kyer nde watɛy ntɔn nde uwɛl ukwà itàkal in'siŋ. »
ACT 26:32 Apan, Angilipà kàsam Fɛstüs naa: « Mbuur wà bàkyer alun'wɛy ilàkal naa nde ukɔ̈ɔ̈n alom muman Sɛzar. »
ACT 27:1 Mpal bàtsül mbar naa bi iwal an'swà mukyà Itali, ba bàpɛ Pɔl anà baar a bɔlokà amwɛy akà kaptɛn mwɛy ikɔb ande Zülyüs, umwɛy uboo a itsuŋ a Lɔmà bàfàbel naa Itsuŋ a Sɛzar.
ACT 27:2 Bi kàbilà kà an'swà a Adalamit màyilyaaŋà à kun'kɔɔl a Azi, waa kàkyen. Un'nsi Masɛdwan a Tɛsalɔnikà mwɛy ikɔb ande Aristark kàkäl anà bi.
ACT 27:3 Taaŋtyà, bi kàmbär u Sidɔn. Zülyüs kàwɛlà Pɔl unsà ubwaŋ banswà, nde kun'pɛɛ mbwo mukàler asam ande ban'kwo mukun'bay.
ACT 27:4 Kan'lwomà bi apan, bi kàläb kà an'dà, kàlyaaŋ kà un'kɔɔl a Shipɛlɛ ntɔn un'pöb kiyeelà lisà.
ACT 27:5 Apan bi kàbwel ngyäl a kölàköl tsütsü a Silisi anà Pamfili, waa kàtɔlà u Mira a Lisi.
ACT 27:6 Akun, kaptɛn kàmɛn an'swà a Alɛksandri màmukyà Itali, laa kibiil nde.
ACT 27:7 Bi kàkyer ilä mbɔɔn ntɔn an'swà màyikyeenà ikye ikye, a mpay yanswà bi, kàkàtöl bi tsütsü a Snide. Ntɔn un'pöb kàyee wa lisà, bi kàlyaaŋ u ngyɛl a isaŋ a Krɛte, tsütsü a Salmɔnɛ.
ACT 27:8 Bi kya kàlyaaŋ a mpay yanswà tii kàkàtol bi kà ikal mwɛy bàfàbel Bo Pɔr, tsütsü a bul làmwɛy ikɔb a la Lasàyà.
ACT 27:9 Taaŋ làmwɛy làbwɛlàbwɛl làlyaaŋ, nkyeen udu a an'dà yàbulà yà bɔɔmà, ntɔn ilä a ukin udyà a Ayudà kyàkäl aŋàlyaaŋ itaan, Pɔl waa kakyään,
ACT 27:10 kàtɛn naa: « Asam amɛ, mɛ in'manà naa nkyeen udu a an'dà itwaal ube mbɔɔn, indiir mbɔɔn ikyà bwà, kànà isaa anà an'swà mpɛl anki, wɛɛ anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a baar abi sye. »
ACT 27:11 Wɛɛ mfum a nsaab a Lɔmà mpem ande kàpɛ akà kaptɛn a an'swà anà akà ŋan'swà, akwànaa akà ndaa a Pɔl.
ACT 27:12 Yumwɛy ayi: làbuŋ alà làkwe anki naa baar bàkäl paa u paŋà a mpye. Lalan baar mbɔɔn bàkäl ba an'kyän mwɛy naa ba bàläb mbwo aba anà muleŋ mukɔlà Fɛniksi, làbuŋ làmwɛy là Krɛt bàduub mper làfàminà taaŋ ntɔn isà ilyaaŋ kwo.
ACT 27:13 Kipöb kyàfü ngyɛl, waa kyàlyaaŋà, apan ba bàsii naa ma màkäl an'kyän aŋàbwaŋ, ba bàtsuuŋ an'swà, bàsɛmà muyikyà ukɔl a isaŋ a Krɛt.
ACT 27:14 Wɛɛ ungö a kitaaŋ, un'pöb a ngwal awà bàfàbel naa Örakilɔ­n, kàfü isaŋ akin, waa kàyabweel,
ACT 27:15 kàsyen an'swà, ma màkwe anki munwaan a un'pöb, laa kàwɛy bi naa wa kisyen.
ACT 27:16 Bi kàlyaaŋ u ngyɛl a kisaŋ bàfàbel Kɔda, bi kàböŋ a mpay muwal itiir a un'sɛŋ.
ACT 27:17 Ungö mufuur kya uboo, unsà bɔɔmà mukàböl kà anseŋ a Sirt, ba bàbäm an'swà in'siŋ asànaa nkwɛl, waa bàtɔɔm löŋ. Ba bàläb muyiwɔŋ abun.
ACT 27:18 Un'pöb a ngwal kàkäl mukàyisiinà a ngwal, lalan taaŋtyà bàtɔɔm ba indiir kan'dà.
ACT 27:19 Kà ilä kyàtär, ba bàtɔɔmà anà an'kɔɔ aba ŋakwo indiir a isal a an'swà.
ACT 27:20 Ilä mbɔɔn, itàkal taaŋ, itàkal mbwaar myàmɛnà anki, un'pöb a ngwal kàkäl mbɔɔn, lalan mpa kàkäl bi anà làkyän muwà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
ACT 27:21 An'taaŋ mbɔɔn baar badi anki. Apan, Pɔl kàmbarà uboboo a ba, waa kàtɛn naa: « Ɔɔ asam amɛ, yàlàkal ubwaŋ naa bɛ làwem lwɛŋ amɛ mukɔɔn ambarà u Krɛt, ntɔn mukɔɔn ayàman nkweel ayi anà bwà alà.
ACT 27:22 Wɛɛ apanà, mɛ amàlalɔm musà un'kanà, ntɔn akà mbuur mwɛy uboo a bɛ ukwà anki, wɛɛ an'swà mpɛl ikyà bwà.
ACT 27:23 U mpib aŋàbà, un'kyeey mwɛy wà Nzam in'wà mɛ uboo ande anà in'fàsyääl mɛ ayàmɛnà akà mɛ,
ACT 27:24 waa kan'kyään naa: "Pɔl, twon an'man bɔɔmà! Yubwaŋ naa ngye akàsà un'lɔɔn u mii a Sɛzar, waa Nzam kàmapà sye mɔ̈ɔ̈ a atɔŋ angye abà musabà anà ngye."
ACT 27:25 Lalan, asam amɛ, làkäl ngwal, ntɔn mɛ in'we anà làkwikilà amu Nzam naa ya iyàkal balàbal asànaa kan'kyään nde.
ACT 27:26 Wɛɛ bi ikàtsüüŋ kà un'kɔɔl a isaŋ mwɛy. »
ACT 27:27 U mpib yà kwem aŋinà, un'pöb kisyen u Adriyatik. Uboboo a mpib, baar a isal a an'swà bàmɛn asànaa bi kàkäl tsütsü a nkankyel.
ACT 27:28 Apan ba bàsii indübà a an'dà a lwaŋ, ba bàmɛn mɛtre an'kwem an'tär aŋinsambwaar. U kikwɛl, ba bàfàtɔɔm lwaŋ, waa bàmɛn mɛtre an'kwem mɔ̈ɔ̈l aŋinaan.
ACT 27:29 Ba bàmɛn bɔɔmà naa bi ikyer akàböl udu a in'kul, lalan bàtɔɔm ba an'löŋ an'nà kà an'dà ungö anà bàkäl musyäär naa taaŋ làyaanà.
ACT 27:30 Wɛɛ, baar a isal a an'swà bàleŋà mbwo yanswà mutiin an'swà, ba bàtɔ̈ɔ̈l itiir un'sɛŋ kà an'dà anà bàkür naa ba bàkàbäm an'löŋ kusà a an'swà.
ACT 27:31 Pɔl kàtɛn a kaptɛn anà aŋità naa: « Isàkal naa baar bà bàkal anki uboo a an'swà, bɛ, bɛ làwà anki mɔ̈ɔ̈. »
ACT 27:32 Lalan aŋità bàtsül ba in'siŋ a itiir a un'sɛŋ, waa bàtyeey kya.
ACT 27:33 Kusà a mwäänà mubalà, Pɔl kàlɔ̈m akà baar banswà mudyà isaa anà mutɛn naa: « Ŋàbà ilä kyàkwem aŋinà làdilà bɛ, ukɔɔn adyà anà mpa làkwen bɛ musà akà undiir mwɛy u mun.
ACT 27:34 Lalan mɛ amàlalɔm mudyà ndam a isaa ntɔn bya byà ndöŋ ntɔn bɛ làwü mɔ̈ɔ̈. Akà làtswe a un'tswe a umwɛy uboo a bɛ làyàkyà anki bwà. »
ACT 27:35 Ungö mutɛn abwɛy, nde kàwɛl làmpà, kàkömà Nzam u mii a baar banswà, kàtsül la, waa kàsɛmà mudyà.
ACT 27:36 Apan, ba banswà bàwɛl ngwal, waa bàdi sye.
ACT 27:37 Bi banswà uboo a an'swà kàkäl baar nkam yweel a an'kwem nsambwaar aŋisyaam.
ACT 27:38 Ungö muyuur a isaa, ba bàtyeey buur a an'swà mutɔɔm blɛ kà an'dà.
ACT 27:39 Mpal làyaanà taaŋ, baar a isal a an'swà bàmɛn anki nkankyel, wɛɛ ma màkäl ansɛŋ a an'dà anà un'soo, ba bàbön musiinà an'swà kwo, kya mbwo yàlàkal.
ACT 27:40 Apan ba bàtsuuŋ an'löŋ, bàwɛy ma uboo a an'dà, ba bàtsuuŋ sye in'siŋ myàfàkwaar an'swà. Ungö ba bàmbaar ipfɛy kusà a an'swà ntɔn un'pöb kasyen kà un'kɔɔl a an'dà, kya mbwo yàlàkal.
ACT 27:41 Wɛɛ ba bàkàböl kà ansɛŋ màkäl uboboo a indek myeel, ba bàsiinà an'swà u nkankyel, usà bàteen kà ansɛŋ anà bàsàkwo anki mubar, wɛɛ akà ngö a an'swà, ibɔ a an'dà byàkäl mupay ya a ngwal.
ACT 27:42 Apan, aŋità bàwɛl an'kyän mudwa baar a bɔlokà ntɔn uman naa umwɛy uboo a ba utääb anà utiin.
ACT 27:43 Wɛɛ kaptɛn kàkwen mutswà Pɔl mɔ̈ɔ̈, waa katsüŋ musyääl an'kyän aba. Nde kàswɛŋ baar bàyöb utääb mukal baar atàtwɛb mutɔɔmà kà an'dà anà musabà u nkankyel.
ACT 27:44 Bumwɛy bàlàsabà udu a an'bää anà udu a ikaam a an'swà. Undiiràwun, ba banswà bàtöl nkankyel anà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
ACT 28:1 Ungö kàwü bi mɔ̈ɔ̈, bi kàyöb naa isaŋ aki ikɔb a kya Malte.
ACT 28:2 Aŋabul biswɛŋ ukwen a ifà asin: ntɔn mbul kàsɛmà munɔ anà mpye yàkäl mbɔɔn, ba bàyöbà böl a mbaa a kölàköl, waa bàwɛl bi banswà ukɔl a la.
ACT 28:3 Pɔl kàkàbɔɔl ibiŋ a nkön, waa kàtɔɔm kya u mbaa. Ntɔn un'swey a mbaa, iyäy mwɛy laa kyàyàtoo kya, waa kyundäär u kɔɔ.
ACT 28:4 Mpal bàmɛn aŋabul ntäy wàmunyɔŋ u kɔɔ ande, ba bàtɛn ba a ba naa: « Ndandaa mbuur wà, wà un'dwää a baar. Nde kan'too anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ u ngyäl a kölàköl, wɛɛ Balàbal kàmupà anki mbwo mukal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈. »
ACT 28:5 Pɔl waa kàfwaŋ ntäy awun u mbaa ukɔɔn awem akà kisaay.
ACT 28:6 Baar bàdilà naa nde uyäm, itàkal naa nde ukü kà imbürà. Wɛɛ ungö mudil an'taaŋ mbɔɔn, ba bàmɛn naa akà undiir mwɛy wà un'be kun'yeel anki. Apan ba bàsɔɔm an'kyän, waa bàtɛɛnà naa nde wà nzam.
ACT 28:7 Tsütsü paa, yàkäl anà ndwaŋ a mfum a isaŋ akin, ikɔb ande Pübiliyüs. Nde kiwɛl anà kipɛ ikal abɔ̈ɔ̈n u ndwà ande ilä itär unsà isam kyanswà.
ACT 28:8 Wɛɛ yàmɛnà naa taar a Pübiliyüs kàkäl aŋàbɔ̈ɔ̈n, ntɔn nde kàkäl anà limpye anà pfulà a pfulà a an'kil. Pɔl waa kàkun'ler. U mbwo a ngyamàkà anà nsyeel a an'kɔɔ, nde waa kun'kɔɔr.
ACT 28:9 Ungö apan, aŋan'kyäl bumwɛy banswà bàkäl uboo a isaŋ aki bàyi sye akà nde, waa bàkɔɔrà.
ACT 28:10 Ba bipɛ làkoo mbɔɔn. Mpal kàbilà bi kà an'swà, ba bipɛ indiir aŋàkwo ntɔn mbwo abi.
ACT 28:11 Ungö a ngɔɔn tär, bi kàbilà kà an'swà a Alɛksandri màkyer isà uboo a isaŋ, u mbil a ma bàsi isii a Dyɔskür.
ACT 28:12 Bi kàtoo u Siraküse, waa kàkäl paa ilä itär.
ACT 28:13 Fà apan, bi kàyilabà un'kɔɔl a an'dà tii kàkàtol bi Rɛgyɔ. Taaŋtyà, un'pöb a mper angyɛl laa kàyi wa, ungö a ilä byeel bi kàtöl Pusɔlɛs.
ACT 28:14 Akun, bi kàbwey anà atɔŋ, bà bilɔ̈ɔ̈m mukal ilä nsambwaar apà ba. Le, bi Lɔmà kàkyen abà.
ACT 28:15 Mpal bàwem atɔŋ a Lɔmà làsaŋ a ngyeel abi, ba bàyiwool u Yà a Apiyüs anà u Trwa Tavɛrn. Mpal kàmɛn nde ba, Pɔl kàkömà Nzam, waa kàfàwal ngwal.
ACT 28:16 Mpal kàtöl bi Lɔmà, ba bàpɛ Pɔl mbwo mukal anà ndwà ande aŋàyen anà ŋità mwɛy mukun'kyɛŋ.
ACT 28:17 Yàmɛnà naa ungö a ilä itär, Pɔl kàbel abyääl a Ayudà. Mpal bàköŋ ba banswà, nde kàtɛn a ba naa: « Atɔŋ abaal, mɛ mbuur mpa kàkyer akà undiir mwɛy wà ube akà un'sɛŋ abi, itàkal akà ikin byàfü akà andweer abi, mɛ ban'kör u Yɛlusàlɛm anà ban'pɛ kà an'kɔɔ a Alɔmà.
ACT 28:18 Baar abà, ungö akan'fuul un'lɔɔn, bàkyer alan'wɛy ntɔn ba bàmɛn anki akà ube mwɛy ban'kwo mukan'twääl ukwà.
ACT 28:19 Wɛɛ Ayudà bàkyer atɔn, lalan kàlɔ̈m mɛ musà un'lɔɔn kusà a Sɛzar, ukɔɔn akal anà an'kyän mufüün un'sɛŋ amɛ.
ACT 28:20 Lalà in'lɔ̈m mɛ mubwey anà muyääm anà bɛ. Kutɛn aŋàbwaŋ, yà ntɔn làkyän a Isàlɛl waa mɛ in'wà aŋàlal un'siŋ wà. »
ACT 28:21 Ba bun'fuur naa: « Bi, bi kàwɛl anki akà un'kaan mwɛy awà kàfü Yuday ntɔn ngye, akà un'tɔŋ mwɛy kàfü anki kwo wa kàyikyään ndaa itàkal mutɛn ube angye akà bi.
ACT 28:22 Wɛɛ bi imanà naa yubwaŋ bi iwem u mun angye ŋakwo ndaa akayweerà ngye, ntɔn bi ikyàyöb naa mper yanswà ikööŋ awà ngye ki bàkyer ayitɔn kya. »
ACT 28:23 Ba bàpɛɛl ilä mwɛy mubwey anà nde, ba bàyi baar mbɔɔn muyun'man u ndwà ande. Unsà an'yääm ande, nde kàkäl mutà imbäl a Imwol a Nzam. Fà tutu tii sisye, nde kàleŋà naa ba bàkyey ndaa kàtɛɛnà nde ntɔn Yɛsu, sɛmà un'kɔɔn a Mɔsɛ anà Aŋangɔɔm.
ACT 28:24 Baar amwɛy bàkyey ndaa kàtɛɛnà nde, wɛɛ bumwɛy bàkyer atɔn musà làkwikilà.
ACT 28:25 Apan ba bàkaabà unsà isak isak. Abun, Pɔl kàkwɛy ndaa mwɛy mpɛl: « Dweelà In'kyɛɛl kàkäl anà iböŋ kàkyään nde andweer abɛ u mbwo a ŋangɔɔm Yɛsay
ACT 28:26 naa: "Kyen kamɛn un'sɛŋ wà, un'kyään naa: Bɛ làkyer asàwem ubwaŋàbwaŋ, wɛɛ bɛ làsàyöb anki. Bɛ làsàler ubwaŋàbwaŋ, wɛɛ bɛ làsàman anki.
ACT 28:27 Ntɔn mpem a un'sɛŋ kàkyàbwà bwoor, ba bàkyàkiin an'tsü aba ikà, ba bàkyàdübà mii aba, ntɔn mutsuŋ mii aba muman, an'tsü aba muwem, mpem aba muyöb anà ba bàkɔɔn abulà mper in'wà mɛ ntɔn mɛ in'kɔ̈ɔ̈n akɔɔr ba."
ACT 28:28 Abwɛy, làyöb naa ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈ a Nzam ayi bàtöm akà baar mpa abà Ayudà: ba, ba bàkyer asàwem! »
ACT 28:29 Ungö bàwem ba ndaa ayi yanswà, Ayudà waa bàkyen, bàmuyisyeel mbaaŋ a ngwal ba a ba.
ACT 28:30 Abun, Pɔl kàkyer yanswà mbul yweel u ndwà kàfafurà nde. Nde kàfawalà baar banswà bàyee mukun'ler.
ACT 28:31 Nde kàkyäänà ndaa a Imwol a Nzam anà kàlɔɔŋà indiir iler Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ, unsà uyɔl banswà anà u duu.
ROM 1:1 Pɔl, un'syääl a Klistɔ Yɛsu, bun'bel mukal ntööm anà bun'si ukɔl ntɔn mukyään Làsaŋ a Nzam.
ROM 1:2 Làsaŋ alà, nde kàtɛn itaan uboo a in'kaan in'kyɛɛl u mbwo a ŋangɔɔm ande.
ROM 1:3 Abun, ya yà ntɔn Mwan ande, bun'bör unsà ndür kà itoo a David,
ROM 1:4 bun'si Mwan a Nzam anà ngwal, u mbwo a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl, ntɔn ngwiiyà ande uboo a akü, Yɛsu Klistɔ, Mwol abi.
ROM 1:5 U mbwo a nde, bi kàwɛl kab a ngway mukal ntööm ntɔn musyen, kà ikɔb ande, in'sɛŋ myanswà mpa amyà Ayudà mukun'kyey u mbwo a làkwikilà,
ROM 1:6 in'sɛŋ làbà bɛ sye uboo mwo, bɛ baar làwɛl làbeel a Yɛsu Klistɔ,
ROM 1:7 - akà atɔŋ banswà abà nkween a Nzam, u Lɔmà, abà bàwɛl làbeel a Nzam mukal bà in'kyɛɛl, wɛy bɛ làwɛl kab a ngway anà duu byan'fà akà Nzam awà Taaràbi anà akà Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ.
ROM 1:8 Mɛ in'tàkwen mufuur an'tɔɔn akà Nzam amɛ u mbwo a Yɛsu Klistɔ ntɔn bɛ banswà, ntɔn u mɛɛn manswà bàmutà imbäl a làkwikilà abɛ.
ROM 1:9 Nzam awà in'fàsyääl mɛ unsà dweelà amɛ, u mbwo a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ a Mwan ande, nde wà mbäl amɛ naa mɛ in'fàlatà din taaŋ lanswà.
ROM 1:10 Taaŋ lanswà, unsà ngyamàkà amɛ, mɛ in'fàlɔm naa unsà ukwen a Nzam, mɛ in'mɛn ipɔ̈l aŋàbwaŋ muyà akà bɛ.
ROM 1:11 Unsà ya yanswà, mɛ iwe anà ngyal mukàlaman ntɔn mukàlapà kab a Dweelà ntɔn bɛ làkäl bàŋàtsim.
ROM 1:12 Itàkal naa u mbwo abɛ, bi banswà iwɛl ngwal, amwɛy anà bumwɛy, u mbwo a làkwikilà abi banswà, làbɛ asànaa làmɛ.
ROM 1:13 Atɔŋ, mɛ in'kwen anki mukalawɛy ukɔɔn ayöb naa mɛ in'fàkal anà an'kyän muyà akà bɛ, ntɔn muwal imbɛŋ imwɛy akà bɛ, asànaa akà in'sɛŋ myumwɛy mpa imyà Ayudà, wɛɛ tii apanà mɛ ipöl ŋàtàman anki.
ROM 1:14 Mɛ, mɛ in'we anà nkul a Angɛlɛki asànaa yà baar mpa abà Angɛlɛki, yà aŋan'yeerà asànaa yà insil.
ROM 1:15 Kyakin, mɛ in'we anà ngyal mukyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ akà bɛ sye baar làbà u Lɔmà.
ROM 1:16 Ntɔn mɛ in'we anki anà nswɛn a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ, ntɔn la là ngwal a Nzam ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbuur awe anà làkwikilà, utàtwɛb akà Un'yudà, ungö akà Ungɛlɛki.
ROM 1:17 Ntɔn balàbal a Nzam làfàmɛnà u mbwo a la, unsà làkwikilà anà ntɔn làkwikilà, asànaa bàsön ya naa: « Mbuur awà balàbal unsà làkwikilà akyer asàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈. »
ROM 1:18 Apan sye, nkyɛl a Nzam ifàmɛnà fà du ntɔn mutɔn ukɔɔn inzaam anà nsaŋ a nkɔɔl a baar bàfàkaar ndandaa uboo a ntsüül a nsaŋ a nkɔɔl.
ROM 1:19 Ntɔn undiir ban'kwo muyöb akà Nzam, wa afàmɛnà ntɔn ba: Nzam kàkyamɛɛy wa.
ROM 1:20 Abun, fà kàkyer Nzam mɛɛn, nsyääl ande yàŋàsöön ubwaŋ yàŋàyee, ngwal a mbul a in'tye anà inzaam ande, byàkyer afàmɛnà ubwaŋàbwaŋ unsà un'yɛnà u mbwo a isal ande. Abun, baar un'lɔɔn bawɛɛl anki.
ROM 1:21 Ntɔn, itàkal naa ba bàyöb Nzam, ba nde làkoo bun'si anki asànaa Nzam, an'tɔɔn sye bun'fuur anki. Wɛɛ an'kyän aba màbulà màbunàbun, mpem aba yà unsil yàbilà uboo a làpib.
ROM 1:22 Ba bàkyeyà uyɔl naa ba bà aŋayeerà, kyekà ba bàbulà aŋukɔŋ:
ROM 1:23 Ba bàsɔɔm làkoo a Nzam mpa afàsɔɔmà anà itɛk a mbuur afàsɔɔmà, anà itɛk a nɛn, anà ntsür a in'kɔl in'nà, anà ntsür yàfilaan.
ROM 1:24 Kyakin Nzam kawɛy nde naa mpem aba ikyer ukwen aba unsà mbiin, ntɔn ya ilwom làkoo a ndür aba ŋakwo.
ROM 1:25 Ba bàsɔɔm ndandaa a Nzam asye a loor, ba bàpɛ làkoo anà bàsyäälà undiir bàkyer kà ikal a Nkyer awàŋàsaak, mbul a in'tye. Wöwö!
ROM 1:26 Lalan, Nzam kasölà nde akà ilään a nswɛn: Akyay aba bàwɛy mukal anà abaal, ba bàbulà mukal ba a ba.
ROM 1:27 Abaal sye u mper yàba, bàpiy nkääl aŋàbwaŋ anà un'kaar, ba bàbilà unsà ilään a amwɛy anà bumwɛy, mukyer ndaa a nswɛn a baal anà baal, anà muwal unsà ndür aba, bweel a balàbal ntɔn ndiimà aba.
ROM 1:28 Asànaa mpa bàmɛn ba naa ndöŋ yatɛy muyöb Nzam, Nzam kasölà akà un'yɛnà aba akɔ̈ɔ̈n an'kyän aŋàbwaŋ: kyakin bàkyerà ba indiir mpa ban'kwo ba mukyer.
ROM 1:29 Ba bàŋàyɔl a un'kɔɔl aŋàyɔŋ wà ifà ifà, wà làmfɛɛl, wà ngyal a ngim, wà nkyɛl, wà un'köl, wà ndwää a baar, wà an'sye, wà impeenà, wà indiir a nswɛn, aŋambämà,
ROM 1:30 aŋatwee, ayiiŋ a Nzam, aŋunkɔ̈ɔ̈n, aŋuyɔl, aswesweey, aŋun'yɛnà abɛ, aŋambɛɛy a aböör aba,
ROM 1:31 bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n un'yɛnà, bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n in'kɔɔn, bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n mpem a ukwen, bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n ngyɛb.
ROM 1:32 Itàkal naa ba bàkyàyɔ̈b ubwaŋàbwaŋ ntsüül a nsaŋ a Nzam ayitɛɛnà naa baar bàfàkyer indiir abi bàkyà ukwà, ba kà nà bàfàkyer bya mpɛl anki, ba bàfàkyey sye baar bàfàkyer bya.
ROM 2:1 Abun, ngye, ngye un'lɔɔn bàsawɛɛl anki, ngye, itàkal naa ngye awà nà, ngye mbuur afàtsul mbar. Ntɔn, afàtsul ngye mbar a mbuur asin, ngye awàŋàkwɛlà ngye ŋakwo, ntɔn ngye afàkyer abun, ngye mbuur afàtsul mbar.
ROM 2:2 Kyekà, bi ikyàyöb naa ntsüül a nsaŋ a Nzam ifàkal unsà ndandaa ifàpà ngö akà baar bàfàkyer indiir abin.
ROM 2:3 Nkye ngye akasii, ngye mbuur afàtsul nsaŋ a baar ban'kyer anà afàkyer asànaa ba, naa ngye ayàkwɛlà anki u ntsüül a nsaŋ a Nzam?
ROM 2:4 Taaŋ lumwɛy ngye awàmudyà un'siinà un'naaŋ a ubwaŋ ande, nkääŋ a mpem anà un'kaay ande. Nkye ngye ayöb anki naa ubwaŋ abà bàmusiinà ngye u mbuul a mpem?
ROM 2:5 Unsà mpem bwoor angye, unsà mpem angye mpa ikwen musɔɔmà, ngye awàmubel nkyɛl a kölàköl akà ngye ŋakwo, ntɔn ilä a nkyɛl a Nzam, ilä usàmɛɛy nde ntsüül a nsaŋ ande yà balàbal,
ROM 2:6 nde asàfuur mbuur mbuur asànaa akyà isal ande:
ROM 2:7 mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye akà baar akwà, u mbwo a muküünà aba mukyer ubwaŋ anà muleŋ làkoo, ibyääl anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ mpa afàtay,
ROM 2:8 wɛɛ nkyɛl anà mfuunà a mpem akà ba akwà, ntɔn mutɔn uwem, bàfàlwomà u mbwo a ndandaa anà bàfàlab mbwo ikɔ̈ɔ̈n balàbal.
ROM 2:9 Ngyɛb mbɔɔn anà bɔɔmà mbɔɔn byàsàkal ntɔn mbuur afàkyer ube, utàtwɛb akà Un'yudà, ungö akà Ungɛlɛki.
ROM 2:10 Wɛɛ làkoo, ibyääl anà duu byàsàkal akà mbuur wanswà afàkyer ubwaŋ, utàtwɛb akà Un'yudà, ungö akà Ungɛlɛki,
ROM 2:11 ntɔn akà Nzam un'kɔɔl aŋàyɔŋ watɛy.
ROM 2:12 Baar banswà bàkyer man'be ukɔɔn un'kɔɔn, bàsàkwà sye ukɔɔn un'kɔɔn. Baar banswà bàkyer man'be uboo a un'kɔɔn bàsatsüül nsaŋ u mbwo a un'kɔɔn.
ROM 2:13 La itàkal naa baar bàfàwem un'kɔɔn abà bàbalàbal kusà a Nzam, wɛɛ baar bàfàsyääl un'kɔɔn.
ROM 2:14 Isàkal naa baar mpa abà Ayudà, mpa bàyöb un'kɔɔn, abà bàfàkyer balàbal ndaa ufaswaŋ un'kɔɔn, un'kɔɔn awà amu ba ŋakwo, ba baar bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n un'kɔɔn.
ROM 2:15 Ba ban'swaŋ naa isal ukweenà un'kɔɔn kyàŋàsɔn u mpem aba, an'kyän aba màmutà imbäl sye, ntsüül a nsaŋ u mpem aba taaŋ làmwɛy ikyer afapɛl, taaŋ lumwɛy ikyer afawɛɛl.
ROM 2:16 Ndaa ayin yanwsà isàmɛnà u mii a mii, umpal usàtsul Nzam nkääl a baar yàŋàyee u mbwo a Yɛsu Klistɔ, asànaa awà ya unsà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ in'fàlɔŋ mɛ.
ROM 2:17 Wɛɛ, ngye mbuur bàfabel Un'yudà, afàsà mpem angye unsà un'kɔɔn anà afàswaŋ ngaal ntɔn Nzam angye,
ROM 2:18 ngye akyàyöb ukwen ande, un'kɔɔn ande kàkyàlɔŋ naa ufàsɔɔl aben ndaa a mfun, ntɔn wa bàkyalɔŋ,
ROM 2:19 ngye mbuur an'sà kam naa ngye afàsyen ikwàmii, ngye awà pɛɛlà a baar abà uboo a làpib,
ROM 2:20 un'lɔɔŋ insil anà wà baar mpa abye anà ngyööb, ntɔn ngye ngyööb anà ndandaa an'wal uboo a un'kɔɔn ...
ROM 2:21 Inye, ngye awɛy bää awà un'lɔɔŋ a baar asin, ntɔn nkye mpa alɔɔŋà ngye, ngye ŋakwo? Ngye afàlɔŋ naa bàkɔɔn ayib, ntɔn nkye ngye ŋakwo afàyib ngye?
ROM 2:22 Ngye afàtsuŋ baar mutà inswem, ntɔn nkye ngye ŋakwo afàtà ngye inswem? Ngye mbuur afàman itɛk ŋingyääy, wɛɛ ngye afàwal indiir a ngwal u ndwà a nzam aba!
ROM 2:23 Ngye afàswaŋ ngaal angye ntɔn un'kɔɔn, wɛɛ ngye afàbɛy Nzam utaaŋ afàdwa ngye un'kɔɔn!
ROM 2:24 Abun, ya yàŋàsɔn naa: « Ntɔn bɛ, ikɔb a Nzam kyàŋàbɛy akà in'sɛŋ asin. »
ROM 2:25 Ndandaa naa nkyɛɛy yà mfun isàkal naa ngye afàsyääl un'kɔɔn, wɛɛ, isàkal naa ngye afàbɛy un'kɔɔn anà nkyɛɛy, ngye, ngye awà asànaa mbuur mpa awàŋàkyɛy.
ROM 2:26 Isàkal naa mbuur mpa awàŋàkyɛy afàlab in'kɔɔn, nkye Nzam ayun'kyey anki asànaa nde wàŋàkyɛy, itàkal naa nde kà wàŋàkyɛy anki?
ROM 2:27 Abun, mbuur mpa awàŋàkyɛy u ndür ande usilabà un'kɔɔn, nde asatsüül nsaŋ, ngye mbuur awe anà un'kaan a un'kɔɔn anà nkyɛɛy, wɛɛ ngye afàbɛy un'kɔɔn.
ROM 2:28 Ntɔn, kà ndaa ifàmɛnà u mii anki ifàkyer Un'yudà, itàkal idiim ifàmɛnà u ndür kyan'kyer nkyɛɛy,
ROM 2:29 wɛɛ ndaa aŋàyee ifàkyer Un'yudà, anà nkyɛɛy yà yà uboo a mpem, nkyɛɛy ifàfà amu Dweelà, kà kà un'kaan anki. Un'yudà a ndandaa awà, làkɔɔ ande afàwal anki akà baar, wɛɛ akà Nzam.
ROM 3:1 Abun, bweel nà Ayudà bye alà? Mfun a nkyɛɛy nkye?
ROM 3:2 Mfun yà unsà indiir mbɔɔn! Ntɔn Ndaa a Nzam bàtwab atàpa akà ba. -
ROM 3:3 Ininà? Isàkal naa bàmbɔɔn uboo a ba bàkäl anki bàlää, nkye ukɔɔn lää aba alà làyàlwom lää a Nzam?
ROM 3:4 Kabwɛy anki! Wɛy Nzam bun'yöb naa nde wà ndandaa, mbuur wanswà wà mbuur a loor, asànaa bàsön ya naa: « Yubwaŋ bayöb naa ngye awà balàbal unsà ndaa angye, naa ngye afàwal iböŋ isàkal naa bàmatsüül nsaŋ. »
ROM 3:5 Wɛɛ bi itɛn aben, isàkal naa un'kɔɔl aŋàyɔŋ abi afàsà balàbal a Nzam ukɔl? Nkye Nzam kà we anà un'kɔɔl aŋàyɔŋ anki kidwa nde unsà nkyɛl ande? Mɛ in'wàmutɛn unsà an'kyän a imbuur.
ROM 3:6 Kabwɛy anki! Ntɔn abun, Nzam mɛɛn nsaŋ asun'tsüül aben?
ROM 3:7 Wɛɛ, isàkal naa u mbwo a loor amɛ, ndandaa a Nzam ifàpää mbɔɔn ntɔn làkoo ande, ntɔn nkye, mɛ, tii lalà ban'tsüülà ba nsaŋ asànaa mbuur un'be?
ROM 3:8 Abun, ntɔn nkye mpa ban'kwo mutɛn naa: « Wɛy bi ikyer ube ntɔn ubwaŋ bàtoo mwo »? Ntɔn baar amwɛy bàfibämà naa bi bàfàlɔŋ abwɛy. Baar aban ban'kwo muwal ntaaŋàmbar!
ROM 3:9 Wɛɛ ininà? Bi Ayudà, bweel nà bi ifàkal alà? Akà ikikye! Ntɔn bi bàkyàtsul mbar naa baar banswà, Ayudà asànaa Angɛlɛki, bà ungyɛl a ikɔ̈b a man'be.
ROM 3:10 Asànaa bàsön ya naa: « Mbuur a balàbal watɛy, itàkal akà mwɛy,
ROM 3:11 akà mbuur a an'yeerà watɛy, mbuur aleŋà Nzam watɛy.
ROM 3:12 Ba banswà bàkyàbwà ndwaŋ, bàkyàyöö. Akà mwɛy afàkyer ubwaŋ watɛy, itàkal akà mwɛy mpɛl.
ROM 3:13 Un'kwaal aba wà asànaa an'dii aŋàduub, làlem aba làfàkɔn loor, an'te a ntäy mà ungyɛl a itɔ̈ɔ̈m aba.
ROM 3:14 Mun aba wàŋàyɔl a in'küül anà buul.
ROM 3:15 In'kɔl aba myà nswɛy mupay an'kil,
ROM 3:16 Ntɛɛl a upay anà ngyɛb yà u mbwo a ba,
ROM 3:17 anà mbwo a duu ba bàyöb anki.
ROM 3:18 Bɔɔmà a Nzam akà ikikye u mii a ba latɛy. »
ROM 3:19 Kyekà, bi bàkyàyöb naa ndaa yanswà kan'tɛn un'kɔɔn, wa kan'tɛn akà baar abà u ngyɛl a un'kɔɔn, ntɔn mun wanswà ukäl wàŋàbäm anà mɛɛn manswà màŋàkwàndwà u mii a Nzam.
ROM 3:20 Wɛɛ, akà mbuur mwɛy usàmɛnà anki wàbalàbal kusà a nde u mbwo a isal a un'kɔɔn, ntɔn un'kɔɔn aswaŋà nà man'be mpɛl.
ROM 3:21 Wɛɛ apanà, u nsaay a un'kɔɔn, balàbal a Nzam làkyer amɛnà, un'kɔɔn anà aŋangɔɔm bun'tɛɛlà imbäl.
ROM 3:22 La là balàbal a Nzam u mbwo a làkwikilà amu Yɛsu Klistɔ ntɔn baar banswà bàfun'kyey, ntɔn nsöön yatɛy:
ROM 3:23 ba banswà bàkyer man'be, anà batsüŋ làkoo a Nzam.
ROM 3:24 Wɛɛ ba batwey bàngway balàbal u mbwo a kab a ngway ande ntɔn ntsuuŋà amu Yɛsu Klistɔ.
ROM 3:25 Nzam nde kàpɛ asànaa ibɔɔn musɔŋ man'be a baar u mbwo a làkwikilà. Ibɔɔn aki iswaŋà balàbal a Nzam, mpa kàpɛ nde ntaaŋàmbar akà man'be bàkyer itaan,
ROM 3:26 utaaŋ a nkääŋ a mpem ande, ntɔn muswaŋ balàbal ande u taaŋ alà ntɔn nde ukäl wàbalàbal anà mutwey balàbal a mbuur kan'sà làkwikilà amu Klistɔ Yɛsu.
ROM 3:27 Nkye apanà we anà undiir afàkyey uyɔl? Akà mwɛy watɛy! Ntɔn nkye? Unsà un'kɔɔn nà? Nkye wà isal? Ŋaa, wɛɛ kà un'kɔɔn a làkwikilà.
ROM 3:28 Bi bàkyàyöb naa mbuur afàtoo wàbalàbal u mbwo a làkwikilà, wɛɛ kà u mbwo a isal a un'kɔɔn anki.
ROM 3:29 Isàkal abwɛy, nkye Nzam wà Nzam a Ayudà mpɛl? Nkye Nde kà wà Nzam a in'sɛŋ myumwɛy anki? Ya yà ndandaa naa nde sye wà Nzam a in'sɛŋ myumwɛy,
ROM 3:30 ntɔn Nzam wà mwɛy: Nde asàtwey balàbal baar aŋàkyɛy u mbwo a làkwikilà, anà baar mpa abàŋàkyɛy u mbwo a làkwikilà.
ROM 3:31 Nkye apanà, ikaswaŋà naa u mbwo a làkwikilà bi kan'lwom un'kɔɔn? Ŋaa, bi kan'pà wa ngwal.
ROM 4:1 Abun, bi itɛn aben ntɔn nkaa abi Abàlam? Ininà nde kàwɛl unsà imbuur?
ROM 4:2 Isàkal naa Abàlam bun'twey balàbal u mbwo a isal ande, nde kàlàkal anà ngyal musɛn an'pɛy, wɛɛ kà kusà a Nzam anki.
ROM 4:3 Apan, Ndaa Aŋàsɔn itɛɛnà aben? Abàlam kàsi làkwikilà amu Nzam, kyakin Nzam kun'twey nde wàbalàbal.
ROM 4:4 Kyekà, mbuur afàkyer isal mwɛy, làfur làŋàtɔɔl a lää, kà sànaa kab a ngway anki, wɛɛ asànaa nkul.
ROM 4:5 Isàkal naa mbuur ufàkyer anki isal, wɛɛ nde afàsà làkwikilà akà Mbuur afàtwey baar a man'be balàbal, làkwikilà ande làŋàsà un'tal unsà balàbal.
ROM 4:6 Kyakin David utɛɛnà nde ntɔn un'sak a mbuur kan'twey Nzam wàbalàbal mukɔɔn alab isal:
ROM 4:7 un'sak akà baar bàmadwääl nkul a an'kyän an'be aba, anà bàkyàfwe man'be aba!
ROM 4:8 Un'sak akà mbuur mpa ufàsyeel Mwol un'tal a man'be ande!
ROM 4:9 Nkye un'sak a kölàköl awà wà ntɔn bàŋàkyɛy mpɛl, lɛɛ wà sye ntɔn baar mpa abàŋàkyɛy? Kyakin, waa bi itɛn naa: làkwikilà a Abàlam bun'syel asànaa balàbal.
ROM 4:10 La bun'syeel taaŋ nà? Kusà lɛɛ ungö a nkyɛɛy ande? Ŋaa, kà ungö anki, wɛɛ kusà.
ROM 4:11 Ungö amukun'pà, ba bun'si isii a nkyɛɛy asànaa inyɛm a balàbal kàwɛl nde u mbwo a làkwikilà, utaaŋ kàkäl nde ŋàtun'kyɛy anki. Kyakin awà nde taa a baar banswà mpa abàŋàkyɛy, ntɔn ba sye bàbulà baar a balàbal,
ROM 4:12 anà taa a bàŋàkyɛy, a baar abà uboo a un'sɛŋ a bàŋàkyɛy mpɛl anki, wɛɛ baar ban'lab sye ntääm a làkwikilà a taaràbi Abàlam, kusà mukun'kyɛy.
ROM 4:13 Kà ntɔn u mbwo a un'kɔɔn anki, wɛɛ u mbwo a balàbal a làkwikilà naa ilää awal kwal a mɛɛn bàpɛ Abàlam, itàkal itoo ande.
ROM 4:14 Isàkal naa kwal alà baar bàfàlab un'kɔɔn bàwal la, làkwikilà mfun làfàkal anki, ilää ifàkal anki.
ROM 4:15 Ntɔn un'kɔɔn afàtwaal nkyɛl. Kyekà, kà ikal ikɔ̈ɔ̈n un'kɔɔn, mbɛɛy a un'kɔɔn sye yatɛy.
ROM 4:16 Kyakin, ikyee bàfàbulà u mbwo a làkwikilà, ntɔn ya ikäl u mbwo a kab a ngway, ntɔn ilää ikäl ntɔn itoo a Abàlam kyanswà, kà ntɔn baar bàfàlab un'kɔɔn mpɛl anki, wɛɛ sye baar bàfàlab làkwikilà a Abàlam, awà taaràbi banswà,
ROM 4:17 asànaa bàsön ya naa: « Mɛ kabuul taa a in'sɛŋ mbɔɔn. » Nde wà taaràbi kusà a mbuur kàsi nde làkwikilà, Nzam, afàpà akü mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà afàbel indiir mpa byàkäl akà ikikye asànaa bya byàkyàkal.
ROM 4:18 Ukɔɔn asà an'kyän ande ukwɛl a làkyän lanswà, nde kàsi làkwikilà, waa kàbulà « taar a in'sɛŋ mbɔɔn » asànaa bàtɛn ya a nde naa: « Itoo angye isàkal mbɔɔn. »
ROM 4:19 Nde kàkäl tsütsü mukɔlà mbul nkam, wɛɛ làkwikilà ande làkäl ka paa, itàkal naa ndür ande yàkäl yàŋàyɔɔn anà un'kyay ande Saal kàkäl ikɔb.
ROM 4:20 Ukɔɔn asà mpem bwoor akà ilää, nde kàsi ngwal unsà làkwikilà, waa kasi Nzam làkoo.
ROM 4:21 Ntɔn nde kàkyer ayöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ naa Nzam usàpà ilää, nde akyer afàkölà kya sye, nde we anà ngwal mukwey kya.
ROM 4:22 Kyakin bun'twey ba wàbalàbal.
ROM 4:23 Kyekà, bàsön anki ntɔn nde mpɛl naa: « Nde bun'twey wàbalàbal. »
ROM 4:24 Wɛɛ ntɔn bi sye, bàsitwey bàbalàbal, bi baar ifàsà làkwikilà amu Nde awà kàwiiy Mwol abi Yɛsu uboo a akü.
ROM 4:25 Nde bàkyer un'kab ntɔn ibii abi, waa kàwiyà ntɔn mutwey bi bàbalàbal.
ROM 5:1 Abà, bitwey ba bàbalàbal u mbwo a làkwikilà, bi ibà a duu anà Nzam u mbwo a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ.
ROM 5:2 Amu nde, bi kan'wal mbwo u làkwikilà, unsà kab a ngway alà ifàkal bi aŋàtsim uboo a la anà ifàswaŋ bi ngaal unsà làkyän a làkoo a Nzam.
ROM 5:3 Yumwɛy, bi ifàswaŋ ngaal itàkal uboo a ngyɛb aŋàdiir, bi ikyàyöb naa ngyɛb aŋàdiir ifàbɔr muküünà,
ROM 5:4 muküünà afàpà ntsim uboo a nsii, ntsim uboo a nsii ifàbɔr làkyän.
ROM 5:5 Kyekà, làkyän làfàkur anki, ntɔn ukwen a Nzam bàŋàyɔl u mpem abi u mbwo a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl awà bipɛ.
ROM 5:6 Ntɔn, utaaŋ bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n bi ngwal, Klistɔ kàkü ntɔn baar a man'be, utaaŋ làkwe la.
ROM 5:7 Yà mpay naa mbuur ukü ntɔn mbuur a balàbal, taaŋ lumwɛy, yan'kwo ikäl naa mbuur mwɛy ukäl anà un'kanà mukyey ukwà ntɔn mbuur aŋàbwaŋ.
ROM 5:8 Wɛɛ Nzam afàswaŋ ukwen ande akà bi: Ntɔn, u taaŋ bàkäl bi baar a man'be, Klistɔ kàkü ntɔn bi.
ROM 5:9 Ntɔn apanà, bi bàkyitwey balàbal u mbwo a an'kil nde, abun, bi sye isàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈ u nkyɛl.
ROM 5:10 Kyakin, isàkal naa bi bàkäl ayiiŋ a Nzam, bi bàkyàbulà un'tüüb anà nde u mbwo a nkweel a Mwan ande, awà bi unsà un'tüüb, bi ikyer asàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈ u mbwo a mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande.
ROM 5:11 Kà nà abwɛy mpɛl anki, bi bàfàswaŋ ngaal amu Nzam u mbwo a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ, u mbwo ande apanà, bi bàwɛl lɔ̈ɔ̈n.
ROM 5:12 Kyakin, asànaa u mbwo a mbuur mwɛy man'be màbilà u mɛɛn manswà, waa ube bàtwääl ukwà, waa ukwà bàbilà mbuur wanswà ntɔn baar banswà bàkyer man'be.
ROM 5:13 Ntɔn, fà nsɛmà tii un'kɔɔn, man'be màkäl u mɛɛn. Wɛɛ, ntaaŋàmbar yàkäl anki ntɔn man'be, un'kɔɔn kàkäl anki.
ROM 5:14 Kyekà, fà Adam tii akà Mɔsɛ, ukwà bàkyer akal, itàkal akà baar mpa bàkyer man'be, akɔ̈ɔ̈n ngweem asànaa mà Adam, ifà a mbuur awà ayàyà.
ROM 5:15 Wɛɛ, ye anà nsöön uboo a kab a ngway anà ibii. Ntɔn, isàkal naa u mbwo a man'be a mbuur mwɛy, bàmbɔɔn bàkyen ukwà, lalan sye, u mbwo a kab a ngway a Nzam, kab a ngway lan'fà akà mbuur mwɛy, Yɛsu Klistɔ, lan'söön ntɔn baar mbɔɔn.
ROM 5:16 Yumwɛy, kab a Nzam lan'lyaaŋ man'be a mbuur mwɛy u mfun: abà, u mbwo a man'be a mbuur mwɛy, ntsüül a nsaŋ yan'pà ntaaŋàmbar, kyekà, kab a ngway bàpɛ ungö a ibii mbɔɔn, lan'lwom ntaaŋàmbar.
ROM 5:17 Ntɔn, isàkal naa u mbwo a ibii a mbuur mwɛy, ukwà bàkyer ayaal, abun sye, u mbwo a Yɛsu Klistɔ mpɛl, baar bàfàwal kab a ngway mbɔɔn anà kab a balàbal, bàsàyaal u mɔ̈ɔ̈.
ROM 5:18 Abun, ntɔn ibii a mbuur mwɛy, mbuur wanswà kàwɛl ntaaŋàmbar, abun sye, isal a balàbal a mbuur mwɛy, kyà ntɔn baar banswà bàwɛl balàbal làfàpà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
ROM 5:19 Abun sye, unsà ukɔɔn ngweem a mbuur mwɛy, baar mbɔɔn bàbulà baar a man'be, ifà imwɛy sye, unsà unkyeey a mbuur mwɛy, un'kàbɔ bàbulà bàbalàbal.
ROM 5:20 Kyeka, un'kɔɔn kan'yà ntɔn ibii ibɛy, wɛɛ, kà ikal man'bilà man'be mbɔɔn, kab a ngway lan'sɔ̈ɔ̈nà.
ROM 5:21 Kyakin, asànaa man'be man'yaal ntɔn ukwà, apan u mbwo a balàbal, kab a ngway làyaal ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye u mbwo a Yɛsu Klistɔ, Mwol abi.
ROM 6:1 Apanà, ininà bi itɛn? Nkye bi ikal tii kunà uboo a man'be ntɔn kab a ngway làsöönà?
ROM 6:2 Ŋaa! Bi kàkyàfuràkwà ntɔn man'be, bi iyàfàkal aben uboo a man'be?
ROM 6:3 Aben, bɛ lan'diimà naa bi banswà kàwɛl ndüümà amu Klistɔ Yɛsu, nkye unsà nkweel ande ayi, waa bi kàwɛl ndüümà?
ROM 6:4 Unsà ndüümà, bi bidyee u mbwo a nkweel ande mbwo mwɛy anà nde, ntɔn yà asànaa Klistɔ kàwiyà nde uboo a akü u mbwo a làkoo a Taa, bi sye iwal mɔ̈ɔ̈ akün.
ROM 6:5 Ntɔn, isàkal naa bi bàkäl un'tüüb unsà ukwà ande, bi sye isàkal anà wa u ngwiiyà ande.
ROM 6:6 Wɛy bi iyöb naa: imbuur itaan kàkäl bi akyà, bàkyàbɛɛrà u kulunsi anà Nde ntɔn mudwa ndür a man'be yi anà bi ikɔ̈ɔ̈n akal asɔ a man'be.
ROM 6:7 Ntɔn mbuur awà kan'kwà, nde bàmutwey balàbal unsà man'be.
ROM 6:8 Kyekà, ntɔn bi ban'kwà anà Klistɔ, bi ban'kyey naa bi isàkal sye u mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà Nde.
ROM 6:9 Ntɔn bi ikyàyöb naa Klistɔ awà kàwiyà uboo a akü, ufàsàkwà anki: ukwà bàfàkal anki anà ikɔ̈b udu a Nde.
ROM 6:10 Nde kàkü ntɔn man'be, mbalà mwɛy ipepey. Wɛɛ apanà, nde we anà mɔ̈ɔ̈, mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande wà ntɔn Nzam.
ROM 6:11 Abà sye bɛ, bɛ làmɛnà asànaa bɛ làkyàkwà unsà man'be, bɛ làwe anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ntɔn Nzam amu Klistɔ Yɛsu.
ROM 6:12 Lalan, wɛy man'be màkɔ̈ɔ̈n akal anà ikɔ̈b udu a ndür abɛ yà ukwà ntɔn mufàkyey ilään a ya.
ROM 6:13 Twon lan'pà itiir a ndür abɛ akà man'be asànaa an'tà a indiir ikɔ̈ɔ̈n balàbal. Wɛɛ, làpɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ akà Nzam asànaa baar bàwiyà uboo a akü, waa abye anà mɔ̈ɔ̈. Lun'pɛ itiir a ndür abɛ asànaa an'tà a indiir a balàbal. Labilà unsà isal a Nzam.
ROM 6:14 Ntɔn man'be màfàsàkal anki anà ikɔ̈b udu abɛ, ntɔn bɛ làfàkal anki ungyɛl a un'kɔɔn, wɛɛ ungyɛl a kab a ngway.
ROM 6:15 Ininà abun? Nkye bi ikyer man'be naa ntɔn bi bàfàkal anki ungyɛl a un'kɔɔn, wɛɛ ungyɛl a kab a ngway? Kà abwɛy anki!
ROM 6:16 Nkye bɛ làyöb anki naa kya bɛ làsàkal uboo a isal a mbuur asànaa asɔ ntɔn mukun'kyey, bɛ làbà asɔ a mbuur wa làkakyeyà bɛ wà? Itàkal isɔ a man'be ifàsyen kà ukwà, itàkal isɔ a nkyeey ifàsyen u balàbal?
ROM 6:17 Wɛɛ bi bàfuur an'tɔɔn akà Nzam: kusà bɛ làkäl asɔ a man'be, wɛɛ apanà, bɛ làkyàkyey u mpem abɛ wanswà an'lɔɔŋ a kiin amà bàlapɛ.
ROM 6:18 Abun, bɛ làkyàlwomà ungyɛl a man'be, waa lan'bulà asɔ a balàbal.
ROM 6:19 Mɛ in'tɛɛnà unsà imbuur, ntɔn bɛ sye làbà baar. Ntɔn, asànaa làpɛ bɛ itiir a ndür asànaa asɔ unsà isal a mbiin anà kyàlingyoomà abyà ifàsyɛn mutɔn Nzam, abun sye, làpɛ bya apanà ntɔn bya ibulà ungyɛl a isɔ a balàbal alà làfàsyen kà un'kyɛɛl.
ROM 6:20 Umpal làkäl bɛ asɔ a man'be, bɛ làkäl nsaay kusà a balàbal.
ROM 6:21 Bɛ bweel nà làwɛl? Ŋàbawà bɛ làbà u nswɛn, ntɔn ntsüü a ma ukwà.
ROM 6:22 Wɛɛ apan bɛ làkyàlwomà ungyɛl a isɔ a man'be anà làkyàbulà asɔ a Nzam, bɛ lan'wal bweel làfasyɛn kà un'kyɛɛl, waa ntsüü a ya, yà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye.
ROM 6:23 Ntɔn làfur a man'be là ukwà, wɛɛ kab a ngway a Nzam là mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye amu Mwol abi Klistɔ Yɛsu.
ROM 7:1 Atɔŋ, ikamɛnà naa bɛ lan'diimà - mɛ in'tɛɛnà a baar bàyöb un'kɔɔn - naa nkye bɛ làyöb anki naa un'kɔɔn afàkal anà ikɔ̈b udu a mbuur nà utaaŋ awà nde anà mɔ̈ɔ̈?
ROM 7:2 Abun, un'kaar aŋàbääl wà un'tüüb, unsà un'kɔɔn, anà mbääl ande utaaŋ awà nde anà mɔ̈ɔ̈. Wɛɛ nde usàkwà, nde ufàfàkal anki ungyɛl a un'kɔɔn a bɔr.
ROM 7:3 Abà, isàkal naa nde kan'wal un'dim asin utaaŋ awà mbuur awà anà mɔ̈ɔ̈, nde kan'tà inswem. Wɛɛ, isàkal naa un'dim kan'kwà, nde kan'bulà nsaay kusà a un'kɔɔn, apan nde uyàkal anki ŋinswem mubulà un'kyay a mbuur asin.
ROM 7:4 Abun sye ntɔn bɛ, atɔŋ amɛ, bɛ bàkyàlasà kà ukwà kusà a un'kɔɔn, u mbwo a ndür a Klistɔ, ntɔn mubulà baar a mbuur asin, Mbuur awà kàwiyà uboo a akü, ntɔn bi itwey mbɛŋ ntɔn Nzam.
ROM 7:5 Kyakin, utaaŋ kàkäl bi unsà in'twaŋ, ilään a man'be màfü unsà un'kɔɔn, màsyäälà itiir a ndür abi, ntɔn bi itwey mbɛŋ ntɔn ukwà.
ROM 7:6 Wɛɛ apanà, kàkü bi unsà ikɔ̈b kyàkäärà bi kà isɔ, bi kàkyàtoo nsaay kusà a un'kɔɔn. Ntɔn bi isäl ungyɛl a ikɔ̈b akün kyà Dweelà, wɛɛ kà ungyɛl a ikɔ̈b itaan kyà un'kɔɔn aŋàsɔn anki.
ROM 7:7 Abun, ininà bi itɛn? Nkye un'kɔɔn wà man'be? Kà abwɛy anki! Wɛɛ, yàlàkal naa un'kɔɔn watɛy, mɛ man'be kàlàyöb anki. Abun, mɛ kàlàyöb anki ngyööm a mpem, yàlàkal naa un'kɔɔn kàtɛɛn anki naa: "Twon an'yɔm mpem."
ROM 7:8 Mulab ndaa ayi, man'be màbör amu mɛ ngyööm a mpem yà ifà ifà u mbwo a nswɛɛŋ. Ntɔn, yàlàkal naa un'kɔɔn ukɔ̈ɔ̈n, man'be màlàkal undiir aŋàkwà.
ROM 7:9 Itaan, mpal kàkɔ̈ɔ̈n un'kɔɔn, mɛ kàkäl anà mɔ̈ɔ̈. Wɛɛ mpal yàyi nswɛɛŋ, man'be màfàwal mɔ̈ɔ̈,
ROM 7:10 mɛ waa kàkü: nswɛɛŋ yàlàsyeen u mɔ̈ɔ̈, yan'syeen kà ukwà.
ROM 7:11 Ntɔn man'be, u mbwo nsil ayin, laa man'kür ma, u mbwo a nswɛɛŋ, anà u mbwo a wa, waa kan'pɛ ukwà.
ROM 7:12 Abun, un'kɔɔn wà in'kyɛɛl, nswɛɛŋ yà in'kyɛɛl, balàbal anà ubwaŋ.
ROM 7:13 Apan, nkye undiir aŋàbwaŋ kàkyàtwaal ukwà ntɔn mɛ? Kà ndandaa anki! Wɛɛ mà man'be: ma màsyääl undiir aŋàbwaŋ mukan'pà ukwà, ntɔn wa kàmɛnà asànaa man'be anà muswaŋ nkyɛl a man'be, u mbwo a nswɛɛŋ.
ROM 7:14 Ndandaa, bi bàkyàyöb naa un'kɔɔn wà wàdweelà. Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ in'wà mbuur a un'sön a ndür, bàkyän'yälà u man'be asànaa un'sɔ.
ROM 7:15 Ntɔn, mɛ in'fàyöb anki ayà in'fàkyer mɛ: mɛ in'fàkyer anki ayà in'fàkwen mɛ, wɛɛ mɛ in'fàkyer ndaa in'fàtɔn mɛ.
ROM 7:16 Abun, isàkal naa ayà mpa in'fàkwen mɛ, mɛ in'fàkyer ya, mɛ an'kyey naa un'kɔɔn wà ubwaŋ.
ROM 7:17 Kà mɛ anki in'kyer abun, wɛɛ man'be amà amu mɛ.
ROM 7:18 Ntɔn mɛ in'kyàyöb naa amu mɛ, - mɛ in'kwen mutɛn uboo a ndür amɛ - ubwaŋ batɛy: ukwen akyer ubwaŋ bàmwo, wɛɛ mɛ in'kakwo anki mukyer ba.
ROM 7:19 Kyakin ubwaŋ in'kwen mɛ mukyer, mɛ in'kyerà anki, wɛɛ ube mpa in'kwen mɛ, mɛ in'wàmukyer ba.
ROM 7:20 Kyekà, isàkal naa mɛ an'kyer ayà mpa in'kwen mɛ, kà mɛ anki an'kyer, wɛɛ man'be amà amu mɛ.
ROM 7:21 Apan, mɛ an'man un'kɔɔn wà: mpal in'kwen mɛ mukyer ubwaŋ, ube bàmanääm.
ROM 7:22 U mpem amɛ, mɛ in'fàman un'sak ntɔn un'kɔɔn a Nzam.
ROM 7:23 Wɛɛ, uboo a itiir a ndür amɛ, mɛ an'fàman un'kɔɔn asin wàmunwan a un'kɔɔn a un'yɛnà amɛ, wa kàman'buul un'sɔ a un'kɔɔn a man'be amà uboo a itiir a ndür amɛ.
ROM 7:24 Ngyɛb akà mɛ! Nà asan'tsuuŋ u ndür a ukwà yi?
ROM 7:25 An'tɔɔn akà Nzam u mbwo a Yɛsu Klistɔ, Mwol abi! Mutsülà, mɛ ŋakwo in'wà un'sɔ a un'kɔɔn a Nzam unsà un'yɛnà, un'sɔ a un'kɔɔn a man'be unsà ndür.
ROM 8:1 Lalan, apanà, ikwàndwà ifàkal anki ntɔn baar abà amu Klistɔ Yɛsu.
ROM 8:2 Ntɔn un'kɔɔn a Dweelà awafàpà mɔ̈ɔ̈ amu Klistɔ Yɛsu, kàman'tsuuŋ unsà un'kɔɔn a man'be anà ukwà.
ROM 8:3 Ntɔn undiir kàkäl mpay mukyer unsà un'kɔɔn, ntɔn un'sön kun'kwaamà ngwal, Nzam kàkyer akyer wa: ntɔn man'be, Nde kàtöm Mwan ande ŋakwo u ndür ayà asànaa ndür a man'be, nde kàpɛ ikwàndwà akà man'be unsà un'sön.
ROM 8:4 Kàkyer nde abà ntɔn balàbal alà kàlɔ̈ɔ̈mà un'kɔɔn làkwey amu bi, bi baar mpa ifàyikyà ungyɛl a ikɔ̈b a un'sön, wɛɛ unsà Dweelà.
ROM 8:5 Abun sye, ungyɛl a ikɔ̈b a un'sön, an'kyän aba màfàsyääl imbuur, wɛɛ baar abà ungyɛl a Dweelà, an'kyän aba màfàsyääl yin'kyɛɛl.
ROM 8:6 Ntɔn un'sön afàsyen kà ukwà, wɛɛ Dweelà afàsyen u mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà u duu.
ROM 8:7 Ntɔn an'kyän a un'sön màfàmbäär Nzam, ma màfàkal anki ungyɛl a un'kɔɔn a Nzam, ma màkwo anki akà ikikye.
ROM 8:8 Kyekà, baar bàfàkal ungyɛl a ikɔ̈b a un'sön, ba bàkwe anki mupà Nzam un'sak.
ROM 8:9 Wɛɛ akà bɛ, bɛ làbà anki unsà un'sön, wɛɛ unsà Dweelà, isàkal naa ndandaa Dweelà a Nzam wà anà bɛ. Isàkal naa mbuur watɛy anà Dweelà a Klistɔ, nde kà wà mbuur ande anki.
ROM 8:10 Abun, isàkal naa Klistɔ wà amu bɛ, ndür abɛ, ndandaa, yà ndür aŋàkwà ntɔn man'be, wɛɛ Dweelà wà mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ ntɔn balàbal.
ROM 8:11 Isàkal naa Dweelà a Nzam awà kàwiiy Yɛsu uboo a akü wà uboo a bɛ, mbuur awà kàwiiy Yɛsu Klistɔ uboo a akü asàpà sye mɔ̈ɔ̈ u ndür abɛ yà ukwà yi, u mbwo a Dweelà ande alà uboo a bɛ.
ROM 8:12 Abun, atɔŋ amɛ, bi ibye anà nkul, wɛɛ kà yà un'sön anki ntɔn mukal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a imbuur.
ROM 8:13 Ntɔn, isàkal naa bɛ làbà anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ unsà imbuur, bɛ làkyer asàkwà, wɛɛ isàkal naa unsà Dweelà, bɛ lan'dwa nkääl abɛ yà imbuur, apan bɛ làsàkal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
ROM 8:14 Kyakin, baar abà bàfasyeen unsà Dweelà a Nzam, ba bà baan a Nzam.
ROM 8:15 Ntɔn bɛ làwɛl anki dweelà làmwɛy lan'kwo mubuul bɛ asɔ anà mukàlapà bɔɔmà, wɛɛ Dweelà mwɛy afàlabuul bàŋàywaaŋ nkà, waa anà bi ikuub in'kwɛŋ: « Wɔɔ Taa! »
ROM 8:16 Dweelà nde ŋakwo afàtà imbäl akà dweelà abi naa bi ibà baan a Nzam.
ROM 8:17 Abun, ntɔn bi ibà baan, bi sye ibà akyee a kwal: akyee a Nzam anà akyee a kwal mbwo mwɛy anà Klistɔ, ntɔn bi ban'wal yar unsà mpay ande, bi sye isàwal yar unsà làkoo ande.
ROM 8:18 Mɛ in'yweerà naa mpay a taaŋ alà ikwo anki anà làkoo alà làyàmɛnà amu bi.
ROM 8:19 Ntɔn, nkyeer yanswà yàmudilà anà nkääŋ a mpem mɛɛy a baan a Nzam.
ROM 8:20 Ntɔn, nkyeer yanswà yàŋàbilà ungyɛl a ikɔ̈b a bunàbun, kà unsà ukwen aya anki, wɛɛ unsà ukwen a mbuur kàsi ya, wɛɛ làkyän làmwo:
ROM 8:21 ntɔn ya sye iyàfàkal anki kà isɔ a küüb ntɔn muwal yar a nsaay anà làkoo a baan a Nzam.
ROM 8:22 Abun, bi ikyàyöb naa nkyeer yanswà tii lalà yà unsà mpay asànaa usaay a bɔr.
ROM 8:23 Kà ntɔn ya mpɛl anki: bi sye, bi baar ibye anà mbɛŋ atàtwɛb yà Dweelà, bi ibàmulaal u mpem abi, mudilà ngywaaŋ a nkà, ntsüüŋ a ndür abi.
ROM 8:24 Ntɔn bi kàkyàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈, wɛɛ ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈ ya yà unsà làkyän mpɛl. Abun, làkyän imanà bi là la kà làkyän anki. Kyekà, uman undiir bàsyeelà làkyän ifàkal nsyeel a làkyän anki: làkyän bàfàsà aben unsà undiir akamɛnà?
ROM 8:25 Wɛɛ usà làkyän unsà undiir mpa ikamanà bi, yà mudil wa unsà muküünà.
ROM 8:26 Ifà imwɛy sye, Dweelà làfàyà mukibay unsà gyɔ̈ɔ̈là abi, ntɔn bi iyöb anki muyamà ubwaŋàbwaŋ, wɛɛ Dweelà ŋakwo afàyamà ntɔn bi mulaal unsà ngɔk mpa ukwo mbuur mutwey.
ROM 8:27 Waa mbuur awà afàleŋ muyöb mpem akyàyöb an'kyän a Dweelà, ntɔn Dweelà afàyamà ntɔn baar in'kyɛɛl asànaa ukwen Nzam.
ROM 8:28 Bi ikyàyöb sye naa indiir byanswà byàfàlyaaŋ ntɔn ubwaŋ a baar bàkwen Nzam, anà baar kàbel nde ntɔn nswaal ande.
ROM 8:29 Ntɔn, baar abà kàyöb nde kusà, nde ba sye katsüül mukal bàbalàbal kà isii a Mwan ande, ntɔn naa nde awà ukäl nswɛm uboo a atɔŋ mbɔɔn.
ROM 8:30 Baar abà kàlɔ̈ɔ̈n nde fà itaan, nde kàkyer abel sye, baar kàbel nde, nde ba kabuul bàbalàbal sye, anà ba akwà kàbuul nde bàbalàbal, nde kàkyer asyäŋà sye.
ROM 8:31 Abun, ininà bi ifàtɛn ntɔn indiir abi? Isàkal naa Nzam wà anà bi, nà asimbäär?
ROM 8:32 Abun, nde mbuur mpa kàtii Mwan ande ŋakwo, wɛɛ nde kun'käb ntɔn bi banswà, ntɔn nkye mpa kipà nde, mbwo mwɛy anà Mwan ande, indiir byanswà?
ROM 8:33 Nà kan'kwo mufüün baar abà kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l Nzam? Nzam afàtwey baar balàbal!
ROM 8:34 Nà asatsüül mbar? Klistɔ Yɛsu kàkyàkwà, waa kàfàwiyà, nde wà u kɔɔ a ibaal a Nzam, wàmubɔɔn ntɔn bi!
ROM 8:35 Nà asàkaab bi anà ukwen a Klistɔ? Lingyoomà, ngyɛb, nkwaaŋ, ngyal, làmbwà, kɔm itàkal igɔnsà?
ROM 8:36 Asànaa bàsön naa: « Ntɔn ngye, bi bàkidwa ilä aŋukiinà, ba bàfiwal asànaa ntsür bàfàsyen kà idwääl. »
ROM 8:37 Wɛɛ unsà ayi yanswà, bi ibà aŋàböŋ aŋàsöönà u mbwo a mbuur awà kikwen.
ROM 8:38 Ɛɛ, ndandaa mɛ an'sà kam naa itàkal ukwà, itàkal mɔ̈ɔ̈, itàkal akyeey, itàkal amfum, itàkal papanà, itàkal taaŋ làsàyà, itàkal ngwal,
ROM 8:39 itàkal ngwal a du, itàkal ngwal a ngyɛl a mɛɛn, itàkal nkyeer asin, undiir mwɛy tɛy akaab bi anà ukwen a Nzam bàyàmɛnà amu Klistɔ Yɛsu awà Mwol abi.
ROM 9:1 Amu Klistɔ mɛ in'tɛn ndandaa, mɛ in'kur anki, u mbwo a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl, an'kyän amɛ man'tɛɛlà imbäl:
ROM 9:2 u mpem amɛ, mɛ in'we anà ngyɛb mbɔɔn anà usaay mpa bàfàtsü.
ROM 9:3 Ɛɛ, mɛ in'yàkwen naa ban'si in'küül, mɛ ŋakwo in'kaabà anà Klistɔ ntɔn atɔŋ amɛ, itoo amɛ u ndür.
ROM 9:4 Ba bà baar a Isàlɛl, abà unsà ngywaaŋ a nkà, làkoo, nkwà, nkɔ̈ɔ̈n, ngyamàkà, ilää
ROM 9:5 anà bàtaa, amu ba, unsà ndür, kàtoo Klistɔ awà udu a ya yanswà, Nzam aŋàsaak ipepey. Yà abwɛy!
ROM 9:6 Ya ikaswaŋà anki naa Ndaa a Nzam iböŋ anki. Ntɔn, baar banswà abà akyee a Isàlɛl kà Bà Isàlɛl anki,
ROM 9:7 anà, kà akyee a Abàlam banswà anki abà baan ande, ntɔn Nzam kàtɛn a Abàlam naa: « Ngye akyee asàwal u mbwo a Isak. »
