ROM 9:8 Ikaswaŋà naa: kà baan a ndür anki unsà imbuur abà baan a Nzam. Baan a Nzam bà baan abà kàbɔ̈r nde uboo ilää kun'pɛ nde.
ROM 9:9 Ntɔn, ndaa ayi yàkäl ilää: « Mɛ in'kyer asàyàfurà u paŋà atub alà, Saal asàkal anà mwan baal. »
ROM 9:10 Kà yàtsü apan anki, Lɛbɛk sye kàbör baan a mbuur mwɛy mpɛl, Isak, taaràbi.
ROM 9:11 Apan, baan bàkäl anki bàŋàtàbɔr anà bàŋàtàkyer anki itàkal ubwaŋ, itàkal ube, ntɔn nswaal a Nzam ikwe, ndaa yàkäl kusà a nsɔ̈ɔ̈l kàkyer nde
ROM 9:12 mukɔɔn alab isal a baar, wɛɛ ukwen a mbuur kabel, waa kàtɛn a Lɛbɛk naa: "Bwel asàsyääl un'kɔm",
ROM 9:13 asànaa bàsön naa: "Mɛ kàkwen Yakɔb, anà kàyiiŋ Isawu."
ROM 9:14 Ininà bi itɛn? Nkye balàbal latɛy amu Nzam? Kà ndandaa anki! »
ROM 9:15 Ntɔn nde kàtɛn a Mɔsɛ naa: "Mɛ in'sàsyääm mbuur an'kwen mɛ musyääm anà in'sàpà kab a ngway akà mbuur an'kwen mɛ mupà kab a ngway.
ROM 9:16 Abun, ndaa ayi ifàkal anki ntɔn ukwen itàkal ngwal a mbuur, wɛɛ u nsyääm a Nzam.
ROM 9:17 Kyakin Ndaa Aŋàsɔn yàtɛn ya a Falawɔ naa: « Le, mɛ kasi mɛ mfum ntɔn muswaŋ amu ngye ngwal amɛ, ntɔn naa ikɔb amɛ bàkyään kya u mɛɛn manswà. »
ROM 9:18 Abun, nde afàsyääm mbuur ukwen nde, afàsà mpem bwoor akà mbuur ukwen nde.
ROM 9:19 Wɛɛ abun, ngye ayàtɛn a mɛ naa: « Ntɔn nkye ufiŋään nde, ntɔn, akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki mumbäär ukwen ande? »
ROM 9:20 Wɛɛ ngye awà nà, mbuur, ntɔn musà Nzam mbaaŋ? Nkye làbuuŋ lan'kwo làtɛn a un'boom ande naa: « Ntɔn nkye kan'kyer ngye abà? »
ROM 9:21 Un'boom, kà wà mfum a tɔm ande anki mukyer a twar nsil alan, làbuuŋ a ibyääl, itàkal làbuuŋ a isal a bunàbun?
ROM 9:22 Ngye ininà atɛn, isàkal naa Nzam akwen mutwey nkyɛl ande anà muswaŋ ngwal ande, nde kàkyer asɛn buur anà nkääŋ a mpem mbɔɔn an'buuŋ a nkyɛl balɔ̈ɔ̈n ntɔn ukwà,
ROM 9:23 ayi yà ntɔn nde mumɛɛy un'naaŋ a làkoo ande akà an'buuŋ a un'naaŋ ande kusà a an'buuŋ a nsyääm kàlɔ̈ɔ̈n nde kusà ntɔn làkoo.
ROM 9:24 Bi ibà baar kàbel nde, kà nà uboo Ayudà mpɛl anki, wɛɛ sye uboo a baar mpa abà Ayudà.
ROM 9:25 Asànaa, un'kaan a Ɔzɛ utɛɛnà wa naa: Awà mpa kàkäl un'sɛŋ amɛ, mɛ in'sun'beelà un'sɛŋ amɛ, awà mpa kàkäl nkween amɛ, mɛ in'sun'beelà nkwen amɛ.
ROM 9:26 Ikal akyä bàtɛɛnà a ba naa: « Bɛ kà làbà un'sɛŋ amɛ anki », ba bàsabeelà baan a Nzam a mɔ̈ɔ̈.
ROM 9:27 Yɛsay, u mper yànde, kàsi un'kwɛŋ ntɔn Isàlɛl: « Itàkal naa baan a Isàlɛl bàkäl asànaa ansɛŋ a ngyäl a kölàköl, baar ikikye bàsàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
ROM 9:28 Ntɔn Mwol asàkwey Ndaa ande yanswà làgyägyä u mɛɛn. »
ROM 9:29 Yɛsay awà kàtàtà ngɔɔm kusà naa: « Isàkal naa Mwol a aŋità kàsiwɛy anki ikyee, abà bi kàkyàbulà asànaa Sɔdɔm, bi kàlàkal balàbal asànaa Gɔmɔr. »
ROM 9:30 Apanà, ininà bi ifàtɛn? Ayi: baar mpa abà Ayudà, mpa bàleŋà mubulà bàbalàbal, bàkyàwal balàbal lan'fà u làkwikilà,
ROM 9:31 kyekà Isàlɛl awà kàleŋà un'kɔɔn ntɔn mubulà balàbal, kàsàman anki la.
ROM 9:32 Ntɔn nkye? Ntɔn balàbal alà ba la bàyadilà anki unsà làkwikilà, wɛɛ ba bàsii naa ba la bàsawal unsà isal. Ba bàyàböl akà « un'kul awà afàbwiy »,
ROM 9:33 abun, bàsön naa: « Le, mɛ kan'tɔɔl u Siyɔnà un'kul afàbwiy, nkɔŋ ifàbwiy. Wɛɛ mbuur afàsà làkwikilà amu Nde usàman anki nswɛn. »
ROM 10:1 Atɔŋ, un'lään awà u mpem amɛ anà ngyamàkà amɛ akà Nzam ntɔn ba, yà naa ba bàwü mɔ̈ɔ̈.
ROM 10:2 Ntɔn, mɛ in'wà mbäl, ba bye anà uyɔl akà Nzam, wɛɛ kà uyɔl abàkapaa pɛɛlà anki u ngyööb.
ROM 10:3 Mudiimà balàbal làfàfà akà Nzam anà muleŋ musà là ba ŋakwo, ba bàfàkal anki ungyɛl a balàbal a Nzam.
ROM 10:4 Ntɔn ntsüü a un'kɔɔn yà Klistɔ, ntɔn bàpɛ balàbal akà mbuur wanswà awe anà làkwikilà.
ROM 10:5 Nde ŋakwo Mɔsɛ kàsön ntɔn balàbal lan'fà akà un'kɔɔn naa: « Mbuur asàkwey nswɛɛŋ ayi, asàkal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ u mbwo a ya. »
ROM 10:6 Wɛɛ, balàbal làfàfà unsà làkwikilà làtɛn abà: « Twon an'tɛn u mpem angye naa: "Nà asàbeenà du?" » Apɛy yà mutyeey Klistɔ.
ROM 10:7 Itàkal naa: « Nà asàtyà kà un'baan? Nkye apɛy yà mumbaar Klistɔ uboo a akü? »
ROM 10:8 Wɛɛ wa atɛɛnà aben? « Tsütsü apà ngye, yà ndaa, u mun anà u mpem angye. » Ndaa ayi, yà ndaa a làkwikilà alà ipay bi làsaŋ.
ROM 10:9 Isàkal naa u mun angye, ngye afàtà imbäl naa Yɛsu wà Mwol, isàkal naa u mpem angye, ngye awe anà làkwikilà naa Nzam kun'wiiy kà ukwà, ngye asàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
ROM 10:10 Kyakin, làkwikilà làfàbuul baar balàbal làfàfà u mpem, anà imbäl aki ifàwiiy baar mɔ̈ɔ̈ ifàtoo u mun.
ROM 10:11 Ntɔn, Ndaa Aŋàsɔn itɛɛnà naa: « Mbuur usàsà làkwikilà amu Nde, bàsun'mɛɛy anki nswɛn. »
ROM 10:12 Abun, nsöön yatɛy uboo Ayudà anà Angɛlɛki: ba banswà bà Mwol mwɛy, awà afàpà indiir ande akà baar banswà bàfun'bel.
ROM 10:13 Abun, mbuur asàbel ikɔb a Mwol akyer asàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
ROM 10:14 Wɛɛ, ba bàyun'bel aben isàkal naa làkwikilà amu nde latɛy? Ba làkwikilà bàyàsà aben amu nde, isàkal naa ba bàŋàtun'wem anki? Ba bàyun'wem aben isàkal naa mbuur ŋàtalɔŋ anki?
ROM 10:15 Wɛɛ ba bàyàlɔŋ aben, isàkal naa ba batöm anki? Yumwɛy bàsön ayi: « Myà ubwaŋ in'kɔl a baar abà bàfàpay Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ! »
ROM 10:16 Wɛɛ ba banswà bàkyey anki Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ alà.
ROM 10:17 Abun, làkwikilà làfàyà unsà ndaa bàfàwem, ngweem ifàfà u mbwo a Ndaa a Klistɔ.
ROM 10:18 Apan, mɛ in'fuul naa: Nkye ba bàwem anki? Ɛɛ, bàkyàwem! Ntɔn, bàsön naa: « Làböl aba làpää u mɛɛn manswà, ndaa aba yàtöl tii u ntsüü a mɛɛn. »
ROM 10:19 Abun, mɛ in'fuul naa: Aben, baar a Isàlɛl bàyöb anki? Utàtwɛb Mɔsɛ kàtɛn naa: « Mɛ in'yàsɛɛn un'kɔ̈l abɛ akà undiir mpa awà un'sɛŋ, mɛ in'yàmbaar nkyɛl abɛ akà un'sɛŋ akɔ̈ɔ̈n un'yɛnà. »
ROM 10:20 Yɛsay kan'kyà kwɛl mutɛn naa: « Mɛ bàmàkan'man akà baar mpa bàyan'leŋà, mɛ kàkàmɛɛy akà baar mpa ban'lɔ̈ɔ̈mà akà undiir mwɛy. »
ROM 10:21 Wɛɛ ntɔn Isàlɛl, Nde kàtɛn naa: « Ilä aŋukiinà mɛ an'lɛɛ an'kɔɔ akà un'sɛŋ aŋunkwem anà wàŋun'tswe ngwal. »
ROM 11:1 Abun, mɛ in'fuul naa: Nkye Nzam kàpiy un'sɛŋ ande? Akà ikikye! Ntɔn mɛ ŋàkwo iwà un'nsi Isàlɛl, itoo a Abàlam, uboo a ywar a Bɛnsàmɛn.
ROM 11:2 Nzam kàpiy anki baar ande kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l nde itaan. Imɛnà naa bɛ làkayöbà anki naa Ndaa Aŋàsɔn nkye itɛɛnà, u mbwo aya kàsi Elya tär ntɔn Isàlɛl a Nzam:
ROM 11:3 « Mwol, ba bàkyer adwa aŋangɔɔm angye, bàpay mɛsà a ibɔɔn angye, mɛ kàsàsal mɛ mpɛl, anà ba bàkwen mukan'dwa sye! »
ROM 11:4 Wɛɛ, Nzam kàmun'fuur aben? « Mɛ kàyee ntɔn mɛ baar nsaab nsàmbwar yà abaal, baar mpa bàsàbwà kà an'bwaŋ kusà a Baal. »
ROM 11:5 Yà balàbal utaaŋ alà, ban'saal baar ikikye kan'sɔɔl Nzam unsà kab a ngway ande.
ROM 11:6 Wɛɛ, isàkal naa unsà kab a ngway, kà unsà isal anki, iswaŋà naa kab a ngway kà là kab a ngway anki.
ROM 11:7 Apanà, bi ifàtɛn aben? Undiir ulɛŋà Isàlɛl, nde wa ŋàtàkaar anki, wɛɛ baar bàsɔ̈ɔ̈l bàkyer akaar wa, wɛɛ akà bumwɛy, mpem aba yàbulà bwoor,
ROM 11:8 asànaa bàsön ya naa: « Nzam kàpɛ dweelà a bɔɔmà, mii ntɔn ukɔɔn aman, an'tsü ntɔn ukɔɔn awem, tii ŋàbà. »
ROM 11:9 David waa kàtɛn sye naa: « Wɛy mɛsà aba ibulà untaam anà an'tɛy ntɔn ba, ntɔn mbwaeel anà ntaaŋàmbar ntɔn ba!
ROM 11:10 Wɛy mii aba ibü mpib, tii mpal bàyàfàman ba. Abɔ̈ɔ̈là müm ipepey. »
ROM 11:11 Waa mɛ in'fuulà naa: nkye ntɔn mbweel ipepey, waa ba bàsɛlà? Kà ndandaa anki! Wɛɛ ntɔn ibii aba, waa Nzam kàpɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ akà baar mpa abà Ayudà, ntɔn musɛn un'köl a Isàlɛl.
ROM 11:12 Kyekà, isàkal naa ibii aba byàpɛ un'naaŋ u mɛɛn, anà ntyeey aba un'naaŋ a baar mpa abà Ayudà, abun nsuub aba yàŋàkwo iyàtwaal un'naaŋ a nkye ifà?
ROM 11:13 Mɛ amàlakyään, ntɔn bɛ baar mpa làbà Ayudà: in'wà mɛ paa, mɛ, ntööm a baar mpa abà Ayudà, mɛ in'fàpà làkoo kà isal amɛ
ROM 11:14 unsà làkyän musɛn un'köl. Mɛ in'sii naa mɛ in'yàsɛɛn un'köl a atɔŋ amɛ unsà ndür ntɔn mutswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a ndam a baar uboo a ba.
ROM 11:15 Ntɔn, isàkal naa nsyeel a ba ukɔl yàfuur un'tüüb a Nzam anà mɛɛn, mfurà aba iyàkal aben? Ya isàkal asànaa mfurà a baar fà ukwà tii u mɔ̈ɔ̈.
ROM 11:16 Kyekà, isàkal naa kab atàtwɛb là in'kyɛɛl, mfwar yanswà iyàkal in'kyɛɛl, isàkal naa un'swɛy wà in'kyɛɛl, an'kɔkà màyàkal mà in'kyɛɛl.
ROM 11:17 Wɛɛ isàkal naa an'kɔkà mamwɛy bàkyàtsuul, wɛɛ ngye, un'te a ɔlive a ndwaŋ, ngye bakön uboo a an'kɔkà màsàsal kà un'te a ɔlivɛ ntɔn badii anà ma u mbwo a un'swɛy mwɛy anà u mbwo a inɔ̈ mwɛy kya,
ROM 11:18 twon an'swaŋ ngaal kusà a an'kɔkà amàŋàtsul. Ngye an'kwo aswɛŋ ngaal, wɛɛ kà ngye anki asɛɛnà un'swɛy, wɛɛ un'swɛy akasɛɛnà.
ROM 11:19 Apan, ngye ayàtɛn naa: « An'kɔkà bàtsül ma ntɔn mɛ ban'kön. »
ROM 11:20 Ye abwɛy. Bàtsül ba ma ntɔn bwoor a mpem a ba. Wɛɛ ngye, unsà làkwikilà waa ngye awà paa. Twon an'sɛn an'pɛy, wɛɛ kal kà igyɛɛŋ.
ROM 11:21 Ntɔn, isàkal naa Nzam kàtii anki an'kɔkà màfàtoo ma ŋakwo, kal kà igyɛɛŋ, manà nde ukɔ̈ɔ̈n asatii, akà ikikye!
ROM 11:22 Ler ubwaŋ anà nsyeel a mii a Nzam: nsyeel a mii akà baar abà bàbü, ubwaŋ akà ngye, isàkal naa ngye awà mulalà uboo a ubwaŋ ba, naa tɛy, ngye sye bàkyer asalwom.
ROM 11:23 Wɛɛ akà ba, isàkal naa ba ban'wɛy bwoor a mpem aba, ba bàkyer asakɔn, ba sye, ntɔn Nzam we anà ikɔ̈b mukakɔn mbalà asin.
ROM 11:24 Abun, isàkal naa ngye, ngye kàlwomà unsà un'te a olivɛ a ndwaŋ awà katwey wa ŋakwo, waa bakön unsà un'te a ɔlive a boo a bul, itàkal naa kà wa anki katwey, ntɔn nkye mpa bàfuur kà un'te a ɔlive a boo a bul an'kɔkà amà kàtwey nde ŋakwo?
ROM 11:25 Ntɔn mɛ inkwen anki, atɔŋ, naa bɛ làkɔ̈ɔ̈n ayöb ngyee ayi, manà bɛ làyamɛnà naa bɛ làbà aŋan'yeerà: ndam a baar a Isàlɛl, mpem aba isàkal yàŋàbwà bwoor mbɔɔn tii mpal bàsàbilà baar mpa abà Ayudà banswà uboo a un'sɛŋ a Nzam.
ROM 11:26 Apan, Isàlɛl kyanswà isàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈, asànaa bàsön ya naa: « Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ asàtoo u Siyɔnà, nde asàlwom ube a Yakɔb.
ROM 11:27 Ya isàkal nkwà amɛ anà ba, mpal in'sàlwom mɛ man'be aba. »
ROM 11:28 Ntɔn Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ, ba bà ayiiŋ a Nzam, ntɔn ubwaŋ abɛ, wɛɛ, ntɔn nsɔ̈ɔ̈l a Nzam, ba bànkween ntɔn bànkaa aba.
ROM 11:29 Ntɔn, Nzam ufàduum anki kab a ngway ufàpà nde, nde ufàsɔɔm anki mbeel ande.
ROM 11:30 Abun sye, itaan, bɛ Nzam lun'kyeyà anki, apanà, ntɔn unkwem aba, bɛ bàkyàlasyääm,
ROM 11:31 abun, ukɔɔn unkyeey aba apanà kan'kyer naa Nzam kisyääm, anà nde usyääm sye ba banswà.
ROM 11:32 Ntɔn, Nzam kàbäm baar banswà uboo a unkwem ntɔn musyääm ba banswà.
ROM 11:33 Ɔɔ, indübà a un'naaŋ, a an'yeerà anà a un'yɛnà a Nzam! Ntsüül a mbar ande ufàgyool anki, mbwo ande ufàkul anki!
ROM 11:34 Asànaa itɛɛnà Ndaa Aŋàsɔn: « Nà kàyöb an'kyän a Mwol? Itàkal naa nà kan'kwo mukal un'pɛɛl a an'lwɛŋ ande?
ROM 11:35 Itàkal naa nà kàtun'pà undiir waa nde kàfun'lɔ̈ɔ̈m mfüür awa? »
ROM 11:36 Ntɔn undiir wanswà afü akà nde, u mbwo a nde, ntɔn nde. Akà nde làkoo a mbul a in'tye! Yà abwɛy.
ROM 12:1 Atɔŋ, mɛ amàlalɔɔm, kikɔb a nsyääm a Nzam, làkäb ndür abɛ asànaa ibɔɔn a mɔ̈ɔ̈, kyà in'kyɛɛl anà kyàmupà Nzam un'sak: kya isàkal ngyamàkà a ndandaa ntɔn bɛ.
ROM 12:2 Twon lan'lab nsyääl a mɛɛn a mpal ayi, wɛɛ làkäl bàŋàbulà u nsɔɔmà a un'yɛnà ntɔn musà nsɔ̈ɔ̈l unsà ukwen a Nzam: undiir aŋàbwaŋ afàpà nde un'sak anà wàŋàkwo.
ROM 12:3 U mbwo a kab a ngway alà ban'pɛ, mɛ in'tɛn akà umwɛy umwɛy uboo a bɛ: twon lan'kal anà uyɔl aŋàsöönà anà uyɔl tii unsà undiir ayɔbà, làyɔbà mbɔɔn ntɔn mutɔn uyɔl, umwɛy ntɔn isii a làkwikilà alà kun'pɛ Nzam.
ROM 12:4 Asànaa bi ibà itiir mbɔɔn unsà ndür mwɛy, wɛɛ itiir abi byanswà kà byà isal imwɛy anki.
ROM 12:5 Kyakin, itàkal naa bi ibà mbɔɔn, bi ibà ndür mwɛy unsà Klistɔ, ntɔn bi ibàŋàtüüb amwɛy anà bumwɛy, asànaa itiir a ndür mwɛy.
ROM 12:6 Bi ibye anà an'kab mànsöön, mulab kab a ngway alà bipɛ, nkye la là kab a ngɔɔm? Wɛy bàsyääl la unsà un'tüüb anà làkwikilà.
ROM 12:7 Nà awe anà kab a isal? Wɛy nde upɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande unsà isal. Umwɛy usàkal anà kab alɔŋ, wɛy nde ulɔŋ.
ROM 12:8 Nkye wumwɛy we alà làlɛɛl? Wɛy nde ulɛɛl. Wɛy mbuur afàpà, upɛ ukɔɔn asà un'tal, mbuur asyen, ukyer anà un'kanà, mbuur afàsyääm, ukyer unsà un'sak.
ROM 12:9 Wɛy ukwen abɛ bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n akal bà mpem ywel. Làsi làyiiŋ akà ube, làbääb anà ubwaŋ:
ROM 12:10 - ntɔn ukwen a itɔŋ, làkäl anà ukwen mbɔɔn bɛ a bɛ, - ntɔn ibyääl, làkäl bàtàtwɛb musyäŋà baar asin,
ROM 12:11 - ntɔn isal a Mwol, làkäl ngwal unsà Dweelà, lun'syääl asànaa asɔ,
ROM 12:12 - ntɔn làkyän, làkäl unsà un'sak, - ntɔn mpay, làkäl anà nkääŋ a mpem, làsi muküünà u ngyamàkà
ROM 12:13 - ntɔn ngyal a aŋin'kyɛɛl, labay, làkäl anà un'kaay.
ROM 12:14 Làsaak baar abà bàfàlamɛɛy nkwaaŋ: lasaak, twon lasi in'küül.
ROM 12:15 Làsäŋ anà baar abà unsà un'sak, làlel anà baar bàlelà.
ROM 12:16 Làkäl anà un'tüüb a ngwal bɛ a bɛ: twon lan'kal anà ngyal a indiir an'köl an'köl, wɛɛ, wɛy bàlasyeen akà indiir a làbɔ̈ɔ̈n. Twon lan'kyey uyɔl naa bɛ làbà aŋan'yeerà.
ROM 12:17 Akà mbuur mwɛy, twon lan'fuur ube kà ikal a ube. Taaŋ lanswà, làleŋ mukyer ubwaŋ kusà a baar banswà.
ROM 12:18 Kya ipöl isàkal, naa ba ukwen abɛ, làkäl a duu anà baar banswà.
ROM 12:19 Nkween amɛ, twon lan'fuur bɛ ŋakwo ube akà ube, wɛɛ làwɛy nkyɛl a Nzam isäl, ntɔn bàsön naa: « Mwol kàtɛn naa: "Mfuur a ube yà yàmɛ, mɛ kan'kwo mufur nsyääl a umwɛy umwɛy.
ROM 12:20 Wɛɛ isàkal naa un'yiiŋ a ngye we anà ngyal, un'pɛ udyà, isàkal naa nde we anà mfyää, un'pɛ unwà. Ntɔn ngye asàkyer abun, ya yà asànaa an'kal a mbaa ngye akasaa udu a un'tswe ande." »
ROM 12:21 Abun, twon an'wɛy naa ube bàwɛl iböŋ udu a ngye, wɛɛ kal wàŋàböŋ kusà a ube mukyer ubwaŋ.
ROM 13:1 Wɛy mbuur wanswà ukäl anà unkyeey akà amfum abye anà ikɔ̈b, ntɔn, kà kye anà ikɔ̈b anki ikɔ̈ɔ̈n afà akà Nzam anà kàkɔ̈ɔ̈n asà Nde.
ROM 13:2 Abun, mbuur afàmbäär ikɔ̈b, nde afàmbäär nswɛɛŋ kàkwen Nzam. Baar bàfàmbäär ya, bàsànaan ntaaŋàmbar udu a ba ŋakwo.
ROM 13:3 Apan, antɛɛn kà baar awem bɔɔmà anki akà baar bàfàkyer ubwaŋ, wɛɛ akà baar bàfàkyer ube. Nkye ngye akwen mukɔɔn awem ntɛɛn bɔɔmà? Kyer ubwaŋ, waa nde kasyäŋà.
ROM 13:4 Ntɔn, nde wà un'syääl a Nzam ntɔn mukasiinà mukyer ubwaŋ. Wɛɛ, isàkal naa ngye afàkyer ube, apan, man bɔɔmà! Ntɔn, kà bunàbun anki awà nde anà kɔm mupà ntaaŋàmbar: nde wà un'syääl a Nzam ntɔn muswaŋ nkyɛl ande akà mbuur un'be.
ROM 13:5 Kyakin, yubwaŋ mukal anà unkyeey, kà nà ntɔn bɔɔmà a nkyɛl mpɛl anki, wɛɛ sye, ntɔn an'kyän.
ROM 13:6 Kyakin sye làfàfur bɛ iter, ntɔn baar bàfàwal bya, ba bà uboo a isal a Nzam ntɔn mukwey kya ubwaŋàbwaŋ.
ROM 13:7 Làpɛ akà mbuur mbuur undiir awà ilɔɔmà mukun'pà: itɛr, akà mbuur awal itɛr, ibaa, akà mbuur awal ibaa, bɔɔmà, akà mbuur awal bɔɔmà, làbɔ̈ɔ̈n, akà mbuur awal làbɔ̈ɔ̈n, ibyääl, akà mbuur awal ibyääl.
ROM 13:8 Twon lan'kal anà nkul a mbuur, naa tɛy, nkul abɛ, yà mukwen amwɛy anà bumwɛy. Ntɔn mbuur afàkwen mbuur wumwɛy, nde kan'kwey un'kɔɔn.
ROM 13:9 Apan, nswɛɛŋ asànaa: « Twon an'tà inswem, twon an'dwa, twon an'yib, twon an'yɔm mpem », anà yumwɛy yanswà, yan'bilà unsà ndaa yi: « Ngye asàkwen un'tɔŋ angye asànaa ngye ŋakwo. »
ROM 13:10 Ukwen bàfàkyer anki akà ube mwɛy akà un'tɔŋ. Ukwen, yà mukwey un'kɔɔn wanswà.
ROM 13:11 Làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ muyöb naa bi ibà mpal nà: làwiyà u twaal abɛ. Ntɔn ŋàbawà, ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈ yà tsütsü apà bi, akwànaa utaaŋ kàsɛmà bi musà làkwikilà.
ROM 13:12 Mpib yàbü itaan, mwäänà wà tsütsü. Lalan, bi ipiy isal a làpib, bi ibwaar an'tà a pɛɛlà.
ROM 13:13 Wɛy bi iyikyà a swalaa, asànaa u mwäänà answà, ukɔɔn in'kyɔm aŋàsöönà anà ngyöör a man, ukɔɔn ndaa a nswɛn anà ipasàsɛ, ukɔɔn an'sye anà un'köl.
ROM 13:14 Wɛɛ làbwäär Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ, twon lan'pà mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ unsà ndür ntɔn mupà un'sak akà ilään aya.
ROM 14:1 Lun'wɛl mbuur awe anà gyɔ̈ɔ̈là unsà làkwikilà, twon lan'ler an'kyän ande pànsi pànsi.
ROM 14:2 Làkwikilà a mbuur mwɛy lun'paa mbwo mudyà undiir wanswà, wɛɛ wumwɛy, u mbwo a gyɔ̈ɔ̈là, afàdyà ndon mpɛl.
ROM 14:3 Wɛy mbuur afàdyà, ukɔɔn adyà un'siinà mbuur mpa afàdyà anà mbuur mpa afàdyà ukɔɔn atsüül mbuur afàdyà nsaŋ, ntɔn Nzam kàkyun'wal.
ROM 14:4 Ngye, ngye awà nà mutsüül un'syääl abar nsaŋ? Itàkal naa nde wàŋàtsim, itàkal naa nde wàŋàbwà, ntɔn Mwol we anà ikɔ̈b mukun'mbaar.
ROM 14:5 Akà mbuur umwɛy, ye anà nsöön uboo a ilä. Akà wumwɛy, bya byanswà byà mfun. Wɛy mbuur mbuur, amu an'kyän ande ŋakwo, ukäl aŋàsà kam.
ROM 14:6 Mbuur afàsà ilä un'tal, nde afàkyer ntɔn Mwol. Mbuur afàdyà indiir byanswà, nde afàkyer ntɔn Mwol, nde afàfuur an'tɔɔn akà Nzam. Mbuur mpa afàdyà bya byanswà afàfuur an'tɔɔn sye akà Nzam.
ROM 14:7 Kyakin, kà we anà umwey anki uboo a bi afàkal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ntɔn nde mpɛl, kà umwey anki sye afàkwà ntɔn nde ŋakwo.
ROM 14:8 Ntɔn, isàkal naa bi ibye anà mɔ̈ɔ̈, bi ibà ntɔn Mwol. Isàkal naa bi kan'kwà, bi kan'kwà ntɔn Mwol. Lalan, itàkal naa bi ibye anà mɔ̈ɔ̈, itàkal naa bi kan'kwà, bi ibà ntɔn Mwol.
ROM 14:9 Lalan, ntɔn mukal Mwol a akü anà wà baar a mɔ̈ɔ̈ waa Klistɔ kàkü anà kàfyefurà u mɔ̈ɔ̈.
ROM 14:10 Wɛɛ ngye, ntɔn nkye atsüülà ngye un'tɔŋ angye nsaŋ? Abun, bi banswà isàkal kusà a làbay a nsaŋ a Nzam.
ROM 14:11 Asànaa kàtɛn Mwol: « Mɛ, Mwol in'wà anà mɔ̈ɔ̈, an'kyey naa: baar banswà bàsyebwà an'köm kusà amɛ, ba banswà bàsàsyäŋà Nzam. »
ROM 14:12 Abun, mbuur mbuur uboo a bi asàkyer asà un'lɔɔn akà Nzam ntɔn nde ŋakwo.
ROM 14:13 Bi ikyer awɛy mutsuul nsaŋ bamwɛy anà bumwey, wɛɛ làkyer naa bɛ làkɔ̈ɔ̈n akal isin a mbweel a un'tɔŋ.
ROM 14:14 Akà mɛ, mɛ in'kyàyöb, mɛ an'sà kam unsà Mwol Yɛsu naa: undiir a ŋingyäy watɛy. Wɛɛ undiir a ŋingyäy wà akà mbuur awà kan'kyey naa wa wà abun.
ROM 14:15 Isàkal naa un'tɔŋ angye kan'man ngyɛb ntɔn isaa an'dyà ngye, ngye afàkal anki uboo a ukwen. U mbwo a isaa angye, twon an'bwiy mbuur awà kàkweel Yɛsu.
ROM 14:16 Wɛy undiir aŋàbwaŋ ntɔn bɛ ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akal ntɔn mutwee bɛ.
ROM 14:17 Ntɔn, Imwol a Nzam kà kyà udyà anà unwà anki, wɛɛ balàbal, duu anà un'sak amu Dweelà In'kyɛɛl.
ROM 14:18 Mbuur ufàsyääl Klistɔ abà, asànaa un'sɔ, Nzam akyer afun'kyey, baar bàkyer afun'kwen.
ROM 14:19 Lalan, bi ilab indiir byàfàpà duu anà indiir byàfàtɔŋ itɔŋ.
ROM 14:20 Twon an'dwa isal a Nzam ntɔn isaa. Ndandaa, indiir byanswà byàŋàpɔŋà, wɛɛ yà ube mudyà undiir kan'kwo mukal kyà ntɔn un'tɔŋ.
ROM 14:21 Yubwaŋ mukɔɔn adyà in'twaŋ, itàkal unwà man bàfàyɔr, itàkal undiir asin kan'kwo mubwiy un'tɔŋ angye.
ROM 14:22 Kaar ntɔn ngye, kusà a Nzam, làkwikilà awà ngye alà. Un'sak akà mbuur mpa afàtsüül nsaŋ nde ŋakwo ntɔn nsɔ̈ɔ̈l ande ufàsyääl nde.
ROM 14:23 Wɛɛ mbuur akadyaa anà nkyɛɛr, nde wàŋàkwà ndwà, ntɔn nkääl ande kà yan'fà anki u nsyeel a kam ande unsà làkwikilà. Kyekà, undiir wanswà mpa afàfà u nsyeel a kam unsà làkwikilà wà man'be.
ROM 15:1 Bi baar ibà ngwal, bi ikyer asɛɛn gyɔ̈ɔ̈là a baar mpa abà ngwal anà mukɔɔn aleŋ ubwaŋ abi ŋakwo.
ROM 15:2 Wɛy mbuur mbuur uboo a bi uleŋ mupà un'sak akà un'tɔŋ ande ntɔn mukun'bay muyɛl unsà làkwikilà.
ROM 15:3 Lalan, Klistɔ kàleŋ anki indiir byàpɛɛ nde un'sak, wɛɛ, asànaa bàsön naa: « In'tswe a abweel in'tswe angye myàkyàbwà udu a mɛ. »
ROM 15:4 Kyekà, indiir byanswà bàsön kusà byàkäl ntɔn an'lɔɔŋ abi, ntɔn naa, u mbwo a muküünà anà ndɛɛl yàtwääl Ndaa Aŋàsɔn, bi ikäl anà làkyän.
ROM 15:5 Wɛy Nzam a muküünà anà ndɛɛl, kàlapɛ mukal un'tüüb uboo a bɛ, asànaa ukwen Klistɔ Yɛsu,
ROM 15:6 ntɔn, u mpem mwɛy anà u mun mwɛy, bɛ làsi làkoo akà Nzam, Taar a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ.
ROM 15:7 Làkäl anà un'kaay bɛ a bɛ, asànaa Klistɔ kàlawɛl nde, ntɔn làkoo a Nzam.
ROM 15:8 Abun, mɛ alàkyään naa, kà ikɔb a lää a Nzam waa Klistɔ kàbulà un'syääl a baar aŋàkyɛy, ntɔn mukwey ilää kàpɛ nde akà bàtaa.
ROM 15:9 Akà baar mpa abà Ayudà, ba bàfàpà Nzam làkoo ntɔn nsyääm ande, asànaa bàsön naa: « Kyakin, mɛ in'sasyäŋà uboo a in'sɛŋ a baar mpa abà Ayudà, mɛ in'sàtɔɔl diim ntɔn ikɔb angye. »
ROM 15:10 Nde kàfàtɛn naa: « In'sɛŋ a mpa abà Ayudà, làsäŋ anà un'sɛŋ ande! »
ROM 15:11 Itàkal sye: « In'sɛŋ a mpa abà Ayudà, bɛ banswà làsyäŋà Mwol, in'sɛŋ myanswà lun'syäŋà! »
ROM 15:12 Yɛsay kàfàtɛn naa: « Kà itoo a Zesɛ, mbuur akyer asàyà, nde akyer asàmbarà ntɔn muyaal in'sɛŋ a baar mpa abà Ayudà. Baar mpa abà Ayudà bàsàsà làkyän amu nde. »
ROM 15:13 Wɛy Nzam a làkyän kàlayööl a un'sak wanswà anà duu unsà làkwikilà, ntɔn bɛ làkäl anà làkyän aŋàsöönà u ngwal a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl!
ROM 15:14 Ntɔn bɛ, atɔŋ amɛ, mɛ an'kyey ndandaa naa bɛ làbà bɛ ŋakwo làŋàyɔl a ubwaŋ, làŋàyɔl a un'yɛnà wanswà anà lan'kwo mupà an'lwɛŋ bɛ a bɛ.
ROM 15:15 Apan, ntɔn mufàbay an'kyän abɛ mbaa, mɛ amàlasöön anà unkir kà ikal byumwɛy, ntɔn kab a ngway kan'pɛ Nzam
ROM 15:16 mukal un'syääl a Yɛsu Klistɔ apà baar mpa abà Ayudà, mupà mɔ̈ɔ̈ amɛ wanswà kà isal a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là Nzam, ntɔn naa baar mpa abà Ayudà bàbulà an'kab kàkyey Nzam, màŋàkyɛɛl amu Dweelà In'kyɛɛl.
ROM 15:17 Lalan, mɛ in'we anà ngaal amɛ amu Klistɔ Yɛsu ntɔn isal a Nzam.
ROM 15:18 Ntɔn, isàkal naa mɛ in'we anà undiir atɛn, mɛ in'tɛn nà indiir kàkyer Klistɔ u mbwo amɛ ntɔn musyen baar mpa abà Ayudà kà unkyeey: amu ndaa anà amu isal,
ROM 15:19 unsà ngwal a idiim anà impà, unsà ngwal a Dweelà a Nzam. Apan, sɛmà Yɛlusàlɛm anà ikal a tsütsü tii u Iliri, mɛ kàkyään aŋàkwo Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là Klistɔ.
ROM 15:20 Wɛɛ mɛ kàsi ibyääl mukyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ nà kà ikal mpa bàkäl aŋàtàtà ikɔb a Klistɔ din, ntɔn mukɔɔn atɔŋ udu a in'bään kàsi mbuur asin.
ROM 15:21 Kyakin mɛ in'lab ndaa bàsön naa: « Baar mpa bakyään ntɔn Nde, bàkyer asàman, ba akwà mpa bàkäl aŋàtàwem musam ntɔn Nde, bàkyer asàyöb. »
ROM 15:22 Undiir nsil awun kan'tsüŋà mbalà mbɔɔn muyà akà bɛ.
ROM 15:23 Wɛɛ apan, mɛ in'fàkal anki anà ikal asal ntsü ayi akà, anà, sɛmà mbul mbɔɔn, mɛ in'we anà ngyal mbɔɔn muyà akà bɛ,
ROM 15:24 umpal in'yàkyà mɛ Ɛspanye. Mɛ an'sà làkyän muyàlaler utaaŋ in'yàlyaaŋ mɛ anà bɛ mukan'bay mukyà kwo, ungö atàyɔl a un'sak, itàkal ikikye, mukal anà bɛ.
ROM 15:25 Wɛɛ apanà, mɛ in'wàmukyà Yɛlusàlɛm ntɔn musyääl aŋin'kyɛɛl.
ROM 15:26 Ntɔn, Masɛdwan anà Akayi bàtsül mbar muköŋà indiir, ntɔn mubay aŋàlàmbwà abà uboo a aŋikyɛɛl a Yɛlusàlɛm.
ROM 15:27 Inye, ba ŋakwo bàtsül abun, wɛɛ, kutɛn aŋàbwaŋ ba bàlàkyer abun. Ntɔn, isàkal naa baar mpa abà Ayudà bàwɛl kab unsà indiir in'kyɛɛl aba, ba sye bàkyer afasyääl unsà indiir a ngyal aba.
ROM 15:28 Umpal in'sàkal mɛ aŋàmay anà aŋàpà kà imɛɛy indiir ban'bwiy, mɛ in'yàkyà Ɛspanye, muyàlyaaŋ apà bɛ.
ROM 15:29 Mɛ in'kyàyöb naa muyà akà bɛ, mɛ in'yàyà aŋàyɔl a nsaak a Klistɔ.
ROM 15:30 Mɛ in'lɔm akà bɛ, atɔŋ, akà Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ anà u mbwo a ukwen a Dweelà, munwan un'tüüb anà mɛ u mbwo a ngyamàkà làsaa bɛ akà Nzam ntɔn mɛ,
ROM 15:31 ntɔn mɛ in'kɔ̈ɔ̈n akwɛlà akà baar a Yuday bà mpem bwoor bà, ntɔn mbaay in'syen mɛ u Yɛlusàlɛm, aŋikyɛɛl bàwɛl ya ubwaŋàbwaŋ.
ROM 15:32 Abun, mɛ in'yàkɔlà apà bɛ unsà un'sak, kà ukwen a Nzam, anà muyöör anà bɛ.
ROM 15:33 Wɛy Nzam a duu ukäl anà bɛ banswà! Yà abwɛy!
ROM 16:1 Mɛ amàlatööm Fɔ̈bɛ, mpääŋ abi, un'syääl a ndwà a Nzam ayà u Sanshrɛs.
ROM 16:2 Lun'wɛl unsà Mwol, asànaa yan'kwo ya akà aŋin'kyɛɛl, lun'bay unsà ndaa yanswà uyàkal nde anà mfun abɛ. Ntɔn nde kàkäl un'yee a baar mbɔɔn anà wà mɛ ŋakwo.
ROM 16:3 Lapɛ Priskà anà Akila mbɔr, mbaay amɛ unsà isal a Yɛsu Klistɔ,
ROM 16:4 ba bàkyer alàkwà ntɔn mukan'tswà mɔ̈ɔ̈. Kà mɛ mpɛl anki kàfuur an'tɔɔn, wɛɛ sye Ikööŋ a baar mpa abà Ayudà.
ROM 16:5 Làpɛ sye Ikööŋ byanswà ifàköŋ u ndwà aba mbɔr. Lun'pɛ nkween amɛ Ɛpɛnɛt mbɔr, mbɛŋ atàtwɛb yà Azi ntɔn Klistɔ.
ROM 16:6 Lun'pɛ Màlye mbɔr, nde kàsäl mbɔɔn ntɔn bɛ.
ROM 16:7 Lapɛ Andrɔnikis anà Yunyas mbɔr, aböör amɛ anà mbaay amɛ yà bɔlokà. Ba bà abyääl uboo a antööm, ba sye bàkäl amu Klistɔ kusà amɛ.
ROM 16:8 Lun'pɛ Ampilayatus mbɔr, mbuur amɛ wàntal uboo a Mwol.
ROM 16:9 Lun'pɛ Lubɛn mbɔr, un'baay abi amu Klistɔ anà nkween amɛ Stakis.
ROM 16:10 Lun'pɛ Apɛlɛ mbɔr, mbuur kàswɛŋ inääm ande amu Klistɔ. Lapɛ baar abà u ndwà a Aristɔbul mbɔr.
ROM 16:11 Lun'pɛ un'böör amɛ Erɔdyɔn mbɔr. Lapɛ baar abà u ndwà a Narsis abà uboo a Mwol mbɔr.
ROM 16:12 Lapɛ Trifɛn anà Trifɔs mbɔr, ba bàmɛn mpay ntɔn Mwol. Lun'pɛ nkween Pɛrsis mbɔr, nde kàdwä ndür unsà isal a Mwol.
ROM 16:13 Lun'pɛ Rufus mbɔr, awà bàsɔ̈ɔ̈l amu Mwol anà ngwän ande awà wàmɛ sye.
ROM 16:14 Làpɛ Asynkrit, Felɛgɔn, Ermɛs, Patrɔbas, Ermas, anà atɔŋ abà anà ba mbɔr.
ROM 16:15 Làpɛ Filɔlɔke anà Zuli, Nɛrɛ anà mpääŋ ande, Ɔlympas anà aŋin'kyɛɛl abà anà ba mbɔr.
ROM 16:16 Làpɛɛlà mbɔr a ndüür in'kyɛɛl bamwɛy anà bumwɛy. Ikööŋ byanswà byà Klistɔ byàmàlapà mbɔr.
ROM 16:17 Mɛ amàlalɔɔm, atɔŋ, mukal kà igyɛɛŋ akà baar bàfàtwaal nkaabà anà bàfàbwiy aŋàlàkwikilà ndwaŋ mutɔn an'lɔɔŋ amà làwɛl bɛ. Làkäl u kwɛl an à ba.
ROM 16:18 Ntɔn baar aban bàfàsyääl anki Klistɔ, Mwol abi, wɛɛ an'bäl aba, anà, unsà ndaa aba yà ntsà anà an'yääm aba mà loor, màfàkur baar a làbɔ̈ɔ̈n.
ROM 16:19 Baar banswà bàkyàyöb unkyeey abɛ. Lalan mɛ in'wà unsà un'sak ntɔn bɛ, wɛɛ mɛ in'kwen naa bɛ làkäl aŋan'yeerà ntɔn ubwaŋ anà ankɔr ntɔn ube.
ROM 16:20 Yan'sal ikikye, Nzam a duu ayàbwanà Satanà ungyɛl a in'kɔl abɛ. Wɛy kab a ngway a Mwol abi Yɛsu làkäl anà bɛ!
ROM 16:21 Tumàtɛ, un'baay amɛ, kàmàlapà mbɔr, anà Lusyus, Yasɔn anà Sɔsipatrɔs, aböör amɛ.
ROM 16:22 Mɛ Tɛrtyus in'sɔnà un'kaan wà, mɛ amàlatööm mbɔr unsà Mwol.
ROM 16:23 Gäyus, mbuur kan'wɛl, anà Ikööŋ kyanswà ifàköŋ u ndwà ande kàmàlapà mbɔr. Erast, mbuur afàkaar ngim a bul lanswà kàmalapà mbɔr, anà un'tɔŋ Kartus.
ROM 16:24 Wɛy kab a ngway a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ làkäl anà bɛ banswà! Wöwö!
ROM 16:25 Bi isyäŋà Nzam! Nde we anà ikɔ̈b mukàlapà ngwal asànaa làlɔɔmà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ in'fàkyään mɛ ntɔn Yɛsu Klistɔ, mulab ngyööb kàwɛl bi u ngyööŋ aŋàyee a Nzam. Ngyööŋ ayi yàkäl yàŋàyee itaan, taaŋ mbɔɔn,
ROM 16:26 wɛɛ apanà, ya bàkyàmɛɛy u pɛɛlà anà u ngyööb a baar mpa abà Ayudà u mbwo a in'kaan a aŋangɔɔm anà mulab nswɛɛŋ a Nzam ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ntsüü. Ya bàkyàswaŋ akà in'sɛŋ myanswà, ntɔn mya myàsi làkwikilà amu Nde anà myun'syääl.
ROM 16:27 Wɛy làkoo làkäl akà Nzam awà Nde mpɛl ŋan'yeerà, u mbwo a Yɛsu Klistɔ, u mbul a in'tye! Wöwö!
1CO 1:1 Pɔl, bun'bel mukal ntööm a Klistɔ Yɛsu, unsà ukwen a Nzam, anà un'tɔŋ abi Sɔstɛn.
1CO 1:2 Akà Ikööŋ a Nzam akyà u Kɔlintɔ, akà baar ban'si an'kɔɔ unsà Klistɔ Yɛsu anà babel mukal aŋikyɛɛl, mbwo mwɛy anà baar banswà bàfàtà ikɔb a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ din, Mwol aba anà wàbi, kà ikal kyanswà,
1CO 1:3 akà bɛ, kab a ngway anà duu byan'fà akà Nzam, Taaràbi, anà akà Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ.
1CO 1:4 Mɛ in'fàfuur an'tɔɔn akà Nzam amɛ taaŋ lanswà ntɔn bɛ, ntɔn kab a ngway a Nzam alà bàlapɛ amu Klistɔ Yɛsu.
1CO 1:5 Ntɔn, bɛ làkäl amu Nde, bàŋàyɔl a in'naaŋ myanswà, amu ndaa yanswà anà amu ngyööb yanswà.
1CO 1:6 Imbäl akyà bàtɛ ntɔn Klistɔ kyàŋàtsim amu bɛ,
1CO 1:7 lalan, akà kab làmwɛy là kab a ngway làlakɔ̈ɔ̈n anki, apaa làyadilà bɛ mɛɛy a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ.
1CO 1:8 Nde sye ayàlapà ngwal tii u ntsüü, ntɔn bɛ làkɔ̈ɔ̈n akal anà an'pɛl kà ilä a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ.
1CO 1:9 Nzam wà wàlää, Nde kàlabel mukal un'tüüb anà Mwan ande Yɛsu Klistɔ, Mwol abi.
1CO 1:10 Atɔŋ, mɛ amàlabɔɔn, kà ikɔb a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ: bɛ banswà làkäl mun mwɛy, nkaabà ikɔ̈ɔ̈n akal uboo a bɛ. Làkäl bàŋàtüüb unsà mpem mwɛy anà unsà an'kyän an'mwɛy.
1CO 1:11 Abun, atɔŋ amɛ, baar a ndwà a Klɔwɛ ban'sam naa bɛ làbye anà an'sye uboo a bɛ.
1CO 1:12 Mɛ in'tɛn naa: umwɛy uboo a bɛ atɛɛnà naa: « Mɛ, mɛ in'wà mbuur a Pɔl. » Wumwɛy naa: « Mɛ in'wà mbuur a Apɔlɔs. » Wumwɛy sye naa: « Mɛ in'wà wà Sɛfas. » Wumwɛy naa: « Mɛ in'wà wà Klistɔ. »
1CO 1:13 Nkye Klistɔ wàŋàkaabà? Nkye Pɔl bun'bɛɛrà u kulunsi ntɔn bɛ? Nkye bɛ ndüümà làwɛl kà ikɔb a Pɔl?
1CO 1:14 Mɛ an'fuur an'tɔɔn akà Nzam naa mɛ kàdümà anki akà mbuur mwɛy uboo a bɛ, nà Krispus anà Gäwus mpɛl.
1CO 1:15 Kyakin, akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki mutɛn naa bàladümà kà ikɔb amɛ.
1CO 1:16 Aa ndandaa, mɛ kàdümà sye ywar a Stɛfanas, mɛ in'manà anki naa mɛ kàfàdümà mbuur asin.
1CO 1:17 Ntɔn Klistɔ kan'töm anki mudümà, wɛɛ mukyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ, ukɔɔn alab an'yeerà a ndaa, ntɔn kulunsi a Klistɔ làkɔ̈ɔ̈n amɛnà undiir a bunàbun.
1CO 1:18 Ntɔn, ndaa a kulunsi yà ukɔŋ akà baar ban'diimà mbwo, wɛɛ akà bi baar ibà u mbwo a ntsweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈, ya yà ngwal a Nzam.
1CO 1:19 Ntɔn bàsön naa: « Mɛ in'yàdwa an'yeerà a aŋayeerà, mɛ in'yàpiy un'yɛnà a aŋun'yɛnà. »
1CO 1:20 Abun, wàken ŋan'yeerà? Wàken un'lɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn? Wàken un'yweer a taaŋ alà? Nkye Nzam kàbuul anki an'yeerà a mɛɛn ukɔŋ?
1CO 1:21 Abun, ntɔn mɛɛn, u mbwo a an'yeerà, màyöb anki Nzam unsà an'yeerà a Nzam, yà unsà ukɔŋ a an'lɔɔŋ waa Nzam kàtsül mutswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a baar abye anà làkwikilà.
1CO 1:22 Ayudà bàlɔɔmà idiim, wɛɛ Angɛlɛki bàleŋà an'yeerà.
1CO 1:23 Wɛɛ bi, bi ifàlɔŋ Klistɔ bàbɛɛrà u kulunsi, isin a mbweel ntɔn Ayudà, ukɔŋ ntɔn baar mpa abà Ayudà.
1CO 1:24 Wɛɛ, akà baar kàbel Nzam, itàkal Ayudà, itàkal Angɛlɛki, Klistɔ wà ngwal a Nzam anà an'yɛɛrà a Nzam.
1CO 1:25 Ntɔn undiir awà ukɔŋ a Nzam wàŋàsöönà an'yeerà a baar, undiir awà gyɔ̈ɔ̈là a Nzam wàŋàsöönà ngwal a baar.
1CO 1:26 Làler, atɔŋ, bɛ làbà bànà, bɛ baar làwɛl mbeel a Nzam: uboo a bɛ, itàkal abyääl mbɔɔn u mii a baar, itàkal aŋangwal mbɔɔn, itàkal baar a ywar aŋàbwaŋ mbɔɔn batɛy.
1CO 1:27 Wɛɛ undiir awà ukɔŋ u mɛɛn, Nzam kun'sɔ̈ɔ̈l ntɔn musà aŋayeerà lingyoomà, undiir a gyɔ̈ɔ̈là u mɛɛn, Nzam kun'sɔ̈ɔ̈l ntɔn musà aŋangwal lingyoomà.
1CO 1:28 Indiir a bunàbun anà ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ndöŋ, indiir ikɔ̈ɔ̈n paa, Nzam kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l bya ntɔn mutyey ntal a indiir abyà paa.
1CO 1:29 Abun, akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki mukyey uyɔl kusà a Nzam.
1CO 1:30 Yà u mbwo a Nde waa bɛ làbà amu Klistɔ Yɛsu, awà kàbulà ntɔn bi an'yeerà màfü akà Nzam, balàbal, un'kyɛɛl anà ntsuuŋà,
1CO 1:31 lalan, asànaa itɛɛnà Ndaa Aŋàsɔn naa: « Mbuur usàkwen muswaŋ ngaal, wɛy nde uswɛŋ ngaal unsà Mwol. »
1CO 2:1 Atɔŋ, mɛ ŋakwo, mpal kàyi mɛ akà bɛ, kà yàkäl anki anà uyɔl a ndaa, itàkal an'yeerà mukàlakyään ngyee a Nzam.
1CO 2:2 Ntɔn mɛ kàtsül mukɔɔn ayöb undiir mwɛy uboo a bɛ, isàkɔɔn akal Yɛsu Klistɔ, anà Yɛsu Klistɔ awà bàbɛɛrà u kulunsi.
1CO 2:3 Lalan kàkäl mɛ sye wàgyɔ̈ɔ̈là anà wàbɔɔmà anà wàŋàtɛɛr kusà a bɛ:
1CO 2:4 ndaa amɛ anà an'lɔɔŋ amɛ màkäl anki anà undiir mwɛy wàntwetweey aŋàsà kam, wɛɛ màkäl muswaŋ isal a ngwal anà kyà Dweelà,
1CO 2:5 ntɔn làkwikilà abɛ làkɔ̈ɔ̈n akal udu a an'yeerà a baar, wɛɛ udu a ngwal a Nzam.
1CO 2:6 Apanà sye, bi ifàlɔŋ an'yeerà mwɛy akà baar aŋàtsim, an'yeerà mpa amà mà mɛɛn mà, itàkal mà ntwasà a mɛɛn mà, abà bàsàyaalà.
1CO 2:7 Wɛɛ, bi ifàlɔŋ an'yeerà a Nzam màŋàyee akà baar, amà kàyöŋà Nzam itaan kusà a nkyeer ntɔn làkoo abi.
1CO 2:8 Akà ntwasà mwɛy wà mɛɛn mà kàyöb anki ma, ntɔn ba bàlàyöb ma, ba Mwol a làkoo bulun'bɛɛrà anki u kulunsi.
1CO 2:9 Wɛɛ, asànaa bàsön ya naa: « Indiir mpa kàmɛn dii anà mpa kàwem tsü, indiir mpa kàyweer mbuur u mpem, indiir kàlɔ̈ɔ̈n Nzam ntɔn baar bàfun'kwen. »
1CO 2:10 Abun, Nzam wa kà imɛɛy u mbwo a Dweelà. Ntɔn Dweelà afàgyool indiir byanswà, itàkal indiir a ngyɛlàngyɛl a Nzam.
1CO 2:11 Nà uboo a baar kan'kwo muyöb indiir abyà uboo a mbuur, naa tɛy dweelà alà uboo ande ŋakwo? Ifà imwɛy sye, indiir abyà amu Nzam, akà mbuur mwɛy uyöb anki, naa tɛy Dweelà a Nzam.
1CO 2:12 Akà bi, bi kàwɛl anki dweelà a mɛɛn, wɛɛ Dweelà afàfà akà Nzam, ntɔn bi iyöb an'kab a kab a ngway a Nzam.
1CO 2:13 Waa bi indiir abi sye ifàtɛn anki unsà ndaa ifàlɔŋ an'yeerà a mbuur, wɛɛ unsà ndaa ufàlɔŋ Dweelà a Nzam, mutɛn indiir a Dweelà unsà ngɔk ufàpà Dweelà.
1CO 2:14 Ntsür a mbuur ufàwal anki indiir ifàfà akà Dweelà a Nzam. Bya byà ukɔŋ ntɔn nde, nde ukwe anki muyöb bya, ntɔn bya bàfàyöb unsà Dweelà.
1CO 2:15 Kyekà, mbuur awe anà Dweelà afàsyeebà indiir byanswà, nde ŋakwo mbuur mwɛy tɛy kan'kwo mukun'syeebà.
1CO 2:16 Ntɔn bàsön naa: « Nà kàyöb an'kyän a Mwol? Nà kan'kwo mukun'pà an'lwɛŋ? » Kyekà bi, bi ibye anà an'kyän a Klistɔ.
1CO 3:1 Akà mɛ, atɔŋ, mɛ in'kwe anki muyäm anà bɛ asànaa akà baar a dweelà, wɛɛ asànaa akà baar a imbuur, asànaa akà baan ambɛy abà amu Klistɔ.
1CO 3:2 Mɛ amàlapà an'bɛɛl munwà, kà isaa a bwoor anki, ntɔn bɛ làlàkwo anki anà bya. Itàkal apanà, bɛ làkwo anki,
1CO 3:3 ntɔn tii lalà bɛ làbà unsà imbuur. Ntɔn uboo a bɛ un'köl anà an'sye mà mwo, nkye nsyääl abɛ kà yà imbuur anki?
1CO 3:4 Mpal ufàtɛn mbuur mwɛy uboo a bɛ naa: « Mɛ in'wà mbuur a Pɔl », wumwɛy naa: « Mɛ in'wà wà Apɔlɔs! », nkye abun bɛ làfàkyer anki unsà imbuur?
1CO 3:5 Abun, Apɔlɔs ininà? Pɔl ininà? Asyääl: u mbwo a ba, bɛ làsi làkwikilà. Umwɛy umwɛy kàkyer asànaa an'kab kun'pɛ Mwol.
1CO 3:6 Mɛ, mɛ kàkön, Apɔlɔs waa kàtsüül an'dà, wɛɛ Nzam kàkyer ngyɛɛl.
1CO 3:7 Kyakin, mbuur afàkɔn anà mbuur afàtsuul an'dà, ba ndöŋ yatɛy, Nzam mpɛl awà ndöŋ, ntɔn Nde afàsà ngyɛɛl.
1CO 3:8 Mbuur afàkɔn anà afàtsuul bà mbwo mwɛy, ntɔn mbuur mbuur asàwal làfur ande unsà isii a isal ande ŋakwo.
1CO 3:9 Ntɔn bi ibà mbaay unsà isal a Nzam anà bɛ làbà ywaŋ ande. Bɛ sye làbà ndwà utɔŋà Nzam.
1CO 3:10 U mbwo a kab a ngway kan'pɛ Nzam, asànaa un'tööŋ aŋàbwaŋ, mɛ kàsi un'bään, mbuur asin an'yàtɔŋ udu a wa. Wɛɛ, wɛy mbuur mbuur ukäl kà igyɛɛŋ unsà ntööŋ ande.
1CO 3:11 Wɛy mbuur asin ukɔ̈ɔ̈n afàsà un'bään asin ukɔl a un'bään awà paa: Yɛsu Klistɔ.
1CO 3:12 Kyekà, itàkal naa ban'tɔŋ udu a un'bään awà anà wɔl, arza, in'kul a ntal, in'te, in'lɛŋ, wɛŋwɛŋ,
1CO 3:13 isal a mbuur mbuur ikyer asàmɛnà. Ilä a nsaŋ isàmɛɛy kya, ntɔn kya ifàmɛnà u mbaa. Mbaa isàsi isal a mbuur mbuur ntɔn muswaŋ ntal a kya.
1CO 3:14 Isàkal naa isal a mbuur kàtöŋ udu a un'bään kyan'tsim u mbaa, nde asàwal làfur.
1CO 3:15 Isàkal naa kya kyan'kuŋà, nde undiir usàwal anki. Nde ŋakwo asàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈, wɛɛ asànaa mbuur kan'sɔrà u mbaa.
1CO 3:16 Nkye bɛ làyöb anki naa bɛ làbà ndwà a Nzam anà Dweelà a Nzam làfàkal uboo a bɛ?
1CO 3:17 Isàkal naa mbuur kan'dwa ndwà a Nzam, Nzam akyer asun'dwa. Ntɔn ndwà a Nzam yà in'kyɛɛl, bɛ làbà ndwà a Nzam ya.
1CO 3:18 Wɛy mbuur ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akur nde ŋàkwo: isàkal naa mbuur mwɛy uboo a bɛ akakyeyà uyɔl naa nde wà ŋayeerà u mɛɛn mà, wɛy nde ubulà ŋukɔŋ, ntɔn mubulà ŋayeerà.
1CO 3:19 Ntɔn an'yeerà a mɛɛn mà, mà ukɔŋ kusà a Nzam. Kyakin, bàsön naa: « Nde afàwal aŋayeerà unsà impeenà aba ŋakwo. »
1CO 3:20 Anà sye naa: « Mwol akyàyöb an'kyän a aŋayeerà, nde akyàyöb naa ma mà bunàbun. »
1CO 3:21 Abun, mbuur taaŋ aswaŋ tɛy ngaal ande udu a baar, ntɔn indiir byanswà byà bɛ:
1CO 3:22 Pɔl, Apɔlɔs itàkal Sɛfas, mɛɛn, mɔ̈ɔ̈ itàkal ukwà, apanà itàkal ungö, bya byanswà byà bɛ,
1CO 3:23 wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làbà bà Klistɔ, anà Klistɔ wà wà Nzam.
1CO 4:1 Abun, wɛy bi iwɛl asànaa asyääl a Klistɔ, abye anà buur a an'yee a Nzam.
1CO 4:2 Kyekà, undiir a ntsüü bàlɔɔmà akà baar abye anà buur abà naa ba bàkäl bàlää.
1CO 4:3 Akà mɛ, mɛ undiir in'manà anki naa bɛ làn'tsüül nsaŋ, itàkal naa làbay a nsaŋ a mɛɛn mà. Mɛ in'fàfàtsüül anki nsaŋ mɛ ŋakwo.
1CO 4:4 Ndandaa, an'kyän amɛ mà a duu, wɛɛ wa kà undiir atwey mɛ wàbalàbal anki. Mwol wà mbuur atsüül mɛ nsaŋ.
1CO 4:5 Kyakin, twon lan'tsul nsaŋ kusà a taaŋ alà bàsi, làdil mpal usàyà Mwol. Nde mbuur asàsà u pɛɛlà ndaa aŋàyee u làpib anà asàmɛɛy an'kyän aŋàyee mà mpem a baar. Apan, mbuur mbuur asàwal akà Nzam nsyäŋà yan'kwo akà nde.
1CO 4:6 Ntɔn bɛ, atɔŋ, waa mɛ kàswɛŋ indiir abi ifà asin, musyääl bya akà Apɔlɔs anà akà mɛ ŋakwo, ntɔn u mbaan abi, bɛ làlɔŋàkà muyöb an'kyän amà unsà indiir abi: « Yà ubwaŋ naa bɛ làkɔ̈ɔ̈n asoobà ndel a Ndaa Aŋàsɔn. » Wɛy naa akà mbuur mwɛy ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akyey uyɔl muwɛɛl mbuur mwɛy anà mutɔn wumwɛy.
1CO 4:7 Abun, nà kasɛɛn? Ininà ngye awe awà mpa kàwɛl ngye? Isàkal naa ya yà abwɛy, ntɔn nkye musɛn an'pɛy asànaa ngye wa kàwɛl anki?
1CO 4:8 Bɛ làkyàyuur itaan! Bɛ làbà aŋun'naaŋ fà itaan! Bɛ làsɛmà muyaal ukɔɔn bi! Ndandaa, mɛ in'kwen naa bɛ làsɛmà uyaal, ntɔn bi sye ikwe muyaal mbwo mwɛy anà bɛ!
1CO 4:9 Ntɔn, mɛ in'sii naa bi antööm Nzam kàkisà kà ikal a ngöngö, asànaa baar batsüül mbar a ukwà: bi bàkibuul indiir atääŋ ntɔn mɛɛn, ntɔn akyeey anà ntɔn baar.
1CO 4:10 Bi ibà aŋukɔŋ ntɔn Klistɔ, wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làbà aŋayeerà amu Klistɔ, bi ibà bàgyɔ̈ɔ̈là, bɛ làbà ngwal, bɛ làbà unsà ibyääl, bi bàkimɛɛy nswɛn.
1CO 4:11 Tii mpal ayi, bi ibye anà ngyal, bi ibye anà mfwää, bi ibà nsàpɔl, bi bipɛ mpay, bi ibà iwɔŋ,
1CO 4:12 bi kan'man mpay musal a an'kɔɔ abi. Bàmukitoo, bi ibàmusaak, bàmukimɛɛy nkwaaŋ, bi kan'tsim,
1CO 4:13 bàmukàyiküür ndaa, bi ibàmulɛɛl. Tii papanà bi kàkyàbulà indiir a mbin a mɛɛn, nkayäl a baar banswà.
1CO 4:14 Mɛ inkàlasöönà anki indiir abi ntɔn mukàlamɛɛy nswɛn, wɛɛ ntɔn mukàlaweey asànaa baan amɛ bànkween.
1CO 4:15 Ntɔn, itàkal naa bɛ làbye anà alɔɔŋ nsaab kwem amu Klistɔ, bɛ làbye anki anà bàtaa mbɔɔn. Ntɔn mɛ in'wà mbuur kàlabör amu Klistɔ Yɛsu u mbwo a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ.
1CO 4:16 Abun, mɛ amàlalɔɔm, làläb mbaan amɛ.
1CO 4:17 Kyakin, mɛ kàlatööm Tumàtɛ, awà mwan amɛ wànkween anà wàlää unsà Mwol. Nde ayàlayɔɔb in'kɔɔn amɛ myà mɔ̈ɔ̈ amu Klistɔ, asànaa in'fàlɔŋ mɛ mper yanswà, uboo a Ikööŋ byanswà.
1CO 4:18 Kyekà, muyweer naa mɛ in'yàyà anki akà bɛ, amwɛy uboo abɛ bàyööl a uyɔl.
1CO 4:19 Wɛɛ isàkal naa Mwol kan'kwen, itaan a mbɔɔn tɛy mɛ in'kyer ayàyà akà bɛ. Mɛ kà in'yàyöb ntwetweey a aŋuyɔl bà anki, wɛɛ ngwal aba!
1CO 4:20 Ntɔn Imwol a Nzam kà kyà ndaa anki, wɛɛ kyà ngwal.
1CO 4:21 Ininà bɛ làkwen? Nkye mɛ in'yi akà bɛ anà an'füm itàkal anà ukwen unsà dweelà a làbɔ̈ɔ̈n?
1CO 5:1 In'bää myan'too ntsü yanswà naa ndaa a nswɛn yà uboo a bɛ, ndaa a nswɛn mpa aŋàtàman itàkal uboo a baar mpa abà Ayudà: umwɛy uboo a bɛ afàkal anà un'kyay a taarànde.
1CO 5:2 Wɛɛ bɛ lan'yam a uyɔl! Nkye bɛ làlàkwo anki muwem ngyɛb mbɔɔn anà mulwom uboo a bɛ mbuur kan'kyer undiir awun?
1CO 5:3 Akà mɛ, mɛ paa watɛy u ndür, wɛɛ mɛ in'wà paa u dweelà, mɛ kàtsül itaan nsaŋ a mbuur wa kàkyer undiir awun asànaa mɛ kàkäl paa.
1CO 5:4 Mpal làsàköŋ bɛ, kà ikɔb a Mwol Yɛsu, mɛ in'sàkal paa unsà dweelà uboo a bɛ.
1CO 5:5 Lun'yälà mbuur atub awun akà Satanà ntɔn mudwa ndür ande, waa dweelà làsàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈ kà ilä a Mwol.
1CO 5:6 Undiir akyey uyɔl watɛy! Nkye bɛ làyöb anki naa: « Kindam a ful ifàsɛɛn mfwar yanswà »?
1CO 5:7 Abun, làpɔŋà unsà ful là itaan, ntɔn bɛ làbulà mfwar akün ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ful. Ntɔn Klistɔ, Pak abi, bàpɛɛl ibɔɔn.
1CO 5:8 Abun, wɛy bi ikɔ̈ɔ̈n atà un'kyɔm anà ful itaan, itàkal ful a ube anà lan'kyän an'be, wɛɛ anà mampà ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ful, unsà pɛɛlà anà ndandaa.
1CO 5:9 Mɛ kàlasöön unsà un'kaan amɛ naa twon lan'kal un'tüüb anà baar bàfàkyer ndaa a nswɛn.
1CO 5:10 An'kyän amɛ kà mà ntɔn baar bàfàkyer ndaa a nswɛn u mɛɛn mà anki, itàkal aŋunkaam anà mbüüb, itàkal baar bàfàyamà itɛk, ntɔn, isàkal naa yà abwɛy, bɛ làkyer atoo u mɛɛn.
1CO 5:11 Mɛ kàlasöön apanà naa twon lan'kal un'tüüb anà mbuur afàtɛn naa nde wà « un'tɔŋ », isàkal naa nde, ŋunkaam, itàkal naa afàyamà itɛk, itàkal un'twee, itàkal un'yöör a man, itàkal mbüüb, mbuur atub awà, twon lan'dyà ikal imwɛy anà nde.
1CO 5:12 Ntɔn, nkye ya ndaa amɛ mutsüül baar a nsà nsaŋ? Nkye kà bɛ anki làtsul nsaŋ a baar abà uboo?
1CO 5:13 Baar a nsà Nzam asàtsul nsaŋ aba. Wɛɛ, bàsön naa: « Lun'böŋ mbuur un'be uboo a bɛ. »
1CO 6:1 Isàkal naa umwɛy uboo abɛ we anà syee anà un'tɔŋ wumwɛy, aben làkàtsul bɛ la akà antɛɛn mpa abà balàbal, akwànaa akà aŋin'kyɛɛl?
1CO 6:2 Nkye bɛ làyöb anki naa aŋin'kyɛɛl bàsàtsüül mɛɛn nsaŋ? Isàkal naa bɛ làsàtsul nsaŋ a mɛɛn mà, nkye bɛ làkwo anki mutsul binsaŋ a bunàbun bi?
1CO 6:3 Nkye bɛ làyöb anki naa bi isàtsul nsaŋ a akyeey? Waa nsaŋ a mɔ̈ɔ̈ wà isikɔ̈ɔ̈n?
1CO 6:4 Abun, mpal làbà bɛ anà nsaŋ atub ayi, nkye bɛ làfàwal baar a bunàbun uboo a Ikööŋ mutsul ya?
1CO 6:5 Mɛ in'tɛɛnà a nswɛn abɛ. Nkye akà ŋan'yeerà mwɛy uboo a bɛ watɛy mutsul nsaŋ uboo a atɔŋ ande?
1CO 6:6 Wɛɛ, nkye un'tɔŋ akàfüün un'tɔŋ ande akà baar bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n làkwikilà?
1CO 6:7 Kiin mutàkal anà nsaŋ uboo a bɛ, iswaŋà naa bɛ lan'kwà ndwà. Ntɔn nkye mpa làfàkyey bɛ ikwàndwà? Ntɔn nkye mpa làfàkwen bɛ naa bàlapfiy?
1CO 6:8 Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làfàkyer ube anà làfàpfiy baar asin. Bɛ ya làfàkyer akà atɔŋ abɛ!
1CO 6:9 Abun, nkye bɛ làyöb anki naa baar mpa abà balàbal bàsàwal anki kwal a Imwol a Nzam? Twon bàlakür: itàkal baar bàfàkyer ndaa a nswɛn, itàkal aŋitɛk, itàkal aŋinswem, itàkal abaal bàfàbulà akaar, itàkal abaal bàfàkal anà abaal,
1CO 6:10 itàkal mbüüb, itàkal aŋàlàmfɛɛl, itàkal ayöör a man, itàkal abweel a in'tswe, itàkal aŋunkaam bàsàwal anki kwal a Imwol a Nzam.
1CO 6:11 Làler indiir bàkäl amwɛy uboo a bɛ. Wɛɛ bɛ bàkyàlasɔŋ, wɛɛ bɛ bàkyàlabuul bàŋin'kyɛɛl, wɛɛ bɛ bàlatwey bàbalàbal kà ikɔb a Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ anà u mbwo a Dweelà a Nzam abi.
1CO 6:12 « Mɛ in'we anà ikɔ̈b mukyer indiir byanswà », wɛɛ indiir byanswà ndöŋ byatɛy. « Mɛ in'we anà ikɔ̈b mukyer indiir byanswà », wɛɛ mɛ in'kyey anki naa undiir mwɛy kan'yaal.
1CO 6:13 « Isaa byà ntɔn an'bäl, an'bäl mà ntɔn isaa. » Nzam asàdwa amwɛy asànaa wumwɛy. Wɛɛ ndür kà yà ntɔn mukyer ndaa a nswɛn anki, wɛɛ ntɔn Mwol, Mwol wà ntɔn ndür.
1CO 6:14 Kyekà, Nzam, mbuur kàwiiy Mwol, Nde asiwiiy sye unsà ngwal ande.
1CO 6:15 Nkye bɛ làyöb anki naa ndür abɛ yà itiir a ndür a Klistɔ? Apan, nkye mɛ an'kwo in'wɛl itiir a ndür a Klistɔ ntɔn mubuul bya itiir a ndür a ndaa a nswɛn? Akà ikikye!
1CO 6:16 Nkye bɛ làyöb anki naa mbuur usàtüüb anà un'kaar a pasàsɛ, ba ban'bulà ndür mwɛy? Ntɔn bàtɛn naa: « Ba bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l bàsàbulà ndür mwɛy. »
1CO 6:17 Wɛɛ mbuur awà un'tüüb mwɛy anà Mwol, nde sye wà dweelà làmwɛy anà nde.
1CO 6:18 Làtiin ipasàsɛ. Man'be asin asin manswà ukyer mbuur mà u nsà a ndür ande. Wɛɛ mbuur afàkyer ndaa a nswɛn afàkyer man'be u ndür ande ŋakwo.
1CO 6:19 Nkye bɛ làyöb anki naa ndür abɛ yà ndwà a Nzam a Dweelà Inkyɛɛl awà amu bɛ anà kan'fà akà Nzam ntɔn bɛ, anà bɛ làfàkal anki bàbɛ ŋakwo?
1CO 6:20 Wɛɛ bɛ bàkyer alasom a ntal mbɔɔn. Lun'si Nzam làkoo u mbwo a ndür abɛ.
1CO 7:1 Ntɔn ndaa lan'söön bɛ, yà ubwaŋ naa mbuur ukɔ̈ɔ̈n abääl.
1CO 7:2 Ntɔn mukɔɔn abwà unsà ŋingyäy, wɛy baal wanswà ukäl anà un'kyay ande, un'kaar wanswà ukäl anà un'dim ande.
1CO 7:3 Wɛy un'dim ukwey buur ande akà un'kyay ande, anà un'kaar ukyer sye abun kusà a un'dim ande.
1CO 7:4 Un'kaar ikɔ̈b kyatɛy u ndür ande ŋakwo, wɛɛ un'dim ande awe anà kya. Ifà imwɛy sye, un'dim, ikɔ̈b kyatɛy u ndür ande, wɛɛ un'kyay ande awe anà kya.
1CO 7:5 Wɛɛ bɛ twon lan'tsuŋ umwɛy anà wumwɛy, nà isàkal naa, unsà ukwen umwɛy anà utaaŋ làmwɛy là ikikye, ntɔn bɛ làpɛ taaŋ unsà ngyamàkà, waa làfàfurà kà un'tüüb, manà naa Satanà uyàsyääl ukɔɔn nkäŋ a mpem abɛ mukàlabwiy.
1CO 7:6 Ndaa amàlakyään mɛ yi, yà an'kyän mpɛl mɛ an'pà, wɛɛ ya kà yà nswɛɛŋ anki.
1CO 7:7 Mɛ in'kwen naa abaal banswà bàkäl asànaa mɛ, wɛɛ mbuur mbuur we anà kab a nsöön kun'pɛ Nzam, umwɛy ntɔn là, wumwɛy ntɔn lanà.
1CO 7:8 Apanà, mɛ in'tɛn a ampfwe anà akweel adim naa yà ubwaŋ mukal aŋàyen, asànaa mɛ.
1CO 7:9 Wɛɛ isàkal naa ba nkääŋ a mpem yatɛy, wɛy ba bàbääl, ntɔn yà ubwaŋ mubääl, akwànaa muwulà mbaa a làmfɛɛl.
1CO 7:10 Wɛɛ akà baar abàŋàbääl, mɛ amàlaswaŋ, kà mɛ anki, wɛɛ Mwol: wɛy un'kaar ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akaabà anà un'dim ande,
1CO 7:11 isàkal naa nde kàkyàkaabà, wɛy nde ukɔ̈ɔ̈n àfàbääl, itàkal naa nde uyöŋà a un'dim ande. Wɛy un'dim sye ukɔ̈ɔ̈n awɛy un'kyay ande.
1CO 7:12 Akà bamwɛy, mɛ in'tɛn abà, kà Mwol anki: isàkal un'tɔŋ abaal wɛ anà un'kyay mpa awà ŋàlàkwikilà, wɛɛ un'kaar awà kan'kyey mukal anà nde, wɛy nde ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akun'wɛy.
1CO 7:13 Ifà imwɛy sye, isàkal naa un'kaar we anà un'dim mpa awà ŋàlàkwikilà, wɛɛ baal awà kan'kyey mukal anà nde, wɛy nde ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akun'wɛy.
1CO 7:14 Ntɔn, un'dim mpa awà ŋàlàkwikilà kan'bulà aŋin'kyɛɛl u mbwo a un'kyay ande, anà un'kyay mpa awà ŋàlàkwikilà kan'bulà aŋin'kyɛɛl u mbwo a un'dim ande wàŋàlàkwikilà. Isàkal naa kabwɛy tɛy, baan abɛ bàyàkal mbiin, kyekà ba bà bàŋikyɛɛl.
1CO 7:15 Wɛɛ, isàkal naa mbuur mpa awà ŋàlàkwikilà kan'kwen mudwa bɔr, wɛy nde ukyer abun! Un'tɔŋ wàbaal itàkal wun'kaar kà wàŋàteen anki unsà indiir abi. Nzam kàlabeel ntɔn bɛ làkäl unsà duu.
1CO 7:16 Abun, un'kaar, ngye ayöb aben naa ngye asàtswà un'dim angye mɔ̈ɔ̈? Itàkal un'dim, ngye ayöb aben naa ngye asàtswà un'kyay angye mɔ̈ɔ̈?
1CO 7:17 Abun, wɛy mbuur mbuur usyen mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande unsà kab alà kun'pɛ Mwol, asànaa kàkäl nde utaaŋ kun'bel Nzam. Ayi nswɛɛŋ amɛ unsà Ikööŋ byanswà.
1CO 7:18 Nkye mbuur mwɛy kàkäl aŋàkyɛy utaaŋ bun'bel? Wɛy nde ukɔ̈ɔ̈n aye nkyɛɛy ande. Nà mpa kàkäl aŋàkyɛy utaaŋ bun'bel? Wɛy bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n un'kyɛy.
1CO 7:19 Nkyɛɛy yundiir a bunàbun, ukɔɔn nkyɛɛy wundiir a bunàbun, wɛɛ undiir a mfun wà mulab nswɛɛŋ a Nzam.
1CO 7:20 Wɛy mbuur mbuur ukäl asànaa kàkäl nde utaaŋ bun'bel.
1CO 7:21 Nkye ngye kàkäl un'sɔ utaaŋ babel? Twon an'kyɛɛr. Wɛɛ, itàkal naa ngye an'bulà nsaay, syääl isɔ angye.
1CO 7:22 Ntɔn, un'sɔ bàbel uboo a Mwol, nde wà nsaay a Mwol. Ifà imwɛy sye, mbuur bàbel wà nsaay, nde wà un'sɔ a Mwol.
1CO 7:23 Mbuur mwɛy kàkyàfur ntal a nkwiy ntɔn bɛ. Twon lan'fàbulà asɔ a baar.
1CO 7:24 Atɔŋ, wɛy mbuur mbuur ukäl kusà a Nzam asànaa kàkäl nde utaaŋ bun'bel.
1CO 7:25 Ntɔn ankɔr, mɛ nswɛɛŋ a Mwol yatɛy: mɛ an'kyän in'pà, an'kyän a mbuur mwɛy ban'kwo musà làkyän, u nsyääm a Mwol.
1CO 7:26 Ntɔn mpay a taaŋ alà, mɛ in'manà naa yubwaŋ naa mbuur mbuur ukäl asànaa awà nde.
1CO 7:27 Nkye ngye awàŋàtüüb anà un'kaar? Twon an'leŋ mukaabà. Nkye ngye kawàŋàtüüb anki anà un'kaar? Twon an'leŋ un'kaar.
1CO 7:28 Isàkal naa ngye an'bääl, ngye akyer anki man'be. Isàkal naa unkɔr un'kaar kan'bääl, nde man'be ukyer anki. Wɛɛ baar bàŋàbääl bye anà buur a ndür mbɔɔn, wɛɛ mɛ in'kwen naa bɛ làkɔ̈ɔ̈n akal anà buur a ndür abà.
1CO 7:29 Atɔŋ, mɛ in'kwen mutɛn abà: taaŋ lan'bulà ikökö. Sɛmà apanà, wɛy mbuur wanswà awe anà un'kyay ukäl asànaa nde wa watɛy,
1CO 7:30 baar bàlelà asànaa ba bàlelà anki, baar bàsaŋà asànaa ba bàsaŋà anki, baar bàsoomà asànaa ba undiir watɛy,
1CO 7:31 baar bàsyäälà indiir a mɛɛn mà asànaa ba bya bàsyäälà anki. Ntɔn mɛɛn mà abà, mà mulyaŋ.
1CO 7:32 Mɛ in'kwen anki naa bɛ làkäl anà nkyɛɛr. Mpfwe mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande wanswà wà unsà indiir a Mwol: nde afàleŋ naa nde Mwol un'sak kun'pà aben.
1CO 7:33 Wɛɛ, baal aŋàbääl an'kyän mà unsà indiir a mɛɛn, nde aleŋà naa nde un'kyay ande un'sak kun'pà aben,
1CO 7:34 anà mpem ande yàŋàkaabà. Ifà imwɛy sye, un'kaar unkɔr asànaa un'sye, an'kyän ande mà unsà indiir a Mwol, ntɔn nde ukäl ŋun'kyɛɛl u ndür anà u dweelà. Wɛɛ un'kaar aŋàbääl an'kyän ande mà mɛɛn, nde afàlɛŋ naa nde un'dim ande un'sak kun'pà aben.
1CO 7:35 Mɛ an'tɛn mɛ abà, ntɔn ubwaŋ abɛ ŋakwo, kà ntɔn mukàlalɛɛ untaam anki, wɛɛ ntɔn bɛ làkyer undiir aŋàbwaŋ, anà bɛ làkäl aŋàbääb a Mwol, u mpem abɛ wanswà.
1CO 7:36 Isàkal naa un'tö mwɛy kan'man naa nde ukwe anki mukaŋ mpem kusa a ŋàtàntüüm ande, isàkal naa nde wàŋàyɔl a ilään mukal anà nde anà indiir byàmulab mbwo a bya, wɛy nde ukyer ayukwen nde. Nde ukyer anki man'be: wɛy ba bàbääl.
1CO 7:37 Wɛɛ, mbuur kan'tsul u mpem ande, ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akun'siinà a ngwal, unsà ukwen ande banswà, muwal an'kyän mukɔɔn atüüb ndür a ŋàtàntüüm ande, nde kan'kyer ubwaŋ.
1CO 7:38 Abun, mbuur kan'bääl ŋàtàntüün ande, nde kan'kyer ubwaŋ, wɛɛ mbuur mpa kun'bääl kan'kyer ubwaŋ aŋàsöönà.
1CO 7:39 Un'kaar wàŋàtüüb anà un'dim ande taaŋ lanswà awà nde anà mɔ̈ɔ̈. Isàkal naa un'dim kan'kwà, nde kan'bulà wà nsaay mubääl mbuur ukwen nde, wɛɛ uboo a Mwol mpɛl.
1CO 7:40 Kyekà, kà an'kyän amɛ, nde ayàkal unsà un'sak mbɔɔn, isàkal naa nde kan'kal asànaa awà nde. Mɛ sye, mɛ in'we anà an'kyän mukal anà Dweelà a Nzam.
1CO 8:1 Ntɔn ndaa ayà iler in'twaŋ bàfàlääm itɛk, bi banswà ikyàyöb naa bi iwe anà ngyööb. Ngyööb ifàpà ngaal, wɛɛ ukwen bàkyer afàtɔŋ.
1CO 8:2 Isàkal naa mbuur mwɛy akasii naa nde ayöb undiir mwɛy, nde ŋàtàyöb anki asànaa bàkyer ayöb.
1CO 8:3 Wɛɛ isàkal naa mbuur akwen Nzam, Nzam akyun'yöb.
1CO 8:4 Abun, nkye ngye an'kwo adi in'twaŋ bàfàlääm itɛk? Bi ikyàyöb naa itɛk u mɛɛn kyà undiir a bunàbun anà nzam asin watɛy, Nzam wà mwɛy.
1CO 8:5 Ntɔn, ndandaa bye anà indiir bàfàbel naa bànzam, itàkal u du, itàkal u mɛɛn, asànaa bànzam anà bàmwol bà mbɔɔn,
1CO 8:6 wɛɛ akà bi, Nzam wà mwɛy, Taa anà Nkyer a indiir byanswà anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi wà ntɔn Nde, anà Mwol mwɛy, Yɛsu Klistɔ. Indiir byanswà bàkyer u mbwo a Nde anà bi ibà anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ u mbwo a Nde.
1CO 8:7 Wɛɛ baar banswà ngyööb yatɛy. Bamwɛy bàkyàyii u nsyääl aba yà itɛk tii ŋàbawà, mudyà in'twaŋ a ibɔɔn asànaa naa ndandaa mya bàlääm itɛk, anà an'kyän aba mà gyɔ̈ɔ̈là, màŋàbwà ŋingyäy.
1CO 8:8 Kyekà, bya kà isaa ifàsin bi tsütsü a Nzam anki: isàkal naa bi idi anki bya, bi undiir ayàkyà bwà watɛy, isàkal naa bi kan'dyà bya, undiir aŋàsöön iyàwal bi watɛy.
1CO 8:9 Wɛɛ làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ naa nsaay abɛ ayi ikɔ̈ɔ̈n abulà mbwo a mbweel ntɔn aŋagyɔ̈ɔ̈là.
1CO 8:10 Ntɔn, isàkal naa ngye bàmaman, ngye mbuur awe anà ngyööb, u mɛsà uboo a ndwà a nzam a itɛk, nkye an'kyän ande iyun'syen anki, nde ŋagyɔ̈ɔ̈là, mudyà in'twaŋ bàlääm mupà ibɔɔn akà itɛk.
1CO 8:11 Abun, ŋagyɔ̈ɔ̈là awà, ntɔn ngyööb angye, wà un'tɔŋ awà kàkü Klistɔ ntɔn nde.
1CO 8:12 Mukyer man'be abun akà atɔŋ abɛ anà muyɔɔl mpem aba yà gyɔ̈ɔ̈là, bɛ làbàmukyer man'be akà Klistɔ.
1CO 8:13 Kyakin, isàkal naa isaa mwɛy ibwiy un'tɔŋ amɛ, mɛ in'yàfàdyà anki akà ikikye in'twaŋ ntɔn mukɔɔn abwiy un'tɔŋ amɛ.
1CO 9:1 Nkye mɛ kà in'wà mbuur a nsaay anki? Nkye mɛ kà in'wà ntööm anki? Nkye mɛ kun'mɛn anki Yɛsu, Mwol abi?
1CO 9:2 Isàkal naa akà baar bumwɛy mɛ kà in'wà ntööm anki, wɛɛ ntɔn làbà bɛ unsà un'tüüb a Mwol, iswaŋà naa ndandaa mɛ in'wà ntööm.
1CO 9:3 Un'kal amɛ kusà a baar bàfan'pɛl awà:
1CO 9:4 Nkye bi ikwe anki mudyà anà munwà?
1CO 9:5 Nkye bi ikwe anki musyen un'klistɔ a un'kaar, asànaa antööm bumwɛy, atɔŋ a Mwol anà Sɛfas?
1CO 9:6 Nkye mɛ mpɛl anà Banàbà ibye anà mbwo mukɔɔn asal?
1CO 9:7 Nà afàsal isal uboo a ità a ngim ande ŋakwo? Nà afàkɔn un'te a vin, ukɔɔn adyà imbɛŋ a wa? Itàkal naa, nà afàdii böl a ngɔɔmà ukɔɔn anwà an'bɛɛl a böl a ngɔɔmà alan?
1CO 9:8 Nkye unsà imbuur mpɛl mɛ in'tɛɛnà indiir abi? Nkye un'kɔɔn sye ufàtɛn anki abwɛy?
1CO 9:9 Kyekà, unsà un'kɔɔn a Mɔsɛ bàsön naa: « Twon an'bäm mun a ngɔɔmà utaaŋ udyaarà wa imbɛŋ. » Nkye Nzam we anà ngyɛb a ngɔɔmà?
1CO 9:10 Nkye nde utɛɛnà anki ntɔn bi mpɛl? Ɛɛ ya bàsön ntɔn bi, ntɔn mbuur afàlem anà mbuur afàtswà imbɛŋ bàkäl anà làkyän muwal kab aba.
1CO 9:11 Isàkal naa bi kàkön indiir a dweelà ntɔn bɛ, nkye yà ndaa a kölàköl naa bi ibwe indiir a mɛɛn mà uboo a bɛ?
1CO 9:12 Isàkal naa baar bumwɛy bàfàsyääl ikɔ̈b aki udu a bɛ, ntɔn nkye mpa ikal kya kyàŋàsöönà akà bi? Wɛɛ bi, bi kàsyääl anki ikɔ̈b aki. Bi ifàkaŋ mpem ntɔn indiir byanswà, naa tɛy, bi iyàkal asànaa kyà ntɔn Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ a Klistɔ.
1CO 9:13 Nkye bɛ làyöb anki naa baar bàfàsal isal u ndwà a Nzam, ndwà a Nzam ifadii, naa baar bàfàsal u mɛsà bàfàpà ibɔɔn, ba bye anà kab aba unsà undiir bàfàpà baar?
1CO 9:14 Ifà imwɛy, Mwol kàswɛŋ baar bàfàkyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ naa udyà aba bà unsà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ.
1CO 9:15 Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ kàsàsyääl anki akà ikɔ̈b mwɛy uboo a bya. Kà ntɔn mulɔm bya anki ntɔn mɛ, waa mɛ an'sɔn un'kaan wà. Ubwaŋ mɛ in'yerakwà! Akà mbuur mwɛy tɛy kan'kwo mulwom làkoo amɛ alà!
1CO 9:16 Akà mɛ, ukyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ kà undiir muswaŋ ngaal anki, ntɔn kya isal ban'pɛ a ngwal: ngyɛb akà mɛ isàkal naa mɛ Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ in'kyään anki!
1CO 9:17 Kya ilàkal naa isal aki mɛ ŋakwo kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l, mɛ in'kyer alàwal làfur. Wɛɛ, ntɔn an'kyän amà màfü anki akà mɛ, kyakin mɛ in'wà mukölà buur ban'pɛ.
1CO 9:18 Apan làfur amɛ làken? La là ntɔn mukyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là ngway, ukɔɔn asyääl ikɔ̈b kan'paa Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ alà.
1CO 9:19 Ndandaa, itàkal naa mɛ in'wà nsaay kusà a baar banswà, mɛ kàkyer naa mɛ in'bulà un'sɔ a baar banswà, ntɔn musyen baar mbɔɔn akà Mwol.
1CO 9:20 Mɛ kàkäl uboo a Ayudà asànaa un'yudà, ntɔn muwal Ayudà, uboo a baar abà u ngyɛl a un'kɔɔn asànaa mbuur awà ungyɛl a un'kɔɔn, - wɛɛ mɛ ŋakwo in'wà anki ungyɛl a un'kɔɔn, - ntɔn muwal baar abà ungyɛl a un'kɔɔn,
1CO 9:21 uboo a baar bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n un'kɔɔn asànaa mɛ an'kɔɔn un'kɔɔn, - kyekà mɛ in'kɔ̈ɔ̈n anki un'kɔɔn a Nzam, ntɔn Klistɔ wà un'kɔɔn amɛ, muwal baar bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n un'kɔɔn.
1CO 9:22 Mɛ kàbulà ŋàgyɔ̈ɔ̈là ntɔn aŋàgyɔ̈ɔ̈là, ntɔn muwal aŋàgyɔ̈ɔ̈là. Ntɔn baar banswà mɛ kàbulà indiir byanswà ntɔn mutswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a amwɛy uboo a ba.
1CO 9:23 Kyekà, indiir abi byanswà, mɛ in'fàkyer ntɔn Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ ntɔn mɛ in'wɛl kab uboo mwo.
1CO 9:24 Nkye bɛ làyöb anki naa aŋantiin, ubɔɔ a iboon, ba banswà bàfàtsumà ntiin, wɛɛ umwɛy mpɛl afàwal undiir a ntal? Làtsumà ntiin ntɔn muböŋ.
1CO 9:25 Aŋan'taam a ngwiy banswà bàfàkaŋ mpem unsà ya yanswà, ba bàfàkyer ntɔn muwal mpà ifàtay, wɛɛ bi, ntɔn mpà mpa ifàtay.
1CO 9:26 Abun, mɛ in'tsumà anki ntiin aŋàdübà mii, mɛ in'kam anki iki a bunàbun.
1CO 9:27 Wɛɛ mɛ infàpà ndür amɛ mpay, mɛ infàbuul ya asànaa un'sɔ. Kya naa tɛy, ungö mukyään làsaŋ akà bumwɛy, mɛ ŋakwo in'kɔ̈ɔ̈n awal iböŋ.
1CO 10:1 Atɔŋ, mɛ in'kwen naa bɛ làyöb ndaa yi: bànkaa abi banswà bàkäl ungyɛl a un'böŋ, ba banswà bàtsül ngyäl,
1CO 10:2 anà ba banswà bàwɛl ndüümà a Mɔsɛ uboo un'böŋ anà uboo a ngyäl.
1CO 10:3 Ba banswà bàdyee isaa a dweelà,
1CO 10:4 anà ba banswà bànwee kɔɔb a dweelà làmwɛy, ntɔn ba bànwee unsà un'kul a dweelà kàyikyeenà anà ba, un'kul awun kàkäl Klistɔ.
1CO 10:5 Wɛɛ, Nzam kàkäl anki un'sak anà bàmbɔɔn uboo a ba, lalan bàkü ba u nsye a ipɔl.
1CO 10:6 Ndaa ayi yanswà yà ntɔn naa ya ikäl mbaan, ntɔn bi ikɔ̈ɔ̈n aleŋ ube asànaa bàleŋà ba.
1CO 10:7 Twon lan'bulà baar a itɛk, asànaa bumwɛy uboo aba, kyakin bàsön naa: « Un'sɛŋ kan'bwaay ntɔn mudyà anà munwà, waa ba bàmbarà ntɔn mutaam. »
1CO 10:8 Bi sye ipà anki ndür abi mukyer ndaa a nswɛn, asànaa bàkyerà bumwɛy uboo a ba: kà ilä imwɛy mpɛl bàkü baar nsaab an'kwem mɔ̈ɔ̈l aŋitär.
1CO 10:9 Bi twon kun'sii Klistɔ, asànaa bàkyer bumwɛy uboo a ba: ntäy yàkyer adwa.
1CO 10:10 Twon lan'ŋüŋün asànaa bàŋüŋün bumwɛy uboo a ba: un'dwää kàkyer adwa.
1CO 10:11 Kyekà, indiir abi byàyeel ba ntɔn bya ikäl mbaan, bya bàsön ntɔn mulɔŋ bi, bi baar ibà u taaŋ a ntsüü.
1CO 10:12 Abun, wɛy mbuur akasii naa nde wà umbäär, ukäl kà igyɛɛŋ ntɔn nde ukɔ̈ɔ̈n abwà.
1CO 10:13 Ndɛb mwɛy tɛy ifàyeel bɛ ayà mpa ifàyeel mbuur. Nzam wà lää, nde upà anki mbwo naa bàlasii yàŋàlyaaŋ ngwal abɛ. Anà ndɛb, nde ayàlɔ̈ɔ̈n sye mbwo mutoo amu ya anà ayàlapà ngwal mukaŋ mpem.
1CO 10:14 Kyakin, nkween amɛ, làtiin muyamà itɛk.
1CO 10:15 Mɛ in'yäämà anà bɛ asànaa a baar abye anà an'kyän aŋàbwaŋ: làtsül bɛ ŋakwo ndaa in'tɛɛnà mɛ.
1CO 10:16 Kɔɔb a nsaak alà ifàsaak bi udu a la, nkye la làfisà anki unsà un'tüüb anà an'kil a Klistɔ? Làmpà ifàtsul bi, nkye la làfisà anki unsà un'tüüb anà ndür a Klistɔ?
1CO 10:17 Ntɔn làmpà là làmwɛy mpɛl, bi banswà ibà ndür mwɛy mpɛl: ntɔn bi banswà ifàkab làmpà mwɛy alan.
1CO 10:18 Wɛɛ làler baar a Isàlɛl, baar bàfàdyà in'twaŋ bàpɛ ibɔɔn, nkye ba un'tüüb watɛy anà mɛsà a ibɔɔn?
1CO 10:19 Ininà mɛ in'kwen mutɛn? Nkye in'twaŋ bàpɛ ibɔɔn akà itɛk lɛɛ itɛk bya ŋakwo ibye anà mfun?
1CO 10:20 Ŋaa! Wɛɛ, asànaa ibɔɔn aba bàkyàpà akà insɔŋà, kà akà Nzam anki, mɛ in'kwen anki naa bɛ làbilà unsà un'tüüb anà insɔŋà.
1CO 10:21 Bɛ làkwo anki munwà mbalà mwɛy ya u kɔɔb a Mwol anà u kɔɔb a insɔŋà. Bɛ làkwo anki mudyà mbalà mwɛy ya u mɛsà a Mwol anà u mɛsà a insɔŋà.
1CO 10:22 Nkye bi ikwen mumbaar un'köl a Mwol? Nkye bi ibye anà ngwal yan'lyaaŋ yà Nde?
1CO 10:23 « Byanswà bàkyàpà mbwo mukyer », wɛɛ kà bya byanswà anki ibye anà ndöŋ. « Byanswà bàkyàpà mbwo mukyer », wɛɛ kà bya byanswà anki byàfàtɔŋ.
1CO 10:24 Wɛy mbuur ukɔ̈ɔ̈n aleŋ ubwaŋ ande ŋakwo mpɛl, wɛɛ uleŋ sye ubwaŋ a baar bumwɛy.
1CO 10:25 Indiir byanswà bàfàyälà u yà, làdi bya làkɔɔn asà mfuul ntɔn mukɔɔn atay an'kyän,
1CO 10:26 ntɔn bàsön naa: « Mɛɛn anà indiir byanswà abyà uboo, byà Mwol. »
1CO 10:27 Isàkal naa mbuur mpa awe anà làkwikilà kàmàlabel anà bɛ lan'kyey mukyà, làdi indiir byanswà kàlapà nde, ukɔɔn asà mfuul ntɔn mukɔɔn atay an'kyän.
1CO 10:28 Wɛɛ, isàkal naa mbuur an'tɛn abɛ naa: « Mi in'twaŋ myan'fà unsà ibɔɔn bàpɛ akà itɛk », twon lan'dyà wa, ntɔn mbuur kàlaweey anà ukɔɔn atay an'kyän.
1CO 10:29 Apà mɛ in'tɛɛnà anki ntɔn an'kyän abɛ, wɛɛ mànde. Ntɔn nkye an'kyän a mbuur asin itsüül ma nsaay amɛ nsaŋ?
1CO 10:30 Isàkal naa mɛ in'fàfuur an'tɔɔn ntɔn isaa in'fàdyà mɛ, ntɔn nkye in'bulà mɛ mbuur atwee ntɔn undiir an'fuur mɛ an'tɔɔn?
1CO 10:31 Abun, itàkal naa bɛ làkyer adyà, itàkal naa bɛ làkyer anwà, itàkal undiir wanswà làkyer bɛ, làkyer wanswà ntɔn làkoo a Nzam.
1CO 10:32 Twon lan'kal kyà ntɔn mbuur: itàkal ntɔn Ayudà, itàkal ntɔn Angɛlɛki, itàkal ntɔn Ikööŋ a Nzam.
1CO 10:33 Kyakin, mɛ ŋakwo in'fàkyer ngwal mupà un'sak akà baar banswà unsà indiir byanswà, kà ntɔn muleŋ ubwaŋ amɛ aŋàyen anki, wɛɛ ntɔn ubwaŋ a baar mbɔɔn, ntɔn ba bàwü mɔ̈ɔ̈.
1CO 11:1 Lan'yööl, asànaa mɛ ŋakwo in'fàyööl mɛ Klistɔ.
1CO 11:2 Mɛ amàlakan: bɛ làfàyɔbà mɛ unsà indiir byanswà anà mulab nswɛɛŋ asànaa kàlalɔŋ mɛ.
1CO 11:3 Apanà, mɛ in'kwen naa bɛ làyöb abà: Klistɔ wà mfum a mbuur wanswà, baal wà mfum a un'kaar, Nzam wà mfum a Klistɔ.
1CO 11:4 Baal wanswà afàyamà, itàkal afàtà ngɔɔm, un'tswe wàŋàfwee, nde afàpà nswɛn akà mfum ande.
1CO 11:5 Wɛɛ un'kaar wanswà afàyamà, itàkal afàtà ngɔɔm, un'tswe wà ipɔl, nde afàpà nswɛn akà mfum ande, ntɔn yà asànaa ntswee ande yàŋàkɔɔl.
1CO 11:6 Isàkal naa un'kaar ufwee anki un'tswe, wɛy bun'kɔɔl ntswe! Wɛɛ, isàkal naa yà nswɛn ntɔn un'kaar bun'tsül itàkal bun'kɔɔl ntswe, wɛy nde ubwäär itàmbalà!
1CO 11:7 Abun, baal ufwe anki un'tswe ande, nde wà ifà anà làkoo a Nzam, wɛɛ un'kaar wà làkoo a baal.
1CO 11:8 Ntɔn, kà baal anki bàtwey amu un'kaar, wɛɛ un'kaar bàtwey amu baal.
1CO 11:9 Baal bun'kyer anki ntɔn un'kaar, wɛɛ un'kaar bun'kyer ntɔn baal.
1CO 11:10 Lalan, un'kaar akyer abwaar isii a ikɔ̈b kà un'tswe ande, ntɔn akyeey.
1CO 11:11 Apan, un'kaar ukaabà anki anà baal, baal sye ifà imwɛy akà un'kaar, uboo a Mwol.
1CO 11:12 Ntɔn, isàkal naa un'kaar bun'twey amu baal, baal sye un'kaar kàmubɔr, yanswà yan'fà akà Nzam.
1CO 11:13 Làtsül bɛ ŋakwo, nkye yubwaŋ naa un'kaar uyamà Nzam ukɔɔn afwe un'tswe?
1CO 11:14 Nkye mɛɛn ŋakwo ifàlalɔŋ anki naa làkoo latɛy akà baal mukal anà ntswe a bwɛlàbwɛl?
1CO 11:15 Kyekà yà làkoo akà un'kaar, ntɔn ntswe bun'pɛ musyääl asànaa itàmbalà.
1CO 11:16 Wɛɛ isàkal naa mbuur akwen mutɔn nkääl ayi, bi ifà aki kyatɛy, itàkal kà Ikööŋ a Nzam sye.
1CO 11:17 Ntɔn ndaa ilääb yi, mɛ alakan anki, ntɔn nköŋ làfàsà bɛ, ya ifàlakyer anki ubwaŋ, wɛɛ ube.
1CO 11:18 Musɛmà, mɛ an'wem naa ye anà nkaabà uboo a bɛ umpal làfàsà bɛ nköŋ, mɛ an'kyey ikikye naa yà ndandaa:
1CO 11:19 yàkäl ubwaŋ naa nkaabà ikäl uboo a bɛ, ntɔn muyöb naa bànà abà aŋàlàkwikilà a ndandaa.
1CO 11:20 Wɛɛ umpal làfàkal bɛ u nköŋ, bɛ kà isaa a Mwol anki làfàdyà.
1CO 11:21 Ntɔn, utaaŋ adyà, mbuur mbuur afàdüül muwal isaa aŋàsöön ukɔɔn ayɔbà bumwɛy. Abun, umwɛy we anà ngyal, umpal wumwɛy wàmuyɔr.
1CO 11:22 Nkye bɛ ndwà yatɛy ntɔn mudyà anà munwà? Itàkal naa, nkye bɛ làbɛyà Ikööŋ a Nzam anà làkwen mumɛɛy baar bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n undiir nswɛn? Ininà mɛ alakyään? Nkye mɛ in'kyer alasyäŋà? Aay, u ndaa ayi, mɛ alàsyaŋà anki.
1CO 11:23 Ntɔn, le an'lɔɔŋ kàwɛl mɛ akà Mwol anà kàlalɔŋ mɛ: Mwol Yɛsu, u mpib bun'yälà, nde kàwɛl làmpà,
1CO 11:24 ungö mufuur an'tɔɔn, nde kàtsül la, waa kàtɛn naa: « Yi yà ndür amɛ, ayà ntɔn bɛ, làkyerà abà muyɔbà mɛ. »
1CO 11:25 Nde kàkyer abun, nde kàwɛl kɔɔb, ungö udyà mutɛn naa: « Kɔɔb là, là Nkwà akün unsà an'kil amɛ. Làkyer abun taaŋ lanswà làyanwaa bɛ, ntɔn muyɔbà mɛ. »
1CO 11:26 Ntɔn, taaŋ lanswà làdyaa bɛ làmpà alà anà lànwaa bɛ kɔɔb alà, bɛ làwàmukyään nkweel a Mwol, tii mpal usyefurà nde.
1CO 11:27 Lalan, mbuur wanswà asàdyà làmpà itàkal asànwà kɔɔb a Mwol ukɔɔn akal wàŋàpɔŋà, nde asàkal wàŋàlɛl kusà a ndür anà an'kil a Mwol.
1CO 11:28 Wɛy mbuur mbuur uler mpem ande ŋakwo kusà mudyà làmpà alà anà munwà kɔɔb alà.
1CO 11:29 Ntɔn mbuur adyaa anà anwaa ukɔɔn asà ndür nsɔ̈ɔ̈l, wàmudyà anà wàmunwà mbar ande ŋakwo.
1CO 11:30 Kyakin, uboo a bɛ bàŋukyal anà aŋatoo bà mbɔɔn, anà ndam yumwɛy yàkyàkwà.
1CO 11:31 Isàkal naa bi kan'syebà bi ŋakwo, bi nsaŋ bàlitsüül anki.
1CO 11:32 Wɛɛ Mwol afitsüül nsaŋ ntɔn mukifuur u mbwo, ntɔn bàkɔɔn akitsüül mbar mbwo mwɛy anà mɛɛn.
1CO 11:33 Kyakin, atɔŋ amɛ, utaaŋ làfàtüüb bɛ ntɔn mudyà, làdil bamwɛy anà bumwɛy.
1CO 11:34 Isàkal naa mbuur we anà ngyal, wɛy nde udi u ndwà ande, ntɔn nköŋ abɛ ikɔ̈ɔ̈n akàlatwääl ntaaŋàmbar. Ntɔn indiir byumwɛy, mɛ insàlɔ̈ɔ̈n utaaŋ in'sàyà mɛ.
1CO 12:1 Atɔŋ, mɛ in'kwen naa bɛ làkäl anà ngyööb ntɔn ndaa iler indiir a Dweelà.
1CO 12:2 Bɛ làkyàyöb naa umpal làkäl bɛ baar mpa abà Ayudà, bàlasyeenà ukɔɔn ayöb, ntsü akà bànzam a itɛk abà nkiin.
1CO 12:3 Kyakin mɛ alàkyään naa: akà mbuur mwɛy tɛy awà kan'kwo mutɛn u mbwo a Dweelà a Nzam naa: « Wɛy Yɛsu ukäl wàŋàküül! » Mbuur mwɛy tɛy kan'kwo mutɛn naa: « Mwol Yɛsu! », isàkɔɔn akal Dweelà In'kyɛɛl.
1CO 12:4 An'kab a kab a ngway mà mbɔɔn, wɛɛ Dweelà nsil wa.
1CO 12:5 Isal byà mbɔɔn, wɛɛ Mwol nsil wa.
1CO 12:6 Nsyääl yà mbɔɔn, wɛɛ Nzam nsil wa afàkyer indiir byanswà amu baar banswà.
1CO 12:7 Amu mbuur mbuur Dweelà afàmɛnà u mbwo a kab ntɔn ubwaŋ a baar banswà.
1CO 12:8 Dweelà afàpà akà mbuur umwɛy ndaa a an'yeerà, akà wumwɛy, Dweelà nsil awà afàpà ndaa a ngyööb,
1CO 12:9 Dweelà mwɛy nsil awà afàpà akà umwɛy làkwikilà, akà wumwɛy ikɔ̈b mukɔɔr aŋukyal.
1CO 12:10 Dweelà afàpà ngwal akà umwɛy mukyer impà, akà wumwɛy kab mutà ngɔɔm, akà wumwɛy musà nsɔ̈ɔ̈l unsà an'dweelà, akà wumwɛy mutɛn ndaa a ifà ifà, akà wumwɛy ntɔn mubaal ndaa ya.
1CO 12:11 Dweelà nsil mwɛy awà mpɛl afàkyer indiir abin byanswà, mupà akà mbuur mbuur kab a nsöön, asànaa ukwen nde.
1CO 12:12 Ndür yà mwɛy, itàkal naa itiir byà mbɔɔn. Wɛɛ itiir a ndür byanswà, itàkal naa bya byà mbɔɔn, bya ikyerà ndür mwɛy mpɛl. Abà, ya sye yà asànaa Klistɔ.
1CO 12:13 Ntɔn, bi banswà kàwɛl ndüümà unsà Dweelà mwɛy mpɛl amu ndür mwɛy mpɛl, itàkal Ayudà itàkal Angɛlɛki, asɔ itàkal baar a nsaay, bi banswà kànü unsà Dweelà mwɛy awunà.
1CO 12:14 Abun, ndür kà yàŋàkyer anki itiir mwɛy mpɛl, wɛɛ yà itiir mbɔɔn.
1CO 12:15 Isàkal naa làkɔl lan'tɛn naa: « Asànaa mɛ kà in'wà kɔɔ anki, mɛ uboo a ndür watɛy », nkye la làkyer ayàlwomà mukal itiir a ndür?
1CO 12:16 Isàkal naa tsü lan'tɛn naa: « Asànaa mɛ kà dii anki, mɛ kà in'wà uboo a ndür anki », nkye la làkyer ayàlwomà mukal itiir a ndür?
1CO 12:17 Yàlàkal naa ndür yanswà ikäl dii, ngweem ilàkal ken? Yàlàkal naa ya yanswà ikäl tsü, usɔŋ bàliweemà ken?
1CO 12:18 Wɛɛ Nzam kàsi itiir itiir unsà ndür, asànaa kàkwen nde.
1CO 12:19 Yàlàkal naa byanswà ikäl itiir mwɛy mpɛl, ndür yàlàkal ken?
1CO 12:20 Apà, itiir byà mbɔɔn, wɛɛ ndür yà mwɛy mpɛl.
1CO 12:21 Dii taaŋ atɛn tɛy a kɔɔ naa: « Mɛ mfun a ngye yatɛy », itàkal un'tswe utɛn a in'kɔl naa: « Mɛ mfun abɛ yatɛy. »
1CO 12:22 Kyekà, itàkal itiir a ndür ifàmɛnà naa bya byà gyɔ̈ɔ̈là gyɔ̈ɔ̈là, bya byà mfun,
1CO 12:23 abyà ifàman bi naa ndöŋ a mbɔɔn byatɛy u ndür, akà bya bi ifàpà nsyäŋà aŋàsöönà. Abyà ifàman bi naa bya ntwɛn yatɛy, bi bya ifàlɔ̈ɔ̈n ubwaŋàbwaŋ,
1CO 12:24 kyekà, itiir abye anà ntwɛn, byàfàkal anki anà mfun mulɔɔn bya. Wɛɛ Nzam ndür kàboom naa nsyäŋà mbɔɔn ikäl akà itiir abyà ifàmɛnà naa bya ndöŋ byatɛy:
1CO 12:25 ntɔn nkaabà ikɔ̈ɔ̈n akal u ndür, wɛɛ itiir byanswà ikäl ngyal mwɛy bamwɛy anà bumwɛy.
1CO 12:26 Isàkal naa itiir imwɛy kyà anà usaay, itiir byanswà byan'kab usaay aban. Isàkal naa itiir imwɛy bàmusyäŋà, itiir byanswà byan'saŋ anà nde.
1CO 12:27 Kyekà, bɛ làbà ndür a Klistɔ, umwɛy umwɛy wà itiir a ndür ande.
1CO 12:28 Kyakin, uboo a Ikööŋ, Nzam kàsi bàtàtwɛb antööm, bàyweel aŋangɔɔm, bàtär alɔɔŋ, ungö apan, kab a impà, kab a nkɔɔr, là mbaay, là ntwasà, anà kab mutɛn ndaa a ifà ifà.
1CO 12:29 Nkye ba banswà bà antööm? Nkye ba banswà bà aŋangɔɔm? Nkye ba banswà bàkyer afàlɔŋ? Nkye ba banswà bàfàkyer impà?
1CO 12:30 Nkye ba banswà bye anà kab a nkɔɔr? Nkye ba banswà bàfàtɛn ndaa a ifà ifà? Nkye ba banswà bàfàbaal ndaa?
1CO 12:31 Abun, làkäl anà ngyal a ngwal yan'kab masöönà ndöŋ. Ungö apan, mɛ in'yàlaswaŋ mbwo yan'söön ubwaŋ.
1CO 13:1 Isàkal naa mɛ an'tɛn amu ndaa a baar anà yà akyeey, wɛɛ isàkal naa mɛ ukwen batɛy, mɛ in'wà asànaa ishabà ifàsà làso itàkal nguŋ ifàsà làso.
1CO 13:2 Isàkal naa mɛ in'we anà kab mutà ngɔɔm, muyöb ngyee yanswà anà là ngyööb yanswà, isàkal naa mɛ in'we anà làkwikilà lanswà lan'kwo mutsum myɔŋ, wɛɛ isàkal naa mɛ ukwen batɛy, mɛ in'wà wà bunàbun!
1CO 13:3 Isàkal naa mɛ an'kab indiir amɛ byanswà akà aŋangyal, itàkal naa mɛ an'pà ndür amɛ u mbaa ntɔn muwal nsyäŋà, wɛɛ isàkal naa mɛ ukwen batɛy, akà undiir mwɛy in'wal mɛ watɛy.
1CO 13:4 Ukwen bà nkääŋ a mpem anà ubwaŋ, ba un'kɔl aŋàyɔŋ watɛy, bàfàswaŋ anki ngaal, bàfàkyey anki uyɔl,
1CO 13:5 bàfàkyer anki ndaa ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ndöŋ, bàfàleŋ anki bweel a ba ŋakwo, bàfàwem anki nkyɛl, bàfàfuur anki ube,
1CO 13:6 bàfàsaŋ anki unsà ndaa ikɔ̈ɔ̈n balàbal, wɛɛ bàfàsaŋ unsà ndandaa.
1CO 13:7 Ukwen bàfàfwe indiir byanswà, bàfàsà làkwikilà unsà indiir byanswà, bàfàsà làkyän unsà indiir byanswà, bàfàsɛn buur a indiir byanswà.
1CO 13:8 Ukwen bàfàkwà anki. Nkye ngɔɔm? Ya ikyer asàwà. Nkye ndaa a ifà ifà? Ya ikyer asàtsü. Nkye ngyööb? Ya ikyer asàwà.
1CO 13:9 Ntɔn ngyööb abi yà ndam, ngɔɔm abi yà ndam.
1CO 13:10 Wɛɛ mpal isàyà yàŋàkwo, undiir a ndam akyer asàtsü.
1CO 13:11 Mpal kàkäl mɛ umbɛy, mɛ kàfatɛɛnà asànaa umbɛy, mɛ kàfasii asànaa umbɛy, mɛ kàfayweerà asànaa umbɛy. Wɛɛ mpal kàbulà mɛ undweer, mɛ kàwɛy indiir byanswà byà imbɛy.
1CO 13:12 Apanà, bi imanà unsà làman abunaa, wɛɛ ilä kyàpaa isàman bi u mii a mii. Apanà, ngyööb amɛ yà itsu, ilä kyàpaa, mɛ in'sàyöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ asànaa Nzam kan'yöb nde.
1CO 13:13 Abun, apanà indiir byà indiir itär: làkwikilà, làkyän anà ukwen, wɛɛ, wà kölàköl uboo a bya, ukwen.
1CO 14:1 Làleŋ ukwen, làkäl anà un'kanà ntɔn indiir a Dweelà, sin sin ngɔɔm.
1CO 14:2 Ntɔn, mbuur afàyäm unsà ndaa mpa bàfàyɔb baar, ufàyäm anki anà baar, wɛɛ anà Nzam. Ntɔn akà mbuur mwɛy ufàyöb anki ndaa ande. Kyekà, u ngwal a Dweelà, nde afàkyään indiir aŋàyee.
1CO 14:3 Wɛɛ mbuur afàtà ngɔɔm afàyäm anà baar ntɔn mutɔŋ anà mupà ngwal.
1CO 14:4 Mbuur afàyäm u ndaa mpa bàfàyöb baar, afàtɔŋ nde ŋakwo, wɛɛ mbuur afàtà ngɔɔm afàtɔŋ nkööŋ.
1CO 14:5 Mɛ in'kwen naa bɛ banswà làtɛn u ndaa mpa bàfàyöb baar, wɛɛ mɛ inkwen mbɔɔn naa bɛ làsöönà mutà ngɔɔm. Mbuur afàtà ngɔɔm kan'söön mbuur afàyäm u ndaa mpa bàfàyöb baar, nà isàkal naa nde kan'baal ya ntɔn mutɔŋ làkwikilà a Ikööŋ.
1CO 14:6 Atɔŋ, bi itàsii apanà naa mɛ in'yàlaler anà mɛ in'yäm anà bɛ u ndaa mpa bàfàyöb baar, nkye mɛ in'sàkal mfun nà akà bɛ, isàkal naa ndaa amɛ yàlatwääl anki itàkal imɛɛy, itàkal ngyööb, itàkal ngɔɔm, itàkal an'lɔɔŋ?
1CO 14:7 Abun, ya yà ifà imwɛy asànaa indiir a ikwɛŋ, asànaa saay a mfuŋ itàkal naa nkwaay: Isàkal naa bya ikatoo anki byànsöön, abun baar bàyàyöb aben naa saay a mfuŋ anà nkwaay ininà itɛɛnà?
1CO 14:8 Abun, isàkal naa saay a mfuŋ làtwey anki ndaa ubwaŋàbwaŋ, nà kan'kwo muyöŋà ntɔn ità?
1CO 14:9 Ya ye abun sye ntɔn bɛ: isàkal naa làlem abɛ làtweyà anki ndaa a un'yɛnà, baar bàyàyöb aben ndaa làtɛɛnà bɛ? Bɛ làyàyäm amu un'pöb.
1CO 14:10 U mɛɛn mà ndaa a ifà ifà yà mbɔɔn, wɛɛ akà mwɛy tɛy uboo a ya ikɔ̈ɔ̈n mbuul.
1CO 14:11 Abun, isàkal naa mɛ in'yöb anki mbuul a ndaa, mɛ in'yàkal ungyey akà mbuur ayäämà, mbuur ayäämà ayàkal ungyey akà mɛ.
1CO 14:12 Abun bɛ sye, ntɔn bɛ làfàkal anà ngyal mbɔɔn yà indiir a Dweelà, làleŋ mukal abyà byàŋàsöönà, wɛɛ bya ikäl ntɔn ntööŋ a Ikööŋ.
1CO 14:13 Kyakin mbuur afàyäm u ndaa a ingyey akyer ayamà ntɔn muwal kab abaal ndaa ayin.
1CO 14:14 Isàkal naa mɛ an'yamà u ndaa a ingyey, dweelà amɛ làkayamà, wɛɛ un'yɛnà amɛ ubɔr anki undiir.
1CO 14:15 Waa mɛ in'kyer aben? Mɛ in'sàyamà unsà Dweelà, wɛɛ mɛɛ in'sàyamà sye anà un'yɛnà, mɛ in'sàtɔl an'diim unsà Dweelà, wɛɛ mɛ in'sàtɔl an'diim sye anà un'yɛnà amɛ.
1CO 14:16 Ntɔn, isàkal naa ngye an'sà nsaak anà Dweelà mpɛl, nkye mbuur awà uboo a baar bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n ngwem, an'kwo utɛn naa: « Abwɛy » unsà ngyamàkà angye yà an'tɔɔn? Ntɔn nde uyöb anki ndaa atɛɛnà ngye.
1CO 14:17 Yà ndandaa naa mfuur a an'tɔɔn angye yà ntsà, wɛɛ mbuur wumwɛy uyɛl anki unsà làkwikilà ande.
1CO 14:18 Mɛ an'fuur an'tɔɔn akà Nzam ntɔn in'yäämà mɛ u ndaa a ingyey yàŋàlyaaŋ bɛ banswà,
1CO 14:19 wɛɛ uboo a Ikööŋ, mɛ in'kwen mutɛn ngɔk tyeen unsà un'yɛnà amɛ, ntɔn mulɔŋ bumwɛy sye, akwànaa ngɔk nsaab kweem unsà ndaa a ingyey.
1CO 14:20 Atɔŋ, unsà an'kyän, twon lan'kal ambɛy. Ndandaa, làkäl ambɛy ntɔn ube, wɛɛ ntɔn an'kyän, làkäl andweer.
1CO 14:21 Unsà un'kɔɔn bàsön naa: « Mwol kan'tɛn naa: Akà un'sɛŋ wà, Mɛ in'sàtɛn u mbwo a baar a ndaa asin anà u mbwo a mun a angyey. Itàkal abun, ba mɛ bàsan'wem anki." »
1CO 14:22 Abun, ndaa mpa bàfàyöb baar yà idiim ntɔn baar mpa abà aŋàlàkwikilà, wɛɛ kà ntɔn aŋàlàkwikilà anki. Ngɔɔm yà idiim ntɔn aŋàlàkwikilà, wɛɛ kà ntɔn baar mpa abà aŋàlàkwikilà anki.
1CO 14:23 Isàkal naa Ikööŋ kyanswà kyan'köŋ, anà baar banswà bàyäm u ndaa a ingyey, isàkal sye naa baar asin itàkal baar bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n làkwikilà bà mwo, nkye ba bàyàtɛn anki naa bɛ làbà anà ukɔŋ?
1CO 14:24 Mper yumwɛy, isàkal naa ba banswà bàmutà ngɔɔm, mbuur asin itàkal mbuur akɔ̈ɔ̈n làkwikilà kan'bilà kwo, nde ayàman naa ba banswà bàtɛɛnà a nde anà bàtsüülà nde mbar.
1CO 14:25 Indiir aŋàyee u mpem ande imɛnà u mii, nde ayàkömà Nzam anà ayàkyään naa Nzam wà uboo a nde, nde ayàtüüb ntabwey ande anà mɛɛn, nde ayàkömà Nzam anà ayàkyään naa ndandaa Nzam wà uboo a bɛ.
1CO 14:26 Atɔŋ, bi itsülà aben? Utaaŋ làfàköŋ bɛ, mbuur mbuur uboo a bɛ an'kwo mutɔl diim, mutwaal an'lɔɔŋ itàkal imɛɛy, mutɛn ndaa a ingyey itàkal mubaal ya: wɛy ya yanswà ikäl ntɔn mutɔŋ Ikööŋ.
1CO 14:27 Isàkal naa baar bàyäm u ndaa a ingyey, wɛy abɔ̈ɔ̈l itàkal atär mpɛl bàyäm, anà bàkyer umwɛy ungö a wumwɛy, anà mbuur abaal ya ukäl.
1CO 14:28 Isàkal naa un'baal watɛy, wɛy un'tɔŋ ukäl a duu uboo a nköŋ, wɛy nde uyäm a nde ŋakwo anà a Nzam.
1CO 14:29 Akà aŋangɔɔm, wɛy abɔ̈ɔ̈l itàkal atär bàwɛl ndaa, wɛy bumwɛy bàsyebà.
1CO 14:30 Isàkal naa umwɛy uboo a nköŋ kan'wal imɛɛy, wɛy mbuur ayäämà ukäl a duu.
1CO 14:31 Bɛ banswà lan'kwo mutà ngɔɔm, wɛɛ mbuur mbuur utaaŋ ande, ntɔn baar banswà bàlɔŋàkà anà bàwɛl ngwal.
1CO 14:32 An'dweelà a aŋangɔɔm mà ungyɛl a aŋangɔɔm.
1CO 14:33 Ntɔn Nzam kà wà Nzam a lingyoomà anki, wɛɛ Nzam a duu. Asànaa bàfàkyer ya uboo a Ikööŋ byanswà byà aŋin'kyɛɛl,
1CO 14:34 wɛy akaar bàkäl a duu uboo a nköŋ: ba mbwo bapɛ anki mutɛn. Wɛy ba bàläb ayà itɛɛnà Un'kɔɔn.
1CO 14:35 Isàkal naa ba bàkwen muyöb undiir mwɛy, wɛy mbuur mbuur ufuul un'dim ande u ndwà. Ntɔn yà nswɛn naa un'kaar usi ndaa uboo a nköŋ.
1CO 14:36 Nkye ndaa a Nzam yàfü akà bɛ? Nkye ya bɛ mpɛl làwɛl?
1CO 14:37 Isàkal naa mbuur asii naa nde wà ŋangɔɔm itàkal wàŋadweelà, wɛy nde ukyey naa indiir in'kàlasöönà mɛ byà nswɛɛŋ mwɛy yà Mwol.
1CO 14:38 Wɛɛ isàkal naa mbuur mwɛy ukyeyà anki ya, iswaŋà naa Nzam kun'yöb anki.
1CO 14:39 Kyakin, atɔŋ amɛ, làkäl anà ilɛɛm mukal aŋangɔɔm, twon lan'tsuŋ mbuur mutɛn unsà ndaa mpa bàfàyöb baar.
1CO 14:40 Wɛɛ, wɛy indiir byanswà ikäl u mbwo anà byàswalaa.
1CO 15:1 Atɔŋ, mɛ alàyɔɔb Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ kàlakyään mɛ, alà làwɛl bɛ, alà làpɛ bɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ amu la,
1CO 15:2 anà u mbwo a la bɛ làsàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈ isàkal naa bɛ lan'kaar la asànaa kàlakyään mɛ, kya naa tɛy, bɛ làlàsà làkwikilà a bunàbun.
1CO 15:3 Mɛ kàtàlalɔŋ indiir atàtwɛb kàwɛl mɛ ŋakwo naa: Klistɔ kàkü ntɔn man'be abi, asànaa itɛɛnà Ndaa Aŋàsɔn.
1CO 15:4 Nde bàkyer un'dyee, waa kàwiyà kà ilä kyàtär.
1CO 15:5 Nde kàyàmɛnà akà Petɔlà, ungö akà Bàkwem Aŋiyweel.
1CO 15:6 Ungö apan, nde kàyamɛnà umbàla mwɛy akà atɔŋ aŋàsöön nkam tyeen. Bàmbɔɔn uboo a ba bye anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ tii papanà, bamwɛy bàkyàkwà.
1CO 15:7 Ungö nde kàkàmɛnà akà Zyak, anà akà antööm banswà.
1CO 15:8 Ungöngö a ba banswà, nde kàyàmɛnà akà mɛ sye, mɛ mwan mpa kàkölà nsöŋ.
1CO 15:9 Ntɔn mɛ in'wà wà ikikye uboo a an'tööm, mɛ in'kwe anki ban'bel ntööm, ntɔn mɛ kàmɛɛy Ikööŋ a Nzam nkwaaŋ.
1CO 15:10 Wɛɛ in'wà mɛ abà, mɛ in'wà ntɔn kab a ngway a Nzam, anà kab a ngway ande alà akà mɛ làkäl anki làbunàbun. Wɛɛ mɛ kàsäl aŋasöön ba banswà: kà mɛ anki, wɛɛ kab a ngway a Nzam alà amu mɛ.
1CO 15:11 Kyakin, itàkal mɛ, itàkal ba, undiir ikyäänà bi awà, undiir làsi bɛ làkwikilà.
1CO 15:12 Isàkal ban'kyään naa Klistɔ kàwiyà uboo a akü, ntɔn nkye bamwɛy uboo a bɛ ban'kwo ba mutɛn naa ngwiiyà a akü yatɛy?
1CO 15:13 Isàkal naa ngwiiyà a akü yatɛy, abwɛy Klistɔ kàwiyà anki,
1CO 15:14 isàkal naa Klistɔ kàwiyà anki, an'lɔɔŋ abi mà màbunàbun, làkwikilà abɛ sye là làbunàbun.
1CO 15:15 Apan, imɛnà naa bi ibà ambäl a Nzam bàloor, ntɔn bi kàtwääl imbäl asin mutɛn naa Nzam kàwiiy Klistɔ, wɛɛ nde kun'wiiy anki, kya isàkal naa ndandaa akü bàfàwiyà anki.
1CO 15:16 Isàkal naa akü bàfàwiyà anki, Klistɔ sye kàwiyà anki.
1CO 15:17 Ntɔn, isàkal naa Klistɔ kàwiyà anki, làkwikilà abɛ là làbunàbun, tii lalà bɛ làbà uboo a man'be.
1CO 15:18 Abun sye, baar bàkü amu Klistɔ bàkyàkyàbwà.
1CO 15:19 Isàkal naa bi kàsi làkyän abi amu Klistɔ ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ awà mpɛl, bi ibà baar a ngweel a ngyɛb aŋàsöön baar banswà.
1CO 15:20 Wɛɛ yà ndandaa naa Klistɔ kàwiyà uboo a akü anà wà mbɛŋ atàtwɛb uboo a baar bàkü.
1CO 15:21 Ntɔn, u mbwo a mbuur mwɛy ukwà waa bayi, abun u mbwo a mbuur mwɛy sye ngwiiyà a akü waa yàyi.
1CO 15:22 Ifà imwɛy baar banswà bàfàkwà amu Adam, amu Klistɔ sye baar banswà bàsàwal mɔ̈ɔ̈,
1CO 15:23 wɛɛ mbuur mbuur kà un'lwaaŋ ande: sɛmà akà Klistɔ, ungö, baar abà amu Klistɔ, utaaŋ a ngyeel ande.
1CO 15:24 Apan, ntsüü waa isàyà, mpal usàfuur nde imwol akà Taa Nzam, ungö mudwa imfum kyanswà, ikɔ̈b kyanswà, ngwal yanswà.
1CO 15:25 Ntɔn nde akyer ayaal, tii mpal usàsà nde ayiiŋ ande banswà ungyɛl a in'kɔl ande.
1CO 15:26 Un'yiiŋ a ntsüü bàsàdwà wà ukwà.
1CO 15:27 Ntɔn, nde indiir byanswà kàsi ungyɛl a in'kɔl ande. Wɛɛ utɛɛnà nde naa: « Indiir byanswà byà ungyɛl a in'kɔl », iswaŋà naa mbuur kun'syeel bya ungyɛl a in'kɔl mwo watɛy.
1CO 15:28 Umpal naa indiir byanswà ban'sà ungyɛl a Klistɔ, apan Mwan ŋakwo asàkal ungyɛl a mbuur kun'syeel indiir byanswà ungyɛl, ntɔn Nzam ukäl ya yanswà amu baar banswà.
1CO 15:29 Yàlàkal naa kà abwɛy anki, baar bàfàwal ndüümà ntɔn akü, ininà bàlàleŋ? Isàkal yà ipepey naa akü bàwiyà anki, ntɔn nkye bàfàwal ba ndüümà ntɔn ba?
1CO 15:30 Wɛɛ bi ŋakwo, ntɔn nkye taaŋ lanswà ibà bi u mpay?
1CO 15:31 Wɛɛ mɛ in'fàkwà ilä byanswà, yà ndandaa sye, atɔŋ, naa bɛ làbà uyɔl amɛ amu Yɛsu Klistɔ, Mwol abi.
1CO 15:32 Ininà mɛ kàlàwal munwan a ntsür u Ifɛsɔ isàkal naa mɛ kàkäl unsà imbuur? Isàkal naa akü bàwiyà anki, wɛy bi idi anà inü, ntɔn nkàswo bi ikyer akwà.
1CO 15:33 Twon bàlakür: isam ibe ifàbwiy nkääl aŋàbwaŋ.
1CO 15:34 Làfuur an'kyän ubwaŋàbwaŋ, làwɛy mukyer man'be. Ntɔn bamwɛy Nzam bàyöb anki, mɛ ya an'tɛn ntɔn nswɛn abɛ.
1CO 15:35 Wɛɛ mbuur mwɛy ayàtɛn naa: « Akü bàyàwiyà aben? Ndür nà ba bàyàfurà ayà? »
1CO 15:36 Insil! Ngye, imbɛŋ afàkɔn ngye, kya mumɛn itwab afàtàkwà.
1CO 15:37 Undiir afàkɔn ngye, kà un'tɛ awà uyàmɛn anki, wɛɛ imbɛŋ a ipɔl, kyà blɛ itàkal kyà undiir asin.
1CO 15:38 Ungö, Nzam kun'pà ndür, asànaa ukwen nde anà akà imbɛŋ imbɛŋ a ndür akya ŋakwo.
1CO 15:39 Akà ndür mwɛy balàbal yatɛy anà yumwɛy: ye anà nsöön uboo a ndür a baar, yà ntsür, yà nɛn, yà nsö.
1CO 15:40 Ye anà ndür a du anà ndür a mɛɛn, un'nyäŋ a ya wà nsöön,
1CO 15:41 umwɛy un'nyäŋ a taaŋ, umwɛy wà nsöŋ, umwɛy wà mbwaar. Mbwaar mwɛy wà nsöön a mbwaar wumwɛy unsà un'nyäŋ.
1CO 15:42 Ya ye abwey sye ntɔn ngwiiyà a akü: bàfàkɔn ndür ifàpɔɔn, ifàwiyà ndür mpa ifàpɔɔn.
1CO 15:43 Bàfàkɔn ndür a nswɛn, ifàwiyà unsà làkoo, bàfàkɔn unsà gyɔ̈ɔ̈là, ifàwiyà aŋàyɔl a ngwal.
1CO 15:44 Bàfàkɔn ndür a ntsür, ifàwiyà ndür a dweelà. Isàkal naa ye anà ndür a ntsür, ye anà ndür a dweelà sye.
1CO 15:45 Kyakin, bàsön naa: « Adam, mbuur atàtwɛb, kàkäl ntsür a mbuur, Adam wà ntsüü wà mbuur a dweelà afàpà mɔ̈ɔ̈. »
1CO 15:46 Wɛɛ undiir wàtàtwɛb, wà ntsür a mbuur, ungö, mbuur a dweelà.
1CO 15:47 Mbuur atàtwɛb kàfü u mɛɛn, mbuur wàyweel kàfü du.
1CO 15:48 Baar a mɛɛn bà ifà imwɛy anà mbuur bàboom a tɔm, baar a du bà ifà imwɛy anà mbuur kàfü du.
1CO 15:49 Ifà imwɛy naa bi kàbwäär ifà a tɔm, bi isàbwaar sye ifà a mbuur a du.
1CO 15:50 Atɔŋ, ndaa in'tɛn mɛ ayi: in'twaŋ anà an'kil màkwe anki mubilà kà Imwol a Nzam, itàkal undiir afàpɔɔn ufàwal anki undiir mpa afàpɔɔn.
1CO 15:51 Wɛɛ mɛ inkwen mukàlakyään ngyee mwɛy. Bi banswà isàkwà anki, wɛɛ bi banswà ikyer asàsɔɔmà,
1CO 15:52 u mbalà mwɛy, kà imbürà imbürà u saay a mfuŋ. Ntɔn saay a mfuŋ a ntsüü làkyer asàbɛɛr, akü bàkyer asàwiyà anà ndür aba mpa isàpɔɔn, wɛɛ bi, bi ikyer asàsɔɔmà.
1CO 15:53 Kyakin, yà naa ndür ifàpɔɔn ibwäär ndür mpa ifàpɔɔn, ndür ifàkwà ibwäär ndür mpa ifàkwà.
