1CO 15:54 Utaaŋ ndür ifàpɔɔn ayi isàbwaar ya ndür mpa ifàpɔɔn, anà ndür ifàkwà isàbwaar ya ndür mpa ifàkwà, abun isàkwo ndaa bàsön naa: « Iböŋ kyan'min ukwà.
1CO 15:55 « Ukwà, kyàken iböŋ angye? Ukwà, kyàken ikɔ̈b angye? »
1CO 15:56 Ukwà ngwal a ba man'be, ngwal a man'be, un'kɔɔn.
1CO 15:57 Wɛɛ bi ifuur an'tɔɔn akà Nzam, nde mbuur afàpà iböŋ u mbwo a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ.
1CO 15:58 Kyakin, atɔŋ amɛ bànkwen, làkäl ngwal, làkäl aŋàtsim, làpɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ taaŋ lanswà unsà isal a Mwol, làyöb naa isal abɛ unsà Mwol kà kyà bunàbun anki.
1CO 16:1 Ntɔn ndaa a an'kab bàköŋà ntɔn aŋin'kyɛɛl, bɛ sye làläb nswɛɛŋ kàpɛ mɛ akà Ikööŋ a Ngalàtyà.
1CO 16:2 Kà ilä atàtwɛb kyà mpɔsà wanswà, wɛy mbuur mbuur usi ukɔl u ndwà ande undiir kàkwe nde muyee ntɔn mukɔɔn adil ngyeel amɛ mukɔŋ an'kab.
1CO 16:3 Utaaŋ in'yàkal mɛ akun, mɛ in'yàtɔm baar làyàsɔɔl bɛ anà in'kaan ntɔn musyen an'kab abɛ u Yɛlusàlɛm.
1CO 16:4 Isàkal naa yà ubwaŋ sye naa mɛ ŋakwo in'kyen, ba bàsàkyà anà mɛ.
1CO 16:5 Mɛ in'yàyà akà bɛ musoonà Masɛdwan, ntɔn mɛ in'yàlyaaŋ kwo.
1CO 16:6 Taaŋ lumwɛy mɛ in'yàkal ndam a ilä itàkal paŋà a mpyee lanswà apà bɛ, ntɔn bɛ lan'pɛ indiir byan'kwo mɛ mulab mbwo amɛ.
1CO 16:7 Mbalà ayi mɛ in'kwen anki, mukàlaman taaŋ alyaaŋ mɛ mpɛl, mɛ in'kwen mubwaay anà bɛ ndam a ilä, isàkal naa Mwol an'pà mbwo.
1CO 16:8 Wɛɛ mɛ in'yàbwaay u Ɛfɛsɔ tii kà un'kyɔm a Pantɛkɔt,
1CO 16:9 ntɔn mbwo a kölàköl yan'dubà ntɔn mɛ mukyer isal a ngwal, itàkal naa ayiiŋ bà mbɔɔn.
1CO 16:10 Isàkal naa Tumàtɛ kan'yà, làkyer naa nde ukäl anà duu uboo a bɛ, ntɔn nde afàkyer isal a Mwol asànaa mɛ.
1CO 16:11 Abun, wɛy mbuur ukɔ̈ɔ̈n un'bɛy. Lun'pɛ byàŋàkwo ntɔn nde uyàfurà apà mɛ, ntɔn mɛ anà atɔŋ ibà mukun'dilà.
1CO 16:12 Ntɔn un'tɔŋ abi Apɔlɔs, mɛ kun'lɛɛl muyà akà bɛ anà atɔŋ bumwɛy, wɛɛ nde ukwen anki akà ikikye muyà apanà, nde asàyà mpal usàman nde mbwo.
1CO 16:13 Làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ, làkäl aŋàtsim unsà làkwikilà, làkäl anà un'kanà, làkäl ngwal.
1CO 16:14 Làkyer indiir abɛ byanswà unsà ukwen.
1CO 16:15 Atɔŋ, nswɛɛŋ yumwɛy ayi: bɛ làkyàyöb naa Sɛràfan anà ywar ande bà baar atàtwɛb mubuul mpem kà Akayi. Ba bàpɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ aba musyääl aŋin'kyɛɛl.
1CO 16:16 Lakyey, baar atub abà anà mbuur wanswà akääbà isal aba anà mpay aba.
1CO 16:17 Mɛ in'we anà un'sak muman Sɛràfan, Fɔrtünatüs anà Akayiküs. Ba bàfwe nkɔ̈ɔ̈n abɛ,
1CO 16:18 ntɔn ba bàlɛɛl mɛ anà bɛ. Làyöb mukan baar atub abà.
1CO 16:19 Ikööŋ a Azi byàmàlapà mbɔr. Akilas anà Priskà, anà Ikööŋ ifàköŋ u ndwà aba bàmàlatöm mbɔr mbɔɔn unsà Mwol.
1CO 16:20 Atɔŋ banswà bàmàlapà mbɔr. Làpɛɛl mbɔr bɛ a bɛ unsà ndüür a in'kyɛɛl.
1CO 16:21 Mbɔr ayi yà kɔɔ amɛ ŋakwo, mɛ Pɔl.
1CO 16:22 Isàkal naa mbuur ukwen anki Mwol, wɛy nde ukäl aŋàküül! Mwol abi, yà!
1CO 16:23 Wɛy kab a ngway a Mwol Yɛsu làkäl anà bɛ.
1CO 16:24 Mɛ bɛ banswà in'kyàlakwen amu Yɛsu Klistɔ.
2CO 1:1 Pɔl, ntööm a Klistɔ Yɛsu unsà ukwen a Nzam, anà un'tɔŋ Tumàtɛ, akà Ikööŋ a Nzam akyà u Kɔlintɔ, anà akà aŋin'kyɛɛl banswà abà u Akayi wanswà.
2CO 1:2 Wɛy Taaràbi Nzam anà Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ bàlapɛ kab a ngway anà duu.
2CO 1:3 Nsaak ikäl akà Nzam, Taar a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ, Taa a nsyääm anà Nzam a ndɛɛl yanswà,
2CO 1:4 nde afàlɛɛl bi unsà mpay abi yanswà, ntɔn mukipà ngwal mulɛɛl baar abà u mpay mbɔɔn, u mbwo a ndɛɛl ayà ifàwal bi ŋakwo akà Nzam.
2CO 1:5 Ntɔn, asànaa ifàman bi mpay mbɔɔn amu Klistɔ, abun sye u mbwo a Klistɔ, ndɛɛl abi yà mbɔɔn.
2CO 1:6 Isàkal naa bi ibà uboo a mpay mbɔɔn, yà ntɔn ndɛɛl abɛ anà ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ. Isàkal naa bi ibà aŋàlɛɛl, yà ntɔn naa bɛ sye làwɛl ndɛɛl ntɔn bɛ làkwe mukaŋ mpem anà muküünà, ifà imwɛy a mpay ifàman bi.
2CO 1:7 Abun, bi ibye anà làkyän a ngwal akà bɛ, ntɔn bi ikyàyöb naa làmanà bɛ mpay mbwo mwɛy anà bi, bɛ sye làwalà ndɛɛl mbwo mwɛy anà bi.
2CO 1:8 Atɔŋ, ntɔn bi ikwen naa bɛ làyöb naa mpay aŋàdiir nà bi kàbweey ayà kà Azi: ya yàkü kir, yàŋàlyaŋ ngwal abi ukwɛl, lalan ilwom ya làkyän mufàkal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
2CO 1:9 Bi kàmɛn amu bi ŋakwo naa bàmitsüül mbar a ukwà. Ntɔn bi ikɔ̈ɔ̈n afàsà làkyän amu bi ŋakwo, wɛɛ amu Nzam afàwiiy akü.
2CO 1:10 Nde mbuur kàduum bi kukwà abà anà akyer afàsiduum. Bi kan'sà làkyän amu nde: nde bi akyer afàsiduum.
2CO 1:11 Bɛ sye làkyàbilà mwo u mbwo a ngyamàkà abɛ ntɔn bi. Abun, kab a ngway alisàwal bi u mbwo a ngyamàkà a baar mbɔɔn, làsàbulà, ntɔn bàmbɔɔn, an'tɔɔn ntɔn bi.
2CO 1:12 Ntɔn, ngaal abi yimbäl a an'kyän abi aki: u mɛɛn, sin sin akà bɛ, bi kàkäl unsà ndandaa anà unsà un'kyɛɛl a Nzam, kà nà an'yeerà a imbuur anki, wɛɛ u mbwo a kab a ngway a Nzam.
2CO 1:13 Kyakin, bi indiir asin bɛ ifàlasöön anki, nà indiir làfàtaŋ bɛ anà làyöb bɛ. Wɛɛ mɛ an'sà làkyän naa bɛ làsàyöb aŋàkwo,
2CO 1:14 ntɔn bɛ làyöb ndam: bi ibà ngaal abɛ, asànaa làbà bɛ yà bi kilä a Mwol Yɛsu.
2CO 1:15 Unsà kam alan, mɛ kàkwen mutàlyaŋ akà bɛ ntɔn mukàlawɛɛl kab a ngway làyweel,
2CO 1:16 anà, fà apà bɛ, mɛ in'kyen Masɛdwan, anà fà Masɛdwan mufyefurà akà bɛ, ntɔn muwal akà bɛ indiir in'yàkal mɛ abyà mfun mukyà Yuday.
2CO 1:17 Umpal kàsi mɛ un'yɔŋ awà, nkye mɛ kàkyer upool? Itàkal naa nkye nswaal amɛ yà yimbuur, ntɔn ya ikäl umbalà mwɛy « inye » anà « ŋaa »?
2CO 1:18 Nzam awà lää, wà mbäl: Ndaa itɛɛnà bi a bɛ kà yumbalà mwɛy « inye » anà « ŋaa » anki.
2CO 1:19 Ntɔn Mwan a Nzam, Klistɔ Yɛsu awà kàlakyään bi, Silàvɛ, Tumàtɛ anà mɛ, kàkäl anki « inye » anà « ŋaa », wɛɛ amu nde yà « inye » mpɛl.
2CO 1:20 Abun, ilää a Nzam byanswà, byàmɛn « inye » a bya amu nde. Kyakin mbwo ande sye bi ifàtɛn naa « yabwɛy » akà Nzam ntɔn làkoo ande.
2CO 1:21 Wɛɛ, mbuur afàpà bi anà bɛ ngwal amu Klistɔ anà kisi an'kɔɔ, wà Nzam,
2CO 1:22 nde mbuur kibɛɛrà inyɛm ande sye anà kàbiil Dweelà u mpem abi asànaa mbööl a indiir aŋàbwaŋ abyà iyàyà.
2CO 1:23 Akà mɛ, mɛ an'wal Nzam mbäl udu a mɔ̈ɔ̈ amɛ: ntɔn mukàlatii waa mɛ mpa kàyàfurà u Kɔlintɔ.
2CO 1:24 Kà ntɔn muyaal làkwikilà abɛ anki, wɛɛ bi ibà mbaay ntɔn un'sak abɛ, ntɔn làkwikilà waa bɛ lan'tsim.
2CO 2:1 Ntɔn, akà mɛ, mɛ an'tsülà abà: Mɛ in'yàfurà anki akà bɛ unsà ngyɛb.
2CO 2:2 Isàkal naa mɛ amàlasà u ngyɛb, nà afàsampà un'sak? Nkye kà mbuur awà kàpɛ mɛ ngyɛb anki?
2CO 2:3 Akin isin a ndaa a un'kaan amɛ, mutiin naa u ngyeel amɛ, mɛ in'kɔ̈ɔ̈n aman ngyɛb akà baar bàlan'pà un'sak. Ndandaa, mɛ an'kyey, ntɔn bɛ, naa un'sak amɛ wà wàbɛ banswà sye.
2CO 2:4 Abun, uboo a mpay aŋàdiir, anà u mpem a ngyɛb anà nsaaŋ mbɔɔn, mɛ kàlasöön kà ntɔn mukàlapà ngyɛb anki, wɛ ntɔn bɛ làyöb naa ukwen nà mɛ in'we abà ntɔn bɛ.
2CO 2:5 Isàkal naa mbuur kàkäl isin a ngyɛb, nde kà mɛ usi anki u ngyɛb, wɛɛ bɛ banswà, taaŋ lumwɛy ndam, mukɔɔn asweey.
2CO 2:6 Ntɔn mbuur atub awà, ubwaŋ pɛl làkäl là baar mbɔɔn,
2CO 2:7 lalan, apanà, lun'dwääl nkul anà lun'pɛ ngwal, manà nde ubilà u ngyɛb aŋàdiir.
2CO 2:8 Kyakin sye mɛ amàlalɔm, muswaŋ ukwen abɛ akà ande,
2CO 2:9 ntɔn, kàlasöön mɛ sye, mɛ kàkwen mukàlasi naa nkye unkyeey abɛ unsà indiir byanswà wàŋàkwo.
2CO 2:10 Mbuur lan'dwääl bɛ nkul, mbuur in'dwääl mɛ sye nkul! Isàkal naa mɛ kàdwääl nkul, ikäl sye naa mɛ kàkäl anà ipöl mukyer abun, mɛ kàkyer ntɔn bɛ, kusà a Klistɔ,
2CO 2:11 ntɔn Satanà mukɔɔn akikur, ntɔn bi ikyàyöb an'kyän ande.
2CO 2:12 Utaaŋ kàkɔlà mɛ Tɔlɔwas ntɔn mukyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là Klistɔ, itàkal naa Mwol kan'duub mbwo a kölàköl,
2CO 2:13 mpem amɛ yàkäl anki a duu, ntɔn mɛ un'tɔŋ amɛ Titɔ kun'mɛn anki. Abun laa kàsawɛy mɛ, waa kàkyen Masɛdwan.
2CO 2:14 Wɛy an'tɔɔn màkäl akà Nzam afisyen taaŋ lanswà unsà iböŋ ande u mbwo a Klistɔ anà u mbwo abi, afàtsul may a usɔŋ a ngyööb ande u mper yanswà.
2CO 2:15 Ntɔn bi ibà ntɔn Nzam, usɔŋ aŋàbwaŋ a Klistɔ, ntɔn baar bàfàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà ntɔn baar bàfàdiimà,
2CO 2:16 ntɔn bamwɛy usɔŋ a ukwà bàfàsyen kukwà, ntɔn bumwɛy, usɔŋ a mɔ̈ɔ̈ bàfàsyen u mɔ̈ɔ̈. Abun, nà kan'kwo unsà isal atub aki?
2CO 2:17 Abun, bi kibà anki asànaa baar bumwɛy bàfàyälà ndaa a Nzam, wɛɛ unsà ndandaa, kikɔb a Nzam, kusa a Nzam, unsà Klistɔ waa bi iyäämà.
2CO 3:1 Nkye bi ifàsɛmà muswɛɛŋ bi ŋakwo? Itàkal naa nkye bi iwe anà mfun, asànaa bumwɛy, yà in'kaan muswɛɛŋ ntɔn bɛ, itàkal myàfà akà bɛ?
2CO 3:2 Wɛɛ bɛ làbà un'kaan abi, bàsön uboo a mpem abi, awà bàyöb anà bàtäŋ baar banswà.
2CO 3:3 Inye, yà ndandaa naa bɛ làbà un'kaan a Klistɔ bàsön ntɔn isal abi, bàsön anki anà tiin, wɛɛ anà Dweelà a Nzam a mɔ̈ɔ̈, kudu a mɛsà a nkɔŋ anki, wɛɛ udu a mɛsà a in'twaŋ, udu a mpem.
2CO 3:4 Lalà kam iwà bi alà kusà a Nzam u mbwo a Klistɔ.
2CO 3:5 Bi ikyey anki uyɔl naa bi ŋakwo kan'kwo mukyer undiir mwɛy u ngwal abi ŋakwo, wɛɛ ngwal abi yan'fà akà Nzam.
2CO 3:6 Nde sye mbuur kibuul bàŋàkwo mukal asyääl a Nkwà akün, kà ntɔn un'kaan anki, wɛɛ ntɔn Dweelà, ntɔn un'kaan akyer afàdwa, wɛɛ Dweelà afàpà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
2CO 3:7 Kyekà, isàkal naa isal a ukwà, bàsön a ngɔk udu a in'kul kyàpɛ làkoo, abun baar a Isàlɛl bàkwe anki musyebà mbɔɔn ntabwey a Mɔsɛ ntɔn làkoo làkäl u ntabwey ande, làkoo mpa làläm.
2CO 3:8 Ntɔn nkye isal a Dweelà mpa ikal kya anà làkoo aŋàsöönà?
2CO 3:9 Isàkal naa isal ifàpà ntaaŋàmbar kyàkäl anà làkoo, ntɔn nkye isal a balàbal mpa iwal kya làkoo aŋàsöönà?
2CO 3:10 Abun, undiir kàkäl anà làkoo kàwɛl anki làkoo, ntɔn làkoo aŋàbà làŋàsöönà.
2CO 3:11 Ntɔn, isàkal naa undiir mpa afàlam kàpɛ làkoo, aben undiir afàlam mpa upà wa làkoo aŋàsöönà?
2CO 3:12 Ntɔn bi ibye anà làkyän atub alà, waa bi iwe anà làkyän a mbɔɔn.
2CO 3:13 Bi ikyer anki asànaa Mɔsɛ kàfafwee ntabwey ande a ipfɛy a swaa ntɔn baar a Isàlɛl bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n aman ntsüü a un'nyäŋ mpa afàlam.
2CO 3:14 Wɛɛ, un'yɛnà aba kàkäl aŋàbwà làpib, tii ŋàbawà, kya bàsàtaŋ Nkwà Itaan, làpib alà là kapaa. La ŋàtàlwomà anki, ntɔn la làsàyaalà amu Klistɔ.
2CO 3:15 Inye, tii ŋàbawà, taaŋ lanswà bàfàtaŋ ba Mɔsɛ, làpib là u mpem aba.
2CO 3:16 Wɛɛ mbuul a mpem akà Mwol mpɛl ifàlwom làpib.
2CO 3:17 Ntɔn Mwol wà Dweelà, ikal awà Dweelà a Mwol, ikal ayà nsaay.
2CO 3:18 Bi banswà, baar ibye anà ntabwey aŋàlwom làpib, bi iwàmumɛɛy làkoo a Mwol, bi ibà aŋàsɔɔmà unsà isii nsil aki, anà làkoo làŋàsöön kölàköl taaŋ lanswà u mbwo a Mwol, awà Dweelà.
2CO 4:1 Ntɔn sye, u mbwo a nsyääm, bi ban'kaar isal aki bi ikwamà anki.
2CO 4:2 Wɛɛ bi kan'tɔn an'yee a nswɛn, bi, bi ifàsyääl anki impeenà anà bi ifàbübünà anki Ndaa a Nzam, wɛɛ mumɛɛy ndandaa ubwaŋàbwaŋ, waa bi ifàswɛɛŋ bi ŋakwo u nsyeebà a mbuur wanswà kusà a Nzam.
2CO 4:3 Isàkal naa apà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ abi làŋàfwe, la làŋàfwe ntɔn baar bàfàdiimà,
2CO 4:4 ntɔn baar bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n làkwikilà, waa nzam a mɛɛn mà kàsi làpib unsà un'yɛnà ntɔn baar bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n aman kyɛɛy a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ alà làkoo a Klistɔ, awà imɛɛy a Nzam.
2CO 4:5 Ntɔn, kà bi ŋakwo anki bi ifàkyään, wɛɛ bi ifàkyään naa Yɛsu Klistɔ wà Mwol anà bi ŋakwo ibà asyääl abɛ ntɔn Yɛsu.
2CO 4:6 Ntɔn Nzam awà kàtɛn naa: « Pɛɛlà làsànyäŋ uboo a làpib! », wà Nde ŋakwo kànyäŋ u mpem abi, ntɔn ngyööb a làkoo ande ipɛ kyɛɛy u ntabwey a Klistɔ.
2CO 4:7 Wɛɛ, un'naaŋ awà, bi wa ifàsyen unsà an'buuŋ, ntɔn ngwal aŋàsöönà ayi ikäl yà Nzam, wɛɛ kà yà bi anki.
2CO 4:8 Bi ibà aŋàküünà mper yanswà, wɛɛ bi kibà aŋàbwanà anki, unsà lingyoomà, wɛɛ bi ilwom anki làkyän,
2CO 4:9 bakyer afilab, wɛɛ bàfikaar anki, bàkyer afidüb, wɛɛ bàfimaay anki,
2CO 4:10 taaŋ lanswà ndür abi ye anà nkweel a Yɛsu ntɔn naa mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande ukäl sye wàŋàmɛnà u ndür abi.
2CO 4:11 Kyakin, taaŋ lanswà, bi aŋamɔ̈ɔ̈, bàkiyälà kukwà ntɔn Yɛsu, ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ a Yɛsu sye umɛnà u ndür abi yukwà.
2CO 4:12 Abun, ukwà bàmukyer isal amu bi, wɛɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ amu bɛ.
2CO 4:13 Kyekà, asànaa ibà bi anà Dweelà mwɛy la, dweelà a làkwikilà, abun bàsön naa: « Mɛ kàsi làkwikilà, kyakin kàyäm mɛ », bi sye, bi kan'sà làkwikilà, kyakin waa bi iyäämà.
2CO 4:14 Ntɔn bi ikyàyöb, mbuur kàwiiy Mwol Yɛsu, nde sye akyer afàsiwiiy anà Yɛsu, waa usisà anà bɛ tsütsü apà nde.
2CO 4:15 Ntɔn indiir abi byanswà byàyi ntɔn bɛ, ntɔn kab a ngway làbɛy, waa làsweey an'tɔɔn a baar mbɔɔn ntɔn làkoo a Nzam.
2CO 4:16 Kyakin, bi iyɔn anki, itàkal naa amu bi, imbuur a nsà kyàmutay ikye ikye, imbuur a boo ifàbulà kyàkün ilä a ilä.
2CO 4:17 Ntɔn, mpay mbɔɔn imanà bi yi, yikaay anà yàlyaŋ, kusà a làkoo a kölàköl là mbul a in'tye kilɔ̈ɔ̈nà mpay mbɔɔn ayi.
2CO 4:18 Abun, isin a an'kyän abi kà kyà unsà indiir byàfàmɛnà anki, wɛɛ unsà indiir mpa bàfàman. Indiir bàfàman byàfàlam anki, wɛɛ undiir mpa bàfàman byàfàlam mbul a in'tye.
2CO 5:1 Bi ikyàyöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ, isàkal naa ndwà abi u mɛɛn yà ntɛn yan'kwà, bi iwe anà ndwà, ntööŋ a Nzam, ndwà a mbul a in'tye, u du, mpa bàtöŋ kan'kɔɔ a mbuur.
2CO 5:2 Abun sye bi ibà mufuur koo, unsà ngyal aŋàdiir mubwaar, udu a yumwɛy, ndwà abi yà du,
2CO 5:3 yubwaŋ naa bimɛn bàŋàbwaar, kà bànsàpɔl anki.
2CO 5:4 Ntɔn, bi baar ibà uboo a ntɛn ayi, bi kan'fuur koo, kan'sil a buur. Ntɔn bi ikwen anki isɔ̈l ipfɛy, wɛɛ ibwäär ipfɛy udu a kyumwɛy, ntɔn undiir afàkwà, mɔ̈ɔ̈ kun'min.
2CO 5:5 Nzam ŋakwo kilɔ̈ɔ̈n mukal abun, nde kipɛ Dweelà ande asànaa mbööl.
2CO 5:6 Lalan bi ibà aŋàyɔl a làkyän taaŋ lanswà. Bi ikyàyöb naa utaaŋ ibà bi uboo a ndür yi, bi ibà u nsà a ndwà abi, ukwɛl a Mwol,
2CO 5:7 ntɔn bi ifàkyà unsà làkwikilà, kunsà mɛɛy anki.
2CO 5:8 Ndandaa, bi ibà aŋàyɔl a làkyän anà bi iyàkwen mulwomà u ndür yi, ntɔn mukàkal apà Mwol.
2CO 5:9 Lalan sye bi ikyer ngwal mukun'pà un'sak, itàkal naa bi ibà u ndür ayi, itàkal naa bi kan'too amu ya.
2CO 5:10 Ntɔn, bi banswà ikyer asàkàmɛnà kusà a làbay a nsaŋ a Klistɔ, ntɔn mbuur mbuur uwɛl kab a indiir kàkyer nde, itàkal amubwaŋ, itàkal amube, utaaŋ kàkäl nde u mɔ̈ɔ̈ a ndür ande.
2CO 5:11 Abà iyöb bi bɔɔmà a Mwol, bi ifàsyääl mbwo yanswà naa baar bàkyey. Kusà a Nzam, bi ibà aŋàmɛnà ubwaŋàbwaŋ. Mɛ in'sii naa mɛ sye in'wà aŋàmɛnà ubwaŋàbwaŋ unsà an'kyän abɛ.
2CO 5:12 Apan, bi iyàfàswɛɛŋ anki bi ŋakwo akà bɛ, wɛɛ bi ikwen mukàlapà ipöl bɛ mukal bàngaal ntɔn bi, ntɔn bɛ làkwe mupà mfuur akà baar bàfàsà ngaal aba unsà indiir ifàmɛnà u mii, wɛɛ kà byà boo a mpem anki.
2CO 5:13 Kyakin isàkal naa bi kàkäl insil, bi kya kàkäl ntɔn Nzam, isàkal naa bi ikàmɛnà asànaa aŋun'yɛnà, yà ntɔn bɛ.
2CO 5:14 Ukwen a Klistɔ bàmikɔr, bi baar ikyeyà naa ndandaa mbuur mwɛy kàkü ntɔn baar banswà, lalan baar banswà bàkyàkwà.
2CO 5:15 Nde kàkü ntɔn baar banswà, ntɔn aŋamɔ̈ɔ̈ bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n afàkal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ntɔn ba ŋakwo, wɛɛ ntɔn mbuur awà kàkü anà kàwiyà ntɔn ba.
2CO 5:16 Kyakin, fà apanà bi ifàyöb anki kà mbuur mwɛy unsà imbuur. Isàkal naa bi kàyöb Klistɔ unsà imbuur, apanà bi ifun'yöb anki abun.
2CO 5:17 Abun sye, isàkal naa mbuur wà amu Klistɔ, nde kan'bulà ikyeer akün. Indiir itaan byan'lyaŋ, le, indiir byanswà byan'bulà byàkün.
2CO 5:18 Indiir byanswà ifàfà akà Nzam, nde mbuur kàfuur un'tüüb abi anà nde u mbwo a Klistɔ anà kipɛ isal mufuur un'tüüb.
2CO 5:19 Ntɔn, Nzam kàkäl amu Klistɔ, kàfuur un'tüüb a mɛɛn anà nde ŋakwo, mukɔɔn alab ibii a baar anà musà amu bi ndaa mufuur un'tüüb.
2CO 5:20 Abun, bi ibà akyeey ntɔn Klistɔ. Ye asànaa Nzam nde ŋakwo abeelà u mbwo a bi: Kikɔb a Klistɔ, bi kàmàlabɔɔn, wɛy bɛ làfuur un'tüüb anà Nzam.
2CO 5:21 Mbuur mpa kàkyer man'be, Nzam kun'tälà buur a man'be abi, ntɔn amu nde bi ibulà bàbalàbal kusà a Nzam.
2CO 6:1 Ntɔn bi ibà abaay ande, bi kàmàlalɛɛl mukɔɔn awal kab a ngway a Nzam a bunàbun.
2CO 6:2 Ntɔn nde an'tɛn naa: « Utaaŋ aŋàbwaŋ, mɛ kàkyer awem, kilä a ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈, mɛ kàkyer abay. » Le, apanà là taaŋ aŋàbwaŋ. Le, apanà kyilä a ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈.
2CO 6:3 Bi ikwen anki, itàkal kaben, mubööl mbuur kyà, ntɔn bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n apɛl isal abi.
2CO 6:4 Wɛɛ akà bi, unsà ya yanswà, bi iswɛɛŋà bi ŋakwo naa ndandaa bi ibà asyääl a Nzam u mbwo a muküünà mbɔɔn amu mpay mbɔɔn, amu an'kyà, amu bɔɔmà aŋàdiir,
2CO 6:5 amu iki, amu an'bɔlokà, amu lingyoomà, amu yɔ̈ɔ̈n, amu nkɔ̈ɔ̈n a twaal, amu nkiin a isaa,
2CO 6:6 u mbwo a pɛɛl, u mbwo a ngyööb, u mbwo a nkääŋ a mpem, u mbwo a ubwaŋ, u mbwo a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl, u mbwo a ukwen a ndandaa,
2CO 6:7 u mbwo a ndaa a ndandaa, u mbwo a ngwal a Nzam, inwään abi byànwään anà byigyɛɛŋ, yà mukyer ndaa a balàbal u mii a Nzam,
2CO 6:8 amu làkoo anà nsaal, amu in'tswe anà nsyäŋà, bàfiwal asànaa aŋatwee, kyekà bi ibà bàndandaa,
2CO 6:9 bàfiwal asànaa biyöb anki, kyekà bàkiyöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ, bàfiwal asànaa akü, kyekà bi ibà anà mɔ̈ɔ̈, bàfiwal asànaa baar abuntaaŋàmbar, kyekà bi kàkü anki,
2CO 6:10 bàfiwal asànaa aŋangyɛb, kyekà taaŋ lanswà bi ibà kun'sak, bàfiwal asànaa aŋàlàmbwà, kyekà bi ifàkyer aŋin'naaŋ mbɔɔn, bàfiwal asànaa bi undiir watɛy, kyekà bi ibye anà indiir byanswà!
2CO 6:11 Atɔŋ a Kɔlintɔ, bi kàyäm anà bɛ u nsaay yanswà, bi kàladuub mpem abi kölàköl.
2CO 6:12 Bi kàladübà anki mpem abi, wɛɛ bɛ lidüüb mpem abɛ.
2CO 6:13 Apanà sye, mɛ in'tɛn a bɛ asànaa akà baan amɛ, bɛ sye làduub mpem abɛ kölàköl!
2CO 6:14 Twon lan'tüüb anà baar bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n làkwikilà. Un'tüüb nà kan'kwo mukäl uboo a balàbal anà ube? Un'tüüb nà uboo a pɛɛlà anà làpib?
2CO 6:15 Nkwà nà ayà uboo a Klistɔ anà Bɛlyar? Isam nà akyà uboo a ŋàlàkwikilà anà mbuur mpa awà ŋàlàkwikilà?
2CO 6:16 Undiir nà wun'tüüb uboo a idwà a Nzam anà bànzam a itɛk? Ntɔn bi, bi ibà idwà a Nzam a mɔ̈ɔ̈ asànaa kàtɛn Nzam ŋakwo naa: « Mɛ in'sàkal anà in'sàlyaŋ uboo a ba, mɛ in'sàkal Nzam a ba, ba bàsàkal un'sɛŋ amɛ. »
2CO 6:17 Kyakin, « Làtoo uboo a baar aban, làkäl ukɔl, twon lan'ba akà undiir mwɛy wàŋingyäy, waa mɛ in'sàlawal.
2CO 6:18 Mɛ in'sàkal taa ntɔn bɛ waa bɛ làsàkal baan abaal anà bakaar ntɔn mɛ. » Mwol aŋangwal yanswà.
2CO 7:1 Nkween amɛ, ntɔn bi kan'kaar ilää a tub abi, bi ipɔŋà bi ŋakwo u ŋingyäy yanswà yà ndür anà yà dweelà. Wɛy bi imay mubulà aŋin'kyɛɛl unsà bɔɔmà a Nzam.
2CO 7:2 Lipɛ ikal u mpem abɛ! Bi mbuur ube kàkyer anki, bi mbuur kàtay anki, bi undiir a mbuur kàduum anki.
2CO 7:3 Kà ntɔn mukàlapɛl anki waa mɛ in'tɛɛnà abwɛy, ntɔn mɛ ya kàkyàtàtɛn: bɛ làbà u mpem abi unsà ukwà anà u mɔ̈ɔ̈.
2CO 7:4 Làkyän amɛ là mbɔɔn amu bɛ, mɛ in'we anà uyɔl mbɔɔn ntɔn bɛ, mɛ in'wà aŋàyɔl a ndɛɛl, mɛ in'wà unsà un'sak mbɔɔn uboo a mpay abi yanswà.
2CO 7:5 Kyakin, utaaŋ ban'kɔlà bi u Masɛdwan, bi kànyäm anki, bi kàbwey a mpay yifà ifà: ngwiy u nsà, bɔɔmà uboo abi.
2CO 7:6 Wɛɛ Nzam, mbuur afàlɛɛl bàŋàlàbɔ̈ɔ̈n, nde kàlɛɛl bi u mbwo a ngyeel a Titɔ,
2CO 7:7 kà nà u mbwo a ngyeel ande mpɛl anki, wɛɛ u mbwo a ngwal kàwɛl nde akà bɛ, nde kàkyer isaam ntɔn ukwen abɛ bà ngwal. Nde kiyäm ngyal abɛ yà ngwal, yà nsaaŋ abɛ, yun'kanà abɛ ntɔn mɛ. Ya yanswà yàfan'pà un'sak aŋàsöönà.
2CO 7:8 Inye, isàkal naa un'kaan amɛ kàlapɛ ngyɛb, mɛ in'kyɛɛrà anki. Yàlàtàkal naa mɛ in'kyɛɛr, ntɔn mɛ imanà naa un'kaan awà kàlapɛ ngyɛb u taaŋ làmwɛy,
2CO 7:9 apanà mɛ an'man un'sak, kà ntɔn ngyɛb abɛ anki, wɛɛ ntɔn nsɔɔmà kan'bɔr wa. Ntɔn ngyɛb abɛ yàkäl unsà ukwen a Nzam. Kyakin, akà bi, bɛ làsàman anki akà ube mwɛy.
2CO 7:10 Ntɔn, ngyɛb unsà ukwen a Nzam ifàbɔr nsɔɔmà ayà ifàsyen u ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà ifàwɛy anki ipöl akà nkyɛɛr. Wɛɛ ngyɛb ntɔn mbääb a mɛɛn mà, ifàbɔr ukwà.
2CO 7:11 Làler apà undiir kàbör ngyɛb akà bɛ unsà ukwen a Nzam: muküünà nà! ndwääl a ube nà! ntöön a ube nà! bɔɔmà nà! ilään nà! un'kanà nà! ntaaŋàmbar nà! Unsà ndaa ya yanswà bɛ ŋakwo làkyàmɛɛy naa bɛ làbà akuun amu ya.
2CO 7:12 Abun, isàkal naa mɛ kàkyer alasöön, kà ntɔn mbɛɛy anki, itàkal kà ntɔn mbuur kàkyer ube anki, itàkal kà ntɔn mbuur bàmukyer ube anki, wɛɛ ntɔn muswaŋ kusà a bɛ, u mii a Nzam, un'kanà abɛ ntɔn bi.
2CO 7:13 Awà undiir kilɛɛl. Bi kà nà ndɛɛl aŋàyen mpɛl kàwɛl anki, bi kàsäŋ aŋàsöönà muman un'sak anà Titɔ ntɔn lun'tɔɔl bɛ mpem.
2CO 7:14 Ntɔn, isàkal naa kusà a nde, mɛ kàswɛŋ ngaal ntɔn bɛ, bɛ mɛ nswɛn lan'mɛɛy anki! Wɛɛ, asànaa ifàkyään bi bɛ ndandaa taaŋ lanswà, lalan ngaal kàswɛŋ bi ntɔn bɛ kusà a Titɔ yàmɛnà naa yà ndandaa,
2CO 7:15 ukwen ande akà bɛ bàŋàsöön mbɔɔn, sin sin nde usàyɔbà unkyeey abɛ banswà, ntɔn bɛ lun'wɛl unsà bɔɔmà anà matɛɛr.
2CO 7:16 Mɛ in'wà unsà un'sak musà làkyän amɛ amu bɛ.
2CO 8:1 Atɔŋ, bi ikwen naa bɛ làyöb kab a ngway alà kàpɛ Nzam akà Ikööŋ a Masɛdwan.
2CO 8:2 Itàkal naa ba bàkäl u mpay mbɔɔn, wɛɛ un'sak aba kàkäl mbɔɔn, lalan bàpɛ ba indiir aŋàsöönà, itàkal naa ba bàŋàlàmbwà aŋàdiir.
2CO 8:3 Mɛ in'wà mbäl: asànaa bään aba, itàkal aŋàsöönà, u mpem aba wanswà,
2CO 8:4 unsà mbɔ̈ɔ̈n yanswà, ba bilɔ̈ɔ̈m, asànaa kab a ngway, mubilà unsà isal mutɔm mbaay akà aŋin'kyɛɛl a Yuday.
2CO 8:5 Ba bàpɛ yàŋàlyaŋ an'kyän abi: ba bàpɛɛl ba ŋakwo, kusà akà Mwol, ungö akà bi, u mbwo a ukwen a Nzam.
2CO 8:6 Kyakin kàlɛɛl bi Titɔ mumay akà bɛ isal a nkääb aki, asànaa kàsɛmà nde kya.
2CO 8:7 Wɛɛ, ntɔn bɛ làbà aŋàyɔl mbɔɔn a indiir byanswà, làkwikilà, kab a ndaa, ngyööb anà mbämà yà ifà ifà anà yukwen làwɛl bɛ akà bi, làkäl sye bàŋàyɔl a nkääb ayi.
2CO 8:8 Mɛ kà nswɛɛŋ anki alapaa: wɛɛ alàyäämà mɛ mbämà a baar asin, mɛ amàlapà ipöl mumɛɛy naa ukwen abɛ bà ndandaa.
2CO 8:9 Ntɔn bɛ làkyayöb kab a ngway a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ: nde mbuur kàkäl ŋun'naaŋ, nde kàbulà ŋàlàmbwà, ntɔn bɛ, ntɔn, u mbwo a làmbwà ande, bɛ làbulà aŋin'naaŋ.
2CO 8:10 An'kyän amɛ ntɔn nkääb amà: yubwaŋ naa bɛ làsi muküünà, ntɔn bɛ làbà bàtàtwɛb, kà ntɔn mukyer mpɛl anki, wɛɛ sye ntɔn muwal an'kyän mukyer isal a nkääb aki sɛmà mbul kàlyaŋ.
2CO 8:11 Wɛɛ apà, làmaay, mukyer wa, abun nswaal abɛ yàŋàbwaŋ ikäl balàbal sye mumay unsà ukwen abɛ.
2CO 8:12 Isàkal naa an'kyän mà ndandaa ubwaŋ, Nzam afàkyey kab alà paa, ukɔɔn aler undiir mpa awà paa!
2CO 8:13 An'kyän abi kà mupfiy anki ntɔn un'sak a baar bumwɛy, wɛɛ ntɔn nsöön ikɔ̈ɔ̈n akal uboo a bɛ.
2CO 8:14 Apanà làbà bɛ anà un'naaŋ, bɛ lan'kwo mubay baar ban'kɔɔn wa. Ntɔn sye, ilä làsàkɔɔn bɛ wa anà ba bàsàkal anà wa, ba bàsàlabay. Abun, nsöön isàkal anki uboo a bɛ.
2CO 8:15 Kyakin bàsön naa: « Mbuur kàbwe mbɔɔn kàwɛl anki byàŋàsöön, mbuur kàbwe ikikye, undiir kàkɔ̈ɔ̈n anki. »
2CO 8:16 Mɛ an'fuur an'tɔɔn akà Nzam awà kan'sà u mpem a Titɔ un'kanà nsil awà amu bi ntɔn bɛ.
2CO 8:17 Titɔ kàkyey ndɔ̈ɔ̈m abi, unsà un'kanà wanswà, waa kàkyen mper akà bɛ unsà ukwen ande ŋakwo.
2CO 8:18 Mbwo mwɛy anà nde, bi ban'tɔm un'tɔŋ awà bàfàkan Ikööŋ byanswà ntɔn isal ande unsà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ.
2CO 8:19 Yà sye naa, Ikööŋ byun'sɔ̈ɔ̈l mukal un'baay abi u nkyeen uboo a nkääb ayi, isal ifàkyer bi ntɔn làkoo a Mwol ŋakwo anà muswaŋ an'kyän abi màŋàbwaŋ.
2CO 8:20 Bi ikal kigyɛɛŋ mutiin an'pɛl unsà nsyääl a un'kàbɔ a ngim ibà bi anà buur awa.
2CO 8:21 Ntɔn bi, bi ileŋà mukyer ubwaŋ, kusà a Mwol mpɛl anki, wɛɛ kusà a baar sye.
2CO 8:22 Mbwo mwɛy anà ba, bi ban'tɔm un'tɔŋ abi, awà ifàkyey bi un'kanà ande mbalà mbɔɔn, anà kan'fàswaŋ wa aŋàsöönà, ntɔn nde kan'sà kam akà bɛ.
2CO 8:23 Abun, Titɔ wà mbuur afàtüüb anà mɛ unsà làkwikilà anà un'baay amɛ unsà isal apà bɛ. Ntɔn atɔŋ bumwɛy ban'tüüb mbwo anà nde, ba bà antööm a Ikööŋ, ba bàfàsal ntɔn làkoo a Klistɔ.
2CO 8:24 Kusà a Ikööŋ, làswɛŋ naa bɛ làbye anà ukwen, naa bi kàkäl anà ibɔŋ muswaŋ ngaal kusà a ba.
2CO 9:1 Mfun yatɛy naa mɛ alàsöön ntɔn mbaay akà aŋin'kyɛɛl.
2CO 9:2 Mɛ in'kyàyöb an'kyän aŋàbwaŋ abɛ, waa mɛ kàswɛŋ ngaal ntɔn bɛ kusà a baar a Masɛdwan. Mɛ kakyään naa: « Akayi wàŋàyöŋà fà mbul kàlyaŋ », anà un'kanà abɛ kàwiiy nkääb a Ikööŋ mbɔɔn.
2CO 9:3 Apan, mɛ amàlatööm atɔŋ naa uyɔl in'we mɛ abà ntɔn bɛ bàkɔɔn akal bàbunàbun unsà ndaa ayin, ntɔn bɛ làkäl bàŋàyöŋà, asànaa kàtɛn mɛ.
2CO 9:4 Abun, mɛ in'yàman bɔɔmà, isàkal naa baar a Masɛdwan ban'yà anà mɛ, anà ba bàmɛn naa bɛ bàŋàtàyöŋà anki, naa mpem ifàlasyeel bi ibulà nswɛn abi, mukɔɔn atɛn naa yà bɛ.
2CO 9:5 Abun, mɛ kàmɛn naa yubwaŋ mulɔm akà atɔŋ abà mufwel akà bɛ kusà a mɛ ntɔn muköŋà an'kab abɛ, isal a an'kab làpɛ bɛ ilää kusà. Kyakin, ma iyàkal màŋàyöŋà utaaŋ in'yàyà mɛ, anà iyàswaŋ naa bɛ làfàpà unsà un'sak, wɛɛ kumpem un'be anki.
2CO 9:6 Apan, làyöb naa: mbuur afàkɔn ikikye, afàbwo sye ikikye, mbuur afàkɔn mbɔɔn, afàbwo sye mbɔɔn.
2CO 9:7 Wɛy mbuur mbuur upɛ asànaa kan'tsul mpem ande, kunkyɛɛr anki, itàkal unkaak a ngwal anki, ntɔn Nzam afàkwen mbuur afàpà unsà un'sak.
2CO 9:8 Nzam we anà ikɔ̈b mukàlayööl a an'kab a ngway mifà ifà, ntɔn u taaŋ lanswà anà unsà ndaa yanswà, bɛ làwɛl indiir làbà bɛ abyà mfun, anà làfàkal anà indiir aŋàsöönà ntɔn isal aŋàbwaŋ kyanswà,
2CO 9:9 asànaa bàsön naa: « Nde kàkyer akab, nde kàpɛ akà aŋàlàmbwà, balàbal ande lipepey. »
2CO 9:10 Kyekà mbuur afàpà nkɔɔn akà un'köön anà làmpà adyà, asàlapà sye nkɔɔn, nde asàbuul ya mbɔɔn, anà asàyɛɛl mbɛŋ a balàbal abɛ.
2CO 9:11 Abun, bɛ làyàkal aŋin'naaŋ ntɔn nkääb yanswà, nkääb ifàbɔr an'tɔɔn akà Nzam, u mbwo a bi.
2CO 9:12 Ntɔn, isal a nkääb aki kà iyàkal ntɔn mumay ngyal aŋin'kyɛɛl mpɛl anki, wɛɛ musweey ngyamàkà a an'tɔɔn mbɔɔn akà Nzam.
2CO 9:13 Mpal bàyàman ba ntal a isal aki, ba bàyàsà Nzam làkoo ntɔn unkyeey làswaŋà bɛ ntɔn Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ a Klistɔ, anà ntɔn nkääb abɛ akà ba anà akà baar banswà.
2CO 9:14 U ngyamàkà aba ntɔn bɛ, ba bàyàlaswaŋ ukwen aba, ntɔn kab a ngway aŋàsöön kàlapɛ Nzam.
2CO 9:15 An'tɔɔn akà Nzam ntɔn kab ande lifà asin.
2CO 10:1 Mɛ, Pɔl, mɛ an'lɔm akà bɛ, unsà làbɔ̈ɔ̈n anà ubwaŋ a Klistɔ, - bää mɛ in'fàkal unsà un'kaay u mii abɛ, wɛɛ wàŋàtsim mpal in'fàkal mɛ ukwɛl,
2CO 10:2 mɛ amàlabɔɔn: twon làman'siinà a ngwal utaaŋ in'yàkal mɛ paa, ntɔn ndaa a ngwal in'kwo mɛ muswaŋ akà baar bàfàsi naa nsyeel a mpem abi yunsà imbuur.
2CO 10:3 Ndandaa, bi ibà baar, wɛɛ bi ifànwan anki unsà ndür.
2CO 10:4 Ntɔn an'tà ifànwan bi amà kà mimbuur anki, wɛɛ ngwal ama yan'fà akà Nzam ntɔn mubwiy ikal a ngwal. Bi ifàpay an'yweerà an'be,
2CO 10:5 anà ngwal yanswà ifàmbäär ngyööb a Nzam. Bi ifàkɔr an'kyän manswà ntɔn ma ikyey Klistɔ.
2CO 10:6 Bi ibàŋàyöŋà mupà ntaaŋàmbar akà unkwem banswà, umpal làsàmɛy bɛ unkyeey abɛ wàŋàkwo.
2CO 10:7 Làler indiir asànaa ibyà bya. Isàkal naa we anà mbuur akakyeyà uyɔl naa nde wà Klistɔ, wɛy nde uyweer anà uyöb naa: bi sye ibà bà Klistɔ asànaa nde!
2CO 10:8 Abun, itàkal naa mɛ in'we anà uyɔl aŋàsöönà ikye unsà ikɔ̈b kipɛ Mwol ntɔn mutɔŋ, kà ntɔn mudwa anki, mɛ nswɛn in'yàman anki.
2CO 10:9 Mɛ in'kwen anki mukal anà ifà mupà bɛ bɔɔmà unsà in'kaan amɛ,
2CO 10:10 ntɔn, bàfàtɛn naa: « In'kaan ande myàfàkal ngwal anà myàfàpà bɔɔmà, wɛɛ umpal awà nde paa, nde wàgyɔ̈ɔ̈là, ndaa ande ndöŋ yatɛy. »
2CO 10:11 Wɛɛ mbuur akatɛɛnà abwɛy, uyöb ubwaŋ naa: asànaa ibà bi unsà in'kaan abi ukwel, bi sye iyàkal abun u nsyääl abi utaaŋ iyàkal bi uboo a bɛ.
2CO 10:12 Ndandaa, bi ikwe anki musi a baar bumwɛy abà bàfàswɛɛŋ ba ŋakwo. Ba bà insil: ba bàfàwal ba ŋakwo asànaa isii musi a ba ŋakwo.
2CO 10:13 Wɛɛ akà bi, bi iyàlyaŋ anki isii unsà ngaal ifàswaŋ bi, wɛɛ bi, bi iyàsyääl isii a ndel a isal kisyeel Nzam, mukitwääl sye tii akà bɛ.
2CO 10:14 Ntɔn, bi ilyaŋ anki ndel abi, asànaa bi kàyi anki akà bɛ. Ndandaa bi ibà baar atàtwɛb bàtöl apà bɛ anà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là Klistɔ.
2CO 10:15 Abun, bi ngaal aŋàsöönà ifàswaŋ anki unsà isal a mbuur asin, wɛɛ bi ibye anà làkyän naa làkwikilà abɛ làsàyɛl, bi iyàfàyɛl aŋàsöönà uboo a bɛ, unsà ndel a isal abi,
2CO 10:16 mukyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ uboo a itiir abyukwel anà bɛ, mukɔɔn aswaŋ ngaal unsà isal bàkyer u ywaŋ a baar asin.
2CO 10:17 Apan sye, bàsön naa: « Wɛy mbuur aswaŋà ngaal, uswɛŋ ngaal ande unsà Mwol. »
2CO 10:18 Abun, kà bàfàkyey mbuur afàswɛɛŋ nde ŋakwo anki, wɛɛ mbuur awà ufàswɛɛŋ Mwol.
2CO 11:1 Aa! Mɛ amàlabɔɔn mukaŋ mpem ntɔn undiir akamɛnà asànaa kikɔŋ amɛ! Ndandaa, làkäŋ mpem ntɔn mɛ!
2CO 11:2 Mɛ in'we anà un'köl ntɔn bɛ, un'köl kan'fà akà Nzam, ntɔn mɛ kàlatɛɛl ntüün a baal mwɛy mpɛl, ntɔn mukàlaswaŋ akà Klistɔ asànaa un'kaar mpa aŋàtàyöb baal, wàŋàpɔŋà.
2CO 11:3 Wɛɛ, mɛ in'we anà bɔɔmà muman naa an'kyän abɛ itäy anà ukwen abɛ ntɔn Klistɔ bàdiimà, asànaa ntäy kàkür nde Ɛva u mbwo a impeenà ande.
2CO 11:4 Kyakin, bɛ làkyer akyeyà ubwaŋàbwaŋ naa mbuur mwɛy uyàlakyään Yɛsu a nsöön a Nde akwà kàlakyään bi. Bɛ làfàkyey sye muwal dweelà anà làsaŋ a nsöön a Dweelà anà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ làwɛl bɛ akà bi.
2CO 11:5 Kyekà, mɛ in'sii naa mɛ kin'wà kimbuur anki kusà a antööm akwà bàfàkyey naa ba bà baar a baar.
2CO 11:6 Isàkal naa mɛ in'kwo anki unsà tweey, wɛɛ mɛ in'we anà ngyööb. Bi bàkyàlaswaŋ yanswà ubwaŋàbwaŋ amu indiir byanswà.
2CO 11:7 Nkye mɛ kàkyer man'be mutyà mɛ ŋakwo ntɔn bɛ làlär, umpal kàlakyään mɛ a ngway Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ a Nzam?
2CO 11:8 Mɛ kàmay un'naaŋ a Ikööŋ byumwɛy, muwal làfur akà ba ntɔn musyääl bɛ.
2CO 11:9 Umpal kàkäl mɛ akà bɛ, anà kàkäl mɛ anà ngyal a undiir, mɛ kàpɛ anki buur amɛ kan'kɔɔ a mbuur mwɛy, ntɔn atɔŋ bàfü Masɛdwan ban'pɛ undiir wanswà kàkäl mɛ awà mfun. Unsà ya yanswà, mɛ kàkäl kigyɛɛŋ mukɔɔn akal buur ntɔn bɛ, mɛ in'yàlalà abun ubwaŋàbwaŋ.
2CO 11:10 U mbwo a ndandaa a Klistɔ ayà amu mɛ, mɛ an'kyey naa: kà mbuur mwɛy watɛy kan'duum ndaa a làkoo ayi kitiir a Akayi.
2CO 11:11 Ntɔn nkye? Ntɔn mɛ bɛ kàlakwen anki? Nzam akyàyöb!
2CO 11:12 Abun, mɛ in'yàlalà mukyer asànaa in'kakyerà mɛ apanà, ntɔn mudübà mbwo akà baar bàleŋà mbwo mukyey uyɔl naa ba bà asànaa bi!
2CO 11:13 Ntɔn baar aban bà antööm a loor, baar a isal a loor bàŋàyee ungö a antööm a Klistɔ.
2CO 11:14 Wa kundiir a ubem anki: Satanà ŋakwo afàyee amu un'kyeey a pɛɛlà.
2CO 11:15 Abun, kundiir a kölàköl anki ntɔn asyääl ande bàyee uboo a asyääl a balàbal. Ntsüü aba isàkal asànaa isal aba.
2CO 11:16 Mɛ an'fàfuur, mbuur twon an'si naa mɛ in'wà ŋukɔŋ. Itàkal abwɛy, làkyey naa mɛ in'käl ŋukɔŋ, ntɔn mɛ sye in'kyey ndam a uyɔl.
2CO 11:17 Ayà in'kwen mɛ mutɛn, kasànaa ukwen Mwol anki, wɛɛ asànaa ŋukɔŋ, ntɔn ya yà ntɔn muswaŋ ngaal.
2CO 11:18 Ntɔn bàmbɔɔn bàfàswaŋ ngaal unsà ndaa a imbuur, mɛ sye in'swaŋ ngaal.
2CO 11:19 Bɛ aŋan'yeerà, bɛ làfàkyey baar bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n an'yeerà ukɔɔn apeen.
2CO 11:20 Abun, bɛ làfàkaŋ mpem naa bàlabuul asɔ, bàlamɛɛy ntaan, bàlapfiy, bàlasaal, bàlakäm mbar u ntabwey.
2CO 11:21 Mɛ in'wà u nswɛn mutɛn naa: bi kàswɛŋ naa bi ibà aŋagyɔ̈ɔ̈là. Kyekà, mbuur usàkyer kyääl mutɛn, - mɛ in'tɛn asànaa ŋukɔŋ - mɛ sye in'kyer kyääl mutɛn.
2CO 11:22 Nkye ba bà Bɛbɛlyɔ? Anà mɛ sye. Nkye ba bà Bisàlɛl? Anà mɛ sye. Nkye ba bikyee a Abàlam? Anà mɛ sye.
2CO 11:23 Nkye ba basyääl a Klistɔ? Mɛ in'tɛn asànaa ŋukɔŋ, mɛ in'wà aŋàsöön ba! Ntɔn, mɛ kàmɛn mpay aŋàsöönà, mɛ kàbilà bɔlokà mbalà mbɔɔn, mɛ ban'düb aŋàsöönà mbɔɔn, mbalà mbɔɔn mɛ kàbweey a igɔnsà a ukwà.
2CO 11:24 Ayudà ban'käm iki an'kwem an'tär aŋiwà mbalà tyeen,
2CO 11:25 an'füm mbalà tär, in'kul mbalà mwɛy, mɛ kàminà kan'dà mbalà tär, mɛ kàkyer mwäänà mwɛy anà mpib mwɛy uboo a ngyäl.
2CO 11:26 Mbalà mbɔɔn mɛ kàkäl u nkyeen kin'kɔl, mɛ kàbweey a igɔnsà mbɔɔn: igɔnsà a ngyäl, igɔnsà a baar abɛ, igɔnsà a atɔŋ a itoo amɛ, igɔnsà a baar mpa abà Ayudà, igɔnsà uboo a an'bul, igɔnsà u nsye a ipɔl, igɔnsà udu a ngyäl anà igɔnsà uboo a atɔŋ a loor,
2CO 11:27 amu yɔ̈ɔ̈n anà mpay mbɔɔn, mbalà mbɔɔn ukɔɔn twaal, amu ngyal anà mfyää, mbalà mbɔɔn amu nkin a isaa, amu mpye anà làmbwà.
2CO 11:28 Ukɔɔn aler indiir byumwɛy, buur amɛ bilä a ilä bà nkyɛɛr ntɔn ikööŋ byanswà.
2CO 11:29 Nà awe anà gyɔ̈ɔ̈là, waa mɛ in'kɔ̈ɔ̈n gyɔ̈ɔ̈là? Nà kan'bwà u man'be, waa mɛ in'kɔ̈ɔ̈n akyɛɛr?
2CO 11:30 Isàkal naa mɛ in'swaŋ ngaal, mɛ ngaal in'swaŋ unsà gyɔ̈ɔ̈là amɛ.
2CO 11:31 Nzam, Taar a Mwol Yɛsu, awàŋasaak ntɔn mbul a in'tye, akyàyöb naa mɛ loor in'taa anki.
2CO 11:32 Mpal kàkäl mɛ u Damas, kuvernɔ̈ɔ̈r kàkäl un'kyeey a mfum Arɛtas kàsi aseey u minàmbwo a bul ntɔn mukan'kɔr.
2CO 11:33 Wɛɛ, u mbwo a mun a nɛl a ibää a làpaŋ, laa ban'tyeey ba uboo a un'tɛr, waa mɛ kàsɔrà kan'kɔɔ ande.
2CO 12:1 Nkye yubwaŋ muswaŋ ngaal? Ŋaa, ndöŋ yatɛy! Wɛɛ apanà, wɛy mɛ in'tɛn ntɔn ndaa kan'swɛŋ Mwol u imanmii anà u imɛɛy.
2CO 12:2 Mɛ in'yöb mbuur mwɛy amu Klistɔ awà, yan'lyaŋ mbul kwem aŋinà, bun'syeen tii u du làtär, nkye yàkäl amu ndür ande? mɛ in'yöb anki, nkye yàkäl u nsà a ndür ande? mɛ in'yöb anki, Nzam ayöb ya.
2CO 12:3 Ndandaa, mɛ in'yöb naa mbuur awà, - nkye yàkäl amu ndür ande? nkye yàkäl anki amu ndür ande? mɛ in'yöb anki, Nzam ayöb ya, -
2CO 12:4 bun'syen tii u paladisɔ, waa kàwem ndaa mpa bàfàbuul, ndaa mpa bàpɛ mbuur mbwo muywel ya.
2CO 12:5 Ntɔn mbuur atub awunà mɛ in'swaŋ ngaal, wɛɛ ntɔn mɛ, mɛ ngaal amɛ in'yàswaŋ nà unsà gyɔ̈ɔ̈là amɛ.
2CO 12:6 Yàlàkal naa mɛ in'kwen muswaŋ ngaal, mɛ kàlàkal anki ŋukɔŋ, ntɔn mɛ kàlàtɛn ndandaa. Wɛɛ mɛ an'tɔn mukyer abun, ntɔn mukɔɔn aman amu mɛ an'kyän aŋàsöön amà bàfàman ba itàkal bàfàwem ba akà mɛ.
2CO 12:7 Apan sye, ntɔn mɛ in'kɔ̈ɔ̈n ayɔl a uyɔl ntɔn kàwɛl mɛ imɛɛy kyan'söön ubwaŋ, ban'si itoor u ndür, asànaa un'kyeey a Satanà bàsɔ̈ɔ̈l mukan'düb anà mukan'dübà mbwo mukyey uyɔl.
2CO 12:8 Mɛ kàbɔ̈ɔ̈n Mwol mbalà tär ntɔn mukan'lwom itoor aki.
2CO 12:9 Wɛɛ nde kan'fuur naa: « Kab a ngway amɛ lan'kwo akà ngye, ntɔn ngwal amɛ ifàmɛnà yàŋàkwo unsà gyɔ̈ɔ̈là. » Abun, unsà un'sak wanswà, mɛ in'yàswaŋ ngaal amɛ unsà gyɔ̈ɔ̈là amɛ, ntɔn ngwal a Klistɔ ikäl amu mɛ.
2CO 12:10 Kyakin un'sak amɛ wamu gyɔ̈ɔ̈là, amu in'tswe, amu in'siinà, amu nkwaaŋ anà amu bɔɔmà aŋàdiir ntɔn Klistɔ. Ntɔn umpal in'wà mɛ unsà gyɔ̈ɔ̈là, apan sye in'wà mɛ anà ngwal.
2CO 12:11 Le mɛ an'bulà ŋukɔŋ! Bɛ lan'siinà a ngwal, bɛ baar làlan'tɛɛl imbäl. Ntɔn, itàkal naa mɛ in'wà undiir a bunàbun, mɛ kin'wà anki u ngyɛl a antööm abà bàfàmɛnà naa ba bà udu.
2CO 12:12 Idiim abyà ifàswaŋ naa mbuur wà ntööm byàmɛnà uboo abɛ: nkääŋ a mpem unsà ndɛb yanswà, idiim, impà anà isal a ngwal.
2CO 12:13 Undiir nà bɛ mpa làwɛl asànaa ikööŋ byumwɛy, nà mɛ mukɔɔn akal buur ntɔn bɛ? Lan'dwääl nkul ntɔn nkɔ̈ɔ̈n a balàbal ayi!
2CO 12:14 Le, mɛ in'wà tsütsü muyà akà bɛ mbalà yàtär, anà mɛ in'yàkal anki buur abɛ: ntɔn mɛ in'lɛŋà anki indiir abɛ, wɛɛ bɛ ŋakwo. Kà buur a baan anki musà indiir ukɔl ntɔn aböör, wɛɛ aböör ntɔn baan.
2CO 12:15 Ntɔn mɛ, mɛ in'pà indiir amɛ byanswà anà mɛ ŋakwo wanswà ntɔn bɛ. Isàkal naa mɛ in'fàlakwen mbɔɔn, nkye mɛ bàyan'kwen ikikye?
2CO 12:16 Itàkal naa mɛ kàkäl anki buur ntɔn bɛ, wɛɛ bàtɛn naa mɛ in'wà ikur baar, waa mɛ kàlakör u mbwo a impeenà.
2CO 12:17 Aben, nkye mɛ kàkyer alapfiy u mbwo a umwɛy uboo a baar kàlatööm mɛ?
2CO 12:18 Mɛ kàlɔ̈m akà Titɔ muyà akà bɛ, anà mɛ kàtöm mbwo mwɛy anà nde un'tɔŋ awà làyöb bɛ. Nkye Titɔ kàkyer alapfiy? Nkye nde anà mɛ, bi kàkäl anki an'kyän an'mwɛy, anà mulab mbwo mwɛy?
2CO 12:19 Fà itaan, nkye bɛ làsii naa bi ifàtwey balàbal bi ŋakwo kusà a bɛ? Ŋaa, bi ifàyäm kusà a Nzam, amu Klistɔ. Indiir abi byanswà, nkwen amɛ, byà ntɔn làkwikilà abɛ làyɛl.
2CO 12:20 Abun, bɔɔmà amɛ bà naa, umpal in'yàyà mɛ, mɛ in'kɔ̈ɔ̈n ayàlaman asànaa in'kwen mɛ, naa bɛ sye làkɔ̈ɔ̈n akan'man asànaa làkwen bɛ. Mɛ in'manà bɔɔmà naa mɛ in'yàtaan uboo a bɛ: an'sye, un'köl, nkyɛl, isür, ntwee, itetɛɛn, in'tswe anà lingwoomà.
2CO 12:21 Mɛ imanà bɔɔmà naa in'yàfàyà mɛ, Nzam amɛ ayàmɛɛy nswɛn kusà abɛ, anà mɛ in'lel ntɔn bàmbɔɔn abà bàkyer man'be kusà anà mpa bàbuul mpem u ŋingyääy, u ndaa a nswɛn anà unsà induumà bàkyer ba.
2CO 13:1 Yi mbalà yàtär in'yà mɛ akà bɛ. Asànaa bàsön ya naa: « Ndaa yanswà bàyàtsul unsà imbäl a baar bɔ̈ɔ̈l itàkal atär. »
2CO 13:2 Mɛ kàkyàtàtɛn kusà, asànaa umpal kayi mɛ mbalà yàyweel, mɛ in'fàfuur ya ŋàbawà mpa in'wà mɛ paa, akà baar bàkyer man'be kusà anà akà bumwɛy: isàkal naa mɛ an'fàyà, mɛ akà mbuur mwɛy in'sàyee anki,
2CO 13:3 ntɔn bɛ làleŋà isii naa Klistɔ afàyäm amu mɛ. Nde kà wàgyɔ̈ɔ̈là anki kusà a bɛ, wɛɛ nde afàswaŋ ngwal amu bɛ.
2CO 13:4 Ndandaa, nde bun'bɛɛrà u kulunsi unsà gyɔ̈ɔ̈là ande, wɛɛ nde we anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ u ngwal a Nzam. Bi sye ibà bàgyɔ̈ɔ̈là amu nde, wɛɛ bi isàkal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà nde u ngwal a Nzam ntɔn bɛ.
2CO 13:5 Làpɛl bɛ ŋakwo, làler naa nkye bɛ làbà uboo a làkwikilà, làler bɛ ŋakwo ubwaŋàbwaŋ. Nkye bɛ làfàkayöbà anki naa Yɛsu Klistɔ wà amu bɛ? Nà isàkal naa bɛ làkɔ̈ɔ̈n awal iböŋ unsà ndeer ayi.
2CO 13:6 Apan, mɛ an'sà làkyän naa bɛ làkyer asàyöb naa bi, bi kàbü anki kusà a ndeer ayi.
2CO 13:7 Bi ifàyamà Nzam naa bɛ làkɔ̈ɔ̈n akyer akà ube mwɛy. Bi ikwen anki mumɛɛy iböŋ abi, wɛɛ muman naa bɛ lan'kyer ubwaŋ, itàkal naa bi ikamɛnà bàŋàkwàndwà.
2CO 13:8 Ntɔn bi ikɔ̈b mumbäär ndandaa kyatɛy, wɛɛ bi iwe anà ikɔ̈b mukölà kya mpɛl.
2CO 13:9 Wɛɛ bi ibà unsà un'sak, taaŋ lanswà ibà bi bàgyɔ̈ɔ̈là anà làbà bɛ aŋangwal. Waa bi ikalɔɔmà u ngyamàkà abi naa bɛ làbulà bàŋàkwo.
2CO 13:10 Kyakin, amàlasöön mɛ ndaa ayi yanswà umpal in'wà mɛ ukwel, ntɔn umpal in'sàyà mɛ, ya ikɔ̈ɔ̈n amɛnà naa ndaa amɛ yà bwoor musyääl ikɔ̈b kan'pɛ Mwol ntɔn mutɔŋ, kà ntɔn mudwa anki.
2CO 13:11 Atɔŋ, làkäl unsà un'sak, làsäl ntɔn mukwo, làpɛɛl ngwal bɛ a bɛ, làkäl an'kyän an'mwɛy, làkäl unsà duu, waa Nzam a ukwen anà duu uyàkal anà bɛ.
2CO 13:12 Làpɛɛl mbɔr u mbwo a ndüür in'kyɛɛl. Aŋin'kyɛɛl banswà bàmàlapà mbɔr.
2CO 13:13 Wɛy kab a ngway a Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ, ukwen a Nzam, anà un'tüüb a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl byàkäl anà bɛ banswà.
GAL 1:1 Pɔl, ntööm, kà unsà ngwal a baar itàkal u mbwo a mbuur mwɛy anki, wɛɛ u mbwo a Yɛsu Klistɔ anà Taa Nzam awà kun'wiiy uboo a akü,
GAL 1:2 anà atɔŋ banswà abà anà mɛ, mɛ an'pà mbɔr akà Ikööŋ abyà u Ngalàtyà:
GAL 1:3 Wɛy kab a ngway anà duu a Taaràbi Nzam anà Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ byàkäl anà bɛ.
GAL 1:4 Klistɔ kàpɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande ŋakwo ntɔn man'be abi, ntɔn mukigyɔɔr u mɛɛn an'be mà, unsà ukwen a Nzam, awà Taaràbi.
GAL 1:5 Wɛy làkoo làkäl anà nde mbul a in'tye! Wöwöö.
GAL 1:6 Mɛ in'wà unsà ubem muman naa bɛ làbà nswɛy musàkɔɔb mbuur awà kàlabel u mbwo a kab a ngway a Klistɔ, ntɔn mulab Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ lànsöön.
GAL 1:7 Ŋaa, Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ asin lànsöön latɛy, wɛɛ bà anà baar uboboo abɛ bàkwen mukàlatwääl lingyoomà anà musɔɔm Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ abar là Klistɔ.
GAL 1:8 Wɛɛ ŋàbawà, isàkal naa we anà mbuur mwɛy, itàkal bi, itàkal sye naa un'kyeey kan'fà du, kàmàlakyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ lànsöön anà la akwà kàlakyään bi, wɛy ŋakaan kun'käär!
GAL 1:9 Bi kàkyàtɛn ya itaan, mɛ ya an'fàtɛn apanà naa: isàkal naa we anà mbuur mwɛy kan'yà mukàlakyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ lànsöön anà la akwà làwɛl bɛ, wɛy ŋakaan kun'käär!
GAL 1:10 Ntɔn, apanà, nkye mɛ in'wàmuleŋ ubwaŋ akà baar lɛɛ akà Nzam? Naa nkye, mɛ in'kwen musà làbɔ̈ɔ̈n akà baar? Ilàkal naa mɛ alàkwen musà làbɔ̈ɔ̈n akà baar, mɛ alàfàkal anki un'syääl a Klistɔ.
GAL 1:11 Ntɔn, atɔŋ, mɛ alàkyään naa: Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ kàlakyään mɛ, la kà là an'kyän a mbuur a mɛɛn anki.
GAL 1:12 Ntɔn la kà mbuur kan'pɛ anki, itàkal naa mbuur kan'lɔ̈ɔ̈ŋ, wɛɛ u mbwo a imɛɛy a Yɛsu Klistɔ.
GAL 1:13 Ntɔn, bɛ làkyàwem itaan nkääl kàkäl mɛ ayà uboo a iyudà: naa sye un'fur a nkyɛl nà mɛ kàkäl awà, umpal kàmɛɛyà mɛ Ikööŋ a Nzam nkwaaŋ ntɔn mupay kya.
GAL 1:14 Mɛ, mɛ kàkyen usà unsà iyudà, mulyaaŋ bàmbɔɔn uboo a nkööl amɛ anà uboo a làfuun amɛ u mbwo a un'kanà amɛ ntɔn nkääl a ankaa amɛ.
GAL 1:15 Wɛɛ Nzam, unsà kab a ngway ande, nde kan'sɔ̈ɔ̈l fà an'bäl a maa anà kan'bel mukun'syääl, nde kàmɛn naa yà ubwaŋ
GAL 1:16 nde kan'mɛɛy Mwan ande, ntɔn mɛ in'kyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ ande akà baar mpa abà Ayudà, ukɔɔn alab an'lwɛŋ a mbuur,
GAL 1:17 itàkal mubeenà Yɛlusàlɛm ntɔn mukàbweey anà baar abà bàbulà antööm kusà a mɛ, mɛ kàkyen Arabi. Ungö apan mɛ kàfurà Damas.
GAL 1:18 Ungö a mbul tär, mɛ kàbeenà Yɛlusàlɛm ntɔn mukàbweey anà Petɔlà. Mɛ kàkyer ilä kwem aŋityeen apà nde.
GAL 1:19 Mɛ kàmɛn anki ntööm asin, nà Zyak mpɛl, un'tɔŋ a Mwol.
GAL 1:20 Ya amàlasöön mɛ yi, mɛ an'tɛn u mii a Nzam, kà loor anki.
GAL 1:21 Apan, mɛ kàkyen itiir a Silya anà Silisi.
GAL 1:22 Wɛɛ Ikööŋ a aklistɔ abyà u Yuday byàyöb anki ntabwey amɛ.
GAL 1:23 Bya byàwem mpɛl naa: « Mbuur akwà kàyimɛɛyà bi nkwaaŋ sɛmà itaan, ŋàbawà nde wàmuyilɔɔŋ làkwikilà alà kàsi nde muküünà mudwa la. »
GAL 1:24 Wɛɛ bya byàsyee Nzam làkoo ntɔn mɛ.
GAL 2:1 Ungö a mbul kwem aŋinà, mɛ kàfàbeenà Yɛlusàlɛm anà Banabas, mɛ kàsyen sye anà Titɔ.
GAL 2:2 Kyekà, mɛ kàbeenà ntɔn imɛɛy kàwɛl mɛ, anà mɛ ba kasam Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ in'fàlɔɔŋ mɛ akà baar mpa aba Ayudà. Mɛ la sye kàyisaamà u mpey akà andweer a Ikööŋ, manà naa isal kàkyer mɛ anà in'yàkyer mɛ apanà ikɔ̈ɔ̈n akal ndöŋ.
GAL 2:3 Wɛɛ ya yàmɛnà naa itàkal Titɔ, un'gɛlɛki kàyisalà anà mɛ, bun'siinà anki a ngwal muwal nkyɛɛy,
GAL 2:4 itàkal abwɛy, atɔŋ abɛ abà bàyàbilà uboboo abi, bàtwääl ipaay unsà nsaay abi yan'fà akà Yɛsu Klistɔ, ba bàkwen mukibuul asɔ a un'kɔɔn.
GAL 2:5 Wɛɛ bi, bi kàkyey anki isɔ a baar aban akà ikikye, itàkal mutüüb anà ba u kitaaŋ, ntɔn ndandaa a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ yàkäl ipepey ntɔn bɛ.
GAL 2:6 Baar bàkäl asànaa bàntal, bàkäl kaben, mɛ kwo watɛy. Ntɔn Nzam ufàler anki ntabwey a baar. Wɛɛ akà mɛ, ba sye ban'swɛŋ anki akà undiir mwɛy a ngwal.
GAL 2:7 Kyekà, ba bàkyàman naa mɛ ban'pɛ buur a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ ntɔn baar mpa abàŋàkyɛy, asànaa bàpɛ akà Petɔlà ntɔn baar aŋàkyɛy.
GAL 2:8 Ntɔn mbuur kàkyer naa Petɔlà ukäl ntööm ntɔn baar aŋàkyɛy, mbuur nsil sye wa kàkyer naa mɛ in'käl ntööm ntɔn baar mpa abà Ayudà.
GAL 2:9 Umpal bàyɔ̈b Zyak, Petɔlà anà Ywan abà bàkäl asànaa an'ta a Ikööŋ, naa kab a ngway alà bàpɛ akà mɛ, ba bipɛ an'kɔɔ, mɛ anà Banabas, muswaŋ un'tüüb uboo a ba anà bi, ntɔn bi ikyen akà baar mpa abà Ayudà, wɛ ba bàkyen akà baar aŋàkyɛy.
GAL 2:10 Yàlɔ̈m naa bi ikyer undiir mwɛy mpɛl: muyɔbà aŋàlàmbwà. Mɛ wa sye kàkyàkyer agyägyä.
GAL 2:11 Wɛɛ mpal kàyi Petɔlà kà Antyɔsha, mɛ kàtön ndaa ande u mii a baar, ntɔn nde kàkäl anà ikwàndwà.
GAL 2:12 Ntɔn, kusà a ngyeel a baar abà kàtöm Zyak, nde kàdyee ikal imwɛy anà baar mpa abà Ayudà. Wɛɛ mpal bàyàkɔlà ba, nde kàkaabà anà baar mpa abà Ayudà, waa kàkäl u mpey, ntɔn nde kàmɛn bɔɔmà a Ayudà aban.
GAL 2:13 Ayudà bumwɛy bàbilà uboo a pfürà ande, kyakin Banabas nde ŋakwo sye kàbilà uboo a pfürà alà.
GAL 2:14 Wɛɛ mpal kàmɛn mɛ naa nkääl aba yàkäl anki balàbal anà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ, mɛ kàtɛn a Petɔlà u mii a baar banswà naa: « Isàkal naa ngye mbuur awà Un'yudà, nkääl angye yà asànaa yà baar mpa abà Ayudà, kà yà Ayudà anki, aben ngye akaswaŋà baar mpa abà Ayudà naa ba bàkäl nkääl mwɛy ya anà Ayudà? »
GAL 2:15 Bi, bi ibà Ayudà fà mböör, wɛɛ bi kà ibà baar mpa abà Ayudà anki, baar a man'be bà.
GAL 2:16 Mpalàbà, bi kan'yöb naa akà mbuur a balàbal mwɛy watɛy naa ntɔn nde afàlab isal a un'kɔɔn, wɛɛ unsà làkwikilà amu Yɛsu Klistɔ mpɛl. Bi, bi sye kàsi làkwikilà amu Yɛsu Klistɔ, ntɔn bi ikäl bàbalàbal unsà làkwikilà amu Klistɔ, wɛɛ kà unsà isal a un'kɔɔn anki. Ntɔn, akà mbuur mwɛy usàkal anki balàbal unsà isal a un'kɔɔn.
GAL 2:17 Wɛɛ, isàkal naa bi kàleŋà mukal bàbalàbal amu Klistɔ, bi sye bàmɛnà naa bi ibà baar a man'be. Nkye Klistɔ kàlàkal un'syääl a man'be? Ikwo anki akà ikikye.
GAL 2:18 Kyakin, isàkal naa mɛ an'fàtɔŋ ya akwà kàbwaab mɛ, abun, ikaswaŋà naa mɛ in'wà un'bɛɛy a un'kɔɔn.
GAL 2:19 Ntɔn yà u mbwo a un'kɔɔn wa mɛ kàkü unsà un'kɔɔn, ntɔn mɛ in'käl anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ amu Nzam. Mɛ, mɛ in'wà aŋàbɛɛrà u kulunsi anà Klistɔ,
GAL 2:20 mɛ in'we anà mɔ̈ɔ̈, wɛɛ kà mɛ anki, Klistɔ awe anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ amu mɛ. Ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ amɛ wà imbuur, wa wà unsà làkwikilà, làkwikilà amu Mwan a Nzam awà kan'kwen anà kàpɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande ntɔn mɛ.
GAL 2:21 Mɛ in'piy anki kab a ngway a Nzam bwà. Ntɔn, kya isàkal naa yà unsà mbwo a un'kɔɔn mbuur kan'kwo mukal wàbalàbal umii a Nzam, abun Klistɔ kàkü wà bunàbun.
GAL 3:1 Ɔ insil a Angalàtyà! Nà kàlalɔ̈? Kyekà, Yɛsu Klistɔ awà bàbɛɛrà u kulunsi bun'swɛŋ u mii a bɛ.
GAL 3:2 Mɛ alàsà mfuul mwɛy mpɛl: Nkye bɛ Dweelà làwɛl ntɔn làsyäälà bɛ un'kɔɔn lɛɛ ntɔn làwem bɛ Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ anà làsi bɛ làkwikilà amu la?
GAL 3:3 Abà, nkye bɛ làbà insil? Utàtwɛb bɛ làsɛmà a Dweelà, nkye ŋàbawà bɛ làkwen mukàtsü a ndür?
GAL 3:4 Nkye mbɔɔn a mpay làmɛn bɛ yàkäl yà bunàbun? Ikwo anki naa ya ikäl yà bunàbun!
GAL 3:5 Mbuur afàlapà Dweelà anà afàkyer impà uboo a bɛ, nkye nde bya afàkyer ntɔn làfàlab bɛ Un'kɔɔn lɛɛ, ntɔn làwem bɛ làsaŋ a làkwikilà?
GAL 3:6 Ntɔn Abàlam kàkäl anà làkwikilà amu Nzam, kyakin kàmɛnà nde wàbalàbal.
GAL 3:7 Làyöb abun naa: baar abye anà làkwikilà bà baan a Abàlam.
GAL 3:8 Abà sye, Ndaa Aŋàsɔn yàtɛn naa Nzam asàkyey baar mpa abà Ayudà, ntɔn làkwikilà aba. Kyakin bàsam ba Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ alà kusà akà Abàlam naa: « In'sɛŋ myanswà myàsàwal nsaak amu ngye. »
GAL 3:9 Kyakin, baar abà anà làkwikilà ban'wal nsaak mbwo mwɛy anà Abàlam, aŋàlàkwikilà.
GAL 3:10 Ntɔn, asyääl a un'kɔɔn banswà bà unsà un'küül. Ntɔn bàsön naa: « Wɛy ŋakaan udi mbuur wanswà afàkɔɔn asà muküünà mukwey ndaa yanswà bàsön uboo a Un'kaan a un'kɔɔn. »
GAL 3:11 Yà ndandaa naa akà mbuur mwɛy wàbalàbal watɛy kusà a Nzam u mbwo a un'kɔɔn, ntɔn bàsɔn naa: « Mbuur a balàbal asàkal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ntɔn làkwikilà. »
GAL 3:12 Kyekà, un'kɔɔn làbɛɛŋ latɛy anà làkwikilà, asànaa itɛɛnà Ndaa Aŋàsɔn naa: « Mbuur asàkwey nswɛɛŋ a un'kɔɔn awà, asàkal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ amu wa. »
GAL 3:13 Klistɔ kàfür ntɔn mukitwey unsà un'küül a un'kɔɔn, nde ŋakwo kàbulà un'küül ntɔn bi, ntɔn bàsön naa: « Wɛy ukäl aŋàküül mbuur wanswà ban'bɛɛrà kà un'te. »
GAL 3:14 Yà abun naa làsaak a Abàlam làsàtööl akà baar mpa abà Ayudà u mbwo a kab a ngway a Yɛsu Klistɔ, naa bi banswà isàwal Dweelà kàpɛ Nzam ilää u mbwo a làkwikilà.
GAL 3:15 Atɔŋ, mbar bi itàtɛn unsà imbuur: isàkal naa kyän kàsön mbuur là u mbwo a la, akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki mulwom itàkal mukwɛy undiir uboo a la.
GAL 3:16 Abun, ilää bàpɛ akà Abàlam anà akà ngyääl ande, bàtɛn anki naa: « anà akà akyee ande » asànaa ya iler un'kàbɔ, wɛɛ ntɔn mbuur mwɛy mpɛl unsà itoo a Abàlam, ikaswaŋà naa Klistɔ.
GAL 3:17 Abun, le an'kyän amɛ: kyän a balàbal, Nzam la kàdi kusà. Un'kɔɔn kàsàyà ungö a mbul nkam nà a an'kwem an'tär, ukwe anki mudwa kyän alà. Naa tɛy, ilää aki isàbulà undiir a bunàbun.
GAL 3:18 Ntɔn, isàkal naa kwal bàfàwal u mbwo a Un'kɔɔn, abun ifàkal anki naa u mbwo a ilää. Wɛɛ kyekà ilää aki Nzam kya kàpɛ akà Abàlam unsà kab a ngway ande.
GAL 3:19 Apanà, mfun a un'kɔɔn nkye? Wa kàyi ntɔn muswaŋ ube a baar, tii kunà usàyà ikyee a Abàlam awà bàpɛ ilää. Ilää aki akyeey bàkyään u mbwo a mfurboo mwɛy.
GAL 3:20 Kyekà, nkalsà awà kà wà ntɔn mbuur mwɛy mpɛl anki, wɛɛ Nzam wà mwɛy.
GAL 3:21 Abun, nkye Un'kɔɔn afàmbäär ilää a Nzam? Ŋaa, akà ikikye! Wɛɛ yàlàkal naa Un'kɔɔn we anà ikɔ̈b apà mɔ̈ɔ̈, abun balàbal sye làlàfà u mbwo a wa.
GAL 3:22 Wɛɛ Ndaa Aŋàsɔn yàkyàsà mɛɛn manswà ungyɛl a ikɔ̈b man'be. Kyakin, unsà làkwikilà amu Yɛsu Klistɔ, ilää waa isàkwo akà aŋàlàkwikilà.
GAL 3:23 Kusà a ngyeel a làkwikilà, bi kàkäl atsüüŋ a un'kɔɔn, tii umpal làlàmɛnà làkwikilà alà.
GAL 3:24 Kyakin, un'kɔɔn kàkäl un'leer abi tii u ngyeel a Klistɔ, ntɔn bi ikäl bàbalàbal u mbwo a làkwikilà.
GAL 3:25 Wɛɛ, ungö a ngyeel a làkwikilà, bi ifàkal anki kà an'kɔɔ a un'leer awà.
GAL 3:26 Ntɔn bɛ banswà, bɛ làbà baan a Nzam u mbwo a làkwikilà amu Yɛsu Klistɔ.
GAL 3:27 Inye, bɛ banswà abà làwɛl ndüümà amu Klistɔ, bɛ làkyàbwaar Klistɔ.
GAL 3:28 Kyakin, Un'yudà itàkal Un'gɛlɛki ufàkal anki. Un'tsüüŋ itàkal un'nsaay ufàkal anki. Baal itàkal un'kaar ufàkal anki. Ntɔn bɛ banswà làbà mwɛy amu Yɛsu Klistɔ.
GAL 3:29 Kya isàkal naa bɛ làbà baar a Klistɔ, bɛ làbà itoo a Abàlam anà aŋakwal unsà ilää.
GAL 4:1 Mɛ in'tɛn abà: isàkal naa un'kyee a kwal wà mwan umbɛy, nde nsöön watɛy anà un'tsüüŋ, itàkal naa nde wà nkum a indiir byanswà,
GAL 4:2 wɛɛ nde wà ungyɛl a baar bàfàkaar indiir ande anà baar abye anà buur a bya, tii mpal isàkwo ilä kàsi taarànde.
GAL 4:3 Bi sye, mpal kàkäl bi ambɛy, bi kàkäl atsüüŋ.
GAL 4:4 Wɛɛ umpal làkwe taaŋ, Nzam kàtöm Mwan ande: bun'bör akà un'kaar mwɛy, bun'bör ungyɛl a un'kɔɔn,
GAL 4:5 ntɔn mutsuuŋ baar bàkäl ungyɛl a un'kɔɔn, ntɔn bi ibulà baan aŋàywaaŋ nkà.
GAL 4:6 Ntɔn làbà bɛ baan, Nzam waa kàtöm Dweelà a Mwan ande uboo a mpem abi, Dweelà afàsà un'kwɛŋ naa: « Aba » iswaŋà naa Taa!
GAL 4:7 Kyakin, ngye afàkal un'tsüüŋ anki, wɛɛ mwan. Ngye sye awà ikyee asànaa amà an'yilà a Nzam.
GAL 4:8 Itaan, umpal mpa layöbà bɛ Nzam, bɛ làkälà atsüüŋ a itɛk, kutɛn aŋàbwaŋ bya kà bànzam anki.
GAL 4:9 Wɛɛ mpalàbà lan'yöb bɛ Nzam, anà nde sye kàmàlayöb, aben lan'fàfurà bɛ akà indiir ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ngwal anà byànswɛn abyà ifàyaal mɛɛn? Nkye bɛ làkwen mufàbulà atsüüŋ a bya?
GAL 4:10 Bɛ, bɛ làfàkyɛɛl ubwaŋàbwaŋ ilä, nsöŋ, an'paŋà anà mbul!
GAL 4:11 Bɛ, bɛ làman'pà bɔɔmà: nkye isal kàkyer mɛ amu bɛ ikyà bwà?
GAL 4:12 Atɔŋ, mɛ amàlabɔɔn, làbulà asànaa mɛ, ntɔn mɛ kàkyàbulà asànaa bɛ. Akà ube mwɛy lan'kyer bɛ batɛy.
GAL 4:13 Bɛ làkyàyöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ naa u mbalà atàtwɛb kàlakyään mɛ Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ, mɛ kàkäl anà ukyal.
GAL 4:14 Ukyal abà bàkäl nsii ntɔn bɛ. Wɛɛ bɛ lan'saal anki, lan'piy anki. Kyekà, bɛ lan'wɛl asànaa un'kyeey a Nzam, asànaa Klistɔ Yɛsu.
GAL 4:15 Abun, wàken un'sak kàkäl anà bɛ? Ntɔn mɛ amàlatɛɛl imbäl ki: kya bɛ làlàkwo, bɛ làlàswaam mii abɛ ntɔn mukan'pà!
GAL 4:16 Ŋàbawà, nkye mɛ an'bulà ŋankir abɛ ntɔn amàlakyään mɛ ndandaa?
GAL 4:17 Ukwen aŋàsöön abà akà bɛ kà bà mpɛlàmpɛl anki, wɛɛ ba bàkwen mpɛl mukàlakaab anà mɛ, ntɔn bɛ làbääb anà ba.
GAL 4:18 Yubwaŋ muswaŋ ukwen abye anà imbäl aŋàbwaŋ taaŋ lanswà, wɛɛ kà nà utaaŋ kàkäl mɛ apà bɛ mpɛl anki,
GAL 4:19 baan amɛ, abà in'fàkamanà mɛ un'swaŋ abɔr tii umpal usàmɛnà Klistɔ amu bɛ.
GAL 4:20 Apanà, mɛ in'kwen mukal apà bɛ, ntɔn mulɔ̈ɔ̈n ntɛɛn amɛ akà bɛ, ntɔn mɛ in'yöb anki naa mɛ ininà in'kyer ntɔn bɛ!
GAL 4:21 Lan'kyään, bɛ baar làkwen mukal u ngyɛl a un'kɔɔn: nkye bɛ làfàwem anki ndaa ufàtɛn un'kɔɔn awà?
GAL 4:22 Ntɔn bàsön naa Abàlam kàbör baan abaal bɔ̈ɔ̈l: mwɛy a un'syääl un'kaar, mwɛy a un'kaar a nsaay,
GAL 4:23 mwan baal a un'syääl un'kaar bun'bör unsà imbuur. Wɛɛ mwan baal a un'kaar a nsaay bun'bör u mbwo a ilää.
GAL 4:24 Apà kye anà ikɔk a ndaa: abun, akaar abà bà nkwà yweel. Mwɛy, Agar, kàfü mɔŋ a Sinayi, kan'bɔr un'tsüüŋ:
GAL 4:25 ntɔn mɔŋ a Sinayi wà kà Arabi. Agar awà afwään Yɛlusàlɛm a ŋàbà ntɔn la là un'tsüüŋ anà baan ande.
GAL 4:26 Wɛɛ Yɛlusàlɛm a du là nsaay, la là maa abi,
GAL 4:27 ntɔn bàsön naa: « Man un'sak, un'kaar ikɔb, ngye mbuur mpa kàbörà! Sà in'kwɛŋ a un'sak, ngye mbuur mpa kàyöb usaay a in'swaŋ! Ntɔn baan a un'kaar awà bàwɔm bà mbɔɔn, akwànaa baan a un'kaar awe anà un'dim. »
GAL 4:28 Wɛɛ bɛ, atɔŋ, asànaa Isak bɛ làbà baan a ilää.
GAL 4:29 Wɛɛ, asànaa mwan bàbör unsà imbuur kàmɛɛy mwan bàbör unsà Dweelà nkwaaŋ, ya sye yà balàbal ŋàbawà.
GAL 4:30 Wɛɛ Ndaa Aŋàsɔn itɛɛnà aben? Abà: « Böŋ un'syääl un'kaar anà mwan ande, ntɔn ikwe anki naa mwan a un'syääl un'kaar uwɛl kwal mbwo mwɛy anà mwan a un'kaar a nsaay. »
GAL 4:31 Kyakin, atɔŋ, bi kà ibà baan a un'syääl un'kaar anki, wɛɛ bi ibà baan a un'kaar a nsaay.
GAL 5:1 Klistɔ kitsuuŋ ntɔn bi ikäl baar a nsaay bàndandaa. Làkäl aŋàtsim, twon lan'fàkal uboo a mpay a isɔ.
GAL 5:2 Mɛ, Pɔl, mɛ amàlàkyään naa: isàkal naa bɛ làbàmukyɛy bɛ a bɛ, abun Klistɔ ufàkal anki anà ndöŋ akà bɛ.
GAL 5:3 Mɛ an'fàtɛn naa mbuur wanswà akyey naa bun'kyɛy, wɛy naa nde ukwey un'kɔɔn wa wanswà.
GAL 5:4 Bɛ, bɛ làbà aŋàkaabà anà Klistɔ, isàkal naa bɛ lan'bünà balàbal abɛ anà un'kɔɔn. Abun kab a ngway làfàkal anki amu bɛ.
GAL 5:5 Wɛɛ akà bi, làkwikilà abi là naa: bi kan'sà làkyän a ngwalàngwal u mbwo a Dweelà, ntɔn bi imɛnà baar mwɛy bàbalàbal.
GAL 5:6 Kyakin, mbuur awà amu Yɛsu Klistɔ, itàkal nkyɛɛy, itàkal ukɔɔn nkyɛɛy, ndaa a ngwal mwo yatɛy. Wɛɛ ndaa akölàköl, yà mukal anà làkwikilà u mbwo a ukwen.
GAL 5:7 Bɛ, bɛ làyikaamà ntiin ubwaŋàbwaŋ, wɛɛ ŋàbawà, nà kàmàlakyekà mbwo naa bɛ làkɔ̈ɔ̈n akyey ndandaa?
GAL 5:8 An'kyän a tub àmà kà man'fà anki akà Nzam awà kàlabel.
GAL 5:9 Bàfàtɛn naa: « Kindam a ful ifàfuubà mfar yanswà. »
GAL 5:10 Mɛ, mɛ in'we anà làkyän akà Mwol ntɔn bɛ: bɛ làsàwal anki an'kyän asin. Wɛɛ mbuur afàlatwääl ipaay, nde asàwal ntaaŋàmbar, itàkal naa nde wà kà nà.
GAL 5:11 Akà mɛ, atɔŋ, isàkal naa mɛ in'wà mufiilɔŋ ndaa iler nkyɛɛy, ntɔn nkye bàfiimɛɛy ba mɛ nkwaaŋ? Abà, ukɔŋ a kulunsi bàfàkal anki!
GAL 5:12 Wɛy ba bàkäl aŋàwal mfɛɛl, ba baar bàfàsà lingyoomà uboo abɛ.
GAL 5:13 Ntɔn bɛ, atɔŋ, bɛ bàlabel mukal baar a nsaay. Kà ya akwà yàŋàtüüb anà imbuur anki. Wɛɛ wɛy bɛ làkäl anà ukwen ntɔn mubay bɛ a bɛ.
GAL 5:14 Ntɔn ukwen a un'kɔɔn wanswà wà unsà ndaa mwɛy yi: « Ngye asàkwen un'tɔŋ angye asànaa ngye ŋakwo. »
GAL 5:15 Wɛɛ isàkal naa bɛ, bɛ làbàmutàtà anà mukàkaam bɛ a bɛ, làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ, naa tɛy, bɛ làyàdwa ndür bɛ a bɛ.
GAL 5:16 Lan'wem: wɛy ngwal a Dweelà yàlasyen, waa bɛ mpa làyàfàkwey ndaa ikwen ndür.
GAL 5:17 Ntɔn ndür, amu ngyal a ya, ifàkyey anki Dweelà - anà Dweelà sye ufàkyey anki ndür, uboboo a ba ye anà iböör - ntɔn, indiir làkwen bɛ mukyer, bɛ làkɔɔn akyer bya.
GAL 5:18 Wɛɛ isàkal naa Dweelà wà muyàlasyen, bɛ làfàkal anki ungyɛl a un'kɔɔn.
GAL 5:19 Kyakin, bàkyàyöb isal a ndür: ndaa a nswɛn, ŋingyäy anà ipasàsɛ,
GAL 5:20 itɛk, ingaŋ, un'yiiŋ, ful a nkyɛl, nkir, nkaabà, itsumbuun, un'köl, an'sye,
GAL 5:21 ilään, ngyöör a man, in'kyɔm, anà indiir a tub byabi. Mɛ amàlanaan an'tsü asànaa kàlakyään mɛ naa: baar bàfàsyääl bya, bàsàwal anki Imfum a Nzam.
GAL 5:22 Wɛɛ le mbɛŋ a Dweelà: ukwen, un'sak, duu, nkääŋ a mpem, ubwaŋ, nkyeer aŋàbwaŋ, làkwikilà,
GAL 5:23 làbɔ̈ɔ̈n, ntsiim. Un'kɔɔn ufàtɔn anki indiir abi!
GAL 5:24 Baar abà amu Klistɔ, bàkyàbɛɛrà ndür aba anà ngyal anà ilään aya u kulunsi.
GAL 5:25 Isàkal naa bi ibà unsà Dweelà, wɛy Dweelà sye kisyen.
GAL 5:26 Wɛy bi ikɔ̈ɔ̈n akal anà uyɔl, iwɛy un'swey anà un'köl uboo a bi.
GAL 6:1 Atɔŋ, isàkal naa umwɛy uboo a bɛ kan'kyer ibii, wɛy bɛ aŋin'kyɛɛl lun'suub unsà làbɔ̈ɔ̈n lanswà. Kal kà igyɛɛŋ: nkye ngye sye akwe anki abü unsà ndɛb?
GAL 6:2 Làsɛɛn buur abɛ bɛ a bɛ, abun bɛ làsàkwey un'kɔɔn a Klistɔ.
GAL 6:3 Ntɔn, mbuur usàsi naa nde wà mbuur a mfun, kyekà nde wà ipfal, nde kan'kur nde ŋakwo.
GAL 6:4 Wɛy mbuur mbuur usyeebà isal ande ŋakwo. Isàkal naa nde aswaŋ ngaal ntɔn kya, nde ya aswaŋ ntɔn nde mpɛl, wɛɛ kà ntɔn mbuur asin anki.
GAL 6:5 Ntɔn mbuur mbuur asàtööm buur ande, nde ŋakwo.
GAL 6:6 Wɛy mbuur awà ban'lɔŋ Ndaa, upɛ ndam a indiir ande byanswà akà un'lɔɔŋ ande.
GAL 6:7 Twon lan'kur bɛ ŋakwo: Nzam ufàkyey anki naa bun'sɛ. Mbuur wanswà asàbwo indiir kàkön nde.
GAL 6:8 Mbuur afàkɔn ntɔn ndür ande ŋakwo, asàbwo sye bya ifàbɔr ndür: mbɔ̈ɔ̈n. Mbuur afàkɔn ntɔn Dweelà, asàbwo bya ufàbɔr Dweelà: mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye.
GAL 6:9 Wɛy bi ikyer ubwaŋ ukɔɔn ayɔn, ntɔn, utaaŋ aŋàbwaŋ, bi ikyer asàbwo, isàkal naa bi iyɔ̈n anki.
GAL 6:10 Abun, ibà bi pà anà taaŋ, wɛy bi ikyer ndaa aŋàbwaŋ ntɔn baar banswà, sin sin baar ibà bi anà ba làkwikilà làmwɛy.
GAL 6:11 Làler isɔn an'köl an'köl bi, mɛ amàlasöön kà an'kɔɔ amɛ ŋakwo.
GAL 6:12 Bye anà baar bàfàkyey uyɔl unsà ndür, ba bà baar bàfàkwen mukàlasiinà a ngwal ntɔn bàlakyɛy. Ba bàkwen anki naa bamɛɛy nkwaaŋ ntɔn kulunsi a Klistɔ.
GAL 6:13 Ntɔn baar nsil aban bàfàkyey naa bakyɛy, ba un'kɔɔn bàfàsyääl anki. Ba bàfàkwen naa bàlakyɛy ntɔn ba bàswɛŋ ngaal ntɔn ndür abɛ.
GAL 6:14 Akà mɛ, ŋaa, ngaal amɛ yà unsà kulunsi a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ. Ntɔn amu la, mɛɛn màŋàbɛɛrà u kulunsi ntɔn mɛ, asànaa mɛ ntɔn mɛɛn.
GAL 6:15 Kyakin, ndaa a ngwal kà nkyɛɛy anki, itàkal ukɔɔn nkyɛɛy: wɛɛ ndaa a ngwal yà mukal ikyeer akün.
GAL 6:16 Akà baar banswà bàfàsyääl nswɛɛŋ, wɛy duu anà ubwaŋ a Nzam màkäl anà ba, anà udu a Isàlɛl a Nzam.
GAL 6:17 Fà apanà, wɛy mbuur mwɛy ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akamɛɛy an'kyeey, ntɔn mɛ in'we anà inyɛm a Yɛsu u ndür amɛ.
GAL 6:18 Wɛy kab a ngway a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ làkäl anà dweelà abɛ atɔŋ banswà. Wöwöö.
EPH 1:1 Pɔl, ntööm a Yɛsu Klistɔ unsà ukwen a Nzam, akà baar abà u Ɛfɛsɔ abà bà Nzam anà bàlää amu Yɛsu Klistɔ:
EPH 1:2 Wɛy kab a ngway anà duu a Taaràbi Nzam anà Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ màkäl anà bɛ.
EPH 1:3 Nsaak ikäl akà Nzam, Taarà Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ! Nde kisaak mukipà nsaak a dweelà yanswà u du amu Klistɔ.
EPH 1:4 Kusà a nkyeer a mɛɛn, Nzam kisɔ̈ɔ̈l itaan mukal bànde u mbwo a Klistɔ, ntɔn bi ikäl bà in'kyɛɛl anà ikɔ̈ɔ̈n an'pɛl u mii ande. Unsà ukwen ande,
EPH 1:5 Nzam kilɔ̈ɔ̈n kusà mukal iywaaŋ nkà ande u mbwo a Yɛsu Klistɔ, mulab ukwen ande unsà ubwaŋ ande.
EPH 1:6 Abun, wɛy bi isyäŋà Nzam ntɔn kab a ntsà kipɛ nde amu Mwan ande wànkween.
EPH 1:7 Amu nde, u mbwo a an'kil ande, bi kàkyàtoo unsà isɔ, amu nde, bàkidwääl ibii abi, mulab un'naaŋ a kab a ngway a Nzam,
EPH 1:8 alà kikääb nde làŋàsöönà, mukipà an'yeerà manswà anà un'yɛnà wanswà.
EPH 1:9 Nde kipɛ mbwo muyöb ngyee a ukwen ande, ngyee kàlɔ̈ɔ̈n nde kusà unsà ubwaŋ ande, amu Klistɔ,
EPH 1:10 ntɔn mukölà ya u taaŋ a ntsüü: un'tüüb amu Klistɔ, nkyeer yanswà ayà u du anà ayà u mɛɛn.
EPH 1:11 Amu nde sye, bi kàwɛl kab làbi unsà an'kyän a mbuur afàsyen bya byanswà unsà ukwen ande, bi bisɔ̈ɔ̈l kusà,
EPH 1:12 ntɔn musyäŋà làkoo ande, bi baar kàsi làkyän kusà amu Klistɔ!
EPH 1:13 Amu nde sye, bɛ làkyàwem ndaa a ndandaa, Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ làfàlatswà mɔ̈ɔ̈. Amu nde sye, bɛ làsi làkwikilà anà bàlasi inyɛm a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl bàpɛ ilää,
EPH 1:14 mbööl a kwal abi tii u ntsuuŋ abi yà ntsüü ayà isàwal bi, ntɔn nsyäŋà a làkoo ande.
EPH 1:15 Kyakin, mɛ sye, fà kàwem mɛ làkwikilà abɛ amu Mwol Yɛsu anà ukwen abɛ ntɔn aŋin'kyɛɛl banswà,
EPH 1:16 mɛ in'fàyɔn anki mufuur an'tɔɔn ntɔn bɛ, umpal in'fàlatà mɛ din u ngyamàkà amɛ.
EPH 1:17 Wɛy naa Nzam a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ, Taa aŋàlàkoo, kàlapɛ dweelà a an'yeerà anà là imɛɛy ntɔn bɛ lun'yöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ,
EPH 1:18 wɛy nde uduub mpem abɛ u pɛɛlà ande, ntɔn bɛ làyöb naa làkyän nà alà mwo unsà làbeel ande, naa un'naaŋ a làkoo ande wà aben, kwal ufàlakääb nde anà aŋin'kyɛɛl,
EPH 1:19 unkaak a ngwal a kölàköl nà nde we awà ntɔn ubwaŋ abi, bi aŋàlàkwikilà. Ngwal ande ayi, nde ya kàtwey unsà unkaak a ngwal ande wanswà,
EPH 1:20 nde ya kàpɛ akà Klistɔ mpal kun'wiiy nde uboo a akü, anà kun'bwääy u kɔɔ ande là ibaal u du,
EPH 1:21 udu a imfum kyanswà, ikɔ̈b kyanswà, unkaak a ngwal wanswà, imwol kyanswà anà ikɔb kyanswà ban'kwo mutà din, kà nà u mɛɛn mà mpɛl anki, wɛɛ sye anà u mɛɛn amà isàyà.
EPH 1:22 Inye, Nzam kàsi indiir byanswà ungyɛl a in'kɔl a Yɛsu anà nde kun'pɛ akà Ikööŋ ntɔn mukal un'tswe a indiir byanswà.
EPH 1:23 Ikööŋ kya kyà ndür ande, nde awà ufàyööl Nzam ŋakwo a barbar.
EPH 2:1 Bɛ, bɛ làkäl bàŋàkwà ntɔn ibii anà man'be abɛ,
EPH 2:2 amà làkyerà bɛ umpal làyilabà bɛ nzam a mɛɛn mà, Mwan a mfum awà afyekyekà uboboo a du anà mɛɛn, dweelà làfàsal apanà uboo a baar a un'tswe ngwal.
EPH 2:3 Bi banswà sye, bi bàkäl un'lwaaŋ mwɛy anà baar abà, fà itaan, mulabà ngyal a ndür abi, bi bàkyerà ukwen aya, bàläbà an'kyän aya. Unsà imbuur, bi bàkälà baan a nkyɛl asànaa baar bumwɛy.
EPH 2:4 Wɛɛ, ntɔn Nzam wàŋàyɔl a ngyɛb, anà nde kikwen unsà ukwen a kölàköl,
EPH 2:5 umpal kàkäl bi bàŋàkwà ntɔn ibii abi, nde kipɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà Klistɔ Yɛsu - yà unsà kab a ngway waa bɛ làwü mɔ̈ɔ̈,
EPH 2:6 anà nde, nde kiwiiy anà kibwääy u du, amu Yɛsu Klistɔ.
EPH 2:7 Kyakin, u mbwo a ubwaŋ ande ntɔn bi amu Klistɔ Yɛsu, nde kàkwen muswaŋ u mbul a in'tye ayà isàyà, un'naaŋ a kölàköl wà kab a ngway ande.
EPH 2:8 Abun, yà unsà kab a ngway waa bɛ làwü mɔ̈ɔ̈, u mbwo a làkwikilà. Bɛ làkyer anki akà undiir, wɛɛ la là kab a Nzam.
EPH 2:9 Ya kàyan'fà anki unsà isal, ntɔn mbuur uswɛŋ ngaal.
EPH 2:10 Ntɔn nde kikyer, nde kiyilà amu Klistɔ Yɛsu, ntɔn isal aŋàbwaŋ kàlɔ̈ɔ̈n Nzam kusà, ntɔn bi ikölà bya.
EPH 2:11 Kyakin, làyɔbà naa utaaŋ itaan bɛ làkäl anà idiim a baar mpa abà Ayudà u ndür abɛ, bɛ baar bàlabeelà baar mpa abà aŋàkyɛy, akà baar bàfàkyey uyɔl naa ba bàŋàkyɛy, ntɔn ba bye anà idiim a nkyɛɛy bàkyer baar u ndür aba.
EPH 2:12 Làyɔbà naa utaaŋ alanà, bɛ làkäl anki anà Klistɔ uboo a bɛ, bɛ làkwe anki mukal baan a Isàlɛl, bɛ làkäl angyey u nkwà yanswà yà ntɔn ilää, ukɔɔn làkyän anà ukɔɔn Nzam u mɛɛn.
EPH 2:13 Wɛɛ apanà, u mbwo a un'tüüb abɛ anà Klistɔ Yɛsu, bɛ baar làkälà ukwɛl, bɛ làkyàbulà tsütsü u mbwo a an'kil a Klistɔ.
EPH 2:14 Abun, nde wà duu abi: nde kàbuul Ayudà anà baar mpa abà Ayudà un'sɛŋ mwɛy. U mbwo a ndür ande, nde kàbwaab ibä a nkaabà akyà un'yiiŋ.
EPH 2:15 Nde kàdwä un'kɔɔn anà nswɛɛŋ awa anà nsyääl awa. Abà, nde kàkwen naa fà Un'yudà anà mbuur mpa awà Un'yudà, nde ukyer mbuur mwɛy wàkün, mubiil duu,
EPH 2:16 anà mutüüb ba bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l ndür mwɛy, anà kàfuur un'tüüb aba anà Nzam. U mbwo a kulunsi, nde kàdwä iyiiŋ.
EPH 2:17 Nde kàyi mukyään duu akà bɛ baar làkäl ukwɛl, anà duu akà baar bàkäl tsütsü.
EPH 2:18 Kyakin, u mbwo a nde, amwɛy anà bamwɛy, unsà Dweelà mwɛy mpɛl, bi ibye anà mbwo mukɔlà apà Taa.
EPH 2:19 Abun, bɛ làfàkal anki angyey, itàkal alyaaŋ a mbwo, wɛɛ bɛ làbà aŋàbul mbwo mwɛy anà aŋin'kyɛɛl, baar a bɔr a Nzam.
EPH 2:20 Bɛ, bɛ bàkyàlabiil unsà ntööŋ, un'bään a ya antööm anà aŋangɔɔm, anà Klistɔ Yɛsu nde ŋakwo wà nkɔŋ a twɛrà.
EPH 2:21 Yà u mbwo ande, waa ndwà yanswà yàmutsim anà yàmuyɛl ntɔn mubulà idwà in'kyɛɛl unsà Mwol.
EPH 2:22 Amu nde, bɛ sye làbà mbwo mwɛy bàŋàbilà uboo a ntööŋ ntɔn mubulà ndwà a Nzam u mbwo a Dweelà.
EPH 3:1 Kyakin, mɛ Pɔl, mbuur a bɔlokà a Klistɔ Yɛsu ntɔn bɛ, bɛ baar mpa làbà Ayudà,
EPH 3:2 mbalà yumwɛy, bɛ làkyàwem naa Nzam, unsà ngyɛb ande, kan'pɛ buur naa an'kyän ande màkwe ntɔn bɛ,
EPH 3:3 anà, u mbwo a imɛɛy, nde kan'mɛɛy ngyee, asànaa kàsön mɛ ya ikikye kusà.
EPH 3:4 Lan'taŋ bɛ, bɛ lan'kwo làmɛn naa un'yɛnà nà mɛ in'we awà muyöb ngyee a Klistɔ.
EPH 3:5 Ngyee ayi Nzam ya kàmɛɛy anki akà baar a ngyääl yàlyaaŋ, asànaa kan'swaŋ nde ya apanà, u mbwo a Dweelà, akà antööm in'kyɛɛl ande anà aŋangɔɔm:
EPH 3:6 baar mpa abà Ayudà bàmakyey unsà kwal nsil alà, baar a ndür mwɛy nsil ayi, bàŋàtüüb unsà ilää nsil aki, amu Klistɔ Yɛsu, u mbwo a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ,
EPH 3:7 mɛ kàkyàbulà un'syääl u mbwo a kab a kab a ngway kan'pɛ Nzam musyäl unkaak a ngwal ande.
EPH 3:8 Mɛ in'wà kimbuur uboo a aŋikyɛɛl banswà, nde kan'pɛ kab a ngway mukyään un'naaŋ a Klistɔ wà ipepey akà baar mpa abà Ayudà,
EPH 3:9 anà musà unsà pɛɛlà naa Nzam afàkwey aben ngyee yàkäl aŋàyee fà itaan amu nde, nde Nkyer a indiir byanswà.
EPH 3:10 Ntɔn, fà apanà, Amfum anà Aŋikɔ̈b u du, bàyöb an'yeerà a Nzam mà ifà ifà, u mbwo a Ikööŋ,
EPH 3:11 asànaa mböön a mbul a in'tye kàkwey nde amu Klistɔ Yɛsu, Mwol abi.
EPH 3:12 Abun, amu nde, u mbwo a làkwikilà ande, waa bi ban'sà mpem anà kam aŋàkwo musin tsütsü apà Nzam.
EPH 3:13 Abun sye, mɛ amàlalɔm naa twon lan'kwamà ntɔn mpay in'manà mɛ ntɔn bɛ: ya yà làkoo abɛ.
EPH 3:14 Lalan, in'fàbwà mɛ an'köm kusà a Taa.
EPH 3:15 Ikɔb a bɔr lanswà, u du anà u mɛɛn, ifàfà amu nde,
EPH 3:16 mulab un'naaŋ a làkoo ande, wɛy nde kàlapɛ ngwal, u mbwo a Dweelà ande, ntɔn imbuur abɛ akyà uboo ikäl aŋàtsim,
EPH 3:17 wɛy nde ubwääy Klistɔ u mpem abɛ u mbwo a làkwikilà, wɛy bɛ làkäl bàŋàsà in'swɛy anà bàŋàtsim unsà ukwen,
EPH 3:18 waa bɛ làkal aŋàkwo muyöb, mbwo mwɛy anà aŋin'kyɛɛl banswà, naa ngyamà, uteer, bwɛl, iminà byà aben,
EPH 3:19 anà muyöb ukwen a Klistɔ ban'söön ngyööb yanswà, ntɔn bɛ làkäl bàŋàyuur tii muwal ngyööl a Nzam yanswà.
EPH 3:20 Apanà, akà nde akwà, u mbwo a unkaak a ngwal afàsal amu bi, kan'kwo mukyer indiir byàŋàsöön indiir byanswà ifàlɔm bi itàkal ifàyweer bi,
EPH 3:21 wɛy làkoo làkäl akà nde uboo a Ikööŋ anà amu Klistɔ Yɛsu, akà ngyääl yanswà, u mbul a in'tye! Wöwöö.
EPH 4:1 Abun, mɛ Pɔl, mbuur a bɔlokà ntɔn Mwol, mɛ amàlabɔɔn, làpɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ akà làbeel làwɛl bɛ,
EPH 4:2 unsà làbɔ̈ɔ̈n lanswà, duu, anà nkääŋ a mpem. Làkääŋà mpem bɛ a bɛ unsà ukwen.
EPH 4:3 Làsi ngwal mukaar un'tüüb a Dweelà u mbwo a duu.
EPH 4:4 Ndür yà mwɛy anà Dweelà wà mwɛy, abun sye Nzam kàlabeel unsà làkyän làmwɛy mpɛl,
EPH 4:5 Mwol mwɛy, làkwikilà làmwɛy mpɛl, ndüümà mwɛy mpɛl,
EPH 4:6 Nzam mwɛy, Taarà a baar banswà, awà udu a baar banswà, afàsal u mbwo a baar banswà, anà afàkal amu baar banswà.
EPH 4:7 Wɛɛ mbuur mbuur amu bi kàwɛl kab a ngway asànaa kà isii a kab a Klistɔ.
EPH 4:8 Kyakin bàtɛɛnà naa: « Nde kàbeenà du, nde kàkör baar a bɔlokà, nde kàpɛ an'kab akà baar. »
EPH 4:9 Kyekà, « Nde kàbeenà », ikaswaŋà aben? Imɛnà naa nde sye kàtàtyà tii u ngyɛl a mɛɛn.
EPH 4:10 Mbuur awà kàtyà, mbuur nsil wa sye kàbeenà du aŋàlyaaŋ du lanswà, ntɔn muyööl indiir byanswà.
EPH 4:11 Wà nde nsil wa kàbuul amwɛy antööm, bumwɛy aŋangɔɔm, apaay Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ, aseey anà alɔɔŋ,
EPH 4:12 ntɔn mupà aŋin'kyɛɛl inwään byàŋàkwo mukwey isal ntɔn mutɔŋ ndür a Klistɔ.
EPH 4:13 Tii kunà isàbulà bi banswà un'tüüb mwɛy unsà làkwikilà anà unsà ngyööb a Mwan a Nzam, unsà indweer, asànaa Klistɔ unsà ngyööl ande.
EPH 4:14 Abun, bi ifàsàkal anki asànaa ambɛy, bàŋàsɛk, bàŋàtàtɔɔm tɔɔm a un'pöb a an'lɔɔŋ a baar a loor anà impeen aba mubwiy baar ndwaŋ.
EPH 4:15 Wɛɛ, mukyään ndandaa unsà ukwen, bi isàyɛl unsà indiir byanswà ntsü akà Klistɔ awà un'tswe.
EPH 4:16 Yà u mbwo ande waa ndür yanswà ayà swalaa, yàŋàtüüb ubwaŋàbwaŋ u mbwo a nkɔn aya, ntɔn mupà mbwo akà itiir a ndür imwɛy imwɛy musal isal a kya, ntɔn muyɛl anà mutɔŋ ya ŋakwo unsà ukwen.
EPH 4:17 Le ayà in'tɛn mɛ anà in'tà mɛ imbäl kà ikɔb a Mwol: twon lan'fàkal asànaa baar mpa abà Ayudà, ntɔn un'yɛnà aba ndöŋ yatɛy.
EPH 4:18 An'kyän aba mà u mpib anà ba sye bà angyey u mɔ̈ɔ̈ a Nzam, ntɔn nkɔ̈ɔ̈n a ngyööb ifàtwaal bwoor u mpem aba.
EPH 4:19 Unsà nkɔ̈ɔ̈n a an'kyän aba, ba bàkyàbilà unsà ipasàsɛ anà bàkyàpà mɔ̈ɔ̈ aba unsà ŋingyäy ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ntsüü anà unkaam.
EPH 4:20 Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ Klistɔ làlɔŋàkà anki abunà,
EPH 4:21 kya isàkal naa ndandaa bɛ làkyàwem naa bàyäm ntɔn nde, isàkal naa nde bàlalɔŋ, unsà ndandaa ayà amu Klistɔ,
EPH 4:22 làpiy nkääl abɛ yà itaan anà làkɔɔb imbuur abɛ kyà itaan akyà ifàbwà u mbwo a ngyal a loor.
EPH 4:23 Wɛy bɛ làfurà bàkün unsà dweelà a un'yɛnà abɛ,
EPH 4:24 anà làbwäär mbuur akün, awà bàkyer asànaa kàkwen Nzam unsà balàbal anà un'kyɛɛl abyà ifàfà u ndandaa.
EPH 4:25 Abun, bɛ làbà aŋàlwomà unsà loor: wɛy mbuur mbuur utɛn ndandaa akà mbääb ande, ntɔn bi ibà atɔŋ bi a bi.
EPH 4:26 Nkye bɛ làbà u nkyɛl? Twon lan'kyer man'be, twon lan'kal u nkyɛl tii mpal làkàminà taaŋ.
EPH 4:27 Twon lan'pà ipöl akà ileŋ.
EPH 4:28 Wɛy mbüüb ukɔ̈ɔ̈n afàyib, wɛɛ nde usi ngwal musal unsà lää kà an'kɔɔ ande ŋakwo, ntɔn nde umɛn undiir akab akà mbuur awe anà ngyal awa.
EPH 4:29 Wɛy ndaa a nsɔɔr ikɔ̈ɔ̈n atoo u mun abɛ. Wɛɛ, kya ngyal isàkal, làtɛn ndaa aŋàbwaŋ, yan'kwo mutɔŋ anà mupà kab a ngway akà baar bàweemà ya.
EPH 4:30 Twon lan'pà Dweelà In'kyɛɛl ngyɛb, Dweelà kàlasi Nzam asànaa inyɛm, ntɔn ilä a ntsuuŋ.
EPH 4:31 Wɛy naa itsumbuun, umpɔr, nkyɛl, an'sye anà in'tswe, bya byanswà byàdiimà amu bɛ anà ube banswà.
EPH 4:32 Làkäl bàŋàbwaŋ bɛ a bɛ, làkäl anà nkääŋ a mpem, làdwääl nkul bɛ a bɛ, asànaa kàladwääl Nzam amu Klistɔ.
EPH 5:1 Làläb Nzam, ntɔn bɛ làbà baan ukwen nde.
EPH 5:2 Làkäl unsà ukwen, asànaa Klistɔ kikwen nde anà kàpɛ nde mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande ŋakwo akà Nzam ntɔn bi, asànaa an'kab anà ibɔɔn asànaa may a usɔŋ aŋàbwaŋ.
EPH 5:3 Itàkal ipasàsɛ, ŋingyäy ifà ifà, ngyal a indiir byanswà, ikal anki akà ikikye uboo a bɛ, ya ikal abun sye ntɔn aŋin'kyɛɛl.
EPH 5:4 Kà yà ubwaŋ anki mutɛn indiir inaŋ anà unsil itàkal itetɛɛn, wɛɛ yà ubwaŋ mufuur an'tɔɔn taaŋ lanswà.
EPH 5:5 Ntɔn, làyöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ naa mbuur wanswà afàkyer ipasàsɛ, ndaa a nswɛn itàkal unkaam - ikaswaŋà naa itɛk - usàwal anki kwal unsà Imwol a Klistɔ anà kyà Nzam.
EPH 5:6 Akà mbuur mwɛy twon kàmàlakur unsà ndaa a bunàbun: ntɔn indiir abi byàfàkàwool nkyɛl a Nzam udu a aŋin'tswe ngwal.
EPH 5:7 Abun, twon lan'tüüb a baar a tub abà.
EPH 5:8 Itaan, bɛ làkälà u làpib, wɛɛ ŋàbawà bɛ làbà pɛɛlà amu Mwol. Làkäl asànaa baan a pɛɛlà.
EPH 5:9 Ntɔn imbɛŋ a pɛɛlà kyà: ubwaŋ, balàbal anà ndandaa.
EPH 5:10 Làsɔ̈ɔ̈l ndaa ifàpà un'sak akà Mwol.
EPH 5:11 Twon lan'bilà unsà isal a mpib ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ndöŋ, wɛɛ làtwey bya u leŋ.
EPH 5:12 Ntɔn indiir bàfàkyer baar abà u nku, yà nswɛn musam bya.
EPH 5:13 Wɛɛ indiir byanswà ufàmɛɛy pɛɛlà, byàfàmɛnà kà ipöl,
EPH 5:14 ntɔn undiir aŋàmɛɛy wanswà wà pɛɛlà. Kyakin bàfàtɛn naa: « Wiyà, ngye mbuur awabɔ̈ɔ̈nà, mbarà uboo a akü, waa Klistɔ usàtà inyäŋ amu ngye. »
EPH 5:15 Làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ unsà nkääl abɛ, twon lan'mɛnà asànaa bɛ làbà insil, wɛɛ làkäl baar a an'yeerà,
EPH 5:16 abà bàfàsyääl taaŋ alà ubwaŋ, ntɔn ilä byà ibe.
EPH 5:17 Abun, twon lan'kal asànaa baar bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n un'yɛnà, wɛɛ làyöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ naa ukwen a Mwol bà aben.
EPH 5:18 Twon lan'yɔr man, ma màfàbwiy baar ndwaŋ. Wɛɛ làkäl aŋàyɔl a Dweelà.
EPH 5:19 Làlɛɛl bɛ a bɛ u mbwo a an'diim a nsyäŋà anà an'diim a ikwɛŋ. Làtɔ̈l an'diim anà lun'syäŋà Mwol u mpem abɛ wanswà.
EPH 5:20 Utaaŋ lanswà, ntɔn indiir byanswà, làfuur an'tɔɔn àkà Nzam Taa kà ikɔb a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ.
EPH 5:21 Bɛ baar làfàpà Klistɔ làzir, làkäl unsà làbɔ̈ɔ̈n bɛ a bɛ.
EPH 5:22 Akaar, lawem adim abɛ asànaa làfàwem bɛ Mwol.
EPH 5:23 Ntɔn un'dim wà mfum a un'kaar, asànaa Klistɔ awà nde Mfum a Ikööŋ, nde wà un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ a Ikööŋ akyà ndür ande ŋakwo.
EPH 5:24 Wɛɛ, asànaa Ikööŋ ifàsà kya Klistɔ làkoo, wɛy akaar sye bàwem adim aba unsà ndaa yanswà.
EPH 5:25 Adim, lakwen akyay abɛ asànaa Klistɔ kàkwen nde Ikööŋ anà kàpɛ nde mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande ŋakwo ntɔn kya.
EPH 5:26 Abà, nde kàkwen mubuul kya kyà in'kyɛɛl anà mupöŋ kya u mbwo a an'dà anà u mbwo a Ndaa.
EPH 5:27 Nde kàkwen naa kya ikäl asànaa nde ŋakwo, ntsà, ukɔɔn kitwan, itàkal un'bɔɔ, itàkal too làmwɛy. Nde kàkwen naa Ikööŋ ande ikäl kyà in'kyɛɛl anà ikɔ̈ɔ̈n an'pɛl.
EPH 5:28 Undiiràwun, un'dim akyer akwen un'kyay ande asànaa ndür ande ŋakwo. Mbuur afàkwen un'kyay ande, afàkwen sye nde ŋakwo.
EPH 5:29 Ntɔn, akà mbuur mwɛy watɛy afàyiiŋ ndür ande ŋakwo, wɛɛ nde akyer afàdii anà afàlɔɔn ya ubwaŋàbwaŋ asànaa ufàkyer Klistɔ ntɔn Ikööŋ ande.
EPH 5:30 Nkye bi kà ibà itiir a ndür ande anki?
EPH 5:31 « Kyakin baal asàwɛy taarànde anà ngwän, waa usàkàbääb anà un'kyay ande. Ba bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l bàsàbulà ndür mwɛy. »
EPH 5:32 Ngyee ayi yà yàkölàköl: mɛ, mɛ an'tɛn naa ya yà ntɔn Klistɔ anà Ikööŋ.
EPH 5:33 Itàkal naa abà, wɛy mbuur mbuur uboo a bɛ ukwen un'kyay ande asànaa nde ŋakwo, wɛy un'kaar upɛ un'dim ande làzir.
EPH 6:1 Baan, lapɛ aböör abɛ làzir, unsà Mwol, ntɔn ya ndaa a balàbal.
EPH 6:2 « Sà làkoo akà taaràŋà anà akà ngwa », yà nswɛɛŋ atàtwɛb aye anà ilää:
EPH 6:3 « ntɔn ngye akäl unsà un'sak anà u mɔ̈ɔ̈ a bwɛlàbwɛl u mɛɛn. »
EPH 6:4 Bɛ, aböör, twon lan'pà mpem a nkyɛl akà baan abɛ, wɛɛ labɔŋ mukapà an'lɔɔŋ aŋàbwaŋ anà an'lwɛŋ man'fà akà Mwol.
EPH 6:5 Asɔ, lapɛ ankum abɛ u mɛɛn mà làzir unsà bɔɔmà anà matɛɛr, u mpem a làbɔ̈ɔ̈n, asànaa bɛ làbàmuweemà Klistɔ,
EPH 6:6 kà nà u mii aba mpɛl anki, asànaa bɛ làkwen mumɛnà bàŋàbwaŋ u mii a baar, wɛɛ asànaa asɔ a Klistɔ mukyer ukwen a Nzam, fà mpem aba.
EPH 6:7 Lasyääl unsà mpem aŋàbwaŋ, asànaa bɛ làbàmusyääl Mwol, wɛɛ kà baar anki.
EPH 6:8 Làyöb naa mbuur mbuur asàwal kà an'kɔɔ a Mwol bweel a ubwaŋ abà kàkyer nde, itàkal un'sɔ, itàkal mbuur a nsaay.
EPH 6:9 Wɛ bɛ, ankum, làkyer sye ifà imwɛy akà ba. Twon làmapà unkiiŋ, ntɔn bɛ làkyàyöb naa bɛ anà ba, làwe Mwol nsil wa u du anà nde ufàsà anki nsɔ̈ɔ̈l uboo a baar.
EPH 6:10 Mumay, làwɛl ngwal abɛ unsà Mwol anà unsà ikɔ̈b a ngwal ande.
EPH 6:11 Làbwäär an'tà a Nzam, ntɔn bɛ làkäl aŋàkwo munwaan anà ikikyer a ileŋ.
EPH 6:12 Bi inwaan anki ngwiy a an'kil anà in'twaŋ, wɛɛ anà Amfum, Aŋikɔ̈b, Aŋàlàyaal u mɛɛn a mpib, anà an'dweelà an'be amà u du.
EPH 6:13 Kyakin, làbwäär an'tà a Nzam manswà, ntɔn bɛ làwɛl iböŋ kà ilä ibe anà làkäl aŋàtsim ungö mukyer indiir byanswà.
EPH 6:14 Làtsim, làbwäär ndandaa asànaa un'di a lɔŋ, balàbal asànaa undiir afàtii itɔl,
EPH 6:15 anà un'kanà akyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là duu asànaa idyäär kà in'kɔl.
EPH 6:16 Udu a indiir byanswà, làkwɛy làkwikilà asànaa làbää làfàdim mbaa a mba yanswà ufàlom Mbuur un'be.
EPH 6:17 Mumay, làwɛl mpà a ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà kɔm a Dweelà, ikaswaŋà naa ndaa a Nzam.
EPH 6:18 U mbwo a ngyamàkà yanswà anà ndɔ̈ɔ̈m, làyamà taaŋ lanswà unsà Dweelà. Làtyeel an'taaŋ unsà muküünà u ngyamàkà ntɔn aŋin'kyɛɛl banswà,
EPH 6:19 anà ntɔn mɛ sye, ntɔn Nzam usi u mun amɛ ndaa an'kwo mɛ musyäl ntɔn mukyään a ngwal ngyee a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ.
EPH 6:20 Itàkal naa apanà mɛ in'wà u bɔlokà, mɛ in'wà un'kyeey a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ alà. Làyamà ntɔn mɛ in'kyään la anà un'kanà wanswà, ukɔɔn bɔɔmà.
EPH 6:21 Mɛ in'kwen bɛ sye làyöb naa mɔ̈ɔ̈ amɛ wà aben, anà ayà in'fàkyer mɛ. Tishik, un'tɔŋ awà in'fàkwen mɛ, un'syääl a lää unsà Mwol, ayàlakyään Làsaŋ lanswà.
EPH 6:22 Undiiràwun wa mɛ amàlatööm awà, ntɔn nde kàlasam naa bi kà ibà aben anà kàlapɛ un'kanà.
EPH 6:23 Wɛy Taa Nzam anà Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ bàpɛ duu, ukwen anà làkwikilà akà atɔŋ banswà.
EPH 6:24 Wɛy kab a ngway a Nzam làkäl akà baar banswà bàfàkwen Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ unsà ukwen mpa bàfàbi.
PHI 1:1 Pɔl anà Tumàtɛ, asyääl a Klistɔ Yɛsu. Anà aŋin'kyɛɛl banswà abà amu Klistɔ Yɛsu u Filipe anà aseey anà asadidi:
PHI 1:2 Wɛy Taaràbi Nzam anà Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ bàlapɛ kab a ngway anà duu.
PHI 1:3 Mɛ in'fàfuur an'tɔɔn akà Nzam amɛ u mbalà yanswà in'fàyɔbà mɛ bɛ,
PHI 1:4 taaŋ lanswà uboo a ngyamàkà amɛ ntɔn bɛ banswà, mɛ in'fàyɔn anki muyamà unsà un'sak,
PHI 1:5 ntɔn kab làfàwal bɛ unsà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ, sɛmà ilä atàtwɛb tii ŋàbà.
PHI 1:6 Wɛɛ mɛ an'sà làkyän naa mbuur kàsɛmà amu bɛ isal aŋàbwaŋ aki akyer asàlab ntsüü a kya tii ilä usàyà Klistɔ Yɛsu.
PHI 1:7 Ya yà balàbal naa mɛ in'käl anà an'kyän a tub amà akà bɛ banswà, ntɔn bɛ làbà u mpem amɛ, bɛ baar làfàwal kab uboo a kab a ngway alà ban'pɛ, itàkal apanà in'wà mɛ u bɔlokà itàkal mpal in'fànwään mɛ Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ anà in'fàtɛɛl mɛ la imbäl.
PHI 1:8 Inye, Nzam wà mbäl amɛ naa mɛ in'fàkwen bɛ banswà mbɔɔn unsà ukwen a Klistɔ Yɛsu.
PHI 1:9 Waa mɛ in'fàyamà abà: wɛy ukwen abɛ bàlalà muyɛl mbɔɔn unsà ngyööb anà nsɔ̈ɔ̈l yanswà,
PHI 1:10 ntɔn bɛ làyöb musɔɔl indiir a ndöŋ. Abun, bɛ làsàkal bàŋàpɔŋà anà ukɔɔn an'pɛl kà ilä a Klistɔ.
PHI 1:11 Bɛ làsàkal bàŋàyɔl a imbɛŋ a balàbal kyan'fà akà Klistɔ Yɛsu ntɔn bi, unsà làkoo anà nsyäŋà a Nzam.
PHI 1:12 Atɔŋ, mɛ in'kwen naa bɛ làyɔb: indiir byan'yeel, byàpɛ mbwo akà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ mukyà usà.
PHI 1:13 Kyakin, u làpaŋ a kuvernɔ̈ɔ̈r, itàkal u mper yanswà, bàkyàyöb naa mɛ in'wà u bɔlokà ntɔn Klistɔ,
PHI 1:14 anà atɔŋ mbɔɔn bàkyàwal ngwal unsà Mwol u mbwo a bɔlokà amɛ, ba bàfàkwɛy kyääl mulɔŋ Ndaa a Nzam ukɔɔn bɔɔmà.
PHI 1:15 Yà ndandaa, baar amwɛy bàfàkyer unsà un'köl anà isür, wɛɛ bumwɛy bàfàlɔŋ Klistɔ unsà an'kyän aŋàbwaŋ.
PHI 1:16 Baar abà bàkyer unsà ukwen, ntɔn ba bàkyàyöb naa isal amɛ apà kyàmunwään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ.
PHI 1:17 Wɛɛ baar bàfàkyään Klistɔ unsà isür, an'kyän aba man'be, ba bàkwen mukwɛy mpay aŋàsöönà u bɔlokà amɛ.
PHI 1:18 Wɛɛ, undiir watɛy! Undiir awà ndöŋ wà naa u mbwo yanswà, itàkal unsà an'kyän an'be itàkal unsà ndandaa, bàmukyäänà Klistɔ. Waa mɛ an'man un'sak ntɔn ya. Inye, mɛ in'yàlalà muman un'sak ntɔn ya.
PHI 1:19 Ntɔn mɛ in'kyàyöb naa yayin yanswà isàkal ntɔn ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈ amɛ, u mbwo a ngyamàkà abɛ anà mbaay a Dweelà a Klistɔ Yɛsu.
PHI 1:20 Undiir indilà mɛ anà in'saa mɛ làkyän u mpem amɛ wanswà, wà naa akà undiir mwɛy ukɔ̈ɔ̈n an'mɛɛy nswɛn, wɛɛ Klistɔ uwɛl làkoo u ndür amɛ, apanà anà utaaŋ lanswà, unsà kam lanswà, itàkal u mbwo a mɔ̈ɔ̈ amɛ, itàkal u mbwo a ukwà amɛ.
PHI 1:21 Ntɔn mɛ, mɔ̈ɔ̈ wà Klistɔ, ukwà bà bweel.
PHI 1:22 Wɛɛ isàkal naa ukal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ u mɛɛn mà, yan'pà mbwo mutwey mbɛŋ unsà isal amɛ, mɛ in'yöb anki naa mɛ ininà in'sɔɔl.
PHI 1:23 Ndaa yweel yan'naanà mper anà mper: mɛ in'we anà ngyal mukyà anà mukal anà Klistɔ, ntɔn ya yan'söön ubwaŋ,
PHI 1:24 wɛɛ yan'söön ndöŋ mbɔɔn mukal u mɛɛn pà ntɔn bɛ.
PHI 1:25 Apan sye, mɛ an'sà kam, mɛ in'kyàyöb naa mɛ in'kyer ayàlam anà in'yàlalà mukal tsütsü apà bɛ banswà ntɔn mukàlabay mukyà usà anà muman un'sak a làkwikilà abɛ.
PHI 1:26 Abun, umpal in'yàfurà mɛ apà bɛ, ngaal abɛ amu Klistɔ Yɛsu ifàsöönà.
PHI 1:27 Wɛɛ itàkal kà aben, làsyen mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ asànaa làkwen Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ a Klistɔ, ntɔn, isàkal naa mɛ amàyàlaler, itàkal naa mɛ in'yi anki, mɛ in'wem làsaŋ naa bɛ lan'tsim unsà dweelà làmwɛy la, làbàmunwaan mbwo mwɛy unsà mpem mwɛy ntɔn làkwikilà amu Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ.
PHI 1:28 Twon lan'man ayiiŋ abɛ bɔɔmà: kya isakal idiim ntɔn mbweel aba anà ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ. Ya yanswà yan'fà akà Nzam.
PHI 1:29 Ntɔn Klistɔ, nde kàlapɛ kab a ngway kà nà mukun'sà làkwikilà mpɛl anki, wɛɛ muman an'kaal sye ntɔn nde.
PHI 1:30 Apanà, bɛ làbàmunwaan ngwiy nsil ya lan'mɛn bɛ munwaan anà ifàkamwanà mɛ asànaa làyöb bɛ.
PHI 2:1 Abun, isàkal naa un'tüüb abɛ anà Klistɔ afàlapà ngwal, ndɛɛl unsà ukwen ande, anà un'tüüb anà nde u mbwo a Dweelà, ngyɛb anà ubwaŋ uboo a bɛ,
PHI 2:2 apan, làyööl mpem amɛ a un'sak mbɔɔn mukal mun mwɛy, ukwen mwɛy, an'kyän an'mwɛy anà un'tüüb mwɛy.
