PHI 2:3 Twon làkyer akà undiir mwɛy unsà isür, itàkal unsà làkoo làkɔ̈ɔ̈n ndöŋ, wɛɛ, anà làbɔ̈ɔ̈n, lawɛl atɔŋ asànaa ba ban'söön bɛ ŋakwo.
PHI 2:4 Wɛy mbuur ukɔ̈ɔ̈n aler ndaa ande ŋakwo mpɛl, wɛɛ nde uler sye ndaa a baar bumwɛy.
PHI 2:5 Làkäl anà ifà a tub aki amu bɛ, ifà kyàkäl amu Yɛsu Klistɔ:
PHI 2:6 Nde mbuur kàkäl asànaa Nzam, nde kàwɛl anki wa asànaa undiir agyɔɔr mukal balàbal anà Nzam.
PHI 2:7 Wɛɛ nde kàkɔɔb ya yanswà kàkäl nde ayà, waa kàbulà asànaa un'sɔ, asànaa baar, ntabwey ande asànaa yà mbuur,
PHI 2:8 nde kàtyeey nde ŋakwo anà kàswɛŋ unkyeey tii kà ukwà, itàkal ukwà a kulunsi.
PHI 2:9 Kyakin Nzam kun'sɛn nde u dudu u mbwo a kab a ngway anà kun'pɛ nde ikɔb kyan'söön ikɔb byanswà,
PHI 2:10 ntɔn naa kà ikɔb a Yɛsu, an'bwaaŋ manswà màbü an'köm u du, u mɛɛn anà ungyɛl a mɛɛn,
PHI 2:11 anà ndaa yanswà yàtɛ imbäl naa: « Yɛsu Klistɔ wà Mwol! » ntɔn làkoo a Taa Nzam.
PHI 2:12 Kyakin, nkween amɛ, bɛ baar làfàkal aŋunkyeey taaŋ lanswà, làkäl abun kà nà u mii amɛ mpel anki, wɛɛ aŋàsöönà apanà mpa in'wà mɛ paa! Làsyääl ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ unsà bɔɔmà anà matɛɛr,
PHI 2:13 ntɔn wà Nzam afàsal uboo a bɛ anà afàlapà ngyal mukwen anà mukyer ndaa yanswà asànaa kàlɔ̈n nde unsà ukwen ande.
PHI 2:14 Làkyer indiir byanswà ukɔɔn in'ŋün anà mbaaŋ,
PHI 2:15 ntɔn bɛ làkɔɔn akal anà pɛl, làkäl ankɔr anà bàŋàpɔŋà, baan a Nzam bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n ube uboo a baar abɛ bà mɛɛn mà abye anà an'kyän an'be. Uboo aba bɛ làbàmupà in'ŋyäŋ asànaa ndem a mbaa u mɛɛn
PHI 2:16 ntɔn bɛ lamɛɛy ndaa a mɔ̈ɔ̈. Abun, bɛ làsàkal ngaal amɛ kà ilä usàyà Klistɔ, ntɔn kà abunàbun anki mɛ kàsäl anà kàmɛn ntaan.
PHI 2:17 Wɛɛ, itàkal naa mɛ an'tyaŋà asànaa man itàkal may udu a ibɔɔn anà isal a làkwikilà abɛ, mɛ in'wà unsà un'sak anà musaŋ anà bɛ banswà.
PHI 2:18 Wɛɛ itàkal bɛ sye, làkal kà un'sak mutüüb anà mɛ.
PHI 2:19 Amu Mwol Yɛsu, mɛ in'wɛ anà làkyän mukàlatööm Tumàtɛ itaan a mbɔɔn tɛy, ntɔn mɛ in'wɛl ndɛɛl unsà làsaŋ abɛ uyan'twääl nde.
PHI 2:20 Nà nde mpɛl afàkab an'kyän anà mɛ, anà afàman mpay ndandaa ntɔn ubwaŋ abɛ.
PHI 2:21 Ntɔn baar banswà bàfàleŋ ubwaŋ aba ŋakwo, wɛɛ kà bà Yɛsu Klistɔ anki.
PHI 2:22 Kyekà, bɛ làkyàyöb naa Tumàtɛ kàkyàswaŋ lää ande: asànaa mwan anà taarànde, nde kàbääb anà mɛ unsà isal a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ.
PHI 2:23 Kyakin mɛ in'we anà làkyän mukàlatööm awà umpal in'yàyöb mɛ naa ndaa amɛ yan'tsü aben.
PHI 2:24 Mɛ in'wɛ anà làkyän unsà Mwol naa mɛ ŋakwo in'kyer ayàlaler itaan a mbɔɔn tɛy.
PHI 2:25 Wɛɛ apanà, mɛ in'manà naa yà mfun naa mɛ alàtööm un'tɔŋ amɛ Ɛpafrɔdit, mbuur ifàsal bi anà ifànwaan bi ità anà nde, mbuur awà lan'tööm bɛ mukambay unsà indiir kàkäl mɛ abyà mfun,
PHI 2:26 ntɔn nde kàkäl anà ngyal mbɔɔn mufàlaman bɛ banswà anà nde kàmɛnà mpay mbɔɔn u mpem ntɔn làwem bɛ làsaŋ a ukyal ande.
PHI 2:27 Inye, nde kàkäl anà ukyal, tsütsü mukwà, wɛɛ Nzam kun'wem ngyɛb, kà nde mpɛl anki, wɛɛ mɛ sye, ntɔn mɛ mukɔɔn aman ngyɛb udu a ngyɛb.
PHI 2:28 Lalan mɛ an'kyer làgyägyä mufàlatööm awà, umpal làyuman bɛ, bɛ làkäl unsà un'sak, anà mɛ in'kɔ̈ɔ̈n akal anà ngyɛb mbɔɔn.
PHI 2:29 Lun'wɛl unsà un'sak wanswà unsà Mwol anà lakömà baar a tub abà.
PHI 2:30 Ntɔn nde kàkyer alàkwà ntɔn isal a Klistɔ: nde kàsi mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande unsà igɔnsà ntɔn mukan'pà mbaay làlàkwo bɛ ŋakwo mukan'pà.
PHI 3:1 Mumay, atɔŋ amɛ, làkäl kà un'sak unsà Mwol. Kà mpay anki akà mɛ mufuur indiir akwà kàsön mɛ, anà bya byà ubwaŋ ntɔn bɛ.
PHI 3:2 Làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ akà mbwà, akà baar a isal abɛ anà akà bàŋàkyɛy a loor.
PHI 3:3 Wɛɛ kiin a baar bàkyɛy bà bi, ntɔn bi ifàsyääl Nzam unsà Dweelà, bi ibye anà ngaal mukal amu Klistɔ Yɛsu, wɛɛ kà uboo a ndür abi ŋakwo anki,
PHI 3:4 itàkal naa mɛ ŋakwo an'kwo in'si mpem amɛ u ndür. Isàkal naa mbuur asin akwen mupà mpem ande amu nde ŋakwo, mɛ, mɛ an'kwo in'kyer yàŋasöönà.
PHI 3:5 Ntɔn mɛ ban'kyɛy kà ilä kyànaan ungö a mböör amɛ. Mɛ in'wà un'nsi Isàlɛl, u mbil a Bɛnsàmɛn, Un'nsi Ebɛlyɔ mwan a Bebɛlyɔ, umfarisi unsà un'kɔɔn,
PHI 3:6 ntɔn un'kanà, mɛ kàmɛɛyà Ikööŋ nkwaaŋ. Ntɔn balàbal alà uboo a un'kɔɔn, akà pɛl mwɛy latɛy amu mɛ.
PHI 3:7 Wɛɛ indiir abi byanswà byakäl bweel ntɔn mɛ, apanà mɛ bya in'manà asanaa bwà ntɔn Klistɔ.
PHI 3:8 Inye, undiir wanswà mɛ in'kamanà asànaa wà bunàbun musi a ubwaŋ abà: ngyööb a Klistɔ Yɛsu, Mwol amɛ. Ntɔn nde, indiir byanswà byà bwà anà in'fàman bya asànaa nkayal, ntɔn muwal bweel: Klistɔ
PHI 3:9 anà mumɛnà amu nde, ukɔɔn akal anà balàbal amɛ lan'fà unsà un'kɔɔn, wɛɛ lan'fà unsà làkwikilà amu Klistɔ, balàbal lan'fà akà Nzam u mbwo a làkwikilà.
PHI 3:10 Mɛ in'kwen muyöb Klistɔ, ngwal a ngwiiyà ande anà un'tüüb u mpay ande, mubulà asànaa nde unsà ukwà ande,
PHI 3:11 ntɔn mutol, kya mbwo isàkal, u ngwiiyà a akü.
PHI 3:12 Iswaŋà anki naa mɛ kàkyàwal indiir abi byanswà, itàkal naa mɛ kàkyàkwo. Wɛɛ mɛ in'wàmulab ntiin amɛ ntɔn mɛ in'wɛl bya, ntɔn mɛ ŋakwo sye Yɛsu kàkyan'wal.
PHI 3:13 Atɔŋ, mɛ in'sii naa mɛ ŋàtàwal anki akà undiir mwɛy. Wɛɛ mɛ in'fàkyer undiir mwɛy mpɛl: mudiimà indiir abyà ungö anà mudüül indiir abyà kusà.
PHI 3:14 Abun, mɛ in'wà mukaamà ntiin tii u ntsüü, ntɔn mɛ in'wɛl mban a mbeel a Nzam fà du u mbwo a Klistɔ Yɛsu.
PHI 3:15 Bi banswà, baar aŋàtsim unsà Dweelà, ifàyweer abun. Apan sye, isàkal naa bɛ làwe anà undiir asin làyweerà, Nzam akyer ayàlamɛɛy wa.
PHI 3:16 Itàkal kà aben, kà ikal ban'kɔlà bi ki, wɛy bi ilalà mukyà mbwo mwɛy.
PHI 3:17 Atɔŋ, bɛ banswà làläb mbaan amɛ, anà làsi iler abɛ akà baar bàfàlab mbaan ayi.
PHI 3:18 Ntɔn, bàmbɔɔn, u mbwo a nkääl aba, bà ayiiŋ a kulunsi a Klistɔ, asànaa in'fàtɛn mɛ a bɛ mbalà mbɔɔn anà in'fàfuur mɛ apanà anà nsaaŋ u mii:
PHI 3:19 ntsüü aba isàkal ukwà, nzam aba wà an'bäl aba, làkoo aba ba bàfàsà unsà indiir a nswɛn aba, an'kyän aba mà unsà indiir a mɛɛn.
PHI 3:20 Wɛɛ akà bi, bi ibà baar a du, ntsü uyàfà Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi ikadilà bi, Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ.
PHI 3:21 Apan, nde asàsɔɔm ndür abi yà nswɛn ntɔn mubuul ya asànaa ndür ande yà làkoo, u mbwo a ngwal ande ifun'pà mbwo musà indiir byanswà ungyɛl a ikɔ̈b ande.
PHI 4:1 Abwɛy, atɔŋ amɛ bà nkween, mɛ in'we anà ngyal mbɔɔn mukàlaman! Bɛ làbà un'sak anà mbaan amɛ! Abun, atɔŋ amɛ, làtsim ubɔɔ a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ anà Mwol.
PHI 4:2 Mɛ an'lɛɛl Ivodi anà mɛ an'lɛɛl Sɛntisha mukal an'kyän an'mwɛy unsà Mwol.
PHI 4:3 Anà ngye sye, un'baay amɛ wàndandaa, mɛ amalɔm mukabay, ntɔn ba bànwään mbwo mwɛy anà mɛ ntɔn Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ, sye, anà Klɛma anà abaay amɛ bumwɛy, ikɔb aba byà ubɔɔ a un'kaan a mɔ̈ɔ̈.
PHI 4:4 Taaŋ lanswà, làkäl kà un'sak unsà Mwol. Mɛ an'fàfuur: làkäl kà un'sak!
PHI 4:5 Wɛy baar banswà bàyöb ubwaŋ angye. Mwol wà tsütsü.
PHI 4:6 Twon lan'kyɛɛr a bunàbun, wɛɛ unsà ipöl kyanswà, u mbwo a ngyamàkà anà u mbwo a ndɔ̈ɔ̈m anà an'tɔɔn, làswɛŋ ngyal abɛ akà Nzam.
PHI 4:7 Abun, duu a Nzam alà lan'lyaaŋ un'yɛnà wanswà, làyàkaar mpem abɛ anà an'kyän abɛ amu Klistɔ Yɛsu.
PHI 4:8 Atɔŋ, mumay, làsi an'kyän abɛ unsà indiir a ndandaa, byà ibyääl, byàbalàbal, byàŋàpɔŋà, byà ukwen, byàŋàsyäŋà, byàŋàbwaŋ, anà byàlàkoo.
PHI 4:9 Indiir làlɔŋàkà bɛ, làwɛl bɛ anà làwem bɛ akà mɛ, làsyääl bya. Waa Nzam a duu uyàkal anà bɛ.
PHI 4:10 Mɛ kàmɛn un'sak mbɔɔn unsà Mwol ntɔn làfàsà bɛ an'kyän abɛ amu mɛ: Inye, bɛ làkäl anà an'kyän amà, wɛɛ bɛ làkäl anki anà ipöl muswaŋ ma.
PHI 4:11 Mɛ in'tɛɛnà anki abwɛy naa ntɔn mɛ an'kwà nkyääŋ a indiir, ntɔn mɛ kàlɔŋàkà mukal anà un'sak a indiir in'wà mɛ abyà.
PHI 4:12 Mɛ in'kyàyöb mukal u làmbwà anà mukal unsà indiir mbɔɔn. Mɛ kàlɔŋàkà mukal aŋàyuur anà mukal u ngyal, mukal unsà indiir mbɔɔn asànaa u ngyal.
PHI 4:13 Mɛ an'kwo mukyer indiir byanswa amu mbuur afan'pà ngwal.
PHI 4:14 Apan sye, bɛ làkyer ubwaŋ muwal kab unsà mpay amɛ.
PHI 4:15 Bɛ làkyàyöb, bɛ, Afilipo: u nsɛmà a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ, umpal kàlwomà mɛ u Masɛdwan, akà Ikööŋ imwɛy kyan'si anki u kab, nà bɛ mpɛl.
PHI 4:16 Ntɔn mpal kàkäl mɛ u Tɛsalɔnikà, mbalà mbɔɔn bɛ lan'tööm indiir kàkäl mɛ abyà mfun.
PHI 4:17 Ikaswaŋà anki naa mɛ in'wàmuleŋ kab, wɛɛ mɛ in'kaleŋà naa bweel abɛ bàbɛy.
PHI 4:18 Abun, mɛ an'kyey naa mɛ kàkyàwal indiir byanswà lan'tööm bɛ. Bya byan'söön mbɔɔn. Apanà mɛ an'yɔl a un'sak ntɔn Epafrɔdit kàman'twääl nde an'kab abɛ: may a usɔŋ aŋàbwaŋ, ibɔɔn kan'kyey Nzam anà kya kyàmupà un'sak.
PHI 4:19 Nzam amɛ akyer ayàkölà ngyal abɛ, asànaa awà un'naaŋ ande unsà làkoo amu Klistɔ Yɛsu.
PHI 4:20 Wɛy làkoo làkäl akà Taaràbi Nzam u mbul a in'tye. Yà abwɛy.
PHI 4:21 Làpɛ mbɔr akà ŋin'kyɛɛl wanswà amu Klistɔ Yɛsu. Atɔŋ abà anà mɛ bàmalatööm mbɔr.
PHI 4:22 Aŋin'kyɛɛl banswà bàmàlapà mbɔr, sin sin baar a ndwà a Sɛzar.
PHI 4:23 Wɛy kab a ngway a Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ làkäl anà dweelà abɛ.
COL 1:1 Pɔl, ntööm a Yɛsu Klistɔ, unsà ukwen a Nzam, anà un'tɔŋ Tumàtɛ awà tsütsü apà mɛ, mɛ an'pà mbɔr
COL 1:2 akà aŋin'kyɛɛl abà u bul a Kɔlɔsay abà atɔŋ abi unsà un'tüüb aba amu Klistɔ: wɛy kab a ngway anà duu a Nzam, Taaràbi, màkäl anà bɛ!
COL 1:3 Bi ifuur an'tɔɔn akà Nzam, Taar a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ, unsà ngyamàkà mpa ifàyɔn bi mupà akà nde ntɔn bɛ.
COL 1:4 Bi kàwem làkwikilà abɛ amu Yɛsu Klistɔ anà ukwen làbà bɛ abà ntɔn aŋin'kyɛɛl banswà.
COL 1:5 Bya byan'fà unsà làkyän alà u du ntɔn bɛ, làkyän làyöb bɛ u mbwo a ndaa a ndandaa ayà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ alà làkɔlà akà bɛ.
COL 1:6 La làpää u mɛɛn manswà, waa làbör imbɛŋ, ifà imwɛy sye ufàkyer nde amu bɛ fà ilä làwɛl bɛ anà làyöb bɛ kab a Nzam unsà ndandaa ande,
COL 1:7 asànaa naa kàlalɔŋ Ɛpafras. Nde wà un'baay a isal ifàkwen bi, un'syääl a lää wà Klistɔ.
COL 1:8 Nde mbuur kikyään naa ukwen nà Dweelà we abà uboo a bɛ.
COL 1:9 Kyakin, akà bi, fà ilä kàwem bi abà, bi kàyɔ̈n anki muyamà ntɔn bɛ. Bi kan'lɔm akà Nzam mukàlapà, u mbwo a Dweelà ande, an'yeerà anà un'yɛnà ntɔn muyöb ukwen ande.
COL 1:10 Abun, bɛ làsàkal anà nkääl aŋàkwo akà Mwol ntɔn mukun'pà un'sak taaŋ lanswà. Amu ya, bɛ làsàkyer ndaa aŋàbwaŋ, làsàbɔr mbɛŋ ifà ifà anà làsàkal u ngyööb a Nzam yà ndandaa.
COL 1:11 Ngwal a làkoo ande isàlabuul bàngwal amu ya yanswà, ntɔn bɛ làkwe mukaŋ mpem u ndaa yanswà anà làsi muküünà tii u ntsüü unsà un'sak.
COL 1:12 Làfuur an'tɔɔn akà Taa awà kàlasi bàŋàkwo muwal kab uboo a kwal a aŋin'kyɛɛl u pɛɛlà.
COL 1:13 Nde kitsü mɔ̈ɔ̈ unsà ikɔ̈b a mpib anà nde kibiil uboo a imwol a Mwan ande wànkween.
COL 1:14 Amu nde bi ibà aŋàbeen, man'be abi màŋàdwääl.
COL 1:15 Mwan awà wà idiim a Nzam mpa bàfàman u mii. Nde wà Mwan atàtwɛb u nkyeer yanswà,
COL 1:16 ntɔn indiir byanswà bàkyer amu nde, u du anà u mɛɛn, abyà ifàmɛnà anà mpa byàfàmɛnà, An'kir Imwol, Amfum, Aŋikɔ̈b anà Aŋangwal, indiir byanswà bàkyer amu nde anà ntɔn nde,
COL 1:17 anà nde wà kusà a indiir byanswà, amu nde indiir byanswà byà kà ikal abya.
COL 1:18 Nde wà un'tswe a ndür ayà Ikööŋ, un'bään wàtàtwɛb uboo a akü, ntɔn muwal ikal atàtwɛb, amu indiir byanswà.
COL 1:19 Ntɔn Nzam kàkwen naa inzaam ande kyanswà iyööl Mwan ande,
COL 1:20 anà u mbwo a nde, nde ufuur un'tüüb ande anà indiir byanswà, u mɛɛn anà u du, musà duu u mbwo a an'kil a kulunsi ande amu nde anà ntɔn nde.
COL 1:21 Kyekà, itaan bɛ làkäl angyey anà ayiiŋ a Nzam unsà an'kyän anà unsa isal abɛ byà ube.
COL 1:22 Wɛɛ apanà, Nzam kan'fuur un'tüüb ande anà bɛ u mbwo a ndür a imbuur a Mwan ande yàkü ntɔn mukàlamɛɛy bàŋin'kyɛɛl kusà ande, ukɔɔn too anà an'pɛl.
COL 1:23 Wɛɛ ilɔɔmà naa, u mbwo a làkwikilà, bɛ làkäl bàngwal anà bàŋàtsim, ukɔɔn akal bàŋàkaabà anà làkyän a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ alà làwem bɛ, alà bàkyään akà ikyeer kyanswà u mɛɛn, anà amu la, mɛ, Pɔl, akyàbulà un'syääl.
COL 1:24 Mpalàbà, mɛ an'man un'sak unsà mpay an'fuur mɛ ayà ntɔn bɛ, ntɔn mɛ in'wàmukölà u ndür amɛ nkɔ̈ɔ̈n ayà u mpay aŋàsöön a Klistɔ, ntɔn ndür ande ayà Ikööŋ,
COL 1:25 ntɔn kya, mɛ akyàbulà un'syääl u mbwo a buur kan'pɛ Nzam ntɔn bɛ: mukyään ubwaŋàbwaŋ ndaa a Nzam,
COL 1:26 ndaa yàkäl ngyee fà itaan anà kàmɛɛy nde mpalàbà akà aŋin'kyɛɛl ande.
COL 1:27 Nde kàkwen mukaswaŋ naa un'naaŋ a làkoo nà awà uboo a ngyee ayi ntɔn baar mpa abà Ayudà: Klistɔ amu bɛ, iswaŋà naa bɛ làbye anà làkyän muwal kab unsà làkoo a Nzam.
COL 1:28 Nde awà bi ifàkyään, ifàweey anà ifàlɔŋ mbuur wanswà unsà an'yeerà manswà, ntɔn mubuul mbuur wanswà ukäl aŋàyɛl amu Klistɔ.
COL 1:29 Kyakin in'fàsal mɛ anà in'fànwaan mɛ anà un'swey a ngwal ande awà afàsal a unkaak a ngwal amu mɛ.
COL 2:1 Abun, mɛ in'kwen bɛ làyöb naa bwoor a ità nà mɛ in'fànwaan ntɔn bɛ, ntɔn baar a Lawɔdisɛ, anà ntɔn baar banswà mpa abàŋàtaman akà ikikye,
COL 2:2 abà, mɛ in'kwen naa mpem aba ikäl yà un'kanà, anà ba bàkäl bàŋàtüüb unsà ukwen, bàbilà uboo a un'naaŋ ande wanswà, bàyöl a un'yɛnà ntɔn bàyöb ngyee a Nzam, ikaswaŋà naa Klistɔ.
COL 2:3 Un'naaŋ a an'yeerà anà ngyööb byàŋàyee amu nde.
COL 2:4 An'tɛn mɛ abà ntɔn mbuur ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akàlakur a ntweey a ntsà yà loor.
COL 2:5 Ntɔn itàkal naa unsà imbuur mɛ tsütsü watɛy anà bɛ, wɛɛ unsà dweelà, mɛ in'wà anà bɛ, mɛ in'wà unsà un'sak muman naa bɛ làbàŋàtsim unsà làkwikilà amu Klistɔ.
COL 2:6 Abun, asànaa làkyey bɛ Klistɔ Yɛsu asànaa Mwol, làkäl un'tüüb anà nde.
COL 2:7 Abà, làkäl aŋàsà in'swɛy anà aŋàtɔŋ amu nde, làkäl aŋàtsim unsà làkwikilà asànaa bàlalɔŋ la, anà làkäl bàŋàsöön unsà ngyamàkà a an'tɔɔn.
COL 2:8 Làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ, ntɔn mbuur ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akàlalɛɛ mbwaar a ntweey a ntsà, wɛɛ ya kàyà ndandaa anki, anà an'yeerà a loor màfàfà unsà imbuur, anà unsà ngwal ifàyaal mɛɛn, wɛɛ kà akà Klistɔ anki.
COL 2:9 Ntɔn ngyööl a Nzam yanswà yà u ndür ande,
COL 2:10 anà bɛ, bɛ làbà aŋàyɔl amu mbuur awà un'tswe a Imfum kyanswà anà Ikɔ̈b kyanswà.
COL 2:11 Amu nde sye waa bàlakyɛy, kà nkyɛɛy ayà ufàkyer kɔɔ a mbuur anki, wɛɛ nkyɛɛy a Klistɔ ayà ifàtsuuŋ imbuur abi kyà man'be.
COL 2:12 Bɛ bàladye anà nde u ndüümà, bàlawiiy sye anà nde, u mbwo a làkwikilà amu unkaak a ngwal a Nzam awà kun'wiiy uboo a akü.
COL 2:13 Bɛ, bɛ baar abà làkäl aŋàkwà ntɔn mbii abɛ anà ukɔɔn nkyɛɛy a ndür abɛ, Nzam kàlapɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà nde. Nde kidwääl nkul a mbii abi yanswà.
COL 2:14 Nde kàdwä un'kɔɔn a ikwàndwà abi anà nswɛɛŋ awa, nde kàpiy wa, waa kàbɛɛrà wa u kulunsi.
COL 2:15 Abun, Amfum anà Aŋikɔ̈b, nde kasi ipɔl ipɔl, kamɛɛy ibaŋ u mii a baar banswà, kasi unsà un'lwaaŋ a iböŋ a kulunsi.
COL 2:16 Abun, wɛy naa akà mbuur mwɛy ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akàlatsüül mbar ntɔn isaa anà man, itàkal ntɔn un'kyɔm, ntɔn mukyɛɛl nsöŋ akün, itàkal saba:
COL 2:17 Abin byanswà byà munii a indiir byàlàyà, wɛɛ ndandaa abya yà amu Klistɔ.
COL 2:18 Twon lan'pà mbwo naa bàlatsüül mbar akà baar bàfàmɛnà naa ba bà baar a làbɔ̈ɔ̈n anà bàfàsà ngyamàkà akà akyeey. Ba bàŋàbilà afwee unsà imɛɛy aba ŋakwo. Ntɔn an'kyän a imbuur aba, ba bàŋàyam a uyɔl bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n ndöŋ.
COL 2:19 Ba kà bàŋàbääb anki akà Klistɔ awà un'tswe. Kyeka, u mbwo a un'tswe waa ndür yanswà ifàwal isaa anà yàŋàtüüb a deŋ deŋ a an'kör anà nkɔn, anà in'tay unsà ngyɛɛl aya ufun'pà Nzam.
COL 2:20 Kya isàkal naa bɛ làkü anà Klistɔ, anà làkyàtsuŋà unsà indiir byàfàyaal mɛɛn mà, ntɔn nkye lan'fàkyey bɛ nswɛɛŋ asànaa bɛ làfàkal kà an'kɔɔ a mɛɛn:
COL 2:21 « Twon an'dyà undiir wà », « Twon an'kyee undiir wunà », « Twon an'ba wa ».
COL 2:22 Nswɛɛŋ ayi yà ntɔn indiir abyà ifàtay ungö musyääl bya. Ya yà nswɛɛŋ anà an'lɔɔŋ a imbuur.
COL 2:23 Inye, nswɛɛŋ ayi ifàmɛnà asànaa ya ye anà an'yeerà, ntɔn ya ifàlɔm naa mbuur mbuur usi ngyamàkà asànaa ukwen mpem ande, anà làbɔ̈ɔ̈n a loor, anà upɛ ndür ande ŋakwo mpay. Wɛɛ ya ndöŋ yatɛy, ntɔn ya ifàpà ilään a ndür mpɛl.
COL 3:1 Abun, isàkal naa bɛ làkyàwiyà anà Klistɔ, làleŋ indiir a du, ikal awà Klistɔ, awà wàŋàbwaay u kɔɔ a ibaal a Nzam.
COL 3:2 Làpɛ an'kyän abɛ unsà indiir a du, wɛɛ kà unsà byàmɛɛn anki.
COL 3:3 Ntɔn, bɛ làkyàkwà, mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ wàŋàyee uboo a Klistɔ, amu Nzam.
COL 3:4 Mpal usàmɛnà Klistɔ awà mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ, apan, bɛ sye làsàmɛnà anà nde, unsà làkoo ande.
COL 3:5 Làdwä indiir a mɛɛn byanswà u mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ: ipasàsɛ, ŋingyäy, ilään, làmfɛɛl, anà unkaam abà itɛk.
COL 3:6 Indiir a tub abi ifàgyool nkyɛl a Nzam udu a baan un'tswe ngwal.
COL 3:7 Le nkääl làkäl bɛ anà ya, mpal làkäl bɛ uboo a mɔ̈ɔ̈ awun.
COL 3:8 Wɛɛ mpalàbà, bɛ sye, làkɔɔb indiir abi byanswà: nkyɛl, itsumbuun, ful, ntwee anà ndaa a kɔɔrà abyà byàfàtoo u mun abɛ.
COL 3:9 Twon lan'kur bɛ a bɛ, ntɔn bɛ làkyàkɔɔb imbuur abɛ kyà itaan anà nsyääl akya,
COL 3:10 anà bɛ làkyàbwaar mbuur akün awà afàbwool taaŋ lanswà uboo a ngyööb asaŋaa isii a Nkyer ande.
COL 3:11 Abun, mbuur mpa awà Un'yudà itàkal naa Un'yudà ufàkal anki, itàkal bàŋàkyɛy anà bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n aŋàkyɛy, itàkal mbuur a mbuur anà kimbuur, itàkal un'sɔ anà mbuur a nsaay, wɛɛ Klistɔ: nde wà ya yanswà amu baar banswà.
COL 3:12 Ntɔn bɛ làbà aŋàsɔɔl, bà in'kyɛɛl, bànkwen akà Nzam, abun làkäl anà mpem aŋàbwaŋ, mpem a ngyɛb, ukwen, làbɔ̈ɔ̈n, anà nkääŋ a mpem.
COL 3:13 Làkäl anà nkääŋ a mpem bɛ a bɛ, kya isàkal naa umwɛy uboo a bɛ we anà ikɔk a ndaa anà wumwɛy, làdwääl nkul bɛ a bɛ, asànaa kàladwääl Klistɔ, làkyer abun sye bɛ a bɛ.
COL 3:14 Unsà ya yanswà, làkäl anà ukwen, wa wà asànaa un'siŋ a ngwal ufàlatüüb.
COL 3:15 Wɛy duu a Klistɔ làyaal mpem abɛ, duu alà bàlabel bɛ banswà ntɔn mutɔŋ ndür mwɛy. Làyöb mufuur an'tɔɔn.
COL 3:16 Wɛy ndaa a Klistɔ anà un'naaŋ aya wanswà ikäl amu bɛ! Làlɔŋàkà anà làweey amwɛy anà bumwɛy unsà an'yeerà manswà. Làtɔ̈ɔ̈l Nzam an'diim u mpem abɛ wanswà anà mfuur an'tɔɔn, u mbwo a an'diim, ikwɛŋ, anà an'diim ufàpà Dweelà.
COL 3:17 Undiir wanswà lan'kwo bɛ mutɛn itàkal mukyer, làkyer wa kà ikɔb a Mwol Yɛsu, unsà mfuur an'tɔɔn akà Taa Nzam u mbwo a nde.
COL 3:18 Akaar, lawem adim abɛ, asànaa abà ukwen a Mwol.
COL 3:19 Abaal, lakwen akyay abɛ, twon lan'kal anà itsumbuun akà ba.
COL 3:20 Baan, làkäl anà unkyeey akà aböör abɛ unsà indiir byanswà, ntɔn ya ifàpà un'sak akà Mwol.
COL 3:21 Bàtaa, twon lan'pà baan abɛ unkiiŋ, manà ba bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n ayàkal anà un'kanà.
COL 3:22 Asɔ, làkäl anà unkyeey akà ankum abɛ unsà indiir byanswà u mɛɛn pà. Làkyer abun, kà nà u mpal bàlaseyà ba anki, asànaa bɛ làleŋà mupà un'sak akà baar, wɛɛ kà unsà mpem yweel anki, ntɔn bɛ làfàtiin Mwol bɔɔmà.
COL 3:23 Itàkal naa isal abɛ akyɛy kyà kà aben, làkyer kya u mpem aŋàbwaŋ, ntɔn Mwol, wɛɛ kà ntɔn baar anki.
COL 3:24 Làyöb naa bɛ làsàwal làfur akà Mwol, la là kwal kàlɔ̈ɔ̈n nde ntɔn aŋikyɛɛl. Ntɔn Nkum a ndandaa làsyääl bɛ wà Klistɔ.
COL 3:25 Mbuur mpa awà balàbal asàwal làfur a nkɔ̈ɔ̈n a balàbal ande, un'kɔl aŋàyɔŋ watɛy.
COL 4:1 Ankum, làkyer balàbal anà nkɔ̈ɔ̈n a nsöön akà asɔ abɛ, làyöb naa bɛ sye, bɛ làbye anà Nkum mwɛy u du.
COL 4:2 Làsi muküünà u ngyamàkà, amu ya, làkäl kà ikyɛɛŋ anà làfuur an'tɔɔn akà Nzam.
COL 4:3 Mpal làyamà bɛ, làyamà sye ntɔn bi ntɔn Nzam kipɛ ipöl aŋàbwaŋ mulɔŋ ndaa ande, mukyään ngyee a Klistɔ, yà ntɔn ya in'wà mɛ u bɔlokà,
COL 4:4 ntɔn mɛ in'sam ya ubwaŋàbwaŋ asànaa an'kwo mɛ musam ya.
COL 4:5 Abà, làkäl anà an'yeerà unsà nkääl abɛ akà baar mpa abà aklistɔ, anà làsyääl taaŋ.
COL 4:6 Wɛy an'yääm abɛ màkäl màŋàbwaŋ taaŋ lanswà, màŋàsà muŋ, anà nkwaar mufuur akà mbuur wanswà.
COL 4:7 Tishik, un'tɔŋ wànkween, un'syääl mwɛy wàlää, un'baay amɛ unsà isal a Mwol, akyer ayàlasam làsaŋ amɛ lanswà.
COL 4:8 Mɛ, mɛ amàlatööm awà abun ntɔn mukàlasam làsaŋ abi anà mukàlalɛɛl.
COL 4:9 Ɔnɛsim, un'tɔŋ wàlää anà nkween, umwɛy uboo a bɛ, wàmuyà mbwo mwɛy anà nde. Ba bàyàlasam indiir byanswà ikalyaaŋà kà.
COL 4:10 Aristark, awà u bɔlokà anà mɛ, kàmàlatööm mbɔr mbɔɔn, anà Malakɔ sye, un'tɔŋ a Barnabas. Bɛ làkyàwal nswɛɛŋ ntɔn nde : isàkal naa nde kan'yà akà bɛ, lun'wɛl ubwaŋàbwaŋ.
COL 4:11 Yɛsu awà bàfàbel Yüstüs, kàmàlatööm mbɔr. Ba mpɛl uboo a Ayudà abàmusal anà mɛ ntɔn Imwol a Nzam. Ba bàkäl ndɛɛl ntɔn mɛ.
COL 4:12 Ɛpafras, nde sye wà umwɛy uboo abɛ, un'syääl a Klistɔ mpa afàyɔn munwaan ità u ngyamàkà ande, ntɔn bɛ làkäl bàŋàtsim, bàŋàbwaŋ, anà ntɔn muswaŋ ngyööl a an'kyän a ukwen a Nzam banswà.
COL 4:13 Mɛ amun'tɛɛl imbäl ki naa nde afàsal ngwal mbɔɔn ntɔn bɛ, ntɔn baar a bul a Lawɔdisɛ anà bà bul a Yɛlapɔlis.
COL 4:14 Lukà, un'ngaŋ, un'saam abi anà Dɛmas bàmàlatööm mbɔr.
COL 4:15 Apɛ atɔŋ abà u bul a Lawɔdisɛ mbɔr, anà Nɛmfa, anà Ikööŋ ifàköŋ u ndwà ande.
COL 4:16 Mpal làsàmay bɛ mutaŋ un'kaan amɛ, làkyer mbwo yanswà naa bàtäŋ wa sye u Ikööŋ a Lawɔdisɛ. Làtäŋ sye anà wa akwà asàfà Lawɔdisɛ.
COL 4:17 Abun, lun'kyään Arship naa: « Tà mpi isal kàwɛl ngye unsà Mwol, ntɔn ngye akwey kya ubwaŋàbwaŋ. »
COL 4:18 Le mbɔr a kɔɔ amɛ Pɔl yayi: Làyɔbà naa mɛ in'wà u bɔlokà. Wɛy kab a ngway a Nzam làkäl anà bɛ!
1TH 1:1 Mɛ Pɔl, Silàvɛ anà Tumàtɛ. Bi ban'pà mbɔr akà Ikööŋ a Atɛsalɔnikà akyà kyà Taa Nzam, anà kyà Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ, wɛy kab a ngway anà duu màkäl anà bɛ.
1TH 1:2 Bi ifàyɔn anki mufuur an'tɔɔn akà Nzam ntɔn bɛ banswà mpal ifàlatà bi din uboo a ngyamàkà abi.
1TH 1:3 Bi ifàyɔbà kusà a Taaràbi Nzam isal ufàtwey nde làkwikilà abɛ, akyà ukwen abɛ, anà kyà muküünà ifàfà unsà làkyän abɛ amu Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ.
1TH 1:4 Bi ikyàyöb, atɔŋ ukwen Nzam, naa nde kàlasɔ̈ɔ̈l.
1TH 1:5 Ntɔn, mpal kàlakyään bi Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ, làkäl anki u ndaa mpɛl, wɛɛ sye unsà ngwal a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl, anà kam aŋàkwo. Bɛ làkyàyöb naa ifà abi byàkäl aben uboo a bɛ, ntɔn ubwaŋ abɛ.
1TH 1:6 Apan bɛ, bɛ làläb nkääl abi anà yà Mwol, mukyey Ndaa uboo mpay aŋàdiir, anà un'sak kan'fà akà Dweelà In'kyɛɛl.
1TH 1:7 Abun, bɛ làkyàbulà mbaan ntɔn aŋàlàkwikilà banswà u bul a Masɛdwan anà Akayi.
1TH 1:8 Kyakin, fà akà bɛ, kà nà ndaa a Mwol mpɛl anki yàpää amu Masɛdwan anà amu Akayi, wɛɛ anà làsaŋ a làkwikilà abɛ amu Nzam làkyer apää ntsü yanswà, waa bi undiir afàtɛn watɛy.
1TH 1:9 Ntɔn ba ŋakwo bàmutà imbäl naa bɛ bi liwɛl abɛn mpal kàyi bi akà bɛ, anà bɛ làwɛy abɛn itɛk ntɔn musyääl Nzam a mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà wàndandaa,
1TH 1:10 anà làdilà Mwan ande kan'fà du, Nde akwà kàwiyà uboo a akü, Yɛsu awà kitsuuŋà u nkyɛl a Nzam ayà tsütsü muyà.
1TH 2:1 Atɔŋ, bɛ ŋakwo làkyayöb naa ngyeel abi akà bɛ kà yàkäl yà bunàbun anki.
1TH 2:2 Wɛɛ, ungö mukipà mpay anà mukito u bul a Filipe, asànaa làyɔb bɛ, Nzam kipɛ ngwal mukàlakyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ ande, uboo a ngwiy a kölàköl.
1TH 2:3 Ntɔn, ndɛɛl abi kàyàŋàbwaay anki udu a ndiimà, itàkal udu a an'kyän a ŋingyay, itàkal u mbwo a an'kyän a loor.
1TH 2:4 Wɛɛ Nzam kàkyisyeebà anà kàkyiman bàŋàkwo mukyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ, kyakin bi ya ifàkyään anki ntɔn mupà un'sak akà baar, wɛɛ akà Nzam awafàler mpem abi.
1TH 2:5 Kyakin, bɛ làkyàyöb, Nzam wà mbäl abi, naa bi kàsyääl anki akà ikikye ndaa alwab baar, itàkal an'kyän muwal bweel.
1TH 2:6 Bi kàleŋ anki làkoo a baar, itàkal akà bɛ, itàkal akà bumwɛy,
1TH 2:7 itàkal naa bi ibà antööm a Klistɔ, bi kàlàsiinà anki a ngwal mukal ungyɛl a ikɔ̈b abi. Wɛɛ bi bàkäl aŋàyɔl a làbɔ̈ɔ̈n uboo a bɛ, asànaa maa ufàbööb nde baan ande.
1TH 2:8 Ntɔn bi kàkäl anà ukwen mbɔɔn akà bɛ, bi kàmɛn naa yà ubwaŋ bi kàlapɛ kà nà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ a Nzam mpɛl anki, wɛɛ anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi ŋakwo, ntɔn bɛ làbà bàntal akà bi.
1TH 2:9 Atɔŋ, bɛ làkyàkayɔbà mpay anà yɔ̈ɔ̈n abi: bi kàsälà mpib anà mwäänà ntɔn mukɔɔn akal buur akà umwɛy ubɔɔ abɛ, waa bi kàlakyään Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ a Nzam.
1TH 2:10 Bɛ làbà ambäl anà Nzam sye: nkääl abi kusà a bɛ, aŋàlàkwikilà, yàkäl yà in'kyɛɛl, yàbalàbal, ikɔ̈ɔ̈n an'pɛl.
1TH 2:11 Bɛ làkyàyöb naa bi bàkyerà aben akà umwɛy umwey uboo a bɛ. Bi kàkyer asànaa taa anà baan ande ŋakwo,
1TH 2:12 mukàlalɛɛl, mukàlapà ngwal, anà mukàlalɔ̈ɔ̈m mukal anà nkääl aŋàkwo a Nzam awà kàlabel u Imwol ande anà u làkoo ande.
1TH 2:13 Kyakin, akà bi, bi ifàfuur an'tɔɔn akà Nzam taaŋ lanswà: mpal bàlakyään bi ndaa a Nzam, bɛ làkyer awem anà làkyey ya, kà asànaa ndaa a mbuur anki, wɛɛ asànaa ndaa a Nzam, ntɔn ya yà ndandaa. Kyakin, ya ifàsal ngwal amu bɛ aŋàlàkwikilà.
1TH 2:14 Atɔŋ, bɛ làyweel Ikööŋ a Nzam abyà u Yuday, amu Klistɔ Yɛsu. Ntɔn mpay nsil ya làmɛn bɛ akà atɔŋ abɛ ŋakwo, ba sye bàmɛn ya akà Ayudà.
1TH 2:15 Ba bà baar bàdwä Mwol Yɛsu anà aŋangɔɔm, anà bimɛɛy nkwaaŋ. Nzam un'sak watɛy anà ba. Ba bàŋankir a baar banswà!
1TH 2:16 Ba bàfàkyer ngwal mukidüüb mbwo muyääm anà baar mpa abà Ayudà manà naa ba bàwü mɔ̈ɔ̈. Abun, ba bàmukwɛy man'be udu a man'be aba taaŋ lanswà, anà u ngöngö, nkyɛl a Nzam ikyer asabweel.
1TH 2:17 Wɛɛ akà bi, atɔŋ, bi kàkyer akaabà anà bɛ taaŋ làmwɛy, itàkal naa bi ifàmɛɛn anki, bɛ làbà u mpem abi. Bi kàkäl anà ilɛɛm mukàlaman, anà bi kàkyer ngwal mbɔɔn mukwey ya.
1TH 2:18 Bi kàkwen muyà akà bɛ: mɛ ŋakwo, Pɔl, kàsi mbalà mbɔɔn. Wɛɛ Satanà laa kidüüb nde mbwo.
1TH 2:19 Abun, nà, isàkal naa kà bɛ anki, abà làkyän abi, un'sak abi, anà ngaal isàkal mpà a làkoo abi kusà a Mwol Yɛsu umpal usàyà nde?
1TH 2:20 Ɛɛ, bɛ làbà làkoo anà un'sak abi.
1TH 3:1 Kyakin, bi kàkwe anki mukaŋ mpem, waa bàyweer naa yubwaŋ bi isàsal bi mpɛl u bul a Atɛn.
1TH 3:2 Bi kàmàlatööm un'tɔŋ abi Tumàtɛ, mbaay abi unsà isal a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ a Klistɔ, ntɔn mukàlalɛɛl anà mukàlapà ngwal unsà làkwikilà abɛ,
1TH 3:3 ntɔn, akumwɛy uboo a bɛ ukɔɔn akwɛlà unsà mpay aŋàdiir yi. Ntɔn bɛ làkyàyöb bɛ ŋakwo naa bi bibel ntɔn mpay ayi.
1TH 3:4 Mpal kàkäl bi apà bɛ, bi kàlaweey naa bi bàkyer asimɛɛy nkwaaŋ. Abun ya sye yan'mɛnà asànaa làyöb bɛ ya ubwaŋàbwaŋ.
1TH 3:5 Asànaa mɛ kàfàkwo anki mukaŋ mpem, mɛ kàtöm Tumàtɛ ntɔn muyöb naa làkwikilà abɛ là aben. Bɔɔmà amɛ làkäl naa manà Un'lwɛb kàlalwɛb, anà isal kàkyer bi ikyà bwà.
1TH 3:6 Apà, Tumàtɛ kan'yàfurà kàfü nde akà bɛ, anà kàmipà làsaŋ aŋàbwaŋ là làkwikilà abɛ anà lukwen abɛ. Nde kan'tɛn naa bɛ làfàyɔbà bi taaŋ lanswà anà làbà anà ngyal mufiman asànaa ibà bi sye anà ngyal mukàlaman.
1TH 3:7 Apan, atɔŋ, bi kan'wal ndɛɛl amu bɛ, u mbwo a làkwikilà abɛ, uboo a ngyɛb aŋàdiir abi yanswà anà mpay abi.
1TH 3:8 Apanà, bi kan'fàyaabà, ntɔn bɛ làbà aŋàtsim unsà un'tüüb abɛ anà Mwol.
1TH 3:9 Bi Nzam abi ifun'kömà aben u ndaa abɛ, ntɔn un'sak wanswà làmipà bɛ kusà ande?
1TH 3:10 Mpib anà mwäänà, bi ifàlɔm akà nde unsà muküünà ntɔn nde kipɛ mbwo mufàlaman anà mukwɛy undiir akɔ̈ɔ̈n u làkwikilà abɛ.
1TH 3:11 Wɛy Nzam nde ŋakwo, anà Mwol Yɛsu biduub mbwo muyà akà bɛ!
1TH 3:12 Wɛy Mwol uyɛɛl anà ukwɛy ukwen làbà bɛ abà bɛ a bɛ anà akà baar banswà, asànaa ifàlakwen bi.
1TH 3:13 Wɛy nde upɛ ngwal u mpem abɛ, ntɔn wa ukäl win'kyɛɛl anà wàbalàbal kusà a Taaràbi Nzam, umpal usàyà Mwol abi Yɛsu anà aŋin'kyɛɛl ande banswà. Wöwöö.
1TH 4:1 Abun, atɔŋ, bɛ làkyer alɔŋàkà akà bi naa nkääl abɛ ikal aben mupà Nzam un'sak, bɛ sye làfàkyer abun. Apanà, bi kàmàlalɔɔm anà kàmàlalɛɛl kikɔb a Mwol Yɛsu, fàlakyerà yàŋàsöönà.
1TH 4:2 Ntɔn, bɛ làkyàyöb nswɛɛŋ kàlapɛ bi, nswɛŋ yàfü akà Mwol Yɛsu.
1TH 4:3 Ukwen a Nzam bà naa bɛ làbulà aŋin'kyɛɛl: wɛy bɛ làtön induumà.
1TH 4:4 Wɛy umwɛy umwɛy uboo a bɛ uyöb muwal un'kaar unsà un'kyɛɛl anà ibyääl,
1TH 4:5 ntɔn mukɔɔn akal ungyɛl a ikɔ̈b a làmfɛɛl asànaa bàfàkyer baar mpa abà Ayudà mpa bàyöb Nzam.
1TH 4:6 Unsà ndaa ayi, wɛy mbuur ukɔɔn akyer un'tɔŋ ande ube anà akɔɔn akun'kur, ntɔn Mwol afàpà ntaaŋàmbar unsà indiir abi byanswà, asànaa kàtɛn bi anà kàlaweey bi itaan.
1TH 4:7 Ntɔn Nzam kibeel anki ntɔn bi ikäl uboo a ŋingyäy, wɛɛ kibeel mukal uboo a un'kyɛɛl.
1TH 4:8 Kyakin, mbuur apiy nswɛɛŋ ayi, kà mbuur anki nde kan'piy, wɛɛ Nzam, Nde awà afàlapà Dweelà In'kyɛɛl ande.
1TH 4:9 Ntɔn ukwen a atɔŋ anà atɔŋ, mfun mukàlasöön yatɛy, ntɔn bɛ ŋakwo Nzam kàkyàlalɔŋ naa bɛ làkal anà ukwen bɛ a bɛ.
1TH 4:10 Anà bɛ làfàkyer abun akà atɔŋ banswà u bul a Masɛdwan lanswà. Atɔŋ, bi kàmàlalɛɛl, fàlakyerà yàŋàsöönà!
1TH 4:11 Làkäl anà ngyal mukal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a duu: wɛy mbuur mbuur ukyer indiir ande ŋakwo anà udi mbɛŋ a isal a an'kɔɔ ande ŋakwo, asànaa kàlaswɛŋ bi.
1TH 4:12 Abun, nkääl abɛ iyàkal yibyääl kusà a baar mpa abà aklistɔ, waa bɛ mpa làyàkal anà mfun a mbuur.
1TH 4:13 Atɔŋ, bi ikwen naa bɛ làyöb ndandaa ntɔn akü, ntɔn bɛ làkɔɔn akal u ngyɛb asànaa baar bumwɛy bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n làkyän.
1TH 4:14 Ntɔn, isàkal naa bi ibye anà làkwikilà naa Yɛsu kàkyàkwà anà kàkyàwiyà, bi kan'sà làkwikilà sye naa Nzam, u mbwo a Yɛsu, asàsyen baar bàkü amu Yɛsu.
1TH 4:15 Le, undiir itɛɛnà bi a bɛ kan'fà u Ndaa a Mwol: baar bàsàkal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ uboo a bi umpal usàyà Mwol, bàsàfwel anki baar bàkü.
1TH 4:16 Ntɔn nde ŋakwo, Mwol, u ndaa a ngwal anà u ndaa a mfum a akyeey, anà say a mfuŋ a Nzam, Mwol ŋakwo asyetyà fà du, baar bàkü amu Klistɔ bàsàwiyà bàtàtwɛb,
1TH 4:17 ungö, bi baar a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abà isàsaal, Nzam asisɛɛn anà ba uboo a itööm, ntɔn mukàbwey anà Mwol u du. Abun bi isàkal ipepey anà Mwol.
1TH 4:18 Làlɛɛl bɛ a bɛ u mbwo a ndaa ayi.
1TH 5:1 Atɔŋ, ntɔn an'taaŋ anà ilä, mfun mukàlasɔ̈ɔ̈n yatɛy.
1TH 5:2 Ntɔn bɛ ŋakwo làkyàyöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ naa ilä a Mwol isàyà asànaa mbüüb uboo a mpib.
1TH 5:3 Mpal bàsàtɛn baar naa: « Ɔɔ, indiir byanswà abyà u du, byà kà ikyɛɛŋ! », apan, kà imbürà, ibaŋ a mpay isàbwà udu a ba asànaa in'swaŋ udu a un'kaar aŋayöm. Akà mbuur mwɛy usàsɔrà anki.
1TH 5:4 Wɛɛ bɛ, atɔŋ, bɛ kàlàbà uboo a làpib anki, waa ilä iyàlataan asànaa mbüüb.
1TH 5:5 Ntɔn bɛ banswà làbà baan a pɛɛlà, baan a mwäänà: bi kibà baar a mpib anki, itàkal bà làpib anki.
1TH 5:6 Kyakin, wɛy bi ikɔɔn abɔ̈ɔ̈n asànaa baar bumwɛy, wɛɛ bi ikal kigyɛɛŋ anà u làbɔ̈ɔ̈n.
1TH 5:7 Baar bàfàbɔ̈ɔ̈n, bàfàbɔ̈ɔ̈n u mpib, in'nweel a man, bàfàyɔr u mpib.
1TH 5:8 Ntɔn bi ibà baan a mwäänà, bi ikal bàlàbɔ̈ɔ̈n, bàŋàbwaar làkwikilà anà ukwen asànaa kàzak ibeenà, anà làkyän a mɔ̈ɔ̈ asànaa mpà ibeenà.
1TH 5:9 Ntɔn Nzam kisɔ̈ɔ̈l anki naa nkyɛl ande yibweel, wɛɛ muwà mɔ̈ɔ̈ u mbwo a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ,
1TH 5:10 awà kàkü ntɔn bi, ntɔn itàkal bàmɔ̈ɔ̈ itàkal bàŋàkwà, bi ibilà mbwo mwɛy anà nde, uboo a mɔ̈ɔ̈.
1TH 5:11 Kyakin, làlɛɛl bɛ a bɛ anà làpɛɛl ngwal bɛ a bɛ, asànaa làfàtàkyer bɛ.
1TH 5:12 Atɔŋ, bi kàmàlalɔɔm mukan baar bàfàsal uboo a bɛ, baar, unsà ukwen a Mwol, bàfàlaler anà bàfàlaweey.
1TH 5:13 Lapɛ làzir anà ukwen, ntɔn isal aba. Làkäl a duu uboo a bɛ.
1TH 5:14 Atɔŋ, bi kàmàlalɛɛl, làweey aŋunkwɛm, làpɛ ngwal akà baar aŋàyɔn, làbay aŋagyɔ̈ɔ̈là, làkäŋ mpem akà baar banswà.
1TH 5:15 Làkäl kikyɛɛŋ, wɛy mbuur ukɔɔn afuur ube unsà ube, wɛɛ taaŋ lanswà làkyer ubwaŋ uboo a bɛ anà akà baar banswà.
1TH 5:16 Làkäl kun'sak taaŋ lanswà.
1TH 5:17 Làyamà ukɔɔn ayɔn.
1TH 5:18 Làfuur an'tɔɔn akà Nzam unsà ndaa yanswà, ntɔn ba ukwen ande akà bɛ amu Klistɔ Yɛsu.
1TH 5:19 Twon lan'düüb mbwo a isal a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl,
1TH 5:20 twon lan'bɛy ndaa a aŋangɔɔm,
1TH 5:21 wɛɛ làsyeebà indiir byanswà: làkäär yàŋabwaŋ,
1TH 5:22 làtön yàmbe yanswà.
1TH 5:23 Wɛy nde ŋakwo Nzam a duu kàlabuul bàŋukiinà aŋin'kyɛɛl, wɛy dweelà abɛ, mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ anà ndür abɛ byàkäl byàŋàtii ubwaŋàbwaŋ, ntɔn bya ikɔ̈ɔ̈n akal anà an'pɛl umpal usàyà Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ.
1TH 5:24 Nde mbuur kàlabel wà lää, nde mbuur asàkwey ya.
1TH 5:25 Atɔŋ, làyàmà sye ntɔn bi.
1TH 5:26 Lapɛ atɔŋ banswà mbɔr u mbwo a ndüür a itɔŋ.
1TH 5:27 Mɛ amàlabɔɔn kikɔb a Mwol: làtäŋ un'kaan wà akà atɔŋ banswà.
1TH 5:28 Wɛy kab a ngway a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ làkäl anà bɛ.
2TH 1:1 Pɔl, Silàvɛ anà Tumutɛ. Bi ban'pà mbɔr akà Ikööŋ akyà kyà Taa Nzam anà kyà Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ:
2TH 1:2 Wɛy Taaràbi Nzam anà Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ bàlapɛ kab a ngway anà duu!
2TH 1:3 Atɔŋ, taaŋ lanswà bi ikyer afuur an'tɔɔn akà Nzam ntɔn bɛ. Yubwaŋ naa bi ikyer abun, ntɔn làkwikilà abɛ làmuyɛl mbɔɔn, anà ukwen a umwɛy umwɛy uboo a bɛ akatɔŋ bumwɛy bàsöönà.
2TH 1:4 Kyakin ifàswaŋ bi ngaal uboo a Ikööŋ a Nzam ntɔn muküünà abɛ anà làkwikilà abɛ unsà nkwaaŋ anà mpay aŋàdiir làmanà bɛ.
2TH 1:5 Abà ya ikamɛɛyà ntsüül a nsaŋ a Nzam yàbalàbal, ntɔn bɛ làmɛnà bàŋàkwo ntɔn Imwol a Nzam akyà làmanà bɛ mpay.
2TH 1:6 Ya yà balàbal naa Nzam ufuur ngyɛb aŋàdiir akà baar bàfàlapà unkiiŋ,
2TH 1:7 anà nde afàpà, akà bɛ baar làmanà mpay, ngyɔ̈ɔ̈r anà akà bi, umpal a imɛɛy a Mwol Yɛsu fà du anà akyeey ande bunkaak a ngwal.
2TH 1:8 Nde asàyà uboo a làlem a mbaa ntɔn mupà ntaaŋàmbar akà baar mpa bàyöb Nzam anà mpa bàfàkyey Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ a Mwol abi Yɛsu.
2TH 1:9 Ntaaŋàmbar aba isàkal bwà a mbul a in'tye, ukwɛl kusà a Mwol anà làkoo ande làngwal,
2TH 1:10 mpal usàyà nde muwal làkoo amu aŋin'kyɛɛl ande anà itääŋ amu aŋàlàkwikilà, kyekà bɛ làkyey imbäl abi.
2TH 1:11 Kyakin bi ikayamà taaŋ lanswà ntɔn bɛ, ntɔn Nzam abi kàlabuul bàŋàkwo mukal uboo a mbeel kàlasi nde, anà, u mbwo a ngwal ande, nde kàlabay mukwey ngyal abɛ mukyer ubwaŋ anà làkwikilà làfàmɛnà unsà isal.
2TH 1:12 Abun, bɛ làsàsyaŋà ikɔb a Mwol abi Yɛsu anà nde sye akyer asàlasyaŋà, asànaa làkwen kab a ngway a Nzam abi anà là Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ.
2TH 2:1 Atɔŋ, ntɔn ndaa iler ngyeel a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ anà nköŋ abi apà nde, bi kàmàlalɔɔm:
2TH 2:2 isàkal naa imɛɛy mwɛy kyàngɔɔm, itàkal ndaa a mbuur mwɛy, itàkal ndaa a un'kaan mwɛy bàmɛɛy naa yàfü akà bi, yàmàlakyään naa ilä a Mwol kyà kyàyà itaan, twon lan'düül musà lingyoomà unsà an'kyän abɛ itàkal muman bɔɔmà ntɔn ya.
2TH 2:3 Wɛy akà mbuur mwɛy ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akàlabwiy ndwaŋ, itàkal kaben. Ntɔn kusà a ilä aki muyà, baar mbɔɔn bàtwab atàpiy làkwikilà anà aŋufur a nkyɛl awà un'kyàbwà, utwab atàmɛnà,
2TH 2:4 nde mbuur afàmbarà anà afàmbäär undiir wanswà bàfàbel naa nzam itàkal naa undiir wanswà bàfàsà làkoo. Nde afàkàbwaay tii u ndwà a Nzam anà mukyään nde ŋakwo naa nde wà Nzam.
2TH 2:5 Nkye bɛ làfàkayɔbà anki naa mɛ kàkyàlakyään ndaa ayin utaaŋ kàkäl mɛ tsütsü apà bɛ?
2TH 2:6 Apanà, bɛ làkyàyöb undiir akun'taa mpi ntɔn nde uyàmɛnà nà utaaŋ kàyöŋà Nzam ntɔn nde.
2TH 2:7 Ntɔn ngyee a ube yàkyàsɛmà musal. Yan'sal nà mulwom mbuur akataa wa mpi,
2TH 2:8 apan mbuur un'be waa usàmɛnà, mbuur usàdwa Mwol Yɛsu u mbwo a un'swey a mun ande, anà asun'buul undiir a bunàbun u mbwo a in'nyääŋ a ngyeel ande.
2TH 2:9 Mbuur un'be asàyà u ngwal a Satanà, nde asàkyer isal a ngwal byifà ifà, impà, idiim a loor,
2TH 2:10 anà mbwo yanswà mpa ayà balàbal ntɔn mukur baar bàdiimà mbwo, ntɔn ba bàwɛl anki ukwen a ndandaa abà bàlawiiy mɔ̈ɔ̈.
2TH 2:11 Kyakin Nzam katöömà nde ngwal a ndiimà ntɔn ba bàsi làkwikilà u ndaa a loor,
2TH 2:12 ntɔn baar banswà mpa bàsi làkwikilà amu ndandaa, wɛɛ bàmɛn un'sak ntɔn ndaa mpa ayà balàbal, bàwɛl ntaaŋàmbar.
2TH 2:13 Atɔŋ, akà bi, bi ikyer afuur an'tɔɔn akà Nzam taaŋ lanswà ntɔn bɛ, nkween a Mwol, ntɔn Nzam kàlasɔ̈ɔ̈l fà nsɛmà, ntɔn bɛ làwü mɔ̈ɔ̈ u mbwo a Dweelà afàkyɛɛl anà u mbwo a làkwikilà amu ndandaa.
2TH 2:14 Ntɔn ya sye, nde kàlabel u mbwo a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ kàlakyään bi, ntɔn bɛ làwɛl kab unsà làkoo a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ.
2TH 2:15 Kyakin, atɔŋ, làkäl aŋàtsim anà làkäär an'lɔɔŋ kàlapɛ bi, itàkal u mun, itàkal unsun'kaan.
2TH 2:16 Wɛy Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ nde ŋakwo, anà Taaràbi Nzam, awà kikwen, anà u mbwo a kab a ngway ande, kipɛ ndɛɛl a mbul a in'tye anà làkyän aŋàbwaŋ,
2TH 2:17 bàlalɛɛl anà bàlapɛ ngwal amu isal kyanswà anà ndaa aŋàbwaŋ yanswà.
2TH 3:1 Abun, atɔŋ, làyamà ntɔn bi, ntɔn ndaa a Mwol ipää agyägyä, anà ya iwɛl làkoo asànaa iwà ya akà bɛ,
2TH 3:2 ntɔn bi isɔrà akaŋankyɛl anà akà baar abe, ntɔn ba banswà làkwikilà latɛy.
2TH 3:3 Wɛɛ Mwol wà lää: nde ayàlapà ngwal anà ayàlatii ukwɛl a Mbuur un'be.
2TH 3:4 Bi ifàsà mpem akà Mwol ntɔn bɛ, ntɔn bɛ làfàkyer indiir ifàlaswaŋ bi, anà bɛ làsàlalà mukyer bya.
2TH 3:5 Wɛy Mwol ulɔ̈ɔ̈n mpem abɛ ntɔn mukwen Nzam anà unsà nkääŋ a mpem a Klistɔ!
2TH 3:6 Atɔŋ, bi bàmàlaswaŋ kà ikɔb a Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ: làkäl ukwɛl a un'tɔŋ awe anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a ŋingyäy anà mpa afàlab an'lɔɔŋ làwɛl bɛ akà bi.
2TH 3:7 Bɛ, bɛ ŋakwo làkyàyöb ubwaŋ naa bɛ bi lilab aben: bi kàkäl anki anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a ŋingyäy uboo a bɛ.
2TH 3:8 Bi kàdi anki mampà a mbuur màngway, wɛɛ, unsà mpay anà ngyɔ̈ɔ̈n, u mpib anà u mwäänà, bi kàsäl ntɔn mukɔɔn akal buur akà umwɛy uboo a bɛ.
2TH 3:9 Iswaŋà anki naa bi kàkäl anki anà ikɔ̈b muwal mbaay abɛ, wɛɛ bi kàkwen mukal mban lan'kwo bɛ mulab.
2TH 3:10 Kyakin, mpal kàkäl bi akà bɛ, bi kàlapɛ nswɛɛŋ yi: « Mbuur mpa akwen musal, wɛy nde ukɔɔn adyà sye! »
2TH 3:11 Kyekà, bi iweemà naa uboo a bɛ bye anà abwal, isal aba nà uyibilà u ndaa a baar asin.
2TH 3:12 Akà abwal aban, bi kan'pà nswɛɛŋ anà ndɛɛl yi kikɔb a Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ: wɛy ba bàsäl unsà duu anà badi isaa a mpay aba ŋakwo.
2TH 3:13 Akà bɛ, atɔŋ, twon làn'yɔn mukyer ubwaŋ.
2TH 3:14 Isàkal naa mbuur uläb anki nswɛɛŋ kan'pà bi uboo a un'kaan wà, lun'syebà ubwaŋàbwaŋ, twon lan'kal un'tüüb anà nde, ntɔn nde umɛn nswɛn.
2TH 3:15 Wɛɛ, twon lun'wɛl asànaa un'yiiŋ, lun'weey asànaa un'tɔŋ.
2TH 3:16 Wɛy Mwol a duu, kàlapɛ duu nde ŋakwo taaŋ lanswà anà u mbwo yanswà. Wɛy Mwol ukäl anà bɛ banswà.
2TH 3:17 Mbɔr yi yan'kɔɔ amɛ ŋakwo Pɔl. Mɛ in'fàsà kɔɔ unsà un'kaan umwɛy umwɛy in'fàsɔn mɛ.
2TH 3:18 Wɛy kab a ngway a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ làkäl anà bɛ banswà.
1TI 1:1 Mɛ Pɔl, ntööm a Klistɔ Yɛsu unsà nswɛɛŋ a Nzam awà Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi anà Klistɔ Yɛsu awà làkyän abi.
1TI 1:2 Akà ngye Tumàtɛ, mwan amɛ wàndandaa unsà làkwikilà: Wɛy Taaràbi Nzam anà Mwol abi Klistɔ Yɛsu bapɛ kab angway, ndwääl a nkul anà duu.
1TI 1:3 Mulab nswɛɛŋ kapɛ mɛ umpal kàlwomà mɛ u Masɛdwan, sàkal u Ɛfɛsɔ, ntɔn mutsuŋ baar bamwɛy mukɔɔn alɔŋ ndaa asin
1TI 1:4 anà mukɔɔn alab in'sim anà in'lwaaŋ mpa ifàtsü: mya myàfàtwaal nsyeel a mbaaŋ kikal mulab ukwen a Nzam abà bàfàkwo unsà làkwikilà.
1TI 1:5 Isin a nswɛɛŋ ayi kyà ukwen bàfàfà u mpem aŋàpɔŋà, unsà an'kyän aŋàbwaŋ anà làkwikilà a ndandaa.
1TI 1:6 Bumwɛy bàsàwɛy indiir abi, waa bàdiimà mbwo, bàkyàbulà muyisà in'lɔn ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ndöŋ.
1TI 1:7 Ba bàfàkyey uyɔl naa ba bà alɔɔŋ a Un'kɔɔn, wɛɛ ba bàyöb anki itàkal indiir bàfàtɛn ba, itàkal ntɔn ndaa bàfàkyään ba a uyɔl banswà.
1TI 1:8 Bi ikyàyöb naa Un'kɔɔn wà ubwaŋ isàkal naa wa ban'syääl u mbwo aŋàbwaŋ.
1TI 1:9 Làyöb naa Un'kɔɔn bàkyer anki ntɔn ŋabalàbal, wɛɛ ntɔn aŋunkwɛm anà baar un'tswe ngwal, ntɔn baar mpa bàfàlab in'kɔɔn, baar abye anà mpem a kɔɔrà anà aŋaman'be, ntɔn baar bàfàbɛy Nzam anà indiir in'kyɛɛl, ntɔn baar bàfàdwa bàtaaràba anà bàngwän, ntɔn adwää baar anà
1TI 1:10 baar a ŋingyäy, ntɔn abaal bàfàbir ba a ba anà akaar bàfàbir ba a ba, ntɔn atɛɛl a yà a asɔ anà aŋaloor, ntɔn aŋimbäl a loor anà baar bàfàkyer undiir asin mpa ufàlab an'lɔɔŋ in'kyɛɛl.
1TI 1:11 An'lɔɔŋ amà mà uboo a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ alà ban'pɛ, alà làfü akà Nzam a làkɔɔ.
1TI 1:12 Mɛ kan'fuur an'tɔɔn mbɔɔn akà Mwol abi Klistɔ Yɛsu awà kan'pɛ ngwal aŋàkwo, ntɔn nde kan'si mpem mpal kan'wɛl nde unsà isal ande,
1TI 1:13 mɛ mbuur kàkäl ŋambɛɛy, ŋamɛɛy a nkwaaŋ anà un'too a in'tswe. Wɛɛ nde kan'wem ngyɛb, ntɔn mɛ kàyöbà anki indiir kàkyɛrà mɛ ntɔn mɛ kàkäl anki anà làkwikilà.
1TI 1:14 Kab a ngway a Mwol abi làkäl aŋàsöönà akà mɛ, anà làkwikilà anà ukwen abà amu Klistɔ Yɛsu.
1TI 1:15 Ayi ndaa a làkwikilà ban'kwo baar banswà musà u mpem anà bàkyey ya naa Klistɔ Yɛsu kàyi u mɛɛn ntɔn mutswà bàŋan'be banswà mɔ̈ɔ̈. Mɛ, mɛ in'wà wàtàtwɛb uboo a ba.
1TI 1:16 Wɛɛ ntɔn abà, mɛ ban'wem ngyɛb, naa amu mɛ, mbuur atàtwɛb, Klistɔ Yɛsu uswɛŋ nkääŋ a mpem ande yanswa, asànaa mbaan ntɔn baar bàsàsà làkwikilà amu nde ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye.
1TI 1:17 Akà Mfum a mbul a in'tye, mpa afàkwà, mpa afàmɛnà u mii, awà nde mpɛl Nzam, wɛy nsyäŋà anà làkoo ikäl anà nde ipepey! Abwɛy!
1TI 1:18 Mwan amɛ Tumàtɛ, le nswɛɛŋ amapà mɛ asànaa ngɔɔm bàtɛ itaan ntɔn ngye. Wɛy ndaa ayi ikäl ngwal a ngye unsà ità angye kyà ntsà,
1TI 1:19 kaar làkwikilà anà an'kyän aŋàbwaŋ. Bumwɛy bàkyàpiy an'kyän amà. Abun làkwikilà aba sye làkyàkyà bwà.
1TI 1:20 Uboo a baar abà bà Imɛnɛ anà Alɛksandre abà kàkäb mɛ akà Satanà ntɔn ba bàlɔŋkà mukɔɔn afàbɛy.
1TI 2:1 Kusà a indiir byanswà, mɛ kan'swaŋ naa bàtwab atàsà ndɔ̈ɔ̈m, ngyamàkà, mbɔ̈ɔ̈n, an'tɔɔn ntɔn baar banswà,
1TI 2:2 ntɔn amfum, anà baar abye anà ikɔ̈b, ntɔn bi ikäl anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ aŋàtɔlà mpem, wà duu unsà inzaam anà uyɔl banswà.
1TI 2:3 Abi indiir a ntsà ufàkyey Nzam awà Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi,
1TI 2:4 awà akwen naa baar banswà bàwü mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà bàtöl muyɔ̈b ndandaa.
1TI 2:5 Ntɔn Nzam wà mwɛy, mfurboo mwɛy mpɛl uboo a Nzam anà baar, baal Klistɔ Yɛsu,
1TI 2:6 awà kàpɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande ŋàkwo asànaa nkwiy ntɔn baar banswà. Abun, nde kàtɛ imbäl, umpal làkwe taaŋ.
1TI 2:7 Ntɔn abun mɛ, mɛ Nzam kan'si mukäl un'kyeey anà ntööm, un'lɔɔŋ a baar mpa abà Ayudà unsà làkwikilà anà ndandaa. Mɛ in'tà anki loor, wɛɛ mɛ an'tɛn ndandaa.
1TI 2:8 Abun, mɛɛ in'kwen naa abaal bàyamà kikal kyanswà, bàsɛɛn an'kɔɔ in'kyɛɛl u du, ukɔɔn nkyɛl anà an'sye.
1TI 2:9 Ntɔn akà akaar, wɛy ba bàbwäär ipfɛy aŋàbwaŋ mpa ipà nswɛn, ikɔɔn akal anà ntwɛn mbɔɔn. Wɛy ba bàkɔɔn atɔŋ ntswe, bàkɔɔn abwaar indiir a wɔl, an'yak, itàkal ipfɛy a ntal mbɔɔn,
1TI 2:10 wɛɛ, isal aŋàbwaŋ byan'kwo ntɔn akaar bàfàkyään inzaam.
1TI 2:11 Wɛy un'kaar uwɛl an'lwɛŋ a duu anà unkyeey wanswà.
1TI 2:12 Mɛ, mɛ impà anki mbwo akà un'kaar mulɔŋ, itàkal muwal ikɔ̈b udu a abaal. Wɛy nde ukäl unsà duu.
1TI 2:13 Ntɔn ya yà naa bàtàboom Adam kusà, Ɛva ungö.
1TI 2:14 Waa kà Adam anki bàkür, wɛɛ un'kaar, ungö bun'kür, nde kàbü u man'be.
1TI 2:15 Itàkal abun, nde asàwà mɔ̈ɔ̈ u mbwo a mböör a baan, isàkal naa nde wà uboo a làkwikilà, ukwen, un'kyɛɛl anà unsà làbɔ̈ɔ̈n.
1TI 3:1 Ndaa yi yà ndandaa: kya mbuur usàkal anà ngyal a isal a ikyɛɛŋ a Ikööŋ, nde kan'sɔɔl isal a ntsà.
1TI 3:2 Un'kyɛɛŋ a Ikööŋ akal mbuur akɔ̈ɔ̈n ifà ibe, un'dim a un'kyay mwɛy mpɛl, mbuur mpa awà ngaal, mbuur a duu, ŋambwäär aŋàbwaŋ, ŋun'kaay, mbuur kan'kwo mulɔŋ,
1TI 3:3 mpa awà un'yöör a man anà un'nwään a ngwiy, wɛɛ nde akal mbuur a làbɔ̈ɔ̈n anà ŋun'tüüb, mbuur mpa afàkwen ngim mbɔɔn.
1TI 3:4 Wɛy nde ukäl aŋàkwo muyaal ndwà ande ŋàkwo anà mukyer naa baan ande bàkäl unsà unkyeey anà làzir lanswà.
1TI 3:5 Lalan, kya mbuur uyöb anki muler ndwà ande ŋàkwo, nde ayàkwo aben muler Ikööŋ a Nzam?
1TI 3:6 Nde ukwo anki mukal mbuur akün unsà mbuul a mpem, naa tɛy, nde ayàsɛɛn an'pɛy, waa uyàwal mbar asànaa kàwɛl ileŋ.
1TI 3:7 Wɛy sye naa baar abà u nsà a Ikööŋ bun'tɛɛl imbäl aŋàbwaŋ, ntɔn nde ukɔ̈ɔ̈n abwà u nswɛn anà unsà intaam a ileŋ.
1TI 3:8 Ifà imwɛy sye, asyääl bàkal baar a làbɔ̈ɔ̈n anà bà mpem mwɛy. Ba bàkal anki ayɔ̈ɔ̈r a man anà baar bàfàkal anà ilään a bweel a nswɛn.
1TI 3:9 Wɛy ba bàkäär ngyee a làkwikilà unsà an'kyän aŋàbwaŋ.
1TI 3:10 Yubwaŋ naa bàtwab atàsi, ungö, isàkal naa undiir un'be bàmɛn anki amu ba, apan waa ba bàsal.
1TI 3:11 Akaar sye bàkal baar a làbɔ̈ɔ̈n, mpa bàfàtwee, baar a duu, bàfasyeel mpem unsà indiir byanswà.
1TI 3:12 Asyääl a Ikööŋ abaal bàkal adim a un'kyay mwɛy mpɛl anà bàkyer ayöb muyaal baan aba anà ndwà aba ŋakwo.
1TI 3:13 Ntɔn asyääl bàfàkyer isal aba ubwaŋàbwaŋ bàfàwal làkoo anà uyɔl byan'fà unsà làkwikilà amu Klistɔ Yɛsu.
1TI 3:14 Amasöön mɛ indiir abi, ntɔn mɛ an'sà làkyän naa mɛ in'kyer ayàlaler ungö a kitaaŋ.
1TI 3:15 Itàkal abun, kya mɛ in'sàlam muyà, ngye akyer ayàyɔ̈b naa nkääl angye ikal aben u ndwà a Nzam, ayà Ikɔ̈ɔ̈ŋ a Nzam a mɔ̈ɔ̈, ta a ndwà anà un'käär a ndandaa.
1TI 3:16 Ukɔɔn mbaaŋ, Ngyee unsà inzaam yà kölàköl! Klistɔ: kàyàmɛnà asànaa mbuur, Dweelà In'kyɛɛl kun'twey wàbalàbal, nde kàyàmɛnà akà akyeey a Nzam. Nde bàkyään akà in'sɛŋ myumwɛy, bun'si làkwikilà u mɛɛn, nde bun'sɛɛn unsà làkɔɔ!
1TI 4:1 Dweelà làtɛɛnà ubwaŋàbwaŋ naa kan'taaŋ a ntsüü, amwɛy bàsàpiy làkwikilà ntɔn mulab an'dweelà a loor anà an'lɔɔŋ man'fà akà insɔŋà.
1TI 4:2 Mpem yweel a baar a loor isabwiy ndwaŋ. An'kyän aba màŋàbwà bwoor.
1TI 4:3 Baar aban bàfàtsuŋ baar mutà bɔr anà mudyà isaa byumwɛy. Wɛɛ Nzam bya kàkyer ntɔn aŋàlàkwikilà abà bàyöb ndandaa ubwaŋàbwaŋ bàdi bya unsà mfuur a an'tɔɔn.
1TI 4:4 Ntɔn indiir byanswà kàkyer Nzam byàŋàbwaŋ, undiir a piy bwà watɛy isàkal naa wa ban'wal unsà mfuur a an'tɔɔn,
1TI 4:5 ntɔn wa wàŋàkyɛɛl u mbwo a Ndaa a Nzam anà ngyamàkà.
1TI 4:6 Kyään indiir abi akà atɔŋ: abun ngye ayàkal un'syääl a Klistɔ Yɛsu wàŋàbwaŋ, wàŋàyuur a ndaa a làkwikilà anà an'lɔɔŋ a ntsà kàläb ngye ubwaŋàbwaŋ.
1TI 4:7 Tɔn nsim mpa ifàlab làkwikilà, itaŋà a anün akaar. Wɛɛ lɔŋàkà inzaam.
1TI 4:8 An'taam mupà ndür ngwal mà mfun unsà indiir ikikye, wɛɛ inzaam kyà mfun unsà indiir byanswà. Ntɔn kya ifàpà ilää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ aŋàbà anà kyà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ayàyà.
1TI 4:9 Ndaa ayi yà ndandaa ayà ban'kwo baar banswà musyeel mpem.
1TI 4:10 Lalan, isàkal naa bi imanà mpay anà inwaanà ntɔn ya, ntɔn bi kàkyàsà làkyän amu Nzam a mɔ̈ɔ̈ awà Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ a baar banswà, sin sin aŋàlàkwikilà.
1TI 4:11 Swaŋ indiir abi anà lɔŋ bya.
1TI 4:12 Wɛy mbuur mwɛy ukɔ̈ɔ̈n abɛy imbɛy angye! Wɛɛ ngye kal mbaan akà aŋàlàkwikilà u ntɛɛn, u nkääl, unsà ukwen, u làkwikilà, anà u mpem aŋàbwaŋ.
1TI 4:13 Apà in'yàyà mɛ, sà muküünà mutaŋ Ndaa Aŋàsɔn, mulɛɛl anà mulɔŋ.
1TI 4:14 Twon an'bɛy kab a ngway alà amu ngye, alà bapɛ u mbwo a ngɔɔm anà nsyeel a an'kɔɔ a andweer.
1TI 4:15 Pà mpem angye unsà indiir abi, pà mɔ̈ɔ̈ angye wanswà unsà isal angye, waa baar banswà bàyàman naa isal angye kyàmukyà usà.
1TI 4:16 Kal kà igyɛɛŋ ntɔn ngye ŋakwo anà ntɔn alɔɔŋ angye. Kal aŋàtsim unsà indiir abi byanswà. Kya ngye asàkyer abun, ngye ayàtswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ angye ŋakwo anà wà baar bàfaweem.
1TI 5:1 Twon aŋän a ngwal baal aŋànün, wɛɛ un'lɛɛl asànaa taaràŋà. Awɛl atö asànaa atɔŋ,
1TI 5:2 andweer akaar asànaa bàmaa, asyee asànaa ampääŋ, unsà mpem aŋàbwaŋ.
1TI 5:3 Asyäŋà akweel adim, akweel adim abà bàndandaa aŋàyen.
1TI 5:4 Wɛɛ, isàkal naa un'kweel un'dim mwɛy we anà baan itàkal atil, wɛy ba bàtwab atàlɔŋkà musyääl làkwikilà aba u ndwà aba ŋakwo anà mufuur ibay akà aböör aba. Awà undiir ufàkyey Nzam.
1TI 5:5 Un'kweel un'dim a ndandaa awà aŋàyen, afàsà làkyän ande amu Nzam. Nde afàsin aküünà u ndɔ̈ɔ̈m anà u ngyamàkà mpib anà mwäänà.
1TI 5:6 Wɛɛ, wunà akwà afàsyääl ilään a ndür, nde wàŋàkwà itaan, itàkal naa nde wà anà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
1TI 5:7 Le indiir atsuŋ ngye ba, ntɔn ba bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n apɛl.
1TI 5:8 Isàkal naa mbuur ufàbay anki atɔŋ ande, sin sin baar a ndwà ande, nde kan'kɔɔb làkwikilà ande, nde kan'söön mbuur akɔ̈ɔ̈n làkwikilà unsà ube.
1TI 5:9 Musɔn ikɔb a un'kaar unsà itsuŋ a akweel adim, nde akal àŋàkölà mbul an'kwem an'syaam, anà kàkäl un'kyay a un'dim mwɛy mpɛl.
1TI 5:10 Wɛy nde ukäl un'kaar awà bàyöb isal ande byà ntsà: kàbɔɔŋ baan ande ubwaŋàbwaŋ, kàfawalà baar u ndwà ande, kàfaywɛyà in'kɔl a aŋàlàkwikilà, kàbayà aŋangyɛb anà kàfakyerà undiir wanswà wàŋàbwaŋ.
1TI 5:11 Wɛɛ akà akweel adim abà asyee, twon an'kyey mukasɔn. Ntɔn, umpal ifàsɛnà ilään a ndür aba, ya ifasiinà mufàbääl, waa bàkɔɔb Klistɔ,
1TI 5:12 abun, ba ban'bwà unsà ikwàndwà ntɔn ban'bɛy ba kyään aba làtàtwɛb.
1TI 5:13 Apan sye, ntɔn ubwal, ba bàfàlɔŋkà muyikyà ndwà a ndwà. Yan'söön ube, ba kà nà abwal mpɛl anki, wɛɛ sye baar a itetɛɛn anà bà mun ipɔl.
1TI 5:14 Abun, mɛ in'kwen naa akweel adim abà asyee bàtɛ bɔr, bàbör baan, bàyaal ndwà aba anà bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n apà abör mbwo atwee.
1TI 5:15 Ntɔn amwɛy amu ba bàfuràtàdiimà mbwo ntɔn mulab Satanà.
1TI 5:16 Isàkal naa ŋàlàkwikilà mwɛy we anà akweel adim u ywar ande, wɛy nde kabay, waa buur bàkɔɔn akal udu a Ikööŋ, ntɔn Ikööŋ ikwe mubay akweel adim abà ndandaa aŋàyen.
1TI 5:17 Andweer bàfàler Ikööŋ ubwaŋàbwaŋ ban'kwo muwal nsyäŋà mbalà yweel, sin sin ba akwà bàfàwal buur a kölàköl unsà Ndaa anà an'lɔɔŋ.
1TI 5:18 Abun, Ndaa Aŋàsɔn itɛɛnà naa: « Twon an'bäm mun a ngɔɔmà utaaŋ undyarà wa mbɛŋ » anà: « Un'syääl an'kwo muwal làfur ande. »
1TI 5:19 Twon an'kyey mfüün ntɔn un'dweer ukɔɔn imbäl a baar bɔ̈ɔ̈l itàkal atär.
1TI 5:20 Baar ban'kyer man'be, aŋän u mii a baar banswà, ntɔn bumwɛy sye bàmɛn bɔɔmà.
1TI 5:21 Mɛ amalɔɔm umii a Nzam, u mii a Klistɔ Yɛsu anà u mii a akyeey in'kyɛɛl: lab indiir abi ukɔɔn nkyɛɛr anà ukɔɔn un'kɔl aŋàyɔŋ.
1TI 5:22 Twon an'düül musà mbuur an'kɔɔ, twon an'bilà unsà man'be a mbuur asin. Ngye ŋakwo kal wàŋàpöŋà.
1TI 5:23 Wɛy munwà an'dà mpɛl, wɛɛ nwà sye ndam a man, ntɔn kwiy angye anà an'kyal angye taaŋ lanswà.
1TI 5:24 Man'be a baar amwɛy màfàmɛnà kusà mutsul mbar, wɛɛ akà bumwɛy, ma màfàmɛnà ungöngö.
1TI 5:25 Abun sye, isal a ntsà byàkyer afàmɛnà, itàkal bya akwà mpa byàfàmɛnà agyä byàkwo anki musin akalà byàŋàyee.
1TI 6:1 Wɛy baar banswà abà asɔ bàkyey naa ankum aba ban'kwo muwal nsyäŋà aŋàkwo, ntɔn mbuur ukɔ̈ɔ̈n abɛy ikɔb a Nzam anà an'lɔɔŋ abi.
1TI 6:2 Isàkal naa ankum aba bà aŋàlàkwilà, ba bàkwo anki mukabɛy naa ntɔn ba bà atɔŋ. Wɛɛ, wɛy ba basyääl aŋàsöön ubwaŋ, ntɔn baar bàwal bweel a nsyääl aba yàŋàbwaŋ bà aŋàlàkwikilà anà nkween. Indiir abi lɔŋ bya anà swaŋ bya.
1TI 6:3 Isàkal naa mbuur kan'lɔŋ ndaa asin, anà kan'kɔɔn alab ndaa a ndandaa a Mwol abi Klistɔ Yɛsu anà an'lɔɔŋ a inzaam,
1TI 6:4 nde wàŋàyɔl a uyɔl, wà insil, wà ŋukyal ntɔn nsyeel a mbaaŋ anà ngwiy a ngɔk, indiir byàfàtwaal un'köl, an'sye, in'tswe, an'kyän an'be,
1TI 6:5 anà mbaaŋ mpa ifàtsü uboo a baar aŋun'yɛnà aŋàkalà, mpa abye anà ndandaa. Ba bàfàsi naa inzaam kyà mbwo muwal bweel.
1TI 6:6 Yà ndandaa naa inzaam kyà bweel a kölàköl akà mbuur afàman un'sak unsà indiir awe nde abya.
1TI 6:7 Ntɔn bi kàtwääl anki akundiir mwɛy u mɛɛn mà, bi sye ikwe anki mufàsyen undiir kan'fà mwo.
1TI 6:8 Abun, isàkal naa bi ibye anà isaa anà ipfɛy, bya byan'kwo ntɔn bi.
1TI 6:9 Wɛɛ akà baar bàfàkwen mukal aŋin'naaŋ, ba bàfàbwà u ndɛb, unsà untaam, anà unsà in'lään mbɔɔn myà upool anà myube, amyà ifàmiin baar u mpay anà kukwà.
1TI 6:10 Ntɔn ukwen a ngim bisin a mpay yanswà. Bamwɛy bàbilà afwee mwo, bàkyàdiimà mbwo a làkwikilà, anà bàkyàpɛɛl usaay mbɔɔn ba ŋakwo.
1TI 6:11 Wɛɛ ngye, mbuur a Nzam, tiin indiir abi, waa aleŋ balàbal, inzaam, làkwikilà, ukwen, nkääŋ a mpem, duu.
1TI 6:12 Nwan ità aŋàbwaŋ kyà làkwikilà. Kaar mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye awà babel mukyey mpal kàtɛ ngye imbäl a ntsà kyà làkwikilà u mii a ambäl mbɔɔn.
1TI 6:13 Mɛ amaswaŋ u mii a Nzam awà afàpà mɔ̈ɔ̈ akindiir byanswà, anà u mii a Klistɔ Yɛsu awà kàtɛ imbäl ande kyà ntsà u mii a Pɔnsi Pilatu naa:
1TI 6:14 Lab nswɛɛŋ ukɔɔn mbiin anà ukɔɔn pɛl, tii mpal usyemɛnà Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ.
1TI 6:15 Mɛɛnà ayi isàkal u taaŋ kàsi ŋun'sak, awà nde mpɛl udu a indiir byanswà, Mfum a amfum, Mwol a amwol.
1TI 6:16 Nde mpɛl mpà afàkwà, awà afàkal u pɛɛlà mwɛy mpa kan'kwo mbuur mwɛy musin tsütsü apà la. Akà mbuur mwɛy kun'mɛn anki anà ukwo anki mukun'man. Làkoo anà ngwal a mbul a in'tye ye anà nde! Wöwöö!
1TI 6:17 Aswɛŋ aŋin'naaŋ a mɛɛn mà bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n asɛɛn an'pɛy anà bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n asà làkyän aba unsà in'naaŋ mpa myàfàlam, wɛɛ amu Nzam, awà afipà un'kàbɔ a indiir, ntɔn bi imɛn un'sak unsà bya.
1TI 6:18 Aswɛŋ ba bàkyer yàŋàbwaŋ, bàkäl aŋin'naaŋ unsà isal a ntsà, bàkäl aŋun'kääb, aŋun'tüüb.
1TI 6:19 Abun, ba bàsàköŋà un'naaŋ a ntsà anà wàngwal ntɔn taaŋ làsàyà ungö, ntɔn musàwal mɔ̈ɔ̈ a ndandaa.
1TI 6:20 Ɔ Tumàtɛ, kaar ubwaŋàbwaŋ an'lɔɔŋ manswà bapɛ. Tiin an'yääm màkɔ̈ɔ̈n ndöŋ anà mpa màfàlab làkwikilà, anà mbaaŋ ayà un'yɛnà un'be.
1TI 6:21 Baar amwɛy abà bàswɛŋ ngaal naa ba bye anà un'yenà un'be awà, ba bàkyàdiimà mbwo a làkwikilà. Wɛy kab a ngway a Nzam làkäl anä ngye!
2TI 1:1 Mɛ Pɔl, ntööm a Klistɔ Yɛsu unsà ukwen a Nzam, asànaa ilää a mɔ̈ö akyà amu Klistɔ Yɛsu.
2TI 1:2 Akà Tumàtɛ, mwan amɛ wànkween: wɛy Taa Nzam anà Mwol abi Klistɔ Yɛsu bapɛ kab a ngway, mpem a ngyɛb anà duu.
2TI 1:3 Mɛ an'fuur an'tɔɔn mbɔɔn akà Nzam, awà in'fàsyääl mɛ unsà an'kyän anàbwaŋ, asànaa bàfun'syäälà ankaa amɛ. Taaŋ lanswà, mpib anà mwäänà, mɛ in'fatà din u ngyamàkà amɛ.
2TI 1:4 Mɛ insàyɔbà nsaaŋ angye, mɛ in'fàkal anà ngyal akaman mbɔɔn, ntɔn mɛ in'käl aŋàyɔl a un'sak.
2TI 1:5 Mɛ in'fàyɔbà sye làkwikilà a ndandaa awà ngye alà, làkwikilà làtwab atàkal a nkaaŋà wun'kaar Lɔwis anà ngwa Önis. Mɛ an'sà kam naa la là amu ngye sye.
2TI 1:6 Lalan mɛ amàfayɔɔb naa: fɛl mbaa a kab a Nzam awà ngye alà sɛmà mpal kasi mɛ an'kɔɔ.
2TI 1:7 Ntɔn Dweelà kan'pɛ Nzam kà là làbɔɔmà anki, wɛɛ Dweelà a ngwal, là ukwen anà là nkääŋ a mpem.
2TI 1:8 Twon an'man nswɛn mutà imbäl a Mwol abi, twon an'man sye nswɛn ntɔn mɛ, mbuur a bɔlokà ntɔn nde. Wɛɛ ngye, man mpay mbwo mwɛy anà mɛ ntɔn Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ, unsà ngwal a Nzam,
2TI 1:9 awà kitsü mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà kibel mukal un'sɛŋ ande, kà ntɔn isal abi anki, wɛɛ ntɔn mböön ande ŋàkwo anà kab a ngway ande, kab a ngway bipɛ amu Klistɔ Yɛsu kusà a an'taaŋ a mbul a in'tye.
2TI 1:10 Kab a ngway alà lan'yàmɛnà apanà u mbwo a ngyeel a Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi Klistɔ, awà kàdwä ikɔ̈b a ukwà anà kàmɛɛy mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye u mbwo a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ.
2TI 1:11 Ntɔn Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ alà ban'si ba un'kyeey, ntööm anà un'lɔɔŋ.
2TI 1:12 Lalan an'fuur mɛ a mpay ayi. Wɛɛ mɛ nswɛn a ya yatɛy, ntɔn mɛ in'kyàyöb naa làkwikilà amɛ là amu nà, làkyän amɛ là naa nde we anà ikɔ̈b mukaar indiir kan'pɛ nde tii Ilä kya.
2TI 1:13 Lab mbaan a ndaa in'kyɛɛl ayi kàwem ngye akà mɛ unsà làkwikilà anà ukwen abà unsà Klistɔ Yɛsu.
2TI 1:14 Kaar an'lɔɔŋ manswà amà bapɛ, u mbwo a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl awà amu bi.
2TI 1:15 Ngye akyàyɔ̈b naa baar a Azi banswà bàkyan'tiin, asànaa Fizyɛl anà Ɛrmɔzyɛl.
2TI 1:16 Wɛy Mwol utɔ̈l ngyɛb ande mbɔɔn udu a ndwà a Ɔnɛsifɔr, ntɔn nde kan'lɛɛl mbalà mbɔɔn, kàsàman anki nswɛn a in'siŋ amɛ.
2TI 1:17 Wɛɛ, pa kàtöl nde Lɔmà, nde kan'leŋ làgyägyä, waa kan'mɛn.
2TI 1:18 Wɛy Mwol kun'pɛ mbwo muman ubwaŋ apà Mwol kà ilä kya. Mbuur asin watɛy ayöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ asànaa ngye ŋakwo indiir kan'kyeer nde u Ԑfɛsɔ.
2TI 2:1 Abun, ngye, mwan baal amɛ, wal ngwal angye u kab a ngway alà amu Klistɔ Yɛsu.
2TI 2:2 Ndaa kàwem ngye akà mɛ u mii a ambäl mbɔɔn, lɔŋ ya akà baar a lää ban'kwo mulɔŋ ya sye akà baar asin.
2TI 2:3 Wal kab a mpay làngye asànaa ŋità aŋàbwaŋ a Klistɔ Yɛsu.
2TI 2:4 Akà ŋità mwɛy tɛy afàköŋà indiir a mɛɛn mà isàkal naa nde akwen mupà un'sak akà mbuur kun'biil kà isal.
2TI 2:5 Abun sye unsà an'taam a unüün, akà ŋan'taam mwɛy uwal anki ndä isàkal naa nde uläb anki in'kɔɔn a unüün.
2TI 2:6 Kab a isaa atàtwɛb làtàkyà akà un'lem.
2TI 2:7 Yöb ndaa an'tɛn mɛ: Mwol ayapà un'yɛnà unsà indiir byanswà.
2TI 2:8 Un'yɔbà Yɛsu Klistɔ awà kàwiyà uboo a akü, awà mbuur a itoo a David, mulab Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ amɛ
2TI 2:9 alà in'kamanà mɛ mpay tii mukambääm in'siŋ asànaa un'dwää. Wɛɛ Ndaa a Nzam kà yàŋàbääm anki!
2TI 2:10 Lalan an'kääŋ mɛ mpem aya yanswà ntɔn bàŋàsɔɔl, ba sye bàwɛl mɔ̈ɔ̈, awà amu Klistɔ Yɛsu, anà làkoo a mbul a in'tye.
2TI 2:11 Ndaa a ndandaa ban'kwo musà làkwikilà ayi: « Kya bi isàkwà anà nde, bi isàkal sye anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà nde.
2TI 2:12 Kya bi isàman mpay anà nde, bi isàyaal anà nde. Kya bi isun'tɔn, nde sye akyɛr asitɔn.
2TI 2:13 Kya bi isàkɔɔn akal bàlää akà nde, nde wà wàlää taaŋ lanswà, ntɔn nde ukwe anki mutɔn nde ŋakwo. »
2TI 2:14 Yɔbà indiir abi, kyey u mii a Nzam naa yà ubwaŋ muwɛy an'sye ntɔn ngɔk ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ndöŋ, naa tɛy ma idwa mɔ̈ɔ̈ a baar bàweemà ma.
2TI 2:15 Sà ngwal ngye ŋàkwo mumɛnà u mii a Nzam asànaa mbuur aŋàtsim, un'syääl mpa awe anà nswɛn, awà afàlɔŋ aswalaa Ndaa a ndandaa.
2TI 2:16 Twon an'bilà unsà an'yääm ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ndöŋ anà mpa màfàlab làkwikilà. Baar bàfàbilà afwee amu ma, bàfàkàtsü unsà imbuur.
2TI 2:17 Ndaa aba yà asànaa inkyär aŋàfüünà ifàdyà in'twaŋ. Imɛnɛ anà Filɛtɔs bà abun.
2TI 2:18 Ba bàkyàwɛy ndandaa, bàmudwa làkwikilà a baar mutɛn naa ngwiiyà yàkyàyà itaan.
2TI 2:19 Itàkal abun, an'sin a ngwal kàsi Nzam màŋàtsim, màŋàsà inyɛm a ndaa yi: « Mwol akyàyöb bànde » anà sye: « Wɛy mbuur wanswà afàtà ikɔb a Mwol din, utön an'kyän an'be. »
2TI 2:20 Uboo a ndwà a kölàköl, kà nà indiir a wɔl anà arza mpɛl byàfàkal, wɛɛ byàfàkal sye anà byà in'te anà byà tɔm. Byàtàtwɛb ntɔn ibyääl, byumwɛy ntɔn nsyääl a bunàbun.
2TI 2:21 Abun, isàkal naa mbuur mwɛy kan'pɔ̈ŋ nde ŋakwo mukaabà anà indiir abi, nde asàkal undiir mwɛy ntɔn ibyääl, wà in'kyɛɛl, wàndöŋ akà Un'lɔɔŋ, wàŋàkwo ntɔn isal aŋàbwaŋ.
2TI 2:22 Tiin ilään a ndür a itö, waa aleŋ bàlàbal, làkwikilà, ukwen, duu anà baar abà bàfàbel Mwol u mpem.
2TI 2:23 Wɛɛ, ntɔn mbaaŋ ikɔ̈ɔ̈n ndöŋ anà yà upool, yöb naa ya ifàbɔr ngwiy.
2TI 2:24 Kyekà, un'syääl a Mwol ukwe anki munwan, wɛɛ nde akal mbuur bàkwen baar banswà, mbuur ayɔ̈b mulɔŋ, anà mukaŋ mpem.
2TI 2:25 Wɛy nde ulwɛŋ asyeel a mbaaŋ unsà duu: taaŋ lumwɛy Nzam ayapà mbwo musɔɔmà anà muyɔ̈b ndandaa,
2TI 2:26 muyàfurà unsà an'kyän aŋàbwaŋ, mutoo kà an'tɛy a ileŋ awà kakäär unsà isɔ ntɔn mulab ukwen ande.
2TI 3:1 Yöb naa kà ilä a ntsüü isàkal anà an'taaŋ a mpay.
2TI 3:2 Ntɔn baar bàsàbulà aŋunguur, asam a ngim, aŋangaal anà aŋuyɔl, bàsatoo Nzam, aŋun'tswe ngwal akà aböör aba, baar mpa bàfàfuur an'tɔɔn, mpa abye anà inzaam,
2TI 3:3 aŋakɔɔrà, bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n ngyɛb, aŋankaabà, bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n nkääŋ a mpem, aŋankyɛl, ayiiŋ a yàŋàbwaŋ,
2TI 3:4 ayääl a baar, aŋakii, ikwàmii ntɔn uyɔl, asam a ilään a ndür, akwànaa asam a Nzam,
2TI 3:5 inzaam aba isàkal kyà nsà mpɛl, wɛɛ ba bàsàtɔn un'kanà a kya. Apɛ ngö baar aban.
2TI 3:6 Amwɛy uboo a ba bàfàbilà u ndwà a ndwà, waa bàfàkur akaar a mpem a bɔɔl bɔɔl, bàŋàyɔl a man'be, bàŋàkwɛlà unsà an'tɛy a ilään a ndür byà ifà ifà,
2TI 3:7 ba bàmulɔŋàkà taaŋ lanswà, wɛɛ ba bàfàkwo anki akà ikikye muyɔ̈b ndandaa.
2TI 3:8 Asànàa Yanɛs anà Yambrɛs bàmbäär ba Mɔsɛ, abun sye baar aban bàfàmbäär ba ndandaa, ntɔɔb aba yàŋàkalà, làkwikilà aba ngwal latɛy.
2TI 3:9 Wɛɛ ba bàsàkyà anki kwɛl, ntɔn unsil aba bàsàmɛnà akà baar banswà asànaa bàmɛnà unsil bàkäl akà baar abà bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l.
2TI 3:10 Wɛɛ akà ngye, ngye kàläb pànsi pànsi an'lɔɔŋ amɛ, nkääl amɛ, ntwaan amɛ, làkwikilà amɛ, nkääŋ a mpem amɛ, ukwen amɛ, muküünà amɛ,
2TI 3:11 nkwaaŋ amɛ, mpay yan'yeel u Antyɔsha, u Ikɔn, anà u Listre. Nkwaaŋ nà mpa kàkäŋ mɛ mpem! Unsà ya yanswà, Mwol kan'tsü mɔ̈ɔ̈.
2TI 3:12 Kyekà, baar bànswà bàfàkwen mukal unsà inzaam amu Klistɔ Yɛsu bàkyer asamɛɛy nkwaaŋ.
2TI 3:13 Wɛɛ akà baar abɛ anà aŋaloor, ba bàsàlalà unsà ube taaŋ lanswà, mukur baar bumwɛy anà ba ŋàkwo bàkyer asakur.
2TI 3:14 Wɛɛ ngye, tsim unsà indiir kàlɔŋàkà ngye anà kàkyey ngye naa bya byà ndandaa: ngye akyàyöb mbuur kalɔŋ bya.
2TI 3:15 Ngye akyàyöb Ndaa Aŋàsɔn yà In'kyɛɛl sɛmà imbɛy angye: ya ye anà ikɔ̈b mukapà an'yeerà ifàtwaal ngwɛɛl a mɔ̈ɔ̈ u mbwo a làkwikilà amu Klistɔ Yɛsu.
2TI 3:16 Un'kaan wanswà wàŋàsɔn u ngwal a Nzam we anà ndöŋ mulɔŋ, mutɔn, mulɔ̈ɔ̈n, muswaŋ mbwo a balàbal,
2TI 3:17 ntɔn mbuur a Nzam ukäl wàŋàkwo anà ukäl anà indiir mukyer isal aŋàbwaŋ.
2TI 4:1 Mɛ amàlɔ̈ɔ̈m u mii a Nzam anà u mii a Klistɔ Yɛsu awà asàyà mutsul mbar a baar a mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà akü, kà ikɔb a mɛɛy ande anà kyà Imwol ande,
2TI 4:2 kyään Ndaa unsà muküünà, itàkal utaaŋ aŋàbwaŋ, itàkal utaaŋ a làbe, tɔn, ŋan, lɛɛl, anà lɔŋ unsà nkääŋ a mpem yanswà.
2TI 4:3 Ntɔn taaŋ mwɛy làkyer asàyà, alà mpa bàsàkwen baar amwɛy muwem an'lɔɔŋ a ndandaa, wɛɛ ba bàsàlab ilään a ndür aba ŋàkwo anà bàsawalà alɔɔŋ mbɔɔn abà bàsakyäänà ndaa ayà ikwen an'tsü aba muwem.
2TI 4:4 Ba basàdübà an'tsü aba akà ndandaa, waa bàsàbulà ntsü akà nsim a bunàbun.
2TI 4:5 Wɛɛ ngye, kaar duu unsà indiir byanswà, bäm mpem unsà mpay, kyer isal angye kyà un'paylàsaŋ, kyer ubwaŋàbwaŋ isal angye kyànswà.
2TI 4:6 Wɛɛ akà mɛ, mɛ bàkyan'kab itaan asànaa ibɔɔn, taaŋ amɛ làkyà lan'kwo.
2TI 4:7 Mɛ kànwään ngwiy aŋàbwaŋ, mɛ kàmay ntiin amɛ, mɛ akyàkaar làkwikilà.
2TI 4:8 Sɛmà apanà ndä a iböŋ amɛ yàmukandilà: ndä usan'pà Mwol, ntɛɛn a balàbal, Ilä kya, kà nà mɛ mpɛl anki, wɛɛ sye anà baar banswà bàsàkwen mɛɛy ande.
2TI 4:9 Sà ngwal muyan'man làgyägyä.
2TI 4:10 Ntɔn Dɛmas kàkyan'tiin, kàkyàkwen ubwaŋ a mɛɛn aŋàbà. Nde kàkyen Tɛsalonikà. Kresɛns kàkyen Ngalàtyà, Titɔ kàkyen Dalmàtyà.
2TI 4:11 Lukà mpɛl awà anà mɛ. Un'wɛl Malakɔ, yà anà nde, ntɔn nde wà ndöŋ mbɔɔn ntɔn isal.
2TI 4:12 Mɛ kàtɔ̈m Tishik u Ɛfɛsɔ.
2TI 4:13 Mpal ayàyà ngye, ntwääl kàzak a mpye kàsàwɛy mɛ u Tɔlàwas kà an'kɔɔ a Karpɔs, anà in'kaan, sin sin myà ibaan a ntsür.
2TI 4:14 Wɛɛ, Alɛksandre, un'tsül a ngöl, kan'kyeer indiir ibe mbɔɔn. Mwol asun'fuur asànaa ayà nsyääl ande.
2TI 4:15 Ngye sye kal kà igyɛɛŋ anà nde, ntɔn nde kàkyer atɔn a ngwal an'lɔɔŋ abi.
2TI 4:16 Umpal kàsi mɛ un'lɔn amɛ wàtàtwɛb, akà mbuur mwɛy kan'bay anki, baar banswà bàkyer an'tɔn. Wɛy bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n alääb ya.
2TI 4:17 Mɛ, mɛ Mwol kan'bay, waa kan'pɛ ngwal, ntɔn mukyään Ndaa ubwaŋàbwaŋ, waa baar mpa abà Ayuda banswà bàkyer awem ya. Nde kàn'tsü mɔ̈ɔ̈ u mun a ntaamà.
2TI 4:18 Mwol asàkyer an'tswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ kusà a nkyeer ambe yanswà, waa usan'biil unsà ubwaŋ banswà uboo a Imwol ande kyà du. Wɛy làkoo làkäl anà nde u mbul a in'tye! Wöwöö!
2TI 4:19 Apɛ Piskil anà Akilas mbɔr, anà ndwà a Ɔnɛsfɔr sye.
2TI 4:20 Elastɛ kàsàsaal u Kɔlintɔ. Mɛ Tɔlɔfim kàsun'wɛy u Milɛ anà ukyal.
2TI 4:21 Sà ngwal muyà kusà a paŋà a mpye. Öbulus, Pudɛns, Linüs, Kɔlɔdyà anà atɔŋ banswà bàmatööm mbɔr.
2TI 4:22 Wɛy Mwol ukäl anà dweelà angye! Wɛy kab angway a Nzam làkäl anà bɛ!
TIT 1:1 Mɛ Pɔl, un'syääl a Nzam anà ntööm a Klistɔ Yɛsu ntɔn musyen baar kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l Nzam unsà làkwikilà anà unsà un'yɛnà a ndandaa asànaa inzaam ilɔɔmà kya,
TIT 1:2 unsà làkyän a mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye kàpɛ Nzam ilää, Nzam awà mpa afàtà loor. Nde kya kapɛ kusà a an'taaŋ a mbul a in'tye,
TIT 1:3 anà u taaŋ kàsi nde, nde kàswɛŋ Ndaa ande uboo a an'lɔɔŋ amà ban'pɛ mulab nswɛɛŋ a Nzam awà Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi.
TIT 1:4 Akà Titɔ, mwan amɛ wà ndandaa unsà làkwikilà abi là un'tüüb: Wɛy Taaràbi Nzam anà Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi Klistↄ Yɛsu bapɛ kab a ngway anà duu.
TIT 1:5 Isàkal naa mɛ kàsawɛy u Krɛt, yà ntɔn naa ngye asàmay an'yilà màsääl anà musà andweer a Ikööŋ u bul lanswà mulab nswɛɛŋ kapɛ mɛ.
TIT 1:6 Undweer akal mbuur akɔ̈ɔ̈n ube, un'dim a un'kyay mwɛy mpɛl, akal anà baan aŋàlàkwikilà mpa ban'kwo mukafüün naa ba bye anà nkääl ambe anà aŋunkwɛm.
TIT 1:7 Ntɔn un'kyɛɛŋ a Ikööŋ akal mbuur akɔ̈ɔ̈n ube, ntɔn nde wà un'leer a isal a Nzam: nde ukal anki mbuur afàböön baar ndaa, ŋankyɛl, un'yöör a man, ŋangwiy, mbuur afàleŋ bweel a nswɛn,
TIT 1:8 wɛɛ nde akal ŋun'kaay, un'sam a ndaa aŋàbwaŋ, ŋan'kyän aŋàbwaŋ, mbuur a balàbal, ŋun'kyɛɛl, ŋankääŋ a mpem,
TIT 1:9 wàŋàbääb a Ndaa asànaa bàlɔŋ ya, ntɔn nde ukwe mulɛɛl unsà an'lɔɔŋ a ndandaa anà mutɔn asyeel a mbaaŋ.
TIT 1:10 Ntɔn baar mbɔɔn baŋun'tswe ngwal, anà ŋàloor, sin sin uboo a Ayudà aŋàlàkwikilà.
TIT 1:11 Ngye akyer atsum mun. Ba bàmutwaal lingyoomà uboo a an'ywar aŋikiinà, muyilɔɔŋ indiir mpa byan'kwo mulɔŋ, ntɔn muwal bweel a nswɛn.
TIT 1:12 Umwɛy uboo a ba, ŋangɔɔm aba ŋakwo, kàtɛn naa: « Taaŋ lanswà Bàkrɛt bà ŋaloor, nstür a mpɔr, abwal bàfàkwen nà udyà mpɛl. »
TIT 1:13 Aki imbäl a ndandaa. Lalan, aŋän a ngwal, ntɔn ba bàkäl anà làkwikilà a ndandaa
TIT 1:14 anà ba bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n alab in'sim a Ayudà anà nswɛɛŋ a baar ifàpà ndandaa ngö.
TIT 1:15 Indiir byanswà byàŋàpɔŋà akà baar abaŋàpɔŋà. Wɛɛ akà baar mpa bàŋàpɔŋà anà bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n làkwikilà, undiir mwɛy wàŋàpoŋà watɛy, ntɔn un'yɛnà anà an'kyän aba màŋàtay.
TIT 1:16 Ba bàfàkyey naa ba bàkyun'yöb Nzam, wɛɛ ba bàkyun'tɔn u nsyääl aba. Ba bà baar a ŋingyääy, bun'tswe ngwal anà bàkwe anki akikikye mukyer undiir aŋàbwaŋ.
TIT 2:1 Wɛɛ akà ngye, lɔŋ indiir byàfàlab an'lɔɔŋ a balàbal.
TIT 2:2 Wɛy anün abaal bàkäl baar a nkwaam, bàlàbɔ̈ɔ̈n, bàŋàtɔɔl mpem, baar a ndandaa unsà làkwikilà aba, unsà ukwen anà unsà nkääŋ a mpem.
TIT 2:3 Ifà imwɛy sye, wɛy andweer akaar bàkäl asànaa baar inkyɛɛl: bàkɔɔn akal aŋatwee anà anweel a man. Wɛy ba bàlɔŋ ndaa aŋàbwaŋ,
TIT 2:4 ntɔn ba bàlwɛŋ asye mukwen adim aba anà baan aba,
TIT 2:5 bàkäl baar a nkwaam, bàŋàpɔŋà, bàler ndwà aba ubwaŋàbwaŋ, bàkyer ubwaŋ, bàkäl anà làbɔ̈ɔ̈n akà adim aba, ntɔn mbuur ukɔɔn abɛy Ndaa a Nzam.
TIT 2:6 Alwɛŋ sye atö bàkäl anà nkwaam unsà ndaa yanswà,
TIT 2:7 unsà indiir byanswà. Mɛɛy ngye ŋàkwo naa ngye awà mbaan a isal a ntsà: mpööŋ a an'lɔɔŋ, ibyääl,
TIT 2:8 ndaa a balàbal ayà mpa ban'kwo musyeel mbaaŋ, ntɔn ukɔɔn aman undiir un'be mutɛn a bi, wɛy un'yiiŋ uwɛl un'tɛr a nswɛn.
TIT 2:9 Wɛy asɔ bàkäl anà unkyeey akà ankum aba unsà indiir byanswà, wɛy ba bapɛ un'sak anà bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n asà mbaaŋ anà ba,
TIT 2:10 itàkal muyib akà undiir aba umwɛy, wɛɛ bàswɛŋ taaŋ lanswà naa ba bà bàlää, ntɔn mupà làkoo akà an'lɔɔŋ a Nzam, Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi.
TIT 2:11 Ntɔn, kab a ngway a Nzam alà ntwà a ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈ a baar banswà làkyer amɛnà.
TIT 2:12 Kab a ngway a Nzam alà làfilɔŋ muwɛy nsyääl ambe anà ngyal a indiir a mɛɛn mà, ntɔn mukal u taaŋ alà unsà nkwaam, unsà balàbal anà unsà inzaam,
TIT 2:13 apà ikadilà bi làkyän aŋàsöönà ubwaŋ anà ilä làsàmɛnà làkoo a Nzam abi wàkölàköl anà Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ Yɛsu Klistɔ.
TIT 2:14 Nde kàpɛ nde ŋakwo ntɔn bi, ntɔn mukitsuuŋ unsà an'kyän an'be manswà anà mupɔŋ un'sɛŋ mwɛy mukal wànde, wàŋàpà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande ntɔn isal a ntsà.
TIT 2:15 Tɛn indiir abi, pà an'lwɛŋ anà ŋan unsà ikɔ̈b kyànswà. Wɛy mbuur ukɔ̈ɔ̈n abɛy!
TIT 3:1 Ayɔɔb aŋàlàkwikilà bàkäl anà unkyeey akabyääl anà akamfum a nsi, bàkyer awem, bàkal anà ukwen mukyer ndaa aŋàbwaŋ,
TIT 3:2 bàkɔɔn atwee akà mbuur mwɛy, bàtiin ngwiy, bàmɛnà aŋukanà, bàswɛŋ duu taaŋ lanswà akà baar banswà.
TIT 3:3 Ntɔn bi sye itaan, bi kàkäl ipool, baar a un'tswe ngwal, baar aŋàdiimà mbwo, asɔ a ngyal a ifà ifà anà un'sak a ifà ifà, kàkäl uboo a kɔɔrà anà un'köl, baar a ŋingyäy u mii a baar, bi kàyiiŋà bi a bi.
TIT 3:4 Wɛɛ, umpal bàmɛnà ubwaŋ a Nzam, Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi anà ukwen ande ntɔn baar,
TIT 3:5 nde kitsü mɔ̈ɔ̈, kà ntɔn bi kàtàkyer isal a balàbal anki, wɛɛ ntɔn ngyɛb ande ŋakwo, u mbwo a an'dà a mböör akün anà yà Dweelà In'kyɛɛl.
TIT 3:6 Dwelà In'kyɛɛl awà, Nzam kun'pay mbɔɔn udu a bi u mbwo a Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi Yɛsu Klistɔ,
TIT 3:7 ntɔn nde kitwey bàbalàbal u mbwo a kab a ngway ande, unsà làkyän, bi ibulà awɛɛl a mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye.
TIT 3:8 Ndaa ayin yà làkwikilà. Mɛ in'kwen naa ngye asi muküünà unsà indiir abi, ntɔn baar banswà bàfàsà làkwikilà amu Nzam, bàsöönà mukyer isal a ntsà. Indiir abi byà byàntwɛn anà byàndöŋ akà baar.
TIT 3:9 Wɛɛ, tiin mbaaŋ a ipool, nsim a an'ywar, an'syee, ngwiy ntɔn un'kɔɔn, ntɔn indiir abi ndöŋ byatɛy, bya byà bunàbun.
TIT 3:10 Mbuur afàtwaal nkaabà, un'lwom ungö a lwɛŋ atàtwɛb anà làyweel:
TIT 3:11 muyöb naa mbuur a tub awà wàŋàdiimà mbwo anà wun'be, nde afàpɛɛl ikwàndwà nde ŋakwo.
TIT 3:12 Umpal in'satööm mɛ Artɛmas itàkal Tishik, kyer ngwal muyan'taan u Nikɔpɔlis. Ntɔn mɛ kàbön naa mɛ in'yàkal kwo u paŋà a mpye.
TIT 3:13 Sà un'kanà mupà Zɛnas awà mbak anà Apɔlɔsi indiir abà ba abyà mfun u nkyeen aba, ntɔn ba bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n akal anà nkyääŋ a undiir.
TIT 3:14 Bàbi ŋakwo sye bàkyer alɔŋàkà mubilà afwee unsà isal a ntsà, ntɔn mukwey ngyal a gyä, anà mukɔɔn akal abwal.
TIT 3:15 Baar banswà abà anà mɛ bàmapà mbɔr. Apɛ asam abi aŋàkwikilà mbɔr. Wɛy kab a ngway làkäl anà bɛ banswà!
PHM 1:1 Pɔl, mbuur a bɔlokà ntɔn Yɛsu Klistɔ anà un'tɔŋ abi Tumàtɛ, bi ban'pà mbɔr akà ngye Filemɔ, nkween abi anà un'baay abi,
PHM 1:2 anà akà un'tɔŋ abi wà un'kaar Apyà, anà akà Arship awà afànwaan ità imwɛy anà bi, anà akà un'tüüb awà afàköŋ u ndwà angye.
PHM 1:3 Wɛy Taaràbi Nzam anà Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ bàlapɛ kab a ngway anà duu!
PHM 1:4 Filemɔ, mɛ in'fàpà an'tɔɔn akà Nzam amɛ taaŋ lanswà, anà in'fatà din u ngyamàkà amɛ,
PHM 1:5 ntɔn mɛ in'fàwem làsaŋ a làkwikilà angye akà Mwol Yɛsu anà ukwen angye akà aŋin'kyɛɛl banswà.
PHM 1:6 Mɛ kàlɔ̈m akà Nzam naa làkwikilà làbà bi un'tüüb, ngye anà mɛ, làkäl ngwal amu ngye, ntɔn la làswɛŋ ubwaŋàbwaŋ ubwaŋ banswà ibà bi abà ntɔn Klistɔ.
PHM 1:7 Un'tɔŋ, mɛ kàmɛn un'sak anà ngwal mbɔɔn, ntɔn, u mbwo a ukwen angye, ngye kàkwaam mpem a aŋin'kyɛɛl.
PHM 1:8 Lalan, itàkal naa mɛ in'wà nsaay amu Klistɔ mukaswaŋ buur angye,
PHM 1:9 wɛɛ mɛ in'kwen mukasà ndɔ̈ɔ̈m yi kà ikↄb a ukwen. Inye, mɛ Pɔl, in'wà un'nün anà in'wà apanà u bɔlokà ntɔn Yɛsu Klistɔ,
PHM 1:10 mɛ amalɔn ntɔn Ɔnɛsim, awà kàbulà mwan amɛ unsà dweelà apà u bɔlokà.
PHM 1:11 Kusà, nde kàkäl anki ndöŋ akà ngye, wɛɛ apanà nde wà ndöŋ akà bi, akà ngye asànaa akà mɛ.
PHM 1:12 Mɛ amafuur awà, nde wà asànaa mpem amɛ ŋakwo.
PHM 1:13 Mɛ in'làkwen mukun'kaar tsütsü apà mɛ ntɔn nde kan'syääl kà ikal angye umpal in'wà mɛ u bɔlokà ntɔn Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ.
PHM 1:14 Wɛɛ mɛ inkwen anki mukyer abun ukɔɔn ukwen angye, ntɔn ngye akɔ̈ɔ̈n akyer ubwaŋ a ngwal, wɛɛ unsà mpem aŋàbwaŋ.
PHM 1:15 Taaŋ lumwɛy nkaabà angye anà Ɔnɛsim u kitaaŋ yàkäl mbwo ngye mukal ipepey anà nde.
PHM 1:16 Ntɔn apanà nde kà afàkal un'sɔ mpɛl a mpɛl anki, wɛɛ nde kan'söön un'sɔ: nde wà un'tɔŋ a nkween. Nde wà ndöŋ mbɔɔn akà mɛ, wɛɛ nde kan'söön sye ndöŋ mbɔɔn akà ngye, asànaa mbuur, asànaa un'tɔŋ angye amu Klistɔ!
PHM 1:17 Abun, isàkal naa ngye afan'wal asànaa un'tɔŋ angye unsà làkwikilà, un'wɛl sye asànaa alan'wal ngye.
PHM 1:18 Isàkal naa nde ibii kà nà kakyer, itàkal naa nde we anà nkul angye, wɔm ya yanswà udu un'tswe amɛ.
PHM 1:19 Mɛ, Pɔl, an'sɔn kà an'kɔɔ amɛ ŋàkwo, mɛ in'kyer asafuur ya. Ndöŋ yatɛy akà mɛ mukayɔɔb naa ngye sye, ngye awe anà nkul amɛ, nkul ya mɔ̈ɔ̈ angye ŋàkwo!
PHM 1:20 Inye, un'tɔŋ, nkyeer ubwaŋ aban ntɔn Mwol: kwaam mpem amɛ ntɔn ukwen a Klistɔ.
PHM 1:21 Yà ntɔn unkyeey angye waa mɛ amasöön: mɛ in'kyàyöb naa ngye ayàkyer byàŋàsöön indiir amalɔ̈ɔ̈m mɛ bi.
PHM 1:22 Apanà sye, ndɔ̈ɔ̈n ikal abɔ̈ɔ̈n: mɛ an'sà làkyän naa, ntɔn ngyamàkà abɛ, itaan a mbɔɔn tɛy, bàyan'fuur ba akà bɛ.
PHM 1:23 Ɛpafras, un'tɔŋ awà u bɔlokà anà mɛ ntɔn Yɛsu Klistɔ, kàmapà mbɔr.
PHM 1:24 Atɔŋ bàfàsal anà mɛ bàmapà mbɔr sye: Malakɔ, Aristark, Damas anà Lukà.
PHM 1:25 Wɛy kab a ngwal a Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ làkäl anà bɛ.
HEB 1:1 Itaan, Nzam kàyäämà anà ankaa abi, mbalà mbɔɔn, u ntɛɛn yà ifà ifà, u mbwo a aŋangɔɔm.
HEB 1:2 Wɛɛ apanà, u paŋà a ntsüü ibà bi là, nde kàyääm anà bi u mbwo a Mwan awà kàsi nde ŋakwal a indiir byanswà, u mbwo a nde sye nde kàkyer mɛɛn manswà.
HEB 1:3 Mwan awà wà pɛɛlà a làkoo ande anà idiim muswaŋ naa Nzam wà aben, anà nde afàkaar indiir byanswà unsà ngwal a ndaa ande. Ungö mupöŋ man'be a baar, nde kàkàbwaay u du u kɔɔ a ibaal a Nzam aŋàsöön ngwal yanswà.
HEB 1:4 Mwan kàbulà wàŋàsöön akyeey, waa Nzam kun'pɛ ikɔb aŋàsöönà kyà ba.
HEB 1:5 Kyakin, nde kàtɛn anki akà ikikye akà un'kyeey mwɛy naa: « Ngye awà Mwan amɛ, mɛ amàbɔr ŋàbà. » Anà sye: « Mɛ in'yàkal Taarànde anà nde ayàkal Mwan amɛ. »
HEB 1:6 Wɛɛ, umpal ubiil nde nswɛm u mɛɛn, nde kan'tɛn naa: « Wɛy akyeey a Nzam banswà bun'kömà. »
HEB 1:7 Ntɔn akyeey, nde kan'tɛn naa: « Nde akyeey ande afabuul an'dweelà, anà asyääl ande làlem a mbaa. »
HEB 1:8 Wɛɛ ntɔn Mwan, nde kan'tɛn naa: « Kir angye là imwol, Nzam, làŋàsà ntɔn mbul a in'tye, ngye imwol angye afàyaal a swalaa.
HEB 1:9 Ngye kàkwen balàbal anà kàyiiŋ ube, kyakin Nzam, Nzam angye, kàtsüül nde may a un'kyɔm aŋàsöön atɔŋ angye. »
HEB 1:10 Nde an'fàtɛn sye naa: « Inye, Mwol, u nsɛmà ngye kàsi in'bään a mɛɛn, du là isal a an'kɔɔ angye.
HEB 1:11 Bya byàkyer asàkwà, wɛɛ ngye, ngye awe anà mɔ̈ɔ̈. Bya byanswà byàsànün asànaa ipfɛy,
HEB 1:12 ngye asabwɛlà asànaa ufàbwɛlà kàzak, ngye asasɔɔm asànaa ipfɛy. Wɛɛ ngye, ngye awà ifà imwɛy, mbul angye isàwà anki. »
HEB 1:13 Nzam kàtɛn anki akà un'kyeey ande mwɛy naa: « Bwaay u kɔɔ amɛ là ibaal, tii mpal in'sàsà mɛ ayiiŋ angye ungyɛl in'kɔl angye. »
HEB 1:14 Kyekà akyeey bà an'dweelà unsà isal a Nzam. Nde afatɔm musyääl baar bàsàwal kwal a mɔ̈ɔ̈.
HEB 2:1 Kyakin, bi ikyer alab ubwaŋàbwaŋ ndaa kàwem bi, ntɔn bi ikɔ̈ɔ̈n adiimà mbwo.
HEB 2:2 Ntɔn, isàkal naa ndaa bàkyään akyeey yàmɛnà naa yà ndandaa, isàkal naa mbɛɛy yanswà anà unkwɛɛm banswà bàkyer awal ntaaŋàmbar aŋàkwo,
HEB 2:3 apan, bi ŋakwo iyàsɔrà aben, isàkal naa bi kan'bi mɔ̈ɔ̈ a tub àwà, mɔ̈ɔ̈ kàsɛmà Mwol ŋakwo mukyään, anà baar bàwem wa biswɛŋ ntal awa.
HEB 2:4 Nzam kàmɛy naa imbäl aba kyàkäl kyà ndandaa u mbwo a idiim, impà, ndaa ubem yà ifà ifà, anà unsà an'kab a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl màŋàkab asànaa kàkwen nde ŋakwo.
HEB 2:5 Nzam kàsi anki mɛɛn amà iyà, amà itɛɛnà bi, ungyɛl a in'kɔl a akyeey.
HEB 2:6 Kyakin kà ikal mwɛy, mbuur mwɛy kàtɛ imbäl abà: « Mbuur wà nà ntɔn ngye un'si mii? Itàkal naa mwan a mbuur ntɔn ngye akun'ler?
HEB 2:7 Utaaŋ ikikye, ngye kun'tyeey ungyɛl a akyeey, ngye kun'bwää làkoo anà ibyääl,
HEB 2:8 ngye kàsi indiir byanswà ungyɛl a in'kɔl ande. » Mukun'sà indiir byanswà ungyɛl a in'kɔl, nde kàwɛy anki akà undiir mwɛy ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akal ungyɛl a ikɔb ande. Kyekà, apanà bi ŋàtàman anki naa bya byanswà byàŋàsà ungyɛl a ikɔ̈b ande.
HEB 2:9 Wɛɛ bi kan'man abà: ungö akun'tyeey ikikye ungyɛl a akyeey, apanà, Yɛsu bàmun'bwää làkoo anà ibyääl, ntɔn ukwà abà kàmɛn nde mpay. Abun, u mbwo a kab a ngway a Nzam, nde kàkü ntɔn baar banswà.
HEB 2:10 Yàkäl ubwaŋ akà Nzam awà ntɔn nde anà u mbwo a nde abyà indiir byanswà, kàkwen musyen un'kàbɔ a baan u làkoo ande. Kyakin, yàbwɛŋ naa nde usyen Yɛsu, un'bään a mɔ̈ɔ̈ aba, ukäl wàŋàkwo, u mbwo a mpay.
HEB 2:11 Ntɔn, mbuur afàpöŋ anà bàŋàpöŋ, ba banswà bàfü ntsü mwɛy. Kyakin nde nswɛn yatɛy mukabel atɔŋ ande,
HEB 2:12 umpal kàtɛn nde naa: « Mɛ in'yàkyään làsaŋ a ikɔb angye akà atɔŋ amɛ, mɛ in'kyer ayasyäŋà uboo a nköŋ. »
HEB 2:13 Nde kàtɛn sye naa: « Mɛ in'yàsà mpem amɛ amu nde. » Waa kàfàkwɛy naa: « Le mɛ, mɛ anà baan kan'pɛ Nzam. »
HEB 2:14 Ntɔn baan abà bye anà undiir mwɛy wà un'tüüb, an'kil anà in'twaŋ, ifà imwɛy sye, Yɛsu kàbulà asànaa ba, nde kàbwäär ndür a imbuur. Abun, u mbwo a nkweel ande, nde kàkwaam ngwal a mbuur kàkäärà ukwà, iswaŋà naa Ileŋ.
HEB 2:15 U mbwo a ba, nde kàtsuuŋ baar banswà bàkäl uboo a isɔ u mɔ̈ɔ̈ aba wanswà ntɔn bɔɔmà a ukwà.
HEB 2:16 Ntɔn, nde kàyi anki mubay akyeey, wɛɛ nde kayi mubay ywar a Abàlam.
HEB 2:17 Kyakin, yàlɔ̈m naa nde ubulà asànaa atɔŋ ande unsà indiir byanswà, ntɔn mubulà undweer a angaŋ bàŋàyɔl a ngyɛb anà wàbalàbal unsà isal ande kusà a Nzam, ntɔn mudwa man'be a un'sɛŋ ande.
HEB 2:18 Apanà, nde kan'kwo mubay baar abàŋàsii, ntɔn nde ŋakwo bàkyer un'sii unsà mpay kàmɛn nde.
HEB 3:1 Kyakin, atɔŋ in'kyɛɛl, bɛ baar làbye anà kab unsà làbeel a du, làsi an'kyän abe amu Yɛsu awà ntööm anà undweer a angaŋ a làkwikilà ifàkyään bi.
HEB 3:2 Nde wà lää akà mbuur kun'si, asànaa kàkäl Mɔsɛ, udu a ndwà a Nzam yanswà.
HEB 3:3 Yàmɛnà naa làkoo a Yɛsu làŋàsöön là Mɔsɛ, asànaa un'tööŋ a ndwà, we anà ibyääl aŋàsöön ndwà ya ŋakwo.
HEB 3:4 Abun, ndwà yanswà ye anà un'tööŋ aya, kyekà Nzam wà un'tööŋ a indiir byanswà.
HEB 3:5 Kyekà Mɔsɛ kàkäl un'syääl a lää u ndwà a Nzam yanswà, ntɔn mutà imbäl a indiir kàlàtɛn Nzam ungö.
HEB 3:6 Wɛɛ Klistɔ wà lää asànaa Mwan, kà un'tswe a ndwà a Nzam. Ndwà ande ya yà bi, isàkal naa bi ban'kaar kam anà làkyän amu nde abyà ifàswaŋ bi ngaal.
HEB 3:7 Kyakin, asànaa utɛnà Dweelà In'kyɛɛl: « Ŋàbà, isàkal naa bɛ lan'wem ndaa ande,
HEB 3:8 twon lan'bäm mpem abɛ asànaa utaaŋ bun'mbäär, ilä bun'sii u nsye ipɔl.
HEB 3:9 Akun ankaa abɛ ban'leŋ un'swey anà bàkyer an'sii, itàkal naa ba bàkyàman isal kàkyer mɛ
HEB 3:10 mbul an'kwem an'nà. Kyakin kàwem mɛ nkööl ayin nkyɛl, waa mɛ kàtɛn naa: "mpem aba yàmubwà ndwaŋ taaŋ lanswà, ba bàkwen anki muyöb undiir kàdilà mɛ akà ba."
HEB 3:11 "Kyakin, uboo a nkyɛl amɛ, mɛ kàdi kyän naa: Ba bàsàbilà anki kà ikal a ngyöör kàlɔ̈n mɛ ntɔn ba!" »
HEB 3:12 Atɔŋ, làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ, wɛy akà umwɛy uboo a bɛ ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akal anà mpem a mbe mpa aye anà làkwikilà ayà ikun'syeenà mutɔn Nzam a mɔ̈ɔ̈.
HEB 3:13 Wɛɛ, ilä byanswà, làpɛɛl ngwal bɛ a bɛ, itàkal naa taaŋ mbɔɔn ban'kwo mutɛn naa « ŋàbawà », ntɔn akà umwɛy uboo a bɛ man'be màkɔ̈ɔ̈n un'kur musà mpem ande bwoor.
HEB 3:14 Kyakin bi ibàŋàtüüb a Klistɔ, isàkal naa bi kan'kaar tii u ntsüü, kam alà kun'si bi u nsɛmà.
HEB 3:15 Kyakin, bàtɛn naa: « Isàkal naa ŋàbawà bɛ lan'wem ndaa ande, twon lan'bäm mpem abɛ asànaa bàkyer ataaràbɛ umpal bun'pɛ ba ngö. »
HEB 3:16 Abun, bànà bàmbäär Nzam, ungö bàwem ba ndaa ande? Nkye kà baar banswà kàtwey Mɔsɛ u Ngipiti anki?
HEB 3:17 Anà bànà nde kàwem nkyɛl mbul an'kwem an'nà? Nkye kà baar bàkyer man'be anki, waa bàkü u nsye ipɔl?
HEB 3:18 Abun, bànà nde kàdyeel kyän, mutɛn naa: « Ba bàsàbilà anki kà ikäl a ngyöör kàlɔ̈n mɛ ntɔn ba. » Nkye kà akà baar bàtön mukun'kyey anki?
HEB 3:19 Bi kan'man naa baar abà bàkwe anki mubilà kà ikal a ngyöör ntɔn ba bàkäl anki anà làkwikilà amu Nzam.
HEB 4:1 Abun, ntɔn ilää kàpɛ Nzam mubilà u ngyöör ande kyà kapaa, wɛy bi ikäl kà igyɛɛŋ ntɔn umwɛy uboo a bɛ ukɔ̈ɔ̈n asàkal u nsà.
HEB 4:2 Ntɔn bi sye, bi kàwɛl Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ asànaa ba. Wɛɛ ndaa bàwem ba yapɛ anki bweel, ntɔn umpal bàwem ba ya, ba bàsi anki làkwikilà amu ya.
HEB 4:3 Kyakin, bi baar kàsi làkwikilà, bi ibilà unsà ngyöör ayà kàtɛn nde naa: « Uboo a nkyɛl amɛ, mɛ kadi kyän naa: Ba bàsàbilà anki uboo a ngyöör amɛ! » Nde kàtɛn abun, itàkal naa nde isal ande kàmay fà nkyeer a mɛɛn.
