HEB 4:4 Ntɔn bàtɛn kà ikal mwɛy uboo a Ndaa Aŋàsɔn ntɔn ilä kyànsàmbwaar naa: « Nzam kàyöör kà ilä kyànsàmbwaar unsà isal ande byanswà. »
HEB 4:5 Unsà ya bàfàtɛn naa: « Ndandaa ba bàsàbilà anki u ngyöör amɛ! »
HEB 4:6 Yan'mɛnà ubwaŋàbwaŋ naa baar bumwɛy bàkyer abilà u ngyöör ayi. Kyeka, bàtàtwɛb bàwem Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ bàbilà anki mwo, ntɔn unkwɛɛm aba.
HEB 4:7 Kyakin, Nzam an'fàsà ilä asin ubeelà nde « ŋàbà ». Nde kàtɛn ntɔn kya ungöngö, u mbwo a David, unsà ndaa bàtäŋ kusà naa: « Ŋàbà, isàkal naa bɛ lan'wem ndaa ande, twon làn'bäm mpem abɛ. »
HEB 4:8 Abà, yàlàkal naa Yɔswa kàpɛ ngyöör akà un'sɛŋ, Nzam kàlàfàtɛn anki, ungö a indiir abi, ntɔn ilä asin.
HEB 4:9 Abun, yàlàfàsaal ngyöör mwɛy, ngyöör a saba ntɔn un'sɛŋ a Nzam.
HEB 4:10 Ntɔn mbuur awà kàbilà u ngyöör ande, nde sye wàmuyöör unsà isal ande, asànaa Nzam kàyöör nde unsà kyànde.
HEB 4:11 Abun, wɛy bi idüül mubilà u ngyöör ayi, ntɔn akà mbuur mwɛy ukɔ̈ɔ̈n abwà unsà unkwɛɛm asànaa baar a Isàlɛl.
HEB 4:12 Ntɔn ndaa a Nzam ye anà mɔ̈ɔ̈, ya yà ngwal anà yan'söön kɔm lanswà u mpɔr. Ya ifàbilà tii kà ikal mukaab mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà dweelà, in'kwo anà usɔ. Nde afàsyeebà pànsi pànsi an'kyän a mpem a mbuur.
HEB 4:13 Akà ikyeer mwɛy ikwe anki mubaan kà ileer ande. Indiir byanswà byànsàpɔl anà byàŋàmɛɛy u mii a mbuur isàtääl bi in'lɔn.
HEB 4:14 Kyakin, ntɔn bi ibye anà undweer a angaŋ a dudu awà kàlyaaŋ u du, Yɛsu, Mwan a Nzam, wɛy bi ikäär ubwaŋàbwaŋ làkwikilà ifàkyään bi.
HEB 4:15 Abun, bi ibye anà undweer a angaŋ kan'kwo mukiwem ngyɛb ntɔn gyɔ̈ɔ̈là abi. Nde bàkyer un'lwab ndaa amu indiir byanswà asànaa bi, wɛɛ nde man'be kàsàkyer anki.
HEB 4:16 Abun, wɛy bi isin anà kam anà làkyän tsütsü a kir a imwol a kab a ngway, ntɔn Nzam kiwem ngyɛb anà bi iwɛl kab a ngway kusà a nde ntɔn mukibay u taaŋ a taaŋ.
HEB 5:1 Undweer a ngaŋ wanswà bàfun'wal uboo a baar, bàfun'sɔɔl ntɔn musyääl Nzam ntɔn ubwaŋ a baar. Isal ande kyà mupà an'kab anà ibɔɔn ntɔn man'be.
HEB 5:2 Ntɔn nde ŋakwo sye we anà gyɔ̈ɔ̈là asànaa baar banswà, lalan nde wàŋàkwo muyöb baar mpa bàfàyöb anà bàfàbwà ndwaŋ.
HEB 5:3 Ntɔn gyɔ̈ɔ̈là alà, nde akyer apà ibɔɔn kà nà ntɔn man'be a un'sɛŋ mpɛl anki, wɛɛ ntɔn mànde ŋakwo sye.
HEB 5:4 Yumwɛy, mbuur ufàpɛɛl anki isal aki nde ŋakwo, kya bàfàwal u mbwo a làbeel a Nzam, asànaa yàkäl ya akà Alɔn.
HEB 5:5 Kyakin, itàkal Klistɔ kàsàpɛɛl anki nde ŋakwo làkoo mubulà undweer a angaŋ. Nde la kàwɛl akà mbuur awà kàtɛn a nde naa: « Ngye awà Mwan amɛ, mɛ aman'bɔr ŋàbà. »
HEB 5:6 Ntsü yumwɛy, nde kàtɛn naa: « Ngye awà ngaŋ a ipepey unsà un'lwaŋ a Mɛlkisɛdɛk. »
HEB 5:7 Unsà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande u mɛɛn, Yɛsu kàsi ngyamàkà anà ndɔ̈ɔ̈m, anà in'kwɛŋ anà nsaaŋ, akà mbuur kàkwe mukun'tswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ unsà ukwà, ntɔn ya Nzam kàkyer un'wem ntɔn unkyeey ande.
HEB 5:8 Itàkal naa nde kàkäl Mwan a Nzam, u mbwo a mpay kàmɛn nde, nde kàlɔŋàkà unkyeey.
HEB 5:9 Abun, nde kàkɔlà wàŋàkwo, waa kàbulà isin a ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈ ipepey ntɔn baar banswà bàfun'kyey.
HEB 5:10 Kyakin, Nzam kun'si nde undweer a angaŋ uboo a un'lwaŋ a Mɛlkisɛdɛk.
HEB 5:11 Unsà ndaa ayi, bi ibye anà indiir mbɔɔn mutɛn, wɛɛ yà mpay mubaal ya, ntɔn bɛ làkyàbulà anà undäär muyöb.
HEB 5:12 Sɛmà itaan, bɛ làlàkal alɔɔŋ, wɛɛ bɛ lan'fàkal anà ngyal naa bàlalɔŋ indiir atàtwɛb byà ndaa a Nzam. Bɛ làkyàkɔlà kà ikal mukal anà ngyal a bɛɛl, akwànaa isaa a bwoor.
HEB 5:13 Mbuur awà u mun a bɛɛl tii mpalàbà, ukwe anki mulab an'kyän unsà ndaa a balàbal, ntɔn nde wà mwan un'kye.
HEB 5:14 Wɛɛ isaa a bwoor byà ntɔn andweer. U nsyääl aba, ba bàkyàsà nsɔ̈ɔ̈l aba unsà yàŋàbwaŋ anà yàmbe.
HEB 6:1 Kyakin, bi iwɛy an'lɔɔŋ a nsɛmà mà Klistɔ, bi ileŋ ma akwà man'kwo ntɔn andweer, ukɔɔn afurà unsà indiir a un'bään asànaa: mubuul mpem, muwɛy isal byàfàtwaal ukwà anà mukal anà làkwikilà amu Nzam,
HEB 6:2 an'lɔɔŋ a ndüümà anà màsyeel an'kɔɔ, ngwiiyà a akü anà ntsüül a nsaŋ ipepey.
HEB 6:3 Ler ndaa iyàkyer bi, isàkal naa Nzam an'pà mbwo.
HEB 6:4 Ya ikwe anki naa baar abà bàwɛl pɛɛlà, bàwem ntsà a kab a du, bàtüüb a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl,
HEB 6:5 bàlɛɛr ndaa a Nzam yàŋàbwaŋ anà ngwal a mɛɛn amà isàyà,
HEB 6:6 anà bàkyàbwà, ba bàkwe anki mufàbuul mpem, ntɔn mufàfuur Mwan a Nzam u kulunsi ntɔn mbuul a mpem aba anà mukun'mɛɛy nswɛn u mii a baar.
HEB 6:7 Umpal ifànwà mɛɛn an'dà a mbul màfànɔ udu a ma mbalà mbɔɔn anà màfàtwey in'te a mfun ntɔn baar bàfàkɔn ma, ma ifàwal nsaak akà Nzam.
HEB 6:8 Wɛɛ, isàkal naa ma màfàtwey nà ibwiy a nsyɛɛnà anà mikyɛɛl, ndöŋ ama yatɛy, itaan tɛy bàkyer ayàküül ma anà bàyàsà ma mbaa.
HEB 6:9 Wɛɛ akà bɛ, nkween amɛ, itàkal naa bi kan'tɛn abwɛy, bi kan'sà kam naa bɛ làbà u ntsü aŋàbwaŋ, ntsü a ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈.
HEB 6:10 Ntɔn, Nzam wà balàbal. Nde ufàdiimà anki isal abɛ anà ukwen làswɛŋ bɛ ntɔn ikɔb ande umpal làsyääl bɛ aŋin'kyɛɛl anà làfàlab bɛ mukasyääl.
HEB 6:11 Wɛɛ, ngyal abi yà naa mbuur mbuur uboo a bɛ uswɛŋ mbämà nsil ya tii u ntsüü, ntɔn làkyän abɛ làkwe ubwaŋàbwaŋ.
HEB 6:12 Abun, twon lan'kwaam ngwal abɛ, wɛɛ làyweel baar abà u mbwo a làkwikilà unsà mukwüünà, anà bàwal kwal a ilää kàpɛ Nzam.
HEB 6:13 Umpal kàpɛ Nzam Abàlam ilää, nde kàdi kyän u mbwo a nde ŋàkwo, ntɔn mbuur aŋàsöön nde kàkäl anki.
HEB 6:14 Nde kàtɛn naa: « Ndandaa, mɛ in'sayööl a nsaak anà in'sapà in'lwaaŋ a baar mbɔɔn! »
HEB 6:15 Kyakin, Abàlam kàdil unsà muküünà, waa kàwɛl undiir kun'pɛ Nzam ilää.
HEB 6:16 Kyekà, baar bàfàdyà kyän bàfàkyer kà ikɔb a mbuur aŋàsöön ba ŋakwo, anà mumay mbaaŋ yanswà, ba bàfàdüül musà mbɔ̈ɔ̈l a kyän.
HEB 6:17 Abun, Nzam kàkwen muswaŋ ubwaŋàbwaŋ akà aŋakwal a ilää naa an'kyän ande ifàsɔɔmà anki, kyakin kàmɛɛy nde kya u mbwo a kyän.
HEB 6:18 Abun, bye anà indiir byeel mpa byàfàsɔɔmà, u mbwo a bya, ikwe anki akà ikikye naa Nzam utɛ loor. Bya byàmitwääl ndɛɛl yàngwal, akà bi baar kàwɛy indiir byanswà ntɔn mukaar làkyän alà biböön.
HEB 6:19 Akà bi, làkyän là asànaa löŋ a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi, làngwal anà làŋàbäm ubwaŋ, la làfàbilà ungö a rido,
HEB 6:20 ikal kàbilà Yɛsu kusà a bi ntɔn bi. Nde kàbulà undweer a angaŋ wà mbul a in'tye kà un'lwaaŋ a Mɛlkisɛdɛk.
HEB 7:1 Mɛlkisɛdɛk awà kàkäl mfum a Salɛm anà ngaŋ a Nzam a Dudu. Nde mbuur kàkàbwey anà Abàlam, umpal kàfü Abàlam ità u ntsü kàwɛl nde iböŋ udu a amfum, waa kun'si an'kɔɔ.
HEB 7:2 Abàlam kun'pɛ mwɛy unsà indiir kwem kàwɛl nde kà ità kàböŋ nde. Mutàsɛmà, ikɔb a Mɛlkisɛdɛk iswaŋà naa « mfum a balàbal ». Nde sye wà mfum a Salɛm, iswaŋà naa « mfum a duu ».
HEB 7:3 Nde wà mbuur akɔ̈ɔ̈n taarànde, itàkal ngwän, itàkal un'lwaaŋ, itàkal nsɛmà, itàkal ntsüü a mɔ̈ɔ̈, wɛɛ nde wà asànaa Mwan a Nzam, nde wà ngaŋ ipepey.
HEB 7:4 Làtääŋ kölàköl a mbuur awà, waa undweer a mbuur Abàlam kun'pɛ mwɛy unsà kwem a indiir kàwɛl nde.
HEB 7:5 Kyekà, un'kɔɔn apaa nswɛɛŋ akà Alɛvi abà angaŋ muwal mwɛy unsà kwem akà un'sɛŋ a Isàlɛl, iswaŋà naa akà atɔŋ aba abà baar a ywar a Abàlam.
HEB 7:6 Wɛɛ Mɛlkisɛdɛk mbuur mpa kàkäl mbuur a ywar a Lɛvi, nde kàwɛl mwɛy unsà kwem akà Abàlam anà nde kàsi ŋilää an'kɔɔ.
HEB 7:7 Kyekà, mukɔɔn asà mbaaŋ, mbuur awà udu afàsà mbuur awà ungyɛl an'kɔɔ.
HEB 7:8 Kyekà, baar a ywar a Lɛvi bàfàwal mwɛy unsà kwem, ba bà baar akwà, wɛɛ Mɛlkisɛdɛk wà mbuur bàtɛ imbäl naa nde we anà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
HEB 7:9 Mumay, bi ban'kwo mutɛn naa: Lɛvi mbuur afawalà mwɛy unsà kwem kàkyer apà mwɛy unsà kwem u mbwo a Abàlam.
HEB 7:10 Ntɔn, itàkal naa nde kàkäl aŋàtun'bɔr anki, nde kàkäl asànaa wà paa amu nkaa ande Abàlam, umpal kàbwey nde anà Mɛlkisɛdɛk.
HEB 7:11 Yàlàkal naa isal bàfàkölà u mbwo a ingaŋ a alɛvi, ntɔn kya kyà kiin a Un'kɔɔn bàpɛ akà un'sɛŋ, yàlàfàkal anki anà ndöŋ mutwey ngaŋ asin unsà un'lwaaŋ a Mɛlkisɛdɛk, akwànaa mukun'sɔɔl uboo a un'lwaaŋ a Alɔn.
HEB 7:12 Ntɔn, nsɔɔmà a ingaŋ ifàtwaal nsɔɔmà a un'kɔɔn.
HEB 7:13 Wɛɛ indiir abi byanswà byàtɛɛnà ntɔn mbuur awà mbuur a mbil asin, uboo a ya akà mbuur mwɛy kàtàkyer anki ingaŋ u mɛsà a ibɔɔn.
HEB 7:14 Ntɔn bàkyàyöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ naa Mwol abi kàfü u mbil a Yuda, mbil mpa kàtɛn Mɔsɛ indiir ntɔn ingaŋ.
HEB 7:15 Yan'mɛnà u leŋ naa we anà ngaŋ asin kàtoo asànaa Mɛlkisɛdɛk.
HEB 7:16 Nde kàbulà anki ngaŋ ntɔn nswɛɛŋ a un'kɔɔn a ikyee imbuur, wɛɛ u mbwo a ngwal a mɔ̈ɔ̈ mpa afàkwà.
HEB 7:17 Ntɔn bàtɛ imbäl ki ntɔn nde: « Ngye awà ngaŋ ipepey unsà un'lwaaŋ a Mɛlkisɛdɛk. »
HEB 7:18 Abun, un'kɔɔn wàtàtwɛb bàkyàdwa, ntɔn wa kàkäl anki ngwal anà ndöŋ
HEB 7:19 anà kàsyen anki akà mbuur mwɛy u nköölà. Wɛɛ u ntsü yumwɛy làkyän aŋàsöön ubwaŋ làkyàyà. U mbwo a la, bi ifàsin tsütsü apà Nzam.
HEB 7:20 Apà làkäl anà kyän a Nzam. Baar bamwɛy bàbulà angaŋ ukɔɔn kyän a tub alà.
HEB 7:21 Wɛɛ Yɛsu kàbulà ngaŋ unsà kyän, mpal kàtɛn Nzam a nde naa: « Mwol kàdi kyän, nde usàsɔɔm anki ndaa ande: "Ngye awà ngaŋ a mbul a in'tye." »
HEB 7:22 Kyakin, Yɛsu kàbulà mbööl a nkwà aŋàbwaŋ.
HEB 7:23 Yumwɛy, angaŋ a alɛvi bàkäl mbɔɔn ntɔn ukwà bapɛɛ anki mbwo mukal ipepey unsà isal.
HEB 7:24 Wɛɛ, ntɔn Yɛsu wà mbul a in'tye, ingaŋ ande kyà ipepey.
HEB 7:25 Kyakin, nde kan'kwo mutswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ipepey baar bàfàsin tsütsü apà Nzam u mbwo a nde. Ntɔn nde we ana mɔ̈ɔ̈ taaŋ lanswà ntɔn muyamà ntɔn ba.
HEB 7:26 Yɛsu wà undweer a angaŋ awà kan'kwo anà bi, wàŋin'kyɛɛl, twan latɛy, ube batɛy, wàŋàkaabà anà baar a man'be, bun'sɛɛn u dudu u du.
HEB 7:27 Nde kà wà anki asànaa andweer a angaŋ bumwɛy bàfàpà ibɔɔn ilä byanswà, utàtwɛb ntɔn man'be aba ŋakwo, ungö ntɔn un'sɛŋ. Wɛɛ nde isal aki kàkyer ipepey mbalà mwɛy mupà nde ŋakwo.
HEB 7:28 Andweer a angaŋ abà bàfàsà Un'kɔɔn bà baar a gyɔ̈ɔ̈là. Wɛɛ ndaa a kyän bàtɛn ungö a un'kɔɔn yàsi Mwan mwɛy wàŋàkwo mbul a in'tye.
HEB 8:1 Kyekà, le kiin a indiir itɛɛnà bi alà: Bi ibye anà undweer a angaŋ a tub awà, nde mbuur kàkàbwaay u kɔɔ ibaal a kir a imwol a làkoo a Nzam.
HEB 8:2 Nde wàmukyer ingaŋ ande kà idwà anà ntɛn a ndandaa kàkyer Mwol, wɛɛ mpa kàkyer mbuur.
HEB 8:3 Undweer a angaŋ bàfun'sà ntɔn mupà an'kab anà ibɔɔn akà Nzam. Abun, yà ndöŋ naa nde sye ukäl anà undiir mwɛy mupà.
HEB 8:4 Kya nde kàlàkal u mɛɛn, nde kàlàkal anki itàkal ngaŋ, ntɔn angaŋ bà paa, ba bàfàpà an'kab mulab nswɛɛŋ a Un'kɔɔn.
HEB 8:5 Wɛɛ ba, ingaŋ aba bàfàkyer uboo a idwà akyà ikwom, munii a idwà a ndandaa akyà u du, asànaa nswɛɛŋ a Nzam kàwɛl Mɔsɛ ntɔn mutɔŋ ntɛn a nköŋ: « Indiir byanswà ngye ayàkyer asànaa baswɛŋ bya u du a mɔŋ. »
HEB 8:6 Wɛɛ apanà, Yɛsu kan'wal isal aŋàsöön ubwaŋ, ntɔn nde wà mfurbo a nkwà aŋàsöön ubwaŋ, yan'bwaay udu a ilää aŋàsöön ubwaŋ.
HEB 8:7 Ntɔn, yàlàkal naa nkwà atàtwɛb yàkäl anki anà an'pɛl, ndöŋ yàlàkal anki mukiir yàyweel.
HEB 8:8 Kyekà, muswaŋ naa nkwà atàtwɛb ye anà an'pɛl, Nzam atɛɛnà a un'sɛŋ ande naa: « Ilä byàmuyà, abyà in'yàdyà mɛ nkwà akün anà un'sɛŋ a Isàlɛl anà wà Yudà.
HEB 8:9 « Wɛɛ, ya isàkal anki asànaa nkwà kàdi mɛ anà ankaa aba mpal katɛ mɛ mpi u kɔɔ ntɔn mukatwey u Ngipiti. Ntɔn ba ŋakwo bàläm anki uboo a nkwà amɛ, abun, mɛ sye wakapɛ ngö.
HEB 8:10 « Ntɔn, le nkwà in'sàdyà mɛ anà un'sɛŋ a Isàlɛl ungö a ilä abin ayi: mɛ in'sàsà in'kɔɔn amɛ unsà an'kyän aba, mɛ in'sàsɔn mya u mpem aba: Mɛ in'sàkal Nzam aba, ba bàsàkal un'sɛŋ amɛ.
HEB 8:11 Akà mbuur mwɛy usàkal anki anà ndöŋ mukyään mbääb ande itàkal un'tɔŋ ande mutɛn naa: "Un'yöb Mwol!" Ntɔn baar banswà bàkyer asan'yöb, sɛmà umbɛy tii akà undweer.
HEB 8:12 Ntɔn mɛ in'sàdwa nkul a ibii aba, mɛ in'fàsàyɔbà anki man'be aba. »
HEB 8:13 Abun, Mwol kàbel nde nkwà ayi naa nkwà akün, iswaŋà naa yàtàtwɛb nde kàbuul undiir itaan. Kyekà, undiir usàbulà wà itaan anà usànün, wa wà tsütsü muyaalà.
HEB 9:1 Nkwà yàtàtwɛb yàkäl anà nswɛɛŋ ntɔn ngyamàkà anà idwà a mɛɛn.
HEB 9:2 Kyakin bàmbaar ntɛn mwɛy yàŋàkaab itiir byeel. Kyàtàtwɛb bàbeelà naa « ikal in'kyɛɛl », uboo byàkäl anà ikɔlà mutɔl mwinà, mɛsà anà mampà in'kyɛɛl.
HEB 9:3 Ungö a rido làyweel, kyàkäl itiir bàbeelà naa « ikal aŋàsöön in'kyɛɛl ».
HEB 9:4 Uboo kwo byàkäl mɛsà a wɔl ntɔn musà tswà mbaa anà un'böl a nkwà wàŋàbwää wanswà anà wɔl. Uboo awa làkäl làbuuŋ a wɔl uboo ala manɛ, anà unsɔk a Alɔn wàŋàfulà, anà an'tär a nkwà.
HEB 9:5 Udu a un'böl, bàkäl ikwom a bàshɛrubɛ a làkoo, munii a an'paab aba kàfafwe nkümà a un'böl awà bàfasyäälà ntɔn ndwääl a man'be. Wɛɛ, apanà kà taaŋ muyäm pànsi pànsi ntɔn indiir abi anki.
HEB 9:6 Ungö musà indiir byanswà abun, angaŋ bàfabilà taaŋ lanswà uboo a itiir kyàtàtwɛb ntɔn mukölà isal aba.
HEB 9:7 Wɛɛ, kà itiir kyàyweel, undweer a angaŋ mpɛl kàfabilà mbalà mwɛy u mbul mwɛy. Nde kàfasyeenà ibɔɔn an'kil ntɔn ibii ande ŋakwo anà byà un'sɛŋ.
HEB 9:8 Dweelà In'kyɛɛl wàmuswaŋ naa mbwo a idwà aŋàsöön in'kyɛɛl ŋàtàduub anki, isàkal naa ntɛn atàtwɛb yà kàpaa.
HEB 9:9 Kya kyà isii ntɔn taaŋ alà. Kya iswaŋà naa an'kab anà ibɔɔn bàfàpà kwo, màkwo anki mupɔŋ mpem a mbuur afàsà ngyamàkà a tub ayi.
HEB 9:10 Ntɔn, bya byàkäl indiir iler udyà, unwà anà upɔŋ ndür. Ya yàkäl nswɛɛŋ a imbuur bàbwääy a ngwal tii utaaŋ a nkwà akün.
HEB 9:11 Kyekà, Klistɔ kàyi asànaa undweer a angaŋ ntɔn mukipà indiir kiwɛɛl nde u mbwo a ntɛn a kölàköl anà yàŋàkwo, ntɛn mpa bàtöŋ anà an'kɔɔ a baar, iswaŋà naa mpa ayà yà mɛɛn mà.
HEB 9:12 Nde kàbilà ipepey kà ikal aŋàsöön in'kyɛɛl, kà nà an'kil a ntab itàkal mà in'tö a ngɔɔmà anki, wɛɛ anà an'kil ande ŋakwo, waa kibeen mbalà mwɛy ipepey.
HEB 9:13 Ntɔn, isàkal naa an'kil a in'dim a ntab anà mà in'tö a ngɔɔmà anà isàkal naa un'twà a ngɔɔmà un'kyay bàfàtyaaŋ udu a baar a ŋingyäy màkyer afàkyɛɛl ntɔn mupöŋ ndür aba,
HEB 9:14 kamanà an'kil a Klistɔ, nde mbuur, u mbwo a dweelà a mbul a in'tye kàkääb nde ŋakwo akà Nzam asànaa ibɔɔn ikɔ̈ɔ̈n too, waa mpa isàpöŋ mpem a isal abi byàŋàkwà ntɔn musyääl Nzam a mɔ̈ɔ̈!
HEB 9:15 Ntɔn ya, Klistɔ wà mfurbo a nkwà akün, ntɔn baar kàbeel Nzam bàwɛl kwal a mbul a in'tye alà kapɛ nde ilää. Ba ban'kwo muwal la, u mbwo a ukwà ande abà bàbeen baar bàkyer man'be unsà nkwà atàtwɛb.
HEB 9:16 Ntɔn ikal awà un'kaan a kwal, yà ubwaŋ bàmɛn naa un'söön awa akyàkwà.
HEB 9:17 Ntɔn, wa afàbulà ndandaa ungö a ukwà a un'söön awa. Isàkal naa aŋawa we anà mɔ̈ɔ̈, wa ndöŋ ufàkal anki.
HEB 9:18 Kyakin, mpal yàsɛmà nkwà yàtàtwɛb, an'kil màkyer atyaŋà.
HEB 9:19 Umpal kàmay Mɔsɛ mukyään nswɛɛŋ yanswà akà un'sɛŋ wanswà asànaa ulɔɔmà Un'kɔɔn, nde kàwɛl an'kil a in'tö a ngɔɔmà, myà in'dim a ntab, anà an'dà, waa kàfwaaŋ ma udu a un'kaan a Un'kɔɔn anà udu a un'sɛŋ wanswà u mbwo a kɔkà a isɔp aŋàbäm in'kà a in'kɔk myàtsöö.
HEB 9:20 Nde kàtɛn naa: « Mà an'kil a nkwà kàdirà Nzam anà bɛ. »
HEB 9:21 Nde kàfwaaŋ sye an'kil udu a ntɛn anà udu a indiir byanswà byà ngyamàkà.
HEB 9:22 Ntɔn, Un'kɔɔn atɛɛnà naa indiir byanswà bàkyer apöŋ anà an'kil. Isàkal naa an'kil ityaŋà anki, ndwääl a man'be sye yatɛy.
HEB 9:23 Isàkal yà ndöŋ naa indiir byàkäl isii a indiir a du byàlàpɔŋà abunà, abun, indiir a du byaŋakwo byàlàpɔŋà u mbwo a ibɔɔn byàŋàsöön ubwaŋ.
HEB 9:24 Ntɔn, Klistɔ kàbilà anki uboo a idwà bàkyer kà an'kɔɔ a baar, idwà akyà ikwom kyàndandaa, wɛɛ nde kàbilà u kiin a du, ntɔn nde umɛnà apanà kusà a Nzam ntɔn bi.
HEB 9:25 Kà ntɔn nde upɛ nde ŋakwo mbalà mbɔɔn anki, asànaa undweer a angaŋ kàfabilà nde mbul wanswà u idwà anà an'kil mpa amà mànde.
HEB 9:26 Kya yàlàkal abwɛy, Yɛsu kàlàman mpay mbalà mbɔɔn sɛmà un'bään a mɛɛn. Wɛɛ apanà, mbalà mwɛy ya mpɛl, u ntsüü a an'taaŋ, nde kàyàmɛnà ntɔn mudwa man'be u mbwo a ibɔɔn ande ŋakwo.
HEB 9:27 Mbuur wanswà akyer akwà mbalà mwɛy mpɛl, waa ungö nsaŋ iyà.
HEB 9:28 Abun sye, Klistɔ kàpɛ nde ŋakwo mbalà mwɛy mpɛl ntɔn mubiiŋ man'be a un'kàbɔ a baar. Nde asàmɛnà mbalà yàyweel, kà ntɔn mulwom man'be anki, wɛɛ ntɔn mutwaal ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈ akà baar bun'dilà.
HEB 10:1 Un'kɔɔn we anà munii a indiir aŋàbwaŋ abyà iyàyà, wɛɛ kà isii a indiir a ndandaa anki. Kyakin wa ukwe anki akà ikikye musyen u nköölà baar bàfàsin apà Nzam: wa kàlàkwo aben anà ibɔɔn ifà imwɛy bàfàpà ipepey mbul anà mbul?
HEB 10:2 Kya yàlàkal naa baar bàfàsà ngyamàkà ayi bàpɔŋà ipepey u mbalà mwɛy, ba bàlàfàkal anki anà an'kyän a man'be.
HEB 10:3 Wɛɛ, imɛnà naa u mbwo a ibɔɔn abi, bàfàfuur man'be kà an'kyän mbul wanswà.
HEB 10:4 Ntɔn, itàkal kà aben, an'kil a in'dim a ngɔɔmà anà mà in'dim a ntab ifàlwom anki man'be.
HEB 10:5 Kyakin, umpal kalàbilà nde u mɛɛn, Klistɔ kàtɛn a Nzam naa: « Ngye kàkwen anki ibɔɔn anà an'kab, wɛɛ ngye kàbom ndür amɛ.
HEB 10:6 Ngye kàkyey anki ntsür aŋàfub anà ibɔɔn ntɔn man'be.
HEB 10:7 Apan, mɛ kàtɛn naa: "Mɛ an'yà mɛ ŋakwo akà ngye, ntɔn mukyer ukwen angye, asànaa bàsön ya ntɔn mɛ unsà un'kaan ibaan a ntsür." »
HEB 10:8 Nde waa utàtɛn naa: « Ngye kàkwen anki ibɔɔn, an'kab, ntsür aŋàfub, ibɔɔn ntɔn man'be, bya ngye un'sak byapɛ anki. » Kyekà, ibɔɔn abi bàfàpà asànaa ulɔɔmà Un'kɔɔn.
HEB 10:9 Kyakin nde waa kàtɛn naa: « Le, mɛ an'yà mɛ ŋakwo ntɔn mukyer ukwen angye. » Nde kàlwom ndaa yàtàtwɛb ntɔn musà yàyweel.
HEB 10:10 Yà unsà ukwen abà waa bi kàpɔŋà u mbwo a an'kab a ndür a Yɛsu Klistɔ, mbalà mwɛy ipepey.
HEB 10:11 Wɛy ngaŋ wanswà umbarà ilä byanswà ntɔn mukölà isal ande, mbalà mbɔɔn nde upɛ ibɔɔn nsil abin, abyà mpa byan'kwo akà ikikye mulwom man'be.
HEB 10:12 Wɛɛ akà Klistɔ, ungö mupà ibɔɔn mwɛy mpɛl ntɔn man'be, nde kàkyàbwaay ipepey u kɔɔ ibaal a Nzam.
HEB 10:13 Apanà nde wàmudilà kwo naa Nzam usi ayiiŋ ande ungyɛl a in'kɔl ande.
HEB 10:14 Abun, u mbwo a an'kab mwɛy amà mpɛl, nde kàbuul bàŋàkwo ipepey baar ufàpöŋ nde unsà man'be.
HEB 10:15 Apan, Dweelà In'kyɛɛl wàmukitɛɛlà imbäl sye. Ntɔn nde kàtàtɛn naa:
HEB 10:16 « Mwol kàtɛn naa: "Le nkwà in'sàdyà mɛ anà ba ungö a ilä abin: Mɛ in'sàsɔn nswɛɛŋ amɛ u mpem aba, mɛ in'sàbääb ya unsà an'kyän aba.
HEB 10:17 Mɛ in'fàsàyɔbà anki man'be aba anà ibii aba. »
HEB 10:18 Kyekà, ikal bàfàdwääl nkul a man'be, ndöŋ an'kab màfàkal anki ntɔn man'be.
HEB 10:19 Kyakin atɔŋ, bi ibye anà nsaay mubilà kà ikal a in'kyɛɛl aŋàsöönà u mbwo a an'kil a ibɔɔn a Yɛsu.
HEB 10:20 Apanà bi ibye anà mbwo akün anà yà mɔ̈ɔ̈ kiduub nde u rido, iswaŋà naa u mbwo a ndür ande.
HEB 10:21 Bi ibye anà undweer a angaŋ a kölàköl bàsi kà un'tswe a ndwà a Nzam.
HEB 10:22 Abun, wɛy bi isin apà Nzam anà mpem a balàbal, wàŋàyɔl a làkwikilà, mpem aŋàpɔŋà unsà ibii kyanswà kyà an'kyän anà ndür aŋàsɔŋ a an'dà aŋàpɔŋà.
HEB 10:23 Wɛy bi ikäl bàŋàtsim unsà làkyän ifàkyään bi, ntɔn Nzam wà lää unsà ilää ande.
HEB 10:24 Wɛy bi ikyɛɛŋ bi a bi, ntɔn bi ipɛɛl ngyal akwen anà yàkyer isal aŋàbwaŋ.
HEB 10:25 Bi twon ban'tiin nköŋ abi, asànaa bàyii baar bumwɛy. Wɛɛ, wɛy bi ipɛɛl ngwal, ntɔn bɛ làkimanà naa Ilä a Mwol kyàmusin.
HEB 10:26 Ntɔn, isàkal naa bi ibàmukyer man'be a kɔrà ungö muyöb ndandaa, ibɔɔn kyan'kwo mulwom man'be ifàkal anki.
HEB 10:27 Wɛɛ yan'saal nà mudil u bɔɔmà nsaŋ anà un'fur a mbaa isàkwiiy baar a un'tswe ngwal.
HEB 10:28 Mbuur usàbɛy Un'kɔɔn a Mɔsɛ bàkyer un'dwa ukɔɔn ngyɛb, isàkal naa baar abɔ̈ɔ̈l itàkal atär ban'tà imbäl ntɔn ube ande.
HEB 10:29 Bɛ làsii naa ntaaŋàmbar akölàköl nà mpa kan'kwo muwal mbuur afàdyà Mwan a Nzam un'siinà, afàbɛy an'kil a nkwà u mbwo a ma kàpɔŋà nde anà afàto Dweelà a kab a ngway?
HEB 10:30 Ntɔn bi ikyun'yöb mbuur awà kàtɛn naa: « Mɛ in'sàfuur ube udu ube, mɛ in'sàfur mbuur mbuur ntɔn isal ande! » Waa kàfàtɛn sye: « Mwol asàtɛn nsaŋ a un'sɛŋ ande. »
HEB 10:31 Yà ndaa a bɔɔmà mbɔɔn mubwà kà an'kɔɔ a Nzam a mɔ̈ɔ̈.
HEB 10:32 Wɛɛ làyɔbà ilä abe byàtàtwɛb mpal làwɛl bɛ pɛɛlà a Nzam: bɛ làkyey muman mpay anwaan ngwiy a ngwal.
HEB 10:33 Mpal mwɛy bàlatö anà bàlamɛɛy nkwaaŋ u mii a baar, mpal yumwɛy bɛ làmɛnà mpay mbwo mwɛy anà baar bàkäl u mpay a tub ayi.
HEB 10:34 Inye, bɛ làwɛl kab unsà mpay a baar a bɔlokà anà bɛ làkyer akyey unsà un'sak naa bàgyɔɔr indiir abɛ, ntɔn bɛ làkyàyöb naa bɛ làbye anà un'naaŋ aŋàsöön ubwaŋ awà afàlam.
HEB 10:35 Abun, twon lan'piy làkyän abɛ, ntɔn la làfàtwaal bweel a kölàköl.
HEB 10:36 Ntɔn, bɛ làbye anà ndöŋ a muküünà ntɔn naa, ungö mukölà ukwen a Nzam, bɛ làwɛl indiir kàpɛ nde ilää.
HEB 10:37 Ntɔn, bàsön naa: « Lan'sal taaŋ ikikye, ikikye mpɛl, mbuur awà ayà, akyer ayàyà, nde uyàkyer anki itaan.
HEB 10:38 Apan, mbuur awà balàbal kusà amɛ asàkal wàmɔ̈ɔ̈ u mbwo a làkwikilà, wɛɛ isàkal naa nde an'furà ngö, mɛ in'sàkal anki anà un'sak amu nde. »
HEB 10:39 Bi, bi kà ibà baar afurà ngö anki ntɔn mukàdiimà, wɛɛ bi ibà baar a làkwikilà ntɔn muwà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
HEB 11:1 Làkwikilà là kam mukal anà undiir awà unsà làkyän, mbwo muyöb ndandaa a undiir mpa bàfàman.
HEB 11:2 U mbwo a la, andweer bàwɛl imbäl aŋàbwaŋ.
HEB 11:3 U mbwo a làkwikilà, bi ikyàyöb naa mɛɛn manswà màŋàyöŋà u mbwo a ndaa a Nzam, abun, indiir byàfàmɛnà u mii byàfàfà unsà indiir mpa byàfàmɛnà.
HEB 11:4 U mbwo a làkwikilà, Abɛl kàpɛ ibɔɔn aŋàbwaŋ akà Nzam kyàŋàsöön kyà Kayin. Ntɔn kya, Nzam kun'twey wàbalàbal, anà kun'tɛɛl imbäl nde ŋakwo ntɔn an'kab ande. Ntɔn la, nde wàmutɛɛnà tii ŋàbà itàkal naa nde kàkyàkwà.
HEB 11:5 U mbwo a làkwikilà, Ɛnɔk bàkyer un'swaam ntɔn nde ukɔ̈ɔ̈n aman ukwà. Bàfàfun'man anki, ntɔn Nzam kàkyer un'swaam. Kusà a nswaam ande, nde kàwɛl imbäl naa Nzam kàkyer un'kyey.
HEB 11:6 Kyekà, ukɔɔn làkwikilà, akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki mupà Nzam un'sak, ntɔn mbuur afàsin tsütsü apà Nzam, akyer asà làkwikilà naa Nde wà paa anà Nde afàpà làfur akà baar bàfun'leŋ.
HEB 11:7 U mbwo a làkwikilà, Nɔwà kàwem ngweey a Nzam ntɔn indiir mpa aŋàtàman. Nde ya kàwɛl anki asànaa un'tääm, waa kàtöŋ an'swà ntɔn ywar ande làwü mɔ̈ɔ̈. Abun, nde kàtsüül mɛɛn ntaaŋàmbar, waa kàbulà ŋakwal a balàbal làfàyà u mbwo a làkwikilà.
HEB 11:8 U mbwo a làkwikilà, Abàlam kàkyey làbeel a Nzam awà kun'swɛŋ mukyà nsi ayà kàlàkàwal nde kwal, nde kàkyen ukɔɔn ayöb naa nde ken ukyà.
HEB 11:9 U mbwo a làkwikilà, nde kàkàbwaay asànaa ungyey u mɛɛn a ilää. Nde kàbwaayà u ntɛn asànaa Isak anà Yakɔb sye, baar bàkäl unsà ilää nsil kya.
HEB 11:10 Ntɔn nde kàdilà bul làkäl anà in'bään a ngwal amyà kàyöŋà anà kàtöŋ Nzam ŋakwo.
HEB 11:11 U mbwo a làkwikilà Saal, nde ŋakwo sye, itàkal naa mbul ande yàkäl yàŋàlyaaŋ, nde kàbulà wàŋàkwo mubɔr, ntɔn Nzam awà kàpɛ ilää aki wà wàlää.
HEB 11:12 Kyakin sye, fà akà mbuur mwɛy mpɛl, awà kàkäl aŋànün tsütsü mukwà, bàbör un'kàbɔ a baar asànaa mbwaar a du, asànaa an'sɛŋ a làbuŋ a ɛwà, mpa ban'kwo mutaŋ.
HEB 11:13 Yà unsà làkwikilà, baar abà banswà bàkü ukɔɔn awal indiir bapɛ ilää, wɛɛ ba bya bàmɛn mpɛl anà bàpɛ bya mbɔr ukwɛl. Anà ba bàyöb naa ba bà angyey anà alyaaŋ u mɛɛn.
HEB 11:14 Ntɔn, baar bàfàtɛn abwɛy, ba bàfàswaŋ ubwaŋàbwaŋ naa ba bàmuleŋ nsi.
HEB 11:15 Yàlàkal naa ba bàfàyɔbà anà nkyɛɛr nsi bàlwomà ba, ba bàlàwal ipöl mufurà kwo.
HEB 11:16 Kutɛn aŋàbwaŋ, ba bàkäl anà ngyal mukal anà nsi yan'söön ubwaŋ, iswaŋà naa nsi a Du. Kyakin, nswɛn yatɛy naa ba bàbeel Nzam naa Nzam aba ntɔn nde kalɔ̈ɔ̈n bul mwɛy.
HEB 11:17 U mbwo a làkwikilà, umpal bun'sii, Abàlam kàkäb Isak, mwan baal ande mwɛy mpɛl, asànaa ibɔɔn, nde mbuur kàwɛl ilää,
HEB 11:18 anà kàtɛn Nzam a nde naa: « Bɔr angye làsàkal làmbɔɔn u mbwo a Isak. »
HEB 11:19 Nde kàmɛn naa Nzam we anà ikɔ̈b muwiiy un'kü, lalan Nzam kun'fuur nde mwan ande anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ asànaa kye anà ikɔk a ndaa, ndaa a ngwiiyà.
HEB 11:20 U mbwo a làkwikilà sye, Isak kàsaak Yakɔb anà Isawu muyilà ndaa isàyà ungö.
HEB 11:21 U mbwo a làkwikilà, Yakɔb, kusà a nkweel ande, kàsaak baan a Yɔsɛfi umwɛy umwɛy. Nde kàtsüüm u nswɛŋ a unsɔk ande, waa kàkömà Nzam.
HEB 11:22 U mbwo a làkwikilà, Yɔsɛfi u ntsüü a mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande, kàkyään ntoo a baan a Isàlɛl anà kàpɛ nswɛɛŋ naa ba bàsàkyer aben ntɔn in'kwo ande.
HEB 11:23 U mbwo a làkwikilà, Mɔsɛ, ungö a mböör ande, aböör ande bun'yee ngɔn tär. Ntɔn bàmɛn ba ntwɛn a mwan aba, ba bàmɛn anki bɔɔmà mubɛy un'kɔɔn a mfum.
HEB 11:24 U mbwo a làkwikilà, Mɔsɛ, mpal kàbulà nde undweer, kàtön bun'beel mwan baal a mwan un'kaar a Falàwɔ.
HEB 11:25 Nde kàkwen muman mpay mbwo mwɛy anà un'sɛŋ a Nzam, akwànaa mukal kà un'sak ntɔn taaŋ làmwɛy là man'be.
HEB 11:26 Nde kàmɛn naa muman nswɛn asànaa Klistɔ yà un'naaŋ aŋàsöön ntal akwànaa in'naaŋ a Ngipiti, ntɔn mii ande myàkäl muler bweel alà làyà.
HEB 11:27 U mbwo a làkwikilà, nde kàlwomà u Ngipiti ukɔɔn aman bɔɔmà a un'fur a nkyɛl a mfum. Nde kàkäl aŋàtsim asànaa nde kàmɛnà Nzam mpa bàfàman.
HEB 11:28 U mbwo a làkwikilà, nde kàswaal Pak anà kàswɛŋ musir an'kil kà ibeenà a ndwà ntɔn un'dwää ukɔ̈ɔ̈n aba baan abaal a nswɛm bà Isàlɛl.
HEB 11:29 U mbwo a làkwikilà, ba bàtsül ngyäl a wɛŋwɛŋ asànaa u mɛɛn aŋàyɔm. Wɛɛ umpal bàsii baar a Ngipiti mutsul, ba bàkyer aminà.
HEB 11:30 U mbwo a làkwikilà, ibä a Yɛlikɔ byàkyer abwà, ungö a un'sɛŋ muywolà bya ilä nsambwaar.
HEB 11:31 U mbwo a làkwikilà, Rayab, un'kaar a pasàsɛ, kàkü anki anà baar mpa abà aŋàlàkwikilà, ntɔn nde kàwɛl aseey unsà ubwaŋ.
HEB 11:32 Ininà mɛ in'fàtɛn? Taaŋ làkyer ayan'kɔ̈ɔ̈n muyääm pànsi pànsi ntɔn Ngidyɔn, Barak, Samsɔn, Zeftɛ, David, Sàmwel anà aŋangɔɔm,
HEB 11:33 u mbwo a làkwikilà ba bàwɛl iböŋ udu a imwol mbɔɔn, bàsyääl balàbal unsà isal, bàwɛl indiir bapɛɛl ilää, bàdübà min a ngɔɔm,
HEB 11:34 bàdim ngwal a mbaa, bàsɔrà u mpɔr a an'kɔm, bàbulà aŋangwal ungö a gyɔ̈ɔ̈là, bàbulà aŋangwal unsà ità, bàbɔ̈ŋ aŋità angyey.
HEB 11:35 U mbwo a làkwikilà, akaar bàfàman akü aba u mbwo a ngwiiyà, waa bafuur abà. Bamwɛy bamɛɛy nkwaaŋ. Ba bàkyer atɔn naa batsuuŋ, ntɔn ba bàwɛl ngwiiyà aŋàsöön ubwaŋ.
HEB 11:36 Bumwɛy bàkyer atoo, bakäm an'füm, babäm in'siŋ, waa batɔɔm u bɔlokà.
HEB 11:37 Bumwɛy sye bàkyer atà in'kul, batsütsül a si, badwä a kɔm. Ba bàkyer ayöö, bàbwäärà ibaan a in'kɔk itàkal ibaan a ntab. Ba batsüŋ indiir mbɔɔn, bamɛɛy nkwaaŋ, bapɛ mpay.
HEB 11:38 Ntɔn mɛɛn màfàkal anki ubwaŋ ntɔn ba. Ba bàbulà muyöö u nsye a ipɔl, u myɔŋ, uboo a mɔɔ anà u mfwoo a mɛɛn.
HEB 11:39 Ba banswà, isàkal naa ba bàwɛl imbäl aŋàbwaŋ ntɔn làkwikilà aba, wɛɛ ba bàsàwal anki indiir kapɛ Nzam ilää.
HEB 11:40 Ntɔn Nzam kàbön undiir aŋàsöön ntɔn bi, ba bàlàkɔlà anki bàŋàkwo ukɔɔn bi.
HEB 12:1 Akà bi sye, baar ibàŋàdiŋà a un'kàbɔ a ambäl, wɛy bi iwɔm undiir wanswà akapaa buur u dwaan abi, sin sin man'be màminääm mà, anà bi itsumà unsà muküünà ntiin bàmilɔ̈ɔ̈m.
HEB 12:2 Wɛy mii abi iler akà Yɛsu mpɛl, nde mbuur kàswaal làkwikilà anà afàkölà la. Nde kàtön un'sak kàkäl nde awà, waa kàkyey kulunsi ukɔɔn aman nswɛn a nkweel a tub ayi anà kàbwaay u kɔɔ ibaal a kir imwol a Nzam.
HEB 12:3 Inye, làyɔbà mbuur awà kàkäŋ mpem kusà a mbaaŋ a tub ayinà yà baar a man'be, ntɔn bɛ làkɔ̈ɔ̈n ayɔn anà làkɔ̈ɔ̈n akwamà.
HEB 12:4 Ntɔn ngwiy abɛ anà man'be, bɛ ŋàtànwaan anki tii an'kil ityaŋà.
HEB 12:5 Anà bɛ làkyàdiimà ndɛɛl kàlapɛ Nzam asànaa akà baan: « Mwan amɛ, twon an'bɛy ngweey a Mwol, twon an'kwaam ndür isàkal naa nde wàmukapɛlà.
HEB 12:6 Ntɔn Mwol afàweey mbuur ukwen nde, nde afàkam an'füm mwan wanswà ufàwal nde asànaa mwan ande. »
HEB 12:7 Mpay làmànà bɛ yi yà ntɔn musuub bɛ. Nzam afàlawal asànaa baan. Nkye we anà mwan mpa ufun'weey taarànde?
HEB 12:8 Isàkal naa bɛ ntaaŋàmbar làfàwal anki asànaa bàfàwal baan banswà, iswaŋà naa bɛ làbà baan a mbɔ̈, kà baan a bɔr anki.
HEB 12:9 Bi bàkäl anà ataaràbi bàmɛɛn: ba bàfipaa ntaaŋàmbar anà bi ba bàfapaa làzir. Waa kamanà Taa a dweelà, nkye bi bun'wem anki ntɔn muwal mɔ̈ɔ̈?
HEB 12:10 Ataaràbi bipɛɛ ntaaŋàmbar u taaŋ ikikye, asànaa bàkweenà ba ŋakwo. Wɛɛ Nzam afipà ntaaŋàmbar ntɔn ubwaŋ abi, ntɔn bi ikäl bàŋin'kyɛɛl asànaa Nde.
HEB 12:11 Mpal ifàwal bi ntaaŋàmbar, ya kà ifàkal un'sak anki u taaŋ alan, wɛɛ ngyɛb. Wɛɛ ungöngö, ya ifàtwey mbɛŋ a duu anà yàbalàbal akà baar bàfàwal ya.
HEB 12:12 Kyakin, làseen an'kɔɔ abɛ màŋàyɔn anà an'bwaaŋ abɛ màŋàkàkwɛɛr.
HEB 12:13 Làböl myäy aswalaa ntɔn in'kɔl abɛ, ntɔn làkɔl ibweel làkɔ̈ɔ̈n abɔɔ, wɛɛ la làkɔɔrà.
HEB 12:14 Làkyer ngwal mukal unsà duu anà baar banswà, anà mukal unsà un'kyɛɛl. Ntɔn, un'kyɛɛl usàkɔɔn, mbuur mwɛy asàman Mwol watɛy.
HEB 12:15 Làkäl kà ikyɛɛŋ naa mbuur mwɛy ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akal u nsà a kab a ngway a Nzam, naa akà un'swɛy mwɛy wàbuul ukɔ̈ɔ̈n amɛn, ukɔ̈ɔ̈n ayɛl ntɔn mutwaal lingyoomà anà mutay baar mbɔɔn.
HEB 12:16 Làkäl kà ikyɛɛŋ naa akà aŋàŋingyäy mwɛy itàkal un'bɛɛy mwɛy ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akal, asànaa Isawu kàyälà nde inswɛm ande ntɔn bisaa.
HEB 12:17 Ntɔn, bɛ làkyàyöb naa ungö, umpal kàkwen nde muwal nsaak a taarànde, nde bàkyer un'piy, anà nde kàmɛn anki ipöl musɔɔm an'kyän a taarànde, itàkal naa nde ya kàleŋ anà nsaaŋ u mii.
HEB 12:18 Bɛ, bɛ làsin anki apà indiir ban'kwo muba, asànaa mɔŋ anà mbaa aŋàlɛɛmà, làpib, mpib, un'pöb a ngwal,
HEB 12:19 saay a mfuŋ anà làso a ndaa. Baar bàwem unkiiŋ awà, bàkwen anki mufàwem wa.
HEB 12:20 Ntɔn ba bàkwe anki mukaŋ mpem ntɔn nswɛɛŋ yi: « Mbuur wanswà asàba mɔŋ, itàkal ntsür, bàsun'dwa a in'kul. »
HEB 12:21 Ndaa ayi yàkäl yà bɔɔmà mbɔɔn, waa Mɔsɛ kàtɛn naa: « Mɛ in'wà unsà bɔɔmà mbɔɔn anà matɛɛr! »
HEB 12:22 Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làkyàsin tsütsü apà mɔŋ a Siyɔnà anà apà bul a Nzam a mɔ̈ɔ̈, Yɛlusàlɛm a du, anà nsaab a nsaab a akyeey
HEB 12:23 abà kà un'kyɔm. Bɛ, bɛ làkyàsin apà nköŋ a baan a nswɛm, abà ikɔb aba byàŋàsɔn u du, yà Nzam, un'tsüül a nsaŋ a baar banswà, anà yà an'dweelà a baar a balàbal bàbulà bàŋàkwo.
HEB 12:24 Bɛ, bɛ làkyàsin apà Yɛsu, mfurbo a nkwà akün, anà yà an'kil ande màfàtɛn ubwaŋàbwaŋ màŋasöön mà Abɛl.
HEB 12:25 Làkäl kà ikyɛɛŋ, twon lan'tɔn muwem mbuur awà ayäämà anà bɛ. Ntɔn, isàkal naa ba bàsɔrà anki u ntaŋàmbar umpal bàtön ba muwem mbuur kàweeyà ba u mɛɛn, abun, bi sye isàsɔrà anki, isàkal naa bi, bi kan'pà ngö akà mbuur awà kiweeyà fà du.
HEB 12:26 Nde mbuur kàni mɛɛn utaaŋ alanà u mbwo a ndaa ande, wàmupà ilää ki apanà: « U mbalà asin, mɛ in'yàfàni kà nà mɛɛn mpɛl anki, wɛɛ sye anà du. »
HEB 12:27 Ngɔk yi, « umbalà a asin », ikyäänà ndiimà a indiir byanswà byàfànini u mɛɛn bàkyer, ntɔn waa isàsaal nà indiir mpa byàfàni.
HEB 12:28 Ntɔn bi ifàwal imwol mpa kyàfànini, wɛy bi ikäär kab a ngway alà. U mbwo a la, wɛy bi isyääl Nzam mukun'pà un'sak, unsà unkyeey anà bɔɔmà.
HEB 12:29 Ntɔn Nzam abi wà mbaa ifàkuuŋ.
HEB 13:1 Làläb mukwen bɛ a bɛ.
HEB 13:2 Twon lan'diimà muwal baar ubwaŋ. Ntɔn ya, bàmbɔɔn bàwɛl akyeey ukɔɔn ayöb.
HEB 13:3 Làyɔbà baar abà u bɔlokà, asànaa bɛ làbà u bɔlokà sye anà ba. Làyɔbà baar abà unsà mpay, ntɔn bɛ sye làbye anà ndür asànaa ba.
HEB 13:4 Wɛy bɔr làkäl làlàkoo akà baar banswà anà mbiin ikɔ̈ɔ̈n akal udu a itäb, ntɔn Nzam asàtsul mbar a baar a inswem anà bà ipasàsɛ.
HEB 13:5 Wɛy ukwen a ngim bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n abilà u nkääl abɛ, làkyey undiir làwà bɛ awa, ntɔn Nzam ŋakwo kàtɛn naa: « Mɛ insawɛy anki, mɛ in'sakɔɔb anki akà àkikye! »
HEB 13:6 Kyakin, bi itɛn unsà kam lanswà naa: « Mwol wà un'baay amɛ, mɛ bɔɔmà undiir mwɛy in'sàman anki. Ininà mbuur kan'kwo mukan'kyer? »
HEB 13:7 Làyɔbà baar bàlayaalà, bàlakyäänà ndaa a Nzam. Làyɔbà naa mɔ̈ɔ̈ aba kàkäl aben anà nkweel aba yàkäl aben, anà làyweel làkwikilà aba.
HEB 13:8 Yɛsu Klistɔ wà ifà imwɛy, yweenà, ŋàbà, anà mbul a in'tye.
HEB 13:9 Twon lan'pà mbwo naa an'lɔɔŋ ingyey mà ifà ifà màlabwiy ndwaŋ. Ntɔn yà ubwaŋ naa mpem ikäl ngwal u mbwo a kab a ngway, wɛɛ kà u mbwo a isaa mpa byàpɛ akà bweel mwɛy akà baar bàfàsyääl ya asànaa un'kɔɔn.
HEB 13:10 Bi ibye anà mɛsà a ibɔɔn, wɛɛ angaŋ bàfàsal uboo a idwà ikɔ̈b adyà isaa bàpɛ an'kab kyatɛy.
HEB 13:11 Ntɔn in'twaŋ a ntsür, ayà ufàsyen undweer a angaŋ an'kil amya uboo a idwà ntɔn ndwääl a man'be, mya bàfàfub u nsà a bul.
HEB 13:12 Kyakin Yɛsu sye kàkü u nsà a bul, ntɔn mubuul baar bàŋin'kyɛɛl u mbwo a an'kil ande ŋakwo.
HEB 13:13 Abun, bi ikyà u nsà a bul mukàbwey anà nde, anà mukyey musɛn un'tɛr a nswɛn kàmɛn nde.
HEB 13:14 Ntɔn u mɛɛn pà bi ibye anki anà bul ipepey, wɛɛ bi ibàmuleŋ bul làyàyà.
HEB 13:15 U mbwo a Yɛsu, wɛy bi ipɛ akà Nzam, ukɔɔn ayɔn, nsyäŋà abi asànaa ibɔɔn, iswaŋà naa an'kab a ndaa ifàtoo u mun a baar bàfàsyäŋà ikɔb ande.
HEB 13:16 Twon lan'diimà mukyer ndaa aŋàbwaŋ anà mutà ibay, ntɔn ibɔɔn a tub abi byàfàpà Nzam un'sak.
HEB 13:17 Làkäl anà unkyeey akà antwasà abɛ, lapɛ làzir, ntɔn ba bàfàler mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ, ntɔn ba bàsàtal un'lɔn awa akà Nzam. Abun, ba ban'kwo musal anà un'sak, kà unsà uŋün anki, undiir mpa uyàkal u bweel abɛ.
HEB 13:18 Làyamà ntɔn bi, ntɔn bi ibye anà kam mukal anà an'kyän aŋàpɔŋà anà bi ikwen mukal anà nkääl aŋàbwaŋ unsà indiir byanswà.
HEB 13:19 Mɛ amalàlɔm, làkyer ya apanà, ntɔn Nzam ukyer naa mɛ in'yàfurà agyägyä akà bɛ.
HEB 13:20 Wɛy naa Nzam, awà ntwà a duu anà kàwiiy uboo a akü Mwol abi Yɛsu, awà kàbulà undweer a aseey a in'kɔk, u mbwo a an'kil a nkwà mwɛy yà mbul a in'tye,
HEB 13:21 wɛy nde kàlabuul bàŋàkwo mukyer yanswà yàŋàbwaŋ ntɔn mukyer ukwen ande, wɛy nde ukyer amu bi undiir ufàkyey nde, u mbwo a Yɛsu Klistɔ, akà nde làkoo làkäl mbul a in'tye. Wöwöö!
HEB 13:22 Atɔŋ, mɛ amàlalɔm, làwem unsà nkääŋ a mpem ndaa a mpɛɛl a ngwal yi! Ntɔn mɛ amàlasöön ikökö.
HEB 13:23 Làyöb naa un'tɔŋ abi Tumàtɛ bàkyun'tsuuŋ. Isàkal naa nde kan'yà làgyägyä, mɛ in'yàlaler anà nde.
HEB 13:24 Lapɛ antwasà abɛ mbɔr anà aŋin'kyɛɛl banswà. Baar abà kà Itali bàmàlapà mbɔr.
HEB 13:25 Wɛy kab a ngway a Nzam làkäl anà bɛ banswà!
JAM 1:1 Mɛ Zyak, un'syääl a Nzam anà Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ, an'pà mbɔr akà in'sɛŋ myàkwem aŋiyweel myàpää u mɛɛn manswà.
JAM 1:2 Atɔŋ amɛ, làwɛl unsà mpem aŋàbwaŋ nsii yanswà ifàlayeel,
JAM 1:3 ntɔn bɛ làkyàyöb, isàkal naa làkwikilà abɛ làngwal kusà a nsii, nsii ayi ifàlabuul bàŋàtsim mbɔɔn.
JAM 1:4 Wɛɛ, wɛy naa muküünà abɛ usyäl ubwaŋàbwaŋ, ntɔn bɛ làkäl bàŋàmaay anà bàŋàkwo, ukɔɔn too.
JAM 1:5 Isàkal naa umwɛy uboo a bɛ an'yeerà matɛy, wɛy nde ulɔ̈m ma akà Nzam awà afàpà akà baar banswà u mpem aŋàbwaŋ ukɔɔn an'pɛl.
JAM 1:6 Wɛɛ, wɛy nde ulɔ̈m anà làkwikilà, ukɔɔn asà nkyɛɛr. Ntɔn mbuur afàsà nkyɛɛr wà asànaa ibɔ a an'dà a ngyäl ufàsɛn un'pöb.
JAM 1:7 Mbuur a tub awà twon kan'si naa nde asàwal undiir akà Mwol,
JAM 1:8 ntɔn nde wà bölà a bölà anà we amà an'kyän mɔ̈ɔ̈l unsà ndaa ande yanswà.
JAM 1:9 Wɛy un'tɔŋ awà ŋàlàmbwà umɛn un'sak umpal kun'sɛɛn Nzam,
JAM 1:10 anà ŋun'naaŋ umɛn un'sak umpal kun'tyeey Nzam, ntɔn nde asàlyaaŋ asànaa iful a an'ywaŋ.
JAM 1:11 Ntɔn taaŋ lan'yàsɛnà anà ipar a mbaa a mwäänà ande, kyan'kuuŋ kite, iful akya kyan'bwà, anà ubwaŋ a kya ban'wà. Mbwo mwɛy sye usàkal ŋun'naaŋ unsà isal ande.
JAM 1:12 Un'sak akà mbuur afànwaan unsà nsii, ntɔn, isàkal naa nde kan'böŋ, nde asàwal mpà a mɔ̈ɔ̈ ayà bàbön mupà akà baar Bàfun'kwen.
JAM 1:13 Mbuur twon kan'tɛn, isàkal naa nde kan'bwà unsà ndɛb, naa: « Ndɛb amɛ yi yan'fà akà Nzam ». Ntɔn Nzam ukwe anki naa ube bun'lwɛb, anà nde ŋakwo ufàlwab anki mbuur.
JAM 1:14 Mbuur mbuur afàbwà u ndɛb a ngyööm a mpem ande ŋakwo, waa ya yun'syen anà yun'bwiy.
JAM 1:15 Ngyööm a mpem isàpfɛy, ya ifàbɔr man'be. Man'be màsàyɛl, ma màfàbɔr ukwà.
JAM 1:16 Atɔŋ amɛ bànkwen, twon lan'bwà ndwaŋ:
JAM 1:17 kab a ntal lanswà anà kab aŋàkwo lanswà màfàfà du, akà Taa a pɛɛlà. Amu nde nsɔɔmà yatɛy, itàkal naa taaŋ lan'nwaan anà nsöŋ.
JAM 1:18 Nde ŋakwo kàkwen mukipà mɔ̈ɔ̈ u mbwo a ndaa ande yàndandaa, ntɔn bi ikäl bàtàtwɛb unsà ikyeer ande byanswà.
JAM 1:19 Atɔŋ amɛ bànkwen, bɛ làkyàyɔb naa bɛ làbà aŋun'yɛnà. Wɛy naa akà mbuur mwɛy ukɔ̈ɔ̈n akal anà ulɛy muwem, wɛɛ nde ukäl anà ulɛy mutɛn anà muwem nkyɛl,
JAM 1:20 ntɔn nkyɛl a mbuur ifàkyer anki balàbal a Nzam.
JAM 1:21 Kyakin, làpiy làbiin lanswà anà un'fur a nkyɛl, làwɛl unsà làbɔ̈ɔ̈n lanswà ndaa a Nzam bàkön u mpem abɛ, ntɔn ya yan'kwo mukàlatswà mɔ̈ɔ̈.
JAM 1:22 Wɛɛ làsyääl ndaa, kà nà muwem ya mpɛl anki, naa tɛy bɛ làbàmukur bɛ ŋakwo.
JAM 1:23 Kyakin, isàkal naa mbuur kan'wem ndaa a Nzam, wɛɛ nde ya usyääl anki, nde wà asànaa mbuur akalerà unsà làman anà kan'man ntabwey ande asànaa awà nde.
JAM 1:24 Ungö kan'may nde muler, nde kan'kyà anà abwà adiimà naa nde kàkäl aben.
JAM 1:25 Wɛɛ mbuur afàsà mii ande ubwaŋàbwaŋ unsà Un'kɔɔn aŋàkwo, Un'kɔɔn a insaay, anà afàsyääl wa, kà nà uwem wa mpɛl anki, wɛɛ usyääl wa, mbuur awun asàkal mbuur a un'sak unsà ndaa usàkyer nde.
JAM 1:26 Isàkal naa mbuur mwɛy afàsi naa nde we anà inzaam, wɛɛ nde ufàkyekyekà anki ntɛɛn ande, nde afàkur mpem ande ŋakwo: inzaam ande kyà bunàbun.
JAM 1:27 Inzaam a ndandaa anà ikɔ̈ɔ̈n too u mii a Taa Nzam aki: ubay itii anà akweel adim unsà mpay aba, anà mukal unsà igyɛɛŋ ntɔn mukɔɔn abwà unsà làbiin a mɛɛn mà.
JAM 2:1 Atɔŋ amɛ, bɛ baar làbye anà làkwikilà amu Mwol abi wàlàkoo, Yɛsu Klistɔ, twon lan'kal anà un'kɔl aŋayɔŋ.
JAM 2:2 Abun, bi itàsi naa mbuur mwɛy kan'yàbilà uboo a nköŋ abɛ, nde kan'bwaar mpɛr a wɔl anà ipfɛy aŋàbwaŋ, anà isàkal sye naa ŋàlàmbwà mwɛy kan'bwaar ipfɛy a mbiin kan'yàbilà,
JAM 2:3 isàkal naa bɛ lan'düül muwal mbuur kan'bwaar ipfɛy aŋàbwaŋ, anà lan'tɛn a nde naa: « Ngye, bwaay pà kà ikal aŋàbwaŋ ki », wɛɛ akà ŋàlàmbwà, bɛ lan'tɛn naa: « Ngye, kyen kakäl umbär kunà. » Mbalà yumwɛy naa: « Kyen kaswen kunà kà ikal in'fàsà mɛ in'kɔl. »
JAM 2:4 Nkye abun bɛ kà un'kɔl aŋàyↄŋ lan'kyer anki? Nkye bɛ kà làbà ambak a kɔɔrà anki?
JAM 2:5 Atɔŋ amɛ bànkwen, làwem: nkye aŋàlàmbwà kà Nzam kasɔ̈ɔ̈l anki u mii a baar ntɔn mukabuul aŋin'naaŋ unsà làkwikilà anà muwal kwal a Imwol akyà kàpɛ nde ilää mupà akà baar bàfun'kwen?
JAM 2:6 Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làduum làkoo a aŋàlàmbwà. Nkye kà ŋin'naaŋ anki bàfàlapà mpay? Nkye kà ba anki sye bàfàlasyen u làbay a nsaŋ?
JAM 2:7 Nkye kà ba anki bàfàbɛy ikↄb a ntwɛn bàfàbel udu a bɛ?
JAM 2:8 Inye, isàkal naa bɛ làfàlab kiin a Un'kɔɔn, asànaa itɛɛnà Ndaa Aŋàsɔn naa: « Ngye asàkwen mbääb angye asànaa ngye ŋakwo », bɛ làfàkyer ubwaŋ.
JAM 2:9 Wɛɛ isàkal naa bɛ làfàkyer un'kɔl aŋàyↄŋ, bɛ làfàkyer man'be, anà Un'kɔɔn afàlatsüül mbar ntɔn bɛ làfàbɛy wa.
JAM 2:10 Ntɔn, isàkal naa mbuur mwɛy afàlab Un'kɔɔn wanswà, wɛɛ nde afàbɛy ikal imwɛy, apan nde afàbɛy wa wanswà.
JAM 2:11 Ntɔn, Nzam kàtɛn naa: « Twon an'tà inswem », nde sye kàtɛn naa: « Twon an'dwa ». Isàkal naa ngye atɛ anki inswem, wɛɛ ngye an'dwa mbuur, yöb naa ngye an'bɛy Un'kɔɔn.
JAM 2:12 Làtɛn anà làkyer asànaa baar bàfatsüül nsaŋ aba u mbwo a un'kɔɔn afàpà insaay.
JAM 2:13 Ntɔn, Nzam usàwem anki ngyɛb mpal usàtsul nde nsaŋ a mbuur mpa afàwem baar bumwɛy ngyɛb. Wɛɛ ngyɛb ifàwal iböŋ u ntsüül a nsaŋ.
JAM 2:14 Atɔŋ amɛ, ndöŋ nà mbuur mutɛn naa: « Mɛ in'we anà làkwikilà », isàkal naa nde isal byatɛy? Nkye làkwikilà alà lan'kwo lun'tsü mɔ̈ɔ̈?
JAM 2:15 Bi itàwal naa un'tɔŋ mwɛy wàbaal itàkal wun'kaar, kà we anà undiir a bwaar itàkal wàdyà anki ilä byanswà,
JAM 2:16 wɛɛ umwɛy uboo a bɛ utɛn a nde naa: « Kyen unsà duu, bwaar ipfɛy a mpye anà dyà ubwaŋàbwaŋ », wɛɛ nde akà undiir mwɛy kun'pɛ anki ntɔn ndür ande, apan ndöŋ nà?
JAM 2:17 Ya yà abwɛy sye ntɔn làkwikilà: isàkal naa la lan'kɔɔn isal, la là undiir aŋàkwà la ŋakwo.
JAM 2:18 Wɛɛ mbuur mwɛy asàtɛn naa: « Ngye, ngye awe anà làkwikilà, wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ in'we anà isal! Nswɛŋ làkwikilà angye làkɔ̈ɔ̈n isal! Wɛɛ akà mɛ, mɛ in'sàswaŋ làkwikilà amɛ u mbwo a isal amɛ.
JAM 2:19 Nkye ngye afàsà làkwikilà naa Nzam wà mwɛy? Yà ubwaŋ. In'sɔŋà sye myàfàsà làkwikilà anà myàkyer afàtɛɛr! »
JAM 2:20 Insil a mbuur, nkye ngye akwen muyöb naa làkwikilà làkɔ̈ɔ̈n isal ndöŋ latɛy?
JAM 2:21 Nkye taaràbi Abàlam bun'twey anki wàbalàbal u mbwo a isal ande, mpal kàkäb nde mwan ande Isak udu a mɛsà a ibɔɔn?
JAM 2:22 Ngye an'man naa làkwikilà anà isal ande byan'kyà mbwo mwɛy: ntɔn isal ande, làkwikilà ande lan'mɛnà làŋàkwo.
JAM 2:23 Abà, ndaa bàsön yi unsà Ndaa Aŋàsɔn yàkyer akwo: « Abàlam kàsi làkwikilà akà Nzam, waa Nzam kun'twey wàbalàbal. » Anà bun'beelà un'sam a Nzam.
JAM 2:24 Bɛ lan'man naa mbuur an'kwo bun'twey wàbalàbal ntɔn isal, kà nà ntɔn làkwikilà mpɛl anki.
JAM 2:25 Ya yàkäl abun sye ntɔn Rayab, un'kaar a pasàsɛ. Nkye kà ntɔn isal ande anki waa nde kàtoo wàbalàbal, ntɔn kàwɛl nde akyeey a Isàlɛl anà katwey nde mbwo asin?
JAM 2:26 Asànaa ndür ikɔ̈ɔ̈n un'swey yàŋàkwà, abun sye, làkwikilà làkɔ̈ɔ̈n isal làŋàkwà.
JAM 3:1 Atɔŋ amɛ, twon lan'kal bàmbɔɔn mulɔŋ. Bɛ làkyàyöb naa nsaŋ abi alɔɔŋ isàkal yà ngwal.
JAM 3:2 Ntɔn bi banswà ifàtà an'pfürà. Isàkal naa mbuur mwɛy ufàtà anki pfürà unsà ntɛɛn ande, nde wà mbuur mwɛy wàŋàkwo anà wàŋàtsim muyaal ndür ande yanswà.
JAM 3:3 Isàkal naa bi kan'bäm un'siŋ u mun a mpoonà ntɔn ya iläb ukwen a bi, bi kan'kwo sye iyaal ndür aya yanswà.
JAM 3:4 Làler sye an'swà: itàkal naa ma mà uteer mbɔɔn, anà in'pöb a ngwal myàsiinà ma, kà indiir imwɛy kyan'swà bàfàbel naa kuvɛrnay laa isyen kya ma mper ukwen kaptɛn.
JAM 3:5 Ifà imwɛy sye, làlem là kitiir a ndür imwɛy. Wɛɛ la lye anà uyɔl mutɛn ndaa akölàköl. Làsii làmwɛy asànaa kimbaa ifàkuuŋ kya ndwaŋ a kölàköl!
JAM 3:6 Làlem sye là mbaa. La là kiin a ube banswà. La là uboo a itiir a ndür abi anà làfàsà làbiin u ndür yanswà, làfàkuuŋ mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi wanswà. La ŋakwo sye làŋàkuŋà a mbaa a nsye a mbaa.
JAM 3:7 Mbuur kan'kwo mukwaam ntsür a umpɔr, itàkal nɛn, itàkal ntäy, itàkal nsö.
JAM 3:8 Wɛɛ akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki mukwaam làlem! La là bölà a bölà, là undiir mwɛy wà ube anà làŋàyɔl a idyà ifàtwaal ukwà.
JAM 3:9 U mbwo a la, bi ifàsaak Mwol anà Taa. Anà u mbwo a la sye, bi ifàküül baar abà kàkyer Nzam kà ifà ande.
JAM 3:10 Nsaak anà un'küül yàfàtoo mun nsil nà wa. Atɔŋ amɛ, ya ikwo anki mukal abà!
JAM 3:11 Nkye ntwà a an'dà ifàtwey an'dà a ntsà anà màbuul mun nsil nà wa?
JAM 3:12 Atɔŋ amɛ, nkye un'te a fige afàbɔr mbɛŋ a ɔlivɛ, itàkal un'te a vin nkye afàbɔr mbɛŋ a fige? Ifuunà a an'dà a muŋ ikwo anki sye itwey an'dà a ntsà.
JAM 3:13 Nà awe an'yeerà anà un'yɛnà uboo a bɛ? Wɛy naa nde uswɛŋ ma unsà nkääl anà làbɔ̈ɔ̈n anà an'yeerà ande.
JAM 3:14 Wɛɛ, isàkal naa bɛ, bɛ làbà anà mpem aŋàyɔl a un'köl a buul anà dweelà a an'sye, twon lan'swaŋ ngaal, twon lan'pà ndandaa mpay u mbwo a loor abɛ.
JAM 3:15 An'yeerà amà kà man'fà du anki, ma mà màmɛɛn, mà ntsür, min'sɔŋà.
JAM 3:16 Ntɔn ikal akyà un'köl anà an'sye, an'pfürà anà ube bà ifà ifà byà paa sye.
JAM 3:17 Wɛɛ an'yeerà a du màŋàtàpɔŋà, ungö mà duu, mà làbɔ̈ɔ̈n, mà un'tüüb, màŋàyɔl a ngyɛb anà mbɛŋ aŋàbwaŋ, mpa amye anà un'kɔl aŋàyↄŋ anà mpem yweel.
JAM 3:18 Imbɛŋ a balàbal kyàŋàkɔn unsà duu akà baar bàfàkyer ndaa a duu.
JAM 4:1 Nkir anà ngwiy uboo abɛ yan'fà ken? Nkye kà ntɔn ilään byàfànwaan uboo a ndür abɛ anki?
JAM 4:2 Bɛ làfàyɔm mpem anà bɛ làfàwal anki undiir. Bɛ làbà adwää anà aŋun'köl, anà bɛ làkwe anki muwal iböŋ. Bɛ làfànwaan anà làfàtwal an'sye. Bɛ undiir watɛy, ntɔn bɛ làfàlɔm anki.
JAM 4:3 Kya bɛ làsàlɔm, bɛ làfàwal anki undiir, ntɔn ndɔ̈ɔ̈m abɛ yà ube: ntɔn indiir làfàlɔm bɛ, bɛ bya làfàsyääl ntɔn ilään abɛ.
JAM 4:4 Bɛ aŋinswem! Nkye bɛ làyöb anki naa ukwen a indiir a mɛɛn bà un'yiiŋ a Nzam? Abun, mbuur usàkwen mukal un'sam a mɛɛn, nde kan'bulà un'yiiŋ a Nzam.
JAM 4:5 Nkye bɛ làsii naa abunàbun waa Ndaa Aŋàsɔn itɛɛnà naa: « Nzam akwen unsà un'köl Dweelà kàsi nde amu bi. »
JAM 4:6 Wɛɛ Nzam afipà kab a ngway làŋàsöön, ntɔn Ndaa Aŋàsɔn itɛn naa: « Nzam afàmbäär aŋun'yɔl, wɛɛ nde afàswaŋ ubwaŋ ande akà aŋàlàbɔ̈ɔ̈n. »
JAM 4:7 Abun, làpɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ akà Nzam, wɛɛ làmbäär ileŋ, waa kya isàtiin ukwɛl apà bɛ.
JAM 4:8 Làsin tsütsü apà Nzam, waa nde usàsin tsütsü apà bɛ. Bɛ baar a man'be, làywɛy an'kɔɔ abɛ, anà làpöŋ mpem abɛ, baar a mpem yweel!
JAM 4:9 Làyweer mpay abɛ, làsi un'saabà anà làlel. Wɛy naa an'sɛ abɛ màbulà ilel anà un'sak abɛ ubulà ngyɛb!
JAM 4:10 Làkäl anà làbɔ̈ɔ̈n kusà a Mwol waa nde usàlasɛɛn.
JAM 4:11 Atɔŋ, twon lan'twe bɛ a bɛ. Mbuur afàtwe un'tɔŋ ande, itàkal naa afàtsul nsaŋ ande, nde wàmusaal Un'kɔɔn anà mutsüül wa mbar. Kyekà isàkal naa ngye an'tsüül Un'kɔɔn mbar, ngye afàkal anki un'syääl a wa, wɛɛ ngye awà ntɛɛn.
JAM 4:12 Mbuur mwɛy mpɛl afàpà un'kɔɔn anà nde mpɛl sye awà ntɛɛn. Nde mpɛl kan'kwo mutswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà mudwa wa. Ngye, ngye awà nà mutsüül mbääb angye mbar?
JAM 4:13 Abun, bɛ baar làfàtɛn naa: « Ŋàbà, itàkal naa nkàswà, bi iyàkyà bul là. Bi kwo ikàkyer mbul mwɛy, bi isàkàtà an'yà, anà bi isàkàwal ngim. »
JAM 4:14 Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làyöb anki akà ikikye naa nkàswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ asàkal aben, ntɔn bɛ làbà asànaa un'swey kan'mɛnà, ungö a kitaaŋ kan'fàyaalà.
JAM 4:15 Le, bɛ làlàtɛn naa: « Isàkal naa Mwol kan'kwen, bi isàkal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà bi isàkyer abà itàkal abunà. »
JAM 4:16 Wɛɛ apanà bɛ làbàmuswaŋ ngaal unsà uyɔl abɛ. Uyɔl atubàbà bube.
JAM 4:17 Abun, isàkal naa mbuur mwɛy akyàyöb mukyer ubwaŋ, wɛɛ isàkal naa nde ba ukyer anki, apan nde kan'bwà unsà man'be.
JAM 5:1 Abun, bɛ aŋun'naaŋ, làlel anà in'kwɛŋ, ntɔn mpay iyàyà udu a bɛ!
JAM 5:2 Un'naaŋ abɛ wàŋàpɔɔn, ipfɛy abɛ in'swab myàkyàdyàdyà.
JAM 5:3 Wɔl abɛ anà ngim abɛ yàŋàbwà an'tär, an'tär ama màsàlatɛɛl imbäl ibe, ma màsàdyà in'twaŋ abɛ asànaa mbaa. Bɛ làkyàköŋà in'naaŋ u ntsüü a taaŋ!
JAM 5:4 Le, bɛ làkyàtɔn mufur baar bàfàsal uboo a an'ywaŋ abɛ. Làfur aba alà làmusà in'kwɛŋ, anà Nzam, Mwol aŋità, akyàwem in'tär a abweel abà.
JAM 5:5 Mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ u mɛɛn kan'kal aŋàyɔl a indiir a ntwɛn anà un'sak. Ndür abɛ làkyàbuul may may asànaa ntsür adilà ilä mukyɛl un'kwaal.
JAM 5:6 Bɛ làpɛ ntaaŋàmbar anà làdwä mbuur a balàbal. Nde in'peen kàlasi anki.
JAM 5:7 Abun, atɔŋ, làkäl anà nkääŋ a mpem tii u ngyeel a Mwol. Làler un'lem a an'ywaŋ: nde afàdil imbɛŋ a mfun ifàtoo u mɛɛn ukɔɔn ayɔn tii mpal usàwal nde mbɛŋ atàtwɛb anà yàngöngö.
JAM 5:8 Bɛ sye, làkäl anà nkääŋ a mpem. Làkäl anà mpem aŋàtsim ntɔn ngyeel a Mwol yà tsütsü.
JAM 5:9 Atɔŋ, twon lan'kal anà buul u mpem bɛ a bɛ, ntɔn mutiin mukal kusà a làbay a nsaŋ. Le, ntɛɛn wà u mun a mbwo!
JAM 5:10 Atɔŋ, unsà ndaa iler mpay anà nkääŋ a mpem, mbaan alab yà yà aŋangɔɔm abà bàtɛn kà ikɔb a Mwol.
JAM 5:11 Làler: bi ifàkan aŋàmun'küünà. Bɛ làkyàwem làsaŋ a nkääŋ a mpem a Yɔb anà bɛ làkyàyöb ndaa kun'kyer Mwol, ntɔn Mwol wàŋàyɔl a mpem a ukwen anà ngyɛb.
JAM 5:12 Wɛɛ unsà ya yanswà, atɔŋ amɛ, twon lan'dyà kyän itàkal u du, itàkal u mɛɛn, itàkal kà aben. Wɛy naa: « Inye » abɛ làkäl inye anà « Aay » abɛ làkäl aay, ntɔn bɛ làkɔɔn akwɛlà u mbar a Nzam.
JAM 5:13 Nkye umwɛy uboo a bɛ wà unsà mpay? Wɛy nde uyamà. Nkye nde wà unsà un'sak? Wɛy nde utɔ̈l an'diim.
JAM 5:14 Nkye wà anà mbuur uboo a bɛ awe anà ukyal? Wɛy nde ubel andweer a Ikööŋ, ntɔn ba bun'si u ngyamàkà, waa ungö bun'tsuul may udu a un'tswe ande kà ikↄb a Mwol.
JAM 5:15 Ngyamàkà a làkwikilà isàkɔɔr un'bɛy, Mwol akyer asumbaar. Isàkal naa nde we anà man'be, bàkyerà asun'dwääl ma.
JAM 5:16 Làkyey man'be abɛ bɛ a bɛ anà làyamà bɛ a bɛ, ntɔn bɛ làkɔɔrà. Ngyamàkà a mbuur a balàbal ifàsal ngwal mbɔɔn.
JAM 5:17 Ɛli kàkäl mbuur asànaa bi, nde kàyamà unsà muküünà naa mbul ukɔ̈ɔ̈n anɔ, wa sye kànɔ̈ anki u mɛɛn isii a mbul tär a ngɔn syaam.
JAM 5:18 Ungö, kàfàyamà nde, mbul kàkyer anɔ, mɛɛn màtwey imbɛŋ ama.
JAM 5:19 Atɔŋ amɛ, isàkal naa umwɛy uboo a bɛ wàŋàbwà ndwaŋ, ukwɛl anà ndandaa, wɛɛ mbuur asin kàmun'fuur,
JAM 5:20 làyöb naa ufuur mbuur a man'be u mbwo kàwɛy nde, yà mutswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande kà ukwà, anà mubiiŋ un'kàbɔ a man'be.
1PE 1:1 Mɛ Petɔlà, ntööm a Yɛsu Klistɔ, an'pà mbɔr akà baar kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l Nzam, bàfàkal u nsi a ingyey anà bàkyàpää u Pɔn, Ngalàtyà, Kapadɔs, Azi anà Bitini,
1PE 1:2 Taa Nzam kàlasɔ̈ɔ̈l kusà asànaa kàkwen nde, u mbwo a un'kyɛɛl a Dweelà, ntɔn bɛ làkäl anà unkyeey akà Yɛsu Klistɔ anà bàŋàpɔŋà u mbwo a an'kil ande. Wɛy kab a ngway anà duu màkäl mbɔɔn anà bɛ!
1PE 1:3 Wɛy nsaak ikäl akà Nzam, Taa a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ! Unsà ngyɛb ande yàkölàköl, nde kipɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ akün ntɔn bi ikäl anà làkyän a mɔ̈ɔ̈ u mbwo a ngwiiyà a Yɛsu Klistɔ uboo a akü,
1PE 1:4 ntɔn mudil kwal alà kàlɔ̈ɔ̈n Nzam ntɔn baar ande. Kwal alà làkwe anki làtay, itàkal làbü ŋingyäy, itàkal làpiy ntwɛn a la bwà. Nde wàmulɔ̈ɔ̈nà la u du ntɔn bɛ,
1PE 1:5 bɛ baar ukatii nde kà unkaak a ngwal ande u mbwo a làkwikilà, ntɔn ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈ ayà isàmɛnà kà ilä a ntsüü.
1PE 1:6 Kyakin, bɛ làbàŋàyɔl a un'sak, itàkal naa u kitaaŋ bɛ làbà u ngyɛb u mbwo a nsii ifà ifà.
1PE 1:7 Ntɔn ntal a làkwikilà abɛ làŋàsii yan'söön ntal a wɔl alà làfàtay itàkal naa la ban'fub u mbaa. Lakwikilà alà làsàwal nsyäŋà, làkoo anà ibyääl umpal usàmɛnà Yɛsu Klistɔ.
1PE 1:8 Bɛ làfàkwen Yɛsu Klistɔ ukɔɔn akun'man. Apanà sye bɛ làbàmusà làkwikilà amu nde itàkal naa bɛ ŋàtuman anki, anà bɛ làbàmufuur a un'sak ifà asin anà wàlàkoo,
1PE 1:9 ntɔn bɛ lan'wal isin a làkwikilà abɛ: ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ.
1PE 1:10 Aŋangɔɔm bàleŋ anà bàbaal pànsi pànsi ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈ ayi, anà ba bàtɛ ngɔɔm ntɔn kab a ngway alà kàlɔ̈ɔ̈n Nzam ntɔn bɛ.
1PE 1:11 Ba bàleŋà naa paŋà nà, naa sye ndaa nà isàkal asànaa kàkyään Dweelà a Klistɔ kàkäl uboo a ba, umpal kàkyään nde mpay isàkal akà Klistɔ kusà anà làkoo ande làsàyà ungö.
1PE 1:12 Nzam kàmɛɛy akà aŋangɔɔm naa isal aki kà kyàkäl ntɔn ba ŋakwo anki, wɛɛ ba kya bàkyerà ntɔn bɛ. Ntɔn, apanà indiir ibi, alɔɔŋ a Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ bàlakyäänà bya u mbwo a ngwal a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl kàtöm Nzam fà du. Akyeey, ba ŋakwo bàkwen musà ileer aba unsà bya.
1PE 1:13 Kyakin, làyöŋà an'kyän abɛ ntɔn isal, làkäl unsà làbɔ̈ɔ̈n, làsi làkyän abɛ lanswà unsà kab a ngway alà bàlatwääl kà ilä a mɛɛy a Yɛsu Klistɔ.
1PE 1:14 Asànaa baan a unkyeey, twon lan'lab ilään a ndür làkäl bɛ akyà umpal làkäl bɛ aŋàdiimà,
1PE 1:15 wɛɛ ifà imwɛy asànaa mbuur kàlabel wà in'kyɛɛl, wɛy bɛ làkäl bà in'kyɛɛl unsà nkääl abɛ yanswà,
1PE 1:16 ntɔn, bàsön naa: « Bɛ làsàkal bà ŋin'kyɛɛl, ntɔn mɛ in'wà aŋin'kyɛɛl. »
1PE 1:17 Wɛɛ isàkal naa bɛ làfàbeel naa Taa, mbuur awà afàtsul nsaŋ, ukɔɔn un'kɔl aŋàyↄŋ akà mbuur wanswà unsà isal ande, làkäl unsà bɔɔmà sye umpal làbà bɛ pà u mɛɛn.
1PE 1:18 Làyöb naa kà unsà indiir aŋàkwà anki, asànaa ngim, itàkal wɔl, waa bàlabeen unsà nkääl a ube làwɛl bɛ akà ataaràbɛ.
1PE 1:19 Aay, bɛ bàlabeen unsà an'kil a ntal a Klistɔ, asànaa mwan a un'kɔk akɔ̈ɔ̈n too itàkal làbiin,
1PE 1:20 awà bàtöm kusà mutàkyer du anà mɛɛn, anà bun'swɛŋ kà ilä a ntsüü ntɔn bɛ.
1PE 1:21 U mbwo a nde, bɛ làfàsà làkwikilà amu Nzam awà kun'wiiy uboo a akü, anà kun'pɛ làkoo, ntɔn làkwikilà anà làkyän abɛ màkäl amu Nzam.
1PE 1:22 Bɛ làpöŋ mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ u mbwo a unkyeey akà ndandaa, ntɔn bɛ làkwen bɛ a bɛ ukɔɔn akal ayà mpem yweel. Wɛy ukwen a mpem a pɛɛlà anà bà ipepey bàkäl uboo a bɛ.
1PE 1:23 Ntɔn bɛ bàlabör u mɔ̈ɔ̈ akün, kà u mbwo a imbɛŋ kyan'kwo mukwà anki, wɛɛ u mbwo a imbɛŋ mpa kyan'kwo mukwà, unsà ndaa a Nzam ayà mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà yà mbul a in'tye.
1PE 1:24 Ntɔn: mbuur wanswà wà asànaa un'lɛŋ aŋàyɔm, anà làkoo ande lanswà là asànaa iful a un'lɛŋ, un'lɛŋ usàyɔm, iful ande kyan'bwà,
1PE 1:25 wɛɛ ndaa a Mwol yà mbul a in'tye. Kyekà, ndaa ayi, yà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ alà bàlakyään.
1PE 2:1 Abun, làpiy nkyɛl yanswà, an'kwaar a ube manswà, mpem yweel yanswà, un'köl wanswà, anà ntwee yanswà.
1PE 2:2 Lànü bɛɛl aŋàpɔŋà là Ndaa asànaa baan a kɔɔ, ntɔn u mbwo a la, bɛ làyɛl ntɔn ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈.
1PE 2:3 Kyakin, « bɛ lan'kyey naa Mwol wà ubwaŋ. »
1PE 2:4 Làsin tsütsü apà nde, nkɔŋ a mɔ̈ɔ̈ ayà bàpiy baar, wɛɛ ya yàŋàsɔɔl anà yàntal kusà a Nzam.
1PE 2:5 Bɛ ŋakwo làbilà asànaa nkɔŋ a mɔ̈ɔ̈ u ntööŋ a Ndwà ufàkal Dweelà, ntɔn mukyer itsuŋ a angaŋ a Nzam, ntɔn mukun'pà ibɔɔn in'kyɛɛl abyà ufàkyey Nde u mbwo a Yɛsu Klistɔ.
1PE 2:6 Ntɔn bàsön u Ndaa Aŋàsɔn naa: « Le, mɛ an'sà nkɔŋ a twɛrà u Siyɔn, nkɔŋ a ntal ayà kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l mɛ. Mbuur awà asà làkyän amu ya, usàman anki nswɛn akà ikikye. »
1PE 2:7 Abun, ibyääl kye akà bɛ aŋàlàkwikilà, wɛɛ akà baar mpa abà aŋàlàkwikilà, « nkɔŋ ayà bàpiy atööŋ, yàbulà nkɔŋ a isin, nkɔŋ a twɛrà.
1PE 2:8 Ya yà nkɔŋ mwey bàfàböl baar, un'kul mwɛy afàbwiy baar. » Baar abà bàfàbwà ba, ntɔn ba bàkyàtɔn musà làkwikilà amu Ndaa. Awà undiir kàkwe mukayɛɛl.
1PE 2:9 Wɛɛ bɛ, bɛ làbà itwà aŋàsɔɔl, itsuŋ a angaŋ amfum, un'sɛŋ in'kyɛɛl, un'sɛŋ kàwɛl Nzam ntɔn mukal wànde. Nde kàlabel mutoo u làpib anà muman pɛɛlà ande là ubem, ntɔn bɛ làkàkyään isal ande byà ibaŋ.
1PE 2:10 Itaan, bɛ làkäl anki un'sɛŋ, wɛɛ apanà, bɛ làbà un'sɛŋ a Nzam. Bɛ baar mpa làwɛl nsyääm, wɛɛ apanà, bɛ làkyàwal nsyääm a Nzam.
1PE 2:11 Ankwen amɛ, mɛ amàlalɛɛl, asànaa alyaaŋ a mbwo anà angyey, twon lan'kal anà ilään a ndür abyà ifànwaan ità anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ.
1PE 2:12 Làkäl anà nkääl aŋàbwaŋ kusà a baar mpa abà Ayudà, ntɔn, unsà undiir nsil awà bàfàlatwee ba naa bɛ làbà baar abe, ba bàmɛn isal abɛ byàŋàbwaŋ anà ba bàsi Nzam làkoo kà ilä usàyà nde.
1PE 2:13 Làkäl anà unkyeey akà imfum a mɛɛn kyanswà, ntɔn Mwol, itàkal akà mfum awe anà ikɔ̈b a dudu,
1PE 2:14 itàkal akà an'kuvɛrnɔ̈ɔ̈r ufàtɔm nde mupà ntaaŋàmbar akà baar abe anà musyäŋà baar bàfàkyer ubwaŋ.
1PE 2:15 Ntɔn ba bà ukwen a Nzam naa bɛ làkyer ubwaŋ ntɔn mudübà min a insil mpa bàyöb akà undiir mwɛy.
1PE 2:16 Làkäl asànaa baar abye anà insaay, ukɔɔn asyääl kya asànaa nkümà ntɔn mufwe nkyɛl abɛ, wɛɛ làkyer asànaa asyääl a Nzam.
1PE 2:17 Làpɛ ibyääl akà baar banswà, lakwen atɔŋ abɛ, làyöb ikɔ̈b a Nzam, lun'syäŋà mfum.
1PE 2:18 Asyääl a ndwà, làkäl anà unkyeey mbɔɔn akà ankum abɛ, kànà akà bàŋàbwaŋ anà bàduu mpɛl anki, wɛɛ anà akaŋitswumbuun.
1PE 2:19 Abun, yà ubwaŋ mbɔɔn mukyey mpay bàfipà ukɔɔn isin aya, ntɔn musyäŋà Nzam.
1PE 2:20 Abun, làkoo nà mukaŋ mpem naa bàladüb ntɔn ibii lan'kyer bɛ? Wɛɛ isàkal naa bɛ lan'man mpay ntɔn ubwaŋ lan'kyer bɛ, la là kab a ngway u mii a Nzam.
1PE 2:21 Kyekà, yà ntɔn ya waa bàlabel, ntɔn Klistɔ sye kàkɔɔm mwäänà ntɔn bɛ, nde kàlaswɛŋ mbaan ntɔn bɛ làläb nkääl ande.
1PE 2:22 Nde kàkyer anki man'be, ndaa a an'kwaar sye yàtoo anki u mun ande,
1PE 2:23 nde kàfuur anki in'tswe, mpal bun'tö in'tswe. Wɛɛ mpal bun'pɛ ba mpay, nde kàŋän anki, wɛɛ ya yanswà nde kàpɛ akà mbuur afàtsul nsaŋ a balàbal lanswà.
1PE 2:24 Nde kàsyen buur a man'be abi nde ŋakwo tii u kulunsi, ntɔn bi kàkü anà man'be abi ŋakwo, ntɔn bi ikäl anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ntɔn balàbal, nde kàlakɔɔr u mbwo a iwà ande.
1PE 2:25 Ntɔn bɛ làdiimà mbwo asànaa in'kɔk, wɛɛ apanà, bɛ lan'furà akàun'kyɛɛŋ a in'kɔk anà un'leer a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ.
1PE 3:1 Bɛ akaar sye, làkäl anà unkyeey akà adim abɛ, ntɔn isàkal naa bye anà abaal bumwɛy uboo aba làkwikilà latɛy unsà ndaa a Nzam, waa ba bàsà làkwikilà u mɔ̈ɔ̈ aba ntɔn nkääl aŋàbwaŋ yà akyay aba,
1PE 3:2 unsà nkääl aŋàpɔŋà anà yà làzir abɛ.
1PE 3:3 Wɛy ntwɛn abɛ ikɔ̈ɔ̈n akal nà u nsà mpɛl asànaa: ntswee aŋàtɔŋ, an'yak a wɔl anà ipfɛy a ntal,
1PE 3:4 wɛɛ, wɛy ntwɛn abɛ ikäl yàŋàyee uboo a mpem, ntwɛn ikɔ̈ɔ̈n mbɔ̈ɔ̈n yà dweelà a làbɔ̈ɔ̈n anà làduu, yà ntal a kölàköl u mii a Nzam.
1PE 3:5 Kyakin mbalà yumwɛy, yayi yàkäl mbwäär a akaar in'kyɛɛl abà bàsi làkyän amu Nzam, abà bàkäl anà unkyeey akà adim aba,
1PE 3:6 asànaa Saal kàsi nde làbɔ̈ɔ̈n akà Abàlam anà kun'bel nde naa mwol ande, nde mbuur làbà bɛ baan ande bakaar, mukyer ndaa aŋàbwaŋ anà mukɔɔn akal unsà bɔɔmà.
1PE 3:7 Bɛ adim sye, làkäl anà nkääl a un'tüüb unsà ngwem anà làyöb nsöön a bwääl alye a akaar. Lasi akyay abe làzir, ntɔn ba, asànaa bɛ, ba bà aŋakwal a kab a ngway a mɔ̈ɔ̈, waa akà ndaa mwɛy ikɔ̈ɔ̈n asà lingyoomà uboo a ngyamàkà abɛ.
1PE 3:8 Mumay, làkäl an'kyän an'mwɛy ma, làkal anà ngweem a ngyɛb, làkwen bɛ a bɛ, làkäl anà nsyääm anà làbɔ̈ɔ̈n.
1PE 3:9 Twon làfuur ube udu a ube, itàkal in'tswe udu a in'tswe, wɛɛ làsaak, ntɔn bàlabel ntɔn nsaak, ntɔn muwal kwal a nsaak.
1PE 3:10 Kyakin, « Wɛy mbuur akwen mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà ilä aŋàbwaŋ, ukäl unsà igyɛɛŋ mutɛn ndaa a mbe anà mutà loor,
1PE 3:11 uwɛy ube anà ukyer ubwaŋ, uleŋ duu anà ukäl uboo a la unsà muküünà.
1PE 3:12 Ntɔn mii a Mwol myà udu a baar a balàbal, anà an'tsü ande mà ipɔl ntɔn muwem ngyamàkà aba, wɛɛ ntabwey a Mwol ifàpà ngö akà baar bàfàkyer ube. »
1PE 3:13 Nà asàlakyer ube, isàkal naa bɛ làbà ngwal mukyer ndaa aŋàbwaŋ?
1PE 3:14 Itàkal naa bɛ làbà muman mpay ntɔn làfàkyer bɛ ndaa a balàbal, làyöb naa bɛ làbà unsà un'sak. Twon lan'man bɔɔmà a baar bumwɛy anà twon lan'kal udu udu.
1PE 3:15 Wɛɛ làpɛ làkoo akà Klistɔ taaŋ lanswà asànaa Mwol uboo a mpem abɛ. Làkäl ngwal taaŋ lanswà mufuur ndaa aŋàbwaŋ akà baar banswà bàkwen muyöb làkyän alye anà bɛ.
1PE 3:16 Wɛɛ ya ikäl abà unsà duu anà làzir. Làkäl anà an'kyän aŋàbwaŋ ntɔn baar bàfàlatwee, anà bàfàman naa nkääl a Klistɔ uboo abɛ yatɛy, waa ba bàsàman nswɛn.
1PE 3:17 Isàkal naa ba bà ukwen a Nzam, yan'söön ubwaŋ muman mpay ntɔn ubwaŋ làfàkyer bɛ, akwànaa mukyer ube.
1PE 3:18 Kyakin, Klistɔ nde ŋakwo, kàmɛn mpay mbalà mwɛy ya, ntɔn man'be a baar, nde mbuur akɔ̈ɔ̈n man'be, waa kàlakweel, bɛ baar a man'be, ntɔn mukàlapà akà Nzam. Nde bun'dwä unsà ndür ande yà imbuur, wɛɛ bun'fuur u mɔ̈ɔ̈ unsà ngwal a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl.
1PE 3:19 Kyakin kàkyen nde mukàlɔŋ itàkal naa an'dweelà màkäl uboo a bɔlokà,
1PE 3:20 akà baar bàtön mukyey, umpal kàkäŋ Nzam mpem - kà ilä kàtöŋà Nɔwà an'swà amà bàbilà baar ntal ikikye, banswà bàkäl baar naan mpa bàkü uboo a an'dà.
1PE 3:21 Kya kyàkäl idiim a ndüümà akyà ifàlatswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ papanà: kya kà kyà ntɔn mpööŋ a làbiin a ndür anki, wɛɛ ntɔn unkyeey akà Nzam unsà an'kyän aŋàbwaŋ, nde afàlatswà mɔ̈ɔ̈ u mbwo a ngwiiyà a Yɛsu Klistɔ,
1PE 3:22 awà kàkyen du, wà u kɔɔ a ibaal a Nzam, anà bàpɛ sye akà nde muyaal udu a akyeey, aŋikɔ̈b anà aŋangwal.
1PE 4:1 Abun, asànaa Klistɔ kàmɛn nde mpay u ndür ande, bɛ sye làkäl aŋàtsim unsà an'kyän nsil ma, ntɔn mbuur awà kàmɛn mpay u ndür ande, kàkyakaab anà man'be,
1PE 4:2 mpalàbà, wɛy nkääl abɛ, unsà ilä byan'saal unsi a mɛɛn pà, ikäl asànaa abà ukwen a Nzam, wɛɛ kà asànaa abà ukwen a baar anki.
1PE 4:3 Bɛ sye làdwä taaŋ mbɔɔn mukyer ndaa ayà ifàpà un'sak akà baar mpa abà Ayudà, mukal uboo a pfürà, unsà ilään a ndaa a mbe, unsà ngyöör a man, unsà in'kyɔm, u nweel a man anà u ngyamàkà a itɛk.
1PE 4:4 Apanà, ba bà muman ndaa mwɛy yà ubem naa bɛ lan'fàtɔn mukyer ndaa a nswɛn kà imɛɛy mbwo mwɛy anà ba, anà ba sye bàmukàlabɛy.
1PE 4:5 Wɛɛ ba bàsàmɛɛy nkyeer aba u mii a mbuur awà kan'kwo mutsul nsaŋ a baar a mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà bàŋàkwà.
1PE 4:6 Kyakin Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ alà bàsam itàkal akà baar aŋàkwà: abun, itàkal naa ba bàsapà ntaaŋàmbar ntɔn nkääl bàkäl ba ayà u mɛɛn, asànaa naa baar banswà, wɛɛ unsà ngwal a Dweelà, ba ban'kwo mukal anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ ufàpà Nzam.
1PE 4:7 Ntsüü a ndaa yanswà yà tsütsü. Kyakin, làkäl anà an'yeerà anà imbämdir a Dweelà ntɔn bɛ làyamà.
1PE 4:8 Kusà aya yanswà, làkäl anà ukwen a ngwalàngwal bɛ a bɛ, ntɔn ukwen bàfàdwa nkul.
1PE 4:9 Làkäl anà mbaay bɛ a bɛ, ukɔɔn asà nkyɛɛr.
1PE 4:10 Wɛy mbuur mbuur usi kab a ngway kàwɛl nde akà Nzam ntɔn ubwaŋ a baar bumwɛy ukɔɔn aŋüŋün. Abun, bɛ làsàkal anà nkääb aŋàbwaŋ yan'kab a Nzam mà ifà ifà.
1PE 4:11 Wɛy mbuur awe anà kab ntɔn mulɔŋ, nde u lɔŋ ndaa a Nzam. Wɛy mbuur awe anà kab ntɔn mubay baar bumwɛy, nde ukyer a ngwal ayà kun'pɛ Nzam. Wɛy naa unsà ya yanswà, làkoo làfurà akà Nzam, u mbwo a Yɛsu Klistɔ. Wɛy naa làkoo anà ngwal byàkäl ipepey akà nde. Wöö wöö!
1PE 4:12 Ankwen amɛ, twon lan'man ndaa yà ubem isàkal naa bɛ làbà muman mpay, asànaa naa ya yà ndaa mwɛy yà ingyey.
1PE 4:13 Wɛɛ bɛ làkäl unsà un'sak itàkal naa bɛ làbà muman mpay mbwo mwɛy anà Klistɔ, ntɔn bɛ làsàman un'sak mbɔɔn umpal làsàmɛnà làkoo ande akà baar banswà.
1PE 4:14 Isàkal naa bàsàlato ntɔn bɛ làbà alɔŋki a Klistɔ, bɛ làbà baar un'sak, ntɔn Dweelà a làkoo, Dweelà a Nzam wuboo a bɛ.
1PE 4:15 Wɛy naa akà mbuur mwɛy amu bɛ ukɔɔn awal ntaaŋàmbar, naa ntɔn nde kàkyer adwa, kàkyer ayib, kàkyer undiir mwɛy wà ube, anà kàbilà sye u ndaa abar.
1PE 4:16 Wɛɛ isàkal naa mbuur mwɛy an'man mpay naa ntɔn nde wà un'klistɔ, nde twon an'man nswɛn, wɛɛ wɛy nde upɛ Nzam làkoo ntɔn kan'wal nde ikɔb a un'klistɔ.
1PE 4:17 Taaŋ a nsaŋ lan'kwo, ya itàtwab akà bi baan a Nzam. Abun, isàkal naa ya isàtwab akà bi, wɛɛ ya isàkal aben akà baar bàfàtɔn Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ a Nzam?
1PE 4:18 Asànaa itɛɛnà Ndaa Aŋàsɔn: « Isàkal naa mbuur a balàbal mɔ̈ɔ̈ asàwà a mpay yanswà, nkye isàkal akà mbuur un'be anà mbuur a man'be? »
1PE 4:19 Kyakin, wɛy baar bàfàman mpay asànaa abà ukwen a Nzam, bàpɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ aba akà Nkyer, nde mbuur a làbɔ̈ɔ̈n, anà ba bàsi muküünà mukyer ubwaŋ.
1PE 5:1 Kyakin, mɛ an'pà un'kanà akà andweer a Ikööŋ abà uboo a bɛ. Mɛ sye in'wà un'dweer asànaa ba, anà in'wà mbäl a mpay a Klistɔ, mɛ mbuur in'we anà kab a làkoo alà làsàmɛnà. Le undiir in'lɔɔmà mɛ akà ba:
1PE 5:2 Làdii làböl a in'kɔk kàlapɛ Nzam, twon làler la a un'kaak a ngwal wanswà, wɛɛ unsà mpem aŋàbwaŋ asànaa ukwen Nzam, twon lan'kyer ntɔn muleŋ bweel, wɛɛ unsà ukwen.
1PE 5:3 Twon làyaal baar abà bàlapɛ muler a un'kaak a ngwal abɛ, wɛɛ làkäl mbaan ntɔn in'kɔk.
1PE 5:4 Kyakin, bɛ làsàwal mpà a làkoo mpa isàbi ubwaŋ aya akà ikikye umpal usàyà Nkum a aseey.
1PE 5:5 Mbwo mwɛy, bɛ atö anà asye, làkäl anà unkyeey akà andweer. Anà bɛ banswà, làkäl anà làbɔ̈ɔ̈n unsà nkääl abɛ, bɛ a bɛ, ntɔn « Nzam afàtɔn aŋun'yɔl, wɛɛ nde afàswaŋ ubwaŋ ande akà aŋàlàbɔ̈ɔ̈n. »
1PE 5:6 Abun, làsi làbɔ̈ɔ̈n ungyɛl a kɔɔ a ngwal a Nzam, waa nde usàlasɛɛn taaŋ kàsi nde,
1PE 5:7 làpɛ nkyɛɛr abɛ yanswà akà nde, ntɔn nde mbuur afàlabɔŋ.
1PE 5:8 Làduub mii abɛ, làkäl unsà igyɛɛŋ! ntɔn ŋankir abɛ, ileŋ, wàmuyileŋ asànaa nkwee a umpɔr ayileŋ mbuur adyà.
1PE 5:9 Lumbäär, làkäl aŋàtsim unsà làkwikilà abɛ. Làyöb naa mpay nsil yayi bàpɛ akà atɔŋ abɛ abà u mɛɛn.
1PE 5:10 Nzam, aŋangyɛb yanswà awà kàlabel unsà làkoo ande là mbul a in'tye u mbwo a Klistɔ, nde ŋakwo asàlapà ngwal ungö a kitaaŋ làsàman bɛ mpay, nde akyer asàlatsiim, asàlatsümà udu a in'bään a ngwal.
1PE 5:11 Wɛy ikɔ̈b ikäl anà nde mbul a in'tye! Wöö wöö!
1PE 5:12 Mɛ kàlasöön bingɔk bi u mbwo a Silàvɛ, awà in'fàwal mɛ asànaa un'tɔŋ a lää, ntɔn mukàlalɛɛl anà mutà imbäl naa yà unsà kab a ngway a Nzam làndandaa waa bɛ làbaŋàtsim.
1PE 5:13 Iköŋ a aklistɔ akyà pà u Babilɔn, kyàmàlatööm mbɔr, anà Malakɔ, mwan amɛ.
1PE 5:14 Làpɛɛl mbɔr a un'kaay a atɔŋ bɛ a bɛ. Wɛy duu làkäl anà bɛ banswà làbà amu Klistɔ!
2PE 1:1 Mɛ Simɔn Petɔlà, un'syääl anà ntööm a Yɛsu Klistɔ. An'söön baar abà bàwɛl làkwikilà aŋàbwaŋ asànaa bi unsà balàbal a Nzam abi anà Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ Yɛsu Klistɔ.
2PE 1:2 Wɛy kab a ngway anà duu màkäl mbɔɔn anà bɛ, u mbwo a ngyööb a Nzam anà Yɛsu, Mwol abi!
2PE 1:3 Abun, ngwal a du yipɛ kab aya yanswà yà ndöŋ ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà inzaam, ntɔn bi iyöb mbuur kibel unsà làkoo ande ŋakwo anà ngwal ifàsal.
2PE 1:4 Kyakin, bi kàwɛl an'kab a ntal akölàköl amà bipɛ ilää, ntɔn, u mbwo a ma, bɛ làwɛl kab unsà inzaam, bɛ baar bàlagyɔɔr unsà làbiin ufàdii ilään a mɛɛn.
2PE 1:5 Kyakin, làsi ngwal abɛ yanswà mukwɛy làkwikilà unsà nkääl aŋàbwaŋ, unsà nkääl aŋàbwaŋ, làsi ngyööb,
2PE 1:6 unsà ngyööb, nkääŋ a mpem, unsà nkääŋ a mpem, imbämdir, unsà imbämdir, inzaam,
2PE 1:7 unsà inzaam, un'tüüb a atɔŋ a atɔŋ, unsà un'tüüb a atɔŋ a atɔŋ, ukwen.
2PE 1:8 Ntɔn, isàkal naa bɛ làbye anà nkääl ayi yàmbɔɔn, ya iyàlasiinà musal anà muyɛl unsà ngyööb a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ.
2PE 1:9 Wɛɛ akà mbuur akɔ̈ɔ̈n bya, nde wà ikwàmii, nde akyer afàbàba: nde uyöb anki naa nde wàŋàpɔŋà unsà man'be ande mà itaan.
2PE 1:10 Kyakin, atɔŋ, fàlasye ngwal ntɔn mutà làbeel abɛ mpi anà nsɔ̈ɔ̈l abɛ. Abun, waa bɔɔmà abwà mpa bàkal akà ikikye.
2PE 1:11 Kyakin, waa mbiilà abɛ unsà Imwol a mbul a in'tye kyà Mwol anà Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi Yɛsu Klistɔ isàkal yàŋàduub kölàköl.
2PE 1:12 Kyakin, mɛ in'wɛy anki mufàlayɔɔb indiir abi, itàkal naa bɛ bya làkyàyöb anà bɛ làbà aŋàtsim unsà ndandaa ayà bàlapɛ.
2PE 1:13 Wɛɛ mɛ in'sii naa yàbalàbal muwiy an'kyän abɛ u mbwo a ngyɔɔb amɛ umpal in'wà mɛ uboo a ipfey a ndür ki.
2PE 1:14 Ntɔn mɛ in'kyàyöb naa taaŋ muwɛy ipfey a ndür aki làmuyà u ntiin, asànaa kan'swɛŋ Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ.
2PE 1:15 Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ in'sàsà ngwal naa ungö a nkyeen amɛ, bɛ làyɔbà an'lɔɔŋ amà taaŋ lanswà.
2PE 1:16 Abun, kà ntɔn mulab nsim a ntwan anki waa bi kàlakyään ngyeel a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ unsà ngwal ande yanswà, wɛɛ ntɔn kàmɛn bi uteer ande u mii abi ŋakwo!
2PE 1:17 Ntɔn nde kàwɛl ibyääl anà làkoo akà Taa Nzam, umpal kàtɛn nde a nde unsà làkoo ande làkölàköl naa: « Wà, wà mwaan amɛ wànkwen, awà kàsi mɛ un'sak amɛ amu nde. »
2PE 1:18 Ndaa ayi yàfü du, bi ŋakwo kàkyer awem ya, umpal kàkäl bi anà nde u mɔŋ in'kyɛɛl.
2PE 1:19 Abun, bi ibye anà ndaa a bwoor yàŋangɔɔm. Bɛ làkäl anà iböŋ musà mii abɛ udu aya asànaa mwin afàlɛɛmà kà ikal a làpib, tii umpal làyaanà taaŋ anà uyàsɛnà mbwaar a tutu uboo a mpem abɛ.
2PE 1:20 Kusà aya yanswà, làyöb abà: akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki nde ŋakwo mutà itàkal mubaal ngɔɔm ayà uboo a Ndaa Aŋàsɔn.
2PE 1:21 Kyakin, ngɔɔm kà ifàfà anki akà ikikye unsà ukwen a mbuur, wɛɛ unsà ngwal a Dweelà In'kyɛɛl waa baar bàyäm kà ikↄb a Nzam.
2PE 2:1 Asànaa bàkäl aŋangɔɔm a loor uboo a un'sɛŋ a Isàlɛl, abun sye, bàsàkal alɔɔŋ a loor uboo a bɛ. Ba bàsàbiil an'lɔɔŋ an'be a ntwan, tii mutɔn Un'lɔɔŋ awà katsü mɔ̈ɔ̈. Kwɛl a mbɔɔn tɛy, ma màsabwiy ndwaŋ.
2PE 2:2 Baar mbɔɔn bàsàlab mbweel a ndwaŋ aba. Ntɔn ba, mbwo a ndandaa isàbulà undiir mwɛy wàŋàbɛy.
2PE 2:3 Unsà küüb a ngim, alɔɔŋ a loor abà bàsàwal indiir abɛ u mbwo ndaa a ntsà. Wɛɛ ntɔn ba, fà itaan, ntaaŋàmbar aba kwɛl yatɛy anà ukwà aba bàyàfàdil anki.
2PE 2:4 Ntɔn, Nzam kàwɛy anki akyeey bàkyer man'be, wɛɛ nde katɔɔm u nsye a mbaa, bàŋàbäm an'dwaaŋ ntɔn mudil mbar.
2PE 2:5 Nde sye kàwɛy anki taaŋ là itaan, wɛɛ nde kàyee Nɔwà, mbuur wànaan uboo a baar bàsɔrà unsà ukwà, nde mbuur kàlɔɔŋà balàbal umpal kàdwä Nzam baar abe kà an'dà umpal kànɔ̈ mbul a ikül.
2PE 2:6 Ungö apan, nde kàpɛ ntaaŋàmbar akà an'bul a Sɔdɔm anà Gɔmɔr anà ma mabulà un'twà ntɔn muswaŋ mbaan akà baar abe abà bàsàyà ungö.
2PE 2:7 Wɛɛ nde kàtsü Lɔt mɔ̈ɔ̈, mbuur a balàbal awà kàwem ngyɛb ntɔn isal aŋingyäy byà atɔŋ ande.
2PE 2:8 Ntɔn mbuur a balàbal awà kàkäl umwɛy uboo a ba, nde kàkyer amanà anà kàkyer awemà: ilä ungö ilä, mpem ande yàkyer ayɔɔ ntɔn isal aba byà ŋingyäy.
2PE 2:9 Abun, Mwol an'kwo ulwom u nsii baar a balàbal anà usi ukɔl baar mpa abà bàbalàbal ntɔn mukapà ntaaŋàmbar kà ilä a nsaŋ.
2PE 2:10 Ntaaŋàmbar ayi yà sin sin ntɔn baar bàfàkwen ŋingyäy. Ba bàfàlab ilään a ndür aba anà bàfàbɛy ikɔ̈b a Nzam. Alɔɔŋ a loor abà bye anà gyɔɔr anà uyɔl, bɔɔmà akà ba batɛy mubweel baar a làkoo a du in'tswe.
2PE 2:11 Itàkal akyeey ban'lyaaŋ ikɔ̈b anà ngwal udu a ba, bàfàtɛn anki ndaa a nswɛn akà ba u mii a Mwol.
2PE 2:12 Wɛɛ ba bà asànaa ntsür a insil ifàkwɛlà anà ifàkwà unsà intaam. Ba bàfàto indiir mpa bàyöb ba. Ba bàkyer asàpɔɔn asànaa ufàpɔɔn ntsür.
2PE 2:13 Abà, ba bàsàwal làfur a un'kɔl aŋàyↄŋ aba. Un'sak aba wàmukyer ndaa a nswɛn kà imɛɛy.
2PE 2:14 Mii aba myàŋàyɔl a inswem, ba bàfàyuur anki mukyer man'be, ba bàfàlwab baar mpa abàŋàtsim. Ba bàkyàtoo làpaan a ngyal a ngim. Un'küül a Nzam wà udu a ba!
2PE 2:15 Ba ban'wɛy mbwo a swalaa, ba ban'yiiŋ ntɔn mulab mbwo a Bàlam mwan a Bɔsɔr, awà kàbü unsà ndɛb a làfur làkɔ̈ɔ̈n balàbal,
2PE 2:16 wɛɛ nde kàwɛl làfur a un'tswe bwoor ande: ntsür a nkiin mwɛy wà isal kàsi ndaa asànaa mbuur, abun, ukɔŋ a ŋangɔɔm awà waa bàwü.
2PE 2:17 Baar abà bà asànaa ntwà mpa ifàtwey an'dà anà an'tööb ufiisyen un'pöb. Ba bàkyalɔ̈ɔ̈n ikal u diŋàdiŋ a mpib.
2PE 2:18 Abun, unsà an'lɔɔŋ aba màŋàyam a uyɔl anà màbunàbun, ba bàfàlwab baar ban'sɔrà benàben kà an'kɔɔ a baar abye anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ un'be.
2PE 2:19 Ba bàfasyeel ilää ntɔn mukapà insaay, wɛɛ, kyekà ba ŋakwo bà asɔ a ilään ifatwääl ukwà, ntɔn mbuur wanswà wà un'sɔ a undiir awà afun'yaal.
2PE 2:20 Abun, isàkal naa baar bàsɔrà kà an'kɔɔ a mbiin a mɛɛn u mbwo a ngyööb a Yɛsu Klistɔ, Mwol anà Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi, ban'fàbwà anà bàmàfayaal unsà mbiin a mɛɛn, mpay aba yàngöngö yan'söön yàtàtwɛb.
2PE 2:21 Ntɔn yàlàkal ubwaŋ akà ba mukɔɔn ayöb mbwo a balàbal, wɛɛ kàmuyöb ya anki, waa ungö bàfàtɔn nswɛɛŋ a in'kyɛɛl ayà bàtöm.
2PE 2:22 Ya yayeel asànaa kyàtɛn itim asànaa ayà ya: « Mbwà kan'fàfurà kà ilwo ande » naa sye: « Ngul un'kyay bàmun'ywɛy làbenàben, kan'fàbibimà uboo a antwar. »
2PE 3:1 Asam amɛ, wà wun'kaan wàyweel alàsöön mɛ. Uboo a mya myemyeel, mɛ an'lɔm akà ngyɔɔb abɛ ntɔn muwiy amu bɛ nsyääl a balàbal muyweer.
2PE 3:2 Làyɔbà ndaa bàtɛn aŋangɔɔm in'kyɛɛl kusà anà nswɛɛŋ a antööm abɛ, nswɛɛŋ a Mwol anà Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈.
2PE 3:3 Làyöb kusà naa: kà ilä a ntsüü, baar a nkääl ambe bàsàkyer ayà, waa bàsàlasɛ,
2PE 3:4 bàsàtɛn naa: « Kyàken ilä a ngyeel ande? Ntɔn, fà bàkü ataa, akà nsɔɔmà mwɛy yi yatɛy. Ndaa yanswà yà ifà imwɛy fà bàkyer mɛɛn! »
2PE 3:5 Unsà ntɛɛn aba ayi, ba ban'diimà naa fà itaan itaan, làkäl anà du. Anà mɛɛn màtoo unsà an'dà, ma mà uboboo a an'dà unsà ngwal a Nzam.
2PE 3:6 U mbwo a ma sye, mɛɛn mà itaan màminà uboo a an'dà.
2PE 3:7 Unsà ndaa iler du anà mɛɛn a ŋàbà, Ndaa nsil ya yàmadil ntɔn mbaa, kà ilä a nsaŋ, anà ukwà a baar abe.
2PE 3:8 Asam amɛ bànkwen, we anà undiir mwɛy mpa lan'kwo bɛ mukyäärà mpiim: ntɔn akà Mwol, ilä mwɛy kyà asànaa nsaab mwɛy yà mbul, anà nsaab mwɛy yà mbul yà sànaa ilä mwɛy.
2PE 3:9 Akà Mwol ngö a nsöŋ yatɛy mukwey ilää ande, asànaa bàfàsii bamwɛy naa nde asàkyer itaan, wɛɛ nde we anà nkääŋ a mpem ntɔn bɛ, ntɔn nde ukwen anki naa bamwɛy bàkü, wɛɛ, naa baar banswà bàbuul mpem aba.
2PE 3:10 Wɛɛ ilä a Mwol isàyà asànaa mbüüb. Ilä làsàdubà du, làso làsàkal làkölàköl, indiir aŋàbääb ikyer asàkaabà, mɛɛn anà isal ama màsàkal u nsaŋ.
2PE 3:11 Mpal isàpää indiir abi byanswà, bɛ làsàkal baar a nkye ifà! Mɔ̈ɔ̈ in'kyɛɛl nà! Làzir nà akà Nzam!
2PE 3:12 Bɛ, bɛ baar làkadilà anà làkanaanà ngyeel a ilä a Nzam, ilä làsàyaalà du aŋàkuŋà anà indiir aŋàbääb ikyer asàyaalà!
2PE 3:13 Bi ibà mudilà du akün anà mɛɛn akün asànaa akyà ilää ande, ikal làbà bàbalàbal.
2PE 3:14 Kyakin, asam amɛ, unsà ndiil ayi, làkyer ngwal ntɔn nde kàlamɛn unsà duu aŋàkwo anà làkɔ̈ɔ̈n an'pɛl.
2PE 3:15 Anà làyöb ubwaŋàbwaŋ naa nkääŋ a mpem a kölàköl a Mwol, yà ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ! Yà unsà an'kyän amà, waa Pɔl, un'tɔŋ anà un'sam abi, kàmàlasöön asànaa amà an'yeerà kun'pɛ Nzam.
2PE 3:16 Ndaa ayi nde ya kan'tɛn sye unsà in'kaan myanswà kàsön nde: Ye anà ndaa yumwɛy yà bwoor muyöb uboo a in'kaan ami, insil anà baar bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n un'yɛnà la bàfakwaar ba an'kyän a mya, asànaa bàfàkwaar ba an'kyän a In'kaan myumwɛy ntɔn ba ŋakwo bàbü ndwaŋ.
2PE 3:17 Wɛɛ bɛ, ankwen amɛ, asànaa lan'yöb bɛ kusà, làkäl unsà igyɛɛŋ, twon lan'lab abɛɛy abà bàfàdiimà mbwo anà twon lan'piy làkyän abɛ!
2PE 3:18 Wɛɛ làyɛl unsà kab angway anà ngyööb a Mwol anà Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi Yɛsu Klistɔ. Wɛy làkoo làkäl akà nde fà ŋàbà tii mbul a in'tye. Wöö wöö.
1JO 1:1 Ndaa ifàpà mɔ̈ɔ̈ yàkäl fà nsɛmà. Bi kàwem ya. Bi kàmɛn ya u mii abi ŋakwo. Bi kàsyeebà ya, anà an'kɔɔ abi màbä ya.
1JO 1:2 Ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ kàkyer ayàmɛnà, anà bi kàkyer un'man, bi kun'tɛɛl imbäl anà bi kàlakyään mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye awà kàkäl apà Taa anà kàyàmɛnà ntɔn bi.
1JO 1:3 Ndaa kàmɛn bi anà kàwem bi, bi ikyäänà ya akà bɛ sye, ntɔn bɛ sye làkäl unsà un'tüüb anà bi. Kyekà, un'tüüb abi wà un'tüüb ibà bi awà anà Taa anà Mwan ande Yɛsu Klistɔ.
1JO 1:4 Isàkal naa bi kàlasöönà indiir abi, yà ntɔn un'sak abi ukäl wàŋàkwo.
1JO 1:5 Le làsaŋ kàwem bi akà Yɛsu Klistɔ anà ikàlakyäänà bi: Nzam wà pɛɛlà, anà amu nde làpib latɛy.
1JO 1:6 Isàkal naa bi iswaŋà ngaal naa bi ibà un'tüüb anà nde, wɛɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi wà unsà làpib, bi ibà baar a loor, bi ifàsyääl anki ndandaa.
1JO 1:7 Isàkal naa mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi wà uboo a pɛɛlà, asànaa nde ŋakwo wà uboo a pɛɛlà, bi ibà uboo un'tüüb bi a bi, anà an'kil a Yɛsu, Mwan ande, màfàpöŋ man'be abi manswà.
1JO 1:8 Isàkal naa bi iswaŋà ngaal naa bi man'be matɛy, bi ban'bwiy bi ŋàkwo ndwaŋ, anà ndandaa yatɛy amu bi.
1JO 1:9 Wɛɛ, isàkal naa bi ban'kyey man'be abi, Nzam wà lää anà balàbal: nde asidwääl man'be abi anà asipööŋ unsà indiir byanswà mpa abyà balàbal.
1JO 1:10 Isàkal naa bi ikyeyà uyɔl naa bi man'be kàkyer anki, bi bun'buulà mbuur a loor, anà ndaa ande yatɛy amu bi.
1JO 2:1 Baan amɛ, amàlasöön mɛ indiir bi yà ntɔn bɛ làkɔ̈ɔ̈n akyer man'be. Wɛɛ isàkal naa mbuur kan'kyer man'be, bi ibye anà nkalsà tsütsü apà Taa, Yɛsu Klistɔ, awà balàbal.
1JO 2:2 Ntɔn nde wà mbuur kàkyey mukal ibɔɔn ntɔn man'be abi, kà ntɔn bi mpɛl anki, wɛɛ sye ntɔn baar a mɛɛn manswà.
1JO 2:3 Bi ibye anà an'kyän a ndandaa naa bi iyöb Klistɔ, isàkal naa bi ifàkyey nswɛɛŋ ande.
1JO 2:4 Isàkal naa mbuur an'tɛn naa: « Mɛ in'kyun'yöb », wɛɛ nde ufàkyey anki nswɛɛŋ ande, nde wà mbuur a loor, ndandaa amu nde yatɛy.
1JO 2:5 Wɛɛ, mbuur akyeyà ndaa ande, amu nde, ukwen a Nzam a ndandaa bàŋàyɔl, apan, bi ban'kyey naa bi ibà amu nde.
1JO 2:6 Mbuur awà ukyeyà uyɔl naa nde wà amu Klistɔ, wɛy nde ŋakwo uläb mbwo kàkyenà nde.
1JO 2:7 Ankwen amɛ, mɛ kà nswɛɛŋ akün anki amàlasöön, wɛɛ nswɛɛŋ itaan ayà làwɛl bɛ fà nsɛmà. Nswɛɛŋ yà itaan ayi, yà ndaa ayà làwem bɛ.
1JO 2:8 Wɛɛ yà nswɛɛŋ akün mɛ alàsɔ̈ɔ̈n, ya yà ndandaa amu nde anà amu bɛ, ntɔn mpib yan'lyaaŋ, taaŋ lan'yaanà.
1JO 2:9 Mbuur awà ukyeyà uyɔl mukal uboo a pɛɛlà, wɛɛ nde ayiiŋà un'tɔŋ ande, tii kunà nde wà uboo a mpib.
1JO 2:10 Mbuur awà akwen un'tɔŋ ande, nde wà uboo a pɛɛlà, akà undiir mwɛy tɛy amu nde kan'kwo mukun'bwiy.
1JO 2:11 Wɛɛ, mbuur awà uyiiŋà un'tɔŋ ande wà uboo a mpib anà nde uyöb anki naa nde akyà ken, ntɔn mpib yan'dübà mii ande.
1JO 2:12 Baan amɛ, mɛ amàlasöön naa: bàmàladwääl nkul ntɔn ikɔb a Yɛsu Klistɔ.
1JO 2:13 Ataa, mɛ amàlasɔ̈ɔ̈n, ntɔn bɛ làkyàyöb mbuur awà fà nsɛmà. Baan atö, mɛ amàlasöön, ntɔn bɛ làwɛl iböŋ kusà a Un'be.
1JO 2:14 Baan amɛ, mɛ kàkyer alasöön, ntɔn bɛ làkyun'yöb Taa. Ataa, mɛ kàkyer alasöön, ntɔn bɛ làkyun'yöb mbuur awà fà nsɛmà. Atö, mɛ kàkyer alasöön, ntɔn bɛ làbà ngwal: ndaa a Nzam ifàbwaay uboo a bɛ anà bɛ làkyàwal iböŋ kusà a Un'be.
1JO 2:15 Abun, bɛ twon lan'kwen mɛɛn, itàkal indiir abyà uboo a mɛɛn. Isàkal naa mbuur akwen mɛɛn, ukwen a Taa amu nde batɛy.
1JO 2:16 Ntɔn undiir wanswà awà uboo a mɛɛn: ilään a ndür, ukwen a mii, uyɔl unsà indiir mpa byàfàfà akà Taa, wɛɛ ifàfà u mɛɛn.
1JO 2:17 Kyekà, mɛɛn màmulyaaŋ anà indiir abyà uboo. Wɛɛ mbuur afàkyer ukwen a Nzam afàkal mbul a in'tye.
1JO 2:18 Baan amɛ, lalà là taaŋ a ntsüü. Bɛ làkyer awem, bàkyäänà naa un'yiiŋ mwɛy wà Klistɔ akyer ayà, kyekà sɛmà apanà ayiiŋ a Klistɔ bàpaa mbɔɔn. Apan bi ban'yöb naa lalà là taaŋ a ntsüü.
1JO 2:19 Baar abà bàtoo akà bi, wɛɛ ba bàkäl anki bàbi. Yàlàkal naa ba bàkäl bàbi, ba bàlàbwaay anà bi. Wɛɛ ba bàkyer alwomà amu bi ntɔn ya imɛnà ndandaa naa ba kà bàbi anki.
1JO 2:20 Wɛɛ akà bɛ, bɛ bàlasi an'kɔɔ akà aŋin'kyɛɛl, anà bɛ banswà làkyàyöb ya.
1JO 2:21 Isàkal naa mɛ amàlasöön, kà ntɔn mutɛn anki naa bɛ ndandaa làyöb anki, wɛɛ ntɔn bɛ làkyàyöb naa akà loor làmwɛy làfàfà anki u ndandaa.
1JO 2:22 Apan, nà awà mbuur a loor, nkye wà mbuur awà utɔnà naa Yɛsu wà Klistɔ? Ler, un'yiiŋ a Klistɔ, nde mbuur afàtɔn mukyey Taa anà Mwan.
1JO 2:23 Mbuur wanswà afàtɔn Mwan, Taa sye watɛy amu nde. Mbuur afàkyey Mwan, ayöb Taa sye.
1JO 2:24 Kyakin, wɛy ndaa làwem bɛ fà nsɛmà ibwaay amu bɛ. Isàkal naa ndaa làwem bɛ fà nsɛmà yan'bwaay amu bɛ, bɛ làsàkal amu Mwan anà amu Taa.
1JO 2:25 Le ilää kàsi nde ŋakwo: mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye.
1JO 2:26 Indiir abi mɛ kàlasöön ntɔn baar bàfàleŋ mukàlabwiy ndwaŋ.
1JO 2:27 Wɛɛ akà bɛ, Dweelà awà làwɛl bɛ akà Klistɔ, kan'bwaay amu bɛ. Abun, ndöŋ yatɛy naa mbuur ufàlalɔŋ. Ntɔn Dweelà ande wàmukàlalɔɔŋà indiir byanswà: nde wà ndandaa, nde loor ufàtà anki, nde kàlalɔŋ naa bɛ lan'bwaay amu nde.
1JO 2:28 Abun, baan amɛ, làbwaay amu nde, ntɔn taaŋ uyamɛnà nde, bi iyàkal bàŋàtsim, ntɔn mukɔɔn asàkal aŋàyɔl a nswɛn kusà a nde.
1JO 2:29 Ntɔn bɛ làkyàyöb naa nde wà balàbal, làyöb naa mbuur wanswà afàsyääl balàbal, bàmubɔr amu nde.
1JO 3:1 Taaràbi kikwen mbɔɔn, lalan kipɛ nde kab: bi bibeelà baan a Nzam, ndandaa bi ibà abwɛy! Kyakin, mɛɛn miyöb anki, ntɔn ma màyöb anki Nzam.
1JO 3:2 Ankwen amɛ, sɛmà apanà bi ibà baan a Nzam, wɛɛ ayà isàkal bi ŋàtàmɛnà anki. Bi ikyàyöb naa umpal usàmɛnà nde, bi isàkal asànaa nde, ntɔn bi isuman asànaa awà nde.
1JO 3:3 Mbuur wanswà an'sà làkyän amu nde, wàmupööŋ nde ŋakwo asànaa Yɛsu Klistɔ ŋakwo wàŋàpɔŋà.
1JO 3:4 Mbuur awà an'kyer man'be, an'kyer sye ube, ntɔn man'be mà ube.
1JO 3:5 Wɛɛ bɛ làkyàyöb naa nde kàyàmɛnà ntɔn mulwom man'be, amu nde man'be matɛy.
1JO 3:6 Mbuur wanswà awà amu nde ufàkyer anki man'be. Mbuur wanswà afàkyer man'be, wàmuswaŋ naa nde kun'mɛn anki anà kun'yöb anki.
1JO 3:7 Baan amɛ, mbuur twon kàlabwiy ndwaŋ! Mbuur awà afàkyer ndaa a balàbal, wà balàbal, asànaa Klistɔ ŋakwo wà balàbal.
