1JO 3:8 Mbuur afàkyer man'be wà mbuur a ileŋ, ntɔn ileŋ afàkyer man'be fà nsɛmà. Mwan a Nzam kàyàmɛnà ntɔn mudwa isal a ileŋ.
1JO 3:9 Mbuur awà bàbör amu Nzam, ufàfàkyer anki man'be, ntɔn mbɛŋ ande yan'bwaay amu nde, nde ufàkwo anki mukyer man'be, ntɔn Nzam wà Taarànde.
1JO 3:10 Le undiir afàpà nsöön ubwaŋàbwaŋ uboo a baan a Nzam anà baan a ileŋ: mbuur wanswà mpa afàkyer balàbal, itàkal mpa afàkwen un'tɔŋ ande, kà wà mwan a Nzam anki.
1JO 3:11 Ntɔn alà làsaŋ làwem bɛ fà nsɛmà: wɛy bi ikwen bi a bi.
1JO 3:12 Wɛy bi ikɔ̈ɔ̈n akyer asànaa Kayin awà kàkäl mbuur a Un'be, waa kàdwä utɔŋ ande. Ntɔn nkye kun'dwä nde? Ntɔn isal ande byàkäl byà ibe, wɛɛ byà un'tɔŋ ande byàkäl byà balàbal.
1JO 3:13 Atɔŋ, twon lan'man ndaa yà ubem, isàkal naa mɛɛn màmàlayiiŋ.
1JO 3:14 Bi, bi ikyàyöb naa bi bàfü kà ukwà tii uboo a mɔ̈ɔ̈, ntɔn bi ifàkwen atɔŋ. Mbuur mpa awà anà ukwen, wà uboo a ukwà.
1JO 3:15 Ntɔn mbuur awà un'yiiŋ a un'tɔŋ ande wà un'dwää. Anà bɛ làkyàyöb naa akà un'dwää mwɛy awe anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye amu nde watɛy.
1JO 3:16 Le, apanà bi ban'yöb ukwen: Yɛsu Klistɔ kàpɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ ande ntɔn bi. Bi sye ikyer asànaa nde, bi ipà mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi ntɔn atɔŋ.
1JO 3:17 Isàkal naa mbuur u mɛɛn mà we anà indiir mbɔɔn, nde umɛn un'tɔŋ ande u mpay, wɛɛ nde kun'kääŋ mpem, ukwen a Nzam ban'kwo mukal aben amu nde?
1JO 3:18 Baan amɛ, wɛy bi ikɔ̈ɔ̈n akwen nà u ndaa anà làlem mpɛl, wɛɛ unsà isal anà u ndandaa.
1JO 3:19 Abun, bi waa isàyöb naa bi ibà baar a ndandaa, anà mpem abi waa isàkal yà duu kusà a Nzam.
1JO 3:20 Ntɔn, itàkal naa mpem abi yàmukifüünà, bi ikyàyöb naa Nzam kan'söön mpem abi anà nde akyàyöb indiir byanswà.
1JO 3:21 Atɔŋ amɛ bànkwen, isàkal naa mpem abi ikifüünà anki, bi ibye anà làkyän kusà a Nzam.
1JO 3:22 Abun, bi isàwal undiir wanswà isàlɔm bi akà nde, ntɔn bi ban'kyey nswɛɛŋ ande anà bi ifàkyer ukwen ande.
1JO 3:23 Le nswɛɛŋ ande: bi musà làkwikilà kà ikɔb a Mwan ande Yɛsu Klistɔ anà bi ikwen bi a bi, asànaa kiswɛŋ nde.
1JO 3:24 Mbuur afàsyäl nswɛɛŋ ande wà wà Nzam, anà Nzam wà amu nde. Apan, bi ban'yöb naa nde wà uboo a bi, u mbwo a Dweelà kipɛ nde.
1JO 4:1 Ankwen amɛ, twon làn'sà làkwikilà akà baar bàkakyeyà uyɔl naa ba bye anà Dweelà, wɛɛ lasii, ntɔn muyöb naa nkye an'dweelà amà akà ba man'fà akà Nzam, ntɔn aŋangɔɔm a loor mbɔɔn bàkyàpää u mɛɛn.
1JO 4:2 Apan bɛ lan'yöb Dweelà a Nzam: dweelà lanswà lan'kyey naa Yɛsu Klistɔ kàyi u ndür, nde wà wà Nzam.
1JO 4:3 Wɛɛ mbuur wanswà afàtɔn mukyey Yɛsu, akà nde Dweelà a Nzam watɛy, wɛɛ dweelà a un'yiiŋ a Klistɔ: bɛ làkyàwem naa nde awà akyer asàyà, anà apanà, nde kàkyàyà itaan u mɛɛn.
1JO 4:4 Wɛɛ bɛ, baan amɛ, bɛ baan a Nzam, bɛ làkyàwal iböŋ kusà a aŋangɔɔm aban, ntɔn Dweelà awafàsal uboo a bɛ wà wàngwal aŋàsöön dweelà làfàyaal mɛɛn.
1JO 4:5 Ba bà baar a mɛɛn. Ba sye bàfàtɛn ndaa a mɛɛn, mɛɛn waa màfàwem.
1JO 4:6 Wɛɛ bi, bi ibà baan a Nzam. Mbuur awà ayöb Nzam, wàmukiweemà. Mbuur mpa awà wà Nzam, kiweemà anki. Apan, bi ban'yöb Dweelà a ndandaa anà dweelà làfàbwiy ndwaŋ.
1JO 4:7 Abun, atɔŋ amɛ, wɛy bi ikwen bi a bi. Ntɔn ukwen bàfàfà akà Nzam, anà mbuur wanswà afàkwen, bun'bör amu Nzam anà nde akyun'kwen.
1JO 4:8 Wɛɛ, mbuur mpa afàkwen kàyöb anki Nzam, ntɔn Nzam wà ukwen.
1JO 4:9 Apan, làler, ukwen a Nzam bàfàmɛnà aben uboo a bi: Nzam kàtöm Mwan ande mwɛy mpɛl u mɛɛn, ntɔn bi iwɛl mɔ̈ɔ̈ u mbwo a nde.
1JO 4:10 Le, ukwen ininà: kà bi anki kàkwen Nzam, wɛɛ nde kikwen, waa kàtöm Mwan ande asànaa ibɔɔn ntɔn ndwääl a man'be abi.
1JO 4:11 Ankwen amɛ, isàkal naa Nzam kikwen abun, bi sye, ikwen bi a bi.
1JO 4:12 Akà mbuur mwɛy kàtääŋ anki Nzam. Isàkal naa bi ban'kwen bi a bi, Nzam wà amu bi, anà ukwen ande amu bi bàŋàkwo.
1JO 4:13 Unsà yayi, bi ifàtà imbäl naa bi ibà amu nde, anà nde amu bi: nde kipɛ Dweelà ande.
1JO 4:14 Anà bi, bi kàkyer un'tääŋ, waa bi ifàtà imbäl naa Taa kàtöm Mwan asànaa Un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mɛɛn.
1JO 4:15 Mbuur wanswà afàtà imbäl naa Yɛsu wà Mwan a Nzam, Nzam wà amu nde, nde wà amu Nzam.
1JO 4:16 Waa bi, bi ban'yöb anà ban'sà làkwikilà naa Nzam akyikwen. Nzam wà ukwen. Mbuur awà uboo a ukwen wà amu Nzam, anà Nzam wà amu nde.
1JO 4:17 Undiir uleŋà ukwen aŋàkwo uboo abi, wà naa bi ikäl aŋàyɔl a làkyän kà ilä a nsaŋ. Bi isàkal abwɛy, ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi u mɛɛn mà wà asànaa awà wànde.
1JO 4:18 Bɔɔmà batɛy uboo a ukwen. Ukwen aŋàkwo bàfàpiy bɔɔmà, ntɔn bɔɔmà bafàyà mpal bàfàdil ntaaŋàmbar. Anà mbur afàman bɔɔmà ukwen ande kà bàŋakwo anki.
1JO 4:19 Akà bi, bi ikyer afàkwen, ntɔn Nzam kàtwab atikwen.
1JO 4:20 Isàkal naa mbuur an'tɛn naa: « Mɛ in'kwen Nzam », wɛɛ nde an'yiiŋà un'tɔŋ ande, nde wà mbuur a loor, ntɔn mbuur mpa ukwen un'tɔŋ awà ukàmanà nde, ukwe anki mukwen Nzam mpa ukàmanà nde.
1JO 4:21 Anà, le nswɛɛŋ ban'kwo bi mukaar akà nde: mbuur awà akwen Nzam, wɛy ukwen sye un'tɔŋ ande.
1JO 5:1 Mbuur awà an'sà làkwikilà naa Yɛsu wà Klistɔ, bàmubɔr amu Nzam, anà mbuur awà akwen Taa, mbuur afàpà mɔ̈ɔ̈, nde afàkwen sye mbuur bàbɔ̈r amu Nzam.
1JO 5:2 Muyöb naa bi ikwen baan a Nzam, bi ikwen Nzam anà isyääl nswɛɛŋ ande.
1JO 5:3 Ntɔn mukwen Nzam yà mukwey nswɛɛŋ ande. Nswɛɛŋ ande ayi buur batɛy,
1JO 5:4 ntɔn mbuur wanswà bàbör amu Nzam, wà ŋiböŋ u mɛɛn. Anà mbwo muwal iböŋ u mɛɛn yà làkwikilà abi.
1JO 5:5 Nà awà ŋiböŋ u mɛɛn, isàkɔɔn akal mbuur afàsà làkwikilà naa Yɛsu wà Mwan a Nzam?
1JO 5:6 Yɛsu Klistɔ wà mbuur kàyi u mbwo a an'dà anà an'kil, kà nà unsà an'dà mpɛl anki, wɛɛ unsà an'dà anà an'kil, anà Dweelà ataa imbäl, ntɔn Dweelà wàndandaa.
1JO 5:7 Abun, ba batär bàmutà imbäl,
1JO 5:8 dweelà, an'dà anà an'kil, bya byàtär byà mwɛy.
1JO 5:9 Isàkal naa bi ban'kyey imbäl a baar, imbäl a Nzam kyà kyàkölàköl, ntɔn kya kyà imbäl a Nzam, nde imbäl aki kàtɛ ntɔn Mwan ande.
1JO 5:10 Mbuur awe anà làkwikilà akà Mwan a Nzam, nde we anà imbäl aki amu nde ŋakwo. Wɛɛ mbuur akɔ̈ɔ̈n làkwikilà, Nzam afun'buul mbuur a loor, ntɔn nde làkwikilà latɛy unsà imbäl kàtɛ Nzam ntɔn Mwan ande.
1JO 5:11 Le imbäl ki: Nzam kipɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye, wɛɛ mɔ̈ɔ̈ wà amu Mwan ande.
1JO 5:12 Mbuur awe anà Mwan we anà mɔ̈ɔ̈, mbuur awà akɔ̈ɔ̈n Mwan a Nzam, nde mɔ̈ɔ̈ watɛy.
1JO 5:13 Amàlasöön mɛ indiir abi yà ntɔn naa bɛ làyöb naa bɛ labye anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye, bɛ baar làbye anà làkwikilà kà ikɔb a Mwan a Nzam.
1JO 5:14 Apan, làkyän ibà bi alà kusà a nde lalà: isàkal naa bi ban'lɔm undiir asànaa abà ukwen ande, nde akyer afiwem.
1JO 5:15 Anà, isàkal naa bi ikyàyöb naa nde akyer afiwem, bi ibye anà làkyän naa bi ban'wal undiir kan'lɔm bi akà nde.
1JO 5:16 Isàkal naa mbuur an'man un'tɔŋ ande wàmukyer man'be, man'be mpa ifàtwaal ukwà, wɛy nde uyamà, waa Nzam usun'pà mɔ̈ɔ̈, isàkal naa ndandaa man'be kan'kyer nde mun'syen anki kà ukwà. Wɛɛ mye anà man'be màfàsyen mbuur kà ukwà, kà ntɔn man'be a tub amà anki mɛ in'tɛɛnà muyamà.
1JO 5:17 Ube banswà bà man'be, wɛɛ man'be manswà ifàsyen anki kà ukwà.
1JO 5:18 Bi ikyàyöb naa mbuur wanswà awà bàbɔ̈r amu Nzam ufàfàkyer anki man'be, ntɔn Mwan a Nzam nde ŋakwo akyer afun'tii. Wɛɛ Un'be kun'kyer anki akà undiir mwɛy.
1JO 5:19 Bi ikyàyöb naa bi ibà baan a Nzam, wɛɛ mɛɛn manswà mà ungyɛl a imwol a Un'be.
1JO 5:20 Bi ikyàyöb naa Mwan a Nzam kàkyàyà anà kipɛ un'yɛnà ntɔn muyöb Nzam a ndandaa. Abun, bi ibà uboo a Ndandaa, amu Mwan ande Yɛsu Klistɔ, Nde wà Ndandaa, nde wà Nzam anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye.
1JO 5:21 Baan amɛ, làkäl bɛ ŋakwo ukwɛl anà itɛk.
2JO 1:1 Mɛ undweer, an'söön Un'kaar kàsɔ̈ɔ̈l Nzam anà baan ande abà in'kwen mɛ u pɛɛlà a ndandaa. Kà ntɔn mɛ mpɛl anki, wɛɛ sye akà baar banswà abye anà ngyööb a ndandaa,
2JO 1:2 ntɔn ndandaa ayà uboo a bi, anà isàkal ipepey anà bi.
2JO 1:3 Kab a ngway, ngyɛb anà duu amà man'fà akà Taa Nzam, anà akà Yɛsu Klistɔ, Mwan a Taa, màyàkal anà bi ntɔn bi ikäl anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ unsà ndandaa anà ukwen.
2JO 1:4 Mɛ kàmɛn un'sak mbɔɔn muman baan angye bumwɛy: mɔ̈ɔ̈ aba ban'pà u mbwo a ndandaa, asànaa nswɛɛŋ kàwɛl bi akà Taa.
2JO 1:5 Apà, Un'kaar, mɛ amàlɔm apanà, mɛ kà nswɛɛŋ akün kàlasöön anki, wɛɛ ya akwà awà bi ayà fà nsɛmà: wɛy bi ikwen bi a bi.
2JO 1:6 Ler naa ukwen bà nkye: naa bi ipe mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi u mbwo a nswɛɛŋ ande. Asànaa nswɛɛŋ làwem bɛ fà nsɛmà, ntɔn bɛ làläb mbwo ayin.
2JO 1:7 Ntɔn abwiiy mbɔɔn bàkyàpää u mɛɛn: ba làkwikilà bàfàsà anki u ngyeel a Yɛsu Klistɔ unsà imbuur. Yà unsà yayin waa bàyöb un'bwiiy anà un'yiiŋ a Klistɔ.
2JO 1:8 Làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ bɛ ŋakwo, ntɔn bweel a isal abi bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n akyà bwà, wɛɛ bɛ làwɛl bweel aŋàkwo.
2JO 1:9 Mbuur wanswà mpa awà uboo a an'lɔɔŋ a Klistɔ, wɛɛ akwen ukyà kwɛl, nde un'tüüb watɛy ana Nzam. Mbuur awà uboo a an'lɔɔŋ amà, wàŋàtüüb anà Taa anà Mwan.
2JO 1:10 Isàkal naa mbuur an'yà akà bɛ, anà kàlatwääl anki an'lɔɔŋ amà, twon lun'wɛl, twon lun'pɛ mbɔr sye.
2JO 1:11 Ntɔn mbuur awun'pà mbɔr, nde an'bulà un'yööb ande unsà isal ande byà ibe.
2JO 1:12 Mɛ in'yàfàkal anà indiir mbɔɔn mukalasöön, wɛɛ mɛ inkwen anki musɔn unsà làkay a un'kaan anà tin. Ntɔn mbalà yumwɛy mɛ in'yà akà bɛ anà mutɛn unsà ndaa a duu, abun un'sak abi asàkal wàŋàkwo.
2JO 1:13 Mbɔr yi yan'fà akà baan a mpääŋ angye wàŋàsɔɔl.
3JO 1:1 Mɛ undweer, an'sɔ̈ɔ̈n Gäyus, awà in'kwen mɛ unsà pɛɛlà a ndandaa.
3JO 1:2 Nkwen amɛ, mɛ in'kwen naa ngye aböŋ unsà indiir byanswà, akäl ubwaŋ, anà un'swey a mɔ̈ɔ̈ angye ukyen usà.
3JO 1:3 Abun, mɛ kàsäŋ mbɔɔn, ntɔn atɔŋ bàyi pà bàmutà imbäl a ndandaa ikamɛnà u mɔ̈ɔ̈ angye: ngye, ngye awà uboo a ndandaa.
3JO 1:4 Un'sak amɛ wà mbɔɔn muwem naa mɔ̈ɔ̈ a baan amɛ wà uboo a ndandaa.
3JO 1:5 Un'sam, ngye awà wàlää unsà indiir akyerà ngye ntɔn atɔŋ, itàkal ntɔn angyey.
3JO 1:6 Ba bàtɛ imbäl a un'kaay angye kusà a Ikööŋ. Ngye asàkyer ubwaŋ mukapà indiir byanswà abà ba abyà mfun ntɔn nkyeen aba, asànaa ukwen Nzam.
3JO 1:7 Yà ntɔn ikɔb a Yɛsu waa ba bàwɛl mbwo mukyà, ukɔɔn akyey akà undiir mwɛy akà baar mpa abà Ayudà.
3JO 1:8 Abun, abà buur abi mukaar baar a tub abà, anà bi mukal abaay ntɔn ndandaa.
3JO 1:9 Mɛ kàsɔ̈ɔ̈n Ikööŋ undiir mwɛy, wɛɛ Dyɔtɛrfɛs awà akwen muyaal indiir byanswà, nde bi ufiwal anki.
3JO 1:10 Mpal in'yàyà mɛ sye, mɛ in'kyer ayàsà kà imɛɛy nsyääl ande, nde mbuur afàpay làsaŋ a làbe ntɔn bi: kà nà ntɔn abwɛy mpel anki, nde kàkyer atɔn nde ŋakwo muwal atɔŋ abà bàlyaaŋ. Baar abà bàlàwal atɔŋ abà, nde ba kàkyer atsuŋ anà kàkyer aböŋ kà Ikööŋ.
3JO 1:11 Un'sam amɛ, twon an'lab ube, wɛɛ lab ubwaŋ. Mbuur afàkyer ubwaŋ wà wà Nzam, mbuur afàkyer ube uyöb anki Nzam.
3JO 1:12 Wɛɛ, ntɔn Dɛmɛtiris, mbuur wanswà afun'tɛɛl imbäl aŋàbwaŋ. Ndandaa ŋakwo yàmutà imbäl ntɔn nde. Wɛɛ bi sye, bi kun'tɛɛl imbäl, anà ngye akyàyɔ̈b naa imbäl a bi kyà ndandaa.
3JO 1:13 Mɛ in'yàkal anà indiir mukasöön, wɛɛ mɛ in'kwen anki mukyer anà tin anà inzar.
3JO 1:14 Ntɔn, mɛ in'sii mukaman itaan a mbɔɔn tɛy anà bi, bi ikyer asàyäm u ndaa a duu.
3JO 1:15 Wɛy duu làkäl anà ngye. Atɔŋ angye bàmapà mbɔr. Mbɔr akà asam, akà mbuur mbuur ukɔl.
JUD 1:1 Yude, un'syääl a Yɛsu Klistɔ, anà un'tɔŋ a Zyak. Akà baar kàbel anà kàkwen Taa Nzam, anà bayee ntɔn Yɛsu Klistɔ.
JUD 1:2 Wɛy kab a ngway, duu anà ukwen byàkäl mbɔɔn anà bɛ.
JUD 1:3 Asam amɛ, abun mɛ kàkäl anà ilɛɛm mukàlasöön ntɔn ndaa iler mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi banswà. Kyekà, mɛ an'man naa yà ndöŋ mukàlasöön un'kaan awà ntɔn mukàlapà un'kanà bɛ munwaan ntɔn làkwikilà alà bàsàsye ipepey akà aŋikyɛɛl.
JUD 1:4 Ntɔn bye anà baar abe bàkyàbilà kunku uboo abɛ. Ba bàkyàkwaar kab a ngway a Nzam abi ntɔn mubuul la ndaa a nswɛn. Abun, ba bàfàtɔn Nkum abi mwɛy mpɛl, Mwol Yɛsu Klistɔ. Ntaaŋàmbar a baar abà, bàsön fà itaan.
JUD 1:5 Mɛ in'kwen mukàlayɔɔb, itàkal naa bɛ làkyàyöb indiir byanswà, Mwol, ungö mutswà un'sɛŋ ande mɔ̈ɔ̈ u Ngipiti, kàdwä baar bàkäl anà mpem a bwoor.
JUD 1:6 Akyeey mpa bàkäär ibyääl aba, wɛɛ bàwɛy ndwà aba ŋakwo, nde ba kayee ipepey bàŋàbäm in'siŋ u làpib, ntɔn Ilä a kölàköl kyà nsaŋ.
JUD 1:7 Layɔbà Sɔdɔm anà Gɔmɔr anà an'bul a tsütsü: asànaa akyeey, baar abà bàbilà afwee mukyer ipasàsɛ anà ndaa a ŋingyäy. Ba bàleŋà mutüüb ndür anà akyeey kàtöm Nzam. Ba bàmukuur a ntaaŋàmbar a mbaa a mbul a in'tye, anà ya yà ntɔn muwey baar banswà.
JUD 1:8 Ifà imwɛy sye, baar abanà, unsà ukɔŋ aba, ba bàfàsà làbiin u ndür, bàfàbɛy imwol anà bàfàto aŋàlàkoo.
JUD 1:9 Kyekà, itàkal Mishɛl, mfum a akyeey, umpal kàsi nde mbaaŋ anà kànüün nde ndür a Mɔsɛ anà ileŋ, nde kun'tö anki in'tswe, wɛɛ nde kàtɛn naa: « Wɛy Mwol kapɛ ntaaŋàmbar! »
JUD 1:10 Wɛɛ baar abanà bàfàbɛy indiir byanswà mpa bàyɔ̈b ba, anà indiir byanswà bàyöb ba unsà imbuur asànaa an'kyän a ntsür ikɔ̈ɔ̈n un'yɛnà, u mbwo abyà ba bàfàkyà ukwà.
JUD 1:11 Ngyɛb akà ba, ntɔn ba bàläb mbwo a Kayin. Ntɔn ukwen a ngim, ba bàbilà unsà ibii asànaa Balam, ba bàkü ntɔn un'tswe bwoor aba asànaa Kɔrɛ.
JUD 1:12 Ba bà baar bàfàtay isaa a ibööl abɛ, ntsü bàfàkyɔm ba anà bàfàyööl ba an'bäl ukɔɔn nswɛn. Ba bà asànaa in'böŋ ifiikyà a in'pöb anà mpa myàfàpà mbul. Ba bà ifà imwɛy anà in'te mpa myàfàbɔr akà imbɛŋ mwɛy, itàkal naa u paŋà myàfàfulà in'te. Abun, mya myàŋàkwà mbalà yweel, in'swɛy myàŋàtsuum.
JUD 1:13 Ba bà asànaa ibɔ a an'dà byànkyɛl byà ngyäl abyà ifàful nswɛn aba. Ba bà asànaa mbwaar ifiikyà kyà a kyà, anà nde kàkyàlɔn ikal a ipepey uboo a diŋdiŋ a mpib ntɔn ba.
JUD 1:14 Akà ba sye isàkwo ngɔɔm a Ɛnɔk, mbuur wà nsambwaar fà Adam ayà itɛn naa: « Le, Mwol asàtwaal nsaab anà nsaab akyeey ande,
JUD 1:15 ntɔn mutsul nsaŋ a baar banswà. Nde asàpà ntaaŋàmbar akà baar a man'be banswà, ntɔn ndaa aba yà ube mubɛy Nzam. Nde asapà ntaaŋàmbar ntɔn isal aba byà ibe byanswà bàkyer ba akà nde ukɔɔn inzaam, anà ntɔn ndaa a bwoor bàtɛn baar a man'be akà nde.
JUD 1:16 Baar abà bà baar bàkɔ̈ɔ̈n un'sak, isal aba in'tär anà in'tär, ba bàfàlab an'kyän aba mabe. Ba bàfàtɛn ndaa mwɛy yà uyɔl anà bàfàlwab baar ntɔn muwal bweel.
JUD 1:17 Wɛɛ akà bɛ, asam amɛ, làyɔbà ndaa bàlakyään antööm a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ kusà.
JUD 1:18 Ba bàlakyään naa: « Utaaŋ a ntsüü, bàsàkal anà aŋasɛɛ anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ aba asàkal asànaa abyà ilään a mbe aba. »
JUD 1:19 Bɛ lan'man baar bàfitwääl nkaabà, an'kyän aba mà an'kyän a mɛɛn, Dweelà akà ba watɛy.
JUD 1:20 Wɛɛ bɛ, asam amɛ, làläb mutɔŋ mɔ̈ɔ̈ abɛ udu a làkwikilà abɛ là in'kyɛɛl. Làyamà unsà Dweelà In'kyɛɛl.
JUD 1:21 Làbwaay unsà ukwen a Nzam, làsi làkyän abɛ unsà ubwaŋ a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ ntɔn mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye.
JUD 1:22 Baar abà an'kɛr an'kɛr, lawɛm ngyɛb.
JUD 1:23 Bamwɛy latsü mɔ̈ɔ̈ mukagyɔɔr u mbaa, bumwɛy lawem ngyɛb anà bɔɔmà: twon lan'sin apà ba, itàkal muba ipfɛy aba byàŋàtay a làbiin a ndür aba.
JUD 1:24 Akà mbuur kan'kwo mukàlatii ntɔn bɛ làkɔ̈ɔ̈n abwà anà nde kàlakäär umbäär kusà a làkoo ande ukɔɔn an'pɛl unsà un'sak mbɔɔn,
JUD 1:25 akà Nzam mwɛy un'tswää a mɔ̈ɔ̈ abi u mbwo a Mwol abi Yɛsu Klistɔ. Wɛy làkoo, uteer, unkaak a ngwal anà ikɔ̈b byàkäl anà nde, fà itaan, papanà, tii mbul a in'tye! Wöö wöö.
REV 1:1 Un'kaan wà we anà imɛɛy kàwɛl Yɛsu Klistɔ. Nzam kya kun'pɛ ntɔn nde uswɛŋ akà asyääl ande ndaa ayà iyà benàben. Yɛsu ya kàkyään akà un'syääl ande Ywan u mbwo a un'kyeey ande.
REV 1:2 Ywan wà mbäl a indiir byanswà kàmɛn nde: Ndaa a Nzam anà imbäl a Yɛsu Klistɔ.
REV 1:3 Un'sak akà mbuur akataŋà anà akà baar bàweemà ndaa a ngɔɔm ban'sɔn uboo kwo anà bàfàkaar ya. Ntɔn taaŋ là tsütsü mukwo.
REV 1:4 Ywan akà Ikööŋ nsambwaar abyà kà Azi: Kab a ngway anà duu màkäl anà bɛ. Ma man'fà akà mbuur kàkäl, awà paa anà uyà, anà akà an'dweelà nsambwaar amà kusà a kir a imwol,
REV 1:5 anà akà Yɛsu Klistɔ, mbäl afàkölà ndaa yanswà, nswɛm uboo a akü, mwol a amfum a mɛɛn. Akà mbuur afikwen, nde kitwey uboo a man'be abi u mbwo a an'kil ande,
REV 1:6 nde kibuul itsuŋ a angaŋ ntɔn musyääl Taarànde Nzam. Wɛy làkoo anà ngwal ikäl anà nde u mbul a in'tye! Yà abwɛy.
REV 1:7 Le, nde wàmuyà uboo a un'böŋ. Baar banswà bàkyer asun'man, itàkal baar akwà bun'pfuul: in'sɛŋ myanswà myà mɛɛn isàsà un'saabà ntɔn nde. Inye, yà abwɛy.
REV 1:8 Mwol, Nzam Aŋangwal, kan'tɛn naa: « Mɛ in'wà wàtàtwɛb anà wàntsüü, mbuur awà paa, awà kàkäl anà uyà. »
REV 1:9 Mɛ un'tɔŋ abɛ Ywan, mbuur kàtüüb mbwo anà bɛ unsà ngyɛb, unsà imfum anà muküünà amu Yɛsu. Mɛ kàkäl kà isaŋ a Patmɔs ntɔn Ndaa a Nzam anà imbäl a Yɛsu.
REV 1:10 Ilä a Mwol, Dweelà làkyer an'wal, mɛ kàwem ndaa a ngwal ungö a mɛ asànaa mfuŋ,
REV 1:11 yàmutɛn naa: « Undiir wanswà amanà ngye, sɔn wa uboo a un'kaan anà tɔm wa akà Ikööŋ nsambwaar: akà Ɛfɛsɔ, akà Smirne, akà Pɛrgam, akà Tyatir, akà Sardɛs, akà Filadɛlfi anà akà Lawɔdisɛ. »
REV 1:12 Mɛ kàkyer abulà ntɔn muyöb mbuur awà kàyäämà anà mɛ. Apan mɛ kàmɛn in'te a minà nsambwaar myà wɔl.
REV 1:13 Uboboo a mya kàkäl anà mbuur mwɛy asànaa mwan a mbuur, akyàbwaar mvwɛl anà un'kab a wɔl aŋàbäm kà itɔl.
REV 1:14 Un'tswe anà ntswe ande yàkäl yà pɛɛl asànaa ipfɛy a pɛɛl, asànaa mbul a pɛɛl. Mii ande myàkäl asànaa làlem a mbaa,
REV 1:15 in'kɔl ande asànaa ishabà bàfàbel naa brɔnze aŋàyir a mbaa, ndaa ande asànaa làso a iwɔɔl.
REV 1:16 U kɔɔ ande là ibaal, nde kàkäl anà mbwaar, mbwaar nsambwaar. Kɔm àŋàsye làyatoo u mun ande. Mun ande kàkäl asànaa taaŋ là paa in'ŋyäŋ u ngwal ande yanswà.
REV 1:17 Mpal kun'mɛn mɛ, mɛ kàbü kà in'kɔl ande asànaa mbuur aŋàkwà. Nde kàsi kɔɔ ande là ibaal udu a mɛ, anà mutɛn naa: « Twon an'man bɔɔmà! Mɛ in'wà mbuur atàtwɛb anà wàntsüü,
REV 1:18 anà wà Mɔ̈ɔ̈. Mɛ kàkyer akwà, wɛɛ le, mɛ in'we anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye. Nsab a ukwà anà an'lɔŋ yà u kɔɔ amɛ.
REV 1:19 Abun, sɔn indiir byanswà an'man ngye anà indiir isàyà ungö a bya.
REV 1:20 Ngyee a mbwaar nsambwaar amɛn ngye u kɔɔ amɛ là ibaal anà in'te a minà nsambwaar myà wɔl ayi: mbwaar nsambwaar yà akyeey a Ikööŋ nsambwaar, in'te a minà nsambwaar myà Ikööŋ nsambwaar. »
REV 2:1 « Sɔn akà un'kyeey a Ikööŋ akyà u Ɛfɛsɔ abà: "Le ndaa ukatɛɛnà mbuur kan'kaar mbwaar nsambwaar u kɔɔ ande là ibaal, awà afàkyà uboo a ndem a mbaa nsambwaar yà wɔl:
REV 2:2 Mɛ in'kyàyöb nsyääl angye, isal angye anà muküünà angye. Mɛ in'kyàyöb sye naa ngye afàkyey anki baar a nkyɛl, naa ngye kàsii baar abà bàfàkyey uyɔl naa ba bà antööm, wɛɛ ba kà bà antööm anki, anà ngye kàmɛɛy loor aba.
REV 2:3 Ngye awe anà muküünà, ngye kàmɛn mpay ntɔn ikɔb amɛ anà ngye kàyɔ̈n anki.
REV 2:4 Wɛɛ undiir mpa in'wà mɛ un'sak anà ngye awà: ngye kàkyàpiy ukwen angye bànsɛmà.
REV 2:5 Yɔbà naa ngye kàfü ken muyàbwà abà. Tà an'kyän anà fuur nsyääl angye yà itaan. Naa tɛy, mɛ in'yàlwom làlem a mbaa angye kà ikal ala.
REV 2:6 Wɛɛ undiir aŋàbwaŋ ntɔn ngye awà: ngye afàtɔn nsyääl a Anikɔlayit asànaa mɛ.
REV 2:7 Wɛy mbuur awe anà an'tsü uwem ndaa ukatɛɛnà Dweelà akà Ikööŋ! « Akà mbuur awà asàwal iböŋ, mɛ in'sun'pà mbwo mudyà mbɛŋ a un'te a mɔ̈ɔ̈ awà uboo a paladisɔ a Nzam." »
REV 2:8 « Sɔn akà un'kyeey a Ikööŋ akyà u Smirne naa: "Le ndaa kan'tɛn mbuur wà Tàtwɛb anà wà Ngöngö, mbuur awà kàkü anà kàfàwiyà:
REV 2:9 Mɛ in'kyàyöb ngyɛb aŋàdiir angye anà làmbwà angye - itàkal naa ngye awà ŋun'naaŋ, anà un'siinà a baar bàfàkyey uyɔl naa ba bà Ayudà, mpa bàtàkal ba Ayudà: Ba bà ndwà a nköŋ a Satanà!
REV 2:10 Twon an'man bɔɔmà ntɔn mpay asàman ngye. Le, ileŋ asàtɔɔm amwɛy uboo a bɛ u bɔlokà ntɔn musi bɛ, ba bàsàlamɛɛy nkwaaŋ ilä kwem. Kal wà swalaa tii kà ukwà, waa mɛ in'sabwää mpà a mɔ̈ɔ̈. »
REV 2:11 « Wɛy mbuur awe anà an'tsü, uwem ndaa ukatɛɛnà Dweelà akà Ikööŋ! » « Mbuur asàwal iböŋ usàman anki mpay a nkweel yàyweel. »
REV 2:12 « Sɔn akà un'kyeey awà kà Ikööŋ akyà u Pɛrgam naa: Le ndaa ukatɛɛnà mbuur awe anà kɔm aŋàsye:
REV 2:13 Mɛ in'kyàyöb naa ngye afàkal ken: kà ikal alà Kir a imwol a Satanà. Wɛɛ ngye akyàndäär anà ikɔb amɛ, ngye kàtön anki làkwikilà amɛ, itàkal mpal bàdwä ba Antipas, mbäl amɛ wà swalaa, u bul abɛ, kà ikal ufàbwaay Satanà.
REV 2:14 Wɛɛ mɛ, mɛ in'we anà pɛl làmwɛy ntɔn ngye: akà ngye bye anà baar bàkyànääm a an'lɔɔŋ a Balam awà kàlwɛŋà Balak naa nde baan a Isàlɛl kabwiy aben: nde kasiinà ba mudyà in'twaŋ bàfàlääm akɔl anà mukyer ipasàsɛ.
REV 2:15 Akà ngye sye bye anà bumwɛy bàkyàbääb a an'lɔɔŋ a Anikɔlayit.
REV 2:16 Abun, buul mpem angye, naa tɛy, mɛ in'yà akà ngye benàben alà ntɔn munwan anà ba anà kɔm làfàtoo u mun amɛ. »
REV 2:17 « Wɛy mbuur awe anà an'tsü uwem ndaa ukatɛɛnà Dweelà akà Ikööŋ! » « Mbuur asàwal iböŋ, mɛ in'sun'pà mane aŋàyee, mɛ in'sun'pà un'kul a pɛɛl. Udu awa kyàŋàsɔn ikɔb akün mpa uyöb mbuur isàkɔɔn akal mbuur kan'wal kya. »
REV 2:18 « Sɔn akà un'kyeey a Ikööŋ akyà u Tyatir naa: Le ndaa utɛɛnà Mwan a Nzam, mbuur awe anà mii asànaa làlem a mbaa anà in'kɔl asànaa brɔnze aŋàlɛɛŋ.
REV 2:19 Mɛ in'kyàyöb isal angye, ukwen angye, làkwikilà angye, nsyääl angye anà muküünà angye. Isal angye byà ntsüü byan'söön byàtàtwɛb.
REV 2:20 Wɛɛ mɛ in'we anà pɛl làmwɛy ntɔn ngye: ngye akyàpà mbwo akà Yɛsàbɛl, un'kaar awà afàtɛn naa nde wà ŋangɔɔm anà afàbwiy asyääl amɛ ndwaŋ mukalɔŋ naa ba bàkyer ipasàsɛ anà bàdi in'twaŋ bàfàlääm akɔl.
REV 2:21 Mɛ kun'wɛy taaŋ mubuul mpem ande, wɛɛ nde ukwen anki mutoo unsà ipasàsɛ ande.
REV 2:22 Le, mɛ in'yun'wɔm udu a itäb anà in'yun'tööm ngyɛb aŋàdiir, nde anà baar ufàtà nde abà inswem, isàkal naa ba bàsɔɔm anki nsyääl aba.
REV 2:23 Yumwɛy, mɛ in'sàdwa baan ande. Abun, Ikööŋ byanswà waa byàsàyöb naa mɛ in'wà mbuur in'fàyöb an'kyän anà ngyal a baar. Mbuur mbuur uboo a bɛ mɛ in'sun'pà asànaa iyà nsyääl ande. »
REV 2:24 « Wɛɛ akà bɛ baar làbà u Tyatir mpa làbilà unsà nkääl a ube ayi anà làkɔ̈ɔ̈n aleŋ indübà a Satanà asànaa bàtɛɛnà ba, mɛ buur asin in'fàlakwɛy anki.
REV 2:25 Wɛɛ undiir làwe bɛ awà, làkäär wa ubwaŋàbwaŋ tii mpal in'sàyà mɛ.
REV 2:26 Akà mbuur asàwal iböŋ anà asàkaar nsyääl amɛ tii u ntsüü, mɛ in'sun'pà ikɔ̈b udu a in'sɛŋ.
REV 2:27 Nde asayaal a un'aŋ a ibeenà asànaa bàfàbɔl an'buuŋ amà bàböm anà tɔm. »
REV 2:28 « Ikɔ̈b aki mɛ ŋakwo kya kàwɛl akà Taaràmɛ. Mɛ in'sun'pà sye mbwaar a tutu. »
REV 2:29 « Wɛy mbuur awe anà an'tsü uwem ndaa utɛɛnà Dweelà akà Ikööŋ! »
REV 3:1 « Sɔn akà un'kyeey a Ikööŋ akyà u Sardes: Mbuur awe anà an'dweelà nsambwaar mà Nzam anà mbwaar nsambwaar atɛɛnà abà: Mɛ in'kyàyöb nsyääl angye: ngye akyàtoo làpaan naa ngye awe anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ kyekà ngye awà un'kü!
REV 3:2 Kal kà igyɛɛŋ! Kaar ubwaŋàbwaŋ undiir an'saal ngye awà kusà wa mukwà ipepey. Ntɔn mɛ in'sàman anki nkääl angye yàŋàbwaŋ u mii a Nzam amɛ.
REV 3:3 Abun, yɔbà ya yanswà kàwɛl ngye anà kàwem ngye, kaar ya, waa akyey man'be angye. Isàkal naa ngye mii aduub anki, mɛ in'sàyà asànaa mbüb, ngye asàyöb anki naa taaŋ nà mɛ in'sàyakuum.
REV 3:4 Itàkal abà, uboo a Sardes, ngye awe anà ndam a baar mpa bàbi ipfɛy aba. Ba bàkyer asàkan'swà, bàŋàbwaar ipfey a pɛɛl, ntɔn ba bàŋàkwo. »
REV 3:5 « Abun, mbuur asàwal iböŋ, asàbwaar ipfɛy a pɛɛl. Mɛ in'sàbiiŋ anki ikɔb ande uboo a un'kaan a mɔ̈ɔ̈. Mɛ in'fàsàyɔbà ikɔb ande kusà a Taaràmɛ anà kusà a akyeey ande. »
REV 3:6 « Wɛy mbuur awe anà an'tsü, uwem ndaa utɛɛnà Dweelà akà Ikööŋ! »
REV 3:7 « Sɔn akà un'kyeey awà kà Ikööŋ akyà u Filadɛlfi naa: « Ŋun'kyɛɛl anà wà Ndandaa, mbuur afàkaar nsab a mfum David, awà afàduub, wɛɛ mbuur asàbäm watɛy, awà afàbäm, wɛɛ mbuur asàduub watɛy, kan'tɛn naa:
REV 3:8 Mɛ in'kyàyöb nkääl angye. Mɛ kàduub ibeenà kusà a ngye, wɛɛ akà mbuur mwɛy ukwe anki mubäm kya. Ngye ngwal a mbɔɔn yatɛy, wɛɛ ngye kàläb ndaa amɛ, ngye ikɔb amɛ kàtön anki.
REV 3:9 Le, mɛ amapà baar a ndwà a nköŋ a Satanà, baar bàfàtɛn naa ba bà Ayudà, wɛɛ ba kà Ayudà anki, ntɔn ba bàfàtà loor. Le, mɛ in'kyer asatwaal ntɔn ba bàyàbwà an'köm kusà a ngye, waa ba bàsàyöb naa mɛ ngye akyakwen.
REV 3:10 Ntɔn kàläb ngye ndaa amɛ unsà muküünà, mɛ sye in'kyer asatii mpal isàyà nsii u mɛɛn manswà, nsii ayà bàsàsà ntɔn baar a mɛɛn.
REV 3:11 Mɛ in'wà tsütsü muyà. Kaar ubwaŋàbwaŋ undiir awà ngye awà, manà mbuur asin uyàgyɔɔr mpà a iböŋ angye. »
REV 3:12 « Mbuur asàwal iböŋ, mɛ in'sun'sà ta uboo a idwà a Nzam amɛ, nde ufàsàtoo anki akà ikikye. Mɛ in'sàsɔn ikɔb a Nzam amɛ udu a nde, anà ikɔb a Yɛlusàlɛm làkün, bul alà lan'fà du akà Nzam amɛ, anà ikɔb amɛ kyàkün. »
REV 3:13 « Wɛy mbuur awe anà an'tsü, uwem ndaa utɛɛnà Dweelà akà Ikööŋ! »
REV 3:14 « Sɔn akà un'kyeey a Ikööŋ akyà u Lawɔdisɛ naa: « Le ndaa utɛɛnà Amɛn, mbäl a lää anà wàndandaa, mbuur kàkyer Nzam indiir byanswà u mbwo a nde:
REV 3:15 Mɛ in'kyàyöb nkääl angye. Mɛ in'kyàyöb naa ngye awà un'lɛy. Ngye alàkal akà mpye itàkal akà mbaa!
REV 3:16 Wɛɛ ngye mbaa yatɛy, mpye yatɛy, ngye awà un'lɛy, kyakin mɛ in'kyer asalwo!
REV 3:17 Ntɔn ngye akatɛɛnà naa: "Mɛ in'wà ŋun'naaŋ, mɛ akyàtà bweel, mɛ ndöŋ a undiir asin yatɛy." Wɛɛ ngye ayöb anki naa ngye awà mbuur a ngyɛb, wànsyääm, ŋàlàmbwà, ikwàmii anà wànsàpɔl.
REV 3:18 Kyakin mɛ amalɔm naa ngye asöm akà mɛ wɔl aŋàyir u mbaa ntɔn ngye abulà ŋun'naaŋ, anà ipfɛy a pɛɛl ntɔn mubwaar ntɔn nswɛn a nsàpɔl angye ikɔ̈ɔ̈n amɛnà, anà un'nɔ̈ ntɔn musɔŋ mii angye anà ngye afurà muman.
REV 3:19 Mɛ, mɛ in'fàŋän anà in'fàlɔ̈ɔ̈n baar banswà in'fàkwen mɛ. Abun, kal anà mbämà, buul mpem angye.
REV 3:20 Le, mɛ awà u munàmbwo, in'wàmubɛɛrà. Isàkal naa mbuur an'wem ndaa amɛ anà an'duub ibɛɛnà, mɛ in'sàbilà u ndwà ande, mɛ in'sàdyà anà nde, nde anà mɛ. »
REV 3:21 « Akà mbuur asàwal iböŋ, mɛ in'sun'pà mbwo mubwaay anà mɛ u kir a imwol amɛ, asànaa mɛ sye kàwɛl mɛ iböŋ anà kàkàbwaay mɛ anà Taaràmɛ u kir a imwol ande. »
REV 3:22 « Wɛy mbuur awe anà an'tsü, uwem ndaa utɛɛnà Dweelà akà Ikööŋ! »
REV 4:1 Ungö apan, mɛ kàmɛn ibeenà aŋàduub u du. Ndaa atàtwɛb yàtɛn a mɛ, asànaa mfuŋ, ayi: « Yaläär pà, waa mɛ aswaŋ ndaa iyàyà ungö. »
REV 4:2 Apan sye Dweelà waa kan'wɛl. Wɛɛ le, u du kwo làkäl anà kir a imwol, mbuur mwɛy kàkäl wàŋàbwaay udu ala.
REV 4:3 Mbuur kàkäl aŋàbwaay kàkäl asànaa in'kul a ntal amyà bàfàbel naa yaspe anà sardwan, kir a imwol làkäl uboo a unkwal a mbul awà kàkäl asànaa un'kul a ntal awà bàfàbel naa ɛmɛrɔde.
REV 4:4 Umbil a kir a imwol màkäl anà an'kir asin mà imwol an'kwem mɔ̈ɔ̈l aŋinà: andweer an'kwem mɔ̈ɔ̈l aŋinà bàkäl bàŋàbwaay udu a ma, bàkyàbwaar ipfɛy a pɛɛl anà mpà a imfum a wɔl kun'tswe aba.
REV 4:5 In'nyäŋ anà ndaa anà idum myàyatoo u kir a imwol. Ndem a mbaa nswambwaar ayà an'dweelà nsambwaar mà Nzam yàmulɛɛmà kusà a kir a imwol.
REV 4:6 Kusà a Kir a imwol kàkäl sye anà ngyäl a kölàköl wà tsɛk tsɛk asànaa talàtal. Uboboo a kir a imwol anà ukɔl bye anà ikyeer a mɔ̈ɔ̈ inà byàŋàyɔl a mii kusà anà ungö.
REV 4:7 Ikyeer kyàtàtwɛb ifà akya asànaa ntaamà, kyàyweel asànaa un'tö a un'kɔk, kyàtär asànaa ntabwey a mbuur, kyànà asànaa inkaak kyàmuyifumà.
REV 4:8 Umwɛy umwɛy uboo a ikyeer a mɔ̈ɔ̈ byà inà kàkäl anà an'paab, an'paab an'syaam màŋàyɔl a mii u mbil anà uboo a ma. Mpib anà mwäänà bya byàfàyɔn anki mukyään naa: « In'kyɛɛl, in'kyɛɛl, in'kyɛɛl, Mwol, Nzam a ngwal yanswà, mbuur kàkäl, awà paa anà ayà. »
REV 4:9 Taaŋ lanswà byàpɛɛ ikyeer abi làkoo, nsyäŋà anà nkömà akà mbuur kan'bwaay u kir a imwol, akà mbuur awe anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye,
REV 4:10 andweer an'kwem mɔ̈ɔ̈l aŋinà bàbwee an'köm kusà a mbuur kan'bwaay u kir a imwol. Ba bàkälà musyäŋà Ŋamɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye anà mutɔɔm mpà aba yà imfum kusà a kir a imwol anà mutɛn naa:
REV 4:11 « Mwol, Nzam abi, ngye an'kwo muwal làkoo, ibyääl anà ngwal. Ntɔn ngye mbuur kàkyer indiir byanswà, ngye kàkwen naa bya ikäl, bya sye waa byàmɛnà. »
REV 5:1 U kɔɔ a ibaal a mbuur kan'bwaay u kir a imwol, mɛ kàmɛn un'kaan aŋàsɔn uboo anà u nsà, wàŋàbäm a inyɛm nsambwaar.
REV 5:2 Apan, mɛ kàmɛn un'kyeey a ngwal wàmulaal in'kwɛŋ u ndaa a ngwal naa: « Nà kan'kwo mulwom inyɛm anà muduub un'kaan? »
REV 5:3 Wɛɛ, itàkal u du, u mɛɛn anà u ngyɛl a mɛɛn, akà mbuur mwɛy kàkwe anki muduub anà muler un'kaan u boo.
REV 5:4 Mɛ kàkyer alel mbɔɔn muman naa akà mbuur mwɛy kàmɛnà anki awà kan'kwo muduub un'kaan anà muler wa u boo.
REV 5:5 Wɛɛ umwɛy uboo a andweer kàtɛn a mɛ naa: « Twon an'lel. Le, nde kàwɛl iböŋ, nde wà ntaamà a un'sɛŋ a Yudà, u mbil a David, nde asàduub un'kaan anà inyɛm awa byànsambwaar. »
REV 5:6 Apan, mɛ kàmɛn un'tö a un'kɔk asànaa wàŋàdwa an'yàtoo u boboo a kir a imwol anà ikyeer inà anà u boboo a andweer. Wa kàkäl anà mbwaŋ, mbwaŋ nsambwaar anà mii, mii nsambwaar amyà an'dweelà nsambwaar kàtöm Nzam u mɛɛn manswà.
REV 5:7 Un'tö a un'kɔk waa kàsin ntɔn muwal un'kaan u kɔɔ a ibaal a mbuur kan'bwaay u kir a imwol.
REV 5:8 Mpal kàwɛl nde un'kaan, ikyeer inà anà andweer an'kwem mɔ̈ɔ̈l aŋinà bàbü an'köm kusà a un'tö a un'kɔk. Umwɛy umwɛy kàkäl anà isyäŋ anà an'kɔɔb a wɔl màŋàyɔl a may a usɔŋ. Ayi yà ngyamàkà a baar in'kyɛɛl.
REV 5:9 Ba bàkäl mutɔl diim akün: « Ngye an'kwo muwal un'kaan anà muduub inyɛm awa. Ntɔn ngye bàkyer adwa, waa u mbwo a an'kil angye, ntɔn Nzam, ngye kàbeen baar a in'sɛŋ myanswà, ndaa yanswà, mbil yanswà anà nsi yanswà.
REV 5:10 Abun, ngye kàkyer imwol anà angaŋ ntɔn Nzam. Ba bàsàyaal mbul a in'tye u mɛɛn. »
REV 5:11 Ungö apan, mɛ kàmɛn anà kàwem ndaa a akyeey mbɔɔn anà ikyeer anà andweer bàŋàdiŋà kir a imwol. Ba bàkäl nkam a nsaab anà nsaab a nsaab.
REV 5:12 Ba bàkäl mutɛn u ndaa a ngwal naa: « Un'tö a un'kɔk awà bàdwä kan'kwo muwal un'kanà, un'naaŋ, an'yeerà anà ngwal, ibyääl, làkoo anà nsaak! »
REV 5:13 Apan mɛ kàfàwem indiir byanswà kàkyer Nzam u du, u mɛɛn, udu a ngyäl a kölàköl anà indiir byanswà abyà uboo kwo byàmutɔl an'diim naa: « Akà mbuur kan'bwaay u kir a imwol anà akà un'tö a un'kɔk, wɛy nsaak, ibyääl, làkoo anà ngwal byàkäl u mbul a in'tye! »
REV 5:14 Ikyeer byànà waa byàtɛɛnà naa: « Yà abwɛy! » Andweer bàbü an'köm, waa bàkömà.
REV 6:1 Ungö apan mɛ kàmɛn un'tö a un'kɔk wàmuduub inyɛm kyàtàtwɛb, mɛ kàwem umwɛy uboo a ikyeer a mɔ̈ɔ̈ kan'tɛn u ndaa a idum: « Yà! »
REV 6:2 In'kàler, kyekà mpoonà a pɛɛl kàkäl. Mbuur kàlär udu a wa kàkäl anà utà. Ba bun'pɛ mpà a imfum. Nde kàkyen wàŋàböŋ ntɔn mukàwal iböŋ.
REV 6:3 Mpal kàduub un'tö a un'kɔk inyɛm kyàyweel, mɛ kàwem ikyeer kyàyweel kyan'tɛn naa: « Yà! »
REV 6:4 Apan mpoonà asin wàŋɔɔ waa kàyàtoo. Mbuur kàlär udu a wa bun'pɛ ikɔ̈b mugyɔɔr duu a mɛɛn ntɔn baar bàküküül mbɛy. Ba bun'pɛ kɔm a kölàköl.
REV 6:5 Mpal kàduub un'tö a un'kɔk inyɛm kyàtär, mɛ kàwem ikyeer kyàtär kyan'tɛn naa: « Yà! » In'kàler, mpoonà a piil kàyàtoo. Mbuur kàlär udu a wa kàkäl anà undiir musi buur u kɔɔ ande.
REV 6:6 Mɛ kàwem asànaa ndaa uboboo a ikyeer a mɔ̈ɔ̈ byànà yàmutɛn naa: « Kilɔ mwɛy kyà blɛ ntɔn làfur a ilä mwɛy, bilɔ itär byà orze ntɔn làfur a ilä mwɛy. Wɛɛ twon an'ba may anà vin. »
REV 6:7 Mpal kàduub un'tö a un'kɔk inyɛm kyànà, mɛ kàwem ikyeer a mɔ̈ɔ̈ kyànà kyan'tɛn naa: « Yà! »
REV 6:8 In'kàler, mpoonà wà an'dà a sakàsak mà kakaa kan'yàtoo. Mbuur kàlär udu awa ikɔb ande « ukwà ». An'lɔŋ màkyer ayun'swà. Ba bapɛ ikɔ̈b udu a yar làmwɛy unsà an'yar an'nà mà mɛɛn, ntɔn mudwa baar a kɔm, a ngyal, a fway anà a ntsür a nkyɛl a mɛɛn.
REV 6:9 Mpal kàduub un'tö a un'kɔk inyɛm kyàtyeen, mɛ kàwem ungyɛl a mɛsà a ibɔɔn akɔl a baar bàdwä ntɔn ndaa a Nzam anà imbäl bàkäl ba akyà.
REV 6:10 Ba bàsi in'kwɛŋ u ndaa a ngwal: « Un'lɔɔŋ in'kyɛɛl anà wàndandaa, mpal nà ngye asàtsul nsaŋ anà asàfuur mfuur a an'kil abi akà baar a mɛɛn? »
REV 6:11 Apan, bàpɛ mvwɛl a pɛɛl akà umwɛy umwɛy uboo a ba anà bàtɛn a ba naa ba bàkäŋ mpem ikye tii mpal usàkwo un'taŋ a baar wanswà kàsäl aba ikal imwɛy anà wà atɔŋ aba abà badwä asànaa ba.
REV 6:12 Ungö apan, mpal kàduub un'tö a un'kɔk inyɛm kyàsyaam, mɛɛn màkyer atɛɛr a ngwal, taaŋ làbulà làpiil asànaa ngɔɔr bàkyer a in'kà a ntsür, nsöŋ wanswà kàbulà asànaa an'kil.
REV 6:13 Mbwaar yàfü du yàbü u mɛɛn, asànaa un'pöb a kölàköl kan'ni un'te a fige waa an'fige man'bwà.
REV 6:14 Du làkyer ayaalà asànaa un'kaan aŋàdiŋà, myɔŋ myanswà anà isaŋ byàkäl byàŋàlwomà kà ikal abya.
REV 6:15 Amfum a mɛɛn, abyääl, amfum a aŋità, aŋin'naaŋ, aŋangwal, baar banswà, asɔ anà baar a nsaay, bàkàyee uboo a mɔɔ anà uboo a nkɔŋ u myɔŋ.
REV 6:16 Ba bàtɛɛnà a myɔŋ anà nkɔŋ naa: « Làbü udu a bi, lifwee kusà a mbuur kan'bwaay udu a kir imwol anà kusà a nkyɛl a un'tö a un'kɔk.
REV 6:17 Ntɔn ilä a kölàköl kyà nkyɛl aba kyan'kwo. Nà kan'kwo mutsim? »
REV 7:1 Ungö apan, mɛ kàmɛn akyeey anà bà umbäär kà antwɛrà a mɛɛn man'nà. Ba bàkäl mutà in'pöb a mɛɛn myà in'nà mpi, ntɔn akà un'pöb mwɛy ukɔ̈ɔ̈n alyaaŋ udu a mɛɛn, udu a ngyäl itàkal udu a un'te mwɛy.
REV 7:2 Mɛ kàmɛn un'kyeey asin kan'too ntsü làfàsɛnà taaŋ. Nde kàkäär inyɛm a Nzam a mɔ̈ɔ̈ u kɔɔ ande. Nde kàsi in'kwɛŋ u ndaa a ngwal akà akyeey anà abà bàwɛl ikɔ̈b mupà mɛɛn anà ngyäl mpay:
REV 7:3 « Twon lan'kyer ube akà mɛɛn, akà ngyäl itàkal akà in'te kusà bi mutàsà inyɛm u ntabwey a asyääl a Nzam abi. »
REV 7:4 Apan mɛ kàwem un'tal a baar abà basi inyɛm: Nsaab nkam mwɛy an'kwem an'nà aŋinà kà in'sɛŋ a Isàlɛl myanswà.
REV 7:5 Nsaab kwem aŋiyweel kà un'sɛŋ a Yudà, nsaab kwem aŋiyweel kà un'sɛŋ a Lubɛn, nsaab kwem aŋiyweel kà un'sɛŋ a Gad,
REV 7:6 nsaab kwem aŋiywɛɛl kà un'sɛŋ a Asɛr, nsaab kwem aŋiyweel kà un'sɛŋ a Nɛftali, nsaab kwem aŋiyweel kà un'sɛŋ a Mànasi,
REV 7:7 nsaab kwem aŋiyweel kà un'sɛŋ a Simɛyɔ, nsaab kwem aŋiyweel kà un'sɛŋ a Lɛvi, nsaab kwem aŋiyweel kà un'sɛŋ a Isakar,
REV 7:8 nsaab kwem aŋiyweel kà un'sɛŋ a Zabàlɔn, nsaab kwem aŋiyweel kà un'sɛŋ a Yɔsɛfi, nsaab kwem aŋiyweel kà un'sɛŋ a Bɛnsàmɛn.
REV 7:9 Ungö apan, in'kàler, mɛ kàmɛn un'kàbɔ a baar bà nsi yanswà mpa ban'kwo mutaŋ, bà mbil yanswà, bà in'sɛŋ myanswà anà bà ndaa yanswà. Ba bàkälà kusà a kir a imwol anà kusà a un'tö a un'kɔk, bàkyàbwaar mvwɛl a pɛɛl anà an'laŋ kà an'kɔɔ.
REV 7:10 Ba bàsyee in'kwɛŋ naa: Ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈ ye akà Nzam abi kan'bwaay u kir a imwol anà akà un'tö a un'kɔk.
REV 7:11 Akyeey banswà bàkäl bàŋàkööŋ umbil a kir a imwol, andweer anà ikyeer byànà bàbü an'köm, bàtsüüm u mɛɛn, waa bàsyäŋà Nzam.
REV 7:12 Ba bàtɛɛnà naa: « Yà abwɛy! Nsaak, làkoo, an'yeerà, an'tɔɔn, ibyääl, unkaak a ngwal anà ngwal bye akà Nzam abi wà mbul a in'tye! Yà abwɛy. »
REV 7:13 Umwɛy uboo a andweer kan'fuul naa: « Bànà baar ban'bwaar mvwɛl a pɛɛl bà, ba ban'fà ken? »
REV 7:14 Mɛ kun'fuur naa: « Mwol amɛ, ngye akyàyöb ya! » Nde waa kàtɛn a mɛ naa: « Ba ban'fà u nkwaaŋ mbɔɔn. Ba bàkyàsɔŋ mvwɛl aba, ba ya bàkyàbuul yà tsɛk tsɛk unsà an'kil a un'tö a un'kɔk.
REV 7:15 Lalan abà ba kusà a kir a imwol a Nzam ntɔn mukun'kömà mpib anà mwäänà u idwà ande. Mbuur kan'bwaay u kir a imwol akyer asafwee u ntɛn ande.
REV 7:16 Ba bàfàsàwem anki ngyal anà mfwää, taaŋ anà myäänà ala myàsaböl anki.
REV 7:17 Ntɔn un'tö a un'kɔk kan'bwaay u kir a imwol asàkal un'kyɛɛŋ aba, nde asasyen u ntwà a an'dà anwà. Nzam asàkɔɔm làsaaŋ lanswà là mii aba. »
REV 8:1 Mpal kàduub un'tö a un'kɔk inyɛm kyà nsambwaar, kà isii a minüt an'kwem an'tär, du làkäl a kul.
REV 8:2 Abun mɛ kàmɛn akyeey nsambwaar bàfàkal kusà a Nzam. Ba bapɛ mfuŋ, mfuŋ nsambwaar.
REV 8:3 Un'kyeey asin kàyàmbar tsütsü a mɛsà bàfàsà tswà mbaa. Nde kàkäl anà làlɔŋà a wɔl alà bàfàsà tswà mbaa. Bun'pɛ tswà mbɔɔn ntɔn nde upɛ la anà ngyamàkà a aŋin'kyɛɛl banswà udu a mɛsà a wɔl amyà kusà a kir a imwol.
REV 8:4 Un'diŋ a tswà, mbwo mwɛy anà ngyamàkà a aŋin'kyɛɛl, kàbeenà kusà a Nzam fà kɔɔ a un'kyeey.
REV 8:5 Apan, un'kyeey kàwɛl làlɔŋà alan, kàyööl la anà mbaa yàkäl udu a mɛsà bàfàsà tswà mbaa, waa kàtɔɔm la u mɛɛn. Apan sye ipar byàkyer abwà, làso a ndaa làkyer atoo, miŋyä myàkyer amɛnà anà mɛɛn màkyer ani.
REV 8:6 Akyeey nsambwaar abà bàkäärà mfuŋ nsambwaar bàyöŋà mubɛɛrà ya.
REV 8:7 Umpal kàbɛɛrà un'kyeey wàtàtwɛb mfuŋ, mbul a in'kul anà mbaa yàŋàtüüb anà an'kil yabü u mɛɛn. Ndam mwɛy unsà tär yà mɛɛn yàwulà mbaa, ndam mwɛy unsà tär yà in'te yàwulà mbaa, anà nkay ambu yanswà yàwulà mbaa.
REV 8:8 Un'kyeey wàyweel kàbɛɛrà mfuŋ. Undiir mwɛy asànaa mɔŋ a kölàköl aŋàyääl mbaa bàtɔɔm u ngyäl. Itiir mwɛy unsà itär byà ngyäl kyàbulà an'kil.
REV 8:9 Ndam mwɛy unsà tär yà indiir a mɔ̈ɔ̈ byàkäl uboo a ngyäl yàkyer akwà anà ndam mwɛy unsà tär yà an'swà yàkyer abwabà.
REV 8:10 Un'kyeey wàtär kàbɛɛrà mfuŋ. Mbwaar mwɛy wàkölàköl awàkàlɛɛmà asànaa mwinà a kölàköl kàfü du waa kàyàbwà. Wa kàbü udu a ndam mwɛy unsà tär yà mwɛy a kölàköl anà udu a ntwà a an'dà mbɔɔn.
REV 8:11 Mbwaar awà ikɔb awa « Absinte ». Ndam mwɛy unsà tär yà an'dà yàbulà buul, anà baar mbɔɔn bàkyer akwà ntɔn bànü ba an'dà a buul amà.
REV 8:12 Un'kyeey wànà kàbɛɛrà mfuŋ. Ndam mwɛy unsà tär yà taaŋ, ndam mwɛy unsà tär yà nsöŋ anà ndam mwɛy unsà tär yà mbwaar yàkyer atay. Abun, ndam mwɛy unsà tär yà pɛɛlà aya yàbulà yàküü: ndam mwɛy unsà tär yà mwäänà yàkyer adiimà anà yà mpib sye ifà imwɛy.
REV 8:13 Apan, kàfàler mɛ, mɛ kàmɛn inkaak kyàmutɛn u ndaa a ngwal naa: « Ngyɛb! Ngyɛb! Ngyɛb akà baar a mɛɛn mpal akyeey atär bamwɛy bàsàbɛɛrà ba mfuŋ aba! »
REV 9:1 Un'kyeey wàtyeen kàbɛɛrà mfuŋ. Mɛ kàmɛn mbwaar mwɛy kàbü u mɛɛn fà du. Bun'pɛ nsab a fu a un'baan.
REV 9:2 Nde kàduub fu a un'baan. Un'diŋ mwɛy kàtoo kwo asànaa un'diŋ a yaaŋ a mbaa a kölàköl. Taaŋ anà un'pöb màkyer apiir.
REV 9:3 Mpay yàkyer atoo uboo a un'diŋ awun, waa yàpää u mɛɛn. Ba bapɛ ikɔ̈b asànaa ikɔ̈b a nye a mɛɛn.
REV 9:4 Nde kàtɛn a ma naa ma màkɔ̈ɔ̈n akyer ube akà iteerà a mɛɛn, akà nkay a mbu itàkal akà un'te mwɛy, wɛɛ akà baar mpɛl abye anà inyɛm a Nzam.
REV 9:5 Ba bapɛ anki mbwo mukadwa, wɛɛ mukapà unkiiŋ mpɛl ngɔn tyeen. Usaay abà paa bà asànaa usaay a lànye làfàtà la mbuur.
REV 9:6 Kà ilä abin, ba bàsàleŋ ukwà, wɛɛ ba, ba bàsàman anki ba. Ba bàsàkwen naa ba bàkü, wɛɛ ukwà bàkyer asatiin.
REV 9:7 Mpay ayi yàkäl asànaa mpoonà aŋàlɔ̈ɔ̈n ntɔn ità. Udu a in'tswe aya yàkäl asànaa mpà a ibyääl yà wɔl, anà ntabwey aya yàkäl asànaa ntabwey a baar.
REV 9:8 Ya yàkäl anà ntswe asànaa ntswe a akaar, anà an'din aya màkäl asànaa an'din a ntaamà.
REV 9:9 Itɔl aya byàmɛnà asànaa byàŋàyee u kwam a ishabà, anà làso a an'paab aya làkäl asànaa làso a an'pusupusu a mpoonà mbɔɔn yàmudüül ità.
REV 9:10 Mpay ya yàkäl anà in'kyel a nsyeenà asànaa myà nye. Yà unsà in'kyel aya waa ya yàkäl anà ikɔ̈b mukyer baar ube ngɔn tyeen.
REV 9:11 Kà un'tswe aya, ya ye anà mfum, un'kyeey a un'baan. Ikɔb ande Abadɔ unsà Ɛbɛlyɔ, anà Apɔlyɔ unsà Ingɛlɛki.
REV 9:12 Ngyɛb yàtàtwɛb yàkyàlyaaŋ. Ungö aya, ngyɛb yweel asin yàkyer afàyà.
REV 9:13 Ungö, un'kyeey wàsyaam kàbɛɛrà mfuŋ. Mɛ kàwem ndaa mwɛy yan'fà kà an'twɛrà man'nà mà mɛsà a ibɔɔn mà wɔl amà kusà a Nzam.
REV 9:14 Ndaa yan'tɛn a un'kyeey kàkäl anà mfuŋ naa: « Atsuuŋ akyeey banà abà bàŋàbäm, tsütsü a ngyäl a kölàköl, Ɛfrat. »
REV 9:15 Waa bàtsuuŋ akyeey ba banà, abà bàlɔ̈ɔ̈n ntɔn taaŋ alà, ilä aki, ngɔn awà anà mbul awà ntɔn mudwa imwɛy uboo a itiir itär byà baar.
REV 9:16 Ban'kyään un'tal a aŋità aba bàfàlaar udu a mpoonà: ba bàkäl nkam yweel yà nsaab nsaab.
REV 9:17 Abun, unsà imanmii, mɛ kàmɛn mpoonà anà baar bàläärà udu aya: ya yàkäl yàŋàbwää inkur a kwam kyà tsöö asànaa mbaa, kyà bulɛ asànaa safir anà kyà sufre. In'tswe a mpoonà ya myàkäl asànaa myà ntaamà. Mbaa, un'diŋ anà sufre myàyatoo u mun aya.
REV 9:18 Ntaaŋàmbar ayi yàtär: mbaa, un'diŋ anà un'twà a mbaa yàyatoo u mun a mpoonà, ya yàdwä itiir imwɛy uboo a itiir itär byà baar banswà.
REV 9:19 Ntɔn ikɔ̈b a mpoonà kyà u mun anà kà in'kyel aya. Ntɔn in'kyel aya myà asànaa ntäy. Mya mye anà in'tswe myàfàsyääl ya ntɔn mukyer baar ube.
REV 9:20 Kyekà baar bàsäl, baar mpa bàkü u ntaaŋàmbar ayi, ba bàwɛy anki nkääl aba. Ba bàwɛy anki mukömà insɔŋà anà itɛk a wɔl, byà arza, byà brɔnze, byà in'kul anà byà in'te, abyà mpa byan'kwo muman, itàkal muwem, itàkal mukyà dwaan.
REV 9:21 Ba bàsɔɔmà anki sye ntɔn ba bàwɛy anki mudwa baar, mukyer inwɛŋ, mukyer ipasàsɛ anà muyib.
REV 10:1 Ungö apan, mɛ kàmɛn un'kyeey asin wàngwal kàyàtyà fà du. Nde kàkäl aŋàfwe itööm mwɛy anà unkwal a mbul kà un'tswe ande. Ntabwey ande yàkäl asànaa taaŋ anà in'kɔl ande myàkäl asànaa an'ta a mbaa.
REV 10:2 Nde kàkäärà kikaan aŋàduub. Nde kàtɔl làkɔl ande là ibaal udu a ngyäl anà làkɔl ande là ikaar u mɛɛn.
REV 10:3 Nde kàsi in'kwɛŋ a ngwal, asànaa ntaamà awàmuŋan. Ungö a nde musà in'kwɛŋ, ipar nsambwaar byàsi in'dum.
REV 10:4 Mpal byàmay ipar muböl, mɛ kàlàkwen musɔn, wɛɛ mɛ kàwem ndaa yan'fà du yàmutɛn a mɛ naa: « Yee indiir byan'tɛn ipar nsambwaar, twon an'sɔn bya. »
REV 10:5 Apan, un'kyeey awà kàmɛn mɛ wàŋàmbar udu a ngyäl anà udu a mɛɛn kàsɛn kɔɔ ande là ibaal u du.
REV 10:6 Nde kàdi kyän là, u mbwo a mbuur awe anà mɔ̈ɔ̈ a mbul a in'tye, awà kàkyer du, mɛɛn, ngyäl anà indiir abyà uboo mwo: « Taaŋ afàdil latɛy!
REV 10:7 Umpal usàbɛɛrà un'kyeey wànsambwaar mfuŋ, apan Nzam asàkwey ngyee ande, asànaa kàkyään nde ya akà asyääl ande aŋangɔɔm. »
REV 10:8 Ungö apan, ndaa ayà kàwem mɛ fà du yàfàtɛn a mɛ abà: « Kyen kawɛl kikaan aŋàduub kà an'kɔɔ a un'kyeey awà umbäär udu a ngyäl anà udu a mɛɛn. »
REV 10:9 Mɛ kàsin tsütsü apà un'kyeey, waa kun'lɔ̈ɔ̈m mukan'pà kikaan kya. Nde kan'fuur naa: « Wal kya anà dyà kya: wa asàkal buul ntɔn kwiy angye, wɛɛ u mun angye wa asàkal ntsà asànaa bwey. »
REV 10:10 Mɛ kàwɛl kikaan akin kà an'kɔɔ a un'kyeey, waa kàdi kya. U mun amɛ kya kyàkäl ntsà asànaa bwey. Wɛɛ ungö mumin kya, kya kyàbulà buul ntɔn kwiy amɛ.
REV 10:11 Apan, bàtɛn a mɛ naa: « Ngye akyer afàtà ngɔɔm udu a in'sɛŋ, nsi, ndaa anà amfum mbɔɔn. »
REV 11:1 Bàfan'pà wɛŋwɛŋ làmwɛy asànaa un'aŋ musi bwɛl, waa bàtɛn a mɛ naa: « Mbarà, kasi idwà a Nzam anà mɛsà a ibɔɔn, anà taŋ baar bàfàkömà kwo.
REV 11:2 Wɛɛ, wɛy ukɔl nsà a ndwà a Nzam, twon an'si ya, ntɔn ya bàkyàpà akà baar mpa abà Ayudà. Ba bàsàndyäär bul in'kyɛɛl ngɔn an'kwem an'nà aŋiyweel.
REV 11:3 Mɛ in'sàtɔm ambäl amɛ bɔ̈ɔ̈l, bàŋàbwaar mpiir, ba bàsàtà ngɔɔm ilä nsaab mwɛy nkam yweel an'kwem an'syaam.
REV 11:4 Ambäl abà bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l bà in'te a ɔlive myeel anà minà myeel amyà myàfàmbar kusà a Mwol a mɛɛn.
REV 11:5 Isàkal naa mbuur mwɛy akwen mukyer ba ube, mbaa laa itoo ya u mun aba, waa iwuul ayiiŋ aba. Inye, mbuur wanswà akwen mukyer ba ube, nde asàkwà abà.
REV 11:6 Ba bye anà ikɔ̈b mudübà du, ntɔn mbul ukɔ̈ɔ̈n anɔ umpal bàtaa ba ngɔɔm. Ba sye bye anà ikɔ̈b musɔɔm an'dà màbulà an'kil anà mupà mɛɛn ntaaŋàmbar yà ifà ifà, taaŋ lanswà bàkwen ba.
REV 11:7 Wɛɛ mpal bàsàmay ba mutà imbäl, ntsür awà kan'too kà un'baan akyer asànwaan anà ba. Wa asàwal iböŋ udu a ba anà akyer asadwa.
REV 11:8 Ndom aba yàsàkal aŋàyäänà u balàbal a kölàköl là bul a kölàköl, alà bàfàbel Sɔdɔm anà Ngipiti unsà idiim, ikal bàbɛɛrà Mwol aba u kulunsi.
REV 11:9 Baar a in'sɛŋ myanswà, mbil yanswà, ndaa yanswà anà nsi yanswà bàsaleerà ndom aba ilä itär a ndam anà bàsàpà anki mbwo naa badyee.
REV 11:10 Baar a mɛɛn bàmusaŋ. Ba bàmukyɔm unsà un'sak anà bàmupɛɛl an'kab, ntɔn aŋangɔɔm abà bàbɔ̈ɔ̈l bàmɛɛy baar a mɛɛn nkwaaŋ mbɔɔn.
REV 11:11 Wɛɛ, ungö a ilä itär a ndam, un'swey a mɔ̈ɔ̈ kàfü akà Nzam kabilà uboo a ba anà ba waa bàmbarà. Matɛɛr màwɛl baar bàleerà.
REV 11:12 Ba bàwem ndaa mwɛy yàngwal u du yàmuswaŋ ba naa: « Làlär pà! » Ba waa bàlär du uboo a itööm, u mii a ayiiŋ aba.
REV 11:13 Taaŋ nsil alan, mɛɛn màkyer ani. Itiir imwɛy uboo a itiir kwem kyà bul kyàkyer abwabà, baar nsaab nsambwaar bàkü unsà ntɛɛr a mɛɛn ayi. Baar bàsäl bàbü matɛɛr anà bàpɛ làkoo akà Nzam a du.
REV 11:14 Mpay yàyweel yan'lyaaŋ. Wɛɛ làkäl kà igyɛɛŋ, yàtär yà tsütsü muyà.
REV 11:15 Apan, un'kyeey wànsambwaar kàbɛɛrà mfuŋ. Ndaa a ngwal mbɔɔn yàfü du, waa yàtɛɛnà naa: « Apanà imwol a mɛɛn kyà akà Mwol abi anà akà Klistɔ ande. Imwol aki isàlam ipepey! »
REV 11:16 Andweer an'kwem mɔ̈ɔ̈l aŋinà abà bàbwaay udu a an'kir aba mà imwol kusà a Nzam, bàbü aŋàtsüüm, waa bàkömà Nzam
REV 11:17 anà mutɛn naa: « Mwol, Nzam a Ngwal Yanswà, ngye awà, anà kàkäl, bi kàmakömà ntɔn ngye kàsyääl ngwal angye yàkölàköl ntɔn mubwääy Imwol angye.
REV 11:18 In'sɛŋ myàkyer ambarà a nkyɛl, wɛɛ apanà nkyɛl angye yan'mɛnà, taaŋ a nsaŋ a akü lan'kwo, taaŋ ayàfur ngye asyääl angye aŋangɔɔm anà bàngye banswà bàfàkyey ikɔb angye, ambɛy anà andweer, anà taaŋ mudwa baar bàfàtay mɛɛn! »
REV 11:19 Idwà a Nzam, u du, waa kyàdubà, un'böl a nkwà waa kàmɛnà kwo. Apan, indiir mbɔɔn byàkyer amɛnà: miŋyä, làso a ndaa, ipar, ntɛɛr a mɛɛn anà mbul a in'kul.
REV 12:1 Idiim mwɛy kyàkölàköl kyàmɛnà u du: un'kaar mwɛy wàŋàbwaar taaŋ kàkäl anà nsöŋ ungyɛl a in'kɔl anà mpà a imwol a mbwaar kwem aŋiyweel udu a un'tswe.
REV 12:2 Nde kàlàbɔr mwan, waa nde kàsyee in'kwɛŋ ntɔn in'swaŋ.
REV 12:3 Apan, idiim asin kyàfàmɛnà u du: dalàgɔ a kölàköl làŋɔɔ làkäl amyà in'tswe nsambwaar anà mbwaŋ kwem, anà mpà a imwol udu a un'tswe umwɛy umwɛy.
REV 12:4 Nde kàköŋà anà un'kyel ande ndam mwɛy amu ndam tär yà mbwaar a du, waa kàtɔɔm ya u mɛɛn. Nde kàmbär kusà a un'kaar awà kàlàbɔr, ntɔn mudyà mwan ande pa uyàtoo wa.
REV 12:5 Kyekà, un'kaar awà kàbör mwan baal, awà asàkal un'kyɛɛŋ a in'sɛŋ myanswà anà un'aŋ a ibeenà. Mwan ande bun'syen akà Nzam anà akà kir ande là imwol.
REV 12:6 Apan, un'kaar awà kàtiin u nsye a ipɔl, kà ikal kun'lɔ̈ɔ̈n Nzam ntɔn bun'dii kwo ilä nsaab mwɛy a nkam yweel a an'kwem an'syaam.
REV 12:7 Apan, ità mwɛy kyàkyer asɛmà u du. Mishɛl anà akyeey ande bànwään anà Dalàgɔ. Dalàgɔ sye anà akyeey ande kànwään anà ba.
REV 12:8 Wɛɛ dalàgɔ kàböŋ anki. Mishɛl anà akyeey ande bàkyer aböŋ u du.
REV 12:9 Ipfür a dalàgɔ bun'tɔɔm u nsà. Wa wà ntäy wà itaan, bàfàbel naa ileŋ anà Satanà, awà afàlwab baar banswà. Wa bun'tɔɔm u mɛɛn, mbwo mwɛy anà akyeey awa.
REV 12:10 Ungö apan, mɛ kàwem ndaa mwɛy yàngwal u du, yàmutɛn naa: « Lalà là taaŋ a ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈, là unkaak a ngwal anà là imwol a Nzam abi! Apanà ikɔ̈b kyà kà an'kɔɔ a Klistɔ ande. Ntɔn nde kàtɔɔm un'füün a atɔŋ abi u nsà, nde mbuur kàfüünà ba kusà a Nzam abi, mpib anà mwäänà.
REV 12:11 Wɛɛ atɔŋ abi bàwɛl iböŋ udu a wa u mbwo a an'kil a mwan a un'kɔk anà u mbwo a ndaa bàtɛɛl ba imbäl. Ba bàkɔɔb mɔ̈ɔ̈ aba, ba bàkyey ukwà.
REV 12:12 Kyakin, wɛy un'sak ukäl u du. Wɛy bɛ baar làfàkal u du làsäŋ! Wɛɛ ngyɛb akà bɛ u mɛɛn anà u ngyäl! Ntɔn ileŋ kyan'yàtyà akà bɛ, kyàŋàyɔl a un'fur a nkyɛl: Kya ikyàyöb naa taaŋ akya lan'sal ikikye. »
REV 12:13 Mpal làmɛn dalàgɔ naa bàmutɔɔm u mɛɛn, laa làkàlab la un'kaar awà kàbör mwan baal.
REV 12:14 Wɛɛ un'kaar kàwɛl an'paab, an'paab mɔ̈ɔ̈l mà nɛn a kölàköl ntɔn mufumà tii kà ikal bàlɔ̈ɔ̈n ntɔn nde u nsye a ipɔl, ntɔn bun'dii kwo mbul tär anà ndam, ukwɛl anà mii a ntäy.
REV 12:15 Apan, ntäy kàlwe an'dà mbɔɔn asànaa mwɛy a kölàköl ungö a un'kaar, ntɔn ibɔ byun'syen.
REV 12:16 Wɛɛ mɛɛn màyi mubay un'kaar: ma màduub mun ama anà mamin ngyäl awà kàlwe dalàgɔ.
REV 12:17 Uboo a un'fur a nkyɛl a dalàgɔ akà un'kaar, la làkànwaan a ndam a baan a un'kaar yasäl, ba baar bàfàlab nswɛɛŋ a Nzam anà bye anà imbäl a Yɛsu.
REV 12:18 Ungö apan dalàgɔ làkàmbar kà un'kɔɔl a ngyäl.
REV 13:1 Apan, mɛ kàmɛn ntsür mwɛy kan'too u ngyäl a kölàköl. Wa kàkäl anà mbwaŋ, mbwaŋ kwem anà in'tswe, in'tswe nsambwaar. Udu a mbwaŋ mwɛy mwɛy, wa kàbwäär mpà a imwol, anà udu a in'tswe awa byàkäl anà ikɔb mubɛy Nzam.
REV 13:2 Ntsür awà kàmɛn mɛ kàkäl asànaa nkwe, an'bwar awa màkäl asànaa an'bwar a ntsür awàbàfàbel naa urs anà mun awa asànaa mun a ntaamà. Dalàgɔ kun'pɛ ngwal ande, imwol ande anà ikɔ̈b akölàköl.
REV 13:3 Umwɛy uboo a in'tswe kàmɛnà asànaa wàŋàyɔɔ tsütsü mukwà, wɛɛ iwà akin kyàkyer akwà. Mɛɛn manswà màkäl mukun'täŋ anà mukun'lab.
REV 13:4 Baar bàbulà mukömà dalàgɔ, ntɔn la làpɛ ikɔ̈b akà ntsür. Ba bàkömà sye ntsür, mutɛn naa: « Nà awà asànaa ntsür? Nà kan'kwo munwan anà wa? »
REV 13:5 Ntsür kàwɛl ikɔ̈b mutɛn ndaa a uyɔl anà yàbɛy Nzam anà ikɔ̈b musal ngɔn an'kwem an'nà aŋiyweel.
REV 13:6 Wa kàsɛmà mubɛy Nzam, mubɛy ikɔb ande, ikal ufàbwaay nde anà baar bàfàkal u du.
REV 13:7 Wa kàwɛl mbwo munwan anà aŋin'kyɛɛl anà muwal iböŋ udu a ba. Bun'pɛ sye ikɔ̈b udu a mbil yanswà, un'sɛŋ wanswà, ndaa yanswà anà nsi yanswà.
REV 13:8 Baar a mɛɛn banswà bàkyer asun'kömà, baar banswà mpa kyàkäl ikɔb aba kyàŋàsɔn, sɛmà nkyeer a mɛɛn, uboo a un'kaan a mɔ̈ɔ̈, un'kaan a un'to a un'kɔk awà bàdwä.
REV 13:9 « Wɛy mbuur awe anà an'tsü uwem!
REV 13:10 Isàkal yan'lɔm naa mbuur akyà isɔ, nde asàkyà isɔ. Isàkal yan'lɔm naa mbuur bàkyer un'dwa a kɔm, nde bàsun'dwa a kɔm. Lalà là taaŋ a muküünà anà là làkwikilà a aŋin'kyɛɛl. »
REV 13:11 Apan mɛ kàmɛn ntsür asin wàmutoo u mɛɛn. Wa kàkäl anà mbwaŋ, mbwaŋ yweel asànaa un'to a un'kɔk, wɛɛ wa kàtɛɛnà asànaa dalàgɔ.
REV 13:12 Wa asyäälà ikɔ̈b kyanswà kyà ntsür wàtàtwɛb u mii a wa. Wa akasiinà mɛɛn anà baar ama a ngwal mukömà ntsür wàtàtwɛb awà kyàkü iwà akwà kyàlun'dwa.
REV 13:13 Ntsür wàyweel awà wàmukyer idiim a kölàköl, itàkal mutyey mbaa fà du tii u mɛɛn, u mii a baar banswà.
REV 13:14 Wa afàbwiy baar a mɛɛn ndwaŋ u mbwo a idiim bun'pɛ mbwo mukyer u mii a ntsür wàtàtwɛb. Wa afàsiinà baar a mɛɛn mukyer itɛk ntɔn ibyääl a ntsür awà bàyɔ̈ɔ̈l a kɔm anà kàwü mɔ̈ɔ̈.
REV 13:15 Ntsür wàyweel kàwɛl ikɔ̈b mupà un'swey akà itɛk a ntsür wàtàtwɛb, ntɔn kya isi ndaa anà idwä baar bàtön mukun'kömà.
REV 13:16 Ntsür wàmusiinà baar banswà a ngwal, bibaar anà baar baar, aŋin'naaŋ anà aŋàlàmbwà, asɔ anà baar a nsaay, muwal idiim mwɛy udu a kɔɔ ibaal itàkal u ntabwey.
REV 13:17 Akà mbuur mwɛy kàlàkwo anki musom itàkal muyälà yàlàkal naa nde idiim aki kyatɛy, iswaŋà naa ikɔb a ntsür itàkal un'tal a ikɔb awa.
REV 13:18 Apà, ilɔɔmà an'yeerà. Mbuur awe anà un'yɛnà kan'kwo uyilà un'tal a ntsür, ntɔn un'tal awà kan'kwo a ikɔb a baal mwɛy. Un'tal ande wa wà nkam syaam a an'kwem an'syaam aŋisyaam.
REV 14:1 Mɛ kàfàman mwan a un'kɔk kàkyàmbar udu a mɔŋ a Siyɔna, wa anà baar, baar nsaab nkam mwɛy an'kwem an'nà aŋinà, abà bàkäl anà ikɔb ande anà kyà taarànde byàŋàsɔn u ntabwey aba.
REV 14:2 Mɛ kàwem ndaa yan'fà du yàmusà làso asànaa iwɔɔl a kölàköl byà an'dà, asànaa ipar a kölàköl. Ndaa kàwem mɛ yàkäl asànaa diim a adim ikwɛŋ bàmubɛɛrà isyaŋ aba.
REV 14:3 Ba bàtɔ̈ɔ̈là diim akün kusà a kir a imwol anà kusà a ikyeer a mɔ̈ɔ̈ byà inà anà andweer. Akà mbuur mwɛy kàkwe anki mulɔŋàkà diim alà, nà baar nsaab nkam mwɛy a an'kwem an'nà aŋinà abà bàbeen u mɛɛn.
REV 14:4 Ba bà baar mpa bàtay ndür aba unsà akaar, ntɔn ba bà ankɔr. Ba bàfàlab mwan a un'kɔk ntsü yanswà ufàkyà nde. Ba babeen uboo a baar asànaa mbɛŋ atàtwɛb ntɔn Nzam anà ntɔn un'to a un'kɔk.
REV 14:5 U mun aba loor làsàmɛnà anki. Amu ba pɛl latɛy.
REV 14:6 Apan, mɛ kàmɛn un'kyeey asin wàmuyifumà u boboo a du. Nde kàkäl anà Làsaŋ Aŋàbwaŋ là mbul a in'tye mukyään baar a mɛɛn, akà baar a nsi yanswà, un'sɛŋ wanswà, ndaa yanswà anà mbil yanswà.
REV 14:7 Nde kàtɛɛnà u ndaa a ngwal naa: « Làkyey ikɔ̈b a Nzam anà lun'si làkoo! Ntɔn taaŋ alà utsüül nde baar nsaŋ lan'kwo. Làkömà mbuur awà kàkyer du, mɛɛn, ngyäl anà ntwà a an'dà! »
REV 14:8 Un'kyeey wàyweel kàläb wàtàtwɛb, waa kàtɛn naa: « La lan'bwà, la lan'bwà, Babilɔn làkölàköl lan'bwà! La lànüü in'sɛŋ myanswà vin a un'fur a ipasàsɛ ala! »
REV 14:9 Un'kyeey wàtär kàläb akyeey bɔ̈ɔ̈l bàtàtwɛb, wàmutɛn u ndaa a ngwal naa: « Isàkal naa mbuur mwɛy kan'kömà ntsür anà itɛk awa, anà isàkal naa nde kan'wal idiim u ntabwey itàkal u kɔɔ,
REV 14:10 nde asànwà vin a un'fur a nkyɛl a Nzam, vin mpa làŋàkwaam uboo a kɔɔb a nkyɛl ande! Nde asàman mpay aŋàdiir yà mbaa anà yà sufre kusà a akyeey in'kyɛɛl anà kusà a un'to a un'kɔk.
REV 14:11 Un'diŋ a mpay aba wàmukyà du ipepey. Ba bàfàyöör anki itàkal u mwäänà itàkal u mpib, ba baar bàfàkömà ntsür anà idiim awa, anà mbuur awà kan'wal idiim a ikɔb awa. »
REV 14:12 Alà là taaŋ musà muküünà ntɔn baar a Nzam abà bàfàlab nswɛɛŋ ande anà abye anà làkwikilà amu Yɛsu.
REV 14:13 Ungö apan mɛ kàwem ndaa yan'fà du anà yan'tɛn a mɛ naa: « Sɔn abà: "Un'sak apanà akà baar abà bàkü uboo a Mwol!" Dweelà atɛɛnà naa: "Ndandaa ba ban'kwo bayöör unsà isal aba, ntɔn isal aba byàmuyalab!" »
REV 14:14 Ungö apan mɛ kàmɛn itööm a pɛɛl. Mbuur mwɛy asànaa Mwan a mbuur kàkäl wàŋàbwaay udu a kya. Nde kàkäl anà mpà a imwol yà wɔl kun'tswe, anà impye mwɛy kyà mpɔr u kɔɔ.
REV 14:15 Un'kyeey asin kàtoo kà idwà a Nzam, waa kàsi un'kwɛŋ a ngwal akà mbuur kàkäl aŋàbwaay udu a itööm: « Syääl impye angye, bwo, ntɔn alà là taaŋ abwo: mɛɛn man'kwo ntɔn mbweel! »
REV 14:16 Apan, mbuur awà kàkäl aŋàbwaay udu a itööm, kàtɔɔm impye ande u mɛɛn, waa kàbwe mbɛŋ yanswà yà mɛɛn.
REV 14:17 Un'kyeey asin kàyàtoo kà idwà a Nzam a du. Nde sye kàkäl anà impye a mpɔr.
REV 14:18 Un'kyeey asin sye, awà kàkäl anà ikɔ̈b udu a mbaa, kàfü mɛsà a ibɔɔn. Nde kàsi un'kwɛŋ a ngwal akà mbuur awà kàkäl anà impye a mpɔr: « Syääl impye angye kyàmpɔr anà kwol itsuŋ a ywaŋ a vin a mɛɛn: an'reze abya màŋàsöŋ! »
REV 14:19 Apan, un'kyeey kàtɔɔm impye ande u mɛɛn, waa kàkwel mbɛŋ a ywaŋ a vin a mɛɛn. Nde kàtɔɔm ya uboo a mpfwee a kölàköl yà un'fur a nkyɛl a Nzam.
REV 14:20 Mbɛŋ ya bàtsü uboo a mpfwee ayi, u nsà a bul. An'kil màkyer atoo uboo aya, waa màyöl tii u mun a mpoonà aŋàmbar anà màpää u mɛɛn tii kà isii a an'kilɔmɛtre nkam tär.
REV 15:1 Apan mɛ kàmɛn idiim asin u du, idiim mwɛy kyàkölàköl anà kyà ubem: akyeey nsambwaar bàkäärà ntaaŋàmbar nsambwaar yàntsüü, ntɔn u mbwo aya waa un'fur a nkyɛl a Nzam kan'kwo.
REV 15:2 Ungö apan mɛ kàmɛn asànaa ngyäl a talàtal wàkölàköl wàŋàtüüb anà mbaa. Baar banswà abà bàwɛl iböŋ udu a ntsür, udu a idiim ande anà udu a un'tal a ikɔb ande bàkäl bàŋàmbar udu a ngyäl a talàtal awà. Ba bàkäl anà isyäŋ kapɛ Nzam kan'kɔɔ aba.
REV 15:3 Ba bàkäl mutɔɔl diim a Mɔsɛ, un'syääl a Nzam, anà diim a un'to a un'kɔk: « Mwol Nzam, Nkum a indiir byanswà, isal angye byà byàkölàköl anà byà ubem! Mwol a in'sɛŋ myanswà, mbwo angye yà balàbal anà yà ndandaa!
REV 15:4 Mwol, nà kan'kwo mutɔn ikɔ̈b angye? Nà atɔn mukasà làkoo? Ntɔn ngye mpɛl awà in'kyɛɛl, in'sɛŋ myanswà myàkyer asàyakömà, ntɔn balàbal angye làkyàmɛnà u leŋ. »
REV 15:5 Ungö a indiir abi, mɛ kàmɛn idwà kyan'dubà u du, anà ntɛn a imbäl.
REV 15:6 Akyeey nsambwaar abà bàkäärà ntaaŋàmbar nsambwaar bàyàtoo uboo a kya. Ba bàkäl bàŋàbwaar ipfɛy a in'kà a ntsür kyà tsɛk tsɛk anà un'kab a wɔl u lɔŋ.
REV 15:7 Umwɛy uboo a ikyeer a mɔ̈ɔ̈ inà kàpɛ an'kɔɔb, an'kɔɔb nsambwaar mà wɔl màŋàyɔl a un'fur a nkyɛl a Nzam a mbul a in'tye.
REV 15:8 Idwà kyàkäl kyàŋàyɔl a un'diŋ. Kya kyà idiim muswaŋ làkoo anà ngwal a Nzam. Akà mbuur mwɛy kàlàbilà anki uboo a idwà tii umpal yàlàwà ntaaŋàmbar nsambwaar yà akyeey nsambwaar.
REV 16:1 Apan mɛ kàwem ndaa a ngwal yàfü idwà yàmutɛn a akyeey nsambwaar naa: « Làkyen kàlatyaaŋ an'kɔɔb nsambwaar mà un'fur a nkyɛl a Nzam u mɛɛn! »
REV 16:2 Un'kyeey wàtàtwɛb kàkyen anà kàtyaaŋ kɔɔb ande u mɛɛn. Apan inkyär ibe anà byà usaay byàtoo u ndür a baar abà bàkäl anà inyɛm a ntsür anà bàfakömà idiim awa.
REV 16:3 Un'kyeey wàyweel kàtyaaŋ kɔɔb ande u ngyäl a kölàköl. An'dà màbulà asànaa an'kil a un'kü anà indiir byanswà byàkäl uboo a an'dà byàkyer akwà.
REV 16:4 Un'kyeey wàtär kàtyaaŋ kɔɔb ande u ngyäl anà u ntwà a an'dà ayà yàbulà an'kil.
REV 16:5 Apan, mɛ kàwem un'kyeey awe anà ikɔ̈b udu a an'dà wàmutɛn naa: « Ngye ŋun'kyɛɛl, ngye awà, anà kàkäl, ngye awà wàbalàbal ntɔn kàtsül ngye nsaŋ ayi unsà balàbal.
REV 16:6 Abun, baar bàtyaaŋ an'kil a baar angye anà mà aŋangɔɔm, anà apanà ngye amapà an'kil naa ba bànü. Ba ban'wal bweel aba! »
REV 16:7 Ungö apan, mɛ kàwem ndaa yan'fà idwà yàmutɛn naa: « Inye, Mwol Nzam, Nkum a indiir byanswà, ntsüül a nsaŋ angye yà ndandaa anà yà balàbal! »
REV 16:8 Un'kyeey wànà kàtyaaŋ kɔɔb ande udu a taaŋ. Ba bun'pɛ mbwo muwuul baar mbaa.
REV 16:9 Baar bàwulà mbaa u mwäänà a ibaŋ. Ba bàbɛy ikɔb a Nzam awe anà ikɔ̈b udu a ntaaŋàmbar a tub ayi, wɛɛ ba bàsàbuul anki mpem ntɔn mukun'sà làkoo.
REV 16:10 Un'kyeey wàtyeen kàtyaaŋ kɔɔb ande udu a kir a imfum a ntsür. Imfum a ntsür kya kyàbilà u làpib. Baar bàbebämà ndem aba an'din ntɔn usaay.
REV 16:11 Ba bàtö Nzam a du ntɔn usaay aba anà inkyär aba. Wɛɛ ba bàwɛy anki nsyääl aba yà mbe.
REV 16:12 Un'kyeey wàsyaam kàtyaaŋ kɔɔb ande u ngyäl Ɛfrat. Ngyäl awà kàkyer ayɔm ntɔn mupà mbwo akà amfum ban'fà ntsü làfàsɛnà taaŋ.
REV 16:13 Apan, mɛ kàmɛn an'dweelà an'tär màŋingyäy, màŋàfyän an'kwar un'swaŋ, màyatoo u mun a dalàgɔ, u mun a ntsür anà u mun a ŋangɔɔm a loor.
REV 16:14 Ma mà an'dweelà a insɔŋà amyà ifàkyer idiim a ubem. Mya myàfàkyà akà amfum a mɛɛn manswà ntɔn mukaköŋà ntɔn ità a ilä a kölàköl kyà Nzam awà Nkum a indiir byanswà.
REV 16:15 Mwol kan'tɛn naa: « Le, mɛ an'yà asànaa mbüb! Un'sak akà mbuur awafàkal wàŋàpaŋà anà afàkaar ipfɛy ande, ntɔn nde ukɔ̈ɔ̈n amɛɛy un'kwey ande. »
REV 16:16 An'dweelà màtüüb amfum kà ikal mwɛy bàfàbel naa Armagɛdɔ kà Ɛbɛlyɔ.
REV 16:17 Un'kyeey wànsambwaar kàtyaaŋ kɔɔb ande uboo a un'pöb. Ndaa mwɛy yàngwal yan'too kà idwà, yàfü kir a imwol yàmutɛn naa: « Yan'kwo! »
REV 16:18 Apan, indiir bi byàkyer amɛnà: miŋyä, làso a ndaa, ipar, ntɛɛr a mɛɛn yà ngwal. Ntɛɛr a mɛɛn a tub ayi ŋàtàkal anki sɛmà abà baar udu a mɛɛn.
REV 16:19 Bul a kölàköl làbaarà itiir itär, an'bul a nsi yanswà màkyer abwabà. Nzam kàdiimà anki bul a kölàköl Babilɔn. Nde kun'nüü kɔɔb a vin ande, vin a un'fur a nkyɛl ande.
REV 16:20 Isaŋ a an'dà byàkyer adiimà anà myɔŋ myàfàmɛnà anki.
REV 16:21 Ikül a mbul a in'kul kyàkyer anɔ, un'kul mwɛy buur awa bàkäl isi a an'kilɔ an'kwem an'nà. In'kul ami myafü du, waa myàbweelà baar, ba bàtöö Nzam ntɔn ya yàkäl ntaaŋàmbar a kölàköl.
REV 17:1 Ungö apan, umwɛy uboo a akyeey nsambwaar awà kàkäär an'kɔɔb nsambwaar kàn'yàtɛn a mɛ naa: « Yà, mɛ in'saswaŋ ntaaŋàmbar a un'kaar a pasàsɛ a kölàköl, awà afàkal udu a an'dà an'köl an'köl.
REV 17:2 Mbwo mwɛy anà nde, amfum a mɛɛn bàbilà unsà ipasàsɛ, baar a mɛɛn bàkyàyɔr vin a ipasàsɛ ande. »
REV 17:3 Abun nde kan'syen u nsye a ipɔl unsà Dweelà. Mɛ kàmɛn un'kaar mwɛy kwo akyàbwaay udu a ntsür mwɛy wàtsöö, wàŋàyɔl a ikɔb abyà byàfàbɛy Nzam. Nde kàkäl amyà in'tswe nsambwaar anà mbwaŋ, mbwaŋ kwem.
REV 17:4 Un'kaar kàkäl aŋàbwaar ipfɛy byàtsöö, tsöö a ngwal anà an'twan a wɔl, in'kul a ntal anà mpɛr. Nde kàkäl anà kɔɔb a wɔl làŋàyɔl anà ndaa a bɔɔmà u kɔɔ, yà ŋingyäy, yà ipasàsɛ ande.
REV 17:5 U ntabwey ande kyàkäl anà ikɔb mwɛy akyà mpa ban'kwo baar muyöb: Babilɔn akölàköl, ngwän a akaar a pasàsɛ anà bà bɔɔmà u mɛɛn.
REV 17:6 Mɛ kàmɛn un'kaar aŋàyɔr a an'kil a aŋin'kyɛɛl anà mà an'bäl a Yɛsu. Umpal kun'mɛn mɛ, mɛ kàkyer abem ngwal.
REV 17:7 Kyakin un'kyeey kàtɛn nde a mɛ naa: « Ntɔn nkye an'man ngye bɔɔmà? Mɛ in'yakyään ngyee a un'kaar anà yà ntsür a in'tswe nsambwaar anà mbwaŋ kwem awà kun'bwääy udu a wa.
REV 17:8 Ntsür akwà awà kàmɛn ngye, awà kàkäl anà mɔ̈ɔ̈, wa ufàkal anki. Wa akyer atoo u boo a un'baan, ntɔn wa ukü. Baar a mɛɛn mpa abye anà ikɔb aba byàŋàsɔn uboo a un'kaan a mɔ̈ɔ̈ fà nkyeer a mɛɛn, bàsàman ndaa mwɛy yà ubem muman ntsür, ntɔn wa kàkyer akal, ufàkal anki, wɛɛ wa akyer afàsyefurà. »
REV 17:9 « Apà, ilɔɔmà un'yɛnà anà an'yeerà. In'tswe nsambwaar myà myɔŋ amyà ufàbwaay un'kaar. Mya sye myà amfum nsambwaar.
REV 17:10 Atyeen uboo a ba bàkyàbwà, wàsyaam wàmuyaal, wànsambwaar ŋàtàyà anki, wɛɛ umpal usàyà nde, nde usàlam anki.
REV 17:11 Ntsür akwà kàkäl anà mpa ufàkal, wa ŋakwo wà mfum wànaan. Wa sye wà umwɛy uboo a ntsür nsambwaar anà wa wàmukyà ukwà. »
REV 17:12 « Mbwaŋ kwem kàmɛn ngye, yà amfum kwem mpa abà aŋàtàwal imfum, wɛɛ, u taaŋ làmwɛy, ba bàsàkab ikɔ̈b a imfum anà ntsür.
REV 17:13 Ba bàkwem bye amà an'kyän mwɛy: upà ngwal anà ikɔ̈b aba unsà isal a ntsür.
REV 17:14 Ba bàsànwaan anà un'tö a un'kɔk, wɛɛ un'tö a un'kɔk asàwal iböŋ udu a ba, ntɔn nde wà Mwol a amwol anà Mfum a amfum, anà nde, bàŋàbel, bàŋàsɔɔl anà bàlää bàsàkyer aböŋ mbwo mwɛy sye anà nde. »
REV 17:15 Un'kyeey kàfàtɛn a mɛ naa: « An'dà kàmɛn ngye, kyà ikal akyà ufàkal un'kaar a pasàsɛ, myà in'sɛŋ, iköŋ, nsi anà ndaa.
REV 17:16 Mbwaŋ kwem kàmɛn ngye anà ntsür, bàsàtɔn un'kaar a pasàsɛ, Ba bàsun'sà aŋàyen anà wànsàpɔl. Ba bàsàdyà in'twaŋ ande anà bàsun'wuul mbaa.
REV 17:17 Ntɔn Nzam kàsi u mpem aba mukwey an'kyän ande, ukwey an'kyän nsil ma anà mupà imfum akà ntsür tii mpal isàkwo ndaa a Nzam. »
REV 17:18 « Mumay, un'kaar kàmɛn ngye, là bul akölàköl làfàyaal udu a amfum a mɛɛn. »
REV 18:1 Ungö apan, mɛ kàmɛn un'kyeey asin kan'fà du: nde kàkäl anà ikɔ̈b mwɛy kyà kölàköl anà làkoo ande làpɛ kyɛɛy u mɛɛn.
REV 18:2 Nde kàtɛn u ndaa a ngwal naa: « La lan'bwà, la lan'bwà, Babilɔn làkölàköl! Mpalabà, la lan'bulà ndwà a insɔŋà, ikal ntɔn an'dweelà an'be mà ifà ifà, ikal a nɛn ifà ifà anà ntsür a mbe anà yà ŋingyäy.
REV 18:3 Ntɔn nde kànüü in'sɛŋ myanswà vin a un'fur a ipasàsɛ ande. Amfum a mɛɛn bàkyer ipasàsɛ anà nde, atɛɛl a an'yà a mɛɛn bàbulà aŋangim u mbwo a ngwal a un'naaŋ ande wàŋàsöön. »
REV 18:4 Mɛ kàwem ndaa asin yan'fà du, yàmutɛɛnà naa: « Làtoo uboboo a bul alà, bɛ in'sɛŋ amɛ, manà bɛ làyàbilà unsà man'be ande anà mukɔɔn abilà unsà mpay ayà iyun'bweel.
REV 18:5 Ntɔn man'be ande màkyàsà ibiŋ tii u du, anà Nzam kàyɔbà in'kɔlàŋàyɔŋ ande.
REV 18:6 Un'fuur asànaa kàkyer nde bumwɛy, un'fuur mbalà yweel ube abà kàkyer nde. Uboo a kɔɔb kàbünà nde vin ande, bünà sye mbalà yweel ntɔn nde.
REV 18:7 Asànaa kàkäl nde unsà làkoo anà unsà un'naaŋ, lun'fuur sye unsà mpay anà unsà un'saabà. Ntɔn nde afàtɛn u mpem ande naa: "Mɛ in'wàmuyaal asànaa mfum un'kaar, mɛ kà in'wà un'kweel un'dim anki, un'saabà usan'bweel anki akà ikikye."
REV 18:8 Kyakin, mpay yanswà ayà bun'lɔ̈ɔ̈n ikyer asun'bweel ilä imwɛy kya: ukwà, ukweel anà ngyal, waa bàsun'tɔɔm u mbaa. Ntɔn Mwol Nzam awà kun'tsüül nsaŋ wà ŋangwal. »
REV 18:9 Apan, amfum a mɛɛn abà bàkyer ipasàsɛ anà nde anà bàläb un'naaŋ ande, bàkyer asàlel anà bàsàsà in'tär, umpal bàsàman ba un'diŋ a bul aŋàkuŋà.
REV 18:10 Ba bàsàkal ukwɛl, ntɔn bɔɔmà a ntaaŋàmbar ande, anà ba bàsàtɛn naa: « Ngyɛb! Ngyɛb! Ɔɔ Babilɔn, bul akölàköl, bul a ngwal! Mbar angye yan'yà u taaŋ làmwɛy mpɛl! »
REV 18:11 Atɛɛl an'yà a mɛɛn bàmulel sye anà bàmusà un'saabà ntɔn nde, ntɔn akà mbuur mwɛy ufàsàsom anki iyääl aba:
REV 18:12 un'kàbɔ a wɔl, arza, in'kul a ntal anà mpɛr, ipfɛy a in'kà a ntsür, anà byà fruu, byà swa anà byàtsöö, in'te a usɔŋ aŋàbwaŋ, indiir ifà ifà byà mbwaŋ a ngyɔ, byà in'te a ntal, byà brɔnze, byà ishabà itàkal byà marbre,
REV 18:13 kanɛl anà köb, may a usɔŋ, mire anà tswà, vin anà may, mfuub anà blɛ, ngɔɔmà anà in'kɔk, mpoonà anà an'shar, asɔ anà baar a bɔlokà.
REV 18:14 Bàfàtɛn naa: « Indiir byanswà afakweenà ngye byàkyàyaalà apà ngye, un'naaŋ angye wanswà anà un'kyɔm angye byàkyàdiimà ntɔn ngye anà bya bàfàsàman anki akà ikikye! »
REV 18:15 Ayääl abà bàbulà aŋangim u mbwo a un'kaar awà, bàsàkal ukwɛl ntɔn mutiin mpay ayà usàman nde. Ba bàkyer asàlel anà bàsàsà un'saabà.
REV 18:16 Ba bàsàtɛn naa: « Ngyɛb! Ngyɛb! Bul akölàköl, làŋàbwaar ipfɛy a in'kà a ntsür, kyàtsöö anà kyàfruu, kyà an'twan a wɔl, in'kul a ntal anà mpɛr.
REV 18:17 U taaŋ làmwɛy mpɛl in'naaŋ mbɔɔn myàkyer ayaalà! » Akaptɛn a an'swà banswà anà baar bàkäl muyikyà anà ba, baar a ngyäl anà baar banswà bàfàman ubwaŋ aba u ngyäl, bàkäl ukwɛl,
REV 18:18 ba bàsyee in'kwɛŋ umpal bàmɛn ba un'diŋ a bul aŋàkuŋà: « Bul nà làkwe musi a bul a kölàköl alà! »
REV 18:19 Ba bàkübà un'twà, bàsyee in'kwɛŋ, bàkyer alelà, bàsyee un'saabà, waa bàtɛɛnà naa: « Ngyɛb! Ngyɛb! Bul akölàköl alà làpɛ un'naaŋ akà baar banswà bàkäl anà an'swà kà an'dà. U taaŋ làmwɛy mpɛl akà undiir mwɛy kàfàkal anki! »
REV 18:20 Du, saŋ ntɔn mbwabà ala! Anà bɛ sye, aŋin'kyɛɛl, antööm anà aŋangɔɔm làsäŋ! Nzam kun'tsüül mbar ntɔn ube kàlakyer nde!
REV 18:21 Apan, un'kyeey a ngwal mwɛy kàwɛl nkɔŋ mwɛy asànaa nkà mwɛy yàkölàköl, waa kàtɔɔm ya u ngyäl, anà kàtɛn naa: « Un'fur a nkyɛl nsil wawà awà bàsàtɔɔm Babilɔn, bul akölàköl anà la bàfàsàman anki akà ikikye.
REV 18:22 Diim a abɛɛrà a isyäŋ anà adim a ikwɛŋ, abɛɛrà a un'swom anà mfuŋ bàfàsawem anki akà ikikye u ndwà angye. Akà un'kyeer a isal a an'kɔɔ mwɛy bàfàsàman anki u ndwà angye. Akà un'kiin a nkà mwɛy bàfàsàwem anki u ndwà angye.
REV 18:23 Mwinà ufàsàpà anki kyɛɛy u ndwà angye. Làso a baar ban'tà bɔr làbenàben bàfàsàwem anki u ndwà angye, ntɔn ayääl angye bàkäl baar ban'söön mfun u mɛɛn, anà u mbwo a in'nwɛŋ angye, ngye kàkyàbwiy in'sɛŋ myanswà ndwaŋ. »
REV 18:24 An'kil a aŋangɔɔm, mà aŋin'kyɛɛl, anà mà baar banswà bàdwä u mɛɛn mà bàmɛnà u Babilɔn.
REV 19:1 Ungö pa, mɛ kàwem u du asànaa ndaa a ngwal yà un'sɛŋ a kölàköl awà u du wàmutɛn naa: « Alɛluya! Ngweel a mɔ̈ɔ̈, làkoo anà ngwal bye akà Nzam abi!
REV 19:2 Ntɔn ntsüül a nsaŋ ande yanswà yà ndandaa anà yà balàbal! Ntɔn nde kàpɛ ntaaŋàmbar akà un'kaar a pasàsɛ a kölàköl, ntɔn nde kàbwiyà mɛɛn unsà ipasàsɛ ande. Nde kun'fuur mfur a an'kil a asyääl ande. »
REV 19:3 Ba bàfàtɛn naa: « Alɛluya! Un'diŋ awa wàmubeenà du mbul a in'tye! »
REV 19:4 Apan andweer an'kwem mɔ̈ɔ̈l aŋinà anà ikyeer a mɔ̈ɔ̈ inà bàbü an'köm, waa bàkömà Nzam awàfàyaal u kir a imwol anà mutɛn naa: « Yà abwɛy! Alɛluya! »
REV 19:5 Ndaa yàtoo u kir a imwol, waa yàtɛn naa: « Lun'syäŋà Nzam abi, bɛ asyääl ande banswà, bɛ baar làfàkyey Nzam, ambɛy anà andweer! »
REV 19:6 Apan mɛ kàwem asànaa ndaa a un'kàbɔ a baar, asànaa làso a ngyäl a kölàköl anà asànaa idum a mbul a ngwal yàmutɛn naa: « Alɛluya! Ntɔn Mwol, Nzam abi wàngwal kan'bwääy imwol ande.
REV 19:7 Wɛy bi isäŋ anà ikäl aŋàyɔl a un'sak, anà kun'si làkoo! Ntɔn taaŋ a un'kyɔm a bɔr a un'tö a un'kɔk lan'kwo, un'kyay ande wàŋàyöŋà.
REV 19:8 Nde bun'pɛ mbwo mubwaar ipfɛy a in'kà a ntsür, kyà in'ŋyäŋ anà kyà tsɛk tsɛk. » Ntɔn ipfɛy a in'kà a ntsür ikaswaŋà naa isal a balàbal byà aŋin'kyɛɛl.
REV 19:9 Un'kyeey mwɛy kàtɛn amɛ naa: « Sɔn: Un'sak akà baar abà bàbel kà un'kyɔm a bɔr a un'tö a un'kɔk. » Nde kàfàkwɛy aba: « Yayi yanswà yà ndaa a Nzam yà ndandaa. »
REV 19:10 Apan, mɛ kàbü an'köm kusà a nde ntɔn mukun'kömà, wɛɛ nde kàtɛn a mɛ naa: « Twon aman'kömà! Mɛ in'wà un'syääl asànaa ngye anà atɔŋ angye abà bàlää unsà imbäl a Yɛsu. Làkoo ngye asà Nzam! » Ntɔn imbäl a Yɛsu kyà dweelà a ngɔɔm.
REV 19:11 Apan, mɛ kàmɛn du làŋàdubà, mpoonà a pɛl kàyàmɛnà. Mbuur kàläär udu awa bàfun'bel « Lää » anà « Ndandaa ». Nde afàtsul nsaŋ anà afànwaan unsà balàbal.
REV 19:12 Mii ande myà asànaa làlɛm a mbaa. Nde we anà mpà a imwol mbɔɔn udu a un'tswe anà ikɔb aŋàsɔn akyà uyöb nde mpɛl.
REV 19:13 Nde wàŋàbwaar kàzak aŋànwɛmà unsà an'kil. Ikɔb ande « Ndaa a Nzam ».
REV 19:14 In'lwaŋ a aŋità a du myàyun'labà udu a mpoonà a pɛɛl, myaŋàbwaar ipfɛy a in'kà a ntsür kyà pɛɛl anà kyà tsɛk tsɛk.
REV 19:15 Kɔm aŋàsye làtoo u mun ande ntɔn mukam in'sɛŋ. Nde asàkal un'kyɛɛŋ aba anà un'aŋ wà ishabà, anà nde asàbwɛɛr rɛzɛ uboo a mpfwee ipölà vin a un'fur a nkyɛl a Nzam Aŋangwal.
REV 19:16 Udu a kàzak ande anà udu a ipɛl ande bàsön ikɔb ki: « Mfum a amfum anà Mwol a amwol ».
REV 19:17 Apan, mɛ kàmɛn un'kyeey aŋàmbar uboo a taaŋ. Nde kasi in'kwɛŋ u ndaa a ngwal akà nɛn yanswà yàyafumà u dudu: « Làyi, làköŋ ntɔn un'kyɔm a kölàköl wà Nzam!
REV 19:18 Abun, yàladi in'twaŋ a amfum, in'twaŋ a amfum a aŋità, in'twaŋ a aŋangwal, in'twaŋ a mpoonà anà myà baar bàfàsyen ya, in'twaŋ a baar banswà, baar a nsaay anà asɔ, ambɛy anà andweer. »
REV 19:19 Ungö apan, mɛ kàmɛn ntsür, amfum a mɛɛn anà in'lwaaŋ a ità aba, bàŋàköŋ ntɔn munwaan a mbuur afàlaar udu a mpoonà anà un'lwaaŋ a ità ande.
REV 19:20 Ntsür bàkyer un'kɔr anà ŋangɔɔm ande wàloor kàkyer idiim ibaŋ kusà ande ntɔn mubwiy ndwaŋ baar abà bàwɛl inyɛm a ntsür anà bàkömà itɛk awa. Ntsür anà ŋangɔɔm a loor batɔɔm bàmɔ̈ɔ̈ u yaaŋ a mbaa.
REV 19:21 Baar bumwɛy bàkyer adwa a kɔm alà làtoo u mun a mbuur kàkäl udu a mpoonà. Nɛn yanswà yàyüür a in'twaŋ aba.
REV 20:1 Apan, mɛ kàmɛn un'kyeey mwɛy an'yàtyà fà du. Nde kàkäär nsab a un'baan anà dwaaŋ a buur.
REV 20:2 Nde kàkör dalàgɔ, ntäy itaan, awà ileŋ anà Satanà, waa kun'bäm dwaaŋ ntɔn mbul nsaab.
REV 20:3 Un'kyeey kun'tɔɔm kà un'baan, kun'bäm a nsab, waa kàbɛɛrà inyɛm udu ande, ntɔn dalàgɔ ukɔ̈ɔ̈n afàbwiy in'sɛŋ ndwaŋ tii isàkwo mbul nsaab. Ungö apan bàkyer asun'tsuuŋ ntɔn kitaaŋ.
REV 20:4 Ungö, mɛ kàmɛn an'kir a imwol. Baar bàbwaayà udu a ma bàwɛl ikɔ̈b mutsul nsaŋ. Mɛ kàmɛn sye mɔ̈ɔ̈ a baar abà batsül in'tswe ntɔn bàtää ba imbäl a Yɛsu anà kyà ndaa a Nzam. Ba bàkömà anki ntsür itàkal idiim awa anà ba bàwɛl anki inyɛm awa u ntabwey, itàkal u kɔɔ. Ba bàkyer awiyà anà bàyaal anà Klistɔ mbul nsaab.
REV 20:5 Akü bumwɛy bàwiyà anki kusà a mbul nsaab mukwo. Ayi yà ngwiiyà yàtàtwɛb.
REV 20:6 Baar ban'wal kab unsà ngwiiyà atàtwɛb ayi, bà aŋun'sak anà aŋin'kyɛɛl! Udu a ba ukwà bàyweel bàsàkal anki. Ba bàsàkal angaŋ a Nzam anà Klistɔ, anà ba bàsàyaal anà Klistɔ mbul nsaab.
REV 20:7 Mpal isàkwo mbul nsaab, Satanà bàkyer asun'twey u bɔlokà ande,
REV 20:8 anà nde asàkyà mukayikur in'sɛŋ amyà kà an'twɛrà a mɛɛn mà anà, ikaswaŋà naa Gɔg anà Magɔg. Nde asaköŋà ntɔn mumwaan ità: un'tal aba wà asànaa ansɛŋ a ngyäl.
REV 20:9 Ba bàbilà a ngwal u mɛɛn manswà, waa bàdiŋà ikal a aŋin'kyɛɛl, iswaŋà naa bul a Nzam lànkween. Wɛɛ mbaa yàfü du, waa yadwä.
REV 20:10 Apan, un'lwɛɛb aba ileŋ, akyà kyàkürà baar, bun'tɔɔm u yaaŋ a mbaa, ntsü abà ntsür anà aŋangɔɔm a loor. Ba bàsàman mpay mpib anà mwäänà u mbul a in'tye.
REV 20:11 Apan, mɛ kàmɛn kir a imwol làkölàköl làpɛɛl anà mbuur kàbwaayà udu a la. Du anà mɛɛn màtiin ukwɛl kusà ande, anà ma bàfàsàman anki.
REV 20:12 Ungö apan mɛ kàmɛn akü, andweer anà ambɛy, bàŋàmbar kusà a kir a imwol. In'kaan bàkyer aduub. Un'kaan asin bàkyer aduub, un'kaan a mɔ̈ɔ̈. Akü batsül nsaŋ, mbuur mbuur mulab nsyääl ande, asànaa bàsön ya uboo a in'kaan.
REV 20:13 Ngyäl kàfuur akü ande, ukwà anà an'lɔŋ màfuur akü ama. Ba banswà batsül nsaŋ, mbuur mbuur asànaa byàkäl isal ande.
REV 20:14 Ukwà anà an'lɔŋ batɔɔm u yaaŋ a mbaa. Yaaŋ a mbaa alà bà ukwà bàyweel.
REV 20:15 Isàkal naa mbuur mwɛy ikɔb ande bàsön anki uboo a un'kaan a mɔ̈ɔ̈, nde bun'tɔɔm u yaaŋ a mbaa.
REV 21:1 Apan, mɛ kàmɛn du akün anà mɛɛn akün. Du làtàtwɛb anà mɛɛn màtàtwɛb màkyàyaalà, anà ngyäl ufàkal anki.
REV 21:2 Mɛ kàmɛn sye bul in'kyɛɛl, Yɛlusàlɛm akün, làfü du apà Nzam, asànaa un'kyay kan'sà ntwɛn ntɔn un'dim ande.
REV 21:3 Mɛ kàwem ndaa mwɛy yàngwal yan'too u kir a imwol yàmutɛn naa: « Le ikal a Nzam anà baar a mɔ̈ɔ̈! Nde asàkal anà ba, anà ba bàsàkal in'sɛŋ ande. Nzam ŋakwo asàkal anà ba, nde asàkal Nzam aba.
REV 21:4 Nde asàkɔɔm làsaaŋ a mii aba lanswà. Ukwà bàfàsàkal anki, itàkal un'saabà, itàkal in'tär, itàkal mpay, ntɔn indiir itaan byàkyàyaalà. »
REV 21:5 Apan, mbuur kàkäl wàŋàbwaay udu a kir a imwol kàtɛn naa: « Le, indiir byanswà mɛ in'kyer byàkün. » Ungö waa nde kàtɛn a mɛ naa: « Sɔn abà, ntɔn ndaa amɛ yà yàndandaa anà yàlää. »
REV 21:6 Apan nde kàtɛn a mɛ naa: « Yan'kwo! Mɛ in'wà Alfa anà Ɔmɛga, nsɛmà anà ntsüü. Akà mbuur awe anà mfwää, mɛ in'sun'pà an'dà a ngway màfàfà u ntwà a an'dà a mɔ̈ɔ̈.
REV 21:7 Mbuur asàwal iböŋ, asàwal kwal là: mɛ in'sàkal Nzam ande, anà nde asàkal mwan amɛ.
REV 21:8 Wɛɛ akà aŋabɔɔmà, akà baar mpa abà aŋàlàkwikilà, akà aŋamɔ̈ɔ̈ aŋingyäy, akà adwää, akà apasàsɛ, akà aŋin'nwɛɛŋ, akà aŋitɛk anà aŋaloor banswà, ikal aba kyà uboo a yaaŋ a mbaa: abà bà ukwà bàyweel. »
REV 21:9 Apan umwɛy uboo a akyeey nsambwaar abà bàkäärà an'kɔɔb nsambwaar màŋàyɔl anà mpay nsambwaar yà ntsüü, kàtɛn a mɛ naa: « Yà, mɛ in'saswaŋ un'kaar aŋàbääl, un'kyay a un'tö a un'kɔk. »
REV 21:10 Nde kan'syen unsà Dweelà udu a mɔŋ akölàköl anà wàbwɛlàbwɛl, waa kan'swɛŋ bul in'kyɛɛl, Yɛlusàlɛm, làfü du apà Nzam.
REV 21:11 La làpɛɛ un'ŋyäŋ a làkoo a Nzam. Un'ŋyäŋ ala kàkäl asànaa un'ŋyäŋ a un'kul a ntal wà talàtal awà bàfàbel naa yaspe.
REV 21:12 La làkäl anà ibä a làpaŋ kyàkölàköl anà kyàbwɛl. La làkäl anà ibeenà, ibeenà kwem aŋiyweel, anà akyeey sye akyeey kwem aŋiyweel ntɔn muleerà ibeenà byàŋàsɔn ikɔb, ikɔb a in'sɛŋ kwem aŋiyweel myà baan a Isàlɛl:
REV 21:13 ibeenà itär ntsü làfàsɛnà taaŋ, ibeenà itär u ntaal, ibeenà itär u ngyɛl, ibeenà itär u ntsü làfàkàminà taaŋ.
REV 21:14 Làpaŋ a bul alà làkäl làŋàtɔŋ udu a nkɔŋ kwem aŋiyweel yà un'bään. Udu aya bàkyàsɔn ikɔb a antööm kwem aŋiyweel bà un'tö a un'kɔk.
REV 21:15 Mbuur kàtɛɛnà a mɛ kàkäl anà isii u kɔɔ: wɛŋwɛŋ là wɔl, ntɔn musi ibeenà anà ibä a bul.
REV 21:16 Ibä a bul byàkäl làsii làmwɛy: un'kɔ̈ ala kàkäl làsii làmwɛy anà ngyamà ala. Nde la kàsi a wɛŋwɛŋ: ma manswà màkäl isi an'kilɔmɛtre nsaab yweel a nkam yweel an'kwem mɔ̈ɔ̈l. Un'kɔ̈, ngyamà anà bwɛl byàkäl làsii làmwɛy la.
REV 21:17 Nde kàsi sye ibä a làpaŋ: kya kyàkäl isi a mɛtre an'kwem nsambwaar aŋiyweel unsà un'kɔ̈.
REV 21:18 Ibä kyàkäl kyàŋàtɔŋ a yaspe, anà bul làkäl làŋàtɔŋ a wɔl aŋàyir là tsɛk tsɛk asànaa talàtal.
REV 21:19 In'bään a ibä a bul myàkäl myàŋàtɔŋ a nkɔŋ a ntal yà ifà ifà: un'bään wàtàtwɛb kàkäl wàŋàtɔŋ a yaspe, wàyweel a safir, wàtär a agate, wànà a ɛmɛrɔde,
REV 21:20 wàtyeen a sardɔniks, wàsyaam a sardwan, wànsambwaar a krizɔlit, wànaan a bɛril, wàwà a tɔpaze, wàkwem a krizɔpraze, wàkwem aŋimwɛy a iyasɛnte, wàkwem aŋiyweel a amɛtiste.
REV 21:21 Ibeenà byàkwem aŋiyweel byàkäl byà an'yak, an'yak kwem aŋiyweel. Ibeenà imwɛy imwɛy kyàkäl kyàŋàkyer a yak làmwɛy. Balàbal akölàköl là bul làkäl là wɔl aŋàyir asànaa kɔɔb a talàtal.
REV 21:22 Wɛɛ mɛ kàmɛn anki ndwà a Nzam u bul alà, ntɔn ndwà a Nzam ala wà Mwol, Nzam Aŋangwal anà un'tö a un'kɔk.
REV 21:23 Bul alà làkäl anki anà mfun a taaŋ itàkal nsöŋ ntɔn mupà la kyɛɛy. Ntɔn làkoo a Nzam làfàpà kyɛɛy anà un'tö a un'kɔk wà mwinà ala.
REV 21:24 In'sɛŋ myàsakyeenà a kyɛɛy ande, anà amfum a mɛɛn bàsun'twäälà làkoo aba.
REV 21:25 Ibeenà a bul byàsàkal byà ipɔl mwäänà aŋun'kiinà, tɔn kwo mpib isàkal anki.
REV 21:26 Wɛɛ bàsàtwaal làkoo anà ibyääl a in'sɛŋ kwo.
REV 21:27 Làbiin làsàbilà anki kwo, itàkal un'pasàsɛ anà ŋaloor, wɛɛ baar abà bàŋàsɔn uboo a un'kaan a mɔ̈ɔ̈ a un'tö a un'kɔk mpɛl.
REV 22:1 Un'kyeey kan'swɛŋ sye ngyäl a an'dà a mɔ̈ɔ̈, wàmutà in'ŋyäŋ asànaa talàtal. An'dà amà màkäl mutoo u kir a Nzam anà là un'tö a un'kɔk.
REV 22:2 Uboboo a balàbal a kölàköl làbul, uboboo a indek myeel myà ngyäl, we anà un'te a mɔ̈ɔ̈. Wa kàfabɔrà mbalà kwem aŋiyweel anà kàpɛɛ imbɛŋ ngɔn wanswà. Nkay awa yà ntɔn mukɔɔr in'sɛŋ.
REV 22:3 Un'küül ufàsàkal anki. Kir a imwol a Nzam anà un'tö a un'kɔk làsàkal uboo a bul, anà asyääl ande bàkyer asun'syäŋà.
REV 22:4 Ba bàsàman ntabwey ande anà ikɔb ande isàkal kyàŋàsɔn u ntabwey aba.
REV 22:5 Làpib làfàsàkal anki, ba bàfàsàkal anki anà mfun a pɛɛlà a mwinà itàkal làtaaŋ, ntɔn Mwol Nzam asàsà pɛɛlà ande udu a ba. Waa ba bàsàyaal mbul a in'tye.
REV 22:6 Ungö apan un'kyeey kàtɛn a mɛ naa: « Ndaa ayi yà ndandaa anà yà lää. Anà Mwol, Nzam a an'dweelà a aŋangɔɔm, kàtöm un'kyeey ande, ntɔn muswaŋ akà asyääl ande ndaa ayiyà u kitaaŋ. »
REV 22:7 Yɛsu kàtɛn naa: « Le, mɛ in'wàmuyà agyä. Un'sak akà mbuur afàsyääl ndaa a ngɔɔm a un'kaan wà! »
REV 22:8 Mɛ Ywan kàwem anà kàmɛn indiir abi. Ungö muwem anà muman bya, mɛ kàbü an'köm kà in'kɔl a un'kyeey awà kan'swɛŋà bya, ntɔn mukun'kömà.
REV 22:9 Wɛɛ nde kàtɛn a mɛ naa: « Twon aman'kömà! Mɛ in'wà un'syääl asànaa ngye, asànaa atɔŋ angye aŋangɔɔm anà baar banswà bàfàsyääl ndaa a un'kaan awà. Ngye akömà Nzam! »
REV 22:10 Nde kàfàtɛn a mɛ naa: « Twon an'yee ndaa a ngɔɔm a un'kaan wà, ntɔn taaŋ lye tsütsü.
REV 22:11 Wɛy mbuur afàkyer ube uläb mukyer ube anà aŋàŋingyäy uläb mukyer ŋingyäy, wɛɛ mbuur afàkyer balàbal uläb mukyer balàbal, anà ŋun'kyɛɛl uläb mukyɛɛl. »
REV 22:12 Nde kàkwɛy naa: « Le, mɛ in'wàmuyà agyä. Mɛ in'yàtwaal bweel mupà akà mbuur mbuur asànaa akyà isal ande.
REV 22:13 Mɛ in'wà Alfa anà Ɔmɛga, iswaŋà naa wàtàtwɛb anà wàntsüü, nsɛmà anà ntsüü.
REV 22:14 « Un'sak akà baar abà ban'sɔŋ ipfɛy aba, ntɔn mukal anà ikɔ̈b mudyà mbɛŋ a un'te a mɔ̈ɔ̈, anà mubilà u min a mbwo a bul.
REV 22:15 Wɛɛ mbwà, aŋin'nwɛŋ, apasàsɛ, adwää, aŋitɛk, anà baar banswà bàfàkwen anà bàfàtà loor bàsàkal u nsà a bul.
REV 22:16 « Mɛ, Yɛsu, mɛ kàtöm un'kyeey amɛ mutà imbäl a indiir abi akà bɛ ntɔn Ikööŋ. Mɛ, mɛ in'wà un'swɛy anà ywar a David, mbwaar afàpà in'ŋyäŋ u tutu. »
REV 22:17 Dweelà anà Un'kyay ban'tɛn naa: « Yà! » Wɛy mbuur kan'wem ya utɛn naa: « Yà! » Wɛy mbuur awe anà mpfwää uyi. Wɛy mbuur akwen an'dà a mɔ̈ɔ̈ uwɛl mà màngway.
REV 22:18 Mɛ, Ywan, mɛ an'weey mbuur wanswà kan'wem ndaa a ngɔɔm a un'kaan wà naa: isàkal naa mbuur kan'kwɛy undiir udu aya, Nzam ayun'kwɛy ntaaŋàmbar ayà bàsön uboo a un'kaan a ngɔɔm awà.
REV 22:19 Isàkal naa mbuur kan'lwom ndaa yanswà ayà uboo a un'kaan a ngɔɔm awà, Nzam asàlwom kab ande uboo a un'te a mɔ̈ɔ̈ anà uboo a bul in'kyɛɛl amà bàsön uboo a un'kaan awà.
REV 22:20 Un'tɛɛl imbäl a indiir abi kan'tɛn naa: « Inye, mɛ in'wàmuyà agyä! » Yà abwɛy! Mwol Yɛsu, yà!
REV 22:21 Wɛy kab a ngway a Mwol Yɛsu làkäl anà bɛ banswà.
